GE07hv_apppu:0: [h: HV (CE) appendix 1, transliterated by Peter Bisschop,
GE07hv_apppu:2: [k: After 7.45, S1 K1.3 Dn Ds D1.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3: prathame merusāvarṇe pravakṣyāmi munīñ śṛṇu // HV_App.I,1.1 //
GE07hv_apppu:4: meghātithis tu paulastyo vasuḥ kāśyapa eva ca / HV_App.I,1.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:5: jyotiṣmān bhārgavaś caiva dyutimān aṅgirās tathā // HV_App.I,1.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:6: savanaś caiva vāsiṣṭha ātreyo havyavāhanaḥ / HV_App.I,1.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:7: paulahaḥ sapta ity ete ṛṣayo rohite 'ntare // HV_App.I,1.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:8: devatānāṃ gaṇās tatra traya eva narādhipa / HV_App.I,1.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:9: dakṣaputrasya putrās te rohitasya prajāpateḥ // HV_App.I,1.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:11: pṛthuśravā bhūridyumna ṛcīko bṛhato gayaḥ / HV_App.I,1.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:12: prathamasya tu sāvarṇer nava putrā mahaujasaḥ // HV_App.I,1.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:13: daśame tv atha paryāye dvitīyasyāntare manoḥ / HV_App.I,1.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:14: haviṣmān paulahaś caiva sukṛtiś caiva bhārgavaḥ / HV_App.I,1.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:15: āpomūrtis tathātreyo vāsiṣṭhaś cāṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,1.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:16: paulastyaḥ pramatiś caiva nābhogaś caiva kāśyapaḥ / HV_App.I,1.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:17: aṅgirā nabhasaḥ satyaḥ saptaite paramarṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,1.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:18: devatānāṃ gaṇau dvau tau ṛṣimantrāś ca ye smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,1.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:19: manoḥ sutottamaujāś ca nikuṣañjaś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,1.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:21: bhūridyumnaḥ suvarcāś ca daśa tv ete manoḥ sutāḥ // HV_App.I,1.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:23: tasya saptaṛṣīṃś cāpi kīrtyamānān nibodha me // HV_App.I,1.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:24: haviṣmān kāśyapaś cāpi haviṣmān yaś ca bhārgavaḥ / HV_App.I,1.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:25: taruṇaś ca tathātreyo vāsiṣṭhas tv anaghas tathā // HV_App.I,1.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:26: aṅgirāś cārudhiṣṇyaś ca paulastyo niścaras tathā / HV_App.I,1.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:27: paulahaś cāgnitejāś ca bhāvyāḥ sapta maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,1.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:28: brahmaṇas tu sutā devā gaṇās teṣāṃ trayaḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,1.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:29: sarvatragaḥ suśarmā ca devānīkaḥ purūdvahaḥ // HV_App.I,1.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:30: kṣemadhanvā dṛḍhāyuś ca ādarśaḥ paṇḍako manuḥ / HV_App.I,1.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:31: sāvarṇasya tu putrā vai tṛtīyasya nava smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,1.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:32: caturthasya tu sāvarṇer ṛṣīn sapta nibodha me / HV_App.I,1.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:33: dyutir vasiṣṭhaputraś ca ātreyaḥ sutapās tathā // HV_App.I,1.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:34: aṅgirās tapasomūrtis tapasvī kāśyapas tathā / HV_App.I,1.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:35: tapośanaś ca paulastyaḥ paulahaś ca tapo raviḥ // HV_App.I,1.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:36: bhārgavaḥ saptamas teṣāṃ vijñeyas tu tapodhṛtiḥ / HV_App.I,1.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:37: pañca devagaṇāḥ proktā mānasā brahmaṇaś ca te // HV_App.I,1.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:38: devavāyur adūraś ca devaśreṣṭho vidūrathaḥ / HV_App.I,1.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:39: mitravān mitravindaś ca mitrasenaś ca mitrakṛt / HV_App.I,1.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:40: mitrabāhuḥ suvarcāś ca dvādaśasya manoḥ sutāḥ // HV_App.I,1.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:41: trayodaśe 'tha paryāye bhāvye manvantare manoḥ / HV_App.I,1.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:42: aṅgirāś caiva dhṛtimān paulastyo havyapastu yaḥ // HV_App.I,1.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:43: paulahas tattvadarśī ca bhārgavaś ca nirutsukaḥ / HV_App.I,1.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:44: niṣprakampas tathātreyo nirmohaḥ kaśyapas tathā // HV_App.I,1.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:45: sutapāś caiva vāsiṣṭhaḥ saptaite tu maharṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,1.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:46: traya eva gaṇāḥ proktā devatānāṃ svayaṃbhuvā // HV_App.I,1.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:47: trayodaśasya putrās te vijñeyās tu ruceḥ sutāḥ / HV_App.I,1.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:48: citraseno vicitraś ca nayo dharmabhṛto dhṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,1.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:49: sunetraḥ kṣatravṛddhaś ca sutapā nirbhayo dṛḍhaḥ / HV_App.I,1.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:50: raucyasyaite manoḥ putrā antare tu trayodaśe // HV_App.I,1.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:51: caturdaśe 'tha paryāye bhautyasya evāntare manoḥ / HV_App.I,1.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:52: agnīdhraḥ kāśyapaś caiva paulasyo māgadhas tathā // HV_App.I,1.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:53: bhārgavo hy atibāhuś ca śucir āṅgirasas tathā / HV_App.I,1.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:54: yuktaś caiva tathātreyaḥ śukro vāsiṣṭha eva ca / HV_App.I,1.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:55: ajitaḥ paulahaś caiva antyāḥ saptarṣayaś ca te // HV_App.I,1.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:56: [h: HV (CE) appendix 2, transliterated by Peter Bisschop,
GE07hv_apppu:59: N (except S1 N1) T2-4 G ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:61: manvantarasya saṃkhyānaṃ yugānāṃ ca mahāmate / HV_App.I,2.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:62: brahmaṇo 'hnaḥ pramāṇaṃ ca vaktum arhasi me dvija // HV_App.I,2.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:64: ahorātraṃ vibhajate sūryo mānena laukikam / HV_App.I,2.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:65: tām upādāya gaṇanāṃ śṛṇu saṃkhyām ariṃdama // HV_App.I,2.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:66: nimeṣaiḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kāṣṭhā triṃśat tu tāḥ kalā / HV_App.I,2.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:67: triṃśatkalo muhūrtas tu triṃśatā tair manīṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,2.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:68: ahorātram iti prāhuś candrasūryagatiṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,2.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:71: viśeṣeṇa tu sarveṣu ahorātraṃ ca nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,2.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:72: ahotrātrāḥ pañcadaśa pakṣa ity abhiśabditaḥ / HV_App.I,2.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:73: pakṣau dvau ca smṛto māso dvau māsāv ṛtur ucyate // HV_App.I,2.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:74: abdaṃ dvyayanam uktaṃ tu ayanaṃ tv ṛtubhis tribhiḥ / HV_App.I,2.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:77: pitṝṇāṃ tad ahorātram iti kālavido viduḥ // HV_App.I,2.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:78: kṛṣṇapakṣas tv ahas teṣāṃ śuklapakṣas tu śarvarī / HV_App.I,2.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:79: kṛṣṇapakṣe tv ahaḥśrāddhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vartate nṛpa // HV_App.I,2.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:80: mānuṣeṇa tu mānena yo vai saṃvatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,2.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:82: divyam ekam ahas tena tathā māsābdasaṃsthitiḥ / **HV_App.I,2.17**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:83: devānāṃ tad ahorātraṃ divā caivottarāyaṇam // HV_App.I,2.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:86: dakṣiṇāyanaṃ smṛtā rātriḥ prājñais tattvārthakovidaiḥ // HV_App.I,2.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:88: divyam abdaṃ daśaguṇam ahorātraṃ manoḥ smṛtam / HV_App.I,2.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:89: ahorātraṃ daśaguṇaṃ mānavaḥ pakṣa ucyate // HV_App.I,2.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:90: pakṣo daśaguṇo māso māsair dvādaśabhir guṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,2.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:91: ṛtur manūnāṃ saṃproktaḥ prājñais tattvārthadarśibhiḥ // HV_App.I,2.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:92: ṛtutrayeṇa tv ayanaṃ taddvayenaiva vatsaraḥ / HV_App.I,2.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:93: [k: For line 24, N2.3 V B2 D6 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:94: ṣaḍbhis tair vatsaraṃ proktaṃ tena saṃkhyā nibadhyate / **HV_App.I,2.24**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:95: catvāry eva sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tu kṛtaṃ yugam // HV_App.I,2.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:96: tāvac chatī bhavet saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tathā nṛpa / HV_App.I,2.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:97: trīṇi varṣasahasrāṇi tretā syāt parimāṇataḥ / HV_App.I,2.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:98: tasyāś ca triśatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tathāparaḥ // HV_App.I,2.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:99: tathā varṣasahasre dve dvāparaṃ parikīrtitam // HV_App.I,2.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:100: tasyāpi dviśatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāśaś ca tathāvidhaḥ // HV_App.I,2.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:102: kalir varṣasahasraṃ tu saṃkhyāto 'tra manīṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,2.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:103: tasyāpi śatikā saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś caiva tadvidhaḥ // HV_App.I,2.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:105: divyenānena mānena yugasaṃkhyāṃ nibodha me // HV_App.I,2.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:107: sasarja sa punas tāta jagat sarvam idaṃ vibhuḥ / **HV_App.I,2.34**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:108: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliś caiva caturyugam / HV_App.I,2.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:109: yugaṃ tad ekasaptatyā guṇitaṃ nṛpasattama / HV_App.I,2.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:111: ayanaṃ cāpi tat proktaṃ dve 'yane dakṣiṇottare // HV_App.I,2.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:112: manuḥ pralīyate hy atra samāpte 'thāyane prabho / HV_App.I,2.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:116: tato 'paro manuḥ kālam etāvantaṃ bhavaty uta / HV_App.I,2.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:117: samatīteṣu rājendra proktaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ sa vai // HV_App.I,2.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:118: tad eva cāyutaṃ proktaṃ muninā tattvadarśinā / HV_App.I,2.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:119: brahmaṇas tad ahaḥ proktaṃ kalpaś ceti sa śabdyate // HV_App.I,2.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:123: sahasrayugaparyantā yā niśā procyate budhaiḥ / HV_App.I,2.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:125: tasmin yugasahasre tu pūrṇe bharatasattama / HV_App.I,2.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:126: brāhme divasaparyante kalpo niḥśeṣa ucyate // HV_App.I,2.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:127: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 3, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:130: [k: D6 T G M1.3.4 ins. appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:132: ity ete pitaro devā devāś ca pitaraḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,3.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:133: anyonyaṃ pitaro hy ete devāś ca pitaraś ca ha // HV_App.I,3.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:134: trayo mūrtim ṛte tāta catvāras tu samūrtayaḥ / HV_App.I,3.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:135: teṣāṃ śrāddhāni satkṛtya devāḥ kurvanti yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,3.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:136: bhaktāḥ prāñjalayaś caiva devās tadgatamānasāḥ / HV_App.I,3.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:137: viśve ca sikatāś caiva pṛśnayaḥ śṛṅgiṇas tathā // HV_App.I,3.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:138: kṛṣṇā viśvā ajāś caiva vidhivat pūjayanty uta / HV_App.I,3.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:139: prajās tu vātaraśanā divākīrtyās tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,3.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:140: meghāś ca marutaś caiva brahmādyāś ca divaukasaḥ / HV_App.I,3.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:141: bhṛgvaṅgirotripramukhā ṛṣayaḥ sarva eva ca // HV_App.I,3.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:142: yakṣā nāgāḥ suparṇāś ca kiṃnarāś cāraṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,3.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:143: pūjayanti pitṝn ete sarva eva phalārthina // HV_App.I,3.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:144: evam ete mahātmānaḥ śrāddhaiḥ satkṛtya pūjitāḥ / HV_App.I,3.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:145: sarvān kāmān prayacchanti śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,3.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:147: mokṣayogaṃ prayacchanti aiśvaryaṃ ca pitāmahāḥ // HV_App.I,3.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:149: kṛtsnaṃ vairāgyam ānantyaṃ prayacchanti pitāmahāḥ // HV_App.I,3.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:150: aiśvaryavihitaṃ yogam aiśvaryaṃ yoga ucyate / HV_App.I,3.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:151: yogaiśvaryam ṛte mokṣaḥ kathaṃcin nopapadyate / HV_App.I,3.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:156: koṭiśaś caiva ratnāni prayacchanti pitāmahāḥ // HV_App.I,3.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:159: vimānānāṃ sahasrāṇi juṣṭāny apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,3.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:161: prajāṃ puṣṭiṃ dhṛtiṃ medhāṃ rājyam ārogyam eva ca / HV_App.I,3.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:162: prītā nityaṃ prayacchanti mānuṣāṇāṃ pitāmahāḥ // HV_App.I,3.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:163: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 4, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:166: [k: D6 S G(ed.) ins. Appendix I, No. 4 after 13.75 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:168: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kriyākalpaṃ yathāvidhi / HV_App.I,4.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:170: āgrahāyaṇamūlāḥ syur aśṭakās tisra eva ca / HV_App.I,4.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:171: kṛṣṇapakṣe variṣṭhā ca pūrvā caindrī ca bhāṣitā / HV_App.I,4.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:172: prājāpatyā dvitīyā syāt tṛtīyā vaiśvadevikī // HV_App.I,4.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:173: ādyāpūpaiḥ smṛtā nityaṃ māṃsair anyā bhavet sadā / HV_App.I,4.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:174: śākaiḥ kāryā tṛtīyā syād eṣa dravyagato vidhiḥ / HV_App.I,4.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:175: anvaṣṭakyaṃ pitṝṇāṃ vai nityam eva vidhīyate // HV_App.I,4.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:176: yā cāpy anyā caturthī syāt tāṃ ca kuryāt prayatnataḥ / HV_App.I,4.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:177: āyuḥśrāddhaṃ budhaḥ kuryāt sarvasvenāpi nityaśaḥ / HV_App.I,4.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:178: śreyāṃsi kṣipram āyānti paratreha ca modate // HV_App.I,4.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:180: sarve puruṣam āyānti nipāneṣv iva dhenavaḥ // HV_App.I,4.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:181: mā sma śreyaḥ prayaccheyur aṣṭakāyām apūjitāḥ / HV_App.I,4.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:182: moghās tasya bhavanty āśāḥ paratreha ca nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,4.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:184: devāṃś ca dāyino yānti tiryag gacchanty adāyinaḥ // HV_App.I,4.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:185: puṣṭiṃ prajāṃ smṛtiṃ medhāṃ putrān aiśvaryam eva ca / HV_App.I,4.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:186: kurvāṇaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ tu sarvaṃ saṃpūrṇam aśnute // HV_App.I,4.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:187: pratipaddhanalābhāya labdhaṃ cāsya na naśyati / HV_App.I,4.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:188: dvitīyāyāṃ tu yaḥ kuryād dvipadādhipatir bhavet // HV_App.I,4.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:189: phalārthināṃ tṛtīyā tu śatrughnī pāpanāśanī / HV_App.I,4.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:190: caturthyāṃ vai prakurvāṇaḥ śatrucchidrāṇi paśyati // HV_App.I,4.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:191: pañcamyām api kurvāṇaḥ prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam / HV_App.I,4.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:192: ṣaṣṭhyāṃ śrāddhāni kurvāṇaḥ prāpnoti dvijapūjanam // HV_App.I,4.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:193: kurute yas tu saptamyāṃ śrāddhāni satataṃ naraḥ / HV_App.I,4.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:194: mahāsatram avāpnoti gaṇānāṃ cādhipo bhavet // HV_App.I,4.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:195: pūrṇāṃ vṛttim avāpnoti yo 'ṣṭamyāṃ kurute naraḥ / HV_App.I,4.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:196: śrāddhaṃ navamyāṃ kartavyam aiśvaryaṃ nṛṣu kāṅkṣatā // HV_App.I,4.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:197: kurvan daśamyāṃ tu naro brāhmīṃ śriyam avāpnuyāt / HV_App.I,4.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:198: vedāṃś caivāpnuyāt sarvān viprāṇāṃ saṃmato bhavet // HV_App.I,4.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:199: ekādaśyāṃ paraṃ dānam aiśvaryaṃ saṃtatiṃ tathā / HV_App.I,4.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:200: dvādaśyāṃ jayalābhāya rājyam āyur vasūni ca // HV_App.I,4.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:201: prajāvṛddhiṃ maśūn medhyān svātantryaṃ puṣṭim uttamām / HV_App.I,4.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:202: dīrgham āyur athaiśvaryaṃ kurvāṇasya trayodaśīm // HV_App.I,4.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:203: yuvān astu gṛhe yasya mṛtās teṣāṃ pradāpayet / HV_App.I,4.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:204: śastreṇa vā hatā ye tu teṣāṃ dadyāc caturdaśīm // HV_App.I,4.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:205: amāvāsyāṃ prayatnena śrāddhaṃ kuryāc chuciḥ sadā / HV_App.I,4.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:206: sarvān kāmān avāpnoti svarge cānantyam aśnute // HV_App.I,4.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:207: annaṃ dadyād amāvāsyāṃ somasyāpyāyanaṃ bhavet / HV_App.I,4.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:209: lokaṃ mānavam āpnoti tatra sarvam samaśnute / **HV_App.I,4.40**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:210: evam āpyāyitaḥ somas trīṃl lokān dhārayiṣyati // HV_App.I,4.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:212: stavaiḥ puṇyair manojñaiś ca sarvakāmaparicchadaiḥ // HV_App.I,4.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:215: stuvanti devagandharvāḥ siddhasaṃghāś ca taṃ sadā / HV_App.I,4.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:216: pitṛbhaktas tv amāvāsyāṃ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,4.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:217: maghāsu kurvañ śrāddhāni sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt / HV_App.I,4.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:218: pratyakṣam arcitās tena bhavanti pitaraḥ sadā / HV_App.I,4.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:219: pitṛdevā maghā yasmāt tasmāt tāsv akṣayaṃ viduḥ // HV_App.I,4.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:221: yamas tu yāni śrāddhāni provāca śaśabindave / HV_App.I,4.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:222: tāni me śṛṇu kāmyāni nakṣatreṣu pṛthak pṛthak // HV_App.I,4.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:223: śrāddhaṃ yaḥ kṛttikāyoge kurvīta satataṃ naraḥ / HV_App.I,4.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:226: durgāṇi tarate nityaṃ dhṛtimān puṣṭimān bhavet / **HV_App.I,4.54**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:228: krūrakarmaṇi bhāgī syād ārdrāyāṃ śrāddham ācaran / HV_App.I,4.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:229: kṣetre putreṣu bhāgī syāc chrāddhaṃ kurvan punarvasau / HV_App.I,4.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:233: ārdrāyāṃ nītimān saumyaḥ puṣṭimāṃś ca punarvasau / **HV_App.I,4.57**3:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:234: puṣṭikāmaḥ punaḥ puṣye śrāddhaṃ kurvīta mānavaḥ // HV_App.I,4.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:235: āśleṣāsu punar dattvā vīrān putrān avāpnuyāt / HV_App.I,4.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:236: śreṣṭho bhavati bandhūnāṃ maghāsu śrāddham ācaran // HV_App.I,4.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:237: phalgunīṣu punaḥ kṛtvā saubhāgyaṃ labhate naraḥ / HV_App.I,4.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:238: pradānaśīlaḥ sāpatya uttarāsu karoti yaḥ // HV_App.I,4.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:239: saṃsatsu mukhyo bhavati haste yas tarpayet pitṝn / HV_App.I,4.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:240: citrāyāṃ kurute yas tu putrān rūpavato labhet / HV_App.I,4.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:241: svātinā tu dvijaḥ kuryād vāṇijyena jijīviṣuḥ / HV_App.I,4.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:242: putrārthaṃ tu viśākhāsu śrāddham īheta mānavaḥ // HV_App.I,4.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:243: anurādhāsu kurvāṇo naraś cakraṃ pravartayet / HV_App.I,4.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:244: ādhipatyaṃ labhec chrāddhaṃ jyeṣṭhāyāṃ kurute hi yaḥ // HV_App.I,4.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:246: tathottarāsv aṣāḍhāsu vītaśoko bhaven naraḥ // HV_App.I,4.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:247: śravaṇena tu lokeṣu prāpnuyāt paramāṃ gatiṃ / HV_App.I,4.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:248: rājyabhogāñ śraviṣṭhāsu prāpnuyād vipulaṃ dhanam // HV_App.I,4.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:249: śrāddhaṃ tv abhijitā kurvan vedān sāṅgān avāpnuyāt / HV_App.I,4.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:250: nakṣatre vāruṇe kurvan bhiṣaksiddhim avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,4.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:251: pūrvaproṣṭhapade kurvan vindate jīvitaṃ bahu / HV_App.I,4.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:252: uttarāsu punaḥ kurvaṃl labhate gāḥ sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,4.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:253: revatyāṃ kurute yas tu rūpyaṃ bahu labhen naraḥ / HV_App.I,4.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:254: aśvinīṣu hayāñ śreṣṭhān bharaṇyām āyur uttamam // HV_App.I,4.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:255: imaṃ śrāddhavidhiṃ kurvañ śaśabindur mahīm imām / HV_App.I,4.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:256: akleśenālabhat kṛtsnāṃ labdhvā ca praśaśāsa ha // HV_App.I,4.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:258: rājataṃ rajatāktaṃ vā pitṝṇāṃ pātram ucyate / HV_App.I,4.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:259: rajatasya kathā vāpi darśanaṃ dānam eva ca / HV_App.I,4.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:260: ānantyam akṣayaṃ svargyaṃ rājataṃ dānam ucyate // HV_App.I,4.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:261: pitṝṇāṃ tena dānena satputrās tārayanty uta / HV_App.I,4.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:262: paṭhyamānaḥ sadā śrāddhe niyato brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,4.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:263: rājate hi svadhā dugdhā pātre 'smin pitṛbhiḥ purā / HV_App.I,4.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:264: akṣayārthaṃ mahī yasmāt tasmin dattam ato 'kṣayam // HV_App.I,4.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:265: kṛṣṇājinasya sāṃnidhyaṃ darśanaṃ dānam eva ca / HV_App.I,4.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:266: rakṣoghnaṃ brahmavarcasyaṃ paśūn putrāṃś ca tārayet // HV_App.I,4.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:267: kāñcanaṃ rājataṃ pātraṃ dauhitraḥ kutapas tilāḥ / HV_App.I,4.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:268: bastaś ca pāvanīyāni tridaṇḍī yoginas tathā // HV_App.I,4.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:269: śrāddhakarmaṇy ayaṃ śreṣṭho vidhir brahman sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,4.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:270: āyuḥ puṣṭir yaśaḥ kīrtiḥ prajñā saṃtativardhanaḥ // HV_App.I,4.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:273: vakṣyāmi vidhivat sthānaṃ pitṝṇām iti śāstrataḥ / HV_App.I,4.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:275: tatra gartās trayaḥ kāryās trayo daṇḍāś ca khādirāḥ / HV_App.I,4.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:276: aratnimātrās te kāryā rajatena vibhūṣitāḥ // HV_App.I,4.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:277: te vitastyāyatā gartāḥ sarvataś caturaṅgulāḥ / HV_App.I,4.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:278: prāgdakṣiṇāyatāḥ kāryāḥ sthirā naśuṣirās tathā // HV_App.I,4.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:279: adbhiḥ pavitrapūtābhiḥ plāvayet satataṃ śuciḥ / HV_App.I,4.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:280: payobhyām ājagavyābhyāṃ śodhanaṃ vāgbhir eva ca // HV_App.I,4.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:281: tarpaṇaṃ satataṃ hy etat tṛptir bhavati śāśvatī / HV_App.I,4.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:282: iha cāmutra ca śrīmān sarvakāmasamanvitaḥ // HV_App.I,4.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:283: evaṃ triṣavaṇasnāto yo 'rcayet prayataḥ sadā / HV_App.I,4.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:284: mantreṇa vidhivat samyak so 'śvamedhaphalaṃ labhet / HV_App.I,4.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:285: triḥsaptasaṃjñās te yasmāt trailokyaṃ dhāryate hi taiḥ // HV_App.I,4.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:286: tasya puṣṭir athaiśvaryam āyuḥ saṃtatir eva ca / HV_App.I,4.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:287: divi ca bhrājate lakṣmyā mokṣaṃ ca labhate kramāt // HV_App.I,4.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:289: mantraṃ tasmād ahaṃ vakṣye amṛtaṃ brahmasaṃmitam // HV_App.I,4.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:290: devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca mahāyogibhya eva ca / HV_App.I,4.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:291: namaḥ svadhāyai svāhāyai nityam eva namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,4.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:292: ādyāvasāne śrāddhasya trirāvṛttaṃ japet sadā / HV_App.I,4.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:293: aśvamedhaphalaṃ hy etad vipraiḥ satkṛtya pūjitam // HV_App.I,4.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:294: piṇḍanirvāpaṇe cāpi japed evaṃ samāhitaḥ / HV_App.I,4.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:295: pitaraḥ kṣipram āyānti rākṣasāḥ pradravanti ca // HV_App.I,4.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:296: pitryo 'yaṃ triṣu lokeṣu mantro 'yaṃ tārayaty uta / HV_App.I,4.119 /
GE07hv_apppu:297: paṭhyamānaḥ sadā śrāddhe niyatair brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,4.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:298: rājyakāmo japed evaṃ sadā mantram atandritaḥ / HV_App.I,4.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:300: prīyante pitaro yena japena niyamena ca / HV_App.I,4.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:303: namasyāmi sadā teṣāṃ dhyāyināṃ yogacakṣuṣām // HV_App.I,4.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:304: indrādīnāṃ ca pitaro dakṣamārīcayos tathā / HV_App.I,4.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:305: pitaraḥ saptarṣīṇāṃ ca tān namasyāmi kāmadān // HV_App.I,4.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:307: tān namaskṛtya sarvān vai pitṝñ jalasamudrayoḥ // HV_App.I,4.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:308: nakṣatrāṇāṃ grahāṇāṃ ca vāyvagnipitaraś ca ye / HV_App.I,4.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:309: dyāvāpṛthivyoś ca sadā namasye 'haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // HV_App.I,4.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:313: etac ca vidhinā yuktaḥ śrīmān kuryān narādhipa / **HV_App.I,4.133**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:315: prajāpater gavāṃ vahneḥ somāya ca yamāya ca / HV_App.I,4.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:316: yogeśvarebhyaś ca sadā namasye 'haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // HV_App.I,4.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:317: namaḥ pitṛgaṇebhyas saptabhyo ye ca kīrtitāḥ / HV_App.I,4.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:319: etad uktaṃ ca saptarcaṃ devarṣigaṇapūjitam / HV_App.I,4.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:320: pavitraṃ paramaṃ hy etac chrīmad rakṣoghnam eva ca // HV_App.I,4.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:321: etena vidhinā yuktas trīn varāṃl labhate naraḥ / HV_App.I,4.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:322: bhaktyā paramayā yuktaḥ śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ // HV_App.I,4.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:323: saptarcaṃ tu japed yas tu nityam eva samāhitaḥ / HV_App.I,4.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:325: yena proktas tv ayaṃ kalpo namas tasmai svayaṃbhuve / HV_App.I,4.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:326: mahāyogeśvarebhyaś ca sadā saṃpraṇato 'smy aham // HV_App.I,4.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:327: vartante pitaras tāta devānāṃ divi devatāḥ / HV_App.I,4.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:328: saptasv ete sthitā nityaṃ sthāneṣu pitaro 'vyayāḥ // HV_App.I,4.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:329: prajāpatisutā ete sarveṣāṃ tu mahātmanām / HV_App.I,4.149 /
GE07hv_apppu:330: ādyo gaṇas tu yogīnāṃ sa nityo yogavardhanaḥ // HV_App.I,4.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:331: dvitīyo devatānāṃ tu tṛtīyo dānavādinām / HV_App.I,4.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:334: śeṣās tu varṇināṃ jñeyā iti sarve prakīrtitāḥ // HV_App.I,4.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:335: pitṝn prīṇāti yo bhaktyā pitaraḥ prīṇayanti tam / HV_App.I,4.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:336: yacchanti pitaraḥ prītāḥ prajāṃ puṣṭiṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,4.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:337: svargam āyuṣyam ārogyaṃ yad anyad api vāñchitam // HV_App.I,4.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:338: devakāryād api mune pitṛkāryaṃ praśasyate / HV_App.I,4.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:339: devatānāṃ hi pitaraḥ pūrvam āyatanaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,4.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:340: te suprasādāḥ suprītā lokasyāpyāyanaṃ param / HV_App.I,4.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:341: sthiraprasādāś ca sadā tān namasyasva bhārgava // HV_App.I,4.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:342: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 5, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:345: [k: K2.4 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1-3.5.6 T G ins. appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:349: andhaṃ cakāra gāṅgeya jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ purā vibho // HV_App.I,5.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:350: ciroṣitā gṛhe cāpi kimarthaṃ caiva tasya sā / HV_App.I,5.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:351: cakāra vipriyam idaṃ tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,5.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:352: pūjanīyā cakārāsau kiṃ sakhyaṃ tena caiva ha / HV_App.I,5.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:353: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ sarvaṃ prabravīhi yathātatham // HV_App.I,5.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:355: śṛṇu sarvaṃ mahārāja yathā vṛttam abhūt purā / HV_App.I,5.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:356: brahmadattasya bhavane tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira // HV_App.I,5.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:357: kācic chakuntikā rājan brahmadattasya vai sakhī / HV_App.I,5.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:359: sakhī sā brahmadattasya sudṛḍhaṃ baddhasauhṛdā / HV_App.I,5.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:360: tasyāḥ kulāyam abhavad gehe tasya narottama // HV_App.I,5.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:361: sā sadāhani nirgatya tasya rājño gṛhottamāt / HV_App.I,5.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:367: caritvā teṣu sā rājan niśi kāmpilyam āgamat / HV_App.I,5.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:368: nṛpater bhavanaṃ pārtha brahmadattasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,5.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:369: rājñā tena sadā rājan kathāyogaṃ cakāra sā // HV_App.I,5.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:370: āścaryāṇi ca sarvāṇi yāni vṛttāni kānicit / HV_App.I,5.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:371: carantī vividhān deśān kathayām āsa sā niśi // HV_App.I,5.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:372: kadācit tasya nṛpater brahmadattasya kaurava / HV_App.I,5.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:373: putro 'bhūd rājaśārdūla sarvasena iti śrutaḥ // HV_App.I,5.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:374: pūjanīyā ca sā tasmin prasūtāṇḍam athāpi ca / HV_App.I,5.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:375: tasmin nīḍe purā hy ekaṃ śakalāt prāsphuṭat tadā // HV_App.I,5.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:378: cakṣuṣmān apy abhūt paścād īṣat pakṣotthitaś ca ha // HV_App.I,5.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:379: atha sā pūjanīyā vai rājaputrasvaputrayoḥ / HV_App.I,5.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:380: tulyasnehāt prītimatī divase divase tadā // HV_App.I,5.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:381: ājahāra sadā sāyaṃ cañcvā nṛpa phaladvayam / HV_App.I,5.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:383: sa bālo brahmadattasya pūjanīyāsutaś ca ha / HV_App.I,5.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:384: te phale bhakṣayitvā ca pṛṭhukau tau mudā yutau / HV_App.I,5.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:385: abhūtāṃ nityam eveha svadatāṃ caiva te phale // HV_App.I,5.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:386: tasyāṃ gatāyām atha ca pūjanīyāṃ sadāhani / HV_App.I,5.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:387: śiśunā caṭakenātha dhātrī taṃ tu śiśuṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,5.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:388: tena prakīḍayām āsa brahmadattātmajaṃ sadā // HV_App.I,5.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:389: nīḍāt tadā samākṛṣya pūjanīyā gatā yadā / HV_App.I,5.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:390: krīḍatā rājaputreṇa kadācic caṭakaḥ sa tu // HV_App.I,5.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:392: durbhaṅgamuṣṭinā rājann asūn sadyas tv ajījahat // HV_App.I,5.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:393: taṃ tu pañcatvam āpannaṃ vyāttāsyaṃ bālaghātitam / HV_App.I,5.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:394: kathaṃcin mocitaṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpatir duḥkhito 'bhavat // HV_App.I,5.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:395: dhātrīṃ tasya jagarhe tāṃ tadāśruparamo nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,5.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:396: tasthau śokānvito rājā śocaṃs taṃ caṭakaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,5.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:397: pūjanīyāpi tatkālaṃ gṛhītvā tu phaladvayam / HV_App.I,5.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:399: athāpaśyata cāgamya gṛhe tasmin narādhipa / HV_App.I,5.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:401: mumoha dṛṣṭvā svaṃ putraṃ punaḥ saṃjñām athālabhat / HV_App.I,5.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:402: labdhasaṃjñā ca sā rājan vilalāpa tapasvinī // HV_App.I,5.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:403: nanu tvam āgatāṃ putra vāśantīṃ parisarpasi / HV_App.I,5.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:405: vyāditāsyaḥ kṣudhārtaś ca pītenāsyena putraka / HV_App.I,5.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:406: śoṇena tālunā putra kasmād adya na sarpasi // HV_App.I,5.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:407: pakṣābhyāṃ māṃ pariṣvajya nanu cañcvāpi cāpy aham / HV_App.I,5.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:408: cīcīkūcīti vāśantaṃ tvām adya na śṛṇomi kim // HV_App.I,5.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:409: manoratho yas tu mama paśyeyaṃ putrakaṃ kadā / HV_App.I,5.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:410: vyāttāsyaṃ vāri yācantaṃ sphurat pakṣaṃ mamāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,5.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:411: sa me manoratho bhagnas tvayi pañcatvam āgate // HV_App.I,5.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:412: vilapyaivaṃ bahuvidhaṃ rājānam atha sābravīt / HV_App.I,5.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:413: nanu mūrdhābhiṣiktas tvaṃ dharmān vetsi sanātanān // HV_App.I,5.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:414: kathaṃ mamānena sutaṃ dhātryā ghātitavān asi / HV_App.I,5.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:415: svaputreṇa samākṛṣya kṣatriyādhama śaṃsa me // HV_App.I,5.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:416: nanu nūnaṃ śrutā te 'bhūd iyam āṅgirasī śrutiḥ / HV_App.I,5.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:417: śaraṇāgataḥ kṣudhārtaś ca śatrubhiś cāpy upadrutaḥ / HV_App.I,5.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:418: ciroṣitaś ca svagṛhe pātavyaḥ sarvato bhavet // HV_App.I,5.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:419: apālayan naro yāti kumbhīpākam asaṃśayam / HV_App.I,5.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:420: katham asya havir devā gṛhṇanti pitaraḥ svadhām // HV_App.I,5.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:421: evam uktvā mahārāja daśadharmagatā satī / HV_App.I,5.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:422: śokārtā tasya bālasya cakṣuṣī nirbibheda sā // HV_App.I,5.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:423: karābhyāṃ rājaputrasya tatas tac cakṣur asphuṭam / HV_App.I,5.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:424: kṛtvā cāndhaṃ nṛpasutam utpapāta tato 'mbaram // HV_App.I,5.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:425: atha rājā sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūjanīyām uvāca ha / HV_App.I,5.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:426: viśokā bhava kalyāṇi kṛtaṃ te bhīru śobhanam // HV_App.I,5.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:427: gataśokā nivartasva ajaryaṃ sakhyam astu te / HV_App.I,5.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:428: pureva sakhi bhadraṃ te nivartasva ramasva ca // HV_App.I,5.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:429: putrapīḍābhavaś cāpi na kopaḥ paramas tvayi / HV_App.I,5.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:430: mamāsti sakhi bhadraṃ te kartavyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tvayā // HV_App.I,5.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:432: ātmaupamyena jānāmi putrasnehaṃ tavāpy aham / HV_App.I,5.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:433: na cāhaṃ vastum icchāmi tava putram acakṣuṣam / HV_App.I,5.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:434: kṛtvā vai rājaśārdūla tvadgṛhe kṛtakilbiṣā // HV_App.I,5.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:435: gāthāś cāpy uśanogītā imāḥ śṛṇu mayeritāḥ // HV_App.I,5.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:436: kumitraṃ ca kudeśaṃ ca kurājānaṃ kusauhṛdam / HV_App.I,5.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:437: kuputraṃ ca kubhāryāṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet // HV_App.I,5.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:438: kumitre sauhṛdaṃ nāsti kubhāryāyāṃ kuto ratiḥ / HV_App.I,5.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:439: kutaḥ piṇḍaḥ kuputre tu nāsti satyaṃ kurājani // HV_App.I,5.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:440: kusauhṛde kva viśvāsaḥ kudeśe na prajīvyate / HV_App.I,5.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:441: kurājani bhayaṃ nityaṃ kuputre sarvato 'sukham // HV_App.I,5.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:442: apakāriṇi viśrambhaṃ yaḥ karoti narādhamaḥ / HV_App.I,5.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:443: anātho durbalo yadvan na ciraṃ sa tu jīvati // HV_App.I,5.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:444: na viśvased aviśvas te viśvas te nāpi viśvaset / HV_App.I,5.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:445: viśvāsād bhayaṃ utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati // HV_App.I,5.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:447: yaḥ karoti naro mūḍho na ciraṃ sa tu jīvati // HV_App.I,5.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:448: abhyunnatiṃ prāpya nṛpaḥ prāvāraṃ kīṭako yathā / HV_App.I,5.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:449: sa vinaśyed asaṃdeham āhaivam uśanā nṛpa // HV_App.I,5.100 //
GE07hv_apppu:450: api mārdavabhāvena gātraṃ saṃlīya buddhimān / HV_App.I,5.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:451: ariṃ nāśayate nityaṃ yathā vallī mahādrumam // HV_App.I,5.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:452: mṛdū raudraḥ kṛśo bhūtvā śanaiḥ saṃlīyate ripuḥ / HV_App.I,5.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:453: valmīka iva vṛkṣasya paścān mūlaṃ nikṛntati // HV_App.I,5.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:454: adrohaṃ samayaṃ kṛtvā munīnām agrato hariḥ / HV_App.I,5.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:455: jaghāna namuciṃ paścād apāṃ phenena pārthiva // HV_App.I,5.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:456: suptaṃ mattaṃ pramattaṃ vā ghātayanti ripuṃ narāḥ / HV_App.I,5.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:457: viṣeṇa vahninā vāpi śastreṇāpy atha māyayā // HV_App.I,5.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:458: naiva śeṣaṃ prakurvanti punar vairabhayān narāḥ / HV_App.I,5.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:459: ghātayanti samūlaṃ hi śrutvemām upamāṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,5.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:460: śatroḥ śeṣaṃ ṛṇāc cheṣaṃ śeṣam agneś ca bhūmipa / HV_App.I,5.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:461: punar vardheta saṃbhūya tasmāc cheṣaṃ na śeṣayet // HV_App.I,5.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:462: hasate jalpate vairī ekapātre ca bhuñjate / HV_App.I,5.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:463: ekāsanaṃ cārohati smarate tac ca kilbiṣam // HV_App.I,5.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:464: kṛtvā saṃbandhakaṃ cāpi viśvasec chatruṇā na hi / HV_App.I,5.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:465: pulomānaṃ jaghānājau jāmātā sañ śatakratuḥ // HV_App.I,5.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:466: nidhāya manasā vairaṃ priyaṃ vaktīha yo naraḥ / HV_App.I,5.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:467: upasarpen na taṃ prājñaḥ kuraṅga iva lubdhakam // HV_App.I,5.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:468: na cāsanne nivastavyaṃ savaire vardhite ripau / HV_App.I,5.119 /
GE07hv_apppu:469: pātayet taṃ samūlaṃ hi nadītīra iva drumam // HV_App.I,5.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:470: amitrād unnatiṃ prāpya nonnato 'smīti viśvaset / HV_App.I,5.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:471: tasmāt prāpyonnatiṃ naśyed yathā prāvārakīṭakaḥ // HV_App.I,5.122 //
GE07hv_apppu:472: ity etā uśanogītā gāthā dhāryā vipaścitā / HV_App.I,5.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:474: mayā ca kilbiṣaṃ tubhyaṃ prayuktam atidāruṇam / HV_App.I,5.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:475: putram andhaṃ prakurvantyā tasmān no viśvase tvayi / HV_App.I,5.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:476: evam uktvā pradudrāva tadākāśe pataṃginī // HV_App.I,5.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:477: ity etat te mayākhyātaṃ purābhūtam idaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,5.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:479: śrāddhaṃ ca pṛcchase yan māṃ yudhiṣṭhira mahāmate // HV_App.I,5.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:481: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 6, transliterated by Christophe Vielle :h]
GE07hv_apppu:482: [k: K2.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 G(ed.) ins. after 21.10;
GE07hv_apppu:484: K3 after adhy. 21. K1 reads lines 1-2 for the first time after 21.10. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:486: gandharvī urvaśī devī rājāṇaṃ manuṣaṃ katham / HV_App.I,6.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:487: devān utsṛjya saṃprāptā tan me brūhi bahuśruta // HV_App.I,6.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:493: svāgataṃ te varārohe āsyatāṃ karavāma kim / **HV_App.I,6.2**1:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:494: saṃramasva mayā sārdhaṃ ratir nau śāśvatīḥ samāḥ / **HV_App.I,6.2**1:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:497: elaṃ tu sā varārohā samayāt samupasthitā // HV_App.I,6.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:499: evaṃ sā hy uṣitā tatra śāpasyāntam abhīpsatī / **HV_App.I,6.4**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:500: ātmanaḥ śāpamokṣārthaṃ samayaṃ sā cakāra ha / HV_App.I,6.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:501: anagnadarśanaṃ caiva sakāmāyāś ca maithunam // HV_App.I,6.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:503: etāv uraṇakau rājan nyāsau rakṣasva mānada / **HV_App.I,6.6**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:504: saṃraṃsye bhavatā sākaṃ ślāghya strīṇāṃ varaḥ smṛtaḥ / **HV_App.I,6.6**3:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:505: dvau meṣau śayanābhyāse sadā baddhau ca tiṣṭhataḥ / HV_App.I,6.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:506: ghṛtamātraṃ tathāhāraḥ kalām ekaṃ tu pārthiva // HV_App.I,6.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:507: yady eṣa samayo rājan yāvatkālaṃ ca te dṛḍham / HV_App.I,6.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:509: tadā tavaiva saṃyogo mayā saha bhaviṣyati / **HV_App.I,6.9**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:511: eṣa te samayo rājan vastuṃ tava gṛhe kṛtaḥ / **HV_App.I,6.9**4:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:512: tāvatkālaṃ tu vatsyāmi kṛtaḥ samaya eṣa naḥ // HV_App.I,6.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:513: tasyās taṃ samayaṃ sarvaṃ sa rājā samapālayat / HV_App.I,6.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:517: ko na seveta manujo devīṃ tvāṃ svayam āgatām / **HV_App.I,6.11**5:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:518: evaṃ sā vasate tatra purūravasi bhāvinī / HV_App.I,6.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:519: varṣāṇy athaikaṣaṣṭiṃ tu tadbhaktyā śāpamohitā // HV_App.I,6.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:522: apaśyann urvaśīm indro gandharvān abravīt tadā / **HV_App.I,6.14**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:525: cintayadhvaṃ mahābhāgā yathā sā tu varāṅganā / HV_App.I,6.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:526: samāgacchet punar devān urvaśī svargabhūṣaṇā // HV_App.I,6.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:527: tato viśvāvasur nāma tatrāha vadatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,6.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:528: mayā tu samayas tābhyāṃ kriyamāṇaḥ śrutaḥ purā // HV_App.I,6.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:529: vyutkrāntasamayan sā vai rājānaṃ tyakṣyate yathā / HV_App.I,6.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:530: tad ahaṃ vedmy aśeṣeṇa yathā bhetsyaty asau nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,6.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:532: evam uktvā gatas tatra pratiṣṭhānaṃ mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,6.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:533: niśāyām atha cāgamya meṣam ekaṃ jahāra saḥ / HV_App.I,6.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:534: mātṛvad vartate sā tu meṣayoś cāruhāsinī // HV_App.I,6.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:535: gandharvāgamanaṃ jñātvā śāpāntaṃ ca yaśasvinī / HV_App.I,6.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:536: rājānam abravīt tatra putro me 'hriyateti sā // HV_App.I,6.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:537: evam ukto viniścitya nagno naivodatiṣṭhata / HV_App.I,6.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:538: nagnaṃ māṃ drakṣyate devī samayo vitatho bhavet // HV_App.I,6.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:539: tato bhūyas tu gandharvā dvitīyaṃ meṣam ādaduḥ / HV_App.I,6.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:540: dvitīye tu hṛte meṣe elaṃ devy abravīd idam // HV_App.I,6.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:541: putrau me hriyate rājann anāthāyā iva prabho / HV_App.I,6.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:545: yadviśrambhād ahaṃ naṣṭā hatāpatyā ca dasyubhiḥ / **HV_App.I,6.31**7:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:546: yaḥ śete niśi saṃtrasto yathā nārī divā pumān / **HV_App.I,6.31**7:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:547: evam uktas tadotthāya nagno rājā pradhāvitaḥ // HV_App.I,6.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:548: meṣayoḥ padam anvicchan gandharvair vidyud apy atha / HV_App.I,6.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:549: utpāditā sumahatī yayā tad bhavanaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,6.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:550: prakāśitaṃ vai sahasā tato nagnam avaikṣata // HV_App.I,6.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:551: nagnaṃ dṛṣṭvā tirobhūtā gandharvī hy agamad divam // HV_App.I,6.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:552: [k: K1.2 Ñ2.3 V1.3 Dn Ds D6 T4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:553: tirobhūtāṃ tu tāṃdṛṣṭvā gandharvā hy agaman divam / **HV_App.I,6.36**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:555: tirobhūtāṃ tu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā gandharvās tatratāv ubhau / **HV_App.I,6.36**9:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:556: utsṛjya meṣau śīghram tu yathākāmaṃ yayus tataḥ / **HV_App.I,6.36**9:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:557: utsṛṣṭau coraṇau dṛṣṭvā rājā gṛhyāgato gṛham / HV_App.I,6.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:558: apaśyann urvaśīṃ tatra vilālapa suduḥkhitaḥ / HV_App.I,6.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:559: cacāra pṛthivīṃ caiva mārgamāṇa itas tataḥ // HV_App.I,6.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:560: athāpaśyat sa tāṃ rājā kurukṣetre mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,6.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:562: sa tāṃ vīkṣya kurukṣetre sarasvatyāś ca tatsakhīḥ / **HV_App.I,6.40**10:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:564: aho jāye jāye tiṣṭha ghore na tyaktum arhasi / **HV_App.I,6.40**10:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:565: māṃ tvam aprāpya nirvṛttiṃ vacāṃsi kṛṇavāmahe // **HV_App.I,6.40**10:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:566: sudeho 'yaṃ patatv adya devi dūraṃ gatas tvayā / **HV_App.I,6.40**10:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:567: svādanty enaṃ vṛkā gṛdhrās tvatprasādasya nāspadam / **HV_App.I,6.40**10:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:569: krīḍantīṃ apsarobhiś ca pañcabhiḥ saha śobhanām / HV_App.I,6.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:570: tāṃ krīḍantīṃ tato dṛṣṭvā vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ // HV_App.I,6.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:571: sā cāpi tatra taṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānam avidūrataḥ / HV_App.I,6.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:572: urvaśī tāḥ sakhīḥ prāha sa eṣa puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,6.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:573: yasminn aham avātsaṃ vai darśayām āsa taṃ nṛpam // HV_App.I,6.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:574: samāvignās tu tāḥ sarvāḥ punar eva narādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,6.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:575: jāye ha tiṣṭha manasi ghore vacasi tiṣṭha he / HV_App.I,6.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:577: urvaśī cābravīd ailaṃ sagarbhāhaṃ tvayā vibho / HV_App.I,6.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:578: saṃvatsarāt kumāras te bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,6.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:579: niśām ekāṃ ca nṛpate nivatsyasi mayā saha // HV_App.I,6.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:580: hṛṣṭo jagāma rājāt sa svapuraṃ sumahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,6.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:581: gate saṃvatsare bhūya urvaśī punar āgamat // HV_App.I,6.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:582: uṣitaś ca tayā sārdham ekarātraṃ mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,6.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:583: urvaśy athābravīd ailaṃ gandharvā varadās tava / HV_App.I,6.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:584: tān vṛṇīṣva mahārāja brūhi caitāṃs tvam eva ha // HV_App.I,6.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:585: vṛṇīṣva samatāṃ rājan gandharvāṇāṃ mahātmanām / HV_App.I,6.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:586: tathety uktvā varaṃ vavre gandharvāś ca tahāstv iti // HV_App.I,6.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:588: sthālīṃ nyasya vane gatvā gṛham abhyāyayau niśi / **HV_App.I,6.59**11:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:590: pūrayitvāgninā sthālīṃ gandharvāś ca tam abruvan / HV_App.I,6.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:591: aneneṣṭvā salokān naḥ prāpsyasi tvaṃ narādhipa // HV_App.I,6.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:592: tān ādāya kumārāṃs tu gamanāyopacakrame / HV_App.I,6.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:593: nikṣipyāgnim araṇye tu saputras tu gṛhaṃ yayau // HV_App.I,6.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:594: abhyetyāgniṃ tu nāpaśyad aśvatthaṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān / HV_App.I,6.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:595: śamījātaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā aśvatthaṃ vismitas tataḥ // HV_App.I,6.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:596: gandharvebhyas tadāśaṃsad agnināśaṃ tatas tu saḥ / HV_App.I,6.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:597: śrutvā tam artham akhilam araṇīṃ tu samādiśan // HV_App.I,6.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:598: aśvatthād araṇīṃ kṛtvā mathitvāgniṃ yathāvidhi / HV_App.I,6.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:599: mathitāgniṃ tridhā kṛtvā ayajat sa narādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,6.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:600: iṣṭvā yajñair bahuvidhair gatas teṣāṃ salokatām // HV_App.I,6.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:601: [k: K2 B1.3 Ds for lines 69-70 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:602: teneṣṭvā tu sa tāṃl lokān prāptavān sa narādhipaḥ / **HV_App.I,6.70**12:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:603: gandharvebhyo varaṃ labdhvā tretāgniṃ samakalpayat / HV_App.I,6.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:604: eko 'gniḥ pūrvam evāsīd ailas tretām akārayat / HV_App.I,6.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:605: evaṃprabhāvo rājāsīd ailas tu puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,6.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:607: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 6A, transliterated by Sandra Smets :h]
GE07hv_apppu:610: śruto mayā mahāprājño budhapautro mahāmatiḥ / HV_App.I,6A.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:613: niṣkṛtiḥ kīdṛśī dṛṣṭā tan me brūhi mahāmate / HV_App.I,6A.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:614: kīdṛśo brāhmaṇo loke svarūpaṃ tad vadasva me // HV_App.I,6A.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:616: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi śṛṇu pārthivasattama / HV_App.I,6A.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:619: sarvasyaivāsya sargasya dharmato brāhmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,6A.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:621: kavyāni caiva pitaraḥ kiṃ bhūtā adhikaṃ tataḥ // HV_App.I,6A.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:622: brāhmaṇyāṃ brāhmaṇāj jātaḥ saṃskṛto brāhmaṇo bhavet / HV_App.I,6A.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:623: jñeyaṃ (?) kṣatriyaviṭśūdrā jñeyāḥ svebhyaḥ svayonijāḥ // HV_App.I,6A.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:624: adhyāpanaṃ cādhyayanaṃ yajanaṃ yājanaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,6A.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:625: dānaṃ pratigrahaś ceti ṣaṭ karmāṇy agrajanmanām // HV_App.I,6A.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:628: vedābhyāso hi viprasya tapaḥ param ihocyate // HV_App.I,6A.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:630: aṅgopakāravedī ca vedārthaṃ jñātum arhati // HV_App.I,6A.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:631: pāṇinyādīni tantrāṇi hy adhītyāṅgāni sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,6A.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:634: śrotā caivānyathā cet syān narakāyaiva kalpate // HV_App.I,6A.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:635: na vedapāṭhamātreṇa saṃtuṣyed vai dvijottamaḥ / HV_App.I,6A.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:636: pāṭhamātrāvasānas tu paṅke gaur iva sīdati // HV_App.I,6A.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:638: nāmadheyaṃ daśamyāṃ tu dvādaśyām atha kārayet // HV_App.I,6A.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:639: ṣaṣṭhe 'nnaprāśanaṃ māsi cūḍā kāryā yathākulam / HV_App.I,6A.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:640: prāpte tu pañcame varṣe tv akṣarābhyāsam ucyate // HV_App.I,6A.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:643: brāhmaṇo bilvapālāśau daṇḍau vā dhārayeta saḥ / HV_App.I,6A.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:644: guruṃ raviṃ samabhyarcya bhaikṣeta niyataḥ śuciḥ // HV_App.I,6A.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:645: niṣekādīni karmāṇi yaḥ karoti yathāvidhi / HV_App.I,6A.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:646: saṃbhāvayati cānnena sa vipro gurur ucyate // HV_App.I,6A.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:647: upanīya tu yaḥ śiṣyaṃ vedam adhyāpayeta tam / HV_App.I,6A.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:648: tadarthabodhakaś caiva tam ācāryaṃ pracakṣate // HV_App.I,6A.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:649: ekadeśaṃ tu vedasya vedāṅgāny api vā punaḥ / HV_App.I,6A.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:650: yo 'dhyāpayati vṛttyartham upādhyāyaḥ sa ucyate // HV_App.I,6A.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:651: upādhyāyād daśācāryā ācāryāṇāṃ śataṃ pitā / HV_App.I,6A.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:652: sahasraṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ tu caibhyo mātā garīyasī // HV_App.I,6A.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:653: guruśuśrūṣayā vidyāṃ saṃprāpya vidhivad dvijaḥ / HV_App.I,6A.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:654: snāyīta tadanujñāto dattvāsmai dakṣiṇāṃ hi gām // HV_App.I,6A.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:658: bandhuhīnāṃ ca yāṃ kanyāṃ rogiṇīṃ ca parityajet // HV_App.I,6A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:660: svabandhuṣv eva kartavyam iti manvādiśāsanam / HV_App.I,6A.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:661: ādadhīta tataḥ paścād vidhānenaiva sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,6A.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:662: brāhme muhūrte cotthāya hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,6A.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:663: dhyātvā samāhitaḥ paścād viṣṭhāmūtraṃ visarjayet // HV_App.I,6A.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:664: nairṛte dakṣiṇe bhāge tṛṇam ācchādya vai punaḥ / HV_App.I,6A.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:665: loṣṭaiś ca lepanaṃ kṛtvā śaucaṃ kṛtvā yathāvidhi // HV_App.I,6A.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:666: mṛdbhiḥ śodhya gude pādau pāṇau gaṇḍūṣam ācaret / HV_App.I,6A.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:667: ācamya prayato bhūtvā tataḥ snānaṃ samācaret // HV_App.I,6A.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:668: jale nimajya hṛdaye nārāyaṇam anāmayam / HV_App.I,6A.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:669: dhyātvotthāya tataḥ kuryād ardhyaṃ sūryāya bhūmipa // HV_App.I,6A.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:670: sahasrakṛtvaḥ paramāṃ devīṃ japtvā samāhitaḥ / HV_App.I,6A.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:671: upasthāyaiva tigmāṃśuṃ homaṃ kuryād dvitīyake // HV_App.I,6A.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:672: vedam adhyāpya vidhivad vedāṅgāni tṛtīyake / HV_App.I,6A.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:673: mūhūrte kusumādīni hṛtvā gacchet tam īśvaram // HV_App.I,6A.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:676: kṛtvā puruṣasūktaiś ca harim aṣṭākṣareṇa ca // HV_App.I,6A.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:678: kṛtvaivātithyapūjāṃ ca bhojanaṃ ca yathākramam // HV_App.I,6A.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:680: kālakṣepaṃ prakurvāṇas tāmbūlaṃ carvayed budhaḥ (tpunaḥ) / HV_App.I,6A.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:681: upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ homaṃ kuryād atandritaḥ // HV_App.I,6A.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:682: brāhmaṇeṣu ca vidvāṃso vidvatsu kṛtabuddhayaḥ / HV_App.I,6A.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:684: śreṣṭhās te brāhmaṇā loke dānapātraṃ sadā matam // HV_App.I,6A.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:685: prathamaṃ tu gurordānaṃ dadyāc chraiṣṭhyaṃ ca sarvadā / HV_App.I,6A.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:686: mātāpitroś ca yad dattaṃ bhrātṛsvasṛsutāsu ca // HV_App.I,6A.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:688: daridrāṇāṃ ca bandhūnāṃ dānaṃ vedavide 'kṣayam / HV_App.I,6A.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:689: pituḥ śataguṇaṃ dānaṃ sahasraṃ mātur ucyate // HV_App.I,6A.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:690: saṃnikṛṣṭam adhīyānam atikrāmati yo dvijaḥ / HV_App.I,6A.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:691: dāne tu kavyabhojye ca dahaty āsaptamaṃ kulam // HV_App.I,6A.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:692: dviguṇaṃ brāhmaṇe dadyāt samaṃ tu brāhmaṇabruve / HV_App.I,6A.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:696: devānāṃ nādhikāro 'sti teṣu rājan divaukasām // HV_App.I,6A.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:697: vairājakanyājātastu budhād ila iti smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,6A.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:700: śaśāṅkas tu kṣayān muktaḥ sarvalokasupūjitaḥ // HV_App.I,6A.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:702: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 6B, transliterated by Christophe Vielle :h]
GE07hv_apppu:703: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 cont. after No. 6; G(ed.) after No. 6A :k]
GE07hv_apppu:705: elaputrā babhūvus te sarve devasutopamāḥ / HV_App.I,6B.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:706: divi jātā mahātmāna āyur dhīmān amāvasuḥ / HV_App.I,6B.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:709: dṛḍhāyuś ca vanāyuś ca śatāyuś corvaśīsutāḥ // HV_App.I,6B.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:710: amāvasos tu dāyādo bhīmo rājātha rājarāṭ / HV_App.I,6B.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:711: śrīmān bhīmasya dāyādo rājāsīt kāñcanaprabhaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:712: vidvāṃs tu kāñcanasyāpi suhotro 'bhūn mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:713: sauhotrir abhavaj jahnuḥ keśinyā garbhasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:714: ājahre yo mahāsattraṃ sarpamedhaṃ mahāmakham // HV_App.I,6B.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:715: patilobhena yaṃ gaṅgā patitve 'bhisasāra ha / HV_App.I,6B.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:716: necchataḥ plāvayām āsa tasya gaṅgā ca tat sadaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:717: sa tayā plāvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā yajñavāṭaṃ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,6B.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:718: sauhotrir abravīd gaṅgāṃ kruddho bharatasattama // HV_App.I,6B.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:719: eṣa te triṣu lokeṣu saṃkṣipyāpaḥ pibāmy aham / HV_App.I,6B.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:720: asya gaṅge 'valepasya sadyaḥ phalam avāpnuhi // HV_App.I,6B.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:721: rājarṣiṇā tataḥ pītāṃ gaṅgāṃ dṛṣṭvā maharṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:723: yuvanāśvasya putrīṃ tu kāverīṃ jahnur āvahat // HV_App.I,6B.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:727: kāverīṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ jahnor bhāryām aninditām // HV_App.I,6B.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:728: jahnus tu dayitaṃ putraṃ sumahaṃ nāma dhārmikam / HV_App.I,6B.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:729: kāveryāṃ janayām āsa ajakas tasya cātmajaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:730: ajakasya tu dāyādo balākāśvo mahīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,6B.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:732: kuśaputrā babhūvur hi catvāro devavarcasaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:733: kuśikaḥ kuśanābhaś ca kuśāmbo mūrtimāṃs tathā / HV_App.I,6B.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:734: pahlavaiḥ saha saṃvṛddho rājā vanacaraih saha // HV_App.I,6B.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:735: kuśikas tu tapas tepe putram indrasamaṃ vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,6B.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:736: labheyam iti taṃ śakras trāsād abhyetya jajñivān // HV_App.I,6B.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:737: pūrṇe varṣasahasre vai taṃ tu śakro hy apaśyata / HV_App.I,6B.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:740: putratve kalpayām āsa devendraḥ sa surottamaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:741: sa gādhir abhavad rājā maghavān kauśikaḥ svayam / HV_App.I,6B.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:742: paurukutsy abhavad bhāryā gādhis tasyām ajāyata // HV_App.I,6B.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:743: viśvāmitraś ca gādheyo rājā viśvarathaś ca ha / HV_App.I,6B.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:744: viśvakṛd viśvajic caiva tathā satyavatī nṛpa // HV_App.I,6B.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:745: purvaṃ kanyā mahābhāgā nāmnā satyavatī śubhā / HV_App.I,6B.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:748: varaṃ visadṛśaṃ matvā gādhir bhārgavam abravīt / **HV_App.I,6B.37**3:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:751: sahasraṃ dīyatāṃ śulkaṃ kanyāyāḥ kuśikā vayam // **HV_App.I,6B.37**3:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:752: ity uktas tanmataṃ matvā gataḥ sa varuṇāntakaṃ / **HV_App.I,6B.37**3:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:753: ānīya dattvā tān aśvān upayeme varānanām / **HV_App.I,6B.37**3:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:754: tāṃ gādhiḥ kāvyaputrāya ṛcīkāya dadau prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,6B.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:755: tasyāḥ prīto 'bhavad bhartā bhārgavo bhṛgunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:757: sa ṛṣiḥ prārthitaḥ patnyā mātre cāpatyakāmyayā / **HV_App.I,6B.39**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:758: śrapayitvobhayair mantraiś caruṃ snātuṃ gato muniḥ / **HV_App.I,6B.39**4:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:759: putrārthaṃ kalpayām āsa caruṃ gādhes tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,6B.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:760: uvācāhūya tāṃ bhārtā ṛcīko bhārgavas tadā / HV_App.I,6B.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:761: upayojyaś carur ayaṃ tvayā mātrā tv ayaṃ tava // HV_App.I,6B.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:762: tasyāṃ janiṣyate putro dīptimān kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:764: tavāpi putraṃ kalyāṇi dhṛtimantaṃ tapodhanam / HV_App.I,6B.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:765: śamātmakaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ carur eṣa vidhāsyati // HV_App.I,6B.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:766: evam uktvā tu tāṃ bhāryām ṛcīko bhṛgunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:767: tapasy abhirato nityam araṇyaṃ praviveśa ha // HV_App.I,6B.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:768: gādhiḥ sadāras tu tadā ṛcīkāśramam abhyagāt / HV_App.I,6B.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:770: carudvayaṃ gṛhītvā tad ṛṣeḥ satyavatī tadā / HV_App.I,6B.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:771: carum ādāya yatnena sā tu mātre nyavedayat // HV_App.I,6B.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:772: mātā vyatyasya daivena duhitre svacaruṃ dadau / HV_App.I,6B.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:773: tasyāś carum athājñānād ātmasaṃsthaṃ cakāra ha // HV_App.I,6B.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:774: atha satyavatī garbhaṃ kṣatriyāntakaraṃ tadā / HV_App.I,6B.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:775: dhārayām āsa dīptena vapuṣā ghoradarśanam // HV_App.I,6B.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:776: tām ṛcīkas tato dṛṣṭvā yogenābhyanusṛtya ca / HV_App.I,6B.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:777: tām abravīd dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ svāṃ bhāryāṃ varavarṇinīm // HV_App.I,6B.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:779: janiṣyati hi putras te krūrakarmātidāruṇaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:780: bhrātā janiṣyate cāpi brahmabhūtas tapodhanaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:781: viśvaṃ hi brahma tapasā mayā tasmin samarpitam // HV_App.I,6B.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:782: evam uktā mahābhāgā bhartrā satyavatī tadā / HV_App.I,6B.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:783: prasādayām āsa patiṃ putro me nedṛśo bhavet / HV_App.I,6B.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:784: brāhmaṇāpasadas tvatta ity ukto munir abravīt // HV_App.I,6B.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:785: naiṣa saṃkalpitaḥ kāmo mayā bhadre tathāstv iti / HV_App.I,6B.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:786: ugrakarmā bhavet putraḥ pitur mātuś ca kāraṇāt // HV_App.I,6B.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:787: punaḥ satyavatī vākyam evam uktvābravīd idam / HV_App.I,6B.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:788: icchaṃl lokān api mune sṛjethāḥ kiṃ punaḥ sutam / HV_App.I,6B.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:789: śamātmakam ṛjuṃ tvaṃ me putraṃ dātum ihārhasi // HV_App.I,6B.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:790: kāmam evaṃvidhaḥ pautro mama syāt tava ca prabho / HV_App.I,6B.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:791: yady anyathā na śakyaṃ vai kartum etad dvijottama // HV_App.I,6B.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:792: tataḥ prasādam akarot sa tasyās tapaso balāt / HV_App.I,6B.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:793: putre nāsti viśeṣo me pautre ca varavarṇini / HV_App.I,6B.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:794: tvayā yathoktaṃ vacanaṃ tathā bhadre bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,6B.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:795: tataḥ satyavatī putraṃ janayām āsa bhārgavam / HV_App.I,6B.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:796: tapasy abhirataṃ dāntaṃ jamadagniṃ śamātmakam // HV_App.I,6B.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:799: sā hi satyavatī puṇyā satyadharmaparāyaṇā / HV_App.I,6B.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:802: tasya kanyā mahābhāgā kāmalī nāma reṇukā // HV_App.I,6B.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:804: ārcīko janayām āsa jāmadagnyaṃ sudāruṇam // HV_App.I,6B.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:806: rāmaṃ kṣatriyahantāraṃ pradīptam iva pāvakam // HV_App.I,6B.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:808: jamadagnis tapovīryāj jajñe brahmavidāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:809: madhyamaś ca śunaḥśephaḥ śunaḥpucchaḥ kaniṣṭhakaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:810: viśvāmitraṃ tu dāyādaṃ gādhiḥ kuśikanandanaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:811: janayām āsa putraṃ tu tapovidyāśamātmakam / HV_App.I,6B.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:812: prāpya brahmarṣisamatāṃ yo 'yaṃ saptarṣitāṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,6B.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:813: viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā nāmnā viśvarathaḥ smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:816: gādher abhūn mahātejāḥ samiddha iva pāvakaḥ / **HV_App.I,6B.95**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:817: tapasā kṣatram utsṛjya yo lebhe brahmavarcasam // **HV_App.I,6B.95**5:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:819: madhyamas tu madhucchandā madhucchandāsa eva te / **HV_App.I,6B.95**5:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:823: viśvāmitrasya tu sutā devarātādayaḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,6B.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:824: prakhyātās triṣu lokeṣu teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu // HV_App.I,6B.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:825: devaśravāḥ katiś caiva yasmāt kātyāyanāḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,6B.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:826: śālāvatyāṃ hiraṇyākṣo reṇor jajñe 'tha reṇumān // HV_App.I,6B.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:827: sāṃkṛtir gālavaś caiva mudgalaś ceti viśrutaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:828: madhucchandādayaś caiva devalaś ca tathāṣṭakaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:829: kacchapo hāritaś caiva viśvāmitrasya vai sutāḥ / HV_App.I,6B.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:830: teṣāṃ khyātāni gotrāṇi kauśikānāṃ mahātmanām // HV_App.I,6B.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:831: pālito babhravaś caiva karajapyas tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,6B.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:833: lohityā yamadūtāś ca tathā kārīṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,6B.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:834: sauśrutāḥ kauśikā rājaṃs tathānye saindhavāyanāḥ // HV_App.I,6B.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:837: śālāvatyā hiraṇyākṣāḥ sāṃkṛtyā gālavās tathā / HV_App.I,6B.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:838: nārāyaṇir naraś cānye viśvāmitrasya dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,6B.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:839: ṛṣyantaravivāhyāś ca kauśikā bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,6B.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:840: pauravasya mahāraja brahmarṣeḥ kauśikasya ca / HV_App.I,6B.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:841: saṃbandho 'py asya vaṃśe 'smin brahmakṣatrasya viśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:843: bhārgavaḥ kauśikatvaṃ hi prāptaḥ sa munisattamaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:844: viśvāmitrasya putras tu śunaḥśepo 'bhavat kila / HV_App.I,6B.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:845: hariścandrasya yajñe tu paśutve viniyojitaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:847: yo vai hariścandramakhe vikrītaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ / **HV_App.I,6B.118**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:849: yo rāto devayajane devair gādhiṣu tāpasaḥ / **HV_App.I,6B.118**6:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:850: devarāta iti khyāta śunaḥśephas tu bhārgavaḥ / **HV_App.I,6B.118**6:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:851: devair dattaḥ śunaḥśepo viśvāmitrāya vai punaḥ / HV_App.I,6B.119 /
GE07hv_apppu:853: putraṃ kṛtvā śunaḥṣephaṃ devarātaṃ ca bhārgavam / **HV_App.I,6B.119**7:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:854: ājīgartaṃ sutān āha jyeṣṭha eṣa prakalpatām // **HV_App.I,6B.119**7:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:855: ye madhucchandaso jyeṣṭhāḥ kuśalaṃ menire na tat / **HV_App.I,6B.119**7:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:856: aśapat tān muniḥ kruddho mlecchā bhavata durjanāḥ // **HV_App.I,6B.119**7:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:858: yan no bhavān vijānīto tasmiṃs tiṣṭhāmahe vayam // **HV_App.I,6B.119**7:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:859: jyeṣṭhaṃ mantradṛśāṃ cakrus tvām anvañco vayaṃ smasi / **HV_App.I,6B.119**7:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:861: devair dattaḥ sa vai yasmād devarātas tato 'bhavat // HV_App.I,6B.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:862: devarātādayaḥ sapta viśvāmitrasya vai sutāḥ / HV_App.I,6B.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:864: aṣṭakasya suto lauhiḥ prokto jahnugaṇo mayā / HV_App.I,6B.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:865: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi vaṃśam āyor mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,6B.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:867: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 7, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:870: [k: K2.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:872: K1.3 after the first occurrence of 21.11 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:874: rambho napatyas tatrāsīd vaṃśaṃ vakṣyāmy anenasaḥ / HV_App.I,7.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:875: anenasaḥ suto rājā pratikṣatro mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,7.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:876: pratikṣatrasutaś cāpi sṛñjayo nāma viśrutaḥ / HV_App.I,7.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:877: sṛñjayasya jayaḥ putro vijayas tasya cātmajaḥ // HV_App.I,7.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:878: vijayasya kṛtiḥ putras tasya haryaśvataḥ sutaḥ / HV_App.I,7.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:880: sahadevasya dharmātmā nadīna iti viśrutaḥ / HV_App.I,7.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:882: saṃkṛter api dharmātmā kṣatradharmo mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,7.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:883: anenasya samākhyātāḥ kṣatravṛddhasya me śṛṇu // HV_App.I,7.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:886: kāśaḥ śalaś ca dvāv etau tathā gṛtsamadaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,7.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:887: putro gṛtsamadasyāpi śunako yasya śaunakāḥ // HV_App.I,7.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:888: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāś caiva vaiśyāḥ śūdrās tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,7.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:889: śalātmajaś ca cārṣṭiceṇas tanayas tasya kāśyakaḥ // HV_App.I,7.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:890: kāśyasya kāsyayo rājan putro dīrghatamās tathā / HV_App.I,7.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:891: dhanvas tu dīrghatamaso vidvān dhanvantariḥ sutaḥ // HV_App.I,7.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:894: tapaso nte sumahato jāto vṛddhasya dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,7.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:895: punar dhanvantarir devo mānuṣeṣv iha jajñivān // HV_App.I,7.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:897: kathaṃ dhanvantarir devo mānuṣeṣv iha jajñivān / HV_App.I,7.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:898: etad veditum icchāmi tvatto brūhi yathātatham // HV_App.I,7.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:900: dhanvantareḥ saṃbhavo yaṃ śrūyatāṃ bharatarṣabha / HV_App.I,7.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:901: sa saṃbhūtaḥ samudrāt tu mathyamāne mṛte purā // HV_App.I,7.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:902: utpannaḥ kalaśāt pūrvaṃ sarvataś ca śriyā vṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,7.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:905: sadyaḥsaṃsiddhakāryaṃ hi viṣṇur dṛṣṭvā hi tasthivān // HV_App.I,7.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:906: abjas tvam iti hovāca tasmād abjas tu sa smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,7.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:907: abjaḥ provāca viṣṇuṃ vai tava putro smi vai prabho / HV_App.I,7.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:908: vidhatsva bhāgaṃ sthānaṃ ca mama loke sureśvara // HV_App.I,7.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:909: evam uktaḥ sa dṛṣṭvā vai tathyaṃ provāca taṃ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,7.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:910: kṛto yajñavibhāgo hi yajñiyair hi suraiḥ saha // HV_App.I,7.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:911: deveṣu viniyuktaṃ hi viddhi hotraṃ maharṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,7.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:912: na śakyam upahomo vai tubhyaṃ kartu kathaṃcana / HV_App.I,7.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:914: na śakyam iha vai kartuṃ mayā tubhyaṃ kathaṃcana / **HV_App.I,7.33**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:915: arvāgbhūto si devānāṃ putra tvaṃ tu na hīśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,7.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:916: dvitīyāyāṃ tu saṃbhūtyāṃ loke khyātiṃ gamiṣyasi / HV_App.I,7.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:917: aṇimādiś ca te siddhir garbhasthasya bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,7.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:918: tenaiva tvaṃ śarīreṇa devatvaṃ prāpsyase prabho / HV_App.I,7.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:919: carumantrair vratair jāpyair yakṣyanti tvāṃ dvijātayaḥ // HV_App.I,7.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:920: aṣṭadhā tvaṃ punaś caiva āyurvedaṃ vidhāsyasi / HV_App.I,7.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:921: avaśyaṃbhāvī hy artho yaṃ prāgdṛṣṭas tv abjayoninā // HV_App.I,7.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:922: dvitīyaṃ dvāparaṃ prāpya bhavitā tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,7.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:923: imaṃ tasmai varaṃ dattvā viṣṇur antardadhe punaḥ // HV_App.I,7.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:924: dvitīye dvāpare prāpte saunahotriḥ sa kāśirāṭ / HV_App.I,7.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:925: putrakāmas tapas tepe dhanvo dīrghaṃ mahat tadā // HV_App.I,7.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:926: prapadye devatāṃ tāṃ tu yā me putraṃ pradāsyati / HV_App.I,7.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:927: abjaṃ devaṃ sa putrārthe tad ārādhitavān nṛpa // HV_App.I,7.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:928: tatas tuṣṭaḥ sa bhagavān abjaḥ provāca taṃ nṛpam / HV_App.I,7.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:929: yad icchasi varaṃ sarvaṃ tat te dāsyāmi suvrata // HV_App.I,7.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:930: bhagavan yadi tuṣṭas tvaṃ putro me khyātimān bhavet / HV_App.I,7.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:932: tasya gehe samutpanno devo dhanvantaris tadā / HV_App.I,7.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:935: tam aṣṭadhā punar vyasya śiṣyebhyaḥ pratyapādayat // HV_App.I,7.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:936: dhanvantares tu tanayaḥ ketumān iti viśrutaḥ / HV_App.I,7.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:937: atha ketumataḥ putro vīro bhīmarathaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,7.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:939: divodāsas tu dharmātmā vārāṇasyadhipo bhavat // HV_App.I,7.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:940: etasminn eva kāle tu purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,7.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:941: śūnyāṃ niveśayām āsa kṣemako nāma rākṣasaḥ // HV_App.I,7.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:942: śaptā hi sā matimatā nikumbhena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,7.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:943: śūnyā varṣasahasraṃ vai bhavitrīti na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,7.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:944: tasyāṃ tu śaptamātrāyāṃ divodāsaḥ prajeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,7.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:945: viṣayānte purīṃ ramyāṃ gomatyāṃ saṃnyaveśayat // HV_App.I,7.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:946: [k: K1 (marg.) Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D5.6 T2 G1-3.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:947: bhadraśreṇyasya pūrvaṃ tu purī vārāṇasīty abhūt / **HV_App.I,7.64**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:949: hatvā niveśayām āsa divodāso narādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,7.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:950: bhadraśreṇyasya tad rājyaṃ hṛtaṃ tena balīyasā // HV_App.I,7.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:952: vārāṇasīṃ nikumbhas tu kimarthaṃ śaptavān prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,7.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:953: nikumbhaḥ kaś ca dharmātmā siddhikṣetraṃ śaśāpa yaḥ // HV_App.I,7.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:955: kāraṇaṃ tad aśeṣeṇa vada tvaṃ vadatāṃ vara / **HV_App.I,7.69**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:957: divodāsas tu rājarṣir nagaraṃ prāpya pārthiva / HV_App.I,7.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:958: vasati sma mahātejāḥ sphītāyāṃ tu narādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,7.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:959: etasminn eva kāle tu kṛtadāro maheśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,7.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:960: devyās tu priyakāmārthaṃ nyavasac chvaśurāntike // HV_App.I,7.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:961: devājñayā pārṣadā ye tv abhirūpās tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,7.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:962: pūrvoktai rūpaveṣaś ca toṣayanti sma pārvatīm // HV_App.I,7.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:963: hṛṣyate vai mahādevī menā naiva prahṛṣyati / HV_App.I,7.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:964: jugupsaty asakṛt taṃ vai devadevaṃ tathaiva ha // HV_App.I,7.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:965: sapārṣadas tv anācāras tava bhartā maheśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,7.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:966: daridraḥ sarvadaivāsau śīlaṃ tasya na vartate // HV_App.I,7.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:967: mātrā tathoktā varadā strīsvabhāvān na cukruve / HV_App.I,7.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:968: smitaṃ kṛtvā tu varadā bhavapārśvam athāgamat // HV_App.I,7.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:970: neha vatsyāmy ahaṃ deva naya māṃ svaṃ niveśanam // HV_App.I,7.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:971: tathā kartuṃ mahādevaḥ sarvāṃl lokān avaikṣata / HV_App.I,7.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:972: vāsārthaṃ rocayām āsa pṛthivyāṃ kurunandana // HV_App.I,7.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:974: divodāsena tāṃ jñātvā niviṣṭāṃ nagarīṃ bhavaḥ // HV_App.I,7.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:975: pārśve tiṣṭhan tam āhūya nikumbham idam abravīt / HV_App.I,7.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:976: gaṇeśvara purīṃ gatvā śūnyāṃ vārāṇasīṃ kuru / HV_App.I,7.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:978: tato gatvā nikumbhas tu purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ tadā / HV_App.I,7.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:979: svapne nidarśayām āsa kaṇṭakaṃ nāma nāpitam / HV_App.I,7.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:980: śreyas te haṃ kariṣyāmi sthānaṃ me racayānagha // HV_App.I,7.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:981: madrūpāṃ pratimāṃ kṛtvā nagaryante tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,7.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:982: tataḥ svapne yathoddiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ kāritavān nṛpa / HV_App.I,7.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:983: purīdvāre tu vijñāpya rājānaṃ tu yathāvidhi / HV_App.I,7.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:984: pūjāṃ ca mahatīṃ tasya nityam eva prayojayat // HV_App.I,7.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:985: gandhaiś ca dhūpamālyaiś ca prokṣaṇīyais tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,7.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:987: evaṃ saṃpūjyate tatra nityam eva gaṇeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,7.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:988: tato varasahasraṃ tu nāgarāṇāṃ prayacchati / HV_App.I,7.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:989: putrān hiraṇyam āyuś ca sarvān kāmāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,7.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:990: rājñas tu mahiṣī śreṣṭhā suyaśā nāma viśrutā / HV_App.I,7.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:991: putrārtham āgatā devī sādhvī rājñā pracoditā // HV_App.I,7.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:992: pūjāṃ tu vipulāṃ kṛtvā devī putram ayācata / HV_App.I,7.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:993: punaḥ punar athāgamya bahuśaḥ putrakāraṇāt // HV_App.I,7.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:994: na prayacchati putraṃ hi nikumbhaḥ kāraṇena hi / HV_App.I,7.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:995: rājā tu yadi saṃkruddhaḥ kāryasiddhis tato bhavet // HV_App.I,7.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:996: atha dīrgheṇa kālena krodho rājānam āviśat / HV_App.I,7.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:997: bhūtam etan mahaddūri nāgarāṇāṃ prayacchati // HV_App.I,7.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:998: prīto varānnaiḥ śataśo mama kiṃ na prayacchati / HV_App.I,7.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:999: māmakaiḥ pūjyate nityaṃ nagaryāṃ mama caiva hi // HV_App.I,7.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:1000: vijñāpito mamārthaṃ vai devyā me putrakāraṇāt / HV_App.I,7.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:1001: na dadāti ca putraṃ me kṛtaghnaḥ kena hetunā // HV_App.I,7.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:1002: tato nārhati satkāraṃ matsakāśād viśeṣataḥ / HV_App.I,7.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:1003: tasmāt tu nāśayiṣyāmi sthānam asya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,7.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:1004: evaṃ sa tu viniścitya durātmā rājakilbiṣī / HV_App.I,7.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:1005: sthānaṃ gaṇapates tasya nāśayām āsa durmatiḥ / HV_App.I,7.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:1006: bhagnam āyatanaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānam aśapat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,7.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:1007: yasmād anaparādhasya tvayā sthānaṃ vināśitam / HV_App.I,7.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:1008: pury akasmād iyaṃ śūnyā tava nūnaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,7.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:1009: tatas tena tu śāpena śūnyā vārāṇasī tadā / HV_App.I,7.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:1010: śaptvā purīṃ nikumbhas tāṃ mahādevam athāgamat // HV_App.I,7.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:1011: akasmāc ca purī sā tu vidrutā sarvatodiśam / HV_App.I,7.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:1012: tasyāṃ puryāṃ tato devo nirmame padam ātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,7.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:1013: ramate tatra vai devo ramamāṇo gireḥ sutām // HV_App.I,7.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:1014: na ratiṃ tatra vai devī labhate gṛhavismayāt / HV_App.I,7.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:1015: vasāmy atra na puryāṃ tu devī devam athābravīt // HV_App.I,7.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:1017: nāhaṃ veśma vimokṣyāmi avimuktaṃ hi me gṛham / HV_App.I,7.129 /
GE07hv_apppu:1018: nāhaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi gaccha devi gṛhaṃ prati // HV_App.I,7.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:1019: hasann uvāca bhagavāṃs tryambakas tripurāntakaḥ / HV_App.I,7.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:1020: tasmāt tad avimuktaṃ hi proktaṃ devena vai svayam / HV_App.I,7.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:1021: evaṃ vārāṇasī śaptā avimuktaṃ ca kīrtitam // HV_App.I,7.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:1022: yasmin vasati vai devaḥ sarvadevanamaskṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,7.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:1023: yugeṣu triṣu dharmātmā saha devyā maheśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,7.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:1024: antardhānaṃ kalau yāti tatpuraṃ hi mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,7.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:1025: antarhite pure tasmin purī tu vasate punaḥ / HV_App.I,7.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:1026: evaṃ vārāṇasī śaptā niveśaṃ punar āgatā // HV_App.I,7.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:1027: bhadraśreṇyasya putro vai durdamo nāma viśrutaḥ / HV_App.I,7.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:1028: divodāsena bāleti ghṛṇayā sa vivarjitaḥ // HV_App.I,7.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:1029: haihayasya tu dāyādyaṃ kṛtavān vai mahīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,7.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:1033: divodāsād dṛṣadvatyāṃ vīro jajñe pratardanaḥ / HV_App.I,7.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:1034: tena putreṇa bālena prahṛtaṃ tasya vai punaḥ // HV_App.I,7.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:1036: tena bālena dāyādyaṃ pragṛhītaṃ punas tadā / **HV_App.I,7.146**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1038: evaṃ pratardano rājā brahmajñaḥ saṃbabhūva ha / **HV_App.I,7.146**7:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1039: sa eva śatrujid vīra ṛtadhvaja itīritaḥ / **HV_App.I,7.146**7:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:1041: pratardanasya putrau dvau vatsabhārgau suviśrutau / HV_App.I,7.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:1042: vatsaputro hy alarkas tu saṃnatis tasya cātmajaḥ // HV_App.I,7.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:1044: alarko nāma putras tu rājā saṃnatimān bhuvi / **HV_App.I,7.148**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1045: aṣṭāratho nāma nṛpaḥ suto bhīmarathasya vai / **HV_App.I,7.148**8:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:1047: alarkaḥ kāśirājas tu brahmaṇyaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ / HV_App.I,7.149 /
GE07hv_apppu:1048: alarkaṃ prati rājarṣiṃ śloko gītaḥ purātanaiḥ // HV_App.I,7.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:1049: ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣaśatāni ca / HV_App.I,7.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:1051: alarkād aparo nānyo bubhuje medinīm imām / **HV_App.I,7.151**9:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1052: yuvā rūpeṇa saṃpanna āsīt kāśikulodvahaḥ // HV_App.I,7.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:1056: ramyāṃ niveśayām āsa purīṃ vārāṇasīṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,7.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:1057: saṃnater api dāyādaḥ sunītho nāma dhārmikaḥ / HV_App.I,7.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:1058: sunīthasya tu dāyādaḥ kṣemo nāma mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,7.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:1059: kṣemasya ketumān putraḥ suketus tasya cātmajaḥ / HV_App.I,7.159 /
GE07hv_apppu:1060: suketutanayaś cāpi dharmaketur iti śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,7.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:1061: dharmaketos tu dāyādaḥ satyaketur mahārathaḥ / HV_App.I,7.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:1062: satyaketusutaś cāpi vibhur nāma prajeśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,7.162 //
GE07hv_apppu:1063: ānartas tu vibhoḥ putraḥ sukumāraś ca tatsutaḥ / HV_App.I,7.163 /
GE07hv_apppu:1064: sukumārasya putras tu satyaketur sudhārmikaḥ // HV_App.I,7.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:1065: dhṛṣṭaketos tu dāyādo veṇuhotraḥ prajeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,7.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:1066: veṇuhotrasutaś cāpi bhargo nāma prajeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,7.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:1067: vatsasya vatsabhūmiś ca bhṛgubhūmis tu bhārgavāt // HV_App.I,7.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:1068: ete tv aṅgirasaḥ putrā jātā vaṃśe tha bhārgave / HV_App.I,7.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:1069: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ striyaḥ putrāḥ sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,7.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:1070: ity ete kāśayaḥ proktā nahuṣasya nibodhata // HV_App.I,7.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:1072: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 8, transliterated by Peter Schreiner, 17.9.1988,
GE07hv_apppu:1075: [k: After 47.52, all Mss. (except M1--3) G(ed.) ins. App.I No. 8: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1077: āryā kātyāyanī devī kauśikī brahmacāriṇī / HV_App.I,8.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1078: jananī siddhasenasya durgā vīrā mahātapāḥ // HV_App.I,8.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:1079: jayā ca vijayā caiva puṣṭiś ca tvaṃ kṣamā dayā / HV_App.I,8.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:1083: parvatāgreṣu ghoreṣu nadīṣu ca guhāsu ca / HV_App.I,8.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:1084: vāsas tava mahādevi vaneṣūpavaneṣu ca // HV_App.I,8.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:1085: śabarair barbaraiś caiva pulindaiś ca supūjitā / HV_App.I,8.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:1087: kukkuṭaiś chāgalair meṣaiḥ siṃhair vyāghraiḥ samākulā / HV_App.I,8.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:1092: āvāsaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ niṣṭhā ca paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,8.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:1094: cīravāsāḥ suvāsāś ca raudrī saṃdhyā tvam eva ca // HV_App.I,8.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:1095: prakīrṇakeśī mṛtyuś ca tathā māṃsaudanapriyā / HV_App.I,8.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:1096: lakṣmīr alakṣmīrūpeṇa dānavānāṃ vadhāya ca // HV_App.I,8.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:1097: sāvitrī cāpi devānāṃ mātā bhūtagaṇasya ca / HV_App.I,8.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:1098: antarvedī ca yajñānām ṛtvijāṃ caiva dakṣiṇā // HV_App.I,8.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:1099: siddhiḥ sāṃyātrikāṇāṃ ca velā sāgarayāyinām / HV_App.I,8.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:1100: yakṣāṇāṃ prathamā yakṣī nāgānāṃ suraseti ca // HV_App.I,8.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:1101: [k: Ñ2.3 V B2 Dn Ds1 D4.5 ins. after line 24;
GE07hv_apppu:1103: kanyānāṃ brahmacaryā ca saubhāgyaṃ pramadāsu ca / **HV_App.I,8.24**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1104: brahmavādiny atho dīkṣā śobhā ca paramā tathā / HV_App.I,8.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:1105: jyotiṣāṃ tvaṃ prabhā devi nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca rohiṇī // HV_App.I,8.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:1106: rājadvāreṣu tīrtheṣu nadīnāṃ saṃgameṣu ca / HV_App.I,8.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:1107: pūrṇe ca pūrṇimācandre kṛttivāsā iti smṛtā // HV_App.I,8.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:1108: sarasvatī ca vālmīkeḥ smṛtir dvaipāyane tathā / HV_App.I,8.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:1109: suradevī ca bhūteṣu stūyase tvaṃ svakarmabhiḥ // HV_App.I,8.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:1110: indrasya cārudṛṣṭis tvaṃ sahasranayaneti ca / HV_App.I,8.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:1111: ṛṣīṇāṃ dharmabuddhis tu devānām aditis tathā // HV_App.I,8.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:1112: karṣakānāṃ ca sīteti bhūtānāṃ dharaṇīti ca / HV_App.I,8.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:1113: tāpasānāṃ ca devī tvam araṇī cāgnihotriṇām // HV_App.I,8.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:1114: kṣudhā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ tṛptis tvaṃ ca divaukasām / HV_App.I,8.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:1115: svāhā tuṣṭir dhṛtir medhā vasūnāṃ tvaṃ vasūmatī // HV_App.I,8.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:1116: āśā tvaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tu tuṣṭiś ca kṛtakarmaṇām / HV_App.I,8.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:1117: diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva tathā hy agniśikhā prabhā // HV_App.I,8.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:1118: śakunī pūtanā ca tvaṃ revatī ca sudāruṇā / HV_App.I,8.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:1119: nidrā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ mohanī kṣatriyā tathā // HV_App.I,8.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:1120: vidyānāṃ brahmavidyā tvam oṃkāro 'stha vaṣaṭ tathā / HV_App.I,8.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:1121: nārīṇāṃ pārvatī ca tvaṃ paurāṇīm ṛṣayo viduḥ // HV_App.I,8.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:1123: [k: K2 V2 B Ds D4 subst. for one 43; Ñ2 ins. after 44 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1125: paryāyanāmabhir divyair indrāṇī ceti viśrutā / HV_App.I,8.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:1126: tvayā vyāptam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṃgamam // HV_App.I,8.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:1127: saṃgrāmeṣu ca sarveṣu agniprajvaliteṣu ca / HV_App.I,8.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:1128: nadītīreṣu ghoreṣu kāntāreṣu bhayeṣu ca // HV_App.I,8.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:1129: pravāse rājabandhe ca śatrūṇāṃ ca pramardane / HV_App.I,8.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:1130: prāṇātyayeṣu sarveṣu tvaṃ hi rakṣā na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,8.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:1131: tvayi me hṛdayaṃ devi tvayi buddhir manas tvayi / HV_App.I,8.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:1132: rakṣa māṃ sarvapāpebhyaḥ prasādaṃ ca kariṣyasi // HV_App.I,8.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:1133: imaṃ devyāḥ stavaṃ divyam itihāsasamanvitam / HV_App.I,8.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:1134: yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ // HV_App.I,8.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:1135: tribhiś ca kāṅkṣitaṃ māsaiḥ phalaṃ vai saṃprayacchati / HV_App.I,8.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:1136: ṣadbhir māsair variṣṭhaṃ tu varam ekaṃ prayacchati // HV_App.I,8.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:1137: [k: For line 55, B3 Ds T3.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1138: ṣaṇmāsān paṭhate yas tu kāṅkṣitaṃ ca labheta saḥ / **HV_App.I,8.55**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1139: asrcitā navabhir māsair divyaṃ cakṣuḥ prayacchati / HV_App.I,8.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:1140: saṃvatsareṇa siddhiṃ tu yathākāmaṃ prayacchati / HV_App.I,8.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:1141: satyaṃ ca brahmacaryaṃ ca dvaipāyanavaco yathā // HV_App.I,8.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:1142: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 9, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit,
GE07hv_apppu:1143: extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:1147: kvacid veśmani nirgatya navanītaṃ ca gṛhṇataḥ / HV_App.I,9.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:1148: saṃkṣobhya takraṃ bahuśo dārakau dārakaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,9.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:1149: anvabhūtām tato rājan ghaṭāṃś ca parijaghnatuḥ / HV_App.I,9.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:1150: dadhi pītvā tu deveśau tān ghaṭāṃś ca pipeṣatuḥ / HV_App.I,9.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:1151: śikyaṃ ca parijagrāha kṛṣṇo dārakaveṣavān / HV_App.I,9.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:1152: bhittvā chittvā ca govindaḥ papau kṣīrāṇi sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,9.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:1153: tac chiṣṭaṃ caiva deveśaḥ kṣitau ca samavākṣipat / HV_App.I,9.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:1154: pāyasaṃ ca samānīya gṛhād anyatra vikṣipan / HV_App.I,9.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:1155: dārakhebhyas tadā kṛṣṇo dadau svaṃ ca samācaran / HV_App.I,9.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:1156: śikyāc ca ghaṭam ādāya dadhnāṃ dārakasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,9.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:1157: nirbhidyācchidya bhūmau tu niṣpapeṣa sa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,9.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:1158: dārakau tau tu sahasā vatsānāṃ ca paraṃtapa / HV_App.I,9.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:1159: dāmnāṃ vimocanaṃ kṛtvā vatsān dhenūr apāyatām / HV_App.I,9.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:1160: prativeśma tadā tau tu vyasanaṃ paryakurvatām / HV_App.I,9.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:1162: na ca śakto vārayituṃ nandagopaḥ sudurmadau / HV_App.I,9.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:1163: tatas tu dārakaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣṇaś cakṣuś ca tadgatam / HV_App.I,9.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:1164: ekasya tu tadā kṛṣṇo dārakasya mahīpate / HV_App.I,9.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:1165: pracchādya tarasānyaṃ tu dārakaṃ pratyuvāca ha / HV_App.I,9.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:1166: gaccha vatsa yathānyatra tathā dṛṣṭaiś ca dārakaiḥ / HV_App.I,9.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:1167: yadi dṛṣṭas tvam anyais tu jito daṇḍadharo mama / HV_App.I,9.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:1168: ity uktvā balabhadraṃ tu taṃ draṣṭuṃ praiṣayad balī / HV_App.I,9.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:1169: sa gatvā balabhadras tu gṛhītvā dārakaṃ balāt / HV_App.I,9.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:1170: keśavāya dadau taṃ tu tvaṃ jitaḥ keśavo 'bravīt / HV_App.I,9.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:1171: kīlakaṃ ca samānīya vikṣipya bhuvi gūhitam / HV_App.I,9.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:1172: āhūya dārakān sarvān idam āha jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,9.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:1173: śaktaś ced bhavatāṃ kaścit kīlaṃ gṛhṇātu paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,9.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:1174: mama pārśvagato bhūtvā daṇḍo deyaś ca tasya ha / HV_App.I,9.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:1175: tac chrutvā dārakāḥ sarve taṃ draṣṭuṃ yatnam āsthitāḥ / HV_App.I,9.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:1176: nāśaknuvaṃś ca te sarve jitāṃs tān abravīd iti / HV_App.I,9.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:1177: evam ādyāni govindo bālakrīḍanakāni vai / HV_App.I,9.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:1178: cakāra matimān kṛṣṇo dārakaiḥ saha gokule // HV_App.I,9.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:1179: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 9A, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit,
GE07hv_apppu:1180: extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner;
GE07hv_apppu:1182: [k: D6 T G M4 G(ed.) cont. (after App.I No. 9); M1-3 ins. after 51.12: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1183: kvacid veśmani saṃgamya śikyasthān payaso ghaṭān / HV_App.I,9A.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1184: ādāya yugapat sarvān payaḥ pītvā mudā bhṛśam / HV_App.I,9A.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:1185: abhihatya tataḥ sarvān niṣpapeṣa hasan bahiḥ / HV_App.I,9A.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:1186: ācchidya śikyam anyatra tato dadhno ghaṭān kṣipan / HV_App.I,9A.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:1187: yathākāmaṃ tataḥ pītvā dārakebhyas tato dadau / HV_App.I,9A.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:1188: atha vegān mudā kṛṣṇaḥ kvacid anyatra veśmani / HV_App.I,9A.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:1189: guptān ghaṭān upādāya tvarito 'tha babhañja ha / HV_App.I,9A.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:1190: kvacid dhṛtaghaṭān pūrṇān bahūn ādāya vesmani / HV_App.I,9A.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:1191: vyabhajad dārakebhyas tu bhakṣayaṃś ca svayaṃ dadau / HV_App.I,9A.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:1192: anyato veśmanaḥ śikyān ghaṭāṃs takrasya pūrayan / HV_App.I,9A.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:1193: ādāyādhūya bahudhā tasminn eva muhuḥ kṣipan / HV_App.I,9A.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:1194: vyahasad vividhaṃ hāsaṃ nanarta ca sa dārakaḥ / HV_App.I,9A.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:1195: takreṣu ca payaḥ kṣipya takraṃ ca payasi kṣipan / HV_App.I,9A.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:1196: payo jaleṣu saṃyojya ghṛtam agnau juhāva ca / HV_App.I,9A.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:1197: evaṃ tau satataṃ tatra cakratur veśmasaṃgaram / HV_App.I,9A.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:1199: gāvaḥ puṣṭā nīrujāś ca vatsalāḥ kāmadohanāḥ / **HV_App.I,9A.15**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1200: āgamya harṣitās tau tu pucchādiṣv avalambatām // **HV_App.I,9A.15**1:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:1202: vatsān ārohamāṇau ca tatpāne phenavo śiśū (sic) // **HV_App.I,9A.15**1:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:1203: atha vatsān muhur baddhān dāmabhiḥ kīlakeṣu vai / HV_App.I,9A.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:1204: bhittvā cchittvā ca dāmāni vatsān dhenuṣv anīyatām / HV_App.I,9A.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:1205: dāmany ācchidya sarvatra vatsān dikṣu prakālayan / HV_App.I,9A.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:1206: ākṛṣya dārakān keśair anyonyaṃ samabandhata / HV_App.I,9A.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:1207: nirudhyamāno gopībhiḥ sa cakre vai muhurmuhuḥ / HV_App.I,9A.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:1208: sarpiṣā payasā caiva dadhnā takreṇa śūnyakam // HV_App.I,9A.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:1209: prāyeṇa govrajaṃ cakre pūrvajena sahāyavān / HV_App.I,9A.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:1210: paśyantīnāṃ ca gopīnāṃ kṛṣṇo nityaṃ sa saṃbhramam // HV_App.I,9A.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:1211: piban payaś ca vividhaṃ cakre caivaṃ sa vaiśasam // HV_App.I,9A.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:1212: krandantyo 'tha muhur gopyo yaśodānikaṭaṃ yayuḥ / HV_App.I,9A.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:1213: kṛṣṇasya ceṣṭitaṃ sarvaṃ yaśodāyai nyavedayan // HV_App.I,9A.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:1214: mama kumbhyo daśa hatāḥ putreṇānena durmate / HV_App.I,9A.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:1215: na ca śiṣṭaṃ payas takraṃ ghṛtaṃ vā dadhi leśakam / HV_App.I,9A.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:1216: kim adya kriyate mūḍhe jīvikā mama naśyati // HV_App.I,9A.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:1218: pañcāśan mama kumbhīnāṃ śikyād ādāya te sutaḥ / HV_App.I,9A.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:1219: ghṛtasya pūrṇān suśliṣṭān paśyantyā mama hanti ha // HV_App.I,9A.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:1221: antarveśmany aśūnyāṃś ca kumbhān sarvān ghṛtena vai / HV_App.I,9A.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:1222: tāñ śūnyān kārayām āsa na ca śiṣṭaṃ ghṛtaṃ mama / HV_App.I,9A.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:1223: atikruddhā tathānyāha keśān ārujya sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,9A.34 /
