GE07hv_apppu:1224: pañcatriṃśad ghaṭān kṛṣṇo ghṛtena payasā samam / HV_App.I,9A.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:1225: ādhūyotkṣipya cāvidhya niṣpapeṣa ca bhūtale // HV_App.I,9A.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:1226: na kiṃcid vyañjanaṃ mūḍhe mama veśmani vidyate / HV_App.I,9A.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:1227: gāvaś ca vatsakaiḥ pītāḥ kṛṣṇenānena mokṣitaiḥ // HV_App.I,9A.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:1229: pāyasaṃ bahu pakvaṃ me bhadre jagdham anena vai / HV_App.I,9A.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:1230: dadhyodanaṃ bhṛśaṃ dattaṃ dārakebhyo rasānvitam // HV_App.I,9A.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:1231: apūpā bahavo jagdhā bhartrarthe rakṣitā mayā / HV_App.I,9A.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:1232: saktavo bahavaḥ pītāḥ saṃskṛtāḥ śarkarādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,9A.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:1233: kiṃ gṛheṇa ca me kāryaṃ kiṃ ghoṣaiḥ kiṃ gavādibhiḥ / HV_App.I,9A.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:1234: eṣā yāsyāmi durmedhe mūḍhe duṣputrasūyini // HV_App.I,9A.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:1236: dhenavo mama naṣṭāḥ syur vatsaiḥ sārdhaṃ daśādya vai / HV_App.I,9A.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:1237: anena kālitā mūḍhe tava putreṇa durhṛdā // HV_App.I,9A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:1238: bhakṣitaṃ navanītaṃ me valmīkapratimaṃ navam / HV_App.I,9A.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:1239: jīvikā mama naṣṭābhūd eṣā yāsyāmi deśakam // HV_App.I,9A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:1240: evam atyantato gopyo vinedur visvaraṃ bhṛśam / HV_App.I,9A.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:1241: kā gatir vada bhadreti gopyaḥ sarvās tadābruvan // HV_App.I,9A.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:1242: atha tābhyo yathānaṣṭaṃ yaśodā dattavaty alam / HV_App.I,9A.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:1243: samāśvāsya tataḥ sarvāḥ svaṃ svaṃ veśma vyakālayat / HV_App.I,9A.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:1244: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 10, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit,
GE07hv_apppu:1245: extracted from the collation and edited by Peter Schreiner. Version of March 5, 2002. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:1247: G(ed.) ins. a passage given in App. I, No. 10 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1248: prāg eva vasudevas tu nandagopena vāritaḥ / HV_App.I,10.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1249: vṛndāvananivāsas te parihartavya ity api // HV_App.I,10.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:1250: sa putragurutāṃ paśyan vanaṃ cāsurasevitam / HV_App.I,10.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:1252: bahusaṃpadam ālokya gavāṃ vṛndāvane vane / HV_App.I,10.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:1253: gopāḥ praveṣṭum icchanti pralambas tatra cāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,10.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:1254: nānyad vanaṃ ca paśyāmi samīpe saṃpadā yutam / HV_App.I,10.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:1255: kiṃ nu kartavyam iti me putrayoś ca hitaṃ bhavet // HV_App.I,10.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:1256: evaṃ vicārayantaṃ taṃ nārado 'bhyāgaman mithaḥ / HV_App.I,10.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:1257: brahmaṇā codito vipra indreṇa ca mahātmanā // HV_App.I,10.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:1258: yadṛcchayā mahāyogī nityaṃ lokahite rataḥ / HV_App.I,10.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:1259: vavande nandagopas tu tasya vai caraṇau muneḥ // HV_App.I,10.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:1260: tam āha sasmitaṃ vipraḥ saṃbhramākulamānasam / HV_App.I,10.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:1261: jñātvā tvayi manoduḥkhaṃ praṇayāt te 'ham āgataḥ // HV_App.I,10.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:1262: idaṃ rahasyaṃ devānāṃ nākhyātavyaṃ kadācana / HV_App.I,10.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:1263: asmin kāle mahāprājña kāle jñāsyati vai bhavān // HV_App.I,10.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:1264: yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi ghoṣeśa tat tvaṃ jñāsyasi vai vibho / HV_App.I,10.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:1265: na kevalau tava sutau devau mānuṣatāṃ gatau / HV_App.I,10.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:1266: rāmakṛṣṇāv imau jātau daityamūlaharāv iti // HV_App.I,10.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:1267: asuraṃ pakṣam uddhartuṃ jāyamānaṃ janārdanam / HV_App.I,10.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:1268: daityaḥ śakaṭaveṣeṇa jñātvā tvām āśrito 'suraḥ / HV_App.I,10.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:1269: śakaṭasya tv adhaḥ suptaṃ nihantuṃ niścitaṃ śiśum // HV_App.I,10.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:1270: rakṣāhīnaṃ yuvābhyāṃ ca viyuktaṃ vīkṣya dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,10.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:1272: yuvābhyām atha nirmuktaṃ vīkṣya dāmodaraṃ tadā / **HV_App.I,10.23**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1273: labdharandhraś ca niṣpeṣṭuṃ tatkṣaṇāc chiśunā hataḥ // HV_App.I,10.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:1274: tāḍito vāmapādena viparyasto mamāra ha / HV_App.I,10.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:1275: prabuddhasya tu bālasya tanmuhūrtaṃ vijṛmbhataḥ // HV_App.I,10.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:1276: tasyām eva niśāyāṃ ca pūtanāṃ nāma rākṣasīm / HV_App.I,10.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:1277: pāyayantīṃ viṣapayaḥ sastanyaṃ prāṇam āharat // HV_App.I,10.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:1278: punar arjunabhūtau tau daityau tacchidradarśinau / HV_App.I,10.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:1279: hantukāmau tadā bālaḥ svayam eva jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,10.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:1280: nānārūpadharān daityān evaṃ hantā tavātmajaḥ / HV_App.I,10.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:1281: bhayasthānaṃ na te gopa viśa vṛndāvanaṃ vanam // HV_App.I,10.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:1282: tatrāpi sumahatkāryaṃ kartā kṛṣṇo 'yam īdṛśam / HV_App.I,10.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:1283: pratyakṣaṃ tava caitāni karmāṇīha kṛtāni ca // HV_App.I,10.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:1284: haniṣyati pralambaṃ ca rāmaḥ parabalārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,10.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:1285: kṛṣṇaś cāsurasaṃghātaṃ na bhīs tvām upasarpa tu // HV_App.I,10.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:1286: ity uktvā nandagopaṃ tu kṛṣṇaṃ tuṣṭāva nāradaḥ / HV_App.I,10.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:1287: namas tubhyaṃ jagaddhātre viśvakartre namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,10.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:1288: kṛṣṇāya balarūpāya bahurūpāya te namaḥ / HV_App.I,10.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:1290: namas te devakīmatar namas te yādaveśvara / HV_App.I,10.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:1291: namas te devadeveśa namo māyāvidhāyine / HV_App.I,10.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:1293: viśa vṛndāvanāṃ deva vihara tvaṃ yathāsukham / HV_App.I,10.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:1294: tatra daityān mahāvīryāñ jahi yatnaparo bhava // HV_App.I,10.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:1295: ity uktvā nārade yāte nandagopo mahāmatiḥ / HV_App.I,10.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:1297: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 11, transliterated by Peter Schreiner;
GE07hv_apppu:1299: [k: After adhy. 53, D3.6,S ins. App. I, No. 11 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1301: tau tu vṛndāvanaṃ prāptau vasudevasutāv ubhau / HV_App.I,11.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1303: praviśya ca mahāraṇyaṃ tadā vṛndāvanaṃ vanam / HV_App.I,11.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:1304: remire suciraṃ kālaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ sahakeśavāḥ / HV_App.I,11.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:1305: gāvaś ca kṣīrasaṃpannā mahiṣyaś ca sunirvṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,11.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:1306: tasmin kāle tadā ceruḥ savatsāś ca yathāsukham // HV_App.I,11.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:1309: cacāra ca yadā kṛṣṇas tadā vṛndāvanevane / **HV_App.I,11.5**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1310: atha trayodaśe varṣe vardhamāne ca keśave / HV_App.I,11.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:1311: saṃprāpto gharmasamayaḥ kṛṣṇe vṛndāvane sthite // HV_App.I,11.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:1312: gate ca bhāskare kāṣṭhām uttarāṃ tīkṣṇadīdhitau / HV_App.I,11.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:1313: marīcyo dikṣu sarvāsu prasṛtās tīkṣṇavarcasaḥ / HV_App.I,11.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:1314: lobhayantyo mṛgāñ śaśvat tīkṣṇaraśmau divākare // HV_App.I,11.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:1316: saptārciṣo giriṃ dagdham udabhūvann itas tataḥ / HV_App.I,11.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:1317: ruravas tarakṣavaś caiva daghdadehā davānalaiḥ / HV_App.I,11.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:1321: petuś ca sarvataḥ pṛthvīṃ raktapātā ivādriṣu // HV_App.I,11.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:1323: tamāṃsīva hi gopānāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pidadhire muhuḥ // HV_App.I,11.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:1324: gopāś gharmasaṃtaptā madhyaṃ yāte divākare / HV_App.I,11.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:1325: vaneṣu drumamūleṣu gāś ca saṃkālya tasthire // HV_App.I,11.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:1326: gopyaḥ kumbhīḥ samādāya nīraiḥ pūrṇāḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,11.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:1327: uṣṇaraśmikarais taptāś chāyām āśritya tasthire / HV_App.I,11.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:1328: vastrair jalārdraiḥ satataṃ vāhayantyaḥ kucān pṛthūn // HV_App.I,11.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:1329: jalabindūn dṛtigatāñ śītalān amalān muhuḥ / HV_App.I,11.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:1330: ādāya pathi gopālā āsyaśoṣaṃ nirāsire // HV_App.I,11.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:1331: mṛṇālair dehajaṃ rūkṣaṃ nīḍasthāś ca vihaṃgamāḥ / HV_App.I,11.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:1334: puṣpair vaibhītakair bhinnā janaprāṇaharaiḥ samam / HV_App.I,11.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:1336: itaḥ kvacit tataḥ sadyas tato 'nyatra tataḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,11.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:1337: vātā vavur mahāvegāḥ kālayanto rajo diśaḥ // HV_App.I,11.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:1338: āgneyaṃ teja evaitat prasṛtaṃ mādhavasya ha / HV_App.I,11.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:1340: keśave jagatāṃ pāle sthite vṛndāvane vane / HV_App.I,11.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:1341: vyādhir gopakule tatra babhūva tumulo mahān // HV_App.I,11.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:1342: vyādhayo vividhākārā goṣu gopālakeṣu ca / HV_App.I,11.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:1343: prādur babhūvur bahavo gharmakāla upasthite // HV_App.I,11.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:1344: mahiṣāś ca bhṛśaṃ taptā jvarātīsāramūrchitāḥ / HV_App.I,11.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:1345: sahasā prapatanti sma vajrabhinnā nagā iva // HV_App.I,11.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:1350: apūrvavarṇāḥ paśavo necchanto yavasaṃ tṛṇam // HV_App.I,11.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:1352: krandamānāś ca tiṣṭhanti śayitāś ca sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,11.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:1353: bhūmau paripatanti sma sraṃsayantaḥ śakṛnty api // HV_App.I,11.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:1354: evaṃvidhair ahobhiś ca pañcaṣaiś ca dinair abhūt / HV_App.I,11.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:1355: mahiṣāṇāṃ gavāṃ cāpi dāruṇaṃ mṛtyusaṃśayam // HV_App.I,11.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:1356: apūrvam evaṃ sahasā gopālānām abhūd bhayam / HV_App.I,11.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:1357: pālayāne tu govinde gopālaiḥ saha gogaṇam // HV_App.I,11.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:1358: savatsānāṃ gavām evaṃ vyādhayaś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ / HV_App.I,11.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:1360: mantraiś ca bheṣajair mukhyair bhiṣajaḥ śāstrayuktibhiḥ / HV_App.I,11.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:1361: yatamānāś ca gopālā na śekus tān nivāritum // HV_App.I,11.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:1362: kṛtvā cāṅgeṣu dahanaṃ sirāvedhāṃś ca tadvidaḥ / HV_App.I,11.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:1363: kurvāṇā bahudhā yatnaṃ na vyādhīn praticakrire // HV_App.I,11.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:1364: tato viṣaṇṇam abhavad gopālānāṃ tadā kulam / HV_App.I,11.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:1365: savṛddhabālaṃ sastrīkaṃ vyākrośad vyādhinā svayam // HV_App.I,11.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:1366: bhṛśam ārtam abhūt trastaṃ saṃnipātajvarārditam / HV_App.I,11.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:1368: pīḍitāḥ piṭakābhiś ca grathitāḥ sarvatas tanum / HV_App.I,11.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:1369: sirāsthimāṃsaṃ nirbhidya prādur bhūtaḥ savedanaiḥ // HV_App.I,11.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:1371: vipannā vḍdhagopālāḥ sagoyūthās tv avāpatan // HV_App.I,11.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:1372: gopālāś ca tathānye ca ye ca tadvanavāsinaḥ / HV_App.I,11.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:1373: sarve paripatanti sma pibanto yamunājalam // HV_App.I,11.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:1374: yamunātīrajenāśu spṛṣṭāḥ sarve ca vāyunā / HV_App.I,11.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:1378: tadā gopagaṇān sarvān sa vyādhiḥ samapadyata // **HV_App.I,11.69**3:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:1383: vyādhirūpair bahuvidhair bhṛśam ārtās tadābhavan // HV_App.I,11.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:1384: sarīsṛpāś ca vyālā ye mṛgāḥ sarve ca pakṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,11.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:1385: prāṇino vividhākārā yāmunaṃ vanam āśritāḥ // HV_App.I,11.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:1386: te sarve mṛtasaṃkalpā mṛtāś caiva sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,11.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:1387: gopālāḥ saha gobhiś ca paripetur diśo daśa // HV_App.I,11.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:1388: sarve saṃghūrṇanayanā niśceṣṭā mūrchitā bhṛśam / HV_App.I,11.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:1389: petur vanacarā rājañ jīvanto 'pi mṛtā yathā // HV_App.I,11.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:1391: śoṇitaṃ lomakūpebhyo jantavaḥ sasṛjur bahu // HV_App.I,11.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:1392: sarveṣāṃ prāṇinām antaḥ samantāt savraṇair mukhaiḥ / HV_App.I,11.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:1393: aśakyam ambu vāhartuṃ kiṃ punar bhojanādikam // HV_App.I,11.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:1394: dantāś ca vipraśīryante keṣāṃcin na ca bhāṣaṇam / HV_App.I,11.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:1395: rasanodgīryate kaṇṭhaiḥ samantāt savraṇair api // HV_App.I,11.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:1396: durgandhaṃ duḥsahaṃ tatra prādur āsīd viśeṣataḥ / HV_App.I,11.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:1397: sarveṣu samavāyeṣu duṣprekṣyaṃ ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,11.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:1400: nāhāraṃ bhuñjate gāvo nauṣadhaṃ na ca khādanam / HV_App.I,11.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:1401: śvāsamātraṃ vrajaṃ sarvaṃ śayitaṃ gogaṇaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,11.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:1402: evaṃ gate vraje tasmiñ śvāsamātre sthite nṛpa / HV_App.I,11.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:1403: atha kṛṣṇaś ca rāmaś ca kaiścid gopaiḥ sahāparaiḥ / HV_App.I,11.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:1404: pṛthag anyatra saṃvāsam ādāv evābhyarocatām // HV_App.I,11.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:1405: bālo 'pi buddhyā saṃcintya kṛṣṇaḥ kamalalocanaḥ / HV_App.I,11.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:1406: idam atretikartavyam iti niścitavān prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,11.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:1410: bhuvaḥ saṃsthānam ālokya khānayām āsa medinīm // HV_App.I,11.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:1411: utpādya salilaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ svayūthyaiḥ saha gogaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,11.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:1412: tajjalaṃ sa piban kṛṣṇo nīrogaḥ samapadyata // HV_App.I,11.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:1413: tad dṛṣṭvānye ca gopālāḥ śaktyālpatarayā yutāḥ / HV_App.I,11.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:1414: praāṇam anutiṣṭhanti teṣām kṛṣṇo 'bhavad gatiḥ // HV_App.I,11.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:1415: nandagopo yaśodā ca putrau dṛṣṭvā nirākulau / HV_App.I,11.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:1416: bhṛśam ārtiyutau cāstām antaḥprītiyutāv api // HV_App.I,11.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:1418: tam avekṣya bhṛśaṃ tapto nābhavat kṛṣṇasaṃnidhau / HV_App.I,11.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:1419: anena bandhuvargeṇa saha me godhanena ca / HV_App.I,11.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:1420: mriyeyaṃ cāham apy atrety evaṃ matir ajāyata // HV_App.I,11.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:1421: atha kṛṣṇaś ca rāmaś ca jvaritau pitarau tadā / HV_App.I,11.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:1422: śrutvaivam paramodvignau vyathitau kila tau sthitau // HV_App.I,11.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:1423: bandhuvargaṃ ca sakalaṃ godhanaṃ ca tathāgatam / HV_App.I,11.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:1426: atha tasyām avasthāyāṃ gopālānāṃ vayotigaḥ / HV_App.I,11.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:1427: videhād āgataḥ kaścit tasmin kolāhale kila // HV_App.I,11.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:1428: sa bandhuvargaṃ saṃprekṣya godhanaṃ ca tathāgatam / HV_App.I,11.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:1430: vayaṃ paśūn samāśritya jīvāmo vigatajvarāḥ / HV_App.I,11.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:1431: paśūnāṃ ca patir devaḥ sarvathā vṛṣhabhadhvajaḥ // HV_App.I,11.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:1432: tasyārcanavidhiṃ śīghraṃ kurudhvaṃ govṛṣasya ca / HV_App.I,11.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:1433: yena śāntim avāpsyāmo na mantrauṣadhapauṣṭikaiḥ // HV_App.I,11.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:1435: asmin saṃnihite sthāne samyag arcāma śaṃkaram / HV_App.I,11.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:1436: ityuktāḥ kulavṛddhena te gopāḥ kṛṣṇam āśritāḥ / HV_App.I,11.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:1437: tathā cakrur dvijendrāṃś ca samāhūyārcanāvidaḥ // HV_App.I,11.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:1439: suprītamanaso viprās tathā cakrur yathākramam // HV_App.I,11.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:1440: havirbhiḥ pāyasaiś cāpi ghṛtena payasāmbunā / HV_App.I,11.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:1441: saṃtarpayanto viśveśaṃ hutvā cāgnau ṛṣadhvajam / HV_App.I,11.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:1442: devīṃ skandagaṇāṃś caiva govṛṣaṃ nandikeśvaram / HV_App.I,11.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:1443: vināyakaṃ ca saṃpūjya stutibhiś cāstuvan haram // HV_App.I,11.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:1445: pūjayanti sma viprendrās tadbhaktā bhaktavatsalam // HV_App.I,11.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:1446: puṣpair gandhaiś ca dhūpaiś ca dīpaiś caiva samantataḥ / HV_App.I,11.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:1447: pṛthak pṛthak samarcanti brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ / HV_App.I,11.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:1448: arcā mūrdhni kṛtās tisraḥ saptarātraṃ ca saṃtatam / HV_App.I,11.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:1450: teṣv evāhaḥsu viprendrāḥ saṃhitādhyayane ratāḥ / HV_App.I,11.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:1451: tribhir vedais tathā cakrur mahādevaprasaktaye // HV_App.I,11.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:1452: gānaiś ca kecid gāyanti śaṃkaraṃ vṛṣabhadhvajam / HV_App.I,11.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:1453: nṛtyanti ca viśeṣeṇa rudraprītyartham udyatāḥ // HV_App.I,11.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:1455: hastavinyāsayogaiś ca pādaghātaiś ca bhāgataḥ // HV_App.I,11.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:1456: nṛttaṃ kurvatsu vipreṣu śivasya pramukhe tadā / HV_App.I,11.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:1457: saptame 'hani madhāhne prodbhūtaṃ mahad adbhutam // HV_App.I,11.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:1458: teṣām eko dvijendras tu vedavedāṅgapāragaḥ / HV_App.I,11.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:1459: unmatta iva saṃjajñe sāṭṭahāsaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,11.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:1460: divyaṃ nṛttaṃ samālebhe divyaṃ geyaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,11.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:1462: vismitāḥ sarva evāsaṃs tasmin sadasi ye sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,11.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:1463: sa ca vai divyanṛttānte devāveśī vaco 'bravīt // HV_App.I,11.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:1464: asmin muhūrte kailāsād āgataḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ / HV_App.I,11.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:1466: vartamānaṃ paśūnāṃ ca gopālānāṃ ca saṃkaṭam / HV_App.I,11.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:1467: vane nivasatāṃ jñātvā prāṇināṃ ca mahadbhayam // HV_App.I,11.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:1468: yuṣmadarcāviśeṣāc ca sauṣṭhavāc ceha karmaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,11.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:1469: vaco govṛṣabhaktyā ca paśūnāṃ patir abravīt // HV_App.I,11.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:1471: ārtānāṃ brūhi madvākyaṃ samāviśya dvijottamam // HV_App.I,11.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:1473: manuṣyaloke bhogārthaṃ dṛṣṭvā bandhūn anekaśaḥ // HV_App.I,11.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:1474: jātaḥ kālaḥ kalir nāma virocanasuto balī / HV_App.I,11.160 /
GE07hv_apppu:1475: anujāto baleḥ pūrvam asurendro mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,11.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:1476: viṣavṛkṣaḥ kapittho 'būt kālindyā dakṣiṇe taṭe / HV_App.I,11.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:1478: parivārās tam āśritya bahubhṛtyās tadāśrayāḥ / HV_App.I,11.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:1479: viṣakaṇṭakino vṛkṣā latā vallyaś ca jajñire // HV_App.I,11.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:1480: tasya bhāryāḥ sapakṣāś ca sahasratanayās tathā / HV_App.I,11.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:1481: gobhūtā vatsabhūtāś ca caranti yamunātaṭe // HV_App.I,11.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:1482: nirgopā vanagāvas tā darpayuktā savatsakāḥ / HV_App.I,11.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:1484: nirgopāś ca tathā gāvaḥ savatsāḥ sarvato vane / **HV_App.I,11.168**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1485: viṣavṛkṣasya ca phalam upayuñjanti nirvṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,11.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:1486: sa ca dvādaśavarṣānte vṛkṣaḥ puṣpaphalākulaḥ / HV_App.I,11.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:1487: tadā bhavanti rogāś ca tadgandharasamūrchitāḥ // HV_App.I,11.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:1488: sa tu puṣpitamātreṇa bhavet phalayuto drumaḥ / HV_App.I,11.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:1489: visṛjan kaṭukaṃ gandhaṃ vyādhīnām ākaraṃ muhuḥ // HV_App.I,11.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:1490: purā tad vanam utsṛjya jīvanti prāṇino bhayāt / HV_App.I,11.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:1491: drumāṇāṃ ca bhaved vyādhir vṛkṣāveśasamusthitaḥ (sic) / HV_App.I,11.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:1492: asmin kāle hi gopālāḥ prāyaśas tad vanaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,11.176 /
GE07hv_apppu:1493: gobhiḥ saha caranti sma te vṛkṣasyāvidūrataḥ // HV_App.I,11.177 //
GE07hv_apppu:1494: paryāyād dvādaśād bānām asmin kāle kramāgate / HV_App.I,11.178 /
GE07hv_apppu:1495: vṛkṣaś ca puṣpaphalavān kapitthaḥ samajāyata / HV_App.I,11.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:1496: [k: After line 179, D6 T1.2 G1.2.4 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1499: anyac cāha mahādevo nandagopasutāv ubhau / HV_App.I,11.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:1500: viṣaṃ ca viṣavṛkṣaṃ ca śaktau śīghram apohitum // HV_App.I,11.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:1501: itaḥ paraṃ vyādhayaś ca na bhavantīha pūrvavat / HV_App.I,11.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:1503: sabhṛtyo viṣavṛkṣaś ca ubhābhyāṃ caiva eva hi / **HV_App.I,11.183**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1504: chedite vyādhayas tasmin na jāyante sma pūrvavat // **HV_App.I,11.183**6:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:1505: gāvo gopāś ca jīvantu prasādāt parameṣṭhinaḥ // HV_App.I,11.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:1506: ahaṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi yatrāste parameśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,11.185 /
GE07hv_apppu:1508: ity uktvāveśito vipraḥ saṃjñāṃ svām āptavāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,11.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:1510: ity uktvāntarhitaḥ syāc ca śaṅkukarṇo mahābaḹaḥ / **HV_App.I,11.187**7:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1511: atha sarve tu gopālāḥ saṃprekṣanta parasparam / HV_App.I,11.188 /
GE07hv_apppu:1512: rāmakṛṣṇau viśeṣeṇa prekṣante sma mudāyutāḥ // HV_App.I,11.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:1513: teṣām iṅgitam ākāraṃ jñātvā kṛṣṇaḥ svabāndhavān / HV_App.I,11.190 /
GE07hv_apppu:1514: idam āha vaco dhīmān madhuraṃ madhurākṛtiḥ // HV_App.I,11.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:1515: [k: After line 191, D6 T1.2 G M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1517: śāsanād devadevasya vayaṃ sarve viṣadrumam / HV_App.I,11.192 /
GE07hv_apppu:1518: yāsyāmo gopavṛddhāś ca tiṣṭhantv atra sabālakāḥ // HV_App.I,11.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:1519: ity uktvā sahasā kṛṣṇaḥ kṛtvā viprān pradakṣiṇam / HV_App.I,11.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:1520: devālayaṃ ca tad dhīmān prayayau yamunāvanam // HV_App.I,11.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:1522: siṃhanādaṃ prakurvantaḥ kṛṣṇasya purato yayuḥ // HV_App.I,11.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:1523: muktarogā gaṇapateḥ paścād āgamanād dhareḥ / HV_App.I,11.198 /
GE07hv_apppu:1524: pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvagopālā brāhmaṇāś ca tam anvayuḥ // HV_App.I,11.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:1526: āghrāya tiktaṃ rūkṣamaṃ ca durgandhaṃ ghrāṇaduḥsaham // HV_App.I,11.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:1527: tam apaśyan nadītīre prabhūtaṃ vṛkṣam ucchritam / HV_App.I,11.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:1529: ṭakkaiḥ kuntaiḥ kuṭhāraiś ca khanitrair aparair dṛḍhaiḥ / HV_App.I,11.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:1530: chittvā te tad vanaṃ ghoram atidurvedham āyasaiḥ / HV_App.I,11.205 /
GE07hv_apppu:1532: viṣavṛkṣāṃś ca tāṃś chittvā tāv ubhau rāmakeśavau / HV_App.I,11.207 /
GE07hv_apppu:1533: jagmatus tasya vṛkṣasya samīpaṃ prāṇividviṣaḥ // HV_App.I,11.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:1534: tau taṃ dadṛśatur daityaṃ vṛkṣabhūtam avasthitam / HV_App.I,11.209 /
GE07hv_apppu:1538: ṛte tatputradārāṃś ca ye jīvanti tam āśritāḥ / **HV_App.I,11.211**9:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1539: tau samīkṣyāśu gtahane savatsā madagarvitāḥ / HV_App.I,11.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:1540: adṛṣṭamānuṣāḥ pūrvaṃ gāvas tasthuḥ kutūhalāt // HV_App.I,11.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:1541: tāv ubhāv api saṃprekṣya rāmakṛṣṇau viṣadrumam / HV_App.I,11.214 /
GE07hv_apppu:1542: pakvair apakvair bālaiś ca sarvataḥ saṃvṛtaḥ phalaiḥ // HV_App.I,11.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:1543: [k: After line 215, D6 T1.2 G M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1545: saṃrabdhau kāṣṭhapāṣāṇaiḥ śātayām āsatuḥ phalam / HV_App.I,11.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:1546: ucchritya bāhū vipulau nirbhujya daśanacchadam // HV_App.I,11.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:1547: vikṣepaṃ cakratuḥ khaṇḍaiḥ kāṣṭhānām aśmanām api / HV_App.I,11.218 /
GE07hv_apppu:1548: [k: After line 218, D6 T1.2 G M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1550: phalāny aśātayat kṛṣṇo hastābhhyāṃ kāṣṭhaśaṅkubhiḥ // HV_App.I,11.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:1551: hastagrāhyān anekāṃś ca kāṣṭhān pāṣāṇasaṃcayān / HV_App.I,11.220 /
GE07hv_apppu:1552: pradaduḥ satvarā gopās tayor hasteṣu sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,11.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:1553: udyamyāhatya tair evam ūrdhvavakrāv ubhāv api / HV_App.I,11.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:1554: phalāni kubhamātrāṇi pātayāṃ cakratuḥ kṣitau // HV_App.I,11.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:1555: tau bṛhadbhiḥ samāghnantau bahuśākhāsv anekadhā / HV_App.I,11.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:1556: pātyamānaiḥ phalaiś caiva cakratus tumulaṃ svanam // HV_App.I,11.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:1557: gopāś ca neduḥ saṃhṛṣṭā nedatus tau ca siṃhavat / HV_App.I,11.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:1559: tāś ca gāvo bhṛśodvignā āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ / HV_App.I,11.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:1561: ghorā bhayānakā gāvaḥ savatsās tān abhidrutāḥ / HV_App.I,11.230 /
GE07hv_apppu:1562: nihantuṃ niścitā bhūtvā goppālān abhisaṃgatāḥ // HV_App.I,11.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:1563: dantair viṣāṇaiḥ pādaiś ca laṅgūlair mastakaiḥ khuraiḥ / HV_App.I,11.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:1565: hanyamānā vane gopāḥ paśubhir bhīmavikramaiḥ / HV_App.I,11.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:1566: aśaknuvantas te tatra viprajagmur diśo daśa // HV_App.I,11.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:1567: humbhāravāś ca nādāś ca ceṣṭāś ca vividhā guṇāḥ / HV_App.I,11.236 /
GE07hv_apppu:1568: yathā syuḥ saurabheyāṇāṃ na santy āsāṃ tathā kvacit // HV_App.I,11.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:1569: gavāṃ bhāvocitaḥ kṛṣṇas tat sarvam upalakṣya ca / HV_App.I,11.238 /
GE07hv_apppu:1570: svayaṃ ca gopo medhāvī bālo 'pi nipuṇaḥ sadā // HV_App.I,11.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:1572: ākārair iṅgitair yuktyā niścitaḥ sa tu buddhimān // HV_App.I,11.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:1574: sālaṃ gṛhītvā tatraiva sthito hy atibalas tadā / **HV_App.I,11.241**12:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1575: tasmin muhūrte catvāro vatsabhūtāḥ kaleḥ sutāḥ / HV_App.I,11.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:1576: samāghnan sahasā kṛṣṇaṃ lalāṭaiś caraṇaiḥ khuraiḥ // HV_App.I,11.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:1577: sa tīkṣṇam āhataḥ kṛṣṇo vatsais tair vītasaṃbhramaḥ / HV_App.I,11.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:1579: teṣāṃ balena vijñāya teṣu hastagateṣu ca / HV_App.I,11.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:1580: daityā niḥsaṃśayam iti harir niścitavān ayam // HV_App.I,11.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:1581: tatkṣaṇād avicāryaiva prārabdhaṃ kāryam ātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,11.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:1584: ekaikam eṣāṃ cikṣepa pādān saṃgṛhya līlayā / HV_App.I,11.249 /
GE07hv_apppu:1585: dakṣiṇena kareṇaiva gṛhītvā cetarān api // HV_App.I,11.250 //
GE07hv_apppu:1586: evaṃ vatsair abhighnantaṃ sarve vatsā viṣadrumam / HV_App.I,11.251 /
GE07hv_apppu:1588: tān sarvān ekahastena saṃdhārya sa mahādyutiḥ / HV_App.I,11.253 /
GE07hv_apppu:1589: apareṇāhanad vatsair ucchritya balavān drumam // HV_App.I,11.254 //
GE07hv_apppu:1590: tataḥ saṃbhūya te vatsāḥ sarvataś ca samādravan / HV_App.I,11.255 /
GE07hv_apppu:1591: samāhananta saṃrabdhāḥ pādair dantaiś ca mastakaiḥ // HV_App.I,11.256 //
GE07hv_apppu:1592: tān hatvā balavān kṛṣṇaḥ pādajānvaṃsakūrparaiḥ / HV_App.I,11.257 /
GE07hv_apppu:1594: nṛtyann iva babhau kṛṣṇaḥ kurvann abhinayakriyām / HV_App.I,11.259 /
GE07hv_apppu:1596: tenotsṛṣṭaiś ca tair vatsaiḥ sāravadbhir anekadhā / HV_App.I,11.261 /
GE07hv_apppu:1597: babhañjur vṛkṣaśākhās taṃ hanyamānā balīyasā // HV_App.I,11.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:1599: prādur āsātikaṭukaṃ tan mahābhairavaṃ ravam // HV_App.I,11.264 //
GE07hv_apppu:1601: petuḥ pṛthivyāṃ svair dehaiḥ śavabhūtā mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,11.266 /
GE07hv_apppu:1602: phalaiś ca sahitāḥ śākhāḥ śākhābhiḥ sahitāḥ śavāḥ // HV_App.I,11.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:1604: tasmin kolāhale vṛtte gāvas tadvatsamātaraḥ / HV_App.I,11.269 /
GE07hv_apppu:1605: abhipetuḥ samudvighnāḥ sarvās tā yatra te sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,11.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:1606: tā āpatantīr evādau balavān rohiṇīsutaḥ / HV_App.I,11.271 /
GE07hv_apppu:1607: bhartsyan kāṣṭhaghātaiś ca bhrāmayan sarvatodiśam // HV_App.I,11.272 //
GE07hv_apppu:1608: hanyamānān sutān dṛṣṭvā pragadṛṣṭaśrutena ca / HV_App.I,11.273 /
GE07hv_apppu:1612: mahārevaṇa sodvignāḥ svayaṃ cāpi bhṛśāhatāḥ // HV_App.I,11.274 //
GE07hv_apppu:1614: bhayād añcitalomāno viviśuḥ sarvato vanam // HV_App.I,11.276 //
GE07hv_apppu:1615: asurāḥ paśavas tāsām anvayo niṣphalo bhuvi / HV_App.I,11.277 /
GE07hv_apppu:1616: adyāpi saṃcaranty eva mahāraṇye janāvṛte // HV_App.I,11.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:1620: dikṣu sarvāsu vatsānāṃ kṣipan vṛkṣe babhañja ha // HV_App.I,11.280 //
GE07hv_apppu:1621: ubhābhyām api hastābhyāṃ yugapac ca pṛthak ca saḥ / HV_App.I,11.281 /
GE07hv_apppu:1622: ekagrāhaiś ca bahubhir tair vatsair vṛkṣam āhanat // HV_App.I,11.282 //
GE07hv_apppu:1623: kṣipyamāṇais tato vṛkṣo vatsair bhagno 'tha viṣṇunā / HV_App.I,11.283 /
GE07hv_apppu:1624: sāravanto hatā vṛkṣā vatsāś ca nihatās tathā // HV_App.I,11.284 //
GE07hv_apppu:1625: aśeṣam eva vatsānāṃ kṣayaṃ nītvā janādanaḥ / HV_App.I,11.285 /
GE07hv_apppu:1627: samāsannaśarīrās te śavabhūtāś ca dānavāḥ / HV_App.I,11.287 /
GE07hv_apppu:1629: dāruṇaiś ca vapurbhis tair bhagnair aṅgair anekadhā / HV_App.I,11.289 /
GE07hv_apppu:1631: dṛṣṭvā tat karma kṛṣṇasya vismitās tatra ye sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,11.291 /
GE07hv_apppu:1632: asādhyaṃ sumahat kāryaṃ kṛtvā kṛṣṇo vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,11.292 //
GE07hv_apppu:1633: atha pūrvajam āmantrya kṛṣṇaḥ kamalalocanaḥ / HV_App.I,11.293 /
GE07hv_apppu:1634: śeṣaṃ vṛkṣaṃ samunmathya gopālair adahat saha / HV_App.I,11.294 /
GE07hv_apppu:1635: viṣakaṇṭakino vṛkṣās tatra ye tān vyanīnaśat // HV_App.I,11.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:1636: tato vallyaś ca bhūyiṣṭhā ye ca gulmās tadāśritāḥ / HV_App.I,11.296 /
GE07hv_apppu:1637: chittvā saṃgṛhya tān sarvān bhagno yatra viṣadrumaḥ / HV_App.I,11.297 /
GE07hv_apppu:1638: tatra parvatavad rāśiṃ kṛtvāgniṃ samupānayat // HV_App.I,11.298 //
GE07hv_apppu:1640: adahat patitaiḥ sārdhaṃ phalaiḥ puṣpaiḥ śavais tathā // HV_App.I,11.300 //
GE07hv_apppu:1641: adahat tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ saparvatamahādrumam / HV_App.I,11.301 /
GE07hv_apppu:1645: bhasmāvaśeṣaṃ saṃdahya śānte tasmin vibhāvasau / HV_App.I,11.303 /
GE07hv_apppu:1646: ākāśāt puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca papāta dharaṇītale // HV_App.I,11.304 //
GE07hv_apppu:1647: vavau vāyuḥ sukhasparśaḥ praśāntam abhavad rajaḥ / HV_App.I,11.305 /
GE07hv_apppu:1648: devaduṃdubhayo nedur nīrujaṃ cābhavad vanam // HV_App.I,11.306 //
GE07hv_apppu:1649: tato rāmaś ca kṛṣṇaś ca pūjyamānau mudā yutau / HV_App.I,11.307 /
GE07hv_apppu:1650: gopālair brahmaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ pratiyātau mahāvanāt // HV_App.I,11.308 //
GE07hv_apppu:1651: samūlaghātaṃ saṃdahya siddhārthās taṃ mahādrumam / HV_App.I,11.309 /
GE07hv_apppu:1652: gopālāḥ kṛtakarmāṇaś cakruḥ siṃhadhvaniṃ muhuḥ // HV_App.I,11.310 //
GE07hv_apppu:1653: praviśya yamunāṃ gopā jalakrīḍās tv anekaśaḥ / HV_App.I,11.311 /
GE07hv_apppu:1654: sakṛṣṇā gopamukhyāś ca cakrur nityavihāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,11.312 //
GE07hv_apppu:1656: cakruḥ śikṣāviśeṣāṃś ca vyāyāmāṃś ca jalāśrayān // HV_App.I,11.314 //
GE07hv_apppu:1657: nṛtyantaḥ praharantaś ca gāyanto gopadārakāḥ / HV_App.I,11.315 /
GE07hv_apppu:1659: yuddhamārgaṃ ca saṃyūhya cakrur yuddhakramaṃ muhuḥ / HV_App.I,11.317 /
GE07hv_apppu:1660: jalagūḍhaśarīrās te cerur nadyām adhogatāḥ // HV_App.I,11.318 //
GE07hv_apppu:1661: antaś copari toyasya rāmakṛṣṇau mudā yutau / HV_App.I,11.319 /
GE07hv_apppu:1664: samutteratur īśau tau sayūthāv iva yūthapau // HV_App.I,11.322 //
GE07hv_apppu:1665: nandagopaniyogena tatrāsīt pūrvam eva hi / HV_App.I,11.323 /
GE07hv_apppu:1666: parikalpitam annādyaṃ putrayor utsave sati // HV_App.I,11.324 //
GE07hv_apppu:1667: tatas tasya niyogāc ca suddham āhāram āhṛtam / HV_App.I,11.325 /
GE07hv_apppu:1668: nyavedayaṃś ca tatraiṣāṃ gopanāryaḥ sadārakāḥ // HV_App.I,11.326 //
GE07hv_apppu:1669: tatra tau vimale vastre paridhāya svalaṃkṛtau / HV_App.I,11.327 /
GE07hv_apppu:1670: ājahrur aśanaṃ mṛṣṭam amṛtaṃ vibudhā iva // HV_App.I,11.328 //
GE07hv_apppu:1671: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca vidhivad vyañjanānvitam / HV_App.I,11.329 /
GE07hv_apppu:1676: śivāś ca lokasiddhyarthaṃ śivā vāco vavāśire // HV_App.I,11.332 //
GE07hv_apppu:1678: tataś ca rāmakṛṣṇau tau gopaiḥ krīḍāparāyaṇau / **HV_App.I,11.332**17:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1679: tata utthāya gopālāḥ svadeśān prati niryayauḥ / HV_App.I,11.333 /
GE07hv_apppu:1680: goniveśaṃ mudā yuktāḥ sāyāhne vītakalmaṣāḥ // HV_App.I,11.334 //
GE07hv_apppu:1681: nṛtyantaḥ prahasantś ca dhāvantaś ca parasparam / HV_App.I,11.335 /
GE07hv_apppu:1686: saveṇaśṛṅgavetrāṃ ca vīnāṃ ca vādayaṃs tathā / **HV_App.I,11.337**18:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1687: pratiyātāḥ sukhaṃ gopāḥ sukaṇṭhā madhurasvarāḥ // HV_App.I,11.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:1689: samantataḥ prādur āsīt kṛto gopair mudānvitaiḥ // HV_App.I,11.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:1690: evaṃ saṃbhūtam atulaṃ śabdaṃ kurvan kumārakāḥ / HV_App.I,11.341 /
GE07hv_apppu:1691: praharṣam atulaṃ labdhvā bhejire vāsam eva te // HV_App.I,11.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:1693: gatasya tasya devasya dharmakālo mahān abhūt / **HV_App.I,11.342**19:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1696: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I No. 12, transliterated by Peter Schreiner;
GE07hv_apppu:1698: [k: After adhy. 54, D3.6,S ins. App.I No. 12. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:1700: syālo 'tha nandagopasya mithileṣu gavāṃ patiḥ / HV_App.I,12.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1701: pravṛddhagodhano dakṣaḥ kumbhako nāma nāmataḥ / HV_App.I,12.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:1702: dātā dugdhasya sarveṣāṃ takrasya ca ghṛtasya ca / HV_App.I,12.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:1703: janasya priyavāṅ nityaṃ yaśodāyā jaghanyajaḥ // HV_App.I,12.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:1704: dharmadā tasya bhāryāsīd dharmadaiva ca nāmataḥ / HV_App.I,12.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:1706: tayos tatra pumāñ jātaḥ śrīdāmā nāma viśrutaḥ / HV_App.I,12.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:1707: sarvaiś ca sadguṇair yuktaḥ sarvaprāṇimanoramaḥ // HV_App.I,12.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:1708: nīlā nāma ca kanyāsīd rūpaudāryaguṇānvitā / HV_App.I,12.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:1709: hasantī gamanair haṃsān bhūspṛṣṭacaraṇān muhuḥ // HV_App.I,12.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:1715: suvarṇakumbhasadṛśau dṛḍhau pīnau stanau mṛdū // HV_App.I,12.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:1716: dhārayantī mṛdusparśā kāmasya jananī nṛṇām / HV_App.I,12.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:1725: tāṃ vavruḥ sarvabhūpālā bhūyo bhūyo viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,12.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:1726: na teṣāṃ kasyacid dattā pitrā vidhibalāśrayāt // HV_App.I,12.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:1727: etasminn eva kāle tu vṛṣarūpā mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,12.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:1729: tadā devāsure yuddhe viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / HV_App.I,12.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:1730: saṃgrāmān bahuśaḥ kṛtvā tena yuddhe jitās tadā / HV_App.I,12.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:1731: diśo mūḍhāḥ prajagmus te viṣṇuṃ hantuṃ samudyatāḥ // HV_App.I,12.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:1732: yāvat kṛṣṇo yadukule jāto daiteyasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,12.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:1733: jñātvā viṣṇuṃ yadukule yatnavantaḥ samutthitāḥ // HV_App.I,12.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:1734: vṛṣarūpadharāḥ sapta kumbhakasya vraje vasan / HV_App.I,12.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:1740: te vṛṣāḥ sarvato jaghnur gāś ca vatsāṃś ca durmadāḥ / HV_App.I,12.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:1741: garbhān āsrāvayan sarvān gavāṃ sasyāny abhakṣayan // HV_App.I,12.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:1743: sasyānāṃ pālakān sarvān ādhāvanti sma sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,12.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:1744: kumbhakasya vraje rātrau vasanti sma mudānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,12.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:1745: kṛṣīvālās tataḥ sarve rājño mithilavarmaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,12.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:1746: nyavedayaṃs tadā sarvaṃ vṛṣaiḥ sasyavināśanam // HV_App.I,12.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:1747: yāny eva tava sasyāni rāṣṭre jātāni sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,12.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:1748: bhakṣitāni samastāni kumbhakasya vṛṣair nṛpa / HV_App.I,12.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:1749: saptabhis taiḥ samudriktair damanena vivarjitaiḥ // HV_App.I,12.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:1750: te nivāryā mahīpāla yadi te syāj jagattrayam / HV_App.I,12.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:1751: sādayanti muhuḥ sarvān naṣṭā rājan bhavatprajāḥ // HV_App.I,12.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:1752: iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā rājā janakasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,12.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:1753: dūtaiḥ kumbhakam āhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,12.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:1754: tava sapta vṛṣā gopa nirdamāḥ sasyaghātakāḥ / HV_App.I,12.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:1755: damyantām adya sarve te vṛṣāḥ sarvaprayatnataḥ // HV_App.I,12.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:1756: anyathā daṇḍya eva syāt sabandhuḥ saprajo bhavān / HV_App.I,12.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:1757: gaccha gopair matiyutair damane kuśalaiḥ samam / HV_App.I,12.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:1758: damyantāṃ te vṛṣāḥ sapta na bhayaṃ vidyate tava // HV_App.I,12.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:1759: atha rātrau kvacid dṛptān dānavān vṛṣarūpiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,12.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:1760: gopālair aparaiḥ sārdhaṃ niyantum upacakrame / HV_App.I,12.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:1761: rajjuhastās tadā sarve mandaṃ mandam upāyayuḥ // HV_App.I,12.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:1762: atha te ballavān dṛṣṭvā rajjuhastān samantataḥ / HV_App.I,12.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:1764: tān khuraiḥ śṛṅgakoṇaiś ca samājagmuḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,12.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:1765: te hatā gopamukhyās tair gataprāṇāḥ samaṃ bhuvi / HV_App.I,12.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:1766: patitāḥ śerate bhūmau vajrabhagnā ivācalāḥ // HV_App.I,12.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:1767: dārakā dārikā vatsās tair hatāḥ patitā bhuvi / HV_App.I,12.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:1768: śerate mṛtabhūyiṣṭhāḥ kumbhakasya vraje sma ha // HV_App.I,12.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:1769: niśceṣṭam abhavat sarvaṃ vrajaṃ nihatadārakam / HV_App.I,12.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:1770: na śekus te vṛṣān roddhuṃ dṛḍhair dāmabhir udyatāḥ / HV_App.I,12.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:1771: nirvīryāḥ sarva evāmī bhagnās tair vṛṣarūpibhiḥ // HV_App.I,12.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:1772: vraje tasmin mahīpāla nihate ca tathā hate / HV_App.I,12.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:1773: visaṃjñaḥ kumbhako bhūtvā niśceṣṭaḥ samapadyata // HV_App.I,12.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:1774: tato vimṛśya tair gopair matim evaṃ samādadhe / HV_App.I,12.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:1775: taptānāṃ vṛṣamallānāṃ damitā yo bhaved bhuvi / HV_App.I,12.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:1776: tasmai kanyāṃ pradāsyāmi nīlāṃ nīradalocanām // HV_App.I,12.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:1777: gopāḥ sarve samāyāntu ye gopā goṣu jīvinaḥ / HV_App.I,12.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:1778: śūdrā vā ye samarthā syus te ca gacchantu sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,12.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:1779: evam āghoṣayām āsa kumbhakaḥ sa vraje kila // HV_App.I,12.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:1782: tato gopagaṇaḥ sarvo mithilām anvavartata / HV_App.I,12.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:1783: vṛṣān sapta samāhatya nīlāṃ gṛhṇāma yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,12.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:1784: iti gopāḥ samājagmuḥ pratyekaṃ tāṃ jighṛkṣavaḥ // HV_App.I,12.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:1785: mithilā rājadhānī sā na kvacid ballavair vinā / HV_App.I,12.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:1786: gopālam ayam evaitad rāṣṭraṃ mithilavarmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,12.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:1787: te gopās tv āyatabhujā vistīrṇabalasaṃyutāḥ / HV_App.I,12.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:1788: āsphoṭitabhujā mattāḥ pratyekaṃ vṛṣam anvayuḥ // HV_App.I,12.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:1789: kumbhakasya tadā dūtair āhūto gopanandanaḥ / HV_App.I,12.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:1790: gopālair aparaiḥ sārdhaṃ nandagopaḥ samāyayau // HV_App.I,12.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:1791: rāmakṛṣṇau ca saṃyātau kumbhakasya vrajaṃ kila / HV_App.I,12.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:1792: dārakair aparaiḥ sārdhaṃ savayobhir mudānvitaiḥ // HV_App.I,12.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:1800: gopās te naubhir uttīrya yamunām ūrmimālinīm / HV_App.I,12.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:1802: kumbhakaś ca mahābuddhir maithileyo mudānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,12.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:1803: nandagopaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā saputraṃ ca samāgatam // HV_App.I,12.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:1805: bṛsīṃ saṃcodayām āsa yaśodāṃ caiva dharmadā // HV_App.I,12.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:1806: balabhadrasya kṛṣṇasya śrīdāmā cāsanaṃ dadau / HV_App.I,12.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:1807: kṛsaraṃ pāyasaṃ caiva tathā dadhyodanaṃ bahu / HV_App.I,12.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:1810: dattāḥ kṛṣṇāya rāmāya nandāyātha sajātaye // HV_App.I,12.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:1812: ūṣuḥ sukhaṃ tadā rātrau gopālāḥ sarva eva te // HV_App.I,12.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:1813: atha tasyāṃ vṛṣā rātrau goṣu vaiśasanaṃ muhuḥ / HV_App.I,12.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:1814: pratyekaṃ sapta te mallā dāvanā vṛṣarūpiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,12.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:1815: vatsāñ jaghnur atho gāś ca kuṭīr bhūyo babhañjire // HV_App.I,12.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:1816: āgantukāṃs tadā gopān rātrau yuddhāya niḥsṛtān / HV_App.I,12.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:1817: jaghnuḥ śṛṅgaiḥ khuraiś caiva śiṣṭā gopāḥ diśo yayuḥ / HV_App.I,12.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:1818: humbhāravaṃ prakurvanto diggajā iva tasthire / HV_App.I,12.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:1820: rajjūś chittvā ghaṭān bhittvā kīlakān atha śikyakān / HV_App.I,12.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:1822: vatsān vidrāvayām āsur gāś ca rājan diśo daśa // HV_App.I,12.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:1823: tataḥ prabhāte vimale vyuṣṭā sā rajanī kila / HV_App.I,12.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:1824: vṛṣās tasthur mahānādās tasmin kumbhakaveśmani // HV_App.I,12.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:1829: atha tasyām avasthāyāṃ niśceṣṭaḥ kumbhakaḥ kila / HV_App.I,12.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:1831: gopān sarvān samāhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,12.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:1832: śrūyantāṃ mama vākyāni gopā nandapuraḥsarāḥ / HV_App.I,12.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:1833: vṛṣāḥ sapta samudbhūtā vraje 'smin madadurmadāḥ // HV_App.I,12.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:1834: siṃhā iva grahākrāntā diggajā iva daṃśitāḥ / HV_App.I,12.129 /
GE07hv_apppu:1836: yatnāś ca bahavo 'smābhiḥ kṛtā roddhum imān muhuḥ / HV_App.I,12.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:1837: eṣām ekaṃ balād yoddhuṃ na śaktā smeti saṃgatāḥ / HV_App.I,12.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:1838: bhītās tebhyo muhur gopā visaṃjñā paryaṭāmahe // HV_App.I,12.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:1839: kiṃ ca rājñā muhur daṇḍyā vayaṃ mithilavarmaṇā / HV_App.I,12.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:1840: gatim eṣāṃ na jānīmo nāgatiṃ na ca cintitam // HV_App.I,12.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:1841: na ca te kevalavṛṣā rākṣasā vā vṛṣātmanā / HV_App.I,12.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:1842: daityā vā dānavā vāpi yakṣagandharva eva vā / HV_App.I,12.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:1844: yuṣmākam āgatānāṃ tu yo vṛṣān damayiṣyati / HV_App.I,12.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:1845: tasyeyaṃ sarvakalyāṇī nīlā deyā manasvinī / HV_App.I,12.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:1846: nīlā sumadhyamā tasmai dattā kamalalocanā // HV_App.I,12.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:1847: ity uktvāhūya tāṃ kanyāṃ gopamadhye karotthitām / HV_App.I,12.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:1848: yūnāṃ manāṃsi cākṣīṇi tasyām eva prapedire // HV_App.I,12.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:1849: stanayoḥ sthitim ājagmuḥ keṣāmcin netrapaṅkaje / HV_App.I,12.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:1850: anyeṣām adhare caiva pareṣāṃ ca sumadhyame / HV_App.I,12.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:1851: evaṃ vyālolamanaso gopāś citrasthitā iva // HV_App.I,12.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:1852: tatra nandasutaḥ kaścij jyeṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇasya saṃmataḥ / HV_App.I,12.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:1853: sa tadāghoṣayad vācā damayiṣye vṛṣān amūn / HV_App.I,12.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:1854: iti pratasthe tān hantuṃ daiteyān vṛṣarūpiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,12.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:1855: bhujāv āsphoṭya ruddho 'pi pitrā yatnavatā tadā / HV_App.I,12.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:1856: iyeṣa yoddhuṃ mandātmā yān na śaknoti mādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,12.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:1857: rāvaṇasya raṇe hantā yaś ca hantā sumālinaḥ / HV_App.I,12.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:1858: teṣāṃ madhye samāsthāya humbhāravam athākarot // HV_App.I,12.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:1859: tena śabdena te sapta vṛṣā ghoṣavataḥ puraḥ / HV_App.I,12.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:1860: khurāñ śṛṅgān samuddhṛtya samuttasthuḥ samudyatāḥ // HV_App.I,12.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:1861: teṣāṃ sthitānām ekasya ghoṣavān mastake 'hanat / HV_App.I,12.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:1862: tato gopāḥ samāgamya siṃhanādaṃ vyanīnadan // HV_App.I,12.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:1863: āhato mastake so 'tha vṛṣo ghoṣavatā tadā / HV_App.I,12.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:1864: agre khurābhyām āhṛtya ghoṣavantaṃ dadaṃśa ha // HV_App.I,12.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:1865: punaḥ śṛṅgeṇa taṃ hatvā khurābhyāṃ dūrato 'kṣipat / HV_App.I,12.160 /
GE07hv_apppu:1866: vyanīnadac ca sahasā gopān vidrāvayaṃs tadā // HV_App.I,12.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:1867: yuvānas tv atha ye gopā nīlāgrahaṇalālasāḥ / HV_App.I,12.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:1869: gopalīlāṃ prakurvantas teṣām agre padaṃ dadhuḥ // HV_App.I,12.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:1870: sthiteṣu gopavīreṣu te vṛṣā gopaghātakāḥ / HV_App.I,12.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:1871: sarvāṃs tāñ śṛṅgakoṇaiś ca nijaghnuḥ sarvatas tataḥ / HV_App.I,12.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:1872: mastakaiś ca khuraiś caiva nyahanan muditā bhṛśam // HV_App.I,12.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:1873: te gopā vṛṣadaityaiś ca nihatā bhuvi pātitāḥ / HV_App.I,12.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:1874: gatān abhimukhaṃ hatvā saṃsthitāḥ sumahāvṛṣāḥ // HV_App.I,12.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:1876: gopālān gopamukhyāṃś ca balād vidrāvya daṃśitān / HV_App.I,12.171 /
GE07hv_apppu:1877: valmīkān khādayanto vai taṭaghātaṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,12.172 //
GE07hv_apppu:1878: kumbhako nandagopaś ca ye vṛddhā goṣu jīvinaḥ / HV_App.I,12.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:1880: rājño bhītā babhūvuś ca daṇḍyā vayam iti sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,12.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:1883: atha kṛṣṇas tadā rāmaṃ babhāṣe vaiśase sati / HV_App.I,12.176 /
GE07hv_apppu:1884: naite vṛṣā mahābāho daityāḥ sapta samutthitāḥ // HV_App.I,12.177 //
GE07hv_apppu:1885: kālanemisutā ārya māṃ hantum iha saṃgatāḥ / HV_App.I,12.178 /
GE07hv_apppu:1886: purā mayā hatā yuddhe tadā tārāmaye vibho // HV_App.I,12.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:1888: nihantavyā mayā rāma gogopān rakṣatā samam // HV_App.I,12.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:1889: etair gopā hatā bhūyo bhūyo hantuṃ samudyatāḥ / HV_App.I,12.182 /
GE07hv_apppu:1890: vayam etair yathāyogaṃ krīḍāṃ kūrmaḥ sagopakāḥ // HV_App.I,12.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:1891: nandaś ca kumbhakaś cobhau viṣaṇṇau samapadyatām / HV_App.I,12.184 /
GE07hv_apppu:1892: rakṣitavyau balād etau gopau bandhū mayā vibho // HV_App.I,12.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:1893: nīlām enāṃ grahīṣyāmi hatvā sapta vṛṣān imān / HV_App.I,12.186 /
GE07hv_apppu:1894: śrīdāmānaṃ sakhitvena grahīṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,12.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:1895: iti niścitya rāmeṇa kṛṣṇaḥ kamalalocanaḥ / HV_App.I,12.188 /
GE07hv_apppu:1896: puras teṣāṃ padaṃ cakre vṛṣāṇāṃ balaśālinām // HV_App.I,12.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:1897: te vṛṣā didijāḥ kruddhā viṣṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā puraḥsthitam / HV_App.I,12.190 /
GE07hv_apppu:1899: te samaṃ sahasā petuḥ kṛṣṇasyopari dānavāḥ / HV_App.I,12.192 /
GE07hv_apppu:1900: tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat teṣāṃ kṛṣṇasya ca prabho // HV_App.I,12.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:1901: tato gopagaṇāḥ sarve kṛṣṇam evāśritābhavan / HV_App.I,12.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:1902: śṛṅgais te sahasā jaghnuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ hantum abhīpsavaḥ // HV_App.I,12.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:1903: pādaprahārais apariḥ pucchaghātaiś ca keśavam / HV_App.I,12.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:1904: pṛthak pṛthak samāhanyuḥ pratyekaṃ vṛṣadānavāḥ / HV_App.I,12.197 /
GE07hv_apppu:1905: dantair dadaṃśur apare khurair anye janārdanam // HV_App.I,12.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:1906: tataḥ kṛṣṇo ruṣā muṣṭiṃ saṃnihatya jaghāna ha / HV_App.I,12.199 /
GE07hv_apppu:1907: teṣām ekaṃ kṣaṇād dhatvā punar anyaṃ jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,12.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:1908: krameṇa muṣṭyā tān sarvān hatvā daiteyagopatīn / HV_App.I,12.201 /
GE07hv_apppu:1909: nīlāṃ haste gṛhītvātha kṛṣṇas tasmin vyarocata // HV_App.I,12.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:1910: kumbhako nandagopaṃ taṃ provāca vrajasaṃsadi / HV_App.I,12.203 /
GE07hv_apppu:1911: prasādāt tava putrasya jīvāmo vigatajvarāḥ / HV_App.I,12.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:1912: saputrāḥ saha gopālaiḥ savatsā godhanaiḥ samam // HV_App.I,12.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:1913: vṛṣaiś ca saptabhir nanda hatā gāvaḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,12.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:1914: garbhāś ca niḥsṛtās tāvad vatsās tāvanta eva hi / HV_App.I,12.207 /
GE07hv_apppu:1915: yatas te nihatā nanda sukhaṃ tasmād avāpnumaḥ // HV_App.I,12.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:1916: sosahasraṃ tava vibho mahiṣā mahiṣīśatam / HV_App.I,12.209 /
GE07hv_apppu:1917: yāvad icchasi vā nanda tāvat te vai dadāmy aham // HV_App.I,12.210 //
GE07hv_apppu:1918: nīlāyai lakṣam ayutaṃ dāsyāmi bahugodhanam // HV_App.I,12.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:1920: alaṃ mama vibho tāta gobhir vatsair dhanair api / HV_App.I,12.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:1921: tiṣṭhantām adya gāvas te gāvo me bahavo matāḥ // HV_App.I,12.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:1923: yadā ca kṛṣṇa udbhūtas tadāprabhṛti me vraje // HV_App.I,12.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:1924: yāvad dugdhaṃ samudbhūtaṃ tāvad eva ghṛtaṃ bhavet / HV_App.I,12.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:1925: gulme gulme madhu bhavet svādu svādu bhavaty alam // HV_App.I,12.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:1926: gāvo vatsāś ca nīrogā jāte kṛṣṇe vraje mama / HV_App.I,12.218 /
GE07hv_apppu:1927: alpakaṃ na ca me syāt tad gehe svaṃ kṛṣṇasaṃnidhau // HV_App.I,12.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:1928: yāsyāmy aham atho gopa gṛhāyābhyanujānatām / HV_App.I,12.220 /
GE07hv_apppu:1929: ity uktvā prayayau nandaḥ savrajaḥ sahagogaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,12.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:1930: kṛṣṇaś ca nīlayā sārdhaṃ śrīdāmnā saha saṃgatah / HV_App.I,12.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:1931: sākaṃ ca balabhadreṇa yayau vṛndāvanaṃ vanam // HV_App.I,12.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:1932: prāpya vṛḍāvanaṃ gopā remire sahakeśavāḥ // HV_App.I,12.224 //
GE07hv_apppu:1935: aho citram aho citraṃ mādhavasya jagatpateḥ / HV_App.I,12.225 /
GE07hv_apppu:1937: dhanyās ta eva deveśaṃ gopaveṣavibhūṣitam / HV_App.I,12.227 /
GE07hv_apppu:1938: apaśyan devam īśaṃ ye mayūrāṅgadabhūṣaṇam // HV_App.I,12.228 //
GE07hv_apppu:1942: paśyanti devam īśeśaṃ namas tebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,12.232 //
GE07hv_apppu:1943: hatvā vṛṣān hariḥ sapta punar āgamya mādhavaḥ / HV_App.I,12.233 /
GE07hv_apppu:1944: vṛndāvanaṃ sarāmas tu gopaiḥ saha mahāmune / HV_App.I,12.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:1945: akarot kiṃ jagannāthas tan me brūhi tapodhana // HV_App.I,12.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:1947: tasyāṃ śaradi govindaḥ sukhaṃ vṛndāvane vane / HV_App.I,12.236 /
GE07hv_apppu:1948: cacāra godhanaḥ sākaṃ jagatāṃ prītivardhanaḥ // HV_App.I,12.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:1949: [h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 13, transliterated and collated with ViP and BrP by Utz Podzeit,
GE07hv_apppu:1950: extracted and edited by Peter Schreiner;
GE07hv_apppu:1953: bhāṇḍīre sukham āsīnaṃ viharantaṃ janārdanam / HV_App.I,13.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:1956: gaṅgātīrthāya saṃkrāntau bhāskarau dvāv ivāgatau // HV_App.I,13.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:1960: namaskartuṃ tadā vīra bhāṇḍīraṃ yakṣasevitam // HV_App.I,13.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:1962: dadarśatuḥ samaṃ vatsān kālyānāṃś ca gogaṇān // HV_App.I,13.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:1964: he vatsāḥ kva ca no mārgo yamunātīrthadarśane / HV_App.I,13.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:1965: kva ca tīrthaṃ susopānaṃ jhaṣagrāhavivarjitam // HV_App.I,13.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:1966: śrutvaitad dārakā vākyaṃ jahasur munipuṃgavau / HV_App.I,13.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:1967: mārgajñā na vayaṃ bālā jñānibhyaḥ saṃpraśasyatām / HV_App.I,13.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:1968: kuto 'tra yamunā śubhrā kuto mārgaḥ kuto vayam // HV_App.I,13.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:1969: etasminn antare kṛṣṇas teṣāṃ vākyaṃ tayor api / HV_App.I,13.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:1970: śrutvā tau samupāgamya vaktum evaṃ pracakrame // HV_App.I,13.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:1971: eṣa vāṃ patha ādeṣṭā gavām iva suyantritaḥ / HV_App.I,13.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:1972: ahaṃ nandasya tanayaḥ kṛṣṇa ity abhiviśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,13.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:1973: mamāyam agrajo rāmaś candramā iva bhāsate / HV_App.I,13.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:1974: āvayor gogaṇaḥ sarvo vacanaṃ ca niśamyatām // HV_App.I,13.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:1975: etad dadhyodanaṃ samyag gṛhyatāṃ yadi rocate / HV_App.I,13.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:1976: pāyasaṃ surasaṃ dugdhaṃ dhātāś ca guḍamiśritāḥ // HV_App.I,13.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:1977: evam ukte tatas tasmin kṛṣṇe kamalalocane / HV_App.I,13.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:1978: tau kāv imāv iti tadā samādhiṃ jagmatur munī / HV_App.I,13.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:1979: tau netrāṇi samunmīlya prītau dṛṣṭvā jagatpatim / HV_App.I,13.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:1980: idam ūcatur adhyātmaṃ munī kṛṣṇasya saṃmatam // HV_App.I,13.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:1981: tvam ādiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ madhyam antas tathā bhavān / HV_App.I,13.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:1982: sraṣṭā sarvasya lokasya pātā bhoktā janārdana // HV_App.I,13.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:1983: sraṣṭā vedasya yajñasya haviṣām ṛtvijāṃ hare / HV_App.I,13.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:1984: karmaṇāṃ phalabhoktā ca phaladaḥ karma kurvatām // HV_App.I,13.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:1985: niṣeddhā duṣṭasattvasya hantā tvaṃ tamasāṃ paraḥ / HV_App.I,13.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:1986: netre te bhānuśaśinau nāsikā ca samīraṇaḥ // HV_App.I,13.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:1987: vācaḥ sarasvatī devī jihvā meghaḥ prakīrtitaḥ / HV_App.I,13.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:1988: dantāś ca parvatā jñeyā karṇaḥ pātālagocaraḥ // HV_App.I,13.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:1989: lakṣmīr vakṣas tu vijṭeyā vāmo bāhus tu śaṃkaraḥ / HV_App.I,13.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:1990: skandhaś ca dakṣiṇo bāhur aṇgulyaḥ sāgarāḥ smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,13.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:1991: ambaraṃ kukṣir ity uktaṃ vivarāṇi diśaḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,13.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:1992: rodasī tava pādau ca keśā devāḥ smṛtā hareḥ / HV_App.I,13.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:1993: lomāni yakṣagandharvāḥ piśācā rākṣasā vibho // HV_App.I,13.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:1994: yāny eva vastujātāni loke dṛṣṭāni mādhava / HV_App.I,13.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:1995: tāni gātreṣu paśyāmaḥ puruṣottama te hare // HV_App.I,13.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:1996: adho bhavantaṃ bhagavan drakṣyāmaḥ sakalātmanā / HV_App.I,13.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:1997: bhavantam ūrdhvaṃ paśyāmo bhavantam atha pṛṣṭhataḥ / HV_App.I,13.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:1998: pārśvataḥ purataś caiva bhavantaṃ vīkṣya nirvṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,13.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:1999: tvam ādau kroḍadaṃṣṭrāgre adadhā gāṃ saparvatām / HV_App.I,13.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:2002: daityendraṃ hatavān viṣṇo rājyaṃ dattvā marutvate // HV_App.I,13.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:2005: raghor anvayam āpannas tvam eva jagatāṃ pate / HV_App.I,13.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:2006: gatvābdhau setunā viṣṇo laṇkāṃ rāvaṇapālitām // HV_App.I,13.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:2007: rāvaṇaṃ sasutaṃ hatvā sānujaṃ sabalaṃ prabho / HV_App.I,13.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:2008: niṣkaṇṭakam imaṃ lokam akaroḥ puruṣottama // HV_App.I,13.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:2009: baler vāmanatāṃ gatvā mahīm ādāya māyayā / HV_App.I,13.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:2010: dattavāṃs tridaśendrāya pātāle taṃ vyadīdadhāḥ // HV_App.I,13.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:2011: tattadrūpam upāgamya lokān rakṣasi mādhava / HV_App.I,13.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:2012: idānīm api deveśa devadeva yadoḥ kule // HV_App.I,13.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:2015: pralambaṃ keśinaṃ hatvā hantā kaṃsasya mādhava / HV_App.I,13.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:2016: aho ramyam idaṃ viṣṇo vapur nīlotpalacchavi / HV_App.I,13.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:2023: aho manoramaṃ rūpaṃ paśyāmas tava mādhava // HV_App.I,13.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:2024: gopālās te ciraṃ dhanyā ye rūpam idam īdṛśam / HV_App.I,13.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:2025: paśyanti nityaśo viṣṇo namas te puruṣottama // HV_App.I,13.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:2027: acintyavibhave tubhyaṃ sarvagāya namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,13.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:2028: namaḥ sakalakalyāṇa+ kalyāṇāya namo namaḥ / HV_App.I,13.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:2031: bhūyaḥ punar namasyāmas tava yogapadaṃ hare / HV_App.I,13.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:2032: sādhayāmo namas te 'stu tīrthāya jagatāṃ pate // HV_App.I,13.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:2033: ity uktvā harim īśeśaṃ tīrthāya munipuṃgavau / HV_App.I,13.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:2034: jagmatus tatra bhāṇḍīre sthitau tau rāmakeśavau / HV_App.I,13.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:2036: [h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 14 transliterated by Peter Schreiner;
GE07hv_apppu:2043: katham uktaṃ nāradena rājan devarṣiṇā purā / HV_App.I,14.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2044: āścaryam etat kathitaṃ tvattaḥ śrutam ariṃdama // HV_App.I,14.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2045: katham anyena jātas tvam ugrasena pitur vinā / HV_App.I,14.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:2046: tava mātrā kathaṃ rājan kṛtaṃ karmedam īdṛśam // HV_App.I,14.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2047: anyāpi prākṛtā nārī na kuryāc ca jugupsitam / HV_App.I,14.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:2048: vistaraṃ śrotum icchāmi hy atra kautūhalaṃ hi me // HV_App.I,14.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:2050: yathā kathitavān vipro maharṣir nāradaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,14.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:2051: tathāhaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yadi te śravaṇe matiḥ // HV_App.I,14.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:2052: āgataḥ śakrasadanāt sa vai śakrasakho muniḥ / HV_App.I,14.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:2056: gātā caturṇāṃ vedānāṃ vidvān gandharvavedavit / HV_App.I,14.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:2058: tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ dṛṣṭvā pūjayitvā yathāvidhi / HV_App.I,14.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:2059: pādyārghyam āsanaṃ dattvā saṃpraveśyopaveśya ha // HV_App.I,14.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:2060: mukhaüupaviṣṭo 'tha muniḥ dṛṣṭvā ca kuśalaṃ mama / HV_App.I,14.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:2061: uvāca ca prītamanā devarṣir bhāvitātmavān // HV_App.I,14.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:2062: pūjito 'haṃ tvayā vīra vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā / HV_App.I,14.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:2063: idaṃ eko mama vacaḥ śrūyatāṃ pratigṛhyatām // HV_App.I,14.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:2065: so 'haṃ kadācid devānāṃ samāje merumūrdhani // HV_App.I,14.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:2066: tatra mantrayatām eva devatānāṃ mayā śrutam / HV_App.I,14.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:2069: tatraiṣā devakī yā te mathurāyāṃ pitṛṣvasā / **HV_App.I,14.24**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2071: yo 'syā garbho 'ṣṭamaḥ kaṃsa sa te mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,14.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:2072: devānāṃ sa tu sarvasvaṃ tridivasya gatiś ca saḥ / HV_App.I,14.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:2073: paraṃ rahasyaṃ devānāṃ sa te mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,14.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:2074: yatnaś ca kriyatāṃ kaṃsa garbhānāṃ pātanaṃ prati / HV_App.I,14.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:2075: nāvajñā ripave kāryā subaleṣv abaleṣu vā // HV_App.I,14.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:2076: na cāyam ugrasenas tu pitā tava mahābala / HV_App.I,14.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:2077: drumilo nāma tejasvī saubhasya patir ūrjitaḥ // HV_App.I,14.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:2079: jātas tenāsi kaṃsa tvaṃ nograsenena vīryavān / **HV_App.I,14.32**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2080: śrutvāhaṃ tad vacas tasya kiṃcid roṣasamanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,14.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:2081: bhūyo 'pṛcchaṃ kathaṃ brahman drumilo nāma dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,14.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:2082: mama mātrā kathaṃ tasya brūhi vipra samāgamaḥ / HV_App.I,14.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:2083: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vistareṇa tapodhana // HV_App.I,14.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:2085: hanta te vartayiṣyāmi śṛṇu rājan yathārthataḥ / HV_App.I,14.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:2086: drumilasya ca mātrā te saṃvādaṃ ca samāgamam // HV_App.I,14.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:2087: [h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 15 transliterated by Peter Schreiner;
GE07hv_apppu:2101: [k: Ñ2 ins. after the second occurrence of line 4; V1.3 after line 4; Ñ3,
GE07hv_apppu:2105: avatīrya rathād dhṛṣtaś cacāra drumilo nṛpaḥ / **HV_App.I,15.4**2:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:2107: sa taṃ prāpya parvatendram avatīrya rathottamāt / HV_App.I,15.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:2109: ubhau tau sūtasahitau ceratur nagamūrdhani // HV_App.I,15.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:2110: tato bahūny apaśyetāṃ kānanāni vanāni ca / HV_App.I,15.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:2112: ceratur nagaśṛṅgeṣu kandareṣu nadīṣu ca / HV_App.I,15.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:2113: nānādhātupinaddhaiś ca śṛṅgair bahubhir ucchritaiḥ // HV_App.I,15.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:2120: siṃhān vyāghrān varāhāṃś ca mahiṣāñ śrabhāñ śaśān / HV_App.I,15.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:2121: sṛmarāṃś camarān nyaṅkūn mātaṅgān yakṣarākṣasān // HV_App.I,15.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:2122: evaṃ bahuvidhān paśyaṃś caramāṇo nagottame / HV_App.I,15.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:2123: dūrād dadarśa nṛpatir devīṃ surasutopamām / HV_App.I,15.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:2124: krīḍamānāṃ sakhībhiś ca puṣpāṇi pravicinvatīm // HV_App.I,15.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:2125: tataś carantīṃ suśroṇīṃ sakhībhiḥ saha saṃvṛtām / HV_App.I,15.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:2126: dṛṣṭvā bhaumapatir dūrād vismayan sūtam abravīt // HV_App.I,15.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:2129: śacīva puruhūtasya utāho vā tilottamā / HV_App.I,15.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:2131: ailasya dayitā devī yoṣidratnaṃ kim urvaśī // HV_App.I,15.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:2133: manthānaṃ mandaraṃ kṛtvā amṛtārtheti naḥ śrutam // HV_App.I,15.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:2134: tato amṛtāt samuttasthau devī śrīr lokabhāvanī / HV_App.I,15.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:2135: nārāyaṇāṅkalalitā kiṃ śrīr eṣā varāṅganā // HV_App.I,15.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:2137: tathā yoṣidgaṇān madhye rūpaṃ pradyotayad vanam / HV_App.I,15.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:2139: dṛṣṭvā rūpam anidyāṅgyā vibhrānto vyākulendriyaḥ / HV_App.I,15.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:2140: kāmasya vaśam āpanno mano vihvalatīva me // HV_App.I,15.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:2142: bhittvā hṛdi śarāḥ pañca nirdahantīva me manaḥ / HV_App.I,15.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:2144: kāmaḥ śaraiḥ pañcabhir me hṛdayaṃ nirdahann iva / **HV_App.I,15.39**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2146: katham adya bhavet kāryaṃ śāntyarthaṃ manmathārciṣaḥ / HV_App.I,15.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:2147: kenopāyena kiṃ kurma bhajen māṃ mattakāśinī // HV_App.I,15.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:2148: evaṃ bahu cintayāno nopalabhya ca dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,15.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:2149: sūtam āha muhūrtaṃ tu tiṣṭhasva tvam ihānagha // HV_App.I,15.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:2150: ahaṃ yāsyāmi tāṃ draṣṭuṃ kasyeyam iti yoṣitam / HV_App.I,15.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:2152: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ sūtas tathāstv iti ca so 'bravīt // HV_App.I,15.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:2153: evam uktvā dānavendro gamanāya mano dadhe / HV_App.I,15.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:2157: vāry upaspṛśya balavān dhyānam evānvapadyata // HV_App.I,15.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:2158: muhūrtaṃ dhyānamātreṇa dṛṣṭaṃ jñānabalāt tataḥ / HV_App.I,15.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:2159: ugrasenasya patnīti jñātvā harṣam avāpa saḥ // HV_App.I,15.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:2160: ugrasenasya vai rūpaṃ kṛtvā svaṃ parivartya saḥ / HV_App.I,15.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:2163: [h: HV (CE) App.I No.16, transliterated by John Brockington,
GE07hv_apppu:2166: [k: D6 T2 G1.3.5 M4 ins. after the ref. of Adhy. 81;
GE07hv_apppu:2172: tau gatvā mathurāṃ vīrau dvāṣthena prativeśitau // HV_App.I,16.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:2173: āsanasthaṃ tadā rājann ugrasenaṃ patiṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,16.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:2174: tatpārśve ca sthitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ balabhadreṇa saṃgatam // HV_App.I,16.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:2175: vasudevaṃ mahāvīryaṃ sātyakiṃ ca mahāmatim / HV_App.I,16.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:2176: anyāṃś ca yādavān dṛṣṭvā samīpasthān mahīpateḥ // HV_App.I,16.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:2177: tau tu sarvān samābhāṣya kaṃsasya pitaraṃ tadā / HV_App.I,16.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:2178: ūcatuḥ sukham āsīnau vāsudevaṃ ca sāgrajam // HV_App.I,16.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:2179: āha yuṣmān mahāvīryo jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,16.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:2180: śrūyatāṃ mama yad vākyaṃ duḥkhitasyābalasya me // HV_App.I,16.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:2181: sutādvayaṃ mahārāja draṣṭum icchāmi duḥkhitam / HV_App.I,16.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:2183: yat tu kaṃso hataḥ saṃkhye kṛṣṇena hi balīyasā / HV_App.I,16.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:2184: aśakto 'haṃ tathā rājan kṛtasya pratikarmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,16.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:2185: yat tu yuddhaṃ balavatā kṛṣṇena kṛtam ity api / HV_App.I,16.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:2186: nātra me vismayaḥ kāryo balavān sa hi sāgrajaḥ // HV_App.I,16.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:2187: kiṃ tu duḥkhaṃ mahad bhūtaṃ duḥsahaṃ mama jāyate / HV_App.I,16.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:2188: tad duḥkhaṃ duḥsahaṃ manye vaktuṃ ca mama duḥsaham // HV_App.I,16.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:2189: magadhendre mahāvīrya sabale mayi mānada / HV_App.I,16.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:2190: citram etan mahārāja yat kṛtaṃ mayi jīvati // HV_App.I,16.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:2191: kṛṣṇena sukṛtaṃ karma māṃ matvā paśum ity api / HV_App.I,16.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:2193: kṛṣṇe tv asukṛtaṃ karma mama tvāṃ paśya ity api / **HV_App.I,16.22**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2194: kiṃ nūnaṃ duṣkaraṃ karma kṛtvā kṛṣṇas tu jīvati // HV_App.I,16.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:2195: jīvaty evaṃ jarāputre māvamaṃsthā yadūttama / HV_App.I,16.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:2196: jīvitaṃ tu samāptaṃ me kṛṣṇe jīvati saṃprati // HV_App.I,16.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:2197: ity uktvā punar āhedaṃ krodhavisphāritānanaḥ / HV_App.I,16.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:2198: yadi kṛṣṇaṃ sthitaṃ saṃkhye haniṣye yadi manmukhe // HV_App.I,16.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:2199: nāhaṃ kaṃso na vā keśī nāriṣṭo na ca pūtanā / HV_App.I,16.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:2201: imām apy aparāṃ rājan pratijñāṃ śṛṇu keśava / HV_App.I,16.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:2202: yadi tvaṃ matpuro bhūyās tadā hanmi sabāndhavam // HV_App.I,16.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:2203: saṃnaddho bhava yuddhāya sthito 'haṃ yuddhalālasaḥ / HV_App.I,16.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:2204: yatra yatra bhavān yāti tatra tatrāham āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,16.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:2205: jīvati tvayi govinda jarāsaṃdho na jīvati / HV_App.I,16.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:2206: āgaccha saha yuddhāya balabhadreṇa dhīmatā // HV_App.I,16.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:2207: kim ebhir bahubhir vṛddhair ugrasenapurogamaiḥ / HV_App.I,16.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:2209: sātyake yuktam evaitat kṛtaṃ kṛṣṇena kiṃ prabho / HV_App.I,16.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:2210: vasudeva yaduśreṣṭha yuktaṃ putreṇa kiṃ tava / HV_App.I,16.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:2211: akrūra vada satyena yuktaṃ vātrānyathāpi vā // HV_App.I,16.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:2212: mṛdhe kṛṣṇa yaduśreṣṭha sthiro bhava na cañcalaḥ / HV_App.I,16.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:2213: bahunātra kim uktena na sthiraṃ tava jīvitam // HV_App.I,16.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:2214: śvaḥ purīṃ tava rotsyāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / HV_App.I,16.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:2215: ko nv idaṃ sāhasaṃ kuryāt tvāṃ vinā kṛṣṇa sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,16.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:2216: ity uktvā tau mahāvīryau virāmaṃ jagmatus tadā // HV_App.I,16.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:2217: ity ukto roṣatāmrākṣaḥ kṛṣṇa ūce vacas tadā / HV_App.I,16.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:2218: hataḥ kaṃso mahārāja kim ataḥ sāhasaṃ kṛtam / HV_App.I,16.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:2219: kiṃ citraṃ vada rājendra hataḥ kaṃsa itīha naḥ // HV_App.I,16.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:2220: idaṃ ca tasmai vaktavyaṃ bhavadbhyāṃ rājasattamau / HV_App.I,16.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:2221: sthito 'smi yuddhasaṃrakto jeṣyāmi ca raṇe ripūn // HV_App.I,16.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:2222: tvāṃ hatvā sabalaṃ saṃkhye rājyam ādāya sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,16.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:2223: ugrasenāya dāsyāmi satyena ca śapāmy aham // HV_App.I,16.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:2224: ity uktvā virarāmaiva keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,16.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:2225: tau tu gatvā tadā sarvaṃ tasmai ca procatuḥ prabho // HV_App.I,16.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:2228: gate dūtadvaye rājan māgadhendraṃ janādhipam / HV_App.I,16.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:2229: taṃ śrutvā rājarājendram āhavepsum amarṣaṇam // HV_App.I,16.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:2230: hantukāmaṃ jagannāthaṃ baladhadraṃ ca māgadham / HV_App.I,16.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:2231: pratāpajñā hi yadavo māgadhasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,16.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:2232: śaṅkamānā bhayaṃ tasmāj jarāsaṃdhān mahīpateḥ // HV_App.I,16.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:2233: sthite hi lokanāthe 'smin sarveṣāṃ balahāriṇi / HV_App.I,16.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:2234: sa pratāpo hi balavān magadhendrasya sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,16.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:2235: [h: HV (CE) App.I No.17, transliterated by John Brockington,
GE07hv_apppu:2238: [k: T1.3 G3.5 M ins. after 82.5; D6 T2 G1.4.5 cont. after *932. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2240: ājaghne keśavaṃ tābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ bhojavardhanaḥ // HV_App.I,17.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2241: rukmī tu vāsudevasya jyāṃ chettuṃ paricakrame / HV_App.I,17.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:2242: jñātvaiva vāsudevo 'pi dhanuś ciccheda tasya ha // HV_App.I,17.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2243: saṃchinnadhanvā bhojo 'pi śaktiṃ jagrāha saṃyataḥ / HV_App.I,17.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:2244: tayā jaghne hariṃ vīraḥ so 'cchinat tāṃ śarair api // HV_App.I,17.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:2245: punar anyāṃ mahārāja gadāṃ preṣitavān nṛpa / HV_App.I,17.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:2246: ciccheda tāṃ jagannāthaḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:2247: parigheṇa samājaghne vāsudevaṃ sa rājakaḥ / HV_App.I,17.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:2248: tad dvidhā śastrasaṃpātair akarod yadupuṃgavaḥ // HV_App.I,17.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:2249: rathacakraṃ samādāya viṣṇuṃ vivyādha rājakaḥ / HV_App.I,17.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:2250: tilaśaś ca tathā deva tac cakraṃ kṛtavāñ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,17.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:2251: yadyad astraṃ samādatte rukmī bhīṣmakanandanaḥ / HV_App.I,17.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:2252: tattat tatra dvidhā kṛtvā jahāsa yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,17.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:2253: tantrīrathaṃ vicakraṃ ca kṛtavān yadunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,17.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:2254: viśastraṃ vidhanuṣkaṃ ca cakāra madhusūdanaḥ // HV_App.I,17.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:2255: saprāṇaṃ kṛtavān kṛṣṇaḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,17.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:2256: avekṣya rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo rukmiṇaṃ na vyaśātayat / HV_App.I,17.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:2257: āhukaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā bhīṣmakaṃ prajaghāna ha // HV_App.I,17.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:2258: bhīṣmako 'tha ca rājendra śarāṇāṃ ca paraḥśataiḥ / HV_App.I,17.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:2260: āhukas tu dhanuś chittvā bhīṣmakasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,17.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:2261: rathaṃ cāsya praciccheda dhvajaṃ ca yadupuṃgavaḥ // HV_App.I,17.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:2262: sārathiṃ ca hayāṃs tasya jaghāna yadunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,17.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:2263: apāyāt samarāt tasmād bhīṣmakas tu śramānvitaḥ // HV_App.I,17.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:2264: vasudevas tu rājendra krāthaṃ vivyādha patribhiḥ / HV_App.I,17.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:2265: krāthas tu rājan vivyādha śaraiḥ saptabhir āśugaiḥ / HV_App.I,17.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:2268: sārathiṃ ca jaghānāśu tathobhau pārṣṇisārathī // HV_App.I,17.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:2269: vasudevas tataḥ kruddho dhanuś ciccheda patribhiḥ / HV_App.I,17.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:2270: virathaṃ ca jaghānāśu jarāsaṃdhasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:2271: viratho vidhanuṣkaś ca prayayau māgadhaṃ prati // HV_App.I,17.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:2272: babhruḥ kauśikarājaṃ taṃ vivyādha vividhaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,17.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:2273: atha babhrur mahātmānaṃ vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,17.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:2274: kauśikaś ca tathā babhruṃ marmajño marmabhedibhiḥ / HV_App.I,17.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:2275: bhṛśaṃ vivyādha samare tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,17.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:2276: tasya babhruḥ kṣurapreṇa śiro jvalitakuṇḍalam / HV_App.I,17.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:2278: atha hatvā mahātmānaṃ babhruś ca sumahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,17.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:2281: gadaś ca niśitair bāṇaiś cedirājam apāhanat / **HV_App.I,17.39**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2285: cedirājas tu sahasā gadaṃ yaduvaraṃ raṇe / **HV_App.I,17.40**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2288: virathaṃ vidhanuṣkaṃ ca kṛtavāṃś cedipaḥ kila / HV_App.I,17.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:2290: dantavaktraṃ mahārāja śaṃbhus tu bahuśas tadā / HV_App.I,17.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:2295: tau ca rājan mahātmānau sātyakiṃ satyavikramam / HV_App.I,17.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:2296: pīḍayāṃ cakratū rājan sarvamarmasu patribhiḥ // HV_App.I,17.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:2297: sātyakir vimukhīkṛtya tau ca rājan mahābalau / HV_App.I,17.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:2299: tau ca taṃ sātyakiṃ vīraṃ jaghnatuś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,17.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:2301: sātyakiḥ pañcaviṃśatyā tau ca rājan mahāmatim / HV_App.I,17.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:2302: samājaghne ca rājendra sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:2303: sātyakeś ca dhanur bāṇaṃ rathaṃ sārathim eva ca / HV_App.I,17.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:2304: ubhau vivyadhatū rājan vāsudevasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:2305: kruddho 'tha sātyakis tau tu gadayābhijaghāna ha / HV_App.I,17.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:2306: stanayoś ca tadā rājan bāhvor urasi cārpayat / HV_App.I,17.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:2307: rathaṃ ca cūrṇayām āsa tathobhau pārṣṇisārathī / HV_App.I,17.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:2308: āyudhāni ca sarvāṇi pothayām āsa yādavaḥ // HV_App.I,17.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:2309: punaś ca gadayā cāśu jaghāna yadunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,17.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:2311: gadāṃ ca prāhiṇot tābhyāṃ vāsudevasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:2314: jarāsaṃdhasya puratas tatsamīpaṃ ca jagmatuḥ // HV_App.I,17.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:2315: ekalavyo 'sya vārṣṇeyaṃ śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ // HV_App.I,17.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:2318: saptatriṃśat tu vārṣṇeya ekalavyas tu viṃśatim / **HV_App.I,17.65**6:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:2319: tau tu rājan mahāvīrau parasparavadhaiṣiṇau / HV_App.I,17.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:2320: lokeṣu pravarau vīrau dhanvināṃ pravarau raṇe // HV_App.I,17.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:2321: parasparaṃ dhanuś chittvā dhvajaṃ caiva parasparam / HV_App.I,17.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:2322: tāv ubhāv ubhayo rājan rathau jaghnatur āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,17.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:2323: dhvajau ca cicchidur vīrau sārathī ca mahābalau // HV_App.I,17.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:2324: tau tu bhūmigatau bhūtvā gadām ādāya satvarau / HV_App.I,17.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:2325: parasparaṃ samāhatya gadayā tau mahāraṇe / HV_App.I,17.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:2327: pradyumno 'tha gadāpaṇir ekalavyaṃ jaghāna ha / HV_App.I,17.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:2331: gadāṃ ciccheda bhūyas tu tasya rājñaḥ sa yādavaḥ // HV_App.I,17.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:2332: utsṛjya tāṃ mahārāja muṣṭinā yādaveśvaram / HV_App.I,17.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:2333: jānubhyāṃ talapādaiś ca jānupādaiś ca yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,17.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:2334: sa ca tādṛgvidhaṃ cakre yuddhaṃ yuddhaviśāradaḥ // HV_App.I,17.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:2335: punaś ca muṣṭinā rājan rājā yadukulodvaham / HV_App.I,17.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:2336: āhatya dantapātaiś ca dadaṃśa nṛpasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,17.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:2337: tataś ca sainikāḥ sarve vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,17.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:2338: bāhuyuddhaṃ samabhavat tayor vīryavatos tadā / HV_App.I,17.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:2339: samantāj jagmatus tau tu yuddhāya ca mahāraṇe // HV_App.I,17.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:2340: tataḥ kruddho mahābāhuḥ pradyumno yādeveśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,17.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:2341: ājaghne muṣṭinā taṃ tu jarāsaṃdhasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,17.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:2343: pradyumnas tu tataḥ kruddho muṣṭinā taṃ jaghāna ha / **HV_App.I,17.86**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2344: udvamañ śoṇitaṃ vaktrād gatāyur iva niḥśvasan / HV_App.I,17.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:2345: gantum aicchat tadā yuddhāt pradyumnena prapīḍitaḥ // HV_App.I,17.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:2347: na gantavyaṃ raṇe vīra kṣatriyo 'sīti cābravīt // HV_App.I,17.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:2349: anyeṣāṃ ca mahān āsīd yodhānāṃ dāruṇo raṇaḥ / **HV_App.I,17.90**9:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2350: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 18, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, 04.05.2003,
GE07hv_apppu:2353: [k: After adhy. 82, N (except Ś1) S G(ed.) ins. App.I No. 18: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2354: sa kṛṣṇas tatra sahito rauhiṇeyena saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,18.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2355: mathurāṃ yādavādhīnāṃ purīṃ tāṃ sukham āvasat // HV_App.I,18.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2356: prāptayauvanadehas tu yukto rājaśriyā vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,18.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:2358: kasyacit tv atha kālasya rājā rājagṛheśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,18.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:2359: [k: Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Dn2 Ds D4.6 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2366: na śarma labhate rātrau na divā śokakarṣitaḥ // **HV_App.I,18.6**2:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2367: sarvaiḥ sa pārthivaiḥ sārdhaṃ mantrayan guptamantravit / **HV_App.I,18.6**2:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:2368: aho dhik pauruṣaṃ manye sarveṣāṃ sarvapārthivāḥ / **HV_App.I,18.6**2:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:2370: te gacchāmaḥ punas tatra mathurāṃ caturaṅgiṇaḥ / **HV_App.I,18.6**2:8 /
GE07hv_apppu:2371: balena mahatā yuktā yatra tau gopakilbiṣau / **HV_App.I,18.6**2:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:2372: anyathā hy ayaśo 'smākam yāval lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // **HV_App.I,18.6**2:10 //
GE07hv_apppu:2375: ūcuś ca vacanaṃ tasya sādhu sādhv iti cābruvan // **HV_App.I,18.6**2:12 //
GE07hv_apppu:2377: bhūmeḥ samantataḥ kṛtvā yadūn sarvān nihatya ca / **HV_App.I,18.6**2:14 /
GE07hv_apppu:2379: tatas te susthirāṃ kṛtvā matiṃ yuddhāya pārthivāḥ / **HV_App.I,18.6**2:16 /
GE07hv_apppu:2381: daśa sapta ca saṃgrāmāñ jarāsaṃdhasya yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,18.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:2382: dadur na cainaṃ samare hantuṃ śekur mahārathāḥ // HV_App.I,18.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:2384: bhūyo 'ṣṭādaśamaṃ kartuṃ saṃgrāmaṃ sa samābharat // HV_App.I,18.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:2385: vailakṣyāt punar evāsau rājā rājagṛheśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,18.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:2388: kṛṣṇasya vadham anvicchan bhūyo vai saṃnyavartata // HV_App.I,18.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:2389: taṃ śrutvā sahitāḥ sarve nivṛttaṃ magadheśvaram / HV_App.I,18.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:2391: tataḥ prāha mahātejā vikadrur nayakovidaḥ / HV_App.I,18.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:2393: śrūyatāṃ tāta govinda kulasyāsya samudbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,18.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:2394: śrūyatām abhidhāsyāmi prāptakālam ahaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,18.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:2397: yaduvaṃśaṃ śrotum icche prāptakālaṃ ahaṃ tava / **HV_App.I,18.20**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2398: prādhānyena dvijaśreṣṭha brūhi taṃ vai viśeṣataḥ // **HV_App.I,18.20**3:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2401: yuktaṃ cen manyase sādho kariṣyasi vaco mama // HV_App.I,18.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:2403: yathā me kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ vyāsena viditātmanā // HV_App.I,18.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:2407: āsīd rājā manor vaṃśe śrīmān ikṣvākusaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,18.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:2409: tasyāsīd dayitā bhāryā madhor daityasya sā sutā / HV_App.I,18.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:2410: devī madhumatī nāma yathā devī śucī tathā // HV_App.I,18.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:2415: sā tam ikṣvākuśārdūlaṃ kāmayām āsa kāminī // HV_App.I,18.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:2418: sa kadācin naraśreṣṭho bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena mādhava / HV_App.I,18.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:2419: rājyān nirasto viśvastaḥ so 'yodhyām saṃparityajat // HV_App.I,18.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:2420: sa tadālpaparīvāraḥ priyayā sahito vane / HV_App.I,18.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:2421: reme sametya kālajñaḥ priyayā kamalekṣaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,18.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:2422: bhrātrā vinikṛtaṃ rājyāt provāca kamalekṣaṇā / HV_App.I,18.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:2423: ehy āgaccha nṛpaśreṣṭha tyaja rājyakṛtāṃ spṛhām // HV_App.I,18.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:2424: gacchāva sahitau vīra madhor mama pitur gṛham / HV_App.I,18.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:2426: sahitau tatra raṃsyāvo yathā divigatau tathā // HV_App.I,18.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:2427: pitur me dayitas tvaṃ hi mātuś ca mama pārthiva / HV_App.I,18.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:2428: matpriyatvāt priyataro bhrātuś ca lavaṇasya me // HV_App.I,18.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:2429: raṃsyāvas tatra sahitau rājyasthāv iva kāmagau / HV_App.I,18.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:2430: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G4.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2431: tatra gatvā naraśreṣṭha hy amarāv iva nandane / **HV_App.I,18.44**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2432: vihariṣyāma bhadraṃ te yathā devasutau tathā // HV_App.I,18.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:2435: tyaja cainaṃ mahārāja bhrātaraṃ te 'timāninam / HV_App.I,18.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:2436: āvayor dveṣiṇaṃ nityaṃ mattaṃ rājyamadena vai // HV_App.I,18.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:2437: dhig imaṃ garhitaṃ vāsaṃ bhṛtyavac ca parāśrayam / HV_App.I,18.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:2438: gacchāva sahitau vīra pitur me bhavanāntikam // HV_App.I,18.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:2439: tasya pūrvaviruddhasya pūrvajaṃ bhrātaraṃ prati / HV_App.I,18.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:2440: kāmārtasya narendrasya patnyās tad ruruce vacaḥ // HV_App.I,18.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:2441: tato madhupuraṃ rājā haryaśvaḥ sa jagāma ha / HV_App.I,18.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:2442: bhāryayā saha kāminyā kāmī puruṣasattamaḥ // HV_App.I,18.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:2443: madhunā dānavendreṇa sa sāmnā samudāhṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,18.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:2444: svāgataṃ vatsa haryaśva prīto 'smi tava darśanāt // HV_App.I,18.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:2445: yad imaṃ mama rājyaṃ vai sarvaṃ madhuvanaṃ vibho / HV_App.I,18.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:2446: dadāmi tava rājendra kṣaṇe 'smin pratigṛhyatām // HV_App.I,18.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:2447: vane 'smiṃl lavaṇaś cāyaṃ maithunaṃ te bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,18.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:2449: lavaṇaś cāpy ayaṃ rājan vīryavān balavattaraḥ / **HV_App.I,18.58**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2453: atra te vasatas tāta durgaṃ giripuraṃ mahat / HV_App.I,18.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:2456: ānartaṃ nāma tad rāṣṭraṃ bhaviṣyaty āyataṃ mahat // HV_App.I,18.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:2457: tad bhaviṣyam ahaṃ manye kālayogena pārthiva / HV_App.I,18.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:2458: adhyāssva ca yathākāmaṃ pārthivaṃ vṛttam uttamam // HV_App.I,18.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:2459: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2460: yāyātam api vaṃśas te sameṣyati ca yādavam / **HV_App.I,18.67**9:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2461: atra vaṃśe ca vaṃśas te somasya bhavitā kila // **HV_App.I,18.67**9:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2462: eṣa me viṣayas tāta tavaiva viṣayopamaḥ / HV_App.I,18.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:2463: dattvā yāsyāmi tapase sāgaraṃ dānavālayam // HV_App.I,18.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:2464: lavaṇena samāyuktas tvam imaṃ viṣayottamam / HV_App.I,18.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:2465: pālayasvākhilaṃ tāta svasya vaṃśasya vṛddhaye // HV_App.I,18.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:2466: bāḍham ity eva haryaśvaḥ pratijagrāha tatpuram / HV_App.I,18.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:2467: sa ca daityas tapovāsaṃ jagāma varuṇālayam // HV_App.I,18.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:2468: haryaśvaś ca mahātejā durgaṃ giripurottamam / HV_App.I,18.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:2469: niveśayām āsa puraṃ vāsārtham amaropamaḥ // HV_App.I,18.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:2470: satyanāma ca tad rāṣṭraṃ surāṣṭraṃ godhanāyutam / HV_App.I,18.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:2474: śaśāsa sa nṛpaḥ sphītaṃ tad rāṣṭraṃ rāṣṭravardhanaḥ / HV_App.I,18.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:2477: samavardhata tad rājyaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sarvaguṇānvitam // HV_App.I,18.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:2478: sa hi rājyasthito rājye rājavṛttena śobhitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:2479: prāptaḥ kulocitāṃ lakṣmīṃ vṛttena ca nayena ca // HV_App.I,18.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:2481: madhumatyāṃ suto jajñe yadur nāma mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,18.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:2484: [k: K4 T3 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2486: [k: T3 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) cont.; K1 Ñ2.3 V B Ds D2-4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2487: yathāsya pūrvako rājā pūruḥ sa sumahāyaśāḥ / **HV_App.I,18.89**11:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2488: sa eka eva tasyāsīt putraḥ paramaśobhanaḥ / HV_App.I,18.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:2490: daśavarṣasahasrāṇi sa kṛtvā rājyam avyayam / HV_App.I,18.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:2491: jagāma tridivaṃ rājā dharmeṇāstamito bhuvi // HV_App.I,18.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:2492: tato yadur adīnātmā prajābhiś cābhyaṣicyata / HV_App.I,18.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:2493: pitary uparate śrīmān krameṇārka ivoditaḥ // HV_App.I,18.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:2495: yadur indrapratīkāśo nṛpo yena sma yādavāḥ // HV_App.I,18.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:2496: sa kadācin nṛpaś cakre jalakrīḍāṃ mahodadhau / HV_App.I,18.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:2497: dāraiḥ saha mahodāraiḥ satāra iva candramāḥ // HV_App.I,18.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:2498: sa tatra sahasā kṣiptis titīrṣuḥ sāgarāmbhasi / HV_App.I,18.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:2500: so 'pakṛṣyata vegena jale sarpapuraṃ mahat / HV_App.I,18.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:2506: sa tad dadarśa rājendro majjitaḥ sāgarāmbhasi / HV_App.I,18.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:2507: pannagendrapuraṃ toye jagatyām iva nirmitam // HV_App.I,18.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:2508: svasthaś caiva pure tatra praviveśa nṛpo yaduḥ / HV_App.I,18.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:2510: tasya dattaṃ maṇimayaṃ jalajaṃ paramāsanam / HV_App.I,18.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:2512: samāsīnaṃ nṛpaṃ tatra parame pannagāsane / HV_App.I,18.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:2514: pitā te svargatiṃ prāptaḥ kṛtvā vaṃśam imaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,18.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:2515: bhavantaṃ tejasā yuktam utpādya vasudhādhipam / HV_App.I,18.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:2516: yādavo nāma vaṃśo 'yaṃ yathā te putrasaṃjñitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:2517: pitrā te tāta loke 'smin sthāpitaḥ pārthivākaraḥ // HV_App.I,18.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:2518: vaṃśe cāsmiṃs tava vibho devānāṃ tanayāvyayāḥ / HV_App.I,18.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:2519: ṛṣīṇām uragāṇāṃ ca utpatsyante nṛyonijāḥ // HV_App.I,18.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:2520: [k: note hiatus at end of pāda a :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2521: tan mameha sutāḥ pañca kumāryo vṛttasaṃmatāḥ / HV_App.I,18.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:2524: varaṃ ca te pradāsyāmi varārhas tvaṃ mato mama // HV_App.I,18.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:2525: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2.3(both times).4 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2527: dāśārhā vṛṣṇayaś ceti khyātiṃ yāsyanti sapta te // **HV_App.I,18.125**12:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2528: sa tasmai dhūmavarṇo vai kanyāḥ kanyāvrate sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,18.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:2529: jalapūrṇena yogena dadāv indrasamāya vai // HV_App.I,18.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:2530: varaṃ cāsmai dadau prītaḥ sa vai pannagapuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,18.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:2531: śrāvayat kanyakā sarvā yathākramam adīnavat // HV_App.I,18.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:2532: etāsu te sutāḥ pañca sutāsu mama mānada / HV_App.I,18.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:2533: utpatsyante pitus tejo mātuś caiva samāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,18.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:2535: tava vaṃśe bhaviṣyanti pārthivāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,18.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:2536: sa varaṃ kanyakāś caiva labdhvā yaduvṛṣas tadā / HV_App.I,18.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:2537: unmamajjātha vegena salilāc candramā yathā // HV_App.I,18.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:2538: sa pañcakanyāmadhyastho ruruce tatra pārthivaḥ / HV_App.I,18.136 /
