GE07hv_apppu:2540: sa tad antaḥpuraṃ sarvaṃ dadarśa nṛpasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,18.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:2542: samāśvasya ca tāḥ sarvāḥ patnīr vai pāvakopamāḥ / HV_App.I,18.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:2543: jagāma svapuraṃ rājā gatvā vai ramate bhṛśam // HV_App.I,18.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:2544: [k: After 141a, K1 Ñ3 V B1 Dn D2.3.5.6 T2 G2.5 M ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2549: sa tāsu nāgakanyāsu kālena mahatā nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,18.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:2550: janayām āsa vikrāntān pañca putrān kulodvahān // HV_App.I,18.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:2551: mucukundaṃ mahābāhuṃ padmavarṇaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,18.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:2552: mādhavaṃ sārasaṃ caiva haritaṃ caiva pārthivam // HV_App.I,18.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:2553: etān pañca sutān saumyān pañcabhūtopamān bhuvi / HV_App.I,18.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:2555: te prāptavayasaḥ sarve sthitāḥ pañca yathādrayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:2556: te jitā baladarpeṇa ūcuḥ pitaram agrataḥ // HV_App.I,18.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:2557: tāta yuktāḥ sma vayasā bale mahati tasthuṣaḥ / HV_App.I,18.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:2558: kṣipram ājñaptum icchāmaḥ kiṃ kurmas tava śāsanāt // HV_App.I,18.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:2559: sa tān nṛpatiśārdūlaḥ śārdūlān iva tejitān / HV_App.I,18.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:2560: prāha prītyā paramayā sutavīrye kutūhalaḥ // HV_App.I,18.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:2561: vindhyarkṣavantāv abhito dve puryau parvatāśraye / HV_App.I,18.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:2562: niveśayatv ayaṃ tāvan mucukundaḥ suto mama // HV_App.I,18.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:2563: sahyasya copari purīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritaḥ / HV_App.I,18.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:2564: padmavarṇo 'pi me putro niveśayatu māciram // HV_App.I,18.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:2565: tasyaiva parataḥ kānte deśe campakabhūṣite / HV_App.I,18.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:2566: sāraso me puraṃ tatra niveśayatu putrakaḥ // HV_App.I,18.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:2568: dvīpaṃ pannagarājasya suto me pālayiṣyati // HV_App.I,18.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:2569: mādhavo 'yaṃ mama suto jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca dharmavit / HV_App.I,18.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:2571: te nṛpaprakriyāṃ prāptā abhiṣiktāḥ sacāmarāḥ / HV_App.I,18.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:2573: svaṃ svaṃ niveśanaṃ sarve bhejire nṛpasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,18.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:2575: mucukundas tu rājarṣir vindhyamadhye vyarocata / HV_App.I,18.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:2577: sa tu taṃ śodhayām āsa vivikte vicacāra ha / HV_App.I,18.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:2578: setuṃ caiva samaṃ cakre parikhāś cāmitodakāḥ // HV_App.I,18.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:2579: sthāpayām āsa bhāgeṣu devatāyatanāni ca / HV_App.I,18.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:2580: rathyā vīthyo nṛṇāṃ mārgāś catvarāṇi gṛhāṇi ca // HV_App.I,18.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:2581: sa tāṃ purīṃ dhanavatīṃ puruhūtapurīprabhām / HV_App.I,18.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:2583: [k: K1.2 Ñ3 V B1 Dn Ds D2-6 Cal. ed. ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2585: nāma cāsyāḥ śubhaṃ cakre nirmitaṃ svena tejasā / HV_App.I,18.176 /
GE07hv_apppu:2588: māhiṣmatī nāma purī prakāśam upayāsyati // HV_App.I,18.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:2590: madhye niveśayām āsa śriyā paramayā vṛtām // HV_App.I,18.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:2591: purikāṃ nāma dharmātmā purīṃ devapurīprabhām / HV_App.I,18.182 /
GE07hv_apppu:2593: [k: K1.2.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G M4 ins. (T1 after line 182) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2595: nirmitā sā purī rājñā purīkā nāma nāmataḥ // **HV_App.I,18.183**15:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2596: sa te dve vipule puryau rājapuryupame śubhe / HV_App.I,18.184 /
GE07hv_apppu:2597: pālayām āsa dharmātmā rājā dharmeṇa vīryavān // HV_App.I,18.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:2599: cakāra nadyā veṇṇāyās tīre tarulatākule // HV_App.I,18.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:2600: viṣayasyālpatāṃ jñātvā saṃpūrṇaṃ rāṣṭram eva ca / HV_App.I,18.188 /
GE07hv_apppu:2601: niveśayām āsa nṛpaḥ sa vapraprāyam uttamam // HV_App.I,18.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:2602: padmavantaṃ janapadaṃ karavīraṃ ca tatpuram / HV_App.I,18.190 /
GE07hv_apppu:2604: sārasenāpi vihitaṃ ramyaṃ krauñcapuraṃ mahat / HV_App.I,18.192 /
GE07hv_apppu:2606: vanavāsīti vikhyātaḥ sphīto janapado mahān / HV_App.I,18.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:2607: puraṃ tu tasya tac chrīmad drumaiḥ sarvartukair vṛtam // HV_App.I,18.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:2612: tasya dāśā jale magnā madgurā nāma viśrutāḥ / HV_App.I,18.198 /
GE07hv_apppu:2613: ye haranti sadā śaṅkhān samudrodaracāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,18.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:2615: saṃcinvanti sadā yuktā jātarūpaṃ ca mauktikam // HV_App.I,18.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:2616: jalajāni ca ratnāni niṣādās tasya mānavāḥ / HV_App.I,18.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:2618: matsyamāṃsena te sarve vartayanti sadā narāḥ / HV_App.I,18.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:2620: taiḥ saṃyānagatā ratnair vaṇijo dūradeśajāḥ / HV_App.I,18.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:2621: haritaṃ tarpayanty ekaṃ yathaiva dhanadaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,18.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:2622: evam ikṣvākuvaṃśāt tu yaduvaṃśo viniḥsṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,18.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:2623: caturdhā yaduputrais tu caturbhir bhidyate punaḥ // HV_App.I,18.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:2624: sa yadur mādhave rājyaṃ visṛjya yadupuṃgave / HV_App.I,18.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:2625: triviṣṭapaṃ gato rājā tyaktvā dehaṃ mahītale // HV_App.I,18.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:2626: babhūva mādhavasutaḥ satvato nāma vīryavān / HV_App.I,18.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:2628: satvatasya suto rājā bhīmo nāma mahān abhūt / HV_App.I,18.214 /
GE07hv_apppu:2629: yena bhaimāḥ sma saṃvṛttāḥ satvatāt sātvatāḥ smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,18.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:2630: rājyasthe tu nṛpe tasmin rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati / HV_App.I,18.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:2631: śatrughno lavaṇaṃ hatvā ciccheda sa madhor vanam // HV_App.I,18.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:2632: tasmin madhuvanasthāne purīṃ ca mathurām imām / HV_App.I,18.218 /
GE07hv_apppu:2634: paryāye caiva rāmasya bharatasya tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,18.220 /
GE07hv_apppu:2635: sumitrāyāḥ sutābhyāṃ ca sthānaṃ prāptaṃ ca vaiṣṇavam // HV_App.I,18.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:2636: [k: For line 221, K1.2.4 V2 B Ds D3.5 M1-3 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2640: yādavena purī vyāptā bhīmena tu mahātmanā / **HV_App.I,18.222**18:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2641: svavaṃśe sthāpitā pūrvaṃ svayam adhyāsitā tathā // HV_App.I,18.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:2642: tataḥ kuśe sthite rājye lave ca yuvarājani / HV_App.I,18.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:2643: andhako nāma bhīmasya suto rājyam akārayat // HV_App.I,18.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:2644: andhakasya suto jajñe raivato nāma pārthivaḥ / HV_App.I,18.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:2645: ṛkṣas tu raivatāj jajñe ramye parvatamūrdhani // HV_App.I,18.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:2646: tatas tu raivatasutaḥ parvataḥ sāgarāntike / HV_App.I,18.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:2647: nāmnā raivatako nāma bhūmau bhūmidharaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,18.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:2649: babhūva pṛthivīpālaḥ pṛthivyāṃ prathitaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,18.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:2650: tasya bhāryāsu tisṛṣu divyarūpāsu keśava / HV_App.I,18.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:2651: catvāro jajñire putrā rucyā proṣṭhapadopamāḥ // HV_App.I,18.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:2652: vasur babhruḥ suṣeṇaś ca śubhākṣaś caiva vīryavān / HV_App.I,18.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:2654: tair ayaṃ yādavo vaṃśaḥ pārthivair bahulīkṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,18.236 /
GE07hv_apppu:2655: ye sma te kṛṣṇa loke 'smin prajāvantaḥ prajeśvarāḥ // HV_App.I,18.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:2656: vasos tu kuntiviṣaye vasudevaḥ suto 'bhavat / HV_App.I,18.238 /
GE07hv_apppu:2659: janayām āsa caivātra suprabhe dve ca dārike // HV_App.I,18.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:2660: kuntīṃ ca pāṇḍor mahiṣīṃ devatām iva bhūcarīm / HV_App.I,18.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:2661: bhāryāṃ ca cedirājasya damaghoṣasya suprabhām // HV_App.I,18.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:2662: [k: For line 241, K Ñ3 V1.2 B D T2-4 G1.4.5 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2664: eṣa te svasya vaṃśasya prabhavaḥ parikīrtitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:2665: śruto mayā purā kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāntikāt // HV_App.I,18.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:2666: tvaṃ tv idānīṃ pranaṣṭe 'smin vaṃśe vaṃśabhṛtāṃ vara / HV_App.I,18.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:2667: svayaṃbhūr iva saṃprāpto bhavāyāsmajjayāya ca // HV_App.I,18.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:2668: na tvāṃ paurāṇamātreṇa śaktā gūhayituṃ vayam / HV_App.I,18.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:2669: devaguhyeṣv api bhavān sarvajñaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:2670: śaktaś cāsi jarāsaṃdhaṃ nṛpaṃ yodhayituṃ prabho / HV_App.I,18.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:2672: śakyaṃ cemaṃ jarāsaṃdhaṃ nṛpaṃ drāvayituṃ hare / **HV_App.I,18.248**21:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2673: tvadbuddhivaśagāḥ sarve vayaṃ yogavrate sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,18.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:2674: jarāsaṃdhas tu balavān nṛpāṇāṃ mūrdhani sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.250 /
GE07hv_apppu:2675: aprameyabalaś caiva vayaṃ ca kṛśasādhanāḥ // HV_App.I,18.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:2676: na ceyam ekāham api purī rodhaṃ sahiṣyati / HV_App.I,18.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:2681: kaṃsasya balavattvāt tu nātiguptā purī janaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:2682: sadyo nipatite kaṃse rājye 'smākaṃ navodaye / HV_App.I,18.258 /
GE07hv_apppu:2683: purī pratyagrarodheyaṃ na rodhaṃ visahiṣyati // HV_App.I,18.259 //
GE07hv_apppu:2684: balaṃ saṃmardabhagnaṃ ca kliśyamānaṃ pareṇa ha / HV_App.I,18.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:2685: asaṃśayam idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ janaiḥ saha vinaṅkṣyati // HV_App.I,18.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:2688: ārto vakṣyati naḥ sarvo rudhyamānaḥ pure janaḥ / HV_App.I,18.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:2689: yādavaiḥ sma virodhena yojito rājyakāmukaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:2690: [k: K Ñ2.3 V1 B D T2.3 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2692: te sarve dvaidham icchanti yat kṣamaṃ tad vidhīyatām / **HV_App.I,18.265**22:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:2693: etan mama mataṃ kṛṣṇa viśrambhāt samudāhṛtam / HV_App.I,18.266 /
GE07hv_apppu:2694: tvayi sarvasvam ity eva paras tvaṃ caiva buddhimān // HV_App.I,18.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:2695: [k: For l. 267, K Ñ2 B1.3 D T2-4 G1.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2696: tvaṃ tu vijñāpitaḥ sarvaṃ na punaḥ saṃprabodhitaḥ / **HV_App.I,18.167**23:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2697: yad atra naḥ kṣamaṃ kṛṣṇa tat svairam abhidhīyatām / HV_App.I,18.268 /
GE07hv_apppu:2698: tvam asya netā sainyasya vayaṃ tvacchāsane sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,18.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:2699: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 (G2 after l. 268) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2700: tvanmūlaś ca virodho 'yaṃ rakṣāsmān ātmanā saha / **HV_App.I,18.169**24:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2703: vikadros tu vacas tathyaṃ niśamya yadupuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,18.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:2706: [k: After line 270,K2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn D2-6 Bom. Poona eds ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2709: sat tattvaṃ ca hitaṃ caiva kṛṣṇoktaṃ khila dhīmatā / **HV_App.I,18.270**26:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:2710: bhāṣitā rājadharmāś ca satyāś ca jagato hitāḥ // **HV_App.I,18.270**26:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2711: etac chrutvā pitur vākyaṃ vikadroś ca mahātmanā / **HV_App.I,18.270**26:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:2712: [k: After l. 4, Bom. Poona ed. ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2713: vikadruṇā yaduśreṣṭha yad dhitaṃ tad vidhīyatām / HV_App.I,18.270*26A /
GE07hv_apppu:2714: vākyam uttamam ekāgro babhāṣe cārubhāṣaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,18.271 //
GE07hv_apppu:2715: bruvatāṃ vaḥ śrutaṃ vākyaṃ hetutaḥ kramatas tathā / HV_App.I,18.272 /
GE07hv_apppu:2716: nyāyataḥ śāstrataś caiva daivaṃ caivānupaśyatām // HV_App.I,18.273 //
GE07hv_apppu:2717: śrūyatām uttamaṃ vākyaṃ mama buddhyā ca gṛhyatām / HV_App.I,18.274 /
GE07hv_apppu:2718: nayena vyavahartavyaṃ pārthivena yathā mayā // HV_App.I,18.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:2719: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2720: saṃdhiṃ ca vigrahaṃ caiva yānam āsanam eva ca / **HV_App.I,18.175**27:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2721: dvaidhībhāvaṃ saṃśrayaṃ ca ṣāḍguṇyaṃ cintayet sadā // **HV_App.I,18.175**27:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2722: balinaḥ saṃnikarṣe tu na stheyaṃ paṇḍitena ca / **HV_App.I,18.175**27:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:2723: apakramed dhi kālajñaḥ samartho yuddham āvahet // **HV_App.I,18.175**27:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2724: ahaṃ tāvat sahāryeṇa muhūrte 'smin prakāśitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:2728: jīvanāśaṃ gamiṣyāmi śaktimān apy aśaktavat // HV_App.I,18.277 //
GE07hv_apppu:2731: karavīrapuraṃ caiva ramyaṃ krauñcapuraṃ tathā / HV_App.I,18.280 /
GE07hv_apppu:2733: vikadros tad vacaḥ śrutvā baladevānujasya ca / **HV_App.I,18.280**29:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2734: praśaśaṃsa tathā mene tathyaṃ tadvacanaṃ hitam / **HV_App.I,18.280**29:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:2735: kṛṣṇaṃ prāha rato raṅgaṃ gamyatāṃ tatra saṃgatau / **HV_App.I,18.280**29:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:2736: drakṣyāvas tatra sahitau gomantaṃ ca nagottamam // HV_App.I,18.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:2737: āvayor gamanaṃ śrutvā jitakāśī ca pārthivaḥ / HV_App.I,18.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:2738: aspṛṣṭvaiva purīṃ darpād anusāraṃ kariṣyati // HV_App.I,18.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:2739: tataḥ sahyavaneṣv eva rājā yāsyati sānugaḥ / HV_App.I,18.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:2740: āvayor darśanād eva yuddhaprītim avāpsyati // HV_App.I,18.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:2741: eṣā naḥ śreyasī yātrā bhaviṣyati kulasya vai / HV_App.I,18.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:2742: paurāṇām atha puryāś ca deśasya ca sukhāvahā // HV_App.I,18.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:2743: na ca śatrau paribhraṣṭe rājāno vijigīṣavaḥ / HV_App.I,18.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:2744: pararāṣṭreṣu mūrchanti mṛdhe śatrukṣayaṃ vinā // HV_App.I,18.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:2745: evam uktvā tu tau vīrau kṛṣṇasaṃkarṣaṇāv ubhau / HV_App.I,18.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:2747: māgadhasya puraḥ sthitvā vākyam etad avocatām // **HV_App.I,18.290**30:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:2748: āvāṃ paśya mahārāja yat kāryaṃ tad vadasva nau / **HV_App.I,18.290**30:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:2749: yac ca kartuṃ pravṛtto 'si tat kuruṣva yathecchasi // **HV_App.I,18.290**30:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:2750: tac chrutvā roṣatāmrākṣo babhāṣe māgadhas tadā / **HV_App.I,18.290**30:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:2751: eṣa vāṃ pratiyotsyāmi haniṣyāmi ca vāṃ yudhi // **HV_App.I,18.290**30:5 //
GE07hv_apppu:2752: ity uktvā dhanur ādatta jarāputraḥ pratāpavān / **HV_App.I,18.290**30:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:2753: tac chrutvā tau tu deveśau gantuṃ vyavasitau kila // **HV_App.I,18.290**30:7 //
GE07hv_apppu:2755: tau tu rāṣṭrāṇi śataśaś carantau kāmarūpiṇau / HV_App.I,18.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:2756: dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya ceratur mārgagau sukham // HV_App.I,18.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:2757: sahyapṛṣṭheṣu ramyeṣu modamānāv ubhau tadā / HV_App.I,18.294 /
GE07hv_apppu:2759: tau ca svalpena kālena sahyācalavibhūṣitam / HV_App.I,18.296 /
GE07hv_apppu:2761: tau tatra gatvā veṇṇāyā nadyās tīraṃ samāśritau / HV_App.I,18.298 /
GE07hv_apppu:2763: adhastāt tasya vṛkṣasya muniṃ dīptatapodhanam / HV_App.I,18.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:2768: klinnaṃ triṣavaṇāmbhobhir ādyaṃ devaguruṃ yathā // HV_App.I,18.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:2777: yasya nāmāni rājānaḥ śrotuṃ śaktāḥ sadā na hi // **HV_App.I,18.307**32:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2778: dadarśatus tau sahitāv apariśrāntam avyayam / HV_App.I,18.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:2779: bhārgavaṃ rāmam āsīnaṃ mandarasthaṃ yathā ravim // HV_App.I,18.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:2780: nyāyatas tau tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā pādamūle kṛtāsanau / HV_App.I,18.310 /
GE07hv_apppu:2781: vasudevasutau vīrau sadhiṣṇyāv iva pāvakau // HV_App.I,18.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:2782: kṛṣṇas tam ṛṣiśārdūlam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,18.312 /
GE07hv_apppu:2784: bhagavañ jāmadagnyaṃ tvāṃ avagacchāmi bhārgavam / HV_App.I,18.314 /
GE07hv_apppu:2785: rāmaṃ munīnām ṛṣabhaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kulāntakam // HV_App.I,18.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:2786: tvayā sāyakavegena kṣipto bhārgava sāgaraḥ / HV_App.I,18.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:2787: iṣupātena nagaraṃ kṛtaṃ sūrpārakaṃ tvayā // HV_App.I,18.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:2788: [k: K Ñ V B D T2-4 G1 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2790: sahyasya ca nikuñjeṣu sphīto janapado mahān / HV_App.I,18.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:2793: tvayā ca sāgaro vipra velām utsārito mahān / **HV_App.I,18.317**34:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2794: tvayā tat kārtavīryasya sahasraṃ bāhumaṇḍalam / HV_App.I,18.320 /
GE07hv_apppu:2795: chinnaṃ drumavanaprakhyaṃ smaratā nidhanaṃ pituḥ // HV_App.I,18.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:2796: iyam adyāpi rudhiraiḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ hatatviṣām / HV_App.I,18.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:2798: raiṇukeyaṃ vijāne tvāṃ kṣitau kṣatriyaroṣaṇam / HV_App.I,18.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:2799: paraśūpagrahe yuktaṃ yathaiveha raṇe tathā // HV_App.I,18.325 //
GE07hv_apppu:2800: tad icchāvas tvayā vipra kaṃcid artham upaśrutam / HV_App.I,18.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:2801: uttaraṃ ca śrutārthena pratyuktam aviśaṅkayā // HV_App.I,18.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:2803: yādavau svo muniśreṣṭha yadi te śrutim āgatau // HV_App.I,18.329 //
GE07hv_apppu:2804: vasudevo yaduśreṣṭhaḥ pitā nau hi dhṛtavrataḥ / HV_App.I,18.330 /
GE07hv_apppu:2805: janmaprabhṛti caivāvāṃ vrajeṣv eva niyojitau // HV_App.I,18.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:2806: tau sma kaṃsabhayatrastau śaṅkitau parivardhitau / HV_App.I,18.332 /

GE07hv_apppu:2808: tāv āvāṃ vyutthitaṃ hatvā samāje kaṃsam ojasā / HV_App.I,18.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:2809: pitaraṃ tatra tasyaiva sthāpayitvā janeśvaram / HV_App.I,18.335 /
GE07hv_apppu:2810: svam eva karma cārabdhau gavāṃ vyāpārakārakau // HV_App.I,18.336 //

GE07hv_apppu:2813: saṃgrāmān subahūn kṛtvā labdhalakṣāv api svayam / **HV_App.I,18.337**35:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2814: tataḥ svapurarakṣārthaṃ prajānāṃ ca mahāvrata / HV_App.I,18.338 /

GE07hv_apppu:2817: jarāsaṃdhārpitapurau purād dvāv eva niḥsṛtau // HV_App.I,18.341 //

GE07hv_apppu:2819: āvayor mantramātreṇa kartum arhasi satkriyām // HV_App.I,18.343 //
GE07hv_apppu:2820: śrutvaitad bhāṣitaṃ rāmas tayor vākyam aninditam / HV_App.I,18.344 /

GE07hv_apppu:2823: eka eva vinā śiṣyair yuvayor mantrakāraṇāt // HV_App.I,18.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:2824: vidito me vraje vāsas tava padmanibhekṣaṇa / HV_App.I,18.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:2825: dānavānāṃ vadhaś cāpi kaṃsasya ca durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:2826: vigrahaṃ ca jarāsaṃdhe viditvā puruṣottama / HV_App.I,18.350 /

GE07hv_apppu:2829: jāne tvāṃ kṛṣṇa goptāraṃ jagataḥ prabhum avyayam / **HV_App.I,18.351**36:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:2832: tathāpi bhaktimātreṇa śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te vacaḥ // **HV_App.I,18.351**36:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2833: pūrvajais tava govinda pūrvaṃ puram idaṃ kṛtam / HV_App.I,18.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:2834: karavīrapuraṃ nāma rāṣṭraṃ caiva niveśitam // HV_App.I,18.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:2835: pure 'smin nṛpatiḥ kṛṣṇa vāsudevo mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,18.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:2836: sṛgāla iti vikhyāto nityaṃ paramakopanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:2837: nṛpeṇa tena govinda svavaṃśaprabhavā nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,18.356 /
GE07hv_apppu:2838: dāyādā nihatāḥ sarve vīra dveṣānuyāyinā // HV_App.I,18.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:2841: tan neha bhavataḥ sthānaṃ rocate me nararṣabhau / HV_App.I,18.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:2845: tīrtvā veṇṇām imāṃ puṇyāṃ nadīm adyaiva saṃgatāḥ / HV_App.I,18.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:2846: viṣayānte nivāsāya giriṃ gacchāma durgamam // HV_App.I,18.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:2847: ramyaṃ yajñagiriṃ nāma sahyasya praruhaṃ girim / HV_App.I,18.366 /
GE07hv_apppu:2849: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 (M4 after 364)ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2851: uṣya tatra niśām ekāṃ khaṭvāṅgāṃ nāma nimnagām / HV_App.I,18.368 /
GE07hv_apppu:2855: amānakāmān mānārhān gatvā tān dharaṇīdharān / HV_App.I,18.372 /

GE07hv_apppu:2858: ramyaṃ krauñcapuraṃ nāma gamiṣyāmaḥ purottamam // HV_App.I,18.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:2859: vaṃśajas tatra te rājā kṛṣṇa dharmarataḥ sadā / HV_App.I,18.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:2860: mahākapir iti khyāto vanasyāsya janādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,18.377 //
GE07hv_apppu:2861: tam adṛṣṭvaiva rājānaṃ nivāsāya gate 'hani / HV_App.I,18.378 /

GE07hv_apppu:2863: tataś cyutā gamiṣyāmaḥ sahyasya vivare girim / HV_App.I,18.380 /
GE07hv_apppu:2870: udayāstamane sūryaṃ somaṃ ca jyotiṣāṃ patim // HV_App.I,18.387 //

GE07hv_apppu:2883: [k: After line 399a, T1 G2.3.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2886: darśayiṣyanti saṃgrāme pāsyanti ca mahīkṣitām / HV_App.I,18.400 /

GE07hv_apppu:2890: tatra te kṛṣṇa saṃgrāme suvyaktaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ vapuḥ / HV_App.I,18.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:2891: drakṣyanti ripavaḥ sarve surāś ca surabhāvana // HV_App.I,18.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:2892: tāṃ bhajasva gadāṃ kṛṣṇa cakraṃ ca ciravismṛtam / HV_App.I,18.406 /
GE07hv_apppu:2893: bhajasva svena rūpeṇa surāṇāṃ vijayāya vai // HV_App.I,18.407 //
GE07hv_apppu:2894: balaś cāyaṃ halaṃ ghoraṃ musalaṃ cārimardanam / HV_App.I,18.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:2896: eṣa te prathamaḥ kṛṣṇa saṃgrāmo bhuvi pārthivaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.410 /
GE07hv_apppu:2898: āyudhāvāptir atraiva vapuṣo vaiṣṇavasya ca / HV_App.I,18.412 /

GE07hv_apppu:2945: hintālaiś ca tamālaiś ca punnāgaiś copaśobhitam // HV_App.I,18.441 //

GE07hv_apppu:2957: sevitaṃ vāridhārābhiś candrapādaiś ca sevitam / HV_App.I,18.451 /
GE07hv_apppu:2959: vanaspatīnāṃ divyānāṃ puṣpair uccāvacaiś citam / HV_App.I,18.453 /

GE07hv_apppu:2966: [k: Ñ2.3 V1 B T3.4 cont. (K3.4 V2 Dn D2-5 ins. after line 456):k]
GE07hv_apppu:2969: kāñcanaiḥ sānubhir yuktaṃ visarpadbhir iva śriyam / **HV_App.I,18.457**48:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2970: sthalībhir mṛgavīthibhiḥ kāntābhir iva śobhitam // HV_App.I,18.458 //

GE07hv_apppu:2973: maṇḍitaṃ vanarājībhiḥ pramadābhiḥ patiṃ yathā / HV_App.I,18.461 /

GE07hv_apppu:2977: jātarūpair vanoddeśaiḥ kṛtrimair iva maṇḍitam / HV_App.I,18.465 /
GE07hv_apppu:2978: mūlena suviśālena śirasā cocchritena ca / HV_App.I,18.466 /

GE07hv_apppu:2980: [k: T1.3 G2.3 M ins. (T2 G1 cont. after *46):k]
GE07hv_apppu:2982: te tam āsādya gomantaṃ ramyaṃ bhūmidharottamam / HV_App.I,18.468 /

GE07hv_apppu:2986: te tu tasyottamaṃ śṛṅgam ārūḍhās tridaśā iva / HV_App.I,18.472 /
GE07hv_apppu:2987: agāraṃ ruciraṃ cakrur manasā nirmitopamam // HV_App.I,18.473 //
GE07hv_apppu:2988: niviṣṭau yādavau dṛṣṭvā jāmadagnyo mahāmuniḥ / HV_App.I,18.474 /

GE07hv_apppu:2992: kṛṣṇaṃ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ caiva yāsye śūrpārakaṃ prati / **HV_App.I,18.476**50:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:2994: prāptavān asmi yāṃ prītiṃ mārgānugamanād api / HV_App.I,18.478 /
GE07hv_apppu:2995: sā me kṛṣṇānugṛhṇāti śarīram idam avyayam // HV_App.I,18.479 //
GE07hv_apppu:2996: idaṃ tat sthānam uddiṣṭaṃ yatrāyudhasamāgamaḥ / HV_App.I,18.480 /
GE07hv_apppu:2997: yuvayor vihito devaiḥ samayaḥ sāṃparāyikaḥ // HV_App.I,18.481 //
GE07hv_apppu:2998: devānāṃ mukhya vaikuṇṭha viṣṇo devair abhiṣṭutaḥ / HV_App.I,18.482 /
GE07hv_apppu:2999: [k: D6 T1-3 G M G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3004: [k: T1.3 G3 ins. after line 4a (G2 after line 4) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3007: kṛṣṇa sarvasya lokasya śṛṇu me naiṣṭhikaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,18.483 //
GE07hv_apppu:3008: yad idaṃ prastutaṃ karma tvayā govinda laukikam / HV_App.I,18.484 /
GE07hv_apppu:3010: tasyāyaṃ prathamaḥ kalpaḥ kālena bhuvi yojitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.486 /
GE07hv_apppu:3011: jarāsaṃdhena vai sārdhaṃ saṃgrāme samupasthite // HV_App.I,18.487 //
GE07hv_apppu:3012: tatrāyudhabalaṃ caiva rūpaṃ ca raṇakarkaśam / HV_App.I,18.488 /
GE07hv_apppu:3013: svayam evātmanā kṛṣṇa tvam ātmānaṃ vidhatsva ha // HV_App.I,18.489 //
GE07hv_apppu:3014: cakrodyatakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ gadāpāṇinaṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,18.490 /
GE07hv_apppu:3016: adyaprabhṛti te yātrā svargoktā samupasthitā / HV_App.I,18.492 /
GE07hv_apppu:3017: pṛthivyām amarārthe ca kīrtyarthaṃ ca satāṃ vara // HV_App.I,18.493 //
GE07hv_apppu:3021: kuru śīghraṃ mahābāho govinda vadatāṃ vara // HV_App.I,18.495 //
GE07hv_apppu:3025: ekaveṇīdharā ceyaṃ vasudhā tvāṃ pratīkṣate // HV_App.I,18.499 //
GE07hv_apppu:3026: sagrahaṃ kṛṣṇa nakṣatraṃ tvatpratīkṣam upasthitam / HV_App.I,18.500 /
GE07hv_apppu:3029: tvayi mānuṣyam āpanne yuddhe ca samupasthite // HV_App.I,18.501 //
GE07hv_apppu:3030: tvarasva kṛṣṇa yuddhāya dānavānāṃ vadhāya ca / HV_App.I,18.502 /
GE07hv_apppu:3031: svargāya ca narendrāṇāṃ devatānāṃ sukhāya ca // HV_App.I,18.503 //
GE07hv_apppu:3032: satkṛto 'haṃ tvayā kṛṣṇa lokaiś caiva sahāmaraiḥ / HV_App.I,18.504 /
GE07hv_apppu:3033: tvayā satkṛtarūpeṇa yena satkṛtavān aham // HV_App.I,18.505 //
GE07hv_apppu:3035: smartavyaś cāsmi yuddheṣu kaṃsāre pṛthivīkṣitām // HV_App.I,18.507 //
GE07hv_apppu:3036: [k: Ñ3 V ins. (B3 B6 subst. for line 507):k]
GE07hv_apppu:3037: smartavyas tatra tatrāhaṃ yatra yuddhaṃ bhavet sadā / **HV_App.I,18.507**54:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3039: na ca kṛtyaṃ mayā tubhyaṃ tvaṃ ca kartā jagadguruḥ / **HV_App.I,18.507**55:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3040: māṃ smṛtvā yo raṇaṃ yāti dhruvaṃ tasya jayo bhavet / **HV_App.I,18.507**55:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:3041: [k: B1 Ds2 D5 cont. (Ñ3 V B3 D6 after *54); K Ñ2 Dn Ds1 D1-4 T G M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3042: ity uktvā jāmadagnyas tu kṛṣṇam akliṣṭakāriṇam / **HV_App.I,18.507**56:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3046: jāmadagnye gate rāme tau yādavakulodvahau / HV_App.I,18.508 /
GE07hv_apppu:3050: tau śailadhātudigdhāṅgau yuvānau śikhare sthitau / HV_App.I,18.512 /
GE07hv_apppu:3051: ceratus tatra kānteṣu vaneṣu ratilālasau // HV_App.I,18.513 //
GE07hv_apppu:3052: udayantaṃ nirīkṣantau śaśinaṃ jyotiṣāṃ varam / HV_App.I,18.514 /
GE07hv_apppu:3053: udayāstamane caiva grahāṇāṃ bhāskarasya ca // HV_App.I,18.515 //
GE07hv_apppu:3054: atha saṃkarṣaṇaḥ śrīmān vinā kṛṣṇena vīryavān / HV_App.I,18.516 /
GE07hv_apppu:3055: cacāra tasya śikhare nagasya nagasaṃnibhaḥ // HV_App.I,18.517 //
GE07hv_apppu:3056: sa phullasya kadambasya pracchāye niṣasāda ha / HV_App.I,18.518 /
GE07hv_apppu:3057: vāyunā madagandhena vījyamānaḥ sukhena vai // HV_App.I,18.519 //
GE07hv_apppu:3058: tasya tenānilaughena sevyamānasya tatra vai / HV_App.I,18.520 /
GE07hv_apppu:3059: madhyasaṃsparśajo bhāvaḥ saṃspṛśan ghrāṇam āgataḥ // HV_App.I,18.521 //
GE07hv_apppu:3060: tṛṣā cainaṃ viveśāśu vāruṇīprabhavā tadā / HV_App.I,18.522 /
GE07hv_apppu:3061: śuṣoca ca mukhaṃ tasya mattasyevāpare 'hani // HV_App.I,18.523 //
GE07hv_apppu:3062: smāritaḥ sa purāvṛttam amṛtaprāśanaṃ vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,18.524 /
GE07hv_apppu:3063: tṛṣito madirānveṣī tatas taṃ tarum ākṣipat // HV_App.I,18.525 //
GE07hv_apppu:3066: tasya prāvṛṣi phullasya yad ambho jaladojjhitam / HV_App.I,18.526 /
GE07hv_apppu:3067: tat koṭharasthā madirā samajāyata nirmalā // HV_App.I,18.527 //
GE07hv_apppu:3068: tāṃ tu tṛṣṇābhibhūtātmā pibann ārta ivāsakṛt / HV_App.I,18.528 /
GE07hv_apppu:3069: madāc ca calitākāraḥ samajāyata sa prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,18.529 //
GE07hv_apppu:3070: tasya mattasya vadanaṃ kiṃcic calitalocanam / HV_App.I,18.530 /
GE07hv_apppu:3072: kadambakoṭare jātā nāmnā kādambarīti sā / HV_App.I,18.532 /
GE07hv_apppu:3073: rūpiṇī vāruṇī tatra devānām amṛtāraṇiḥ // HV_App.I,18.533 //
GE07hv_apppu:3075: tisras tridaśanāryas tam upatasthuḥ priyaṃvadāḥ // HV_App.I,18.535 //
GE07hv_apppu:3076: madirā rūpiṇī bhūtvā kāntiś ca śaśinaḥ priyā / HV_App.I,18.536 /
GE07hv_apppu:3077: śrīś ca devī variṣṭhā strī svayam evāmbujadhvajā // HV_App.I,18.537 //
GE07hv_apppu:3079: vāruṇy ātmahitaṃ vākyam uvāca madaviklavam // HV_App.I,18.539 //
GE07hv_apppu:3081: ahaṃ te dayitā kāntā vāruṇī samupasthitā // HV_App.I,18.541 //
GE07hv_apppu:3082: tvām evāntarhitaṃ śrutvā śāśvataṃ vaḍavāmukhe / HV_App.I,18.542 /
GE07hv_apppu:3086: sāhaṃ kadambam ālīnā meghakāle sukhapriyā / HV_App.I,18.546 /
GE07hv_apppu:3087: tṛṣitaṃ manyamānā tvāṃ svena rūpeṇa chāditā // HV_App.I,18.547 //
GE07hv_apppu:3089: samīpaṃ preṣitā pitrā varuṇena tavānagha // HV_App.I,18.549 //
GE07hv_apppu:3091: tvayopayoktum icchāmi saṃmatas tvaṃ hi me guruḥ // HV_App.I,18.551 //
GE07hv_apppu:3092: na tvānanta parityakṣye bhartsitāpi tvayāvyava / HV_App.I,18.552 /
GE07hv_apppu:3093: nāhaṃ tvayā vinā lokān utsahe deva sevitum // HV_App.I,18.553 //
GE07hv_apppu:3099: provāca praṇayāt kāntiḥ saṃkarṣaṇam upasthitā / HV_App.I,18.556 /
GE07hv_apppu:3100: jayapūrveṇa yogena sasmitaṃ yogam icchatī // HV_App.I,18.557 //
GE07hv_apppu:3101: ahaṃ candrād api guruṃ sahasraśirasaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,18.558 /
GE07hv_apppu:3102: svair guṇair anuraktā tvāṃ yathaiva madirā tathā // HV_App.I,18.559 //
GE07hv_apppu:3103: śrīś ca padmālayā devī vidheyā vaiṣṇavorasi / HV_App.I,18.560 /
GE07hv_apppu:3105: sā mālām amalāṃ gṛhya balasyorasi daṃśitā / HV_App.I,18.562 /
GE07hv_apppu:3106: padmāsyaṃ padmahastā vai saṃkarṣaṇam athābravīt // HV_App.I,18.563 //
GE07hv_apppu:3107: [k: Ñ3 V2 B2 D6 T1.2 G2-5 M G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3108: yady asti mayi kāruṇyaṃ vijñāpyaṃ śrūyatām idam / **HV_App.I,18.563**59:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3109: rāma rāmābhirāmas tvaṃ vāruṇyā samalaṃkṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,18.564 /
GE07hv_apppu:3110: kāntyā mayā ca deveśa saṃgataś candramā yathā // HV_App.I,18.565 //
GE07hv_apppu:3111: iyaṃ ca sā mayā maulir uddhṛtā varuṇālayāt / HV_App.I,18.566 /
GE07hv_apppu:3112: mūrdhni śīrṣasahasrasya yā te bhānur ivābabhau // HV_App.I,18.567 //
GE07hv_apppu:3114: ādipadmaṃ ca padmākṣa divyaṃ śravaṇabhūṣaṇam // HV_App.I,18.569 //
GE07hv_apppu:3115: kauśeyāni ca nīlāni samudrābhāṇi bhāvataḥ / HV_App.I,18.570 /
GE07hv_apppu:3121: saṃgṛhya tam alaṃkāraṃ tāś ca tisraḥ surastriyaḥ / HV_App.I,18.574 /
GE07hv_apppu:3124: mudaṃ paramikāṃ lebhe grahamuktaḥ śaśī yathā // HV_App.I,18.577 //
GE07hv_apppu:3125: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ saṃlāpe vartamāne gṛhe yathā / HV_App.I,18.578 /
GE07hv_apppu:3129: suptasya śayane divye kṣīrode varuṇālaye / HV_App.I,18.582 /
GE07hv_apppu:3130: viṣṇoḥ kirīṭaṃ daityena hṛtaṃ vairocanena vai // HV_App.I,18.583 //
GE07hv_apppu:3131: tadarthaṃ tena saṃgrāmaḥ kṛto gurvartham ojasā / HV_App.I,18.584 /
GE07hv_apppu:3132: kirīṭārthe samudrasya madhye daityagaṇaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,18.585 //
GE07hv_apppu:3133: mokṣayitvā kirīṭaṃ tu vaiṣṇavaṃ patatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,18.586 /
GE07hv_apppu:3135: sa dadarśa guruṃ śaile viṣṇuṃ kāryāntarāgatam / HV_App.I,18.588 /
GE07hv_apppu:3137: sa dṛṣṭvā mānuṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ śailarājaśirogatam / HV_App.I,18.590 /
GE07hv_apppu:3139: abhijñas tasya bhāvānām garutmān patatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,18.592 /
GE07hv_apppu:3140: cikṣepa khagato mauliṃ viṣṇoḥ śirasi hṛṣṭavat // HV_App.I,18.593 //
GE07hv_apppu:3141: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3145: [k: M1-3 (G2.5 M4 after line 1 of *61) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3146: saṃyuktaḥ kṛṣṇaśirasā sa maulim adhikaṃ babhau / **HV_App.I,18.593**62:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3149: kṛṣṇaḥ prahṛṣṭavadano rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,18.595 //
GE07hv_apppu:3150: tvarate tu kāryārtho devatānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.596 /
GE07hv_apppu:3151: yatheyam āvayoḥ śaile saṃgrāmaracanā kṛtā // HV_App.I,18.597 //
GE07hv_apppu:3153: mūrdhni dṛṣṭvātra daityena hṛtā kṣiptvā garutmatā / **HV_App.I,18.597**63:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3154: [k: V3 (cont.) K2 Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Dn2 Ds2 D2.5.6 T1.2 G4 M4 (Dn after line 598) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3157: śakrasya sadṛśaṃ rūpaṃ divyam āsthāya sāgarāt / HV_App.I,18.598 /
GE07hv_apppu:3158: mamāhiśayanān maulir hṛtvā kṣipto garutmatā // HV_App.I,18.599 //
GE07hv_apppu:3159: [k: K2 Ñ2.3 V1.3 B3 Ds D2.6 G M4 subst. (V2 B1.2D4.5 T1.3 ins. after line 598) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3161: suvyaktaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ sa jarāsaṃdho narādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,18.600 /
GE07hv_apppu:3162: lakṣyante ca dhvajāgrāṇi rathānāṃ vātaraṃhasām // HV_App.I,18.601 //
GE07hv_apppu:3164: [k: K Ñ3 V1.2 B D T2-4 G1.4 M4 subst. for line 602:k]
GE07hv_apppu:3166: chatrāṇy ārya virājante daṃśitāni sitāni ca // HV_App.I,18.603 //
GE07hv_apppu:3168: abhivartanti naḥ śubhrā yathā khe haṃsapaṅktayaḥ // HV_App.I,18.605 //
GE07hv_apppu:3169: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3172: etāni nūnaṃ samare pārthivair āyudhāni ca / **HV_App.I,18.605**67:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:3174: kāle khalu nṛpaḥ prāpto jarāsaṃdho mahīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,18.606 /
GE07hv_apppu:3176: ārya tiṣṭhāva sahitau na khalv anvāgate nṛpe / HV_App.I,18.608 /
GE07hv_apppu:3177: yuddhārambhaḥ prayoktavyo balaṃ tāvad vimṛśyatām // HV_App.I,18.609 //
GE07hv_apppu:3178: evam uktvā tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saṃsthaḥ saṃgrāmalālasaḥ / HV_App.I,18.610 /
GE07hv_apppu:3180: vīkṣamāṇaś ca tān sarvān nṛpān yaduvaro 'vyayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.612 /
GE07hv_apppu:3181: ātmānam ātmanovāca yat pūrvaṃ divi mantritam // HV_App.I,18.613 //
GE07hv_apppu:3182: ime te pṛthivīpālāḥ pārthive vartmani sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,18.614 /
GE07hv_apppu:3183: ye vināśaṃ gamiṣyanti śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇa // HV_App.I,18.615 //
GE07hv_apppu:3184: prokṣitān khalv imān anye mṛtyunā nṛpasattamān / HV_App.I,18.616 /
GE07hv_apppu:3186: sthāne bhārapariśrāntā vasudheyaṃ divaṃ gatā / HV_App.I,18.618 /
GE07hv_apppu:3188: [k: K1 Ñ1.3 V B2 Dn Ds D2-4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3190: alpena khalu kālena viviktaṃ pṛthivītalam / HV_App.I,18.620 /
GE07hv_apppu:3191: bhaviṣyati narendraughair ākīrṇaṃ ca nabhastalam // HV_App.I,18.621 //
GE07hv_apppu:3194: jarāsaṃdhas tataḥ prāpto nṛpaṃ sarvamahākṣitām / HV_App.I,18.622 /
GE07hv_apppu:3196: nirgataṃ sa hariṃ jñātvā mathurāto mahīpatiḥ / **HV_App.I,18.622**69:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3200: tatas te calitāḥ sarve gomantaṃ sabalā nṛpāḥ / **HV_App.I,18.622**69:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:3204: rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair yuktair asaṅgagatibhiḥ kvacit // HV_App.I,18.625 //
GE07hv_apppu:3207: svārūḍhaiḥ sādibhir yuktaiḥ preṅkhamāṇaiḥ pravalgitaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.628 /
GE07hv_apppu:3208: vājibhir vāyusaṃkāśaiḥ plavadbhir iva patribhiḥ // HV_App.I,18.629 //
GE07hv_apppu:3211: evaṃ caturvidhaiḥ sainyaiḥ kampamānair ivāmbudaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.632 /
GE07hv_apppu:3217: sa rathair neminirghoṣair gajaiś ca madasiñjitaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.634 /
GE07hv_apppu:3218: heṣadbhiś caiva turagaiḥ kṣveḍitograiś ca pattibhiḥ // HV_App.I,18.635 //
GE07hv_apppu:3219: saṃnādayan diśaḥ sarvāḥ sarvāṃś cāpi guhāśayān / HV_App.I,18.636 /
GE07hv_apppu:3220: sa rājā sāgarākāraḥ sasainyaḥ pratyadṛśyata // HV_App.I,18.637 //
GE07hv_apppu:3224: rathī khaḍgī śarī cāpī niṣaṅgī hemakuṇḍalī / **HV_App.I,18.637**72:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:3228: kim etair nṛpasiṃhaiś ca ity avocan mahābalaḥ / **HV_App.I,18.637**72:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:3231: rathaiḥ pavanasaṃpātair gajaiś ca jaladopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.640 /
GE07hv_apppu:3232: turagaiś ca sitābhrābhaiḥ pattibhiś cāpi daṃśitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.641 /
GE07hv_apppu:3233: vyāmiśraṃ tad balaṃ bhāti mattadviparathākulam / HV_App.I,18.642 /
GE07hv_apppu:3237: babhau tasya niviṣṭasya babhau śrīḥ śibirasya vai / HV_App.I,18.646 /
GE07hv_apppu:3238: śuklaparvaṇi pūrṇasya yathā rūpaṃ mahodadheḥ // HV_App.I,18.647 //
GE07hv_apppu:3239: vītarātre tataḥ kāle nṛpās te kṛtakautukāḥ / HV_App.I,18.648 /
GE07hv_apppu:3241: samavāyīkṛtāḥ sarve giriprastheṣu te nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,18.650 /
GE07hv_apppu:3243: teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ śuśruve pṛthivīkṣitām / HV_App.I,18.652 /
GE07hv_apppu:3244: yugānte bhidyamānānām sāgarāṇāṃ yathā svaraḥ // HV_App.I,18.653 //
GE07hv_apppu:3246: cerur mā śabda ity evaṃ bruvanto rājaśāsanāt // HV_App.I,18.655 //
GE07hv_apppu:3247: tasya rūpaṃ balasyāsīn niḥśabdastimitasya vai / HV_App.I,18.656 /
GE07hv_apppu:3249: tasmin stimitaniḥśabde yogād iva mahārṇave / HV_App.I,18.658 /
GE07hv_apppu:3250: jarāsaṃdho bṛhad vākyaṃ bṛhaspatir ivādade // HV_App.I,18.659 //
GE07hv_apppu:3252: sarvataḥ parvataś caiva balaughaiḥ parivāryatām // HV_App.I,18.661 //
GE07hv_apppu:3253: aśmayantrāṇi yujyantāṃ kṣepaṇīyāś ca mudgarāḥ / HV_App.I,18.662 /
GE07hv_apppu:3254: ūrdhvaṃ cāpi pravāhyantāṃ prāsā vai tomarāṇi ca // HV_App.I,18.663 //
GE07hv_apppu:3255: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3256: ūrdhvaṃ prekṣamāṇārthāya dṛḍhāni ca laghūni ca / **HV_App.I,18.663**73:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3259: yathā narapatiḥ prāha tathā śighraṃ vidhīyatām // **HV_App.I,18.663**73:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:3260: dāryatām eṣa ṭaṅkaughaiḥ khanitaiś ca nagottamaḥ / HV_App.I,18.664 /
GE07hv_apppu:3261: nṛpāś ca durgayuddhajñā vinyasyantām adūrataḥ // HV_App.I,18.665 //
GE07hv_apppu:3262: adyaprabhṛti sainyair me girirodhaḥ pravartyatām / HV_App.I,18.666 /
GE07hv_apppu:3263: yāvad etau pātayāmo vasudevasutāv ubhau // HV_App.I,18.667 //
GE07hv_apppu:3265: ākāśam api bāṇaughair niḥsaṃpātaṃ vidhīyatām // HV_App.I,18.669 //
GE07hv_apppu:3267: teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu śīghram āruhyatāṃ giriḥ // HV_App.I,18.671 //
GE07hv_apppu:3270: drumaḥ kiṃpuruṣaś caiva pārvatīyāś ca mānavāḥ / HV_App.I,18.674 /
GE07hv_apppu:3271: parvatasyāparaṃ pārśvaṃ kṣipram ārohayantv amī // HV_App.I,18.675 //
GE07hv_apppu:3272: pauravo veṇudāriś ca vaidarbhaḥ somakas tathā / HV_App.I,18.676 /
GE07hv_apppu:3273: rukmī ca bhojādhipatiḥ sūryākṣaś caiva yāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.677 //
GE07hv_apppu:3274: pāñcalānām adhipatir drupadaś ca narādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,18.678 /
GE07hv_apppu:3275: vindānuvindāv āvantyau dantavaktraś ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,18.679 //
GE07hv_apppu:3276: chāgaliḥ purumitraś ca virāṭaś ca mahīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,18.680 /
GE07hv_apppu:3277: kauśāmbyo mālavaś caiva śatadhanvā vidūrathaḥ // HV_App.I,18.681 //
GE07hv_apppu:3278: bhūriśravās trigartaś ca bāṇaḥ pañcanadas tathā / HV_App.I,18.682 /
GE07hv_apppu:3279: uttaraṃ parvatāroham ete durgasahā nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,18.683 /
GE07hv_apppu:3281: ulūkaḥ kaitaveyaś ca vīraś cāṃśumataḥ sutaḥ / HV_App.I,18.685 /
GE07hv_apppu:3282: ekalavyo dṛḍhākṣaś ca rathavarmā jayadrathaḥ // HV_App.I,18.686 //
GE07hv_apppu:3283: uttamaujās tathā sālvaḥ kairaleyaś ca kaiśikaḥ / HV_App.I,18.687 /
GE07hv_apppu:3284: vaidiśo vāmadevaś ca suketuś cāpi vīryavān // HV_App.I,18.688 //
GE07hv_apppu:3285: pūrvaṃ parvatanirvyūham eteṣv āyattam astu naḥ / HV_App.I,18.689 /
GE07hv_apppu:3287: ahaṃ ca daradaś caiva cedirājaś ca saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,18.691 /
GE07hv_apppu:3289: evam eṣa giriḥ kṣipraṃ samantād veṣṭito balaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.693 /
GE07hv_apppu:3291: gadino ye gadābhis te parighaiḥ parighāyudhāḥ / HV_App.I,18.695 /
GE07hv_apppu:3292: apare vividhaiḥ śastrair dārayantu nagottamam // HV_App.I,18.696 //
GE07hv_apppu:3294: kāryo bhūmisamaḥ sarvo bhavadbhir vasudhādhipaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.698 //
GE07hv_apppu:3295: jarāsaṃdhavacaḥ śrutvā pārthiveṣu ca śāsanam / HV_App.I,18.699 /
GE07hv_apppu:3296: [k: K1.2.4 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3297: gomantaṃ veṣṭayām āsuḥ sāgarāḥ pṛthivīm iva / **HV_App.I,18.699**74:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3298: uvāca rājā cedīnāṃ devānāṃ maghavā iva // HV_App.I,18.700 //
GE07hv_apppu:3299: kiṃ no yuddhena durge 'smin gomante ca nagottame / HV_App.I,18.701 /
GE07hv_apppu:3301: kāṣṭhais tṛṇaiś ca bahubhiḥ parivārya samantataḥ / HV_App.I,18.703 /
GE07hv_apppu:3302: adyaiva dīpyatāṃ kṣipram alam anyena karmaṇā // HV_App.I,18.704 //
GE07hv_apppu:3303: kṣatriyāḥ sukumārā hi raṇe sāyakayodhinaḥ / HV_App.I,18.705 /
GE07hv_apppu:3304: na yuktāḥ parvate durge niyoktuṃ pādayodhinaḥ // HV_App.I,18.706 //
GE07hv_apppu:3305: na nāma pratibandhena nāpy avaskandakarmaṇā / HV_App.I,18.707 /
GE07hv_apppu:3306: śakya eṣa giris tāta devair apy abhimarditum // HV_App.I,18.708 //
GE07hv_apppu:3309: vayaṃ bahava ity evaṃ nāpy eṣa nipuṇo nayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.711 /
GE07hv_apppu:3310: yādavau nāvamantavyau dvāv apy etau raṇe sthitau // HV_App.I,18.712 //
GE07hv_apppu:3312: karmabhis tv amarau vidmo bālāv atibalānvitau // HV_App.I,18.714 //
GE07hv_apppu:3314: karmabhis tv atulair vīrāv ubhāv api balotkaṭau / **HV_App.I,18.714**75:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3315: [k: K Ñ V B D T G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3321: vākyam etat tu ruruce sabalānāṃ mahīkṣitām / HV_App.I,18.715 /
GE07hv_apppu:3322: yad uktaṃ cedirājena nṛpāṇāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,18.716 //
GE07hv_apppu:3323: tataḥ kāṣṭhais tṛṇair vaṃśaiḥ śuṣkaśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.717 /
GE07hv_apppu:3325: dadus te sarvatas tūrṇaṃ pāvakaṃ tatra pārthivāḥ / HV_App.I,18.719 /
GE07hv_apppu:3327: sa vāyudīpito vahnir utpapāta samantataḥ / HV_App.I,18.721 /
GE07hv_apppu:3328: sadhūmajvālamālābhir bhābhiḥ kham iva śobhayan // HV_App.I,18.722 //
GE07hv_apppu:3330: dadāha śailaṃ śrīmantaṃ gomantaṃ kāntapādapam // HV_App.I,18.724 //
GE07hv_apppu:3331: sa dahyamānaḥ śailendro mumoca vipulāḥ śilāḥ / HV_App.I,18.725 /
GE07hv_apppu:3333: sacitrabhānuḥ śailendro bhābhir bhānur ivāmbudam / HV_App.I,18.727 /
GE07hv_apppu:3334: ālimpatīva vidhivat samantād arciṣāṃ cayaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.728 //

GE07hv_apppu:3349: resuś codvejitāḥ siṃhāḥ śārdūlāś cānalāvilāḥ / HV_App.I,18.741 /

GE07hv_apppu:3374: na tu cakre tayoḥ sparśaṃ vahnitāpo mahīpate // **HV_App.I,18.748**78:16 //

GE07hv_apppu:3378: dhūmabhārair anālakṣye mūle śithilatāṃ gate // HV_App.I,18.752 //
GE07hv_apppu:3379: saroṣaṃ hi tadā rāmo vacanaṃ keśisūdanam / HV_App.I,18.753 /

GE07hv_apppu:3382: āvayoḥ kṛṣṇa vaireṇa vairibhir vasudhādhipaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.756 //
GE07hv_apppu:3385: ayaṃ yady āvayor arthe gomantas tāta dahyate / HV_App.I,18.759 /
GE07hv_apppu:3386: ayaśasyam idaṃ loke kaulīnaṃ ca bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,18.760 //
GE07hv_apppu:3387: tad asyānṛṇyahetor hi nagasya nagasaṃnibha / HV_App.I,18.761 /
GE07hv_apppu:3388: kṣatriyān nihaniṣyāmi dorbhyām iva yudhāṃ vara // HV_App.I,18.762 //
GE07hv_apppu:3389: ete te kṣatriyāḥ sarve girim ādīpya daṃśitāḥ / HV_App.I,18.763 /

GE07hv_apppu:3394: evam uktvā gireḥ śṛṅgān meruśṛṅgād ivoḍurāṭ / HV_App.I,18.765 /
GE07hv_apppu:3395: nipapāte balaḥ śrīmān vanamālādharo yuvā / HV_App.I,18.766 /

GE07hv_apppu:3461: nāmnā śārṅgam iti khyātaṃ prīto jagrāha vīryavān // **HV_App.I,18.800**88:2 //

GE07hv_apppu:3581: vyupāramante yuddhāni prekṣya tau puruṣarṣabhau / HV_App.I,18.895 /

GE07hv_apppu:3597: rāmasya tu gadāvegaṃ rājā sa magadheśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,18.911 /

GE07hv_apppu:3636: [k: T1 G3 M1-3 ins. (T2 G1.5 cont. after *103) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3637: jarāsaṃdhe gate rājñi kṛṣṇād bhīte raṇotsavāt / **HV_App.I,188.927**104:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3639: saṃbandhakāmo govindam idam evāha cedirāṭ // HV_App.I,18.929 //
GE07hv_apppu:3640: ahaṃ pitṛṣvasur bhartā tava yādavanandana / HV_App.I,18.930 /
GE07hv_apppu:3641: sabalas tvām upāvṛttas tvaṃ hi me dayitaḥ prabho // HV_App.I,18.931 //
GE07hv_apppu:3644: uktaś caiṣa mayā rājā jarāsaṃdho 'lpacetanaḥ / HV_App.I,18.932 /
GE07hv_apppu:3645: kṛṣṇād virama durbuddhe vigrahād raṇakarmaṇi // HV_App.I,18.933 //
GE07hv_apppu:3646: tad eṣa sa parityakto mama vākyasya dūṣakaḥ / HV_App.I,18.934 /
GE07hv_apppu:3647: bhagno yuddhe jarāsaṃdhas tvayā dravati sānugaḥ // HV_App.I,18.935 //
GE07hv_apppu:3648: nirvairo naiṣa saṃyāti svapuraṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,18.936 /
GE07hv_apppu:3651: tvayy eva bhūyo 'py aparaṃ darśayiṣyati kilbiṣam // HV_App.I,18.937 //
GE07hv_apppu:3654: tad imāṃ saṃtyajāśu tvaṃ mahīṃ hatanarākulām / HV_App.I,18.938 /
GE07hv_apppu:3660: sṛgālaṃ vāsudevaṃ vai drakṣyamas tatra pārthivam // HV_App.I,18.941 //
GE07hv_apppu:3661: imau rathavarodagrau yuvayoḥ kāritau mayā / HV_App.I,18.942 /
GE07hv_apppu:3663: śīghram āruha bhadraṃ te baladevasahāyavān / HV_App.I,18.944 /
GE07hv_apppu:3664: tvarāmaḥ karavīrasthaṃ draṣṭuṃ taṃ vasudhādhipam // HV_App.I,18.945 //
GE07hv_apppu:3674: tad gaccha rāmasahitaḥ sahāyaiḥ saha saṃgataḥ / **HV_App.I,18.945**109:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:3676: pitṛṣvasuḥ pater vākyaṃ śrutvā cedipates tadā / HV_App.I,18.946 /
GE07hv_apppu:3677: vākyaṃ hṛṣṭamanāḥ kṛṣṇo jagāda jagato guruḥ // HV_App.I,18.947 //
GE07hv_apppu:3681: vākyasya durlabhā loke vaktāraś cedisattama // HV_App.I,18.951 //
GE07hv_apppu:3682: cedinātha sanāthau svaḥ saṃvṛttau tava darśanāt / HV_App.I,18.952 /
GE07hv_apppu:3683: nāvayoḥ kiṃcid aprāpyaṃ yayos tvaṃ bandhur īdṛśaḥ // HV_App.I,18.953 //

GE07hv_apppu:3685: paryāptau tvatsanāthau svaḥ kartuṃ cedikulodvaha // HV_App.I,18.955 //
GE07hv_apppu:3687: yuddham apratimaṃ viddhi pravṛttaṃ nau raṇe nṛpaiḥ / **HV_App.I,18.955**110:1 /
