GE07hv_apppu:3689: saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān vṛttaḥ pratyakṣaṃ tava cedipa // **HV_App.I,18.955**110:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:3690: yadūnāṃ prathamo bandhus tvaṃ hi sarvamahīkṣitām / HV_App.I,18.956 /
GE07hv_apppu:3692: cakramausalam ity evaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ raṇavṛttayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.958 /
GE07hv_apppu:3693: kathayiṣyanti loke 'smin ye dhariṣyanti pārthivāḥ // HV_App.I,18.959 //
GE07hv_apppu:3694: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3696: śravaṇād dhāraṇāc cāsya svargalokaṃ vrajanti vai // **HV_App.I,18.959**111:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:3697: tad gacchāma mahāvīra karavīraṃ purottamam / HV_App.I,18.960 /
GE07hv_apppu:3698: tvayoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa cedirāja śivāya vai // HV_App.I,18.961 //
GE07hv_apppu:3699: te syandanagatāḥ sarve pavanotpātibhir hayaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.962 /
GE07hv_apppu:3700: bhejire dīrgham adhvānaṃ mūrtimanta ivāgnayaḥ // HV_App.I,18.963 //
GE07hv_apppu:3701: te trirātroṣitāḥ prāptāḥ karavīraṃ purottamam / HV_App.I,18.964 /
GE07hv_apppu:3702: śivāya ca śive deśe niviṣṭās tridaśopamāḥ // HV_App.I,18.965 //
GE07hv_apppu:3705: tān āgatān viditvātha sṛgālo yuddhadurmadaḥ / HV_App.I,18.966 /
GE07hv_apppu:3707: D6 T1-3 G1.3-5 M (G after line 965) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3708: prātaḥ praviśya taddvāri dvāḥsthaṃ vacanam abravīt / **HV_App.I,18.966**112:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3711: dvāḥstho 'py atha tathety uktvā tasmai sarvaṃ nyavedayat // **HV_App.I,18.966**112:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:3720: khe gateneva śakrasya haryaśvena rathādriṇā // HV_App.I,18.975 //
GE07hv_apppu:3721: sāvitre niyame pūrṇe yaṃ dadau savitā svayam / HV_App.I,18.976 /
GE07hv_apppu:3722: ādityaraśmibhir iva raśmibhir yo nigṛhyate // HV_App.I,18.977 //
GE07hv_apppu:3724: sa sṛgālo 'bhyayāt kṛṣṇaṃ śalabhaḥ pāvakaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,18.979 //
GE07hv_apppu:3727: rathī khaḍgī śarī cāpī niṣaṅgī kuṇḍalī balī / **HV_App.I,18.980**113:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3730: muhur muhur jyācapalaṃ vikṣipan duḥsahaṃ dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,18.982 /
GE07hv_apppu:3732: bhābhir bhūṣaṇapaṅktīnāṃ dīpto merur ivācalaḥ / HV_App.I,18.984 /
GE07hv_apppu:3733: rathastha iva śailendraḥ sṛgālaḥ pratyadṛśyata // HV_App.I,18.985 //
GE07hv_apppu:3735: gurutvena ca nāmyantī cacālorvī yathā purā // HV_App.I,18.987 //
GE07hv_apppu:3736: tam āpatantaṃ śrīmantaṃ mūrtimantam ivānalam / HV_App.I,18.988 /
GE07hv_apppu:3737: sṛgālaṃ lokapālābhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇo na vivyathe // HV_App.I,18.989 //
GE07hv_apppu:3740: sṛgālaś cāpi saṃrabdhaḥ taṃ rathaṃ sādhu coditam / HV_App.I,18.990 /
GE07hv_apppu:3742: vāsudevaṃ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sṛgālo yuddhalālasaḥ / HV_App.I,18.992 /
GE07hv_apppu:3744: vāsudevaḥ smitaṃ kṛtvā pratiyuddhāya tasthivān // HV_App.I,18.994 //
GE07hv_apppu:3746: sa tasya vismayaṃ dṛṣṭvā pratiyoddhum upasthitaḥ / **HV_App.I,18.994**115:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3747: tad yuddham abhavat tābhyāṃ samare ghoradarśanam / HV_App.I,18.995 /
GE07hv_apppu:3748: ubhābhyām iva mattābhyāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ yathā vane // HV_App.I,18.996 //
GE07hv_apppu:3754: sṛgālābhaṃ sṛgālaṃ ca jaghāna navabhiḥ śaraiḥ / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:3755: tataḥ pañcaśatā viṣṇuṃ sṛgālo 'tha jaghāna ha / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:3763: tair astrais tau tu rājendra vāsudevau raṇotsukau / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:14 /
GE07hv_apppu:3764: yuyudhāte ruṣā yuktau saṃdaṣṭoṣṭhau tadā raṇe // **HV_App.I,18.996**116:15 //
GE07hv_apppu:3767: māheśvaraṃ sṛgālas tu raudraṃ caiva janārdanaḥ / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:18 /
GE07hv_apppu:3768: gomāyur atha yāmyaṃ tu kālam astraṃ janardanaḥ // **HV_App.I,18.996**116:19 //
GE07hv_apppu:3769: te śastre niṣphale rājan bhūmiṃ jagmatur āture / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:20 /
GE07hv_apppu:3770: kṣurapreṇa sṛgālas tu chettum aicchat tu śārṅgiṇaḥ / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:21 /
GE07hv_apppu:3771: jyāṃ jātaroṣo dhanuṣā tasya devasya paśyataḥ // **HV_App.I,18.996**116:22 //
GE07hv_apppu:3772: taj jñātvā bhagavān viṣṇur dhanuś ciccheda sāyakaiḥ / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:23 /
GE07hv_apppu:3773: visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ punar anyat samādade // **HV_App.I,18.996**116:24 //
GE07hv_apppu:3774: tac cāpi bhagavān viṣṇuś ciccheda ca nanāda ca / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:25 /
GE07hv_apppu:3775: punar anyat samādatte cāpaṃ bhārasahaṃ nṛpa // **HV_App.I,18.996**116:26 //
GE07hv_apppu:3776: tena cāpena govindaṃ jaghāna niśitaiḥ śataiḥ / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:27 /
GE07hv_apppu:3777: navatyā ca punar viṣṇur navabhiś ca punar nṛpaḥ // **HV_App.I,18.996**116:28 //
GE07hv_apppu:3778: aśītyā ca punar devaṃ samājaghne paraḥ śaraiḥ / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:29 /
GE07hv_apppu:3779: śarāṇām atha lakṣāṇāṃ samājaghne hariṃ ruṣā // **HV_App.I,18.996**116:30 //
GE07hv_apppu:3780: tataḥ kruddho 'tha bhagavāṃś ciccheda dhanur uttamam / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:31 /
GE07hv_apppu:3781: sārathiṃ cāsya hatvā tu jaghāna prāṣṭhisārathim // **HV_App.I,18.996**116:32 //
GE07hv_apppu:3783: tataḥ sṛgālo vikrāntaś cāpaṃ bhārasahaṃ mahat / **HV_App.I,18.996**116:34 /
GE07hv_apppu:3784: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtvā dhanus tadā // **HV_App.I,18.996**116:35 //
GE07hv_apppu:3785: sṛgālas tv abravīt kṛṣṇaṃ samare samupasthitam / HV_App.I,18.997 /
GE07hv_apppu:3789: gomante yuddhamārgeṇa yat tvayā kṛṣṇa ceṣṭitam / HV_App.I,18.999 /
GE07hv_apppu:3790: anāyakānāṃ mūḍhānāṃ nṛpāṇāṃ durbale bale / HV_App.I,18.1000 /
GE07hv_apppu:3791: sa me suviditaḥ kṛṣṇa kṣatriyāṇāṃ parājayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.1001 /
GE07hv_apppu:3793: tiṣṭhedānīṃ yathākāmaṃ sthito 'haṃ pārthive pade / HV_App.I,18.1003 /
GE07hv_apppu:3796: kva yāsyasi mayā ruddho raṇeṣv apariniṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,18.1004 //
GE07hv_apppu:3797: na cāham ekaṃ sabalo yuktas tvāṃ yoddhum āhave / HV_App.I,18.1005 /
GE07hv_apppu:3798: aham ekas tvam apy eko dvau yudhyāva raṇe sthitau // HV_App.I,18.1006 //
GE07hv_apppu:3799: kiṃ janena nirastena tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca raṇe sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.1007 /
GE07hv_apppu:3800: dharmayuddhena nidhanaṃ vrajatv ekataro raṇe // HV_App.I,18.1008 //
GE07hv_apppu:3801: loke 'smin vāsudevo 'haṃ bhaviṣyāmi hate tvayi / HV_App.I,18.1009 /
GE07hv_apppu:3802: hate mayi tvam eko vā vāsudevo bhaviṣyasi // HV_App.I,18.1010 //
GE07hv_apppu:3803: sṛgālasya vacaḥ śrutvā vāsudevaḥ kṣamāparaḥ / HV_App.I,18.1011 /
GE07hv_apppu:3804: iṣṭataḥ praharasveti tam uktvā cakram ādade // HV_App.I,18.1012 //
GE07hv_apppu:3806: cikṣepa kṛṣṇe ghorāṇi yuddhāya laghuvikramaḥ // HV_App.I,18.1014 //
GE07hv_apppu:3809: śastrāṇi yāni cānyāni musalādyāni saṃyuge / HV_App.I,18.1015 /
GE07hv_apppu:3810: pātayām āsa govinde sa sṛgālaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,18.1016 //
GE07hv_apppu:3812: nirdayābhihataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sthito girir ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,18.1018 //
GE07hv_apppu:3814: cakram udyamya govindaḥ sṛgālorasi pātayat // HV_App.I,18.1020 //
GE07hv_apppu:3815: [k: After line 1020a, D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3817: yadi śaknoṣi rājendra vahaitac cakram udyatam / **HV_App.I,18.1020**120:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:3819: chetsyāmi te śiraḥ kāyāc cakreṇānena rājaka / **HV_App.I,18.1020**120:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:3821: taṃ rathasthaṃ pramāṇasthaṃ sṛgālaṃ yuddhadurmadam / HV_App.I,18.1021 /
GE07hv_apppu:3822: jaghāna samare cakraṃ jātadarpaṃ mahābalam / HV_App.I,18.1022 /
GE07hv_apppu:3825: tataḥ sudarśanaṃ cakraṃ punar āyād guroḥ karam // HV_App.I,18.1023 //
GE07hv_apppu:3826: cakreṇorasi nirbhinnaḥ sa gatāsur gatotsavaḥ / HV_App.I,18.1024 /
GE07hv_apppu:3828: niśamya taṃ nipatitaṃ vajrapātād ivācalam / HV_App.I,18.1026 /
GE07hv_apppu:3829: tasya sainyāny apayayur vimanāṃsi hate nṛpe // HV_App.I,18.1027 //
GE07hv_apppu:3830: [k: K Ñ3 V2 B Dn Ds D1.3-6 T1.3.4 G2.4.5 (Ñ2 V1.3 D2 after line 1029) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3833: kecit tatraiva śocantaḥ smarantaḥ sukṛtāni ca / **HV_App.I,18.1029**122:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:3834: patitaṃ bhūmipaṃ bhūmau na tyajanti sma duḥkhitāḥ // **HV_App.I,18.1029**122:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:3838: na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyam iti tān abhyabhāṣata // **HV_App.I,18.1029**122:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:3842: patito vai sṛgālākhyo bhraṣṭaḥ san dīnamānasaḥ // **HV_App.I,18.1029**122:12 //
GE07hv_apppu:3843: te sma paśyanti patitaṃ dharaṇyāṃ dharaṇīpatim / HV_App.I,18.1028 /
GE07hv_apppu:3845: vilapanti sma te sarve sacivāḥ saprajā bhṛśam / HV_App.I,18.1030 /
GE07hv_apppu:3846: sāśrupātekṣaṇā dīnāḥ śokasya vaśam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,18.1031 //
GE07hv_apppu:3847: teṣāṃ ruditaśabdena paurāṇāṃ visvaraiḥ svaraiḥ / HV_App.I,18.1032 /
GE07hv_apppu:3848: mahiṣyas tasya niṣpetuḥ saputrā ruditānanāḥ // HV_App.I,18.1033 //
GE07hv_apppu:3849: tās taṃ nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā ślāghyaṃ bhūmipatiṃ patim / HV_App.I,18.1034 /
GE07hv_apppu:3850: stanān ārujya karajair bhṛśārtāḥ paryadevayan // HV_App.I,18.1035 //
GE07hv_apppu:3851: urāṃsy urasijāṃś caiva śirojāny ākulāny api / HV_App.I,18.1036 /
GE07hv_apppu:3852: nirdayaṃ tāḍayantyas tā visvaraṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ // HV_App.I,18.1037 //
GE07hv_apppu:3854: petur ūrdhvabhujāḥ sarvāḥ kṛttamūlā latā iva // HV_App.I,18.1039 //
GE07hv_apppu:3857: tāḥ patiṃ patitaṃ bhūmau rudantyo hṛdi tāḍitāḥ / HV_App.I,18.1042 /
GE07hv_apppu:3859: putraṃ cāsya puraskṛtya bālaṃ prasrutalocanam / HV_App.I,18.1044 /
GE07hv_apppu:3862: śakradevaṃ pituḥ pārśve dviguṇaṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ // HV_App.I,18.1045 //
GE07hv_apppu:3863: imaṃ te paśya vikrāntaṃ bālaṃ putram apaṇḍitam / HV_App.I,18.1046 /
GE07hv_apppu:3864: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.2.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3865: tvadvihīnaḥ katham ayaṃ pade sthāsyati paitṛke / **HV_App.I,18.1046**124:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3866: katham ekapade tyaktvā gato 'sy antaḥpuraṃ param // **HV_App.I,18.1046**124:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:3867: atṛptās tava saukhyānāṃ kiṃ kurmo vidhavā vayam // HV_App.I,18.1047 //
GE07hv_apppu:3868: tasya padmāvatī nāma mahiṣī pramadottamā / HV_App.I,18.1048 /
GE07hv_apppu:3869: gṛhītvā taṃ sutaṃ tatra vāsudevam upasthitā // HV_App.I,18.1049 //
GE07hv_apppu:3870: yas tvayā pātito vīra raṇaproktena karmaṇā / HV_App.I,18.1050 /
GE07hv_apppu:3871: tasya pretagatasyāyaṃ putras tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,18.1051 //
GE07hv_apppu:3872: yadi tvāṃ praṇametāsau kuryād vā śāsanaṃ punaḥ / HV_App.I,18.1052 /
GE07hv_apppu:3873: [k: Ñ1.2 T1 G3 M subst. for line 1052 (V3 T3 ins.):k]
GE07hv_apppu:3874: yadi tvaṃ bāndhavaḥ ślāghyaḥ putrasya praṇatasya me / **HV_App.I,18.1052**125:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3876: nāyam ekaprahāreṇa janas tapyeta dāruṇam // HV_App.I,18.1053 //
GE07hv_apppu:3877: yadi kuryād ayaṃ mūḍhas tvayi bāndhavakaṃ vidhim / HV_App.I,18.1054 /
GE07hv_apppu:3878: naivaṃ parītaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ seveta vasudhātalam // HV_App.I,18.1055 //
GE07hv_apppu:3879: ayam asya vipannasya bāndhavasya tvayānagha / HV_App.I,18.1056 /
GE07hv_apppu:3880: saṃtatī rakṣyatāṃ vīra+ +putraḥ putra ivātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.1057 //
GE07hv_apppu:3881: tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā mahiṣyā yadunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,18.1058 /
GE07hv_apppu:3882: mṛdupūrvam idaṃ vākyam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,18.1059 //
GE07hv_apppu:3883: rājapatni gato roṣaḥ sahānena durātmanā / HV_App.I,18.1060 /
GE07hv_apppu:3884: prakṛtisthā vayaṃ jātā devi saiṣo 'smi bāndhavaḥ // HV_App.I,18.1061 //
GE07hv_apppu:3885: roṣo me vigataḥ sādhvi tava vākyair akilbiṣaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.1062 /
GE07hv_apppu:3886: yo 'yaṃ putraḥ sṛgālasya mamāpy eṣa na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,18.1063 //
GE07hv_apppu:3887: abhayaṃ cābhiṣekaṃ ca dadāmy asmai sukhāya vai / HV_App.I,18.1064 /
GE07hv_apppu:3888: āhūyantāṃ prakṛtayaḥ purodhā mantriṇas tathā / HV_App.I,18.1065 /
GE07hv_apppu:3890: tataḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvāḥ purodhā mantriṇas tathā / HV_App.I,18.1067 /
GE07hv_apppu:3891: abhiṣekārtham ājagmur yatra tau rāmakeśavau // HV_App.I,18.1068 //
GE07hv_apppu:3892: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.2.4.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3896: kṛṣṇas tadahatur evāśu prasthānam abhirocayat // HV_App.I,18.1070 //
GE07hv_apppu:3897: rathena hariyuktena tena yuddhārjitena vai / HV_App.I,18.1071 /
GE07hv_apppu:3898: keśavaḥ prasthito 'dhvānaṃ yathendras tridivaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,18.1072 //
GE07hv_apppu:3900: sahitau tāv anugatau mathurāṃ prati jagmatuḥ / **HV_App.I,18.1072**127:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3901: [k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M ins. (after line 1072) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3903: āpṛcchya keśavaṃ rājā svāṃ purīṃ pratijagmivān // **HV_App.I,18.1072**128:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:3904: [k: D6 T2 G1.4.5 cont.;; K B Dn Ds D1-5 T3.4 G2 ins. (after line 1072):k]
GE07hv_apppu:3909: naidhanena vidhānena cakrus te tasya satkriyām / **HV_App.I,18.1072**129:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:3919: prodyattejombujākṣaṃ hṛdaya bhaja sadā tvaṃ vapuḥ prāṃśu jiṣṇoḥ / **HV_App.I,18.1072**130:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:3922: tau tu svalpena kālena pañcarātroṣitau pathi / HV_App.I,18.1073 /
GE07hv_apppu:3923: [k: After line 1073a, K Ñ1.2 V3 Dn D2.3.5.6 T3 G2 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3926: [k: After line 1073, K1(marg.).2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D1.4.6 T1.3 G2.3.5 M ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3928: jagmatuḥ sahitau vīrau mudā paramayā yutau // **HV_App.I,18.1073**132:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:3929: nagarīṃ mathurāṃ prāptau vasudevasutāv ubhau // HV_App.I,18.1074 //
GE07hv_apppu:3930: [k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3931: tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahāśaṅkhaṃ pāñcajanyaṃ ca yādavaḥ / **HV_App.I,18.1074**133:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3933: tataḥ pratyudgatāḥ sarve yādavā yadunandanau / HV_App.I,18.1075 /
GE07hv_apppu:3935: śreṇyaḥ prakṛtayaś caiva mantriṇaḥ sapurohitāḥ / HV_App.I,18.1077 /
GE07hv_apppu:3936: sabālavṛddhā sā caiva purī samabhivartata // HV_App.I,18.1078 //
GE07hv_apppu:3938: rathyāḥ patākāmālinyo bhāsanti sma samantataḥ // HV_App.I,18.1080 //
GE07hv_apppu:3939: hṛṣṭā pramuditā sarvā purī paramaśobhitā / HV_App.I,18.1081 /
GE07hv_apppu:3941: akrūraḥ sātyakiś caiva mantriṇaś ca yathocitāḥ / **HV_App.I,18.1081**134:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3942: bhrātros tayor āgamane yathaivendramahe tathā // HV_App.I,18.1082 //
GE07hv_apppu:3943: muditās tatra gāyanti rājamārgeṣu gāyanāḥ / HV_App.I,18.1083 /
GE07hv_apppu:3946: sve pure nibhayāḥ sarve krīḍadhvaṃ yādavāḥ sukham // HV_App.I,18.1086 //
GE07hv_apppu:3947: na tatra kaścid dīno vā malino vā vicetanaḥ / HV_App.I,18.1087 /
GE07hv_apppu:3950: naranārīgaṇāś caiva bhejire mānasaṃ sukham // HV_App.I,18.1090 //
GE07hv_apppu:3951: śivāś ca pravavur vātā virajaskā diśo daśa / HV_App.I,18.1091 /
GE07hv_apppu:3952: daivatāni ca sarvāṇi hṛṣṭāny āyataneṣv api // HV_App.I,18.1092 //
GE07hv_apppu:3953: yāni liṅgāni lokasya vṛttānīha kṛte yuge / HV_App.I,18.1093 /
GE07hv_apppu:3954: tāni sarvāṇy adṛśyanta bhrātror āgamanaṃ prati // HV_App.I,18.1094 //
GE07hv_apppu:3955: tataḥ kāle śive puṇye syandanenārimardanau / HV_App.I,18.1095 /
GE07hv_apppu:3956: hariyuktena tau vīrau praviṣṭau mathurāṃ purīm // HV_App.I,18.1096 //
GE07hv_apppu:3957: viśantaṃ nagarīṃ ramyāṃ govindaṃ rāmam eva ca / HV_App.I,18.1097 /
GE07hv_apppu:3958: anujagmur yadugaṇāḥ śakraṃ devagaṇā iva // HV_App.I,18.1098 //
GE07hv_apppu:3959: vasudevasya bhavanaṃ pitus tau yadunandanau / HV_App.I,18.1099 /
GE07hv_apppu:3961: tāv āyudhāni vinyasya gṛhe sve svairacāriṇau / HV_App.I,18.1101 /
GE07hv_apppu:3963: [k: K1(marg.).2 Ñ2 Dn G2 (Ñ3 V B2 after line 1100) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3964: tatas tau vasudevasya pādau samabhipīḍya ca / **HV_App.I,18.1100**135:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3968: evaṃ tāv ekanirmāṇau mathurāyāṃ śubhānanau / HV_App.I,18.1103 /
GE07hv_apppu:3970: ugrasenānugau bhūtvā kaṃcit kālaṃ mumodatuḥ // HV_App.I,18.1104 //
GE07hv_apppu:3973: kṛtvā prayāṇaṃ gomantād rājā sa magadheśvaraḥ / **HV_App.I,18.1104**136:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:3976: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 18A, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, 22.06.2003,
GE07hv_apppu:3979: [k: After line 880 of App.I No. 18, D6 S ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3980: sasainyaḥ sabalaś cāpi pṛṣṭhato 'nvacarat kila // HV_App.I,18A.1 //
GE07hv_apppu:3981: ity uktvā pārthivān sarvān kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇāmbudopamaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:3984: pralaptaś ca tathā rājā viṣṇunā prabhviṣṇunā // HV_App.I,18A.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:3985: dhnavī bāṇi rathī khaḍgī kuṇḍalī kavacī balī / HV_App.I,18A.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:3986: śūrāṇām agraṇīḥ sākṣād eka evātulo nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:3987: keśavasya puraḥ sthitvā babhāṣe keśisūdanam // HV_App.I,18A.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:3988: kim etais tucchavākyair hi tiṣṭhedānīṃ mamāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,18A.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:3989: yad balaṃ yac ca te vīryaṃ darśayasva yadīcchasi // HV_App.I,18A.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:3990: eṣa tvāṃ prahariṣyāmi tiṣṭha tāvad raṇe kṣaṇam // HV_App.I,18A.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:3991: ete ye nihatā gopa rājāno balamohitāḥ / HV_App.I,18A.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:3992: etair varākair gopāla kṛtaṃ rājavidūṣakaiḥ // HV_App.I,18A.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:3993: eṣa tvāṃ darśayiṣyāmi yamarājānam eva hi / HV_App.I,18A.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:3994: ity uktvā sa jarāsaṃdhaḥ kṛṣṇam abhyadravad raṇe // HV_App.I,18A.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:3995: taṃ dṛṣṭvā roṣatāmrākṣaṃ kṛṣṇo vākyam uvāca ha / HV_App.I,18A.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:3996: icchātaḥ praharasveti yadi śaknoṣi rājaka // HV_App.I,18A.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:3997: eṣa te pramukhe rājan sthito 'haṃ kiṃ vikatthase / HV_App.I,18A.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:3998: naitāvatā raṇe rājañ śūrāḥ santi nṛpottamāḥ // HV_App.I,18A.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:3999: śarair vā yadi vā śastrair darśayasva parākramam / HV_App.I,18A.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:4000: ity uktvā sa jagannāthaḥ sarveṣām agraṇīr hariḥ / HV_App.I,18A.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:4001: suparṇadhvajam āsthāya kṛṣṇas tu ratham uttamam / HV_App.I,18A.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:4002: tam abhyayāj jarāsaṃdhaṃ śarair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ // HV_App.I,18A.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:4003: sārathiṃ cāsya vivyādha pañcabhiḥ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,18A.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:4004: jaghāna turagāṃś cājau yatamānasya vīryavān // HV_App.I,18A.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:4005: baladevo dhanuś cāsya ciccheda nataparvaṇā // HV_App.I,18A.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:4006: taṃ kṛcchragatam ājñāya citraseno mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:4007: senānīḥ kauśikaś caiva kṛṣṇaṃ vivyādha pañcabhiḥ // HV_App.I,18A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:4008: tribhir vivyādha saṃkruddhaḥ kāmapālaṃ tu kauśikaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:4009: baladevo dhanuś cāsya bhallenājau dvidhākarot // HV_App.I,18A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:4010: javenābhyarditaś cāpi tān arīñ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ / HV_App.I,18A.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:4011: janārdano 'pi bhagavān ājaghāna sa māgadham // HV_App.I,18A.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:4012: jarāsaṃdho 'pi vegena dhanur anyan mahārathaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:4013: sajyaṃ kṛtvā mahāvīraḥ keśavaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,18A.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:4015: bhagavān api govindaḥ śareṇa nataparvaṇā / HV_App.I,18A.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:4016: lalāṭe cāsya cikṣepa jarāsaṃdhasya cābhibhūḥ // HV_App.I,18A.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:4017: punar vivyādha niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ śailopamais tathā / HV_App.I,18A.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:4019: taṃ citrasenaḥ saṃrabdho vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,18A.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:4020: kauśikaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā jarāsaṃdhas tu saptabhiḥ // HV_App.I,18A.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:4021: tribhis tribhiś ca nārācais tān bibheda janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:4022: pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiś caiva baladevas tu tān arīn // HV_App.I,18A.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:4023: kṛṣṇo rathāśvāṃś ciccheda citrasenasya vīryavān / HV_App.I,18A.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:4024: baladevo dhanuś cāsya bhallenājau dvidhākarot // HV_App.I,18A.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:4025: saṃchinnadhanvā viratho gadām ādāya vīryavān / HV_App.I,18A.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:4028: dhanuś ciccheda rāmasya jarāsaṃdho mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,18A.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:4029: gadayā ca jaghānāśu citraseno halāyudham / HV_App.I,18A.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:4030: jarāsaṃdhas tu balavān keśavaṃ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,18A.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:4031: punar navatyā vivyādha punaś caiva hi saptabhiḥ / HV_App.I,18A.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:4032: aśītyā ca jarāsaṃdhaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ nīlotpalacchavim // HV_App.I,18A.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:4033: dhanuś ciccheda bhagavāñ jarāputrasya dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,18A.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:4034: utsṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ gadām ādāya vīryavān // HV_App.I,18A.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:4035: jaghāna ca tadā viṣṇuṃ bāhudeśe balī tadā / HV_App.I,18A.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:4036: gadayā caiva govindo jaghānāsya ca vakṣasi // HV_App.I,18A.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:4037: jānubhyāṃ nipapātorvyāṃ punar utthāya māgadhaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:4038: gadayātha haraṃ vegāj jaghānāhatya vakṣasi // HV_App.I,18A.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:4039: hariś ca gadayā rājañ jarāsaṃdham amarṣaṇam // HV_App.I,18A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:4040: na mamarṣa jarāsaṃdho gadāyātaṃ janārdanam / HV_App.I,18A.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:4041: jaghāna stanayor madhye baladevasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,18A.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:4042: tataḥ pīḍitasarvāṅgo yayau kṛṣṇo mahītalam / HV_App.I,18A.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:4043: siṃhanādaṃ tataś cakre māgadho rājasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:4044: hataḥ kṛṣṇo hataḥ kṛṣṇa iti vācaṃ samādade // HV_App.I,18A.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:4045: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ krodhād dviguṇavikramaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:4046: ādāya musalaṃ rāmo jarāsaṃdham abhidravat // HV_App.I,18A.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:4047: jaghāna stanayor madhye bāhubhyāṃ yadunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:4048: punaś ca gadayā rāmo lalāṭe taṃ jaghāna ha / HV_App.I,18A.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:4049: jānubhyām apatad bhūmau gatasaṃjño jarāsutaḥ // HV_App.I,18A.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:4050: utthāya sahasā bhūmer jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,18A.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:4051: balabhadraṃ jaghānāśu sasvanaṃ māgadhas tadā // HV_App.I,18A.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:4052: tato haladharo vīro gadayā sarvapuṣṭayā / HV_App.I,18A.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:4053: ciccheda tāṃ gadāṃ vīraḥ kṛṣṇasya puratas tadā // HV_App.I,18A.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:4054: jarāsaṃdhas tu balavān utsṛjya mahatīṃ gadām / HV_App.I,18A.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:4056: ādāya niśitāṃ ghorāṃ tāṃ jaghāna halāyudham / HV_App.I,18A.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:4057: punaś ca gadayā taṃ tu lalāṭe 'bhyahanad balī // HV_App.I,18A.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:4058: muṣṭinā ca samāhatya gadayā ca tadā bhṛśam / HV_App.I,18A.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:4059: talena ca jaghānāśu vāsudevasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,18A.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:4060: tato mūrcchāṃ samāpede balabhadraḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,18A.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:4061: siṃhanādaṃ tataś cakre rājā sa magadheśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,18A.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:4062: etasminn antare viṣṇuḥ saṃjñāṃ prāpya jarāsutam / HV_App.I,18A.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:4064: jarāputras tadā tasmai prāhiṇoc chaktim uttamām // HV_App.I,18A.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:4065: tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya gṛhītvā viṣṇur avyayaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:4066: tasminn eva dadau vīraḥ sākṣād viṣṇur baler iva // HV_App.I,18A.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:4067: sa tayā tāḍito rājā papāta ca mumoha ca / HV_App.I,18A.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:4068: prāptasaṃjñas tadā rājā parigheṇa samāhanat // HV_App.I,18A.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:4069: tayos tu yuddham abhavat parasparavadhaiṣiṇoḥ / HV_App.I,18A.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:4071: namuceś caiva śakrasya rāmarāvaṇayor iva // HV_App.I,18A.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:4072: ubhau tau lokavikhyātau bale cāstre ca viśrutau / HV_App.I,18A.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:4073: ubhāv eva raṇe vīrau yuddhe ca pariviśrutau // HV_App.I,18A.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:4074: etasminn antare viṣṇuḥ śārṅgam ādāya vīryavān / HV_App.I,18A.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:4076: arditaḥ sa tu rājendro gadayāpothayad dharim / HV_App.I,18A.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:4077: sa hitvā tu tadā śārṅgaṃ gadayā taṃ jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,18A.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:4078: balabhadro 'pi dharmātmā prahartuṃ taṃ viniścitaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:4079: tadantare prāha vīro darado nāma pārthivaḥ / HV_App.I,18A.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:4080: na yuktaṃ rāma rāmeti parāsaktaṃ prati prabho // HV_App.I,18A.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:4081: taṃ dṛṣṭvā roṣatāmrākṣo halī musalam ādade / HV_App.I,18A.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:4082: rāmaṃ haladharaṃ rājā pratīyād yuddhadurmadam // HV_App.I,18A.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:4083: tayos tad yuddham abhavad gajayūthapayor iva // HV_App.I,18A.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:4084: [h: HV (CE) App.I No. 19, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, 22.06.2003,
GE07hv_apppu:4087: [k: T1.3 G3 M cont. after App.I No. 18: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:4090: sabalaḥ sānugaś caiva kiṃ matvā svagṛhaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,19.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:4091: kaṣṭam etaj jarāsaṃdhaḥ kṛtavān balasaṃmitaḥ / HV_App.I,19.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:4093: purataḥ kṛtavān brahman na yuktaṃ pratibhāti me / HV_App.I,19.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:4094: jarāsaṃdho 'pi rājendraḥ sarveṣām agraṇīḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,19.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:4095: lajjākaram idaṃ manye tasya rājño dvijottama / HV_App.I,19.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:4096: pṛṣṭhataś ca samāgamya purastāt paśyator yayau // HV_App.I,19.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:4097: kim uttaraṃ tato rājā jarāsaṃdhaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,19.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:4099: etad ācakṣva me brahman vistareṇa tapodhana // HV_App.I,19.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:4101: dagdhvā prayāto gomantād rājā sa magadheśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,19.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:4102: vrīḹayāvanato bhūtvā svapurīṃ praviveśa ha // HV_App.I,19.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:4103: praviśya svapuraṃ so 'tha pādaspṛṣṭa ivoragaḥ / HV_App.I,19.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:4104: na śarma labhate rātrau na divā śokakarśitaḥ // HV_App.I,19.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:4105: tataḥ kadācid rājā tu duḥkhaśokasamanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,19.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:4106: nṛpān sarvān samāhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,19.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:4107: mantrayāmo nṛpaśreṣṭhā mahat kāryam upasthitam / HV_App.I,19.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:4109: sa sarvaiḥ pārthivaiḥ sārdhaṃ mantrayām āsa mantravit / HV_App.I,19.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:4110: aho dhik pauruṣaṃ manye yad asmān prati pārthivāḥ // HV_App.I,19.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:4111: ye nṛpā balakṛṣṇābhyāṃ nirjitāḥ sabalānugāḥ / HV_App.I,19.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:4112: nirotsyāmaḥ purīṃ ramyāṃ madhurāṃ yādavair vṛtām // HV_App.I,19.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:4113: bhagavantaḥ purīṃ tatra madhurāṃ caturaṅgiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,19.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:4114: balena mahatā yuktā hantuṃ tau gopakilbiṣau // HV_App.I,19.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:4115: anyathā hy ayaśo 'smākaṃ yāvalloko vapuṣmatām / HV_App.I,19.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:4116: pratijñā ca mamāpyp eṣā śrūyatāṃ pārthivottamāḥ // HV_App.I,19.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:4117: yau tau gopakavīrau hi tau hatvā tu svakaṃ puram / HV_App.I,19.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:4118: yāsyāmi satyam etad dhi balair bahubhir anvitaḥ // HV_App.I,19.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:4119: balāni bahurāpāṇi mama santi nṛpottamāḥ / HV_App.I,19.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:4120: niḥsādhanau yādavakau niṣkośā durbalā hi te // HV_App.I,19.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:4121: atha sādhyā purī sarvā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / HV_App.I,19.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:4122: tato yūyaṃ sthirā kṛtvā buddhiṃ yuddhāya pārthivāḥ / HV_App.I,19.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:4123: prayāntu sarve rājānaḥ kampayanto vasuṃdharām // HV_App.I,19.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:4125: nirmūlā caiva sā kāryā bhavadbhiḥ khyātakīrtibhiḥ // HV_App.I,19.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:4127: [h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 20, transliterated by François Painchaud,
GE07hv_apppu:4130: [k: After adhy. 83, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T2-4 G1.2.4.5 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:4132: etasminn antare prāptā lokaprāvṛttikā narāḥ / HV_App.I,20.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:4137: prāvṛttikā narāḥ prāhuḥ pārthivātyayikaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,20.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:4139: bhavīṣyati kṣitīśānāṃ sumahān ity anekaśaḥ // HV_App.I,20.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:4142: prakāśaṃ sma kathās tatra śrūyante manujeritāḥ / HV_App.I,20.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:4143: rukmiṇī kila nānmā strī rukmiṇaḥ prathitā svasā // HV_App.I,20.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:4144: bhāvī svayaṃvaras tatra tasyāḥ kila janārdana // HV_App.I,20.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:4145: ity artham ete nṛvarā gacchanti sabalānugāḥ // HV_App.I,20.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:4149: drakṣyāmaḥ śataśas tatra śibirāṇi mahātmanām // HV_App.I,20.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:4151: sadā yuddhapriyāṇāṃ hi parasparam amarṣiṇām // HV_App.I,20.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:4152: jayāya śīghraṃ sahitā balaughena samanvitāḥ / HV_App.I,20.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:4153: niruddhāḥ pṛthivīpālāḥ kim ekāntacarā vayam / HV_App.I,20.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:4155: śrutvaitat keśavo vākyaṃ hṛdi śalyam ivārpitam / HV_App.I,20.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:4156: nirjagāma yaduśreṣṭho yadūnāṃ sahito balaiḥ // HV_App.I,20.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:4157: yādavās te balodagrāḥ sarve saṃgrāmalālasāḥ / HV_App.I,20.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:4158: niryayuḥ syandanair divyair garvitās tridaśā iva // HV_App.I,20.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:4161: [k: For the second occurrence of line 29, Ñ2 V3 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:4168: [k: Note: The next star--passage is numbered *5;
GE07hv_apppu:4170: ugrasenaṃ tu govindaḥ prāha niścitadarśanaḥ / HV_App.I,20.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:4171: tiṣṭha tvaṃ nṛpaśārdūla bhrātrā me sahito 'nagha // HV_App.I,20.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:4173: purīṃ śūnyām imāṃ vīra jaghanyāḥ pīḍayanti naḥ // HV_App.I,20.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:4175: modante sukhinas tatra devaloke yathāmarāḥ // HV_App.I,20.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:4176: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā bhojarajo mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,20.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:4178: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahābāho yadūnām nandivardhana // HV_App.I,20.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:4179: śrūyatāṃ yad ahaṃ tv adya vakṣyāmi ripusūdana // HV_App.I,20.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:4180: tvayā vihināḥ sarve sma na śaktāḥ sukham āsitum / HV_App.I,20.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:4181: pure 'smin viṣayānte vā patihīnā iva striyaḥ // HV_App.I,20.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:4182: tvatsanāthā vayaṃ tāta tvadbāhubalam āśritāḥ / HV_App.I,20.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:4183: bibhīmo na narendrāṇāṃ sendrāṇām api mānada / HV_App.I,20.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:4184: vijayāya yaduśreṣṭha yatra yatra gamiṣyasi / HV_App.I,20.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:4185: tatra tvaṃ sahito 'smābhir gacchethā yādavarṣabha // HV_App.I,20.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:4186: tasya rājño vacaḥ śrutvā sasmitaṃ devakīsutaḥ / HV_App.I,20.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:4187: yatheṣṭaṃ bhavatām adya tathā kartāsmy asaṃśayam // HV_App.I,20.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:4190: evam uktvā tu kṛṣṇo hi jagāmāśu rathena vai / HV_App.I,20.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:4191: bhīṣmakasya gṛhaṃ prāpto lohitāyati bhāskare // HV_App.I,20.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:4193: raṅgaṃ suvipulaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājasīṃ tanum āviśat // HV_App.I,20.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:4195: manasā cintayām āsa vainateyaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,20.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:4196: tataś cintitamātras tu viditvā vinatātmajaḥ / HV_App.I,20.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:4197: sukhalakṣyaṃ vapuḥ kṛtvā nililye keśavāntike // HV_App.I,20.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:4199: kampitā manujāḥ sarve nyubjāś ca patitā bhuvi / HV_App.I,20.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:4200: śirobhiḥ patitāḥ sarve prāvepanta yathoragāḥ // HV_App.I,20.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:4201: tān saṃnipatitān dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇo girir ivācalaḥ / HV_App.I,20.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:4202: sa tadā pakṣavātena mene patagasattamam // HV_App.I,20.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:4204: pakṣavātena pṛthivīṃ cālayantaṃ muhur muhuḥ // HV_App.I,20.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:4207: caraṇābhyāṃ prakarṣantaṃ pāṇḍuraṃ bhogināṃ varam / HV_App.I,20.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:4211: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa dhvajaṃ prāptaṃ sacivaṃ sāṃparāyikam / HV_App.I,20.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:4213: dṛṣṭvā paramasaṃhṛṣṭaḥ sthitaṃ deham ivāparam // HV_App.I,20.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:4220: vayaṃ tatraiva gatvādya pratīkṣāmaḥ svayaṃvaram // HV_App.I,20.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:4222: drakṣyāmaḥ śataśas tatra sametānāṃ mahātmanām // HV_App.I,20.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:4223: evam uktvā mahābāhur vainateyaṃ mahābalam / HV_App.I,20.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:4224: jagāmātha purīṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kaiśikasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,20.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:4225: vainateyasakhaḥ śrīmān yādavaiś ca mahārathaiḥ // HV_App.I,20.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:4229: etasminn eva kale tu rājā nayaviśāradaḥ / HV_App.I,20.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:4231: argham ācamanaṃ dattvā sa rājā kaiśikaḥ svayam / HV_App.I,20.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:4232: satkṛtya vidhivat kṛṣṇaṃ svapuraṃ saṃpraveśayat // HV_App.I,20.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:4233: pūrvam eva tu kṛṣṇāya kāritaṃ divyamandiram / HV_App.I,20.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:4234: viveśa sabalaḥ śrīmān kailāsaṃ śaṃkaro yathā / HV_App.I,20.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:4236: sukhenaivoṣitaḥ kṛṣṇas tasya rājño niveśane / HV_App.I,20.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:4240: te kṛṣṇam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā vaineteyaṃ mahādyutim / HV_App.I,20.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:4242: te sametya gatā rājan rājāno bhīmavikramāḥ / HV_App.I,20.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:4244: bhīṣmakasya sabhāṃ gatvā ramyāṃ hemapariṣkṛtām / HV_App.I,20.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:4246: niṣedus te nṛpavarā devā devasabhām iva // HV_App.I,20.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:4251: teṣāṃ madhye mahābāhur jarāsaṃdho mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,20.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:4252: babhāṣe sumahātejā devān deveśvaro yathā // HV_App.I,20.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:4253: śrūyatāṃ bho nṛpaśreṣṭhā bhīṣmakaś ca mahāmatiḥ / HV_App.I,20.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:4254: kathyamānaṃ yathābuddhyā vacanaṃ vadatāṃ varāḥ // HV_App.I,20.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:4255: yo 'sau kṛṣṇa iti khyāto vasudevasuto balī / HV_App.I,20.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:4258: avaśyaṃ kurute yatnaṃ kanyāvāptir yathā bhavet // HV_App.I,20.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:4259: yad atra kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sunayopetavad hitam / HV_App.I,20.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:4261: pādātau tau mahāvīryau vasudevasutāv ubhau / HV_App.I,20.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:4262: vainateyaṃ vinā tasmin gomante parvatottame / HV_App.I,20.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:4263: yat kṛtaṃ sumahad ghoraṃ bhavadbhir viditaṃ hi tat // HV_App.I,20.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:4265: sametya yudhyamānasya kīdṛśo vigraho bhavet // HV_App.I,20.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:4267: kaḥ sthāsyati raṇe tasminn api śakraḥ suraiḥ saha // HV_App.I,20.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:4268: yadā cāsmai nāpi sutā kadācit saṃpradīyate / HV_App.I,20.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:4269: tato hy ayaṃ balād enāṃ netuṃ śaktaḥ suraiḥ saha // HV_App.I,20.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:4270: purā ekārṇave ghore śrūyate medinī tv iyam / HV_App.I,20.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:4271: pātālasya tale magnā viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / HV_App.I,20.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:4272: vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthāya uddhṛtā jagadādinā / HV_App.I,20.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:4273: hiraṇyākṣaś ca daityendro varāheṇa nipātitaḥ // HV_App.I,20.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:4279: na cābhyantararātryahnor na śūṣkeṇārdrakena ca // HV_App.I,20.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:4280: avadhyastriṣu lokeṣu daityendro hy aparājitaḥ / HV_App.I,20.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:4281: nārasiṃhena rūpeṇa nihato viṣṇunā purā // HV_App.I,20.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:4282: vāmanena tu rūpeṇa kaśyapasyātmajo balī / HV_App.I,20.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:4288: tretādvāparayoḥ saṃdhau rāmaḥ śāstrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,20.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:4290: viṣṇunā nihato bhūyaś chadmarūpeṇa haihayaḥ // HV_App.I,20.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:4293: purā kṛtayuge viṣṇuḥ saṃgrāme tārakāmaye / HV_App.I,20.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:4294: ṣoḍaśārdhabhujo bhūtvā garuḍastho hi vīryavān / HV_App.I,20.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:4296: kālanemiś ca daityo vai devatānāṃ bhayapradaḥ / HV_App.I,20.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:4299: antaraṃ prāpya kālasya nihatā bahavo 'surāḥ // HV_App.I,20.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:4302: śakunīṃ keśinaṃ caiva yamalārjunakāv api // HV_App.I,20.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:4303: nāgaṃ kuvalayāpīḍaṃ cāṇūraṃ muṣṭikaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,20.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:4304: kaṃsaṃ ca balināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sagaṇaṃ devakīsutaḥ / HV_App.I,20.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:4305: nihatya gopaveṣeṇa krīḍayām āsa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,20.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:4307: kṛtāni tatra tatraiva viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / HV_App.I,20.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:4308: tenāhaṃ vaḥ pravakṣyāmi bhavatāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,20.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:4309: taṃ manye keśavaṃ viṣṇuṃ surādyam asurāntakam / HV_App.I,20.159 /
GE07hv_apppu:4310: nārāyaṇaṃ jagadyoniṃ purāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ dhruvam // HV_App.I,20.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:4314: svayaṃbhuvam ajaṃ sthāṇum ajeyaṃ sacarācaraiḥ / HV_App.I,20.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:4316: iti me niścitā buddhir jāto 'yaṃ mathurādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,20.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:4317: kule mahati vai rājñāṃ vipule cakravartinām / HV_App.I,20.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:4318: katham anyasya martyasya garuḍo vāhanaṃ bhavet // HV_App.I,20.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:4319: viśeṣeṇa tu kanyārthe vikramasthe janārdane / HV_App.I,20.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:4320: kaḥ sthāsyati pumān adya garuḍasyāgrato balī // HV_App.I,20.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:4322: viṣṇor āgamane caiva mahān doṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ / HV_App.I,20.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:4323: bhavadbhir anucintyedaṃ kriyatāṃ yad anantaram // HV_App.I,20.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:4324: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ bhūpaṃ magadhānāṃ janeśvaram / HV_App.I,20.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:4325: sunītho 'tha mahāprājño vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,20.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:4326: samyag āha mahābāhur magadhādhipatir nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,20.176 /
GE07hv_apppu:4327: samakṣaṃ naradevānāṃ yathā vṛttaṃ mahāhave / HV_App.I,20.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:4328: gomante rāmakṛṣṇābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ karma suduṣkaram // HV_App.I,20.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:4331: tenāyaṃ māgadhaḥ śrīmān anāgatam acintayat / HV_App.I,20.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:4332: brūte ca rājasenāyām anusmṛtya sudāruṇam // HV_App.I,20.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:4333: padātyor yudhyatos tatra balakeśavayor yudhi / HV_App.I,20.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:4334: durnivāryataro ghoro hy abhavad vāhinīkṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,20.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:4335: viditaṃ vaḥ suparṇasya āgatasya nṛpottamāḥ // HV_App.I,20.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:4337: samudrāḥ kṣubhitāḥ sarve cacālādrir mahī muhuḥ / HV_App.I,20.187 /
GE07hv_apppu:4338: vayaṃ sarve susaṃtrastaḥ kim utpāteti viklavāḥ // HV_App.I,20.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:4339: yadā saṃnahya yudhyeta ārūḍhaḥ keśavena saḥ / HV_App.I,20.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:4340: katham asmadvidhaḥ śaktaḥ pratisthātuṃ raṇājire // HV_App.I,20.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:4341: rājñāṃ svayaṃvare nāma sumahān harṣavardhanaḥ / HV_App.I,20.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:4342: kṛto naravarair ādyair yaśodharmasya vai nidhiḥ // HV_App.I,20.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:4343: idaṃ tu kuṇḍinagaram āsādya manujeśvarāḥ / HV_App.I,20.193 /
GE07hv_apppu:4345: yadi sā varayed anyaṃ rājñāṃ madhye nṛpātmajā / HV_App.I,20.195 /
GE07hv_apppu:4346: kṛṣṇasya bhujayor vīryaṃ kaḥ pumān prasahiṣyati // HV_App.I,20.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:4348: tadartham āgataḥ kṛṣṇo vayaṃ caiva narādhipāḥ // HV_App.I,20.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:4350: kanyāhetor narendrānāṃ yathā vadati māgadhaḥ // HV_App.I,20.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:4353: ity evam ukte vacane sunīthena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,20.201 /
GE07hv_apppu:4355: yad uktaṃ māgadhendreṇa sunīthena narādhipāḥ / HV_App.I,20.203 /
GE07hv_apppu:4356: yuktapūrvam idaṃ manye yad asmākaṃ vaco hitam // HV_App.I,20.204 //
GE07hv_apppu:4357: na ca vidveṣaṇenāhaṃ na cāhaṃkāravādinā / HV_App.I,20.205 /
GE07hv_apppu:4360: ka eṣa nikhilaṃ vaktuṃ śakto vai rājasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,20.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:4361: kiṃ tv anusmaraṇārthe 'haṃ yad bravīmi śṛṇuṣva me / HV_App.I,20.209 /
GE07hv_apppu:4362: āgato vāsudeveti kim āśvaryaṃ narādhipāḥ // HV_App.I,20.210 //
GE07hv_apppu:4363: yathāgatā vayaṃ sarve kṛṣṇo 'pīha tathāgataḥ / HV_App.I,20.211 /
GE07hv_apppu:4364: kim atra doṣo gauṇo vā kanyāhetoḥ samāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,20.212 //
GE07hv_apppu:4365: yad asmābhiḥ sametyaiva kṛtaṃ gomantarodhanam / HV_App.I,20.213 /
GE07hv_apppu:4366: tatra yuddhakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ kathaṃ vaḥ kartum arhatha // HV_App.I,20.214 //
GE07hv_apppu:4369: tāv āhūya vadhārthāya ubhau rāmajanārdanau / HV_App.I,20.217 /
GE07hv_apppu:4370: nāgenoddīpitau vīrau hatvā nāgaṃ viveśatuḥ // HV_App.I,20.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:4371: tataḥ svavīryam āśritya nihato raṅgasāgare / HV_App.I,20.219 /
GE07hv_apppu:4372: gatāsur iva cāsīno mathureśaṃ sahānugaḥ // HV_App.I,20.220 //
GE07hv_apppu:4373: kim atra vihito doṣo yenāsmābhir vayodhikaiḥ / HV_App.I,20.221 /
GE07hv_apppu:4374: uparodhaparā rājan vayaṃ sarve samāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,20.222 //
GE07hv_apppu:4376: puraṃ balaṃ samutsṛjya gomantaṃ parvataṃ gatau / HV_App.I,20.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:4377: tatrāpi gatam asmābhir hantuṃ samarayodhibhiḥ // HV_App.I,20.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:4379: rathāśvanaranāgena tatra vai vigrahaḥ kṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,20.227 /
GE07hv_apppu:4380: kṛtvoparodhaṃ śailaḥ sa kṣatradharmeṇa dīpitaḥ // HV_App.I,20.228 //
GE07hv_apppu:4381: dāvāgnimukham āviśya mṛtau yadi tapasvinau / HV_App.I,20.229 /
GE07hv_apppu:4382: vinītāv iti manyāmaḥ sarve kṣatriyapuṃgavāḥ // HV_App.I,20.230 //
GE07hv_apppu:4383: pratiyuddhe kṛte tv evaṃ dūṣayāmo janārdanam // HV_App.I,20.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:4384: yatra yatra prayāsyāmo vayaṃ tatra bhavet kaliḥ / HV_App.I,20.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:4385: prītyarthaṃ prayatiṣyāmaḥ kṛṣṇena saha bhūmipāḥ // HV_App.I,20.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:4386: idaṃ kuṇḍipuraṃ kṛṣṇo nāgataḥ kalihetunā / HV_App.I,20.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:4388: martye 'smin puruṣendro 'sau na kaścit prākṛto naraḥ / HV_App.I,20.236 /
GE07hv_apppu:4389: devaloke ca deveśaḥ pravaraḥ puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,20.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:4390: devānām api kartāsau lokānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ / HV_App.I,20.238 /
GE07hv_apppu:4391: na deve bāliśā buddhir na cerṣyā na ca matsaraḥ // HV_App.I,20.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:4392: na stabdho na kṛśo nārtaḥ praṇatārtiharaḥ sadā / HV_App.I,20.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:4393: eṣa viṣṇuḥ prabhur devo devānām api daivatam // HV_App.I,20.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:4395: na senāsahito yāti kṛṣṇaḥ śatruvināśane // HV_App.I,20.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:4396: iyaṃ yātrā vijānīdhvaṃ prītyarthaṃ hy āgato hariḥ / HV_App.I,20.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:4397: sahīto yādavendraiś ca bhojavṛṣṇyandhakair iha // HV_App.I,20.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:4398: argham ācamanīyaṃ ca dattvātithyaṃ narādhipāḥ / HV_App.I,20.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:4399: kariṣyāmo vayaṃ sarve keśavāya mahātmane // HV_App.I,20.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:4400: evaṃ saṃdhānataḥ kṛtvā kṛṣṇena sahitā vayam / HV_App.I,20.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:4402: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā dantavaktrasya dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,20.250 /
GE07hv_apppu:4403: sālvaḥ pravadatāṃ śreṣṭhas tān uvāca narādhipān // HV_App.I,20.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:4404: kiṃ bhayenāsya naḥ sarve nyastaśastrā bhavāmahe / HV_App.I,20.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:4406: parastavena kiṃ kāryaṃ vinindya balam ātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,20.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:4407: naiṣa dharmo narendrāṇāṃ kṣatradharme vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,20.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:4409: teṣāṃ kāpuruṣā buddhiḥ kathaṃ bhavitum arhati // HV_App.I,20.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:4410: ahaṃ jānāmi vai kṛṣṇam ādidevaṃ sanātanam / HV_App.I,20.258 /
GE07hv_apppu:4412: vaikuṇṭham ajayaṃ loke carācaraguruṃ harim / HV_App.I,20.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:4415: asmākaṃ ca vināśāya lokasaṃrakṣaṇāya ca / HV_App.I,20.263 /
GE07hv_apppu:4416: aṃśāvataraṇe kṛtsnaṃ jāne viṣṇor viceṣṭitam // HV_App.I,20.264 //
GE07hv_apppu:4417: saṃgrāmam atulaṃ kṛtvā viṣṇunā saha bhūmipāḥ / HV_App.I,20.265 /
GE07hv_apppu:4419: taṃ ca jānāmi rājendrāḥ kālenāyuḥkṣayo bhavet // HV_App.I,20.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:4420: nākāle mriyate kaścit prāpte kāle na jīvati / HV_App.I,20.268 /
GE07hv_apppu:4421: evaṃ viniścayaṃ budhvā na kuryāt kasyacid bhayam // HV_App.I,20.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:4422: sa eva bhagavān viṣṇur ālokya tapasaḥ kṣayam / HV_App.I,20.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:4424: baliṃ vairocaniṃ caiva budhvāvadhyaṃ mahābalam / HV_App.I,20.272 /
GE07hv_apppu:4426: evamādīni cānyāni viṣṇoś ceṣṭāni vai nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,20.274 /
GE07hv_apppu:4427: tasmād ayuktaṃ bhavatāṃ vigrahārthe vicāraṇam // HV_App.I,20.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:4429: tasmād asmāsu yuktaṃ tad bhavatāṃ vigrahe matiḥ / **HV_App.I,20.275**9:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:4430: na ca saṃgrāmahetor hi kṛṣṇasyāgamanaṃ tv iha / HV_App.I,20.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:4431: yasya vā tasya vā kanyā varayiṣyati tasya sā / HV_App.I,20.277 /
GE07hv_apppu:4432: kim atra vigraho rājñāṃ prītir bhavati vai dhruvam // HV_App.I,20.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:4434: na kiṃcid abravīd rājā bhīṣṃakaḥ putrakāraṇāt // HV_App.I,20.280 //
GE07hv_apppu:4436: raṇe pracaṇḍātirathaṃ vicintya manasā sutam // HV_App.I,20.282 //
GE07hv_apppu:4437: kṛṣṇaṃ na sahate nityaṃ putro me baladarpitaḥ / HV_App.I,20.283 /
GE07hv_apppu:4438: nityābhimānī ca raṇe na bibheti ca kasyacit // HV_App.I,20.284 //
GE07hv_apppu:4439: kṛṣṇasya bhujavīryena hriyati nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,20.285 /
GE07hv_apppu:4441: dveṣī caivābhimānī ca kuto jīvati me sutaḥ / HV_App.I,20.287 /
GE07hv_apppu:4442: jīvitaṃ nātra paśyāmi mama putrasya keśavāt // HV_App.I,20.288 //
GE07hv_apppu:4443: kanyāhetoḥ sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ pitṝṇāṃ nandivardhanam / HV_App.I,20.289 /
GE07hv_apppu:4444: kārayiṣye kathaṃ yuddhaṃ putreṇa saha keśavam // HV_App.I,20.290 //
GE07hv_apppu:4445: na ca nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ varam icchati rukmiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,20.291 /
GE07hv_apppu:4447: na ca nārāyaṇād devo varadṛṣṭas tu rukmiṇaḥ / **HV_App.I,20.291**10:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:4452: vṛndāvane vasañ śrīmān keśavo balināṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,20.296 /
GE07hv_apppu:4453: uddhṛtyaikena hastena saptāhaṃ dhṛtavān girim / HV_App.I,20.297 /
GE07hv_apppu:4454: duṣkaraṃ karma saṃsmṛtya manaḥ sīdati me bhṛśam // HV_App.I,20.298 //
GE07hv_apppu:4455: nagendraṃ sahasāgamya daivataiḥ saha vṛtrahā / HV_App.I,20.299 /
GE07hv_apppu:4457: yathā vai damito nāgaḥ kāliyo yamunāhrade / HV_App.I,20.301 /
GE07hv_apppu:4459: keśī caiva mahāvīryo dānavo hayavigrahaḥ / HV_App.I,20.303 /
GE07hv_apppu:4460: nihato vāsudevena devair api durāsadaḥ // HV_App.I,20.304 //
GE07hv_apppu:4461: sāṃdīpanisutaś caiva ciranaṣṭo hi sāgare / HV_App.I,20.305 /
GE07hv_apppu:4462: daityaṃ pañcajanaṃ hatvā ānīto yamamandirāt // HV_App.I,20.306 //
GE07hv_apppu:4463: gomanto sumahad yuddhaṃ bahubhiś caiva tāv ubhau / HV_App.I,20.307 /
GE07hv_apppu:4467: jaghratus tau mahāvīryau vasudevasutāv ubhau // HV_App.I,20.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:4469: na nāgā na ca daityendrā na piśācā na guhyakāḥ // HV_App.I,20.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:4471: tam anusmṛtya saṃgrāmaṃ bhṛśaṃ sīdati me manaḥ // HV_App.I,20.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:4473: kṛtvā govardhanaṃ veśma rakṣitā gā nṛbhiḥ saha / **HV_App.I,20.315**11:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:4475: na mayā śrutapūrvo vā dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ kuto 'pi vā / HV_App.I,20.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:4476: tādṛśo bhuvi martye 'smin vāsudevāt surottamāt // HV_App.I,20.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:4477: samyag āha mahābāhur dantavaktro mahīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,20.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:4480: gamanāya matiṃ cakre prasādayitum acyutam // HV_App.I,20.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:4481: cintyamāno narendrais tu bahubhir balaśālibhiḥ / HV_App.I,20.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:4484: upaviṣṭā nṛpāḥ sarve sveṣu viśrāmaveśmasu // HV_App.I,20.325 //
GE07hv_apppu:4485: ye viśiṣṭāś ca rājāno vidarbhāyāṃ narādhipaiḥ / HV_App.I,20.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:4486: tair āgamya svabhūpeṣu raho gatvā niveditam // HV_App.I,20.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:4487: śrutvā kṛṣṇābhiṣekaṃ tu kecid dhṛṣṭā narādhipāḥ / HV_App.I,20.328 /
GE07hv_apppu:4488: kecid dīnatarā bhītā udāsīnās tathāpare // HV_App.I,20.329 //
GE07hv_apppu:4489: tridhā prabhinnā sā senā naranāgāśvavāhinī / HV_App.I,20.330 /
GE07hv_apppu:4490: mahārṇava iva kṣubdhā abhiṣekeṇa cālitā // HV_App.I,20.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:4491: nṛpāṇāṃ bhedam ālokya bhīṣmako rājasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,20.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:4492: vyatikramam acintyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ nṛpatinā svayam // HV_App.I,20.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:4493: vicintya manasā rājan dahyamānena cetasā / HV_App.I,20.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:4495: etasminn antare dūtāḥ saṃprāptāḥ kaiśikāntikāt / HV_App.I,20.336 /
GE07hv_apppu:4496: lekham uddhṛtya śirasā viviśus te nṛpārṇavam // HV_App.I,20.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:4499: hatvā kaṃsaṃ mahāvīryaṃ devair api durāsadam / HV_App.I,20.338 /
GE07hv_apppu:4500: nābhiṣiktaḥ svayaṃ rājye nopaviṣṭo nṛpāsane // HV_App.I,20.339 //
GE07hv_apppu:4501: kanyārthenāgataḥ kṛṣṇas tatrāpi na kṛto 'tithiḥ / HV_App.I,20.340 /
GE07hv_apppu:4502: amānam atulaṃ prāpya kṣāntavān kena hetunā // HV_App.I,20.341 //
GE07hv_apppu:4504: sa cāpi kṣamayā yuktaḥ kāraṇaṃ kim apekṣitam / HV_App.I,20.343 /
GE07hv_apppu:4505: etad ākhyāhi bhagavan paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // HV_App.I,20.344 //
GE07hv_apppu:4508: manasā cintayām āsa vāsudevasya kaiśikaḥ // HV_App.I,20.346 //
GE07hv_apppu:4509: dṛṣṭvāścaryaṃ hi naḥ sarvān dhruvaṃ pāpakṣayo bhavet / HV_App.I,20.347 /
GE07hv_apppu:4511: K4 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:4514: viśuddhabhāvaḥ kṛṣṇasya āvayor dṛṣṭa tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,20.348 //
GE07hv_apppu:4515: ataḥ pātrataraḥ ko 'nyas triṣu lokeṣu vidyate / HV_App.I,20.349 /
GE07hv_apppu:4517: tasyāvāṃ kiṃ pradāsyāva ātithyakaraṇe nṛpa / HV_App.I,20.351 /
GE07hv_apppu:4518: pātram āsādya vai rājan yathā dharmo na lupyate // HV_App.I,20.352 //
GE07hv_apppu:4519: evam anyonyaṃ saṃcintya bhrātarau krathakaiśikau / HV_App.I,20.353 /
GE07hv_apppu:4520: svaṃ rājyaṃ dātukāmau tau jagmatuḥ keśavāntikam // HV_App.I,20.354 //
GE07hv_apppu:4521: devam āsādya tau vīrau vidarbhanagarādhipau / HV_App.I,20.355 /
GE07hv_apppu:4522: ūcatus tau mahātmānau praṇamya śirasā harim // HV_App.I,20.356 //
GE07hv_apppu:4523: adyāvāṃ saphalaṃ janma adyāvāṃ saphalaṃ yaśaḥ / HV_App.I,20.357 /
GE07hv_apppu:4524: adyāvāṃ pitaras tṛptā deve tvayi gṛhāgate // HV_App.I,20.358 //
GE07hv_apppu:4525: cāmaraṃ vyajanaṃ chatraṃ dhvajaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ balam / HV_App.I,20.359 /
GE07hv_apppu:4528: āvām iha hi rājye tvām abhiṣiñcāva vai prabho // HV_App.I,20.362 //
GE07hv_apppu:4529: āvayor yat kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ bahubhiḥ pārthivair api / HV_App.I,20.363 /
GE07hv_apppu:4530: śakyate nānyathā kartuṃ jarāsaṃdhena vā svayam // HV_App.I,20.364 //
GE07hv_apppu:4531: śatrus te māgadho rājā jarāsaṃdho mahādyutiḥ / HV_App.I,20.365 /
GE07hv_apppu:4532: kathāṃ te bruvate nityaṃ nṛpāṇām abhayapradaḥ // HV_App.I,20.366 //
GE07hv_apppu:4533: siṃhāsanam anadhyāsya puraṃ cāsya na vidyate / HV_App.I,20.367 /
GE07hv_apppu:4535: kṛṣṇo 'pi sumahāvīryo hy abhimānī mahādyutiḥ / HV_App.I,20.369 /
GE07hv_apppu:4536: na cāgamiṣyate cāsmin kanyārthe ca svayaṃvare // HV_App.I,20.370 //
GE07hv_apppu:4538: katham āsyati nīceṣu āsaneṣu mahādyutiḥ // HV_App.I,20.372 //
GE07hv_apppu:4539: iti saṃcodyamānas tu śrutvāsau bhīṣmako nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,20.373 /
GE07hv_apppu:4542: nivedayām āsa tadā tasyābhilaṣitaṃ tv idam // **HV_App.I,20.373**13:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:4544: tava viśrāmahetor hi kāritaṃ ca gṛhottamam / HV_App.I,20.375 /
GE07hv_apppu:4547: samāje manujendrāṇāṃ mā bhūd āsanasaṃkaṭam // HV_App.I,20.378 //
GE07hv_apppu:4549: āsyatām āsane śubhre śvaḥ prabhāte mahādyute // HV_App.I,20.380 //
GE07hv_apppu:4552: evam uktvā suraśreṣṭhaṃ praṇipatya kṛtāñjalī / HV_App.I,20.383 /
GE07hv_apppu:4553: preṣayām āsa tau vīrau raṅgamadhye nṛpair vṛte // HV_App.I,20.384 //
GE07hv_apppu:4555: likhitvā sumahātejāḥ kaiśikaḥ śāpajād bhayāt // HV_App.I,20.386 //
GE07hv_apppu:4556: viditaṃ vo nṛpāḥ sarve vainateyasahācyutaḥ / HV_App.I,20.387 /
GE07hv_apppu:4560: pradadau vāsudevāya svaṃ rājyaṃ dharmahetunā // HV_App.I,20.390 //
GE07hv_apppu:4561: idam āsanam āssveti bhrātrā me sahito 'naghāḥ / HV_App.I,20.391 /
GE07hv_apppu:4563: na yuktam āsanaṃ dātuṃ tvayāsīnaṃ narādhipa / HV_App.I,20.393 /
GE07hv_apppu:4568: abhiṣiñcata rājendraṃ bahubhiḥ pārthivaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,20.398 //
GE07hv_apppu:4570: nāgamiṣyati yaḥ kaścit so 'sya vadhyo bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,20.400 //
GE07hv_apppu:4575: eṣa śakrasya saṃdeśaḥ kathito vo narādhipāḥ / HV_App.I,20.405 /
GE07hv_apppu:4576: lekhenāhūya tān sarvān abhiṣiñcantu keśavam // HV_App.I,20.406 //
GE07hv_apppu:4578: iti saṃcodya svastho 'sau devadūto gato divam / HV_App.I,20.407 /
GE07hv_apppu:4580: tenāhaṃ codayiṣyāmi bhavanto ye samāgatāḥ / HV_App.I,20.409 /
GE07hv_apppu:4581: durnivāryataraṃ ghoraṃ śakreṇa svayam īritam // HV_App.I,20.410 //
GE07hv_apppu:4582: yuṣmābhir darśane yuktam adbhutaṃ bhuvi durlabham / HV_App.I,20.411 /
GE07hv_apppu:4583: kalaśair abhiṣicyantaṃ svayam eva nabhastalāt // HV_App.I,20.412 //
GE07hv_apppu:4584: dṛṣṭvāścaryaṃ hi naḥ sarvān dhruvaṃ pāpakṣayo bhavet / HV_App.I,20.413 /
GE07hv_apppu:4585: snāpanārthaṃ ca kṛṣṇāya devadevāya viṣṇave // HV_App.I,20.414 //
GE07hv_apppu:4586: āgacchadhvāṃ nṛpaśreṣṭā na bhayaṃ kartum arhatha / HV_App.I,20.415 /
GE07hv_apppu:4588: sarveṣāṃ manujendrāṇām abhayaṃ kurute hariḥ / HV_App.I,20.417 /
GE07hv_apppu:4589: viśuddhabhāvaḥ kṛṣṇasya āvayor dṛṣṭa tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,20.418 //
GE07hv_apppu:4590: māgadhasya viśeṣeṇa na vairaṃ hṛdi dṛśyate / HV_App.I,20.419 /
GE07hv_apppu:4591: yad atra kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ tad bhavadbhir vicintyatām // HV_App.I,20.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:4593: evaṃ saṃcintyamānās tu nṛpāḥ śāpabhayārditāḥ / HV_App.I,20.421 /
GE07hv_apppu:4594: bhūyaḥ śuśruvū rājendra rājānaḥ sarva eva te // HV_App.I,20.422 //
GE07hv_apppu:4600: na yuktaṃ vadatānyonyaṃ kṛṣṇena saha vairiṇā / HV_App.I,20.427 /
GE07hv_apppu:4601: vasadhvaṃ prītim utpādya svarāṣṭreṣu narādhipāḥ // HV_App.I,20.428 //
GE07hv_apppu:4603: anena saha saṃprītyā modadhvaṃ vigatajvarāḥ // HV_App.I,20.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:4604: mānuṣāṇāṃ nṛpā devā nṛpāṇāṃ devatāḥ surāḥ / HV_App.I,20.431 /
GE07hv_apppu:4605: surāṇāṃ daivataṃ śakraḥ śakrasyāpi janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,20.432 //
GE07hv_apppu:4607: tasyāpi devaḥ sa śivaḥ śivasyāpi janārdanaḥ / **HV_App.I,20.432**14:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:4608: eṣa viṣṇuḥ prabhur devo devānām api daivatam / HV_App.I,20.433 /
GE07hv_apppu:4609: jāto 'yaṃ mānuṣe loke nararūpeṇa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,20.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:4613: abhiṣicya suraiḥ sārdhaṃ kim icchadhvam ataḥ param // HV_App.I,20.438 //
GE07hv_apppu:4617: gatvā yūyaṃ vidarbhāyāṃ krathakaiśikayoḥ saha / HV_App.I,20.442 /
GE07hv_apppu:4623: tābhyāṃ saha nṛpaśreṣṭhāḥ kṛtvā sumahad utsavam / HV_App.I,20.448 /
GE07hv_apppu:4625: āgamiṣyatha saṃhṛṣṭāḥ punar eva svayaṃvaram // HV_App.I,20.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:4626: jarāsaṃdhaḥ sunīthaś ca rukmiṇaś ca mahārathaḥ / HV_App.I,20.451 /
GE07hv_apppu:4627: sālvaḥ saubhapatiś caiva catvāro rājasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,20.452 /
GE07hv_apppu:4628: raṅgasyāśūnyahetor hi tiṣṭhantu iti pārthivāḥ / HV_App.I,20.453 /
GE07hv_apppu:4630: evam ājñāṃ sureśasya śrutvā citrāṅgaderitām / HV_App.I,20.454 /
GE07hv_apppu:4631: gamanāya matiṃ cakruḥ sarva eva nṛpottamāḥ // HV_App.I,20.455 //
GE07hv_apppu:4633: bhiṣmakaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā prayātāḥ svabalair vṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,20.457 //
GE07hv_apppu:4634: bhiṣmakaś ca mahābāhuḥ svabalena samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,20.458 /
GE07hv_apppu:4635: jagāma pārthivaiḥ sārdhaṃ dahyamānena cetasā / HV_App.I,20.459 /
GE07hv_apppu:4636: yatra kṛṣṇo mahābāhuḥ kaiśikasya niveśane // HV_App.I,20.460 //
GE07hv_apppu:4638: śubhrā devasabhā ramyā snānahetor ihāgatā // HV_App.I,20.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:4644: gandharvā munayaś caiva kiṃnarāś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,20.468 /
GE07hv_apppu:4646: stuvanti munayaḥ sarve siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,20.470 /
GE07hv_apppu:4647: devaduṃdubhayaś caiva svayam evānadan divi // HV_App.I,20.471 //
GE07hv_apppu:4652: svayam āgamya rājendro devaiḥ saha śacīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,20.474 /
GE07hv_apppu:4654: aṣṭabhir lokapālais tu svadigbhāgeṣu saṃsthitaiḥ / HV_App.I,20.476 /
GE07hv_apppu:4655: upagāyadbhir nṛtyadbhiḥ stuvadbhiś ca samantataḥ // HV_App.I,20.477 //
GE07hv_apppu:4656: [k: For lines 476-477, K1.3.4 Ñ3 V1.2 B1(marg.).2 Dn D1-5 T2-4 G1.4.5 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:4657: aṣṭau ye lokapālās te svāsu dikṣu samāsthitāḥ / **HV_App.I,20.477**16:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:4659: śrutvā sutumulaṃ nādaṃ sarva eva narādhipāḥ / HV_App.I,20.478 /
GE07hv_apppu:4660: vismayotphullanayanā viviśus te sabhāṃ śubhām // HV_App.I,20.479 //
GE07hv_apppu:4661: kaiśikaś ca mahātejā upagamya narādhipān / HV_App.I,20.480 /
GE07hv_apppu:4662: praveśayām āsa balī pratipūjya yathāvidhi // HV_App.I,20.481 //
GE07hv_apppu:4665: tato 'mbarasthās te divyāḥ kalaśāś cailakaṇṭhinaḥ / HV_App.I,20.484 /
GE07hv_apppu:4672: satkṛtya vidhivad rājñām upaviṣṭo janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,20.491 //
GE07hv_apppu:4673: śubhe devasabhe ramye snānahetor ihāgate / HV_App.I,20.492 /
GE07hv_apppu:4674: upāsyamāno yadubhir vibabhau ca narādhipaiḥ // HV_App.I,20.493 //
GE07hv_apppu:4675: vainateyaś ca balavān kāmarūpī narākṛtiḥ / HV_App.I,20.494 /
GE07hv_apppu:4676: dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam āśritya āsanastho babhūva ha // HV_App.I,20.495 //
GE07hv_apppu:4677: krathakaiśikau ca tau vīrau vāmapārśve sva āsane / HV_App.I,20.496 /
GE07hv_apppu:4682: sukhopaviṣṭaṃ śrīmantaṃ devā iva śacīpatim // HV_App.I,20.501 //
GE07hv_apppu:4683: sacivaiḥ śrāvitāḥ pūrvaṃ praviṣṭās te narādhipāḥ / HV_App.I,20.502 /
GE07hv_apppu:4684: yathārheṇa ca saṃpūjya rājānaḥ sarva eva te / HV_App.I,20.503 /
GE07hv_apppu:4685: sukhopaviṣṭās te sveṣu āsaneṣu narādhipāḥ // HV_App.I,20.504 //
GE07hv_apppu:4687: pūjayitvā yathānyāyam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,20.506 //
GE07hv_apppu:4688: avijñātā nṛpāḥ sarve mānuṣo 'yām iti prabho / HV_App.I,20.507 /
GE07hv_apppu:4689: bhavantam uparundhānā deva tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi // HV_App.I,20.508 //
GE07hv_apppu:4691: na me vairaṃ nivasati ekāham api kaiśika / HV_App.I,20.509 /
GE07hv_apppu:4694: teṣāṃ ko hetunā kopaḥ kartavyas tv avanīśvarāḥ // HV_App.I,20.512 //
GE07hv_apppu:4695: yad gataṃ tad atikrāntaṃ ye mṛtās te divaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,20.513 /
GE07hv_apppu:4696: eṣa dharmo nṛloke 'smiñ jāyanti ca mriyanti ca // HV_App.I,20.514 //
GE07hv_apppu:4697: tasmād aśocyaṃ bhavatāṃ mṛtānaṃ vai narādhipāḥ / HV_App.I,20.515 /
GE07hv_apppu:4698: kṣantavyaṃ bhavatāsmākaṃ vītavairā bhavantu vai // HV_App.I,20.516 //
GE07hv_apppu:4700: evam uktvā narendrāṃs tān āśvāsya madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,20.517 /
GE07hv_apppu:4701: kaiśikasya mukhaṃ vīkṣya virarāma mahādyutiḥ // HV_App.I,20.518 //
GE07hv_apppu:4702: etasminn eva kale tu bhīṣmako nayakovidaḥ / HV_App.I,20.519 /
GE07hv_apppu:4703: pūjayitvā yathānyāyam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,20.520 //
GE07hv_apppu:4706: putro me bālabhāvena bhaginīṃ dātum icchati / HV_App.I,20.521 /
GE07hv_apppu:4707: svayaṃvare narendrāṇāṃ na cāhaṃ dātumutsahe // HV_App.I,20.522 //
GE07hv_apppu:4708: atīva bālabhāvatvād dātum icchen matir mama / HV_App.I,20.523 /
GE07hv_apppu:4709: ekā tv ekaṃ samālokya varayiṣyati me matiḥ // HV_App.I,20.524 //
GE07hv_apppu:4711: prasādaṃ kuru deveśa kṣantum arhasi me prabho // HV_App.I,20.526 //
GE07hv_apppu:4714: yadā bhavati vai prauḍhaḥ kīdṛśo 'vinayo bhavet // HV_App.I,20.528 //
GE07hv_apppu:4717: ekasyāpi nṛpasyāgre mohādyo vitathaṃ vadet / HV_App.I,20.531 /
GE07hv_apppu:4718: na sa tiṣṭhati loke 'smin nirdahed daṇḍavāhninā // HV_App.I,20.532 //
GE07hv_apppu:4719: eṣa dharmo narendrāṇām iti te viditaṃ prabho / HV_App.I,20.533 /
GE07hv_apppu:4720: lokadharmaṃ puraskṛtya purā gītaṃ svayaṃbhuvā // HV_App.I,20.534 //
GE07hv_apppu:4721: kathaṃ tava sutas teṣām agrato manujeśvara / HV_App.I,20.535 /
GE07hv_apppu:4722: vaktum arhati rājendra vitathaṃ rājasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,20.536 //
GE07hv_apppu:4723: tādṛśaṃ raṅgam atulaṃ kārayaṃs tanayas tava / HV_App.I,20.537 /
GE07hv_apppu:4724: kathaṃ tvayā hy avijñāta iti me saṃśayo mahān // HV_App.I,20.538 //
GE07hv_apppu:4726: yathārheṇa tu saṃpūjya ātithyaṃ kṛtavān asi // HV_App.I,20.540 //
GE07hv_apppu:4727: rathāśvanaranāgānāṃ vimardam atulaṃ tv iha / HV_App.I,20.541 /
GE07hv_apppu:4728: kathaṃ na jñātavān rājaṃs tava putrasya ceṣṭitam // HV_App.I,20.542 //
GE07hv_apppu:4729: viṣādo na bhaved atra caturaṅgabalāgame / HV_App.I,20.543 /
GE07hv_apppu:4730: kathaṃ na jñāyate rājann iti me buddhisaṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,20.544 //
GE07hv_apppu:4731: mamāgamanam eveha prāyeṇa na hitaṃ tava / HV_App.I,20.545 /
GE07hv_apppu:4732: ato na kṛtam ātithyam apātrāya narādhipa // HV_App.I,20.546 //
GE07hv_apppu:4733: pātrebhyo dīyatāṃ kanyā mām apāsya mahābhuja / HV_App.I,20.547 /
GE07hv_apppu:4734: mamāgamanadoṣeṇa kathaṃ kanyāṃ na dāsyasi // HV_App.I,20.548 //
GE07hv_apppu:4736: iti manvādibhir gītaṃ dharmavidbhir narottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,20.550 //
GE07hv_apppu:4737: ato 'rthaṃ na praviṣṭo 'haṃ raṅgamadhye viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,20.551 /
GE07hv_apppu:4741: āvābhyāṃ kṛtam ātithyaṃ kaiśikaḥ supriyātithiḥ / HV_App.I,20.555 /
GE07hv_apppu:4742: uṣitau ca yathā svarge purā garuḍakeśavau // HV_App.I,20.556 //
GE07hv_apppu:4744: evam evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ taṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāgvajracoditam / HV_App.I,20.557 /
GE07hv_apppu:4749: prasīda devalokeśa martyalokeśa pāhi mām / HV_App.I,20.559 /
GE07hv_apppu:4752: na prasidhyanti kāryāṇi kurvatām avicāraṇāt // HV_App.I,20.562 //
GE07hv_apppu:4753: bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prāpya devānām api daivatam / HV_App.I,20.563 /
GE07hv_apppu:4754: samyag bhavatu me dṛsṭiḥ saṃpatsyantu ca me kriyāḥ // HV_App.I,20.564 //
GE07hv_apppu:4755: āniṣpannām api kriyāṃ nayopetāṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,20.565 /
GE07hv_apppu:4756: phaladāṃ hi prakurvanti mahāsenāpatir yathā // HV_App.I,20.566 //
GE07hv_apppu:4757: bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prāpya nātibādhati me bhayam / HV_App.I,20.567 /
GE07hv_apppu:4758: yan mayā cintitaṃ kāryaṃ tad bhavāñ śrotum arhati // HV_App.I,20.568 //
GE07hv_apppu:4759: na dātum icche kanyāṃ vai pārthivebhyaḥ svayaṃvare / HV_App.I,20.569 /
GE07hv_apppu:4760: prasādaṃ kuru deveśa na kopaṃ kartum arhasi // HV_App.I,20.570 //
GE07hv_apppu:4762: pūrvam eva hi govinda kathitaṃ nāradena yat / **HV_App.I,20.570**18:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:4763: eṣā tavānujā bālā śrīr eṣā hy avatāriṇī // **HV_App.I,20.570**18:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:4764: kṛṣṇārthe janmam āsādya punar jātā tu sā svayam // **HV_App.I,20.570**18:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:4770: nāradena yathoktaṃ vai vitathaṃ na vaded dvijaḥ // **HV_App.I,20.570**18:9 //
GE07hv_apppu:4772: vacanena kim uktena tvayā rājan mahāmate / HV_App.I,20.571 /
GE07hv_apppu:4773: khakanyāṃ dāsyase neti ko 'tra netā tavānagha / HV_App.I,20.572 /
GE07hv_apppu:4774: mā dehīti na cākhyeyaṃ dadasveti na me vacaḥ / HV_App.I,20.573 /
GE07hv_apppu:4775: rukmiṇyā divyamūrtitvāt saṃbandhe kāraṇaṃ kṣamam // HV_App.I,20.574 //
GE07hv_apppu:4776: merukūṭe purā devaiḥ kṛtam aṃśāvatāraṇam / HV_App.I,20.575 /
GE07hv_apppu:4777: tadā nisṛṣṭā sā pūrvaṃ gaccha tvaṃ patinā saha // HV_App.I,20.576 //
GE07hv_apppu:4779: jāyes tvaṃ vipulaśroṇi pratyavekṣasva keśavam // HV_App.I,20.578 //
GE07hv_apppu:4780: tenāhaṃ vaḥ pravakṣyāmi rājan na kṛtakaṃ vacaḥ / HV_App.I,20.579 /
GE07hv_apppu:4781: śrutvā svayaṃ viniścitya yad yuktaṃ tat kariṣyasi // HV_App.I,20.580 //
GE07hv_apppu:4782: rukmiṇī nāma te kanyā na sā prakṛtimānuṣī / HV_App.I,20.581 /
GE07hv_apppu:4783: śrīr eṣā brahmavākyena jātā kenāpi hetunā // HV_App.I,20.582 //
GE07hv_apppu:4784: na ca sā manujendrāṇāṃ svayaṃvaravidhikṣamā / HV_App.I,20.583 /
GE07hv_apppu:4785: ekā tv ekāya dātavyā iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,20.584 //
GE07hv_apppu:4786: na ca tāṃ śakyase rājaṃl lakṣmīṃ dātuṃ svayaṃvare / HV_App.I,20.585 /
GE07hv_apppu:4787: sadṛśaṃ varam ālokya dātum arhasi dharmataḥ // HV_App.I,20.586 //
GE07hv_apppu:4790: ahaṃ caivāgato rājñāṃ draṣṭukāmo mahotsavam / HV_App.I,20.589 /
GE07hv_apppu:4791: tāṃ ca kanyāṃ varārohāṃ padmena rahitāṃ śriyam // HV_App.I,20.590 //
GE07hv_apppu:4792: kṣantavyam iti yat proktaṃ tvayā rājan mamepsayā / HV_App.I,20.591 /
GE07hv_apppu:4793: yuktapūrvam ahaṃ manye kaluṣāya na pārthiva // HV_App.I,20.592 //
GE07hv_apppu:4794: pūrvam eva mayā kṣāntaṃ yenāsmi viṣaye tava // HV_App.I,20.593 //
GE07hv_apppu:4795: āgataḥ saumyarūpeṇa tenaiva kṣāntavān prabho // HV_App.I,20.594 //
GE07hv_apppu:4797: katham asmadvidhe rājan kaluṣo vasate hṛdi // HV_App.I,20.596 //
GE07hv_apppu:4799: bhavādṛśe kathaṃ rājan kaluṣo hṛdi vartate // HV_App.I,20.598 //
GE07hv_apppu:4801: pālayasva purīṃ samyak kaluṣo yadi vartate / **HV_App.I,20.598**19:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:4802: kṣānto 'ham iti mantavyaṃ yena senāsahāgataḥ / HV_App.I,20.599 /
GE07hv_apppu:4803: na cāhaṃ senayā sārdhaṃ yāsyāmi ripuvāhinīm // HV_App.I,20.600 //
GE07hv_apppu:4805: sthitaḥ sann arkasaṃkāśāny āyudhāni kare vahan // HV_App.I,20.602 //
GE07hv_apppu:4806: mānyo 'smākaṃ bhavān rājan vayasā ca pituḥ samaḥ / HV_App.I,20.603 /
GE07hv_apppu:4807: pālayasva purīṃ samyak putreṣu pitṛvad vasa // HV_App.I,20.604 //
GE07hv_apppu:4808: kaluṣo nāma rājendra vaset kāpuruṣeṣu vai / HV_App.I,20.605 /
GE07hv_apppu:4809: śūreṣu śuddhabhāveṣu kaluṣo vasate katham // HV_App.I,20.606 //
GE07hv_apppu:4810: jānīdhvam eṣā me vṛttiḥ putreṣu pitṛvad dhi saḥ / HV_App.I,20.607 /
GE07hv_apppu:4812: ātithyakaraṇe 'smākaṃ svaṃ rājyaṃ dadatuḥ śubhau / HV_App.I,20.609 /
GE07hv_apppu:4813: tena dānaphalenābhyāṃ daśa pūrve divaṃ gatāḥ // HV_App.I,20.610 //
GE07hv_apppu:4814: bhaviṣyāś caiva rājendra putrapautrā daśāvarāḥ / HV_App.I,20.611 /
GE07hv_apppu:4815: te 'pi tatraiva yāsyanti devalokaṃ narādhipāḥ // HV_App.I,20.612 //
GE07hv_apppu:4816: anayoḥ suciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā rājyam akaṇṭakam / HV_App.I,20.613 /
GE07hv_apppu:4817: yadābhilāṣo bhokṣasya sukhaṃ yāsyanti nirvṛtim // HV_App.I,20.614 //
GE07hv_apppu:4818: narendrāś ca mahābhāgā yo 'bhiṣecitum āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,20.615 //
GE07hv_apppu:4819: kālena te 'pi yāsyanto devalokaṃ triviṣṭapam // HV_App.I,20.616 //
GE07hv_apppu:4821: nagarīṃ mathurāṃ ramyāṃ bhojarājena pālitām // HV_App.I,20.618 //
GE07hv_apppu:4823: evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ bhīṣmakaṃ yadupuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,20.619 /
GE07hv_apppu:4824: rājñāṃ caiva upāmantrya vaidarbhābhyāṃ viśeṣataḥ / HV_App.I,20.620 /
GE07hv_apppu:4825: sabhāṃ niṣkramya deveśo jagāma ratham antikam // HV_App.I,20.621 //
GE07hv_apppu:4826: tataḥ sa dṛṣṭvā rājarṣir bhīṣmakaḥ kila keśavam / HV_App.I,20.622 /
GE07hv_apppu:4827: te tu sarve mahīpālā viṣaṇṇavadanābhavan // HV_App.I,20.623 //
GE07hv_apppu:4836: dṛṣṭvā sa rājarājendraḥ praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ / HV_App.I,20.630 /
GE07hv_apppu:4839: devadeva namas tubhyam anādinidhanāya vai / HV_App.I,20.632 /
GE07hv_apppu:4841: svayaṃbhuvāya viśvāya sthāṇave vedhasāya ca / HV_App.I,20.634 /
GE07hv_apppu:4842: padmanābhāya jaṭine daṇḍine piṅgalāya ca // HV_App.I,20.635 //
GE07hv_apppu:4843: haṃsaprabhāya haṃsāya catrarūpāya vai namaḥ / HV_App.I,20.636 /
GE07hv_apppu:4844: vaikuṇṭhāya namas tasmai ajāya paramātmane // HV_App.I,20.637 //
GE07hv_apppu:4846: puruṣottamāya yuktāya nirguṇāya namo 'stu te // HV_App.I,20.639 //
GE07hv_apppu:4847: varado bhava me nityaṃ tvadbhaktāya surottama / HV_App.I,20.640 /
GE07hv_apppu:4848: lokanātho 'si nāthas tvaṃ viṣṇus tvaṃ viditātmanām // HV_App.I,20.641 //
GE07hv_apppu:4850: evaṃ stutvā mahādevaṃ nṛpāṇām agrato nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,20.642 /
GE07hv_apppu:4852: śātakumbhasya nicayaṃ kṛṣṇāya pradadau nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,20.644 /
GE07hv_apppu:4853: punaś cakre namaskāraṃ vainateye mahābale // HV_App.I,20.645 //
GE07hv_apppu:4856: kāmarūpāya divyāya kāśyapāya ca vai namaḥ // HV_App.I,20.647 //
GE07hv_apppu:4858: iti saṃkṣepataḥ stutvā satkṛtya varabhūṣaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,20.648 /
GE07hv_apppu:4859: tato visarjayām āsa kṛṣṇaṃ kamalalocanam / HV_App.I,20.649 /
GE07hv_apppu:4860: anujagmur nṛpāś caiva prasthitaṃ vāsavānujam // HV_App.I,20.650 //
GE07hv_apppu:4861: pratigṛhya ca satkāraṃ nṛpān āmantrya vīryavān / HV_App.I,20.651 /
GE07hv_apppu:4862: jagāma mathurāṃ kṛṣṇo dyotayāno diśo daśa / HV_App.I,20.652 /
GE07hv_apppu:4866: bṛṃhitena ca nāgānāṃ hayānāṃ heṣitena ca / HV_App.I,20.656 /
GE07hv_apppu:4869: gate kṛṣṇo mahāvīrye ādāya param āsanam // HV_App.I,20.659 //
GE07hv_apppu:4870: sabhām ādāya devāś ca prayayus tridaśālayam // HV_App.I,20.660 //
GE07hv_apppu:4873: prayayus te nṛpāḥ sarve punar eva svayaṃvaram // HV_App.I,20.663 //
GE07hv_apppu:4884: svayaṃvarakṛto doṣo vidito vo narādhipāḥ / HV_App.I,20.672 /
GE07hv_apppu:4885: kṣantavyo mama vṛddhasya durṇayasya phalodayaḥ // HV_App.I,20.673 //
GE07hv_apppu:4886: evam ābhāṣya tān sarvān satkṛtya ca yathāvidhi / HV_App.I,20.674 /
GE07hv_apppu:4887: tato visarjayām āsa nṛpāṃs tān madhyadeśajān / HV_App.I,20.675 /
GE07hv_apppu:4889: te 'pi sarve maheṣvāsāḥ prahṛṣṭamanaso nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,20.677 /
GE07hv_apppu:4890: yathārheṇa ca saṃpūjya jagmus te narapuṃgavāḥ // HV_App.I,20.678 //
GE07hv_apppu:4891: jarāsaṃdhaḥ sunīthaś ca dantavaktraś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,20.679 /
GE07hv_apppu:4892: sālvaḥ saubhapatiś caiva mahākūrmaś ca pārthivaḥ // HV_App.I,20.680 //
GE07hv_apppu:4894: veṇudāriś ca rājarṣiḥ kaśmīrādhipatis tathā // HV_App.I,20.682 //
GE07hv_apppu:4895: ete cānye ca bahavo dakṣiṇāpathikā nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,20.683 /
GE07hv_apppu:4896: śrotukāmā raho vākyaṃ sthitā vai bhīṣmakāntike // HV_App.I,20.684 //
GE07hv_apppu:4897: tān vai samīkṣya rājendraḥ sa rājā bhīṣmako balo / HV_App.I,20.685 /
GE07hv_apppu:4898: snehapūrṇena manasā sthitāṃs tān avanīśvarān // HV_App.I,20.686 //
GE07hv_apppu:4902: vacanaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ śrutvā kṛtaṃ me kāryam īdṛśam / HV_App.I,20.690 /
GE07hv_apppu:4903: sadbhir bhavadbhiḥ kṣantavyaṃ vayaṃ nityāparādhinaḥ // HV_App.I,20.691 //
GE07hv_apppu:4904: evam uktvā tu rājā sa bhīṣmako nayakovidaḥ / HV_App.I,20.692 /
GE07hv_apppu:4905: uvāca sutam uddiśya vacanaṃ rājasaṃsadi / HV_App.I,20.693 /
GE07hv_apppu:4907: manye bālān imāṃl lokān sa eṣa puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,20.695 /
GE07hv_apppu:4908: kīrtiḥ kīrtimatāṃ śreṣṭo yaśaś ca yaśabhāg balī / HV_App.I,20.696 /
GE07hv_apppu:4910: dhanyā khalu mahābhāgā devakī yoṣitāṃ varā / HV_App.I,20.698 /
GE07hv_apppu:4911: putraṃ tribhuvanaśreṣṭhaṃ dhṛtvā garbheṇa keśavam // HV_App.I,20.699 //
GE07hv_apppu:4914: evaṃ lālapyamānaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ rājasaṃsadi / HV_App.I,20.702 /
GE07hv_apppu:4915: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā sālvarājo mahādyutiḥ // HV_App.I,20.703 //
GE07hv_apppu:4916: alaṃ khedena rājendra sutāya ripumardine / HV_App.I,20.704 /
GE07hv_apppu:4917: kṣatriyasya raṇe rājan dhruvaṃ jayaparājayau // HV_App.I,20.705 //
GE07hv_apppu:4918: niyatā gatir martyānām eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,20.706 /
GE07hv_apppu:4919: balakeśavayor anyas tṛtīyaḥ kaḥ pumān iha // HV_App.I,20.707 //
GE07hv_apppu:4920: raṇe yodhayituṃ śaktas tava putraṃ mahābalam / HV_App.I,20.708 /
GE07hv_apppu:4922: ripuṃ vārayituṃ śakto dhanur gṛhya mahābhujaḥ // HV_App.I,20.710 //
GE07hv_apppu:4923: bhārgavāstraṃ mahāraudraṃ devair api durāsadam / HV_App.I,20.711 /
GE07hv_apppu:4924: sṛjato bāhuvīryeṇa kaḥ pumān presahiṣyati // HV_App.I,20.712 //
GE07hv_apppu:4925: ayaṃ tu puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇo hy anādinidhano 'vyayaḥ / HV_App.I,20.713 /
GE07hv_apppu:4926: taṃ vijetā na loke 'sminn api śūladharaḥ svayam // HV_App.I,20.714 //
GE07hv_apppu:4928: viditvā devam īśānaṃ na yodhayati keśavam // HV_App.I,20.716 //
GE07hv_apppu:4929: asti tasya raṇe jetā yavanādhipatir nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,20.717 /
GE07hv_apppu:4930: sa kālayavano namā avadhyaḥ keśavasya ha // HV_App.I,20.718 //
GE07hv_apppu:4931: taptvā sudāruṇaṃ ghoraṃ tapaḥ paramaduścaram / HV_App.I,20.719 /
GE07hv_apppu:4932: rudram ārādhayām āsa dvādaśābdāny ayośanaḥ // HV_App.I,20.720 //
GE07hv_apppu:4935: putrakāmena muninā toṣya rudrāt suto vṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,20.721 /
GE07hv_apppu:4936: māthurāṇām avadhyo 'yaṃ bhaved iti ca śaṃkarāt / HV_App.I,20.722 /
GE07hv_apppu:4937: evam astv iti rudro 'pi pradadau munaye sutam // HV_App.I,20.723 //
GE07hv_apppu:4938: evaṃ gargasya tanayaḥ śrīmān rudravarod bhavaḥ / HV_App.I,20.724 /
GE07hv_apppu:4940: kṛṣṇo 'pi balavān eṣa māthure jātavān ayam / HV_App.I,20.726 /
GE07hv_apppu:4941: sa jeṣyati raṇe kṛṣṇaṃ mathurāyāṃ samāgataḥ // HV_App.I,20.727 //
GE07hv_apppu:4942: manyadhvaṃ yadi vo yuktāṃ nṛpā vācaṃ mayeritām / HV_App.I,20.728 /
GE07hv_apppu:4943: tatra dūtaṃ visṛjadhvaṃ yavanendrapuraṃ prati // HV_App.I,20.729 //
GE07hv_apppu:4944: śrutvā saubhapater vākyaṃ sarve te nṛpasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,20.730 /
GE07hv_apppu:4945: kurma ity abruvan hṛṣṭāḥ sālvarājaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,20.731 //
GE07hv_apppu:4946: sa teṣāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā jarāsaṃdho mahīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,20.732 /
GE07hv_apppu:4947: babhūva vimanā rājan brahmaṇo vacanaṃ smaran // HV_App.I,20.733 //
GE07hv_apppu:4949: māṃ samāśritya pūrve 'smin nṛpā nṛpabhayārditāḥ / HV_App.I,20.734 /
GE07hv_apppu:4951: iha māṃ nocyate bhūpaiḥ parasaṃśrayahetunā / HV_App.I,20.736 /
GE07hv_apppu:4952: kany eva patividveṣād anyaṃ ratiparāyaṇā // HV_App.I,20.737 //
GE07hv_apppu:4953: aho subalavad daivam aśakyaṃ vinivartitum / HV_App.I,20.738 /
GE07hv_apppu:4954: yad ahaṃ kṛṣṇahetor hi saṃśrayāmi balādhikam // HV_App.I,20.739 //
GE07hv_apppu:4956: śreyo hi maraṇaṃ mahyaṃ na cānyaṃ saṃśraye nṛpāḥ // HV_App.I,20.741 //
GE07hv_apppu:4957: kṛṣṇo vā baladevo vā yo vā so vā naro 'paraḥ / HV_App.I,20.742 /
GE07hv_apppu:4959: eṣā me niścitā buddhir etat supuruṣavratam / HV_App.I,20.744 /
GE07hv_apppu:4960: ato 'nyathā na śakto 'haṃ kartuṃ parasamāśrayam // HV_App.I,20.745 //
GE07hv_apppu:4961: bhavatāṃ sādhuvṛttānām ābādhaṃ na karoti saḥ / HV_App.I,20.746 /
GE07hv_apppu:4962: tena dūtaṃ pradāsyāmi nṛpāṇāṃ rakṣaṇāya vai // HV_App.I,20.747 //
GE07hv_apppu:4963: vyomamārgeṇa yātavyaṃ yathā kṛṣṇo na bādhate / HV_App.I,20.748 /
GE07hv_apppu:4968: vacanaṃ ca yathāsmābhir dautyena kṛṣṇavigrahe // HV_App.I,20.753 //
GE07hv_apppu:4970: punar evābravīd rājā saubhasya patimūrjitam / HV_App.I,20.754 /
GE07hv_apppu:4971: gaccha sarvanarendrāṇāṃ sāhāyyaṃ kuru mānada // HV_App.I,20.755 //
GE07hv_apppu:4972: yavanendro yathābhyeti yathā kṛṣṇaṃ vijeṣyati / HV_App.I,20.756 /
GE07hv_apppu:4973: yathā vayaṃ ca tuṣyāmas tathā nītir vidhīyatām // HV_App.I,20.757 //
GE07hv_apppu:4974: evaṃ saṃdiśya sarvāṃs tān bhīṣmakaṃ pujya dharmataḥ / HV_App.I,20.758 /
GE07hv_apppu:4975: prayayau svapuraṃ rājā svena sainyena saṃvṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,20.759 //
GE07hv_apppu:4976: sālvo 'pi nṛpatiśreṣṭhas tāṃś ca saṃpūjya vīryavān / HV_App.I,20.760 /
GE07hv_apppu:4979: anuvrajya jarāsaṃdhaṃ gatāḥ svanagareṣu vai // HV_App.I,20.763 //
GE07hv_apppu:4980: bhīṣmakaḥ saha putreṇa tāv ubhau cintya durṇayam / HV_App.I,20.764 /
GE07hv_apppu:4981: gṛhe viviśatur dīnau kṛṣṇam evānucintayan // HV_App.I,20.765 //
GE07hv_apppu:4984: gatvā tu sā sakhīmadhye uvāca vrīḍitānanā / HV_App.I,20.768 /
GE07hv_apppu:4985: na cānyeṣāṃ narendrāṇāṃ patnī bhavitum utsahe / HV_App.I,20.769 /
GE07hv_apppu:4986: kṛṣṇāt kamalapatrākṣāt satyam etad vaco mama // HV_App.I,20.770 //
GE07hv_apppu:4989: yavanānāṃ balodagraḥ sa kālayavano nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,20.771 /
GE07hv_apppu:4993: śrutimān dharmaśīlaś ca satyavādī jitendriyaḥ / HV_App.I,20.775 /
GE07hv_apppu:4996: sukhāsīnaḥ sabhāṃ ramyāṃ sacivaiḥ parivāritaḥ // HV_App.I,20.778 //
GE07hv_apppu:4998: vividhāś ca kathā divyāḥ kathyamānaiḥ parasparam // HV_App.I,20.780 //
GE07hv_apppu:4999: etasminn eva kālo tu divyagandhavaho 'nilaḥ / HV_App.I,20.781 /
GE07hv_apppu:5000: pravavau madanābodhas tasya vai sukhaśītalaḥ // HV_App.I,20.782 //
GE07hv_apppu:5001: kasmād ity evamanasaḥ sabhāyāṃ ye samāhatāḥ / HV_App.I,20.783 /
GE07hv_apppu:5002: utphullanayanāḥ sarve rājā caivāvalokya saḥ // HV_App.I,20.784 //
GE07hv_apppu:5003: apaśyata rathaṃ divyam āyāntaṃ bhāskaropamam / HV_App.I,20.785 /
GE07hv_apppu:5011: tatropaviṣṭaṃ śrīmantaṃ saubhasya patim ūr jitam / HV_App.I,20.793 /
GE07hv_apppu:5013: uvāca yavanendro vai mitraṃ pravadatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,20.795 /
GE07hv_apppu:5014: tatrotthāya mahābāhuḥ svayam eva nṛpāsanāt / HV_App.I,20.796 /
GE07hv_apppu:5016: sālvo 'pi sumahātejā dṛṣṭvā rājānam āgatam / HV_App.I,20.798 /
GE07hv_apppu:5018: avatīrya suvisrabdha eka eva rathottamāt / HV_App.I,20.800 /
GE07hv_apppu:5020: dṛṣṭvārgham udyātaṃ rājñā sa sālvo rājasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,20.802 /
GE07hv_apppu:5021: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā nārghārho 'smi mahādyute // HV_App.I,20.803 //
GE07hv_apppu:5023: preṣito bahubhiḥ sārdhaṃ jarāsaṃghena dhīmatā / HV_App.I,20.805 /
GE07hv_apppu:5027: jānāmy ahaṃ mahābāho dautyena tvām ihāgatam / HV_App.I,20.807 /
GE07hv_apppu:5028: saṃmite naradevānāṃ preṣitaṃ māgadhena vai // HV_App.I,20.808 //
GE07hv_apppu:5029: tena tvām arcaye rājan viśeṣeṇa mahāmate / HV_App.I,20.809 /
GE07hv_apppu:5031: bhavaty abhyarcite rājñāṃ sarveṣām arcitaṃ bhavet / HV_App.I,20.811 /
GE07hv_apppu:5032: [k: Ñ2 V1 .2 Ds D3-6 G2 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5033: mānite tava rājendra sarveṣāṃ mānitaṃ bhavet / **HV_App.I,20.811**22:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5034: āsyatām āsane divye mayā sārdhaṃ janeśvara // HV_App.I,20.812 //
GE07hv_apppu:5035: hastāliṅganakaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭvā ca kuśalamayam / HV_App.I,20.813 /
GE07hv_apppu:5036: sukhopaviṣṭhau sahitau śubhe siṃhāsane nṛpau // HV_App.I,20.814 //
GE07hv_apppu:5038: yad bāhubalam aśritya vayaṃ sarve narādhipāḥ / HV_App.I,20.815 /
GE07hv_apppu:5039: vasāmo vigatodvegā devā iva śacīpatim / HV_App.I,20.816 /
GE07hv_apppu:5040: kim asādhyaṃ bhaved asya yenāsi preṣito mayi / HV_App.I,20.817 /
GE07hv_apppu:5041: vada satyaṃ vacas tasya kim ājñāpayati prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,20.818 /
GE07hv_apppu:5042: kariṣye vacanaṃ tasya api karma suduṣkaram // HV_App.I,20.819 //
GE07hv_apppu:5044: yathā vadati rājendra magadhādhipatis tava / HV_App.I,20.820 /
GE07hv_apppu:5047: jāto 'haṃ jagatāṃ bādhī kṛṣṇaḥ paramadurjayaḥ / HV_App.I,20.822 /
GE07hv_apppu:5048: viditvā tasya durvṛttam ahaṃ hantuṃ samudyataḥ // HV_App.I,20.823 //
GE07hv_apppu:5051: cedirājasya vacanaṃ mahārthaṃ śrutavān aham / HV_App.I,20.826 /
GE07hv_apppu:5054: dṛṣṭvā rāmo gireḥ kūṭād āpluto hematāladhṛk // HV_App.I,20.829 //
GE07hv_apppu:5057: sarpantam iva sarpendraṃ vikṛṣyākṛṣya lāṅgalam / HV_App.I,20.832 /
GE07hv_apppu:5059: gajena gajam āsphālya rathena rathayodhinam / HV_App.I,20.834 /
GE07hv_apppu:5060: hayena ca hayārohaṃ padātena padātinam // HV_App.I,20.835 //
GE07hv_apppu:5062: vicaran vividhān mārgān nidāghe bhāskaro yathā // HV_App.I,20.837 //
GE07hv_apppu:5064: cakraṃ cakrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,20.839 //
GE07hv_apppu:5066: cakraṃ sa ca mahātejāḥ kālīṃ caivāyasīṃ gadām / **HV_App.I,20.839**23:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5068: cakraṃ sudarśanaṃ cakrī gavāṃ caiva gadāgrajaḥ / **HV_App.I,20.839**24:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5069: pravicālya mahāvīryaḥ pādavegena taṃ girim / HV_App.I,20.840 /
GE07hv_apppu:5074: jaghāna vāhinīṃ rājaṃś cakravyagreṇa pāṇinā // HV_App.I,20.845 //
GE07hv_apppu:5075: vikṣipya vipulaṃ cakraṃ gadāpātād anantaram / HV_App.I,20.846 /
GE07hv_apppu:5083: tatrāhaṃ yudhyamānas tu bhrātāsya balavān balī / HV_App.I,20.854 /
GE07hv_apppu:5084: sthito mamāgrataḥ śuro gadāpāṇir halāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,20.855 //
GE07hv_apppu:5085: dvādaśākṣauhiṇīr hatvā prabhinna iva kesarī / HV_App.I,20.856 /
GE07hv_apppu:5086: halaṃ saunandam uddhṛtya gadayā mām atāḍayat // HV_App.I,20.857 //
GE07hv_apppu:5088: bhūyaḥ prahartukāmo māṃ vaiśākhenāsthito mahīm // HV_App.I,20.859 //
GE07hv_apppu:5089: vaiśākhaṃ sthānam āsthāya guhaḥ krauñcaṃ yathā purā / HV_App.I,20.860 /
GE07hv_apppu:5090: tathā māṃ dīrghanetrābhyām īkṣate nirdahann iva // HV_App.I,20.861 //
GE07hv_apppu:5092: jīvitārthī nṛloke 'smin kaḥ pumān sthātum arhati // HV_App.I,20.863 //
GE07hv_apppu:5093: dṛṣṭvā mahāgadāṃ bhīmāṃ kāladaṇḍam ivoddhṛtām / HV_App.I,20.864 /
GE07hv_apppu:5094: kālāṅkuśena nirdhūtāṃ sthita evāgrato mama // HV_App.I,20.865 //
GE07hv_apppu:5097: prahartavyo na rājāyam avadhyo 'yaṃ tavānagha / HV_App.I,20.868 /
GE07hv_apppu:5098: kalpito 'sya vadhaś cānyād viramasva halāyudha // HV_App.I,20.869 //
GE07hv_apppu:5099: śrūtvāhaṃ tena vākyena cintāviṣṭo nivartitaḥ / HV_App.I,20.870 /
GE07hv_apppu:5100: sarvaprāṇaharaṃ ghoraṃ brahmaṇā svayam īritam // HV_App.I,20.871 //
GE07hv_apppu:5101: tenāhaṃ vaḥ pravakṣyāmi nṛpāṇāṃ hitakāmyayā / HV_App.I,20.872 /
GE07hv_apppu:5102: śrūtvā tvam eva rājendra kartum arhasi madvacaḥ // HV_App.I,20.873 //
GE07hv_apppu:5103: tapasogreṇa mahatā putrārthī toṣya śaṃkaram / HV_App.I,20.874 /
GE07hv_apppu:5104: prāptavān devadevāt tvām avadhyaṃ māthurair janaiḥ // HV_App.I,20.875 //
GE07hv_apppu:5115: praviśya rāṣṭraṃ mathurāṃ vaśe naya @ HV_App.I,20.886 @
GE07hv_apppu:5116: nihatya kṛṣṇaṃ prathayasva vai yaśaḥ // HV_App.I,20.887 //
GE07hv_apppu:5117: māthuro vāsudevo 'yaṃ baladevaś ca bāndhavaḥ / HV_App.I,20.888 /
GE07hv_apppu:5118: tau vijeṣyasi saṃgrāme gatvā tāṃ mathurāṃ purīm // HV_App.I,20.889 //
GE07hv_apppu:5121: vākyaṃ te kathitam idaṃ hitaṃ nṛpāṇām / HV_App.I,20.891 /
GE07hv_apppu:5122: tat sarvaṃ saha sacivair vimṛśya buddhayā @ HV_App.I,20.892 @
GE07hv_apppu:5123: yad yuktaṃ kuru manujendra ātmaneṣṭam // HV_App.I,20.893 //
GE07hv_apppu:5126: evaṃ kathayamānaṃ taṃ sālvarājaṃ nṛpājñayā / HV_App.I,20.894 /
GE07hv_apppu:5128: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi saphalaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me / HV_App.I,20.896 /
GE07hv_apppu:5129: kṛṣṇanigrahahetor yan niyukto bahubhir nṛpaiḥ // HV_App.I,20.897 //
GE07hv_apppu:5130: durjayaṃ triṣu lokeṣu surāsuragaṇair api / HV_App.I,20.898 /
GE07hv_apppu:5131: tasya nigrahahetor mām avadhārya jayāśiṣam // HV_App.I,20.899 //
GE07hv_apppu:5132: prahṛṣṭai rājasiṃhais tair avadhārya jayo mama / HV_App.I,20.900 /
GE07hv_apppu:5133: teṣāṃ vāgambuvarṣena vijayo me bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,20.901 //

GE07hv_apppu:5137: yāsyāmi mathurāṃ rājan vijetuṃ keśavaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,20.905 //
GE07hv_apppu:5138: evam ābhāṣya rājānaṃ saubhasya patim ūr jitam / HV_App.I,20.906 /
GE07hv_apppu:5140: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau cittaṃ siddhādeśāya vai nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,20.908 /
GE07hv_apppu:5141: purohitāya rājendra pradadau bahuśo dhanam // HV_App.I,20.909 //
GE07hv_apppu:5143: prasthānaṃ kṛtavān samyag jetukāmo janārdanam // HV_App.I,20.911 //
GE07hv_apppu:5145: yavanendraṃ pariṣvajya jagāma svapuraṃ nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,20.913 //

GE07hv_apppu:5150: na cāruroha bhagavān vainateyaṃ mahābalam / HV_App.I,20.916 /
GE07hv_apppu:5151: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ brahman brūhi tattvaṃ mahāmune // HV_App.I,20.917 //
GE07hv_apppu:5153: śrṇu rājan suparṇena kṛtaṃ karma hy amānuṣam / HV_App.I,20.918 /

GE07hv_apppu:5156: manasā cintayām āsa vainateyo mahāmatiḥ // HV_App.I,20.921 //
GE07hv_apppu:5157: yad uktaṃ devadevena nṛpāṇām agrataḥ prabho / HV_App.I,20.922 /
GE07hv_apppu:5158: yāsyāmi mathurāṃ ramyāṃ bhojarājena pālitām // HV_App.I,20.923 //
GE07hv_apppu:5161: deva yāsyāmi nagarīṃ raivatasya kuśasthalīm / HV_App.I,20.926 /
GE07hv_apppu:5162: raivataṃ ca giriṃ ramyaṃ nandanapratimaṃ vanam / HV_App.I,20.927 /
GE07hv_apppu:5167: tāṃ samantāt samālokya vāsārthaṃ te kṣamākṣamam / HV_App.I,20.932 /
GE07hv_apppu:5168: yadi syād bhavate ramyā praśastā nagarīti ca / HV_App.I,20.933 /
GE07hv_apppu:5170: evaṃ vijñāpya deveśaṃ praṇipatya janārdanam / HV_App.I,20.935 /
GE07hv_apppu:5171: jagāma patagendro vai paścimābhimukho balī / HV_App.I,20.936 /
GE07hv_apppu:5172: kṛṣṇo 'pi yadubhiḥ sārdhaṃ viveśa mathurāṃ purīm // HV_App.I,20.937 //

GE07hv_apppu:5177: kiṃ cakāra mahābāhur ugraseno mahīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,20.941 //

GE07hv_apppu:5186: rājendreṣvarbudaṃ dattaṃ mānaveṣu ca vai daśa // HV_App.I,20.945 //
