GE07hv_apppu:5189: ye tatra samanuprāptā narendrās te gṛhaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,20.946 /
GE07hv_apppu:5191: evaṃ nidhipatiḥ śrīmān daivatair anumoditaḥ / HV_App.I,20.948 /
GE07hv_apppu:5193: cakāra mahatīṃ pūjāṃ devatāyataneṣu vai / HV_App.I,20.950 /
GE07hv_apppu:5195: naṭānāṃ nṛtyageyāni vādyāni ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,20.952 /
GE07hv_apppu:5198: patākā vividhākārā dāpayām āsa bhojarāṭ // HV_App.I,20.955 //
GE07hv_apppu:5201: naṭānāṃ nṛtyageyāni vādyāni ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,20.958 /
GE07hv_apppu:5204: vastrāstaraṇakaṃ rājā dāpayām āsa bhūtale // HV_App.I,20.961 //
GE07hv_apppu:5208: alaṃkṛtvā pratīkṣante sveṣu sthāneṣu yoṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,20.965 //
GE07hv_apppu:5209: evaṃ kṛtvā purānandam ugraseno narādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,20.966 /
GE07hv_apppu:5210: vasudevagṛhaṃ gatvā priyākhyānaṃ nivedya ca / HV_App.I,20.967 /
GE07hv_apppu:5211: rāmeṇa saha saṃmantrya nirgato ratham antikam // HV_App.I,20.968 //
GE07hv_apppu:5212: tasminn evāntare rājañ śaṅkhadhvanir abhūn mahān // HV_App.I,20.969 //
GE07hv_apppu:5214: striyo vṛddhās ca bālāś ca sūtamāgadhabandinaḥ // HV_App.I,20.971 //

GE07hv_apppu:5219: avatīrya rathāc chubhrāt pādamārgeṇa cāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,20.974 /
GE07hv_apppu:5222: vanamālorasaṃ divyaṃ tapantam iva bhāskaram // HV_App.I,20.977 //
GE07hv_apppu:5226: dṛṣṭvā sa rājā rājendraṃ harṣagadgadayā girā / HV_App.I,20.981 /
GE07hv_apppu:5228: rathena na mayā gantuṃ yuktapūrvaṃ vicintya vai / HV_App.I,20.983 /
GE07hv_apppu:5229: avatīrṇo mahābhāga gaccha tvaṃ syandanena ca // HV_App.I,20.984 //
GE07hv_apppu:5230: viṣṇunā chadmarūpeṇa gatvemāṃ mathurāṃ purīm / HV_App.I,20.985 /
GE07hv_apppu:5232: tam ahaṃ stotum icchāmi sarvabhāvena keśavam // HV_App.I,20.987 //
GE07hv_apppu:5234: na yuktaṃ nṛpate stotuṃ vrajantaṃ devasattamam / HV_App.I,20.989 /
GE07hv_apppu:5235: astotreṇaiva saṃtuṣṭas tava rājañ janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,20.990 //
GE07hv_apppu:5236: tuṣṭasya stutibhiḥ kiṃ te darśanena tava stutiḥ // HV_App.I,20.991 //
GE07hv_apppu:5237: rājendratvam anuprāpya āgatas tava veśmani / HV_App.I,20.992 /
GE07hv_apppu:5238: tat tvaṃ kiṃ stutavān rājān divyaiḥ stotrair amānuṣaiḥ / HV_App.I,20.993 /
GE07hv_apppu:5239: evam ābruvamāṇau tau saṃprāptau keśevāntikam // HV_App.I,20.994 //
GE07hv_apppu:5241: uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭha ugrasenaṃ narādhipam // HV_App.I,20.996 //
GE07hv_apppu:5242: yan mayā cābhiṣiktas tvaṃ mathureśo bhavatv iti / HV_App.I,20.997 /
GE07hv_apppu:5243: na yuktam anyathā kartuṃ mathurādhipate svayam // HV_App.I,20.998 //
GE07hv_apppu:5244: argham ācamanīyaṃ ca pādyaṃ cāsmannivedanam / HV_App.I,20.999 /
GE07hv_apppu:5245: na dātum arhase rājann etan me manasaḥ priyam // HV_App.I,20.1000 //
GE07hv_apppu:5246: tavābhiprāyaṃ vijñāya bravīmi nṛpate vacaḥ / HV_App.I,20.1001 /
GE07hv_apppu:5247: tvam eva māthuro rājā nānyathā kartum arhasi // HV_App.I,20.1002 //
GE07hv_apppu:5248: sthānaṃ bhāgaṃ ca nṛpate dāsyāmi tava dakṣiṇam / HV_App.I,20.1003 /
GE07hv_apppu:5249: yathā nṛpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ tathā te sthāpito 'grataḥ // HV_App.I,20.1004 //
GE07hv_apppu:5252: cāmaravyajanaṃ chatraṃ dhvajaṃ ca manujeśvara / HV_App.I,20.1007 /
GE07hv_apppu:5254: dhārayasva mahābhāga pālayasva purīm imām / HV_App.I,20.1009 /
GE07hv_apppu:5259: māthurāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhāgā dīnārikā daśa / HV_App.I,20.1014 /
GE07hv_apppu:5262: nṛpena saha tiṣṭhanti vikadrupramukhāś ca ye / HV_App.I,20.1017 /
GE07hv_apppu:5263: daśasāhasriko bhāgas teṣāṃ dhātrā prakalpitaḥ // HV_App.I,20.1018 //
GE07hv_apppu:5266: evaṃ saṃpūjya rājendraṃ māthuraṇāṃ camūmukhe / HV_App.I,20.1019 /
GE07hv_apppu:5267: kṛtvā sumahad ānandaṃ mathurāṃ madhusūdanaḥ // HV_App.I,20.1020 //
GE07hv_apppu:5269: dīpyamānaḥ samantāc ca devā iva triviṣṭapam // HV_App.I,20.1022 //
GE07hv_apppu:5271: bṛṃhitena ca nāgānāṃ hayānāṃ heṣitena ca // HV_App.I,20.1024 //
GE07hv_apppu:5273: tumulaḥ sumahān āsīn nādo megharavopamaḥ // HV_App.I,20.1026 //
GE07hv_apppu:5274: bandibhiḥ stūyamānaṃ ca namaś cakrur api prajāḥ / HV_App.I,20.1027 /
GE07hv_apppu:5275: dattvā dānam ananto 'pi na yayau vismayaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,20.1028 //
GE07hv_apppu:5277: anahaṃkārabhāvāc ca vismayaṃ na jagāma ha // HV_App.I,20.1030 //
GE07hv_apppu:5279: dṛṣṭvā mathuravāsinyo namaś cakruḥ pade pade // HV_App.I,20.1032 //
GE07hv_apppu:5281: nāgaparyaṅkam ut sṛjya gato 'yaṃ mathurāṃ purīm // HV_App.I,20.1034 //
GE07hv_apppu:5282: badhvā baliṃ mahāvīryaṃ durjayaṃ tridaśair api / HV_App.I,20.1035 /
GE07hv_apppu:5283: śakrāya pradadau rājyaṃ trailokyaṃ vajrapāṇaye // HV_App.I,20.1036 //
GE07hv_apppu:5284: hatvā daityagaṇān sarvān kaṃsaṃ ca balināṃ varam / HV_App.I,20.1037 /
GE07hv_apppu:5286: nābhiṣiktaḥ svayaṃ rājye nopaviṣṭo nṛpāsanam / HV_App.I,20.1039 /
GE07hv_apppu:5287: rājendratvam abhīpsan vai mathurām āviśat tataḥ // HV_App.I,20.1040 //
GE07hv_apppu:5289: sūtamāgadhabandibhya idam ucur gaṇā giraḥ // HV_App.I,20.1042 //
GE07hv_apppu:5290: kiṃ vā śakṣyāmahe vaktuṃ guṇānāṃ te guṇodadhe / HV_App.I,20.1043 /
GE07hv_apppu:5294: kiṃ tv adbhutam idaṃ loke mānavendreṣu bhūtale / HV_App.I,20.1047 /
GE07hv_apppu:5295: na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyaṃ ca śakrād āsanam āgatam // HV_App.I,20.1048 //
GE07hv_apppu:5296: sabhāvataraṇaṃ caiva kalaśair āgataṃ svayam / HV_App.I,20.1049 /
GE07hv_apppu:5297: na śrutaṃ na ca dṛṣṭaṃ vā tena manyāmahe 'dbhutam // HV_App.I,20.1050 //
GE07hv_apppu:5298: dhanyā devī mahābhāgā devakī yoṣitāṃ varā / HV_App.I,20.1051 /
GE07hv_apppu:5299: bhavantaṃ tridaśaśreṣṭhaṃ bhṛtvā garbheṇa keśavam // HV_App.I,20.1052 //
GE07hv_apppu:5300: [k: D2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5303: iti saṃjalpamānānāṃ śṛṇvantau pṛthag īritam / HV_App.I,20.1053 /
GE07hv_apppu:5305: prākāradvāri saṃprāptā+ +varcayām āsa vai tadā / HV_App.I,20.1055 /
GE07hv_apppu:5306: argham ācamanaṃ dattvā pādyṃ pādyeti cābravīt // HV_App.I,20.1056 //
GE07hv_apppu:5307: ugrasenas tato dhīmān keśavasya rathāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,20.1057 /
GE07hv_apppu:5308: praṇamya śirasā kṛṣṇaṃ ratham āruhya vīryavān // HV_App.I,20.1058 //
GE07hv_apppu:5310: dhanaughair varṣamāṇas tu saṃprāptāḥ pitṛveśmani // HV_App.I,20.1060 //
GE07hv_apppu:5312: rājendratvam anuprāpya na yuktaṃ pitṛveśmani / HV_App.I,20.1062 /
GE07hv_apppu:5313: sthāpitaṃ devarājena dattaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prabho // HV_App.I,20.1063 //
GE07hv_apppu:5315: prasādayiṣye bhagavan na kopaṃ kartum arhasi // HV_App.I,20.1065 //
GE07hv_apppu:5316: devakī vasudevaś ca rohinī ca viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,20.1066 /
GE07hv_apppu:5317: na kiṃcit karaṇe śaktā harṣaklamavimohitāḥ // HV_App.I,20.1067 //
GE07hv_apppu:5318: kaṃsamātā tato rājann argham ādāya keśavam / HV_App.I,20.1068 /
GE07hv_apppu:5321: ugrasenaṃ samāhūya uvāca ślakṣṇayā girā / HV_App.I,20.1071 /
GE07hv_apppu:5323: na cāhaṃ mathurākāṅkṣī na mayā vittakāṅkṣayā / HV_App.I,20.1072 /
GE07hv_apppu:5324: ghātitau tava putrau tau kālena nidhanaṃ gatau // HV_App.I,20.1073 //
GE07hv_apppu:5325: yajasva vividhān yajñān dadasva vipulaṃ dhanam / HV_App.I,20.1074 /
GE07hv_apppu:5327: tyajasva manasas tāpaṃ kaṃsanāśodbhavaṃ bhayam / HV_App.I,20.1076 /
GE07hv_apppu:5328: nayasva vittanicayaṃ mayā dattaṃ punas tava // HV_App.I,20.1077 //
GE07hv_apppu:5329: iti prāśvāsya rājānaṃ kṛṣṇo 'tha halinā saha / HV_App.I,20.1078 /
GE07hv_apppu:5330: praviveśa tataḥ śrīmān mātāpitror athāntakam // HV_App.I,20.1079 //
GE07hv_apppu:5332: pitṛmātros tu pādau vai namaś cakratur ānatau // HV_App.I,20.1081 //
GE07hv_apppu:5333: tasmin muhūrte nagarī mathurā tu babhūva sā / HV_App.I,20.1082 /
GE07hv_apppu:5336: manasā cintayām āsur devalokaṃ na bhūtalam // HV_App.I,20.1085 //
GE07hv_apppu:5337: visṛjya mathureśaṃ tu mahiṣīsahitaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,20.1086 /
GE07hv_apppu:5339: nyastaśastrāv ubhau vīrau tasthatuḥ svairacāriṇau / HV_App.I,20.1088 /
GE07hv_apppu:5340: tataḥ kṛtāhnikau bhūtvā sukhāsīnau kathāntare // HV_App.I,20.1089 //
GE07hv_apppu:5341: etasminn eva kāle tu mahotpāto babhūva ha / HV_App.I,20.1090 /
GE07hv_apppu:5342: babhramuś ca ghanākāśe celuś cāvaniparvatāḥ // HV_App.I,20.1091 //
GE07hv_apppu:5343: samudrāḥ kṣobhitāḥ sarve vibhrāntā bhogināṃ varāḥ / HV_App.I,20.1092 /
GE07hv_apppu:5344: kampitā yādavāḥ sarve nyubjāś ca patitā bhūvi / HV_App.I,20.1093 /
GE07hv_apppu:5345: tau tān nipatitān dṛṣṭvā rāmakṛṣṇau ca niścalau / HV_App.I,20.1094 /
GE07hv_apppu:5348: praṇamya śirasā tābhyāṃ saumyarūpī kṛtāsanaḥ // HV_App.I,20.1097 //
GE07hv_apppu:5349: taṃ dṛṣṭvā samanuprāptaṃ sacivaṃ sāṃparāyikam / HV_App.I,20.1098 /
GE07hv_apppu:5353: tam uvāca tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sthitaṃ deham ivāparam / HV_App.I,20.1102 /
GE07hv_apppu:5356: tatra gatvā sukhāsīnā mantrayāmo manogatam // HV_App.I,20.1105 //
GE07hv_apppu:5358: vainateyatṛtīyau ca guhyaṃ mantram amantrayan // HV_App.I,20.1107 //
GE07hv_apppu:5359: avadhyo 'sau kṛto 'smākaṃ sumahac ca ripor balam / HV_App.I,20.1108 /
GE07hv_apppu:5360: kṛtaḥ sainyakṣayaś cāpi mahān iti narādhipaiḥ // HV_App.I,20.1109 //
GE07hv_apppu:5361: balāni ca sasainyāni hantuṃ varṣaśatair api / HV_App.I,20.1110 /
GE07hv_apppu:5362: na śakṣyāmaḥ kṣayaṃ netuṃ jarāsaṃdhasya vāhinīm // HV_App.I,20.1111 //
GE07hv_apppu:5363: ato 'rthaṃ vainateya tvāṃ bravīmi mathurāṃ purīm / HV_App.I,20.1112 /
GE07hv_apppu:5364: vasator āvayoḥ śreyo na bhaved iti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,20.1113 //
GE07hv_apppu:5367: vāsārtham īkṣituṃ bhūmiṃ tava deva kuśasthalīm // HV_App.I,20.1115 //
GE07hv_apppu:5368: gatvāhaṃ khe samāsthāya samantād avalokya tām / HV_App.I,20.1116 /
GE07hv_apppu:5369: dṛṣṭvā vai vibudhaśreṣṭha purīṃ lakṣaṇapūjitām // HV_App.I,20.1117 //
GE07hv_apppu:5384: raivataṃ ca giriśreṣṭhaṃ kuru deva surālayam / HV_App.I,20.1132 /
GE07hv_apppu:5386: kārayitvādhivāsaṃ taṃ tatra gatvā surottama / HV_App.I,20.1134 /
GE07hv_apppu:5387: kumārāṇāṃ pracāraś ca suramānyo bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,20.1135 //
GE07hv_apppu:5388: nāmnā dvāravatī nāma triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā / HV_App.I,20.1136 /
GE07hv_apppu:5390: yadi syāt saṃvṛtāṃ bhūmiṃ pradāsyati mahodadhiḥ / HV_App.I,20.1138 /
GE07hv_apppu:5391: yatheṣṭaṃ vividhaṃ karma viśvakarmā kariṣyati // HV_App.I,20.1139 //
GE07hv_apppu:5401: evaṃ kṛtvātha saṃjalpaṃ vainateyo 'tha keśavam / HV_App.I,20.1146 /
GE07hv_apppu:5402: praṇamya śirasā tābhyāṃ niṣasāda kṛtāsanaḥ // HV_App.I,20.1147 //
GE07hv_apppu:5403: kṛṣṇo 'pi rāmasahito vicintya hitam īritam / HV_App.I,20.1148 /
GE07hv_apppu:5404: prakāśaṃ kartukāmau tau visṛjya vinatātmajam // HV_App.I,20.1149 //
GE07hv_apppu:5407: praviveśa balī śrīmān svapitur bhavanaṃ nṛpa / **HV_App.I,20.1150**33:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5408: modete sukhinau tatra devaloke yathāmarau // HV_App.I,20.1151 //
GE07hv_apppu:5409: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā bhojarājo mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,20.1152 /
GE07hv_apppu:5410: kṛṣṇaṃ snehena visrabdhaṃ babhāṣe vacanāmṛtam // HV_App.I,20.1153 //
GE07hv_apppu:5411: krṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇa mahābāho yadūnāṃ nandivardhana / HV_App.I,20.1154 /
GE07hv_apppu:5412: śrūyatāṃ yad ahaṃ tvādya vakṣyāmi ripusūdana // HV_App.I,20.1155 //
GE07hv_apppu:5413: tvayā vihīnāḥ sarve sma na śaktāḥ sukham āsitum / HV_App.I,20.1156 /
GE07hv_apppu:5414: pure 'smin viṣayānte vā patihīnā iva striyaḥ // HV_App.I,20.1157 //
GE07hv_apppu:5415: tvatsanāthā vayaṃ tāta tvadbāhubalam āśritāḥ / HV_App.I,20.1158 /
GE07hv_apppu:5416: bibhīmo na narendrāṇāṃ sendrāṇām api mānada // HV_App.I,20.1159 //
GE07hv_apppu:5417: vijayāya yaduśreṣṭha yatra yatra gāmiṣyasi / HV_App.I,20.1160 /
GE07hv_apppu:5418: tatra tvaṃ sahito 'smābhir gacchethā yādavarṣabha // HV_App.I,20.1161 //
GE07hv_apppu:5419: tasya rājño vacaḥ śrutvā sasmitaṃ devakīsutaḥ / HV_App.I,20.1162 /
GE07hv_apppu:5420: yatheṣṭaṃ bhavatām adya tathā kartāsmy asaṃśayam / HV_App.I,20.1163 /
GE07hv_apppu:5422: [h: HV (CE) chapter 9210, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic,
GE07hv_apppu:5425: [k: After adhy. 87.28, D6 S (except G2) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5426: yathārhaṃ ca yathāyogaṃ praśrayaṃ pradadau nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,21.1 //
GE07hv_apppu:5427: vivāhaṃ ghoṣayām āsa śiśupālasya māgadhaḥ / HV_App.I,21.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:5428: sarvamantaḥ puraṃ caiva vivāhe sotsukaṃ kila // HV_App.I,21.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:5429: śvobhūte tu vivāhaḥ syāc caidyasyeti ca bhūmipāḥ / HV_App.I,21.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:5431: śiśupālo 'pi rājā tu varaveṣeṇa saṃyutaḥ // HV_App.I,21.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:5432: kumārair ātmatulyaiś ca niyamastho 'bhavat tadā // HV_App.I,21.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:5435: etasminn eva kāle tu nārado munisattamaḥ / HV_App.I,21.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:5436: pṛthivyāṃ paryaṭann eko vīṇāsaktakaras tadā // HV_App.I,21.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:5437: dvāravatyāṃ tato viṣṇuṃ nivasantaṃ yadūttamam / HV_App.I,21.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:5438: sabhājayañ jagannāthaṃ prāpto dvāravatīṃ kila / HV_App.I,21.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:5439: praviśya ca purīṃ ramyāṃ keśavenābhipūjitaḥ // HV_App.I,21.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:5440: tasyām eva sabhāyāṃ tu yadubhir vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,21.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:5442: tadabhyāśe sthitaṃ rāmam ugrasenaṃ ca sātyakim / HV_App.I,21.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:5443: anyān api yadūn sarvān dadarśa muditān mahān // HV_App.I,21.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:5444: taṃ dṛṣṭvā yādavāḥ sarve pratyujjagmuḥ sasaṃbhramam // HV_App.I,21.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:5445: bhagavān api govindo rāmeṇa saha keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,21.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:5446: upatasthe yathāyogam argham ādāya cāsanam / HV_App.I,21.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:5447: idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam ity ūce taṃ munīśvaram // HV_App.I,21.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:5448: tac ca sarvaṃ yathāprāptam upayujya munīśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,21.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:5449: āsane ca samāsthāya nyaṣīdan muditas tadā // HV_App.I,21.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:5450: āsanasthaṃ muniśreṣṭhaṃ yādavāḥ sarva eva te / HV_App.I,21.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:5451: āsanāni yathāyogaṃ prāpnuvan svāni sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,21.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5452: keśavo 'pi ca dharmātmā rāmeṇa saha saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,21.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:5454: uvāca ca muniśreṣṭhaṃ vīṇāsaktam asaṅgagam // HV_App.I,21.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:5455: kuśalaṃ sarvakāryeṣu vada kiṃ munisattama / HV_App.I,21.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:5456: api te kuśalaṃ vipra tapaso munisattama // HV_App.I,21.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:5457: kuśalaṃ tava vīṇāyā vada vipra yathātatham // HV_App.I,21.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:5458: jagatām adya viprendra kā vārtā vada me prabho // HV_App.I,21.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:5459: atha vā kuśalaṃ nāma yuṣmākaṃ niyatātmanām / HV_App.I,21.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:5460: diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si saṃprāptaḥ pāvayānaś ca no vibho // HV_App.I,21.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:5461: prītā vayaṃ muniśreṣṭha pūtāś caiva tvadāgamāt / HV_App.I,21.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:5462: adyeyaṃ yādavakulaṃ loke khyātiṃ prayāsyati / HV_App.I,21.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:5463: tvādṛśāṃ puṇyakīrtīnāṃ saṃyogād vada sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,21.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:5464: ādyo hi munimukhyānāṃ bhavāṃl loke prathiṣyati / HV_App.I,21.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:5465: dhanyāḥ khalu vayaṃ vipra yato dṛṣṭās tvayā vibho / HV_App.I,21.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:5466: evamādi jagannāthaḥ kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭavān munim // HV_App.I,21.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:5467: tac chrutvā kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / HV_App.I,21.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:5468: muniḥ prītamanā bhūtvā provāca yadusaṃsadi // HV_App.I,21.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:5469: rāmeṇa saṃgataṃ kṛṣṇam ūrdhvabāhum avasthitam / HV_App.I,21.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:5470: sarvāṃs tahtā yadūn vipraḥ samābhāṣya vacas tadā // HV_App.I,21.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:5471: kim ayaṃ kuśalapraśnaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇa mayi prabho / HV_App.I,21.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:5472: na yuktaṃ pratibhāty etad devadeva jagatpate // HV_App.I,21.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:5473: yatas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānām ādiḥ kuśaladas tadā / HV_App.I,21.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:5474: tvadicchayā jagat sarvaṃ kuśale viniyujyate // HV_App.I,21.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:5475: vayaṃ tu devadeveśa nityaṃ kuśalino hare / HV_App.I,21.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:5476: tathā hi mūlabhṛtyā vai viṣṇo tava yuge yuge // HV_App.I,21.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:5477: idaṃ tu citraṃ deveśa yad uktaṃ bhavato hare / HV_App.I,21.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:5478: pāvayāna iti śrīmaṃl lokanātha sureśvara // HV_App.I,21.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:5479: tvaṃ hi śuddhaḥ sadā yogī pūtaḥ kila mamāgamāt / HV_App.I,21.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:5480: kim anyad vada deveśa prasādāt tava mānada // HV_App.I,21.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:5481: prasādāt iśayād etad yuktaṃ vaktuṃ jagatpate / HV_App.I,21.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:5482: idaṃ niścitavān adya prasanno mayi mānada // HV_App.I,21.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:5483: sarvathā kṛtakṛtyo 'smi dṛṣṭo yena tvayā vibho / HV_App.I,21.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:5484: prītir me hy atulā viṣṇo tava saṃdarśanena hi // HV_App.I,21.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:5485: ity uktvā sa jagannāthaṃ bhūyaḥ stotuṃ pracakrame / HV_App.I,21.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:5486: purāṇajñaḥ sadā vipro munīnām ādir avyayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:5487: tattvārthavit tadā viṣṇoḥ sākṣād vedārthatattvavit / HV_App.I,21.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:5488: ādāya nihitāṃ vīnāṃ saṃsthāpya layam uttamam // HV_App.I,21.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:5491: [k: Pāda b begins with three stars in the original,
GE07hv_apppu:5492: probably marking lacuna. The numbering of *--passages continues from app. 20. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5493: tantrīṃ ca sudṛḍhāṃ kṛtvā jagau geyair jagatpatim / HV_App.I,21.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:5496: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya haraye vedhase bhūtadhāriṇe / HV_App.I,21.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:5497: devadeva jagannātha namas te cakradhāriṇe // HV_App.I,21.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:5499: namas te sakaleśāya nirguṇāya guṇātmane // HV_App.I,21.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:5501: namas te kroḍarūpāya daṃṣṭrayā kṣitidhāraṇe // HV_App.I,21.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:5503: trivikrama namas tubhyaṃ trayīrūpa janārdana // HV_App.I,21.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:5506: udgīthāya namas tubhyaṃ rathaṃtara namo 'stu te / HV_App.I,21.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:5507: yaṃ vidur vedatattvajñā brahmādyāḥ sanakādayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:5509: so 'si deva jagannātha yo dṛṣṭo brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,21.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:5510: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante yogino yatacetasaḥ / HV_App.I,21.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:5511: so 'si deva purāṇātmaṃs tubhyaṃ deva namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,21.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:5512: tvām āhuḥ sakalā vedā brahmeti jñānaniścaye / HV_App.I,21.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:5513: tvamevedaṃ jagatsarvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // HV_App.I,21.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:5514: tvanmāyāpaṭalacchannāḥ prāṇinaḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,21.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:5515: ahaṃ mānakṛtā bhraṣṭrāḥ patanti narakeṣu ca / HV_App.I,21.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:5516: ye ca tvāṃ viṣṇur ity āhus te ca tvāṃ yānti yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,21.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:5517: ye tu jñānasahā martyā vedāntajñānabṛṃhitāḥ / HV_App.I,21.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:5518: te tu tvāṃ devadeveśa praviśanti purātanam // HV_App.I,21.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:5519: tavaiṣā bhagavan māyā yām āśritya jaganmayīm / HV_App.I,21.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:5520: prāṇino niḥśvasanti sma duḥsahā sā hi nityaśaḥ / HV_App.I,21.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:5521: vihāraḥ sarva evaiṣa prāṇinām udayāya hi // HV_App.I,21.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:5522: pūrvamāsīj jagannātha vārāha iti saṃjñitaḥ / HV_App.I,21.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:5523: adadhā bhūtadhātrīṃ tvaṃ prāṇināṃ ca hitāya hi / HV_App.I,21.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:5524: punar aśvaśirā bhūtvā vedān āhṛtya tiṣṭhasi // HV_App.I,21.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:5525: āsīr vāmanarūpas tvam abadhnā balim adhvare / HV_App.I,21.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:5526: āhṛtya rājyaṃ tasmāt tvam indrāya prāhiṇor vibho // HV_App.I,21.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:5527: abhūs tvaṃ nārasiṃhaś ca hatavān daityapuṃgavam // HV_App.I,21.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:5528: raghoratha jagannātha vaṃśe vaṃśavatāṃ vara / HV_App.I,21.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:5529: āsīś ca rāmasaṃjñas tvaṃ rāvaṇaṃ hatavān vibho / HV_App.I,21.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:5530: niṣkaṇṭakam imaṃ lokam akaror devasattama // HV_App.I,21.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:5531: abhūś ca jāmadagnyas tvaṃ gṛhītvā paraśuṃ prabho / HV_App.I,21.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:5532: hatavāṃs tvaṃ mahāvīryaṃ kṛtavīryasutaṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,21.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:5533: niḥkṣatriyam imaṃ lokam adadāḥ kāśyapāya vai // HV_App.I,21.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:5534: idānīm api govinda lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā / HV_App.I,21.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:5535: mānuṣaṃ vapur āsthāya dvāravatyāṃ pratiṣṭhasi // HV_App.I,21.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:5536: hatavān pūtanāṃ bālye gokule viharan prabho / HV_App.I,21.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:5537: arjunau hatavān bhūyo baddho lūkhalasaṃpuṭaḥ // HV_App.I,21.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:5538: punaś ca krīḍatā viṣṇo tvayaiva nihato hayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:5539: adadhās tvaṃ punaḥ śailaṃ gavāṃ saṃrakṣaṇāya hi / HV_App.I,21.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:5541: nanarta bhagavān bhūyo yamunāyā hrade hare / HV_App.I,21.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:5542: akaroḥ kāliyaṃ viṣṇo vimadaṃ yamunātaṭe // HV_App.I,21.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:5543: raṅgamadhye hatau viṣṇo tvayā cāṇūramuṣṭikau / HV_App.I,21.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:5544: duḥsahaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ hatavān kaṃsam ojasā // HV_App.I,21.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:5546: sa idānīṃ sthito rājye tvām āśrityendravad divi // HV_App.I,21.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:5547: kim anena jagannātha sarvaṃ tvadvaśagaṃ jagat / HV_App.I,21.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:5549: namas te devadeveśa namo bhūyo namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,21.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:5550: iti stutvā jagannātham upāraṃsīt sa nāradaḥ / HV_App.I,21.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:5551: tac chrutvā yādavāḥ sarve paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,21.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:5552: manasā tuṣṭuvur viṣṇuṃ nāradāc chrutavistarāḥ / HV_App.I,21.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:5553: dhanyā vayaṃ jagannātham āśritya sukhinas tathā / HV_App.I,21.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:5554: nirvṛtā vayam eveti nāradaṃ ca śaśaṃsire // HV_App.I,21.122 //
GE07hv_apppu:5555: punaḥ prītiyutāḥ sarve vilokya ca parasparam / HV_App.I,21.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:5556: dhanyā vayaṃ punar dhanyā dhanyānām agrataḥ sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,21.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:5559: kimartham iha saṃprāpto vada nārada sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,21.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:5560: alam etaiḥ stutipadair yathārthair vāpi nārada // HV_App.I,21.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:5561: tvad āgamanajaṃ vipra tatkāryaṃ vada sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,21.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:5562: kutūhalaṃ mama vibho vṛṣṇīnāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,21.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:5566: arcayitvā haraṃ śarvaṃ dakṣine sāgare vibhum // HV_App.I,21.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:5568: tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ devadeveśa vasantaṃ vṛṣṇisaṃsadi // HV_App.I,21.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:5569: vindhyasya dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gatavān bhīṣmapālitām / HV_App.I,21.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:5570: praviśya ca purīṃ tāṃ tu vidarbhasya mahīpateḥ / HV_App.I,21.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:5572: tatra dṛṣṭo hṛṣīkeśa rājñāṃ samudayo mahān // HV_App.I,21.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:5573: jarāsaṃdhaṃ puraskṛtya rājānaḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,21.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:5574: yathāsukhaṃ yathāyogaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ keśava māciram // HV_App.I,21.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:5575: śiśupālo hi nṛpatiś cedīnām īśvaraś ca saḥ / HV_App.I,21.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:5576: pauṇḍrako vāsudevaś ca nityaṃ tvāṃ dveṣṭi yo vibho // HV_App.I,21.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:5577: drṣṭaś cātha mayā rājā bhīṣmako mābravīd vacaḥ / HV_App.I,21.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:5578: śiśupālasya viprarṣe rukmiṇyā saha saṃgamaḥ / HV_App.I,21.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:5579: bhavitā śvaḥ prabhāte tu tadarthaṃ rājasaṃgamaḥ // HV_App.I,21.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:5580: tac chrutvā tvarito deva prāptas tvāṃ vṛṣṇipuṃgava / HV_App.I,21.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:5581: tad gaccha vṛṣṇibhiḥ sārdhaṃ nagaraṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,21.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:5582: gṛhāṇa rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇa jitvā nṛpatipuṃgavān // HV_App.I,21.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:5583: śiśupālo 'tha rājā tu varaveṣeṇa viṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,21.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:5584: udvaheta jagannātha yadi rājā sa rukmiṇīm / HV_App.I,21.149 /
GE07hv_apppu:5585: akṛtyam ayaśasyaṃ ca bhavato nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:5586: yācitā sā bhavadbhis tu na dattā bhīṣmakeṇa hi // HV_App.I,21.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:5587: ārakṣako jarāsaṃdhaḥ pauṇḍraś ca nṛpapuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,21.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:5588: ekalavyo hṛṣīkeśa rukmī tasya tu dāsyati // HV_App.I,21.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:5589: bhavantaṃ yaḥ sadā dveṣṭi na tvāmāhvayati prabho // HV_App.I,21.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:5590: jarāsaṃdhas tu vṛṣṇīnāṃ sadā dveṣṭā na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,21.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:5591: tad gacchatu bhavāñ śīghraṃ yānair aśvair gajair api // HV_App.I,21.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:5592: ugrasenaṃ puraskṛtya sātyakiṃ ca mahābalam / HV_App.I,21.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:5593: tām ādāya jagannātha gatvā yāsyasi māciram // HV_App.I,21.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:5594: sā ca dṛṣṭā hṛṣīkeśa śokopahatacetanā / HV_App.I,21.159 /
GE07hv_apppu:5595: tvayy eva mana ādhāya sadā tvāṃ smarati prabho // HV_App.I,21.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:5596: yadi bhartā bhavec caidyaḥ syān mṛtā rukmiṇī hare / HV_App.I,21.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:5597: ujjīvaya hare viṣṇo rukmiṇīṃ rukmabhūṣaṇām // HV_App.I,21.162 //
GE07hv_apppu:5598: ity ahaṃ deva saṃprāptaḥ kṛtyaśeṣaṃ vicintyatām / HV_App.I,21.163 /
GE07hv_apppu:5599: na kiṃcid api duḥsādhyaṃ cakrapāṇe hare tava // HV_App.I,21.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:5600: sādhayāmo vayaṃ deva gacchet yuktvā jagāma saḥ // HV_App.I,21.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:5603: ity uktvā nārade yāte brahmalokaṃ sanātanam / HV_App.I,21.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:5604: vāsudevas tu dharmātmā yadūnām agraṇīr hariḥ // HV_App.I,21.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:5605: gamanāya matiṃ cakre rukmiṇyāharaṇe tadā / HV_App.I,21.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:5606: uvāca ca yadūn sarvān sajjībhavata māciram // HV_App.I,21.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:5607: asminn eva muhūrte tu yāsyāmaḥ kuṇḍinaṃ prati / HV_App.I,21.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:5608: rathamānaya me śīghraṃ sārathe dāruka prabho // HV_App.I,21.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:5609: āruhyantāṃ rathā aśvā gajāś ca parikalpitāḥ // HV_App.I,21.172 //
GE07hv_apppu:5610: agrataś cāstu no vīraḥ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ / HV_App.I,21.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:5611: madhyato balabhadras tu rājā caiva tu pṛṣṭhataḥ // HV_App.I,21.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:5612: ahaṃ khaḍgī gadī cakrī śārṅgī śāṅkhī talatravān / HV_App.I,21.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:5613: ratham āsthāya gacchāmi dārukeṇa sahāyavān // HV_App.I,21.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:5616: badhvā vā bhīṣmakaṃ saṃkhye hatvā caiva tu rukmiṇam / HV_App.I,21.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:5617: ānayiṣyāmi tāṃ rājan rukmiṇīṃ matpriyāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,21.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:5618: sajjībhavantu rājāno rathair aśvair gajais tathā / HV_App.I,21.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:5619: kiṃ vilambatha rājāno yāsyāmaḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,21.182 /
GE07hv_apppu:5620: ity uktvā vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve gamanāyopacakrire // HV_App.I,21.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:5621: kṛṣṇasyājñāṃ puraskṛtya sarve te yadupuṃgavāḥ / HV_App.I,21.184 /
GE07hv_apppu:5622: rathān āruhya yātās te saṃnaddhāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:5623: sātyakis tu mahārāja ratham āruhya daṃśitaḥ / HV_App.I,21.186 /
GE07hv_apppu:5624: dhanvī khaṅgī rathī bāṇī sainyāgre pratyadṛśyata / HV_App.I,21.187 /
GE07hv_apppu:5625: baladevo 'pi dharmātmā gajam āruhya daṃśitaḥ // HV_App.I,21.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:5626: sainyamadhye mahārāja mṛgamadhye yathā hariḥ // HV_App.I,21.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:5627: bhagavān api govindo rathaṃ dārukasaṃskṛtam / HV_App.I,21.190 /
GE07hv_apppu:5628: āruhya sahasā viṣṇur dārukeṇa samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,21.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:5629: gantum aichaj jagannātho hartuṃ bhojapateḥ sutām // HV_App.I,21.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:5631: samāśvastā tadā sā tu sa ca rājā suduḥkhitaḥ // HV_App.I,21.194 //
GE07hv_apppu:5633: āhatya duṃdubhīn sarve śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak / HV_App.I,21.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:5634: krameṇaiva gatās te tu bhīṣmakasya purīṃ prati // HV_App.I,21.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:5635: [h: HV (CE) chapter 9220, transliterated by Kreṣimir Krnic,
GE07hv_apppu:5639: pitṛṣv asuḥ priyārthaṃ ca rāmakṛṣṇāv ubhāv api / HV_App.I,22.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5640: prayayur vṛṣṇayaś cānye mānyās tejobalānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,22.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5641: dṛṣṭvā tān āgatān sarvān vāsudevapurogamān / HV_App.I,22.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:5643: pūjayām āsa pūjārhān niviṣṭān bahir eva tān / HV_App.I,22.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:5644: nyaveśayac ca tān sarvān bhīṣmako nagarād bahiḥ // HV_App.I,22.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:5645: sthite tasmiñ jarāsaṃdhe ripau teṣāṃ mahātmani / HV_App.I,22.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:5646: saṃbhārās tatra sarvatra vivāhāya samāhṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,22.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5647: śaṅkhāś ca paṭahāś caiva sasvanuḥ sarvatas tadā / HV_App.I,22.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:5648: brāhmaṇāś ca samāyātā nānādigbhyas tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,22.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:5649: ucchritāś caiva sarvatra dhvajā vai samalaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,22.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:5650: śvobhāvini vivāhe tu rukmiṇī niryayau bahiḥ / HV_App.I,22.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:5653: keśavo me bhaved bhartā nānyaḥ kaścid bhaved iti / HV_App.I,22.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:5654: evaṃ manasi saṃkalpaṃ kurvatī rukmiṇī śubhā / HV_App.I,22.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:5655: dīpyamānena vapuṣā balena mahatā vṛtā // HV_App.I,22.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:5656: tāṃ dadarśa tadā kṛṣṇo lakṣmīṃ sākṣād iva sthitām / HV_App.I,22.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:5658: vahner iva śikhāṃ dīptāṃ māyāṃ bhūmigatām iva / HV_App.I,22.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:5659: pṛthivīm iva gambhīrām utthitāṃ dharaṇītalāt // HV_App.I,22.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:5660: marīcim iva somasya saumyāṃ strīvigrahām iva / HV_App.I,22.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:5661: vinā padmaṃ śriyam iva bhujiṣyāstrīsahāyinīm // HV_App.I,22.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:5662: kṛṣṇena manasā dṛṣṭā durnirīkṣyā surair api // HV_App.I,22.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5663: śyāmāvadātā sā hy āsīt pṛthucārvañcitekṣaṇā / HV_App.I,22.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:5668: nāsty anyā pramadā loke rūpeṇa yaśasā śriyā / HV_App.I,22.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:5670: tāṃ dṛṣṭvāṃ vavṛdhe kāmaḥ kṛṣṇasya priyadarśanām / HV_App.I,22.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:5672: rukmiṇī ca tathā devī dadṛśe kṛṣṇam īśvaram / HV_App.I,22.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:5673: acintayac ca sā devī dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇam avasthitam / HV_App.I,22.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:5674: so 'yaṃ viṣṇur jagannāthaḥ sākṣād rāmānujaḥ kṛtī // HV_App.I,22.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:5675: asya cakraṃ sadā śaṅkho bhujayor ubhayor api / HV_App.I,22.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:5676: śobhayetāṃ sadā tau tu daityadānavadāriṇau // HV_App.I,22.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:5677: asya haste sthitaṃ śārṅgaṃ daityadānavabhīṣaṇam / HV_App.I,22.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:5678: sadā bhāti mahācāpaṃ loke khyātataraṃ hareḥ // HV_App.I,22.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:5679: yamāśritya sadā devaṃ gadā kaumodakīti sā / HV_App.I,22.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:5681: yad anujñāṃ samāśritya khaḍgo nandakasaṃjñitaḥ / HV_App.I,22.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:5682: ripūn hanti mahāvīryān asahyān daivatair api // HV_App.I,22.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:5683: asyābhūd vāhanaṃ viṣṇor garutmān pakṣipuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,22.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:5685: so 'yaṃ viṣṇur vibhuḥ sākṣād gopaveṣavibhūṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,22.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:5686: gopastrīs tan abhāreṣu vijahāra yathāsukham // HV_App.I,22.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:5687: yo nanarta hrade tasyā yamunāyās tadā hariḥ / HV_App.I,22.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:5689: ayaṃ govardhanaṃ śailaṃ dadhāraikena pāṇinā / HV_App.I,22.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:5690: līlayā sa jagannātho golakaṃ bālako yathā // HV_App.I,22.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:5691: ayaṃ sa puṇḍarīkākṣo yo gajaṃ prajaghāna ha // HV_App.I,22.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:5692: yaś cāṇūraṃ mṛdhe hatvā kaṃsaṃ caiva mahābalam / HV_App.I,22.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:5693: nanarta raṅge govindo gopaiḥ sārdhaṃ sayādavaiḥ // HV_App.I,22.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:5695: śyāmāvadātaḥ saśrīkaḥ sākṣād indrānujaḥ kṛtī / HV_App.I,22.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:5696: yuvā hariḥ purāṇātmā padmākṣaḥ padmasaprabhaḥ // HV_App.I,22.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:5697: so 'yam adya jagannāthaḥ prāpto mām iha yādavaḥ / HV_App.I,22.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:5698: amuṣya pādayoryugmam udvahāmi na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,22.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:5700: evaṃ vicintayitvā sā vavande taṃ śacīṃ tadā // HV_App.I,22.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:5701: rāmeṇa saha niścitya keśavas tu mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,22.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:5702: tatpramāthe 'karod buddhiṃ vṛṣṇibhiḥ praṇidhāya ca // HV_App.I,22.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:5703: kṛtvā tu devakāryāṇi niṣkrāmantīṃ surālayāt // HV_App.I,22.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:5704: unmathya sahasā kṛṣṇaḥ svaṃ nināya rathottamam // HV_App.I,22.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:5706: samanahyanta dāśārhās tad ājñāya tu sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,22.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:5708: vājibhir vāraṇaiś caiva parivavrur halāyudham // HV_App.I,22.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:5709: ādāya rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo jagāmāśu puraṃ prati / HV_App.I,22.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:5710: rāme tv āsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yuyudhāne ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,22.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:5711: akrūre vipṛthau caiva gade ca kṛtavarmaṇi / HV_App.I,22.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:5712: vasudeve sudeve ca sāraṇe ca mahābale // HV_App.I,22.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:5714: ugrasenātmaje kahve śatadyumne ca keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,22.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:5715: rājādhideve mṛdare prasene citrake tathā / HV_App.I,22.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:5716: agnidatte bṛhaddurge śvaphalke satyake pṛthau // HV_App.I,22.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:5718: gurum āsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yayau dvāravatīṃ prati // HV_App.I,22.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:5719: te cāpi yādavāḥ sarve yuddhāya samupasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,22.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:5721: [h: HV (CE) App. 22A, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic,
GE07hv_apppu:5726: balabhadrahatāḥ śiṣṭāḥ puruṣās tatra rakṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5727: nyavedayanta tad vṛttaṃ jarāsaṃdhāya mānada // HV_App.I,22A.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5728: rukmiṇe bhīṣmakāyāpi pauṇḍrāya ca mahātmane / HV_App.I,22A.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:5729: dantavaktrāya śūrāya caidyāya ca sumedhase // HV_App.I,22A.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:5731: anyebhyaś cāpi rājabhyaḥ praśaśaṃsur yathātatham // HV_App.I,22A.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:5732: śrutyaivaṃ tan nṛpabalaṃ vivāhārthaṃ samāgatam / HV_App.I,22A.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:5733: kṣubdhaṃ narāvarānīkaṃ śirasi prahṛtaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,22A.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5734: cacāla rājakaḥ sarvas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:5735: aho vīryam aho dhairyaṃ kṛṣṇasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:5736: hatā vayaṃ nirānandā avajñātāś ca savaśaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:5737: ity ūcus te nṛpatayo māgadhapramukhās tadā // HV_App.I,22A.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:5739: uvāca rājñas tān sarvān māgadhaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:5740: niṣpīḍya caraṇau rājā dantān kaṭakaṭāpayan // HV_App.I,22A.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:5741: śrūyatāṃ mama vākyāni rājānaḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,22A.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:5742: eṣa gopakadāyādo yat karoti mamāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,22A.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:5743: tasyādya phalabhākso æstu yadi jīvāmi bhūmipāḥ // HV_App.I,22A.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:5744: eṣo æhaṃ sagaṇaṃ hatvā gopālaṃ nṛpasaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,22A.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:5745: dvārakāṃ yādavapurīṃ bhaṅktvānīya ca rukmiṇīm // HV_App.I,22A.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:5746: dāsyāmi nṛpatiśreṣṭhāḥ kiṃ tiṣṭhatha vilambatha / HV_App.I,22A.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:5747: saṃnahyantāṃ rathaśreṣṭhā ratha āyātu me tvarāt // HV_App.I,22A.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:5748: ityuktvā sa jarāsaṃdhaḥ siṃhanādam athākarot / HV_App.I,22A.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:5749: cacāla ca balaṃ sarvaṃ jarāsaṃdhapriye sthitam // HV_App.I,22A.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5751: āhatya tu sabhāstambhaṃ jarāsaṃdham abhāṣata // HV_App.I,22A.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:5752: sthātavyaṃ bhavatā rājan sthite mayi narādhipa / HV_App.I,22A.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:5753: bhṛtyo æsmi tava rājendra kim etat sāhasaṃ tava // HV_App.I,22A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:5754: sthite bhṛtye kathaṃ svāmī kāryaṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:5757: aham ekaḥ sa evaikaḥ kṛṣṇo gopakakilbiṣaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:5758: hatvā taṃ gopakaṃ yuddhe balabhadrasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,22A.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:5759: aṅgāni ca mahārāja cūrṇayitvā gadābhṛtam / HV_App.I,22A.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:5760: vṛkebhyo hi prayacchāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,22A.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:5761: aham eva bhaviṣyāmi vāsudevo mahītale / HV_App.I,22A.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:5762: hate tasmiñ jarāsaṃdha gopake mama nāmake // HV_App.I,22A.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:5763: ity uktvā dhanur ādāya jagarja nṛpasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,22A.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:5764: caidyo æpy atha mahārāja sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,22A.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:5766: ādāya parighaṃ ghoram idam āha nṛpottamān // HV_App.I,22A.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:5767: anenaiva tu rājāno yādavān sabalān yudhi / HV_App.I,22A.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:5768: hatvā tu yamarājāya dāsyāmi nṛpapuṃgavāḥ / HV_App.I,22A.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:5769: tiṣṭhadhvam iha rājāno mamaivāyaṃ parābhavaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:5772: tat tu yuktaṃ yadukule kṣatriyā na hi te vibho / HV_App.I,22A.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:5773: viśeṣato ætha gopāle ballaveṣu vivardhite // HV_App.I,22A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:5774: gavāṃ vṛttiṃ tu gopālā vartayanti sadā tathā / HV_App.I,22A.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:5775: kṛṣṇo æpi gokule vṛddho gopaiḥ sahacaraḥ kila // HV_App.I,22A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:5776: paradārābhiyukto hi keśavaḥ satataṃ vibho / HV_App.I,22A.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:5777: sarvathā taṃ durātmānaṃ haniṣye sagaṇaṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,22A.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:5778: tāṃ cānayāmi rājānas tiṣṭhadhvam iha bhūmipāḥ // HV_App.I,22A.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:5779: kva nu te bāndhavās teṣāṃ yānāśritya tu yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,22A.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:5780: avajñāṃ kṛtavanto no yuṣmābhir iha cintyatām // HV_App.I,22A.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:5781: ity uktvātha sa caidyas tu yuddhāya samupasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:5782: te ca sarve nṛpatayaḥ kruddhā yuddhāya daṃśitāḥ / HV_App.I,22A.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:5784: jarāsaṃdho ætha nṛpatī ratham āruhya daṃśitaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:5785: yuddhāya vai mahārāja mano dadhre mahīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:5786: pauṇḍro æpy atha mahārāja vāsudevo mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:5787: ratham āruhya sahasā yuddhāyaiva mano dadhe // HV_App.I,22A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:5788: dantavaktro jarāsaṃdhaḥ śiśupālaś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,22A.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:5789: saṃnaddhā niryayuḥ kruddhā jighāṃsanto janārdanam // HV_App.I,22A.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:5791: niryayau cedirājaś ca bhrātṛbhiḥ saha bandhubhiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:5792: kva vāsudevaḥ kva ca gopakas tathā @ HV_App.I,22A.65 @
GE07hv_apppu:5795: kuto nu vīro yudhi sātyakiḥ kila // HV_App.I,22A.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:5798: śaraiś ca khaḍgair yudhi pātayanto @ HV_App.I,22A.71 @
GE07hv_apppu:5802: atha sainye mahārāja māgadhasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:5804: mādhavo 'pi mahārāja śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pṛthak tadā // HV_App.I,22A.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:5805: bherīṇāṃ ca mṛdaṅgānāṃ jharjharīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:5806: nādāḥ samabhavaṃs tatra yadūnāṃ sainyasaṃcaye // HV_App.I,22A.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:5807: tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat senayor ubhayos tadā / HV_App.I,22A.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:5809: tān pratyagṛhṇāt saṃrabdhān vṛṣṇivīrān mahārathān / HV_App.I,22A.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:5811: taṃ pratyagṛhṇan saṃrabdhā vṛṣṇivīrā mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,22A.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:5812: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtya vāsavaṃ tv amarā iva // HV_App.I,22A.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:5813: āpatantaṃ hi vegena jarāsaṃdhaṃ mahābalam / HV_App.I,22A.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:5814: ṣaḍbhir vivyādha nārācair yuyudhāno mahāmṛdhe // HV_App.I,22A.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:5815: akrūro dantavaktraṃ tu vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:5816: taṃ pratyavidhyat kārūṣo bāṇair daśabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:5817: vipṛthuḥ śiśupālaṃ tu śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:5818: aṣṭabhiḥ pratyavidhyat taṃ śiśupālaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,22A.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:5819: gaveṣaṇo 'pi caidyaṃ tu ṣaḍbhir vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:5820: anirdāntas tathāṣṭābhir bṛhaddurgas tu pañcabhiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:5821: prativivyādha tāṃścaidyaḥ pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:5822: jaghāna cāśvāṃś caturaś caturbhir vipṛthoḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:5823: bṛhaddurgasya bhallena śiraś ciccheda cārihā / HV_App.I,22A.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:5824: vipṛthoḥ sārathiṃ caiva prāhiṇod yamasādanam // HV_App.I,22A.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:5825: hatāśvaṃ tu rathaṃ tyaktvā vipṛthuḥ sumahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:5826: āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ bṛhaddurgasya vīryavān / HV_App.I,22A.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:5827: āruhya javanān aśvān niyantum upacakrame // HV_App.I,22A.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:5828: te kruddhāḥ śaravarṣeṇa sunīthaṃ samavākiran / HV_App.I,22A.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:5831: paṭuśaḥ pañcabhiś cāpi vivyādha yudhi mārgaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:5832: tābhyāṃ sa viddho daśabhir bāṇair marmātigaiḥ śitaiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:5833: tato balī śakradevaṃ bibheda daśabhiḥ krudhā // HV_App.I,22A.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:5834: pañcabhiś cāpi vivyādha so 'vidūrād vidūratham // HV_App.I,22A.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:5835: vidūratho 'pi taṃ ṣaḍbhir vivyādhājau śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:5836: triṃśatā pratyavidhyat taṃ balī bāṇair mahāratham / HV_App.I,22A.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:5837: kṛtavarmā bibhedāśu rājaputraṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:5838: nyahanat sārathiṃ cāsya dhvajaṃ ciccheda sūcchritam / HV_App.I,22A.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:5839: prativivyādha taṃ kruddhaḥ pauṇḍraḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:5840: dhanuś cāsya praciccheda bhallena nataparvaṇā / HV_App.I,22A.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:5841: nikṛttaśatruḥ kāliṅgaṃ bibhedāṅgaṃ ca mārgaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:5842: tomareṇāṃ sadeśe taṃ bibheda ca kaliṅgajaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:5843: gajenāsādya kahvas tu gajam aṅgasya vīryavān // HV_App.I,22A.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:5844: tomareṇa jaghānāśu bibhedāṅgaṃ ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,22A.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:5845: citrakaś ca śvaphalkaś ca sātyakiś ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:5846: kaliṅgasya rathānīkaṃ nārācair bibhiduḥ śitaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:5848: jaghāna rāmaḥ saṃkruddho vaṅgarājaṃ ca saṃyuge // HV_App.I,22A.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:5849: taṃ hatvā gajam āruhya dhanur ādāya vīryavān / HV_App.I,22A.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:5850: saṃkarṣaṇo jaghānograir nārācaiḥ kāśikān bahūn // HV_App.I,22A.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:5851: ṣaḍbhir nihatya kārūṣān maheṣvāsāṃś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,22A.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:5852: śataṃ jaghāna saṃrabdho māgadhānāṃ mahārathaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:5853: nihatya tān mahārāja jarāsaṃdhaṃ tato 'bhyayāt // HV_App.I,22A.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:5854: tam āpanantaṃ vivyādha nārācair māgadhas tribhiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:5856: taṃ bibhedāṣṭabhiḥ kruddho nārācair musalāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:5857: ciccheda cāsya bhallena dhvajaṃ rukmavibhūṣitam / HV_App.I,22A.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:5858: cāpaṃ ca mahādāyattaṃ śarair eva halāyudhaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:5859: rathaṃ cāsya mahārāja tilaśaś ca samāhanat // HV_App.I,22A.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:5860: sa cchinnadhanvā viratho gadāmādāya māgadhaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:5861: vivyādha balabhadraṃ tu ciccheda ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:5862: rathaṃ ca cūrṇayām āsa gadayāsya sa māgadhaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:5863: pātyamāno rathāt tasmād avaplutya halāyudhaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:5864: sātyakes tu rathaṃ prāyāt sarvakṣatrasya paṣyataḥ / HV_App.I,22A.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:5865: sātyakis tu mahārāja śarair vivyādha māgadham // HV_App.I,22A.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:5866: baladevo mahārāja gadāṃ saṃgṛhya satvaram / HV_App.I,22A.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:5867: jaghāna māgadhaṃ saṃkhye vajreṇeva giriṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,22A.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:5868: tad yuddham abhavat teṣāṃ ghoraṃ devāsuropamam / HV_App.I,22A.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:5870: gajair gajāś ca saṃkruddhāḥ saṃnipetuḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:5871: rathā rathais tu saṃrabdhāḥ sādibhiś cāpi sādinaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:5873: chindantaś cottamāṅgāni vinedur yudhi te pṛthak // HV_App.I,22A.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:5875: śarāṇāṃ patatām ājau pakṣiṇām iva śuśruve // HV_App.I,22A.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:5876: bherīśaṅkhamṛdaṅgānāṃ veṇunāṃ ca mṛdhe dhvaniḥ / HV_App.I,22A.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:5877: babhūva ghoṣaḥ śastrāṇāṃ jyāghoṣaś ca mahātmanām // HV_App.I,22A.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:5878: etasminn antare vīro balabhadro mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,22A.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:5879: jaghāna gadayā vīraṃ jarāsaṃdhaṃ mahāmṛdhe / HV_App.I,22A.149 /
GE07hv_apppu:5880: mūrchāṃ jagāma rājā tu nipapāta ca bhūtale // HV_App.I,22A.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:5881: sātyakir vaṅgarājaṃ tu jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:5882: tat sainyaṃ vimukhaṃ cāsīj jarāsaṃdhe nipātite // HV_App.I,22A.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:5883: sātyakir balabhadraś ca jitvā yodhān sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:5884: śaṅkhaṃ dadhmatū rājānau sarveṣām agrataḥ sthitau / HV_App.I,22A.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:5885: tataś ca vidrute sainye jarāsaṃdhe parājite // HV_App.I,22A.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:5886: tayoḥ śaṅkhasvanaṃ śrutvā gacchann eva janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:5888: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,22A.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:5891: [h: HV (CE) chapter 9230, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic,
GE07hv_apppu:5895: alaṃ kurvantu rathyāś ca patākāś caiva sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,23.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5897: sūtāś ca māgadhāś caiva bandinaś ca tathāpare // HV_App.I,23.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:5898: kalaśāś ca prapūryantāṃ sumudrair api vāribhiḥ / HV_App.I,23.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:5899: ucchrīyantāṃ dhvajāḥ sarve āneyā vārayoṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,23.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:5900: purohitāś ca hūyantāṃ kumārāś caiva sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,23.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:5901: āhanyantāṃ mahābheryo mṛdaṅgāḥ sarvataḥ kṣitau // HV_App.I,23.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5902: nṛtyantāṃ nartakāḥ sarve gāyantāṃ gāyakās tathā / HV_App.I,23.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:5903: bhojyantāṃ brāhmaṇāḥ sarve dīyantāṃ ca dhanāni ca // HV_App.I,23.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:5904: alaṃ kriyantāṃ sarvatra prāsādāḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,23.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:5906: te ca sarve yathājñaptaṃ cakruś caiva sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,23.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:5907: kvacic ca susvaraṃ geyaṃ gāyakāś cakrire tadā / HV_App.I,23.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:5908: kvacid bheryaḥ samāghnātā mahāghoṣaṃ prapūrire / HV_App.I,23.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:5909: rodasī pūrayāmāsuḥ pātālaṃ ca prapūritam // HV_App.I,23.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:5910: kvacic chaṅkhā mahārāja vyādhmātā yādaveśvaraiḥ / HV_App.I,23.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:5911: pṛthivīṃ kampayanto vai samudrān abhyavardhayan // HV_App.I,23.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:5912: kvacid gajā hayāś caiva heṣāṃ cakrur mahotsave / HV_App.I,23.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:5914: adhyakṣaḥ sātyakiś cāsīt keśave hy utsavonmukhe / HV_App.I,23.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:5915: itaś cetaś ca saṃyāti niyuṅkte tatra tatra ha // HV_App.I,23.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:5916: yasya yasya ca yatkāryaṃ taṃ taṃ tatra niyuktavāṇ // HV_App.I,23.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:5917: baladevo æpi dharmātmā rājabhiḥ sārdham acyutaḥ / HV_App.I,23.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:5918: yathārhaṃ tu yathāyogaṃ saṃmānaṃ samyojayat // HV_App.I,23.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:5919: evaṃ kolāhale tasmin keśavaḥ paravīrahā / HV_App.I,23.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:5920: brāhmaṇāṃś ca mahārāja nānādigbhyaḥ samāgatān // HV_App.I,23.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:5922: namaskṛtya hṛṣīkeśo vivāhāya mano dadhe // HV_App.I,23.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:5923: anujñātaś ca tai rājan dhautavāsāḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,23.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:5924: rukmiṇyāḥ keśavaḥ pāṇiṃ jagrāha vidhivat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,23.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:5928: papāta puṣpavarṣaṃ ca vavau vāyuḥ sukhaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,23.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:5929: brāhmaṇebhyas tadā dattvā ratnāni ca janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,23.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:5931: saṃyojya ca hṛṣīkeśo vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca // HV_App.I,23.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:5932: gajānāṃ ca śataṃ sāgraṃ sahasram ayutaṃ gavām / HV_App.I,23.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:5934: idaṃ covāca rājendra keśavaḥ paravīrahā / HV_App.I,23.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:5935: yad yac ca śobhanaṃ vastu dīyantām ratnasaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,23.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:5936: arcitāś cārthino rājan bhūyāsuś ca mahotsave // HV_App.I,23.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:5937: evam ājñāpya govindo rukmiṇyā saha yādavān / HV_App.I,23.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:5939: ugrasenaṃ ca rājendraṃ vṛddhān anyān sayādavān / HV_App.I,23.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:5940: te sarve cakrur aśrūṇi harṣajāni yadūttamāḥ // HV_App.I,23.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:5941: nirvṛtte tu tadā rājan vivāhe keśavasya ha / HV_App.I,23.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:5942: ye ye samāgatās tatra nṛpā viprāḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,23.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:5943: anubhūya vivāhaṃ tu jagmuḥ sarve yathāgatam // HV_App.I,23.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:5944: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 24, transliterated by Eva De Clercq;
GE07hv_apppu:5946: [k: K Ñ2.3 V2 B Dn D1-5 S (T3 missing) ins. after adhy. 99,
GE07hv_apppu:5949: atrāścaryādbhutaṃ mantram āhnikaṃ japatāṃ vara / HV_App.I,24.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5951: pradyumne dvārakāṃ prāpte hatvā taṃ kālaśambaram / **HV_App.I,24.1**1:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:5953: yaṃ japtvā tu nṛpaśreṣṭha sāyaṃ prātaḥ śubhaṃ labhet // HV_App.I,24.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5955: dharmakāmaiś ca munibhir ṛṣibhiś cāpi kīrtitam // HV_App.I,24.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:5957: mahadbhir munibhiś caiva ṛṣibhiś cāpi kīrtitam / **HV_App.I,24.4**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5963: kiṃcit stotraṃ mama brūhi yaj japtvā nirbhayo 'bhavam / **HV_App.I,24.4**3:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:5964: surāsuragurur brahmā pātu māṃ jagatīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,24.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:5966: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni cchandāṃsy ātharvaṇāni ca / HV_App.I,24.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:5967: catvāraḥ sakalā vedāḥ saharasyāḥ savistarāḥ // HV_App.I,24.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5968: purāṇam itihāsaṃ ca khilāny upakhilāni ca / HV_App.I,24.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:5969: aṅgāny upāṅgāni tathā savyākhyānāni pāntu mām // HV_App.I,24.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:5970: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam / HV_App.I,24.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:5971: indriyāṇi mano buddhis tathā sattvaṃ rajas tamaḥ // HV_App.I,24.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:5972: vyānodānaḥ samānaś ca prāṇo 'pānaś ca pañcamaḥ / HV_App.I,24.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:5973: vāyavaḥ sapta caivānye yeṣv āyattam idaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,24.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:5975: āvāhaḥ pravahaś caiva udvahaḥ saṃvahas tathā / **HV_App.I,24.14**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5977: [k: the first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5978: marīcir aṅgirāś cātriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ / HV_App.I,24.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:5979: bhṛgur vasiṣṭho bhagavān pāntu te māṃ maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,24.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:5980: kaśyapādyāś ca munayaś caturdaśa diśo daśa / HV_App.I,24.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:5981: naranārāyaṇau devau sagaṇau pāntu māṃ sadā // HV_App.I,24.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:5982: rudrāś caikādaśa proktā ādityā dvādaśaiva tu // HV_App.I,24.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:5983: aṣṭau ca vasavo devā aśvinau dvau prakīrtitau // HV_App.I,24.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:5984: hrīḥ śrīr lakṣmīḥ svadhā medhā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ smṛtir dhṛtiḥ / HV_App.I,24.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:5985: aditir ditir danuś caiva siṃhikā daityamātaraḥ // HV_App.I,24.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:5986: [k: the first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5987: himavān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadhaḥ śvetaparvataḥ / HV_App.I,24.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:5988: ṛṣabhaḥ pāriyātraś ca vindhyo vaidūryaparvataḥ // HV_App.I,24.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5991: śeṣaś ca vāsukiś caiva viśālākṣaś ca takṣakaḥ / HV_App.I,24.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:5994: tathā pūraṇakaś caiva nāgaś ca karavīrakaḥ // HV_App.I,24.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:5996: maṇināgaś ca bhagavāṃs triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,24.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:5997: nāgarāḍ dadhikarṇaś ca tathā hāridrako 'paraḥ / HV_App.I,24.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:5998: ete cānye ca bahavo ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ // HV_App.I,24.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:5999: bhūdharāḥ satyadharmāṇaḥ pāntu māṃ bhujageśvarāḥ / HV_App.I,24.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:6000: samudrāḥ pāntu catvāro gaṅgā ca saritāṃ varā // HV_App.I,24.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:6001: sarasvatī candrabhāgā śatadrur devikā śubhā / HV_App.I,24.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:6002: irāvatī vipāśā ca śarayūr yamunā tathā // HV_App.I,24.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:6004: kauśikī devikā caiva puṇyā divyā dṛṣadvatī / **HV_App.I,24.38**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6005: kulmāṣī rathavāmā ca bāhudā ca hiraṇyadā / HV_App.I,24.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:6006: plakṣā cekṣumatī caiva tāpanī ca bṛhadrathā / HV_App.I,24.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:6007: khyātā carmaṇvatī caiva puṇyā caiva vadhūsarā // HV_App.I,24.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:6008: etāś cānyāś ca sarito yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ / HV_App.I,24.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:6010: veṇṇā godāvarī sītā kāverī kāñcanāvatī // HV_App.I,24.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:6013: nadī vaitaraṇī puṇyā vidarbhā narmadā śubhā / HV_App.I,24.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:6014: vitastā vai bhīmarathī elā caiva mahānadī / HV_App.I,24.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:6015: kālindī gomatī puṇyā nadaḥ śoṇaś ca viśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,24.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:6016: etāś cānyāś ca vai nadyo yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ / HV_App.I,24.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:6018: siprā carmaṇvatī puṇyā mahī sābhramatī tathā / HV_App.I,24.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:6019: sindhur vetravatī caiva bhojā ca vanamālikā // HV_App.I,24.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:6021: khyātā vetravatī caiva cāpadāsīti viśrutā // HV_App.I,24.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:6022: prasthāvatī puṇyanadī nadī puṇyā sarasvatī / HV_App.I,24.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:6023: mitraghnī cendumālā ca tathā madhumatī nadī // HV_App.I,24.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:6024: umā gurunadī caiva tāpī ca vimalodakā / HV_App.I,24.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:6025: vimalā vimalodā ca mattagaṅgā payasvinī // HV_App.I,24.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:6026: etāś cānyāś ca vai nadyo yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ / HV_App.I,24.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:6027: tā māṃ samabhiṣiñcantu paścimām āśritā diśam // HV_App.I,24.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:6028: [k: Ñ2 V1 B1.2 D2.3 T1 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6030: sā tu dahatu me pāpaṃ kīrtitā śaṃbhunā dhṛtā / **HV_App.I,24.61**6:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:6031: prabhāsaṃ ca prayāgaṃ ca naimiṣaṃ puṣkarāṇi ca / HV_App.I,24.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:6033: rāmahradam vinaśanaṃ rāmatīrthaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,24.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:6034: gaṅgādvāraṃ kanakhalaṃ somo vai yatra cotthitaḥ // HV_App.I,24.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:6035: kapālamocanaṃ tīrthaṃ jambūmārgaṃ ca viśrutam / HV_App.I,24.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:6039: vikhyātaṃ phālgunītīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ bhadravaṭaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,24.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:6040: kokāmukhaṃ puṇyanadaṃ gaṅgāsāgaram eva ca / HV_App.I,24.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:6041: magadheṣu tapodaś ca gaṅgodbhedaś ca viśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,24.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:6043: tīrthāny etāni puṇyāni sevitāni maharṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,24.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:6044: māṃ pāvayantu salilaiḥ kīrtitākīrtitāni ca // HV_App.I,24.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:6048: sūkaraṃ yogamārgaṃ ca śvetadvīpaṃ tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,24.73**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6052: taṃ śāpamocanaṃ tīrthaṃ punantv etāni kilbiṣāt / **HV_App.I,24.73**8:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:6053: dharmārthakāmavidhayo yaśaḥ prāptiḥ śamo damaḥ / HV_App.I,24.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:6054: varuṇo 'ṃśo 'tha dhanado yamo niyama eva ca // HV_App.I,24.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6055: kālo nayaḥ saṃnatiś ca krodho mohaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ / HV_App.I,24.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:6057: yakṣāḥ piśācā gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ / HV_App.I,24.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:6059: lambodarāś ca balinaḥ piṅgākṣā viśvarūpiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,24.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:6061: nakṣatrāṇi grahāś caiva ṛtavaḥ śiśirādayaḥ / HV_App.I,24.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:6063: āmodaś ca pramodaś ca praharṣaḥ śoka eva ca / HV_App.I,24.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:6064: manyus tamas tapaḥ satyaṃ siddhir vṛddhiḥ śrutir dhṛtiḥ // HV_App.I,24.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:6065: rudrāṇī bhadrakālī ca bhadraṣaṣṭhā ca vāruṇī / HV_App.I,24.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:6066: bhāsī ca kālikā caiva śāṇḍilī ceti viśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,24.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:6067: āryā kuhūḥ sinīvālī bhīmā citravatī ratiḥ / HV_App.I,24.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:6068: ekānaṃśā ca kūṣmāṇḍī devī kātyāyanī ca yā // HV_App.I,24.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:6069: lohityāyanamātā ca devakanyāś ca yāḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,24.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:6070: gonandā devapatnī ca māṃ rakṣantu sabāndhavam // HV_App.I,24.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:6079: mattonmattapramattāś ca praharantyaś ca dhiṣṭhitāḥ / HV_App.I,24.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:6080: piṅgākṣyaḥ piṅgakeśyaś ca tato 'nyā lūnamūrdhajāḥ // HV_App.I,24.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:6081: ūrdhvakeśyaḥ kṛṣṇakeśyaḥ śvetakeśyas tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,24.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:6085: mukhamaṇḍī biḍālī ca pūtanā gandhapūtanā / HV_App.I,24.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:6089: naktaṃcarāḥ sukhodarkāḥ sadā parvaṇi dāruṇāḥ / HV_App.I,24.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:6090: mātaro mātṛvat putraṃ rakṣantu mama nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,24.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:6092: kumāraskandajāś caiva jvarā vai vaiṣṇavādayaḥ // HV_App.I,24.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:6105: vāmanā vikaṭāḥ kubjāḥ karālā lūnamūrdhajāḥ / HV_App.I,24.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:6109: ekapādā dvipādāś ca tathā dviśiraso 'pare / HV_App.I,24.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:6110: nirmāṃsās tālajaṅghāś ca vyāditāsyā bhayaṃkarāḥ // HV_App.I,24.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:6113: ete grahāś ca satataṃ rakṣantu mama sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,24.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:6115: māheśvaro vaiṣṇavaś ca jvarau lokabhayāvahau // HV_App.I,24.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:6116: grāmaṇīś caiva gopālo bhṛṅgarīṭir gaṇeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,24.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:6117: devaś ca vāmadevaś ca ghaṇṭākarṇaḥ karaṃdhamaḥ // HV_App.I,24.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:6118: śvetamodaḥ kapālī ca jambhakaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ / HV_App.I,24.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:6120: nijaghāso ghasaś caiva sthūṇākarṇaḥ praśoṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,24.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:6123: kūṣmāṇḍaḥ kumbhamūrdhā ca rocano vaikṛto grahaḥ // HV_App.I,24.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:6124: aniketaḥ surārighnaḥ śivaś cāśiva eva ca / HV_App.I,24.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:6125: kṣemakaḥ piśitāśī ca surārir harilocanaḥ // HV_App.I,24.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:6131: pārvatyā roṣasaṃbhūtāḥ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca // HV_App.I,24.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:6134: rātrāvahani durgeṣu kīrtitāḥ sakalair guṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,24.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:6135: teṣāṃ gaṇānāṃ patayaḥ sagaṇāḥ pāntu māṃ sadā // HV_App.I,24.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:6136: nāradaḥ parvataś caiva gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,24.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:6137: pitaraḥ kāraṇaṃ kāryam ādhayo vyādhayas tathā // HV_App.I,24.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:6138: agastyo gālavo gārgyaḥ śaktidhaumyaḥ parāśaraḥ / HV_App.I,24.160 /
GE07hv_apppu:6139: kṛṣṇātreyaś ca bhagavān asito devalo 'malaḥ // HV_App.I,24.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:6140: bṛhaspatir utathyaś ca mārkaṇḍeyaḥ śrutaśravāḥ / HV_App.I,24.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:6141: dvaipāyano vidarbhaś ca jaiminir māṭharaḥ kaṭhaḥ // HV_App.I,24.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:6142: viśvāmitro vasiṣṭhaś ca lomaśaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ / HV_App.I,24.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:6143: uttaṅkaś caiva raibhyaś ca paulomaś ca dvitas tritaḥ // HV_App.I,24.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:6144: ṛṣir vaikālavṛkṣīyo munir medhātithis tathā / HV_App.I,24.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:6145: sārasvato yavakrītaḥ kuśiko gautamas tathā // HV_App.I,24.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:6149: saṃvarto ṛśyaśṛṅgaś ca svastyātreyo vibhāṇḍakaḥ / HV_App.I,24.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:6150: ṛcīko jamadagniś ca tathaurvas tapasāṃ nidhiḥ // HV_App.I,24.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:6151: bharadvājaḥ sthūlaśirāḥ kaśyapaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ / HV_App.I,24.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:6152: bṛhadagnir hariśmaśrur vijayaḥ kaṇva eva ca // HV_App.I,24.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:6154: T1.2 G1.3 after the repetition of line 165:k]
GE07hv_apppu:6156: vaitaṇḍī dīrghatapāś caiva vedaś cāthāṃśumāñ śivaḥ / HV_App.I,24.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:6157: [k: The first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6160: aṣṭāvakro dadhītiś ca śvetaketus tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,24.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:6161: uddālakaḥ kṣārapāṇiḥ śṛṅgī gauramukhas tathā / HV_App.I,24.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:6162: agniveśyaḥ śamīkaś ca pramucur mumucus tathā // HV_App.I,24.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:6163: ete cānye ca bahavo ṛṣayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / HV_App.I,24.176 /
GE07hv_apppu:6164: munayaḥ saṃśitātmāno ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ / HV_App.I,24.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:6165: ṛjavaḥ ślāghinaḥ śāntāḥ śāntiṃ kurvantu me sadā // HV_App.I,24.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:6166: trayo 'gnayas trayo vedās traividyaṃ kaustubho maṇiḥ / HV_App.I,24.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:6167: uccaiḥśravā hayaḥ śrīmān vaidyo dhanvaṃtarir hariḥ // HV_App.I,24.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:6168: amṛtaṃ gauḥ suvarṇaṃ ca dadhigaurāś ca sarṣapāḥ / HV_App.I,24.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:6169: śuklāḥ samanasaḥ kanyāḥ śvetacchatraṃ yavākṣatāḥ // HV_App.I,24.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:6170: dūrvā hiraṇyaṃ gandhāś ca vālavyajanam eva ca / HV_App.I,24.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:6171: tathāpratihataṃ cakraṃ mahokṣaś candanaṃ viṣam // HV_App.I,24.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:6172: śveto vṛṣaḥ karī mattaḥ siṃho vyāghro hayaḥ śarāḥ / HV_App.I,24.185 /
GE07hv_apppu:6173: pṛthivī coddhṛtā lājā brāhmaṇā madhupāyasam // HV_App.I,24.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:6174: svastiko vardhamānaś ca nandyāvartaḥ priyaṅgavaḥ / HV_App.I,24.187 /
GE07hv_apppu:6175: śrīphalaṃ gomayaṃ matsyā duṃdubhiḥ paṭahasvanaḥ // HV_App.I,24.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:6176: ṛṣipatnyaś ca kanyāś ca śrīmad bhadrāsanaṃ dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,24.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:6177: rocanā rucakaś caiva nadīnāṃ saṃgamodakam // HV_App.I,24.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:6178: suparṇāḥ śatapatrāś ca cakorā jīvajīvakāḥ / HV_App.I,24.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:6181: puṇyaṃ vai vigatakleśaṃ śrīmad vai maṅgalānvitam / HV_App.I,24.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:6183: yaś cedaṃ śrāvayed vidvān yaś caivaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ / HV_App.I,24.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:6184: maṅgalāṣṭaśataṃ snāto japet parvaṇi parvaṇi // HV_App.I,24.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:6186: na ca prāpnoti vaikalyaṃ paratreha ca nandati // HV_App.I,24.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:6187: dhanyaṃ yaśasyām āyuṣyaṃ pavitraṃ vedasaṃmitam // HV_App.I,24.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:6188: śrīmat svargyaṃ sadā puṇyam apatyajananaṃ śivam // HV_App.I,24.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:6189: śubhaṃ kṣemakaraṃ nṝṇāṃ medhājananam uttamam / HV_App.I,24.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:6191: śraddadhāno dayābhūtaḥ prapaṭhed ātmavān naraḥ / HV_App.I,24.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:6192: sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā gatiṃ ca labhate parām // HV_App.I,24.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:6194: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 25 transliterated by Eva De Clercq;
GE07hv_apppu:6198: sa jātu vismayaṃ kurvan diśāṃ dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,25.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:6200: devalokaṃ jagāmāśu kurvan siṃhadhvaniṃ muhuḥ // HV_App.I,25.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:6201: indrasya sadanaṃ gatvā kavāṭaṃ ghaṭṭayan danuḥ / HV_App.I,25.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:6202: yudhyatām iti hovāca jayo vā pratidīyatām // HV_App.I,25.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:6203: tac chrutvā devarājo 'pi devaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,25.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:6204: airāvataṃ samāruhya devasainyaiś ca pālitaḥ // HV_App.I,25.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6206: nirjagāma purāt tasmād dānavānāṃ samīpataḥ / HV_App.I,25.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:6207: airāvataṃ samāsthāya tasthau tatra śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,25.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:6208: tato yuddhaṃ samabhavad dānavānāṃ durātmanām / HV_App.I,25.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:6209: devaiḥ śakrasahāyaiś ca nighnatām itaretaram // HV_App.I,25.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:6210: devāḥ śaraiḥ samājaghnur dānavān nagasaṃnibhān / HV_App.I,25.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:6211: dānavāś ca mahārāja devān indrapurogamān / HV_App.I,25.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:6212: nijaghnuḥ samare tatra khaṅgaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ // HV_App.I,25.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:6213: siṃhanādaṃ mahac cakrur daityā yudhi mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,25.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:6214: devān babādhire te tu pratyakṣaṃ ca śacīpateḥ // HV_App.I,25.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6215: ārtā yuddhapariśrāntā devāgacchan diśo daśa / HV_App.I,25.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:6216: śakreṇa vāritāś cāpi sthātuṃ śaktā na devatāḥ // HV_App.I,25.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:6217: tāṃs tu vidrāvitān dṛṣṭvā vṛtrahā balasūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,25.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:6218: sthātavyam iti hovāca nirjarān sa mahāprabhuḥ // HV_App.I,25.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:6219: dhanur ādāya vidhivaj jyāghoṣaṃ samavāsṛjat / HV_App.I,25.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:6220: tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi mumoca yudhi vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,25.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:6221: lokapālās tathā rājan samājagmuḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,25.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:6222: yakṣaiś ca guhyakaiś caiva saha vaiśravaṇas tathā // HV_App.I,25.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:6223: varuṇo yādasāṃ rājā vāruṇaiś ca samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,25.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:6224: nāgaiś ca śatasāhasrair anuyāto digīśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,25.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6226: yayau yoddhuṃ mahārāja narakaṃ dānavottamam // HV_App.I,25.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:6227: taiḥ sārdhaṃ devarājo 'pi yuddhaṃ cakre mahāmatiḥ / HV_App.I,25.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:6228: narako 'pi mahārāja yuddhaṃ cakre sudāruṇam // HV_App.I,25.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:6229: hayagrīvo nisumbhaś ca muraś ca ripumardanaḥ / HV_App.I,25.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:6230: cakrur yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ narakeṇa saha prabho // HV_App.I,25.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6231: lokapālā mahārāja saṃsaktā yoddhum īhate // HV_App.I,25.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:6233: cakre yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ yathā vṛtravadhe purā // HV_App.I,25.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:6234: nisumbho daṇḍahastena yamena saha saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,25.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:6235: muro 'pi rājan vikrānto rājarājena saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,25.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:6237: te ca devā mahārāja dānavaiḥ saha saṃgatāḥ // HV_App.I,25.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:6238: te devā dānavāś caiva parasparajayaiṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,25.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:6240: hayagrīvaṃ mahārāja varuṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ / HV_App.I,25.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:6241: jaghāna niśitair bāṇair marmabhedibhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,25.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:6243: paraḥśataiḥ śarāṇāṃ tu vivyādha yudhi dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,25.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:6244: śarāṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi tatra devapatī raṇe / HV_App.I,25.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:6245: mumoca yudhi pāśeśas tam asyantaṃ śitāñ śarān // HV_App.I,25.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:6246: punaḥ kruddho mahārāja dānavo nagasaṃnibhaḥ / HV_App.I,25.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:6247: varuṇasya mahaccāpaṃ muṣṭideśe babhañja ha / HV_App.I,25.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:6249: visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ pāśam ādāya pāśabhṛt / HV_App.I,25.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:6250: samājaghne sa pāśena hayagrīvaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,25.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:6251: tam āpatantaṃ vegena pāśaṃ jagrāha dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,25.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:6252: tenaiva taṃ samājaghne varuṇaṃ yādasāṃ patim / HV_App.I,25.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:6253: sa tu pāśo 'tra nirvīryaḥ svāminaṃ na babādha ha // HV_App.I,25.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:6254: tataḥ kruddho hayagrīvo varuṇaṃ yādasāṃ patim / HV_App.I,25.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:6255: jaghāna gadayā rājan mūrdhni deśe mahābalam // HV_App.I,25.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:6256: sa tenābhihato mūrdhni vamañ soṇitam ulbaṇam / HV_App.I,25.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:6258: vāruṇais taiḥ samāyuktoḥ nirjito dānavottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,25.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:6259: nisumbhaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā yamaṃ jaghne mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,25.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:6260: yamo 'pi dhanur ādāya śareṇa nataparvaṇā / HV_App.I,25.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:6261: jaghāna dānavaṃ saṃkhye paśyatas tu śacīpateḥ // HV_App.I,25.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:6262: nisumbho roṣatāmrākṣo dhanuś ciccheda tasya tat // HV_App.I,25.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:6263: utsṛjya dhanuratnaṃ ca daṇḍam udyamya dānavam / HV_App.I,25.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:6264: dhāvati sma yamo rājan hantukāmo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,25.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:6265: utsṛjya tu mahārāja dānavo dhanur uttamam / HV_App.I,25.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:6266: ādāya niśitaṃ khaṅgaṃ prāyāt pretapatiṃ tadā // HV_App.I,25.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:6267: tayos tābhyāṃ mahāyuddham āyudhābhyāṃ tadābhavat / HV_App.I,25.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:6268: purā devāsure yuddhe balivāsavayor iva // HV_App.I,25.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:6272: khaṅgena prāharat taṃ tu yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ yudhi // HV_App.I,25.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6273: saṃchinnavarmā deveśo yamo yāmyaiḥ samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,25.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:6275: jagāmāśu puraṃ yuddhād bhīto dānavasattamāt // HV_App.I,25.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:6276: rājarājas tathā sārdhaṃ guhyakair devasaṃnibhaiḥ / HV_App.I,25.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:6278: muraṃ tu mauravaiḥ sārdhaṃ samājaghne paraḥśataiḥ / HV_App.I,25.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:6281: jaghāna rājarājaṃ tu śaraiḥ suniśitair api / HV_App.I,25.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:6282: vidhvā tu rājarājaṃ taṃ guhyakāṃś ca samāhanat // HV_App.I,25.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:6283: khaḍgaiḥ pāśaiḥ samājaghne yakṣān devaripus tadā / HV_App.I,25.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:6284: yakṣāś ca guhyakāś caiva bhītā dudruvur āhavāt / HV_App.I,25.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:6286: yakṣasainyaṃ parājitya muro vaiśravaṇaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,25.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:6287: śarair āśīviṣākārair vivyādha yudhi dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,25.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:6288: stanayor vakṣasi tathā cakṣuṣor netrasaṃpuṭe / HV_App.I,25.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:6289: yatheṣṭaṃ dharṣayām āsa dānavo yuddhadurmadaḥ / HV_App.I,25.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:6290: sa cāpy ārto viṣaṇṇaś ca nirjagāma raṇājirāt // HV_App.I,25.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:6291: te ca yakṣās tadā rājan guhyakāś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,25.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:6292: alakāṃ ca samājagmur bhītā yuddhaparāṅmukhāḥ // HV_App.I,25.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:6293: yamo 'tha varuṇaś caiva kuberaś ca mahāmatiḥ / HV_App.I,25.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:6294: nirjitā dānavendreṇa svaṃ svaṃ nagaram āyayuḥ // HV_App.I,25.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:6295: devāś ca nirjitāḥ sarve dānavair nagasaṃnibhaiḥ / HV_App.I,25.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:6296: diśo daśa drutāḥ sarve bhītā vṛttavilocanāḥ // HV_App.I,25.100 //
GE07hv_apppu:6299: nirjitaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā devarājaḥ śacīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,25.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:6300: āruhyairāvataṃ nāgaṃ prāṃśuṃ śaśinibhaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,25.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:6301: māhendram atha cāpaṃ ca sajyaṃ kṛtvā sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,25.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:6302: cakre yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ narakeṇa durātmanā // HV_App.I,25.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:6303: narako 'pi mahārāja śakraṃ dṛṣṭvā śacīpatim / HV_App.I,25.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:6304: nanāda vividhaṃ nādaṃ siṃho gajapatiṃ yathā // HV_App.I,25.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:6305: āgaccheti tadovāca jyāghoṣaṃ ca cakāra saḥ / HV_App.I,25.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:6306: tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ yathā vṛtravadhe purā // HV_App.I,25.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:6307: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ narako duṣṭacetanaḥ / HV_App.I,25.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:6308: ākarṇapūrṇaṃ saṃdhāya jaghne vṛtraripuṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,25.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:6309: āhatas tena devendro vihvalaḥ samapadyata / HV_App.I,25.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:6310: susrāva rudhiraṃ śakro gatasaṃjñas tadābhavat // HV_App.I,25.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:6311: samāśvastas tadā śakraḥ śarair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ / HV_App.I,25.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:6312: rathaṃ vivyādha saptatyā sārathiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,25.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:6313: kṣurapreṇa tadā rājan dhvajaṃ ciccheda cottamam / HV_App.I,25.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:6314: sārathiṃ prāhiṇot tasya yamāya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,25.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:6315: jaghānāśvāṃś caturbhis tu bāṇaiḥ suniśitair api / HV_App.I,25.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:6316: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena narakasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,25.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:6317: sa cchinnadhanvā viratho vibāṇo hatasārathiḥ / HV_App.I,25.119 /
GE07hv_apppu:6318: ādāya niśitaṃ khaḍgam utpapāta śacīpatim / HV_App.I,25.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:6320: vyāvidhya tu punar daityo devarājasya vakṣasi / HV_App.I,25.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:6322: visaṃjño vihvalaś caiva devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ / HV_App.I,25.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:6323: utsṛjyairāvataṃ nāgaṃ gacchati sma tadārtavat // HV_App.I,25.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:6324: nāgaṃ taṃ pothayām āsa kumbhadeśe sa dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,25.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:6325: sa ca nāgo mahārāja prādravac ca bhayāt tadā // HV_App.I,25.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:6326: jitvātha narako bhaumo vṛtrahantāram āhave / HV_App.I,25.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:6327: nanāda vividhān nādān rodasī ca vinādayan // HV_App.I,25.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:6328: nirjityākhaṇḍalaṃ śakraṃ lokāpālāṃs tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,25.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:6329: jayam āghoṣayām āsa narako dānavottamaḥ // HV_App.I,25.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:6330: amarāvatīṃ tadā daityaḥ praviśya ca mahāsuraiḥ / HV_App.I,25.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:6331: [k: the first Pada of this line has one syllable too many :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6332: urvaśīṃ ca samāhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,25.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:6333: bhaja mām iha vāmoru nirjitaḥ śakra āhave / HV_App.I,25.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:6334: aham indro yamo rājā varuṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ / HV_App.I,25.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:6335: aham eva sadā bhadre rājarājo 'smi suprabhe // HV_App.I,25.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:6337: ṛṣayo yadi te rājan yakṣyanti kratubhiḥ sadā / HV_App.I,25.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:6338: tadā bhajāmi daityendra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,25.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:6339: evam uktas tadā daityo bāḍham ity abravīd vacaḥ // HV_App.I,25.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:6340: svargaśreṇīr mahārāja pramathya ditijaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,25.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:6343: jagāma daityarājas tu yatheṣṭaṃ dānavaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,25.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:6344: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 26, transliterated by Eva De Clercq;
GE07hv_apppu:6349: saṃprāpya mānuṣaṃ lokaṃ narako dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,26.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6350: dvāravatyāṃ jagannāthe tasmin rakṣati bhūtalam / HV_App.I,26.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:6351: babādhe mānuṣān sarvān ṛṣīn viprāṃś ca dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,26.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:6352: rakṣaty eva jagannāthe viprān munigaṇāṃs tathā / HV_App.I,26.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:6353: bādhate sma tadā daityo viprān munigaṇāṃś ca saḥ // HV_App.I,26.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:6354: tataḥ kadācid daityendra urvaśīvacanaṃ smaran / HV_App.I,26.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:6355: badaryāṃ hi mahārāja yaṣṭuṃ munigaṇāṃs tadā / HV_App.I,26.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:6356: satreṇa śakraṃ deveśaṃ tathā devagaṇān api // HV_App.I,26.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6357: dṛṣṭvā tān munivīrāṃs tu narako dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,26.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:6358: provāca vacanaṃ kāle yaṣṭavyo 'smi munīśvarāḥ // HV_App.I,26.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:6359: asmin kāle jagannātha indro 'haṃ vibudhādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,26.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:6360: jitaḥ śakro raṇe viprā lokapālaiḥ sahāmaraiḥ / HV_App.I,26.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:6361: tata ijyo namaskāryo vandyo lokahitāya vai // HV_App.I,26.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:6362: tad etad vacanaṃ śrutvā narakasya durātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,26.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:6363: āhus te munayaḥ sarve badarīvāsatatparāḥ // HV_App.I,26.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:6364: yakṣyāmo na vayaṃ daitya dānavo 'si durātmavān / HV_App.I,26.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:6365: indraṃ devagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ yakṣyāmo vigatajvarāḥ // HV_App.I,26.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:6366: tac chrutvā roṣatāmrākṣo dānavān idam abravīt / HV_App.I,26.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:6367: vadhyantām ṛṣayaḥ sarve bhidyantāṃ yajñabhūmayaḥ // HV_App.I,26.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:6368: na tvāṃ yakṣyāma he daitya ity ūcuḥ kila tāpasāḥ // HV_App.I,26.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:6369: te ca sarvaṃ tathā cakrur dānavā duṣṭacetasaḥ // HV_App.I,26.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6370: yajñabhūmiṃ samāloḍya yajñabhārāṃs ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,26.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:6371: agnīn saṃmiśrayām āsur dadahur darbhapuñjakān // HV_App.I,26.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:6372: kamaṇḍalūn dvidhākṛtya jaṭā ācchidya dūrataḥ / HV_App.I,26.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:6373: prakṣipya dānavāḥ sarve narakeṇa samanvitāḥ // HV_App.I,26.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:6374: yajñavāṭaṃ samāloḍya cakrur bhasma tadā nṛpa / HV_App.I,26.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:6375: tāvat tāni havīṃṣy atra bhakṣayām āsur ojasā / HV_App.I,26.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:6377: teṣv eva cāgnimukhyeṣu dagdhvā te dānavottamāḥ // HV_App.I,26.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:6378: evaṃ te dānavāḥ sarve cakrur vighnakriyāṃ tadā / HV_App.I,26.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:6379: te ca sarve munivarāḥ palāyanti diśo daśa // HV_App.I,26.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:6380: tatra yā munikanyās tu jahāra narakas tadā / HV_App.I,26.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:6381: prāgjyotiṣaṃ jagāmāśu kanyābhis tābhir eva ca / HV_App.I,26.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:6382: yatheṣṭaṃ mumude tatra priyābhiḥ saha dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,26.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6386: tasminn evāśrame ramye mantrayitvā parasparam // HV_App.I,26.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:6387: devāya lokanāthāya kṛṣṇāya ca mahātmane / HV_App.I,26.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:6388: nivedayāmaḥ pāpasya dānavasya kṛtaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,26.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:6391: yadi sa pratikuryādd hi tan naḥ śreyo bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,26.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:6392: yadi jīved asau pāpo narako dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,26.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:6393: jagan na sthāsyate samyag vinaṣṭaś ca bhavej janaḥ // HV_App.I,26.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:6396: gṛhītvā munayaḥ sarve śiṣyair dhamanisaṃtatāḥ // HV_App.I,26.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:6397: keśavāya ca tasmai tu badarīphalasaṃhatim / HV_App.I,26.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:6399: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ mārgam āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,26.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:6400: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ / HV_App.I,26.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:6401: kaṇvo dhūmro bṛhaddurgo bharadvājaś ca gālavah / HV_App.I,26.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:6402: kavaṣo dhūmraketuś ca kāśyaḥ kāpilakas tathā // HV_App.I,26.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:6403: ete cānye ca munayo narakeṇa durātmanā / HV_App.I,26.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:6405: śiṣyaiḥ saha samāyātā ārtā dānavapāpinā / HV_App.I,26.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:6407: gaṅgāṃ ca samanuprāpya sthitās tasyās taṭe taḍā / HV_App.I,26.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:6408: tatra snātuṃ samārabdhā munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / HV_App.I,26.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:6409: atra snātvā vayaṃ yāmo draṣṭuṃ lokahitaiṣiṇaṃ / HV_App.I,26.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:6411: iti saṃcintya munayaḥ snānaṃ cakrur yathāvidhi / HV_App.I,26.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:6412: yena yogyā munivarā draṣṭuṃ keśavam avyayam / HV_App.I,26.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:6413: tasmin gaṅgāmbhasi snātvā sarve śuddhās tapodhanāḥ // HV_App.I,26.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:6414: avatīrya tato gaṅgāṃ naubhir munivarās tadā / HV_App.I,26.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:6416: praviśya dvārakāṃ te tu vasiṣṭhādyā munīśvarāḥ / HV_App.I,26.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:6418: yā sabhā lokavikhyātā sudharmeti ca viśrutā / HV_App.I,26.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:6419: tasyā dvāraṃ samāsthāya dvāḥsthaṃ procur maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,26.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:6421: badaryāṃ vai samuṣitā munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / HV_App.I,26.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:6422: draṣṭuṃ tvāṃ samanuprāptā pīḍitā dānavottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,26.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:6423: tac chrutvā dvārapālo 'pi keśavāya mahātmane / HV_App.I,26.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:6424: nivedayām āsa tadā yad uktaṃ munisattamaiḥ // HV_App.I,26.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:6425: śrutvā tu devadeveśo munīn yaduvarārcitaḥ / HV_App.I,26.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:6426: praveśyantām iti proktāḥ pradyumnaṃ samacodayat // HV_App.I,26.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:6427: arghyaṃ pādyaṃ tadā pātram āsanāni samantataḥ / HV_App.I,26.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:6428: ānīyantāṃ yathāyogaṃ sa ca sarvaṃ cakāra ha // HV_App.I,26.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6429: te praviṣṭā munivarās tāṃ sabhāṃ sabhyapūjitām // HV_App.I,26.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:6430: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 27 transliterated by Eva De Clercq;
GE07hv_apppu:6433: tāṃ sabhāṃ viviśur hṛṣṭāḥ saśiṣyā munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,27.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6434: tān dṛṣṭvā samanuprāptān keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,27.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:6435: namaskṛtya munīn sarvān āsanānīty avocata // HV_App.I,27.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:6437: arghyaṃ ca tebhyaḥ pradadau pādyam ācamanaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,27.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:6438: utsṛjya gāṃ jagannātho madhuparkaṃ dadau punaḥ / HV_App.I,27.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:6439: andhakā vṛṣṇayaś caiva praṇāmaṃ cakrire munīn // HV_App.I,27.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:6440: tair apy anumatāḥ sarve yādavā munisattamaiḥ / HV_App.I,27.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:6441: svaṃ svaṃ hi bhejire te tu āsanaṃ lokaviśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,27.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:6442: [k: The counter for line 10 is wrongly printed after line 9; thus,
GE07hv_apppu:6443: the automatically inserted line counter differs from the printed one for the rest of this appendix. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6444: keśavo 'pi mahārāja svaṃ sthānaṃ samavāpa ha // HV_App.I,27.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:6447: āsīneṣu jagannātho munivīreṣu tatra ha / HV_App.I,27.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:6448: uvāca vacanaṃ kāle sopaskaram idaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,27.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:6449: kuśalaṃ sarvakāryeṣu tapaḥsu ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,27.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:6450: yuṣmadāgamanaṃ mahyaṃ prīṇāti satataṃ bhṛśam // HV_App.I,27.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:6451: yādavāś ca parāṃ prītim āsthitā munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,27.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:6452: yuṣmadāgamanād viprāḥ kim u vaktavyam atra ha // HV_App.I,27.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:6453: kulaṃ pūtaṃ sadā viprā yasmin viprāḥ samāgatāḥ / HV_App.I,27.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:6454: yuṣmadāgamanapraśno na yukto vaktum atra naḥ // HV_App.I,27.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6455: tathāpi no manāṃsīha prasahya munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,27.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:6457: tasmād viprā yathātattvaṃ vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,27.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6458: evaṃ pṛṣṭās tadā viprāḥ keśavena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,27.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:6459: ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve keśavaṃ keśisūdanam // HV_App.I,27.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:6460: śṛṇu deva jagannātha kāraṇaṃ kāraṇātmaka // HV_App.I,27.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:6461: narako nāma deveśa bhaumo dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,27.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:6462: bādhate no jagannātha dānavair dānavādhamaḥ // HV_App.I,27.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:6463: jaghnus te dānavā deva hutaṃ hotavyam eva ca / HV_App.I,27.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:6464: abhakṣayanta te deva yajñabhāṇḍān sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,27.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6465: idaṃ covāca duṣṭātmā ijyo 'smīti ca mādhava / HV_App.I,27.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:6466: bibhidus te durātmāno dānavā nagayodhinaḥ / HV_App.I,27.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:6467: kamaṇḍalūñ jaṭāś caiva uṭajāni sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,27.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:6468: na kvacic charma deveśa lapsyāmo yadi jīvati // HV_App.I,27.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:6469: tasmin duṣṭe jagannātha dhig gatā nirayaṃ vayam / HV_App.I,27.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:6470: jahi taṃ devadeveśa dānavaṃ duṣṭacetasam // HV_App.I,27.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6471: rakṣa naḥ sakalān hatvā dānavān duṣṭapauruṣān // HV_App.I,27.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:6472: ṛṣipatnīḥ samānīya svapuraṃ nītavān danuḥ / HV_App.I,27.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:6473: rakṣā hi tvayi govinda sthitā nityaṃ jagatpate // HV_App.I,27.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:6474: kṣātraṃ vṛttaṃ samāsthāya dvāravatyāṃ vasan hare / HV_App.I,27.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:6475: nigṛhya duṣṭān rakṣasva sādhūn sādhupriyo hy asi / HV_App.I,27.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:6476: ārtā vayaṃ jagannātha hatās tena durātmanā // HV_App.I,27.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:6477: iyaṃ ca bhavate deva nītā hy asmābhir acyuta / HV_App.I,27.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:6478: badarīsaṃhatir deva pūrvabhuktā tvayā vibho // HV_App.I,27.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:6479: ity uktvā munayas te tu daduḥ sarvaṃ jagatpateḥ / HV_App.I,27.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:6481: yajñabhārān mahārāja darśayām āsur añjasā // HV_App.I,27.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:6482: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca deveśo roṣatāmrākulekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,27.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:6483: kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭaṃ mahaj jātam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām / HV_App.I,27.47 /
