GE07hv_apppu:6484: iti matvā jagannātho nottaraṃ pratyapadyata // HV_App.I,27.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:6485: cintāviṣṭe jagannāthe rakṣam ātmani cintite // HV_App.I,27.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:6487: arthyābhir vāgbhir iṣṭābhir īśvaraṃ praṇatās tadā // HV_App.I,27.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:6503: prabodham āyāti kathaṃ nu lokaḥ // HV_App.I,27.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:6508: kathaṃ vayaṃ vettum alaṃ jagatpate @ HV_App.I,27.72 @
GE07hv_apppu:6511: jñātuṃ vayaṃ deva yatāmahe guro // HV_App.I,27.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:6514: sthūlaṃ tu nityaṃ jagatāṃ nivāsa @ HV_App.I,27.78 @
GE07hv_apppu:6516: tam eva nityaṃ janakādayas te @ HV_App.I,27.80 @
GE07hv_apppu:6520: natāḥ sma nityaṃ jagatāṃ nivāsa @ HV_App.I,27.84 @
GE07hv_apppu:6524: namas tubhyaṃ namas tubhyaṃ deva deva hare hare / HV_App.I,27.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:6526: yat padaṃ paramaṃ nityaṃ tava viṣṇo hare param / HV_App.I,27.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:6527: taṃ namāma jagannātha yat tu paśyanti yoginaḥ / HV_App.I,27.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:6528: namo namo hare viṣṇo namo mādhava keśava // HV_App.I,27.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:6529: yat tu paśyanti satataṃ yogino yatacetasaḥ / HV_App.I,27.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:6530: yat prāpya na nivartante tan namāma padaṃ tava // HV_App.I,27.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:6531: yā māyā tava govinda durjñeyā yogacintakaiḥ / HV_App.I,27.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:6532: tāṃ natāḥ sma jagannātha yām āśritya sthitiṃ sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,27.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:6533: yā rakṣati jagadviṣṇo tāṃ namāma hare sadā // HV_App.I,27.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:6534: ṛgyajuś ca tathā sāma yaṃ stauti satataṃ hare / HV_App.I,27.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:6537: dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ tribhiś caiva pañcabhiś ca janārdana // HV_App.I,27.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:6538: punaś caiva jagannātha dvābhyāṃ stauti jagadpate / HV_App.I,27.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:6539: taṃ tvāṃ natāḥ sma deveśa ṛgyajuḥsāmarūpiṇam // HV_App.I,27.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:6541: makāro 'si tathā viṣṇo namas te praṇavātmaka // HV_App.I,27.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:6542: udgīthāya namo nityaṃ namo hotre janārdana / HV_App.I,27.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:6543: adhvaryave namas tubhyaṃ yaṣṭṛrūpāya te namaḥ // HV_App.I,27.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:6545: jagat sarvaṃ tvam evāsi jagac ca tvayi tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,27.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:6546: saṃhartā cāsi jagatāṃ tathā pātā jagatpate / HV_App.I,27.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:6547: sraṣṭāsi ca tathā deva sthitau sthitimatāṃ vara // HV_App.I,27.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:6549: vāsudeveśa bho viṣṇo tvayi sṛṣṭiṃ jagatpate / **HV_App.I,27.109**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6550: namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ sarvabhūtahṛdi sthita / HV_App.I,27.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:6552: namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ bhūyo bhūyo namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,27.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:6553: evaṃ stutvā jagannāthaṃ praṇāmaṃ cakrire hareḥ // HV_App.I,27.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:6554: tataś ca vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve śinivīrapurogamāḥ / HV_App.I,27.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:6555: utthāya cāsanāt sarve praṇāmaṃ cakrire hareḥ // HV_App.I,27.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:6556: sarve te yādavās tatra prasannamanaso 'bhavan / HV_App.I,27.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:6557: so 'yam eṣa jagannāthaḥ pāti no 'smin vasan sadā / HV_App.I,27.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:6558: āśrityainaṃ sukhaṃ sarve vatsyāmo yādavīṃ purīm // HV_App.I,27.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:6559: iti matvā tadā sarve yādavāḥ kṛṣṇam avyayam // HV_App.I,27.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:6560: vavandire mahābhāgāḥ stutaṃ munibhir avyayam // HV_App.I,27.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:6563: evaṃ stuto jagannātho munibhiḥ puṇyakīrtibhiḥ / HV_App.I,27.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:6565: antaḥ prītiyutaś cāsīt prakṛtistho 'pi keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,27.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:6566: pratijñām akarot tebhyo munibhyo yadusaṃsadi // HV_App.I,27.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:6567: eṣo 'smi sagaṇaṃ hatvā narakaṃ duṣṭapūruṣam / HV_App.I,27.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:6568: niṣkaṇṭakam imaṃ lokaṃ kariṣyāmi munīśvarāḥ // HV_App.I,27.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:6569: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sukhaṃ svapsyati māciram / HV_App.I,27.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:6570: cakreṇa niśitenaiva śiraś chetsyāmi dānavam // HV_App.I,27.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:6571: muraṃ ca dānavaṃ viprā hatagrīvaṃ ca dānavam / HV_App.I,27.129 /
GE07hv_apppu:6572: sarvān etān haniṣyāmi gacchadhvaṃ vigatajvarāḥ / HV_App.I,27.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:6573: ārabhyantāṃ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kiṃ vilambatha māciram // HV_App.I,27.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:6574: pratijñāte jagannāthe vinedur yādavās tadā / HV_App.I,27.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:6575: munayaś ca tadā deve pratijñāte tu keśave / HV_App.I,27.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:6576: āśīrvādāṃs tadā viprā dadus tasmai mahātmane // HV_App.I,27.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:6577: nirvighnā tava deveśa pratijñā śatrutāpana / HV_App.I,27.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:6579: svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmo badarīṃ tava śobhanām // HV_App.I,27.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:6580: ity uktvā munayaḥ sarve praṇipatya ca keśavam / HV_App.I,27.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:6581: jagmuḥ śiṣyair mahārāja badarīṃ tāṃ tapodhanāḥ // HV_App.I,27.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:6582: gateṣu teṣu vipreṣu sahaśiṣyeṣu yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,27.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:6583: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā yathāyogam upāsate // HV_App.I,27.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:6584: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 28, transliterated by Eva De Clercq;
GE07hv_apppu:6586: [k: D6 S ins. after 91.52, D3 after 91.52cd :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6587: śaṅkhaṃ prādhmāpayām āsa śārṅgadhanvā gadādharaḥ / HV_App.I,28.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6588: tasya śaṅkharavaṃ śrutvā narako yuddhadurmadaḥ / HV_App.I,28.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:6589: dhanur ādāya visphārya nādena mahatā tadā / HV_App.I,28.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:6590: nādayan rodasī yāyād yuddhāya narako balī // HV_App.I,28.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:6591: keśavaṃ purato dṛṣṭvā gadinaṃ śārṅgiṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,28.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:6592: uvāca narako daityaḥ ko bhavān kim ihāgataḥ / HV_App.I,28.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:6593: daityendro narakaḥ praṣṭā jetā śakrasya saṃyuge // HV_App.I,28.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:6594: ko 'yaṃ pakṣī sthitaḥ pārśve kaiṣā te vada sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,28.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:6595: enāṃ grahītum icchāmi jānīyāṃ yadi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,28.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:6596: evam ukto jagannāthaḥ prahasya suciraṃ tadā / HV_App.I,28.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:6597: ālokya satyabhāmāṃ tu vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,28.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:6598: vāsudevo 'smi daityendra yadi te śrutim āgataḥ / HV_App.I,28.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:6599: eṣā satrājitaḥ putrī bhāryā mama yavīyasī // HV_App.I,28.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:6600: eṣa tārkṣyo garutmāṃs tu vāhanaṃ mama daityapa / HV_App.I,28.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:6601: tvāṃ hantum iha saṃprāpto vadāmi kim ataḥ param // HV_App.I,28.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:6602: śrutvaitad dānavo ghoro vihasya suciraṃ tadā / HV_App.I,28.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:6603: vāsudevo 'si saṃprāpto māṃ hantuṃ kila yādava // HV_App.I,28.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:6604: diṣṭyā saṃprāptavān adya cintanīyaḥ sadā mayā / HV_App.I,28.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:6605: kadāsau dṛśyate yuddhe haniṣyāmīti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,28.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:6606: kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha yaduśreṣṭha kuru yuddhaṃ yadīcchasi / HV_App.I,28.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:6607: hatvā tvām adya saṃprāptam ānayāmi puraṃ mama // HV_App.I,28.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6608: enāṃ padmapalāśākṣīṃ yudhyatāṃ kiṃ vilambase / HV_App.I,28.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:6612: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 28A transliterated by Eva De Clercq;
GE07hv_apppu:6614: [k: D3.6 T G1.3-5 M4 G(ed.) ins. after 91.55, M1-3 after 91.53 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6617: garuḍaṃ pothayām āsa śarāṇāṃ ca paraḥśataiḥ / HV_App.I,28A.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:6620: iti saṃcintya manasā śarair vivyādha pañcabhiḥ / HV_App.I,28A.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:6621: aṣṭābhir dānavaṃ viṣṇur navabhiś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:6622: dānavo 'pi mahārāja vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6624: ṣaḍbhir vivyādha nārācair dānavaṃ devakīsutaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:6625: dānavo 'pi jagannāthaṃ śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:6626: tau tu yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ cakratur yuddhalālasau / HV_App.I,28A.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:6627: yathā devāsure yuddhe purā śambaravāsavau / HV_App.I,28A.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:6628: yathā yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ rāmarāvaṇayor bhuvi // HV_App.I,28A.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:6629: tataḥ kruddho hṛṣīkeśaḥ śareṇa nataparvaṇā / HV_App.I,28A.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:6630: dhvajaṃ vivyādha rājendra narakasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:6631: tam antare sarai rājan vivyādha yudhi dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:6634: vivyādha garuḍaṃ rājan nārācena mahāmatiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6635: vivyadhe garuḍas tasya nārācena samāhataḥ / HV_App.I,28A.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:6636: susrāva rudhiraṃ ghoraṃ vāsudevasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,28A.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:6637: pakṣe samāhataḥ pakṣī cacāla ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6639: pakṣeṇa pakṣiṇāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pothayām āsa dānavam // HV_App.I,28A.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:6640: āhatya sahasā bhūya ājaghne dṛḍhamuṣṭinā / HV_App.I,28A.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:6641: tataś cacāla narako narakeṇeva kilbiṣī // HV_App.I,28A.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:6642: tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā vyāvidhya ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:6644: ākarṇapūrṇam ākṛṣya jaghāna harim īśvaram // HV_App.I,28A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6645: nārācaḥ sa ca rājendra lalāṭe prāpatat tadā / HV_App.I,28A.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:6646: cacāla ca jagannāthas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:6647: visaṃjñaś ca tato bhūtvā rathopastha upāviśat // HV_App.I,28A.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:6648: satyabhāmā ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsudevaṃ tathāgatam / HV_App.I,28A.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:6649: cāmarair vījayām āsa pakṣābhyāṃ pakṣipuṃgavaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:6650: āśvasto 'tha hṛṣīkeśaḥ saṃjñāṃ prāpya ca keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:6651: dhanus tasyai tato dattvā śārṅgaṃ bhārasahaṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,28A.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:6652: yudhyasva narakaṃ devi śrānto 'smi yudhi pīḍitaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:6653: evam uktā tadā devī satyā satyavatāṃ varā / HV_App.I,28A.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:6654: tadā yuddhaṃ samārebhe narakeṇa durātmanā // HV_App.I,28A.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:6655: nārācair ardhacandraiś ca bhallaiḥ suniśitair api / HV_App.I,28A.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:6656: jaghāna dānavaṃ satyā mahiṣī śārṅgadhanvanaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:6657: babādha dānavaṃ satyā satyaṃ satyetaraṃ yathā // HV_App.I,28A.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:6658: yudhyantīṃ tāṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā narako dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:6659: stanamadhye 'tha tasyās tu samājaghne śarottamaiḥ / HV_App.I,28A.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:6660: bāhvantare tathā ṣaḍbhiḥ pārśve saptabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:6661: satyabhāmā tataḥ kruddhā bāṇena niśitena ca / HV_App.I,28A.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:6662: dhanuś ciccheda tasyāpi narakasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:6663: dhvajaṃ chatraṃ tathā yaṣṭiṃ ratham aśvās tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,28A.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:6664: etān dvidhākarot sarvān satyabhāmā balānvitā // HV_App.I,28A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:6665: punar anyan mahaccāpam ādade dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:6666: tac cāpi cicchide cāpaṃ mahiṣī śārṅgadhanvanaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:6667: punar anyat samādatte dvidhā tac cāpi sākarot // HV_App.I,28A.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:6668: tataḥ sa dānavaḥ kruddho gadāṃ suniśitāṃ tadā / HV_App.I,28A.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:6669: ādāya prāhiṇot tasyai vāsudevasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,28A.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:6670: tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya tilaśaḥ sākarot tadā / HV_App.I,28A.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:6671: tataḥ śaktiṃ samādāya tasyai dātuṃ pracakrame // HV_App.I,28A.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:6673: tāṃ cāpi tilaśaḥ kṛtvā sasvaraṃ prajahāsa ca // HV_App.I,28A.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:6674: tataḥ parigham ādāya vyāvidhya narakas tadā / HV_App.I,28A.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:6675: prāhiṇoc ca tadā tasyai sāntare nijaghāna ha / HV_App.I,28A.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:6676: śaraiś ca niśitai rājan satyā vivyādha dānavam // HV_App.I,28A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:6677: tuṣṭuvuś ca tadā satyāṃ keśavaprāṇavallabhām / HV_App.I,28A.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:6678: divi sthitā devagaṇā ṛṣayaś ca tathāmalāḥ // HV_App.I,28A.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:6679: sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyāc chareṇa nirakṛntata / HV_App.I,28A.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:6680: śaktir bhagavato devī vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,28A.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:6681: tatra prīto mahāviṣṇuḥ pariṣvajya ca tāṃ vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,28A.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:6683: mahāviṣṇuḥ sasvaje tāṃ satyabhāmāṃ priyāṃ tadā / **HV_App.I,28A.65**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6684: śramāmbhaś cāpi tasyās tu mārjayām āsa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:6685: tasyās tu kaṇṭhābharaṇaṃ dadau prīto janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:6686: na dattam atha rukmiṇyā dattaṃ tasyā mahātmanā / HV_App.I,28A.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:6687: mahārghaṃ lokavikhyātaṃ hṛtaṃ balimukhe tadā // HV_App.I,28A.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:6688: satyabhāmā tad ādāya bhūṣaṇaṃ lokaviśrutam / HV_App.I,28A.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:6689: badhvā kaṇṭhe tadā devī rarāja bahuśaḥ śubhā // HV_App.I,28A.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:6690: asakṛd yācamānāpi vihāre śayane tathā / HV_App.I,28A.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:6691: na hi labdhavatī pūrva tadā labdhaṃ jarārdanāt // HV_App.I,28A.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:6692: sthīyatāṃ sāṃprataṃ devi śramārtāsi varānane / HV_App.I,28A.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:6693: ity uktvā dhanur ādāya yuyudhe dānavaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,28A.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:6694: narako ratham āruhya sadhvajaṃ sapatākinam / HV_App.I,28A.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:6695: ādāya paramaṃ cāpaṃ bāṇair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:6696: sa vāsudevam āvidhya satyāṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,28A.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:6697: garuḍaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā vāsudevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:6698: atho jagatpatir devaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃprati dānave / HV_App.I,28A.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:6699: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ dhanuś ciccheda tasya hi / HV_App.I,28A.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:6700: rathaṃ ca sārathiṃ cāpi jaghāna yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:6701: tataḥ kruddho rathāt tasmād āplutya narakas tadā / HV_App.I,28A.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:6702: gadām ādāya govindaṃ jaghānāvidhya vakṣasi / HV_App.I,28A.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:6703: garuḍaṃ pothayam āsa talena narakas tadā // HV_App.I,28A.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:6704: punaḥ parigham ādāya vāsudevaṃ samabhyayāt / HV_App.I,28A.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:6706: tataḥ śilāḥ samādāya prāhiṇod yadunandanam / HV_App.I,28A.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:6707: tāś ca sarvāḥ samājaghne śaraiḥ śārṅgaviniḥsṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:6708: śailair vṛkṣais tathā pāśair gadāparighapaṭṭasaiḥ / HV_App.I,28A.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:6710: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ narake dānaveśvare // HV_App.I,28A.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:6715: hantum aicchaj jagannātho narakaṃ dānaveśvaram // HV_App.I,28A.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:6719: narakaṃ sādhuvidviṣṭaṃ dviṣṭaṃ munigaṇaiḥ sadā / HV_App.I,28A.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:6720: pradīptacakraṃ cakreṇa kṣiptena niśitena ca // HV_App.I,28A.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:6722: dvidhā ciccheda lokeśaḥ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,28A.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:6732: [k: After 92.70, K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 29)
GE07hv_apppu:6733: , Ñ1 ins. this after App. I (No. 42). :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6735: prādurbhāve muniśreṣṭha māthure caritaṃ śubham / HV_App.I,29.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6736: [k: M4 om. the ref. T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 ins. after the ref.;
GE07hv_apppu:6740: tad vadāśu guro mahyam aviglānaṃ kathaṃ hariḥ // **HV_App.I,29.1**1:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:6741: śṛṇvan vai nādhigacchāmi tṛptiṃ kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:6742: dvārakāyāṃ nivasataḥ kṛtadārasya yad guṇam / HV_App.I,29.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:6743: caritaṃ brūhi kṛṣṇasya sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava // HV_App.I,29.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:6746: nibodha caritaṃ citraṃ tasyaiva sadṛśaṃ prabhoḥ // HV_App.I,29.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:6748: rukmiṇyā sahito devyā yayau raivatakaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,29.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6750: tarpayiṣyan svayaṃ viprāñ jagāma madhusūdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:6751: kumārāḥ prayayus tatra putrā bhrātara eva ca / HV_App.I,29.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:6753: ṣoḍaśa strīsahasrāṇi jagmur eva ca dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,29.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:6754: ṛddhyā paramayā rājan viṣṇor evānurūpayā // HV_App.I,29.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:6755: tatas tatra dvijātīnāṃ kāmān prādād adhokṣajaḥ / HV_App.I,29.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:6758: yaunaiḥ śrautaiś ca mākhaiś ca śuddhānāṃ kurunandana // HV_App.I,29.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6759: tarpayitvā dvijān kāmair iṣṭair iṣṭaḥ satāṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,29.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:6760: jñātīn saṃtarpayām āsa yathārhaṃ dharmavatsalaḥ // HV_App.I,29.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:6764: kadācid atha rukmiṇyā vasan gehe janārdanaḥ / **HV_App.I,29.21**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6765: bahu mene priyāṃ bhāryāṃ rukmiṇīṃ bhīṣmakātmajām // HV_App.I,29.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:6768: āgataṃ cāprameyātmā munim indrānujas tadā / HV_App.I,29.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:6769: śāstradṛṣṭena vidhinā arcayām āsa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:6770: so 'rcito vāsudevena munir arcyatamaḥ satām / HV_App.I,29.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:6771: pārijātataroḥ puṣpaṃ dadau kṛṣṇāya bhārata // HV_App.I,29.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6772: tad vṛkṣarājakusumaṃ rukmiṇyāḥ pradadau hariḥ / HV_App.I,29.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:6773: pārśvasthā sā hi kṛṣṇasya bhojyā naravarābhavat // HV_App.I,29.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:6774: pratigṛhya tu tat puṣpaṃ kāmāraṇir aninditā / HV_App.I,29.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:6777: śuśubhe tena puṣpeṇa dviguṇaṃ rukmiṇī tadā // HV_App.I,29.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6778: tāṃ nāradas tathovāca munir brahmasutas tadā / HV_App.I,29.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:6779: tavaivaupayikaṃ puṣpam ekaṃ devi pativrate // HV_App.I,29.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:6780: alaṃkṛtaṃ puṣpam etat saṃsargāt tava sarvathā / HV_App.I,29.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:6781: atyarhā ca matā me tvam etat puṣpaṃ dhṛtavrate // HV_App.I,29.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:6783: amlānam etat satataṃ puṣpaṃ bhavati kāmini // HV_App.I,29.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:6785: īpsitān api gandhāṃś ca dadāti vadatāṃ vare // HV_App.I,29.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:6786: śītoṣṇe cepsite devi puṣpam etat prayacchati / HV_App.I,29.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:6787: sravaty api rasān devi manasā kāṅkṣitān varān // HV_App.I,29.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:6788: sevyamānaṃ ca saubhāgyaṃ dadāti varavarṇini / HV_App.I,29.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:6789: sravaty api tathā gandhān īpsitān prativardhanān // HV_App.I,29.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:6790: yāni yāni ca puṣpāṇi tvaṃ devy abhilaṣiṣyasi / HV_App.I,29.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:6791: kusumaṃ vṛkṣarājasya tāni tāni pradāsyati // HV_App.I,29.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:6792: etad eva bhagādhānaṃ dharmiṣṭhe dharmadaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:6793: matiṃ ca nāśubhe dhatte dhāryamāṇaṃ sadā śubhe // HV_App.I,29.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:6794: yad yad icchasi varṇaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyati / HV_App.I,29.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:6795: svalpaṃ vā yadi vā sthūlaṃ chandatas te bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:6797: pradīpakarma rātrau ca karoti kamalekṣaṇe // HV_App.I,29.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:6800: bubhukṣā vā pipāsā vā glānir vāpy atha vā jarā / HV_App.I,29.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:6801: devy etaddhārayantyās te svacchandena bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:6802: anugītāni gītāni dāsyaty api ca cintite / HV_App.I,29.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:6803: suvāditrān sumadhurāṃs tathaiva tava saṃmatān // HV_App.I,29.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:6804: pūrṇe saṃvatsare devi puṣpam etat tavāntikāt / HV_App.I,29.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:6807: kṛtir eṣā hi bhadraṃ te pārijātasya suprabhe / HV_App.I,29.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:6810: dhārayed īśvarī nityaṃ puṣpāṇy etāni suprabhe // HV_App.I,29.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:6812: sāvitrī vedamātā ca śrīś ca sarvaguṇodite // HV_App.I,29.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:6813: devapatnyas tathaivānyā devāś ca vasudevatāḥ / HV_App.I,29.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:6814: saṃvatsaraḥ paraḥ kālaḥ sarveṣāṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:6815: ṣoḍaśastrīsahasrāṇāṃ madhye tvaṃ khalu vartase / HV_App.I,29.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:6816: adyeṣṭāṃ vāsudevasya vedmi tvāṃ bhojanandini // HV_App.I,29.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:6817: sapatnyas te guṇopete sarvāḥ sarveśvarapriye / HV_App.I,29.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:6819: prakāśam adya saubhāgyam anivāryaṃ yaśaś ca te / HV_App.I,29.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:6820: mandārakusumaṃ dattaṃ yat te madhunighātinā // HV_App.I,29.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6821: adya sātrājitī devī jñāsyate varavarṇinī / HV_App.I,29.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:6822: saubhāgyāḍhyaṃ sadā vetti yātmānaṃ subhagā satī // HV_App.I,29.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:6823: sāmbamātātha gāndhārī bhāryāś cānyā mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:6825: saubhāgyaikaratho jaitras tava devy adya niḥsṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,29.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:6826: manoratharathānāṃ yaḥ sahasrair api durjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:6828: ātmā dvitīyaḥ kṛṣṇasya bhoje tvam iti bhāmini // HV_App.I,29.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:6830: jīvitātiśayas tena tvayā prāpto haripriye // HV_App.I,29.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:6831: nāradenaivam uktaṃ tu tathyaṃ vākyaṃ narādhipa / HV_App.I,29.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:6832: tatrasthāḥ śuśruvuḥ preṣyāḥ preṣitāḥ satyabhāmayā // HV_App.I,29.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:6833: devīnāṃ ca tathānyāsāṃ sapatnīnāṃ viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:6834: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ saviśeṣaṃ ca nāradenābhyudāhṛtam // HV_App.I,29.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:6835: tac ca śrutvā sunikhilaṃ preṣyābhiḥ strīsvabhāvataḥ / HV_App.I,29.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:6836: prakāśīkṛtam evāsīd viṣṇor antaḥpure tadā // HV_App.I,29.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:6837: karṇākarṇi tato devyaḥ kaulīnam iva sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,29.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:6839: arheti putramāteti jyeṣṭheti ca samāgatāḥ / HV_App.I,29.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:6840: prāyeṇa pravadanti sma hṛṣṭā dāmodarastriyaḥ // HV_App.I,29.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:6841: mamṛṣe na sapatnyās tu tat saubhāgyaguṇodayam / HV_App.I,29.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:6844: satyabhāmā priyā nityaṃ viṣṇor atulatejasaḥ // HV_App.I,29.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:6848: sā śubhaṃ kauṅkumaṃ vāsaḥ samutsṛjya śucismitā / **HV_App.I,29.100**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6853: vahneḥ śikhā śrīr iva vardhitendhanā // HV_App.I,29.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:6872: upaviṣṭaṃ muniṃ jñātvā rukmiṇyā saha keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:6874: jagāma tvaritaś caiva satyabhāmāgṛhaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,29.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:6876: abhimānavatīm iṣṭāṃ prāṇair api garīyasīm / HV_App.I,29.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:6877: jānan sātrājitīṃ viṣṇur viveśa śanakair iva // HV_App.I,29.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:6878: ruṣitām iva tāṃ devīṃ snehāt saṃkalpayann iva / HV_App.I,29.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:6880: dārukaṃ dvāradeśe tu tiṣṭhety uktvā viveśa ha / HV_App.I,29.129 /
GE07hv_apppu:6882: sa dadarśa priyāṃ dūrat krodhāgāragatāṃ tadā / HV_App.I,29.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:6883: preṣyāmadhyasthitāṃ krodhān niḥśvasantīṃ muhur muhur // HV_App.I,29.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:6885: saṃśleṣayitvā niḥśvasya viharantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:6887: kṛtvā pṛṣṭhe 'tha vadanaṃ vihasantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:6888: karapadme punaḥ śaśvan mukhapadmaṃ niveśya ca / HV_App.I,29.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:6890: [k: for line 138, V3 D3.4 G2 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6892: sarasaṃ candanaṃ gṛhya preṣyāhastād aninditām / HV_App.I,29.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:6893: prasādhayitvā hṛdayaṃ kṣipantīṃ nirdayaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:6894: punar utthāya śayanāt patantīṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:6895: tās tāś ceṣṭās tathānyāś ca priyāyā dadṛśe hariḥ // HV_App.I,29.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:6896: avaguṇṭhya yadā vaktram upadhāne nyaveśayat / HV_App.I,29.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:6897: idam antaram ity eva tato matvā janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:6898: preṣyājanaṃ samājñāpya anākhyeyo śmi saṃjñayā / HV_App.I,29.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:6899: saśaṅkitapracāraś ca tvarito 'nvagamac ca tām // HV_App.I,29.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:6900: jagrāha vyajanaṃ caiva sthitvā sa paripārśvataḥ / HV_App.I,29.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:6901: śanair avāsṛjad vātaṃ jahāsa śanakair iva // HV_App.I,29.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:6903: babhāra bhagavān gandhaṃ divyaṃ mānuṣadurlabham // HV_App.I,29.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:6904: atyadbhutaṃ sugandhaṃ ca jighritvā vismayānvitā / HV_App.I,29.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:6905: apāvṛṇon mukhaṃ satyā kim etad iti cābravīt // HV_App.I,29.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:6906: sotthitā pṛṣṭhato devam apaśyantī suvismitā / HV_App.I,29.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:6907: paryapṛcchad atho preṣyā gandhasya prabhavaḥ tadā // HV_App.I,29.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:6908: tāḥ pṛṣṭās tv aprabhāṣantyo jānubhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,29.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:6909: adhomukhyas tatas tasthuḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭās tadā // HV_App.I,29.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:6910: tad apūrvam adṛṣṭvaiva gandhaṃ muñcati medinīm / HV_App.I,29.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:6911: katham ekataras tasyā gandho 'yam udabhūt khalu // HV_App.I,29.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:6912: kiṃ tv idaṃ syād iti ca sā vivekṣantī samantataḥ / HV_App.I,29.159 /
GE07hv_apppu:6913: dadṛśe keśavaṃ devī sahasā lokabhāvanam // HV_App.I,29.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:6917: muhūrtam asitāpāṅgī tasthāv anyamukhī śubhā // HV_App.I,29.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:6918: nibadhya bhrūkuṭīṃ vāmāṃ samyag utkṣipya locane / HV_App.I,29.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:6919: niveśya vadanaṃ haste śobhasīty abravīd dharim // HV_App.I,29.166 //
GE07hv_apppu:6920: tasyāḥ susrāva netrābhyāṃ vāri praṇayakopajam / HV_App.I,29.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:6922: samutpatya jalaṃ tatra patitaṃ vadanāmbujāt / HV_App.I,29.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:6923: pratijagrāha padmākṣaḥ karābhyām api satvaram // HV_App.I,29.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:6926: sravaty asitapatrākṣi kimarthaṃ tava bhāmini / HV_App.I,29.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:6927: toyaṃ sundari netrābhyāṃ puṣkarābhyām ivodakam // HV_App.I,29.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:6928: prabhāte pūrṇacandrasya madhyāhne paṅkajasya ca / HV_App.I,29.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:6929: bibharti tava kiṃ vaktraṃ vapur mama manoharam // HV_App.I,29.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:6930: kimarthaṃ kauṅkumaṃ vāso mahārajatam eva ca / HV_App.I,29.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:6933: devābhigamanād ūrdhvaṃ śuklaṃ neṣṭaṃ hi te priye // HV_App.I,29.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:6934: kiṃ cānābharaṇaṃ gātraṃ sugātri tava kathyatām / HV_App.I,29.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:6935: citrakasthānam ākrāntaṃ kasmāc ca varavarṇini // HV_App.I,29.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:6936: śvetena tava paṭṭena vāsasā priyadarśane / HV_App.I,29.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:6937: lalāṭaṃ sevyate kasmāc candanena sugandhinā // HV_App.I,29.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:6940: karoṣi mama cātyarthaṃ mano glāpayasi priye // HV_App.I,29.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:6943: ratnasyābharaṇair muktā tava grīvā na śobhate / HV_App.I,29.190 /
GE07hv_apppu:6946: kim u nābhāṣase mādya sukhenotpalagandhinā // HV_App.I,29.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:6947: ardhākṣṇāpi hi tāvan māṃ kimarthaṃ na nirīkṣase / HV_App.I,29.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:6948: muñcasy eva saniḥśvāsaṃ toyam añjanadurdinam // HV_App.I,29.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:6950: jalam añjanakalmāṣaṃ mā mokṣīr ānanadviṣam // HV_App.I,29.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:6951: tvadīyo 'haṃ yadā devi khyāto jagati kiṃkaraḥ / HV_App.I,29.198 /
GE07hv_apppu:6952: nājñāpayasi māṃ kiṃ tvaṃ pureva varavarṇini // HV_App.I,29.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:6953: kim akārṣam ahaṃ devi vipriyaṃ tava bhāmini / HV_App.I,29.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:6955: manasā karmaṇā vācā na tvām aticarāmy aham / HV_App.I,29.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:6956: sarvathā sarvacārvaṅgi satyam etad bravīmy aham // HV_App.I,29.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:6958: dvitīyaṃ na hi me kiṃcid uktaṃ yan meti nāgare // **HV_App.I,29.203**6:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:6959: bahumāno mamānyāsu strīṣu sarvāsu śobhane / HV_App.I,29.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:6960: snehaś ca bahumānaś ca tvām ṛte 'nyāsu nāsti me // HV_App.I,29.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:6961: naiva tvāṃ madano jahyād amṛte mayi māmakaḥ / HV_App.I,29.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:6962: iti me niścitaṃ viddhi cetaḥ surasutopame // HV_App.I,29.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:6964: niścitaṃ viddhi ceto me tvayi nityaṃ suniścalam // **HV_App.I,29.207**7:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:6965: kṣamādayaś ca medinyāṃ śabdādyāś cāmbare guṇāḥ / HV_App.I,29.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:6967: gandho guṇaś ca medinyā khe śabdaś ca yathā guṇaḥ / **HV_App.I,29.208**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6968: dhruvaṃ paṅkajagarbhābhe tvayi snehas tathā mama // HV_App.I,29.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:6969: rucir agnau yathā divyā prabhā caiva divākare / HV_App.I,29.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:6970: kāntiś ca cāśvatī candre snehas tvayi tathā mama // HV_App.I,29.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:6972: śanair uvāca netrābhyāṃ pramṛjya subhagā jalam // HV_App.I,29.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:6973: madīyas tvam iti hy āsīn mama nityaṃ manaḥ prabho / HV_App.I,29.214 /
GE07hv_apppu:6974: adya sādhāraṇasnehas tvam ity avagatā hy aham // HV_App.I,29.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:6975: nājñāsiṣam ahaṃ pūrvam anityaṃ kālaparyayam / HV_App.I,29.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:6976: adya lokagatiṃ kṛtsnām avagacchāmi na dhruvām // HV_App.I,29.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:6978: adyālokya gatiṃ kṛtsnāṃ maivaṃ jānāmi vā dhruvam // **HV_App.I,29.217**9:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:6979: amṛtāyā dvitīyaṃ hi janmedaṃ mama sarvathā / HV_App.I,29.218 /
GE07hv_apppu:6980: kim atra bahunoktena hṛdayaṃ vetti te 'cyuta // HV_App.I,29.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:6981: vāṅmātram iva paśyāmi mādhuryaṃ saṃprayujyate / HV_App.I,29.220 /
GE07hv_apppu:6982: mayi snehaś ca kṛtakas tavānyatra na kṛtrimaḥ // HV_App.I,29.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:6983: ṛjusvabhāvāṃ bhaktāṃ ca sarvathā puruṣottama / HV_App.I,29.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:6984: avajānāsi jānan māṃ kaitavīṃ vṛttim āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:6985: etāvat khalu paryāptaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam adya yat / HV_App.I,29.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:6986: śrutaṃ vāpy atha vā śrāvyaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ snehaphalodayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:6987: yadi tv aham anugrāhyā mām anujñātum arhasi / HV_App.I,29.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:6988: tapasyeyaṃ paraṃ kṛtvā niścayaṃ puruṣottama // HV_App.I,29.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:6989: bhartuś chandena nārīṇāṃ tapo vā vratakāni vā / HV_App.I,29.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:6990: niṣphalaṃ khalu yad bhartur acchandena kriyeta yat // HV_App.I,29.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:6991: itīdam uktvā punar eva śobhanā @ HV_App.I,29.230 @
GE07hv_apppu:6997: nārāyaṇaḥ satyabhāmāṃ punar evātha bhārata / HV_App.I,29.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:6998: provāca praṇayāt kruddhām abhimānavatīṃ satīm // HV_App.I,29.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:7000: kim u tatkāraṇaṃ yena tvam evam ativiklavā // HV_App.I,29.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:7001: śāpitāsi mama prāṇair ācakṣvānatyayo yadi / HV_App.I,29.238 /
GE07hv_apppu:7002: śrotavyaṃ yadi bhaktena bhartrā sarvāṅgaśobhane // HV_App.I,29.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:7003: tataḥ provāca bhartāraṃ satyā satyavrate sthitam / HV_App.I,29.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:7005: tvayaiva sthāpitaṃ pūrvaṃ saubhāgyaṃ mama mānada / HV_App.I,29.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:7006: jagaty amalapatrākṣe tat khyātaṃ keśināśana // HV_App.I,29.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:7007: śiro vahāmi ceṣṭatvāt tavāhaṃ deva garvitā / HV_App.I,29.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:7009: sāham adyāvahāsyāsmi sapatnīnāṃ janasya ca / HV_App.I,29.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:7010: iti preṣyābhir ākhyātaṃ śrutvā tathyaṃ tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,29.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:7011: yat pārijātakusumaṃ dattavān nāradas tava / HV_App.I,29.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:7012: tat kileṣṭajane dattaṃ tvayāhaṃ parivarjitā // HV_App.I,29.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:7014: snehaś ca bahumānaś ca prakāśaṃ gamitas tvayā // HV_App.I,29.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:7015: tām astauṣīt samakṣaṃ te priyāṃ sa kila nāradaḥ / HV_App.I,29.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:7016: tam aśrauṣīś ca hṛṣṭas tvaṃ priyāyāḥ saṃstavaṃ kila // HV_App.I,29.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:7017: stotavyā yadi tāvat sā nāradena tavāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,29.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:7018: durbhago 'yaṃ janas tatra kimartham anuśabditaḥ // HV_App.I,29.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:7019: praṇayasya rasaṃ dattvā paścāttāpaḥ prabho yadi / HV_App.I,29.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:7020: anujñāṃ me prayacchasva tapaḥ kartuṃ prasīda me // HV_App.I,29.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:7021: svapnenāpi na dṛṣṭvāhaṃ śraddadhyāṃ puṣkarekṣaṇa / HV_App.I,29.258 /
GE07hv_apppu:7022: yad anyad eva nirvṛttam aśrauṣaṃ paśyatas tava // HV_App.I,29.259 //
GE07hv_apppu:7023: kāmaḥ kāmaṃ tu tasyaiva muner atulatejasaḥ / HV_App.I,29.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:7024: atra manyus tu me deva sāṃnidhyaṃ tava tatra yat // HV_App.I,29.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:7025: mānārthaṃ jīvyate loke sadbhir ity uktavān asi / HV_App.I,29.262 /
GE07hv_apppu:7026: tad evaṃ sati necchāmi jīvituṃ mānavarjitā // HV_App.I,29.263 //
GE07hv_apppu:7027: mamābhavad yato rakṣā bhayam adya tato mama / HV_App.I,29.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:7028: sarvato rakṣate yo māṃ sa māṃ nādyābhirakṣati // HV_App.I,29.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:7029: hā gatiṃ kāṃ gamiṣyāmi tyaktā deva tvayā vibho / HV_App.I,29.266 /
GE07hv_apppu:7030: kumudvatīgatāṃ nūnaṃ gatiṃ yāsyāmy asaṃgatā // HV_App.I,29.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:7031: kim akārṣam ahaṃ mohād īśvarāṇāṃ priyāpriyam / HV_App.I,29.268 /
GE07hv_apppu:7032: priyā bhūtvāpriyā bhūtā yad ahaṃ tava mānada // HV_App.I,29.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:7033: vasantakusumaiś citraṃ sadā raivatakaṃ girim / HV_App.I,29.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:7034: priyā bhūtvāpriyā bhūtā kathaṃ drakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29.271 //
GE07hv_apppu:7036: kathaṃ nāmānilaṃ dveṣyā seveyaṃ durbhagā satī // HV_App.I,29.273 //
GE07hv_apppu:7037: jalakrīḍāṃ tavāṅkasthā deva kṛtvā mahodadhau / HV_App.I,29.274 /
GE07hv_apppu:7038: kathaṃ daurbhāgyam āpannā paśyeyam api sāgaram // HV_App.I,29.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:7039: sātrājiti priyā nānyā tvatto me 'stīti viddhi mām / HV_App.I,29.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:7040: tvam avocaḥ kva tad yātam atha vā kaḥ smariṣyati // HV_App.I,29.277 //
GE07hv_apppu:7042: mām uvāca bhavāṃs tathyaṃ na nūnam iti cintaye // **HV_App.I,29.277**10:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:7043: yad adrākṣīd dhi māṃ śvaśrūr bahumānena nandinīm / HV_App.I,29.278 /
GE07hv_apppu:7044: avajñātā tvayā rājñī nūnaṃ daurbhāgyakīrtitā // HV_App.I,29.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:7045: kiṃ nu gūḍhena me premṇā susnigdhenāpi mānada / HV_App.I,29.280 /
GE07hv_apppu:7046: yat samānāṃ janair devo māṃ na paśyati nityadā // HV_App.I,29.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:7047: nāhaṃ tvāṃ kitavaṃ dhūrtam ajñāsiṣam ariṃdama / HV_App.I,29.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:7048: adya jñāto 'si tatpakṣaś cañcalo janavañcakaḥ // HV_App.I,29.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:7050: cora jñāto 'si tatpakṣo vāṅmātramadhuraḥ śaṭhaḥ // HV_App.I,29.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:7051: evam īrśyāvaśaṃ prāptāṃ devīṃ sātrājitīṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,29.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:7053: maivaṃ padmapalāśākṣi mameśvari vada priye / HV_App.I,29.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:7054: kim atra bahunoktena tvadīyam avagaccha mām // HV_App.I,29.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:7055: tat pārijātakusumaṃ tasyā devi mamāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,29.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:7056: nārado matpriyaṃ kurvan munir akliṣṭakarmakṛt // HV_App.I,29.291 //
GE07hv_apppu:7057: dākṣiṇyād anurodhāc ca dattavān nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,29.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:7060: tadā dātāsmi suśroṇi satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_App.I,29.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:7062: gṛhe te sthāpayiṣyāmi yāvatkālaṃ tvam icchasi // HV_App.I,29.297 //
GE07hv_apppu:7063: evam uktvā tu hariṇā provāca harivallabhā / HV_App.I,29.298 /
GE07hv_apppu:7064: yady evaṃ sa drumaḥ śakya ihānayitum acyuta // HV_App.I,29.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:7065: manyur eṣa pramṛṣṭo hi bhaved bahuguṇo mama / HV_App.I,29.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:7066: sīmantinīnāṃ sarvāsām adhikā syām adhokṣaja // HV_App.I,29.301 //
GE07hv_apppu:7067: tathāstu prathamaḥ kalpa iti tāṃ madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.302 /
GE07hv_apppu:7071: tataḥ snāto jagannāthaḥ sarveśaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.306 /
GE07hv_apppu:7073: dadhyau ca nāradaṃ devaḥ snāto devamuniṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,29.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:7075: tam āgataṃ narapate satāṃ gatir adhokṣajaḥ / HV_App.I,29.310 /
GE07hv_apppu:7076: satyayā saha dharmātmā yathāvidhim apūjayat // HV_App.I,29.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:7077: pādau prakṣālayāṃ cakre muneḥ sātrājitī svayam / HV_App.I,29.312 /
GE07hv_apppu:7078: jalaṃ devaḥ svayaṃ kṛṣṇo bhṛṅgāreṇa dadau tadā // HV_App.I,29.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:7080: paramānnaṃ sa munaye prayatātmā jagadguruḥ // HV_App.I,29.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:7081: tal lokakartrā satkṛtya dattaṃ munir udāradhīḥ / HV_App.I,29.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:7082: bubhuje vadatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śraddhayā parayānvitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:7083: upaspṛśya tatas tṛptaḥ pradadau cāśiṣaḥ prabhoḥ / HV_App.I,29.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:7084: tāś ca prītena manasā pratijagrāha keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:7085: tataḥ sātrājitīṃ devīṃ praṇatāṃ nārado 'bravīt / HV_App.I,29.320 /
GE07hv_apppu:7086: prasārya dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ sajalaṃ jalajekṣaṇām // HV_App.I,29.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:7087: yathedānīṃ tathaiva tvaṃ bhava devi pativratā / HV_App.I,29.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:7088: saviśeṣaṃ ca subhagā bhava tvaṃ tapaso balāt // HV_App.I,29.323 //
GE07hv_apppu:7089: ity uktā munimukhyena satyabhāmā haripriyā / HV_App.I,29.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:7090: uttasthau mahatā yuktā harṣeṇa tu narādhipa // HV_App.I,29.325 //
GE07hv_apppu:7091: sa kṛṣṇo 'py abhyanujñāṃ tu labdhvā munivarāt tadā / HV_App.I,29.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:7093: tatas tv āvaśyakaṃ kṛtvā satyabhāmāpi bhārata / HV_App.I,29.328 /
GE07hv_apppu:7094: anujñayā tadā bhartur viveśāntargṛhaṃ mudā // HV_App.I,29.329 //
GE07hv_apppu:7096: sthitā pārśve ca kṛṣṇasya namaskṛtvā mahātmane // HV_App.I,29.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:7097: tato muhūrtam āsitvā nāradaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt / HV_App.I,29.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:7098: āpṛcche tvāṃ gamiṣyāmi śakralokam adhokṣaja // HV_App.I,29.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:7099: tatrādyaṃ devam īśānaṃ namaskṛtya maheśvaram / HV_App.I,29.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:7102: māsi māsy ucitaṃ hy etan mahendrasadane vibho / HV_App.I,29.336 /
GE07hv_apppu:7103: pūjārthaṃ devadevasya gāndharvaṃ nṛtyam eva ca // HV_App.I,29.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:7104: antarhito devadevaḥ somaḥ sapravaro vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,29.338 /
GE07hv_apppu:7106: nimantrito 'haṃ pūrvedyuḥ puṣpaṃ dātuṃ mahādyute / HV_App.I,29.340 /
GE07hv_apppu:7107: pārijātasya bhadraṃ te tarurājño mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.341 //
GE07hv_apppu:7108: yad etad āhṛtaṃ svargāt tat tvadarthaṃ mayā vibho / HV_App.I,29.342 /
GE07hv_apppu:7110: iṣṭaḥ sa vṛkṣaḥ satataṃ śacyāḥ puṣkaralocana / HV_App.I,29.344 /
GE07hv_apppu:7111: saubhāgyam āvahaty eva pūjyamāno 'pi nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,29.345 //
GE07hv_apppu:7112: [k: T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 subst. for line 345 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:7114: puṇyaṃ kartuṃ tadā sṛṣṭaḥ pārijāto mahādrumaḥ / HV_App.I,29.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:7116: purādityā mahātejās toṣitaḥ kila kaśyapaḥ / HV_App.I,29.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:7117: vareṇa cchandayām āsa mārīcas tapaso nidhiḥ // HV_App.I,29.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:7118: sovāca subhagā yena bhaveyaṃ munisattama / HV_App.I,29.350 /
GE07hv_apppu:7119: svalaṃkṛtā kāmataś ca sarvair eva vibhūṣaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:7120: īpsitaṃ gītanṛtyaṃ ca bhaven mama tapodhana / HV_App.I,29.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:7121: kumārī nityadā caiva bhaveyaṃ tapasāṃ nidhe // HV_App.I,29.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:7122: virajāḥ śokarahitā bhaveyam api nityadā / HV_App.I,29.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:7123: patibhaktimatī caiva dharmaśīlā tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:7127: sarvapuṣpāṇi dṛśyante tasminn eva mahādrume // HV_App.I,29.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:7128: īdṛśāny asya puṣpāṇi bibharty ekātirūpiṇī / HV_App.I,29.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:7129: bahurūpāṇi cāpy anyā padmāni ca tathāparā // HV_App.I,29.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:7130: mandārād api vṛkṣāc ca sāras uddhṛtya kaśyapaḥ / HV_App.I,29.362 /
GE07hv_apppu:7131: tasmād eṣa taruśreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣāṃ śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:7134: tatas tatra nibadhyātha kaśyapaṃ pradadau śubhā / HV_App.I,29.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:7135: aditir mama puṇyārthaṃ saubhāgyārthaṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:7137: adityā kaśyapo dattaḥ puṇyārthaṃ ca tato mama / **HV_App.I,29.365**13:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7139: niṣkrayeṇa mayā muktaḥ kaśyapas tu tapodhanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.366 /
GE07hv_apppu:7140: indro dattas tathendrāṇyā saubhāgyārthaṃ tato mama // HV_App.I,29.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:7141: somaś cāpy atha rohiṇyā ṛddhyā ca dhanadas tathā / HV_App.I,29.368 /
GE07hv_apppu:7142: evaṃ saubhāgyado vṛkṣaḥ pārijāto na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:7144: mandārapuṣpair yad yukto mandāras tena kathyate // HV_App.I,29.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:7145: ko 'py ayaṃ dārur ity āhur ajānanto yato janāḥ / HV_App.I,29.372 /
GE07hv_apppu:7146: kovidāra iti khyātaḥ saṃtataḥ sa mahātaruḥ // HV_App.I,29.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:7147: mandāraḥ kovidāraś ca pārijātaś ca nāmabhiḥ / HV_App.I,29.374 /
GE07hv_apppu:7148: sa vṛkṣo jñāyate divyo yasyaitat kusumottamam // HV_App.I,29.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:7151: tato jigamiṣuṃ tatra nāradaṃ munisattamam / HV_App.I,29.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:7153: maharṣe dharmatattvajña svargaṃ gatvā tvayānagha / HV_App.I,29.378 /
GE07hv_apppu:7154: dṛṣṭvā sadasyān devasya tripuraghnasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:7156: saṃvarṇayitvā bhrātṛtvaṃ paurāṇaṃ vetsi yan mune // HV_App.I,29.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:7157: yad asrākṣīn muniśreṣṭho bhagavān kaśyapas tarum / HV_App.I,29.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:7159: sa puṇyam atisaubhāgyaṃ dadāti tarusattamaḥ / HV_App.I,29.384 /
GE07hv_apppu:7160: tava dattaṃ purā dānaṃ vrate ca tarusattamam // HV_App.I,29.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:7162: dattaṃ śrutvābhikāṅkṣanti dātuṃ patnyo mama prabho // HV_App.I,29.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:7163: puṇyārthaṃ dānadharmārthaṃ mama prītyartham eva ca / HV_App.I,29.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:7164: ānāyya ca dvāravatīṃ pārijātaṃ mahātarum // HV_App.I,29.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:7165: datte dāne punaḥ svargaṃ tatra taṃ nāyayiṣyasi / HV_App.I,29.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:7166: sa vācya evaṃ bhagavān balabhid bhagavaṃs tvayā // HV_App.I,29.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:7167: tathā tathā prayatnaś ca kāryo munivara tvayā / HV_App.I,29.392 /
GE07hv_apppu:7168: yathā taruvaraṃ dadyāt pārijātaṃ sureśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29.393 //
GE07hv_apppu:7169: tatra dūtaguṇaṃ tāvat paśyāmas te tapodhana / HV_App.I,29.394 /
GE07hv_apppu:7170: saṃbhāvyā sarvakṛtyānāṃ saṃpad dhi tvayi me matā // HV_App.I,29.395 //
GE07hv_apppu:7171: evaṃ nārāyaṇenokto nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / HV_App.I,29.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:7172: prahasyovāca keśighnam idaṃ vākyaṃ tapodhanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:7173: bāḍham evaṃ pravakṣyāmi yadumukhya sureśvaram / HV_App.I,29.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:7174: na tu dāsyati devendraḥ pārijātaṃ kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:7175: mandaraṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ dānavais tridaśais tathā / HV_App.I,29.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:7176: nikṣipya toyadhau pūrvaṃ pārijātaḥ samāhṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:7177: mandaraṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ nayituṃ preṣitaḥ purā / HV_App.I,29.402 /
GE07hv_apppu:7179: svayaṃ vijñāpito gatvā tataḥ śakreṇa śaṃkaraḥ / HV_App.I,29.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:7180: ākrīḍadruma udyāne śacyāḥ syād iti yācitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:7181: tathāstv iti varo datto mahādevena cānagha / HV_App.I,29.406 /
GE07hv_apppu:7182: na ca nītaḥ pārijāto mandaraṃ citrakandaram // HV_App.I,29.407 //
GE07hv_apppu:7183: krīḍāvṛkṣaḥ sa śacyeti vyapadeśena mokṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,29.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:7184: mahendreṇa mahābāho pārijātas taruḥ purā // HV_App.I,29.409 //
GE07hv_apppu:7187: na tatra sūryabhāḥ kṛṣṇa praviśanti nagottame / HV_App.I,29.412 /
GE07hv_apppu:7189: na ca candraprabhāḥ śītā naiva kṛṣṇa sadāgatiḥ // HV_App.I,29.413 //
GE07hv_apppu:7190: śītoṣṇe chandatas tatra śailaputryā bhavanti hi / HV_App.I,29.414 /
GE07hv_apppu:7191: svayaṃprabhaṃ vanaṃ tad dhi mahādevasya tejasā // HV_App.I,29.415 //
GE07hv_apppu:7193: māṃ cānyas tad vanaṃ divyaṃ na prayāti kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29.417 //
GE07hv_apppu:7194: sravanti tatra vārṣṇeya pārijātāḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,29.418 /
GE07hv_apppu:7195: sarvaratnāni mukhyāni manasā kāṅkṣitāni vai // HV_App.I,29.419 //
GE07hv_apppu:7196: gaṇās tāny upabhuñjanti pravarāṇāṃ mahātmanām / HV_App.I,29.420 /
GE07hv_apppu:7198: pārijātād bahuguṇaṃ phalaṃ teṣāṃ tathā dhanam / HV_App.I,29.422 /
GE07hv_apppu:7199: abhimānaṃ prabhā caiva guṇā bhūriguṇās tathā // HV_App.I,29.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:7200: mūrtimantaś ca te vṛkṣāḥ somaṃ devaṃ vṛṣadhvajam / HV_App.I,29.424 /
GE07hv_apppu:7201: upatiṣṭhanti satataṃ pravaraiḥ saha keśava // HV_App.I,29.425 //
GE07hv_apppu:7202: raudreṇa tejasā juṣṭā hīnā duḥkhaiḥ sukhānvitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.426 /
GE07hv_apppu:7203: taravo mandare te hi dayitāḥ śailakanyayā // HV_App.I,29.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:7204: praviveśāndhako nāma ghoras tatra mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29.428 /
GE07hv_apppu:7207: avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vṛtrād daśaguṇaṃ balī // HV_App.I,29.431 //
GE07hv_apppu:7208: evaṃ duḥkhena te deva pārijātaṃ pradāsyati / HV_App.I,29.432 /
GE07hv_apppu:7209: puṣkarākṣa sahasrākṣaḥ satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_App.I,29.433 //
GE07hv_apppu:7210: satataṃ sahito devyā śacyā sa hi varadrumaḥ / HV_App.I,29.434 /
GE07hv_apppu:7213: mune tad yujyate sādhu mahādevena dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29.436 /
GE07hv_apppu:7214: yac chacīṃ kāraṇaṃ kṛtvā na nītaḥ sa taruḥ purā // HV_App.I,29.437 //
GE07hv_apppu:7215: sa jyeṣṭhaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ lokakṛt prabhavo 'vyayaḥ / HV_App.I,29.438 /
GE07hv_apppu:7216: pārāvaryasya sadṛśaṃ kṛtavān iti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,29.439 //
GE07hv_apppu:7217: ahaṃ yavīyān devasya sarvathā balaghātinaḥ / HV_App.I,29.440 /
GE07hv_apppu:7218: lālanīyaś ca bhagavañ jayanta iva sattama // HV_App.I,29.441 //
GE07hv_apppu:7219: sarvathā bhagavāṃs tāvad upāyair bahuvistaraiḥ / HV_App.I,29.442 /
GE07hv_apppu:7220: karotu yatnaṃ prītyarthaṃ śakto hy asi tapodhana // HV_App.I,29.443 //
GE07hv_apppu:7221: mayā mune pratijñātaṃ puṇyārthaṃ satyabhāmayā / HV_App.I,29.444 /
GE07hv_apppu:7222: svargād ihānayiṣyāmi pārijātam iti prabho // HV_App.I,29.445 //
GE07hv_apppu:7223: mayā tad anṛtaṃ śakyaṃ kathaṃ kartuṃ tapodhana / HV_App.I,29.446 /
GE07hv_apppu:7224: nānṛtaṃ hi vaco vipra proktapūrvaṃ mayānagha / HV_App.I,29.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:7225: mayi bhagnapratijñe hi lokānāṃ saṃplavo bhavet // HV_App.I,29.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:7226: yan mayā hi muniśreṣṭha lokā dharmaguṇānvitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.449 /
GE07hv_apppu:7227: paripālyāḥ sthitau sarve sa kathaṃ hy anṛtaṃ vadet // HV_App.I,29.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:7229: na cāsurā naiva ca yakṣapannagāḥ / HV_App.I,29.452 /
GE07hv_apppu:7232: naiva yakṣapiśācāś ca na ca sarve 'pi pannagāḥ // **HV_App.I,29.452**14:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:7235: sa pārijātaṃ yadi na pradāsyati @ HV_App.I,29.455 @
GE07hv_apppu:7242: tvayāpi kāryaḥ khalu tatra niścayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:7245: nārado 'tha munir gatvā mahendrasadanaṃ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29.463 /
GE07hv_apppu:7246: tāṃ rātrim avasat tatra dadṛśe ca mahotsavam // HV_App.I,29.464 //
GE07hv_apppu:7247: tatrādityā mahātmāno vasavaś ca surottamāḥ / HV_App.I,29.465 /
GE07hv_apppu:7248: rājarṣayaś ca vidvāṃsaḥ svargatāḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:7249: nāgā yakṣāś ca siddhāś ca cāraṇāś ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29.467 /
GE07hv_apppu:7250: brahmarṣayaś ca śataśo devarṣimanavas tathā // HV_App.I,29.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:7251: suparṇāś ca mahātmāno marutaś ca mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,29.469 /
GE07hv_apppu:7252: divaukasāṃ nikāyāś ca śataśo 'nye samāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,29.470 //
GE07hv_apppu:7253: upary upari sarveṣāṃ somo devo maheśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29.471 /
GE07hv_apppu:7254: tasthāv amitavikrāntaḥ svair gaṇaiḥ parivāritaḥ // HV_App.I,29.472 //
GE07hv_apppu:7256: kalpāntarasahasreṣu kṣayo yeṣāṃ na vidyate // HV_App.I,29.474 //
GE07hv_apppu:7257: yān arcayanti satataṃ devā deveśvaropamāḥ / HV_App.I,29.475 /
GE07hv_apppu:7258: ātmajñā nāvalepāndhā ye ca dharmapathe sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,29.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:7259: rudrāś ca kāśyapā devam adhyupāsanta bhārata / HV_App.I,29.477 /
GE07hv_apppu:7260: skandaś ca bhagavān raudrir gaṅgā ca saritāṃ varā // HV_App.I,29.478 //
GE07hv_apppu:7261: arciṣmāṃs tumburuś caiva bhāriś ca vadatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,29.479 /
GE07hv_apppu:7262: netāro devadevānām ete hi tapasānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,29.480 //
GE07hv_apppu:7264: dharmanityās taponityāḥ satāṃ mārgam upāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,29.482 //
GE07hv_apppu:7265: ye tv ime mānuṣā devān arcayanti śubhārthinaḥ / HV_App.I,29.483 /
GE07hv_apppu:7266: tān arcayanti hy amarās tathā rājañ śubhārthinaḥ // HV_App.I,29.484 //
GE07hv_apppu:7267: pitṛkṛtyeṣu devānāṃ saṃnyāsaṃ ye tv anuṣṭhitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.485 /
GE07hv_apppu:7269: gandharvādhipatiḥ śrīmāṃs tatra citraratho nṛpa / HV_App.I,29.487 /
GE07hv_apppu:7270: saputro vādayām āsa devavādyāni hṛṣṭavat / HV_App.I,29.488 /
GE07hv_apppu:7271: ūrṇāyuś citrasenaś ca hāhā hūhūs tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29.489 /
GE07hv_apppu:7272: ḍambaras tumburuś caiva jagur anye ca tadgaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,29.490 //
GE07hv_apppu:7273: urvaśī pūrvacittiś ca hemā rambhā ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29.491 /
GE07hv_apppu:7274: hemadantā ghṛtācī ca sahajanyā tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29.492 //
GE07hv_apppu:7275: jujoṣa bhagavān devas tadupasthānam ātmavān / HV_App.I,29.493 /
GE07hv_apppu:7276: vṛttena tuṣṭaḥ śakrasya jagāma jagataḥ patiḥ / HV_App.I,29.494 /
GE07hv_apppu:7277: gate bhūtapatau sarve nṛpā jagmur yathāgatam / HV_App.I,29.495 /
GE07hv_apppu:7278: mahendreṇārcitā devāḥ svān eva nilayān gatāḥ // HV_App.I,29.496 //
GE07hv_apppu:7279: tataḥ sarveṣu yāteṣu sukhāsīnaṃ puraṃdaram / HV_App.I,29.497 /
GE07hv_apppu:7280: sadasyaiḥ svaiḥ sahāsīnaṃ nārado 'bhyāyayau muniḥ // HV_App.I,29.498 //
GE07hv_apppu:7281: tam indraḥ pūjayām āsa samutthāya tapodhanam / HV_App.I,29.499 /
GE07hv_apppu:7282: dideśa kuśagarbhaṃ ca pīṭham ātmāsanopamam // HV_App.I,29.500 //
GE07hv_apppu:7283: nārado 'tha mahātejā mahendram idam abravīt / HV_App.I,29.501 /
GE07hv_apppu:7285: kiṃcit kāryaṃ puraskṛtya preṣito 'smi mahātmanā / HV_App.I,29.503 /
GE07hv_apppu:7287: prītivākyāni hṛdyāni prayujya munaye tadā / HV_App.I,29.505 /
GE07hv_apppu:7288: tataḥ prahṛṣṭo bhagavān abravīt pākaśāsanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.506 //
GE07hv_apppu:7289: kim āha puruṣaśreṣṭhaḥ śīghram ācakṣva me mune / HV_App.I,29.507 /
GE07hv_apppu:7290: cirasya khalu kṛṣṇena saṃsmṛtāḥ sma mahātmanā / HV_App.I,29.508 /
GE07hv_apppu:7291: priyavākyāni hṛdyāni brūhi dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29.509 //
GE07hv_apppu:7293: mahendrendrānujaṃ draṣṭuṃ gato 'haṃ bhrātaraṃ tava / HV_App.I,29.510 /
GE07hv_apppu:7295: taṃ tu raivatake 'drākṣaṃ tadāsīnam ariṃdamam / HV_App.I,29.512 /
GE07hv_apppu:7296: rukmiṇyā sahitaṃ vīram umayeva vṛṣadhvajam // HV_App.I,29.513 //
GE07hv_apppu:7297: pārijātataroḥ puṣpaṃ tasya dattaṃ mayānagha / HV_App.I,29.514 /
GE07hv_apppu:7299: tad dṛṣṭvā tasya patnyas tu vismayaṃ paramaṃ yayuḥ / HV_App.I,29.516 /
GE07hv_apppu:7301: guṇās tāsāṃ mayākhyātās tasya puṣpasya mānada / HV_App.I,29.518 /
GE07hv_apppu:7303: adityā kaśyapo dattaḥ puṇyārthaṃ ca yathā mama / HV_App.I,29.520 /
GE07hv_apppu:7304: puṣpadāmnā veṣṭayitvā kaṇṭhe puṇyārtham ātmavān // HV_App.I,29.521 //
GE07hv_apppu:7305: tvaṃ ca datto yathā śacyā devāś cānye sureśvara / HV_App.I,29.522 /
GE07hv_apppu:7306: niṣkrayaś ca yathā dattaḥ kaśyapādyair mahātmabhiḥ // HV_App.I,29.523 //
GE07hv_apppu:7307: tac chrutvā tasya patny ekā satyabhāmeti viśrutā / HV_App.I,29.524 /
GE07hv_apppu:7308: puṇyakārthaṃ manaś cakre dayitā te yavīyasaḥ // HV_App.I,29.525 //
GE07hv_apppu:7309: tayā cābhyarthito bhartā devyā devagaṇeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29.526 /
GE07hv_apppu:7310: pratijajñe sa dharmātmā yavīyāṃs tava mānada // HV_App.I,29.527 //
GE07hv_apppu:7311: tato mām uktavān vīro viṣṇur balavatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,29.528 /
GE07hv_apppu:7312: yathāvat suramukhyeśa bruvataḥ śṛṇu bhāvana // HV_App.I,29.529 //
GE07hv_apppu:7318: paśyantv amarakalyāṇaṃ matprabhāvāc ca mānuṣāḥ // HV_App.I,29.535 //
GE07hv_apppu:7321: nāradaṃ vadatāṃ śreṣṭham idaṃ vākyam athābravīt // HV_App.I,29.537 //
GE07hv_apppu:7322: bhajāsanaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha śrutam uktaṃ tvayā dvija / HV_App.I,29.538 /
GE07hv_apppu:7324: āsīne nārade śakro labdhānujño 'tha nāradāt / HV_App.I,29.540 /
GE07hv_apppu:7325: svam āsanaṃ tato bheje tasyaiva sadṛśaṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29.541 //
GE07hv_apppu:7327: nirīkṣya svabalaṃ vīryaṃ pārṣadaṃ vṛtranāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.543 //
GE07hv_apppu:7328: maharṣe kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā vaktavyas te janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.544 /
GE07hv_apppu:7330: madanantaram īśas tvaṃ jagato nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,29.546 /
GE07hv_apppu:7331: tvadīyaḥ pārijātaś ca ratnāny anyāni cācyuta // HV_App.I,29.547 //
GE07hv_apppu:7332: tvaṃ tu bhārāvataraṇaṃ kartuṃ deva mahīṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,29.548 /
GE07hv_apppu:7334: tvaṃ tu bhārāvatārāya mahyā deva bhuvaṃ gataḥ / **HV_App.I,29.548**15:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7336: tvayi tīrṇapratijñe hi punaḥ prāpte triviṣṭapam / HV_App.I,29.550 /
GE07hv_apppu:7337: pūrayiṣyāmi vadhvās te iṣṭān kāmān adhokṣaja // HV_App.I,29.551 //
GE07hv_apppu:7338: svargīyāṇi na ratnāni nayitavyāni keśava / HV_App.I,29.552 /
GE07hv_apppu:7339: svalpārthe mānuṣaṃ lokam iti pūrvakṛtā sthitiḥ // HV_App.I,29.553 //
GE07hv_apppu:7340: utkramya hi sthitiṃ daivīṃ pravartāmi mahābala / HV_App.I,29.554 /
GE07hv_apppu:7341: yady ahaṃ kiṃ pravakṣyanti prajāpatigaṇāḥ prabho // HV_App.I,29.555 //
GE07hv_apppu:7343: niyamāḥ sarvakṛtyānāṃ sthāpitā jagato dhruvāḥ // HV_App.I,29.557 //
GE07hv_apppu:7344: prajāpatikṛtaṃ mārgam apāsya vrajato mama / HV_App.I,29.558 /
GE07hv_apppu:7345: śrutvā prajāpatir dhīmāñ śāpam apy utsṛjet prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29.559 //
GE07hv_apppu:7347: bhetsyanty aśaṅkitā daityā daityapakṣās tathāpare // HV_App.I,29.561 //
GE07hv_apppu:7348: strīnimittam ito nīte pārijāte drumeśvare / HV_App.I,29.562 /
GE07hv_apppu:7349: svargaukaso bhaviṣyanti vimanaskāś ca mānada // HV_App.I,29.563 //
GE07hv_apppu:7350: upabhogā manuṣyāṇāṃ vihitā ye svayaṃbhuvā / HV_App.I,29.564 /
GE07hv_apppu:7351: tais tu tuṣyatu me bhrātā saṃpaśyan kālaparyayam // HV_App.I,29.565 //
GE07hv_apppu:7352: ihāpi tāvat tridive mama yaḥ syāt parigrahaḥ / HV_App.I,29.566 /
GE07hv_apppu:7353: tridivastho 'pi taṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sarvaṃ bhoktum ihārhati // HV_App.I,29.567 //
GE07hv_apppu:7354: [k: Ñ1 V1 B1.3 D6 (marg.) T G1-3.5 ins. (D4 after line 575):k]
GE07hv_apppu:7356: tṛpto hy āmiṣabhojyānām abhimānāj janardanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.568 /
GE07hv_apppu:7357: tato dharmaṃ samutsṛjya pāpam evānuvartate // HV_App.I,29.569 //
GE07hv_apppu:7358: strīvaśyatā khyāpyamānā kṛṣṇasya hi mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.570 /
GE07hv_apppu:7359: jagaty ayaśaso yogaṃ janayed iti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,29.571 //
GE07hv_apppu:7360: mānuṣyaṃ mānuṣe prāpto yad etan madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.572 /
GE07hv_apppu:7361: kuryān nirbandhanīyaṃ yad bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena nārada // HV_App.I,29.573 //
GE07hv_apppu:7363: jñātito dharṣaṇā caiva viśeṣeṇa hi garhitā // HV_App.I,29.575 //
GE07hv_apppu:7364: dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca krameṇa madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.576 /
GE07hv_apppu:7365: sevatv eṣa satāṃ dharmān sthāpitān padmayoninaḥ // HV_App.I,29.577 //
GE07hv_apppu:7366: mahītalaṃ pārijātam arpayiṣyāmi te yadi / HV_App.I,29.578 /
GE07hv_apppu:7367: paulomīm āditaḥ kṛtvā ko nu māṃ bahu maṃsyate // HV_App.I,29.579 //
GE07hv_apppu:7368: pārijātaṃ mahīpṛṣṭhe dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca mānuṣāḥ / HV_App.I,29.580 /
GE07hv_apppu:7369: svargārthaṃ nodyamiṣyanti dṛṣṭvā svargaphalaṃ kṣitau // HV_App.I,29.581 //
GE07hv_apppu:7370: pārijātaguṇān martyā juṣanti yadi nārada / HV_App.I,29.582 /
GE07hv_apppu:7371: devānāṃ manuṣāṇāṃ ca na viśeṣo bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29.583 //
GE07hv_apppu:7372: tatra yat kriyate karma iha tad bhujyate naraiḥ / HV_App.I,29.584 /
GE07hv_apppu:7375: tulyaṃ devasamair martyaiḥ sarvadaiva jagad bhavet // HV_App.I,29.587 //
GE07hv_apppu:7376: yajñair martyā na yakṣyanti labdhasvargaphalā bhuvi / HV_App.I,29.588 /
GE07hv_apppu:7377: na pūrtāni pradāsyanti tulyatvam amarair gatāḥ / HV_App.I,29.589 /
GE07hv_apppu:7378: yajñair japyāhnikaiś caiva nityam āpyāyayanti naḥ / HV_App.I,29.590 /
GE07hv_apppu:7379: mānuṣāḥ svargam icchantaḥ śraddadhānās tapodhana // HV_App.I,29.591 //
GE07hv_apppu:7380: tat sarvaṃ na kariṣyanti pārijātaguṇānvitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.592 /
GE07hv_apppu:7381: nistejaso bhaviṣyāmas te gatās tadvihīnatām / HV_App.I,29.593 /
GE07hv_apppu:7382: itaḥ suvṛṣṭyā sasyais te jīvanti puruṣā bhuvi / HV_App.I,29.594 /
GE07hv_apppu:7383: āpyāyayantas te 'py asmān dānair yajñais tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29.595 //
GE07hv_apppu:7384: na bubhukṣā pipāsā vā bādhate yadi mānuṣān / HV_App.I,29.596 /
GE07hv_apppu:7385: rogo jarā vā dharmajña mṛtyur vā ratir eva vā // HV_App.I,29.597 //
GE07hv_apppu:7386: daurgandhyaṃ vā sughorā va ītayaḥ karmasaṃbhavāḥ / HV_App.I,29.598 /
GE07hv_apppu:7388: sarvathā nayanaṃ tatra pārijātasya na kṣamam / HV_App.I,29.600 /
GE07hv_apppu:7389: iti vācyas tvayā vipra viṣṇur akliṣṭakarmakṛt // HV_App.I,29.601 //
GE07hv_apppu:7390: yathā yathā ca me bhrātā tuṣyaty etad vicārayan / HV_App.I,29.602 /
GE07hv_apppu:7391: tathā tathā tvayā kāryaṃ kāryaṃ matprītim icchatā // HV_App.I,29.603 //
GE07hv_apppu:7392: hārāṃś ca maṇayaś caiva candanāny agurūṇi ca / HV_App.I,29.604 /
GE07hv_apppu:7393: vastrāṇi ca vicitrāṇi vadhvās tvaṃ dvārakāṃ naya // HV_App.I,29.605 //
GE07hv_apppu:7394: yogyāni yāni martyānāṃ yavad icchati keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.606 /
GE07hv_apppu:7395: na svargaparimoṣaṃ tu kartum arhati keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.607 //
GE07hv_apppu:7398: na pārijātaṃ ca kathaṃcana drumaṃ @ HV_App.I,29.610 @
GE07hv_apppu:7403: provāca vākyaṃ vākyajño mahātmā dharmavittamaḥ // HV_App.I,29.613 //
GE07hv_apppu:7404: avaśyam eva vaktavyaṃ hitaṃ balaniṣūdana / HV_App.I,29.614 /
GE07hv_apppu:7405: mayā tava mahābāho bahumāno 'sti me tvayi // HV_App.I,29.615 //
GE07hv_apppu:7406: ukto mayā vāsudevo jānatā bhavato matam / HV_App.I,29.616 /
GE07hv_apppu:7407: na dattaḥ pārijāto hi harasyāpi tvayā purā // HV_App.I,29.617 //
GE07hv_apppu:7408: hetavaś ca mayā tasya darśitā bhoḥ samāsataḥ / HV_App.I,29.618 /
GE07hv_apppu:7409: na cāvagatavān devaḥ satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_App.I,29.619 //
GE07hv_apppu:7410: upendro 'haṃ mahendreṇa lālanīyaḥ sadeti mām / HV_App.I,29.620 /
GE07hv_apppu:7412: uvāca bhagavān devaḥ satyam etad bravīmi te / **HV_App.I,29.620**17:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7413: athāha puṇḍarīkākṣas tat tad uttaram eva ca // HV_App.I,29.621 //
GE07hv_apppu:7414: punaḥ punar mayā cāsya hetavo deva darśitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.622 /
GE07hv_apppu:7415: tato na buddhir vyāvṛttā vṛtranāśana tasya vai // HV_App.I,29.623 //
GE07hv_apppu:7416: api cāpy uktavān devo vākyaṃ te madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.624 /
GE07hv_apppu:7417: prahasya puruṣaśreṣṭhaḥ saroṣam iva vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.625 //
GE07hv_apppu:7419: na cāsurā naiva ca pannagottamāḥ / HV_App.I,29.627 /
GE07hv_apppu:7421: mune samarthāḥ khalu bhadram astu te // HV_App.I,29.629 //
GE07hv_apppu:7422: sa pārijātaṃ yadi na pradāsyati @ HV_App.I,29.630 @
GE07hv_apppu:7426: upendrasya mahendrāyaṃ bhrātus te niścayaḥ paraḥ / HV_App.I,29.634 /
GE07hv_apppu:7427: yad atra manyase nyāyyaṃ saṃpradhārya kuruṣva tat // HV_App.I,29.635 //
GE07hv_apppu:7428: tattvaṃ hitaṃ ca deveśa śrūyatāṃ vadato mama / HV_App.I,29.636 /
GE07hv_apppu:7429: nayanaṃ pārijātasya dvārakāṃ mama rocate // HV_App.I,29.637 //
GE07hv_apppu:7430: nāradenaivam uktas tu pravyaktaṃ baladehabhit / HV_App.I,29.638 /
GE07hv_apppu:7432: anāgasi mayi jyeṣṭhe sodare yadi keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.640 /
GE07hv_apppu:7433: evaṃ pravṛttaḥ kiṃ śakyaṃ kartum adya tapodhana // HV_App.I,29.641 //
GE07hv_apppu:7434: bahūni pratilomāni purā sa kṛtavān mayi / HV_App.I,29.642 /
GE07hv_apppu:7435: kṛṣṇo nārada soḍhāni bhrāteti sma mayānagha // HV_App.I,29.643 //
GE07hv_apppu:7436: khāṇḍave cārjunarathaṃ purā vāhayatā satā / HV_App.I,29.644 /
GE07hv_apppu:7437: madīyā vāritā meghāḥ śamayanto 'gnim uddhatam // HV_App.I,29.645 //
GE07hv_apppu:7438: govardhanaṃ dhārayatās vipriyaṃ ca kṛtaṃ mama // HV_App.I,29.646 //
GE07hv_apppu:7439: tathā vṛtravadhe prāpte sāhāyyārthaṃ vṛto mayā / HV_App.I,29.647 /
GE07hv_apppu:7440: samo 'ham iti sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām iti coktavān / HV_App.I,29.648 /
GE07hv_apppu:7441: svabāhubalam āśritya vṛtraś ca nihato mayā // HV_App.I,29.649 //
GE07hv_apppu:7442: devāsureṣu prāpteṣu saṃgrāmeṣu ca nārada / HV_App.I,29.650 /
GE07hv_apppu:7443: yudhyaty ātmecchayā kṛṣṇo mune suviditaṃ tava // HV_App.I,29.651 //
GE07hv_apppu:7444: bahunātra kim uktena tasmād iṣṭyā pravartatām / HV_App.I,29.652 /
GE07hv_apppu:7445: jñātibhedo na me kāryaḥ sākṣī tvaṃ mama nārada // HV_App.I,29.653 //
GE07hv_apppu:7446: mamorasi gadāṃ moktum udyato yadi keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.654 /
GE07hv_apppu:7447: anuśocyātha paulomī guṇaḥ ka iha dṛśyate // HV_App.I,29.655 //
GE07hv_apppu:7448: [k: ka is missing in the cr. ed. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:7449: udavāsagato dhīmān pitā naḥ kaśyapaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29.656 /
GE07hv_apppu:7450: adityā saha me mātrā tayor vācyam idaṃ bhavet // HV_App.I,29.657 //
GE07hv_apppu:7451: ajitātmā mama bhrātā rajasā mahatā vṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,29.658 /
GE07hv_apppu:7452: kāmena ca striyā vākyād evaṃ mām uktavān gurum // HV_App.I,29.659 //
GE07hv_apppu:7453: sarvathā dhik striyo vipra dhig rajastamasī tathā / HV_App.I,29.660 /
GE07hv_apppu:7455: sarvaṃ ca strīṣu saṃgrāhyaṃ dhik striyaḥ sa yathā tathā / **HV_App.I,29.660**18:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7456: yatrādhikṣiptavān viṣṇur evaṃ māṃ strījito dvija // HV_App.I,29.661 //
GE07hv_apppu:7457: na dṛṣṭaṃ kaśyapakulaṃ vyapadeśyaṃ mahāmune / HV_App.I,29.662 /
GE07hv_apppu:7458: naiva dakṣakulaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mātur me yatra saṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.663 //
GE07hv_apppu:7459: na jyeṣṭhatā na rājatvaṃ devānāṃ pratimānitam / HV_App.I,29.664 /
GE07hv_apppu:7462: sadvṛtto jñānasaṃpanna iti brahmā purābravīt // HV_App.I,29.667 //
GE07hv_apppu:7463: nāsti bhrātṛsamo bandhur āhārya itaro janaḥ / HV_App.I,29.668 /
GE07hv_apppu:7464: iti mām abravīn mātā pitā caiva prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,29.669 //
GE07hv_apppu:7465: sodareṣu viśeṣaṃ tu pitā me kaśyapo 'bravīt / HV_App.I,29.670 /
GE07hv_apppu:7466: dṛptā mayā virudhyante dānavāḥ pāpaniścayāḥ // HV_App.I,29.671 //
GE07hv_apppu:7467: kāmam etan na vaktavyaṃ svayam ātmastavānvitam / HV_App.I,29.672 /
GE07hv_apppu:7468: prāptas tv avasaro vipra yad ihādyocyate mayā // HV_App.I,29.673 //
GE07hv_apppu:7469: dhanur jyāyāṃ muniśreṣṭha cchinnāyāṃ hi purānagha / HV_App.I,29.674 /
GE07hv_apppu:7470: dhanvibhir amarāṇāṃ ca varadānān mahāmate // HV_App.I,29.675 //
GE07hv_apppu:7471: [k: T1-3 G1.3-6 M4 subst. for l. 675 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:7473: utkṛttaśiraso viṣṇoḥ purā deho dhṛto mayā / HV_App.I,29.676 /
GE07hv_apppu:7474: saṃdhitaṃ ca śiro yatnāc chinnaṃ raudreṇa tejasā // HV_App.I,29.677 //
GE07hv_apppu:7475: ahaṃ viśiṣṭo devānām ity uktvā punar acyutaḥ / HV_App.I,29.678 /
GE07hv_apppu:7476: dhanur āropya darpeṇa sthito nārada keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.679 //
GE07hv_apppu:7477: kiṃ māṃ pitā vā mātā va vakṣyatīti mayā mune / HV_App.I,29.680 /
GE07hv_apppu:7478: snehena vidhṛtaṃ viṣṇoḥ śarīraṃ munisattama // HV_App.I,29.681 //
GE07hv_apppu:7479: aindraṃ vaiṣṇavam asyaiva mune bhāgam ahaṃ dadau / HV_App.I,29.682 /
GE07hv_apppu:7480: yavīyāṃsam ahaṃ premṇā kṛṣṇaṃ paśyāmi nārada // HV_App.I,29.683 //
GE07hv_apppu:7481: saṃgrāmeṣu prahartavyaṃ tena pūrvaṃ tapodhana / HV_App.I,29.684 /
GE07hv_apppu:7482: rājā kilāhaṃ samare praharāmy agrato dhruvam // HV_App.I,29.685 //
GE07hv_apppu:7484: yatto rakṣāmi dharmajña keśavaṃ bhaktim āśritam // HV_App.I,29.687 //
GE07hv_apppu:7485: idaṃ bhaṅktvā madīyaṃ ca bhagavan viṣṇunā kṛtam / HV_App.I,29.688 /
GE07hv_apppu:7486: uparyupari lokānāṃ adhikaṃ bhavanaṃ mune // HV_App.I,29.689 //
GE07hv_apppu:7487: avamānaḥ sa ca mayā pṛṣṭhataḥ kriyate mune / HV_App.I,29.690 /
GE07hv_apppu:7488: lālanīyo mayā bāla ity evaṃ bhrātṛgauravāt // HV_App.I,29.691 //
GE07hv_apppu:7489: bālo 'yaṃ mama putreti yavīyān iti nārada / HV_App.I,29.692 /
GE07hv_apppu:7490: pitrā mātrā ca govindo nātīva paribhāṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.693 //
GE07hv_apppu:7491: iṣṭas tatra jananyāḥ sa keśavaḥ saviśeṣataḥ / HV_App.I,29.694 /
GE07hv_apppu:7492: vayaṃ dveṣyā na saṃdehas tatra sneho 'tiricyate // HV_App.I,29.695 //
GE07hv_apppu:7493: sarvajño balavāñ śūraḥ pātraṃ mānayitā tathā / HV_App.I,29.696 /
GE07hv_apppu:7494: keśavety eva ca dhyānaṃ yat tad vitathatāṃ gatam // HV_App.I,29.697 //
GE07hv_apppu:7495: gaccha nārada vaktavyaḥ keśavo vacanān mama / HV_App.I,29.698 /
GE07hv_apppu:7496: āhūto na nivarteyaṃ samaraṃ prati śatrubhiḥ // HV_App.I,29.699 //
GE07hv_apppu:7497: yadīcchasi tad āgaccha sahyaṃ te yat tvam icchasi / HV_App.I,29.700 /
GE07hv_apppu:7498: praharasva ca pūrvaṃ tvaṃ bhāryājita yathecchasi // HV_App.I,29.701 //
GE07hv_apppu:7499: rathāṅgenātha śārṅgeṇa gadayā nandakena vā / HV_App.I,29.702 /
GE07hv_apppu:7500: praharāruhya garuḍaṃ dṛḍho bhūtvā janārdana // HV_App.I,29.703 //
GE07hv_apppu:7501: prahṛte prahariṣyāmi yathāśaktyā ca keśava / HV_App.I,29.704 /
GE07hv_apppu:7502: aho dhig yadi māṃ sneho viklavaṃ na kariṣyati // HV_App.I,29.705 //
GE07hv_apppu:7503: yāvan na saṃgrāmagato jito 'haṃ cakrapāṇinā / HV_App.I,29.706 /
GE07hv_apppu:7504: pārijātaṃ na dāsyāmi tāvad bho munisattama // HV_App.I,29.707 //
GE07hv_apppu:7505: māṃ samāhvayate jyeṣṭhaṃ yavīyāṃsas tapodhana / HV_App.I,29.708 /
GE07hv_apppu:7506: ahaṃ taṃ marṣayiṣyāmi kimarthaṃ strījitaṃ harim // HV_App.I,29.709 //
GE07hv_apppu:7507: adyaiva gaccha bhagavan dvārakāṃ kṛṣṇapālitām / HV_App.I,29.710 /
GE07hv_apppu:7508: vivādaḥ saṃsthitaḥ so 'dya iti vācyas tvayācyutaḥ // HV_App.I,29.711 //
GE07hv_apppu:7510: ahaṃ sajjaḥ sthitaḥ sāṅga iti vācyas tvayācyuta / **HV_App.I,29.711**20:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7517: na māyayā hartum ihārhasi drumaṃ @ HV_App.I,29.718 @
GE07hv_apppu:7518: suyuddham evāstu dhig astu jihmatām // HV_App.I,29.719 //
GE07hv_apppu:7521: mahendravacanaṃ śrutvā nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,29.720 /
GE07hv_apppu:7522: vivikte devarājānam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,29.721 //
GE07hv_apppu:7523: kāmaṃ priyāṇi rājāno vaktavyā nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,29.722 /
GE07hv_apppu:7524: prāptakālaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ hitam apriyam acyuta // HV_App.I,29.723 //
GE07hv_apppu:7525: aniyuktaḥ purobhāgo na syād iti vadanti hi / HV_App.I,29.724 /
GE07hv_apppu:7527: kāryākārye samutpanne paripṛcchati māṃ bhavān / HV_App.I,29.726 /
GE07hv_apppu:7528: yatas tataḥ pravakṣyāmi gṛhyatāṃ yadi rocate // HV_App.I,29.727 //
GE07hv_apppu:7529: anuktenāpi suhṛdā vaktavyaṃ jānatā hitam / HV_App.I,29.728 /
GE07hv_apppu:7530: nyāyyaṃ ca prāptakālaṃ ca parābhavam anicchatā // HV_App.I,29.729 //
GE07hv_apppu:7531: vaktavyaṃ sarvathā sadbhir apriyaṃ cāpi yad dhitam / HV_App.I,29.730 /
GE07hv_apppu:7532: ānṛṇyam etat snehasya sadbhir evādṛtaṃ purā // HV_App.I,29.731 //
GE07hv_apppu:7533: anṛte dharmabhagne ca na śuśrūṣati cāpriye / HV_App.I,29.732 /
GE07hv_apppu:7534: na priyaṃ na hitaṃ vācyaṃ sadbhir ete vininditāḥ // HV_App.I,29.733 //
GE07hv_apppu:7535: sarvathā deva vaktavyaṃ śrūyatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ vara / HV_App.I,29.734 /
GE07hv_apppu:7536: śrutvā ca kuru sarvajña mama śreyaskaraṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,29.735 //
GE07hv_apppu:7537: anyonyabhedo bhrātṝṇāṃ suhṛdāṃ vā balāntaka / HV_App.I,29.736 /
GE07hv_apppu:7538: bhavaty anandakṛd deva dviṣatāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.737 //
GE07hv_apppu:7540: viparītaṃ ca tad buddhvā nityaṃ buddhimatāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29.739 //
GE07hv_apppu:7541: yat syāt tāpakaraṃ paścād ārabdhaṃ kāryam īdṛśam / HV_App.I,29.740 /
GE07hv_apppu:7542: ārabhen naiva tad vidvān eṣa buddhimatāṃ nayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.741 //
GE07hv_apppu:7543: vipākam asya kāryasya nānupaśyāmi śobhanam / HV_App.I,29.742 /
GE07hv_apppu:7544: yat tu tatkāraṇaṃ deva nibodha vibudhādhipa // HV_App.I,29.743 //
GE07hv_apppu:7545: ya eko viśvam adhyāste pradhānaṃ jagato hariḥ / HV_App.I,29.744 /
GE07hv_apppu:7546: prakṛtyā yaṃ paraṃ sarve kṣetrajñaṃ vai vidur budhāḥ // HV_App.I,29.745 //
GE07hv_apppu:7547: tasyāvyaktasya yo vyakto bhāgaḥ sarvabhavodbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.746 /
GE07hv_apppu:7548: tasyātmā prathamo devo viṣṇuḥ sarvasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29.747 //
GE07hv_apppu:7549: prakṛtyāḥ prathamo bhāga umā devī yaśasvinī / HV_App.I,29.748 /
GE07hv_apppu:7550: vyaktaḥ sarvamayo viṣṇuḥ strīsaṃjño lokabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.749 //
GE07hv_apppu:7551: rukmiṇyādyāḥ striyas tasya vyaktatve prathamo guṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29.750 /
GE07hv_apppu:7552: avyayā prakṛtir devī guṇadevo maheśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29.751 //
GE07hv_apppu:7553: na viśeṣo 'sti rudrasya viṣṇoś cāmarasattama / HV_App.I,29.752 /
GE07hv_apppu:7554: guṇinaś cāvyayaḥ śaśvat sadā ca prathamo guṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.753 //
GE07hv_apppu:7556: bhoktā maheśvaro devaḥ kartā viṣṇur adhokṣajaḥ // HV_App.I,29.755 //
GE07hv_apppu:7557: brahmā devagaṇāś cānye paścāt sṛṣṭā mahātmanā / HV_App.I,29.756 /
GE07hv_apppu:7559: evaṃ purāṇapuruṣo viṣṇur deveṣu paṭhyate / HV_App.I,29.758 /
GE07hv_apppu:7560: acintyaś cāprameyaś ca guṇebhyaś ca paras tathā // HV_App.I,29.759 //
GE07hv_apppu:7561: adityā tapasā viṣṇur mahātmārādhitaḥ purā / HV_App.I,29.760 /
GE07hv_apppu:7562: vareṇa cchanditā tena parituṣṭena cāditiḥ // HV_App.I,29.761 //
GE07hv_apppu:7563: tayoktas tvām ahaṃ putram icchāmīti surottama / HV_App.I,29.762 /
GE07hv_apppu:7564: praṇataṃ deva vijñāya nārāyaṇam adhokṣajam // HV_App.I,29.763 //
GE07hv_apppu:7565: tenoktā bhuvane nāsti matsamaḥ puruṣo 'paraḥ / HV_App.I,29.764 /
GE07hv_apppu:7566: aṃśena tu bhaviṣyāmi putraḥ khalv aham eva te // HV_App.I,29.765 //
GE07hv_apppu:7569: pradhānaṃ jagato nāthaḥ kartā bhartā ca keśavaḥ // **HV_App.I,29.765**21:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:7570: sa jātaḥ sarvakṛd devo bhrātā tava sureśvara / HV_App.I,29.766 /
GE07hv_apppu:7571: nārāyaṇo mahātejā yam upendraṃ pracakṣate // HV_App.I,29.767 //
GE07hv_apppu:7572: icchann eva harir devaḥ kāśyapatvam upāgataḥ / HV_App.I,29.768 /
GE07hv_apppu:7573: tais tair bhāvair vikurute bhūtabhavyabhavo 'vyayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.769 //
GE07hv_apppu:7574: prādurbhāvaṃ gato devo jagato hitakāmyayā / HV_App.I,29.770 /
GE07hv_apppu:7575: māthuraṃ jagato nāthaḥ kartā hartā ca keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.771 //
GE07hv_apppu:7576: yathā ca tilapiṇḍaḥ syād vyāptaḥ snehena mānada / HV_App.I,29.772 /
GE07hv_apppu:7577: tathā jagad idaṃ vyāptaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_App.I,29.773 //
GE07hv_apppu:7578: brahmaṇyadevaḥ sarvātmā tais tair bhāvair vikurvate / HV_App.I,29.774 /
GE07hv_apppu:7579: jagaty atiguṇo devo vaikuṇṭhaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.775 //
GE07hv_apppu:7580: ataḥ samastadevānāṃ pūjya eva ca keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.776 /
GE07hv_apppu:7581: padmanābhaś ca bhagavān prajāsargakaro vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,29.777 //
GE07hv_apppu:7582: ananto dhāraṇārthaṃ ca bibharti ca mahad yaśaḥ / HV_App.I,29.778 /
GE07hv_apppu:7583: yajña ity api sadbhiś ca kathyate vedavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,29.779 //
GE07hv_apppu:7584: śvetaḥ kṛtayuge devo raktas tretāyuge tathā / HV_App.I,29.780 /
GE07hv_apppu:7585: dvāpare ca yathā pītaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kaliyuge vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,29.781 //
GE07hv_apppu:7587: prātaḥ kṛtayugo yo me trātā vai madhyame tathā / **HV_App.I,29.781**22:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7588: tṛtīye dvāparo yāme saṃdhyāyāṃ kalir eva ca // **HV_App.I,29.781**22:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:7591: avadhīt sa hiraṇyākṣaṃ divyarūpadharo hariḥ / HV_App.I,29.782 /
GE07hv_apppu:7593: dadhārāpsu nimajjantīm eṣa devo vasuṃdharām / HV_App.I,29.784 /
GE07hv_apppu:7594: vārāhaṃ vapur āśritya jagato hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,29.785 //
GE07hv_apppu:7595: jigāya jagatīṃ caiva viṣṇur vāmanarūpadhṛk / HV_App.I,29.786 /
GE07hv_apppu:7596: babandha ca baliṃ devaḥ śrīmān pannagabandhanaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.787 //
GE07hv_apppu:7600: tvayy āyattaḥ purā viṣṇur udāram ativikramaḥ // HV_App.I,29.789 //
GE07hv_apppu:7601: sāvaśeṣaṃ tapo yasya taṃ nihanti janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.790 /
GE07hv_apppu:7602: alīkeṣv api vartantaṃ vrataṃ etan mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.791 //
GE07hv_apppu:7603: jaghne ca dānavān mukhyān devānāṃ ye ca śatravaḥ / HV_App.I,29.792 /
GE07hv_apppu:7604: tava priyārthaṃ govindo dharmanityaḥ satāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29.793 //
GE07hv_apppu:7605: rāmatvam api cāvāpya jaghne rāvaṇam ātmavān / HV_App.I,29.794 /
GE07hv_apppu:7606: bhūtvā kāmaguṇaś caiva jaghāna dviradaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,29.795 //
GE07hv_apppu:7607: hitāya jagato 'dyāpi loke vasati mānuṣe / HV_App.I,29.796 /
GE07hv_apppu:7609: jaṭī kṛṣṇājinī daṇḍī dṛṣṭapūrvo mayā hariḥ / HV_App.I,29.798 /
GE07hv_apppu:7610: daiteyeṣu caran devas tṛṇeṣv agnir ivoddhataḥ // HV_App.I,29.799 //
GE07hv_apppu:7611: adrākṣam api govindaṃ dānavaikārṇavaṃ jagat / HV_App.I,29.800 /
GE07hv_apppu:7612: kurvāṇaṃ dānavair hīnaṃ jagato hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,29.801 //
GE07hv_apppu:7613: avaśyaṃ pārijātaṃ te nayiṣyati janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.802 /
GE07hv_apppu:7614: dvārakām amaraśreṣṭha nānṛtaṃ ca bravīmy aham // HV_App.I,29.803 //
GE07hv_apppu:7615: bhrātṛsnehābhibhūtas tvaṃ kṛṣṇe na prahariṣyasi / HV_App.I,29.804 /
GE07hv_apppu:7616: nāpi kṛṣṇas tvayi jyeṣṭha prahariṣyati vāsava // HV_App.I,29.805 //
GE07hv_apppu:7617: naiva cec chroṣyasi proktaṃ mayā deva kathaṃcana / HV_App.I,29.806 /
GE07hv_apppu:7618: pṛccha tvaṃ nayadharmajñān ye hitās tava mantriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.807 //
GE07hv_apppu:7619: nāradenaivam uktas tu mahendro janamejaya / HV_App.I,29.808 /
GE07hv_apppu:7620: idam uttaram īśo 'tha pratyuvāca jagadgurum // HV_App.I,29.809 //
GE07hv_apppu:7621: evaṃvidhaprabhāvaṃ tvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vadasi yad dvija / HV_App.I,29.810 /
GE07hv_apppu:7622: evam etat subahuśaḥ śrutaṃ khalu mayā mune // HV_App.I,29.811 //
GE07hv_apppu:7623: yataś caivaṃvidhaḥ kṛṣṇas tato 'haṃ tasya taṃ tarum / HV_App.I,29.812 /
GE07hv_apppu:7624: na pradāsyāmi dātavyaṃ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran // HV_App.I,29.813 //
GE07hv_apppu:7625: mahāprabhāvo nālpārthe ruṣyed iti vicintayan / HV_App.I,29.814 /
GE07hv_apppu:7626: vyavasthito 'haṃ bhadraṃ te mune sarvaguṇoditaḥ // HV_App.I,29.815 //
GE07hv_apppu:7627: mahāprabhāvāḥ satataṃ bhavanti hi sahiṣṇavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.816 /
GE07hv_apppu:7628: śrotāraś caiva satataṃ vṛddhānāṃ jñānacakṣuṣām // HV_App.I,29.817 //
GE07hv_apppu:7629: mahātmā kāraṇe nālpe kṛṣṇo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,29.818 /
GE07hv_apppu:7630: bhrātrā jyeṣṭhena dharmajño virodhaṃ gantum arhati // HV_App.I,29.819 //
GE07hv_apppu:7631: yathaiva mama mātuḥ sa varaṃ prādād adhokṣajaḥ / HV_App.I,29.820 /
GE07hv_apppu:7632: tathaiva tasyāḥ putrāṇāṃ jyeṣṭhānāṃ soḍhum arhati // HV_App.I,29.821 //
GE07hv_apppu:7633: yathaivopendratāṃ yātaḥ svayam icchañ janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.822 /
GE07hv_apppu:7634: tathaiva bhrātur indrasya saṃmānaṃ kartum arhati // HV_App.I,29.823 //
GE07hv_apppu:7635: jyaiṣṭhyam etena devena nārabdhaṃ kiṃ purātane / HV_App.I,29.824 /
GE07hv_apppu:7636: athedānīm apīcchet sa jyeṣṭho 'stu madhusūdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.825 //
GE07hv_apppu:7643: athaitya dvārakāṃ ramyāṃ nārado munisattamaḥ / HV_App.I,29.830 /
GE07hv_apppu:7647: tam evārthaṃ mahātmānaṃ cintayantaṃ dṛḍhavratam / HV_App.I,29.834 /
GE07hv_apppu:7648: kevalaṃ yojayantaṃ ca vākyamātreṇa bhāminīm // HV_App.I,29.835 //
GE07hv_apppu:7649: dṛṣṭvaiva nāradaṃ devaḥ pratyutthāya adhokṣajaḥ / HV_App.I,29.836 /
GE07hv_apppu:7650: pūjayām āsa ca tadā vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā // HV_App.I,29.837 //
GE07hv_apppu:7653: athovāca muniḥ sarvaṃ vistareṇa tapodhanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.840 /
GE07hv_apppu:7655: śrutvā kṛṣṇas tu tat sarvaṃ nāradaṃ vākyam abravīt / HV_App.I,29.842 /
GE07hv_apppu:7656: amarāvatīṃ purīṃ yāsye so 'haṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29.843 //
GE07hv_apppu:7657: ity uktvā nāradenaiva sahitaḥ sāgaraṃ yayau / HV_App.I,29.844 /
GE07hv_apppu:7658: saṃdideśa tatas tatra vivikte nāradaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,29.845 //
GE07hv_apppu:7661: na yuddhe pramukhe śakra sthātum arhasi me prabho / HV_App.I,29.848 /
GE07hv_apppu:7662: pārijātasya nayane niścitaṃ tvam avehi mām // HV_App.I,29.849 //
GE07hv_apppu:7663: evam uktas tu kṛṣṇena nāradas tridivaṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,29.850 /
GE07hv_apppu:7665: tato bṛhaspateḥ śakraḥ śaśaṃsa balanāśanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.852 /
GE07hv_apppu:7666: śrutvā bṛhaspatir devam uvāca kurunandana // HV_App.I,29.853 //
GE07hv_apppu:7667: aho dhig brahmasadanaṃ mayi yāte śatakrato / HV_App.I,29.854 /
GE07hv_apppu:7668: durnītam idam ārabdham atra bhedo hi dāruṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.855 //
GE07hv_apppu:7669: anākhyāya kathaṃ nāma bhavatā bhuvaneśvara / HV_App.I,29.856 /
GE07hv_apppu:7670: mamaitat kṛtyam ārabdhaṃ deva kenāpi hetunā // HV_App.I,29.857 //
GE07hv_apppu:7671: atha vā bhavitavyena karmajena pramuhyate / HV_App.I,29.858 /
GE07hv_apppu:7672: jagadvṛtraghna na vidhiḥ śakyaḥ samativartitum // HV_App.I,29.859 //
GE07hv_apppu:7673: sahasaiva tu kāryāṇām prārambho na praśasyate / HV_App.I,29.860 /
GE07hv_apppu:7674: tad etat sahasārabdhaṃ kāryaṃ dāsyati lāghavam // HV_App.I,29.861 //
GE07hv_apppu:7675: bṛhaspatiṃ mahātmānaṃ mahendras tv abravīd vacaḥ / HV_App.I,29.862 /
GE07hv_apppu:7676: evaṃ gate 'dya yat kāryaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati // HV_App.I,29.863 //
GE07hv_apppu:7680: tathā śakra kariṣyāmi yathā nyāyyaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29.867 //
GE07hv_apppu:7681: bṛhaspatis tv evam uktvā kṣīrodaṃ sāgaraṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,29.868 /
GE07hv_apppu:7682: ācaṣṭa munaye sarvaṃ kaśyapāya mahātmane // HV_App.I,29.869 //
GE07hv_apppu:7683: tac chrutvā kaśyapaḥ kruddho bṛhaspatim abhāṣata / HV_App.I,29.870 /
GE07hv_apppu:7684: avaśyaṃ bhāvyam etad bhoḥ sarvathā nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.871 //
GE07hv_apppu:7685: icchataḥ sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ maharṣer devaśarmaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29.872 /
GE07hv_apppu:7686: apadhyānakṛto doṣaḥ pataty eṣa śatakratoḥ // HV_App.I,29.873 //
GE07hv_apppu:7687: asya doṣasya śāntyartham ārabdhaś ca mune mayā / HV_App.I,29.874 /
GE07hv_apppu:7688: udavāsaḥ sa doṣaś ca prāpta eva sudāruṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.875 //
GE07hv_apppu:7689: tad gamiṣyāmi mātrāsya sahādityā tapodhana / HV_App.I,29.876 /
GE07hv_apppu:7690: ubhau tau vārayiṣyāmi daivaṃ saṃvadate yadi // HV_App.I,29.877 //
GE07hv_apppu:7691: bṛhaspatis tu dharmātmā mārīcam idam abravīt / HV_App.I,29.878 /
GE07hv_apppu:7692: prāptakālaṃ tvayā tatra bhavitavyaṃ tapodhana // HV_App.I,29.879 //
GE07hv_apppu:7693: tatheti kaśyapaś coktvā saṃprasthāpya bṛhaspatim / HV_App.I,29.880 /
GE07hv_apppu:7695: tatra somaṃ mahātmānam ānarca vṛṣabhadhvajam / HV_App.I,29.882 /
GE07hv_apppu:7696: varārtho kaśyapo dhīmān adityā sahitaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29.883 //
GE07hv_apppu:7697: tuṣṭāva ca tam īśanaṃ mārīcaḥ kaśyapas tadā / HV_App.I,29.884 /
GE07hv_apppu:7698: vedoktaiḥ svakṛtaiś caiva stavaiḥ stavyaṃ jagadgurum // HV_App.I,29.885 //
