GE07hv_apppu:7880: taṃ prasthitaṃ taruṃ dṛṣṭvā pārijātam adhokṣajaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1050 /
GE07hv_apppu:7881: amarāvatīṃ purīṃ śreṣṭhāṃ tataś cakre pradakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,29.1051 //
GE07hv_apppu:7882: te tu nandanagoptāraḥ pārijātaṃ drumottamam / HV_App.I,29.1052 /
GE07hv_apppu:7883: hriyateti mahendrāya gatvā nṛpa śaśaṃsire // HV_App.I,29.1053 //
GE07hv_apppu:7886: pūrvam abhyāgataṃ dvāraṃ keśavaṃ śatrusūdanam / HV_App.I,29.1056 /
GE07hv_apppu:7889: hāhākāro mahān āsīd dhruvaṃ yat tridivaukasām // **HV_App.I,29.1056**29:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:7890: dṛṣṭvovāca pravṛttaṃ bhoḥ kim idaṃ madhusūdana // HV_App.I,29.1057 //
GE07hv_apppu:7891: praṇamya garuḍastho 'tha keśavaḥ śakram abravīt / HV_App.I,29.1058 /
GE07hv_apppu:7892: vadhvās te puṇyakārthāya nīyate 'yaṃ varadrumaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1059 //
GE07hv_apppu:7893: tam uvāca tataḥ śakro mā maivaṃ puṣkarekṣaṇa / HV_App.I,29.1060 /
GE07hv_apppu:7894: ayodhayitvā na tarur nayitavyas tvayācyuta // HV_App.I,29.1061 //
GE07hv_apppu:7896: praharasva mahābāho prathamaṃ mayi keśava / HV_App.I,29.1062 /
GE07hv_apppu:7897: pratijñā saphalā te 'stu muktvā kaumodakīm api // HV_App.I,29.1063 //
GE07hv_apppu:7898: tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair devarājagajottamam / HV_App.I,29.1064 /
GE07hv_apppu:7900: vivyādha garuḍaṃ vajrī divyaiḥ śaravarais tathā / HV_App.I,29.1066 /
GE07hv_apppu:7901: bāṇāṃś ca cchedayām āsa keśavasya tarasvinaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1067 //
GE07hv_apppu:7902: yān yān mumoca devendras tāṃs tāṃś ciccheda mādhavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1068 /
GE07hv_apppu:7903: mādhavena prayuktāṃś ca ciccheda balavṛtrahā // HV_App.I,29.1069 //
GE07hv_apppu:7904: mahendrasya ca śabdena dhanuṣaḥ kurunandana / HV_App.I,29.1070 /
GE07hv_apppu:7905: śārṅgasya ca ninādena mumuhuḥ svargavāsinaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1071 //
GE07hv_apppu:7906: tayor vartati saṃgrāme garuḍasthaṃ mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1072 /
GE07hv_apppu:7907: pārijātaṃ jayanto 'tha hartum abhyudito balī // HV_App.I,29.1073 //
GE07hv_apppu:7908: pradyumnam atha kaṃsaghno vārayeti tam abravīt / HV_App.I,29.1074 /
GE07hv_apppu:7909: tatas taṃ vārayām āsa raukmiṇeyaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,29.1075 //
GE07hv_apppu:7910: jayanto jayatāṃ śreṣṭho raukmiṇeyam atheṣubhiḥ / HV_App.I,29.1076 /
GE07hv_apppu:7911: sarvagātreṣu vihasann ājaghāna rathe sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1077 //
GE07hv_apppu:7912: rathastha eva rathinaṃ kāmas tu kamalekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1078 /
GE07hv_apppu:7913: aindrim abhyardayām āsa bāṇair āśīviṣopamaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.1079 //
GE07hv_apppu:7914: sa saṃnipātas tumulo babhūva kurunandana / HV_App.I,29.1080 /
GE07hv_apppu:7916: tatas taṃ vārayām āsa jayantaḥ sarvavīrahā / **HV_App.I,29.1080**30:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7917: jayantasya ca vīrasya raukmiṇeyasya cobhayoḥ // HV_App.I,29.1081 //
GE07hv_apppu:7918: kṛtapratikṛtaṃ yuddhe cakratus tau mahābalau / HV_App.I,29.1082 /
GE07hv_apppu:7920: devāś ca munayaś caiva dadṛśur vismayānvitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.1084 /
GE07hv_apppu:7921: taṃ saṃgrāmaṃ mahāghoraṃ siddhāś caiva sacāraṇāḥ // HV_App.I,29.1085 //
GE07hv_apppu:7922: tatas tu pravaro nāma devadūto mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1086 /
GE07hv_apppu:7923: pārijātaṃ punar hartum iyeṣa kurunandana // HV_App.I,29.1087 //
GE07hv_apppu:7924: sakhā sa devarājasya mahāstravid ariṃdamaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1088 /
GE07hv_apppu:7926: brāhmaṇas tapasā siddho jambudvīpād divaṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,29.1090 /
GE07hv_apppu:7927: svaśaktyā nṛpa saṃyātaḥ sakhitvaṃ balaghātinaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1091 //
GE07hv_apppu:7928: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kṛṣṇaḥ sātyakim abravīt / HV_App.I,29.1092 /
GE07hv_apppu:7929: rathastha eva pravaraṃ śarair vāraya sātyake // HV_App.I,29.1093 //
GE07hv_apppu:7930: na tv eva nirdayaṃ bāṇā moktavyāḥ sātyake tvayā / HV_App.I,29.1094 /
GE07hv_apppu:7931: asya brāhmaṇacāpalyaṃ soḍhavyaṃ khalu sarvathā // HV_App.I,29.1095 //
GE07hv_apppu:7932: tataḥ ṣaṣṭyā tatheṣūṇāṃ garuḍasthaṃ dvijas tadā / HV_App.I,29.1096 /
GE07hv_apppu:7933: ājaghāna mahābāho sātyakiṃ pravaro bhṛśam // HV_App.I,29.1097 //
GE07hv_apppu:7934: śiner naptā tatas tasya kṣipataḥ sāyakān nṛpa / HV_App.I,29.1098 /
GE07hv_apppu:7935: ciccheda puruṣavyāghro vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,29.1099 //
GE07hv_apppu:7936: brāhmaṇo nābhihantavyas tiṣṭha vipra svavartmani / HV_App.I,29.1100 /
GE07hv_apppu:7937: avadhyā yādavānāṃ hi svaparādhe 'pi hi dvijāḥ // HV_App.I,29.1101 //
GE07hv_apppu:7938: pravaras tu prahasyainam uvāca kurunandana / HV_App.I,29.1102 /
GE07hv_apppu:7939: alaṃ kṣāntyā nṛṇāṃ śūra yudhya sarvātmanā raṇe // HV_App.I,29.1103 //
GE07hv_apppu:7940: jāmadagnyasya rāmasya śiṣyo 'ham api yādava / HV_App.I,29.1104 /
GE07hv_apppu:7941: nāmataḥ pravaro nāma sakhā śakrasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29.1105 //
GE07hv_apppu:7942: na devā yoddhum icchanti manyanto madhusūdana / HV_App.I,29.1106 /
GE07hv_apppu:7943: ānṛṇyaṃ sauhrdasyāham adya gantāsmi mādhava // HV_App.I,29.1107 //
GE07hv_apppu:7944: tatas tayos tadā raudraḥ saṃgrāmo vavṛdhe nṛpa / HV_App.I,29.1108 /
GE07hv_apppu:7946: dyauś cacāla tadā rājan dyucarāś ca sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1110 /
GE07hv_apppu:7947: tasmin vartati saṃgrāme teṣām atimahātmanām // HV_App.I,29.1111 //
GE07hv_apppu:7948: nātiśiṣye raṇe kārṣṇir aindram astrabhṛtāṃ varaṃ / HV_App.I,29.1112 /
GE07hv_apppu:7949: aindriḥ kārṣṇiṃ mahātmānaṃ māyinaṃ śūrasaṃmatam // HV_App.I,29.1113 //
GE07hv_apppu:7950: hanta gṛhṇa pratīccheti tāv ubhau yodhasattamau / HV_App.I,29.1114 /
GE07hv_apppu:7951: [k: T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 subst. for line 1114 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:7952: tau tu bāṇān pratīcchantāv ubhau bharatasattama / **HV_App.I,29.1114**31:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7956: so 'straṃ tad atidīpyantam āpatantaṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,29.1118 /
GE07hv_apppu:7957: tastambhe bāṇajālena tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,29.1119 //
GE07hv_apppu:7958: tatas tad dīpyamānaṃ tu papāta raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,29.1120 /
GE07hv_apppu:7960: tenāstreṇa ratho dagdhaḥ pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1122 /
GE07hv_apppu:7961: nādahat tat tu ghoraṃ taṃ raukmiṇeyaṃ janādhipa // HV_App.I,29.1123 //
GE07hv_apppu:7962: dahaty agniṃ na khalv agnir uddhato 'pi viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29.1124 /
GE07hv_apppu:7964: atha nārāyaṇasuto viratho rathināṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1126 /
GE07hv_apppu:7965: sthito dhanuṣmān ākāśe jayantam idam abravīt // HV_App.I,29.1127 //
GE07hv_apppu:7966: mahendraputra divyaṃ tvaṃ yad astraṃ muktavān asi / HV_App.I,29.1128 /
GE07hv_apppu:7967: nāham idṛśarūpāṇāṃ śakyo hantuṃ śatair api // HV_App.I,29.1129 //
GE07hv_apppu:7968: prayatnaṃ kuru śikṣāyāṃ yatnaṃ me 'dya pradarśaya / HV_App.I,29.1130 /
GE07hv_apppu:7970: āsīn me sādhvasaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathasthaṃ tvāṃ dhṛtāyudham / HV_App.I,29.1132 /
GE07hv_apppu:7971: bibhemi tava nedānīṃ yuddhe dṛṣṭabalābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1133 //
GE07hv_apppu:7972: manasā smaryatām eṣa pārijātas tvayā taruḥ / HV_App.I,29.1134 /
GE07hv_apppu:7973: śakyaṃ na khalu hastābhyāṃ spraṣṭavyo yas tvayā hy asau // HV_App.I,29.1135 //
GE07hv_apppu:7974: ratho māyāmayo dagdhas tvayā yo hy astratejasā / HV_App.I,29.1136 /
GE07hv_apppu:7975: īdṛśāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi sraṣṭuṃ śakto 'smi māyayā / HV_App.I,29.1137 /
GE07hv_apppu:7976: evam ukto jayantaś ca mumocāstraṃ mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1138 /
GE07hv_apppu:7978: tat pradyumno mahāvegaṃ śarajālair avārayat / HV_App.I,29.1140 /
GE07hv_apppu:7979: catvāry astrāṇi divyāni mumocaivāparāṇi saḥ // HV_App.I,29.1141 //
GE07hv_apppu:7980: dikṣu sarvāsu rurudhus tany astrāṇy atha bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1142 /
GE07hv_apppu:7981: raukmiṇeyaṃ mahātmānam antarikṣe ca pañcamam // HV_App.I,29.1143 //
GE07hv_apppu:7983: mumoca tāni ghorāṇi pradyumnaṃ prati sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,29.1145 //
GE07hv_apppu:7984: tāni sarvāṇi bāṇaughaiḥ kārṣṇir astrāṇy avārayat / HV_App.I,29.1146 /
GE07hv_apppu:7985: jayantaṃ cāparair bāṇair vivyādha niśitais tadā // HV_App.I,29.1147 //
GE07hv_apppu:7986: tato nādaḥ samutsṛṣṭo dyucaraiḥ puṇyakarmabhiḥ / HV_App.I,29.1148 /
GE07hv_apppu:7987: dṛṣṭvā sthairyaṃ ca śaighryaṃ ca pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1149 //
GE07hv_apppu:7990: cicchedeṣvasanaṃ vīro hastāvāpaṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29.1151 //
GE07hv_apppu:7991: tato 'nyat sa tu jagrāha mahat tad dhanur uttamam / HV_App.I,29.1152 /
GE07hv_apppu:7993: sa tena vīro mahatā dhanuṣā viprasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1154 /
GE07hv_apppu:7994: śarān mumoca viśikhān arkaraśminibhāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,29.1155 //
GE07hv_apppu:7995: cakarta ca dhanuś citraṃ śaineyasyāmitaujasaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1156 /
GE07hv_apppu:7996: vivyādha sarvagātreṣu bāṇair api ca sātyakim // HV_App.I,29.1157 //
GE07hv_apppu:7997: dhanur ādāya śaineyas tato 'nyat kurunandana / HV_App.I,29.1158 /
GE07hv_apppu:7998: dṛḍhaṃ bhārasahaṃ dhīmān vivyādha pravaraṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,29.1159 //
GE07hv_apppu:7999: uccakartatur anyonyaṃ varmaṇī tau śitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,29.1160 /
GE07hv_apppu:8000: gātrebhyaś caiva māṃsāni marmabhidbhiḥ śarottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.1161 //
GE07hv_apppu:8002: ciccheda pravaro vīras tribhiś cainam atāḍayat // HV_App.I,29.1163 //
GE07hv_apppu:8003: [k: misprint vīs tribhiś for vīras tribhiś :k]
GE07hv_apppu:8004: anyad iṣvasanaṃ taṃ tu grahītumanasaṃ dvijaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1164 /
GE07hv_apppu:8005: gadayā tāḍayām āsa kṣiptayā laghuhastavat // HV_App.I,29.1165 //
GE07hv_apppu:8006: so 'siṃ carma ca jagrāha sātyakiḥ prahasann iva / HV_App.I,29.1166 /
GE07hv_apppu:8007: na jagrāha dhanur dhīmān gadayābhihato bhṛśam / HV_App.I,29.1167 /
GE07hv_apppu:8008: tataḥ śaraśatāny eva mumoca pravaras tadā // HV_App.I,29.1168 //
GE07hv_apppu:8009: vihastam iva vijñāya sātyakiṃ yadunandanam / HV_App.I,29.1169 /
GE07hv_apppu:8011: tasya ciccheda bhallena nistriṃśaṃ pravaras tadā / HV_App.I,29.1171 /
GE07hv_apppu:8012: tsarudeśe 'pātayac ca pravaraḥ prahasann iva // HV_App.I,29.1172 //
GE07hv_apppu:8013: vyadhamac ca tathā carma śitair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ / HV_App.I,29.1173 /
GE07hv_apppu:8014: ājaghāna ca śaktyainaṃ hṛdi vipro nanāda ca // HV_App.I,29.1174 //
GE07hv_apppu:8015: taṃ viklavam iva jñātvā pārijātajihīrṣayā / HV_App.I,29.1175 /
GE07hv_apppu:8016: tārkṣyābhyāśe rathenaiva sa tasthau pravaras tadā // HV_App.I,29.1176 //
GE07hv_apppu:8017: taṃ pakṣapuṭavegena cikṣepa garuḍas tadā / HV_App.I,29.1177 /
GE07hv_apppu:8018: gavyūtim ekaṃ sarathaḥ sa papāta mumoha ca // HV_App.I,29.1178 //
GE07hv_apppu:8019: taṃ jayanto nipatyātha patitaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,29.1179 /
GE07hv_apppu:8020: samāśvāsya rathaṃ śīghraṃ samāropitavāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,29.1180 //
GE07hv_apppu:8021: śaineyam api muhyantaṃ patantaṃ ca muhur muhuḥ / HV_App.I,29.1181 /
GE07hv_apppu:8023: taṃ hi pasparśa hastena savyena madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1183 /
GE07hv_apppu:8025: pradyumno dakṣiṇe pārśve vāme tu śinipuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1185 /
GE07hv_apppu:8027: jayantaḥ pravaraś caiva rathenaikena bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1187 /
GE07hv_apppu:8030: balavān eṣa patatāṃ rājā ca vinatāsutaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1190 //
GE07hv_apppu:8031: dakṣiṇe caiva savye ca pārśve mama dhṛtāyudhau / HV_App.I,29.1191 /
GE07hv_apppu:8033: ubhau sthitau yudhyamānaṃ mām eveha prapaśyatam // HV_App.I,29.1192 //
GE07hv_apppu:8034: evam uktau sthitau vīrau tataḥ śakrasya pārśvayoḥ / HV_App.I,29.1193 /
GE07hv_apppu:8038: varuṇo dharmarājas tu dharmado bahubhir vṛtaḥ / **HV_App.I,29.1195**32:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8039: kṛṣṇaṃ ca yodhayām āsa divyāstraiś ca narādhipa // **HV_App.I,29.1195**32:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:8040: sarve devā mahendreṇa kṛṣṇaṃ matvā tu mānuṣam / **HV_App.I,29.1195**32:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:8041: yāvanta eva te devā dadṛśus taṃ tam antike // **HV_App.I,29.1195**32:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8043: sa tān bāṇān agaṇayan vainateyaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,29.1197 /
GE07hv_apppu:8046: ubhau tau sahasā rājan balinau gajapakṣiṇau / HV_App.I,29.1199 /
GE07hv_apppu:8048: radanaiḥ pannagaripuṃ kareṇa śirasā tadā / HV_App.I,29.1201 /
GE07hv_apppu:8049: airāvato gajapatir ājaghāna nadaṃs tadā // HV_App.I,29.1202 //
GE07hv_apppu:8050: tathā nakhāṅkuśais tīkṣṇair vainateyo balotkaṭaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1203 /
GE07hv_apppu:8051: tathā pakṣanipātaiś ca śakranāgaṃ jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,29.1204 //
GE07hv_apppu:8052: muhūrtaṃ sumahān āsīt saṃpāto gajapakṣiṇoḥ / HV_App.I,29.1205 /
GE07hv_apppu:8054: mūrdhny athairāvataṃ tārkṣyas tāḍayām āsa bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1207 /
GE07hv_apppu:8058: patantam api taṃ śakro na mumoca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1211 /
GE07hv_apppu:8059: kāruṇyād atha sauhārdāt pūrvābhyupagamād api // HV_App.I,29.1212 //
GE07hv_apppu:8060: kṛṣṇo 'py anvagamac cainaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ prabhavāvyayaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1213 /
GE07hv_apppu:8062: sa tasthau parvataśreṣṭhe pāriyātre tu vṛtrahā // HV_App.I,29.1215 //
GE07hv_apppu:8063: airāvate samāśvaste saṃgrāmo vavṛdhe punaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1216 /
GE07hv_apppu:8066: tato vajrāyudho vajram āśaniṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1219 /
GE07hv_apppu:8067: mumoca garuḍe rājann airāvaṇaripau nṛpa // HV_App.I,29.1220 //
GE07hv_apppu:8068: vajrāśaninipātāṃs tān sehe śakrasya nāgahā / HV_App.I,29.1221 /
GE07hv_apppu:8069: avadhyo balināṃ śreṣṭho nisargeṇa tapobalāt // HV_App.I,29.1222 //
GE07hv_apppu:8070: mumoca pakṣam ekaikaṃ mānayann aśaniṃ tadā / HV_App.I,29.1223 /
GE07hv_apppu:8071: vajraṃ ca devarājño 'tha bhrātuḥ kaśyapasaṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1224 //
GE07hv_apppu:8072: ākramyamāṇas tārkṣyeṇa nyamajjan nṛpate giriḥ / HV_App.I,29.1225 /
GE07hv_apppu:8073: viveśa dharaṇīṃ rājañ śīryamāṇaḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,29.1226 //
GE07hv_apppu:8074: cukūja bahumānena kṛṣṇasya sa tu parvataḥ / HV_App.I,29.1227 /
GE07hv_apppu:8075: tam adrākṣīt tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kiṃcic cheṣam adhokṣajaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1228 //
GE07hv_apppu:8076: taṃ muktvā garuḍenātha tasthau devo vihāyasi / HV_App.I,29.1229 /
GE07hv_apppu:8077: pradyumnaṃ ca tadovāca sarvakṛl lokabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1230 //
GE07hv_apppu:8078: ito dvāravatīṃ gatvā ratham ānaya māciram / HV_App.I,29.1231 /
GE07hv_apppu:8080: vaktavyo balabhadraś ca rājā ca kukurādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1233 /
GE07hv_apppu:8081: śvo jitvendram āgamiṣye dvārakām iti mānada // HV_App.I,29.1234 //
GE07hv_apppu:8082: tathety uktvā tu dharmātmā pradyumnaḥ pitaraṃ vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,29.1235 /
GE07hv_apppu:8083: gatvā yathoktam uktvā ca yādaveśabalāv ubhau // HV_App.I,29.1236 //

GE07hv_apppu:8315: tato 'bhivādya pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1454 /
GE07hv_apppu:8316: mahendraṃ saha śacyā ca pratasthe dvārakāṃ prati // HV_App.I,29.1455 //
GE07hv_apppu:8317: dadau kṛṣṇāya paulomī niyogāt kurunandana / HV_App.I,29.1456 /
GE07hv_apppu:8318: sarvāsām eva kṛṣṇasya bhāryāṇāṃ dharmacāriṇī // HV_App.I,29.1457 //
GE07hv_apppu:8319: divyānāṃ sarvaratnānāṃ vāsasāṃ ca manasvinī / HV_App.I,29.1458 /
GE07hv_apppu:8321: bhāryāṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi yāni ṣodaśa mādhave / HV_App.I,29.1460 /
GE07hv_apppu:8323: tāni saṃbhāvayethās tvaṃ vastrair ābharaṇais tathā / **HV_App.I,29.1460**37:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8324: pratigṛhya mahātejāḥ prayayau dvārakāṃ prati // HV_App.I,29.1461 //
GE07hv_apppu:8326: sasātyakiḥ saputraś ca prāpto raivatakaṃ girim // HV_App.I,29.1463 //
GE07hv_apppu:8327: sa tatra sthāpayitvā ca pārijātaṃ varadrumam / HV_App.I,29.1464 /
GE07hv_apppu:8328: sātyakiṃ preṣayām āsa dvārakāṃ dvāramālimīm // HV_App.I,29.1465 //
GE07hv_apppu:8332: adya dvāravatīṃ caiva pārijātaṃ mahādrumam / HV_App.I,29.1468 /
GE07hv_apppu:8333: praveśayiṣye nagare śobhā prakriyatāṃ śubhā // HV_App.I,29.1469 //
GE07hv_apppu:8334: ity uktaḥ satyako gatvā tathoktvā punar āgataḥ / HV_App.I,29.1470 /
GE07hv_apppu:8335: kumārair nāgaraiḥ sārdhaṃ sāmbaprabhṛtibhiḥ prabho // HV_App.I,29.1471 //
GE07hv_apppu:8336: tato 'grataḥ pārijātam āropya garuḍe tadā / HV_App.I,29.1472 /
GE07hv_apppu:8337: pradyumno dvārakāṃ ramyāṃ viveśa rathināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1473 //
GE07hv_apppu:8339: tasyānu rathamukhyena satyakaḥ sāmba eva ca // HV_App.I,29.1475 //
GE07hv_apppu:8340: ye tv anye nṛpa vārṣṇeyā yānair bahuvidhais tathā / HV_App.I,29.1476 /
GE07hv_apppu:8341: yayuḥ prahṛṣṭās tat karma pūjayanto mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1477 //
GE07hv_apppu:8342: satyakād vistaraṃ śrutvā yādavā nāgarās tathā / HV_App.I,29.1478 /
GE07hv_apppu:8343: vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmur aprameyasya karmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1479 //
GE07hv_apppu:8345: rājan na tatṛpur hṛṣṭāḥ paśyamānā mahodayam // HV_App.I,29.1481 //
GE07hv_apppu:8346: tam adbhutam acintyaṃ ca madakelikilāṇḍajam / HV_App.I,29.1482 /
GE07hv_apppu:8347: vṛkṣottamaṃ paśyatāṃ vai vṛddhānām agamaj jarā // HV_App.I,29.1483 //
GE07hv_apppu:8348: ye tv andhacakṣuṣaḥ sarve te 'bhavan divyacakṣuṣaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1484 /
GE07hv_apppu:8349: virogā rogiṇaś cāsan ghrātvā gandhaṃ vanaspateḥ // HV_App.I,29.1485 //
GE07hv_apppu:8351: babhūvur hṛṣṭamanaso vavanduś ca janārdanam // HV_App.I,29.1487 //
GE07hv_apppu:8352: nānāvidhāni tūryāṇi geyāni madhurāṇi ca / HV_App.I,29.1488 /
GE07hv_apppu:8353: śuśruvus tasya vṛkṣasya nātidūragatā narāḥ // HV_App.I,29.1489 //
GE07hv_apppu:8354: yo yaṃ saṃkalpayām āsa gandhaṃ hṛdyaṃ naras tadā / HV_App.I,29.1490 /
GE07hv_apppu:8355: sa tadaiva tam ājaghre pārijātasamudbhavam // HV_App.I,29.1491 //
GE07hv_apppu:8356: tataḥ praviśya ramyāṃ tu dvārakāṃ yadunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1492 /
GE07hv_apppu:8357: vasudevaṃ mahātmānaṃ dadṛśe devakīṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29.1493 //
GE07hv_apppu:8358: kukurādhipatiṃ caiva balaṃ bhrātaram eva ca / HV_App.I,29.1494 /
GE07hv_apppu:8359: vṛddhāṃś ca yādavānāṃ ye mānārhān amaropamān // HV_App.I,29.1495 //
GE07hv_apppu:8360: visarjya tān vai bhagavān anādinidhano 'cyutaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1496 /
GE07hv_apppu:8361: saṃpūjya ca yathānyāyaṃ svam eva bhavanaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29.1497 //
GE07hv_apppu:8362: sa satyabhāmayā vāsaṃ viveśa madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1498 /
GE07hv_apppu:8364: sā devī pūjayām āsa prahṛṣṭā vāsavānujam / HV_App.I,29.1500 /
GE07hv_apppu:8365: pratijagrāha taṃ cāpi pārijātaṃ mahādrumam / HV_App.I,29.1501 /
GE07hv_apppu:8366: manīṣitena sa tarur alpo bhavati bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1502 /
GE07hv_apppu:8367: mahāṃś ca vāsudevasya tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,29.1503 //
GE07hv_apppu:8368: kadācid dvārakāṃ sarvāṃ pracchādayati bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1504 /
GE07hv_apppu:8369: kadācid dhastadhāryas tu bhavaty aṅguṣṭhasaṃnibhaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1505 //
GE07hv_apppu:8370: nananda satyā kauravya devī prāpya manoratham / HV_App.I,29.1506 /
GE07hv_apppu:8371: puṇyakārthaṃ tu saṃbhārān saṃbhartum upacakrame // HV_App.I,29.1507 //
GE07hv_apppu:8372: yāni dravyāṇi kauravya jambudvīpe tu kānicit / HV_App.I,29.1508 /
GE07hv_apppu:8373: yogyāni tāni kṛṣṇena saṃhṛtāni mahātmanā // HV_App.I,29.1509 //
GE07hv_apppu:8374: muniṃ tadā saṃsmṛtavān sa nāradaṃ @ HV_App.I,29.1510 @
GE07hv_apppu:8380: atha kṛṣṇasya kauravya dhyātamātras tapodhanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1514 /
GE07hv_apppu:8381: ājagāma muniśreṣṭho nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1515 //
GE07hv_apppu:8382: taṃ pūjayitvā vidhivad vāsudevo viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29.1516 /
GE07hv_apppu:8384: tataḥ kāle ca saṃprāpte snātaṃ devo mahāmunim / HV_App.I,29.1518 /
GE07hv_apppu:8385: saṃpūjya mālyair gandhaiś ca bhojayām āsa bhārata // HV_App.I,29.1519 //
GE07hv_apppu:8389: babandha kṛṣṇaṃ subhagā pārijāte vanaspatau // HV_App.I,29.1523 //
GE07hv_apppu:8390: adbhir dadau nāradāya tato 'nujñāpya keśavam / HV_App.I,29.1524 /
GE07hv_apppu:8391: devī dhenusahasraṃ ca kāñcanasya ca parvatam // HV_App.I,29.1525 //
GE07hv_apppu:8393: tilamiśrasya ca tathā dhānyair anyair yutasya ca // HV_App.I,29.1527 //
GE07hv_apppu:8394: pratigṛhya tu tat sarvaṃ nārado munisattamaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1528 /
GE07hv_apppu:8395: prahṛṣṭo vadatāṃ śreṣṭho bhuktvā keśavam abravīt // HV_App.I,29.1529 //
GE07hv_apppu:8396: bhoḥ keśava madīyas tvam adbhir datto 'si satyayā / HV_App.I,29.1530 /
GE07hv_apppu:8398: sa tvaṃ mām anugacchasva kuru yad yad bravīmy aham // HV_App.I,29.1531 //
GE07hv_apppu:8399: prathamaḥ kalpaḥ ity evam abravīn madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1532 /
GE07hv_apppu:8400: vrajantam anuvavrāja nāradaṃ ca janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1533 //
GE07hv_apppu:8401: parihāsaṃ bahuvidhaṃ kṛtvā munivaras tadā / HV_App.I,29.1534 /
GE07hv_apppu:8403: apanīya tataḥ kaṇṭhāt puṣpadāmainam abravīt / HV_App.I,29.1536 /
GE07hv_apppu:8404: kapilāṃ gāṃ savatsāṃ bho niṣkrayārthaṃ prayaccha me // HV_App.I,29.1537 //
GE07hv_apppu:8405: kṛṣṇājinaṃ tilaiḥ pūrṇaṃ prayaccha ca sakāñcanam / HV_App.I,29.1538 /
GE07hv_apppu:8406: eṣo 'tra niṣkrayaḥ kṛṣṇa vihito vṛṣaketunā // HV_App.I,29.1539 //
GE07hv_apppu:8407: tathety uktvā hṛṣīkeśas tathā cakre janādhipa / HV_App.I,29.1540 /
GE07hv_apppu:8408: sa uvāca muniśreṣṭhaṃ rahite madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1541 /
GE07hv_apppu:8409: varaṃ varaya dharmajña yas te nārada kāṅkṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1542 /
GE07hv_apppu:8410: taṃ te dātāsmi dharmajña parā prītir hi me tvayi // HV_App.I,29.1543 //
GE07hv_apppu:8412: nityam evāstu me prīto bhavān viṣṇo sanātana / HV_App.I,29.1544 /
GE07hv_apppu:8413: tvatprabhāvāc ca sālokyaṃ vrajeyaṃ te mahāmate // HV_App.I,29.1545 //
GE07hv_apppu:8414: ayonijo bhaveyaṃ ca nārāyaṇa satāṃ gate / HV_App.I,29.1546 /
GE07hv_apppu:8415: bhaveyaṃ brāhmaṇaś caiva punarjātyantareṣv aham // HV_App.I,29.1547 //
GE07hv_apppu:8416: evam astv iti taṃ devo viṣṇuḥ provāca bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1548 /
GE07hv_apppu:8417: tutoṣa ca tato dhīmān nārado munisattamaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1549 //
GE07hv_apppu:8420: tāsāṃ dadau saṃniyogam ekaikaṃ harivallabhā / HV_App.I,29.1552 /
GE07hv_apppu:8421: śacyā yo vāsudevasya purā datto narādhipa // HV_App.I,29.1553 //
GE07hv_apppu:8422: pārijāto vasaṃs tatra tataḥ pravavṛdhe tadā / HV_App.I,29.1554 /
GE07hv_apppu:8424: nimantritā gaṇāḥ sarve keśavena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,29.1556 /
GE07hv_apppu:8426: pāṇḍavāṃś cānayām āsa sahaiva pṛthayā hariḥ / HV_App.I,29.1558 /
GE07hv_apppu:8427: draupadyā ca mahātejās tathaiva ca subhadrayā // HV_App.I,29.1559 //
GE07hv_apppu:8428: śrutaśravāṃ ca sasutāṃ bhīṣmakaṃ sasutaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29.1560 /
GE07hv_apppu:8429: anyān api ca kauravya mitrasaṃbandhibāndhavān // HV_App.I,29.1561 //
GE07hv_apppu:8430: reme ca saha pārthena phālgunena janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1562 /
GE07hv_apppu:8433: pārijātaṃ punaḥ svargam anayat sarvabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1565 //
GE07hv_apppu:8434: tatrāditiṃ kaśyapaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā svapitarau prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29.1566 /
GE07hv_apppu:8436: tam uvācāditir mātā praṇataṃ madhusūdanam / HV_App.I,29.1568 /
GE07hv_apppu:8437: saubhrātram astu vām evaṃ nityaṃ cāmarasattama // HV_App.I,29.1569 //
GE07hv_apppu:8438: manorathaṃ mamaitaṃ tvaṃ pūrayasva janārdana / HV_App.I,29.1570 /
GE07hv_apppu:8439: tathety evābravīt kṛṣṇas tato mātaram ātmavān // HV_App.I,29.1571 //
GE07hv_apppu:8441: vāsudevo mahātejāḥ kālaprāptam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1573 //
GE07hv_apppu:8443: antarbhūmitale vadhyān asurān prati mānada // HV_App.I,29.1575 //
GE07hv_apppu:8444: tad ito daśarātreṇa hantāham asurottamān / HV_App.I,29.1576 /
GE07hv_apppu:8446: jayantena ca vīreṇa dānavānāṃ jighāsayā / HV_App.I,29.1578 /
GE07hv_apppu:8447: eko 'tra mānuṣo devo devaputras tathāparaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1579 //
GE07hv_apppu:8448: avadhyāḥ kila te devair brahmaṇo varadarpitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.1580 /
GE07hv_apppu:8449: asmābhiḥ kila hantavyā mānuṣatvam upāgataiḥ // HV_App.I,29.1581 //
GE07hv_apppu:8450: tatheti kṛṣṇaṃ sa hariḥ prītarūpas tadābravīt / HV_App.I,29.1582 /
GE07hv_apppu:8451: sasvajāte 'tha tau devāv anyonyaṃ janamejaya // HV_App.I,29.1583 //
GE07hv_apppu:8453: prītātmā kuruśārdūla kuṇḍaladvayam eva ca // HV_App.I,29.1585 //
GE07hv_apppu:8455: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 29A, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme,
GE07hv_apppu:8457: [k: After App I (No. 29), K Ñ V B D T G M4 cont. with a passage given in App. I (No. 29A). :k]
GE07hv_apppu:8460: dvaipāyanaprasādena sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava // HV_App.I,29A.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:8463: śṛṇu yena vidhānena loke djarmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29A.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8465: yayau dvāravatīṃ dhīmān nārado munisattamaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:8468: kṛṣṇena sahitaṃ vipraṃ nāradaṃ dharmavittamam / HV_App.I,29A.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:8469: āsīnaṃ paripapraccha rukmiṇī bhaiṣmakī nṛpa // HV_App.I,29A.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:8470: tatra jāmbavatī devī satyamhāmā ca bhāminī / HV_App.I,29A.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:8472: devyaś ca nṛpa kṛṣṇasya bahvyo 'nyā vai samāgatāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:8475: mune dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha sarvajñānabhṛtāṃ vara / HV_App.I,29A.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:8476: utpattiṃ puṇyakānāṃ tvaṃn vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:8477: vidhiṃ ca phalayojaṃ ye dānakālaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29A.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:8478: kautūhalaṃ naḥ paramaṃ tac chindhi dvipadāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29A.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:8480: śṛṇu vaidarbhi dharmajñe sapatnībhiḥ sahānaghe / HV_App.I,29A.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:8481: puṇyakānāṃ vidhiḥ prokto yathā devyomayā purā // HV_App.I,29A.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:8482: cacāromā vrataṃ devi puṇyakānāṃ śucivratā / HV_App.I,29A.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:8483: vratāvasāne 'tha tayā sakhyo devi nimantritāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:8485: paulomī ca śacī devī khyātā like pativratā // HV_App.I,29A.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:8486: rohiṇī ca mahābhāgā somasyadayitā satī / HV_App.I,29A.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:8487: phalgunī ca tahtā pūrvā revatī ca visāṃ pate // HV_App.I,29A.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:8488: tathā śatabhiṣā caiva maghā ca kurunandana / HV_App.I,29A.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:8489: etābhir hi mahādevī pūrvam ārādhitā satī // HV_App.I,29A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:8490: gaṅgā sarasvatī caiva celagaṅgā ca nimnagā / HV_App.I,29A.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:8491: tathā vaitaraṇī caiva gaṇḍakī yā ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:8492: anyāś ca sarito ramyā lopāmudrā ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29A.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:8493: satyaś cānyā jagaddevi dhārayanti hi tāḥ śubhāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:8494: śubhāś ca girinandinyo vahnikanyāś ca suvratāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:8495: svāhā vahnipriyā devī sāvitrī ca yaśasvinī // HV_App.I,29A.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:8496: ṛddhiḥ kuberakāntā ca jaleśamahiṣī tathā / HV_App.I,29A.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:8497: bhāryā pitṛpateś caiva vasupatnyas tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:8498: hrīḥ śrīr dhṛtis tathā kīrtir āśā meghā ca suvratā / HV_App.I,29A.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:8499: prītir matiś ca khyātiś ca saṃyatiś ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:8500: devyaḥ satyas tathaivānyāḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:8501: tāsāṃ vratāvasāne ca pūjāṃ cakre 'mbikā tadā / HV_App.I,29A.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:8503: vāsobhir bahubhir mukhyair nānārāgaiḥ sumadhyame // HV_App.I,29A.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:8504: pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ dattāṃ devyā tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:8505: upaviṣṭāḥ kathāś citrāḥ kurvantyo bhartṛdevatāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:8506: puṇyakārthaṃ kathās tāsām āsan devī śaśaṃsa yāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:8507: vidhiṃ ca puṇyakasyātha satīnāṃ bhartṛdevate // HV_App.I,29A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:8508: tāsāṃ matena sādhvīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ somanandinī / HV_App.I,29A.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:8509: paryapṛcchad umāṃ devīṃ puṇyakānāṃ vidhiṃ varam // HV_App.I,29A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:8510: umā tāsāṃ priyārthaṃ tu puṇyakāny abravīt tadā / HV_App.I,29A.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:8511: samakṣaṃ mama vaidarbhi sarvabhūtahite ratā // HV_App.I,29A.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:8512: mamaiva comayā dattaḥ sa tadā ratnaparvataḥ / HV_App.I,29A.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:8513: pratigṛhya mayā caiva kṛto brāhmaṇāc chubhe // HV_App.I,29A.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:8514: umā tv arundhatīṃ sādhvīm āmantrya yad abhāṣata / HV_App.I,29A.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:8515: śṛṇu kalyāṇi vakṣyāmi sarvābhiḥ sahitā śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:8516: puṇyakānāṃ vidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:8517: yathā caiva mayā dṛṣṭas tata eṣa vidhiḥ śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:8520: sarvajñāhaṃ yadā bhartuḥ prasādena śaucismite / HV_App.I,29A.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:8521: tadā purā mayādiṣṭo dṛṣṭaḥ puṇyavidhiḥ śubhaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:8523: mahādevaprasādena mayā dṛṣṭas tv arundhati // HV_App.I,29A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:8524: puṇyakāni ca sarvāṇi cīrṇavaty asmy anindite / HV_App.I,29A.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:8525: anujñayā bhagavato bhartuḥ śarvasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:8529: puṇyakānāṃ vidhis tasyāḥ purāṇe parikīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:8531: niṣphalāny asatīnāṃ hi puṇyakāni tathā śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:8532: yā vañcayanti bhartāraṃ yoniduṣṭāś ca yāḥ striyaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:8534: sādhvyo jagad dhārayanti suśīlāḥ patidevatāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:8535: ananyā dharmanityāś ca satāṃ panthānam āśritāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:8537: satataṃ sādhuvādinyo dhārayanti jagat khalu // HV_App.I,29A.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:8538: vyādhitaḥ patito vāpi dīno vāpi katkhaṃcana / HV_App.I,29A.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:8539: na tyaktavyaḥ striyā bhartā dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:8540: akāryakāriṇaṃ vāpi patitaṃ vāpi nirguṇam / HV_App.I,29A.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:8541: strī patiṃ tārayaty eva tathātmānaṃ śubhānane // HV_App.I,29A.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:8542: yoniduṣṭastriyo nāsti prāyaścittaṃ hataiva sā / HV_App.I,29A.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:8543: vāgduṣṭe vihitaṃ sadbhiḥ prāyaścittaṃ purātane // HV_App.I,29A.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:8544: bhartuś chandena kartavyaṃ vratakaṃ sarvadā striyā / HV_App.I,29A.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:8545: upavāso 'pi vā satye kāṇkṣantyā sukṛtāṃ gatim // HV_App.I,29A.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:8546: kalpāntarasahasreṣu na strī sā labhate gatim / HV_App.I,29A.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:8548: yadi syān nāma mānuṣyaṃ strī labhed asatī satī / HV_App.I,29A.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:8550: bhartā devaḥ sadā strīṇāṃ sadbhir dṛṣṭas tapodhane / HV_App.I,29A.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:8551: yasyā hi tuṣyate bhartā sā satī dharmacāriṇī // HV_App.I,29A.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:8552: kautūhalahatānāṃ tu striṇāṃ loko na śobhanaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:8553: bhartary eva mano yāsāṃ sadbhāvena vyavasthitam / HV_App.I,29A.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:8554: karmaṇā manasā vācā patiṃ nāticaranti yāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:8555: tāsāṃ puṇyaphalaṃ saumye puṇyakaiḥ samudāhṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:8556: puṇyakānāṃ vidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ svarlokaṃ prati śobhane / HV_App.I,29A.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:8557: nibodha saha sarvābhir dṛṣṭo yas tapasā mayā // HV_App.I,29A.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:8558: snātvā strī pratar utthāya patiṃ vijñāpayet satī / HV_App.I,29A.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:8559: upavāsārtham atha vā vratakāryaṃ dhṛtavrate // HV_App.I,29A.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:8560: śvaśurābhyāṃ ca caraṇau satataṃ saṃnamasya ca / HV_App.I,29A.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:8561: grahāyaudambaraṃ pātraṃ sakuśaṃ sākṣataṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:8562: gośṛṅgaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ sicya pratigṛhṇīta taj jalam / HV_App.I,29A.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:8563: tato bhartuḥ satī dadyāt snātasya prayatasya ca // HV_App.I,29A.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:8564: ātmano 'tha niṣektavyaṃ tataḥ śirasi taj jalam / HV_App.I,29A.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:8565: trailokye sarvatīrtheṣu snānam etad udāhṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.100 //
GE07hv_apppu:8566: upavāseṣu kartavyam etad dhi vratakeṣu ca / HV_App.I,29A.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:8567: snānam etad dhi sāmānyaṃ strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ ca bhāvini // HV_App.I,29A.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:8568: arundhati mayā dṛṣṭaṃ tapasā haratejasā / HV_App.I,29A.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:8569: aśalyaviddhaṃ śayanam āsanaṃ ca tathāvidham / HV_App.I,29A.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:8570: svayaṃ prakṣālanaṃ cāpi pādayor anuśabditam // HV_App.I,29A.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:8571: aśruprapāto roṣaś ca kalahaś ca kṛtaḥ sati / HV_App.I,29A.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:8572: upavāsād vratād vāpi sadyo bhraṃśayati striyaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:8573: śuklam eva sadā vāsaḥ praśastaṃ candrasaṃbhave / HV_App.I,29A.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:8574: antarvāsaṃ coparaṃ caiva upavāse vrate tathā // HV_App.I,29A.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:8575: pādukāryaṃ trṇaiḥ kāryaṃ sarvadā vratake sati / HV_App.I,29A.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:8576: upavāse 'pi ca vidhir eṣa eva prakīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:8577: añjanaṃ rocanaṃ cāpi gandhān sumanasas tathā / HV_App.I,29A.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:8578: vratake copavāse ca nityam eva vivarjayet // HV_App.I,29A.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:8579: dantakāṣṭaṃ śiraḥsnānam udvartanam athāpi vā / HV_App.I,29A.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:8580: vivarjitaṃ mṛdā sarvaḥ śaucarthas tu vidhīyate // HV_App.I,29A.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:8581: bilvāmṛtaphalair nityaṃ śrīphalaiś ca samācaret / HV_App.I,29A.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:8582: prakṣālanaṃ vai śirasaḥ sadā mṛnmiśritair jalaiḥ // HV_App.I,29A.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:8583: śiraso 'bhyañjanaṃ saumye naivam etat praśasyate / HV_App.I,29A.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:8584: na pādayor na gātrasya sneheneti sthitiḥ smṛtā // HV_App.I,29A.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:8585: goyānam uṣṭrayānaṃ ca kharayānaṃ ca varjitam / HV_App.I,29A.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:8586: nagnasnānaṃ ca satataṃ vrate cāpy upavāsake // HV_App.I,29A.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:8588: śubhe taḍāgavāpy ādau vistīrṇe jalajāyute // HV_App.I,29A.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:8589: gatvā snānaṃ praśastaṃ tu sadaive khalu sarvathā / HV_App.I,29A.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:8590: alābhe tv avaruddhā strī ghaṭasnānaṃ samācaret // HV_App.I,29A.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:8591: navaiś ca kumbhaiḥ snātavyaṃ vidhir eṣa purātanaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:8592: snānaṃ ca kāryaṃ śirasā tapaḥphalam avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29A.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:8595: vidhinaitena kṛtsnena strī sadā bhatṛdevatā / HV_App.I,29A.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:8596: caret saṃvatsaraṃ dāntā ṣaṇmāsān māsam eva vā // HV_App.I,29A.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:8597: striyo hy āvāhayet sādhvīr ekādaśa samādhinā / HV_App.I,29A.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:8598: svayaṃ caiva vidhir dṛṣṭo vratakānāṃ vidhiḥ śubhaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:8599: adbhir dadyāt satī sarvā yā mūlavratinī bhavet / HV_App.I,29A.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:8600: tāsāṃ tu niṣkrayo deyo deśakālānurūpataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:8601: tato māsāntaśuklasya tithau ca navamī tathā / HV_App.I,29A.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:8604: ādau cānte ca kurvīta vratakasyāpi siddhaye // HV_App.I,29A.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:8605: kṣurakarma tato bhartur ātmanaś caiva kārayet / HV_App.I,29A.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:8606: utsādanaṃ na snānaṃ ca tasminn ahani saṃsmṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:8607: tato vivāhavat snānaṃ vihitaṃ puṇyake śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:8608: maṇḍanaṃ caiva vihitaṃ mālyadhāraṇam eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:8609: kumbhais tu snāpyamānemaṃ sādhvī mantram udīrayet / HV_App.I,29A.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:8610: bhartuḥ pādau namaskṛtya manasā vātha vā girā // HV_App.I,29A.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:8611: āpo devyo ṛṣīṇāṃ hi viśvadhātryo @ HV_App.I,29A.144 @
GE07hv_apppu:8612: divyā mādantyā yāḥ śaṃkarā dharmadhātryaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:8615: apām eṣa smṛto mantraḥ sarvatrānyatra me śṛṇu / HV_App.I,29A.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:8618: bhartrā sākaṃ mama dāsyā vateṇyā / HV_App.I,29A.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:8619: mā karmaṇā manasā vāpi vācā @ HV_App.I,29A.152 @
GE07hv_apppu:8620: bhartur bhaveyaṃ ruśatī syāṃ vaśaṃgā // HV_App.I,29A.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:8624: sarvāmanā syāṃ na daridrā bhaveyam // HV_App.I,29A.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:8625: patiś ca me syāt sumukho matpratīkṣo @ HV_App.I,29A.158 @
GE07hv_apppu:8626: nityaṃ madbhaktaḥ syāmn manmatir madgatiś ca / HV_App.I,29A.159 /
GE07hv_apppu:8627: prītiś ca nau syāc cakravākānurūpā @ HV_App.I,29A.160 @
GE07hv_apppu:8628: manovirāgo na bhavet sādhu ca syāt // HV_App.I,29A.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:8631: ubhe ule yāḥ śubhāḥ pāvayanti @ HV_App.I,29A.164 @
GE07hv_apppu:8632: pitur bhartuś ca patibhaktyorjitāś ca // HV_App.I,29A.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:8633: bhūmir vāyur jalam ākāśam agnir @ HV_App.I,29A.166 @
GE07hv_apppu:8634: antaḥkṣetrajñaḥ prakṛtir yo mahāṃś ca / HV_App.I,29A.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:8635: ahaṃkāra7s ca mama sākṣye niyuktāḥ @ HV_App.I,29A.168 @
GE07hv_apppu:8636: smareyur me niścayaṃ ca vrataṃ ca // HV_App.I,29A.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:8639: santv ete me sākṣiṇaḥ sarvasaṃsthā @ HV_App.I,29A.172 @
GE07hv_apppu:8640: vrate cāsmin niścaye cāpi vṛtte // HV_App.I,29A.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:8642: diśaḥ sarvā daśa cātmā ca me 'yam / HV_App.I,29A.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:8643: santv ete vai sākṣiṇaḥ sarva eva @ HV_App.I,29A.176 @
GE07hv_apppu:8644: vrate cāsmin niścaye cāpi nityam // HV_App.I,29A.177 //
GE07hv_apppu:8647: snātvātha vāsasī dadyād bhartuḥ kartya svayaṃ śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.180 /
GE07hv_apppu:8648: athātmakartitaṃ na syāc chubhe vighnena kenacit // HV_App.I,29A.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:8649: vāso 'nyad eva dadyāc ca śvetaṃ mukhyaṃ navaṃ śuci / HV_App.I,29A.182 /
GE07hv_apppu:8650: svakartitaṃ sūtratantuṃ vāsasā tena miśrayet // HV_App.I,29A.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:8651: tato dvijaṃ śuciṃ dāntaṃ jñānavijñānakovidam / HV_App.I,29A.184 /
GE07hv_apppu:8652: bhojayec ca yathāśakti saha bhartrā sumadhyame // HV_App.I,29A.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:8654: śayyā yānaṃ gṛhaṃ dhānyaṃ dāsīdāsaṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:8655: alaṃkāraḥ śaktitaś ca ratnaparvata eva ca / HV_App.I,29A.188 /
GE07hv_apppu:8657: vāsobhiś ca praticchanno nānāvarṇair arundhati // HV_App.I,29A.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:8658: hastyaśvājarathāś caiva deyā gaur eva ca dhruvam // HV_App.I,29A.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:8660: guḍasya madhunaś caiva suvarṇasya ca śobhanām // HV_App.I,29A.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:8661: tathaiva sarvagandhānāṃ rasānāṃ pṛthag eva ca / HV_App.I,29A.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:8662: tathā sumanasāṃ dadyād rūpasyaudumbarasya ca // HV_App.I,29A.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:8663: phalānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ vāsasām api nandini / HV_App.I,29A.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:8664: citrapratikṛtiṃ caiva yāṃś cānyān apy abhīpsyati // HV_App.I,29A.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:8665: śilāpratikṛtiṃ caiva dadhno 'tha payasas tathā / HV_App.I,29A.198 /
GE07hv_apppu:8666: sarpiṣā dūrvayā caiva yāṃś cānyān apy abhīpsati // HV_App.I,29A.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:8667: kāladeśānurūpaṃ ca deyaṃ vibhavataḥ sati / HV_App.I,29A.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:8668: alpaṃ vā bahulaṃ vāpi bhartuś chandena sarvadā // HV_App.I,29A.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:8669: tilapātraṃ pradātavyaṃ na deyaṃ na tu śobhane / HV_App.I,29A.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:8670: gaus tv avaśyaṃ pradātavyā kapilā kāṃsyam eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:8671: kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca subhage satilaṃ vāsasānvitam / HV_App.I,29A.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:8672: ādarśaś caiva kūrcaś ca tathājinam anindite // HV_App.I,29A.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:8673: etad dattvā sarvakāmān āpnoti varavarṇinī / HV_App.I,29A.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:8675: mṛṣṭahastā dhanāḍhyā ca strī bhavaty amalekṣāṇā / HV_App.I,29A.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:8676: icchayā labhate caiva kanyāṃ rūpaguṇānvitām / HV_App.I,29A.209 /
GE07hv_apppu:8677: bhavanti subhagāś cāḍhyās tathaiva ca purodhikāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:8678: putravatyo dhanāḍhyāś ca śīlavatyaś ca nityadā // HV_App.I,29A.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:8679: arundhati kṛtaṃ hy etan mayaiva prathamaṃ yataḥ / HV_App.I,29A.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:8680: umāvratakam ity evaṃ khyātam atra mahītale // HV_App.I,29A.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:8681: etad evottamaṃ strīṇāṃ vrataṃ tasmāt samācaret / HV_App.I,29A.214 /
GE07hv_apppu:8682: sarvakāmān avāpnoti strī dattvaivam anindite // HV_App.I,29A.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:8683: etad vratakarāje ca devadevo vṛṣadhvajaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:8684: purābhiṣiktavān saumye priyārthaṃ mama sarvakṛt // HV_App.I,29A.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:8685: vratakasyāvasāne tu deyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca nityadā / HV_App.I,29A.218 /
GE07hv_apppu:8686: strīṇāṃ pradeyāḥ kāmāś ca sadṛśāḥ kāladeśayoḥ // HV_App.I,29A.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:8688: chandato brāhmaṇānāṃ tu deyam annaṃ sadakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,29A.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:8689: pāyasaṃ tatra dātavyaṃ vratake nānyad iṣyate / HV_App.I,29A.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:8690: nātra prāṇivadhaḥ kāryaḥ purāṇe niyatā śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,29A.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:8691: atha dvitīyaṃ vakṣyāmi vratakaṃ somasaṃbhave / HV_App.I,29A.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:8692: mahādevaprasādeva dṛṣṭavaty asmi yac chubhe // HV_App.I,29A.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:8693: sarvāḥ putraphalāḥ nāryaḥ sadbhir etad udāhṛtam / HV_App.I,29A.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:8694: tasmād anviṣyatī dadyāt saputrakarakāñ śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:8695: jyeṣṭhāṣāḍhau śubhau māsau puroktaṃ vidhim ācaret / HV_App.I,29A.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:8696: atha vā jyeṣṭham evaikam āṣāḍhaṃ vā samācaret // HV_App.I,29A.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:8697: tato māsadvaye pūrṇe māse vā varavarṇini / HV_App.I,29A.230 /
GE07hv_apppu:8699: sarpiṣaḥ payasaś caiva dadhno 'tha madhuno 'naghe / HV_App.I,29A.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:8700: jalasya ca tathā dadyāt pūrayitvā śaśiprabhe // HV_App.I,29A.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:8702: saputrakarakān dadyād yāvanto manasaḥ priyāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:8703: icched duhitaraṃ ced dhi strīnāmnā kārayet tataḥ / HV_App.I,29A.236 /
GE07hv_apppu:8704: kiṃcid dravyaṃ sutākāmāt sutāṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam // HV_App.I,29A.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:8705: gaur vātha kāñcanaṃ vāpi dakṣiṇārthaṃ praśasyate / HV_App.I,29A.238 /
GE07hv_apppu:8706: viprasyācchādanaṃ deyam avaśyaṃ tu śucismite // HV_App.I,29A.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:8707: yajñopavītaṃ vratake dadyān nārī śucivratā / HV_App.I,29A.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:8711: karakān api dadyāc ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:8712: anujñayā sadā bhartuḥ satyavādiny arundhati // HV_App.I,29A.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:8713: suvarṇasūtraṃ viprāya kaumudyāṃ dātum arhati / HV_App.I,29A.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:8714: yajñopavītaṃ viprasya vrataṃ saṃsthāpya kāmikam // HV_App.I,29A.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:8715: yajñopavītaṃ karakaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ ca svaśaktitaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:8717: parasya putrīti hi tā vaidhavyaṃ prāpnivanti hi / **HV_App.I,29A.48**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8719: prayacchantī satī strībhiḥ sarvān kāmān samaśnute // HV_App.I,29A.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:8720: na ca saṃbhakṣayet kiṃcin nārī dhānyam atho phalam / HV_App.I,29A.250 /
GE07hv_apppu:8721: puṣpaṃ vā nopayuñjīta yāvad evaṃ samācaret // HV_App.I,29A.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:8722: ekabhaktena dharmajñe sā tryahaṃ kṣantum arhati / HV_App.I,29A.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:8723: brāhmaṇāya tato deyaṃ bhartuś ca tadanantaram // HV_App.I,29A.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:8724: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kṛtvā subhagā rūpaśālinī / HV_App.I,29A.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:8725: bhavaty avidhavā caiva strī dhanasya tatheśvarī // HV_App.I,29A.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:8726: vārtākāni na khāded yā strī pūrṇaṃ parivatsaram / HV_App.I,29A.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:8727: na sā putravināśaṃ hi paśyatīty avagamyatām // HV_App.I,29A.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:8728: śaśakaṃ mṛgamāṃsaṃ ca nityam eva vivarjayet / HV_App.I,29A.258 /
GE07hv_apppu:8729: nāpnoti maraṇaṃ nārī prāpnoti patidevatām // HV_App.I,29A.259 //
GE07hv_apppu:8730: alābuṃ varjayen nārī tathaivopodikām api / HV_App.I,29A.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:8731: kalambūṃ kāñcanaṃ dadyād yā bhartuḥ sukham icchati // HV_App.I,29A.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:8732: pūrṇe saṃvatsare dadyād ekaikaṃ śākam ādṛtā / HV_App.I,29A.262 /
GE07hv_apppu:8733: sudakṣiṇaṃ putravatī bhavaty eṣā purodhikā // HV_App.I,29A.263 //
GE07hv_apppu:8734: svayaṃ prakṣālayānā strī svapādāv evam āditaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:8735: pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate nityam udvegaṃ nādhigacchati // HV_App.I,29A.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:8736: divā yā sūryapūtena vartayet strī pativratā / HV_App.I,29A.266 /
GE07hv_apppu:8737: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ rātrāv annaṃ vivarjayet // HV_App.I,29A.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:8738: sā jīvaputrā subhagā bhavaty amaravarṇinī / HV_App.I,29A.268 /
GE07hv_apppu:8739: adhitiṣṭhati sarvāś ca sapatnyo nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:8740: pūrṇe saṃvatsare dadyāt sauvarṇaṃ sūryam uttamam / HV_App.I,29A.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:8742: phalāni vātha puṣpāṇi bhakṣāṇy api ca suvratā / HV_App.I,29A.272 /
GE07hv_apppu:8744: athkāstaṃgamite sūrye bhuṅkte strī niyatā satī / HV_App.I,29A.274 /
GE07hv_apppu:8746: sā dadyāt kāñcanaṃ candraṃ nakṣatrtāṇi grahān api / HV_App.I,29A.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:8747: abhirūpāya viprāya vāsaś ca lavaṇānvitam // HV_App.I,29A.277 //
GE07hv_apppu:8749: subhagā darśanīyā ca putravaty api bhāmini // HV_App.I,29A.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:8750: paurṇamāsyāṃ tu satataṃ prāpte somodaye 'ṅganā / HV_App.I,29A.280 /
GE07hv_apppu:8751: arghyaṃ dadyāt sumanasā sākṣataṃ sakuśaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:8752: yāvakaṃ ca baliṃ dadyād dadhinā saha saṃyutam / HV_App.I,29A.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:8753: evaṃ yā kurute nityaṃ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29A.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:8754: adṛṣṭvā yā tu nāśnāti sūryaṃ nārī pativratā / HV_App.I,29A.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:8755: durdine vātha vā vyabhre sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29A.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:8756: kāñcanaṃ śaktito dadyāt sā viprāya manasvinī / HV_App.I,29A.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:8757: subhagā darśanīyā ca bhavaty amaravarṇinī // HV_App.I,29A.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:8760: niveṣṭavyaṃ śarīraṃ yair vratakaiḥ puṇyair api / HV_App.I,29A.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:8761: arundhati pravakṣyāmi sahaitabhir vare śṛṇu // HV_App.I,29A.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:8762: kṛṣṇāṣṭamīṃ yā kṣipati syād vā mūlaphalāśinī / HV_App.I,29A.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:8765: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kṛtvā tato dadyād dvijātaye // HV_App.I,29A.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:8767: dakṣiṇāpūrvam iṣṭānnaṃ śaktyā vāpi śucismite // HV_App.I,29A.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:8769: tasyā bhavanti keśās tu bhavatīṣṭā hi bhartare // HV_App.I,29A.297 //
GE07hv_apppu:8770: śiro nirveṣṭukāmā tu gomayena śiraḥ satī / HV_App.I,29A.298 /
GE07hv_apppu:8771: prakṣālayen malaṃ dhātryā bilvena śrīphalena ca // HV_App.I,29A.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:8772: gomūtraṃ ca sadā prāśec chiraḥsnānaṃ ca miśrayet / HV_App.I,29A.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:8773: kṛṣṇāṃ caturdaśīṃ tv etat kartavyaṃ varavarṇini // HV_App.I,29A.301 //
GE07hv_apppu:8774: bhavaty avidhavā caiva subhagā vijvarā tathā / HV_App.I,29A.302 /
GE07hv_apppu:8775: śirorogair naiva cāsyāḥ śarīram abhitapyate // HV_App.I,29A.303 //
GE07hv_apppu:8776: darśanīyaṃ lalāṭaṃ yā kāṅkṣati strī śucismite / HV_App.I,29A.304 /
GE07hv_apppu:8777: tithiṃ pratipadaṃ nityaṃ sā kṣaped ekabhojanā // HV_App.I,29A.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:8778: payasā ca tathāśnīyād yāvat saṃvatsaro gataḥ / HV_App.I,29A.306 /
GE07hv_apppu:8779: brāhmaṇasya tato dadyāt paṭṭaṃ rūpyamayaṃ śubham // HV_App.I,29A.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:8780: lalāṭaṃ rūpasaṃpannam āpnoti strī sumadhyamā // HV_App.I,29A.308 //
GE07hv_apppu:8781: satataṃ strī dvitīyāyāṃ bhruvor icchet surūpatām / HV_App.I,29A.309 /
GE07hv_apppu:8783: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe brāhmaṇaṃ svasti vācayet / HV_App.I,29A.311 /
GE07hv_apppu:8784: phalaiḥ pariṇataiḥ saumye māsāṇāṃ dakṣiṇānvitaiḥ / HV_App.I,29A.312 /
GE07hv_apppu:8785: lavaṇena ca bhadraṃ te ghṛtapātreṇa cānaghe // HV_App.I,29A.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:8787: bhruvau vidhāya sā dadyān mṛganābhimaye śubhe / **HV_App.I,29A.313**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8788: ātmanaḥ śobhanau karṇāv icchantī strī sumadhyamā / HV_App.I,29A.314 /
GE07hv_apppu:8789: nakṣatre śravaṇe prāpte dhruvaṃ bhuñjīta yāvakam // HV_App.I,29A.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:8790: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe karṇau dadyād dhiraṇmayau / HV_App.I,29A.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:8791: ghṛte prakṣipya viprāya payasā sahitau śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.317 /
GE07hv_apppu:8792: nāsām icchel lalāṭāntām avyaṅgāṃ vyādhivarjitām / HV_App.I,29A.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:8793: tilagulmaṃ sadā siñced yāvat puṣped dhi rakṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:8795: tasmād ādāya puṣpāṇi ghṛte prakṣipya dāpayet // HV_App.I,29A.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:8796: svakṣī bhaveyam iti yā strī kāṅkṣaty amṛtodbhave / HV_App.I,29A.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:8797: anantaraṃ vai bhuñjānā payasā vā ghṛtena vā // HV_App.I,29A.323 //
GE07hv_apppu:8798: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe padmapatrāṇi paṇḍitā / HV_App.I,29A.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:8800: plavamānāni viprāya tato dadyāt satī sati / HV_App.I,29A.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:8801: kṛṣṇasārasamānākṣī tad dattva bhavati sma vai // HV_App.I,29A.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:8802: icched oṣṭhau cārurūpau yā strī dharmaguṇānvitā / HV_App.I,29A.328 /
GE07hv_apppu:8803: sā mṛṇmayena tu pibed udakaṃ vatsaraṃ satī / HV_App.I,29A.329 /
GE07hv_apppu:8805: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe vidrumaṃ dātum arhati // HV_App.I,29A.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:8806: tena bimbaphalābhoṣṭhī strī bhavaty eva śobhane / HV_App.I,29A.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:8808: yā cārurūpān iccheta dantān amaravarṇini / HV_App.I,29A.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:8809: śuklāṣṭamīṃ na sāśnīyād bhaktadvayam aninditā // HV_App.I,29A.335 //
GE07hv_apppu:8810: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe dadyād rūpyamayān satī / HV_App.I,29A.336 /
GE07hv_apppu:8811: dantān prkṣipya dharmajñe payasy atiguṇodite // HV_App.I,29A.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:8812: tena sā tilapuṣpābhān dantān āpnoti sā satī / HV_App.I,29A.338 /
GE07hv_apppu:8813: saubhāgyam api cāpnoti saputratvaṃ tathānaghe // HV_App.I,29A.339 //
GE07hv_apppu:8814: sarvam eva mukhaṃ kāntam icched yā rucirānane / HV_App.I,29A.340 /
GE07hv_apppu:8815: sā paurṇamāsyām aśnātu prāpte candrodaye śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.341 //
GE07hv_apppu:8816: yāvakaṃ payasā siddhaṃ dattvā viprāya bhāminī / HV_App.I,29A.342 /
GE07hv_apppu:8817: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe candraṃ rūpyamayaṃ śubham // HV_App.I,29A.343 //
GE07hv_apppu:8818: padme phulle tu vinyasya brāhmaṇān svasti vācayet / HV_App.I,29A.344 /
GE07hv_apppu:8819: pūrṇacandramukhī tena dānena strī śubhe bhavet // HV_App.I,29A.345 //
GE07hv_apppu:8820: stanāv icchati yā nārī tṛṇarājaphalopamau / HV_App.I,29A.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:8821: ayācitaṃ daśamyāṃ sā nityam aśnīta vāgyatā // HV_App.I,29A.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:8822: saṃvatsare tataḥ pūrṇe dve bilve kāñcane śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:8824: saubhāgyaṃ param āpnoti bahūn putrāṃs tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29A.350 /
GE07hv_apppu:8825: sadonnatau stanau sā strī bibharty amaravarṇini // HV_App.I,29A.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:8827: pañcamyāṃ tu na bhoktavyaṃ annaṃ toyena nityadā // HV_App.I,29A.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:8828: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe dadyāj jatilatāṃ śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:8829: phullāṃ sadakṣiṇāṃ dhanye brāhmaṇāya dhṛtāmane // HV_App.I,29A.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:8830: hastāv icchati yā nārī rūpayuktau sumadhyame / HV_App.I,29A.356 /
GE07hv_apppu:8831: dvādaśīṃ sā kṣaped evaṃ śākaiḥ sarvair aninditaiḥ // HV_App.I,29A.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:8832: saṃvatsare tataḥ pūrṇe raukme padme dadātu sā / HV_App.I,29A.358 /
GE07hv_apppu:8834: śroṇīṃ viśālām anvicchet strī kṣapetv eva suvratā / HV_App.I,29A.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:8835: trayodaśīm ekabhaktam aśnātv evam ayācitam // HV_App.I,29A.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:8836: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe lavaṇaṃ saṃprayacchatu / HV_App.I,29A.362 /
GE07hv_apppu:8838: kāñcanaṃ caiva dātavyaṃ tadākārasya sarvadā / HV_App.I,29A.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:8839: añjanena ca dharmajñe śanakair avacūrṇayet // HV_App.I,29A.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:8840: ratnāni caiva pūrṇāni vāso raktaṃ ca dāpayet / HV_App.I,29A.366 /
GE07hv_apppu:8841: tena śroṇīm abhimatāṃ strī saumye pratipadyate // HV_App.I,29A.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:8842: madhurāṃ vācam icchantī varjayel lavaṇaṃ satī / HV_App.I,29A.368 /
GE07hv_apppu:8843: saṃvatsare vā māsaṃ vā dāpayel lavaṇaṃ tataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:8844: sadakṣiṇaṃ brāhmaṇāya paraṃ mādhuryam icchatī / HV_App.I,29A.370 /
GE07hv_apppu:8847: ṣaṣṭhyāṃ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ varārohe bhoktavyaṃ satilaudanam // HV_App.I,29A.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:8848: agnir vā brāhmaṇo vāpi na spraṣṭavyaḥ padā sadā / HV_App.I,29A.374 /
GE07hv_apppu:8849: padā yadā spṛśet taṃ ca vandeta tapasānvitā // HV_App.I,29A.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:8850: pādena caiva pādaṃ na prakṣālayitum arhati / HV_App.I,29A.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:8851: etair nityavratair yuktā dharmajñā patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.377 //
GE07hv_apppu:8852: kūrmau rukmamayau dadyād brāhmaṇāya pativrate / HV_App.I,29A.378 /
GE07hv_apppu:8853: tau vācayed brāhmanāya sthāpayitvā ghṛte 'naghe // HV_App.I,29A.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:8854: padme cādhomukhe kṛtvā dadyād viprāya nandini / HV_App.I,29A.380 /
GE07hv_apppu:8856: sarvam eva tu yā gātram icchaty atimanoharam / HV_App.I,29A.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:8857: trirātraṃ puṣpakāle sā karoti patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:8858: kaumudyām atha vāṣāḍhyāṃ māghyāṃ cāśvayuje tathā / HV_App.I,29A.384 /
GE07hv_apppu:8859: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva manyate yadi daivatam // HV_App.I,29A.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:8860: ghṛtaṃ ca nityaṃ viprebhyo dadātu lavaṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29A.386 /
GE07hv_apppu:8861: saṃmārjanaṃ gṛhe caiva karotu patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:8862: upalepanaṃ ca dharmajñe balikarma ca mānini / HV_App.I,29A.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:8863: vāgduṣṭā caiva mā śubhre bhavatv ātmārthapaṇḍitā // HV_App.I,29A.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:8864: paryaśnātu ca sā kaṃcid api śākaṃ yaśasvini / HV_App.I,29A.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:8865: baliṃ sṛjatv atathyaṃ ca parityajatu bhāmini // HV_App.I,29A.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:8866: bāndhavān saguṇān icched ekabhaktena nityadā / HV_App.I,29A.392 /
GE07hv_apppu:8867: saptamīṃ saptamīṃ nityaṃ kṣapet strī patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.393 //
GE07hv_apppu:8868: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe vṛkṣaṃ dadyād dhiraṇmayam / HV_App.I,29A.394 /
GE07hv_apppu:8870: karañje dīpakaṃ dadyāt sadā yā pramadā vare / HV_App.I,29A.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:8871: pūrṇe saṃvatsare dadyāt sauvarṇaṃ dīpakaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:8872: rucyā sā strī bhaved bhartur iṣṭā putravatī tathā / HV_App.I,29A.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:8873: sapatnīnām adhi tathā dīpavaj jvalate śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:8874: yā śeṣabhojinī nityaṃ naiva ca syād aruṃtudā / HV_App.I,29A.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:8875: na ca syād vyaśanā saumye nityaṃ ca patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:8876: śaucānvitā ca satataṃ na ca rūkṣābhibhāṣiṇī / HV_App.I,29A.402 /
GE07hv_apppu:8878: kiṃ tasyā vratakaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ vā syād upavāsakaiḥ / HV_App.I,29A.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:8879: yā bhartur devatā nityaṃ satyadharmaguṇānvitā // HV_App.I,29A.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:8881: yā yonim icchate nārī śubhāṃ saṃkucitām api / **HV_App.I,29A.405**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8882: kṛṣṇāṃ caturdaśīṃ sā tu saṃvatsaram upoṣya ca // **HV_App.I,29A.405**4:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:8884: muktāyugmena saṃyuktāṃ śubhāṃ yoniṃ labhet tataḥ // **HV_App.I,29A.405**4:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8885: vidhavā strī tu yā syād daivayogāt satī sati / HV_App.I,29A.406 /
GE07hv_apppu:8886: tasyā vakṣyāmi yo dharmaḥ purāṇoktaḥ sumadhyame // HV_App.I,29A.407 //
GE07hv_apppu:8887: patiṃ sṃakalpayitvā sā citrasthaṃ vātha mṛnmayam / HV_App.I,29A.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:8888: tasya pūjāṃ sadā kuryāt satāṃ dharmam anusmaret // HV_App.I,29A.409 //
GE07hv_apppu:8889: tata evābhyanujñāṃ ca nityaṃ yācate suvratā / HV_App.I,29A.410 /
GE07hv_apppu:8890: vratake copavāse ca bhojane ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.411 //
GE07hv_apppu:8891: bhartṛlokān vrajaty evaṃ na ced vyuccarate patim / HV_App.I,29A.412 /
GE07hv_apppu:8892: śāṇḍilī sūryavad bhāti satataṃ patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.413 //
GE07hv_apppu:8893: adyaprabhṛti sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ caiva yoṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.414 /
GE07hv_apppu:8894: drakṣyanti puṇyakavidhiṃ paurāṇo yaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.415 //
GE07hv_apppu:8895: muniś ca nāradaḥ kṛtsnaṃ paurāṇaṃ jñāsyate vidhim / HV_App.I,29A.416 /
GE07hv_apppu:8896: upavāsasya dharmātmā vratakānāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.417 //
GE07hv_apppu:8897: aditiś cāpi sendrāṇī tvaṃ ca somasute vare / HV_App.I,29A.418 /
GE07hv_apppu:8898: pravartane vratakānāṃ puṇyakānāṃ ca sarvadā / HV_App.I,29A.419 /
GE07hv_apppu:8899: kīrtanīyāḥ satīnāṃ hi bhaviṣyatha guṇānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:8901: prādurbhāveṣu sarveṣu viṣṇor bhāryā mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.422 /
GE07hv_apppu:8902: jñāsyanti puṇyakavidhiṃ nityam eva sanātanam // HV_App.I,29A.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:8903: saviśeṣaṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ strīdharmeṣu praśasyate / HV_App.I,29A.424 /
GE07hv_apppu:8904: patibhaktir aduṣṭatvam avāgduṣṭatvam eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.425 //
GE07hv_apppu:8906: yā patiṃ dūṣayen nārī duṣṭair vākyaiś ca nīcavat / **HV_App.I,29A.425**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8907: sā yāti narakān ghorān yāvat tapati bhāskaraḥ // **HV_App.I,29A.425**5:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:8908: bhojanaṃ kurute yā tu agrato bhartur eva ca / **HV_App.I,29A.425**5:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:8909: yāvanti pāṃśavo bhūmau tāvad varṣāṇi valgulī // **HV_App.I,29A.425**5:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8911: evam uktās tu tāḥ sādhvyo mahādevyā tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.426 /
GE07hv_apppu:8912: jagmur hṛṣṭā mahādevīṃ praṇipatya harapriyām // HV_App.I,29A.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:8913: aditir vratakaṃ cakre śṛṇu yad dharmacāriṇī / HV_App.I,29A.428 /
GE07hv_apppu:8914: umāvratavidhiḥ sarvaḥ pūrvoddiṣṭas tayā kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.429 //
GE07hv_apppu:8915: pārijāte nibadhyātha mama dattas tu kaśyapaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.430 /
GE07hv_apppu:8916: aditivratakaṃ nāma tad dattaṃ satyabhāmayā // HV_App.I,29A.431 //
GE07hv_apppu:8917: tad eva vratakaṃ dattaṃ sāvitryā dharmanityayā // HV_App.I,29A.432 //
GE07hv_apppu:8918: tair eva yuktaiḥ saṃyuktam idaṃ tv abhyadhikaṃ kṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.433 //
GE07hv_apppu:8919: saṃdhyākāle ca saṃprāpte sthāne sthāne tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29A.434 /
GE07hv_apppu:8920: pūjanaṃ vā namaskāro japaś ca dviguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.435 //
GE07hv_apppu:8921: sāvitryā vratakaṃ kṛtvā tathādityā vrataṃ satī / HV_App.I,29A.436 /
GE07hv_apppu:8922: bhartuḥ kulaṃ pitṛkulaṃ tathātmānaṃ ca tārayet // HV_App.I,29A.437 //
GE07hv_apppu:8923: indrāṇī vratakaṃ cakre tathaivomā yathāvidhi / HV_App.I,29A.438 /
GE07hv_apppu:8924: raktaṃ abhyadhikaṃ vāso bhojanaṃ caiva sāmiṣam // HV_App.I,29A.439 //
GE07hv_apppu:8925: caturthe divase cāpi puṇyakārthavidhiḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.440 /
GE07hv_apppu:8926: ahorātropavāsaś ca deyaṃ kumbhaśataṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.441 //
GE07hv_apppu:8927: gaṅgayā vratakaṃ dattaṃ tad evaumaṃ yaśaskari / HV_App.I,29A.442 /
GE07hv_apppu:8928: snānam abhyadhikaṃ kāryaṃ pratyūṣasyātmano jale // HV_App.I,29A.443 //
GE07hv_apppu:8929: anyatra vā jale māgha-- śuklapakṣe haripriye / HV_App.I,29A.444 /
GE07hv_apppu:8930: etad gaṅgāvrataṃ nāma sarvakāmapradaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.445 //
GE07hv_apppu:8931: sapta sapta ca saptātha kulāni harivallabhe / HV_App.I,29A.446 /
GE07hv_apppu:8933: deyaṃ kumbhasahasraṃ tu gaṅgāyā vratake śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.448 /
GE07hv_apppu:8934: tāraṇaṃ pāraṇaṃ caiva tad vrataṃ sārvakāmikam // HV_App.I,29A.449 //
GE07hv_apppu:8935: yamabhāryā cakārātha vrataṃ yāmarathaṃ śubham / HV_App.I,29A.450 /
GE07hv_apppu:8936: hemante tat tukartavyam ākāśe harivallabhe // HV_App.I,29A.451 //
GE07hv_apppu:8937: imāni caiva vākyāni brūyād ākāśam āsthitā / HV_App.I,29A.452 /
GE07hv_apppu:8938: snātā śucisamācārā namaskṛtya patiṃ śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.453 //
GE07hv_apppu:8939: carāmy ahaṃ yāmarathaṃ himaṃ pṛṣṭhena dhāraye / HV_App.I,29A.454 /
GE07hv_apppu:8940: pativratā jīvaputrā bhaveyaṃ ca purodhikā // HV_App.I,29A.455 //
GE07hv_apppu:8941: sapatnīś cādhitiṣṭheyaṃ paśyeyaṃ caiva mā yamam / HV_App.I,29A.456 /
GE07hv_apppu:8942: sabhartṛputrā jīveyaṃ ciraṃ sumukham eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.457 //
GE07hv_apppu:8943: patilokaṃ ca gaccheyaṃ bhaveyaṃ nandinī tathā / HV_App.I,29A.458 /
GE07hv_apppu:8944: sucelā mṛṣṭahastā ca svajaneṣṭā guṇānvitā // HV_App.I,29A.459 //
GE07hv_apppu:8945: evaṃ kṛtvā tato vipraṃ madhunā svasti vācayet / HV_App.I,29A.460 /
GE07hv_apppu:8946: tilair api tathā kṛṣṇaiḥ pāyasena tu bhojayet // HV_App.I,29A.461 //
GE07hv_apppu:8947: evaṃ vratāni devībhiḥ kṛtāny amaravarṇini / HV_App.I,29A.462 /
GE07hv_apppu:8949: ahaṃ bravīmi tapasā madīyena samanvitā / HV_App.I,29A.464 /
GE07hv_apppu:8950: sarvā drakṣyatha puṇyāni vratakāni tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.465 //
GE07hv_apppu:8951: paurāṇāny umayā devyā yāni dṛṣṭāni vai purā / HV_App.I,29A.466 /
GE07hv_apppu:8954: rukmiṇī vratakaṃ cakre dṛṣṭvā vratakavistaram / HV_App.I,29A.468 /
GE07hv_apppu:8955: umāyā varadānena dṛṣṭvā divyena cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,29A.469 //
GE07hv_apppu:8958: tathā jāmbavatī cakre puromāvratakaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29A.472 /
GE07hv_apppu:8959: dadāv abhyadhikaṃ sā tu ratnavṛkṣaṃ manoharam // HV_App.I,29A.473 //
GE07hv_apppu:8960: satyā dadau tathaivātha puromāvratakaṃ yathā / HV_App.I,29A.474 /
GE07hv_apppu:8961: pītam abhyadhikaṃ vāsas tayā dattam umāvrate // HV_App.I,29A.475 //
GE07hv_apppu:8962: rohiṇyātha ca phālgunyā maghayā ca purātane / HV_App.I,29A.476 /
GE07hv_apppu:8963: vratāni khalu dattāni bahūni kulavardhane // HV_App.I,29A.477 //
GE07hv_apppu:8964: dadau śatabhiṣā caiva vratakaṃ puṇyalakṣaṇam / HV_App.I,29A.478 /
GE07hv_apppu:8971: sve sthānena gatā rājan viṣṇor vratakaśāsanāt (sic) // **HV_App.I,29A.479**6:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8973: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 29B, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme,
GE07hv_apppu:8976: [k: After App I (No. 29A), K Ñ2 V B D T G M4 cont. with a passage given in App. I (No. 29B). :k]
GE07hv_apppu:8981: teṣāṃ vadhaṃ muniśreṣṭha kīrtayasvāndhakasya ca // HV_App.I,29B.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8984: tatra pradhānā bahavo babhūvur asurottamāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:8985: śarāgninā na dagdhāste rudreṇa tripurālayāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:8986: ṣaṣṭiḥ śatasahasrāṇi na nyūnāny adhikāni ca // HV_App.I,29B.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:8987: te jñātivadhasaṃtaptāś cakrur vīrāḥ purā tapaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:8991: teṣām udumbaraṃ rājan gaṇa ekaḥ samāśritaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:8992: vṛkṣaṃ tatrāvasan vīra te kurvanto mahat tapaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:8993: kapitthaṃ vṛkṣam āśritya kecit tatroṣitāḥ purā / HV_App.I,29B.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:8994: sṛgālavāṭīṃ tv aparre cerur ugraṃ tathā tapaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:8995: vaṭamūle tathā cerus tapaḥ kauravanandana / HV_App.I,29B.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:8996: adhīyantaḥ pare brahma vaṭaṃ gatvāsurātmajāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:8997: teṣāṃ tuṣṭaḥ prajākartā naradeva pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:8998: varaṃ dātuṃ suraśreṣṭhaḥ prāpto dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:8999: varaṃ varayatety uktās te rājan padmayoninā / HV_App.I,29B.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:9000: te neṣur varadānaṃ tu dviṣantas tryambakaṃ vibhum / HV_App.I,29B.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:9002: tān uvāca tato brahmā sarvajñaḥ kurunandana / HV_App.I,29B.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:9003: viśvasya jagataḥ kartuḥ saṃhartuś ca mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:9004: kaḥ śakto 'pacitiṃ gantum māstu vo 'tha vṛthā śramaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:9006: tam astūya sukhaṃ svarge vastum icchanti ye 'surāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:9007: te neṣus tatra kecit tu durātmāno mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:9008: atheṣur apare rājann asurā bhavyabhāvanāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:9009: neṣur ye sudurātmānas tān uvāca tāmaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:9010: varayadhvaṃ varaṃ vīrā rudrakrodham kṛte 'surāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:9011: te ūcuḥ sarvadevānām avadhyāḥ syāma he vibho / HV_App.I,29B.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:9012: purāṇi ṣaṭ ca no deva bhavantv antar mahītale // HV_App.I,29B.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:9013: sarvakāmasamṛddhārthaṃ ṣaṭpuraṃ cāstu naḥ prabho / HV_App.I,29B.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:9014: vayaṃ ca ṣaṭpuragatās vasema ca sukhaṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29B.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:9015: rudrāc ca no bhayaṃ na syād yena no jñātayo hatāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:9016: nihataṃ tripuraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ sma tapasāṃ nidhe // HV_App.I,29B.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:9018: asurā bhavatāvadhyā devānāṃ śaṃkarasya ca / HV_App.I,29B.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:9019: na bādhiṣyatha ced viprān satpathasthān satāṃ priyān // HV_App.I,29B.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:9020: vipropaghātaṃ mohāc cet kariṣyatha kathaṃcana / HV_App.I,29B.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:9021: nāśaṃ yāsyatha viprā hi jagataḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:9022: nārāyaṇād dhi bhetavyaṃ kurvadbhir brāhmaṇāhitam / HV_App.I,29B.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:9023: sarvabhūteṣu bhagavān hitaṃ dhatte janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:9024: te gatā asurā rājan brahmaṇā ye visarjitāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:9027: ye 'pi bhaktā mahādevam asurā dharmacāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:9028: svaṃ hi darśanaṃ teṣāṃ dadau tripuranāśanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:9029: śvetaṃ vṛṣabham āruhya somaḥ sapravaraḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29B.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:9030: uvāca cedaṃ bhagavān asurān sa satāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:9031: vairaṃ utsṛjya dambhaṃ ca hiṃsāṃ cāsurasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:9032: mām eva cāśritās tasmād varaṃ sādhu dadāmi vaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:9033: yair dīkṣitāḥ stha munibhiḥ satkriyāparamair dvijaiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:9034: saha tair gamyatāṃ svargaḥ prīto 'haṃ vaḥ sukarmaṇā // HV_App.I,29B.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:9035: iha ye caiva vatsyanti tāpasā brahmavādinaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:9036: api kāpitthikāvṛkṣe teṣāṃ lokā yathā mama // HV_App.I,29B.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:9037: iha māsāntapakṣāntau yaḥ kariṣyati mānavaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:9038: vānaprathena vidhinā pūjayan māṃ tapodhanaḥn // HV_App.I,29B.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:9039: varṣāṇāṃ sa sahasraṃ tu tapasāṃ prāpsyate phalam / HV_App.I,29B.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:9040: kṛtvā trirātraṃ vidhival lapsyate cepsitaṃ gatim // HV_App.I,29B.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:9041: arkadvīpe nivasato dviguṇaṃ tad bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,29B.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:9042: nīce deśe ca bhadraṃ vo varam etaṃ dadāmy aham // HV_App.I,29B.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:9043: śvetavāhananāmānaṃ yaś ca māṃ pūjayiṣyati / HV_App.I,29B.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:9044: sarvato bhayacitto 'pi gatiṃ sa mama yāsyati // HV_App.I,29B.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:9045: audumbarān vāṭamūlān dvijān kāpitthikān api / HV_App.I,29B.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:9047: munīṃś ca brahmavāṭīyān saviśeṣeṇa ye narāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:9048: pūjayiṣyanti satataṃ te yāsyantīpsitāṃ gatim // HV_App.I,29B.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:9049: ity uktvātha mahādevo bhagavāñ śvetavāhanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:9050: tair eva sahitaḥ sarvai rudralokaṃ jagāma vai // HV_App.I,29B.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:9051: jambūmārgaṃ gamiṣyāmi jambūmārge vasāmy aham / HV_App.I,29B.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:9055: etasminn eva kāle tu caturvedaṣaḍaṅgavit / HV_App.I,29B.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:9058: aśvamedhaḥ kṛtas tena vasudevasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:9060: āvartāyāḥ śubhe tīre sunadyā munijuṣṭayā // HV_App.I,29B.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:9061: sakhā tu vasudevasya sahādhyāyī dvijottamaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:9062: upādhyāyaś ca kauravya kṣīrahotā mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:9063: vasudevas tatra yāto devakyā sahitaḥ prabho / HV_App.I,29B.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:9064: yajamānaṃ ṣaṭpurasthaṃ yathā śakro bṛhaspatim // HV_App.I,29B.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:9065: tat satraṃ brahmadattasya bahvannaṃ bahudakṣiṇam / HV_App.I,29B.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:9069: vyāso 'haṃ yājñavalkyaś ca sumantur jaiminis tathā / HV_App.I,29B.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:9070: dhṛtimāñ jājaliś caiva devalādyāś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:9072: yatrepsitān dadau kāmān devakī dharmacāriṇī / HV_App.I,29B.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:9074: tasmin satre vartamāne daityāḥ ṣaṭpuravāsinaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:9075: nikumbhādyāḥ samāgamya tam ucur varadarpitāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:9076: kalpyatāṃ yajñabhāgo naḥ somaṃ pāsyāmahe vayam / HV_App.I,29B.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:9077: kanyāś ca brahmadatto no yajamānaḥ prayacchatu // HV_App.I,29B.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:9078: bahvyaḥ santy asya kanyāś ca rūpavatyo mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:9079: āhūya tāḥ pradātavyāḥ sarvathaiva hi naḥ śrutam // HV_App.I,29B.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:9080: ratnāni ca brahmadatto viśiṣṭāni dadātu naḥ / HV_App.I,29B.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:9081: anyathā tu na yaṣṭavyaṃ vayam ājñāpayāmahe // HV_App.I,29B.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:9082: etac chrutvā brahmadattas tān uvāca mahāsurān / HV_App.I,29B.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:9083: yajñabhāgo na vihitaḥ purā vo 'surasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:9084: kathaṃ sattre somapānaṃ śakyaṃ dātuṃ mayā hi vaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:9086: kanyā hi mama yā deyās tāś ca saṃkalpitā mayā / HV_App.I,29B.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:9088: ratnāni tu prayacchāmi sāntvenāhaṃ vicintya vai / HV_App.I,29B.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:9089: balān naiva pradāsyāmi devakīputram āśritaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:9090: nikumbhādyās tu ruṣitāḥ pāpāḥ ṣaṭpuravāsinaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:9091: yajñavāṭaṃ vilulupur jahruḥ kanyāś ca tās tathā // HV_App.I,29B.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:9092: taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃpravṛttaṃ tu dadhyāv ānakaduṃdubhiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:9093: vāsudevaṃ mahātmānaṃ balabhadraṃ gadaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29B.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:9094: viditārthas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pradyumnam idam abravīt / HV_App.I,29B.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:9095: gaccha kanyāparitrāṇaṃ kuru putrāśu māyayā / HV_App.I,29B.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:9096: yāvad yāvanasainyena ṣaṭpuraṃ yāmy ahaṃ prabho // HV_App.I,29B.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:9097: sa yayau ṣaṭpuraṃ vīraḥ pitur ājñākaras tadā // HV_App.I,29B.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:9099: kanyās tā māyayā dhīmān ājahre sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:9100: māyāmayīś ca kṛtvānyā nyastavān rukmiṇīsutaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:9101: mā bhair iti ca dharmātmā devakīm uktavāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,29B.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:9102: māyāmayīs tu tā hatvā sutā hy asya durāsadāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:9103: ṣaṭpuraṃ viviśur daityāḥ parituṣṭā nārādhipa // HV_App.I,29B.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:9104: karma cāsārya te tatra vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā / HV_App.I,29B.119 /
GE07hv_apppu:9105: yad viśiṣṭaṃ bahuguṇaṃ tad abhūc ca narādhipa // HV_App.I,29B.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:9106: etasminn antare prāptā rājānas tatra bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:9107: satre nimantritāḥ pūrvaṃ brahmadattena dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29B.122 //
GE07hv_apppu:9108: jarāsaṃdho danta vaktraḥ śiśupālas tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29B.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:9109: pāṇḍavā dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca mālavānāṃ gaṇās tathā // HV_App.I,29B.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:9110: rukmī caivāhvṛtiś caiva nīlo nādhrama eva ca / HV_App.I,29B.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:9111: vindānuvindāv āvantyau ślayaḥ śakunir eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:9112: rājānaś cāpare vīrā mahātmāno dṛḍhāyudhāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:9114: ete caiva mahātejā rājānaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ / **HV_App.I,29B.127**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9115: āvāsitā nātidūre ṣaṭpurasya ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:9116: tān dṛṣṭvā nāradaḥ śrīmān acintayad aninditaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.129 /
GE07hv_apppu:9117: kṣatrasya yādavānāṃ ca bhaviṣyati samāgamaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:9118: atra hetur ayaṃ yuddhe tasmāt tat prayatāmy aham / HV_App.I,29B.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:9119: evaṃ saṃcintayitvā sa nikumbhabhavanaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:9120: pūjitaḥ sa nikumbhena dānavaiś ca tathāparaiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:9121: upaviṣṭaḥ sa dharmātmā nikumbham idam abravīt // HV_App.I,29B.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:9122: kathaṃ virodhaṃ yadubhiḥ kṛtvā svasthair ihāsyate / HV_App.I,29B.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:9123: yo brahmadattaḥ sa kṛṣṇaḥ sa hi tasya pituḥ sakhā // HV_App.I,29B.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:9124: śatāni pañca bhāryāṇāṃ brahmadattasya dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,29B.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:9126: śatadvayaṃ brahmaṇīnāṃ rājanyānāṃ tathā śatam / HV_App.I,29B.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:9127: vaiśyānāṃ śataṃ ekaṃ ca śādrīṇāṃ śatam eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:9128: tābhiḥ śuśrūṣito dhīmān durvāsa dharmavittamaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:9129: tena tāsāṃ varo datto muninā puṇyakarmaṇā // HV_App.I,29B.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:9130: ekaikas tanayo rānn ekekā duhitā tathā / HV_App.I,29B.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:9132: kanyā bhavanti tanayās tasyāsure punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:9133: saṃgame saṃgame vīra bhartṛbhiḥ śayane saha // HV_App.I,29B.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:9134: sarvaṃ puṣpamayaṃ gandhaṃ sravanti ca varāṅganāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:9135: sarvadā yauvane nyastāḥ sarvāś caiva pativratāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:9137: jānanti sarvā daiteya varadānena dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:9138: putrāś ca rūpasaṃpannāḥ śāstrārthakuśalās tathā / HV_App.I,29B.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:9140: svīkariṣyanti tāṃś caiva ye samiṣyanti vai nṛpāḥ / **HV_App.I,29B.151**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9141: sve sve sthitā varṇadharme yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:9142: tāḥ kanyā bhaimamukhyānāṃ dattāḥ prāyeṇa dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29B.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:9143: avaśeṣaṃ śataṃ tv ekaṃ yad ānītaṃ kila tvayā // HV_App.I,29B.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:9144: tadarthe yādavān vīrān yodhayiṣyasi sarvathā / HV_App.I,29B.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:9145: sāhāyyārthe tu rājāno vriyantāṃ hetupūrvakam // HV_App.I,29B.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:9146: brahmadattasutārthaṃ ca rātnāni vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,29B.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:9148: ātithyaṃ kriyatāṃ caiva ye sameṣyanti vai nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.159 /
GE07hv_apppu:9149: evam ukte tathā cakrur asurās te 'tihṛṣṭavat // HV_App.I,29B.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:9150: labdhvā pañcaśataṃ kanyā ratnāni vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,29B.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:9151: yathārheṇa narendrais tā vibhaktā bhaktivatsalāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.162 //
GE07hv_apppu:9152: ṛte pāṇḍusutān vīrān vāritā nāradena te / HV_App.I,29B.163 /
GE07hv_apppu:9154: tuṣṭais tair asurā hy uktā rājan bhūmipasattamaiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:9156: arcitāḥ sma yathānyāyaṃ kṣatraṃ suraripus tadā / HV_App.I,29B.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:9157: kṣatraṃ nārcitapūrvaṃ hi divyair vīrair bhavadvidhaiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:9158: nikumbho 'thābravīd dhṛṣṭaḥ kṣatraṃ suraripus tadā / HV_App.I,29B.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:9159: anuvarṇayitvā kṣatrasya mahātmyaṃ satyam eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:9160: yuddhaṃ no ripubhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaviṣyati nṛpottamāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.171 /
GE07hv_apppu:9161: sāhāyyaṃ dattam iccchāmo bhavadbhis tatra sarvathā // HV_App.I,29B.172 //
GE07hv_apppu:9162: evam astv iti tān ūcuḥ kṣatriyāḥ kṣīṇakilbiṣāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:9163: pāṇḍaveyān ṛte vīrāñ śrutārthān nāradād vibho // HV_App.I,29B.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:9164: kṣatriyāḥ saṃniviṣṭās te yuddhārthaṃ kurunandana / HV_App.I,29B.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:9165: patnyas tu brahmadattasya yajñavāṭaṃ gatā api // HV_App.I,29B.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:9166: kṛṣṇo 'pi senayā sārdhaṃ prayayau ṣaṭpuraṃ vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,29B.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:9167: mahādevasya vacanam udvahan manasā nṛpa // HV_App.I,29B.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:9168: sthāpayitvā dvāravatyāṃ āhukaṃ pārthivaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,29B.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:9169: sa tayā senayā sārdhaṃ paurāṇāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,29B.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:9172: dattāgulmāpratisaraṃ kṛtvā taṃ vidhivat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29B.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:9173: pradyumnam aṭane śrīmān rakṣārthaṃ viniyujya ca // HV_App.I,29B.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:9177: balaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sātyakiś ca tārkṣyam āruruhur mudā // HV_App.I,29B.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:9180: āvartāyā jale snātvā rudreṇa varadattayā / HV_App.I,29B.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:9182: pradyumnam agre sainyasya viyati sthāpya mānada / HV_App.I,29B.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:9183: rakṣārthaṃ yajñavāṭasya pāṇḍavān viniyujya ca // HV_App.I,29B.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:9184: śeṣāṃ senāṃ guhādvāri bhagavān viniyujya ca / HV_App.I,29B.193 /
GE07hv_apppu:9185: jayantam atha sasmāra pravaraṃ ca satāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.194 //
GE07hv_apppu:9186: tāv āpetatur evātha svayaṃ cāpaśyatāṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29B.195 /
GE07hv_apppu:9187: viyaty eva niyuktau tau pradyumna iva bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:9188: tataḥ kṛṣṇasya vacanād āhato raṇaduṃdubhiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.197 /
GE07hv_apppu:9189: jalajā murajāś caiva vādyāny apy aparāṇi ca // HV_App.I,29B.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:9190: mākaro racito vyūhaḥ sāmbena ca gadena ca / HV_App.I,29B.199 /
GE07hv_apppu:9191: sāraṇaś coddhavaś cobhau bhojo vaitaraṇas tathā // HV_App.I,29B.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:9192: anādhṛṣṭiś ca dharmātmā vipṛthuḥ pṛthur eva ca / HV_App.I,29B.201 /
GE07hv_apppu:9193: k,rtavarmā ca daṃṣṭre dve vicakṣur arimardanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:9194: sanatkumāro dhkarmātmā cārudeṇṣaś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.203 /
GE07hv_apppu:9196: śeṣā yādavasenā tu vyūhamadhye vyavasthitā / HV_App.I,29B.205 /
GE07hv_apppu:9197: rathair aśvair narair nāgair ākulā kulavardhana // HV_App.I,29B.206 //
GE07hv_apppu:9198: ṣaṭpurād api niṣkrāntā dānavā yuddhadurmadāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.207 /
GE07hv_apppu:9199: āruhya meghanādāṃś ca gardabhān api hastinaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:9200: makarāñ śiśumārāṃś ca hayān api ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.209 /
GE07hv_apppu:9201: mahiṣān atha khaḍgāṃś ca drutān api ca kacchapān // HV_App.I,29B.210 //
GE07hv_apppu:9202: etair eva rathair yuktair vividhāyudhapāṇayaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.211 /
GE07hv_apppu:9207: nikumbho niryayau agre devānām iva vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.216 //
GE07hv_apppu:9208: bhūmiṃ dyāṃ ca vavṛdhire dānavās te balotkaṭāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.217 /
GE07hv_apppu:9209: nadanto vividhān nādān kṣveḍantaś ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:9214: kaṭhinā nādino vīrā drupadasyandanās tathā / HV_App.I,29B.223 /
GE07hv_apppu:9215: rukmī caivāhvṛtiś caiva tasthatur niścitau raṇe / HV_App.I,29B.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:9217: śalyaś ca śakuniś cobhau bhagadattaś ca pārthivaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:9218: jarāsaṃdhas trijgartaś ca virāṭaś ca sahottaraḥ // HV_App.I,29B.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:9219: yuddhārtham udyatā vīrā nikumbhādyā jayaiṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:9220: yuyutsamānā yadubhir devair iva mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:9221: tato nikumbhaḥ samare śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.230 /
GE07hv_apppu:9222: mamarda samare senāṃ bhaimnānāṃ bhīmadarśanām // HV_App.I,29B.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:9223: senāpatir anādṛṣṭir mamṛṣe tan na yādavaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:9224: mamarda ghorair bāṇaughaiś citrapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:9225: na ratho 'suramukhyasya dadṛśe na ca vājinaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:9226: na dhvajo na nikumbhaś ca sarvaṃ bāṇābhisaṃvṛtam // HV_App.I,29B.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:9227: sa parītya tato vīro nikumbho māyināṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.236 /
GE07hv_apppu:9230: ruddhvā cābhyagamad vīraṃ māyābalam upāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:9231: punar eva nikumbhas tu kṛtavarmāṇam āhave / HV_App.I,29B.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:9232: anayac cārudeṣṇaṃ ca bhojaṃ vaitaraṇaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29B.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:9233: sanatkumāraṃ tārkṣyaṃ ca tathaiva niśaṭholmukau / HV_App.I,29B.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:9235: na tasya dadṛśe deho māyācchanno janeśvara / HV_App.I,29B.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:9236: nayato yādavān ghorān guhāṃ ṣaṭpurasaṃjñitām // HV_App.I,29B.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:9237: tad dṛṣṭvā kadanaṃ ghoraṃ bhaimānāṃ bhītivardhanam / HV_App.I,29B.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:9238: cukopa bhagavān kṛṣṇo balaḥ satyaka eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:9239: saviśeṣaṃ tathā kāmaḥ sāmbaś ca paravīrahā / HV_App.I,29B.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:9240: aniruddhaś ca durdharṣo bhaimāś ca bahavo 'pare // HV_App.I,29B.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:9241: tataḥ śārṅgāyudhaḥ śārṅgaṃ kṛtvā sajyaṃ nareśvara / HV_App.I,29B.250 /
GE07hv_apppu:9242: dānaveṣu pravṛtteṣu tṛṇeṣv iva hutāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:9243: taṃ dṛṣṭvā dānavā devam abhidudruvur īśvaram / HV_App.I,29B.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:9244: śalabhāḥ kālapāśārtāḥ pradīptam iva pāvakam // HV_App.I,29B.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:9245: samutsṛjya śataghnīś ca parighāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:9246: śūlāni cāgnitulyāni pradīptāṃś ca paraśvadhān // HV_App.I,29B.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:9247: parvatāgrāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca ghorāś ca vipulāḥ śilāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:9248: utkṣipya ca gajān mattān rathān api hayān api // HV_App.I,29B.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:9249: nārāyaṇāgnis tān sarvān dadāha prahasann iva / HV_App.I,29B.258 /
GE07hv_apppu:9251: śāradaṃ varṣaṇaṃ yadvat sahed vīra gavāṃ patiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:9252: tadvad yaduvṛṣaḥ sehe bāṇavarṣam ariṃdamaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:9255: na śekuḥ pramukhe sthātuṃ kṛṣṇasyāsurasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:9256: vyāditāsyasya siṃhasya vṛṣabhā iva bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:9257: te vadhyamānāḥ kṛṣṇena divam ācakramus tadā / HV_App.I,29B.266 /
GE07hv_apppu:9259: tān ākāśagatān aindrir jayantaḥ pravaras tadā / HV_App.I,29B.268 /
GE07hv_apppu:9261: nipetur asurāṇāṃ tu śirāṃsi dharaṇītale / HV_App.I,29B.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:9263: nipetur bahavaś cchinnā daityānāṃ vasudhātale / HV_App.I,29B.272 /
GE07hv_apppu:9265: raukmiṇeyas tataḥ sṛṣṭvā ghorāṃ māyāmayīṃ guhām / HV_App.I,29B.274 /
GE07hv_apppu:9266: adṛśyaniṣkramāṃ vīraḥ kṣatraṃ prakṣeptum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:9267: gadena saha dharmātmā sāraṇena śaṭhena ca / HV_App.I,29B.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:9268: sāmbena cāparaiś cāpi pūrvaṃ yena praveśitāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.277 //
GE07hv_apppu:9269: pramathya tarasā karṇaṃ yatantaṃ raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,29B.278 /
GE07hv_apppu:9270: jagrāha balavān kārṣṇiḥ prasphurantaṃ tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:9271: vinadya ca guhāṃ vīro ghorāṃ māyāmayīṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,29B.280 /
GE07hv_apppu:9272: duryodhanaṃ ca rājānaṃ virāṭadrupadāv api // HV_App.I,29B.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:9273: śakuniṃ caiva śalyaṃ ca nīlaṃ cāpi nadīsutam / HV_App.I,29B.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:9274: vindānuvindau rājānau jarāsaṃdhaṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:9275: trigartān mālavāṃś caiva vasātīṃś ca mahābalān / HV_App.I,29B.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:9277: tathāhvṛtim uvācedaṃ mātulaṃ rukmim eva ca / HV_App.I,29B.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:9278: śiśupālaṃ ca rājānaṃ bhagadattaṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:9279: saṃbamdhaṃ ca gurutvaṃ ca mānayāmi narādhipāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:9280: guhām imāṃ ghorarūpāṃ yena prakṣepayāmi vaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:9282: prakṣeptavyā narendrās te guhāyām iti dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29B.291 //
