GE07hv_apppu:9283: āśritya śāmbarīṃ māyāṃ nikumbhena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,29B.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:9284: prakṣiptān yādavāṃś caiva mākṣayiṣyāmi sarvathā // HV_App.I,29B.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:9285: ity ukte śiśupālas tu rājā senapatis tathā / HV_App.I,29B.294 /
GE07hv_apppu:9286: śarais tatarda tān bhaimān pradyumnaṃ saviśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:9287: bilvodakeśvaraṃ devaṃ raukmiṇeyo namasya ca / HV_App.I,29B.296 /
GE07hv_apppu:9288: ārambhan nṛpatiṃ baddhuṃ śiśupālaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,29B.297 //
GE07hv_apppu:9290: śailādir abravīd vīraṃ raukmiṇeyaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,29B.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:9291: bilvodakeśvaro devaḥ prāha tvāṃ yadunandana / HV_App.I,29B.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:9292: sarvaṃ kuru yathā rātryāṃ proktas tvaṃ bhaima māyayā // HV_App.I,29B.301 //
GE07hv_apppu:9293: kanyārthaṃ ratnalubdhāṃs tu badhānemān narādhipān / HV_App.I,29B.302 /
GE07hv_apppu:9294: pāśais tvam eva moktuṃ ca pramāṇaṃ yadunandana // HV_App.I,29B.303 //
GE07hv_apppu:9295: asurāṃs tu mahābāho niḥśeṣān kartum arhasi / HV_App.I,29B.304 /
GE07hv_apppu:9296: evam eva ca vaktavyas tvayā vīra janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:9297: tataḥ sa bhagadattaṃ ca śiśupālaṃ ca bhūmipam / HV_App.I,29B.306 /
GE07hv_apppu:9298: āhvṛtiṃ caiva rumiṃ ca śeṣāṃś cānyān narādhipān // HV_App.I,29B.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:9299: babandha haradattais taiḥ pāśair uttamavīryavān / HV_App.I,29B.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:9300: māyāmayīṃ guhāṃ caiva nināya kurunandana // HV_App.I,29B.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:9301: baddhvā ca raukmiṇeyo 'tha niḥśvasanta ivoragān / HV_App.I,29B.310 /
GE07hv_apppu:9302: aniruddhaṃ cakārātha rakṣitāraṃ svam ātmajam // HV_App.I,29B.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:9304: senapatiṃ kṣatriyāṃś ca kośādhyakṣāṃś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:9305: hastyaśvarathavṛndāṃś ca cakāra ca tathātmasāt / HV_App.I,29B.314 /
GE07hv_apppu:9306: avyagras tu tato hantum asurān udyataḥ prabho // HV_App.I,29B.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:9307: saṃnaddha eva covāca brahmadattaṃ dvijottamam / HV_App.I,29B.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:9308: viśrabdhaṃ vartatāṃ karma mā bhaiḥ paśya dhanaṃjayam // HV_App.I,29B.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:9309: na devebhyo nāsurebhyo nānyebhyo dvijasattama / HV_App.I,29B.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:9310: bhayaṃ hi vidyate tasya goptāro yasya pāṇḍavāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:9311: na cāsurais tava sutāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ khalv api tejasā / HV_App.I,29B.320 /
GE07hv_apppu:9312: yajñavaṭe nirīkṣyaitān māyayā nihitā mayā // HV_App.I,29B.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:9315: rudreṣu bhūmipāleṣu sānugeṣu viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29B.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:9317: diśaḥ prasasrus te vārā vadhyamānāḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,29B.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:9319: nikumbhas tān athovāca ruṣito dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:9320: bhittvā pratijñāṃ kiṃ mohād bhayārtā yātha vihvalāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:9321: hīnapratijñāḥ kāṃl lokān prayāsyatha palāyitāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.328 /
GE07hv_apppu:9323: phalaṃ jitveha bhoktavyaṃ ripūn samarakarkaśān / HV_App.I,29B.330 /
GE07hv_apppu:9324: hatena cāpi śūreṇa vastavyaṃ tridive sukham // HV_App.I,29B.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:9325: palāyitvā grḥaṃ gatvā kasya drakṣyatha he mukham / HV_App.I,29B.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:9326: dārān vakṣyatha kiṃ cāpi dhig dhik kiṃ kiṃ na lajjatha // HV_App.I,29B.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:9327: evam uktā nivṛttās te lajjamānā nṛpāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:9328: dviguṇena ca vegena yuyudhur yadubhiḥ saha // HV_App.I,29B.335 //
GE07hv_apppu:9330: ye yānti yajñavāṭaṃ tu tān nihati dhanaṃjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:9331: yamau bhīmaś ca rājā ca dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / HV_App.I,29B.338 /
GE07hv_apppu:9332: dyāṃ prayātāj jaghānaindriḥ pravaraśca dvijottamaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.339 //
GE07hv_apppu:9338: susrāva śoṇitanadī nadīva jalād āgame // HV_App.I,29B.345 //
GE07hv_apppu:9339: tāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva nikumbhas tu vardhamānāṃś ca śātravān / HV_App.I,29B.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:9340: hatān sarvān sahāyāṃś ca vīryād evotpapāta ha // HV_App.I,29B.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:9341: sa vārito jayantena pravareṇa ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:9344: pravaraṃ tāḍayām āsa sa papāta mahītale // HV_App.I,29B.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:9345: aindris taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau bāhubhyāṃ parṣasvaje / HV_App.I,29B.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:9347: tataḥ suniścayaṃ kṛtvā pravaraṃ mucya satvaram / **HV_App.I,29B.352**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9348: viditvā caiva saprāṇaṃ hitvāsuram abhidrutaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:9349: abhidrutya nikumbhaṃ ca nistriṃśena jaghana ha / HV_App.I,29B.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:9351: tatakṣa bahulaṃ gātraṃ nikumbhasyaindrir āhave / HV_App.I,29B.356 /
GE07hv_apppu:9352: sa cintayām āsa tadā vadhyamāno mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29B.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:9353: kṛṣṇena saha yoddhavyaṃ vairiṇā jñātighātinā / HV_App.I,29B.358 /
GE07hv_apppu:9354: śrāvayāmi kim ātmānam āhave śakrasūnunā // HV_App.I,29B.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:9355: evaṃ sa niścayaṃ kṛtvā tattraivāntaradhīyata / HV_App.I,29B.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:9356: jagāma caiva yuddhārthaṃ yatra kṛṣṇo mahābalaḥn // HV_App.I,29B.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:9358: draṣṭum abhyāgato yuddhaṃ jahṛṣe saha daivataiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:9359: sāghu sādhv iti putraṃ ca parituṣṭaḥ sa sasvaje / HV_App.I,29B.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:9360: pravaraṃ cāpi dharmātmā sasvaje mohavarjitam // HV_App.I,29B.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:9362: jayamānaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā jayantaṃ raṇadurjayam // HV_App.I,29B.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:9363: dadarśātha nikumbhas tu keśavaṃ raṇadurjayam / HV_App.I,29B.368 /
GE07hv_apppu:9365: sa nādaṃ sumahat kṛtvā pakṣirājam atāḍayat / HV_App.I,29B.370 /
GE07hv_apppu:9366: parigheṇa sughoreṇa balaṃ sātyakim eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:9367: nārāyaṇaṃ cārjunaṃ ca bhīmaṃ cātha yudhiṣṭhiram / HV_App.I,29B.372 /
GE07hv_apppu:9368: yamau ca vasudevaṃ ca sāmbaṃ kāmaṃ ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,29B.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:9369: yuyudhe māyayā daityaḥ śīghrakārī ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.374 /
GE07hv_apppu:9370: na cainaṃ dadṛśuḥ sarve sarvaśastraviśāradāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:9371: yadā tu naiva paśyanti tadā bilvodakeśvaram / HV_App.I,29B.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:9372: dadhyau devaṃ hṛṣīkeśaḥ pramathānāṃ gaṇeśvaram // HV_App.I,29B.377 //
GE07hv_apppu:9374: yadā tu naiva paśyanti tadā devaṃ janārdanam / **HV_App.I,29B.377**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9376: tatas te dadṛśuḥ sarve prabhāvād atitejasaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.378 /
GE07hv_apppu:9379: āhvayantaṃ raṇe kṛṣṇaṃ vairiṇaṃ jñātināśanam // HV_App.I,29B.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:9380: sajjagāṇḍīva evātha pārthas tasya ratheṣubhiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:9381: parighaṃ caiva gātreṣu vivyādhainam athāsakṛt // HV_App.I,29B.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:9382: te bāṇās tasya gātreṣu parighaś ca janādhipa / HV_App.I,29B.384 /
GE07hv_apppu:9383: bhagnāḥ śilāśitāḥ sarve nipetuḥ kuñcitāḥ kṣitau // HV_App.I,29B.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:9384: viphalān astrayuktāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā bāṇān dhanaṃjayaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.386 /
GE07hv_apppu:9385: papraccha keśavaṃ vīraḥ kim etad iti bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:9386: parvatān api bhindanti mama vajropamāḥ śarāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:9387: kim idaṃ devakīputra vismayo 'tra mahān mama // HV_App.I,29B.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:9388: tam uvāca tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prahasann iva bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:9389: mahadbhūtaṃ nikumbho 'yaṃ kaunteya śṛṇu vistaram // HV_App.I,29B.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:9390: purā gatvottarakurūṃs tapaś cakre mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,29B.392 /
GE07hv_apppu:9392: athainaṃ chandayām āsa vareṇa bhagavān haraḥ / HV_App.I,29B.394 /
GE07hv_apppu:9393: sa vavre trīṇi rūpāṇi navadhyāni surāsuraiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.395 //
GE07hv_apppu:9396: tam uvāca mahādevo bhagavān vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:9397: mama vā brāhmaṇānāṃ vā viṣṇor vāpriyam ācaran // HV_App.I,29B.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:9398: bhaviṣyasi harer vadhyo na tv anyasya mahāsura / HV_App.I,29B.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:9399: bramaṇyo 'haṃ ca viṣṇuś ca viprā naḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:9400: sa eṣa sarvaśastrāṇām avadhyaḥ pāṇḍunandana / HV_App.I,29B.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:9401: trideho 'tipramāthī ca varadattaś ca dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:9403: avadhyaṃ ṣaṭpuraṃ deham idam asya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.403 //
GE07hv_apppu:9404: ditiṃ śuśrūṣati tv eko deho 'sya tapasānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:9405: anyas tu deho ghoro 'sya yenāvasati ṣaṭpuram // HV_App.I,29B.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:9406: etat te sarvam akhyātaṃ nikumbhacaritaṃ mayā / HV_App.I,29B.406 /
GE07hv_apppu:9407: tvarayāsya vadhe vīra kathā paścād bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29B.407 //
GE07hv_apppu:9408: tayoḥ kathayator evaṃ kṛṣṇayor asuras tadā / HV_App.I,29B.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:9409: guhāṃ ṣaṭpurasaṃjñāṃ tāṃ viveśa taṇadurjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.409 //
GE07hv_apppu:9410: anviṣya tasya bhagavān viveśa madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.410 /
GE07hv_apppu:9411: tāṃ ṣaṭpuraguhāṃ ghrāṃ durdharṣāṃ kurunandana // HV_App.I,29B.411 //
GE07hv_apppu:9414: yatra praviśya bhagavān apaśyata janādhipān / HV_App.I,29B.414 /
GE07hv_apppu:9415: yuyudhe saha ghoreṇa nikumbhena janādhipa // HV_App.I,29B.415 //
GE07hv_apppu:9416: kṛṣṇasyānu praviṣṭās tu balādyā yādavās tathā / HV_App.I,29B.416 /
GE07hv_apppu:9417: praviṣṭāś ca tataḥ sarve pāṇḍavāś ca mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.417 /
GE07hv_apppu:9418: sametās tu praviṣṭās te kṛṣṇasyānumatena vai // HV_App.I,29B.418 //
GE07hv_apppu:9419: yuyudhe sa tu kṛṣṇena raukmiṇeyaḥ pracoditaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.419 /
GE07hv_apppu:9423: anayad yādavān sarvān yān ayaṃ baddhavān purā // HV_App.I,29B.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:9424: te muktā raukmiṇeyena prāptā yatra janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.421 /
GE07hv_apppu:9426: rājāno vīra muñceti punaḥ kāmam athābruvan / HV_App.I,29B.423 /
GE07hv_apppu:9427: mumoca cātha tān vīro raukmiṇeyo pratāpavān // HV_App.I,29B.424 //
GE07hv_apppu:9429: lajjayābhiplutā vīrās tasthur naṣṭaśriyas tathā // HV_App.I,29B.426 //
GE07hv_apppu:9430: nikumbham appi govindaḥ prayatantaṃ jayaṃ prati / HV_App.I,29B.427 /
GE07hv_apppu:9431: yodhayām āsa bhagavān ghoram ātmaripuṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,29B.428 //
GE07hv_apppu:9432: parigheṇāhataḥ kṛṣṇo nikumbhena bhṛśaṃ vibho / HV_App.I,29B.429 /
GE07hv_apppu:9433: gadayā cāpi kṛṣṇena nikumbhas tāḍito bhṛśam // HV_App.I,29B.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:9434: tāv ubhau moham āpannau suprahārahatau tadā // HV_App.I,29B.431 //
GE07hv_apppu:9435: tataḥ pravyathitān dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavāṃś cātha yādavān / HV_App.I,29B.432 /
GE07hv_apppu:9436: jepur muṇigaṇās tatra kṛṣṇasya hitakāmyayā / HV_App.I,29B.433 /
GE07hv_apppu:9437: tuṣṭuvuś ca mahātmānaṃ vedaproktais tathā stavaiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:9438: tataḥ pratyāgataprāṇo bhagavān keśavas tadā / HV_App.I,29B.435 /
GE07hv_apppu:9439: dānavaś ca punar vīrau udyatau samaraṃ prati // HV_App.I,29B.436 //
GE07hv_apppu:9440: vṛṣabhāv iva nardantau gajāv iva ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.437 /
GE07hv_apppu:9441: śālāvṛkāv iva kruddhau praharantau raṇotkaṭau // HV_App.I,29B.438 //
GE07hv_apppu:9442: atha kṛṣṇaṃ tadovāca nṛpa vāg aśarīriṇī / HV_App.I,29B.439 /
GE07hv_apppu:9444: iti hovāca bhagavān devo bilvodakeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29B.441 /
GE07hv_apppu:9445: dharmaṃ yaśaś ca vipulaṃ prāpnuhi tvaṃ mahābala // HV_App.I,29B.442 //
GE07hv_apppu:9446: tathety uktvā namaskṛtvā lokanāthaḥ satāṃ gatiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.443 /
GE07hv_apppu:9448: tan nikumbhasya ciccheda śiraḥ pravarakuṇḍalam / HV_App.I,29B.445 /
GE07hv_apppu:9450: tat papāta śiras tasya bhūmau jvalitakuṇḍalam / HV_App.I,29B.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:9451: meghamatto gireḥ śṛṅgān mayūra iva bhūtale // HV_App.I,29B.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:9452: nikumbhe nihate tasmin devo bilvodakeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29B.449 /
GE07hv_apppu:9453: tutoṣa ca naravyāghra jagattrāsakare vibho // HV_App.I,29B.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:9454: papāta puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca śakrasṛṣṭā nabhastalāt / HV_App.I,29B.451 /
GE07hv_apppu:9456: nananda ca jagat kṛtsnaṃ munayaś ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.453 //
GE07hv_apppu:9457: daityakanyāś ca bhagavān yadubhyaḥ śataśo dadau / HV_App.I,29B.454 /
GE07hv_apppu:9458: kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca bhagavān sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.455 /
GE07hv_apppu:9459: ratnāni ca vicitrāṇi vāsāṃsi pravarāṇi ca // HV_App.I,29B.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:9464: tad eva cātha pravaraṃ saṭpuraṃ puravardhanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.459 /
GE07hv_apppu:9466: sattre samāpte ca tadā śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.461 /
GE07hv_apppu:9467: visarjayitvā tat kṣatraṃ pāṇḍavāṃś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:9470: niyuddhakuśalān mallān devo mallapriyas tadā / HV_App.I,29B.465 /
GE07hv_apppu:9471: yodhayitvā dadau bhūri vittaṃ vastrāṇi cātmavān // HV_App.I,29B.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:9472: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sahito yadubhiś ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.467 /
GE07hv_apppu:9473: abhivādya brahmadattaṃ yayau dvāravatīṃ purīm // HV_App.I,29B.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:9474: sa viveśa purīṃ ramyāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulām / HV_App.I,29B.469 /
GE07hv_apppu:9475: puṣpacitrapathāṃ vīro vandyamāno naraiḥ pathi // HV_App.I,29B.470 //
GE07hv_apppu:9476: imaṃ yaḥ ṣaṭpuravadhaṃ vijayaṃ cakrapāṇinaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.471 /
GE07hv_apppu:9477: śṛṇuyād vā paṭhed vāppi sa yuddhe jayam āpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29B.472 //
GE07hv_apppu:9478: aputro labhate putram adhano labhate dhanam / HV_App.I,29B.473 /
GE07hv_apppu:9479: vyādhito mucyate rogād baddhaś cpay atha bandhanāt // HV_App.I,29B.474 //
GE07hv_apppu:9480: idaṃ puṃsavanaṃ proktaṃ gaubhādhānaṃ ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.475 /
GE07hv_apppu:9481: śrāddheṣu paṭhitaṃ samyag akṣayyakaraṇaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,29B.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:9484: satatam iha hi yaḥ paṭhen naraḥ @ HV_App.I,29B.479 @
GE07hv_apppu:9491: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 29C, transliterated and proof--read by Renate Söhnen--Thieme,
GE07hv_apppu:9493: [k: After App I (No. 29B), K Ñ2 V B D T G M4 cont. with a passage given in App. I (No. 29C). :k]
GE07hv_apppu:9497: bhānumatyāś ca haraṇaṃ nikumbhasya vadhaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29C.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:9498: prabrūhi vadatāṃ śreṣṭha paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // HV_App.I,29C.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:9500: ditir hateṣu putreṣu viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / HV_App.I,29C.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:9501: tapasārādhayām āsa mārīcaṃ kaśyapaṃ purā // HV_App.I,29C.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:9502: tapasā kālayuktena tathā śuśrūṣayā muneḥ / HV_App.I,29C.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:9503: ānukūlyena ca tathā mādhuryeṇa ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29C.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:9504: parituṣṭaḥ kaśyapas tu tām uvāca tapodhanām / HV_App.I,29C.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:9505: parituṣṭo 'haṃ te bhadre varaṃ varaya suvrate // HV_App.I,29C.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:9507: hataputrāsmi bhagavan devair dharmabhṛtāṃ vara / HV_App.I,29C.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:9508: avaśyaṃ putram icchāmi devair amitavikramam // HV_App.I,29C.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:9510: avadhyas te suto devi dākṣāyaṇi bhaved iti / HV_App.I,29C.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:9511: devānāṃ saṃśayo nātra kaścit kamalalocane // HV_App.I,29C.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:9512: devadevam ṛte rudraṃ tasya na prabhavāmy aham // HV_App.I,29C.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:9513: ātmā tatas te putreṇa rakṣitavyo hi sarvathā // HV_App.I,29C.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:9514: anvālabhata tāṃ devīṃ kaśyapaḥ satyavāg atha / HV_App.I,29C.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:9515: aṅgulyodaradeśe tu sā putraṃ suṣuve tataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:9517: dvisahasrekṣaṇaṃ caiva tāvaccaraṇam eva ca // HV_App.I,29C.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:9518: sa vrajaty andhavad yasmād anandho 'pi hi bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:9519: tam andhako 'yaṃ nāmneti procus tatranivāsinaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:9520: avadhyo 'smīti lokān sa sarvān bādhati bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:9521: haraty api ca ratnāni sarvāṇy ātmabalāśrayāt // HV_App.I,29C.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:9525: cakāra satataṃ mohād andhakaḥ pāpaniścayaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:9526: trailokyavijayaṃ kartum udyataḥ satu bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:9527: sahāyair asuraiḥ sārdhaṃ bahubhiḥ sarvadharṣibhiḥ // HV_App.I,29C.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:9528: taṃ śrutvā bhagavāñ śakraḥ kaśyapaṃ pitaraṃ bravīt / HV_App.I,29C.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:9530: ājñāpaya vibho kāryam asmākaṃ samanantaram / HV_App.I,29C.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:9531: yavīyasaḥ kathaṃ nāma soḍhavyaṃ syān mune mayā // HV_App.I,29C.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:9532: iṣṭaputre prahartavyaṃ kathaṃ nāma mayā vibho / HV_App.I,29C.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:9533: ihātrabhavatī kuryān manyuṃ mayi hate sute // HV_App.I,29C.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:9535: vārayiṣyāmi devendra sarvathā bhadram astu te // HV_App.I,29C.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:9536: andhakaṃ vārayām āsa dityā saha tu kaśyapaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:9538: vārito 'pi sa duṣṭātmā bādhaty eva divaukasaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:9539: tais tair upāyair duṣṭātmā pramathya ca tathā parān // HV_App.I,29C.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:9540: babhañja kānane vṛkān udyānāni ca durmatiḥ / HV_App.I,29C.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:9541: uccaiḥśravaḥsutān aśvān balād apy ānayad divaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:9542: nāgān diśāgajasutān divyān āpi ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:9543: balād dharati devānāṃ paśyatāṃ baladarpitaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:9544: devān āpyāyante tu ye yajñais tapasā balāt / HV_App.I,29C.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:9545: teṣāṃ cakāra vidhvaṃsaṃ duṣṭātmā devakaṇṭakaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:9546: nejur yajñais trayo varṇās tepur naiva tapāṃsy api / HV_App.I,29C.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:9547: andhakasya bhayād rājan yajñavighnāni kurvataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:9548: tasyecchayā vāti vāyur ādityaś ca tapaty uta / HV_App.I,29C.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:9549: candramāś ca sanakṣatro dṛśyate naiva vā punaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:9550: na bhajanti vimānāni vihāyasy prabhāṃ prabho / HV_App.I,29C.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:9554: kurūn athottarān pāpo drāvayām āsa bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:9555: bhadrāśvān ketumālāṃś ca jambudvīpāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29C.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:9556: mānayanti ca taṃ devā dānavāś ca durāsadāḥ / HV_App.I,29C.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:9557: bhūtāni ca tathānyāni samarthāny api sarvathā // HV_App.I,29C.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:9558: ṛṣayo vadhyamānās tu sametā brahmavādinaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:9559: acintayann andhakasya vadhaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29C.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:9560: teṣāṃ bṛhaspatir madhye dhīmān idam athābravīt / HV_App.I,29C.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:9561: nāsya rudrād ṛte mṛtyur vidyate ca kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29C.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:9562: tathā vare dīyamāne kaśyapenāpi śabditaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:9563: nāhaṃ rudrāt paritrātuṃ śakta ity eva dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29C.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:9564: tad upāyaṃ cintayāmaḥ śarvo yena sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:9566: viditārtho hi bhagavān avaśyaṃ jagataḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29C.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:9567: aśrupramarjanaṃ devaḥ kariṣyati satāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29C.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:9568: vrataṃ hi devadevasya bhavasya jagato guroḥ / HV_App.I,29C.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:9569: santo 'sadbhyo rakṣitavyā brāhmaṇās tu viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:9570: te vayaṃ nāradaṃ sarve prayāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ dvijaṃ / HV_App.I,29C.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:9571: upāyaṃ vetsyate tatra vayasyo hi bhavasya saḥ // HV_App.I,29C.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:9572: bṛhaspativacaḥ śrutvā sarve te 'tha tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29C.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:9573: [k: Ds1 (marg.) Bom. Poona eds, G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:9577: devarṣe bhagavan sādho kailāsaṃ vraja satvaram / **HV_App.I,29C.75**1:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:9578: vijñaptum arhase devam andhakasya vadhe haram // **HV_App.I,29C.75**1:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:9579: trāṇārthaṃ nāradaṃ procus tāṃs tatheti sa coktavān // HV_App.I,29C.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:9580: ṛṣiṣv atha prayāteṣu tat kāryaṃ nārado muniḥ / HV_App.I,29C.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:9581: vicārya manasā vidvān iti kāryaṃ sa dṛṣṭavān // HV_App.I,29C.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:9582: sa devadevaṃ bhagavān draṣṭuṃ munir athāyayau / HV_App.I,29C.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:9584: sa tatra rajanīm ekām uṣitvā munisattamaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:9585: mandārāṇāṃ vane ramnye dayitaḥ śūlapāṇinaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:9586: ājagāma punaḥ svargaṃ labdhvānujñāṃ vṛṣadhvajāt / HV_App.I,29C.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:9587: mandārapuṣpaiḥ sukṛtāṃ mālām ābadhya bhārata // HV_App.I,29C.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:9589: saṃtānamālyadāmaṃ ca sarvais taiḥ kusumaiḥ kṛtam // HV_App.I,29C.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:9590: tac ca kaṇṭhe samāsajya mahāgandhaṃ nārādhipa / HV_App.I,29C.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:9591: āyayāv andhako yatra durātmā baladarpitaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:9592: andhakas tv atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā gandham āghrāya cottamam / HV_App.I,29C.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:9594: kuto 'yaṃ puṣpajātir vā kamanīyā tapodhana / HV_App.I,29C.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:9595: gandhān varṇāñ śubhāṃs tān hi bhoḥ puṣyati muhur muhuḥ // HV_App.I,29C.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:9597: kaḥ prabhus tasya deśasya yaḥ sa sukṛtavān mune / HV_App.I,29C.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:9598: ācakṣya yady anugrāhyā vayaṃ te devatātithe // HV_App.I,29C.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:9600: ācakṣva me mune sarvaṃ saṃsiśasva varaṃ hi vai / **HV_App.I,29C.95**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9602: yad yad iṣṭaṃ mamāpi syāt tad deyaṃ devatātithau / **HV_App.I,29C.95**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9603: tam uvāca muniśreṣṭhaḥ prahasann iva bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:9604: grahāya dakṣiṇe haste mahatas tapaso nidhiḥ // HV_App.I,29C.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:9605: mandaraḥ parvataśreṣṭho vīra kāmagamaṃ vanam / HV_App.I,29C.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:9606: tatra caivaṃvidhaṃ puṣpaṃ bhoḥ sṛṣṭiḥ śūlapāṇinaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:9607: na tu tatra vanaṃ kaścid acchandena mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:9608: praveṣṭuṃ labhate tad dhi rakṣanti pramathottamāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:9611: nityaṃ prakrīḍate tatra somaḥ sapravaro haraḥ / HV_App.I,29C.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:9615: strīratnamaṇiratnāni yāni cānyāni cāpy atha / HV_App.I,29C.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:9616: kāṅkṣitāni phalanti sma te drumā haravallabhāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:9617: na tatra sūryaḥ somo 'tha tapaty atulavikrama / HV_App.I,29C.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:9618: svayaṃprabhaṃ taruvanaṃ tad bho duḥkhavivarjitam // HV_App.I,29C.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:9619: tatra gandhāḥ sravanty anye ratnāny anye mahādrumāḥ / HV_App.I,29C.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:9620: vāsāṃsi vividhāny anye sugandhāni mahābala // HV_App.I,29C.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:9621: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ lehyaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29C.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:9622: tarubhyaḥ sravate tebhyo vividhaṃ manasepsitam // HV_App.I,29C.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:9623: pipāsā vā bubhukṣā vā glāniś cintāpi vānagha / HV_App.I,29C.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:9624: na mandāravane vīra bhavatīty upadhāryatām // HV_App.I,29C.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:9625: na te varṇayituṃ śakyā guṇā varṣaśatair api / HV_App.I,29C.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:9626: guṇā ye tatra vartante svargād bahuguṇottarāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:9627: atīva vijayel lokān samahendrān na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:9628: ekāham api yas tatra vased vai ditijottama // HV_App.I,29C.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:9629: svargasyāpi hi tat svargaṃ sukhānām api sat sukham / HV_App.I,29C.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:9630: babhūva jagataḥ sarvam iti me dhīyate manaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:9633: andhako nāradavacaḥ śrutvā tattvena bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:9634: mandaraṃ parvataṃ gantuṃ mano dadhre mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29C.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:9636: jagāma mandaraṃ kruddho mahādevālayaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29C.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:9641: vātoddhūtair vanaiḥ phullair nṛtyantam iva ca kvacit / HV_App.I,29C.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:9642: prasrutair dhātubhiś citrair viliptam iva ca kvacit // HV_App.I,29C.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:9643: pakṣisvanaiḥ sumadhurair nadantam iva ca kvacit / HV_App.I,29C.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:9644: haṃsaiḥ śucipadaiḥ kīrṇaṃ saṃpatadbhir itas tataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:9645: mahābalaiś ca mahiṣaiś caradbhir daityanāśanaiḥ / HV_App.I,29C.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:9650: sa mandaraṃ giriṃ prāha rūpiṇaṃ baladarppitaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:9651: vetsi tvaṃ hi yathāvadhyo varadānād ahaṃ pituḥ // HV_App.I,29C.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:9652: mama caiva vaśe sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram / HV_App.I,29C.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:9653: pratiyoddhuṃ na māṃ kaścid icchaty api gire bhayāt // HV_App.I,29C.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:9654: pārijātavanaṃ cāsti tava sānau mahāgire / HV_App.I,29C.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:9655: sarvakāmapradaiḥ puṣpair bhūṣitaṃ ratnam uttamam // HV_App.I,29C.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:9656: tad ācakṣvopabhokṣyāmi tad vanaṃ tava sānujam // HV_App.I,29C.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:9657: kiṃ kariṣyasi kruddhas tvaṃ mano hi tvarate mama // HV_App.I,29C.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:9658: trātāraṃ nānupaśyāmi mayā khalv arditasya te / HV_App.I,29C.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:9659: ity ukto mandaras tena tatraivāntarhito 'bhavat / HV_App.I,29C.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:9661: mumoca nādaṃ sumahad idaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,29C.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:9662: mayā nāma yācyamāno yasmān na bahu manyase / HV_App.I,29C.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:9663: ahaṃ cūrṇīkaromi tvāṃ balaṃ parvata paśya me // HV_App.I,29C.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:9664: evam uktvā gireḥ śṛṅgam utpāṭya bahuyojanam / HV_App.I,29C.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:9665: niṣpipeṣa gires tasya śṛṅge 'thānyatra vīryavān / HV_App.I,29C.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:9666: saha tair asuraiḥ sarvair varadānena darpitaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:9668: viditvā bhagavān rudraś cakārānugrahaṃ gireḥ // HV_App.I,29C.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:9671: nabhaścyutaiḥ purā yadvat tadvad eva virājate // HV_App.I,29C.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:9672: atha devaprabhāvena śṛṅgāṇy utpāṭitāni tu / HV_App.I,29C.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:9673: kṣiptāni cāsurān eva ghnanti ghorāṇi bhārata // HV_App.I,29C.162 //
GE07hv_apppu:9674: kṣiptvā ye prapalāyante śṛṅgāṇi tu mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,29C.163 /
GE07hv_apppu:9675: śṛṅais tais taiḥ sma vadhyante parvatasya janādhipa // HV_App.I,29C.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:9676: ye svasthās tv asurās tatra tiṣṭhanti girisānuṣu / HV_App.I,29C.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:9677: śṛṅgais te tasya vadhyante mandarasya mahāgireḥ // HV_App.I,29C.166 //
GE07hv_apppu:9678: tato 'ndhakas tadā dṛṣṭvā senāṃ tāṃ sūditāṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29C.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:9680: āhvayaitaṃ vanaṃ yasya yuddhārtham upatiṣṭhatu / HV_App.I,29C.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:9681: kiṃ tvayācala yuddhena hatāḥ sma cchadmanā raṇe // HV_App.I,29C.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:9682: evam ukte tv andhakena vṛṣabheṇa maheśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29C.171 /
GE07hv_apppu:9684: pramathānāṃ gaṇair dhīmān vṛto vai bahulocanaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:9685: tathā bhūtagaṇaiś caiva dhīmān bhūtagaṇeśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29C.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:9686: pracakampe tataḥ kṛtsnaṃ trailokyaṃ ruṣite hare / HV_App.I,29C.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:9687: sindhavaś ca pratisrotam ūhuḥ prajvalitodakāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:9688: jagmur diśo 'gnidāhaṃ ca sarvato haratejasā / HV_App.I,29C.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:9689: yuyudhuś ca grahāḥ sarve viparītā janādhipa // HV_App.I,29C.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:9690: celuś ca girayas tatra kāle kurukulodvaha / HV_App.I,29C.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:9692: uṣṇabhāś candramāś cāsīt sūryaḥ śītaprabhas tathā / HV_App.I,29C.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:9693: na brahma vividus tatra munayyo brahmavādinaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:9694: vaḍavāḥ suṣuvur gāś ca gāvo 'śvān api cānagha / HV_App.I,29C.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:9695: petur vṛkṣāś ca medinyām acchinna bhasmasātkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:9696: bādhante vṛṣabhā gāś ca gāvaś cāruruhur vṛṣān / HV_App.I,29C.185 /
GE07hv_apppu:9697: rākṣasā yātudhānāś ca piśācāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:9700: andhako 'pi mahātejā bāṇair api vavarṣa tam // **HV_App.I,29C.86**5:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:9701: viparītaṃ jagad dṛṣṭvā mahādevas tathā gatam / HV_App.I,29C.187 /
GE07hv_apppu:9703: tat papāta harotsṛṣṭam andhakorasi durdharam / HV_App.I,29C.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:9704: bhasmasāc cākarod raudram andhakaṃ sādhukaṇṭakam // HV_App.I,29C.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:9705: tato devagaṇāḥ sarve munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29C.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:9706: śaṃkaraṃ tuṣṭuvuś caiva jagacchatrau nibarhite // HV_App.I,29C.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:9707: devaduṃdubhayo neduḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ papāta ha / HV_App.I,29C.193 /
GE07hv_apppu:9708: trailokyaṃ virvṛtaṃ cāsīn narendra vigatajvaram // HV_App.I,29C.194 //
GE07hv_apppu:9710: jepuś ca brāhmaṇā vedān ījuś ca kratubhis tathā // HV_App.I,29C.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:9711: grahāḥ prakṛtim āpedur ūhur nadyo yathā purā / HV_App.I,29C.197 /
GE07hv_apppu:9712: na jajvāla jale vahnir āśāḥ sarvāḥ prasedire // HV_App.I,29C.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:9713: mandaraḥ parvataśreṣṭhaḥ pureva virarāja ha / HV_App.I,29C.199 /
GE07hv_apppu:9715: reme somaś ca bhagavān pārijātavane haraḥ / HV_App.I,29C.201 /
GE07hv_apppu:9716: supracārān surān kṛtvā śakrādīn dharmataḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29C.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:9718: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 29D, transliterated by François Painchaud,
GE07hv_apppu:9721: [k: K Ñ2 V B D T G M4 cont. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:9723: mune 'ndhakavadhaḥ śrāvyaḥ śruto 'yaṃ khalu bho mayā / HV_App.I,29D.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9724: śāntis trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ kṛtā devena dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29D.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:9725: nikumbhasya hataṃ dehaṃ dvitīyaṃ cakrapāṇinā / HV_App.I,29D.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:9726: yadarthaṃ ca yathā caiva tad bhavān vaktum arhati // HV_App.I,29D.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:9731: samudrayātrā saṃprāptā tīrthe piṇḍārake nṛpa // HV_App.I,29D.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:9732: ugraseno narapatir vasudevaś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29D.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:9733: nikṣiptau nagarādhyakṣau śeṣāḥ sarve vinirgatāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:9734: pṛthag balaḥ pṛthag dhīmāl lokanātho janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29D.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:9737: kumaraiḥ saha vārṣṇeyai rūpavadbhiḥ svalaṃkṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,29D.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:9739: veśyā niveśitā vīra dvāravatyāṃ sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:9740: sāmānyās tāḥ kumārāṇāṃ krīḍānāryo mahātmanām / HV_App.I,29D.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:9741: icchābhojyā guṇair eva rājanyā veśayoṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,29D.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:9742: sthitir eṣā hi bhaimānāṃ kṛtā kṛṣṇena dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29D.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:9743: strīnimittaṃ bhaved vairaṃ mā yadunām iti prabho // HV_App.I,29D.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:9744: revatyā caikayā sārdhaṃ balo reme 'nukūlayā / HV_App.I,29D.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:9747: cikrīḍa sāgarajale revatyā sahito balaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:9749: ramayām āsa govindo vaiśvarūpyeṇa sarvakṛt // HV_App.I,29D.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:9750: aham iṣṭā mayā sārdhaṃ jale vasati keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,29D.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:9751: iti tā menire sarvā nārāyaṇaparāḥ striyaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:9753: mānam ūhuś ca tāḥ sarvā govinde bahumānajam // HV_App.I,29D.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:9754: aham iṣṭaham iṣṭeti snigdhe parijane tadā / HV_App.I,29D.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:9755: nārāyaṇās triyaḥ sarvā mudā śaślāghire śubhāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:9757: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā jahṛṣire darpaṇeṣv aṅgalakṣaṇam // HV_App.I,29D.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:9758: gotram uddiśya kṛṣṇasya jagire kṛṣṇayoṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,29D.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:9759: pibantya iva kṛṣṇasya nayanair vadanāmbujam // HV_App.I,29D.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:9764: śirāṃsi garvitāny ūhuḥ sarvā niravaśeṣataḥ / HV_App.I,29D.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:9766: tābhis tu saha cikrīḍa sarvābhir harir ātmavān / HV_App.I,29D.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:9767: vaiśvarūpyeṇa vidhinā samudre vimale jale // HV_App.I,29D.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:9768: uvāha sarvagandhāḍhyaṃ svacchaṃ vāri mahodadhiḥ / HV_App.I,29D.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:9769: toyaṃ cālavaṇaṃ vīra vāsudevasya śāsanāt // HV_App.I,29D.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:9770: gulphadaghnaṃ jānudaghnam ūrudaghnam athāpi vā / HV_App.I,29D.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:9771: nāryas tāḥ stanadaghnaṃ vā jalaṃ samabhikāṅkṣitam // HV_App.I,29D.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:9772: siṣicuḥ keśavaṃ patnyo dhārā iva mahodadhim / HV_App.I,29D.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:9773: siṣeca taśca govindo meghaḥ phullalatā iva // HV_App.I,29D.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:9775: upagūhasva māṃ vīra patāmīty abruvan striyaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:9776: kāścit kāṣṭhamayais teruḥ plavaiḥ sarvāṅgaśobhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29D.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:9778: makarākṛtibhiś cānyā mīnābhair api cāparāḥ / HV_App.I,29D.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:9780: stanakumbhais tathā terūḥ kumbhair iva tathāparāḥ / HV_App.I,29D.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:9782: rarāma saha rūkmiṇyā jale tasmin mudā yutaḥ / HV_App.I,29D.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:9784: tat tad eva hi tāś cakrur mudā nārāyaṇastriyaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:9787: yasyā yasyās tu yo bhāvas tāṃ tāṃ tenaiva keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,29D.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:9792: vaiśvarūpyeṇa vartantam aṅganās tā janārdanam // HV_App.I,29D.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:9794: kṛṣṇaṃ bhāryāś cakamire bhaktyā ca bahu menire // HV_App.I,29D.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:9795: pṛthag goṣṭhyaḥ kumārāṇāṃ prakāśaṃ strīgaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,29D.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:9796: alaṃcakrur jalaṃ vīrāḥ sāgarasya guṇākarāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:9798: tejasāpy āhṛtānāṃ te dākṣaṇyāt tasthire vaśe / HV_App.I,29D.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:9799: śṛṇvantaś cārugītāni tathā svabhinayāny api / HV_App.I,29D.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:9801: pañcacūḍās tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kauberyaś ca varāpsarāḥ / HV_App.I,29D.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:9802: māhendrīś cānayām āsa vaiśvarūpyeṇa hetunā // HV_App.I,29D.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:9803: tāḥ provācāprameyātmā sāntvayitvā jagat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29D.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:9804: upasthitāś ca praṇatāḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭās tathā // HV_App.I,29D.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:9806: matpriyārthaṃ varārohā ramayadhvaṃ ca yādavān // HV_App.I,29D.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:9807: darśayadhvaṃ guṇān sarvān nṛtyagītai rahaḥsu ca / HV_App.I,29D.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:9809: evaṃ kṛte vidhāsyāmi śreyo vo manasepsitam / HV_App.I,29D.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:9810: maccharīrasamā hy ete sarve niravaśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29D.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:9811: śirasājñāṃ tu tāḥ sarvāḥ pratigṛhya hares tadā / HV_App.I,29D.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:9813: tābhiḥ praviṣṭamātrābhir dyotitaḥ sa mahārṇavaḥ / HV_App.I,29D.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:9815: tā jale sthalavat sthitvā jaguś cāthāpy avādayan / HV_App.I,29D.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:9816: cakruś cābhinayaṃ samyak svargāvāsa ivāṅganāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:9817: gandhair mālyaiś ca tā divyair vastraiś cāyatalocanāḥ / HV_App.I,29D.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:9818: helābhir hāsabhāvaiś ca jahrur bhaimamanāṃsy atha // HV_App.I,29D.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:9819: kaṭākṣair iṅgitair hāsaiḥ kalaroṣaiḥ prasāditaiḥ / HV_App.I,29D.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:9820: manonukūlair bhaimānāṃ samājahrur manāṃsi tāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:9821: utkṣipyotkṣipya cākāśaṃ vātaskandhān bahūṃś ca tān / HV_App.I,29D.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:9823: kṛṣṇo 'pi teṣāṃ prītyarthaṃ vijahre viyati prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29D.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:9824: sarvaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ sārdhaṃ strīsahasrair mudānvitaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:9825: prabhāvajñās tu te vīrāḥ kṛṣṇasyāmitatejasaḥ / HV_App.I,29D.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:9826: na jagmur vismayaṃ bhaimā gāmbhīryaṃ paramāsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:9827: kecid raivatakaṃ gatvā punar āyānti bhārata / HV_App.I,29D.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:9828: gṛhān anye vanāny anye kāṅkṣitāny arimardana // HV_App.I,29D.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:9829: apeyaḥ peyasalilaḥ sāgaraś cābhavat tadā / HV_App.I,29D.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:9831: adhāvan sthalavac cāpi jale jalajalocanāḥ / HV_App.I,29D.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:9832: gṛhya haste tathā nāryo yuktā majjaṃs tathāpi ca // HV_App.I,29D.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:9833: bhakṣyabhojyāni peyāni coṣyaṃ lehyaṃ tathaica ca / HV_App.I,29D.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:9834: bahuprakāraṃ manasā dhyāte teṣāṃ bhavaty uta // HV_App.I,29D.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:9835: amlānamālyadhāriṇyas tāḥ striyas tān aninditān / HV_App.I,29D.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:9836: rahaḥsu ramayāṃ cakruḥ svarge devaratānugāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:9839: āyatāś caturasrāś ca vṛttāś ca svastikās tathā / HV_App.I,29D.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:9840: prāsādā nauṣu kauravya vihitā viśvakarmaṇā // HV_App.I,29D.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:9847: karṇadhārair gṛhītās tā nāvaḥ kārtasvarojjvalāḥ / HV_App.I,29D.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:9848: salilaṃ śobhayām āsuḥ sāgarasya mahormimat // HV_App.I,29D.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:9849: samucchritaiḥ sitaiḥ potair yānapātrais tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29D.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:9850: naubhiś ca jhillikābhiś ca śuśubhe varuṇālayaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:9851: purāṇy ākāśagāmīni gandharvāṇām itas tataḥ / HV_App.I,29D.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:9855: udyānāni sabhā vṛkṣā dīrghikāḥ syandanāni ca / HV_App.I,29D.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:9856: niveśitāni svalpāni tādṛśāny eva sarvathā // HV_App.I,29D.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:9859: vaneṣu ruruvur hṛdyaṃ madhuraṃ caiva pakṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29D.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:9861: devalokodbhavāḥ śvetā vilepuḥ kokilās tadā / HV_App.I,29D.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:9862: madhurāṇi vicitrāṇi yadūnāṃ kāṅkṣitāni ca // HV_App.I,29D.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:9867: nārāyaṇājñayā vṛkṣāḥ puṣpāṇi mumucur bhṛśam / HV_App.I,29D.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:9869: vavau manoharo vāto ratikhedaharaḥ sukhaḥ / HV_App.I,29D.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:9871: śītoṣṇam icchatāṃ tatra babhūva vasudhāpate / HV_App.I,29D.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:9873: na kṣutpipāsā na glānir na cintā śoka eva ca / HV_App.I,29D.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:9874: āviveśa tadā bhaimān prabhāvāc cakrapāninaḥ // HV_App.I,29D.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:9878: rūdhvā cikrīḍur indrābhā bhaimāḥ kṛṣṇābhirakṣitāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:9881: ratnāni yāni trailaukye viśiṣṭāni viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29D.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:9883: pṛthak pṛthaṅ nivāsāś ca strīṇāṃ kṛṣṇasya bhārata / HV_App.I,29D.160 /
GE07hv_apppu:9886: yadusiṃhāḥ śubhair juṣṭāḥ śakunaiḥ svargavāsibhiḥ // HV_App.I,29D.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:9905: tāṃ revatīṃ cāpy atha vāpi rāmaṃ @ HV_App.I,29D.180 @
GE07hv_apppu:9913: cikrīḍur anyāś ca tathaiva tāsāṃ @ HV_App.I,29D.188 @
GE07hv_apppu:9924: vraje ca vāsaṃ śakunīvadhaṃ ca // HV_App.I,29D.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:9925: tathā ca bhagnau yamalārjunau ca @ HV_App.I,29D.200 @
GE07hv_apppu:9927: sa kāliyo nāgapatir hrade ca @ HV_App.I,29D.202 @
GE07hv_apppu:9928: kṛṣṇena dāntaś ca yathā durātmā // HV_App.I,29D.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:9943: ratnapravekaṃ ca yudhā jitair yat @ HV_App.I,29D.218 @
GE07hv_apppu:9950: balaḥ pṛthuśrīḥ sa cukūrda rāmaḥ / HV_App.I,29D.225 /
GE07hv_apppu:9961: gadaś ca dhīmān atha sāraṇaś ca @ HV_App.I,29D.236 @
GE07hv_apppu:9983: madhyaṃ ca gatvā sa cukūrda bhūyo @ HV_App.I,29D.258 @
GE07hv_apppu:9985: sa satyabhāmām atha keśavaṃ ca @ HV_App.I,29D.260 @
GE07hv_apppu:9986: pārthaṃ subhadrāṃ ca balaṃ ca devam / HV_App.I,29D.261 /
GE07hv_apppu:9995: hasan vihāsāṃś ca jahāsa harṣād @ HV_App.I,29D.270 @
GE07hv_apppu:10005: rāsāvasāne tv atha gṛhya haste @ HV_App.I,29D.280 @
GE07hv_apppu:10011: dvidhākṛtāḥ sma patitāḥ sma bhūtvā @ HV_App.I,29D.286 @
GE07hv_apppu:10021: dṛśyā ca te ratnavibhūṣitā tu @ HV_App.I,29D.296 @
GE07hv_apppu:10022: sā velikābhūr atha patsukhā ca / HV_App.I,29D.297 /
GE07hv_apppu:10023: manonukūlaṃ ca janasya yat tat @ HV_App.I,29D.298 @
GE07hv_apppu:10036: pātraṃ papur yeṣu dadasva bhaimāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:10039: yathā vyalīkaṃ na bhaved yadūnāṃ @ HV_App.I,29D.314 @
GE07hv_apppu:10043: siṣeca pūrvaṃ nṛpa nāradaṃ tu @ HV_App.I,29D.318 @
GE07hv_apppu:10046: sa cāpi satyām atha rukmiṇīṃ ca @ **HV_App.I,29D.319**1:2 @
GE07hv_apppu:10052: kṛṣṇātmajā ye tv atha bhaimamukhyā @ HV_App.I,29D.324 @
GE07hv_apppu:10056: śeṣās tu bhaimā harim abhyupetāḥ @ HV_App.I,29D.328 @
GE07hv_apppu:10084: nārāyaṇaś caiva sa nāradaś ca @ HV_App.I,29D.356 @
GE07hv_apppu:10094: te noparemuḥ suciraṃ ca bhaimā @ HV_App.I,29D.366 @
GE07hv_apppu:10095: mānaṃ vahanto madanaṃ madaṃ ca // HV_App.I,29D.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:10103: priyāś ca teṣāṃ nanṛtuḥ pratītāḥ // HV_App.I,29D.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:10109: bhaimā hi te tatyajur eva toyam // HV_App.I,29D.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:10148: śākaiś ca sūpaiś ca bahuprakāraiḥ / HV_App.I,29D.417 /
GE07hv_apppu:10149: peyaiś ca dadhnā payasā ca vīrāḥ @ HV_App.I,29D.418 @
GE07hv_apppu:10153: śṛtaṃ payaḥ śarkarayā ca yuktaṃ @ HV_App.I,29D.422 @
GE07hv_apppu:10154: phalaprakārāṃś ca bahūṃś ca khādan // HV_App.I,29D.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:10158: sarpiḥ palaṃ madhu palaṃ maricaṃ dvikarṣaṃ @ **HV_App.I,29D.423**3:3 @
GE07hv_apppu:10164: tṛptāḥ pravṛttāḥ punar eva vīrās @ HV_App.I,29D.424 @

GE07hv_apppu:10172: jagrāha vīṇām atha nāradas tu @ HV_App.I,29D.432 @
GE07hv_apppu:10174: hallīsakaṃ tu svayam eva kṛṣṇaḥ @ HV_App.I,29D.434 @
GE07hv_apppu:10178: āsāritān te ca tataḥ pratītā @ HV_App.I,29D.438 @

GE07hv_apppu:10183: hemā ca rājann atha miśrakeśī // HV_App.I,29D.443 //
GE07hv_apppu:10184: tilottamā cāpy atha menakā ca @ HV_App.I,29D.444 @

GE07hv_apppu:10256: [k: Line 503 is printed with enclosing brackets. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10262: prītiṃ puraskṛtya hi te daśārhāḥ / HV_App.I,29D.509 /
GE07hv_apppu:10273: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 29E, transliterated by François Painchaud,
GE07hv_apppu:10276: [k: K Ñ2 V B D T G M4 cont. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10279: chidram āsādya durbuddhir devaśatrur durāsadaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:10280: kanyāṃ bhānumatīṃ nāma bhānor duhitaraṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,29E.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:10283: māyāvī māyayā rājan pūrvavairam anusmaran // HV_App.I,29E.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:10284: bhrātur hi vajranābhasya tasya kanyā prabhāvatī / HV_App.I,29E.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:10285: pradyūmnena hṛtā vīra vajranābhas tathā hataḥ // HV_App.I,29E.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:10286: bhānor eva tathāraṇye vasaty avasareṇa hi / HV_App.I,29E.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:10289: tasyāṃ hṛtāyāṃ kanyāyāṃ rudantyāṃ samitiṃjaya // HV_App.I,29E.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:10290: vasudevāhukau vīrau daṃśitau nirgatāv ubhau / HV_App.I,29E.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:10291: ārtanādam upaśrutya bhānoḥ kanyāpure tadā // HV_App.I,29E.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:10292: na dṛṣṭigocare tau tu dadṛśate 'pakāriṇam / HV_App.I,29E.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:10293: tathaiva daṃśitau yātau yatra kṛṣṇo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:10294: śrutārthaḥ svaṃ vimānaṃ tad āruroha janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:10295: pārthena sahitas tārkṣyaṃ nāgaśatrum ariṃdamaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:10296: rathe tvam anugaccheti saṃdiśya makaradhvajam / HV_App.I,29E.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:10297: tvareti garuḍaṃ vīraḥ saṃdideśa ca kāśyapam // HV_App.I,29E.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:10298: vajraṃ nagaram āyāntaṃ nikumbhaṃ raṇadurjayam / HV_App.I,29E.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:10300: pradyumnaś ca mahātejā māyināṃ pravaro nṛpa // HV_App.I,29E.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:10303: nikumbhas tv atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā tridhātmānam athākarot // HV_App.I,29E.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:10304: tān sarvān yodhayām āsa nikumbhaḥ prahasann iva / HV_App.I,29E.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:10306: savyenālambya hastena kanyāṃ bhānumatīṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,29E.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:10307: dakṣiṇenātha hastena gadayā praharaty uta // HV_App.I,29E.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:10308: kanyārthaṃ na ca kṛṇṣau vā kāmo vā nṛpasattama / HV_App.I,29E.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:10309: nirdayaṃ praharanti sma nikumbhe ca mahāsure // HV_App.I,29E.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:10310: samarthās te mahātmānaḥ śatruṃ hantuṃ durāsadāḥ / HV_App.I,29E.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:10312: śreṣṭho dhanuṣmatāṃ pārthaḥ sarvathā kuśalo yudhi / HV_App.I,29E.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:10313: nārācair vidhinā daityaṃ śaraśaktyā jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,29E.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:10314: te tu vaitastikair bāṇair vividhur dānavaṃ yudhi / HV_App.I,29E.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:10315: na kanyāṃ kalayā yuktyā śikṣayā ca mahīpate // HV_App.I,29E.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:10316: tataḥ sa kanyayā sārdhaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata / HV_App.I,29E.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:10317: āsurīm āśrito māyāṃ na tāṃ vetti hi kaś cana // HV_App.I,29E.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:10318: taṃ kṛṣṇau raukmiṇeyaś ca pṛṣṭhato 'nuyayus tadā / HV_App.I,29E.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:10319: hārītaḥ śakuno bhūtvā tasthāv atha mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29E.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:10320: taṃ bāṇaiḥ punar evātha vīro bhūyo dhanaṃjayaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:10321: vaitastikair marmabhidbhiḥ kanyāṃ rakṣann atāḍayat // HV_App.I,29E.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:10322: sa imāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ saptadvīpāṃ mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,29E.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:10323: babhrāmānugataś caiva tair vīrair arimardanaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:10325: papāta celagaṅgāyāḥ puline saha kanyayā // HV_App.I,29E.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:10326: na devā nāsurā vāpi laṅghayanti tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29E.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:10327: gokarṇaṃ tejasā guptaṃ mahādevasya bhārata // HV_App.I,29E.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:10328: etad antaram āsādya pradyumnaḥ śīghravikramaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:10329: kanyāṃ bhānumatīṃ bhaimo jagrāha raṇadurjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:10330: asuraḥ so 'rdito rājan kṛṣṇābhyāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,29E.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:10332: jagāma pṛṣṭhato yātau kṛṣṇau tārkṣyagatau tadā // HV_App.I,29E.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:10333: viveśa ṣaṭpuraṃ caiva jñātīnām ālayaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,29E.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:10334: tatra vīrau guhādvāri kṛṣṇau rātriṃ tadoṣatuḥ // HV_App.I,29E.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:10335: raukmiṇeyo 'pi kṛṣṇena saṃdiṣṭo dvārakāṃ purīm / HV_App.I,29E.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:10337: nayitvā cāyayau vīraḥ ṣaṭpuraṃ dānavākulam / HV_App.I,29E.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:10338: dadarśa ca guhādvāri kṛṣṇau bhīmaparākramau // HV_App.I,29E.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:10339: ūṣatur dvāram ākramya ṣaṭpurasya mahābalau / HV_App.I,29E.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:10341: tato 'nantaram etasmād bilād atibalas tadā / HV_App.I,29E.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:10342: nirjagāma balī yoddhuṃ nikumbho bhīmavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:10343: tasya nirgacchatas tasmād bilāt pārtho viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29E.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:10344: rurodha sarvato mārgaṃ śarair gāṇḍīvaniḥsṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,29E.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:10345: so 'bhisṛtya gadāṃ ghorām udyamya bahukaṇṭakām / HV_App.I,29E.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:10346: śirasy atāḍayat pārthaṃ nikumbho balināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:10347: gadayābhihate pārthe raktaṃ vamati muhyati / HV_App.I,29E.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:10348: hasitvā so 'suro dṛpto raukmiṇeyam atāḍayat // HV_App.I,29E.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:10349: taṃ prāṅmukhamukhaṃ vīraṃ māyāvī māyināṃ varam / HV_App.I,29E.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:10350: adṛṣṭenāhato vīraḥ śirasy atha mumoha saḥ // HV_App.I,29E.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:10351: tathāgatau tu dṛṣṭvā tau muhyamānau sutāḍitau / HV_App.I,29E.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:10354: tāv anyonyaṃ durādharṣau garjantāv abhipetatuḥ // HV_App.I,29E.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:10355: airāvatagataḥ śakraḥ sarvair devagaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,29E.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:10356: dadarśa tan mahāyuddhaṃ ghoraṃ devāsuraṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29E.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:10357: dṛṣṭvā devān hṛṣīkeśaś citrair yuddhair ariṃdamaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:10358: iyeṣa dānavaṃ hantuṃ devānāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,29E.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:10359: sa maṇḍalāni citrāṇi darśayām āsa keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:10362: śikṣayā bhrāmayāṇo 'tha maṇḍalāni cacāra ha // HV_App.I,29E.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:10363: ṛṣabhāv iva garjantau bṛṃhantāv iva kuñjarau / HV_App.I,29E.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:10364: vāsitāntaram āsādya kruddhau sālāvṛkāv iva // HV_App.I,29E.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:10365: ājaghāna nikumbhas tu gadayā gadapūrvajam / HV_App.I,29E.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:10367: tatkālam eva kṛṣṇo 'pi bhrāmayitvā mahāgadām / HV_App.I,29E.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:10368: nikumbhamūrdhani tadā pātayām āsa bhārata // HV_App.I,29E.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:10369: avaṣṭabhya muhūrtaṃ tu hariḥ kaumodakīṃ gadām / HV_App.I,29E.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:10370: tasthau jagadgurur dhīmān mumoha patitaḥ kṣitau // HV_App.I,29E.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:10371: hāhābhūtaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tatkālam abhavat tadā / HV_App.I,29E.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:10372: tathā gate vāsudeve naradeve mahātmani // HV_App.I,29E.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:10375: nūnam ātmecchayā kṛṣṇas tathā cakre surottamaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:10376: ko hi śakto mahātmānaṃ yuddhe mohayituṃ harim // HV_App.I,29E.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:10377: kṛṣṇaḥ pratyāgataprāṇaś cakram udyamya bhārata / HV_App.I,29E.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:10380: śarīraṃ tat parityajya na tu taṃ vetti keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:10381: mumūrṣati mṛto vāyam iti matvā janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:10382: rarakṣa smaramāṇo 'tha vīro vīravrataṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29E.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:10385: pradyumno 'py atha māyāvī viditaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt / HV_App.I,29E.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:10386: nikumbhas tāta nāsty atra gataḥ kvāpi sudurmatiḥ // HV_App.I,29E.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:10387: pradyumnenaiva mukte tu tan nanāśa kalevaram / HV_App.I,29E.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:10388: prajahāsātha bhagavān arjunena saha prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29E.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:10390: dadṛśus te tadā vīrāḥ kṣitau divi ca sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,29E.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:10391: sahasrāṇy eva kṛṣṇaṃ tu tathā pārtham ariṃdamam / HV_App.I,29E.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:10392: raukmiṇeyaṃ tathā vīraṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,29E.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:10393: pāṇḍavasya dhanuḥ kecit kecid asya mahāśarān / HV_App.I,29E.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:10394: anye 'sya jagṛhur hastāv anye pādau mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,29E.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:10395: evaṃ grahāya te vīram agamaṃs te vihāyasi / HV_App.I,29E.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:10396: pārthānām api koṭyas tu gṛhītānāṃ tadābhavan // HV_App.I,29E.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:10397: nāntaṃ dadarśa kṛṣṇaś ca kārṣṇiś ca ripunāśanau / HV_App.I,29E.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:10398: vicchidya tau śarair vīrau nikumbhaṃ pārthavarjitau // HV_App.I,29E.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:10399: ekaikas tu dvidhā chinno dvaidhībhavati bhārata / HV_App.I,29E.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:10400: divyajñānas tadā kṛṣṇo bhagavān atra dṛṣṭvān // HV_App.I,29E.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:10401: nikumbhaṃ tattvataś cāpi dadarśa madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:10402: sraṣṭāraṃ sarvamāyānāṃ hartāraṃ phalgunasya ca // HV_App.I,29E.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:10403: sa cakreṇa śiras tasya cakartāsurasūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:10405: sa muktvā phalgunaṃ rājaṃś chinne śirasi bhārata / HV_App.I,29E.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:10408: kṛṣṇavākyena jagraha kārṣṇir viyati mānada // HV_App.I,29E.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:10409: nikumbhe patite bhūmau samāśvāsya dhanaṃjayam / HV_App.I,29E.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:10411: samiyāyātha dāśarho dvārakāṃ mudito vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,29E.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:10412: nāradaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ vavande yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:10413: nārado 'tha mahātejā bhānuṃ yādavam abravīt / HV_App.I,29E.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:10414: bhāno mā kārṣīr manyuṃ tvaṃ śrūyatāṃ bhaimanandana // HV_App.I,29E.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:10416: sa śaśāpa tato roṣān munir duhitaraṃ tava // HV_App.I,29E.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:10418: sutārthe te mayā sārdhaṃ munibhiḥ sa prasāditaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:10419: bālāṃ vratavatīṃ kanyām anāgasam imāṃ mune / HV_App.I,29E.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:10420: śaptavān asi dharmajña kathaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara / HV_App.I,29E.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:10422: asmābhir evam uktas tu durvāsā bhaimanandana / HV_App.I,29E.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:10424: yad avocam ahaṃ vākyaṃ tat tathā na tad anyathā / HV_App.I,29E.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:10425: ripuhastam avaśyaṃ hi gamiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:10426: adūṣitā tu dharmeṇa bhartāram upalapsyati // HV_App.I,29E.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:10427: bahuputrā bahudhanā subhagā ca bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29E.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:10428: sugandhagandhā ca sadā kumārī ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.149 /
GE07hv_apppu:10429: na ca śokām imaṃ ghoraṃ tan vaṅgī dhārayiṣyati // HV_App.I,29E.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:10430: evaṃ bhānumatī vīra sahadevāya dīyatām / HV_App.I,29E.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:10431: śraddadhānaḥ sa śūraś ca dharmaśīlaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:10432: tato bhānumatīṃ bhānur dadau mādrīsutāya vai / HV_App.I,29E.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:10433: sahadevāya dharmātmā nāradasya vacaḥ smaran // HV_App.I,29E.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:10434: ānītaḥ sahadevaś ca preṣite cakrapāṇinā / HV_App.I,29E.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:10435: vivāhe ca tadā vṛtte sabhāryaḥ svapuraṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29E.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:10436: imaṃ kṛṣṇasya vijayaṃ yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād atha / HV_App.I,29E.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:10437: vijayaṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu śraddadhāno labhen naraḥ // HV_App.I,29E.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:10439: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 29F, transliterated by François Painchaud,
GE07hv_apppu:10442: [k: K Ñ2 V B D T G M4 cont. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10446: krīḍāṃ ca sāgare divyāṃ kṛṣṇīnām atitejasām / HV_App.I,29F.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:10447: aśrauṣaṃ paramāścaryaṃ mune dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29F.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:10449: tan me kautūhalaṃ śrotuṃ prasādād bhavato mune // HV_App.I,29F.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:10451: hanta te kīrtayiṣyāmi vajranābhavadhaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:10452: vijayaṃ caiva kāmasya sāmbasya ca mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:10453: meroḥ sānau narapate tapaś cakre mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:10454: vajranābha iti khyāto niścitaḥ samitiṃjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:10455: tasya tuṣṭo mahātejā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:10456: vareṇa cchandayām āsa tapasā paritoṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:10457: avadhyatāṃ sa devebhyo vavre dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:10458: puraṃ vajrapuraṃ caiva sarvaratnamayaṃ śubham // HV_App.I,29F.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:10459: svacchandena praveśaś ca na vāyor api bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:10463: tathā tad abhavat tasya varadānena bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:10465: koṭiśo varalabdhaṃ tam asurāḥ parivārya te / HV_App.I,29F.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:10466: ūṣur vajrapure rājan saṃvāheṣu tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29F.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:10470: purasya cātmanaś caiva jagad bādhitum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:10471: mahendram abravīd gatvā devalokaṃ viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29F.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:10472: aham īśitum icchāmi trailokyaṃ pākaśāsana // HV_App.I,29F.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:10473: atha vā me prayacchasva yuddhaṃ devagaṇeśvara / HV_App.I,29F.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:10474: sāmānyaṃ hi jagat kṛtsnaṃ kāśyapānāṃ mahātmanām // HV_App.I,29F.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:10475: sa bṛhaspatinā sārdhaṃ mantrayitvā sureśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:10477: satreṣu dīkṣitaḥ saumya kaśyapo naḥ pitā muniḥ / HV_App.I,29F.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:10478: tasmin vṛtte yathā nyāyyaṃ tathā sa hi kariṣyati // HV_App.I,29F.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:10479: tataḥ sa pitaraṃ gatvā kaśyapaṃ dānavo 'bravīt / HV_App.I,29F.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:10480: yathoktaṃ devarājena tam uvācātha kaśyapaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:10481: satre kṛtte kariṣyāmi yathā nyāyyaṃ bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,29F.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:10482: tvaṃ tu vajrapure putra vasa gaccha samāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:10483: evam ukte vajranābhaḥ svam eva nagaraṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:10484: mahendro 'pi yayau devo dvārakāṃ dvāramālinīm // HV_App.I,29F.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:10485: gatvā cāntarhito devo vāsudevam athābravīt / HV_App.I,29F.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:10486: vajranābhasya vṛttāntaṃ tam uvāca janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:10487: śaurer upasthito deva vājimedho mahākratuḥ / HV_App.I,29F.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:10488: tasmin vṛtte vajranābhaṃ pātayiṣyāmi vāsava // HV_App.I,29F.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:10489: tatropāyaṃ praveśe tu cintayāvaḥ satāṃ gate / HV_App.I,29F.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:10490: nānicchayā praveśo 'sti tatra vāyor api prabho // HV_App.I,29F.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:10491: tato gato devarājo vāsudevena satkṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:10492: vājimedhe ca saṃprāpte vasudevasya bhārata // HV_App.I,29F.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:10493: tasmin yajñe vartamāne praveśārthaṃ surottamau / HV_App.I,29F.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:10494: cintayām āsatur vīrau devarājācyutāv ubhau // HV_App.I,29F.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:10495: tatra yajñe vartamāne sunāṭyena naṭas tadā / HV_App.I,29F.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:10496: maharṣīṃs toṣayām āsa bhadranāmeti nāmataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:10497: taṃ vareṇa muniśreṣṭhāś chandayām āsur ātmavān / HV_App.I,29F.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:10498: sa vavre tu naṭo bhadro varaṃ deveśvaropamaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:10501: bhojyo dvijānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhaveyaṃ munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:10502: saptadvīpāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ vicareyam imām aham // HV_App.I,29F.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:10504: avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sthāvarā ye ca jaṅgamāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:10505: yasya yasya va veṣeṇa praviśeyam ahaṃ khalu / HV_App.I,29F.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:10506: mṛtasya jīvato vāpi bhāvenotpāditasya vā // HV_App.I,29F.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:10507: sa bhūyas tādṛśaḥ syāṃ vai jarārogavivarjitaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:10508: tuṣyeyur munayo nityam anye ca mama sarvadā // HV_App.I,29F.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:10509: evam astv iti sa prokto brāhmaṇair nṛpate naṭaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:10511: purāṇi dānavendrāṇām uttarāṃś ca kurūṃs tathā / HV_App.I,29F.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:10512: bhadrāśvān ketumālāṃś ca kālāpadvīpam eva ca // HV_App.I,29F.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:10513: parvaṇīsu tu sarvāsu dvārakāṃ yadumaṇḍitām / HV_App.I,29F.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:10514: āyāti varadattaḥ sa lokavīra mahānaṭaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:10516: uvāca bhagavāñ śakraḥ sāntvayitvā sureśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:10518: vimānavāhā devānāṃ sukṛtīnāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29F.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:10519: devānām asti kartavyaṃ kāryaṃ śatruvadhānvitam / HV_App.I,29F.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:10520: tat kartavyaṃ na mantraś ca bhettavyo vaḥ kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29F.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:10521: akurvatāṃ devatājñām ugro daṇḍaḥ pated api / HV_App.I,29F.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:10524: ito 'ntaḥpuravāpīṣu caradhvam ucitaṃ hi vaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:10525: tasyāsti kanyāratnaṃ hi trailokyātiśayaṃ śubham / HV_App.I,29F.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:10526: nāmnā prabhāvatī nāma candrābheva prabhāvatī // HV_App.I,29F.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:10527: varadānena sā labdhā mātrā kila varānanā / HV_App.I,29F.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:10528: haimavatyā mahādevyāḥ sakāśād iti naḥ śrutam // HV_App.I,29F.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:10529: svayaṃvarā ca sā kanyā bandhubhiḥ sthāpitā satī / HV_App.I,29F.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:10530: ātmecchayā patiṃ haṃsā varayiṣyati śobhanā // HV_App.I,29F.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:10531: tad bhavadbhir guṇā vācyāḥ pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:10532: sadbhūtāḥ kularūpasya śīlasya vayasas tathā // HV_App.I,29F.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:10533: yadā sā raktabhāvā ca vajranābhasutā satī / HV_App.I,29F.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:10534: tasyāḥ sakāśāt saṃdeśo nayitavyaḥ samādhinā // HV_App.I,29F.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:10535: pradyumnasya punas tasmād ānayadhvaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29F.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:10536: svabuddhyā prāptakālaṃ ca saṃvidheyaṃ hitaṃ mama / HV_App.I,29F.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:10537: netravaktraprasādaś ca kartavyas tatra sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:10538: tathā tathā guṇā vācyāḥ pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:10539: yathā yathā prabhāvatyā manas tatra bhavet sthiram // HV_App.I,29F.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:10540: vṛttāntaś cānudivasaṃ pradeyo mama sarvathā / HV_App.I,29F.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:10541: dvāravatyāṃ ca kṛṣṇasya bhratur mama yavīyasaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:10542: tāvad yatnaś ca kartayaḥ pradyumno yāvad ātmavit / HV_App.I,29F.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:10544: avadhyās te tu devānāṃ brahmaṇo varadarpitāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:10545: devaputrair hi hantavyāḥ pradyumnapramukhair yudhi // HV_App.I,29F.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:10546: naṭo dattavaras tasya veṣam āsthāya yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:10548: etac ca sarvaṃ kartavyam anyac ca svayam eva hi / HV_App.I,29F.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:10550: praveśas tatra devānāṃ nāsti haṃsāḥ kathaṃcana / HV_App.I,29F.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:10551: vajranābhepsite tatra praveśaḥ khalu sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:10554: te vāsavavacaḥ śrutvā haṃsā vajrapuraṃ yayuḥ / HV_App.I,29F.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:10555: pūrvocitaṃ hi gamanaṃ tatra teṣāṃ janādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:10556: te dīrghikāsu ramyāsu nipetur vīra pakṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:10558: te vai nadanto madhuraṃ saṃskṛtāpūrvabhāṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:10559: pūrvam apy āgatās te tu vismayaṃ janayanti hi // HV_App.I,29F.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:10560: antaḥpuropabhogyāsu cerūr vāpīṣu te nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:10563: sa tān uvāca daiteyo dhartarāṣṭrān idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:10566: āgantavyaṃ jālapādāḥ svam idaṃ bhavatāṃ gṛham / HV_App.I,29F.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:10568: te tathoktāḥ śakunayo vajranābhena bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:10569: tathoty uktvā hi viviśur dānavendraniveśanam // HV_App.I,29F.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:10570: cakruḥ paricayaṃ te ca devakāryavyapekṣayā / HV_App.I,29F.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:10571: mānuṣālāpinas te tu kathāś cakruḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:10573: striyo remur viśeṣeṇa śṛṇvantyaḥ saṃgatāḥ kathāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:10574: tato vicaratīṃ haṃsā dadṛśuś cāruhāsinīm / HV_App.I,29F.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:10576: haṃsāḥ paricitāṃ cakrus tāṃ tataś cāruhāsinīm // HV_App.I,29F.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:10577: sakhīṃ śucimukhī cakre haṃsī rājasutāṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29F.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:10578: sā tāṃ kadācit papraccha vajranābhasutāṃ sakhīm / HV_App.I,29F.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:10580: trailokyasundarīṃ vedmi tvām ahaṃ hi prabhāvati / HV_App.I,29F.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:10581: rūpaśīlaguṇair devi kiṃcit tvāṃ vaktum utsahe // HV_App.I,29F.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:10582: vyatikrāmati te bhīru yauvanaṃ cāruhāsini / HV_App.I,29F.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:10583: yad atītaṃ punar naiti gataṃ srota ivāmbhasaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:10584: kāmopabhogatulyā hi ratir devi na vidyate / HV_App.I,29F.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:10585: strīṇāṃ jagati kalyāṇi satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_App.I,29F.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:10586: svayaṃvaratve nyastā tvaṃ pitrā sarvāṅgaśobhane / HV_App.I,29F.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:10587: na ca kiṃcid varayase devāsurakulodbhavam // HV_App.I,29F.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:10588: vrīḍitā yānti suśroṇi pratyākhyātās tvayā śubhe / HV_App.I,29F.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:10589: rūpaśauryaguṇair yuktāḥ sadṛśās tvatkulasya hi // HV_App.I,29F.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:10590: āgatān necchase devi sadṛśān kularūpayoḥ / HV_App.I,29F.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:10591: ihaiṣyati kim arthaṃ tvāṃ pradyumno rukmiṇīsutaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:10592: trailokye yasya rūpeṇa sadṛśo 'tha kulena vā / HV_App.I,29F.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:10593: gunair vā cārusarvāṅgi śauryeṇāpy atha vā śubhe // HV_App.I,29F.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:10594: deveṣu devaḥ suśroṇi dānaveṣu ca dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:10595: mānuṣeṣv api dharmātmā mānuṣaḥ sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:10596: yaṃ sadā devi dṛṣṭvā hi sravanti jaghanāni hi / HV_App.I,29F.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:10597: āpīnānīva dhenūnāṃ srotāṃsi saritām iva // HV_App.I,29F.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:10598: na pūrṇacandreṇa mukhaṃ nayane vā kuśeśayaiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:10599: utsahāmopamātuṃ hi mṛgendreṇātha vā gatim // HV_App.I,29F.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:10600: jagataḥ sāram uddhṛtya putraḥ sa vihitaḥ śubhe / HV_App.I,29F.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:10601: kṛtvānaṅgaṃ vaśe sāṅgaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_App.I,29F.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:10602: hṛtena śambaro bālye yena pāpo nibarhitaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:10603: māyāś ca sarvāḥ saṃprāptā na ca śīlaṃ vināśitam // HV_App.I,29F.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:10604: yān yān guṇān pṛthuśroṇi manasā kalpayiṣyasi / HV_App.I,29F.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:10605: eṣṭavyās triṣu lokeṣu pradyumne sarva eva te // HV_App.I,29F.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:10608: prabhāvatī śucimukhīm iti hovāca bhāvinī / HV_App.I,29F.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:10609: viṣṇur mānuṣalokasthaḥ śrutaḥ sa bahuśo mayā // HV_App.I,29F.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:10610: pituḥ kathayataḥ saumye nāradasya ca dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:10611: śatruḥ sa kila daityānāṃ varjanīyaḥ kilānaghe // HV_App.I,29F.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:10612: kulāni kila daityānāṃ tena dagdhāni mānini / HV_App.I,29F.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:10613: pradīptena rathāṅgena śārṅgeṇa gadayā tathā // HV_App.I,29F.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:10615: ity ete dānavendreṇa saṃdiśyante hi taṃ prati // HV_App.I,29F.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:10616: manoratho hi sarvāsāṃ strīṇām evaṃ śucismite / HV_App.I,29F.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:10617: bhaved dhi me patikulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pitṛkulād iti // HV_App.I,29F.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:10618: yadi nāmābhyupāyaḥ syāt tasyehāgamanaṃ prati / HV_App.I,29F.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:10619: mahān anugraho me syāt kulaṃ syāt pāvitaṃ ca me // HV_App.I,29F.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:10620: samarthanāṃ me pṛṣṭā tvaṃ prayaccha śucilāpini / HV_App.I,29F.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:10621: pradyumnaḥ syād yathā bhartā mama vṛṣṇikulodbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:10623: asurāṇāṃ striyo vṛddhāḥ kathayantyo mayā śrutāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.177 //
GE07hv_apppu:10624: pradyumnasya tathā janma purastād api me śrutam / HV_App.I,29F.178 /
GE07hv_apppu:10625: yathā ca tena nihato balavān kālaśambaraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:10626: hṛdi me vartate nityaṃ pradyumnaḥ khalu sattame / HV_App.I,29F.180 /
GE07hv_apppu:10627: hetuḥ sa nāsti tasyārthe yathā mama samāgamaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:10628: dāsī tavāhaṃ sakhyārhe dūtye tvāṃ ca visarjaye // HV_App.I,29F.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:10629: paṇḍitāsi vadopāyaṃ mama tasya ca saṃgame // HV_App.I,29F.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:10630: tatas tāṃ sāntvayitvā sā prahasantīdam abravīt / HV_App.I,29F.184 /
GE07hv_apppu:10631: tatra dūtī gamiṣyāmi tavāhaṃ cāruhāsini / HV_App.I,29F.185 /
GE07hv_apppu:10632: imāṃ bhaktiṃ tavodārāṃ pravakṣyāmi śucismite // HV_App.I,29F.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:10633: tathā caiva kariṣyāmi yathaiṣyati tavāntikam / HV_App.I,29F.187 /
GE07hv_apppu:10634: sākṣāt kāmena suśroṇi bhaviṣyasi sakāminī // HV_App.I,29F.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:10635: iti me bhāṣitaṃ satyaṃ smarethāḥ śucilocane / HV_App.I,29F.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:10639: mama tvaṃ tatra me devi hitaṃ samyak prapatsyase / HV_App.I,29F.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:10640: ity uktvā sā tathā cakre yat tat sā tām athābravīt // HV_App.I,29F.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:10641: dānavendraś ca tāṃ haṃsīṃ papracchāntaḥpure tadā / HV_App.I,29F.193 /
GE07hv_apppu:10643: tattvaṃ śucimukhi brūhi kathāṃ yogyatayā vare / HV_App.I,29F.195 /
GE07hv_apppu:10644: kiṃ tvayā dṛṣṭam āścaryaṃ jagaty uttamapakṣiṇi // HV_App.I,29F.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:10645: adṛṣṭapūrvam anyair vā yogyāyogyam anindite / HV_App.I,29F.197 /
GE07hv_apppu:10646: sovāca vajranābhaṃ tu haṃsī naravarottama // HV_App.I,29F.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:10647: śrūyatām ity athāmantrya dānavendraṃ mahādyutim / HV_App.I,29F.199 /
GE07hv_apppu:10648: dṛṣṭā me śāṇḍilī nāma sādhvī dānavasattama / HV_App.I,29F.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:10649: āścaryaṃ karma kurvantī merupārśve manasvinī // HV_App.I,29F.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:10650: sumanā caiva kausalyā sarvabhūtahite ratā / HV_App.I,29F.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:10651: tathāvidūre śāṇḍilyāḥ śailaputryāḥ śubhā sakhī // HV_App.I,29F.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:10652: naṭaś caiva mayā dṛṣṭo munidattavaraḥ śubhaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:10653: kāmarūpī ca bhojyaś ca trailokye nityasaṃmataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:10654: kurūn yātyuttarān vīra kālāmradvīpam eva ca / HV_App.I,29F.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:10655: bhadrāśvān ketumālāṃś ca dvīpān anyāṃs tathānagha // HV_App.I,29F.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:10657: sa vetti devān nṛtyena vismāpayati sarvadā // HV_App.I,29F.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:10659: śrutam etan mayā haṃsi nacirād iva vistaram / HV_App.I,29F.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:10660: cāraṇānāṃ kathayatāṃ siddhānāṃ ca mahātmanām // HV_App.I,29F.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:10661: kutūhalaṃ mamāpy asti sarvathā pakṣinandini / HV_App.I,29F.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:10662: naṭe dattavare tasmin saṃstavas tu na vidyate // HV_App.I,29F.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:10664: saptadvīpān vicarati naṭaḥ sa ditijottama / HV_App.I,29F.214 /
GE07hv_apppu:10665: guṇavantaṃ janaṃ śrutvā guṇahāryaḥ sa sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:10666: tava cecchṛṇuyād vīra sadbhūtaṃ guṇavistaram / HV_App.I,29F.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:10667: naṭaṃ tadāgataṃ viddhi puraṃ tava mahāsura // HV_App.I,29F.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:10669: upāyaḥ sṛjyatāṃ haṃsi yeneha sa naṭaḥ śubhe / HV_App.I,29F.218 /
GE07hv_apppu:10670: āgacchen mama bhadraṃ te viṣayaṃ pakṣinandini // HV_App.I,29F.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:10671: te haṃsā vajranābhena kāryahetor visarjitāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.220 /
GE07hv_apppu:10672: devendrāyātha kṛṣṇāya śaśaṃsuḥ sarvam eva tat // HV_App.I,29F.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:10673: adhokṣajena pradyumno niyuktas tatra karmaṇi / HV_App.I,29F.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:10674: prabhāvatyāś ca saṃsarge vajranābhavadhe tathā // HV_App.I,29F.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:10675: daivīṃ māyāṃ samāśritya saṃvidhāya harir naṭam / HV_App.I,29F.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:10676: naṭaveṣeṇa bhaimānāṃ preṣayām āsa bharata // HV_App.I,29F.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:10677: pradyumnaṃ nāyakaṃ kṛtvā sāmbaṃ kṛtvā vidūṣakam / HV_App.I,29F.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:10678: pāripārśvaṃ gadaṃ vīram anyān bhaimāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29F.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:10680: pārśve gadāṃ vīramatyāṃ bhaimānāṃ ca tathaiva hi / **HV_App.I,29F.227**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:10681: vāramukhyā naṭīḥ kṛtvā tat tūryasadṛśaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,29F.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:10682: tathaiva bhadraṃbhadrasya sahāyāṃś ca tathāvidhān // HV_App.I,29F.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:10683: pradyumnavihitaṃ ramyaṃ vimānaṃ te mahārathāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.230 /
GE07hv_apppu:10684: jagmur āruhya kāryārthaṃ devānām amitaijasām // HV_App.I,29F.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:10685: ekaikasya samā rūpe puruṣāḥ puruṣasya te / HV_App.I,29F.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:10686: strīṇāṃ ca sadṛśāḥ sarve svararūpair narādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:10688: jagmur dānavasaṃkīrṇaṃ supuraṃ nāma nāmataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:10693: dadāv ājñāṃ vajranābho dīyatāṃ gṛham uttamam / **HV_App.I,29F.236**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:10696: bhartur ājñāṃ samālabhya tathā cakruś ca sarvaśaḥ // **HV_App.I,29F.236**3:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:10697: pūrvaśruto naṭaḥ prāptaḥ kautūhalam ajījanat // HV_App.I,29F.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:10698: naṭasyātha dadur daityāḥ satkāraṃ parayā mudā / HV_App.I,29F.238 /
GE07hv_apppu:10699: pratyayārthaṃ daduś cāpi ratnāni subahūny atha // HV_App.I,29F.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:10700: tataḥ sa nanṛte tatra varadatto naṭas tadā / HV_App.I,29F.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:10701: supure puravāsīnāṃ paraṃ harṣaṃ samādadhat // HV_App.I,29F.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:10707: ṛśyaśṛṅgaś ca śāntā ca tathārūpair naṭaiḥ kṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:10708: tatkālajīvito vṛddhā dānavā vismayaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:10709: ācacakṣuś ca teṣāṃ vai rūpatulyatvam acyuta // HV_App.I,29F.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:10710: saṃskārābhinayau teṣāṃ prastāvānāṃ ca dhāraṇam / HV_App.I,29F.250 /
GE07hv_apppu:10711: dṛṣṭvā sarve praveśaṃ ca dānavā vismayaṃ gatāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:10712: te raktā vismayaṃ nedur asurāḥ parayā mudā / HV_App.I,29F.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:10713: utthāyotthāya nāṭyasya viśeṣeṣu punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:10714: dadur vastrāṇi tuṣṭāś ca graiveyavalayāni ca / HV_App.I,29F.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:10716: pṛthagartheṣu datteṣu ślokais te tuṣṭuvur naṭāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:10717: asurāṃś ca munīṃś caiva gotrair abhijanair api // HV_App.I,29F.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:10720: purā śrutārtho daityeśaḥ preṣayām āsa bharata / HV_App.I,29F.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:10721: ānīyatāṃ vajrapuraṃ naṭo 'sāv iti harṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:10723: nītā vajrapuraṃ ramyaṃ naṭaveṣeṇa yādavāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.263 //
GE07hv_apppu:10724: āvāsaś ca tato dattaḥ sukṛto viśvakarmaṇā / HV_App.I,29F.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:10725: eṣṭavyaṃ yac ca tat sarvaṃ dattaṃ śataguṇottaram // HV_App.I,29F.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:10726: atha kālotsavaṃ cakre vajranābho mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.266 /
GE07hv_apppu:10727: kārayām āsa ramyaṃ ca raṅgavāṭaṃ prahṛṣṭavat // HV_App.I,29F.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:10728: tatas tān pariviśrāntān prekṣārthāya pracodayat / HV_App.I,29F.268 /
GE07hv_apppu:10729: dattvā ratnāni bhūrīṇi vajranābho mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:10730: upaviṣṭaś ca tān draṣṭuṃ saha jñātibhir ātmavān / HV_App.I,29F.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:10731: chatre cāntaḥpuraṃ sthāpya cakṣur dṛśye janādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.271 //
GE07hv_apppu:10736: tatas tu devagāndhāraṃ chālikyaṃ śravaṇām ṛtam / HV_App.I,29F.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:10739: viddham āsāritaṃ ramyaṃ jagire svarasaṃpadā // HV_App.I,29F.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:10741: asurāṃs toṣayām āsur utthāyothāya bhārata // HV_App.I,29F.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:10742: nāndīṃ ca vādayām āsa pradyumno gada eva ca / HV_App.I,29F.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:10743: sāmbaś ca vīryasaṃpannaḥ kāryārthaṃ naṭatāṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:10744: nāndyante ca tadā ślokaṃ gaṅgāvataraṇāśritam / HV_App.I,29F.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:10746: rambhābhisāraṃ kauveraṃ nāṭakaṃ nanṛtus tataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:10748: nalakūbaras tu pradyumnaḥ sāmbas tasya vidūṣakaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:10749: kailāso rūpitaś cāpi māyayā yadunandanaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:10750: śāpaś ca dattaḥ kruddhena rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:10751: nalakūbareṇātha yathā rambho cāpy atha sāntvitā / HV_App.I,29F.291 /
GE07hv_apppu:10753: evaṃ rāmasya caritaṃ ṣaṭkāṇḍam atha sottaram / **HV_App.I,29F.291**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:10754: dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ rājñāṃ ca vijayāvaham // **HV_App.I,29F.291**4:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:10757: etat prakaraṇaṃ vīrā nanṛtur yadunandanāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:10758: nāradasya muneḥ kīrtiṃ sarvajñasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:10760: tuṣṭuvur dānavā vīrā bhaimān amitatejasaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:10761: te dadur vastramukhyāni ratnāny ābharaṇāni ca / HV_App.I,29F.296 /
GE07hv_apppu:10765: candanāni ca divyāni śītāni rasavanti ca / HV_App.I,29F.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:10766: gurūṇy agurumukhyāni gandhāḍhyāni ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.301 /
GE07hv_apppu:10767: cintāmaṇīn udārāṃś ca cintite sarvakāmadān // HV_App.I,29F.302 //
GE07hv_apppu:10768: prekṣāsu tāsu bahvīṣu dadanto dānavās tadā / HV_App.I,29F.303 /
GE07hv_apppu:10770: striyo dānavamukhyānāṃ tathaiva ca janeśvara // HV_App.I,29F.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:10771: tato haṃsī prabhāvatyāḥ sakhī prāha prabhāvatīm / HV_App.I,29F.306 /
GE07hv_apppu:10772: gatāsmi dvārakāṃ ramyāṃ bhaimaguptām anindite // HV_App.I,29F.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:10773: pradyumnaś ca mayā dṛṣṭo vivikte cārulocane / HV_App.I,29F.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:10774: bhaktiś ca kathitā tasya mayā tava śucismite // HV_App.I,29F.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:10775: tena hṛṣṭena kālaś ca kṛtaḥ kamalalocane / HV_App.I,29F.310 /
GE07hv_apppu:10776: adya pradoṣasamaye tvayā saha samāgamaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:10777: tad adya ruciraśroṇi tava priyasamāgamaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.312 /
GE07hv_apppu:10778: na hy ātmavanto bhāṣanti mithyā bhaimakulodbhavāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:10779: tataḥ prabhāvatī hṛṣṭā haṃsīṃ tām idam abravīt / HV_App.I,29F.314 /
GE07hv_apppu:10780: uṣitāsi mamāvāse svaptum arhasi sundari // HV_App.I,29F.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:10781: tvayāhaṃ sahitāvāse draṣṭum icchāmi kaiśavim / HV_App.I,29F.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:10782: niḥsādhvasā bhaviṣyāmi tvayā saha vihaṃgame // HV_App.I,29F.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:10783: haṃsī tatheti covāca sakhīṃ kamalalocanām / HV_App.I,29F.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:10784: āruroha ca tad dharmyaṃ prabhāvatyā vihaṃgamā // HV_App.I,29F.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:10787: tasmin kṛte saṃvidhāne kāmam ānayituṃ yayau / HV_App.I,29F.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:10788: prabhāvatīm anujñāpya haṃsī vāyusamā gatau // HV_App.I,29F.323 //
GE07hv_apppu:10789: [k: Ds1 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10791: adya bhūtaḥ sa bhagavan samayo vartate niśi / **HV_App.I,29F.323**5:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:10792: tatheti prāha tāṃ kāmaḥ sā nivṛttātha pakṣiṇī // **HV_App.I,29F.323**5:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:10793: sā gatvābhyāgatā haṃsī prabhāvatim athābravīt / HV_App.I,29F.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:10795: pradyumno nīyamānaṃ tu dadṛśe mālyam ātmavān / HV_App.I,29F.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:10796: bhramarair āvṛtaṃ vīraḥ sugandham arimardana // HV_App.I,29F.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:10797: nililye tatra mālye tu bhūtvā madhukaras tadā / HV_App.I,29F.328 /
GE07hv_apppu:10799: praveśitaṃ ca tan mālyaṃ strībhir madhukarāyutam / HV_App.I,29F.330 /
GE07hv_apppu:10800: [k: K1.3.4 V B Dn Ds D1.3.6 T1-3 G1-5 M3 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10802: avidūre ca vinyastaṃ prabhāvatyā janādhipa / HV_App.I,29F.331 /
GE07hv_apppu:10803: bhramarās te yayuḥ saumya saṃdhyākāle hy upasthite // HV_App.I,29F.332 //
GE07hv_apppu:10804: sa bhaimapravaro vīras taiḥ sahāyair vihinataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.333 /
GE07hv_apppu:10805: karṇotpale prabhāvatyā nililye śanakair iva // HV_App.I,29F.334 //
GE07hv_apppu:10806: tataḥ prabhāvatī haṃsīm uvāca vadatāṃ varā / HV_App.I,29F.335 /
GE07hv_apppu:10808: sakhi dahyanti me 'ṅgāni mukhaṃ ca pariśuṣyati / HV_App.I,29F.337 /
GE07hv_apppu:10809: autsukyaṃ hṛdi cātīva ko 'yaṃ vyādhir anauṣadhaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:10810: dadhad dviguṇam autsukyam asau pūrṇaniśākaraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.339 /
GE07hv_apppu:10812: na dṛṣṭapūrvo hi mayā śrutimātreṇa kāṅkṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.341 /
GE07hv_apppu:10813: aho dhūmayate 'ṅgāni strīsvabhāvasya dhik khalu // HV_App.I,29F.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:10814: kalpayāmi yathā buddhyā yadi nābhyeti me priyaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.343 /
GE07hv_apppu:10815: kumudvatīgataṃ mārgaṃ hā gamiṣyāmy akiṃcanā / HV_App.I,29F.344 /
GE07hv_apppu:10817: śītavīryāḥ prakṛtyaiva jagato hlādanāḥ sukhāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:10818: dahanti mama gātrāṇi kiṃ nu candragabhastayaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:10820: dāvāgnisadṛśo me 'dya daṃdahīti śubhāṃ tanum // HV_App.I,29F.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:10821: tataḥ saṃkalpaye eva sthairyaṃ kāryam ivātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.350 /
GE07hv_apppu:10823: vimanaskāsmi muhyāmi vepathur me mahān hṛdi / HV_App.I,29F.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:10824: baṃbhramīti ca me dṛṣṭir hā hā yāmi dhruvaṃ kṣayam // HV_App.I,29F.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:10827: āviṣṭeyaṃ mayā bālā sarvathety avagamya tu / HV_App.I,29F.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:10828: kārṣṇir hṛṣṭena manasā saṃsīm idam uvāca ha // HV_App.I,29F.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:10829: daityendratanayāṃ prāptam avagacchasva mām iha / HV_App.I,29F.356 /
GE07hv_apppu:10830: ṣaṭpadaiḥ saha ṣaṭpādo bhūtvā mālye nilīya tu // HV_App.I,29F.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:10831: vidheyo 'smi prabhāvatyā yatheṣṭaṃ mayi vartatām / HV_App.I,29F.358 /
GE07hv_apppu:10832: ity uktvā darśayām āsa surūpo rūpam ātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:10833: tad dharmyapṛṣṭhaṃ prabhayā dyotitaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:10834: abhibhūtā prabhā caiva rājaṃś candrodbhavā śubhā // HV_App.I,29F.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:10835: prabhāvatyās tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā vavṛve kāmasāgaraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.362 /
GE07hv_apppu:10836: candrasyevodaye prāpte parvaṇyāṃ saritāṃ patiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:10837: salajjādhomukhī kiṃcit kiṃcit tiryag avekṣiṇī / HV_App.I,29F.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:10842: adhomukhaṃ mukhaṃ kṛtvā na māṃ kiṃcit prabhāṣase // HV_App.I,29F.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:10843: prabhopamardaṃ mā kārṣīr vadanasya varānane / HV_App.I,29F.370 /
GE07hv_apppu:10844: sādhvasaṃ tyajyatāṃ bhīru dāsaḥ sādhv anugṛhyatām // HV_App.I,29F.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:10845: na kālam iva paśyāmi bhīru bhīrutvam utsṛja / HV_App.I,29F.372 /
GE07hv_apppu:10846: yācāmy eṣo 'ñjalaṃ kṛtvā prāptakālaṃ nibodha me // HV_App.I,29F.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:10849: upaspṛśya tato bhaimo maṇisthaṃ jātavedasam / HV_App.I,29F.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:10850: juhāva samaye vīraḥ puṣpair mantrān udīrayan // HV_App.I,29F.377 //
GE07hv_apppu:10852: cakre pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva taṃ maṇisthaṃ hutāśanam // HV_App.I,29F.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:10853: prajajvāla sa tejasvī mānayann acyutātmajam / HV_App.I,29F.380 /
GE07hv_apppu:10854: bhagavāñ jagataḥ sākṣī śubhasyāthāśubhasya ca // HV_App.I,29F.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:10855: uddiśya dakṣiṇāṃ vīro viprāṇāṃ yadunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:10856: uvāca haṃsīṃ dvārasthāṃ tiṣṭhāvāṃ rakṣa pakṣiṇi // HV_App.I,29F.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:10857: tasyāṃ praṇamya yātāyāṃ kāmas tāṃ cārulocanām / HV_App.I,29F.384 /
GE07hv_apppu:10858: grahāya dakṣiṇe haste nināya śayanottamam // HV_App.I,29F.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:10859: ūrāv evopaveśyaināṃ sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.386 /
GE07hv_apppu:10860: cucumba śanakair gaṇḍe vāsayan mukhamārutaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:10861: tato 'syā āpapau vaktraṃ padmaṃ madhukaro yathā / HV_App.I,29F.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:10862: āliliṅge ca suśroṇīṃ krameṇa ratikovidaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:10863: arāmayad rahasy enāṃ na codvejigavāṃs tadā / HV_App.I,29F.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:10864: āpi kṛtsnaṃ caraty arthaṃ ratikāryaviśāradaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.391 /
GE07hv_apppu:10865: uvāsa sa tayā sārdhaṃ raman kṛṣṇasutaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29F.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:10866: aruṇodayakāle ca yayau yatra naṭālayaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.393 /
GE07hv_apppu:10867: akāmayā prabhāvatyā kathaṃcit sa visarjitaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.394 /
GE07hv_apppu:10868: tām eva manasā kāntāṃ kāntarupaḥ samudvahan // HV_App.I,29F.395 //
GE07hv_apppu:10869: ta ūṣur naṭaveṣeṇa kāryārthaṃ bhaimavaṃśajāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:10870: pratīkṣantas tadā vākyam indrakeśavayos tadā / HV_App.I,29F.397 /
GE07hv_apppu:10873: kaśyapasya muneḥ satraṃ yāvat tāvan narādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.400 //
GE07hv_apppu:10877: tāvad divāyāṃ daityendraḥ nāṭayaṃś ca naṭān nṛpa / **HV_App.I,29F.402**7:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:10878: divāsu nanṛtus te vai rātrāv eva kadācana // **HV_App.I,29F.402**7:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:10879: evaṃ kālapratīkṣāṇāṃ vasatāṃ tatra dhīmatām / HV_App.I,29F.403 /
