GE07hv_apppu:10881: ahar niśaṃ ca vṛttāntaṃ prayacchanti manojavāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:10883: reme saha prabhāvatyā pradyumnaś cānurūpayā / HV_App.I,29F.407 /
GE07hv_apppu:10885: tair hi vajrapuraṃ haṃsair vasadbhir vāsavājñayā / HV_App.I,29F.409 /
GE07hv_apppu:10886: vyāptaṃ nṛpa naṭāṃs tāṃś ca na viduḥ kālamohitāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.410 //
GE07hv_apppu:10887: divāpi raukmiṇeyas tu prabhāvatyā nṛpālaye / HV_App.I,29F.411 /
GE07hv_apppu:10889: māyayāsya praticchāyā dṛśyate hi naṭālaye / HV_App.I,29F.413 /
GE07hv_apppu:10890: dehārdhena tu kauravya siṣeva sa prabhāvatīm // HV_App.I,29F.414 //
GE07hv_apppu:10891: saṃnatiṃ vinayaṃ śīlaṃ līlāṃ dākṣyaṃ vilāsitām / HV_App.I,29F.415 /
GE07hv_apppu:10892: spṛhayanty asurā dṛṣṭvā vidvattāṃ ca mahātmanām // HV_App.I,29F.416 //
GE07hv_apppu:10893: rūpaṃ vilāsaṃ gandhaṃ ca mṛjāṃ bhāṣām athāryatām / HV_App.I,29F.417 /
GE07hv_apppu:10895: vajranābhasya tu bhrātā sunābho nāma viśrutaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.419 /
GE07hv_apppu:10896: duhitṛdvayaṃ ca nṛpates tasya rūpaguṇānvitam // HV_App.I,29F.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:10897: ekā candravatī nāmnā guṇavaty atha cāparā / HV_App.I,29F.421 /
GE07hv_apppu:10898: prabhāvatyālayaṃ te tu vrajataḥ khalu nityadā // HV_App.I,29F.422 //
GE07hv_apppu:10899: dadṛśāte tu te tatra ratisaktāṃ prabhāvatīm / HV_App.I,29F.423 /
GE07hv_apppu:10901: sovāca mama vidyāsti yādhītā kāṅkṣitaṃ patim / HV_App.I,29F.425 /
GE07hv_apppu:10902: ratyartham ānayaty āśu saubhagyaṃ ca prayacchati / HV_App.I,29F.426 /
GE07hv_apppu:10903: devaṃ vā dānavaṃ vāpi vivaśaṃ sadya eva hi // HV_App.I,29F.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:10904: sāhaṃ ramāmi kāntena devaputreṇa dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29F.428 /
GE07hv_apppu:10905: dṛśyatāṃ matprabhāvena pradyumnaḥ supriyo mama / HV_App.I,29F.429 /
GE07hv_apppu:10906: te dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ yāte rūpayauvanasaṃpadam // HV_App.I,29F.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:10907: punar evābravīt te tu bhaginyau cāruhāsinī / HV_App.I,29F.431 /
GE07hv_apppu:10908: prabhāvatī varārohā kālaprāptam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.432 //
GE07hv_apppu:10909: devā dharmaratā nityaṃ dambhaśīlā mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.433 /
GE07hv_apppu:10910: devās tapasi raktā hi sukharaktā mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:10911: devāḥ satyaratā nityam anṛte tu mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.435 /
GE07hv_apppu:10912: dharmastapaś ca satyaṃ ca yatra tatra jayo dhruvam // HV_App.I,29F.436 //
GE07hv_apppu:10913: devaputrau varayataṃ patividyāṃ dadāmy aham / HV_App.I,29F.437 /
GE07hv_apppu:10915: tāṃ tathety ūcatur hṛṣṭe bhaginyau cārulocanām / HV_App.I,29F.439 /
GE07hv_apppu:10916: paripapraccha bhaimaṃ ca kāryaṃ tat prati māninī // HV_App.I,29F.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:10917: sa pitṛvyaṃ gadaṃ vīraṃ sāmbaṃ cāpy abravīt tadā / HV_App.I,29F.441 /
GE07hv_apppu:10918: rūpānvitau suśīlau ca śūrau ca raṇakarmaṇi // HV_App.I,29F.442 //
GE07hv_apppu:10920: parituṣṭena dattā me vidyā durvāsasā purā / HV_App.I,29F.443 /
GE07hv_apppu:10921: parituṣṭena saubhāgyaṃ sadā kanyātvam eva ca // HV_App.I,29F.444 //
GE07hv_apppu:10922: devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ yaṃ dhyāsyasi sa te patiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.445 /
GE07hv_apppu:10923: bhaviteti mayā caiva vīro 'yam abhikāṅkṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.446 //
GE07hv_apppu:10925: pradyumnaṃ tv aham eṣyāmi yuvāṃ tāv apy avāpsyatha / **HV_App.I,29F.446**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:10926: gṛhṇītaṃ tad imāṃ vidyāṃ sadyo vāṃ priyasaṃgamaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:10927: tato jagṛhatur hṛṣṭe tāṃ vidyāṃ bhaginīmukhāt // HV_App.I,29F.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:10928: dadhyatur gadasāmbau ca vidyām abhyasya te śubhe / HV_App.I,29F.449 /
GE07hv_apppu:10929: tau pradyumnena sahitau praviṣṭau bhaimanandanau // HV_App.I,29F.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:10930: pracchannau māyayā vīrau kārṣṇinā māyinā nṛpa // HV_App.I,29F.451 //
GE07hv_apppu:10938: ity uktas tu prabhāvatyā pradyumno hṛṣṭamānasaḥ / **HV_App.I,29F.451**9:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:10940: gāndharveṇa vivāhena tāv apy aribalārdanau / HV_App.I,29F.452 /
GE07hv_apppu:10941: pāṇiṃ jagṛhatur vīrau mantrapūrvaṃ satāṃ priyau / HV_App.I,29F.453 /
GE07hv_apppu:10942: candravatyā gadaḥ sāmbo guṇavatyā tu kaiśaviḥ // HV_App.I,29F.454 //
GE07hv_apppu:10944: mārgamāṇās tv anujñāṃ te śakrakeśavayos tadā // HV_App.I,29F.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:10957: muñcanti dhārāś ca ghanā nadantas @ HV_App.I,29F.467 @
GE07hv_apppu:10989: na mārutaḥ syād yadi cārugātri @ HV_App.I,29F.499 @
GE07hv_apppu:10990: na meghakālo mama vallabhaḥ syāt // HV_App.I,29F.500 //
GE07hv_apppu:10994: tataḥ paraṃ kiṃ sukham asti loke // HV_App.I,29F.504 //
GE07hv_apppu:10999: na bhānti nadyo 'dya sarāṃsi caiva @ HV_App.I,29F.509 @
GE07hv_apppu:11030: gajān gajaiḥ svair iva vīryadṛptān // HV_App.I,29F.540 //
GE07hv_apppu:11045: na dṛśyate yat tava vaktratulyo @ HV_App.I,29F.555 @
GE07hv_apppu:11049: tadā nu paśyanti janāḥ prahṛṣṭā @ HV_App.I,29F.559 @
GE07hv_apppu:11062: vināpi candreṇa pure pitus te @ HV_App.I,29F.569 @
GE07hv_apppu:11069: yaṃ sāmagāḥ parvaṇi cāpy udāram // HV_App.I,29F.576 //
GE07hv_apppu:11078: nṛpaḥ kuśāgraiḥ punar eva yaś ca @ HV_App.I,29F.585 @
GE07hv_apppu:11079: dhīmān gato 'gnir divi pūjyate ca / HV_App.I,29F.586 /
GE07hv_apppu:11080: āyuś ca vaṃśe nahuṣaś ca yasya @ HV_App.I,29F.587 @
GE07hv_apppu:11083: vaṃśe harir yasya jagat praṇetā / HV_App.I,29F.590 /
GE07hv_apppu:11085: yaḥ subhru dakṣasya vṛtaḥ sutābhiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.592 //
GE07hv_apppu:11086: babhūva rājā ca vasuś ca yasya @ HV_App.I,29F.593 @
GE07hv_apppu:11094: na kutsito yasya nṛpo 'sti vaṃśe @ HV_App.I,29F.601 @
GE07hv_apppu:11111: jagmur devāsurāḥ svāni sthānāny amitavikramāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.614 //
GE07hv_apppu:11112: vajranābho 'pi nirvṛtte satre kaśyapam abhyagāt / HV_App.I,29F.615 /
GE07hv_apppu:11114: vajranābha nibodhasva śrotavyaṃ yadi cen mama / HV_App.I,29F.617 /
GE07hv_apppu:11115: vasa vajrapure putra svajanena samāvṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.618 //
GE07hv_apppu:11116: tapasābhyadhikaḥ śakraḥ śaktaś caiva svabhāvataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.619 /
GE07hv_apppu:11117: brahmaṇyaś ca kṛtajñaś ca jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhatamo gunaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.620 //
GE07hv_apppu:11118: rājā kṛtsnasya jagataḥ pātrabhūtaḥ satāṃ gatiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.621 /
GE07hv_apppu:11119: saṃprāpto lokarājyaṃ sa sarvabhūtahite rataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.622 //
GE07hv_apppu:11120: naiva śakyas tvayā jetuṃ vajranābha vihanyase / HV_App.I,29F.623 /
GE07hv_apppu:11121: ahiṃ padā vyutkraman vai na cirād vinaśiṣyasi // HV_App.I,29F.624 //
GE07hv_apppu:11122: vajranābhas tu tad vākyaṃ nābhinandati bharata / HV_App.I,29F.625 /
GE07hv_apppu:11124: abhivādya sa durbuddhiḥ kaśyapaṃ lokabhāvanam / HV_App.I,29F.627 /
GE07hv_apppu:11126: jñātiyodhān samānīya mitrāṇi subahūni ca / HV_App.I,29F.629 /
GE07hv_apppu:11127: pratasthe svargam evāgre vijigīṣur viśāṃ pate // HV_App.I,29F.630 //
GE07hv_apppu:11128: etasminn antare devau kṛṣṇendrau ca mahābalau / HV_App.I,29F.631 /
GE07hv_apppu:11129: preṣayām āsatur haṃsān vajranābhavadhaṃ prati // HV_App.I,29F.632 //
GE07hv_apppu:11131: tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā haṃsā vajrapuraṃ yayuḥ / **HV_App.I,29F.632**12:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11132: ūcuś ca vacanaṃ teṣāṃ śakrakeśavayos tadā // **HV_App.I,29F.632**12:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:11133: samāgatās tu tac chrutvā yadumukhyā mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.633 /
GE07hv_apppu:11134: mantrayitvā mahātmānaś cintām āpedire tadā / HV_App.I,29F.634 /
GE07hv_apppu:11136: tayor duhitaro bhāryā bhaktyā tāḥ sarvabhāvanāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.636 //
GE07hv_apppu:11137: sarvāḥ sagarbhās tāś caiva kiṃ tu kāryam anantaram / HV_App.I,29F.637 /
GE07hv_apppu:11138: prāptaḥ prasavakālaś ca tāsāṃ nāticirād iva // HV_App.I,29F.638 //
GE07hv_apppu:11139: saṃmantrayitvaitad arthaṃ haṃsān ūcur mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.639 /
GE07hv_apppu:11140: ākhyeyam arthavat kṛtsnaṃ śakrakeśavayos tadā // HV_App.I,29F.640 //
GE07hv_apppu:11141: haṃsair gatvā tadākhyātaṃ devayos tad yathātatham // HV_App.I,29F.641 //
GE07hv_apppu:11142: tābhyāṃ haṃsās tu saṃdiṣṭā na bhetavyam iti prabho // HV_App.I,29F.642 //
GE07hv_apppu:11143: utpatsyanti gunaiḥ ślāghyāḥ putrā vaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.643 /
GE07hv_apppu:11144: garbhasthāḥ sarvavedāṃś ca sāṅgān vetsyanty aninditāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.644 //
GE07hv_apppu:11145: tathā cānāgataṃ sarvam astrāṇi vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,29F.645 /
GE07hv_apppu:11146: sadya eṣa yuvānaś ca bhaviṣyanti supaṇḍ itāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.646 //
GE07hv_apppu:11147: evam uktvā gatā haṃsāḥ punar vajrapuraṃ vibho / HV_App.I,29F.647 /
GE07hv_apppu:11149: prabhāvatī tadā putraṃ suṣuve sadṛśaṃ pituḥ / HV_App.I,29F.649 /
GE07hv_apppu:11151: māsamātreṇa suṣuve devī candravatī nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.651 /
GE07hv_apppu:11152: candraprabham iti khyātaṃ tanayaṃ sadṛśaṃ pituḥ // HV_App.I,29F.652 //
GE07hv_apppu:11153: sadyaś ca yauvanaprāptaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.653 /
GE07hv_apppu:11154: guṇavaty- api putraṃ ca guṇavantam aninditā // HV_App.I,29F.654 //
GE07hv_apppu:11155: yuvānāv atha sadyas tau sarvaśāstrārthakovidau / HV_App.I,29F.655 /
GE07hv_apppu:11157: harmyapṛṣṭhe vardhamānā hṛṣṭās te yadunandanāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.657 /
GE07hv_apppu:11159: niveditāś ca saṃbhrāntair dautair ākāśarakṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.659 /
GE07hv_apppu:11161: vicārya sarve gṛhyantāṃ mamaite gṛhadharṣakāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.661 /
GE07hv_apppu:11163: tataḥ sainyaṃ samājñaptam asurendreṇa dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29F.663 /
GE07hv_apppu:11164: āvārayām āsa diśaḥ sarvāḥ kurukulodvaha // HV_App.I,29F.664 //
GE07hv_apppu:11165: gṛhyantām āśu vadhyantām iti vācas tatas tataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.665 /
GE07hv_apppu:11167: tac chrutvā vyathitās teṣāṃ mātaraḥ putravatsalāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.667 /
GE07hv_apppu:11168: rurudus tā rudantyo 'tha pradyumnaḥ sahasābravīt // HV_App.I,29F.668 //
GE07hv_apppu:11169: mā bhaiṣṭa jīvamāneṣu sthiteṣv asmāsu sarvathā / HV_App.I,29F.669 /
GE07hv_apppu:11170: kiṃ no daityāḥ kariṣyanti sarvathā bhadram astu vaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.670 //
GE07hv_apppu:11171: prabhāvatīm athovāca pradyumno viklavāṃ sthitām / HV_App.I,29F.671 /
GE07hv_apppu:11172: pitā tava gadāpāṇiḥ pitṛvyaś ca sthitas tava // HV_App.I,29F.672 //
GE07hv_apppu:11173: bhrātaraś caiva te devi jñātayaś ca tathāpare / HV_App.I,29F.673 /
GE07hv_apppu:11174: ete pūjyāś ca mānyāś ca tavārthe khalu sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.674 //
GE07hv_apppu:11175: bhaginyau pṛccha bhadraṃ te kāle 'yaṃ khalu dāruṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.675 /
GE07hv_apppu:11176: maraṇaṃ sahamānānāṃ yudhyatāṃ vijayo dhruvam // HV_App.I,29F.676 //
GE07hv_apppu:11178: kim atra kāryam asmābhiḥ sarvaiś cakrāntarasthitaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.678 //
GE07hv_apppu:11179: prabhāvatī rudantī tu pradyumnam idam abravīt / HV_App.I,29F.679 /
GE07hv_apppu:11180: śirasy añjalim ādhāya jānubhyāṃ patitā kṣitau // HV_App.I,29F.680 //
GE07hv_apppu:11181: gṛhāṇa śastram ātmānaṃ rakṣa śatrunibarhaṇa / HV_App.I,29F.681 /
GE07hv_apppu:11182: jīvanputrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca draṣṭāsi yadunandana // HV_App.I,29F.682 //
GE07hv_apppu:11183: āryāṃ nṛvara vaidarbhīm aniruddhaṃ ca mānada / HV_App.I,29F.683 /
GE07hv_apppu:11185: durvāsasā varo datto muninā mama dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29F.685 /
GE07hv_apppu:11187: eṣa me hṛdayāśvāso bhavitā na tad anyathā / HV_App.I,29F.687 /
GE07hv_apppu:11189: ity uktvā sāsim ādāya sūpaspṛṣṭvā manasvinī / HV_App.I,29F.689 /
GE07hv_apppu:11190: pradadau raukmiṇeyāya jayasveti varaṃ varā // HV_App.I,29F.690 //
GE07hv_apppu:11191: sa taṃ jagrāha dharmātmā prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā / HV_App.I,29F.691 /
GE07hv_apppu:11192: praṇamya śirasā dattaṃ priyayā bhaktiyuktayā // HV_App.I,29F.692 //
GE07hv_apppu:11193: candravaty- api nistriṃśaṃ gadāya pradadau mudā / HV_App.I,29F.693 /
GE07hv_apppu:11194: tathā guṇavatī caiva sāmbāyāsiṃ mahātmane // HV_App.I,29F.694 //
GE07hv_apppu:11195: haṃsaketum athovāca pradyumnaḥ praṇataṃ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29F.695 /
GE07hv_apppu:11196: ihaiva sāmbasahitau yudhyasva saha dānavaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.696 //
GE07hv_apppu:11197: ākāśe dikṣu sarvāsu yotsyāmy aham āriṃdama / HV_App.I,29F.697 /
GE07hv_apppu:11198: ity uktvātha rathaṃ cakre māyayā māyināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.698 //
GE07hv_apppu:11199: sahasraśirasaṃ nāgaṃ kṛtvā sārathim ātmavān / HV_App.I,29F.699 /
GE07hv_apppu:11201: sa tena rathamukhyena harṣayan vai prabhāvatīm / HV_App.I,29F.701 /
GE07hv_apppu:11204: bhedanair gādhanaiś caiva tatarda ditisaṃbhavān // HV_App.I,29F.704 //
GE07hv_apppu:11205: asurāś ca raṇe mattāḥ kārṣṇiṃ śatrair itas tataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.705 /
GE07hv_apppu:11206: jaghnuḥ kamalapatrākṣaṃ paraṃ niścayam āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.706 //
GE07hv_apppu:11208: sukuṇḍalāni cānyeṣāṃ śirāṃsy api sa cicchide // HV_App.I,29F.708 //
GE07hv_apppu:11209: kṣuracchinnaiḥ śirobhis taiḥ kāyaiś ca śakalair api // HV_App.I,29F.709 //
GE07hv_apppu:11212: dadarśa mudito yuddhaṃ bhaimānāṃ ditijaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,29F.712 //
GE07hv_apppu:11213: ye gadaṃ caiva sāmbaṃ ca daityāḥ samabhidudruvuḥ / HV_App.I,29F.713 /
GE07hv_apppu:11214: te yayur nidhanaṃ sarve yādāṃsīva mahodadhau // HV_App.I,29F.714 //
GE07hv_apppu:11215: viṣamaṃ tu tadā yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā devapatir hariḥ / HV_App.I,29F.715 /
GE07hv_apppu:11216: gadāya preṣayām āsa svarathaṃ harivāhanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.716 //
GE07hv_apppu:11217: dideśa mātalisutaṃ yantāraṃ ca suvarcasam / HV_App.I,29F.717 /
GE07hv_apppu:11218: sāmbāyairāvaṇaṃ nāgaṃ preṣayām āsa ceśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.718 //
GE07hv_apppu:11219: jayantaṃ raukmiṇeyasya sahāyam adadād vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,29F.719 /
GE07hv_apppu:11220: airāvaṇam adhiṣṭhātuṃ pravaraṃ sa niyuktavān // HV_App.I,29F.720 //
GE07hv_apppu:11225: taṃ mātalisutaṃ caiva gajam airāvaṇaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,29F.723 /
GE07hv_apppu:11226: devaḥ preṣitavāñ śakro vidhijño varakarmasu // HV_App.I,29F.724 //
GE07hv_apppu:11227: kṣīṇam asya tapo vadhyo yadunām eṣa durmatiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.725 /
GE07hv_apppu:11228: praviśanti tu bhūtāni sarvatra tu yathepsitam // HV_App.I,29F.726 //
GE07hv_apppu:11229: pradyumnaś ca jayantaś ca prāptau harmyaṃ mahābalau / HV_App.I,29F.727 /
GE07hv_apppu:11231: parighair vikramantau ca yudhyantau ca raṇājire // HV_App.I,29F.729 //
GE07hv_apppu:11232: gadaṃ kārṣṇis tadovāca durvāryaṃ raṇadurjayaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.730 /
GE07hv_apppu:11233: upendrānuja śakreṇa ratho 'yaṃ preṣitas tava // HV_App.I,29F.731 //
GE07hv_apppu:11234: hariyuṅ mātalisuto yantā cāyaṃ mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.732 /
GE07hv_apppu:11237: śva eṣyati hṛṣīkeśas tasmin vṛtte 'cyutānuja // HV_App.I,29F.735 //
GE07hv_apppu:11240: kariṣyāmi vidhānaṃ tu naiṣa śakraṃ sutānvitam / HV_App.I,29F.738 /
GE07hv_apppu:11241: vijeṣyaty apramādas tu kartavya iti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.739 //
GE07hv_apppu:11242: kalatrarakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ sarvopāyair narair yudhi / HV_App.I,29F.740 /
GE07hv_apppu:11244: evaṃ saṃdiśya bhaimaḥ sa gadasāmbau mahābalau / HV_App.I,29F.742 /
GE07hv_apppu:11246: tamaś ca nāśayām āsa daityasṛṣṭaṃ durāsadam / HV_App.I,29F.744 /
GE07hv_apppu:11247: jahṛṣe devarājaś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā ripumardanam // HV_App.I,29F.745 //
GE07hv_apppu:11248: dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni kārṣṇiṃ sarveṣu śatruṣu / HV_App.I,29F.746 /
GE07hv_apppu:11249: antarātmani vartantaṃ kṣetrajñam iti taṃ viduḥ / HV_App.I,29F.747 /
GE07hv_apppu:11250: evaṃ vyatītā rajanī raukmiṇeyasya yudhyataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.748 /
GE07hv_apppu:11253: asurāṇāṃ tribhāgaś ca nihato nātitejasā // HV_App.I,29F.749 //
GE07hv_apppu:11254: yāvad dhi yodhayām āsa kārṣṇir daityān raṇājire / HV_App.I,29F.750 /
GE07hv_apppu:11256: ayodhayaj jayantaś ca yāvad daityān mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.752 /
GE07hv_apppu:11257: tāvad ākāśagaṅgāyāṃ bhaimaḥ saṃdhyām upāsta vān // HV_App.I,29F.753 //
GE07hv_apppu:11260: jagataś cakṣuṣi tatas trimuhūrtodite ravau / HV_App.I,29F.754 /
GE07hv_apppu:11263: tasthau viyati śakrasya samīpe kurunandana // HV_App.I,29F.757 //
GE07hv_apppu:11264: sametya ca yathānyāyaṃ kṛṣṇo vāsavasaṃnidhau / HV_App.I,29F.758 /
GE07hv_apppu:11265: pāñcajanyaṃ vibhur dadhmau daityānāṃ bhayavardhanam / HV_App.I,29F.759 /
GE07hv_apppu:11266: taṃ śrutvābhyāgatas tatra pradyumnaḥ paravīrahā / HV_App.I,29F.760 /
GE07hv_apppu:11267: vajranābhaṃ jahīty uktaḥ keśavena tvareti ca // HV_App.I,29F.761 //
GE07hv_apppu:11268: tārkṣyam āruhya gaccheti punar eva pracoditaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.762 /
GE07hv_apppu:11269: cakāra sa tathā vīraḥ praṇipatya surottamau // HV_App.I,29F.763 //
GE07hv_apppu:11270: sa manoraṃhasā vīras tārkṣyeṇāśu yayau nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.764 /
GE07hv_apppu:11272: tatas tārkṣyagato vīras tatarda raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,29F.766 /
GE07hv_apppu:11273: vajranābhaṃ sthiro bhūtvā sarvāstravid aninditaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.767 //
GE07hv_apppu:11275: urasy abhihato vīro vajranābho mahātmanā // HV_App.I,29F.769 //
GE07hv_apppu:11276: sa tenābhihato vīro daityo mohavaśaṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.770 /
GE07hv_apppu:11277: cakṣāra ca bhṛśaṃ raktaṃ babhrāma ca gatāsuvat // HV_App.I,29F.771 //
GE07hv_apppu:11278: āśvasety atha taṃ kārṣṇir uvāca raṇadurjayaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.772 /
GE07hv_apppu:11279: labdhasaṃjñaḥ sa vīras tu pradyumnam idam abravīt // HV_App.I,29F.773 //
GE07hv_apppu:11280: sādhu yādava vīryeṇa ślāghyo mama ripur bhavān / HV_App.I,29F.774 /
GE07hv_apppu:11282: evam uktvā mahānādaṃ muktvā meghaśatopamam / HV_App.I,29F.776 /
GE07hv_apppu:11283: gadāṃ mumoca vegena saghaṇṭāṃ bahukaṇṭakām // HV_App.I,29F.777 //
GE07hv_apppu:11284: tayā lalāṭe 'bhihataḥ pradyumno gadayā nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.778 /
GE07hv_apppu:11285: udvaman rudhiraṃ bhūri mumoha yadupuṃgavaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.779 //
GE07hv_apppu:11286: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ pāñcajanyaṃ jalodbhavam / HV_App.I,29F.780 /
GE07hv_apppu:11290: tasya cakraṃ kare jātaṃ kṛṣṇacchandena bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.784 /
GE07hv_apppu:11294: vajranābhasya tatkāyād uccakarta śiras tadā / HV_App.I,29F.788 /
GE07hv_apppu:11296: gadaḥ sunābham avadhīd yatamānaṃ raṇājire / HV_App.I,29F.790 /
GE07hv_apppu:11300: nikumbho 'pi hate vīre vajranābhe mahāsure / HV_App.I,29F.794 /
GE07hv_apppu:11303: avatīrṇau mahātmānau harī vajrapuraṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29F.797 //
GE07hv_apppu:11308: sāntvayām āsatuś caiva bālavṛddhaṃ bhayārditam // HV_App.I,29F.799 //
GE07hv_apppu:11310: āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca bṛhaspatimatānugau // HV_App.I,29F.801 //
GE07hv_apppu:11311: vajranābhasya tad rājyaṃ caturdhā cakratur nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.802 /
GE07hv_apppu:11321: koṭyaś catasro grāmāṇām adhikās tā viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29F.806 /
GE07hv_apppu:11323: caturdhā cakratus tatra saṃhṛṣṭau śakrakeśavau // HV_App.I,29F.808 //
GE07hv_apppu:11325: caturdhā cakratur vīrau vīra vāsavakeśavau // HV_App.I,29F.810 //
GE07hv_apppu:11326: tato 'bhiṣiktās te vīro rājāno vāsavājñayā / HV_App.I,29F.811 /
GE07hv_apppu:11328: svayaṃ śakreṇa devena keśavena ca dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29F.813 /
GE07hv_apppu:11330: vijayasya prasiddhaiva gātir viyati dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.815 /
GE07hv_apppu:11332: abhiṣicya jayantaṃ tu bhagavān vāsavo 'bravīt / HV_App.I,29F.817 /
GE07hv_apppu:11333: tvayaite vīra saṃrakṣyā rājānaḥ samitiṃjaya // HV_App.I,29F.818 //
GE07hv_apppu:11336: gamanāgamanaṃ caiva divi siddhaṃ bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,29F.821 /
GE07hv_apppu:11337: triviṣṭapaṃ dvārakāṃ ca ramyāṃ bhaimābhirakṣitām // HV_App.I,29F.822 //
GE07hv_apppu:11339: icchayaiṣāṃ prayacchasva rathāṃs tvaṣṭṛkṛtān api // HV_App.I,29F.824 //
GE07hv_apppu:11341: prayacchākāśagau vīra sāmbasya ca gadasya ca // HV_App.I,29F.826 //
GE07hv_apppu:11342: ākāśena purīṃ yāntu dvārakāṃ bhaimarakṣitām / HV_App.I,29F.827 /
GE07hv_apppu:11343: āyāntu ca sutaṃ draṣṭuṃ yatheṣṭaṃ bhimanandanau // HV_App.I,29F.828 //
GE07hv_apppu:11344: iti saṃdiśya bhagavān devarājaḥ puraṃdaraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.829 /
GE07hv_apppu:11345: jagāma bhagavān svargaṃ dvārakām api keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.830 //
GE07hv_apppu:11346: ṣaṇmāsān uṣitas tatra gadaḥ pradyumna eva ca / HV_App.I,29F.831 /
GE07hv_apppu:11347: sāmbaś ca dvārakāṃ yātā yānārūḍhā mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.832 //
GE07hv_apppu:11348: adyāpi tāni rājyāni meroḥ pārśve nṛpottare / HV_App.I,29F.833 /
GE07hv_apppu:11349: sthāsyanti ca jagad yāvat tāvat te 'marasaṃnibhāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.834 //
GE07hv_apppu:11350: nivṛtte mausale yuddhe svargaṃ yāteṣu vṛṣṇiṣu / HV_App.I,29F.835 /
GE07hv_apppu:11351: gadapradyumnasāmbās te gatā vajrapuraṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29F.836 //
GE07hv_apppu:11352: tataḥ proṣya punar yānti svargaṃ svaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.837 /
GE07hv_apppu:11353: prasādena ca kṛṣṇasya lokakartur janeśvara // HV_App.I,29F.838 //
GE07hv_apppu:11354: pradyumnottaram etat te nṛdeva kathitaṃ mayā / HV_App.I,29F.839 /
GE07hv_apppu:11355: dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ śatrunāśanam eva ca // HV_App.I,29F.840 //
GE07hv_apppu:11357: yaśo vipulam āpnoti dvaipāyanavaco yathā // HV_App.I,29F.842 //
GE07hv_apppu:11359: [h: HV (CE) App. I No. 30, transliterated by André Couture,
GE07hv_apppu:11362: [k: After 99.26, all Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) G(ed.) ins. App. I, No. 30 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11363: sarvamāyāsv abhijño 'sau nāma viśrāvya cāvyayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.1 //
GE07hv_apppu:11364: aho dānava duṣṭātman keśavasyātmajaṃ śiśum / HV_App.I,30.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:11365: harate nirbhayaś caiva bhayam adya karomy aham // HV_App.I,30.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:11366: kathaṃ vai krodham āgacched badhyate vā kathaṃ mayā / HV_App.I,30.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:11367: prathamaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi yena kupyati mandadhīḥ // HV_App.I,30.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:11369: toraṇaṃ gṛham āsādya ucchritaṃ meruśṛṅgavat // HV_App.I,30.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:11370: etad unmathya pātiṣye bhallena niśitena vai / HV_App.I,30.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:11372: tato yuddhena hatvājau gantāsmi dvārakāṃ prati // HV_App.I,30.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:11373: ity uktvā sajyam ācakre saśaraṃ cāpam ojasā / HV_App.I,30.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:11374: ciccheda dhvajaratnaṃ tu śambarasya mahābhujaḥ // HV_App.I,30.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:11375: tac chrutvā tu dhvajacchedaṃ pradyumnena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,30.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:11376: kruddhas tv ājñāpayām āsa putrān vai kālaśambaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:11378: naitaṃ vai draṣṭum icchāmi mama vipriyakārakam // HV_App.I,30.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:11379: śrutvā tu śambarād vākyaṃ sutās te śambarasya ha / HV_App.I,30.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:11382: śrutesenaḥ suṣeṇaś ca somaseno damas tathā // HV_App.I,30.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:11383: senānīḥ sainyahantā ca senahā sainikas tathā / HV_App.I,30.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:11385: sutaḥ sākocavikalaḥ sātulaḥ sarakaḥ śuciḥ / HV_App.I,30.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:11386: kumbhaketuḥ sudaṃṣṭraś ca keśir ity evam ādayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:11388: gṛhītvā niryayur hṛṣṭā manyunā paricoditāḥ / HV_App.I,30.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:11389: āhvayantam amitraṃ vai tasthuḥ saṃgrāmamūrdhani // HV_App.I,30.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:11390: pradyumnas tu mahābāhū ratham āruhya satvaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:11391: niryayau cāpam ādāya saṃgrāmābhimukhas tadā // HV_App.I,30.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:11392: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,30.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:11393: śambarasya ca putrāṇāṃ keśavasya ca sūnunā // HV_App.I,30.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:11396: nāradas tumbarus caiva hāhā hūhūś ca gāyanāḥ / HV_App.I,30.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:11399: śaśaṃsa devarājāya vajriṇe citram adbhutam // HV_App.I,30.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:11400: śambarasya śataṃ putrā ekaḥ kṛṣṇasya cātmajaḥ / HV_App.I,30.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:11401: bahūnāṃ yudhyatām eṣa kathaṃ vijayam āpnuyāt // HV_App.I,30.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:11402: tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya prahasya balasūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:11403: uvāca vacanaṃ cedam śṛṇu yo 'sya parākramaḥ // HV_App.I,30.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:11405: ratyā prasādito devaḥ kāmapatnyā trilocanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:11406: parituṣṭena devena varam asyāḥ pradīyate // HV_App.I,30.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:11407: viṣṇur manuṣyadehas tu dvārakāyāṃ bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,30.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:11408: tasya putratvam asyaiva bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:11409: anaṅga iti vikhyātas trilokeṣu mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,30.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:11412: āsthāya śambaro māyāṃ pradyumnam apaneṣyati // HV_App.I,30.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:11413: tac gaccha śambaragṛhaṃ bhāryā māyāvatī bhava / HV_App.I,30.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:11415: tatra tvam ātmanaḥ kāntaṃ bālarūpaṃ vivardhaya / HV_App.I,30.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:11417: tatas tvayā sahānaṅgo dvārakāṃ vai gamiṣyati / HV_App.I,30.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:11418: ramiṣyati tvayā sārdhaṃ śailāputryā tv ahaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,30.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:11419: evam ādiśya deveśo jagāma puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,30.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:11423: evam eṣa mahābāhuḥ śambaraṃ nihaniṣyati / HV_App.I,30.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:11424: saputriṇo vai pradyumno hantā tasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:11427: saha putreṇa govindo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // **HV_App.I,30.62**1:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:11430: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,30.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:11431: śambarasya tu putrāṇāṃ rukmiṇyā nandanasya ca // HV_App.I,30.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:11434: yugapat pātayanti sma pradyumnopari vegitāḥ // HV_App.I,30.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:11435: kārṣṇāyanis tu saṃkruddhaḥ sarvāstrair dhanuṣaś cyutaiḥ / HV_App.I,30.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:11436: ekaikaṃ paṅcabhiḥ kruddhaś ciccheda raṇamūrdhani // HV_App.I,30.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:11437: tato 'surā kruddhatarāḥ sarve te kṛtaniścayāḥ / HV_App.I,30.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:11439: tataḥ prakupito 'naṅgo dhanur āyamya satvaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:11440: śambarasya jaghānāśu daśa putrān mahaujasaḥ // HV_App.I,30.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:11442: cicchedāśu śiras tasya citrasenasya vīryavān // HV_App.I,30.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:11443: tatas te hataśeṣās tu sametya samayudhyata / HV_App.I,30.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:11445: tataḥ saṃdhāya bāṇāṃs tu vimuṅcan sa raṇotsukaḥ / HV_App.I,30.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:11446: krīḍann iva mahātejās teṣāṃ śīrṣāṇy apātayat // HV_App.I,30.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:11447: nihatya samare sarvāñ śatam uttamadhanvinām / HV_App.I,30.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:11449: hataṃ putraśataṃ śrutvā śambaraḥ krodham ādadhe / HV_App.I,30.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:11450: sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa rathaṃ me saṃprayojaya // HV_App.I,30.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:11451: rājño vākyaṃ niśamyātha praṇamya śirasā bhuvi / HV_App.I,30.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:11452: sa sainyaṃ codayām āsa rathaṃ ca susamāhitam // HV_App.I,30.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:11463: virājamānaṃ śrīmantam ārohac chambaras tadā // HV_App.I,30.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:11464: kāñcanaṃ citrasaṃnāhaṃ dhanur gṛhya śarāṃs tathā / HV_App.I,30.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:11466: caturbhiḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,30.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:11467: durdharaḥ ketumālī ca śatruhantā pramardanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:11468: etaiḥ parivṛto 'mātyair yuyutsuḥ prasthito raṇe // HV_App.I,30.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:11469: daśa nāgasahasrāṇi rathānāṃ dve śate tathā / HV_App.I,30.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:11470: hayānāṃ cāṣṭasāhasraiḥ prayutaiś ca padātinām / HV_App.I,30.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:11471: etaiḥ parivṛto yodhaiḥ śambaraḥ prayayau tadā // HV_App.I,30.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:11472: prayātasya tu saṃgrāme utpātāny utthitāni vai / HV_App.I,30.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:11474: garjanti puruṣaṃ medhā nirghātaś cāmbarāt patat / HV_App.I,30.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:11475: śivā vinedur aśivaṃ sainyaṃ saṃkālayan mahat // HV_App.I,30.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:11476: dhvajaśīrṣe 'patad gṛdhraḥ kāṅkṣan vai dānavāsṛjam / HV_App.I,30.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:11477: rathāgre patitaś cāsya kabandho bhuvi dṛśyate // HV_App.I,30.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:11480: sphurate nayanaṃ cāsya savyaṃ bhayanivedanam / HV_App.I,30.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:11481: bāhuḥ prakampate savyaḥ prāskhalan rathavājinaḥ // HV_App.I,30.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:11482: dhvāṅkṣo mūrdhni nipatitaḥ śambarasya surāriṇaḥ / HV_App.I,30.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:11485: pratodo nyapatad dhastāt sārather hayayāyinaḥ // HV_App.I,30.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:11486: etān acintayitvā tu utpātān samupasthitān / HV_App.I,30.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:11490: tena śabdena mahatā saṃtrastā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,30.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:11492: raṇamadhye sthitaḥ kārṣṇiś cintayan nidhanaṃ ripoḥ / HV_App.I,30.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:11494: taṃ dṛṣṭvā śambaro māyī raukmiṇeyaṃ mahābalam / **HV_App.I,30.123**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11495: sainyaiḥ parivṛtaḥ saṃkhye yuddhāya kṛtaniścayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:11497: asaṃprāptāṃś ca tān bāṇāṃś ciccheda kṛtahastavat // HV_App.I,30.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:11498: pradyumno dhanur ādāya śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha / HV_App.I,30.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:11499: na tasya sainye 'bhimukho yo na viddhaḥ śareṇa vai // HV_App.I,30.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:11501: śambarasya tathābhyāśe sthitaṃ saṃhṛtya bhītavat // HV_App.I,30.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:11502: svabalaṃ vidrutaṃ dṛṣṭvā śambaraḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,30.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:11503: ājñāpayām āsa tadā sacivān dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:11504: gacchadhvaṃ manniyogena praharadhvaṃ ripoḥ sutam / HV_App.I,30.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:11505: nopekṣaṇīyaḥ śatrur vai vadhyatāṃ kṣipram eṣa vai // HV_App.I,30.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:11506: upekṣita iva vyādhiḥ śarīraṃ nāśayed dhruvam / HV_App.I,30.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:11507: tad eṣa durgatiḥ pāpo vadhyatāṃ matpriyecchayā // HV_App.I,30.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:11508: tatas te sacivāḥ kruddhāḥ śirasā gṛhya śāsanam / HV_App.I,30.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:11509: śaravarṣaṃ pramuñcantas tvaritāś codayan rathān // HV_App.I,30.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:11510: tān dṛṣṭvā dhāvataḥ saṃkhye kruddho makaraketanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:11511: cāpam udyamya saṃbhrāntas tasthau pramukhato balī // HV_App.I,30.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:11514: saptatyā śatruhantāraṃ dvyaśītyā tu pramardanam / HV_App.I,30.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:11516: tatas te savicāḥ kruddhā pradyumnaṃ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ / HV_App.I,30.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:11517: [k: After line 145, Dn Cal. ed. ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11518: nijaghnuḥ samare vīrās tad adbhūtam ivābhavat / **HV_App.I,30.145**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11519: ekaikaśo bibhedājau ṣaṣṭibhiḥ ṣaṣṭibhiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,30.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:11520: tān aprāptāñ śarān bāṇaiś ciccheda makaradhvajaḥ // HV_App.I,30.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:11521: tato 'rdhacandram ādāya durdharasya sa sārathim / HV_App.I,30.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:11522: jaghāna paśyatāṃ rājñāṃ sarveṣāṃ sainikasya vai // HV_App.I,30.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:11523: caturbhir atha nārācaiḥ suparvaiḥ kaṅkavājitaiḥ / HV_App.I,30.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:11524: jaghāna caturaḥ so 'śvān durdharasya rathaṃ prati // HV_App.I,30.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:11525: ekena yoktraṃ chatraṃ ca dhvajam ekena bandhuram / HV_App.I,30.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:11526: ṣaṣṭyā ca yugacakrākṣaṃ ciccheda makaradhvajaḥ // HV_App.I,30.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:11527: athāparaṃ śaraṃ gṛhya kaṅkapatraṃ sutejitam / HV_App.I,30.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:11529: sa gatāsur gataśrīko gatasattvo gataprabhaḥ / HV_App.I,30.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:11530: nipapāta rathopasthāt kṣīṇapuṇya iva grahaḥ // HV_App.I,30.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:11531: durdhare nihate śūre dānave dānaveśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:11534: kṛtvābhyadhāvat sahasā tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt // HV_App.I,30.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:11535: saṃkruddhaḥ kṛṣṇasūnus tu śaravarṣair avākirat / HV_App.I,30.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:11536: parvataṃ vāridhārābhiḥ prāvṛṣīva yathā ghanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:11537: sa viddho dānavāmātyaḥ pradyumnena dhanuṣmatā / HV_App.I,30.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:11541: nipatyotpatya jagrāha sarveṣām eva paśyatām / HV_App.I,30.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:11542: tenaiva tasya ciccheda ketumāleḥ śiras tadā // HV_App.I,30.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:11543: tad dṛṣṭvā karma vipulaṃ raukmiṇeyasya devarāṭ / HV_App.I,30.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:11544: vismayaṃ paramaṃ prāptaḥ sarvair devagaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,30.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:11546: ketumāliṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā śatruhantā pramardanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:11548: te gadāṃ musalaṃ cakraṃ prāsatomarasāyakān / HV_App.I,30.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:11549: bhindipālān kuṭhārāṃś ca bhāsvarān kūṭamudgarān / HV_App.I,30.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:11550: yugapat saṃkṣipanti sma vadhārthaṃ kṛṣṇanandane // HV_App.I,30.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:11551: so 'pi tāny astrajālāni śastrajālair anekadhā / HV_App.I,30.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:11552: ciccheda bahudhā vīro darśayan pāṇilāghavam // HV_App.I,30.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:11553: gajān so 'bhyahanat kruddho gajārohān sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,30.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:11554: rathān sārathibhiḥ sārdhaṃ hayāṃś caiva tu mardayan / HV_App.I,30.180 /
GE07hv_apppu:11555: pātayaṃs tāñ śaravrātair nāviddhaḥ kaś cid īkṣyate // HV_App.I,30.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:11556: evaṃ sarvāṇi sainyāni mamantha makaradhvajaḥ / HV_App.I,30.182 /
GE07hv_apppu:11565: nadīṃ dustaraṇīṃ bhīmām anaṅgena pravartitām // HV_App.I,30.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:11568: tān rukmiṇīṣutaḥ śrīmān viloḍayati dhanvinaḥ / HV_App.I,30.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:11569: śatruhantāram āśritya śarān abhyakiran bahūn // HV_App.I,30.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:11570: śatruhantā punaḥ kruddho mumoca śaram uttamam / HV_App.I,30.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:11571: pradyumnaṃ sa samāsādya hṛdaye nipapāta ha // HV_App.I,30.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:11572: sa viddhas tena bāṇena pradyumno na vyakampata / HV_App.I,30.198 /
GE07hv_apppu:11573: śaktiṃ jagrāha balavāñ śatruhantre mumūrṣave // HV_App.I,30.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:11574: sā kṣiptā raukmiṇeyena śaktir jvālākulā raṇe / HV_App.I,30.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:11578: patitaṃ śatruhantāraṃ dṛṣṭvā tasthau pramardanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:11579: jagrāha musalaṃ so'tha vacanaṃ cedam ādade // HV_App.I,30.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:11580: tiṣṭha kiṃ prākṛtair ebhiḥ kariṣyasi raṇapriya / HV_App.I,30.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:11581: māṃ yodhaya sudurbuddhe tatas tvaṃ na bhaviṣyasi // HV_App.I,30.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:11582: vṛṣṇivaṃśakule jātaḥ śatrur asmatpitā tava / HV_App.I,30.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:11583: putraṃ hantāsmy ahaṃ tasya tato 'sau nihato bhavet // HV_App.I,30.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:11584: mṛtena tena durbuddhe sarvadevakṣayo bhavet / HV_App.I,30.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:11585: daiteyā dānavāḥ sarve modantāṃ hataśatravaḥ // HV_App.I,30.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:11586: hate tvayi mamāstreṇa tvatsamutthaiś ca śoṇitaiḥ / HV_App.I,30.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:11587: śambarasya tu putrāṇāṃ karomy udakasatkriyām // HV_App.I,30.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:11588: adya bhīṣmasutā mandā karuṇaṃ vilapiṣyati / HV_App.I,30.214 /
GE07hv_apppu:11589: nihataṃ tvāṃ ca śrutvaiva yauvanasthaṃ gatāyuṣam // HV_App.I,30.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:11590: sa te pitā cakradharo viphalāśo bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,30.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:11591: hataṃ tvāṃ sa viditvā tu prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati mandadhīḥ / HV_App.I,30.217 /
GE07hv_apppu:11592: ity uktvā parigheṇāśu tāḍayad rukmiṇīsutam // HV_App.I,30.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:11593: sa tāḍito mahātejā raukmiṇeyaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,30.219 /
GE07hv_apppu:11594: [k: Line 219: double daṇḍa corrected to single. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11595: dorbhyām ākṣipya tasyaiva rathamukhyaṃ vyacūrṇayat // HV_App.I,30.220 //
GE07hv_apppu:11596: so 'vaplutya rathāt tasmāt padātir avatasthivān / HV_App.I,30.221 /
GE07hv_apppu:11597: tāṃ gadāṃ gṛhya sahasā raukmiṇeyam upādravat / HV_App.I,30.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:11598: tathaiva gadayā kāmaḥ pramardanam apothayat // HV_App.I,30.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:11599: hataṃ pramardanaṃ daityaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve pradudruvuḥ / HV_App.I,30.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:11600: na śaktāḥ pramukhe sthātuṃ siṃhatrāsād gajā iva // HV_App.I,30.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:11601: sārameyaṃ yathā dṛṣṭvā vigaṇo vipraṇaśyate / HV_App.I,30.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:11602: tathā sainyā viṣīdanti pradyumnasya bhayārditāḥ // HV_App.I,30.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:11603: kṣatajādigdhavaktrā vai muktakeśā hy aśobhata / HV_App.I,30.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:11611: śambaras tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ sūtam āha viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,30.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:11612: śatrupramukhato vīra rathaṃ me śīgram āvaha / HV_App.I,30.235 /
GE07hv_apppu:11613: yāvad enaṃ śarair hanmi mama vipriyakārakam // HV_App.I,30.236 //
GE07hv_apppu:11614: tato bhartur vacaḥ śrutvā sūtas tatpriyakārakaḥ / HV_App.I,30.237 /
GE07hv_apppu:11616: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ratham āyāntaṃ pradyumnaḥ phullalocanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.239 /
GE07hv_apppu:11617: saṃdadhe cāpam ādāya śaraṃ kanakabhūṣaṇam / HV_App.I,30.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:11618: tenāhanat susaṃkruddhaḥ kopayañ śambaraṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,30.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:11619: hṛdaye tāḍitas tena devaśatruḥ suviklavaḥ / HV_App.I,30.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:11620: rathopasthaṃ samāśritya tasthau so 'tha vicetanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:11621: sa cetanāṃ punaḥ prāpya dhanur ādāya śambaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:11622: vivyādha kārṣṇiṃ kupitaḥ saptabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,30.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:11623: tān aprāptāñ śarān so 'tha saptabhiḥ saptadhācchinat / HV_App.I,30.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:11624: śambaraṃ ca jaghānātha saptatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,30.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:11626: ahanac chambaraṃ krodhād dhārābhir iva parvatam // HV_App.I,30.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:11628: [k: After line 250, Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11629: sa diśo vidiśaś caiva śaradhārāḥ samāvṛṇot / **HV_App.I,30.250**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11630: andhakārīkṛtaṃ vyoma dineśo naiva dṛśyate // HV_App.I,30.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:11632: pradyumnasya rathopasthe śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha // HV_App.I,30.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:11634: ciccheda bahudhā rājan darśayan pāṇilāghavam // HV_App.I,30.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:11635: hate tasmin mahāvarṣe śarāṇāṃ kārṣṇinā tadā / HV_App.I,30.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:11638: āgneyāstraṃ mumocātha tena vṛkṣān aśātayat // HV_App.I,30.259 //
GE07hv_apppu:11640: pradyumnas taṃ tu vāyavyaiḥ protsārayata saṃyuge / HV_App.I,30.261 /
GE07hv_apppu:11641: tato māyāṃ parāṃ cakre devaśatruḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,30.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:11642: siṃhān vyāghrān varāhāṃś ca tarakṣūn ṛkṣavānarān / HV_App.I,30.263 /
GE07hv_apppu:11643: vāraṇān vāridaprakhyān hayān uṣṭrān viśāṃ pate // HV_App.I,30.264 //
GE07hv_apppu:11644: mumoca dhanur āyamya pradyumnasya rathopari / HV_App.I,30.265 /
GE07hv_apppu:11646: gāndharvāstreṇa ciccheda sarvāṃs tān khaṇḍaśas tadā // HV_App.I,30.266 //
GE07hv_apppu:11647: pradyumnena tu sā māyā hatā tāṃ vīkṣya śambaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.267 /
GE07hv_apppu:11648: anyāṃ māyāṃ mumocātha śambaraḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.268 //
GE07hv_apppu:11651: tām āpatantīṃ māyāṃ tu kārṣṇiḥ kamalalocanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.271 /
GE07hv_apppu:11652: saiṃhīṃ māyāṃ samutsraṣṭuṃ cakre buddhiṃ mahāmanāḥ // HV_App.I,30.272 //
GE07hv_apppu:11653: [k: After line 272, T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11654: utsraṣṭukāmaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭā śambaro 'pi mumoca tām / **HV_App.I,30.272**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11656: māyā nāgamayī naṣṭā ādityeneva śarvarī // HV_App.I,30.274 //
GE07hv_apppu:11657: nihatāṃ hastimāyāṃ tu dṛṣṭvāsau dānaveśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.275 /
GE07hv_apppu:11658: māyāṃ saṃmohanīṃ nāma so 'sṛjad dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.276 //
GE07hv_apppu:11659: tāṃ sṛṣṭāṃ mohinīṃ nāma māyāṃ mayavinirmitām / HV_App.I,30.277 /
GE07hv_apppu:11660: saṃjñāstreṇa tu pradyumno nāśayām āsa vīryavān // HV_App.I,30.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:11661: śambaras tu tataḥ kruddho māyayā naṣṭayā tathā / HV_App.I,30.279 /
GE07hv_apppu:11662: saiṃhīṃ māyāṃ mahātejāḥ so 'sṛjad dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.280 //
GE07hv_apppu:11663: siṃhān āpatato dṛṣṭvā raukmiṇeyaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,30.281 /
GE07hv_apppu:11664: astraṃ gāndharvam ādāya śarabhān asṛjat tadā // HV_App.I,30.282 //
GE07hv_apppu:11666: siṃhān vidrāvayām āsur vāyur jaladharān iva // HV_App.I,30.284 //
GE07hv_apppu:11667: siṃhān vidrāvitān dṛṣṭvā māyayāṣṭāpadena vai / HV_App.I,30.285 /
GE07hv_apppu:11668: śambaraś cintayām āsa katham enaṃ nihanmi vai // HV_App.I,30.286 //
GE07hv_apppu:11669: aho mūrkhasvabhāvo 'haṃ yan mayā na hataḥ śiśuḥ / HV_App.I,30.287 /
GE07hv_apppu:11670: [k: Line 287: manmayā corrected. The vulgate reading “yan mayā” is not recorded by the CE;
GE07hv_apppu:11671: so I deduce it is a misprint. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11672: prāptayauvanadehas tu kṛtāstraś cāpi durmatiḥ / HV_App.I,30.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:11673: tat kathaṃ nihaniṣyāmi śatruṃ raṇaśiraḥsthitam // HV_App.I,30.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:11674: māyā sā tiṣṭhate tīvrā pannagī nāma bhīṣaṇā / HV_App.I,30.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:11677: tayā dahyeta duṣṭātmā hy eṣa māyāmayena vai // HV_App.I,30.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:11678: sā sṛṣṭā pānnagī māyā viṣajvālāsamākulā / HV_App.I,30.294 /
GE07hv_apppu:11679: tayā pannagamayyā tu sarathaṃ sahavājinam / HV_App.I,30.295 /
GE07hv_apppu:11680: sasūtaṃ sa hi pradyumnaṃ babandha śarabandhanaiḥ // HV_App.I,30.296 //
GE07hv_apppu:11681: badhyamānaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā ātmānaṃ vṛṣṇivaṃśajaḥ / HV_App.I,30.297 /
GE07hv_apppu:11682: māyāṃ saṃcintayām āsa sauparṇīṃ sarpanāśanīm // HV_App.I,30.298 //
GE07hv_apppu:11683: sā cintitā mahāmāyā pradyumnena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,30.299 /
GE07hv_apppu:11684: [k: After line 299, T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11686: suparṇā vicaranti sma sarpā naṣṭā mahāviṣāḥ // HV_App.I,30.300 //
GE07hv_apppu:11688: sādhu vīra mahābāho sādhu rukmiṇinandana / HV_App.I,30.302 /
GE07hv_apppu:11689: yat tvayā dharṣitā māyā tena sma paritoṣitāḥ // HV_App.I,30.303 //
GE07hv_apppu:11691: asti me kāladaṇḍābho mudgaro hemabhūṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:11693: mayā sṛṣṭaṃ svadehena tapas taptvā suduścaram // HV_App.I,30.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:11694: purā yo mama pārvatyā dattaḥ paramatuṣṭayā / HV_App.I,30.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:11695: gṛhāṇa śambaremaṃ tvaṃ mudgaraṃ hemabhūṣitam // HV_App.I,30.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:11697: anena dānavau raudrau balinau nagacāriṇau / HV_App.I,30.311 /
GE07hv_apppu:11698: śumbhaś caiva niśumbhaś ca sagaṇau sūditau mayā // HV_App.I,30.312 //
GE07hv_apppu:11699: prāṇasaṃśayam āpanne tvayā mokṣyaḥ sa śatrave / HV_App.I,30.313 /
GE07hv_apppu:11700: ity uktvā pārvatī devī tatraivāntaradhīyata // HV_App.I,30.314 //
GE07hv_apppu:11701: tad ahaṃ mudgaraśreṣṭhaṃ mocayiṣyāmi śatrave // HV_App.I,30.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:11702: tasya vijñāya cittaṃ tu devarājo 'bhyabhāṣata / HV_App.I,30.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:11703: gaccha nārada śīgraṃ tvaṃ pradyumnasya rathaṃ prati // HV_App.I,30.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:11704: saṃbodhaya mahābāhuṃ pūrvajātiṃ ca smāraya / HV_App.I,30.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:11705: vaiṣṇavāstraṃ prayacchāsmai vadhārthaṃ śambarasya ca / HV_App.I,30.319 /
GE07hv_apppu:11707: evam ukto maghavatā nāradaḥ prayayau tvaran / HV_App.I,30.321 /
GE07hv_apppu:11709: kumāra paśya māṃ prāptaṃ devagandharvanāradam / HV_App.I,30.323 /
GE07hv_apppu:11710: preṣitaṃ devarājena tava saṃbodhanāya vai // HV_App.I,30.324 //
GE07hv_apppu:11711: smara tvaṃ pūrvakaṃ bhāvaṃ kāmadevo 'si mānada / HV_App.I,30.325 /
GE07hv_apppu:11713: tvaṃ vṛṣṇivaṃśe jāto 'si rukmiṇyā garbhasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,30.327 /
GE07hv_apppu:11714: jāto 'si keśavena tvaṃ pradyumna iti kīrtyase // HV_App.I,30.328 //
GE07hv_apppu:11715: āhṛtya śambareṇa tvam ihānīto 'si mānada / HV_App.I,30.329 /
GE07hv_apppu:11717: vadhārthaṃ śambarasya tvaṃ hriyamāṇo hy apekṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,30.331 /
GE07hv_apppu:11719: yaiṣā māyāvatī nāma bhāryā vai śambarasya tu / HV_App.I,30.333 /
GE07hv_apppu:11720: ratiṃ tāṃ viddhi kalyāṇīṃ tava bhāryāṃ purātanīm / HV_App.I,30.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:11721: tava sā rakṣaṇārthāya śambarasya gṛhe 'vasat // HV_App.I,30.335 //
GE07hv_apppu:11722: māyāṃ śarīrajāṃ nyasya mohanārthaṃ durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.336 //
GE07hv_apppu:11723: rater utpādanārthāya preṣayaty aniśaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,30.337 /
GE07hv_apppu:11724: evaṃ pradyumna buddhyā vai tava bhāryā pratiṣṭhitā // HV_App.I,30.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:11725: hatvā tvaṃ śambaraṃ vīra vaiṣṇavāstreṇa saṃyuge / HV_App.I,30.339 /
GE07hv_apppu:11726: gṛhya māyāvatīṃ bhāryāṃ dvārakāṃ gantum arhasi // HV_App.I,30.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:11727: gṛhāṇa vaiṣṇavaṃ cāstraṃ kavacaṃ ca mahāprabham / HV_App.I,30.341 /
GE07hv_apppu:11728: śakreṇa tava saṃgṛhya preṣitaṃ śatrusūdana // HV_App.I,30.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:11729: śṛṇu me hy aparaṃ vākyaṃ kriyatām aviśaṅkayā / HV_App.I,30.343 /
GE07hv_apppu:11730: asya devaripos tāta mudgaro nityapūjitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.344 //
GE07hv_apppu:11733: tad astrapratighātārthaṃ devīṃ saṃsmartum arhasi / HV_App.I,30.347 /
GE07hv_apppu:11735: gṛhāṇa vaiṣṇavaṃ cāstraṃ devyai caiva namasya ca / **HV_App.I,30.347**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11736: stavyā caiva namasyā ca mahādevī raṇotsukaiḥ // HV_App.I,30.348 //
GE07hv_apppu:11737: tatra vai kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ saṃgrāme ripuṇā saha / HV_App.I,30.349 /
GE07hv_apppu:11738: ity uktvā nārado vākyaṃ prayayau yatra vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,30.350 //
GE07hv_apppu:11741: śambaras tu tataḥ kruddho mudgaraṃ taṃ samādade / HV_App.I,30.351 /
GE07hv_apppu:11742: mudgare gṛhyamāṇe tu dvādaśārkāḥ samutthitāḥ // HV_App.I,30.352 //
GE07hv_apppu:11743: parvatāś calitāḥ sarve calitaṃ vasudhātalam / HV_App.I,30.353 /
GE07hv_apppu:11744: udmārgāḥ sāgarā jātāḥ saṃkṣubdhāś cāpi devatāḥ / HV_App.I,30.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:11745: gṛdhracakrākulaṃ vyoma ulkāpāto babhūva ha / HV_App.I,30.355 /
GE07hv_apppu:11746: vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaḥ puruṣaṃ pavano vavau // HV_App.I,30.356 //
GE07hv_apppu:11747: evaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahotpātān pradyumnaḥ sa tvarānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,30.357 /
GE07hv_apppu:11748: avatīrya rathād vīraḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.358 //
GE07hv_apppu:11749: devīṃ sasmāra manasā pārvatīṃ śaṃkarapriyām / HV_App.I,30.359 /
GE07hv_apppu:11750: praṇamya śirasā devīṃ stotuṃ samupacakrame // HV_App.I,30.360 //
GE07hv_apppu:11752: oṃ namaḥ kātyāyanyai guhasya jananyai namaḥ / HV_App.I,30.361 /
GE07hv_apppu:11753: namas trailokyamāyāyai kātyāyanyai namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,30.362 //
GE07hv_apppu:11754: namaḥ śatruvināśinyai namo gārgyai girīśaye / HV_App.I,30.363 /
GE07hv_apppu:11756: kālarātriṃ namasye 'haṃ kumārīṃ cāpi nityaśaḥ / HV_App.I,30.365 /
GE07hv_apppu:11759: namasyāmi mahādevīṃ jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ tathā // HV_App.I,30.368 //
GE07hv_apppu:11765: sāvitrīṃ cāpi viprāṇāṃ namasye 'haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ / HV_App.I,30.374 /
GE07hv_apppu:11766: rakṣa māṃ devi satataṃ saṃgrāme vijayaṃ kuru // HV_App.I,30.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:11767: iti kāmavacaḥ śrutvā durgā suprītamānasā / HV_App.I,30.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:11770: varaṃ varaya vatsa tvam amoghaṃ darśanaṃ mama // HV_App.I,30.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:11771: devyāstu vacanaṃ śrutvā romāñ codgatamānasaḥ / HV_App.I,30.380 /
GE07hv_apppu:11772: praṇamya śirasā devīṃ vijñaptum upacakrame // HV_App.I,30.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:11773: yadi tvaṃ devi tuṣṭāsi dīyatāṃ me yadīpsitam / HV_App.I,30.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:11774: varaṃ ca varade yāce sarvāmitreṣu me jayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:11775: yas tvayā mudgaro dattaḥ śambarasyātmasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,30.384 /
GE07hv_apppu:11776: eṣa me gātram āsādya mālā padmamayī bhavet // HV_App.I,30.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:11777: tathāstv iti ca sāpy uktvā tatraivantaradhīyata / HV_App.I,30.386 /
GE07hv_apppu:11778: pradyumnas tu mahātejā hṛṣṭo ratham athāruhat // HV_App.I,30.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:11779: mudgaraṃ tu gṛhītvā ca śambaraḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,30.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:11780: bhrāmayitvā sa cikṣepa pradyumnorasi vīryavān // HV_App.I,30.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:11781: sa gatvā madanābhyāśaṃ mālā bhūtvātha pauṣkarī / HV_App.I,30.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:11782: pradyumnasya ca kaṇṭhe sā samāyuktā vyarājata / HV_App.I,30.391 /
GE07hv_apppu:11783: nakṣatrāṇāṃ tu mālāyāṃ yathā parivṛto vidhuḥ // HV_App.I,30.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:11784: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,30.393 /
GE07hv_apppu:11785: sādhu sādhv iti vācocuḥ pūjayan keśavātmajam // HV_App.I,30.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:11786: mudgaraṃ puṣpabhūtaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pradyumnasaṃnidhau / HV_App.I,30.395 /
GE07hv_apppu:11787: vaiṣṇavaṃ paramāstraṃ tu nāradena yadāhṛtam / HV_App.I,30.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:11788: saṃdadhe cāpam āyamya idaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,30.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:11789: yady ahaṃ rukmiṇīputraḥ keśavasyātmajo hy aham / HV_App.I,30.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:11790: tena satyena bāṇemaṃ jahi tvaṃ śambaraṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,30.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:11791: ity uktvā cāpam ākṛṣya saṃdhāya ca mahāmanāḥ / HV_App.I,30.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:11792: cikṣepa śambarāāyātha dahaṃl lokatrayaṃ tviṣā // HV_App.I,30.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:11793: sa kṣipto vṛṣṇisiṃhena bāṇaḥ kravyādamohanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.402 /
GE07hv_apppu:11794: hṛdayaṃ śambarasyātha bhittvā dharaṇim āgamat // HV_App.I,30.403 //
GE07hv_apppu:11795: naivāsya māṃsaṃ na snāyur nāsthi na tvaṅ na śoṇitam / HV_App.I,30.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:11797: hate daitye mahākāye dānave śambare 'dhame / HV_App.I,30.406 /
GE07hv_apppu:11799: ūrvaśī menakā rambhā vipracittis tilottamā / HV_App.I,30.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:11801: devarājas tu suprītaḥ sarvair devagaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,30.410 /
GE07hv_apppu:11807: sa ca samarapariśramaṃ vahan vai @ HV_App.I,30.416 @
GE07hv_apppu:11812: [h: HV (CE) App. I, No. 31, transliterated by Anne Mossner and Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:11815: [k: T2.4 G M1-3 ins. after adhyāya 105,
GE07hv_apppu:11816: Dn Ds2 D6 T1 M4 after App. I, No. 42B :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11818: kimarthaṃ bhagavān viṣṇur devadevo janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11819: gataḥ kailāsaśikharam ālayaṃ śaṃkarasya ha // HV_App.I,31.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:11820: nāradād yais tapo vṛddhair munibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:11821: tatra dṛṣṭo mahādevaḥ śaṃkaro nīlalohitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:11822: keśavena purā vipra kurvatā tapa uttamam / HV_App.I,31.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:11823: arcitas tena devena śaṃkaraś ceti viśrutam // HV_App.I,31.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:11824: devās tatra jagannāthaṃ dṛṣṭavantaḥ purātanam / HV_App.I,31.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:11825: arcayāṃ cakrire sākṣāc chakrādyās taṃ hariṃ haram // HV_App.I,31.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:11826: tau tu devau mahādevāv ekībhūtau dvidhā kṛtau / HV_App.I,31.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:11829: tayos tatra yathāvṛttaṃ kailāse parvatottame // HV_App.I,31.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:11830: ṛṣayaḥ kim aceṣṭanta dṛṣṭvā tau puruṣottamau / HV_App.I,31.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:11831: etat sarvam aśeṣeṇa vaktum arhasi sattama // HV_App.I,31.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:11832: yathāgato harir viṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇo jiṣṇuḥ purātanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:11833: yathā ca śaṃkaraḥ sākṣāt kṛtavān nāgabhūṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:11834: etat sarvaṃ vipravarya brūhi tattvena yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:11836: śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan yathā kṛṣṇo gato nagam / HV_App.I,31.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:11837: yathā ca dṛṣṭo deveśaḥ śaṃkaro vṛṣavāhanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:11838: yathā cacāra ca tapo yathā te munayo gatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:11839: ekatvaṃ ca tayor yadvat tathā śṛṇu nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:11840: dvaipāyano 'tha bhagavān yathā provāca māṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:11841: namas kṛtvā pravakṣyāmi keśavaṃ khagavāhanam / HV_App.I,31.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:11842: yathāśakti yathāprajñaṃ śṛṇu yatnena suvrata // HV_App.I,31.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:11843: na hy aśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ nṛśaṃsāyātapasvine / HV_App.I,31.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:11844: nānadhītāya vaktavyaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇyavatāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,31.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:11845: svargyaṃ yaśasyaṃ dhanyaṃ ca buddhiśuddhikaraṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:11846: dhyeyaṃ puṇyātmanā nityam idaṃ vedārthaniścitam // HV_App.I,31.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:11850: śivayor devayos tatra hareś caiva bhavasya ha // HV_App.I,31.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:11852: hateṣv atha nṛpeṣv eva kiṃcic chiṣṭeṣu śatruṣu // HV_App.I,31.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:11853: śāsati sma tadā viṣṇuḥ pṛthivīṃ puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:11854: dvāravatyāṃ jagannātho vasan vṛṣṇibhir īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:11855: rukmiṇīsaṃgato devo vasaṃs tatra pure hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:11856: kadācic ca tayā sārdhaṃ śete rātrau jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:11857: viharaṃś ca yathāyogaṃ prītaḥ prītiyujā tayā // HV_App.I,31.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:11858: athovāca tadā devī rukmiṇī rukmabhūṣaṇā / HV_App.I,31.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:11859: putram icchāmi deveśa tvatto devakinandana // HV_App.I,31.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:11860: balinaṃ rūpasaṃpannaṃ tvayaiva sadṛṣaṃ prabho / HV_App.I,31.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:11861: vṛṣṇīnām api netāraṃ vīryayuktaṃ taponvitam // HV_App.I,31.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:11863: evam ādiguṇair yuktaṃ dātum arhasi sattama // HV_App.I,31.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:11864: tvayi sarvasya dātṛtvaṃ nityam eva pratiṣṭhitam / HV_App.I,31.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:11865: tvaṃ hi sarvasya kartā ca dātā bhoktā jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:11867: vaktavyaṃ kim u deveśa yadi bhaktāsmi keśava / HV_App.I,31.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:11868: anugraho yadi syān me devadeva jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:11869: dātum arhasi putraṃ tvaṃ vīryavantaṃ janārdana // HV_App.I,31.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:11871: ity ukto devadeveśaḥ priyayā prīyamāṇayā / HV_App.I,31.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:11872: tayā mahiṣyā rukmiṇyā rukmiśatrur yadūdvahaḥ // HV_App.I,31.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:11873: provāca vacanaṃ kāle rukmiṇīṃ yādaveśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:11874: dātāsmi tādṛśaṃ putraṃ yaṃ tvam icchasi bhāmini // HV_App.I,31.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:11875: nityabhaktāsi me devi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / HV_App.I,31.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:11876: avaśyaṃ tava dāsyāmi putraṃ śatrunibarhaṇam // HV_App.I,31.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:11877: putreṇa lokāñ jayati satām kāmadughā hi ye / HV_App.I,31.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:11878: pud iti narakasyākhyā duḥkaṃ ca narakaṃ viduḥ // HV_App.I,31.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:11879: pudas trāṇāt tataḥ putram ihecchanti paratra ca / HV_App.I,31.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:11880: anantāḥ putriṇo lokāḥ puruṣasya priye śubhāḥ // HV_App.I,31.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:11881: patir jāyāṃ praviśati garbho bhūtvā sa mātaram / HV_App.I,31.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:11882: tasyāṃ punar navo bhūtvā daśame māsi jāyate // HV_App.I,31.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:11884: tajjāyā jāyā bhavati yad asyāṃ jāyate punaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.63**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11885: putravatāṃ bibhetīndraḥ kiṃ nu te nājitaṃ bhavet / HV_App.I,31.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:11886: nāputro vindate lokān kuputrād vandhyatā varā // HV_App.I,31.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:11887: kuputro narako yasmāt suputrāt svarga eva hi / HV_App.I,31.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:11888: tasmād vinītaṃ satputraṃ śrutavantaṃ dayāparam // HV_App.I,31.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:11889: vidyā hi vinatir yasmād vidyāyuktaṃ sudhārmikam / HV_App.I,31.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:11890: icchet putraṃ sadā putrī puruṣo yatnavān budhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:11891: tasmād dāsyāmi te putraṃ vidyāvantaṃ sudhārmikam / HV_App.I,31.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:11892: eṣa gacchāmi putrārthaṃ kailāsaṃ parvatottamam // HV_App.I,31.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:11894: tato labdhāsmi putraṃ te bhavād bhūtahite ratāt // HV_App.I,31.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:11895: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa bhavaṃ śaṃkaram avyayam / HV_App.I,31.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:11896: toṣayitvā virūpākṣam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum // HV_App.I,31.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:11897: gamiṣyāmy aham adyaiva draṣṭuṃ śaṃkaram avyayam / HV_App.I,31.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:11898: sa ca me dāsyate putraṃ toṣitas tapasā mayā // HV_App.I,31.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:11899: tatra gatvā mahādevaṃ namaskṛtya sahomayā / HV_App.I,31.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:11900: praviśya badarīṃ puṇyām ṛṣijuṣṭāṃ tapomayīm // HV_App.I,31.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:11907: idam ekam idaṃ tattvam iti niścitamānasaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:11911: prasiddhāṃ mahatīṃ devi yāsyāmi sukṛtālayām / HV_App.I,31.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:11912: ity uktvā virarāmaiva devadevo janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:11915: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ gantum icchañ janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:11917: gāś ca dattvātha viprebhyo namaskṛtya dvijottamān / HV_App.I,31.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:11918: āsthānam aṇḍapaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ praviveśa jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:11919: āsanaṃ mahad āsthāya vṛṣṇīn āhūya sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:11920: balabhadraṃ śineḥ putraṃ hārdikyaṃ śaṭhasāraṇau // HV_App.I,31.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:11922: yasya nītiṃ samāśritya jīvanti yadavaḥ sukham // HV_App.I,31.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:11923: netā ca yaduvṛṣṇīnāṃ sa tu dharmaparaḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:11924: yasya bibhyati devāś ca nītes tasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:11925: yasya buddhivaśād viṣṇuḥ śaśāsa pṛthivīṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:11926: taṃ ca vṛṣṇivaraṃ vīram uddhavaṃ devasaprabham // HV_App.I,31.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:11927: anyān api yadūn sarvān uvāca bhagavān hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:11928: śṛṇvantu mama vākyāni yādavāḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,31.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:11929: śṛṇu cāpi vaco mahyaṃ pitar uddhava me sakhe // HV_App.I,31.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:11930: bālyāt prabhṛti yo yatno mama duṣṭanibarhaṇe / HV_App.I,31.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:11931: pratyakṣaṃ bhavatā dṛṣṭaṃ pūtanānidhanaṃ nṛpāḥ // HV_App.I,31.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:11932: keśī ca nihato bālye mayā bālena yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,31.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:11933: govardhano dhṛtaḥ śailo gāvaś ca paripālitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:11934: abhiṣikto 'smi śakreṇa devānām agrataḥ sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:11935: kaṃso 'pi nidhanaṃ nīto mayā cāṇūramallakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:11936: ugraseno 'bhiṣiktaś ca kṛtā dvāravatī mayā / HV_App.I,31.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:11937: anye cāpi nṛpā rājan balino nihatā mayā // HV_App.I,31.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:11938: yo 'pi vīro jarāsaṃdho nigṛhīto balān mayā / HV_App.I,31.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:11939: bhīmena balinā rājan nayena mama yādavāḥ // HV_App.I,31.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:11940: sṛgālo nihataḥ saṃkhye gomantād gacchatā mayā / HV_App.I,31.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:11941: yo 'pi vīro durātmāsau dānavo narako hataḥ / HV_App.I,31.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:11942: niṣkaṇṭakam imaṃ lokaṃ kṛtavān rājasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:11943: kiṃ tu vīro nṛpo jajñe sakhā bhaumasya yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,31.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:11944: pauṇḍro vīryavatāṃ netā dveṣṭā cāsau sadā mama // HV_App.I,31.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:11945: śiṣyo droṇasya rājendro balī brahmāstravitkṛtī / HV_App.I,31.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:11946: śāstrajño nītimān sākṣān netā sainyasya yatnavān / HV_App.I,31.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:11947: yoddhā yuddhapriyo rājā jāmadagnya ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,31.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:11948: ekāntaśatrur asmākaṃ chidrānveṣī sadā mama / HV_App.I,31.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:11949: bādhiṣyate purīṃ yoddhā chidraṃ yadi labheta saḥ // HV_App.I,31.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:11950: na hy alpasādhyo balavān puṇḍrasyeśo nṛpottamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:11952: yathā na bādhate rājā purīṃ yadukulāśrayām // HV_App.I,31.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:11953: ahaṃ tu yās ye kailāsaṃ kutaścit kāraṇān nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,31.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:11955: yāvad āgamanaṃ mahyaṃ tāvad yattā bhavantv iha // HV_App.I,31.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:11956: mayā virahatāṃ cemaṃ yadi jānāti pauṇḍrakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:11957: āgamiṣyati rājendro rotsyate ca purīm imām / HV_App.I,31.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:11958: imāṃ niryādavāṃ kartuṃ śaknotīti ca me matiḥ // HV_App.I,31.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:11959: yattā bhavata rājendrāḥ khaḍgaiḥ pāśaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:11963: teṣāṃ madhye mahābāhur uddhavaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt / **HV_App.I,31.136**2:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:11964: pāṣāṇaiḥ karpaṇasthaiś ca saṃnaddhā bhavata svakaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:11965: pidhāya ca kapāṭāni mahādvārāṇi yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:11966: eka eva mahādvāro gamanāgamane sadā / HV_App.I,31.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:11967: mudrayā saha gacchantu rājāno gantum īpsavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:11968: na cāmudraḥ praveṣṭavyo dvārapālasya rakṣataḥ / HV_App.I,31.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:11969: yāvad āgamanaṃ mahyaṃ tāvad evaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,31.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:11970: mṛgayā nātra kartavyā na ca krīḍā bahiḥ purāt / HV_App.I,31.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:11971: jñātavyāś ca pare sve ca gamanāgamane sadā // HV_App.I,31.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:11975: evamādi kriyā kāryā yāvad āgamanaṃ mama / HV_App.I,31.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:11976: ity uktvā yādavān sarvān sātyakiṃ punar āha ca // HV_App.I,31.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:11979: sātyake śṛṇu madvākyaṃ yatto bhava yudhāṃ vara / HV_App.I,31.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:11980: tvaṃ tu khaḍgī gadī bhūtvā cāpī bāṇī talatravān / HV_App.I,31.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:11981: tiṣṭha yatnena rakṣasva purīṃ bahunṛpāśrayām // HV_App.I,31.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:11982: na ca nidrā tvayā kāryā rātrau yaduvṛṣa prabho / HV_App.I,31.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:11983: na ca vyākhyā tvayā kāryā śāstrāṇāṃ śāstratatpara / HV_App.I,31.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:11984: na ca vādas tvayā kāryo vādibhiḥ saha vṛṣṇipa // HV_App.I,31.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:11985: tvaṃ hi yoddhā balī jetā dhanurvedasya vedavit / HV_App.I,31.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:11986: tathā kuru yathā vīra nopahāsyā bhavemahi // HV_App.I,31.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:11988: kariṣyāmi vacas tubhyaṃ yathāśakti janārdana / HV_App.I,31.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:11989: ājñā tava jagannātha dhāryā yatnena me sadā // HV_App.I,31.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:11991: yāvad āgamanaṃ tubhyaṃ tāvat sthāsyāmi yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:11992: prasādas tava govinda yadi syān mayi mādhava / HV_App.I,31.159 /
GE07hv_apppu:11993: kiṃ nāma mama duḥsādhyaṃ śatrūṇāṃ nigrahe hare // HV_App.I,31.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:11994: yadi śakraṃ yamaṃ vāpi kuberam api pāśinam / HV_App.I,31.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:11995: sarvān etān vijeṣyāmi kim u pauṇḍraṃ nṛpottamam / HV_App.I,31.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:11996: gaccha kāryaṃ kuruṣvedaṃ yatto 'haṃ satataṃ hare // HV_App.I,31.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:11997: uddhavaṃ punar āhendaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ padmanibhekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:11998: śṛṇūddhava tvaṃ vākyaṃ me kuryās tv etat prayatnavān // HV_App.I,31.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:11999: rakṣyā nayena rājendra purī dvāravatī tvayā / HV_App.I,31.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:12000: yatto bhava sadā tāta kuru sāhāyyam atra naḥ / HV_App.I,31.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:12001: lajjā mama samutpannā vadatas tava sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:12002: tvaṃ hi netā samas tasya vidyāpārasya sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:12003: ko nu śakṣyati medhāvī vaktuṃ vidyāvataḥ puraḥ // HV_App.I,31.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:12004: yat kāryaṃ tad bhavān vetti hy akāryaṃ cāpi sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.171 /
GE07hv_apppu:12005: ato 'haṃ virame tāta vaktuṃ saṃprati vṛṣṇipa // HV_App.I,31.172 //
GE07hv_apppu:12007: kim idaṃ tava govinda vartate māṃ prati prabho / HV_App.I,31.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:12008: aho prasannatā mahyaṃ kiṃ tu prītir iyaṃ tava // HV_App.I,31.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:12009: jānāmy ahaṃ jagannātha prasādasyaiṣa vistaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:12010: yasya prasanno bhavasi tasya kiṃ nāsti keśava // HV_App.I,31.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:12011: tvaṃ hi sarvasya jagataḥ kartā hartā pradhānakṛt / HV_App.I,31.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:12012: prabhavaḥ sarvakāryāṇāṃ vaktā śrotā pramāṇavit // HV_App.I,31.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:12013: dhyātā dhyānamayo dhyeya iti brahmavido viduḥ / HV_App.I,31.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:12014: jetā devaripūṇāṃ ca goptā nākasadāṃ bhavān // HV_App.I,31.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:12015: tvannāthā vayam eveti jīvāmo nihatadviṣaḥ / HV_App.I,31.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:12016: iyaṃ nītir ahaṃ manye netā nīter yato bhavān // HV_App.I,31.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:12017: ko nu nāma na yo veda tvāṃ vinā sāṃprataṃ vada / HV_App.I,31.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:12018: nītis tvaṃ sarvakāryāṇām iti me niścitā matiḥ // HV_App.I,31.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:12019: durgāḍho nayamārgo 'yam ity āhus tadvido janāḥ / HV_App.I,31.185 /
GE07hv_apppu:12020: caturdhā procyate nītiḥ sāmadāne janārdana // HV_App.I,31.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:12021: daṇḍo bhedo manuṣyāṇāṃ nigrahāvagrahe sadā / HV_App.I,31.187 /
GE07hv_apppu:12022: daṇḍyeṣu daṇḍam icchanti sāmānyaṃ tu naye hare // HV_App.I,31.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:12023: balavatsv atha dānaṃ tu trayāṇāṃ cedagocare / HV_App.I,31.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:12024: prayoktavyo mahābheda iti nītimatāṃ matam // HV_App.I,31.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:12025: teṣu teṣv atha sarveṣu pramāṇaṃ tvāṃ vidur budhāḥ / HV_App.I,31.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:12026: kim atra bahunoktena sarvaṃ tvayi samarpitam / HV_App.I,31.192 /
GE07hv_apppu:12027: ity uktvā virarāmaiva uddhavo nītimattaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:12028: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur evam eva nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:12030: ugrasenaṃ nṛpaṃ rājaṃs tathā hārdikyam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:12031: kāmapālaṃ punar viṣṇur idaṃ hovāca yattvavit / HV_App.I,31.197 /
GE07hv_apppu:12032: na pramādas tvayā kāryaḥ sarvadā yatnavān bhava // HV_App.I,31.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:12033: sthite tvayi mahābāho ka pīḍā jagato bhavet // HV_App.I,31.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:12034: gadī bhava sadā ārya na krīḍā sarvadā bhavet // HV_App.I,31.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:12035: rakṣa tvaṃ sarvadā yatnāt purīṃ dvāravatīṃ prabho / HV_App.I,31.201 /
GE07hv_apppu:12036: nopahāsyā yathā syāma tathā kuru gadī bhava // HV_App.I,31.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:12037: utsāhaḥ sarvathā kāryo nirutsāho na yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.203 /
GE07hv_apppu:12038: bāḍham ity abravīd rāmaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vṛṣṇikulodvaham // HV_App.I,31.204 //
GE07hv_apppu:12039: vṛṣṇayaḥ sarva evaite svaṃ svaṃ sadma samāyayuḥ / HV_App.I,31.205 /
GE07hv_apppu:12040: gantum aicchaj jagannāthaḥ kailāsaṃ parvatottamam // HV_App.I,31.206 //
GE07hv_apppu:12043: tataḥ sa cintayām āsa garuḍaṃ pakṣipuṃgavam / HV_App.I,31.207 /
GE07hv_apppu:12044: āgaccha tvaritaṃ tārkṣya iti viṣnur jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:12045: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tārkṣyo vedarāśir iti smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.209 /
GE07hv_apppu:12046: balavān vikramī yogī śāstranetā kurūdvaha // HV_App.I,31.210 //
GE07hv_apppu:12047: yajñamūrtiḥ purāṇātmā sāmamūrdhā ca pāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.211 /
GE07hv_apppu:12050: pannagāriḥ padmanetraḥ sākṣād indra ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,31.214 //
GE07hv_apppu:12053: prādur āsīn mahāvīryaḥ keśavasyāgratas tadā / HV_App.I,31.217 /
GE07hv_apppu:12054: jānubhyām apatad bhūmau namo viṣṇo jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:12055: namaste devadeveśa hare svāminn iti bruvan / HV_App.I,31.219 /
GE07hv_apppu:12056: pasparśa pāṇinā kṛṣṇaḥ svāgataṃ tārkṣyapuṃgava // HV_App.I,31.220 //
GE07hv_apppu:12057: ity uvāca tadā tārkṣyaṃ yāsye kailāsaparvatam / HV_App.I,31.221 /
GE07hv_apppu:12058: śūlinaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi śaṃkaraṃ śāśvataṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.222 //
GE07hv_apppu:12059: bāḍham ity abravīt tārkṣya āruhyainaṃ janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.223 /
GE07hv_apppu:12060: tiṣṭhadhvam iti hovāca yādavān pārśvavartinaḥ // HV_App.I,31.224 //
GE07hv_apppu:12061: tato yayau jagannātho diśaṃ prāguttarāṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.225 /
GE07hv_apppu:12062: raveṇa mahatā tārkṣyas trailokyaṃ samakampayat // HV_App.I,31.226 //
GE07hv_apppu:12063: sāgaraṃ kṣobhayām āsa padbhyāṃ pakṣī vrajaṃs tadā / HV_App.I,31.227 /
GE07hv_apppu:12064: pakṣeṇa parvatān sarvān vahan devaṃ janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.228 //
GE07hv_apppu:12065: tato devāḥ sagandharvā ākāśe 'dhiṣṭhitās tadā / HV_App.I,31.229 /
GE07hv_apppu:12066: tuṣṭuvuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ vāgbhir iṣṭābhir īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.230 //
GE07hv_apppu:12067: jaya deva jagannātha naya viṣṇo jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.231 /
GE07hv_apppu:12070: jayājeya hare deva yogidhyeya bhayāpaha // HV_App.I,31.234 //
GE07hv_apppu:12071: nārāyaṇa namo deva kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa hare hare / HV_App.I,31.235 /
GE07hv_apppu:12073: namas te sakaleśāya nirguṇāya guṇātmane / HV_App.I,31.237 /
GE07hv_apppu:12075: acintyamūrtaye tubhyaṃ namas te sakaleśvara / HV_App.I,31.239 /
GE07hv_apppu:12076: ity ādibhis tadā devaṃ vāgbhir īśānam avyayam / HV_App.I,31.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:12078: śṛṇvann eva jagannāthaḥ stutivākyāni tāni ca / HV_App.I,31.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:12079: yayau sārdhaṃ suragaṇair munibhir vedapāragaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:12080: yatra pūrvaṃ svayaṃ viṣṇus tapas tepe sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,31.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:12082: varṣāyutaṃ tapas taptaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / HV_App.I,31.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:12083: yatra viṣṇur jagannāthas tapas taptvā sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,31.247 /
GE07hv_apppu:12085: gaṅgā yatra saricchreṣṭhā madhye dhāvati pāvanī / HV_App.I,31.249 /
GE07hv_apppu:12086: yatra śakraḥ svayaṃ hatvā vṛtraṃ vedārthatattvagam // HV_App.I,31.250 //
GE07hv_apppu:12087: brahmahatyā vināśārthaṃ tapo varṣāyutaṃ carat / HV_App.I,31.251 /
GE07hv_apppu:12088: yatra siddhāś ca siddhāḥ syur dhyātvā devaṃ janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.252 //
GE07hv_apppu:12089: yatra hatvā raṇe rāmo rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam / HV_App.I,31.253 /
GE07hv_apppu:12090: etacchāsanam icchaṃś ca tapo ghoram atapyata // HV_App.I,31.254 //
GE07hv_apppu:12091: devāś ca munayaś caiva siddhiṃ yānti śucivratāḥ / HV_App.I,31.255 /
GE07hv_apppu:12092: yatra nityaṃ jagannāthaḥ sākṣād vasati keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.256 //
GE07hv_apppu:12093: yatra yajñāḥ pravartante nityaṃ munigaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.257 /
GE07hv_apppu:12094: yasyāḥ smaraṇamātreṇa naraḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati // HV_App.I,31.258 //
GE07hv_apppu:12095: svargasopānam icchanti yāṃ puṇyāṃ munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.259 /
GE07hv_apppu:12096: śatravo mitratāṃ yānti yatra nityaṃ nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.260 //
GE07hv_apppu:12097: yām āhuḥ puṇyaśīlānāṃ sthānam uttamadharmiṇām / HV_App.I,31.261 /
GE07hv_apppu:12098: yatra viṣṇuṃ samārādhya devāḥ svargaṃ samāyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:12099: siddhikṣetram idaṃ prāhur ṛṣayo vītamatsarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.263 /
GE07hv_apppu:12100: viśālāṃ badarīṃ viṣṇus tāṃ draṣṭuṃ sakaleśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.264 //
GE07hv_apppu:12101: sāyāhne cāmaragaṇair munibhis tattva darśibhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.265 /
GE07hv_apppu:12104: nīḍastheṣu vihaṃgeṣu duhyamānāsu goṣu ca // HV_App.I,31.268 //
GE07hv_apppu:12105: bṛsīṣv atha ca tiṣṭhatsu munivīreṣu sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.269 /
GE07hv_apppu:12109: atithau pūjyamāne ca saṃdhyāviṣṭe jaganmaye // HV_App.I,31.273 //
GE07hv_apppu:12110: sa tasyām atha velāyāṃ devaiḥ saha janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.274 /
GE07hv_apppu:12111: viveśa badarīṃ viṣṇur munijuṣṭāṃ tapomayīm // HV_App.I,31.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:12112: āśramasyātha madhyaṃ tu praviśya harir īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:12114: pradeśe puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ sthitas tāvat sahāmaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:12117: tato munigaṇā dṛṣṭvā devadevam avasthitam / HV_App.I,31.279 /
GE07hv_apppu:12121: nirmajjānīrasāḥ kecid vetālā iva kecana / HV_App.I,31.283 /
GE07hv_apppu:12124: smarantaḥ sarvadā viṣṇuṃ tadbhaktās tatparāyaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,31.286 //
GE07hv_apppu:12126: dhyānena manasā viṣṇuṃ dṛṣṭavantas tapodhanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.288 //
GE07hv_apppu:12129: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca raibhyo dhūmras tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,31.291 /
GE07hv_apppu:12130: jābāliḥ kāśyapaḥ kaṇvo bharadvājo 'tha gautamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.292 //
GE07hv_apppu:12131: atrir aśvaśirā bhadraḥ śaṅkhaḥ śaṇkhanidhiḥ kuṇiḥ / HV_App.I,31.293 /
GE07hv_apppu:12133: kakṣīvān aṅgirāś caiva munir dīrghatamās tathā / HV_App.I,31.295 /
GE07hv_apppu:12134: asito devalas tāta vālmīkiś ca mahātapāḥ // HV_App.I,31.296 //
GE07hv_apppu:12135: ete cānye ca munayo draṣṭum īśvaram avyayam / HV_App.I,31.297 /
GE07hv_apppu:12136: ādāyārghyaṃ yathāyogam uṭajāt svāt samāyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.298 //
GE07hv_apppu:12137: te ca gatvā hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ viṣṇum īśaṃ janārdanam / HV_App.I,31.299 /
GE07hv_apppu:12138: bhaktinamrās tadā devaṃ praṇemur bhaktavatsalam // HV_App.I,31.300 //
GE07hv_apppu:12139: namo 'stu kṛṣṇa krṣneti devadeveti keśavam / HV_App.I,31.301 /
GE07hv_apppu:12140: praṇavātmañ jagannātha natāḥ sma śirasā hare // HV_App.I,31.302 //
GE07hv_apppu:12141: viṣṇo jiṣṇo hṛṣīkeśa keśaveti ca sarvadā / HV_App.I,31.303 /
GE07hv_apppu:12142: praṇām apraṇatā viprāḥ prāhur itthaṃ jagatpatim // HV_App.I,31.304 //
GE07hv_apppu:12143: idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam idaṃ viṣṭaram eva ca / HV_App.I,31.305 /
GE07hv_apppu:12144: kṛtārthāḥ sarvathā deva prasanno no jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.306 //
GE07hv_apppu:12145: kiṃ kurmaḥ kiṃ nu naḥ kṛtyaṃ kaścid doṣaḥ prabho hare / HV_App.I,31.307 /
GE07hv_apppu:12146: iti prāñjalayaḥ sarve sthitā devasya pārśvataḥ // HV_App.I,31.308 //
GE07hv_apppu:12147: kṛṣno 'pi tad yathāyogam upayujya sahāmaraiḥ / HV_App.I,31.309 /
GE07hv_apppu:12148: kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ munivarā vardhatāṃ tapa uttamam // HV_App.I,31.310 //
GE07hv_apppu:12149: iti bruvan purāṇātmā prītas tena garutmatā / HV_App.I,31.311 /
GE07hv_apppu:12150: āsanaṃ lambhayām āsa rātrau devo janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.312 //
GE07hv_apppu:12151: kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭavān bhūyo munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām / HV_App.I,31.313 /
GE07hv_apppu:12152: agnihotreṣu tapasi tathā kṛtyeṣu sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.314 //
GE07hv_apppu:12153: evamādi jagannāthaḥ pṛṣṭavān īśvaras tadā / HV_App.I,31.315 /
GE07hv_apppu:12154: sarvatra kuśalaṃ te tu brūyuḥ kṛṣṇasya tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,31.316 //
GE07hv_apppu:12155: ātithyaṃ cakrire te tu nīvāraiḥ phalamūlakaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.317 /
GE07hv_apppu:12156: devānām atha sarveṣāṃ viṣṇoḥ kṛṣṇasya yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:12157: ātithyam upayuñjānas tataḥ prīto 'bhavad dhariḥ // HV_App.I,31.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:12160: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur durvijñeyagatiḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,31.320 /
GE07hv_apppu:12161: yatra pūrvaṃ tapas taptam ātmanā yādaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:12162: gaṅgāyāś cottare tīre deśaṃ draṣṭum upāgataḥ / HV_App.I,31.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:12163: svayam eva hariḥ sākṣāt praviveśa tamālayam // HV_App.I,31.323 //
GE07hv_apppu:12164: praviśya suciraṃ kālaṃ dadarśa ca manoramam / HV_App.I,31.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:12165: niṣasāda tatas tasminn āśrame puṇyavardhane // HV_App.I,31.325 //
GE07hv_apppu:12166: samādhau yojayām āsa manaḥ padmanibhekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:12167: kim apy eṣa jagannātho dhyātvā deveśvaraḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:12168: sthite devagurau tatra samādhau dīpavad dharau / HV_App.I,31.328 /
GE07hv_apppu:12169: tatra śabdo mahān ghoraḥ prādur āsīt samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.329 //
GE07hv_apppu:12170: khāda khāda namo deva yāta yāta mṛgān imān / HV_App.I,31.330 /
GE07hv_apppu:12171: preṣayeha śunaḥ sarvān prasādāc chārṅgadhanvanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:12172: eṣa viṣṇur ayaṃ kṛṣṇo harir īśa ito 'cyutaḥ / HV_App.I,31.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:12173: namo 'stu viṣṇo deveśa svāmin mādhava keśava // HV_App.I,31.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:12174: ity ādiśabdaḥ sumahān āvir āsīt tadā niśi / HV_App.I,31.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:12175: tataś ca sumahānādaḥ siṃhānāṃ mṛgavidviṣām / HV_App.I,31.335 /
GE07hv_apppu:12176: dhāvatāṃ ca śunāṃ rajan mṛgān anu vinardatām // HV_App.I,31.336 //
GE07hv_apppu:12177: mṛgāṇāṃ bhītiyuktānām ṛkṣāṇāṃ dvīpināṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.337 /
GE07hv_apppu:12178: gajānāṃ nardatāṃ rājan bṛṃhitāni tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:12180: nādas trailokyavitrāsaḥ prādur āsīt tadā niśi // HV_App.I,31.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:12181: śrutvā taṃ tu harir devas tādṛśaṃ tatra viṣṭhitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.341 /
GE07hv_apppu:12182: samādhi kṣobhanipuṇaṃ niḥśvasya ca jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:12183: tataḥ sa cintayām āsa ko 'yam eṣa mahāsvanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.343 /
GE07hv_apppu:12184: kasyāyam īdṛśaḥ śabdaḥ stutiyukto mama tv iti // HV_App.I,31.344 //
GE07hv_apppu:12185: āhosvin mṛgayā śabdaḥ śunāṃ saṃcaratāṃ vane / HV_App.I,31.345 /
GE07hv_apppu:12186: mṛgāṇām atha sarveṣāṃ nādaś ca sumahān ayam / HV_App.I,31.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:12187: vyāmiśraḥ stutiyuktābhir vāgbhir mama samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:12188: iti saṃcintya manasā diśo viprekṣya sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:12189: tata āste haris tatra jñātuṃ tasya samudbhavam // HV_App.I,31.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:12190: tato mṛgāḥ samāyānti yatra tiṣṭhati keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.350 /
GE07hv_apppu:12191: tāṃś caivānucaro rājañ śvagaṇaḥ samapadyata // HV_App.I,31.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:12192: atha vai dīpikā rājañ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:12193: tatas tamo 'pi vyanaśad diveva samapadyata // HV_App.I,31.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:12194: tato 'nu bhūtasaṃghāś ca samadṛśyanta tatra ha / HV_App.I,31.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:12195: piśācāś ca mahāghorā nardanto bahuvisvaram // HV_App.I,31.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:12196: bhakṣayanto 'tha piśitaṃ pibanto rudhiraṃ bahu / HV_App.I,31.356 /
GE07hv_apppu:12198: yatrāsau tiṣṭhate deva tāni tatraiva bhārata // **HV_App.I,31.356**4:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:12200: prādur āsan mahāghorāḥ piśācā vikṛtānanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:12201: hanyamānā hatā rājan patantaḥ patitā mṛgāḥ / HV_App.I,31.358 /
GE07hv_apppu:12202: itaś cetaś ca dhāvanto bāṇair viddhā mṛgadviṣaḥ // HV_App.I,31.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:12204: yatrāsau tiṣṭhate devas tatra yātāni bhārata // HV_App.I,31.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:12207: putravatyaḥ samāpetur yatra tiṣṭhati keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:12208: śvagaṇas tatra rājendra caraty eva tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:12209: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvam ālokya viṣṭhitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.366 /
GE07hv_apppu:12210: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā paśyann āste sma keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:12211: kasyaiṣa visṛto nādaḥ kasya vāyaṃ janaḥ patan / HV_App.I,31.368 /
GE07hv_apppu:12212: ko nu māṃ stauti bhaktyā tu bhaviṣye prītimān aham // HV_App.I,31.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:12213: kasya muktiḥ samāyātā prīte mayi sudurlabhā / HV_App.I,31.370 /
GE07hv_apppu:12214: iti saṃcintya bhagavān āste prākṛtavad dhariḥ // HV_App.I,31.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:12217: teṣām anu mahāghorau piśācau vikṛtānanau / HV_App.I,31.372 /
GE07hv_apppu:12220: khādantau māṃsapiṭakaṃ pibantau śoṇitaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:12223: karṣantau śavayūthāni bāhubhyāṃ tatra tatra ha / HV_App.I,31.378 /
GE07hv_apppu:12224: hasantau vividhaṃ hāsaṃ svajātisadṛśaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:12225: vadantau bahurūpāṇi vacāṃsi prākṛtāni ca / HV_App.I,31.380 /
GE07hv_apppu:12227: sṛkkiṇī lelihantau ca dantān kaṭakaṭāyinau / HV_App.I,31.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:12229: vadantau kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti mādhaveti ca saṃtatam // HV_App.I,31.384 //
GE07hv_apppu:12230: kadā nu drakṣyate viṣṇuḥ sa idānīṃ kva tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,31.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:12231: svāmī naḥ kutra vasati kuto draṣṭuṃ yatāmahe / HV_App.I,31.386 /
GE07hv_apppu:12232: atra vā kutra deveśaḥ kuto nu sthāsyate hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:12233: kutaḥ padmapalāśākṣaḥ sākṣād indrānujo hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:12234: yam āhuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ brahma brahmavido janāḥ / HV_App.I,31.389 /
GE07hv_apppu:12235: tam ajaṃ puruṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ draṣṭum abhyudyatā vayam // HV_App.I,31.390 //
GE07hv_apppu:12237: tam ajaṃ viśvakartāraṃ kuto drakṣyāma sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:12238: yasya vistāra evaiṣa lokaḥ prāṇinivāsitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.393 /
GE07hv_apppu:12239: taṃ devaṃ draṣṭum īśānaṃ yatāmaḥ sāṃprataṃ harim // HV_App.I,31.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:12240: daśā ghoratamā loke vidviṣṭā sarvajantubhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.395 /
GE07hv_apppu:12241: paiśācīyaṃ samutpannā kathaṃ nau prāviśad balāt / HV_App.I,31.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:12243: aho nau duṣkṛtaṃ karma prāktane janmasaṃcaye / HV_App.I,31.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:12244: atraiva mahatī prītir vartate sarvadā tadā // HV_App.I,31.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:12245: yāvanno duṣkṛtaṃ karma tāvat sthāsyati tādṛśī / HV_App.I,31.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:12247: sarvathā duṣkṛtaṃ karma bahubhir janmasaṃcayaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.402 /
GE07hv_apppu:12248: tathā hi tat phalaṃ ghoram adyāpi na nivartate // HV_App.I,31.403 //
GE07hv_apppu:12249: yat tāḥ smaḥ prāṇino hantuṃ śvagaṇaiḥ saha sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,31.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:12250: tathā hi prāṇino loke bālyam ādau samāsthitāḥ / HV_App.I,31.405 /
GE07hv_apppu:12251: ajñānāvṛtacittāś ca kṛtyākṛtyaṃ na jānate // HV_App.I,31.406 //
GE07hv_apppu:12252: tathā yauvanino mattā viṣayair bahulīkṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,31.407 /
GE07hv_apppu:12253: yatante śreyase naiva tato viṣayasaṃsthitāḥ / HV_App.I,31.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:12255: tathā ca vṛddhabhāve tu vyādhibhir bahubhir vṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,31.410 /
GE07hv_apppu:12257: yatante na hi vai śreyo vinaṣṭendriyagocarāḥ // HV_App.I,31.412 //
GE07hv_apppu:12258: tato mṛtā garbhavāse vasanti satataṃ narāḥ / HV_App.I,31.413 /
GE07hv_apppu:12259: viṇmūtrakalile ghore duḥkhair bahubhir ācitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.414 //
GE07hv_apppu:12260: cyavante tu tato ghorād garbhāt saṃsāramaṇḍale / HV_App.I,31.415 /
GE07hv_apppu:12262: mahaty evaṃ sadā ghore saṃsāre duḥkhasaṃkule / HV_App.I,31.417 /
GE07hv_apppu:12265: acchedyaḥ śastrasaṃpātair upāyair bahubhiḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.420 /
GE07hv_apppu:12266: etasmān na nivartante martyāḥ prākṛtabuddhayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.421 //
GE07hv_apppu:12267: imaṃ hatvā manuṣyendram idam asmād dharāmy aham / HV_App.I,31.422 /
GE07hv_apppu:12268: corayitvā dhanam idaṃ hariṣyāmy adya yāmy aham // HV_App.I,31.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:12269: nirbhartsyainam idaṃ śāntaṃ hariṣyāmi dhanaṃ balī / HV_App.I,31.424 /
GE07hv_apppu:12270: ityādi vyākulā mūrkhā yatante prāṇipīḍanam / HV_App.I,31.425 /
GE07hv_apppu:12271: asyaiva duḥkhamūlasya saṃsārasya sadā hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.426 //
GE07hv_apppu:12273: ādidevaḥ purāṇātmā ātmā brahmavidāṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.428 /
GE07hv_apppu:12274: taṃ vayaṃ sarvayatnena drakṣyāmaḥ sarvathā harim / HV_App.I,31.429 /
GE07hv_apppu:12275: itthaṃ piśācau bhāṣantau prādur āstāṃ hareḥ puraḥ // HV_App.I,31.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:12278: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ piśācau māṃsabhakṣakau / HV_App.I,31.431 /
GE07hv_apppu:12280: vilokayāṃ cakratus tau piśācau devakīsutam / HV_App.I,31.433 /
GE07hv_apppu:12281: sthitaṃ sukhāsane viṣṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā lokeśvaraṃ harim // HV_App.I,31.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:12282: tau ca gatvā samuddeśaṃ piśācau keśavasya ha / HV_App.I,31.435 /
GE07hv_apppu:12283: tatas tāv ūcatur viṣṇum antarīkṛtya keśavam // HV_App.I,31.436 //
GE07hv_apppu:12284: ko bhavān kasya vā martya kutaś cāgamyate tvayā / HV_App.I,31.437 /
GE07hv_apppu:12285: kimartham iha saṃprāpto vane ghoramṛgākule // HV_App.I,31.438 //
GE07hv_apppu:12287: śvāpadaiḥ sevyamāne ca vipine vyāghrasaṃkule // HV_App.I,31.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:12288: sa kumāro 'navadyāṅgaḥ sākṣād viṣṇur ivāparaḥ / HV_App.I,31.441 /
GE07hv_apppu:12289: padmapatrekṣaṇaḥ śyāmaḥ padmābhaḥ śrīpatiḥ svayam // HV_App.I,31.442 //
