GE07hv_apppu:12290: asmatprītikaraḥ sākṣāt prāpto viṣṇur ivāparaḥ / HV_App.I,31.443 /
GE07hv_apppu:12291: devo vā yadi vā yakṣo gandharvaḥ kiṃnaro 'pi vā // HV_App.I,31.444 //
GE07hv_apppu:12292: indro vā dhanado vāpi yamo 'tha varuṇo 'pi vā / HV_App.I,31.445 /
GE07hv_apppu:12293: ekākī vipine ghore dhyānārpitamanā iva // HV_App.I,31.446 //
GE07hv_apppu:12294: brūhi martya yathātattvaṃ jñātum icchāmi mānada / HV_App.I,31.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:12295: evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ piśācābhyām āha viṣṇur urukramaḥ // HV_App.I,31.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:12296: kṣatriyo 'smīti māṃ prāhur manuṣyāḥ prakṛtisthitāḥ / HV_App.I,31.449 /
GE07hv_apppu:12297: yaduvaṃśe samutpannaḥ kṣātraṃ vṛttam anuṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:12298: lokānām atha pātāsmi śāstā duṣṭasya sarvadā / HV_App.I,31.451 /
GE07hv_apppu:12299: kailāsaṃ gantukāmo 'smi draṣṭuṃ devam upāpatim // HV_App.I,31.452 //
GE07hv_apppu:12300: ity evaṃ mama vṛttāntaḥ kathyatāṃ kau yuvām iti / HV_App.I,31.453 /
GE07hv_apppu:12301: yuvām iha samāyātau kiṃarthaṃ brāhmaṇāśramam // HV_App.I,31.454 //
GE07hv_apppu:12302: eṣā hi badarī puṇyā nānāvipraniṣevitā / HV_App.I,31.455 /
GE07hv_apppu:12303: badarīyaṃ samākhyātā na kṣudrair āśritā kvacit // HV_App.I,31.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:12305: śvagaṇā nātra dṛśyante piśācā māṃsabhojanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.458 //
GE07hv_apppu:12306: na hantavyā mṛgāś cātra mṛgayā nātra vartate / HV_App.I,31.459 /
GE07hv_apppu:12307: na tu kṣudraiḥ praveṣṭavyā na kṛtaghnair na nāstikaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.460 //
GE07hv_apppu:12308: aham asya tu deśasya rakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.461 /
GE07hv_apppu:12309: vyatikramo yadi bhavet tasya śāstāsmi yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:12310: kau bhavantau kva nu yuvāṃ kasyeyaṃ mahatī camūḥ / HV_App.I,31.463 /
GE07hv_apppu:12311: nātaḥ paraṃ praveṣṭavyam ṛṣayas tatra saṃsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.464 //
GE07hv_apppu:12312: vighnas tatra pravarteta tapaḥsu ca tapasvinām / HV_App.I,31.465 /
GE07hv_apppu:12313: ihaiva sthīyatāṃ tāvad vaktavyaṃ ca tataḥ sukham // HV_App.I,31.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:12314: anyathāhaṃ niṣeddhā syāṃ balād bāhvos tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,31.467 /
GE07hv_apppu:12315: evaṃ pṛṣṭau piśācau tu vaktum evaṃ pracakratuḥ // HV_App.I,31.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:12316: tayor eko mahāghoraḥ piśāco dīrghabāhukaḥ / HV_App.I,31.469 /
GE07hv_apppu:12317: uvāca vacanaṃ tatra yathā hṛdi samarpitam / HV_App.I,31.470 /
GE07hv_apppu:12319: namaskṛtya jagannāthaṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ jagatpatim / HV_App.I,31.472 /
GE07hv_apppu:12320: ādidevam ajaṃ viṣṇuṃ vareṇyam anaghaṃ śucim / HV_App.I,31.473 /
GE07hv_apppu:12321: vakṣyāmi sakalaṃ yadvat tathā śṛṇu yadīcchasi // HV_App.I,31.474 //
GE07hv_apppu:12323: māṃsādo vikṛto ghoraḥ sākṣān mṛtyur ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,31.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:12325: mamāyam anujaḥ sākṣād antakasyāntako hy ayam // HV_App.I,31.478 //
GE07hv_apppu:12326: mṛgayāyāṃ samāyātā viṣṇoḥ pūjārtham ity uta / HV_App.I,31.479 /
GE07hv_apppu:12327: mameyaṃ vartate senā śvagaṇo 'pi mamaiva tu // HV_App.I,31.480 //
GE07hv_apppu:12330: satataṃ dūṣayan viṣṇuṃ ghaṇṭām ābadhya karṇayoḥ / HV_App.I,31.483 /
GE07hv_apppu:12331: mama na praviśen nāma viṣṇor iti vicintayan // HV_App.I,31.484 //
GE07hv_apppu:12333: ārādhya taṃ mahādevam astuvaṃ satataṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.486 //
GE07hv_apppu:12334: tataḥ prasanno mām āha vṛṇīṣveti varaṃ haraḥ / HV_App.I,31.487 /
GE07hv_apppu:12335: tato muktir mayā tatra prārthitā devasaṃnidhau // HV_App.I,31.488 //
GE07hv_apppu:12336: muktiṃ prārthayamānaṃ māṃ punar āha trilocanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.489 /
GE07hv_apppu:12337: muktipradātā sarveṣāṃ viṣṇur eva na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.490 //
GE07hv_apppu:12338: tasmād gatvā ca badarīṃ tatrārādhya janārdanam / HV_App.I,31.491 /
GE07hv_apppu:12340: ity ukto devadevena śūlinā jñātavān aham / HV_App.I,31.493 /
GE07hv_apppu:12341: tam eva paramaṃ matvā govindaṃ garuḍadhvajam / HV_App.I,31.494 /
GE07hv_apppu:12342: tasmāt prārthayamānaḥ san muktideśam imaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,31.495 //
GE07hv_apppu:12343: anyac ca śṛṇu me kāryaṃ yadi kautūhalaṃ tava / HV_App.I,31.496 /
GE07hv_apppu:12344: purī dvāravatī nāma paścimasyodadhes taṭe // HV_App.I,31.497 //
GE07hv_apppu:12346: adhyuvāsa harir viṣṇus tāṃ purīṃ puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.499 //
GE07hv_apppu:12348: nirgatāḥ sāṃprataṃ martya vayam etaiḥ sahānugaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.501 /
GE07hv_apppu:12349: viṣṇuḥ sarveśvaraḥ sākṣād draṣṭavyo 'smābhir adya hi // HV_App.I,31.502 //
GE07hv_apppu:12350: lokānāṃ prabhavaḥ pātā kartā hartā jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.503 /
GE07hv_apppu:12351: āder ādiḥ samastasya prabhavaṃ kāraṇaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.504 //
GE07hv_apppu:12353: prabhuḥ prabhūṇām api yaḥ sadātmakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.506 /
GE07hv_apppu:12355: draṣṭuṃ hariṃ saṃprati saṃyatāḥ smaḥ // HV_App.I,31.508 //
GE07hv_apppu:12356: yasya prasādāj jagad evam āsīt @ HV_App.I,31.509 @
GE07hv_apppu:12359: draṣṭuṃ hariṃ saṃprati saṃyatāḥ smaḥ // HV_App.I,31.512 //
GE07hv_apppu:12361: layaṃ ca yasmin samupaiti kalpe / HV_App.I,31.514 /
GE07hv_apppu:12364: sraṣṭā ca yo 'sau sakalasya devaḥ @ HV_App.I,31.517 @
GE07hv_apppu:12365: pātā ca hartā ca hariḥ sa eva / HV_App.I,31.518 /
GE07hv_apppu:12371: bhuvaś ca kartā harir eka eva / HV_App.I,31.522 /
GE07hv_apppu:12377: pādau ca vikṣipya karau ca dhūnvan // HV_App.I,31.528 //
GE07hv_apppu:12381: bahir yathābhūtam abhūd idaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,31.532 //
GE07hv_apppu:12386: nābheś ca yasyāvir abhūt sapatraṃ @ HV_App.I,31.537 @
GE07hv_apppu:12390: dadhāra yo bhūtapatir mahān mahīṃ @ HV_App.I,31.541 @
GE07hv_apppu:12397: draṣṭuṃ tam īśaṃ vayam udyatāḥ smaḥ // HV_App.I,31.548 //
GE07hv_apppu:12401: draṣṭuṃ tam īśaṃ vayam udyatāḥ smaḥ // HV_App.I,31.552 //
GE07hv_apppu:12405: draṣṭuṃ tam īśaṃ vayam udyatāḥ smaḥ // HV_App.I,31.556 //
GE07hv_apppu:12406: yaṃ prāhur īḍyaṃ varadaṃ vareṇyam @ HV_App.I,31.557 @
GE07hv_apppu:12408: yaṃ sarvagaṃ devam ajaṃ janārdanaṃ @ HV_App.I,31.559 @
GE07hv_apppu:12409: draṣṭuṃ hariṃ saṃprati saṃyatāḥ smaḥ // HV_App.I,31.560 //
GE07hv_apppu:12410: yasmin sarvam idaṃ protam ādikāle jagatpatau / HV_App.I,31.561 /
GE07hv_apppu:12411: taṃ draṣṭum adya saṃvṛttāḥ kiṃ nu vakṣyāma sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.562 //
GE07hv_apppu:12412: gacchāmo vayam anyatra gaccha tvaṃ kāmam anyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.563 /
GE07hv_apppu:12413: niyamo 'py asti no martya yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,31.564 /
GE07hv_apppu:12414: rātrimadhyam anuprāptaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.565 //
GE07hv_apppu:12415: ity uktvā ghorarūpo 'sau piśāco vikṛtānanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.566 /
GE07hv_apppu:12416: tasminn eva same deśe pītvā ca rudhiraṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.567 //
GE07hv_apppu:12418: apaḥ samspṛśya tatraiva pārśve saṃsthāpya sādhanam // HV_App.I,31.569 //
GE07hv_apppu:12419: āntrapāśaṃ mahāghoraṃ saṃsthāpya vipulaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,31.570 /
GE07hv_apppu:12420: āsanaṃ kuśasaṃyuktaṃ kṛtvā cābhyukṣya vāriṇā // HV_App.I,31.571 //
GE07hv_apppu:12421: utsārya śvagaṇān sarvān yatnena mahatā tadā / HV_App.I,31.572 /
GE07hv_apppu:12422: sukhāsanaṃ samāsthāya samādhau yatate śvapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.573 //
GE07hv_apppu:12423: ekacittas tadā bhūtvā namaskṛtya ca keśavam / HV_App.I,31.574 /
GE07hv_apppu:12424: imaṃ mantraṃ paṭhan ghoraḥ piśāco bhaktavatsalam // HV_App.I,31.575 //
GE07hv_apppu:12425: namo bhagavate tasmai vāsudevāya cakriṇe / HV_App.I,31.576 /
GE07hv_apppu:12426: namaste gadine tubhyaṃ vāsudevāya dhīmate // HV_App.I,31.577 //
GE07hv_apppu:12427: oṃ namo nārāyaṇāya viṣṇave prabhaviṣṇave / HV_App.I,31.578 /
GE07hv_apppu:12428: mama bhūyān manaḥśuddhiḥ kīrtanāt tava keśava // HV_App.I,31.579 //
GE07hv_apppu:12429: janmedam īdṛśaṃ ghoraṃ mā bhūn mama durāsadam / HV_App.I,31.580 /
GE07hv_apppu:12430: devabhūto bhaviṣyāmi smaraṇāt tava gopate // HV_App.I,31.581 //
GE07hv_apppu:12432: atra pūto bhaviṣyāmi smaraṇāt tava keśava / **HV_App.I,31.581**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:12433: tava cakraprahāreṇa kāyo naśyatu māmakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.582 /
GE07hv_apppu:12434: mama bhūyo bhavo mā bhūd eṣā me prārthanā tava // HV_App.I,31.583 //
GE07hv_apppu:12435: arthināṃ kalpavṛkṣo 'si dātā sarvasya sarvadā / HV_App.I,31.584 /
GE07hv_apppu:12436: yatra yatra bhavej janma tatra tatra bhavān hṛdi // HV_App.I,31.585 //
GE07hv_apppu:12437: vartatāṃ mama deveśa prārthanaiṣā mamāparā / HV_App.I,31.586 /
GE07hv_apppu:12438: namas tubhyaṃ namas tubhyaṃ bhavatv evaṃ sadā mama // HV_App.I,31.587 //
GE07hv_apppu:12439: nirvighnā prārthanā deva namas te 'stu sadā mama // HV_App.I,31.588 //
GE07hv_apppu:12440: yadā me maraṇaṃ bhūyāt tadā mā bhūt smṛtibhramaḥ // HV_App.I,31.589 //
GE07hv_apppu:12441: dine dine kṣaṇaṃ cittaṃ tvayi saṃsthaṃ bhavatv iti / HV_App.I,31.590 /
GE07hv_apppu:12442: evaṃ preraya māṃ deva mā bhūt te cittam īdṛśam // HV_App.I,31.591 //
GE07hv_apppu:12443: nṛśaṃso 'yaṃ piśāco 'yaṃ dayā kāsmin bhaved iti / HV_App.I,31.592 /
GE07hv_apppu:12444: evaṃ cintaya māṃ deva bhṛtyo mahyam iti prabho // HV_App.I,31.593 //
GE07hv_apppu:12445: parapīḍā na matto 'stu namas te bhagavan prabho / HV_App.I,31.594 /
GE07hv_apppu:12446: indriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu mā bhūvan sāṃpratam hi me // HV_App.I,31.595 //
GE07hv_apppu:12447: antakāle mamāpy evaṃ prasādāt tava keśava / HV_App.I,31.596 /
GE07hv_apppu:12448: pṛthivī pātu me ghrāṇam rasanā pātu me payaḥ // HV_App.I,31.597 //
GE07hv_apppu:12449: sūryaś ca pātu me cakṣuḥ sparśaṃ pātu ca mārutaḥ / HV_App.I,31.598 /
GE07hv_apppu:12450: śrotram ākāśam apyetu manaḥ prāṇaṃ ca gacchatu // HV_App.I,31.599 //
GE07hv_apppu:12451: jalaṃ māṃ rakṣatān nityam pṛthivī rakṣatāṃ hare / HV_App.I,31.600 /
GE07hv_apppu:12452: sūryo māṃ rakṣatāṃ viṣṇo namas te sūryatejase // HV_App.I,31.601 //
GE07hv_apppu:12453: vāyur māṃ rakṣatāṃ duḥkād ākāśaṃ ca janārdana / HV_App.I,31.602 /
GE07hv_apppu:12454: na manaḥ sarvagaṃ deva rakṣatāṃ viṣayād dhare // HV_App.I,31.603 //
GE07hv_apppu:12455: manoviparyayaṃ ghoraṃ puruṣān hanti nityaśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.604 /
GE07hv_apppu:12456: pāpeṣu yojayet puṃsaḥ parapīḍādikeṣu ca // HV_App.I,31.605 //
GE07hv_apppu:12457: manas tad rakṣatāṃ deva bhūyo bhūyo janārdana / HV_App.I,31.606 /
GE07hv_apppu:12458: mā bhūn manasi kāluṣyaṃ mano me nirmalaṃ bhavet // HV_App.I,31.607 //
GE07hv_apppu:12459: kaluṣaṃ yasya tac cittaṃ narake pātayaty amum / HV_App.I,31.608 /
GE07hv_apppu:12460: bāhyāni nirmalāny evam indriyāṇi bhavanti cet / HV_App.I,31.609 /
GE07hv_apppu:12461: na tāni kāryavantīha manaś cet kaluṣaṃ bhavet // HV_App.I,31.610 //
GE07hv_apppu:12462: tathā hi muṣṭināmedhyaṃ gṛhītvā yo vyavasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.611 /
GE07hv_apppu:12463: bahiḥ prakṣālanaṃ kurvan kiṃ bhavet tasya keśava / HV_App.I,31.612 /
GE07hv_apppu:12464: vyartho hi kevalaṃ tasya pragraho bāhyagocaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.613 //
GE07hv_apppu:12465: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena cittaṃ rakṣa janārdana / HV_App.I,31.614 /
GE07hv_apppu:12467: parivādāj jagannātha vācaṃ rakṣa durudvahām / HV_App.I,31.616 /
GE07hv_apppu:12468: paradravyān mano rakṣa paradārāj janārdana / HV_App.I,31.617 /
GE07hv_apppu:12469: sarvatra me dayā bhūyāt prasādāt tava keśava // HV_App.I,31.618 //
GE07hv_apppu:12470: tvayy eva bhaktir acalā bhūyād bhūteṣu me dayā / HV_App.I,31.619 /
GE07hv_apppu:12471: bahunātra kim uktena śṛṇuṣvedaṃ vaco mama // HV_App.I,31.620 //
GE07hv_apppu:12472: sukhe duḥkhe ca rāge ca bhojane gamane tathā / HV_App.I,31.621 /
GE07hv_apppu:12473: jāgratsvapneṣu sarvatra tvayy eva ramatāṃ manaḥ // HV_App.I,31.622 //
GE07hv_apppu:12475: iti bruvan ghoratamo jātyā hīno na cittatah // HV_App.I,31.624 //
GE07hv_apppu:12476: piśāco bhagavad bhaktaḥ samādhiṃ samapadyata / HV_App.I,31.625 /
GE07hv_apppu:12477: dṛḍhaṃ badhvātmanaḥ kāyam āntrapāśena māṃsapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.626 //
GE07hv_apppu:12478: niścalenaiva manasā sukham āste sa māṃsapaḥ / HV_App.I,31.627 /
GE07hv_apppu:12479: dhyāyan hariṃ jagadyoniṃ viṣṇuṃ pītāmbaraṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.628 //
GE07hv_apppu:12481: nityam śuddhaṃ jñānagamyaṃ kāraṇaṃ sarvadehinām // HV_App.I,31.630 //
GE07hv_apppu:12482: nāsikāgraṃ samālokya paṭhan brahma sanātanam / HV_App.I,31.631 /
GE07hv_apppu:12483: nivātastho yathā dīpaḥ proccaran praṇavaṃ sadā // HV_App.I,31.632 //
GE07hv_apppu:12484: praṇavaṃ vācakaṃ matvā vācyaṃ brahmeti niścitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.633 /
GE07hv_apppu:12485: ekāgraṃ satataṃ kṛtvā cittaṃ viṣṇau samarpitam // HV_App.I,31.634 //
GE07hv_apppu:12486: vikalparahitaṃ cittaṃ hṛdi madhye nyaveśayat / HV_App.I,31.635 /
GE07hv_apppu:12488: āste sukhaṃ mahāyogī piśitāśas tadā mahān / HV_App.I,31.637 /
GE07hv_apppu:12489: tridhāmānaṃ japaṃs tatra smaran viṣṇuṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,31.638 //
GE07hv_apppu:12492: tataḥ sa bhagvān viṣṇuḥ piśācaṃ dṛṣṭavāṃs tadā / HV_App.I,31.639 /
GE07hv_apppu:12493: cintayantaṃ svam ātmānaṃ śuddhaṃ buddhisamanvitam // HV_App.I,31.640 //
GE07hv_apppu:12494: ātmany eva sthitaṃ sākṣāt paṭhantaṃ praṇavaṃ sakṛt / HV_App.I,31.641 /
GE07hv_apppu:12495: prārthayantaṃ svam ātmānam ekānte niyataṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.642 /
GE07hv_apppu:12497: dhyātvā tu suciraṃ viṣṇuḥ kāraṇaṃ puṇyakarmaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.644 /
GE07hv_apppu:12499: vāsudeveti kṛṣṇeti mādhaveti ca māṃ sadā // HV_App.I,31.646 //
GE07hv_apppu:12502: iti māṃ nāmabhir nityaṃ paṭhaty eṣa divāniśam / HV_App.I,31.649 /
GE07hv_apppu:12503: svapañjāgrat tathā tiṣṭhan bhuñjan gacchaṃs tathā vadan // HV_App.I,31.650 //
GE07hv_apppu:12504: bhakṣayan māṃsapiṭakaṃ pibañ śoṇitam eva ca / HV_App.I,31.651 /
GE07hv_apppu:12505: bādhamānaṃ ca suciraṃ hatvāpi ca mṛgān bahūn // HV_App.I,31.652 //
GE07hv_apppu:12506: hanane bhojane caiva jāgratsvapne tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,31.653 /
GE07hv_apppu:12507: sarveṣv api ca kāryeṣu kartāham iti manyate // HV_App.I,31.654 //
GE07hv_apppu:12508: etasya karmaṇaḥ pāka eṣa ghorasya sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.655 /
GE07hv_apppu:12509: niścityaivaṃ jagannāthaḥ prītas tasya babhūva ha // HV_App.I,31.656 //
GE07hv_apppu:12510: adarśayat svam ātmānam ananyasya jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.657 /
GE07hv_apppu:12512: sa ca ghoraḥ piśāco 'pi dadarśātmani keśavam / HV_App.I,31.659 /
GE07hv_apppu:12514: śaṅkhinaṃ cakriṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ sragviṇaṃ gadinaṃ vibhum / HV_App.I,31.661 /
GE07hv_apppu:12517: caturbhujaṃ śubhagiraṃ niścalaṃ sarvagaṃ śubham // HV_App.I,31.664 //
GE07hv_apppu:12518: anādim ajaram nityaṃ māyāvinam amāyinam / HV_App.I,31.665 /
GE07hv_apppu:12519: satyayuktaṃ sadā śuddhaṃ buddhigamyaṃ sadāmalam // HV_App.I,31.666 //
GE07hv_apppu:12520: manasaiva jagannāthaṃ dṛṣṭvā viṣṇum anekadhā / HV_App.I,31.667 /
GE07hv_apppu:12522: adya dṛṣṭo harir viṣṇuḥ sākṣāt sarvatragaḥ śubhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.669 /
GE07hv_apppu:12523: prasanno hi harir mahyaṃ tenāhaṃ dṛṣṭavān harim // HV_App.I,31.670 //
GE07hv_apppu:12524: siddhaṃ me janmanaḥ kṛtyaṃ kim ataḥ kṛtyam asti me / HV_App.I,31.671 /
GE07hv_apppu:12525: granthayo mama nirbhinnā vaśyāny evendriyāṇi me // HV_App.I,31.672 //
GE07hv_apppu:12526: prāyeṇa jitam ity eva mano manye smṛte harau / HV_App.I,31.673 /
GE07hv_apppu:12527: eṣaṇāś ca nirastā me prasanno 'haṃ tathābhavam // HV_App.I,31.674 //
GE07hv_apppu:12528: ebhyo 'thāpi piśācebhyo nirmuktaḥ sāṃprataṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.675 /
GE07hv_apppu:12529: yo 'sau mamānujaḥ sākṣāt sa ca bhaktas tathā harau / HV_App.I,31.676 /
GE07hv_apppu:12530: kālena caiva nirmukto viṣṇoḥ sāyujyam āpnuyāt // HV_App.I,31.677 //
GE07hv_apppu:12531: ity evaṃ cintayitvā sa āntrapāśaṃ vibhidya ca / HV_App.I,31.678 /
GE07hv_apppu:12532: krameṇa prāṇam unmucya vilokya ca diśas tathā / HV_App.I,31.679 /
GE07hv_apppu:12533: śarīraṃ susamaṃ kṛtvā prātiṣṭhat sa sukhena ha // HV_App.I,31.680 //
GE07hv_apppu:12536: piśitāśo jagannāthaṃ dadarśa jagatāṃ patim / HV_App.I,31.681 /
GE07hv_apppu:12537: samādhau ca yathā dṛṣṭaṃ bhūmau caiva jagatpatim // HV_App.I,31.682 //
GE07hv_apppu:12538: ayaṃ viṣṇur ayaṃ viṣṇur ity ūce piśitāśanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.683 /
GE07hv_apppu:12539: samādhau ca yathā dṛṣṭaḥ so 'yam atrāpi dṛśyate / HV_App.I,31.684 /
GE07hv_apppu:12540: ity uvāca punar brūte nṛtyann iva hasann iva // HV_App.I,31.685 //
GE07hv_apppu:12545: viṣṇur jiṣṇur jagannāthaḥ purāṇaḥ puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.690 /
GE07hv_apppu:12546: viśvātmā viśvakartā yaḥ so 'yam eṣa sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.691 //

GE07hv_apppu:12551: yo 'sau pṛthvīṃ dadhārāśu daṃṣṭrayā jalasaṃcayāt / HV_App.I,31.696 /
GE07hv_apppu:12552: yo 'yam eṣa hariḥ sākṣād vārāhaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.697 //
GE07hv_apppu:12554: dattvā ca śakrāya tato 'nu rājyam / HV_App.I,31.699 /

GE07hv_apppu:12558: niḥśokaṃ nikhilaṃ lokaṃ cakārāsau janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.703 //

GE07hv_apppu:12563: yaḥ śete jaladhau nāge devyā lakṣmyā sukhāvahe / HV_App.I,31.708 /
GE07hv_apppu:12564: hatvā tau dānavau ghorau madhukaiṭabhasaṃjñitau // HV_App.I,31.709 //
GE07hv_apppu:12565: yam āhur ādyaṃ vibudhā jagatpatiṃ @ HV_App.I,31.710 @
GE07hv_apppu:12568: sthūlāt sthaviṣṭhaṃ harim eva viṣṇum // HV_App.I,31.713 //
GE07hv_apppu:12569: yatra sthitam idaṃ sarvaṃ prāpte lokasya nāśane / HV_App.I,31.714 /
GE07hv_apppu:12570: ādau yasmāt samutpannaṃ so 'yaṃ viṣṇur iha sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.715 //
GE07hv_apppu:12573: ayaṃ sa viṣṇuḥ puruṣottamaḥ śivaḥ @ HV_App.I,31.718 @
GE07hv_apppu:12575: bhṛgor vaṃśe samutpanno jāmadagnya iti śrutaḥ / HV_App.I,31.720 /
GE07hv_apppu:12576: śiṣyatvaṃ samavāpyaiva mṛgavyādhasya yaḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.721 //
GE07hv_apppu:12580: hayaiś ca nāgaiś ca rathaiś ca nirgatam // HV_App.I,31.725 //
GE07hv_apppu:12581: kurukṣetraṃ samāsādya yaś cakāra pitṛkriyām / HV_App.I,31.726 /
GE07hv_apppu:12582: niḥkṣatriyam imaṃ lokaṃ kṛtavān ekaviṃśatim // HV_App.I,31.727 //
GE07hv_apppu:12583: raghor atha kule jāto rāmo nāma janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.728 /
GE07hv_apppu:12584: sītayā ca śriyā yukto lakṣmaṇānucaraḥ kṛtī // HV_App.I,31.729 //

GE07hv_apppu:12602: tatra hatvā hayaṃ ghoraṃ virarājāṃśumān iva // HV_App.I,31.747 //
GE07hv_apppu:12607: yo dhenukaṃ tālavane tatphalaiḥ samamacchinat / HV_App.I,31.752 /

GE07hv_apppu:12636: yādavebhyo dadau prītiṃ kaṃsasyaiva tu paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.781 //
GE07hv_apppu:12641: vidyām avāpya sakalāṃ dattvā putraṃ mahāmuneḥ / HV_App.I,31.786 /
GE07hv_apppu:12642: sāgrajo 'tha jagāmāśu mathurāṃ yādavīṃ purīm // HV_App.I,31.787 //
GE07hv_apppu:12646: devāṃś ca sarvāñ jagato jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.791 //
GE07hv_apppu:12647: sa eṣa bhagavān viṣṇur adya dṛṣṭo janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.792 /
GE07hv_apppu:12648: kṛtakṛtyo 'smi saṃjātaḥ sāyujyaṃ prāpnuyām aham // HV_App.I,31.793 //
GE07hv_apppu:12649: yena dṛṣṭo hariḥ sākṣāt tasya muktiḥ karasthitā / HV_App.I,31.794 /
GE07hv_apppu:12650: so 'yam eṣa hariḥ sākṣāt pratyakṣam iha vartate // HV_App.I,31.795 //
GE07hv_apppu:12651: ko nu janmāntare pūrvaṃ dharmaḥ saṃcita eva me / HV_App.I,31.796 /
GE07hv_apppu:12652: yasya pākaḥ samutpanno yenāsau dṛśyate mayā // HV_App.I,31.797 //
GE07hv_apppu:12654: kim asmai dīyate vastu kiṃ tu vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,31.799 /
GE07hv_apppu:12655: kariṣye kim ahaṃ viṣṇo vadasvādya yathepsitam // HV_App.I,31.800 //
GE07hv_apppu:12656: ity uktvā visvaraṃ nādaṃ nanāda bahuśas tadā / HV_App.I,31.801 /
GE07hv_apppu:12657: jahāsa vikṛtaṃ bhūyo nanarta piśitāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.802 //
GE07hv_apppu:12658: namo namo hare kṛṣṇa yādaveśvara keśava / HV_App.I,31.803 /
GE07hv_apppu:12659: pratyakṣaṃ ca hares tatra nanarta vividhaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.804 //
GE07hv_apppu:12662: vihasya vikṛtaṃ bhūyaḥ pranṛtya ca yathābalam / HV_App.I,31.805 /
GE07hv_apppu:12663: brāhmaṇasya hatasyātha śavam ādāya satvaram // HV_App.I,31.806 //
GE07hv_apppu:12665: tataḥ khaṇḍaṃ samādāya adbhir abhyukṣya yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.808 //
GE07hv_apppu:12666: nidhāya pātre suśubhe namaskṛtya janārdanam / HV_App.I,31.809 /
GE07hv_apppu:12667: idaṃ provāca deveśaṃ prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.810 //
GE07hv_apppu:12668: gṛhāṇedaṃ jagannātha bhakṣyaṃ yogyaṃ tava prabho / HV_App.I,31.811 /
GE07hv_apppu:12669: bhavādṛśair jagannātha grāhyaṃ sarvātmanā hare // HV_App.I,31.812 //
GE07hv_apppu:12670: bhaktinamrā vayaṃ viṣṇo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / HV_App.I,31.813 /
GE07hv_apppu:12671: dattaṃ yadbhaktinamreṇa grāhyaṃ tatsvāminā hare // HV_App.I,31.814 //
GE07hv_apppu:12672: navaṃ susaṃskṛtaṃ bhakṣyaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ śavam uttamam / HV_App.I,31.815 /
GE07hv_apppu:12674: sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ śavaṃ brāhmaṇam uttamam / **HV_App.I,31.815**7:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:12675: asmākaṃ piśitāśānāṃ śāstre niyatam eva hi / HV_App.I,31.816 /
GE07hv_apppu:12676: tato gṛhāṇa bhagavan yadi doṣo na vidyate // HV_App.I,31.817 //
GE07hv_apppu:12677: ity uktvā vikṛtaṃ bhūyo vihasya sa tu kāmataḥ / HV_App.I,31.818 /
GE07hv_apppu:12678: dātum aicchat tadā khaṇḍam aspṛśyasya śavasya ha // HV_App.I,31.819 //
GE07hv_apppu:12679: tataḥ prīto haris tasmai manasāpūjayac ca tam / HV_App.I,31.820 /
GE07hv_apppu:12680: aho 'sya snehakāruṇyaṃ mayi sarvatra vartate // HV_App.I,31.821 //
GE07hv_apppu:12681: iti saṃcintya manasā provāca yadupuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.822 /
GE07hv_apppu:12682: alam etena sarvatra piśāca piśitānana / HV_App.I,31.823 /
GE07hv_apppu:12683: aspṛśyaṃ mādṛśair etad brāhmaṇaṃ śavam uttamam // HV_App.I,31.824 //
GE07hv_apppu:12684: brāhmaṇaḥ sarvathā pūjyo jantubhir dharmakāṅkṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.825 /
GE07hv_apppu:12686: na hantavyāḥ sadā viprās taddhiṃsā narakāvahā / HV_App.I,31.827 /
GE07hv_apppu:12687: tasmād aspṛśyam asmābhir nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.828 //
GE07hv_apppu:12688: tasmāt prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te manonirmalatā yathā / HV_App.I,31.829 /
GE07hv_apppu:12689: manaḥ śuddhiṃ yadāpannaṃ tataḥ prīto 'smi māṃsapa // HV_App.I,31.830 //
GE07hv_apppu:12690: asmatsaṃkīrtanācchaśvac chuddaṃ hi karaṇaṃ tava / HV_App.I,31.831 /
GE07hv_apppu:12691: atīva manasā prīta ity uktvā bhagavān hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.832 //
GE07hv_apppu:12692: paspaṛśāṇgaṃ tadā viṣṇuḥ piśācasyātha sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.833 /
GE07hv_apppu:12693: kareṇa mṛdunā devaḥ pāpān nirmocayad dhariḥ / HV_App.I,31.834 /
GE07hv_apppu:12694: tatas tasya babhau rūpaṃ kāmarūpasamaprabham // HV_App.I,31.835 //
GE07hv_apppu:12698: keyūrī cāṅgadī caiva kauśeyavasanas tadā / HV_App.I,31.839 /
GE07hv_apppu:12699: jñānavān sattvasaṃpannaḥ sākṣād indra ivāparaḥ / HV_App.I,31.840 /
GE07hv_apppu:12700: gandharva iva gāyaṃs tu siddhaḥ siddha iva svayam // HV_App.I,31.841 //
GE07hv_apppu:12701: sākṣāt spṛṣṭaṃ tadā viṣṇoḥ kareṇa mṛdupūrvakam / HV_App.I,31.842 /
GE07hv_apppu:12702: na nūnaṃ tādṛśaṃ rūpam āsīt kalpāntareṣv api // HV_App.I,31.843 //
GE07hv_apppu:12703: adyāpi naiva munayo labhante tādṛśaṃ vapuḥ / HV_App.I,31.844 /
GE07hv_apppu:12704: kṛtvā subahuśo ghoraṃ tapaḥ paramaduścaram // HV_App.I,31.845 //
GE07hv_apppu:12705: yac ca labdhaṃ tadā tena piśācena nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.846 /
GE07hv_apppu:12706: ko nu nāma jagannātham āśritaḥ sīdate nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.847 //
GE07hv_apppu:12707: na hi sarvatra kalyāṇo yo hi nityaṃ janārdanam / HV_App.I,31.848 /
GE07hv_apppu:12708: dhyāyan paṭhañ japan vāpi tasya kiṃ nāsti bhūpate // HV_App.I,31.849 //
GE07hv_apppu:12709: tataḥ provāca bhagavān sthitaṃ kāmam ivāparam / HV_App.I,31.850 /
GE07hv_apppu:12710: akṣayaḥ svargavāsas te yāvad indro bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,31.851 //
GE07hv_apppu:12711: tāvat svargī bhavān astu śāsanān mama nānyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.852 /
GE07hv_apppu:12712: naṣṭe śakre tataḥ svargāt sāyujyaṃ mama gaccatu // HV_App.I,31.853 //
GE07hv_apppu:12713: yo 'yaṃ bhrātā tava svargī yāvad indro bhavet tadā / HV_App.I,31.854 /
GE07hv_apppu:12714: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yat te manasi vartate / HV_App.I,31.855 /
GE07hv_apppu:12715: dātāsmi sarvataḥ sarvaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.856 //
GE07hv_apppu:12717: yaś cemaṃ saṃgamaṃ deva saṃsmaren niyatātmavān / HV_App.I,31.857 /
GE07hv_apppu:12718: bhaktis tasyācalā deva tvayi bhūyāj janārdana // HV_App.I,31.858 //
GE07hv_apppu:12719: manaḥśuddhir bhavet tasya mā bhūt kaluṣatā hare / HV_App.I,31.859 /
GE07hv_apppu:12720: kāluṣyaṃ manasas tasya mā bhūd eṣa varo mama // HV_App.I,31.860 //
GE07hv_apppu:12721: evam astv iti deveśaḥ svargaṃ gaccheti keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.861 /
GE07hv_apppu:12722: indrātithir bhavān astu tvāṃ pratīkṣya hariḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.862 //
GE07hv_apppu:12723: ity uktvā bhagavān viṣṇus tato deśād apāgamat / HV_App.I,31.863 /
GE07hv_apppu:12724: [k: Dn Ds2 T1.2 G3-5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:12725: tena stuto jagannāthaḥ pūjayitvā ca taṃ dvijam / **HV_App.I,31.863**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:12726: tato visṛjya govindas tasmād deśād upāgamat // **HV_App.I,31.863**8:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:12727: yatra te munayaḥ siddhā agnihotram upāsate / HV_App.I,31.864 /
GE07hv_apppu:12728: sa ca svargī tataḥ svargam ājñayā keśavasya ha // HV_App.I,31.865 //
GE07hv_apppu:12729: tasmāt paṭha sadā rājan manaḥśuddhiṃ yadīcchasi / HV_App.I,31.866 /
GE07hv_apppu:12730: manaś ca śuddhaṃ bhavati paṭhatas te jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.867 //
GE07hv_apppu:12733: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur munibhyas tattvam āditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.868 /
GE07hv_apppu:12734: kathayām āsa yad vṛttaṃ piśācasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.869 //
GE07hv_apppu:12735: tac chrutvā munayaḥ sarve vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.870 /
GE07hv_apppu:12736: aho 'sya karmaṇaḥ pākas tava saṃdarśanād iti // HV_App.I,31.871 //
GE07hv_apppu:12737: arcito munibhiḥ sarvaiḥ prītaḥ prītimatāṃ priyaḥ / HV_App.I,31.872 /
GE07hv_apppu:12738: tataḥ prabhāte vimale sūrye cābhyudite sati // HV_App.I,31.873 //
GE07hv_apppu:12739: āruhya garuḍaṃ viṣṇur yayau kailāsam uttamam / HV_App.I,31.874 /
GE07hv_apppu:12740: bhavadbhis tatra gantavyam ity uktvā munisattamān // HV_App.I,31.875 //
GE07hv_apppu:12741: yatra viśveśvarāḥ siddhās tapasyanti yatavratāḥ / HV_App.I,31.876 /
GE07hv_apppu:12742: yatra vaiśravaṇaḥ sākṣād upāste śaṃkaraṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.877 /
GE07hv_apppu:12743: yatra tanmānasaṃ nāma saro haṃsālayaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,31.878 //
GE07hv_apppu:12744: yatra bhṛṅgī riṭir devam upāste śaṃkaraṃ śivam / HV_App.I,31.879 /
GE07hv_apppu:12745: gāṇapatyam avāpyātha nityaṃ pārśvacaro hare // HV_App.I,31.880 //
GE07hv_apppu:12746: yatra siṃhā varāhāś ca dvipadvīpimṛgaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.881 /
GE07hv_apppu:12748: yatra nadyaḥ samutpannā gaṅgādyāḥ sāgaraṃgamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.883 /
GE07hv_apppu:12749: yatra viśveśvaraḥ śaṃbhur acchinad brahmaṇaḥ śiraḥ / HV_App.I,31.884 /
GE07hv_apppu:12750: yatrotpannā mahāvetrā bhūtānāṃ daṇḍatāṃ yayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.885 //
GE07hv_apppu:12751: umayā yatra sahitaḥ śaṃkaro nīlalohitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.886 /
GE07hv_apppu:12752: ṛṣibhiḥ prārthitaḥ pūrvaṃ dadau yatra nagaḥ sutām / HV_App.I,31.887 /
GE07hv_apppu:12754: yatra lebhe hariś cakram upāsya bahubhir dinaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.889 /
GE07hv_apppu:12755: puṣkaraiḥ śatapatraiś ca netreṇa ca jagatpatim // HV_App.I,31.890 //
GE07hv_apppu:12756: guhāṃ yatra samāśritya krīḍante siddhakiṃnarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.891 /
GE07hv_apppu:12757: priyābhiḥ saha modante pibante madhu cottamam // HV_App.I,31.892 //
GE07hv_apppu:12758: yam uddhṛtya bhujaiḥ sarvaiḥ paulastyo virarāma ha / HV_App.I,31.893 /
GE07hv_apppu:12759: tam āruhya mahāśailaṃ devakīnandano hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.894 /
GE07hv_apppu:12761: tapaś cartuṃ kila harir viṣṇuḥ sarveśvaraḥ śivaḥ / HV_App.I,31.896 /
GE07hv_apppu:12762: jaṭī cīrī jagannātho mānuṣaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.897 /
GE07hv_apppu:12763: tapase dhṛtacittas tu śucau bhūmāv upāviśat // HV_App.I,31.898 //
GE07hv_apppu:12764: avaruhya tato yānād garuḍād vedasaṃmitāt / HV_App.I,31.899 /
GE07hv_apppu:12765: dvādaśābdaṃ tapaś cartuṃ mano dadhre jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.900 //
GE07hv_apppu:12766: phālgunena tu māsena samārebhe janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.901 /
GE07hv_apppu:12768: kim uddiśya jagannāthas tapaś carati mānadaḥ / HV_App.I,31.903 /
GE07hv_apppu:12769: tan na vidmo yathākāmaṃ durjñeyeśvaracintanā // HV_App.I,31.904 //
GE07hv_apppu:12770: tapasyati tadā viṣṇau parvate bhūtasevite / HV_App.I,31.905 /
GE07hv_apppu:12772: homārthaṃ vāsudevasya caratas tapa uttamam // HV_App.I,31.907 //
GE07hv_apppu:12773: cakrarājo 'tha puṣpāṇi saṃcinoti tadā hareḥ / HV_App.I,31.908 /
GE07hv_apppu:12774: dikṣu sarvāsu sarvatra rarakṣa jalajas tadā // HV_App.I,31.909 //
GE07hv_apppu:12775: khaḍga āhṛtya yatnena kuśān subahuśas tadā / HV_App.I,31.910 /
GE07hv_apppu:12776: gadā kaumodakī caiva paricaryāṃ cakāra ha // HV_App.I,31.911 //
GE07hv_apppu:12778: sthitaṃ hi puratas tasya yatheṣṭaṃ bhṛtyavat svayam / HV_App.I,31.913 /
GE07hv_apppu:12779: juhoti bhagavān viṣṇur edhobhir bahubhiḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.914 //
GE07hv_apppu:12780: ājyādibhis tadā havyair agniṃ saṃpūjya mādhavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.915 /
GE07hv_apppu:12781: saptārciṣaḥ samāptiṃ ca samastavyas tataḥ kṛtī // HV_App.I,31.916 //
GE07hv_apppu:12782: ekasminn ekadā māse bhuñjāno niyatātmavān / HV_App.I,31.917 /
GE07hv_apppu:12783: dvitīye tv atha paryāye bhuñjann ekena kenacit // HV_App.I,31.918 //
GE07hv_apppu:12784: ekasmin vatsare bhuñjaṃs tathaivaikena kenacit / HV_App.I,31.919 /
GE07hv_apppu:12785: samāpya vatsaraṃ sarvam evam eva jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.920 //
GE07hv_apppu:12786: dvādaśābde tathā pūrṇe ūnamāse jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.921 /
GE07hv_apppu:12787: juhvann agniṃ samādhyāyan paṭhan mantrāñ janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.922 //
GE07hv_apppu:12788: āraṇyakaṃ paṭhan viṣṇuḥ sākṣāt sarveśvaro hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.923 /
GE07hv_apppu:12789: āste dhyānaparas tatra paṭhan praṇavam uttamam // HV_App.I,31.924 //
GE07hv_apppu:12792: tata indraḥ svayaṃ tatra āruhya gajam uttamam / HV_App.I,31.925 /
GE07hv_apppu:12793: draṣṭuṃ sarveśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ tapasyantaṃ samāyayau // HV_App.I,31.926 //
GE07hv_apppu:12794: tato yamas tu bhagavān āruhya mahiṣaṃ varam / HV_App.I,31.927 /
GE07hv_apppu:12795: kiṃ karaiś ca svayaṃ sākṣād āyayau nagam uttamam // HV_App.I,31.928 //
GE07hv_apppu:12796: pracetā haṃsam āruhya vāruṇaiś ca samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.929 /
GE07hv_apppu:12798: yayau kailāsaśikharaṃ draṣṭuṃ keśavam añjasā // HV_App.I,31.931 //
GE07hv_apppu:12799: anye 'pi ca tathā devā ādityā vasavas tathā / HV_App.I,31.932 /
GE07hv_apppu:12800: rudrāś caiva tathā rājan draṣṭuṃ keśavam āyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.933 //
GE07hv_apppu:12801: siddhāś ca munayaś caiva gandharvā yakṣakiṃnarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.934 /
GE07hv_apppu:12803: tato devagaṇaḥ sarvaḥ kailāsaṃ samapadyata / HV_App.I,31.936 /
GE07hv_apppu:12804: parvato nāradaś caiva tathānye munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.937 /
GE07hv_apppu:12807: ko nv atra vismayo bhūyād iti te menire gaṇāḥ / **HV_App.I,31.938**9:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:12808: āścaryaṃ khalu paśyadhvaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,31.939 /
GE07hv_apppu:12809: yogidhyeyaḥ svayaṃ kṛṣṇo yat tapyati guruḥ svayam / HV_App.I,31.940 /
GE07hv_apppu:12810: ko nv atra samayo bhūyād iti te menire gaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,31.941 //
GE07hv_apppu:12816: priyeṇa sakhyā prabhur īśvaraḥ śivaḥ / HV_App.I,31.947 /
GE07hv_apppu:12818: śarī ca khaḍgī śaśiśekharaḥ śivaḥ // HV_App.I,31.949 //
GE07hv_apppu:12822: śūlaṃ ca bibhrann apareṇa bāhunā // HV_App.I,31.953 //
GE07hv_apppu:12830: tāṃ cāpi vīkṣan bahuśas tadā śivaḥ // HV_App.I,31.961 //
GE07hv_apppu:12834: draṣṭuṃ hariṃ keśavam abhyayāc chivaḥ // HV_App.I,31.965 //
GE07hv_apppu:12835: yam āhur agryaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntaṃ @ HV_App.I,31.966 @
GE07hv_apppu:12839: yam āhur ekaṃ puruṣaṃ purātanaṃ @ HV_App.I,31.970 @
GE07hv_apppu:12841: dakṣasya jajñaṃ vinihatya yo vai @ HV_App.I,31.972 @
GE07hv_apppu:12842: vināśya devāṃś ca purā purātanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.973 //
GE07hv_apppu:12843: yaṃ vidur bhūtatattvajñaṃ bhūtaṃ bhuteśabhāvanam / HV_App.I,31.974 /
GE07hv_apppu:12844: vāmadevaṃ virūpākṣam āhus tattvavido janāḥ // HV_App.I,31.975 //
GE07hv_apppu:12846: rudraṃ rodananāmānam āhur viśveśvaraṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.977 //
GE07hv_apppu:12847: aprameyam anādhāram āhur māheśvarā janāḥ / HV_App.I,31.978 /
GE07hv_apppu:12848: nagnaṃ nagnaparītaṃ tu nāginaṃ nagnavarcasam / HV_App.I,31.979 /
GE07hv_apppu:12849: āhur viśveśvaraṃ śāntaṃ śivam ādiṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,31.980 //
GE07hv_apppu:12850: tasya mūrtir imāḥ sarvā dharādyāḥ sakalā nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.981 //
GE07hv_apppu:12851: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ sūryaś ca tathā śaśī / HV_App.I,31.982 /
GE07hv_apppu:12852: agniś ca yajamānaś ca prakṛtiś caivam aṣṭadhā // HV_App.I,31.983 //
GE07hv_apppu:12855: draṣṭuṃ viśveśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ bhūtasaṃghaiḥ samāyayau // HV_App.I,31.986 //
GE07hv_apppu:12864: tribāhuḥ pañcabāhuś ca vyāghravaktraḥ sitānanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.993 //
GE07hv_apppu:12865: ete cānye ca bahavo dīrghāsyā dīrghalocanāḥ / HV_App.I,31.994 /
GE07hv_apppu:12866: nṛtyantaḥ prahasantaś ca sphoṭayantaḥ parasparam // HV_App.I,31.995 //
GE07hv_apppu:12867: tathānye ghorarūpāś ca tathānye vikṛtānanāḥ / HV_App.I,31.996 /
GE07hv_apppu:12869: śavāni subahūny āśu bhakṣayantas tatas tataḥ / HV_App.I,31.998 /
GE07hv_apppu:12870: pibanto rudhiraṃ ghoraṃ khaṇḍayantaḥ śavaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.999 //
GE07hv_apppu:12872: nagnāś caiva sacīrāś ca śūlāgraprotamānuṣāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1001 //
GE07hv_apppu:12874: ḍiṇḍibhair aṭṭahāsaiś ca nādayanto vasuṃdharām / HV_App.I,31.1003 /
GE07hv_apppu:12875: kapālino bhairavāś ca jaṭilā muṇḍinas tathā / HV_App.I,31.1004 /
GE07hv_apppu:12876: evaṃ bahuvidhā ghorāḥ piśācā vikṛtānanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1005 //
GE07hv_apppu:12877: tathānye munivīrāś ca dhyāyantaḥ parameśvaram / HV_App.I,31.1006 /
GE07hv_apppu:12878: paṭhanto vedaśāstrāṇi sāṅgāni vividhāni ca // HV_App.I,31.1007 //
GE07hv_apppu:12881: stuvantaḥ śaṃkaraṃ bhaktyā stotrair māheśvarais tatha / HV_App.I,31.1010 /
GE07hv_apppu:12882: ekatra te munigaṇā aparatra gaṇās tathā // HV_App.I,31.1011 //
GE07hv_apppu:12883: anyatra siddhagandharvāḥ priyābhiḥ saha saṃgatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1012 /
GE07hv_apppu:12884: nṛtyanti nṛtyakuśalā gāyanti sma ca kanyakāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1013 //
GE07hv_apppu:12885: vidyādharās tathānyatra stuvantaḥ śaṃkaraṃ śivam / HV_App.I,31.1014 /
GE07hv_apppu:12886: nanṛtus tasya purato gacchanto 'psarasāṃ gaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1015 //
GE07hv_apppu:12887: evam etair mahāghoraiḥ piśācair bhūtakiṃnaraiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1016 /
GE07hv_apppu:12888: munibhiś cāpsarobhiś ca samaṃ śarvaḥ samāyayau // HV_App.I,31.1017 //
GE07hv_apppu:12889: yatra viśveśvaro viṣṇus tapas tepe sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,31.1018 /
GE07hv_apppu:12890: yatra te lokapālāś ca tiṣṭhanti sma didṛkṣayā / HV_App.I,31.1019 /
GE07hv_apppu:12893: jaṭī ca sākṣāt praṇavātmakaḥ kṛtī / HV_App.I,31.1022 /
GE07hv_apppu:12898: evaṃ bahuvidhair bhūtaiḥ piśācair uragaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.1025 /
GE07hv_apppu:12899: āgatya bhagavān rudraḥ śaṃkaro vṛṣavāhanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1026 //
GE07hv_apppu:12900: dadarśa viṣṇuṃ deveśaṃ tapantaṃ tapa uttamam / HV_App.I,31.1027 /
GE07hv_apppu:12901: juhvānam agniṃ vidhivad dhavyair medhyair jagatpatim // HV_App.I,31.1028 //
GE07hv_apppu:12905: indrādyair devasaṃghaiś ca vṛtaṃ munigaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.1032 /
GE07hv_apppu:12906: acintyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhyāyantaṃ kim api prabhum // HV_App.I,31.1033 //
GE07hv_apppu:12907: avaruhya vṛṣāc charvo bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1034 /
GE07hv_apppu:12908: tataḥ prītaḥ prasannātmā lalāṭākṣa umāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1035 /
GE07hv_apppu:12909: tato bhūtapiśācāś ca rākṣasā guhyakās tathā / HV_App.I,31.1036 /
GE07hv_apppu:12910: munayo vipravaryāś ca jayaśabdaṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,31.1037 //
GE07hv_apppu:12911: jaya deva jagannātha jaya rudra janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1038 /
GE07hv_apppu:12912: jaya viṣṇo hṛṣīkeśa nārāyaṇa parāyaṇa // HV_App.I,31.1039 //
GE07hv_apppu:12913: jaya rudra purāṇātmañ jaya deva hareśvara / HV_App.I,31.1040 /
GE07hv_apppu:12914: ādideva jagannātha jaya śaṃkara bhāvana // HV_App.I,31.1041 //
GE07hv_apppu:12916: jaya cakragadāpāṇe jaya śūliṃs trilocana // HV_App.I,31.1043 //
GE07hv_apppu:12918: iti te munayaḥ sarve praṇāmaṃ cakrire harim // HV_App.I,31.1045 //
GE07hv_apppu:12919: tata utthāya bhagavān dṛṣṭvā devam avasthitam / HV_App.I,31.1046 /
GE07hv_apppu:12921: tato hṛṣṭamanā viśṇus tuṣṭāva haram īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.1048 //
GE07hv_apppu:12923: namas te śitikaṇṭhāya nīlagrīvāya vedhase / HV_App.I,31.1049 /
GE07hv_apppu:12924: namas te astu śociṣe namas te upavāsine // HV_App.I,31.1050 //
GE07hv_apppu:12925: namas te astu mīḍhuṣe nams te gadine hara / HV_App.I,31.1051 /
GE07hv_apppu:12926: namas te viśvamūrtaye vṛṣāya vṛṣarūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1052 //
GE07hv_apppu:12929: amūrtāya ca devāya namas te 'stu pinākine / HV_App.I,31.1053 /
GE07hv_apppu:12932: [k: The *--passage after line 1233 is also numbered as *11/ :k]
GE07hv_apppu:12933: nāmaḥ kubjāya kūpāya śivāya śivarūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1054 //
GE07hv_apppu:12934: namas tuṇḍāya tuṣṭāya namas tuṭituṭāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1055 /
GE07hv_apppu:12935: namaḥ śivāya śāntāya giriśāya ca te namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1056 //
GE07hv_apppu:12936: namo harāya hiprāya namo hariharāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1057 /
GE07hv_apppu:12938: namo 'ghaṇṭāya ghaṇṭāya namo ghaṭighaṭāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1059 /
GE07hv_apppu:12939: namaḥ śarvāya śāntāya bhūtādhipataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1060 //
GE07hv_apppu:12940: namo namo virūpāya purāya purahāriṇe / HV_App.I,31.1061 /
GE07hv_apppu:12941: nama ādyāya bījāya śucaye bhasmarūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1062 //
GE07hv_apppu:12943: namas te khaṭvahastāya namas te kṛttivāsase // HV_App.I,31.1064 //
GE07hv_apppu:12944: namas te vāmadevāya nama ākāśamūrtaye / HV_App.I,31.1065 /
GE07hv_apppu:12945: harāya harirūpāya namas te tigmatejase // HV_App.I,31.1066 //
GE07hv_apppu:12948: namaś candrāya devāya sūryāya ca namo namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1069 /
GE07hv_apppu:12949: namaḥ pradhānadevāya bhūtānāṃ pataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1070 //
GE07hv_apppu:12951: ajāya ca namas tubhyaṃ bhūtabhāvana bhāvana // HV_App.I,31.1072 //
GE07hv_apppu:12952: namo 'stu harikeśāya piṅgalāya namo namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1073 /
GE07hv_apppu:12956: umāpate namas tubhyaṃ kailāsanilayāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1077 /
GE07hv_apppu:12959: tryambakāya namas tubhyaṃ tryakṣāya ca śivāya ca // HV_App.I,31.1080 //
GE07hv_apppu:12960: varadāya vareṇyāya namas te candraśekhara / HV_App.I,31.1081 /
GE07hv_apppu:12961: nama idhmāya haviṣe dhruvāya ca kuśāya ca // HV_App.I,31.1082 //
GE07hv_apppu:12962: namas te śatudyumnāya nāgapāśapriyāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1083 /
GE07hv_apppu:12967: virūpāya surūpāya mahāghorāya te namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1088 //
GE07hv_apppu:12971: bhūtāvāsa namas tubhyaṃ sarvāvāsa namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1092 //
GE07hv_apppu:12972: namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ namas te bhūtidāyine / HV_App.I,31.1093 /
GE07hv_apppu:12973: nams te vāmadevāya mahādevāya te namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1094 //
GE07hv_apppu:12974: kā nu vākstutirūpā te ko nu stotuṃ praśaknuyāt / HV_App.I,31.1095 /
GE07hv_apppu:12975: kasya vā sphurate jihvā stutau stutimatāṃ vara // HV_App.I,31.1096 //
GE07hv_apppu:12976: kṣamasva bhagavan deva bhakto 'haṃ dhyāhi māṃ hara / HV_App.I,31.1097 /
GE07hv_apppu:12977: sarvātman sarvabhūteśa dhyāhi māṃ satataṃ hara // HV_App.I,31.1098 //
GE07hv_apppu:12978: rakṣa deva jagannātha lokān sarvātmanā hara / HV_App.I,31.1099 /
GE07hv_apppu:12979: dhyāhi bhaktān sadā deva bhaktapriya sadā hara // HV_App.I,31.1100 //
GE07hv_apppu:12982: tato vṛṣadhvajo devaḥ śūlī sākṣād umāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1101 /
GE07hv_apppu:12983: karaṃ kareṇa saṃspṛśya viṣṇoś cakradharasya ha // HV_App.I,31.1102 //
GE07hv_apppu:12984: provāca bhagavān rudraḥ keśavaṃ garuḍadhvajam / HV_App.I,31.1103 /
GE07hv_apppu:12986: kim idaṃ devadeveśa cakrapāṇe janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1105 /
GE07hv_apppu:12987: tapaścaryā kim arthaṃ te prārthanā tava kā vibho / HV_App.I,31.1106 /
GE07hv_apppu:12988: svayaṃ viṣṇur bhavān nityas tapas tvaṃ tapasāṃ hare // HV_App.I,31.1107 //
GE07hv_apppu:12989: putrārthaṃ yadi te deva tapaścaryā janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1108 /
GE07hv_apppu:12990: putro datto mayā deva pūrvam eva jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.1109 //
GE07hv_apppu:12991: śṛṇu tatrāpi bhagavan kāraṇaṃ kāraṇātmaka // HV_App.I,31.1110 //
GE07hv_apppu:12992: tapaś cartuṃ pravṛtto 'ham kutaścit kāraṇād dhare / HV_App.I,31.1111 /
GE07hv_apppu:12993: varṣāyutaṃ mahāghoram purā kṛtayuge tadā // HV_App.I,31.1112 //
GE07hv_apppu:12994: bhavānī tatra me deva paricartuṃ tadābhavat / HV_App.I,31.1113 /
GE07hv_apppu:12995: pitrā niyuktā deveśa umaiṣā varavarṇinī / HV_App.I,31.1114 /
GE07hv_apppu:12996: bhīta indras tadā deva māraṃ māṃ praiṣayat tadā // HV_App.I,31.1115 //
GE07hv_apppu:12997: madhunā saha saṃyukto māro mām āgatas tadā / HV_App.I,31.1116 /
GE07hv_apppu:12998: lakṣyaṃ mām akarot tatra bāṇasya preṣitasya ha // HV_App.I,31.1117 //
GE07hv_apppu:12999: eṣā māṃ sevate tatra dānāt puṣpādinā hare // HV_App.I,31.1118 //
GE07hv_apppu:13000: tataḥ kruddho 'ham abhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā māraṃ tathāvidham / HV_App.I,31.1119 /
GE07hv_apppu:13001: krudhyato mama deveśa netrād agniḥ papāta ha // HV_App.I,31.1120 //
GE07hv_apppu:13002: so 'yam agnis tadā māraṃ bhasmasāt kṛtavāṃs tadā / HV_App.I,31.1121 /
GE07hv_apppu:13003: acintayaṃ tadā viṣṇo śakrasyaitac cikīrṣitam // HV_App.I,31.1122 //
GE07hv_apppu:13004: tataḥprabhṛti deveśa dayā taṃ prati vartate / HV_App.I,31.1123 /
GE07hv_apppu:13005: brahmaṇā ca niyukto 'smi prītas tatra janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1124 //
GE07hv_apppu:13006: niyuktaḥ putrarūpeṇa sa te deva jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.1125 /
GE07hv_apppu:13007: jyeṣṭhas tava suto deva pradyumnety abhiviśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1126 //
GE07hv_apppu:13008: smaraṃ taṃ viddhi deveśa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / HV_App.I,31.1127 /
GE07hv_apppu:13009: ity uktvā punar āhedaṃ yāthātmyaṃ darśayann iva / HV_App.I,31.1128 /
GE07hv_apppu:13010: munīnāṃ śrotukāmānāṃ yāthātmyaṃ tatra sattama // HV_App.I,31.1129 //
GE07hv_apppu:13011: añjaliṃ saṃpuṭaṃ kṛtvā viṣṇum uddiśya śaṃkaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.1130 /
GE07hv_apppu:13012: umayā sārdham īśāno yāthātmyaṃ vaktum aihata // HV_App.I,31.1131 //
GE07hv_apppu:13013: hare kurvati tatraivam añjaliṃ kurusattama / HV_App.I,31.1132 /
GE07hv_apppu:13014: munayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca sahakiṃnarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1133 /
GE07hv_apppu:13015: añjaliṃ cakrire viṣṇau devadeveśvare harau // HV_App.I,31.1134 //
GE07hv_apppu:13017: yat tat kāraṇam āhus tat sāṃkhyāḥ prakṛtisaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,31.1135 /
GE07hv_apppu:13019: sattvaṃ rajas tamo viṣṇo jagadaṇḍaṃ janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1137 /
GE07hv_apppu:13020: tasya kāraṇam āhus tvāṃ sāṃkhyās tattvavido hare / HV_App.I,31.1138 /
GE07hv_apppu:13022: tato mahān samutpannaḥ prakṛtir yasya kāraṇam / HV_App.I,31.1140 /
GE07hv_apppu:13023: tasmāt tu mahato ghorād ahaṃkāro mahān abhūt / HV_App.I,31.1141 /
GE07hv_apppu:13024: sa tvam ādau jagannātha pariṇāmas tathā hi saḥ // HV_App.I,31.1142 //
GE07hv_apppu:13025: ahaṃkārāt prabho deva kāraṇāni mahānti ca / HV_App.I,31.1143 /
GE07hv_apppu:13026: tanmātrāṇi tathā pañca bhūtāni prabhavanty uta // HV_App.I,31.1144 //
GE07hv_apppu:13027: tāni tvām āhur īśānaṃ bhūtānīti jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.1145 /
GE07hv_apppu:13028: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam // HV_App.I,31.1146 //
GE07hv_apppu:13029: cakṣur ghrāṇaṃ tathā sparṣo rasanā śrotram eva ca / HV_App.I,31.1147 /
GE07hv_apppu:13030: manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathā deva prerakaṃ tatra tatra ha // HV_App.I,31.1148 //
GE07hv_apppu:13031: karmendriyāṇi cāpy āhuḥ pādādīni janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1149 /
GE07hv_apppu:13032: tvam eva tāni sarvāṇi karoṣi niyatātmavān // HV_App.I,31.1150 //
GE07hv_apppu:13033: sveṣu sveṣu jagannātha viṣayeṣu tathā hare / HV_App.I,31.1151 /
GE07hv_apppu:13035: yadā tvaṃ rajasā yuktas tadā bhūtāni sṛṣṭavān / HV_App.I,31.1153 /
GE07hv_apppu:13036: yadā ca sattvayukto 'si tadā pātā jagattrayam // HV_App.I,31.1154 //
GE07hv_apppu:13037: yadā te tama utkṛṣṭaṃ tadā saṃharase jagat / HV_App.I,31.1155 /
GE07hv_apppu:13038: tribhir eva guṇair yuktaḥ sṛṣṭirakṣāvināśane // HV_App.I,31.1156 //
GE07hv_apppu:13039: vartase vividhāṃ bhūtim ādāya niyatātmavān / HV_App.I,31.1157 /
GE07hv_apppu:13041: prāṇinām upabhogārtham antaḥ sthitvā jagadguro / HV_App.I,31.1159 /
GE07hv_apppu:13042: tasmāt sarvatra bhūteṣu vartase sarvago bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1160 //
GE07hv_apppu:13043: brahmā tvaṃ sṛṣṭikāle tu sthitau viṣṇur asi prabho / HV_App.I,31.1161 /
GE07hv_apppu:13044: saṃhāre rudranāmāsi tridhāmā tvam iti prabho // HV_App.I,31.1162 //
GE07hv_apppu:13045: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca / HV_App.I,31.1163 /
GE07hv_apppu:13046: etāḥ prakṛtayo deva bhinnāḥ sarvatra te hare // HV_App.I,31.1164 //
GE07hv_apppu:13049: bhūmiṃ sarvām imāṃ prāpya saptadvīpāṃ sasāgarām / HV_App.I,31.1167 /
GE07hv_apppu:13050: aṇuḥ sarvatrago bhūtvā atyatiṣṭhad daśāṅgulam // HV_App.I,31.1168 //
GE07hv_apppu:13051: tvam evedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yad bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,31.1169 /
GE07hv_apppu:13052: tvatto virāṭ prādur abhūt samrāṭ caiva janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1170 //
GE07hv_apppu:13053: tava vaktrāj jagannātha brāhmaṇo lokarakṣakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1171 /
GE07hv_apppu:13054: prādur āsīt purāṇātman ṣaṭkarmanirataḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.1172 //
GE07hv_apppu:13055: rājanyas tu tathā bāhvor āsīt saṃrakṣaṇe rataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1173 /
GE07hv_apppu:13056: ūrvor vaiśyas tathā viṣṇo pādāc chūdra udāhṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1174 /
GE07hv_apppu:13057: evaṃ varṇā jagannātha tava dehāt sanātanāt // HV_App.I,31.1175 //
GE07hv_apppu:13058: manasas tava deveśa candramāḥ samapadyata / HV_App.I,31.1176 /
GE07hv_apppu:13061: yasya bhāsā jagat sarvaṃ bhāsate bhānumānasau // HV_App.I,31.1179 //
GE07hv_apppu:13062: mukhād indraś cāgniś ca prāṇād vāyur ajāyata / HV_App.I,31.1180 /
GE07hv_apppu:13063: nābher antarikṣam utpannaṃ tava deva janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1181 //
GE07hv_apppu:13064: dyaur āsīt tu mahāghorā śirasas tava gopate / HV_App.I,31.1182 /
GE07hv_apppu:13065: padbhyāṃ bhūmiḥ samutpannā diśaḥ śrotrāj jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.1183 /
GE07hv_apppu:13066: evaṃ sṛṣṭvā jagat sarvaṃ vyāpya sarvaṃ vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1184 //
GE07hv_apppu:13067: vyāpya sarvān imāṃl lokān sthitaḥ sarvatra keśava / HV_App.I,31.1185 /
GE07hv_apppu:13068: tataś ca viṣṇunāmāsi dhātor vyāpteś ca darśanāt // HV_App.I,31.1186 //
GE07hv_apppu:13069: nārā āpaḥ samākhyātās tāsām ayanam āditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1187 /
GE07hv_apppu:13070: yatas tvaṃ bhūtabhavyeśa tan nārāyaṇaśabditaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1188 //
GE07hv_apppu:13071: vasanād devanād deva vāsudeveti śabditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1189 /
GE07hv_apppu:13072: harasi prāṇino deva tato harir iti smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1190 //
GE07hv_apppu:13073: śaṃ karoṣi sadā deva tataḥ śaṃkaranāmavān / HV_App.I,31.1191 /
GE07hv_apppu:13074: bṛhattvād bṛṃhaṇatvāc ca tasmād brahmeti śabditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1192 /
GE07hv_apppu:13076: hṛṣīkāṇīndriyāṇy āhus teṣām īśo yato bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1194 /
GE07hv_apppu:13077: hṛṣīkeśas tato viṣṇo khyāto vedeṣu paṭhyate // HV_App.I,31.1195 //
GE07hv_apppu:13078: ko brahmeti samākhyāta īśo 'haṃ sarvadehiṣu / HV_App.I,31.1196 /
GE07hv_apppu:13079: āvāṃ tavāṅge saṃbhūtau tataḥ keśavanāmavān // HV_App.I,31.1197 //
GE07hv_apppu:13080: mā vidyā ca hare proktā tasyā īśo yato bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1198 /
GE07hv_apppu:13081: tasmān mādhavanāmāsi dhavaḥ svāmīti śabditaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1199 //
GE07hv_apppu:13082: gaur eṣā tu yato vāṇī tāṃ ca veda yato bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1200 /
GE07hv_apppu:13083: govindas tu tato deva munibhiḥ kathyate bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1201 //
GE07hv_apppu:13084: trir ity eva trayo vedāḥ kīrtitā munisattamaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1202 /
GE07hv_apppu:13085: kramate tāṃs tathā sarvāṃs trivikrama iti smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1203 //
GE07hv_apppu:13087: mananān munir evāsi yamanād yatir ucyase // HV_App.I,31.1205 //
GE07hv_apppu:13088: apaś carasi yasmāt tvaṃ tapasvīti ca śabditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1206 /
GE07hv_apppu:13089: vasanti tvayi bhūtāni bhūtāvāsas tato hare // HV_App.I,31.1207 //
GE07hv_apppu:13090: īśas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānām īśvaro 'si tato hare / HV_App.I,31.1208 /
GE07hv_apppu:13091: praṇavaḥ sarvavedānāṃ gāyatrī chandasāṃ prabho // HV_App.I,31.1209 //
GE07hv_apppu:13092: akṣarāṇām akāras tvaṃ sphoṭas tvaṃ varṇasaṃśrayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1210 /
GE07hv_apppu:13093: rudrāṇām aham evāsmi vasūnāṃ pāvako bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1211 /
GE07hv_apppu:13094: ādityānāṃ bhavān viṣṇur indro deveśvaro bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1212 //
GE07hv_apppu:13095: aśvattho vṛkṣajātīnāṃ brahmā lokagurur bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1213 /
GE07hv_apppu:13096: merus tvaṃ parvatendrāṇāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ ca nāradaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1214 //
GE07hv_apppu:13097: dānavānāṃ bhavān daityaḥ prahrādo bhaktavatsala / HV_App.I,31.1215 /
GE07hv_apppu:13098: sarpāṇām eva sarveṣāṃ bhavān vāsukisaṃjñakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1216 //
GE07hv_apppu:13099: guhyakānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhavān dhanada eva ca / HV_App.I,31.1217 /
GE07hv_apppu:13100: varuṇo yādasāṃ rājā gaṅgā tripathagā bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1218 //
GE07hv_apppu:13101: ādis tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ madhyam antas tathā bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1219 /
GE07hv_apppu:13102: tvattaḥ samabhavad viśvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ pralīyate // HV_App.I,31.1220 //
GE07hv_apppu:13103: ahaṃ tvaṃ sarvago deva tvam evāhaṃ janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1221 /
GE07hv_apppu:13104: āvayor antaraṃ nāsti śabdair arthair jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.1222 //
GE07hv_apppu:13105: nāmāni tava govinda yāni loke mahānti ca / HV_App.I,31.1223 /
GE07hv_apppu:13106: tāny eva mama nāmāni nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.1224 //
GE07hv_apppu:13107: tvadupāsā jagannātha saivāstu mama gopate / HV_App.I,31.1225 /
GE07hv_apppu:13108: yaś ca tvāṃ dveṣṭi deveśa sa māṃ dveṣṭi na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1226 //
GE07hv_apppu:13109: tvadvistāro yato deva ahaṃ bhūtapatis tataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1227 /
GE07hv_apppu:13110: na tad asti vinā deva yat te virahitaṃ hare // HV_App.I,31.1228 //
GE07hv_apppu:13111: yad āsīd vartate yac ca yac ca bhāvi jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.1229 /
GE07hv_apppu:13112: sarvaṃ tvam eva deveśa vinā kiṃcit tvayā na hi // HV_App.I,31.1230 //
GE07hv_apppu:13113: stuvanti devāḥ satataṃ bhavantaṃ svair guṇaiḥ prabho / HV_App.I,31.1231 /
GE07hv_apppu:13114: ṛk ca tvaṃ yajur evāsi sāmāsi satataṃ vibho // HV_App.I,31.1232 //
GE07hv_apppu:13115: kiṃ ucyate mayā deva sarvaṃ tvaṃ bhūtabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1233 /
GE07hv_apppu:13117: namaḥ sarvātmane deva munīn āha punaḥ śivaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.1233**11:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:13118: evaṃ jānīta he viprā ye bhaktā draṣṭum āgatāḥ / **HV_App.I,31.1233**11:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:13119: etad eva paraṃ vastu naitasmāt param asti vaḥ // **HV_App.I,31.1233**11:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:13120: [k: This is a second occurrence of the reference *11. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:13121: namaḥ sarvātmane deva viṣṇo mādhava keśava // HV_App.I,31.1234 //
GE07hv_apppu:13122: namas karomi sarvātman namas te 'stu sadā hare / HV_App.I,31.1235 /
GE07hv_apppu:13123: namaḥ puṣkaranābhāya vande tvām aham īśvara // HV_App.I,31.1236 //
GE07hv_apppu:13126: ity uktvā devadeveśaṃ munīn āha punaḥ śivaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1237 /
GE07hv_apppu:13127: evaṃ jānīta he viprā ye bhaktā draṣṭum āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1238 //
GE07hv_apppu:13128: etad eva paraṃ vastu naitasmāt param asti vaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1239 /
GE07hv_apppu:13129: etad eva vijānīdhvam etad vaḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1240 //
GE07hv_apppu:13130: etad eva sadā viprā dhyeyaṃ prathatamānasaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1241 /
GE07hv_apppu:13131: etad vaḥ paramaṃ śreya etad vaḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1242 //
GE07hv_apppu:13132: etad vo janmanaḥ kṛtyam etad vas tapasaḥ phalam / HV_App.I,31.1243 /
GE07hv_apppu:13133: eṣa vaḥ puṇyanicaya eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1244 //
GE07hv_apppu:13134: eṣa vo mokṣavaśaga eṣa mārga udāhṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1245 /
GE07hv_apppu:13135: eṣa puṇyapradaḥ sākṣād etad vaḥ karmaṇāṃ phalam // HV_App.I,31.1246 //
GE07hv_apppu:13136: etad eva praśaṃsanti vidvāṃso brahmavādinaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1247 /
GE07hv_apppu:13137: eṣā trayīgatir viprāḥ prārthyā brahmavidāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,31.1248 //
GE07hv_apppu:13139: eṣa brahmavidāṃ mārgaḥ kathito vedavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1250 //
GE07hv_apppu:13140: evam eva vijānīta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / HV_App.I,31.1251 /
GE07hv_apppu:13141: harir ekaḥ sadā dhyeyo bhavadbhiḥ sattvasaṃsthitaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1252 //
GE07hv_apppu:13143: nānyo jagati devo 'sti viṣṇor nārāyaṇāt paraḥ / **HV_App.I,31.1252**12:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:13144: om ity evaṃ sadā viprāḥ paṭhadhvaṃ dhyāta keśavam / HV_App.I,31.1253 /
GE07hv_apppu:13145: tato niḥśreyasaprāptir bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1254 //
GE07hv_apppu:13146: evaṃ dhyāto hariḥ sākṣāt prasanno vo bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,31.1255 /
GE07hv_apppu:13147: bhavanāśam ayaṃ devaḥ kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1256 //
GE07hv_apppu:13148: sadā dhyāta hariṃ viprā yadīcchā prāptum īśvaram / HV_App.I,31.1257 /
GE07hv_apppu:13150: smaradhvaṃ sarvadā viṣṇuṃ paṭhadhvaṃ triśarīriṇam // HV_App.I,31.1259 //
GE07hv_apppu:13151: manaḥsaṃyamanaṃ viprāḥ kurudhvaṃ yatnataḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.1260 /
GE07hv_apppu:13153: dhyātvā māṃ sarvayatnena tato jānīta keśavam / HV_App.I,31.1262 /
GE07hv_apppu:13154: upāsyo 'yaṃ sadā viprā upāyo 'smi hare smṛtau // HV_App.I,31.1263 //
GE07hv_apppu:13155: upāyo 'yaṃ mayā prokto nātra saṃdeha ity api / HV_App.I,31.1264 /
GE07hv_apppu:13156: ayaṃ māyī sadā viprā yatadhvaṃ māyanāśane // HV_App.I,31.1265 //
GE07hv_apppu:13157: yathā vo buddhir akhilā śuddhā bhavati yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1266 /
GE07hv_apppu:13158: tathā kuruta viprendrā yathā devaḥ prasīdati // HV_App.I,31.1267 //
GE07hv_apppu:13159: evam uktās tataḥ sarve yatayaḥ puṇyaśālinaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1268 /
GE07hv_apppu:13161: yathāvad upagṛhṇānā nirastāḥ saṃśayān nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1269 //
GE07hv_apppu:13162: evam eveti te viprāḥ prāhuḥ prāñjalayo haram / HV_App.I,31.1270 /
GE07hv_apppu:13163: chinno naḥ saṃśayaḥ sarvo gṛhīto 'rthaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1271 //
GE07hv_apppu:13164: etadarthaṃ samāyātā vayam adya tavālayam / HV_App.I,31.1272 /
GE07hv_apppu:13165: saṃgamād yuvayoḥ sarvo naṣṭo moho mahān iha / HV_App.I,31.1273 /
GE07hv_apppu:13166: yathā vadasi deveśa tathā naḥ śreyase param // HV_App.I,31.1274 //
GE07hv_apppu:13167: yathāha bhagavān rudro yatāmaḥ satataṃ harau / HV_App.I,31.1275 /
GE07hv_apppu:13168: iti te munayaḥ prītāḥ praṇemuḥ keśavaṃ harim // HV_App.I,31.1276 //
GE07hv_apppu:13171: tataḥ sa bhagavān rudraḥ sarvān vismāpayann iva / HV_App.I,31.1277 /
GE07hv_apppu:13172: stutyā pracakrame stotuṃ viṣṇuṃ viśveśvaraṃ harim / HV_App.I,31.1278 /
GE07hv_apppu:13173: arthyābhiḥ śrutiyuktābhir munīnāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ tadā // HV_App.I,31.1279 //
GE07hv_apppu:13174: namo bhagavate tubhyaṃ vāsudevāya dhīmate / HV_App.I,31.1280 /
GE07hv_apppu:13175: yasya bhāsā jagat sarvaṃ bhāsate nityam acyuta / HV_App.I,31.1281 /
GE07hv_apppu:13176: namo bhagavate deva nityaṃ sūryātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1282 //
GE07hv_apppu:13177: yaḥ śītayati śītāṃśur lokān sarvān imān prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,31.1283 /
GE07hv_apppu:13178: namas te viṣṇave deva tubhyaṃ somātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1284 //
GE07hv_apppu:13179: yaḥ prajāḥ prāṇayaty eko viśvātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1285 /
GE07hv_apppu:13180: namaḥ sarvātmane deva namo vāyvātmane hare // HV_App.I,31.1286 //
GE07hv_apppu:13181: yo dadhāra kareṇāsau kuśacīrādi yat sadā / HV_App.I,31.1287 /
GE07hv_apppu:13182: dadhāra vedān sarvāṃś ca tubhyaṃ brahmātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1288 //
GE07hv_apppu:13183: sarvān saṃharate yas tu saṃhāre viśvadṛk sadā / HV_App.I,31.1289 /
GE07hv_apppu:13184: krodhātmā viśvarūpo 'si tubhyaṃ rudrātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1290 //
GE07hv_apppu:13185: sṛṣṭau sraṣṭā samastānāṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇadāyine / HV_App.I,31.1291 /
GE07hv_apppu:13186: ajāya viṣṇave tubhyaṃ sraṣṭre viśvasṛje namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1292 //
GE07hv_apppu:13187: ādau prakṛtimūlāya bhūtānāṃ prabhavāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1293 /
GE07hv_apppu:13188: namas te devadeveśa pradhānāya namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1294 //
GE07hv_apppu:13189: pṛthivyāṃ gandharūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ prāṇināṃ hare / HV_App.I,31.1295 /
GE07hv_apppu:13190: dṛḍhāya dṛḍharūpāya tubhyaṃ gandhātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1296 //
GE07hv_apppu:13191: apāṃ rasāya sarvatra prāṇināṃ sukhahetave / HV_App.I,31.1297 /
GE07hv_apppu:13192: namas te viśvarūpāya rasāya ca namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1298 //
GE07hv_apppu:13193: tejasā bhāsvaro yas tu guṇo jantuhitaḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.1299 /
GE07hv_apppu:13194: tasmai deva jagannātha namo bhāsvararūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1300 //
GE07hv_apppu:13195: vāyoḥ sparśo guṇo yatra śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkhadaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1301 /
GE07hv_apppu:13196: namas te vāyurūpāya namaḥ sparśātmane hare // HV_App.I,31.1302 //
GE07hv_apppu:13198: namas te bhagavan viṣṇo tubhyaṃ śabdātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1304 //
GE07hv_apppu:13199: yo dadhāra jagat sarvaṃ māyāmānuṣadehavān / HV_App.I,31.1305 /
GE07hv_apppu:13201: nama ādyāya bījāya nirguṇāya guṇātmane / HV_App.I,31.1307 /
GE07hv_apppu:13202: acintyāya sucintyāya tasmai cintyātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1308 //
GE07hv_apppu:13204: namo brahmavide tubhyaṃ brahmabrahmātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1310 //
GE07hv_apppu:13207: viśvāya viśvarūpāya viśvakartre namo namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1313 /
GE07hv_apppu:13208: viśvahartre namo nityaṃ bhūtāvāsa namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1314 //
GE07hv_apppu:13211: agnaye 'gnipate tubhyaṃ jyotiṣāṃ pataye namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1317 /
GE07hv_apppu:13212: namaḥ sūryāya bhadrāya tejasāṃ pataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1318 //
GE07hv_apppu:13213: namaḥ somāya saumyāya namaḥ śītātmane hare / HV_App.I,31.1319 /
GE07hv_apppu:13217: namo yajñāya ījyāya haviṣe havyasaṃskṛte / HV_App.I,31.1321 /
GE07hv_apppu:13218: namaḥ sruvāya pātrāya yajñāṅgāya parāya ca // HV_App.I,31.1322 //
GE07hv_apppu:13219: namaḥ praṇavadehāya kṣarāyāpy akṣarāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1323 /
GE07hv_apppu:13223: gadine khaḍgine tubhyaṃ śaṅkhine cakriṇe namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1325 /
GE07hv_apppu:13224: śūline carmiṇe nityaṃ varadāya namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1326 //
GE07hv_apppu:13225: buddhapriyāya buddhāya prabuddhāya sukhāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1327 /
GE07hv_apppu:13226: haraye viṣṇave tubhyaṃ namaḥ sarvātmane guro // HV_App.I,31.1328 //
GE07hv_apppu:13227: namas te sarvalokeśa sarvakartre namo namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1329 /
GE07hv_apppu:13228: namaḥ svabhāvaśuddhāya namas te yajñasūkara // HV_App.I,31.1330 //
GE07hv_apppu:13229: namo viṣṇo namo viṣṇo namo viṣṇo namo hare / HV_App.I,31.1331 /
GE07hv_apppu:13230: namas te vāsudevāya vāsudevāya dhīmate // HV_App.I,31.1332 //
GE07hv_apppu:13231: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya kṛṣṇāya sarvāvāsa namo namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1333 /
GE07hv_apppu:13232: namo bhūyo namas te 'stu pāhi lokāñ janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1334 //
GE07hv_apppu:13233: iti stutvā jagannātham uvāca munisattamān / HV_App.I,31.1335 /
GE07hv_apppu:13234: idaṃ stotram adhīyānā nityaṃ vrajata keśavam / HV_App.I,31.1336 /
GE07hv_apppu:13235: śaraṇyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tatra śreyo vidhāsyati // HV_App.I,31.1337 //
GE07hv_apppu:13236: ye cemaṃ dhārayiṣyanti stavaṃ pāpavimocanam / HV_App.I,31.1338 /
GE07hv_apppu:13237: teṣāṃ prītaḥ prasannātmā paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.1339 /
GE07hv_apppu:13238: śreyo dāsyati sarvātmā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.1340 //
GE07hv_apppu:13239: avaśyaṃ manasā dhyāta keśavaṃ bhaktavatsalam / HV_App.I,31.1341 /
GE07hv_apppu:13240: śreyaḥ prāptuṃ yadīcchanti bhavantaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1342 //
GE07hv_apppu:13241: ity uktvā bhagavān rudras tatraivāntaradhīyata / HV_App.I,31.1343 /
GE07hv_apppu:13242: sagaṇaḥ śaṃkaraḥ sākṣād umayā bhūtabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1344 //
GE07hv_apppu:13243: tatas te munayaḥ sarve parāṃ nirvṛtim āpnuyuḥ / HV_App.I,31.1345 /
GE07hv_apppu:13245: tam eva paramaṃ tattvaṃ matvā nārāyaṇaṃ harim / **HV_App.I,31.1345**15:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:13246: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā menire svakṛtārthatām // HV_App.I,31.1346 //
GE07hv_apppu:13247: lokapālās tadā viṣṇuṃ namaskṛtya hariṃ tadā / HV_App.I,31.1347 /
GE07hv_apppu:13248: jagmuḥ svānyatha veśmāni gaṇaiḥ sarvair nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.1348 //
GE07hv_apppu:13249: āruhya bhagavān viṣṇur garuḍaṃ pakṣipuṃgavam / HV_App.I,31.1349 /
GE07hv_apppu:13250: śaṅkhī cakrī gadī khaḍgī śārṅgī tūṇītalatravān // HV_App.I,31.1350 //
GE07hv_apppu:13251: yathāgataṃ jagannātho yayau badarikām anu / HV_App.I,31.1351 /
GE07hv_apppu:13253: tatra gatvā yathāyogaṃ viśramya harir īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.1353 /
GE07hv_apppu:13254: arcito munibhiḥ sarvair niṣasāda sukhāsane // HV_App.I,31.1354 //
GE07hv_apppu:13257: etasminn eva kāle tu pauṇḍro nṛpavaro nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.1355 /
GE07hv_apppu:13259: vṛṣṇiśatrus tadā rājā kṛṣṇadveṣṭā balāt tadā / HV_App.I,31.1357 /
GE07hv_apppu:13260: nṛpān sarvān samāhūya provāca nṛpasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,31.1358 //
GE07hv_apppu:13261: jitā ca pṛthivī sarvā jitāś ca nṛpasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1359 /
GE07hv_apppu:13262: vṛṣṇayas te balonmattāḥ kṛṣṇam āśritya garvitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1360 //
GE07hv_apppu:13263: na dāsyanti karaṃ sarve mama te kṛṣṇasaṃśrayāt / HV_App.I,31.1361 /
GE07hv_apppu:13264: sa tu kṛṣṇaś ca balavān mām avajñāya tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,31.1362 //
GE07hv_apppu:13265: ahaṃ cakrīti garvo 'bhūt tasya gopasya sarvadā / HV_App.I,31.1363 /
GE07hv_apppu:13266: śaṅkhī cakrī gadī śārṅgī tūṇīśarasahāyavān / HV_App.I,31.1364 /
GE07hv_apppu:13267: evamādir mahāgarvas tasya saṃprati vartate // HV_App.I,31.1365 //
GE07hv_apppu:13268: loke ca mama yan nāma vāsudeveti nityaśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1366 /
GE07hv_apppu:13269: agṛhṇān mama tan nāma gopo madabalānvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1367 //
GE07hv_apppu:13270: tasya cakrasya yac cakraṃ mamāpi niśitaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,31.1368 /
GE07hv_apppu:13271: garvahantṛ sadā tasya bali nāmnā sudarśanam // HV_App.I,31.1369 //
GE07hv_apppu:13272: sahasrāraṃ mahāghoraṃ tasya cakrasya nāśanam / HV_App.I,31.1370 /
GE07hv_apppu:13273: anena mahatā cakraṃ gopakasya nṛpottamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1371 //
GE07hv_apppu:13274: mamāpy etad dhanur divyaṃ śārṅgaṃ nāma mahāvaram / HV_App.I,31.1372 /
GE07hv_apppu:13275: nāśayāmi na saṃdehaś cakraṃ tasya yad adbhutam // HV_App.I,31.1373 //
GE07hv_apppu:13276: pāñcajanyo mahāśaṅkho mahānādaḥ sadā babhau / HV_App.I,31.1374 /
GE07hv_apppu:13277: tasya śaṅkhasya jetāsau paśyadhvaṃ nṛpasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1375 //
GE07hv_apppu:13278: gadā kaumodakī nāma mameyaṃ mahatī dṛḍhā / HV_App.I,31.1376 /
GE07hv_apppu:13280: khaḍgo nandakanāmāsau mamāyaṃ vipulo dṛḍhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1378 /
GE07hv_apppu:13281: antakasyāntako ghoras tasya khaḍgasya nāśakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1379 //
GE07hv_apppu:13282: tataś cāhaṃ gadī khaḍgī śārṅgī cakrī talatravān / HV_App.I,31.1380 /
GE07hv_apppu:13283: yudhi jetāsmi kṛṣṇasya nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.1381 //
GE07hv_apppu:13284: māṃ ca brūta nṛpāś caivaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.1382 /
GE07hv_apppu:13285: śaṅkhinaṃ śārṅgiṇaṃ vīraṃ brūta nityaṃ nṛpottamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1383 /
GE07hv_apppu:13286: vāsudeveti māṃ brūta na tu gopaṃ yadūttamam // HV_App.I,31.1384 //
GE07hv_apppu:13287: eko 'haṃ vāsudevo hi hatvā taṃ gopadārakam / HV_App.I,31.1385 /
GE07hv_apppu:13288: sakhyur mama nihantāraṃ narakasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1386 //
GE07hv_apppu:13289: māṃ tathā yadi na brūta daṇḍyā bhāraṃ śataṃ śatam / HV_App.I,31.1387 /
GE07hv_apppu:13290: suvarṇasya ca niṣkasya dhānyānāṃ bahuśas tathā // HV_App.I,31.1388 //
GE07hv_apppu:13291: tathā bruvati rājendre manasā duḥsahaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,31.1389 /
GE07hv_apppu:13293: rasajñā balavīryasya keśavasya sadā nṛpāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1391 //
GE07hv_apppu:13294: apare tu nṛpā rājann evam eveti cukruśuḥ / HV_App.I,31.1392 /
GE07hv_apppu:13295: anye balamadotsiktā jeṣyāmaḥ keśavaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,31.1393 //
GE07hv_apppu:13299: nāradaḥ sarvalokajñaḥ pauṇḍrasya nagaraṃ prati // HV_App.I,31.1395 //
GE07hv_apppu:13301: dvāḥsthena ca samājñaptaḥ praviveśa gṛhottamam // HV_App.I,31.1397 //
GE07hv_apppu:13304: kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭavān bhūyo nṛpasya munisattamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1400 /
GE07hv_apppu:13305: uvāca nāradaṃ bhūyaḥ pauṇḍrako balagarvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1401 //
GE07hv_apppu:13306: bhavān sarvatra kuśalaḥ sarvakāryeṣu paṇḍitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1402 /
GE07hv_apppu:13308: sarvatrago nirābādho gantā sarvatra sarvadā / HV_App.I,31.1404 /
GE07hv_apppu:13309: agamyaṃ tava viprendra brahmāṇḍe 'tra na kiṃcana // HV_App.I,31.1405 //
GE07hv_apppu:13310: nāradaivaṃ vada tvaṃ hi yatra yatra gataḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.1406 /
GE07hv_apppu:13311: tatra tatra tapaḥsiddho loke prathitavīryavān // HV_App.I,31.1407 //
GE07hv_apppu:13312: pauṇḍra eva balī khyāto vāsudeveti śabditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1408 /
GE07hv_apppu:13313: śaṅkhī cakrī gadī śārṅgī khaḍgī tūṇītalatravān // HV_App.I,31.1409 //
GE07hv_apppu:13314: vijetā rājasiṃhānāṃ dātā dānasya sarvadā / HV_App.I,31.1410 /
GE07hv_apppu:13315: bhoktā rājyasya sarvasya śāstā rājñāṃ balād balī / HV_App.I,31.1411 /
GE07hv_apppu:13316: ajeyaḥ śatrusainyānāṃ rakṣitā svajanasya ha // HV_App.I,31.1412 //
GE07hv_apppu:13318: tasya vīryabale na sto nāmnaś ca mama dhāraṇe // HV_App.I,31.1414 //
GE07hv_apppu:13319: sa hi gopo vṛthā bālyād dhārayaty eva nāma me / HV_App.I,31.1415 /
GE07hv_apppu:13320: idaṃ niścinu viprendra eka eva bhavāmy aham // HV_App.I,31.1416 //
GE07hv_apppu:13321: vāsudevo jagaty asmin nirjitya balinaṃ yadum / HV_App.I,31.1417 /
GE07hv_apppu:13322: vṛṣṇīn sarvān balāj jitvā nirdahiṣye ca tāṃ purīṃ // HV_App.I,31.1418 //
GE07hv_apppu:13323: dvārakāṃ vṛṣṇinilayāṃ yoddhā cāhaṃ mahāmate / HV_App.I,31.1419 /
GE07hv_apppu:13324: ete ca balinaḥ sarve nṛpā mama samāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1420 //
GE07hv_apppu:13325: aśvāś ca veginaḥ santi rathā vāyujavā mama / HV_App.I,31.1421 /
GE07hv_apppu:13326: nāgā mattāḥ sahasraṃ ca śataṃ niyutam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.1422 //
GE07hv_apppu:13327: etenaiva balenājau haniṣye keśavaṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,31.1423 /
GE07hv_apppu:13328: tasmād evaṃ sadā vipra vada brahman pure mama // HV_App.I,31.1424 //
GE07hv_apppu:13329: indrasyāpi sadā vipra vada nārada sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,31.1425 /
GE07hv_apppu:13330: prārthanaiṣā mama vibho namasye tvāṃ tapodhana // HV_App.I,31.1426 //
GE07hv_apppu:13332: sarvatragaḥ sadā cāsmi yāvad brahmāṇḍasaṃsthitiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1427 /
GE07hv_apppu:13333: avāryaḥ sarvalokeṣu gamane kenacin nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1428 //
GE07hv_apppu:13334: kiṃ tu vaktuṃ tathā rājan notsahe nṛpasattama / HV_App.I,31.1429 /
GE07hv_apppu:13335: mahīṃ śāsati deveśe cakrapāṇau janārdane // HV_App.I,31.1430 //
GE07hv_apppu:13336: viṣṇau sarvatrage deve duṣṭān hatvā sabāndhavān / HV_App.I,31.1431 /
GE07hv_apppu:13337: vāsudeveti ko nāma tiṣṭhaty asmin harāv iti / HV_App.I,31.1432 /
GE07hv_apppu:13338: ko nāma vaktum evaṃ hi kṛṣṇe śāsati gopatau // HV_App.I,31.1433 //
GE07hv_apppu:13339: ajñānād vaktum evaṃ cet samarthaḥ prākṛto janaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1434 /
GE07hv_apppu:13340: hariḥ sarvatrago viṣṇur darpaṃ te vyaneṣyati // HV_App.I,31.1435 //
GE07hv_apppu:13342: ādidevaḥ purāṇātmā darpaṃ te vyapaneṣyati // HV_App.I,31.1437 //
GE07hv_apppu:13343: hāsyam etan mahārājan yac cakraṃ tava saṃsthitam / HV_App.I,31.1438 /
GE07hv_apppu:13344: śārṅgaṃ śaṅkhaṃ tathā rājan gadā ghoratarā hi te / HV_App.I,31.1439 /
GE07hv_apppu:13345: atīva hāsakālo 'yaṃ tava saṃprati vartate // HV_App.I,31.1440 //
GE07hv_apppu:13348: tataḥ kruddho mahārāja pauṇḍro balamadānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1441 /
GE07hv_apppu:13349: nāradaṃ vipravaryaṃ taṃ provāca nṛpasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,31.1442 //
GE07hv_apppu:13350: mā maivaṃ vada devarṣe rājāhaṃ vijayī sadā / HV_App.I,31.1443 /
GE07hv_apppu:13351: gaccha tvaṃ kāmam adyaiva muniḥ śāpapradaḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.1444 /
GE07hv_apppu:13352: bhītas tvatto mahābuddhe gaccha tvaṃ kāmam atra ha // HV_App.I,31.1445 //
GE07hv_apppu:13353: ity ukto nṛpavīryeṇa tūṣṇīm eva sa nāradaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1446 /
GE07hv_apppu:13355: sa gatvā viṣṇusakāśaṃ viṣṇoḥ sarvaṃ śaśaṃsa ha // HV_App.I,31.1448 //
GE07hv_apppu:13356: tac chrutvā bhagavān viṣṇur yatheṣṭaṃ vadatām iti / HV_App.I,31.1449 /
GE07hv_apppu:13358: ity uktvā virarāmaiva tasmin badarikāśrame // HV_App.I,31.1451 //
GE07hv_apppu:13359: tataḥ pauṇḍro mahāvīryo balair bahubhir īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.1452 /
GE07hv_apppu:13360: aśvair anekasāhasrair gajair bahubhir anvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1453 //
GE07hv_apppu:13364: aṣṭau hayasahasrāṇi nāgānāṃ niyutaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.1457 /
GE07hv_apppu:13365: prayutaṃ pattisāhasraṃ tad balaṃ samapadyata // HV_App.I,31.1458 //
GE07hv_apppu:13366: etena tu balenājau prasphuran nṛpasattama / HV_App.I,31.1459 /
GE07hv_apppu:13367: virarāja mahārāja udayastho yathā raviḥ // HV_App.I,31.1460 //
GE07hv_apppu:13368: yayau madhyamarātreṇa nagarīṃ dvārakām anu / HV_App.I,31.1461 /
GE07hv_apppu:13369: pattayo dīpikāhastā rātrau mahati dāruṇe // HV_App.I,31.1462 //
GE07hv_apppu:13372: rathaṃ mahāntam āruhya śastraughaiś ca samanvitam / HV_App.I,31.1465 /
GE07hv_apppu:13379: gṛhītadīpiko rājā vīryavān balavān nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.1472 /
GE07hv_apppu:13380: hantum aicchaj jagannāthaṃ vṛṣṇīṃś caiva samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1473 //
GE07hv_apppu:13381: ākarṣan balamukhyāṃs tān rājñaḥ sarvān mahādyutiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1474 /
GE07hv_apppu:13382: pūrvadvāraṃ samāgamya balaṃ saṃsthāpya yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1475 /
GE07hv_apppu:13383: idaṃ provāca rājā tu nṛpān sarvān avasthitān // HV_App.I,31.1476 //
GE07hv_apppu:13384: tāḍyatām atra bherī tu nāma viśrāvya māmakam / HV_App.I,31.1477 /
GE07hv_apppu:13385: yudhyatāṃ yudhyatām atra deyaṃ vā pratidīyatām // HV_App.I,31.1478 //
GE07hv_apppu:13388: iti te preṣitāḥ sarve samāghnaṃs tūryakān bahūn / HV_App.I,31.1481 /
GE07hv_apppu:13389: dīpikāś ca pradīpyante bahvyaḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1482 //
GE07hv_apppu:13390: itaś cetaś ca rājāno vartante yuddhalālasāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1483 /
GE07hv_apppu:13391: purīṃ te paritas tasthuḥ kṣatriyāḥ śastriṇas tathā // HV_App.I,31.1484 //
GE07hv_apppu:13393: kuto nu vṛṣṇipravaraḥ kuto rājā jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1486 //
GE07hv_apppu:13394: kutaś ca sātyakir vīraḥ kuto hārdikya eva ca / HV_App.I,31.1487 /
GE07hv_apppu:13395: kuto nu balabhadraś ca sarvayādavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1488 /
GE07hv_apppu:13396: ity evaṃ kathayanto vai rājānaḥ sarva eva tu // HV_App.I,31.1489 //
GE07hv_apppu:13398: śarāṃś ca cāpāni mahānti sarve / HV_App.I,31.1491 /
GE07hv_apppu:13403: tataś ca yādavāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā sainikasaṃcayam / HV_App.I,31.1494 /
GE07hv_apppu:13409: sātyakir balabhadraś ca hārdikyo niśaṭhas tathā / HV_App.I,31.1500 /
GE07hv_apppu:13411: anye ca yādavāḥ sarve kavacapragrahe ratāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1502 /
GE07hv_apppu:13413: khaḍginaḥ śastriṇaś caiva sarve śastrasamākulāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1504 /
GE07hv_apppu:13415: rathino gajinaś caiva sādinaḥ sāyudhās tathā / HV_App.I,31.1506 /
GE07hv_apppu:13417: niryayur nagarāt tūrṇaṃ dīpikābhiḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1508 /
GE07hv_apppu:13418: kutaḥ pauṇḍraka ity eva bruvantaḥ sarvasātvatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1509 //
GE07hv_apppu:13420: tato vitimiro deśaḥ samantāt pratyapadyata / HV_App.I,31.1511 /
GE07hv_apppu:13421: yuddhaṃ samabhavad ghoraṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ kṣatriyaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,31.1512 //
GE07hv_apppu:13422: tato mahān samabhavat saṃnādo lomaharṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1513 /
GE07hv_apppu:13423: hayā hayaiḥ samāyuktāḥ gajāś ca rathayūthapaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1514 //
GE07hv_apppu:13424: rathā rathaiḥ samāyuktāḥ sādinaḥ sādibhis tathā / HV_App.I,31.1515 /
GE07hv_apppu:13425: khaḍgibhiḥ khaḍgino rājan gadibhir gadinas tathā // HV_App.I,31.1516 //
GE07hv_apppu:13429: nighnataitān ity avocan vṛṣṇayaḥ sarvato nṛpān // HV_App.I,31.1520 //
GE07hv_apppu:13430: ayam eṣa mahābāhuḥ khaḍgī patati vīryavān / HV_App.I,31.1521 /
GE07hv_apppu:13431: ayam eṣa śarī ghoro vartate naḥ sudāruṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1522 /
GE07hv_apppu:13432: gadī cāyaṃ mahāvīryaḥ sarvān no bādhate nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1523 //
GE07hv_apppu:13433: ayaṃ rathī śarī cāpī gadī tūṇīravān prabho / HV_App.I,31.1524 /
GE07hv_apppu:13434: paṭṭasī sarvato yāti kuntapāṇir ayaṃ balī // HV_App.I,31.1525 //
GE07hv_apppu:13435: ayam atra mahāśūlī saṃsthitaḥ sarvatodiśam / HV_App.I,31.1526 /
GE07hv_apppu:13436: gajo 'yaṃ suviṣāṇāgro vartate sarvataḥ pathi // HV_App.I,31.1527 //
GE07hv_apppu:13437: aśvī sarvatragaḥ śūro vegavān vātasaṃnibhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1528 /
GE07hv_apppu:13438: śarāñ śaraiḥ samāhanti daṇḍān daṇḍair jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.1529 //
GE07hv_apppu:13439: kuntān kuntaiḥ samājaghnur gadābhiś ca gadās tathā / HV_App.I,31.1530 /
GE07hv_apppu:13440: parighān parighaiś caiva śūlāñ śūlaiḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1531 //
GE07hv_apppu:13441: evaṃ teṣāṃ mahārāja kurvatāṃ raṇam uttamam / HV_App.I,31.1532 /
GE07hv_apppu:13442: saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān āsīc chabdaḥ samabhavan mahān // HV_App.I,31.1533 //
GE07hv_apppu:13443: tūryāṇi subahūny ājau śabdavanti mahānti ca / HV_App.I,31.1534 /
GE07hv_apppu:13444: prādur āsan sahasrāṇi śaṅkhānāṃ caiva nisvanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1535 //
GE07hv_apppu:13445: rātrau prādur abhūc chabdaḥ saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1536 /
GE07hv_apppu:13446: vartamāne mahāyuddhe vṛṣṇīnāṃ caiva taiḥ saha // HV_App.I,31.1537 //
GE07hv_apppu:13447: kecid dhatāḥ samāpetuḥ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīkṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1538 /
GE07hv_apppu:13449: petur urvyāṃ mahāvīryā rājānaḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1540 //
GE07hv_apppu:13450: kecit tu bhinnavarmāṇaḥ samāpetus tatas tataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1541 /
GE07hv_apppu:13454: evaṃ te nihatā rājan rājānaḥ sarva eva tu // HV_App.I,31.1545 //
GE07hv_apppu:13455: etasminn antare śūra ekalavyo niṣādapaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1546 /
GE07hv_apppu:13457: śarair anekasāhasrair ardayām āsa yādavān / HV_App.I,31.1548 /
GE07hv_apppu:13458: paraḥśataiḥ śarāṇāṃ tu niśitair marmabhedibhiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1549 //
GE07hv_apppu:13459: vṛṣṇivīrabalaṃ sarvaṃ pothayām āsa sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1550 /
GE07hv_apppu:13460: yudhyataḥ śastrapāṇīṃś ca kṣatriyān vīryavattamān // HV_App.I,31.1551 //
GE07hv_apppu:13462: sāraṇaṃ daśabhir vidhvā hārdikyaṃ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1553 //
GE07hv_apppu:13463: ugrasenaṃ navāśītyā vasudevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1554 /
GE07hv_apppu:13464: uddhavaṃ daśabhiś caiva akrūraṃ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1555 //
GE07hv_apppu:13465: evam ekaikaśaḥ sarvān nihatya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1556 /
GE07hv_apppu:13466: vidrāvya yādavīṃ senāṃ nāma viśrāvya vīryavān // HV_App.I,31.1557 //
GE07hv_apppu:13467: ekalavyo yadūn āha vīryavān balavān aham / HV_App.I,31.1558 /
GE07hv_apppu:13468: idānīṃ sātyakir vīraḥ kva yāsyati mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1559 //
GE07hv_apppu:13469: madamatto halī sākṣāt kva yātīha gadādharaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1560 /
GE07hv_apppu:13470: ity āha siṃhanādena sarvān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.1561 //
GE07hv_apppu:13473: vidruteṣu ca sainyeṣu vṛṣṇivīreṣu caiva hi / HV_App.I,31.1562 /
GE07hv_apppu:13474: bhīteṣv atha mahārāja hateṣu yudhi sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1563 //
GE07hv_apppu:13475: dīpikāsu praśāntāsu niḥśabde sati sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1564 /
GE07hv_apppu:13476: jitam ity eva tan matvā vṛṣṇīnāṃ balam uttamam // HV_App.I,31.1565 //
GE07hv_apppu:13477: tataḥ pauṇḍro mahāvīryo babhāṣe sainikān svakān / HV_App.I,31.1566 /
GE07hv_apppu:13478: śīghraṃ gacchata rājendrāṣ ṭaṅkaiḥ kuntaiḥ purīm imām // HV_App.I,31.1567 //
GE07hv_apppu:13479: kuṭhāraiḥ kuntalaiś caiva pāṣāṇaiḥ sarvatodiśam / HV_App.I,31.1568 /
GE07hv_apppu:13480: karpaṇasthaiś ca pāṣāṇaiḥ sarvato yāta bhūmipāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1569 //
GE07hv_apppu:13481: bhidyantāṃ prākāracayāḥ prāsādāś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1570 /
GE07hv_apppu:13482: [k: G2.3 M4 ins. after line 1570, T2.4 G1.4 after 1572:k]
GE07hv_apppu:13483: yoṣito vāramukhyāś ca nāgāś caiva samantataḥ / **HV_App.I,31.1570**16:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:13484: gṛhyantām aśvamukhyāś ca dhanāni subahūni ca // HV_App.I,31.1571 //
GE07hv_apppu:13485: gṛhyantāṃ kanyakāḥ sarvā dāsyaś caiva samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1572 /
GE07hv_apppu:13486: gṛhyantām aśvamukhyāś ca dhanāni subahūny atha // HV_App.I,31.1573 //
GE07hv_apppu:13487: tatheti te mahātmāno rājānaḥ sarva eva tu / HV_App.I,31.1574 /
GE07hv_apppu:13488: kuṭhāraiḥ sarvataś caiva cicchiduḥ pauṇḍrakājñayā / HV_App.I,31.1575 /
GE07hv_apppu:13489: prākārāṃś caiva sarvatra prāsādān ratnasaṃcayān // HV_App.I,31.1576 //
GE07hv_apppu:13490: atha tatra mahāśabdaḥ prādur āsīt samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1577 /
GE07hv_apppu:13493: śrutvā śabdaṃ mahāghoraṃ sātyakiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1580 /
GE07hv_apppu:13494: mayi sarvaṃ samāropya keśavo yādaveśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.1581 /
GE07hv_apppu:13495: gataḥ kailāsaśikharaṃ draṣṭum īśvaram avyayam // HV_App.I,31.1582 //
GE07hv_apppu:13496: avaśyaṃ sarvathā rakṣyā purī dvāravatī mayā / HV_App.I,31.1583 /
GE07hv_apppu:13497: iti saṃcintya manasā dhanur ādāya satvaram // HV_App.I,31.1584 //
GE07hv_apppu:13498: rathaṃ mahāntam āruhya dārukasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1585 /
GE07hv_apppu:13499: putreṇa saṃskṛtaṃ ghoraṃ yantā ca svayam eva ha // HV_App.I,31.1586 //
GE07hv_apppu:13500: dhanur mahat tam ādāya śarāṃś cāśīviṣopamān / HV_App.I,31.1587 /
GE07hv_apppu:13502: aṅgadī kuṇḍalī tūṇī śarī cāpī gadāsimān / HV_App.I,31.1589 /
GE07hv_apppu:13503: yayau yuddhāya vegena saṃsmaran kaiśavaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1590 //
GE07hv_apppu:13504: dīpikādīpite deśe yayau sātyakir uttamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1591 //
GE07hv_apppu:13505: tathā ca baladevo 'pi ratham āruhya bhāsvaram / HV_App.I,31.1592 /
GE07hv_apppu:13506: gadī śarāsimān vīraḥ prāyād raṇacikīrṣayā // HV_App.I,31.1593 //
GE07hv_apppu:13507: siṃhanādaṃ prakurvaṃs tu vimuñcan bhairavaṃ ravam / HV_App.I,31.1594 /
GE07hv_apppu:13508: uddhavo 'pi balī sākṣād gajam āruhya satvaram // HV_App.I,31.1595 //
GE07hv_apppu:13509: mattaṃ mahāravaṃ ghoraṃ saṃgrāmaṃ nītimattaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.1596 /
GE07hv_apppu:13510: yayau nītiṃ vicinvānaḥ parāṃ prītiṃ mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1597 //
GE07hv_apppu:13511: anye 'pi vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve yayuḥ saṃgrāmalālasāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1598 /
GE07hv_apppu:13512: rathān gajān samāruhya hārdikyapramukhās tadā // HV_App.I,31.1599 //
GE07hv_apppu:13513: dīpikābhiś ca sarvatra purovṛttābhir īśvarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1600 /
GE07hv_apppu:13514: siṃhanādaṃ prakurvantaḥ smarantaḥ kaiśavaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1601 //
GE07hv_apppu:13516: te sametya yathāyogaṃ sthitās tatra mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1603 //
GE07hv_apppu:13517: sthite sainye mahāghore dīpikādīpite pathi / HV_App.I,31.1604 /
GE07hv_apppu:13518: śinir vīraḥ śarī cāpī gadī tūṇīrapāṇimān // HV_App.I,31.1605 //
GE07hv_apppu:13520: ākarṇapūrṇam ākṛṣya dhanuḥ pravaram uttamam // HV_App.I,31.1607 //
GE07hv_apppu:13522: vāyavyāstreṇa te sarve tatrasthā nṛpasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1609 /
GE07hv_apppu:13523: vidrutā hy astravīryeṇa yatra tiṣṭhati pauṇḍrakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1610 //
GE07hv_apppu:13524: tatra gatvā sthitāḥ sarve nirdhūtā vātaraṃhasā / HV_App.I,31.1611 /
GE07hv_apppu:13525: yatra pūrvaṃ sthitāḥ sarve vidrutā rājasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1612 //
GE07hv_apppu:13526: tatra sthitvā sa śaineyaḥ śaram ādāya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1613 /
GE07hv_apppu:13527: niśitaṃ sarpabhogābhaṃ babhāṣe sātyakis tadā // HV_App.I,31.1614 //
GE07hv_apppu:13528: kvedānīṃ sa mahābāhuḥ pauṇḍrako rājasaṃjñakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1615 /
GE07hv_apppu:13529: sthito 'smi vyavasāyena śarī cāpī mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1616 //
GE07hv_apppu:13530: yadi draṣṭā durātmānaṃ tato hantā nṛpādhamam / HV_App.I,31.1617 /
GE07hv_apppu:13531: bhṛtyo 'smi keśavasyāhaṃ jighāṃsuḥ pauṇḍrakaṃ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1618 //
GE07hv_apppu:13532: chittvā śiras tu tasyāhaṃ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1619 /
GE07hv_apppu:13533: dāsyāmi vaḷagṛdhrebhyaḥ śvabhyaś caiva durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1620 //
GE07hv_apppu:13534: ko nu nāmedṛśaṃ karma coravac ca samācaret / HV_App.I,31.1621 /
GE07hv_apppu:13535: supteṣu niśi sarvatra yādaveṣu mahātmasu // HV_App.I,31.1622 //
GE07hv_apppu:13536: coro 'yaṃ sarvathā rājā na hi rājā balānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1623 /
GE07hv_apppu:13537: yadi śakto na kuryāc ca cauryam etan nṛpādhamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1624 //
GE07hv_apppu:13538: aho 'sya bālatā rājñaś corakāryaṃ prakurvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1625 /
GE07hv_apppu:13539: sarvathā gamanaṃ tasya na hi paśyāmi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.1626 //
GE07hv_apppu:13540: ity uccaiḥ sātyakir vīraḥ prajahāsa mahāsvanam / HV_App.I,31.1627 /
GE07hv_apppu:13541: visphārya sudṛḍhaṃ cāpaṃ saṃdadhe kārmuke śaram // HV_App.I,31.1628 //
GE07hv_apppu:13542: ākarṇya vacanaṃ vīraḥ sātyakes tasya dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1629 /
GE07hv_apppu:13544: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇam āgatya purato yadoḥ / HV_App.I,31.1631 /
GE07hv_apppu:13545: babhāṣe vāsudevas tu hasan bahuvidhaṃ nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1632 //
GE07hv_apppu:13546: sātyake śṛṇu me vākyaṃ yadi yoddhuṃ vyavasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1633 /
GE07hv_apppu:13547: kva nu kṛṣṇaḥ kva gopālaḥ kutaḥ sa iha vartate // HV_App.I,31.1634 //
GE07hv_apppu:13548: strīhantā paśuhantā ca kva ca svāmīti śabdyate / HV_App.I,31.1635 /
GE07hv_apppu:13549: sa idānīṃ kva varteta gṛhītvā mama nāma tat / HV_App.I,31.1636 /
GE07hv_apppu:13550: hantā sakhyur mahāvīryo narakasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1637 //
GE07hv_apppu:13551: mamaiva nāma tad bhūyād dhate tasmin durātmani / HV_App.I,31.1638 /
GE07hv_apppu:13552: gaccha tvaṃ kāmato vīra yoddhuṃ na kṣamate bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1639 //
GE07hv_apppu:13553: atha vā tiṣṭha kiṃcit tu tato draṣṭāsi me balam / HV_App.I,31.1640 /
GE07hv_apppu:13554: śiras te pātayiṣyāmi śarair ghorair durāsadaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1641 //
GE07hv_apppu:13555: hatasya tava vīrasya bhūmiḥ pāsyati śoṇitam / HV_App.I,31.1642 /
GE07hv_apppu:13556: śroṣyate sa tathā gopo hataḥ sātyakir ity api // HV_App.I,31.1643 //
GE07hv_apppu:13557: yo garvas tasya gopasya sarvadā vartate mahān / HV_App.I,31.1644 /
GE07hv_apppu:13558: vinaṅkṣyati sa tu kṣipraṃ hate tvayi yadūttama // HV_App.I,31.1645 //
GE07hv_apppu:13559: tvayi rakṣāṃ samādiśya gopaḥ kailāsaparvatam / HV_App.I,31.1646 /
GE07hv_apppu:13560: gata ity evam asmābhiḥ śrutaṃ pūrvaṃ mahāmate // HV_App.I,31.1647 //
GE07hv_apppu:13561: śaraṃ gṛhāṇa niśitaṃ yadi śaknoṣi matpuraḥ / HV_App.I,31.1648 /
