GE07hv_apppu:13562: ity uktvā bāṇaṃ ādāya yoddhuṃ vyavasitaḥ kila // HV_App.I,31.1649 //
GE07hv_apppu:13565: tataḥ kruddho mahārāja sātyakir vṛṣṇipuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1650 /
GE07hv_apppu:13566: uvāca vacanaṃ rājan vāsudevaṃ smayann iva // HV_App.I,31.1651 //
GE07hv_apppu:13567: mā voca īdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ vāsudevaṃ nṛpādhama / HV_App.I,31.1652 /
GE07hv_apppu:13568: ko nāma jagatāṃ nātham itthaṃ brūyāj jijīviṣuḥ // HV_App.I,31.1653 //
GE07hv_apppu:13569: mṛtyus tvāṃ sarvathā yāti vadantaṃ tādṛśaṃ vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1654 /
GE07hv_apppu:13570: jihvā te śatadhā dīryād vadatas tādṛśaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1655 //
GE07hv_apppu:13571: eṣa te pātayiṣyāmi śiraḥ kāyāc ca pauṇḍraka / HV_App.I,31.1656 /
GE07hv_apppu:13572: yan nāma vāsudeveti tava saṃprati vartate // HV_App.I,31.1657 //
GE07hv_apppu:13573: yāvat patati kāyāt tu śiras tāvat tu vartatām / HV_App.I,31.1658 /
GE07hv_apppu:13574: sa eva śvo hi bhagavān vāsudevo bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,31.1659 //
GE07hv_apppu:13575: eka eva jagannāthaḥ kartā sarvasya sarvagaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1660 /
GE07hv_apppu:13576: durātman sarvathā devo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1661 //
GE07hv_apppu:13577: eṣa te svaśiraḥ kāyāt pātayiṣyāmi rājaka / HV_App.I,31.1662 /
GE07hv_apppu:13578: yady asau bhagavān viṣṇur nāgamiṣyati sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.1663 //
GE07hv_apppu:13579: astraṃ vīryaṃ balaṃ caiva sarvaṃ darśaya sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,31.1664 /
GE07hv_apppu:13580: nātaḥ paraṃ balaṃ rājan vīryaṃ tava ca vartate // HV_App.I,31.1665 //
GE07hv_apppu:13581: sarvaṃ darśaya yatnena sthito 'smi vyavasāyavān / HV_App.I,31.1666 /
GE07hv_apppu:13582: śarī cāpī gadī khaḍgī sarvathāham upasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1667 //
GE07hv_apppu:13583: neto nagaram āyāsi satyenaitad bravīmy aham / HV_App.I,31.1668 /
GE07hv_apppu:13584: sarvathā kṛtakṛtyo 'smi dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ vāsudevaka / HV_App.I,31.1669 /
GE07hv_apppu:13585: tavāṅgaṃ tilaśaḥ kṛtvā śvabhyo dāsyāmi rājaka // HV_App.I,31.1670 //
GE07hv_apppu:13586: ity uktvā bāṇam ādāya vāsudevaṃ mahābalam / HV_App.I,31.1671 /
GE07hv_apppu:13587: ākarṇapūrṇam ākṛṣya vivyādha niśitaṃ śaram // HV_App.I,31.1672 //
GE07hv_apppu:13588: sa tena viddho yadunā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.1673 /
GE07hv_apppu:13589: vamañ śoṇitam atyuṣṇam aṅgān netrān nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.1674 //
GE07hv_apppu:13590: tataś cukrodha sa nṛpo vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.1675 /
GE07hv_apppu:13591: navabhir daśabhiś caiva śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1676 /
GE07hv_apppu:13592: vivyādha sātyakiṃ rājā nadaṃś ca bahudhā kila // HV_App.I,31.1677 //
GE07hv_apppu:13593: tato nārācam ādāya niśitaṃ yamasaṃnibham / HV_App.I,31.1678 /
GE07hv_apppu:13594: dhanur ākṛṣya balavān vāsudevo nṛpottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1679 /
GE07hv_apppu:13595: vivyādha sātyakiṃ bhūyo niśi prahlādayan svakān // HV_App.I,31.1680 //
GE07hv_apppu:13597: lalāṭe sudṛḍhaṃ vīro vṛṣṇīnām agraṇīs tadā / HV_App.I,31.1682 /
GE07hv_apppu:13598: niṣasāda rathopasthe niśceṣṭa iva sattama // HV_App.I,31.1683 //
GE07hv_apppu:13602: pātayiṣyāmi te vīryam ity uktvā bāṇam ādade // **HV_App.I,31.1683**17:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:13603: tataḥ sa pauṇḍrako rājā vidhvā daśabhir āśugaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1684 /
GE07hv_apppu:13604: sārathiṃ pañcaviṃśatyā hayāṃś ca caturo dṛḍham // HV_App.I,31.1685 //
GE07hv_apppu:13605: te hayā rudhirāktāṅgāḥ sārathiś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1686 /
GE07hv_apppu:13607: vāsudevo rathī cāpī siṃhanādaṃ samādade // HV_App.I,31.1688 //
GE07hv_apppu:13608: tena nādena tatrābhūd vibuddhaḥ sātyakis tadā / HV_App.I,31.1689 /
GE07hv_apppu:13609: viddhān hayāṃs tathā dṛṣṭvā sārathiṃ ca tathāgatam // HV_App.I,31.1690 //
GE07hv_apppu:13611: are drakṣyāmi te vīryam ity uktvā bāṇam ādade / HV_App.I,31.1692 /
GE07hv_apppu:13612: vivyādha tena bāṇena vakṣasy enaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,31.1693 //
GE07hv_apppu:13613: tataś cacāla tenājau vāsudevaḥ śareṇa ha / HV_App.I,31.1694 /
GE07hv_apppu:13614: susruve rudhiraṃ ghoram atyuṣṇaṃ vakṣaso nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1695 //
GE07hv_apppu:13615: rathopasthe papātāśu niḥśvasan bahuśo nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.1696 /
GE07hv_apppu:13616: kṛtyaṃ cāpi na jānāti kevalaṃ niṣasāda ha // HV_App.I,31.1697 //
GE07hv_apppu:13617: sātyakis tu rathaṃ vidhvā daśabhiḥ sāyakais tadā / HV_App.I,31.1698 /
GE07hv_apppu:13618: dhvajaṃ ciccheda bhallena vāsudevasya vṛṣṇipaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1699 /
GE07hv_apppu:13619: hayāṃś ca caturo hatvā bāṇaiḥ sārathim eva ca // HV_App.I,31.1700 //
GE07hv_apppu:13620: yuyudhāno 'tha rājendra bhallena niśitena ha / HV_App.I,31.1701 /
GE07hv_apppu:13621: sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād aharat sātyakis tadā // HV_App.I,31.1702 //
GE07hv_apppu:13622: rathagranthiṃ ca ciccheda hayāś ca vyasavo 'bhavan / HV_App.I,31.1703 /
GE07hv_apppu:13623: aśvāṃś ca caturo hatvā caturbhiḥ patribhis tadā // HV_App.I,31.1704 //
GE07hv_apppu:13624: cakraṃ ca tilaśaḥ kṛtvā bāṇair daśabhir añjasā / HV_App.I,31.1705 /
GE07hv_apppu:13625: jahāsa vipulaṃ rājan vāsudevo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1706 //
GE07hv_apppu:13626: sātyakiś ca tadā rājan rathād āplutya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1707 /
GE07hv_apppu:13627: dhanur ādāya vipulaṃ tasthau bhūmau yadūttamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1708 //
GE07hv_apppu:13628: tato bhallena tīkṣṇena jyāṃ ca ciccheda satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1709 /
GE07hv_apppu:13629: nimeṣād iva vīras tu sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1710 /
GE07hv_apppu:13630: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena sarvān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.1711 //
GE07hv_apppu:13631: tatas tyaktvā mahācāpam anyad ghoraṃ mahāmṛdhe / HV_App.I,31.1712 /
GE07hv_apppu:13632: anyat kārmukam ādāya vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1713 //
GE07hv_apppu:13633: vāsudevo 'pi niḥśvasya dhanur ādāya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1714 /
GE07hv_apppu:13634: śarāṃś ca katicid rājan gadāṃ khaḍgaṃ ca yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1715 /
GE07hv_apppu:13635: yāvad balaṃ samādāya tato bhūmau vyatiṣṭhata // HV_App.I,31.1716 //
GE07hv_apppu:13636: bhūmiṣṭho vāsudevas tu sātyakiṃ satyavikramam / HV_App.I,31.1717 /
GE07hv_apppu:13637: śarair anekasāhasraiḥ ardayām āsa satvaram // HV_App.I,31.1718 //
GE07hv_apppu:13638: sātyaker dhvajavaṃśaṃ tu ciccheda raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,31.1719 /
GE07hv_apppu:13639: rathaṃ jaghāna niśitaiḥ śarair daśabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1720 //
GE07hv_apppu:13640: sātyakiḥ krūrakarmāṇam indro vṛtravadhe yathā // HV_App.I,31.1721 //
GE07hv_apppu:13641: tataś ca yuyudhānas tu vāsudevaṃ nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.1722 /
GE07hv_apppu:13642: daśabhir daśabhiś caiva pañcabhiḥ pañcabhis tathā // HV_App.I,31.1723 //
GE07hv_apppu:13643: ṣaḍbhiḥ ṣaḍbhis tathāṣṭābhir bibheda raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,31.1724 /
GE07hv_apppu:13644: yathā devāsure yuddhe baliṃ baliripur nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1725 //
GE07hv_apppu:13645: sa ca cāpaṃ mahāghoraṃ pauṇḍro yaduvṛṣasya ha / HV_App.I,31.1726 /
GE07hv_apppu:13646: muṣṭideśe dvidhā kṛtvā bāṇair daśabhir añjasā / HV_App.I,31.1727 /
GE07hv_apppu:13647: jahāsa vipulaṃ rājan vāsudevo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1728 //
GE07hv_apppu:13648: tato 'paraṃ mahac cāpaṃ sātyakir vṛṣṇipuṅgavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1729 /
GE07hv_apppu:13649: sajyaṃ kṛtvā balī sākṣāt sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1730 /
GE07hv_apppu:13650: śaraiḥ saptatisāhasraiḥ ardayām āsa satvaram // HV_App.I,31.1731 //
GE07hv_apppu:13651: te śarāḥ śalabhākārā nipetuḥ sarvatas tadā / HV_App.I,31.1732 /
GE07hv_apppu:13652: śirastaḥ pārśvataś caiva pṛṣṭhataḥ puratas tathā // HV_App.I,31.1733 //
GE07hv_apppu:13653: āsye caiva mahārāja jaṅghayor jaghane tathā / HV_App.I,31.1734 /
GE07hv_apppu:13654: vyathāṃ ca dadur atyantaṃ vāsudevasya marmagāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1735 //
GE07hv_apppu:13656: kevalaṃ dhairyanicayas tṛṣārtaḥ śaravān yathā / HV_App.I,31.1737 /
GE07hv_apppu:13657: yathā manasvī riktaś ca tathā tiṣṭhati pauṇḍrakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1738 //
GE07hv_apppu:13658: tataś cukrodha balavān vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.1739 /
GE07hv_apppu:13659: ardhacandraṃ samādāya vivyādha yudhi sātyakim / HV_App.I,31.1740 /
GE07hv_apppu:13660: vidhvā saptabhir āyāntaṃ krodhena prasphurann iva // HV_App.I,31.1741 //
GE07hv_apppu:13661: viddho 'tha sātyakis tena śaraiḥ pañcabhir āśugaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1742 /
GE07hv_apppu:13662: cāpaṃ ciccheda pauṇḍrasya siṃhanādaṃ vyanīnadat // HV_App.I,31.1743 //
GE07hv_apppu:13663: vāsudevo gadāṃ gṛhya bhrāmayitvā padātpadam / HV_App.I,31.1744 /
GE07hv_apppu:13664: tvaritaṃ pātayām āsa sātyaker vakṣasi prabho // HV_App.I,31.1745 //
GE07hv_apppu:13665: savyena tāṃ samākṛṣya kareṇa yadunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1746 /
GE07hv_apppu:13666: śaraṃ pragṛhya vivyādha sātyakir yudhi pauṇḍrakam // HV_App.I,31.1747 //
GE07hv_apppu:13667: tam antare gṛhītvāśu vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.1748 /
GE07hv_apppu:13668: śaktibhir daśabhiś caiva sātyakiṃ nijaghāna ha // HV_App.I,31.1749 //
GE07hv_apppu:13669: tābhir viddho raṇe vīraḥ sātyakiḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.1750 /
GE07hv_apppu:13672: apāsya dhanuratnaṃ tad gadām ādāya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1751 /
GE07hv_apppu:13673: ājaghāna tadā vīro vṛṣṇīnām agraṇīr nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1752 //
GE07hv_apppu:13676: tataḥ kruddho gadāpāṇiḥ sātyakir vṛṣṇinandanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1753 /
GE07hv_apppu:13677: vāsudevaṃ jaghānāśu gadayā tīkṣṇayā nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.1754 /
GE07hv_apppu:13678: sātyakiṃ vāsudevas tu gadayābhyahanad balī // HV_App.I,31.1755 //
GE07hv_apppu:13679: tāv udyatagadau vīrau śuśubhāte tadā raṇe / HV_App.I,31.1756 /
GE07hv_apppu:13680: dṛptau yathā vane siṃhau parasparavadhaiṣiṇau // HV_App.I,31.1757 //
GE07hv_apppu:13681: tataḥ sa sātyakiḥ kruddhaḥ savyaṃ maṇḍalam āgamat / HV_App.I,31.1758 /
GE07hv_apppu:13682: jaghnatus tau tadā yuddhe gadābhyāṃ gadinau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1759 //
GE07hv_apppu:13683: stanayoḥ pārśvayoḥ pṛṣṭhe tāḍitau gadadhāriṇau / HV_App.I,31.1760 /
GE07hv_apppu:13684: ubhau tau rudhirāktāṅgau puṣpitāv iva kiṃśukau // HV_App.I,31.1761 //
GE07hv_apppu:13687: dakṣiṇaṃ vāsudevas tu taṃ jaghāna stanāntare / HV_App.I,31.1764 /
GE07hv_apppu:13688: yuyudhāno 'tha vīras tu bāhvor madhyam atāḍayat // HV_App.I,31.1765 //
GE07hv_apppu:13689: dṛḍhaṃ sa tāḍito vīro jānubhyām apatad bhuvi / HV_App.I,31.1766 /
GE07hv_apppu:13690: tata utthāya bhūyas tu lalāṭe 'bhyahanad yadum // HV_App.I,31.1767 //
GE07hv_apppu:13691: viṣaṇṇaḥ kiṃcid āyastas tata utthāya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1768 /
GE07hv_apppu:13693: vāsudevo balī vīraḥ sākṣān mṛtyur ivāparaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1770 /
GE07hv_apppu:13694: jaghāna gadayā vṛṣṇiṃ nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,31.1771 //
GE07hv_apppu:13695: sa tayā tāḍito vṛṣṇir gadayā bāhumuktayā / HV_App.I,31.1772 /
GE07hv_apppu:13696: ālambya bhūmiṃ sahasā mṛtyor aṅkagato yathā // HV_App.I,31.1773 //
GE07hv_apppu:13697: saṃjñāṃ punaḥ samālambya pāṇibhyāṃ dṛḍham eva ca / HV_App.I,31.1774 /
GE07hv_apppu:13698: gadāṃ tasya mahārāja gṛhītvā pragraheṇa ha // HV_App.I,31.1775 //
GE07hv_apppu:13699: dvidhā kṛtvā mahāgurvīṃ gadāṃ kālāyasīṃ śubhām / HV_App.I,31.1776 /
GE07hv_apppu:13700: utsṛjya sahasā vīraḥ siṃhanādaṃ vyanīnadat // HV_App.I,31.1777 //
GE07hv_apppu:13701: tata utplutya rājā tu vāsudevo mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1778 /
GE07hv_apppu:13702: savyena sātyakiṃ gṛhya dakṣiṇena kareṇa ha // HV_App.I,31.1779 //
GE07hv_apppu:13703: muṣṭiṃ kṛtvā mahāghorāṃ vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.1780 /
GE07hv_apppu:13704: tāḍayām āsa madhye tu stanayoḥ sātyakiṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1781 //
GE07hv_apppu:13705: śaineyo vṛṣṇivīras tu gadām utsṛjya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1782 /
GE07hv_apppu:13708: tayor evaṃ mahāghoraṃ talayuddham avartata // HV_App.I,31.1785 //
GE07hv_apppu:13709: jānubhyāṃ muṣṭibhiś caiva bāhubhyāṃ śirasā tathā / HV_App.I,31.1786 /
GE07hv_apppu:13710: urasoraḥ samāhatya jānubhyāṃ śirasā tathā / HV_App.I,31.1787 /
GE07hv_apppu:13711: karābhyāṃ karam āhatya tau yuddhaṃ saṃpracakratuḥ // HV_App.I,31.1788 //
GE07hv_apppu:13712: tālayos tatra rājendra vṛkṣayoḥ saṃnikṛṣṭayoḥ / HV_App.I,31.1789 /
GE07hv_apppu:13713: vane yathāgnir utpannas tathaivāsīt sudāruṇaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1790 //
GE07hv_apppu:13714: tāv ājau prathitau vīrāv ubhau pauṇḍrakasātyakī / HV_App.I,31.1791 /
GE07hv_apppu:13715: niśi stimitamūkāyāṃ śastraṃ tyaktvā mahābalau / HV_App.I,31.1792 /
GE07hv_apppu:13716: yuyudhāte mahāraṅge mallau dvāv iva viśrutau // HV_App.I,31.1793 //
GE07hv_apppu:13717: ubhe sene mahārāja saṃśayaṃ jagmatus tadā / HV_App.I,31.1794 /
GE07hv_apppu:13718: kiṃ nu syāt sātyakir vīro hato 'nena durātmanā / HV_App.I,31.1795 /
GE07hv_apppu:13719: āhosvid vāsudevas tu hato 'nena bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,31.1796 //
GE07hv_apppu:13721: hatvā parasparaṃ vīrau vīrasvargaṃ gamiṣyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1798 /
GE07hv_apppu:13722: anyathā noparamyetāṃ yuddhād vīrau suviśrutau // HV_App.I,31.1799 //
GE07hv_apppu:13723: aho vīryam aho dhairyam etayor balaśālinoḥ / HV_App.I,31.1800 /
GE07hv_apppu:13724: etau mahābhaṭau loke naitau prākṛtasaṃmatau // HV_App.I,31.1801 //
GE07hv_apppu:13725: naivaṃ yuddhaṃ mahāghoram āsīd devāsureṣv api / HV_App.I,31.1802 /
GE07hv_apppu:13726: na śruto na ca vā dṛṣṭaḥ saṃgrāmo 'yaṃ kadācana // HV_App.I,31.1803 //
GE07hv_apppu:13727: evaṃ te sainikā brūyuḥ senayor ubhayor api / HV_App.I,31.1804 /
GE07hv_apppu:13728: rātrau niśātame ghore dṛṣṭvā yuddhaṃ sudāruṇam // HV_App.I,31.1805 //
GE07hv_apppu:13729: atha tau bāhubhir ghoraiḥ saṃnipetatur ojasā / HV_App.I,31.1806 /
GE07hv_apppu:13730: daśabhir muṣṭibhir jaghne sātyakiḥ pauṇḍranandanam / HV_App.I,31.1807 /
GE07hv_apppu:13731: pañcabhiḥ sātyakiṃ pauṇḍraḥ samājaghne mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1808 //
GE07hv_apppu:13733: prādur āsīt tu sarvatra sarvān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.1810 //
GE07hv_apppu:13736: etasminn antare kruddha ekalavyo niṣādapaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1811 /
GE07hv_apppu:13737: balabhadram abhiprekṣya dhanur ādāya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1812 /
GE07hv_apppu:13738: āruhya sa rathaṃ vīro yayau yatra halī sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1813 //
GE07hv_apppu:13739: dṛṣṭvāyāntaṃ niṣādeśam ekalavyaṃ halī tadā / HV_App.I,31.1814 /
GE07hv_apppu:13740: rathī gadī śarī bhūtvā tasthau tasyāgrato balī // HV_App.I,31.1815 //
GE07hv_apppu:13741: baladevaṃ ca viṃśatyā jaghāna śaramālayā / HV_App.I,31.1816 /
GE07hv_apppu:13742: rathaṃ daśabhir āhatya sūtaṃ daśabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1817 //
GE07hv_apppu:13743: siṃhanādaṃ prakurvāṇo daśabhis tv atha sīriṇam / HV_App.I,31.1818 /
GE07hv_apppu:13744: dhanurjyāṃ daśabhiś chittvā siṃhanādaṃ vyanīnadat // HV_App.I,31.1819 //
GE07hv_apppu:13745: sajyaṃ ca kārmukaṃ kṛtvā baladevo niṣādapam / HV_App.I,31.1820 /
GE07hv_apppu:13746: nārācair daśabhir vidhvā bāṇaiś ca daśabhiḥ śitaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1821 /
GE07hv_apppu:13747: ciccheda dhanur ardhaṃ tat sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1822 //
GE07hv_apppu:13748: sūtaṃ daśabhir āhatya rathaṃ triṃśadbhir eva ca / HV_App.I,31.1823 /
GE07hv_apppu:13749: dhvajaṃ ciccheda bhallena niṣādasya jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.1824 //
GE07hv_apppu:13750: tato 'paraṃ mahac cāpaṃ niṣādo vīryavattamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1825 /
GE07hv_apppu:13753: baladevo mahāvīryaḥ śeṣaḥ sarpa iva śvasan / HV_App.I,31.1828 /
GE07hv_apppu:13754: daśabhis tad dhanur divyaṃ śaraiḥ sarvasahair balī / HV_App.I,31.1829 /
GE07hv_apppu:13755: ciccheda muṣṭideśe tu mādhavo mādhavāgrajaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1830 //
GE07hv_apppu:13756: ekalavyo niṣādeśaḥ khaḍgam ādāya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1831 /
GE07hv_apppu:13758: tam antare yaduvṛṣo vṛṣṇivīraḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.1833 /
GE07hv_apppu:13759: tilaśaḥ pañcabhir bāṇaiś cakāra yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1834 //
GE07hv_apppu:13761: prāhiṇot sāratheḥ kāyam ālokyātha niṣādapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1836 //
GE07hv_apppu:13762: taṃ cāpi daśabhir vīro mādhavo yadupuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1837 /
GE07hv_apppu:13764: tataḥ śaktiṃ samādāya ghaṇṭāmālākulāṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.1839 /
GE07hv_apppu:13766: siṃhanādaṃ mahāghoraṃ akarot sa niṣādarāṭ // HV_App.I,31.1841 //
GE07hv_apppu:13767: sā śaktiḥ sarvakalyāṇī baladevam upāgamat // HV_App.I,31.1842 //
GE07hv_apppu:13768: utplutya tāṃ mahāghorāṃ balabhadraḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.1843 /
GE07hv_apppu:13769: ādāyātha niṣādeśaṃ sarvān vismāpayann iva / HV_App.I,31.1844 /
GE07hv_apppu:13770: tayaiva taṃ jaghānāśu vakṣodeśe sa mādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1845 //
GE07hv_apppu:13771: sa tayā tāḍito vīraḥ svaśaktyātha niṣādapaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1846 /
GE07hv_apppu:13774: niṣādās tasya rājendra śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1849 /
GE07hv_apppu:13776: gadinaḥ sādinaś caiva maheṣvāsā mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1851 //
GE07hv_apppu:13777: śarair anekasāhasraiḥ śaktibhiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1852 /
GE07hv_apppu:13778: gadābhiḥ paṭṭasaiḥ śūlaiḥ parighaiḥ prāsatomaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1853 //
GE07hv_apppu:13779: kuntair atha kuṭhāraiś ca vyadravan rāmam ojasā / HV_App.I,31.1854 /
GE07hv_apppu:13780: śalabhā iva rājendra dīpyamānaṃ hutāśanam / HV_App.I,31.1855 /
GE07hv_apppu:13781: te śaraiḥ pātayāṃ cakrū rāmaṃ rāmam ivāparam // HV_App.I,31.1856 //
GE07hv_apppu:13782: kecit kuṭhārair ājaghnuḥ kecit kuntaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1857 /
GE07hv_apppu:13783: gadābhiḥ kecid āyānti śaktibhiś ca tathāpare / HV_App.I,31.1858 /
GE07hv_apppu:13784: nijaghnuḥ sahasā rāmaṃ sphurantaṃ pāvakaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,31.1859 //
GE07hv_apppu:13785: tataḥ kruddho halī sākṣād dhalam udyamya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1860 /
GE07hv_apppu:13786: sarvāṃs tān karṣayām āsa musalena vyapothayat // HV_App.I,31.1861 //
GE07hv_apppu:13787: te hanyamānā rāmeṇa niṣādāḥ parvatāśrayāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1862 /
GE07hv_apppu:13789: kṣaṇena tān mahārāja hatvā sarvān mahābalān / HV_App.I,31.1864 /
GE07hv_apppu:13790: siṃhavad vinadaṃs tatra tasthau rāmo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1865 //
GE07hv_apppu:13791: tato rātrau mahāghorāḥ piśācāḥ piśitāśanāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1866 /
GE07hv_apppu:13793: pibantaḥ śoṇitaṃ koṣṇaṃ saṃkṛṣya ca śavaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.1868 //
GE07hv_apppu:13796: kravyādāḥ sarva evāśu bhakṣayantas tadā śavam / HV_App.I,31.1869 /
GE07hv_apppu:13797: hasanto vividhaṃ ghoraṃ nādayanto vasuṃdharām // HV_App.I,31.1870 //
GE07hv_apppu:13798: rākṣasāḥ piśitāśāś ca pibanto rudhiraṃ bahu / HV_App.I,31.1871 /
GE07hv_apppu:13799: āśiṣaṃ yuñjate rājañ śavasya piśitāśanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1872 //
GE07hv_apppu:13800: nṛtyanti sma tadā rājan nagaryāṃ raṇatoṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1873 /
GE07hv_apppu:13801: kākā baḷāś ca gṛdhrāś ca śyenā gomāyukās tathā / HV_App.I,31.1874 /
GE07hv_apppu:13802: bhakṣayantaḥ pradhāvantas tataś cetaś ca dāruṇam // HV_App.I,31.1875 //
GE07hv_apppu:13803: etasminn antare vīro niṣādo labdhasaṃjñakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1876 /
GE07hv_apppu:13804: hatān sarvān samālokya niṣādān atha sīriṇā // HV_App.I,31.1877 //
GE07hv_apppu:13805: gadām ādāya kupito rāmam eva jagāma ha / HV_App.I,31.1878 /
GE07hv_apppu:13806: jaghāna gadayā rājañ jatrudeśe niṣādapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1879 //
GE07hv_apppu:13807: tato rāmo gadī rājan niṣādaṃ bāhuśālinam / HV_App.I,31.1880 /
GE07hv_apppu:13808: ājaghne gadayā krūraṃ madamatto halāyudhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1881 /
GE07hv_apppu:13809: tayoś ca tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ gadābhyāṃ samavartata // HV_App.I,31.1882 //
GE07hv_apppu:13810: ākāśe śabda āsīt tu tayor yuddhe mahāravaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1883 /
GE07hv_apppu:13811: samudrāṇāṃ yathā ghoṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ saṃnigacchatām // HV_App.I,31.1884 //
GE07hv_apppu:13812: kalpakṣaye mahārāja śabdaḥ sa tumulo 'bhavat / HV_App.I,31.1885 /
GE07hv_apppu:13813: kṣubhito nāgalokaś ca nāgāḥ kṣobhaṃ samāyayuḥ / HV_App.I,31.1886 /
GE07hv_apppu:13814: pṛthivī cāntarikṣaṃ ca sarvaṃ śabdamayaṃ babhau // HV_App.I,31.1887 //
GE07hv_apppu:13815: tataḥ sa pauṇḍrako rājā sātyakiṃ vṛṣṇinandanam / HV_App.I,31.1888 /
GE07hv_apppu:13817: yuyudhāno balī rājan vāsudevaṃ jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,31.1890 //
GE07hv_apppu:13818: tayoś ca tumulaḥ śabdaḥ prādur āsīn mahāraṇe / HV_App.I,31.1891 /
GE07hv_apppu:13820: brahmāṇḍakṣobhaṇo rājañ śabda āsīt subhairavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1893 //
GE07hv_apppu:13821: tato rajaḥ prādur abhūt tasmin saṃgrāmamūrdhani / HV_App.I,31.1894 /
GE07hv_apppu:13822: tārakā niṣprabhā āsaṃs tamasy evaṃ kṣayaṃ gate // HV_App.I,31.1895 //
GE07hv_apppu:13823: uṣasi pratibuddhāyāṃ tamo niḥśeṣatāṃ yayau / HV_App.I,31.1896 /
GE07hv_apppu:13824: udito bhagavān sūryaś candraś ca kṣayam āyayau // HV_App.I,31.1897 //
GE07hv_apppu:13825: tato yuddhaṃ prādur abhūc caturṇāṃ bāhuśālinām / HV_App.I,31.1898 /
GE07hv_apppu:13826: devāsurasamaṃ rājann udite bhāskare mahat // HV_App.I,31.1899 //
GE07hv_apppu:13829: tataḥ prabhāte vimale bhagavān devakīsutaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1900 /
GE07hv_apppu:13830: gantum aicchaj jagannāthaḥ purīṃ badarikāśramāt // HV_App.I,31.1901 //
GE07hv_apppu:13831: namaskṛtya munīn sarvān yayau dvāravatīṃ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,31.1902 /
GE07hv_apppu:13832: āruhya garuḍaṃ viṣṇur vegena mahatā prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,31.1903 //
GE07hv_apppu:13833: sumahāñ śuśruve śabdas teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ prakurvatām / HV_App.I,31.1904 /
GE07hv_apppu:13834: gacchatā devadevena purīṃ dvāravatīṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1905 //
GE07hv_apppu:13835: acintayaj jagannāthaḥ ko nv ayaṃ śabda utthitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1906 /
GE07hv_apppu:13837: vyaktam āgatavān pauṇḍro nagarīṃ dvārakām anu / HV_App.I,31.1908 /
GE07hv_apppu:13838: tena yuddhaṃ samabhavat pauṇḍrakeṇa durātmanā // HV_App.I,31.1909 //
GE07hv_apppu:13840: śabdo 'yaṃ sumahān vṛtto nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.1911 //
GE07hv_apppu:13841: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu dadhmau śaṅkhaṃ mahāravam / HV_App.I,31.1912 /
GE07hv_apppu:13842: pāñcajanyaṃ hariḥ sākṣāt prīṇayan vṛṣṇipuṃgavān // HV_App.I,31.1913 //
GE07hv_apppu:13843: rodasī pūrayām āsa tena śabdena keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1914 /
GE07hv_apppu:13844: yādavā vṛṣṇayaś caiva śrutvā śaṅkhasya taṃ ravam // HV_App.I,31.1915 //
GE07hv_apppu:13845: vyaktam āyāti bhagavān pāñcajanyaravo hy ayam / HV_App.I,31.1916 /
GE07hv_apppu:13846: iti te menire rājan vṛṣṇayo yādavās tathā / HV_App.I,31.1917 /
GE07hv_apppu:13847: nirbhayāḥ samapadyanta vṛṣṇayo yādavā nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1918 //
GE07hv_apppu:13848: tasminn eva kṣaṇe dṛṣṭas tārkṣyaś ca patatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1919 /
GE07hv_apppu:13849: tataś ca devakīsūnur dṛṣṭas tair yādaveśvaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1920 //
GE07hv_apppu:13850: sūtāś ca māgadhāś caiva puro yānti jagatpateḥ / HV_App.I,31.1921 /
GE07hv_apppu:13851: stutyā stotuṃ hariṃ viṣṇum īśvaraṃ kamalekṣaṇam // HV_App.I,31.1922 //
GE07hv_apppu:13852: tataś ca yādavāḥ sarve parivavrur janārdanam / HV_App.I,31.1923 /
GE07hv_apppu:13853: kṛṣṇas tu garuḍaṃ bhūyo gaccha tvaṃ merum uttamam // HV_App.I,31.1924 //
GE07hv_apppu:13854: ity uktvā garuḍaṃ viṣṇur visṛjya yadupuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1925 /
GE07hv_apppu:13855: dārukaṃ punar āhedaṃ ratham ānaya me prabho // HV_App.I,31.1926 //
GE07hv_apppu:13856: sa tatheti pratijñāya ratham ānīya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1927 /
GE07hv_apppu:13857: ratho 'yaṃ bhagavan deva kim ataḥ kṛtyam asti me / HV_App.I,31.1928 /
GE07hv_apppu:13858: ity uktvā ratham ādāya praṇamyāgre sthito hareḥ // HV_App.I,31.1929 //
GE07hv_apppu:13859: gate 'tha garuḍe viṣṇū ratham āruhya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.1930 /
GE07hv_apppu:13860: yatra yuddhaṃ samabhavat tatra yāti sma keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1931 //
GE07hv_apppu:13861: tatra gatvā mahāraṅge yudhyatāṃ ca mahātmanām / HV_App.I,31.1932 /
GE07hv_apppu:13863: pauṇḍro 'tha vāsudevas tu kṛṣṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇotsukam / HV_App.I,31.1934 /
GE07hv_apppu:13864: sātyakiṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā vāsudevam upāgamat // HV_App.I,31.1935 //
GE07hv_apppu:13865: kruddho 'tha sātyakī rājan vārayām āsa pauṇḍrakam / HV_App.I,31.1936 /
GE07hv_apppu:13866: na gantavyam ito rājann eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1937 //
GE07hv_apppu:13867: jitvā māṃ gaccha rājendra paraṃ yoddhuṃ mahāraṇe / HV_App.I,31.1938 /
GE07hv_apppu:13868: kṣatriyo 'si mahāvīra sthite mayi raṇotsuke // HV_App.I,31.1939 //
GE07hv_apppu:13869: eṣa te garvam akhilaṃ nāśayiṣyāmi saṃyuge / HV_App.I,31.1940 /
GE07hv_apppu:13870: ity uktvā cāgratas tasthau gacchato yādaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.1941 //
GE07hv_apppu:13871: pauṇḍrasya śininaptā tu paśyataḥ keśavasya ha / HV_App.I,31.1942 /
GE07hv_apppu:13872: avajñāya śineḥ pautraṃ kṛṣṇam eva jagāma ha // HV_App.I,31.1943 //
GE07hv_apppu:13873: nirbhartsya sahasā bhūyaḥ sātyakiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1944 /
GE07hv_apppu:13874: gadayā prāharat pauṇḍraṃ vāsudevasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1945 /
GE07hv_apppu:13876: dṛṣṭvātha bhagavān evaṃ sātyakiṃ praśaśaṃsa ha // HV_App.I,31.1947 //
GE07hv_apppu:13877: nivārya sātyakiṃ kṛṣṇo yatheṣṭaṃ kriyatām asau / HV_App.I,31.1948 /
GE07hv_apppu:13879: tataḥ sa pauṇḍrako rājā vāsudevam uvāca ha / HV_App.I,31.1950 /
GE07hv_apppu:13880: bho bho yādavagopāla idānīṃ kva gato bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1951 //
GE07hv_apppu:13881: tvāṃ draṣṭum adya saṃprāpto vāsudevo 'smi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.1952 //
GE07hv_apppu:13882: hatvā tvāṃ sabalaṃ kṛṣṇa balair bahubhir anvitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1953 /
GE07hv_apppu:13883: gate 'tha yamalokaṃ tu tvayi keśava bandhubhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1954 /
GE07hv_apppu:13884: aham eko bhaviṣyāmi vāsudevo jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1955 //
GE07hv_apppu:13885: yac cakraṃ tava govinda prathitaṃ suprabhaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,31.1956 /
GE07hv_apppu:13886: anena mama cakreṇa pāṭito 'smi ca tad raṇe // HV_App.I,31.1957 //
GE07hv_apppu:13887: cakram astīti yad vīryaṃ tava mādhava sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,31.1958 /
GE07hv_apppu:13888: nāśayiṣyāmi tat sarvaṃ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1959 //
GE07hv_apppu:13889: śārṅgīti māṃ vijānīhi na tvaṃ śārṅgīti śabdyase / HV_App.I,31.1960 /
GE07hv_apppu:13890: śaṅkhī cāhaṃ gadī cāhaṃ cakrīti ca janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1961 /
GE07hv_apppu:13891: mām eva hi sadā brūyū rājāno vīryaśālinaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1962 //
GE07hv_apppu:13892: ādau tvaṃ ballavair vṛddho hatvā strībālakān bahūn / HV_App.I,31.1963 /
GE07hv_apppu:13893: gāś ca hatvā mahāgarvas tava saṃprati vartate // HV_App.I,31.1964 //
GE07hv_apppu:13894: tat te 'haṃ vyapaneṣyāmi yadi tiṣṭhasi matpuraḥ / HV_App.I,31.1965 /
GE07hv_apppu:13895: śastraṃ gṛhāṇa govinda yadi yoddhuṃ vyavasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1966 /
GE07hv_apppu:13896: ity uktvā bāṇam ādāya tasthau pārśve jagatpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.1967 //
GE07hv_apppu:13897: etad vacanam ākarṇya vāsudevasya bhāṣitam / HV_App.I,31.1968 /
GE07hv_apppu:13898: smitaṃ kṛtvā hariḥ kṛṣṇo babhāṣe pauṇḍrakaṃ nṛpam // HV_App.I,31.1969 //
GE07hv_apppu:13899: kāmaṃ vada nṛpa tvaṃ hi pātaky asmi sadā nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.1970 /
GE07hv_apppu:13900: goghātī bālaghātī ca strīhantā sarvathā nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1971 //
GE07hv_apppu:13901: cakrī bhava gadī rājañ śārṅgī ca satataṃ bhava / HV_App.I,31.1972 /
GE07hv_apppu:13902: nāmāsīd yad vṛthā mahyaṃ vāsudeveti ca prabho // HV_App.I,31.1973 //
GE07hv_apppu:13903: śārṅgī cakrī gadī śaṅkhīty evamādi vṛthā mama / HV_App.I,31.1974 /
GE07hv_apppu:13904: kiṃ tu vakṣyāmi kiṃcit tu śṛṇuṣva yadi manyase // HV_App.I,31.1975 //
GE07hv_apppu:13905: kṣatriyā balino ye tu sthite mayi jagatpatau / HV_App.I,31.1976 /
GE07hv_apppu:13906: tathā nu bruvate tvāṃ hi jīvaty eva mayi prabho // HV_App.I,31.1977 //
GE07hv_apppu:13907: yat te cakraṃ mahāghoraṃ sarvakālāyasaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,31.1978 /
GE07hv_apppu:13908: tat tulyaṃ mama cakrasya vṛttato na tu vīryataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1979 /
GE07hv_apppu:13909: āyudheṣv atha sarvatra śabdasādṛśyam asti te // HV_App.I,31.1980 //
GE07hv_apppu:13910: gopo 'haṃ sarvadā rājan prāṇināṃ prāṇadaḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.1981 /
GE07hv_apppu:13911: goptā sarveṣu lokeṣu śāstā duṣṭasya sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1982 //
GE07hv_apppu:13912: katthanaṃ sarvadā kāryaṃ jitvā śatrūn raṇe nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.1983 /
GE07hv_apppu:13913: ajitvā kiṃ bhavān brūte sthite mayi ca śastriṇi // HV_App.I,31.1984 //
GE07hv_apppu:13914: hatvā māṃ brūhi rājendra yadi śaknoṣi pauṇḍraka / HV_App.I,31.1985 /
GE07hv_apppu:13915: sthito 'haṃ cakram āśritya rathī cāpī gadāsimān // HV_App.I,31.1986 //
GE07hv_apppu:13916: ratham āruhya yuddhāya saṃnaddho bhava mānada / HV_App.I,31.1987 /
GE07hv_apppu:13917: ity uktvā bhagavān viṣṇuḥ siṃhanādaṃ vyanīnadat // HV_App.I,31.1988 //
GE07hv_apppu:13920: tataḥ śaraṃ samādāya vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.1989 /
GE07hv_apppu:13921: pauṇḍraṃ jaghāna sahasā niśitena śareṇa ha // HV_App.I,31.1990 //
GE07hv_apppu:13922: pauṇḍro 'tha vāsudevas tu śarair daśabhir āśugaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1991 /
GE07hv_apppu:13924: dārukaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā hayān daśabhir eva ca / HV_App.I,31.1993 /
GE07hv_apppu:13925: saptatyā vāsudevaṃ tu yādavaṃ vāsudevakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1994 //
GE07hv_apppu:13926: tataḥ prahasya suciraṃ keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1995 /
GE07hv_apppu:13928: ākṛṣṛa śārṅgaṃ balavān saṃdhāya ripumardanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1997 /
GE07hv_apppu:13929: nārācena sutīkṣṇena dhvajaṃ ciccheda keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1998 //
GE07hv_apppu:13930: sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyād āhṛtya yadupuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1999 /
GE07hv_apppu:13931: aśvāṃś ca caturo hatvā caturbhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2000 //
GE07hv_apppu:13933: cakraṃ ca tilaśaḥ kṛtvā hasan kiṃcid avasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2002 //
GE07hv_apppu:13934: pauṇḍrako vāsudevas tu rathād āplutya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.2003 /
GE07hv_apppu:13935: ādāya niśitaṃ khaḍgaṃ prāhiṇot keśavāya ha // HV_App.I,31.2004 //
GE07hv_apppu:13936: sa khaḍgaṃ śatadhā kṛtvā śarair daśabhir eva ca / HV_App.I,31.2005 /
GE07hv_apppu:13937: bālavat keśavo 'tiṣṭhan nimīlya nayane hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.2006 //
GE07hv_apppu:13938: tataḥ śaktiṃ samādāya niśitāṃ ghoravigrahām / HV_App.I,31.2007 /
GE07hv_apppu:13940: tāṃ cāpi tilaśaḥ kṛtvā tūṣṇīm āsīt sa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2009 //
GE07hv_apppu:13944: tad dvidhā jagatāṃ nāthaś cakāra yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2013 //
GE07hv_apppu:13945: tataś cakraṃ mahāghoraṃ sahasrāraṃ mahāprabham / HV_App.I,31.2014 /
GE07hv_apppu:13946: triṃśad bhārasamāyuktam ayasā nirmitaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,31.2015 /
GE07hv_apppu:13947: ādāyātha mahārāja keśavaṃ vākyam abravīt // HV_App.I,31.2016 //
GE07hv_apppu:13948: paśyedaṃ niśitaṃ ghoraṃ tava cakravināśanam / HV_App.I,31.2017 /
GE07hv_apppu:13949: anena tava govinda darpaṃ darpavatāṃ vara / HV_App.I,31.2018 /
GE07hv_apppu:13951: tvām uddiśya mahāghoraṃ kṛtaṃ mama durāsadam / HV_App.I,31.2020 /
GE07hv_apppu:13952: yadi śakto hare kṛṣṇa dārayainaṃ mahāspadam // HV_App.I,31.2021 //
GE07hv_apppu:13953: ity uktvā tac chataguṇaṃ bhrāmayitvā mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2022 /
GE07hv_apppu:13955: harim uddiśya sahasā vinadad bhairavaṃ ravam // HV_App.I,31.2024 //
GE07hv_apppu:13956: tataḥ prahasya bhagavān āpatantaṃ mahāyudham / HV_App.I,31.2025 /
GE07hv_apppu:13957: gṛhītvā balavad ghoraṃ tenaiva prāhiṇod dhariḥ // HV_App.I,31.2026 //
GE07hv_apppu:13958: dṛṣṭvā tam mahad āyāntaṃ pauṇḍrako nṛpasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2027 /
GE07hv_apppu:13959: avaplutya tato deśāt tad utsṛjya mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2028 /
GE07hv_apppu:13960: siṃhanādaṃ mahāghoraṃ vyanadad vīryavāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,31.2029 //
GE07hv_apppu:13961: tato vismayam āpanno bhagavān devakīsutaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2030 /
GE07hv_apppu:13962: aho vīryam aho dhairyam asya pauṇḍrasya duḥsaham / HV_App.I,31.2031 /
GE07hv_apppu:13963: iti matvā jagannāthaḥ sthita eva rathottame // HV_App.I,31.2032 //
GE07hv_apppu:13964: tataḥ śilāḥ samādāya preṣayām āsa keśave / HV_App.I,31.2033 /
GE07hv_apppu:13965: tāḥ śilāḥ praṣayām āsa tasmai yādavanandanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2034 //
GE07hv_apppu:13966: pauṇḍreṇa suciraṃ kālaṃ vikrīḍya bhagavān hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.2035 /
GE07hv_apppu:13967: tataś cakraṃ samādāya niśitaṃ raktabhojanam // HV_App.I,31.2036 //
GE07hv_apppu:13971: vaiṣṇavaṃ paramaṃ cakraṃ nityaṃ suragaṇārcitam // HV_App.I,31.2040 //
GE07hv_apppu:13972: viṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇo rathī śārṅgī nityayuktaḥ sadā hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.2041 /
GE07hv_apppu:13973: jaghāna tena govindaḥ pauṇḍrakaṃ nṛpasattamam // HV_App.I,31.2042 //
GE07hv_apppu:13974: tasya dehaṃ vidāryāśu cakraṃ piśitabhojanam / HV_App.I,31.2043 /
GE07hv_apppu:13975: kṛṣṇasyātha karaṃ bhūyaḥ prāpa sarveśvarasya ha / HV_App.I,31.2044 /
GE07hv_apppu:13976: tataḥ sa pauṇḍrako rājā gatāsuḥ prāpatad bhuvi // HV_App.I,31.2045 //
GE07hv_apppu:13977: nihatya bhagavān viṣṇur durvijñeyagatiḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,31.2046 /
GE07hv_apppu:13978: pratipede sudharmāṃ tu yādavaiḥ pūjito hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.2047 //
GE07hv_apppu:13981: niṣādeśaṃ tato rāmaḥ śaktyā vīryavatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2048 /
GE07hv_apppu:13983: tataḥ kruddho niṣādeśo rāmaṃ mattaṃ mahābalam / HV_App.I,31.2050 /
GE07hv_apppu:13985: āhataḥ sa tu tenāśu balabhadro mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2052 /
GE07hv_apppu:13986: ubhābhyāṃ caiva rāmas tu karābhyāṃ vṛṣṇipuṅgavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2053 /
GE07hv_apppu:13987: gadāṃ gṛhya mahāghorāṃ niṣādāya samādade // HV_App.I,31.2054 //
GE07hv_apppu:13988: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahatīṃ ghorām āyāntīṃ prāṇahāriṇīm / HV_App.I,31.2055 /
GE07hv_apppu:13990: anvadhāvat tato rāmo dhāvantaṃ makarālayam // HV_App.I,31.2057 //
GE07hv_apppu:13991: dhāvaty evaṃ tadā rājann ekalavye niṣādape / HV_App.I,31.2058 /
GE07hv_apppu:13992: dhāvaty eva ca rāmo 'pi yatra yāto niṣādapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2059 //
GE07hv_apppu:13993: sāgaraṃ sa praviśyāśu gatvā yojanapañcakam / HV_App.I,31.2060 /
GE07hv_apppu:13994: bhīta eva tadā rājann ekalavyo niṣādapaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2061 /
GE07hv_apppu:13995: kaṃcid dvīpāntaraṃ rājan praviśya jaḍavat sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2062 //
GE07hv_apppu:13996: tato rāmo niṣādeśaṃ jitvā yādavanandanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2063 /
GE07hv_apppu:13997: tāṃ sabhāṃ maṇiratnāḍhyāṃ praviveśa halāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2064 //
GE07hv_apppu:13998: sātyakir yuddhasaṃraktas tāṃ sabhāṃ praviveśa ha / HV_App.I,31.2065 /
GE07hv_apppu:13999: anye ca yādavā rājan yathāyogam upasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2066 //
GE07hv_apppu:14000: āsīneṣu ca sarveṣu vṛṣṇivīreṣu sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.2067 /
GE07hv_apppu:14001: abhivādya yathāyogaṃ vṛddhān sarvān sa keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2068 /
GE07hv_apppu:14002: uvāca vacanaṃ kāle bhagavān devakīsutaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2069 //
GE07hv_apppu:14004: sa tu mahyaṃ yaduvarāḥ prītimāṃś ca dadau varam // HV_App.I,31.2071 //
GE07hv_apppu:14005: tatra devāḥ samāyātā munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2072 /
GE07hv_apppu:14006: dṛṣṭvā māṃ śaṃkaraṃ caiva prītās tuṣṭāḥ samāyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.2073 //
GE07hv_apppu:14007: atyadbhutaṃ mayā dṛṣṭaṃ rātrau yādavasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2074 /
GE07hv_apppu:14008: piśācau dvau mahāghorau vadantau māmikāṃ kathām // HV_App.I,31.2075 //
GE07hv_apppu:14009: mṛgayāṃ cakratus tau tu cintayantau tu māṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.2076 /
GE07hv_apppu:14010: dṛṣṭvā māṃ tau tu rājendrāḥ prītimantau tapasvinau / HV_App.I,31.2077 /
GE07hv_apppu:14011: bhaktinamrau mahātmānau praṇāmaṃ cakratus tadā // HV_App.I,31.2078 //
GE07hv_apppu:14012: tato 'haṃ sarvathā prītas tau dṛṣṭvā svargam uttamam / HV_App.I,31.2079 /
GE07hv_apppu:14013: toṣayitvā mahādevam ahnā cāhaṃ tato gataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2080 //
GE07hv_apppu:14014: tatas te vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve devadevaṃ praśaṃsire / HV_App.I,31.2081 /
GE07hv_apppu:14015: sarvathā kṛtakṛtyās te vṛṣṇayaḥ keśavāśrayāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2082 /
GE07hv_apppu:14016: yādavāḥ sarva evātra svaṃ svaṃ jagmur yathālayam // HV_App.I,31.2083 //
GE07hv_apppu:14017: abhyantaraṃ jagannāthaḥ praviśya harir īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2084 /
GE07hv_apppu:14019: te prīte prītiyuktena keśavena samanvite / HV_App.I,31.2086 /
GE07hv_apppu:14020: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ keśavasya ca ceṣṭitam // HV_App.I,31.2087 //
GE07hv_apppu:14021: śaśāsa pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ duṣṭān hatvā mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2088 /
GE07hv_apppu:14022: narakaṃ ghorakarmāṇaṃ pauṇḍraṃ ca nṛpasattamam // HV_App.I,31.2089 //
GE07hv_apppu:14023: hayagrīvaṃ niśumbhaṃ ca tathā sundopasundakau / HV_App.I,31.2090 /
GE07hv_apppu:14024: rarakṣa viprān deveśo munīn munivarārcitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2091 //
GE07hv_apppu:14025: viprebhyaś ca dadau vittaṃ gāś ca ratnāni keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2092 /
GE07hv_apppu:14026: agnihotraṃ prayuñjāno brāhmaṇāṃś ca sutarpayan // HV_App.I,31.2093 //
GE07hv_apppu:14027: munīṃś ca brahmacaryeṇa devān yajñena keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2094 /
GE07hv_apppu:14028: svadhayā ca pitṝn sarvān prīṇayaty eva sarvadā // HV_App.I,31.2095 //
GE07hv_apppu:14029: tasmiñ śāsati deveśe rājyaṃ niṣkaṇṭakaṃ babhau / HV_App.I,31.2096 /
GE07hv_apppu:14030: sukham eva prajāḥ sarvā jīvanti brāhmaṇottarāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2097 //
GE07hv_apppu:14034: caritaṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa tapodhana / HV_App.I,31.2099 /
GE07hv_apppu:14035: na hi me tṛptir astīha śṛṇvataḥ kaiśavīṃ kathām // HV_App.I,31.2100 //
GE07hv_apppu:14036: ko nu nāma harer viṣṇor devadevasya cakriṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2101 /
GE07hv_apppu:14037: śṛṇvan kathāṃ smaran vāpi tṛptiṃ yāti divāniśam // HV_App.I,31.2102 //
GE07hv_apppu:14038: puruṣārtho 'yam evaiko yat kathāśravanaṃ hareḥ // HV_App.I,31.2103 //
GE07hv_apppu:14039: katham āsīj jagaddhetor haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca / HV_App.I,31.2104 /
GE07hv_apppu:14041: vicakrasya kathaṃ yuddhaṃ dānavasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2106 /
GE07hv_apppu:14042: sa tayor mitratāṃ yāta ity evam anuśuśrumaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2107 //
GE07hv_apppu:14043: tau nṛpau vīryasaṃpannau śiṣyau bhṛgusutasya ha / HV_App.I,31.2108 /
GE07hv_apppu:14044: sarvāstrakuśalau vīrau harāl labdhavarau kila // HV_App.I,31.2109 //
GE07hv_apppu:14045: saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān āsīd ity uktaṃ bhavatā purā / HV_App.I,31.2110 /
GE07hv_apppu:14046: tayoś ca nṛpayor vipra keśavasya jagatpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.2111 //
GE07hv_apppu:14047: kasya putrau samutpannau kiṃvīryau kiṃparākramau / HV_App.I,31.2112 /
GE07hv_apppu:14048: sarvam etad dvijaśreṣṭha vaktum arhasi suvrata // HV_App.I,31.2113 //
GE07hv_apppu:14050: śṛṇu rājan mahābāho kathāṃ pāpapraṇāśinīm / HV_App.I,31.2114 /
GE07hv_apppu:14051: yathā saṃgrāma āsīt tu tayoś cakradharasya ca // HV_App.I,31.2115 //
GE07hv_apppu:14052: yathā ca tau samutpannau yathābhūd vigraho mahān / HV_App.I,31.2116 /
GE07hv_apppu:14054: balāny atha vicakrasya śitaśūladharāṇi ca / HV_App.I,31.2118 /
GE07hv_apppu:14055: āsan yuddhe mahārāja dānavasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2119 //
GE07hv_apppu:14056: yadūnām antaraṃ prepsur vicakro yuddhakāṅkṣayā / HV_App.I,31.2120 /
GE07hv_apppu:14057: devāsure mahāyuddhe devān ajayad ambare / HV_App.I,31.2121 /
GE07hv_apppu:14058: tadvadārthaṃ sadā yatnam akaroc caiva keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2122 //
GE07hv_apppu:14061: āsīt sālveṣu rājendra brahmadatto nṛpottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2123 /
GE07hv_apppu:14062: nāmnā rājan sa bhūtātmā sarvabhūtadayāparaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2124 //
GE07hv_apppu:14064: brahmavid vedavic caiva sadā yajñaparaḥ śivaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2126 //
GE07hv_apppu:14067: sa tābhyāṃ mumude rājā śacyā śakra ivāmbare / HV_App.I,31.2129 /
GE07hv_apppu:14068: nāmnā mitrasaho nāma sakhā cāsīd dvijottamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2130 //
GE07hv_apppu:14070: anapatyaḥ sa viprendro yathā rājā babhūva ha // HV_App.I,31.2132 //
GE07hv_apppu:14071: sa rājā sahitas tābhyām arcayām āsa śaṃkaram / HV_App.I,31.2133 /
GE07hv_apppu:14072: putrārthaṃ śūlinaṃ śarvaṃ daśa varṣāṇy ananyadhīḥ / HV_App.I,31.2134 /
GE07hv_apppu:14073: sa vipro vaiṣṇavaṃ satraṃ putrārthaṃ samayojayat // HV_App.I,31.2135 //
GE07hv_apppu:14074: arcitas tena rājendra śaṃkaro nīlalohitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2136 /
GE07hv_apppu:14075: ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa svapne rājānam abravīt / HV_App.I,31.2137 /
GE07hv_apppu:14076: prīto 'smi tava bhadraṃ te varaṃ varaya suvrata // HV_App.I,31.2138 //
GE07hv_apppu:14077: atha rājā jagannātham uvācedaṃ svapann api / HV_App.I,31.2139 /
GE07hv_apppu:14078: putrau mama bhavetāṃ hi tathety uktvā vṛṣadhvajaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2140 /
GE07hv_apppu:14079: antardhānaṃ gataḥ śaṃbhuḥ sa ca prīto 'bhavan nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2141 //
GE07hv_apppu:14080: so 'pi mitrasaho vidvān devaṃ keśavam avyayam / HV_App.I,31.2142 /
GE07hv_apppu:14081: pañcavarṣaṃ jagannātham arcayām āsa bhaktitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2143 //
GE07hv_apppu:14082: arcitas tena vipreṇa devadevo janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2144 /
GE07hv_apppu:14083: putram ekaṃ dadau tasmai svātmanā sadṛśaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.2145 //
GE07hv_apppu:14084: te bhārye garbham ādhattāṃ tejasā śaṃkarasya ha / HV_App.I,31.2146 /
GE07hv_apppu:14085: viprabhāryā mahārāja vaiṣṇavaṃ teja ādadhāt // HV_App.I,31.2147 //
GE07hv_apppu:14086: mahiṣyau te mahāvīryau putrau śaṃkarasaṃmitau / HV_App.I,31.2148 /
GE07hv_apppu:14087: asūyetāṃ mahīpāla krameṇaiva nṛpasya ha // HV_App.I,31.2149 //
GE07hv_apppu:14088: sa tayoś ca mahārāja jātakarmādikāḥ kriyāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2150 /
GE07hv_apppu:14089: cakāra vidhivat sarvā viprasāc ca mahaddhanam // HV_App.I,31.2151 //
GE07hv_apppu:14090: sa ca vipro vinītātmā putram ekaṃ prajajñivān / HV_App.I,31.2152 /
GE07hv_apppu:14091: sākṣād iva jagannāthaṃ sthitaṃ putrātmanā nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2153 //
GE07hv_apppu:14092: jātakarmādikaṃ sarvaṃ karaṇaṃ sa cakāra ha / HV_App.I,31.2154 /
GE07hv_apppu:14093: tau kumārāv ayaṃ caiva trayaḥ savayaso 'bhavan // HV_App.I,31.2155 //
GE07hv_apppu:14094: vedān adhītya te sarvāñ śrutvā cānvīkṣikīṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.2156 /
GE07hv_apppu:14095: dhanurvedaṃ tathāstre ca nipuṇās te 'bhavaṃs tadā // HV_App.I,31.2157 //
GE07hv_apppu:14097: sa ca viprasuto rājañ janārdana iti smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2159 //
GE07hv_apppu:14098: anyonyaṃ mitratāṃ yātāḥ sarve caiva kumārakāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2160 //
GE07hv_apppu:14101: haṃsaś ca ḍibhakaś caiva tapaś cartuṃ mahāmatī / HV_App.I,31.2161 /
GE07hv_apppu:14102: manaś cakratur ātmāṃśau śaṃkarasya nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.2162 //
GE07hv_apppu:14103: gatvā tu himavatpārśvaṃ tapaś cakratur añjasā / HV_App.I,31.2163 /
GE07hv_apppu:14104: uddiśya śaṃkaraṃ śarvaṃ nīlagrīvam umāpatim // HV_App.I,31.2164 //
GE07hv_apppu:14105: vīryāstre caiva nau syātām ity ādhāya tu mānase / HV_App.I,31.2165 /
GE07hv_apppu:14106: ekāgrau prayatau bhūtvā vāyvambuprāśinau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2166 //
GE07hv_apppu:14107: namas te devadeveśa śaṃkareti divāniśam / HV_App.I,31.2167 /
GE07hv_apppu:14108: hara śarva śivānanda nīlagrīva umāpate // HV_App.I,31.2168 //
GE07hv_apppu:14109: vṛṣadhvaja virūpākṣa haryakṣa jagatāṃ pate / HV_App.I,31.2169 /
GE07hv_apppu:14113: ityādināmabhir nityaṃ stuvantau śaṃkaraṃ bhavam / HV_App.I,31.2173 /
GE07hv_apppu:14114: hṛdi kṛtvā virūpākṣaṃ tapas tepatur añjasā // HV_App.I,31.2174 //
GE07hv_apppu:14116: varṣāṇīha tadā rājan pañca cakratur ojasā // HV_App.I,31.2176 //
GE07hv_apppu:14117: tataḥ prīto 'bhavac charvas tābhyāṃ saṃyamanena ca / HV_App.I,31.2177 /
GE07hv_apppu:14118: sa dadau darśanaṃ naijaṃ vyāghracarmāmbaro haraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2178 /
GE07hv_apppu:14119: triyakṣaḥ śaṃkaraḥ śarvaḥ śūlapāṇir umāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2179 //
GE07hv_apppu:14121: tau dṛṣṭvā prītamanasau namaś cakratur añjasā // HV_App.I,31.2181 //
GE07hv_apppu:14123: varaṃ varayatāṃ bhadrau yathecchā vāṃ tathāstu vai // HV_App.I,31.2182 //
GE07hv_apppu:14124: tāv ūcatus tadā rājan prītas tvaṃ bhagavan yadi / HV_App.I,31.2183 /
GE07hv_apppu:14126: āvām ajeyau sarvātmann eṣa nau prathamo varaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2185 //
GE07hv_apppu:14127: dvitīyo nau virūpākṣa raudrāstrāṇāṃ ca saṃgrahaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2186 /
GE07hv_apppu:14128: māheśvaraṃ tathā raudram astraṃ brahmaśiro mahat // HV_App.I,31.2187 //
GE07hv_apppu:14129: abhedyaṃ kavacaṃ divyaṃ acchedyaṃ cāpi kārmukam / HV_App.I,31.2188 /
GE07hv_apppu:14130: paraśuṃ ca tathā śarva sadā rakṣārtham eva ca // HV_App.I,31.2189 //
GE07hv_apppu:14131: sahāyau dvau mahādeva bhūtau yuddhe hi gacchatoḥ / HV_App.I,31.2190 /
GE07hv_apppu:14132: evam astv iti deveśa āha bhṛṅgiriṭī haraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2191 //
GE07hv_apppu:14134: yuvām atha ca bhūteśau sahāyau satataṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,31.2193 //
GE07hv_apppu:14135: saṃgrāmaṃ gacchatāṃ ghoram etayor balaśālinoḥ / HV_App.I,31.2194 /
GE07hv_apppu:14136: ity uktvā bhagavāñ śarvas tatraivāntar adhīyata // HV_App.I,31.2195 //
GE07hv_apppu:14137: tatas tau vīryasaṃpannau haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca / HV_App.I,31.2196 /
GE07hv_apppu:14144: namaḥ śivāya śāntāya mahādevāya dhīmate / HV_App.I,31.2203 /
GE07hv_apppu:14145: ityādibhiḥ sadā devaṃ stuvantau nāmabhiḥ śivam / HV_App.I,31.2204 /
GE07hv_apppu:14146: sākṣād iva mahādevau rejatuḥ śūladhāriṇau // HV_App.I,31.2205 //
GE07hv_apppu:14147: tataḥ svabhavanaṃ gatvā pituḥ pādāv agṛhṇatām / HV_App.I,31.2206 /
GE07hv_apppu:14148: pituś ca sakhyur balinau mātuś ca caraṇau tadā // HV_App.I,31.2207 //
GE07hv_apppu:14149: janārdano 'pi dharmātmā kālena mahatā nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.2208 /
GE07hv_apppu:14151: sa ca viṣṇuṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ pītakauśeyavāsasam / HV_App.I,31.2210 /
GE07hv_apppu:14153: haṃsaś ca ḍibhakaś caiva kṛtadārau babhūvatuḥ / HV_App.I,31.2212 /
GE07hv_apppu:14154: janārdanaś ca dharmātmā kṛtadāro babhūva ha // HV_App.I,31.2213 //
GE07hv_apppu:14155: sarve te yajñaparamāḥ pañcayajñaparās tathā / HV_App.I,31.2214 /
GE07hv_apppu:14157: dharma eva paraṃ śreya iti te menire nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2216 //
GE07hv_apppu:14160: tataḥ kadācit tau vīrau mṛgayāṃ cakratuḥ kila / HV_App.I,31.2217 /
GE07hv_apppu:14161: janārdanena sahitau rathair aśvair gajair api // HV_App.I,31.2218 //
GE07hv_apppu:14162: vanaṃ gatvā tu tau vīrau siṃhavyāghrāṃś ca jaghnatuḥ / HV_App.I,31.2219 /
GE07hv_apppu:14163: śitair bāṇair mahārāja varāhān atha sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2220 /
GE07hv_apppu:14164: vyālān anyān mṛgān hiṃsrāñ śvabhiś ca sahitau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2221 //
GE07hv_apppu:14165: eṣa āyāti vipulo varāho dīrghalocanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2222 /
GE07hv_apppu:14166: enaṃ bāṇena saṃchindhi yāti cāyaṃ mṛgādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2223 /
GE07hv_apppu:14168: ete khalu mṛgāḥ sārdhaṃ śāvair dhāvanti sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.2225 /
GE07hv_apppu:14169: etad bhramati sarvatra bhītaṃ śaśakulaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,31.2226 //
GE07hv_apppu:14170: śāvais tadanvayaiḥ sārdhaṃ na hantavyam idaṃ śubham / HV_App.I,31.2227 /
GE07hv_apppu:14171: grahītavyam idaṃ sarvaṃ nirudhya śvagaṇair iha // HV_App.I,31.2228 //
GE07hv_apppu:14172: ity ādiśabdaḥ sumahān mṛgayāṃ kurvatāṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.2229 /
GE07hv_apppu:14173: kṣatriyāṇāṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha vyādhānāṃ caiva dhāvatām // HV_App.I,31.2230 //
GE07hv_apppu:14174: hatvā mṛgān subahuśo vyāghrān siṃhān nṛpottamau / HV_App.I,31.2231 /
GE07hv_apppu:14175: śramaṃ ca jagmatur vīrau madhyaṃ gacchati bhāskare // HV_App.I,31.2232 //
GE07hv_apppu:14176: alaṃ hi mṛgayāsmākaṃ śramaḥ samupajāyate / HV_App.I,31.2233 /
GE07hv_apppu:14177: ity ūcatur mahārāja puṣkaraṃ jagmatuḥ saraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2234 //
GE07hv_apppu:14179: vījanmārutasānūpaṃ śramāt tatra sukhaṃ sthitau // HV_App.I,31.2236 //
GE07hv_apppu:14180: tato janāḥ saraḥ sarve vigāhya śramakarśitāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2237 /
GE07hv_apppu:14181: bisān pravālān padmānāṃ bhakṣayām āsur ārtavat // HV_App.I,31.2238 //
GE07hv_apppu:14182: janārdanena sahitau haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca / HV_App.I,31.2239 /
GE07hv_apppu:14183: saraḥ kvacit samāśritya śramaṃ saṃtyajya tiṣṭhataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2240 //
GE07hv_apppu:14185: vigāhyaḥ tatsaraḥ svādu śītaṃ pītvā jalaṃ ca tau / **HV_App.I,31.2240**19:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:14186: viśramya sarasas tīre tadāsāte sukhaṃ nṛpau / HV_App.I,31.2241 /
GE07hv_apppu:14187: aśṛṇvatāṃ paraṃ brahma munimukhyaiḥ samīritam / HV_App.I,31.2242 /
GE07hv_apppu:14188: mādhyaṃdinaṃ tathā sarvaiḥ savanaṃ sasvaraṃ nṛpau // HV_App.I,31.2243 //
GE07hv_apppu:14189: tataḥ prītau nṛpau bhūtvā śrutvā vedadhvaniṃ tadā / HV_App.I,31.2244 /
GE07hv_apppu:14190: aicchetāṃ tau tadā draṣṭuṃ yajñaṃ munikṛtaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,31.2245 //
GE07hv_apppu:14191: sthāpayitvā tataḥ senāṃ sarvāṃ mṛgasamanvitām / HV_App.I,31.2246 /
GE07hv_apppu:14192: ādāya ca mahācāpe śarān katicid eva ca // HV_App.I,31.2247 //
GE07hv_apppu:14193: janārdanas tadā vīro haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca / HV_App.I,31.2248 /
GE07hv_apppu:14194: padātinau mahārāja jagmatuś cāśramaṃ kila // HV_App.I,31.2249 //
GE07hv_apppu:14199: janārdanaś ca dharmātmā haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca / HV_App.I,31.2252 /
GE07hv_apppu:14200: sadaḥ praviśya satrasya namaś cakrur munīṃs tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2253 //
GE07hv_apppu:14201: tān āgatān mahātmāno munayaḥ śiṣyasaṃyutāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2254 /
GE07hv_apppu:14202: arghyapādyāsanādīni cakruḥ pūjāṃ ca yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2255 //
GE07hv_apppu:14203: tau nṛpau sa ca viprendraḥ saparyāṃ pratigṛhya ca / HV_App.I,31.2256 /
GE07hv_apppu:14204: prītātmānau mahātmānau āsate susukhaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2257 //
GE07hv_apppu:14205: tato haṃso babhāṣe tān munīn saṃyatavāṅ nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.2258 /
GE07hv_apppu:14206: pitā hi nau muniśreṣṭhā yaṣṭum aicchat sasādhanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2259 /
GE07hv_apppu:14207: gantavyaṃ tatra yuṣmābhiḥ satrānte munisattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2260 //
GE07hv_apppu:14208: rājasūyena yajñena kṛtvā digvijayaṃ vayam / HV_App.I,31.2261 /
GE07hv_apppu:14209: yājayiṣyāmahe viprāḥ pitaraṃ dhārmikaṃ nṛpam / HV_App.I,31.2262 /
GE07hv_apppu:14210: āyāntu tatra viprendrāḥ saśiṣyāḥ saparicchadāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2263 //
GE07hv_apppu:14211: vayam adyaiva sahitā diśo jeṣyāmahe dhruvam / HV_App.I,31.2264 /
GE07hv_apppu:14212: śaktā hi vayam evaitat kartuṃ sainikasaṃcayaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2265 //
GE07hv_apppu:14213: āvayoḥ purataḥ sthātuṃ na śaktā devadānavāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2266 /
GE07hv_apppu:14214: kailāsanilayād devād varaṃ labdhāḥ sma yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2267 //
GE07hv_apppu:14215: ajeyāḥ śatrusaṃghānām astrāṇi vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,31.2268 /
GE07hv_apppu:14216: ity uktvā virarāmaiva haṃso balamadānvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2269 //
GE07hv_apppu:14218: yadi syāt tatra gacchāmo vayaṃ śiṣyair nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.2270 /
GE07hv_apppu:14219: āsmahe cānyathā rājann ity ūcuḥ kila tāpasāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2271 //
GE07hv_apppu:14222: tato deśān mahārāja gantuṃ niścitamānasau / HV_App.I,31.2272 /
GE07hv_apppu:14223: puṣkarasyottaraṃ tīraṃ durvāsā yatra tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,31.2273 //
GE07hv_apppu:14224: yatayo yatayo bhūtvā yatra brahmaniṣeviṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2274 /
GE07hv_apppu:14227: tam ātmānaṃ jagadyoniṃ viṣṇuṃ viśveśvaraṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.2277 //
GE07hv_apppu:14228: brahmarūpaṃ śivaṃ śāntam akṣaraṃ sarvatomukham / HV_App.I,31.2278 /
GE07hv_apppu:14229: vedāntamūrtim avyaktam anantaṃ śāśvataṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.2279 //
GE07hv_apppu:14231: dhyāyantaṃ sarvadā devaṃ manasā sarvatomukham // HV_App.I,31.2281 //
GE07hv_apppu:14234: haṃsāḥ paramahaṃsāś ca śiṣyā durvāsasaḥ prabho / HV_App.I,31.2284 /
GE07hv_apppu:14235: gatvā tatra mahātmānau dṛṣṭvā tān ūrdhvaretasaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2285 //
GE07hv_apppu:14236: durvāsasaṃ mahābuddhiṃ vicinvānaṃ paraṃ padam / HV_App.I,31.2286 /
GE07hv_apppu:14237: kruddho yadi sa durvāsā dagdhuṃ lokān imān kṣamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2287 //
GE07hv_apppu:14238: devā api ca yaṃ draṣṭuṃ kruddhaṃ cen na kṣamāḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.2288 /
GE07hv_apppu:14239: roṣamūrtiḥ sadā yas tu viśvātmā viśvarūpadhṛk // HV_App.I,31.2289 //
GE07hv_apppu:14240: raktakaupīn avasano haṃsaḥ parama eva ca / HV_App.I,31.2290 /
GE07hv_apppu:14241: dṛṣṭvenaṃ ca tayor evaṃ buddhir āsīn mahāmate // HV_App.I,31.2291 //
GE07hv_apppu:14242: ko nāmāsau mahābhūtaḥ kāṣāyī varṇavittamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2292 /
GE07hv_apppu:14243: kaścāyam āśramo nāma vihāya ca gṛhāśramam // HV_App.I,31.2293 //
GE07hv_apppu:14244: gṛhastha eva dharmātmā gṛhastho dharmavittamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2294 /
GE07hv_apppu:14245: gṛhastho dharmarūpas tu gṛhasthaḥ svarga eva ca // HV_App.I,31.2295 //
GE07hv_apppu:14246: gṛhasthaś ca sadā mātā prāṇināṃ jīvanaṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.2296 /
GE07hv_apppu:14247: taṃ vinānyena rūpeṇa vartate yo hi mūrkhavat // HV_App.I,31.2297 //
GE07hv_apppu:14248: unmatto 'yaṃ virūpo 'yam atha vā mūrkha eva ca / HV_App.I,31.2298 /
GE07hv_apppu:14249: dhyāyann iva sadā cāyam āste vañcayitāpi vā // HV_App.I,31.2299 //
GE07hv_apppu:14250: kim ete prākṛtajñānā dhyāyanta iva kiṃcana / HV_App.I,31.2300 /
GE07hv_apppu:14252: sthāpayiṣyāmahe sarvān mandabuddhīn imān gṛhe / HV_App.I,31.2302 /
GE07hv_apppu:14253: balād eva dvijān etān mūḍhavijñānatatparān / HV_App.I,31.2303 /
GE07hv_apppu:14254: asadgrāhagṛhītāṃś ca bāliśān durmatīn imān // HV_App.I,31.2304 //
GE07hv_apppu:14255: eṣāṃ śāstā ca ko mūḍho na vidmo vayam atra ha / HV_App.I,31.2305 /
GE07hv_apppu:14256: dharmye vartmani saṃsthāpya punar yāsyāva nirvṛtau // HV_App.I,31.2306 //
GE07hv_apppu:14257: iti saṃcintya tau vīrau vipreṇa sahitau nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.2307 /
GE07hv_apppu:14258: janārdanena rājānau mohād bhāgyakṣayān nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2308 //
GE07hv_apppu:14259: samīpaṃ tasya rājendra yateḥ saṃśitacetasaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2309 /
GE07hv_apppu:14260: gatvā ca procatur ubhau durvāsasamatīndriyam / HV_App.I,31.2310 /
GE07hv_apppu:14261: yatīṃś ca niyatān kruddhau rājānau rājasattama // HV_App.I,31.2311 //
GE07hv_apppu:14264: jñānaleśād vihīnātman kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ dvija / HV_App.I,31.2312 /
GE07hv_apppu:14265: kaś cāyam āśramo vipra bhavatā yaḥ samāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2313 //
GE07hv_apppu:14266: gṛhamedhaṃ parityajya kiṃ tvayā sādhitaṃ padam / HV_App.I,31.2314 /
GE07hv_apppu:14267: dambha eva bhavān vyaktaṃ śaṅke nāsty atra kāraṇam // HV_App.I,31.2315 //
GE07hv_apppu:14268: lokāṃś cemān sadā mūḍha nāśayiṣyasi nirvṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2316 /
GE07hv_apppu:14269: etān sarvān vinetāsi narake pātayiṣyasi // HV_App.I,31.2317 //
GE07hv_apppu:14270: svayaṃ naṣṭaḥ parān mūrkha nāśayiṣyasi yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.2318 /
GE07hv_apppu:14271: aho śāstā kathaṃ nāsti tava mandamate dvija // HV_App.I,31.2319 //
GE07hv_apppu:14272: sarvathā tvadvinetā ca pāpaṃ nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2320 /
GE07hv_apppu:14273: tyaktvemam āśramaṃ vipra gṛhī bhava yatātmavān // HV_App.I,31.2321 //
GE07hv_apppu:14274: pañca yajñān sadā vipra kuru yatnaparo bhava / HV_App.I,31.2322 /
GE07hv_apppu:14275: tataḥ svargaṃ paraṃ gantā svarge hi sumahat sukham / HV_App.I,31.2323 /
GE07hv_apppu:14276: eṣa śreyaḥpatho vipra jīvate cet spṛhā tava // HV_App.I,31.2324 //
GE07hv_apppu:14277: ity uktavantau dharmātmā śrutvā vipro janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2325 /
GE07hv_apppu:14278: uvāca ca yatiṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇamyāsau subhītavat // HV_App.I,31.2326 //
GE07hv_apppu:14279: mā brūtām īdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ rājānau mandacetasau / HV_App.I,31.2327 /
GE07hv_apppu:14280: aśrāvyam īdṛśaṃ ghoraṃ lokayor ubhayor api // HV_App.I,31.2328 //
GE07hv_apppu:14281: ko vaktum īśo mandātmā yadi jīvet sabāndhavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2329 /
GE07hv_apppu:14282: sarvathā kāla evāyaṃ yuvayor mandacetasoḥ / HV_App.I,31.2330 /
GE07hv_apppu:14283: samāpta āyuṣaḥ śeṣo brahmadaṇḍahatau yuvām // HV_App.I,31.2331 //
GE07hv_apppu:14284: ete hi yatayaḥ śuddhā jñānadīpitacetasaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2332 /
GE07hv_apppu:14286: ṛte vām īdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ kaḥ samartho hy anubruvan / HV_App.I,31.2334 /
GE07hv_apppu:14287: sarvathā jñātam asmābhiḥ samāptam iha jīvitam // HV_App.I,31.2335 //
GE07hv_apppu:14288: catvāra āśramāḥ pūrvam ṛṣibhir vihitā nṛpau / HV_App.I,31.2336 /
GE07hv_apppu:14289: brahmacārī gṛhasthaś ca vānaprasthaś ca bhikṣukaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2337 //
GE07hv_apppu:14290: teṣām agraś caturtho 'yam āśramo bhikṣukaḥ smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2338 /
GE07hv_apppu:14291: āste tasmin mahābuddhiḥ sa hi puṇyatamaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2339 //
GE07hv_apppu:14292: nopāsitā bhavadbhyāṃ ca vṛddhāḥ samyag vinītavat / HV_App.I,31.2340 /
GE07hv_apppu:14293: jñānaṃ nāptaṃ tatas tebhyas tathā caivaṃ vadeta kaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2341 //
GE07hv_apppu:14294: aśrāvyam īdṛśaṃ ghoraṃ mayā prāṇabhṛtā nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.2342 /
GE07hv_apppu:14295: kiṃ kariṣyāmi mandātman mitratvād bhavator nṛpau // HV_App.I,31.2343 //
GE07hv_apppu:14296: jñānaṃ yad āptaṃ bhavatā gurubhyas @ HV_App.I,31.2344 @
GE07hv_apppu:14297: tad atra duḥkhāya hi kevalaṃ naḥ / HV_App.I,31.2345 /
GE07hv_apppu:14300: yuvāṃ vihāya yāsye vā pateyaṃ vā śilātale / HV_App.I,31.2348 /
GE07hv_apppu:14301: pibeyaṃ vā viṣaṃ ghoraṃ pateyaṃ vā mahormiṣu // HV_App.I,31.2349 //
GE07hv_apppu:14302: ātmānaṃ vātra saṃtyakṣye śṛṇvatāṃ paśyatāṃ nṛpau / HV_App.I,31.2350 /
GE07hv_apppu:14303: ity uktvā vilalāpaivaṃ mā brūteti sadā vadan // HV_App.I,31.2351 //
GE07hv_apppu:14306: tataḥ kruddho 'tha durvāsā dhakṣyann iva tayor asūn / HV_App.I,31.2352 /
GE07hv_apppu:14308: paśyaṃs tau ca durātmānau roṣavyākulitendriyaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2354 /
GE07hv_apppu:14309: kurvann iva tadā lokān bhasmabhūtān imān nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2355 //
GE07hv_apppu:14310: brāhmaṇaṃ cakṣuṣā paśyan saumyenānyena kevalam / HV_App.I,31.2356 /
GE07hv_apppu:14311: uvāca vacanaṃ rājan dhvaṃsata dhvaṃsateti ha // HV_App.I,31.2357 //
GE07hv_apppu:14312: ito gacchata rājānau kiṃ vilambatha māciram / HV_App.I,31.2358 /
GE07hv_apppu:14313: na vāṃ vacanasaṃbhūtaṃ roṣaṃ dhārayituṃ kṣamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2359 //
GE07hv_apppu:14314: anyathā vo mahīpālān sarvān dagdhum ahaṃ kṣamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2360 /
GE07hv_apppu:14315: kim ataḥ sāhasaṃ vaktuṃ kaś ca śaknoti matpuraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2361 //
GE07hv_apppu:14317: vyapaneṣyati mandajñau kiṃ vā vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.2363 //
GE07hv_apppu:14318: tata utthāya dharmātmā gantum aicchad yatīśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2364 /
GE07hv_apppu:14319: tato niṣeddhuṃ haṃsas taṃ yatate sma yatīśvaram // HV_App.I,31.2365 //
GE07hv_apppu:14320: tasya bāhuṃ samādāya haṃso nṛpavarottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2366 /
GE07hv_apppu:14321: kaupīnaṃ cicchide krūraḥ kṛtānta iva sattama // HV_App.I,31.2367 //
GE07hv_apppu:14322: yatayo 'nye palāyanti diśo daśa vicetasaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2368 //
GE07hv_apppu:14323: kaṣṭaṃ heti vadan vipro mitrabhāvāj janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2369 /
GE07hv_apppu:14324: nyavārayad yathāśakti kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ tv iti // HV_App.I,31.2370 //
GE07hv_apppu:14325: durvāsāḥ satyadharmas tu hantum īśo 'pi taṃ tataḥ / HV_App.I,31.2371 /
GE07hv_apppu:14326: mandaṃ mandam uvācedaṃ haṃsaṃ ḍibhakam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.2372 //
GE07hv_apppu:14328: tathāpi na karomy evaṃ yatayo hy atra te vayam // HV_App.I,31.2374 //
GE07hv_apppu:14329: yo hi devo jagannāthaḥ keśavo yādaveśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2375 /
GE07hv_apppu:14331: loke tasmin yaduśreṣṭhe rakṣaty eva jagatpatau / HV_App.I,31.2377 /
GE07hv_apppu:14332: yuvayoḥ sarvathā jīvaḥ sujīva iti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2378 //
GE07hv_apppu:14333: jarāsaṃdho 'pi vāṃ bandhuḥ sa ca vaktuṃ na cecchati / HV_App.I,31.2379 /
GE07hv_apppu:14334: īdṛśaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ sa hi dharmapathe sadā // HV_App.I,31.2380 //
GE07hv_apppu:14335: etāvatā sa vāṃ bandhur na sa bhūyo bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,31.2381 /
GE07hv_apppu:14336: vidveṣo hy astu vāṃ tasya māgadhasya mahīpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.2382 //
GE07hv_apppu:14337: śrutvedaṃ ghorarūpaṃ tu sa hi bandhuḥ saheta cet / HV_App.I,31.2383 /
GE07hv_apppu:14338: dharmanāśo bhavet tasya nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.2384 //
GE07hv_apppu:14339: ity uktvā gaccha gaccheti haṃsaṃ prāha punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2385 /
GE07hv_apppu:14341: svasty astu tava viprendra bhaktir astu janārdane / HV_App.I,31.2387 /
GE07hv_apppu:14343: adya śvo vā paraśvo vā sādhur eva sadā bhavān // HV_App.I,31.2389 //
GE07hv_apppu:14344: na hi sādhor vināśo 'sti lokayor ubhayor api / HV_App.I,31.2390 /
GE07hv_apppu:14345: gaccha sarvaṃ pitur brūhi jñātvā vṛttaṃ yathākhilam // HV_App.I,31.2391 //
GE07hv_apppu:14348: tatas tau haṃsaḍibhakau kruddhau kālena coditau / HV_App.I,31.2392 /
GE07hv_apppu:14349: śikyaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ caiva vidalaṃ dārum eva ca // HV_App.I,31.2393 //
GE07hv_apppu:14350: daṇḍān pātraviśeṣāṃś ca chittvā mittvā ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2394 /
GE07hv_apppu:14351: tasmin deśe mahārāja vyādhair māṃsāny adīdahan / HV_App.I,31.2395 /
GE07hv_apppu:14352: bhakṣayitvā tato deśāt svapuraṃ tau prajagmatuḥ // HV_App.I,31.2396 //
GE07hv_apppu:14353: janārdanaś ca dharmātmā snehād anuyayau tayoḥ / HV_App.I,31.2397 /
GE07hv_apppu:14354: naṣṭāv imāv iti tadā sa mene duḥkhitaḥ param // HV_App.I,31.2398 //
GE07hv_apppu:14355: gateṣu teṣu sarveṣu durvāsā yatisattamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2399 /
GE07hv_apppu:14356: palāyanaparān sarvān idam āha yatīśvarān // HV_App.I,31.2400 //
GE07hv_apppu:14357: ito deśād vinirgatya puṣkarāt puṇyasaṃyutāt / HV_App.I,31.2401 /
GE07hv_apppu:14358: mandaṃ mandaṃ samāśvasya viśramya ca tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2402 //
GE07hv_apppu:14360: dṛṣṭvā ca tasmai prabhave vakṣyāmo yatisattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2404 //
GE07hv_apppu:14361: sa hi rakṣañ jagad idaṃ dharmavartmani saṃsthitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2405 /
GE07hv_apppu:14362: ādyo lokagurur viṣṇur yatātmā tattvavitpriyaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2406 /
GE07hv_apppu:14363: uddhṛtya kaṇṭakān sarvāñ śaśāsa pṛthivīm imām // HV_App.I,31.2407 //
GE07hv_apppu:14364: sa ca pāpān mahāghorān sarvān pāpakṛtān prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,31.2408 /
GE07hv_apppu:14365: rakṣen naḥ sakalān sarvāñ jñāneṣu niyatātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2409 /
GE07hv_apppu:14366: idam adya kṣamaṃ viprā yānam adya vidhīyatāṃ // HV_App.I,31.2410 //
GE07hv_apppu:14367: sāhasaṃ yat kṛtaṃ tābhyāṃ pātrabhedādi sattamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2411 /
GE07hv_apppu:14368: etat sarvam aśeṣeṇa darśayāma janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.2412 //
GE07hv_apppu:14369: tatheti te pratijñāya yatayo jñānacakṣuṣaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2413 /
GE07hv_apppu:14370: chinnāṃs tābhyāṃ samādāya śikyaṃ dārumayaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,31.2414 //
GE07hv_apppu:14371: dvidalaṃ karpaṭaṃ caiva kaupīnam atha valkalam / HV_App.I,31.2415 /
GE07hv_apppu:14373: etān anyān samādāya draṣṭuṃ keśavam āyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.2417 //
GE07hv_apppu:14374: pañca caiva sahasrāṇi puraskṛtya mahāmunim / HV_App.I,31.2418 /
GE07hv_apppu:14376: ahorātreṇa te sarve dvārakāṃ kṛṣṇapālitām / HV_App.I,31.2420 /
GE07hv_apppu:14377: yayur dāntā mahātmāno lomaśāḥ keśavarjitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2421 //
GE07hv_apppu:14378: prātaḥ praviśya rājendra vāpikāyāṃ yatīśvarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2422 /
GE07hv_apppu:14379: snātvopaspṛśya śucayo yatnena mahatā tadā // HV_App.I,31.2423 //
GE07hv_apppu:14387: avyaktaḥ śāśvato devaḥ sakalo niṣkalaḥ śivaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2429 //
GE07hv_apppu:14389: kumārair aparaiḥ sārdhaṃ sātyakipramukhair nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2431 //
GE07hv_apppu:14391: cakāra priyakṛt kṛṣṇo yuyudhānena keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2433 //
GE07hv_apppu:14392: mamāyaṃ prathamo golas tava paścād bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,31.2434 /
GE07hv_apppu:14393: iti bruvaṃs tadā viṣṇuḥ sātyakiṃ kamalekṣaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2435 //
GE07hv_apppu:14395: uddhavapramukhā rājann āseduḥ kvacid atra vai // HV_App.I,31.2437 //
GE07hv_apppu:14397: vijahāra yathā rāmaḥ sugrīveṇa purā nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2439 //
GE07hv_apppu:14399: vikrīḍya suciraṃ kṛṣna upāraṃsīt sayādavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2441 //
GE07hv_apppu:14400: dvāḥsthena vāritāḥ pūrvaṃ dvāry eva ca samāsthitāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2442 /
GE07hv_apppu:14401: idam antaram ity eva viviśus tāṃ sabhāṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2443 //
GE07hv_apppu:14408: yatayaś ca mahārāja pratyadṛśyanta tatpuraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2450 /
GE07hv_apppu:14410: vasudevas tathākrūra ugrasenas tathā nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2452 //
GE07hv_apppu:14411: anye ca yādavāḥ sarve saṃbhramaṃ pratipedire / HV_App.I,31.2453 /
GE07hv_apppu:14412: idaṃ kim idam ity evaṃ vyāsaktamanaso 'bhavan // HV_App.I,31.2454 //
GE07hv_apppu:14414: ardhakaupīnavasanaṃ smarantaṃ kam api dvijam // HV_App.I,31.2456 //
GE07hv_apppu:14418: durvāsasaṃ te dadṛśur bhītā yādavasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2460 //
GE07hv_apppu:14419: kiṃ kariṣyaty asau kruddhaḥ kiṃ vā vakṣyati naḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,31.2461 /
GE07hv_apppu:14420: iti prāñjalayaḥ sarve yādavāḥ saṃprapedire / HV_App.I,31.2462 /
GE07hv_apppu:14421: idam āsanam ity evaṃ kiṃcid ūcuś ca vṛṣṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2463 //
GE07hv_apppu:14422: tataḥ kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśaḥ kiṃcid utplutya tatpuraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2464 /
GE07hv_apppu:14423: idam āsanam ity evaṃ sthīyatām iha nirvṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2465 //
GE07hv_apppu:14424: aham atra sthito vipra kiṃ karomīti cābravīt / HV_App.I,31.2466 /
GE07hv_apppu:14425: tataḥ kiṃcid ivāsīna āsane yativigrahaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2467 //
GE07hv_apppu:14426: āsane saṃsthite tasmin yatayo vītamatsarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2468 /
GE07hv_apppu:14427: āsanāni yathāyogaṃ bhejire nirvṛtāḥ kila // HV_App.I,31.2469 //
GE07hv_apppu:14429: āha bhūyo hṛṣīkeśo yatiṃ durvāsasaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,31.2471 /
GE07hv_apppu:14430: kim arthaṃ brūhi viprendra asmin pratyāgamo hi vaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2472 //
GE07hv_apppu:14431: dṛṣṭaṃ vāpy atha vā kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ vo 'sti vā mahat / HV_App.I,31.2473 /
GE07hv_apppu:14433: niḥspṛhāś ca sadā yūyam asmatto dvijapuṅgavāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2475 /
GE07hv_apppu:14434: prārthyaṃ nāma na caivāsti spṛhā naivāsti vo yataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2476 //
GE07hv_apppu:14436: nirūpyamāṇam asmābhir vipra kiṃcin na dṛśyate // HV_App.I,31.2478 //
GE07hv_apppu:14437: na jāne kāraṇaṃ brahman yuṣmadāgamanaṃ prati / HV_App.I,31.2479 /
GE07hv_apppu:14438: etāvatā cānumeyaṃ kiṃcit kāraṇam asti hi / HV_App.I,31.2480 /
GE07hv_apppu:14439: tad brūhi yadi vidyeta tvatto jñāsyāmahe vayam // HV_App.I,31.2481 //
GE07hv_apppu:14440: ity uktavati deveśe cakrapāṇau janārdane / HV_App.I,31.2482 /
GE07hv_apppu:14441: tasyāpi rājan viprasya bhūyaḥ kopo mahān abhūt / HV_App.I,31.2483 /
GE07hv_apppu:14442: tasmād abhyadhikaḥ pūrvāt kopaḥ saṃjāyate mahān // HV_App.I,31.2484 //
GE07hv_apppu:14443: didhakṣann iva lokāṃs trīn bhakṣayann iva paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.2485 /
GE07hv_apppu:14444: roṣaraktekṣaṇaḥ kruddho hasann iva dahann iva / HV_App.I,31.2486 /
GE07hv_apppu:14445: uvāca vacanaṃ viṣṇuṃ durvāsāḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2487 //
GE07hv_apppu:14446: na jāna iti kasmāt tvaṃ brūṣe no yādaveśvara / HV_App.I,31.2488 /
GE07hv_apppu:14447: jānāmi tvām ahaṃ deva vañcayann iva bhāṣase / HV_App.I,31.2489 /
GE07hv_apppu:14450: nigūhase prabhur ataḥ kasmān no jagatīpate // HV_App.I,31.2492 //
GE07hv_apppu:14451: so 'si brahmavidāṃ mūrtis tad etat paramaṃ padam / HV_App.I,31.2493 /
GE07hv_apppu:14452: yad avyaktaṃ paraṃ brahma yac ca jñātā vayaṃ purā // HV_App.I,31.2494 //
GE07hv_apppu:14453: yato viśvam idaṃ bhūtaṃ tad etat paramaṃ padaṃ / HV_App.I,31.2495 /
GE07hv_apppu:14454: yac ca sthūlaṃ vijānanti purā tattvena cetasā // HV_App.I,31.2496 //
GE07hv_apppu:14455: purāvido 'tha viśveśa tad etat paramaṃ vapuḥ / HV_App.I,31.2497 /
GE07hv_apppu:14456: karmaṇā prāpyate yat tu yat smṛtvā nirvṛtā vayam // HV_App.I,31.2498 //
GE07hv_apppu:14457: pratyakṣam api yad rūpaṃ naiva jānanti māṇuṣāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2499 /
GE07hv_apppu:14458: na hi mūḍhadhiyo deva na vayaṃ tādṛśā hare // HV_App.I,31.2500 //
GE07hv_apppu:14459: na jāna iti kasmāt tvaṃ kim ataḥ sāhasaṃ vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2501 /
GE07hv_apppu:14460: ye hi mūlaṃ vijānanti teṣāṃ patravivecanam // HV_App.I,31.2502 //
GE07hv_apppu:14461: kurvataḥ kiṃ phalaṃ deva tava keśiniṣūdana / HV_App.I,31.2503 /
GE07hv_apppu:14462: vedānte prathitaṃ tejas tava cedaṃ vibhāvyate // HV_App.I,31.2504 //
GE07hv_apppu:14463: yac ca vijñānatṛptās tu yogino vītakalmaṣāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2505 /
GE07hv_apppu:14464: paśyanti hṛtsaroje hi tad evedaṃ vapuḥ prabho // HV_App.I,31.2506 //
GE07hv_apppu:14465: vedair yad gīyate tejo brahmeti pravibhajyate / HV_App.I,31.2507 /
GE07hv_apppu:14466: tad evedaṃ vijāne 'haṃ rūpam aiśvaram īśvara // HV_App.I,31.2508 //
GE07hv_apppu:14467: vaiṣṇavaṃ paramaṃ teja iti vedeṣu paṭhyate / HV_App.I,31.2509 /
GE07hv_apppu:14468: avagacchāmy ahaṃ viṣṇo tad evedaṃ vapus tava // HV_App.I,31.2510 //
GE07hv_apppu:14469: ya om ity ucyate śabdo yasya vāg iti gīyate / HV_App.I,31.2511 /
GE07hv_apppu:14470: sa evāsi prabho viṣṇo na jāna iti mā vada // HV_App.I,31.2512 //
GE07hv_apppu:14471: parokṣaṃ yadi kiṃcit syāt tava vaktuṃ prayujyate / HV_App.I,31.2513 /
GE07hv_apppu:14472: na jāna iti govinda mā vadīḥ sāhasaṃ hare // HV_App.I,31.2514 //
GE07hv_apppu:14473: viśvaṃ yataḥ prādur āsīd yasmiṃl līnaṃ kṣaye sati / HV_App.I,31.2515 /
GE07hv_apppu:14474: idaṃ tad aiśvaraṃ tejas tv avagacchāmi keśava // HV_App.I,31.2516 //
GE07hv_apppu:14475: kartā tvaṃ bhūtabhavyeśa pratibhāsi sadā hṛdi / HV_App.I,31.2517 /
GE07hv_apppu:14476: yad yad rūpaṃ smaren nityaṃ tat tad evāsi me hṛdi // HV_App.I,31.2518 //
GE07hv_apppu:14477: vāyur eva sadā viṣṇur iti me dhīyate matiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2519 /
GE07hv_apppu:14478: tadā tad rūpam evāsi hṛnmadhye saṃsthito vibho // HV_App.I,31.2520 //
GE07hv_apppu:14479: ākāśo viṣṇur ity eva kadācid dhīyate matiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2521 /
GE07hv_apppu:14480: tadā tad rūpam evāsi hṛnmadhye saṃsthito vibho // HV_App.I,31.2522 //
GE07hv_apppu:14481: pṛthivī viṣṇur ity etat kadācid dhīyate matiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2523 /
GE07hv_apppu:14482: tadā pārthivarūpo 'si pratibhāsi sadā mama // HV_App.I,31.2524 //
GE07hv_apppu:14483: raso 'yaṃ deva ity eva kadācic cintyate mayā / HV_App.I,31.2525 /
GE07hv_apppu:14484: tadā rasātmanā viṣṇo hṛnmadhye saṃsthito vibho // HV_App.I,31.2526 //
GE07hv_apppu:14485: yadā tvaṃ teja ity eva smartā syāṃ puruṣottama / HV_App.I,31.2527 /
GE07hv_apppu:14486: yadā tadrūpasaṃpannaḥ pratibhāsi sadā hṛdi // HV_App.I,31.2528 //
GE07hv_apppu:14487: candramā harir ity eva tadā cāndramasaṃ vapuḥ / HV_App.I,31.2529 /
GE07hv_apppu:14488: nirīkṣaṃś cakṣuṣā deva tataḥ prīto 'smi keśava // HV_App.I,31.2530 //
GE07hv_apppu:14489: yadā sauraṃ vapur iti smartā syāṃ jagatīpate / HV_App.I,31.2531 /
GE07hv_apppu:14490: tadā tadbhāvanāyogāt sūrya eva virājase // HV_App.I,31.2532 //
GE07hv_apppu:14491: tasmāt sarvaṃ tvam evāsi niścitā matir īdṛśī / HV_App.I,31.2533 /
GE07hv_apppu:14492: ato na jāne 'ham iti vaktuṃ neśo janārdana // HV_App.I,31.2534 //
GE07hv_apppu:14493: ity arthe saṃsthito viṣṇo pīḍāṃ no naiva cintyase / HV_App.I,31.2535 /
GE07hv_apppu:14494: atyantaduḥkhitā viṣṇo vayaṃ tvām anu saṃsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2536 //
GE07hv_apppu:14495: īdṛśīyam avasthā no naināṃ smartāsi keśava / HV_App.I,31.2537 /
GE07hv_apppu:14496: tat punar bhāgadheyaṃ no naṣṭam ity eva cintaye / HV_App.I,31.2538 /
GE07hv_apppu:14497: mandabhāgyā vayaṃ viṣṇo yato no na smareḥ prabho // HV_App.I,31.2539 //
GE07hv_apppu:14499: nāmnā ca haṃsaḍibhakau bādhete no janārdana / HV_App.I,31.2541 /
GE07hv_apppu:14500: gārhasthyaṃ hi sadā śreyo vadantāv iti keśava // HV_App.I,31.2542 //
GE07hv_apppu:14501: itaś cetaś ca dhāvantau vadantau bahu kilbiṣam / HV_App.I,31.2543 /
GE07hv_apppu:14502: ayuktaṃ bahu bhāṣantau dharṣayantau ca naḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.2544 //
GE07hv_apppu:14503: idam anyat kṛtaṃ deva asahyaṃ pāpam ucyate / HV_App.I,31.2545 /
GE07hv_apppu:14504: paśyedaṃ bahudhā deva bhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2546 /
GE07hv_apppu:14505: śikyaṃ ca dāravaṃ pātraṃ dvidalān veṇukān bahūn // HV_App.I,31.2547 //
GE07hv_apppu:14506: idam apy aparaṃ paśya tayoḥ sāhasaceṣṭitam / HV_App.I,31.2548 /
GE07hv_apppu:14507: kaupīnaṃ bahudhā chinnaṃ tad asmākaṃ mahad dhanam / HV_App.I,31.2549 /
GE07hv_apppu:14509: tvaṃ tu no rakṣase nityaṃ kṣātravṛttaṃ samāśritaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2551 /
GE07hv_apppu:14510: citraṃ citram idaṃ deva rakṣasy eva divāniśam // HV_App.I,31.2552 //
GE07hv_apppu:14511: kiṃ kariṣyāmi mandātmā mandabhāgyā vayaṃ vibho / HV_App.I,31.2553 /
GE07hv_apppu:14512: kiṃ naḥ śaraṇam adyaiva tad brūhi jagatīpate // HV_App.I,31.2554 //
GE07hv_apppu:14513: jīvantau tau yadi syātāṃ naṣṭā lokā ime trayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2555 /
GE07hv_apppu:14514: na viprā na ca rājāno na vaiśyā na ca pādajāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2556 //
GE07hv_apppu:14516: na tayoḥ purataḥ sthātuṃ śaktā devāḥ savāsavāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2558 //
GE07hv_apppu:14517: na ca bhīṣmo na vā rājā bāhlīko bhīmavikramaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2559 /
GE07hv_apppu:14518: yo hi vīro jarāsaṃdhaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ bhayaṃkaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2560 //
GE07hv_apppu:14519: naiva ca prāyaśaḥ sthātuṃ girīśavaradarpiṇoḥ / HV_App.I,31.2561 /
GE07hv_apppu:14520: tayoḥ śakto hare kṛṣṇa nityam apratisaṅginoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2562 //
GE07hv_apppu:14521: tasmāt tvaṃ jahi tau vīrau rakṣa lokān imān prabho / HV_App.I,31.2563 /
GE07hv_apppu:14522: anyathā rakṣasīty evaṃ śabdo vyartho 'tra jāyate // HV_App.I,31.2564 //
GE07hv_apppu:14523: bahunātra kim uktena rakṣa rakṣa jagattrayam / HV_App.I,31.2565 /
GE07hv_apppu:14524: ity uktvā virarāmaiva durvāsāḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2566 //
GE07hv_apppu:14528: yater vacanam ākarṇya mandam ucchvasya keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2567 /
GE07hv_apppu:14530: kṣantavyaṃ bhavatā pūrvaṃ doṣa eṣa mamaiva hi / HV_App.I,31.2569 /
GE07hv_apppu:14531: śṛṇu vākyaṃ mamaitat tu śrutvā kṣamaparo bhava // HV_App.I,31.2570 //
GE07hv_apppu:14532: jeṣyāmi tau raṇe vipra haṃsaṃ ḍibhakam eva ca / HV_App.I,31.2571 /
GE07hv_apppu:14533: girīśo vā varaṃ dadyāc chakro vā dhanado 'pi vā // HV_App.I,31.2572 //
GE07hv_apppu:14534: yamo vā varuṇo vāpi brahmā vātha caturmukhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2573 /
GE07hv_apppu:14535: sabalau sānugau hatvā punar dāsyāmi vo ratim // HV_App.I,31.2574 //
GE07hv_apppu:14536: satyenaiva śapāmy adya mā roṣavaśam anvagāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2575 /
GE07hv_apppu:14537: rakṣāṃ vo 'haṃ kariṣyāmi hatvā tau ca nṛpādhamau // HV_App.I,31.2576 //
GE07hv_apppu:14538: jānāmi tau durātmānau yuṣmaddoṣakarau hi tau / HV_App.I,31.2577 /
GE07hv_apppu:14539: śrutaṃ ca pūrvam asmābhis tīkṣṇadaṇḍadharāv iti // HV_App.I,31.2578 //
GE07hv_apppu:14542: prāṇān api tayo rājā dāsyaty eva na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2581 /
GE07hv_apppu:14544: jaye tayor vipravarya tatra śreyo bhaveta naḥ / HV_App.I,31.2583 /
GE07hv_apppu:14545: yatra yatra ca tau gatvā sthitāv ity anuśuśruma / HV_App.I,31.2584 /
GE07hv_apppu:14546: tatra tatra ca hantāhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.2585 //
GE07hv_apppu:14549: tataḥ prītaḥ prasannātmā yādaveśvaram āha saḥ / HV_App.I,31.2588 /
GE07hv_apppu:14550: svasty astu bhavate kṛṣṇa jagatāṃ svasti sarvadā // HV_App.I,31.2589 //
GE07hv_apppu:14551: kiṃ nu nāma jagannātha duḥsādhyaṃ tava keśava / HV_App.I,31.2590 /
GE07hv_apppu:14553: devānām api deveśa sarvatra samadarśanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2592 /
GE07hv_apppu:14554: viṣṇo deva hare kṛṣṇa namas te cakrapāṇaye // HV_App.I,31.2593 //
GE07hv_apppu:14555: namaḥ svabhāvaśuddhāya śuddhāya niyatāya ca / HV_App.I,31.2594 /
GE07hv_apppu:14556: śabdāgocara deveśa namas te bhaktavatsala / HV_App.I,31.2595 /
GE07hv_apppu:14557: ajñānād atha vā jñānād yan mayoktaṃ kṣamasva tat // HV_App.I,31.2596 //
GE07hv_apppu:14558: tvam evāhaṃ jagannātha nāvayor antaraṃ pṛthak / HV_App.I,31.2597 /
GE07hv_apppu:14559: ataḥ kṣamasva bhagavan kṣamāsārā hi sādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2598 //
GE07hv_apppu:14561: kṣantavyaṃ bhavatā vipra kṣamāsārā vayaṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.2599 /
GE07hv_apppu:14562: saṃnyāsinaḥ kṣamāsārāḥ kṣamā teṣāṃ paraṃ balam // HV_App.I,31.2600 //
GE07hv_apppu:14563: kṣamā mokṣakarī nityaṃ tattvajñānam iva dvija / HV_App.I,31.2601 /
GE07hv_apppu:14564: kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yaśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2602 //
GE07hv_apppu:14565: kṣamā svargasya sopānam iti vedavido viduḥ / HV_App.I,31.2603 /
GE07hv_apppu:14566: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kṣamāṃ pālayata svakām // HV_App.I,31.2604 //
GE07hv_apppu:14568: ete te yatayo viprāḥ pūjanīyā mayādya vai // HV_App.I,31.2606 //
GE07hv_apppu:14569: bhoktavyā yatayo viprā bhikṣukāḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,31.2607 /
GE07hv_apppu:14570: tatheti te pratijñāya bhoktum aicchan harer gṛhe // HV_App.I,31.2608 //
GE07hv_apppu:14571: tataḥ svabhavanaṃ viṣṇuḥ praviśya harir īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2609 /
GE07hv_apppu:14573: bhojayām āsa tān sarvān yatīn yativarārcitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2611 //
GE07hv_apppu:14574: chittvā chittvā ca deveśo dukūlāni mṛdūni saḥ / HV_App.I,31.2612 /
GE07hv_apppu:14575: dadau tebhyas tadā viṣṇuḥ sarvebhyo janamejaya / HV_App.I,31.2613 /
GE07hv_apppu:14576: te ca prītā yathāyogaṃ yataḥ pūrvaṃ tato gatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2614 //
GE07hv_apppu:14579: durvāsās tv atha tatraiva nāradena sahāyavān / HV_App.I,31.2615 /
GE07hv_apppu:14580: cintayan brahmaṇas tattvaṃ vijahāra yathāsukham / HV_App.I,31.2616 /
GE07hv_apppu:14581: bhagavān api govindas tayor vadham amanyata // HV_App.I,31.2617 //
GE07hv_apppu:14582: tatas tau haṃsaḍibhakau tasmin kāle mahīpate / HV_App.I,31.2618 /
GE07hv_apppu:14585: rājasūyaṃ mahāyajñaṃ pitaḥ kuru suyantritaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2621 /
GE07hv_apppu:14586: asmin māsi nṛpaśreṣṭha yatāmo yajñasiddhaye // HV_App.I,31.2622 //
GE07hv_apppu:14587: āvāṃ te 'dya mahārāja diśāṃ vijayatatparau / HV_App.I,31.2623 /
GE07hv_apppu:14588: yatiṣyāvo balaiḥ sārdhaṃ rathair aśvair gajair api // HV_App.I,31.2624 //
GE07hv_apppu:14590: tatheti sa mahārājo brahmadatto 'bravīt tadā // HV_App.I,31.2626 //
GE07hv_apppu:14591: janārdanas tu viprendro dṛṣṭvā sāhasatatparau / HV_App.I,31.2627 /
GE07hv_apppu:14592: aśakyam iti manvāno vayasyaṃ haṃsam abravīt // HV_App.I,31.2628 //
GE07hv_apppu:14593: śṛṇu haṃsa vaco mahyaṃ śrutvā niścitya vīryavān / HV_App.I,31.2629 /
GE07hv_apppu:14594: āyuṣman sāhasaṃ kartuṃ niścito 'si nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.2630 //
GE07hv_apppu:14595: sthite bhīṣme jarāsaṃdhe bāhlīke ca nṛpottame / HV_App.I,31.2631 /
GE07hv_apppu:14596: kiṃ ca vīreṣu sarveṣu yādaveṣu nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.2632 //
GE07hv_apppu:14597: bhīṣmo hi balavān vṛddhaḥ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2633 /
GE07hv_apppu:14598: triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ yo jigāya bhṛgūttamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2634 /
GE07hv_apppu:14599: taṃ yuddhe jitavān bhīṣmaḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2635 //
GE07hv_apppu:14600: jarāsaṃdhasya yad vīryaṃ tad bhavān vetti saṃyuge / HV_App.I,31.2636 /
GE07hv_apppu:14601: vṛṣṇivīrās tu te sarve kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2637 //
GE07hv_apppu:14602: tatra kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśo jitaśatruḥ kṛtī sadā / HV_App.I,31.2638 /
GE07hv_apppu:14603: jarāsaṃdhena sahitaḥ sadā yuddhe jitaśramaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2639 /
GE07hv_apppu:14604: pramukhe tasya na sthātuṃ śakto jīvan nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.2640 //
GE07hv_apppu:14605: balabhadras tathā mattaḥ kruddho yadi bhaved balī / HV_App.I,31.2641 /
GE07hv_apppu:14606: lokān imān samāhartuṃ śaknotīti matir mama // HV_App.I,31.2642 //
GE07hv_apppu:14607: tathā ca sātyakir vīraḥ śakto jetuṃ raṇe ripūn / HV_App.I,31.2643 /
GE07hv_apppu:14608: tathānye yādavāḥ sarve kṛṣṇam āśritya daṃśitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2644 //
GE07hv_apppu:14609: asmābhiś ca kṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ virodho yatibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.2645 /
GE07hv_apppu:14610: durvāsā yatibhiḥ sārdhaṃ gato draṣṭuṃ sa keśavam // HV_App.I,31.2646 //
GE07hv_apppu:14611: iti śrutaṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha brāhmaṇād bhoktum āgatāt / HV_App.I,31.2647 /
GE07hv_apppu:14612: tathā sati yathā sidhyet tathā cintyaṃ ca mantribhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2648 /
GE07hv_apppu:14613: tataḥ paścād vidhāsyāmo rājasūyaṃ mahākratum // HV_App.I,31.2649 //
GE07hv_apppu:14615: ko nāma bhīṣmo mandātmā vṛddho hīnabalaḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.2650 /
GE07hv_apppu:14616: āvayoḥ purataḥ sthātuṃ śaktaḥ kila sa vṛddhakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2651 //
GE07hv_apppu:14617: yādavā iti citraṃ naḥ śaktāḥ sthātuṃ raṇe dvija / HV_App.I,31.2652 /
GE07hv_apppu:14618: kaś ca kṛṣṇaḥ puraḥ sthātuṃ baladevaś ca mattakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2653 //
GE07hv_apppu:14619: śaineyaś cāpi viprendra sthātuṃ nālaṃ vicitratā / HV_App.I,31.2654 /
GE07hv_apppu:14620: jarāsaṃdhas tu dharmātmā bandhur eva sadā mama // HV_App.I,31.2655 //
GE07hv_apppu:14621: gaccha vipra yaduśreṣṭhaṃ brūhi madvacanāt tvaran / HV_App.I,31.2656 /
GE07hv_apppu:14622: dīyatāṃ karasarvasvaṃ yajñārthaṃ lavaṇaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.2657 //
GE07hv_apppu:14623: lavaṇāni bahūny āśu gṛhya keśava māciram / HV_App.I,31.2658 /
GE07hv_apppu:14624: āgaccha tvaritaṃ kṛṣṇa na te kāryaṃ vilambanam / HV_App.I,31.2659 /
GE07hv_apppu:14625: iti brūhi yaduśreṣṭhaṃ yāhi tvaritavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2660 //
GE07hv_apppu:14626: na brūyāś cottaraṃ vipra śapeyaṃ tvāṃ priyo 'si me / HV_App.I,31.2661 /
GE07hv_apppu:14627: mitrabhāvād idaṃ brūhi śapāmi tvāṃ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2662 //
GE07hv_apppu:14628: iti saṃcodito vipro nottaraṃ pratyabhāṣata / HV_App.I,31.2663 /
GE07hv_apppu:14629: mitrabhāvāt tathā rājan snehāc ca janamejaya // HV_App.I,31.2664 //
GE07hv_apppu:14630: janārdanas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ gantuṃ samudyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.2665 /
GE07hv_apppu:14631: adya śvo vā paraśvo vā gacchāmīti yateta saḥ // HV_App.I,31.2666 //
GE07hv_apppu:14633: eka eva ca dharmātmā hayam āruhya satvaram // HV_App.I,31.2668 //
GE07hv_apppu:14634: prātar eva jagāmāśu draṣṭuṃ dvāravatīṃ dvijaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2669 /
GE07hv_apppu:14635: hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ manasā saṃsmaran dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2670 //
GE07hv_apppu:14637: prabhuṃ kṛṣṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ manasā saṃsmaran harim / **HV_App.I,31.2670**20:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:14640: tataḥ prāyād dhariṃ draṣṭuṃ brāhmaṇo brahmavittamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2671 /
GE07hv_apppu:14641: hayenaikena rājendra tvaritaṃ sa yayau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2672 //
GE07hv_apppu:14643: pāntho yāti jalaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaritaṃ tatpipāsayā / HV_App.I,31.2674 /
GE07hv_apppu:14644: dhāvaty eva tathā vipro hariṃ draṣṭuṃ janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.2675 //
GE07hv_apppu:14645: gacchan sa cintayām āsa codayan hayam uttamam / HV_App.I,31.2676 /
GE07hv_apppu:14646: haṃsa eva yathā nityaṃ kuryāt priyahitaṃ mama / HV_App.I,31.2677 /
GE07hv_apppu:14647: tathā hi preṣitas tena hariṃ paśyety ahaṃ prabhum // HV_App.I,31.2678 //
GE07hv_apppu:14648: aham eva sadā dhanyo matto hy abhyadhiko na ca / HV_App.I,31.2679 /
GE07hv_apppu:14649: yato drakṣyāmy ahaṃ viṣṇuṃ vasantaṃ dvārakāpure // HV_App.I,31.2680 //
GE07hv_apppu:14650: sā hi me jananī dhanyā hariṃ dṛṣṭvā punar gatam / HV_App.I,31.2681 /
GE07hv_apppu:14651: kṛtārthaṃ sarvathā putraṃ drakṣyaty eṣā manasvinī // HV_App.I,31.2682 //
GE07hv_apppu:14654: vapur drakṣyāmy ahaṃ viṣṇor nīlotpaladalacchavi / HV_App.I,31.2685 /
GE07hv_apppu:14657: paśyāmy aham adīnātmā naṣṭaduḥkho 'smi nirvṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2688 //
GE07hv_apppu:14658: api drakṣyati yogātmā saumyenaiva svacakṣuṣā / HV_App.I,31.2689 /
GE07hv_apppu:14659: api vā matpriyaṃ brūyāt svasti ceti ca vā vadet // HV_App.I,31.2690 //
GE07hv_apppu:14660: drakṣyāmi cakriṇo varṣma antas trailokyasaṃyutam / HV_App.I,31.2691 /
GE07hv_apppu:14661: pādābjaṃ cakriṇo draṣṭuṃ tvarayaty eva māṃ manaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2692 //
GE07hv_apppu:14662: vakṣaḥsthalaṃ sadā viṣṇoḥ sphurad ratnaprabhāyutam / HV_App.I,31.2693 /
GE07hv_apppu:14663: paśyann iva ca gacchāmi smarann aniśam īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.2694 //
