GE07hv_apppu:14665: īṣat smitādharaṃ viṣṇuṃ paśyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2696 //
GE07hv_apppu:14666: smarataś ca hare rūpaṃ lomaharṣo 'yam īdṛśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2697 /
GE07hv_apppu:14667: gacchataś ca puro bhāti śaṅkhacakragadāsimān // HV_App.I,31.2698 //
GE07hv_apppu:14668: yātīva ca puro bhāti mahyaṃ devo jagadguruḥ / HV_App.I,31.2699 /
GE07hv_apppu:14669: eṣo 'yam iti me vaktuṃ jihvā prasphuratīva tam // HV_App.I,31.2700 //
GE07hv_apppu:14670: idaṃ duḥkhataraṃ manye karaṃ dehīti yad vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2701 /
GE07hv_apppu:14671: idaṃ tat sāhasaṃ manye yad vacas tasya bhūpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.2702 //
GE07hv_apppu:14673: tasya sarvaṃ puro gatvā vaktāhaṃ kila nirdayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2704 //
GE07hv_apppu:14674: mūḍhānām agraṇīr asmi nirlajjaś ca tathā vadan / HV_App.I,31.2705 /
GE07hv_apppu:14675: karaṃ dehi hare viṣṇo haṃsasya yadupuṃgava // HV_App.I,31.2706 //
GE07hv_apppu:14676: lavaṇāni bahūny āśu dātavyāni karātmanā / HV_App.I,31.2707 /
GE07hv_apppu:14677: iti vaktuṃ na me yuktaṃ puratas tasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2708 //
GE07hv_apppu:14678: tathāpi mitrabhāvāt tu vaktavyaṃ ghoram īdṛśam / HV_App.I,31.2709 /
GE07hv_apppu:14679: kaṣṭo hy ayaṃ mitrabhāvo manuṣyāṇāṃ kṛtātmanām // HV_App.I,31.2710 //
GE07hv_apppu:14680: atha vā sarvavid viṣṇuḥ sarvasya hṛdi saṃsthitam / HV_App.I,31.2711 /
GE07hv_apppu:14681: jānāty eva sadā bhāvaṃ prāṇināṃ śobhane rataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2712 //
GE07hv_apppu:14682: tathā sati na me doṣo mitrabhāvo yato hy ayam / HV_App.I,31.2713 /
GE07hv_apppu:14683: sarvathā rakṣatāṃ viṣṇur ghoraṃ vaktuṃ yatasya me // HV_App.I,31.2714 //
GE07hv_apppu:14687: drakṣyāmi cakriṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ keśavaṃ yādaveśvaram // HV_App.I,31.2718 //
GE07hv_apppu:14690: kṛtārthaḥ sarvathā cāhaṃ bhavāmi vigatajvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2721 /
GE07hv_apppu:14691: adya me saphalaṃ janma sākṣātkṛtavato hariṃ // HV_App.I,31.2722 //
GE07hv_apppu:14692: adya me saphalā yajñāḥ sākṣāt kṛtavato harim / HV_App.I,31.2723 /
GE07hv_apppu:14693: netre me saphale viṣṇuṃ paśyataś ca jaganmayam // HV_App.I,31.2724 //
GE07hv_apppu:14694: prītimānas tu me viṣṇur vaktur ghorasya karmaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2725 /
GE07hv_apppu:14695: unmiṣan netrayugmena drakṣyāmy asakṛd īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.2726 //
GE07hv_apppu:14696: āmūlamastakaṃ viṣṇuṃ paśyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2727 /
GE07hv_apppu:14697: pibāmi netrayugmena vapuḥ kṛṣṇasya kevalam // HV_App.I,31.2728 //
GE07hv_apppu:14698: dhārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ pāṃśuṃ tatpādaprabhavaṃ śivam / HV_App.I,31.2729 /
GE07hv_apppu:14699: tataḥ kṛtārthatāṃ yāsye svargamārgo hi tadrajaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2730 //
GE07hv_apppu:14700: meghagambhīranirghoṣaṃ śroṣyāmi ca hareḥ svaram / HV_App.I,31.2731 /
GE07hv_apppu:14701: pādābjaṃ cakriṇo viṣṇoḥ paśyāmi ca jagatpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.2732 //
GE07hv_apppu:14703: harer idaṃ jagadrūpaṃ paśyāmīva ca sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2734 //
GE07hv_apppu:14704: prasīdatu sadā viṣṇur ayuktaṃ vaktum icchataḥ / HV_App.I,31.2735 /
GE07hv_apppu:14711: kadā drakṣyāmi deveśam idānīm atha vānyadā / HV_App.I,31.2742 /
GE07hv_apppu:14712: sarvathā kṛtakṛtyo 'haṃ yad vapur draṣṭum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2743 //
GE07hv_apppu:14713: namo mahyaṃ namo mahyaṃ yato draṣṭum ahaṃ harim / HV_App.I,31.2744 /
GE07hv_apppu:14715: drakṣyāmy avaśyam adyaiva viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ jagadgurum // HV_App.I,31.2746 //
GE07hv_apppu:14719: tejomayaṃ mama harer vapur astu bhūtyai // HV_App.I,31.2750 //
GE07hv_apppu:14724: dhyeyaṃ mumukṣubhir ameyam anādy anantaṃ @ HV_App.I,31.2755 @
GE07hv_apppu:14725: sthūlaṃ susūkṣmataram ekam anekam ādyam / HV_App.I,31.2756 /
GE07hv_apppu:14728: cintayann iti viprendro yayau dvāravatīṃ purīm / HV_App.I,31.2759 /
GE07hv_apppu:14729: matvā kṛtārtham ātmānaṃ vāhayan hayam uttamam // HV_App.I,31.2760 //
GE07hv_apppu:14732: sa niveditasarvasvo dvāḥsthena hi janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2761 /
GE07hv_apppu:14733: atha praviśya dharmātmā sudharmāṃ vai dvijottamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2762 //
GE07hv_apppu:14741: udgīyamānaṃ vipraiś ca sāmabhiḥ sāmagair harim // HV_App.I,31.2770 //
GE07hv_apppu:14742: dṛṣṭvā prītamanā viṣṇuṃ provāca pulakacchaviḥ / HV_App.I,31.2771 /
GE07hv_apppu:14743: nāmnā janārdano 'smīti nanāma caraṇau hareḥ / HV_App.I,31.2772 /
GE07hv_apppu:14744: balabhadraṃ tato bhūyo vavande śirasā dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2773 //
GE07hv_apppu:14745: dūto 'smi devadeveśa haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca / HV_App.I,31.2774 /
GE07hv_apppu:14746: iti bruvāṇaṃ viprendram idam āha sa mādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2775 //
GE07hv_apppu:14747: āssvedaṃ viṣṭaraṃ pūrvaṃ paścād būhi prayojanam / HV_App.I,31.2776 /
GE07hv_apppu:14748: tatheti cābravīd vipro mahad āsanam āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2777 //
GE07hv_apppu:14749: vācā saṃpūjya viprendram apṛcchat kuśalaṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.2778 /
GE07hv_apppu:14750: brahmadattasya rājendra haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca // HV_App.I,31.2779 //
GE07hv_apppu:14751: śrutaṃ cāpi tayor vīryaṃ tataḥ prīto dvijottama / HV_App.I,31.2780 /
GE07hv_apppu:14752: api vā kuśalaṃ vipra pitus tava janārdana // HV_App.I,31.2781 //
GE07hv_apppu:14754: iti śrutvā giraṃ viṣṇos tathety āha janārdanaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.2781**21:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:14755: saṃgatiś ca girīśāt tu śrutā me vīryatas tayoḥ / HV_App.I,31.2782 /
GE07hv_apppu:14756: iti śrutvā giraṃ viṣṇos tathety āha janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2783 //
GE07hv_apppu:14757: kuśalaṃ brahmadattasya pituś ca mama keśava / HV_App.I,31.2784 /
GE07hv_apppu:14758: tayor eva jagannātha haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca // HV_App.I,31.2785 //
GE07hv_apppu:14760: kim āhatur mahīpālau tau haṃsaḍibhakau nṛpau / HV_App.I,31.2786 /
GE07hv_apppu:14761: brūhi sarvam aśeṣeṇa nātra śaṅkā dvijottama // HV_App.I,31.2787 //
GE07hv_apppu:14762: vācyaṃ vāpy atha vāvācyaṃ kartavyam atha vetaram / HV_App.I,31.2788 /
GE07hv_apppu:14763: śrutvā tasya vidhāsyāmo yuktarūpaṃ dvijottama // HV_App.I,31.2789 //
GE07hv_apppu:14764: dūtasya sarvathā vipra na vācyāvācyakalpanā / HV_App.I,31.2790 /
GE07hv_apppu:14765: yat karma rājanirdiṣṭaṃ tad vācyaṃ dūtajanmanā // HV_App.I,31.2791 //
GE07hv_apppu:14766: nātra śaṅkā tvayā kāryā vaktavyasyetarasya vā / HV_App.I,31.2792 /
GE07hv_apppu:14767: ato vada yathāproktaṃ tābhyāṃ mama janārdana // HV_App.I,31.2793 //
GE07hv_apppu:14768: keśavenaivam uktas tu provācātho janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2794 /
GE07hv_apppu:14769: ajānann iva kiṃ brūṣe sarvaṃ pratyakṣadarśivān // HV_App.I,31.2795 //
GE07hv_apppu:14770: na cāsti te parokṣaṃ tu jagadvṛttāntam acyuta / HV_App.I,31.2796 /
GE07hv_apppu:14771: sarvaṃ hi manasā paśyan kiṃ tvam āttha vadeti mām // HV_App.I,31.2797 //
GE07hv_apppu:14772: vidvadbhir gīyase viṣṇo tvam eva jagatīpate / HV_App.I,31.2798 /
GE07hv_apppu:14774: tvam evedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ jagac ca tvayi tiṣṭhati / HV_App.I,31.2800 /
GE07hv_apppu:14775: na tvayā rahito hy ekaḥ padārthaḥ sacarācaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2801 //
GE07hv_apppu:14776: nāsti kiṃcid avedyaṃ te sarvago 'si jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.2802 /
GE07hv_apppu:14777: tvam indraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ rudraḥ saṃhārakarmakṛt // HV_App.I,31.2803 //
GE07hv_apppu:14778: rakṣitāsi sadā viṣṇo sarvalokasya mādhava / HV_App.I,31.2804 /
GE07hv_apppu:14779: saṃsārasya bhavān sraṣṭā kiṃ tvam āttha vadeti mām // HV_App.I,31.2805 //
GE07hv_apppu:14780: vidvadbhir gīyase viṣṇo jñānātmeti ca mādhava / HV_App.I,31.2806 /
GE07hv_apppu:14781: prāṇaṃ prāṇavidaḥ prāhus tvām eva puruṣottama // HV_App.I,31.2807 //
GE07hv_apppu:14782: śabdaṃ śabdavidaḥ prāhus tvām eva puruṣottama / HV_App.I,31.2808 /
GE07hv_apppu:14783: tathā sati hṛṣīkeśa kiṃ tvam āttha vadeti mām // HV_App.I,31.2809 //
GE07hv_apppu:14784: tathāpi śṛṇu deveśa codito 'si yatas tvayā / HV_App.I,31.2810 /
GE07hv_apppu:14785: vadety asakṛd evaitat tasmād vakṣyāmi mādhava // HV_App.I,31.2811 //
GE07hv_apppu:14787: tadarthaṃ preṣitas tābhyāṃ haṃsena ḍibhakena ca // HV_App.I,31.2813 //
GE07hv_apppu:14788: karārthaṃ yadumukhyebhyas tava cāmantraṇāya ca / HV_App.I,31.2814 /
GE07hv_apppu:14789: lavaṇaṃ bahu deyaṃ te yajñārthaṃ tasya keśava // HV_App.I,31.2815 //
GE07hv_apppu:14790: ity arthaṃ preṣitas tābhyāṃ karaṃ dehi tadājñayā / HV_App.I,31.2816 /
GE07hv_apppu:14791: idam apy aparaṃ tābhyāṃ uktaṃ śṛṇu jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.2817 //
GE07hv_apppu:14792: lavaṇāni bahūny āśu pragṛhya tvarito bhavān / HV_App.I,31.2818 /
GE07hv_apppu:14793: āgacchatu tayo rājñoḥ seyaṃ keśava vāgvibho // HV_App.I,31.2819 //
GE07hv_apppu:14794: ity uktavati viprendre dūte tatra tayor nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.2820 /
GE07hv_apppu:14795: prahasya suciraṃ kṛṣṇo babhāṣe dūtam īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2821 //
GE07hv_apppu:14796: śṛṇu dūta vaco mahyaṃ yuktam uktaṃ dvijottama / HV_App.I,31.2822 /
GE07hv_apppu:14797: karaṃ dadāmi tābhyāṃ tu karado 'smi yato nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2823 //
GE07hv_apppu:14798: dhārṣṭyaṃ etat tayor vipra matto yat tu karagrahaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2824 /
GE07hv_apppu:14800: aho dhārṣṭyam aho dhārṣṭyaṃ tayoḥ kṣatriyabījayoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2825 //
GE07hv_apppu:14801: idam aśrutapūrvaṃ me matto yas tu karagrahaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2826 /
GE07hv_apppu:14802: ity uktvā keśavo dūtam idam āha sma yādavān // HV_App.I,31.2827 //
GE07hv_apppu:14803: hāsyam etad yaduśreṣṭhā matto yat tu karagrahaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2828 /
GE07hv_apppu:14805: tau taṃ yājayitārau ca haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca / HV_App.I,31.2830 /
GE07hv_apppu:14806: voḍhā kila yaduśreṣṭhā lavaṇasya durātmanoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2831 //
GE07hv_apppu:14808: hāsyaṃ hāsyam idaṃ hāsyaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ yādavā vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2833 //
GE07hv_apppu:14810: yādavāḥ sarva evaite hāsāya samavasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2835 //
GE07hv_apppu:14811: karadaḥ kṛṣṇa ity evaṃ bruvantaḥ sarvasātvatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2836 /
GE07hv_apppu:14812: hāsaṃ mumucur atyarthaṃ talaṃ dattvā parasparam / HV_App.I,31.2837 /
GE07hv_apppu:14814: sa ca vipro nṛpaśreṣṭha nindayan maitram ātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2839 /
GE07hv_apppu:14815: aho kaṣṭam aho kaṣṭaṃ dautyaṃ yat kṛtavān aham / HV_App.I,31.2840 /
GE07hv_apppu:14816: iti lajjāsamāviṣṭas tūṣṇīm āsīd avāṅmukhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2841 //
GE07hv_apppu:14819: hāsaṃ kurvatsu teṣv evaṃ keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2842 /
GE07hv_apppu:14820: uvāca vacanaṃ dūtaṃ gaccha madvacanād dvija / HV_App.I,31.2843 /
GE07hv_apppu:14821: tāv itthaṃ haṃsaḍibhakau brūhi tvaritavikrama // HV_App.I,31.2844 //
GE07hv_apppu:14822: bāṇair dāsyāmi niśitaiḥ śārṅgamuktaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2845 /
GE07hv_apppu:14824: asinā vātha dāsyāmi niśitena mahātmanoḥ / HV_App.I,31.2847 /
GE07hv_apppu:14825: śiro vaś chetsyate cakraṃ matkaraprahitaṃ bali // HV_App.I,31.2848 //
GE07hv_apppu:14826: yo varaṃ dattavāñ śarvo yuvayor dhārṣṭyakāraṇam / HV_App.I,31.2849 /
GE07hv_apppu:14827: sa eva rakṣitā vāṃ syāt taṃ jitvā vā nihanmy aham // HV_App.I,31.2850 //
GE07hv_apppu:14828: deśo 'yaṃ saṃvidhātavyo yatra naḥ saṃgatir bhavet / HV_App.I,31.2851 /
GE07hv_apppu:14829: tatra gantā tathā cāsmi sabalaḥ sahasainikaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2852 //
GE07hv_apppu:14830: bhavantau nirbhayau bhūtvā gacchetāṃ sabalau nṛpau / HV_App.I,31.2853 /
GE07hv_apppu:14831: puṣkare vā prayāge vā mathurāyām athāpi vā / HV_App.I,31.2854 /
GE07hv_apppu:14832: tatrāhaṃ sabalo yātā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.2855 //
GE07hv_apppu:14833: atha vā mitrabhāvāc ca vaktum evaṃ tvam akṣamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2856 /
GE07hv_apppu:14834: na śakyaṃ yat tvayā vaktuṃ tat tu vakṣyati sātyakiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2857 /
GE07hv_apppu:14835: tvayā saha tato gatvā sākṣibhūto bhava dvija // HV_App.I,31.2858 //
GE07hv_apppu:14836: idaṃ ca jāne viprendra sneho mama sadā tvayi / HV_App.I,31.2859 /
GE07hv_apppu:14837: tena tvaṃ vijayī bhūyāḥ saṃsāre duḥkhasaṃkule / HV_App.I,31.2860 /
GE07hv_apppu:14838: matkathāparamo nityaṃ sadā bhava janārdana // HV_App.I,31.2861 //
GE07hv_apppu:14841: ity uktvā brāhmaṇaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sātyakiṃ punar āha ca / HV_App.I,31.2862 /
GE07hv_apppu:14842: gaccha śaineya vipreṇa brūhi madvacanāt tayoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2863 //
GE07hv_apppu:14843: yan mayoktam aśeṣeṇa vada gatvā tayor yado / HV_App.I,31.2864 /
GE07hv_apppu:14844: yathā naḥ saṃgatir yuddhe tathā vada balād yado // HV_App.I,31.2865 //
GE07hv_apppu:14845: dhanur ādāya gaccha tvaṃ baddhagodhāṅgulitravān / HV_App.I,31.2866 /
GE07hv_apppu:14846: ekenāśvena gaccha tvam asahāyo yadūttama // HV_App.I,31.2867 //
GE07hv_apppu:14847: sātyakis taṃ tathety uktvā hayam āruhya śīghragam / HV_App.I,31.2868 /
GE07hv_apppu:14848: gantum aicchat tato rājann asahāyaḥ sa sātyakiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2869 //
GE07hv_apppu:14849: janārdanaṃ visṛjyāśu dūtaṃ taṃ yādaveśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2870 /
GE07hv_apppu:14850: aho dhārṣṭyam aho dārṣṭyam ity uvāca janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2871 //
GE07hv_apppu:14851: namaskṛtya tato dūto mādhavaṃ yādaveśvaram / HV_App.I,31.2872 /
GE07hv_apppu:14852: sa yayau sālvanagaraṃ śaineyena saha dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2873 //
GE07hv_apppu:14853: tataḥ praviśya dharmātmā brāhmaṇo brahmavittamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2874 /
GE07hv_apppu:14854: āsanaṃ mahad āsthāya visṛjya yadave punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2875 /
GE07hv_apppu:14855: āste yathāsukhaṃ vipraḥ śaineyena samanvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2876 //
GE07hv_apppu:14856: atha taṃ haṃsaḍibhayor darśayām āsa sātyakim / HV_App.I,31.2877 /
GE07hv_apppu:14857: dūto 'yaṃ sātyakiḥ prāptaḥ savyo bāhur ayaṃ hareḥ // HV_App.I,31.2878 //
GE07hv_apppu:14858: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā haṃsaḥ prāha vacas tadā / HV_App.I,31.2879 /
GE07hv_apppu:14859: śrutyā samāgataḥ pūrvam adya dṛṣṭo mayā tv asau // HV_App.I,31.2880 //
GE07hv_apppu:14860: dhanurvede ca vede ca śastraśāstre tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,31.2881 /
GE07hv_apppu:14861: nipuṇo 'yaṃ sadā śūra ity evam anuśuśrumaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2882 /
GE07hv_apppu:14862: adya dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāptaḥ prītiṃ me vidadhāty asau // HV_App.I,31.2883 //
GE07hv_apppu:14863: kuśalaṃ vāsudevasya baladevasya cāpi vā / HV_App.I,31.2884 /
GE07hv_apppu:14865: tatheti sātyakiḥ prāha mandam unmiṣitānanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2886 /
GE07hv_apppu:14866: tato janārdanaṃ prāha haṃso vākyaviśāradaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2887 //
GE07hv_apppu:14867: api dṛṣṭas tvayā cakrī siddhaṃ naḥ kāryam īhitam / HV_App.I,31.2888 /
GE07hv_apppu:14868: vada sarvam aśeṣeṇa mā vṛthā kālam atyagāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2889 //
GE07hv_apppu:14871: ity uktavati haṃse ca dharmātmātha janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2890 /
GE07hv_apppu:14872: uvāca prasahan vīraḥ stuvan nārāyaṇaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,31.2891 //
GE07hv_apppu:14894: adrākṣam adrākṣam ahaṃ punaḥ punaḥ @ HV_App.I,31.2908 @
GE07hv_apppu:14907: piban pibaṃs tasya vapuḥ punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2921 /
GE07hv_apppu:14913: saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya tam eva nirvṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2927 //
GE07hv_apppu:14915: vījyamānaṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ cāmarāṇāṃ śataiḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.2929 //
GE07hv_apppu:14917: smarantaṃ sarvadā viṣṇuṃ kva vā tau kva ca veti vā // HV_App.I,31.2931 //
GE07hv_apppu:14918: kuto drakṣyāmi tau mandau kuto vā matpurogatau / HV_App.I,31.2932 /
GE07hv_apppu:14919: dhyāyantam itthaṃ deveśaṃ karasaṃśravaṇāt tadā // HV_App.I,31.2933 //
GE07hv_apppu:14920: hasantam evam adrākṣaṃ karaṃ dehīty ataḥ param / HV_App.I,31.2934 /
GE07hv_apppu:14921: vadantaṃ nārade vācaṃ durvāsasi yatīśvare // HV_App.I,31.2935 //
GE07hv_apppu:14923: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā hariṃ devaṃ punaḥ punar acintayam // HV_App.I,31.2937 //
GE07hv_apppu:14924: asādhyam idam ārabdhaṃ tābhyām iti nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.2938 /
GE07hv_apppu:14925: nārabdhavyam idaṃ kāryam itaḥprabhṛti bhūmipa // HV_App.I,31.2939 //
GE07hv_apppu:14926: nivṛttā sā kathā haṃsa yat karagrahaṇaṃ tava / HV_App.I,31.2940 /
GE07hv_apppu:14927: eṣa te 'śeṣam akhilaṃ vakṣyaty eva hi sātyakiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2941 //
GE07hv_apppu:14928: etad vacanaṃ ākarṇya haṃsaḥ kruddho 'bravīd vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2942 /
GE07hv_apppu:14929: are brāhmaṇadāyāda kā nāma tava vāg iyam / HV_App.I,31.2943 /
GE07hv_apppu:14930: āvayoḥ purato vaktuṃ trailokyaṃ jetum icchatoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2944 //
GE07hv_apppu:14931: māyayā tvāṃ bhramaty eṣa kṛṣṇo līlāvidhānavit / HV_App.I,31.2945 /
GE07hv_apppu:14932: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrama evaiṣa tava saṃjāyate mahān // HV_App.I,31.2946 //
GE07hv_apppu:14938: aho 'dya bhrama evaiṣa darśanāt tasya cakriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2952 //
GE07hv_apppu:14939: idānīṃ ca mahātmāsau bhrāmayaty eva keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2953 /
GE07hv_apppu:14940: tvām eva vipra mandātman nindrajālakṛtā hi sā // HV_App.I,31.2954 //
GE07hv_apppu:14941: cāpalyam idam evaitat tava vipra samudbhavam / HV_App.I,31.2955 /
GE07hv_apppu:14942: aho nu khalu sādṛśyaṃ kartavyaṃ bhavatā mama // HV_App.I,31.2956 //
GE07hv_apppu:14943: aham etat tvayā vipra marṣaye 'troditaṃ vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2957 /
GE07hv_apppu:14944: sakhibhāvād dvijaśreṣṭha anyathā kaḥ sahed idam // HV_App.I,31.2958 //
GE07hv_apppu:14945: gaccha mandamate vipra yatheṣṭaṃ sāṃprataṃ tv itaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2959 /
GE07hv_apppu:14946: gaccha gaccha yatheṣṭaṃ tvaṃ pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīṃ tava // HV_App.I,31.2960 //
GE07hv_apppu:14947: jitvā gopāladāyādaṃ hatvā yādavakān bahūn / HV_App.I,31.2961 /
GE07hv_apppu:14948: eṣa naḥ prathamaḥ kalpo jeṣyāma iti yādavān / HV_App.I,31.2962 /
GE07hv_apppu:14949: gaccha necchāmi vipra tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ paruṣavādinam // HV_App.I,31.2963 //
GE07hv_apppu:14950: śatrupakṣastutiparaṃ saha bhuktvā sadā mayā / HV_App.I,31.2964 /
GE07hv_apppu:14951: na me vipravadhaḥ kāryaḥ kaṣṭāyām api cāpadi // HV_App.I,31.2965 //
GE07hv_apppu:14952: ity uktvā brāhmaṇaṃ haṃso bhūyaḥ sātyakim abravīt / HV_App.I,31.2966 /
GE07hv_apppu:14953: are yādavadāyāda kimarthaṃ prāptavān iha / HV_App.I,31.2967 /
GE07hv_apppu:14954: kim abravīn nandasutaḥ kiṃ vā me nādiśat karam // HV_App.I,31.2968 //
GE07hv_apppu:14956: idaṃ tasya vaco haṃsa śaṅkhacakragadābhṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2969 /
GE07hv_apppu:14958: dāsyāmi karasarvasvam asinā vā śitena ca / HV_App.I,31.2971 /
GE07hv_apppu:14959: śiraś chetsyāmi te haṃsa karadānasya saṃgraham // HV_App.I,31.2972 //
GE07hv_apppu:14960: dhārṣṭyaṃ hi tava mandātman kim ato 'pi nṛpādhama / HV_App.I,31.2973 /
GE07hv_apppu:14961: devadevāj jagannāthāt karam icchati yo nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2974 /
GE07hv_apppu:14963: tasya śārṅgaravaṃ śrutvā śaṅkhasya ca hareḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2976 /
GE07hv_apppu:14964: ko nāma jīvitaṃ kāṅkṣaṃs tiṣṭhedānīṃ tvam adya vai / HV_App.I,31.2977 /
GE07hv_apppu:14967: prathamo balabhadro 'sau dvitīyo 'haṃ sa sātyakiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2980 //
GE07hv_apppu:14968: kṛtavarmā tṛtīyas tu caturtho niśaṭho balī / HV_App.I,31.2981 /
GE07hv_apppu:14969: pañcamo 'tha ca babhrus tu ṣaṣṭhaś caivotkalaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2982 //
GE07hv_apppu:14971: aṣṭamas tv atha sāraṅgo navamo vipṛthus tathā / HV_App.I,31.2984 /
GE07hv_apppu:14972: daśamaś coddhavo dhīmān vayam ete balānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2985 //
GE07hv_apppu:14974: devadevasya yuddheṣu tiṣṭhanty eva divāniśam // HV_App.I,31.2987 //
GE07hv_apppu:14975: yau hi vīrau sutau tasya svātmanā sadṛśau bale / HV_App.I,31.2988 /
GE07hv_apppu:14976: tāv eva vāṃ kṣamau yuddhe hantuṃ balamadānvitau // HV_App.I,31.2989 //
GE07hv_apppu:14977: yo girīśo girāv eva varaṃ dattvā sa tiṣṭhati / HV_App.I,31.2990 /
GE07hv_apppu:14978: yuvāṃ hi kevalau yuddhe tiṣṭhathaḥ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,31.2991 /
GE07hv_apppu:14979: gṛhītvā śatrubhiḥ sārdhaṃ yuddhaṃ kartuṃ samudyatau // HV_App.I,31.2992 //
GE07hv_apppu:14980: īdṛśeṣv atha bhṛtyeṣu yuddhaṃ kurvatsu śatrubhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2993 /
GE07hv_apppu:14981: trailokyaṃ rakṣatas tasmāt karam icchan vrajeta kaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2994 //
GE07hv_apppu:14982: haniṣyaty eṣa vāṃ yuddhe trailokyaṃ yo 'dya rakṣati / HV_App.I,31.2995 /
GE07hv_apppu:14984: kva naḥ saṃgrāma ity evaṃ punar āha jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2997 /
GE07hv_apppu:14985: puṣkare puṇyade nityam uta govardhane girau // HV_App.I,31.2998 //
GE07hv_apppu:14986: mathurāyāṃ prayāge vā darśayetāṃ balāni me / HV_App.I,31.2999 /
GE07hv_apppu:14988: rājasūyaṃ mahāyajñaṃ yaṣṭum icchati kaḥ svayam / HV_App.I,31.3001 /
GE07hv_apppu:14989: vadan vā svastimān martyas tvāṃ vinā ko vrajet sukham // HV_App.I,31.3002 //
GE07hv_apppu:14990: idaṃ jāḍyam idaṃ mauḍhyam idam atyadbhutaṃ vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3003 /
GE07hv_apppu:14991: idam icchasi cen mūḍha hāsyatāṃ yāsi bhūtale / HV_App.I,31.3004 /
GE07hv_apppu:14992: ity uktvā sātyakir vīro hasann iva vibho sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3005 //
GE07hv_apppu:14995: tataḥ kruddho mahārāja haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca / HV_App.I,31.3006 /
GE07hv_apppu:14997: didhakṣantau diśaḥ sarvāḥ sarvān vīkṣya nṛpottamān / HV_App.I,31.3008 /
GE07hv_apppu:14998: karaṃ kareṇa niṣpīḍya smarantau tadvaco mahat // HV_App.I,31.3009 //
GE07hv_apppu:14999: kva nu kva vā nandasūnuḥ kva vā rāmo balotkaṭaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3010 /
GE07hv_apppu:15000: iti bruvāṇau sākṣepau sātyakiṃ satyasaṃgaram // HV_App.I,31.3011 //
GE07hv_apppu:15001: are yādavadāyāda kiṃ brūṣe naḥ purogataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3012 /
GE07hv_apppu:15002: ito nirgaccha mandātman dūtas tvam asi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.3013 //
GE07hv_apppu:15003: anyathā vadhya eva tvaṃ pralapan paruṣaṃ vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3014 /
GE07hv_apppu:15004: satyaṃ nirlajja evāsi yad brūyā īdṛśaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3015 //
GE07hv_apppu:15005: āvām idaṃ jagat sarvaṃ śāsituṃ saṃyatau nṛpau / HV_App.I,31.3016 /
GE07hv_apppu:15006: ko nāma mānuṣe loke karado naiva jīvati // HV_App.I,31.3017 //
GE07hv_apppu:15007: hatvā gopālakaṃ saṃkhye badhvā yādavakān bahūn / HV_App.I,31.3018 /
GE07hv_apppu:15008: gṛhṇīmaḥ karasarvasvaṃ tato gaccha narādhama // HV_App.I,31.3019 //
GE07hv_apppu:15009: avadhyo dūtatāṃ prāpto bahvabaddhaṃ prabhāṣase / HV_App.I,31.3020 /
GE07hv_apppu:15010: īśvaro nau varaṃ dātā hy astrāṇām api ca prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3021 //
GE07hv_apppu:15011: rakṣitārau mahābhūtau saṃgrāmaṃ gacchatoś ca nau / HV_App.I,31.3022 /
GE07hv_apppu:15012: pitaraṃ yājayiṣyāvo hatvā gopālakān raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3023 //
GE07hv_apppu:15013: ete proktā bhṛśaṃ yuddhe kātarāḥ sarva eva te / HV_App.I,31.3024 /
GE07hv_apppu:15014: hatvā tān sabalān yuddhe punar jeṣyāva keśavam // HV_App.I,31.3025 //
GE07hv_apppu:15020: sacchatrā sadhvajā caiva sabhaṭā sādhu sāmbarā // HV_App.I,31.3031 //
GE07hv_apppu:15021: kalpyatāṃ vāhinī ghorā balādhyakṣāḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3032 /
GE07hv_apppu:15022: avadhya eva gaccha tvaṃ na te maraṇato bhayam // HV_App.I,31.3033 //
GE07hv_apppu:15023: saṃgrāmaḥ puṣkare 'smākaṃ śvaḥ paraśvo 'pi vā nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3034 /
GE07hv_apppu:15024: tato jñāsyāvahe vīryaṃ keśavasya balasya ca / HV_App.I,31.3035 /
GE07hv_apppu:15025: ye tvayoktā nṛpāḥ saṃkhye teṣām api ca yad balam // HV_App.I,31.3036 //
GE07hv_apppu:15027: eṣa gacchāmi vāṃ hantuṃ śvaḥ paraśvo 'pi vā nṛpau / HV_App.I,31.3037 /
GE07hv_apppu:15028: adyaiva hi mayā vadhyau na ced dūto bhavāmy aham // HV_App.I,31.3038 //
GE07hv_apppu:15029: na hi śvo vā paraśvo vā yuvāṃ kaṭukabhāṣiṇau / HV_App.I,31.3039 /
GE07hv_apppu:15030: dautyaṃ hi duḥkham akhilaṃ bhavaty eva sadā nṛṇām // HV_App.I,31.3040 //
GE07hv_apppu:15031: anyathāhaṃ yuvāṃ hatvā tato yāsyāmi nirvṛtim / HV_App.I,31.3041 /
GE07hv_apppu:15032: svavīryaṃ bāhudarpaṃ ca darśayaṃś ca nṛpādhamau // HV_App.I,31.3042 //
GE07hv_apppu:15039: śareṇa niśitenājau darpaṃ vāṃ vyapaneśyati / HV_App.I,31.3049 /
GE07hv_apppu:15040: ity uktvā ratham āruhya pratasthe sātyakiḥ kila // HV_App.I,31.3050 //
GE07hv_apppu:15043: sa praviśya puraṃ viṣṇoḥ sātyakiḥ śinipuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3051 /
GE07hv_apppu:15044: ācacakṣe 'tha kṛṣṇāya yathā vṛttaṃ tayos tadā // HV_App.I,31.3052 //
GE07hv_apppu:15045: tataḥ prabhāte vimale keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3053 /
GE07hv_apppu:15050: tatheti te pratiśrutya sarvaṃ cakrur anīkapāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3058 //
GE07hv_apppu:15051: ādāya sudṛḍhaṃ cāpaṃ ratham āruhya daṃśitāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3059 /
GE07hv_apppu:15052: agrato jagmur atyarthaṃ senāyāḥ puruṣottamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3060 //
GE07hv_apppu:15053: vanamālī halī rāmo nīlavāsāḥ sitaprabhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3061 /
GE07hv_apppu:15055: sātyakiś ca tathā rājan pragṛhītaśarāsanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3063 /
GE07hv_apppu:15057: anye ca yādavāḥ śūrāḥ pragṛhītamahāyudhāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3065 /
GE07hv_apppu:15058: siṃhanādaṃ prakurvanto jagmur atyartham uttamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3066 //
GE07hv_apppu:15059: haris tu ratham āruhya saṃnaddhaṃ dārukeṇa ha / HV_App.I,31.3067 /
GE07hv_apppu:15060: śārṅgaṃ bhārasahaṃ ghoraṃ gṛhītvā saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3068 //
GE07hv_apppu:15064: yayau rathagato vipraiḥ stūyamāno mudānvitaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3072 //
GE07hv_apppu:15065: sūtair māgadhaputraiś ca stūyamānas tatas tataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3073 /
GE07hv_apppu:15066: ānīya senāṃ sakalāṃ yayau kāṣṭhām athottarām // HV_App.I,31.3074 //
GE07hv_apppu:15067: pāñcajanyaṃ mukhe nyasya sarvaprāṇena keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3075 /
GE07hv_apppu:15068: dadhmau mahāravaṃ kurvañ śatrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanam // HV_App.I,31.3076 //
GE07hv_apppu:15069: ādhmātas tena hariṇā sa cakre śaṅkharāṭ svanam / HV_App.I,31.3077 /
GE07hv_apppu:15070: ravaḥ sa rodasī rājan pūrayām āsa śaṅkhataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3078 //
GE07hv_apppu:15071: tasmiñ śaṅkhe tathādhmāte neduḥ śaṅkhāḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3079 /
GE07hv_apppu:15072: bheryaś cāpi samādhmātā mṛdaṅgā bahuśo nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3080 /
GE07hv_apppu:15073: nedur atyartham atulaṃ gharmānte jaladā yathā // HV_App.I,31.3081 //
GE07hv_apppu:15074: atho yayur mahārāja puṣkaraṃ puṇyavardhanam / HV_App.I,31.3082 /
GE07hv_apppu:15075: sarasas tasya rājendra puṣkarasya nṛpottamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3083 //
GE07hv_apppu:15077: niveśaṃ kārayām āsur yādavāḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,31.3085 /
GE07hv_apppu:15078: svaṃ svaṃ yathāsukhaṃ rājan pragṛhītakuṭīmaṭham // HV_App.I,31.3086 //
GE07hv_apppu:15079: bhagavān api govindaḥ saro dṛṣṭvā suśobhanam / HV_App.I,31.3087 /
GE07hv_apppu:15080: upaspṛśya jale tasmin praṇamya yatipuṅgavān // HV_App.I,31.3088 //
GE07hv_apppu:15081: tayor āgamanaṃ lipsur āste tīre yathāsukham / HV_App.I,31.3089 /
GE07hv_apppu:15082: śṛṇvan vedadhvaniṃ viṣṇur brāhmaṇānāṃ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3090 //
GE07hv_apppu:15085: atha tau haṃsaḍibhakau jagmatuḥ puṣkaraṃ prati / HV_App.I,31.3091 /
GE07hv_apppu:15090: anyau dvāv iva rudrau tau lokasaṃhārakārakau // HV_App.I,31.3096 //
GE07hv_apppu:15092: akṣauhiṇyo daśaivāsaṃs tayor atha samāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3098 //
GE07hv_apppu:15093: vicakras tu mahārāja dānavo nagasaṃnibhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3099 /
GE07hv_apppu:15094: tayor eva sakhā pūrvam āsīc ca balaśālinoḥ / HV_App.I,31.3100 /
GE07hv_apppu:15095: śakro 'pi yasya purataḥ sthātuṃ śakto na vajrabhṛt // HV_App.I,31.3101 //
GE07hv_apppu:15096: yo hi vīro mahārāja devadaitya samāgame / HV_App.I,31.3102 /
GE07hv_apppu:15097: devān nighnaṃs tadā yuddhe devendram ajayan mahān / HV_App.I,31.3103 /
GE07hv_apppu:15098: akaroc ca purā yuddhaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_App.I,31.3104 //
GE07hv_apppu:15099: yo hi dvāravatīṃ prāpya babādhe yadupuṅgavān / HV_App.I,31.3105 /
GE07hv_apppu:15100: sa tadānīṃ mahārāja śrutvā yuddham upasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3106 //
GE07hv_apppu:15102: vṛtaḥ samabhavad daityo vṛṣṇidveṣān nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.3108 /
GE07hv_apppu:15103: haṃsasya ḍibhakasyātha sāhāyyaṃ kartum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3109 //
GE07hv_apppu:15105: atīva mitratāṃ yāto dadyāt prāṇāṃś ca saṃyati // HV_App.I,31.3111 //
GE07hv_apppu:15107: yayau tasya sahāyārthaṃ hiḍimbaḥ puruṣādakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3113 //
GE07hv_apppu:15110: tayos tatra mahāsainyaṃ gacchatoḥ keśavaṃ prati / HV_App.I,31.3116 /
GE07hv_apppu:15111: miśritaṃ daityasaṃghaiś ca rākṣasaiś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3117 /
GE07hv_apppu:15113: daityena tena sahitau jagmatuḥ puṣkaraṃ prati / HV_App.I,31.3119 /
GE07hv_apppu:15114: tāv etau haṃsaḍibhakau hantuṃ keśavam añjasā // HV_App.I,31.3120 //
GE07hv_apppu:15115: tataḥ śrutvā jarāsaṃdho vigrahaṃ yadupuṅgavaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3121 /
GE07hv_apppu:15116: nākaron nṛpa sāhāyyaṃ śāpo me bhaviteti ha // HV_App.I,31.3122 //
GE07hv_apppu:15117: gacchatoḥ saṃyugaṃ rājan haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca / HV_App.I,31.3123 /
GE07hv_apppu:15118: atitvaritavikrāntās te yayuḥ puṣkaraṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3124 //
GE07hv_apppu:15120: aham eva nṛpā yuddhaṃ karomi prathamaṃ hareḥ // HV_App.I,31.3126 //
GE07hv_apppu:15121: ity abruvan nṛpā rājan gacchantaḥ keśavaṃ prati / HV_App.I,31.3127 /
GE07hv_apppu:15122: saṃprāptās te nṛpaśreṣṭhāḥ puṣkaraṃ puṇyavardhanam // HV_App.I,31.3128 //
GE07hv_apppu:15123: munijuṣṭaṃ tapovṛddhair ṛṣibhiś ca niṣevitam / HV_App.I,31.3129 /
GE07hv_apppu:15124: atyantabhadraṃ lokeṣu puṣkaraṃ prathamaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3130 //
GE07hv_apppu:15125: puṣkaraṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo dvāv eva jagatīpate / HV_App.I,31.3131 /
GE07hv_apppu:15126: darśanāt sparśanāc cāpi kilbiṣacchedinau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3132 //
GE07hv_apppu:15127: puṣkaraṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo dvāv eva nṛpasattama / HV_App.I,31.3133 /
GE07hv_apppu:15129: dvāv eva hi naraśreṣṭha kilbiṣaughasya nāśakau / HV_App.I,31.3135 /
GE07hv_apppu:15130: tāv ubhau yatra sahitau tatra te saṃsthitā nṛpāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3136 //
GE07hv_apppu:15131: dṛṣṭavantau hariṃ viṣṇuṃ viṣṭaraśravasaṃ param / HV_App.I,31.3137 /
GE07hv_apppu:15133: tebhyaḥ kuru namaskāraṃ manasā nṛpasattama / HV_App.I,31.3139 /
GE07hv_apppu:15134: aghaṃ niḥśeṣam abhavat tava bhūpa na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3140 //
GE07hv_apppu:15135: sainyaṃ tatra ca saṃprāptaṃ daityarakṣaḥsamākulam / HV_App.I,31.3141 /
GE07hv_apppu:15138: praviśya sarasas tīraṃ puṣkarasya viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,31.3144 /
GE07hv_apppu:15139: adarśayat tatra devaṃ yuddhāya samupasthitam // HV_App.I,31.3145 //
GE07hv_apppu:15141: dve sene saṃgate rājan sadhvaje saparicchade / HV_App.I,31.3146 /
GE07hv_apppu:15146: te śarāḥ kārmukotsṛṣṭā nirbhidyātha śarīriṇām / HV_App.I,31.3151 /
GE07hv_apppu:15147: śarīrāṇi mahārāja jagmur dūraṃ sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3152 //
GE07hv_apppu:15149: sphuṭitāś ca tadā rājañ śirāṃsy āhatya saṃyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3154 //
GE07hv_apppu:15150: parighāś ca tadā rājñāṃ bāhubhiḥ paricoditāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3155 /
GE07hv_apppu:15151: tilaśaś cakrur atulāḥ śarīraṃ nṛparakṣasām / HV_App.I,31.3156 /
GE07hv_apppu:15153: daityā rakṣāṃsi rājendra rājānaś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3158 /
GE07hv_apppu:15154: anyonyaṃ parighair jaghnuś cāpamuktair mahāśaraiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3159 /
GE07hv_apppu:15155: śaraiś ca bhogibhogābhais tīkṣṇam anye mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3160 //
GE07hv_apppu:15157: [k: Ds2 T1.4 G1.3-5 M (Dn after line 3167) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15159: nāgā nāgair mahārāja hayāś cāśvaiḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3162 //
GE07hv_apppu:15160: rathā rathaiḥ samājaghnuḥ sādinaḥ sādibhis tathā / HV_App.I,31.3163 /
GE07hv_apppu:15163: bhiṇḍipālair mahāraudrair jaghnur anyonyam āhave // HV_App.I,31.3166 //
GE07hv_apppu:15164: rākṣasā dānavā rājan kṣatriyāś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3167 /
GE07hv_apppu:15165: itaś cetaś ca dhāvantaḥ kurvanto visvaraṃ ravam / HV_App.I,31.3168 /
GE07hv_apppu:15166: hatāḥ kecin mahārāja petur urvyāṃ mahāsibhiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3169 //
GE07hv_apppu:15169: yamarāṣṭraṃ gatāḥ kecit kecit svargaṃ samāyayuḥ / HV_App.I,31.3172 /
GE07hv_apppu:15171: kecit svāṃś ca parāṃś caiva hatvā bhrāntā ivābhavan // HV_App.I,31.3174 //
GE07hv_apppu:15172: etasminn antare rājañ śaṅkhā bheryaḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3175 /
GE07hv_apppu:15173: sasvanuḥ sarvataḥ sainye mṛdaṅgā bahavas tathā / HV_App.I,31.3176 /
GE07hv_apppu:15174: madhyaṃdinagate sūrye tāpaṃ dadhati ghoravat // HV_App.I,31.3177 //
GE07hv_apppu:15175: tataḥ piśācā vikṛtāḥ karālā nirṇatodarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3178 /
GE07hv_apppu:15176: rākṣasāś ca mahāghorāḥ piśitaṃ keśaśāḍvalam / HV_App.I,31.3179 /
GE07hv_apppu:15177: muditā bhakṣayām āsuḥ pibantaḥ śoṇitaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.3180 //
GE07hv_apppu:15178: saṃcitāni śavāny āsan kabandhāḥ khaḍgapāṇayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3181 /
GE07hv_apppu:15179: vibhajya deśaṃ bahuśo yuddhabhūmau śavārthinaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3182 //
GE07hv_apppu:15180: atha śyenā balāś caiva kaṅkā gṛdhrās tathāpare / HV_App.I,31.3183 /
GE07hv_apppu:15181: tuṇḍaiḥ śavāni niṣkṛṣya bhakṣayanti tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3184 //
GE07hv_apppu:15184: hataṃ lakṣaṃ mahārāja rathānāṃ rathibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.3187 /
GE07hv_apppu:15185: triṃśatkoṭyo hatās tatra sādinaḥ sāyudhā bhṛśam // HV_App.I,31.3188 //
GE07hv_apppu:15186: madhyaṃdinagate sūrye hatāḥ kecana nirgatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3189 /
GE07hv_apppu:15187: kecic ca nihatā rājan puṣkaraṃ prāviśan saraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3190 //
GE07hv_apppu:15188: kecid bhūmiṃ samālambya bhītā ity abruvan raṇe / HV_App.I,31.3191 /
GE07hv_apppu:15189: muktakeśāḥ patanti sma rathaṃ saṃtyajya kecana // HV_App.I,31.3192 //
GE07hv_apppu:15190: saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭāḥ kecit svāminaḥ purato hatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3193 /
GE07hv_apppu:15192: yathā devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ pūrvam āsīn nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.3195 //
GE07hv_apppu:15195: etasminn antare rājan dvaṃdvayuddham avartata / HV_App.I,31.3196 /
GE07hv_apppu:15196: vicakraṃ yodhayām āsa śārṅgadhanvā gadādharaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3197 //
GE07hv_apppu:15197: balabhadro 'tha haṃsena ḍibhakena ca sātyakiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3198 /
GE07hv_apppu:15199: śeṣāś ca śeṣai rājendra cakrur yuddham adīnagāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3200 //
GE07hv_apppu:15200: vāsudevas trisaptatyā daityaṃ vakṣasy atāḍayat / HV_App.I,31.3201 /
GE07hv_apppu:15201: śarair niśitadhārāgrair vismayaṃ darśayan raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3202 //
GE07hv_apppu:15202: dānavo devadeveśaṃ dṛḍhena niśitena ca / HV_App.I,31.3203 /
GE07hv_apppu:15204: jaghāna stanayor madhye paśyatas tu śacīpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.3205 //
GE07hv_apppu:15205: tena viddho 'tha bhagavān vakṣodeśe janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3206 /
GE07hv_apppu:15206: avamac chonitaṃ viṣṇur ādikāle yathā prajāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3207 //
GE07hv_apppu:15207: tataḥ kruddho hṛṣīkeśaḥ kṣurapreṇāharad dhvajam / HV_App.I,31.3208 /
GE07hv_apppu:15208: aśvāṃś ca caturo hatvā sārathiṃ ca śarais tribhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3209 /
GE07hv_apppu:15209: tato dadhmau śaṅkhavaraṃ yathā tārāmaye raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3210 //
GE07hv_apppu:15210: rathād utplutya sahasā dānavaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3211 /
GE07hv_apppu:15211: gadāṃ gṛhya mahāghorāṃ duḥsahāṃ vīryaśālinīm // HV_App.I,31.3212 //
GE07hv_apppu:15212: tayā jaghāna daityendraḥ kirīṭe keśavasya ha / HV_App.I,31.3213 /
GE07hv_apppu:15213: lalāṭe ca punar viṣṇuṃ siṃhanādam anīnadat // HV_App.I,31.3214 //
GE07hv_apppu:15214: tataḥ śilāṃ ca mahatīṃ pragṛhya danujaḥ kila / HV_App.I,31.3215 /
GE07hv_apppu:15216: tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya hastenādāya keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3217 /
GE07hv_apppu:15217: jaghāna ca tadā daityaṃ tāḍitaḥ sa tayā kṣitau / HV_App.I,31.3218 /
GE07hv_apppu:15218: gatāsur iva saṃjajñe śvasann iva papāta ha // HV_App.I,31.3219 //
GE07hv_apppu:15219: prāpya saṃjñāṃ tato daityaḥ krodhād dviguṇam ābabhau / HV_App.I,31.3220 /
GE07hv_apppu:15220: ādāya parighaṃ ghoram idam āha janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.3221 //
GE07hv_apppu:15221: anena tava govinda darpaṃ jātaṃ nihanmy aham / HV_App.I,31.3222 /
GE07hv_apppu:15222: vikramajñaḥ sadā cāsi mama devāsure raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3223 //
GE07hv_apppu:15223: tāv eva vipulau bāhū sa evāsmi janārdana / HV_App.I,31.3224 /
GE07hv_apppu:15224: tathāpi yudhyase vīra jñātvā vai māmakaṃ balam // HV_App.I,31.3225 //
GE07hv_apppu:15227: cikṣepa daityo lokeśaṃ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3228 //
GE07hv_apppu:15228: taṃ gṛhya bāhunā kṛṣṇo duṣṭo 'sīti vadan hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.3229 /
GE07hv_apppu:15229: khaṇḍaśaḥ kārayām āsa khaḍgena niśitena ca // HV_App.I,31.3230 //
GE07hv_apppu:15230: utpāṭya vṛkṣaṃ daityendraḥ śataśākhaṃ mahāśikham / HV_App.I,31.3231 /
GE07hv_apppu:15231: tena taṃ pothayām āsa viṣṭaraśravasaṃ vibhum / HV_App.I,31.3232 /
GE07hv_apppu:15232: gṛhya taṃ cāpi khaḍgena tilaśaś ca cakāra ha // HV_App.I,31.3233 //
GE07hv_apppu:15233: vikrīḍya suciraṃ kṛṣṇas tena daityena mādhavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3234 /
GE07hv_apppu:15234: hantum aicchat tadā daityam ādāya niśitaṃ śaram / HV_App.I,31.3235 /
GE07hv_apppu:15235: āgneyāstreṇa saṃyojya jaghānainaṃ sa tena ha // HV_App.I,31.3236 //
GE07hv_apppu:15236: pradahya sa śaro daityaṃ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3237 /
GE07hv_apppu:15237: yathāpūrvaṃ jagāmāśu karaṃ bhagavataḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3238 //
GE07hv_apppu:15238: hataśiṣṭās tadā daityāḥ palāyanta diśo daśa / HV_App.I,31.3239 /
GE07hv_apppu:15239: adyāpi na nivartante gacchanto vai mahodadhim // HV_App.I,31.3240 //
GE07hv_apppu:15242: baladevas tu dharmātmā dhanur ādāya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.3241 /
GE07hv_apppu:15243: jaghāna haṃsaṃ daśabhir bāṇair bāṇabhṛtāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3242 /
GE07hv_apppu:15244: taṃ pratyavidhyan nārācair haṃsaḥ pañcabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3243 //
GE07hv_apppu:15245: tān antare halī chittvā nārācair daśabhiḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3244 /
GE07hv_apppu:15246: nārācenāśu vivyādha lalāṭe haṃsam ojasā // HV_App.I,31.3245 //
GE07hv_apppu:15247: dṛḍhaṃ patan sa nārācas tasya saṃjñāṃ samādade / HV_App.I,31.3246 /
GE07hv_apppu:15248: rathopasthe ciraṃ sthitvā sthūṇākarṇaṃ samādade // HV_App.I,31.3247 //
GE07hv_apppu:15249: labdhvā haṃsaḥ sa saṃjñāṃ tu vidhvā tena yadūttamam / HV_App.I,31.3248 /
GE07hv_apppu:15250: siṃhavad vyanadad dhaṃso devān vismāpayan raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3249 //
GE07hv_apppu:15251: tataḥ kruddho halī viddhas tena bāṇena mādhavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3250 /
GE07hv_apppu:15252: vamañ śoṇitam atyarthaṃ niśaśvāsa raṇājire / HV_App.I,31.3251 /
GE07hv_apppu:15254: nārācaiḥ saptasāhasrair ardayām āsa yādavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3253 /
GE07hv_apppu:15255: haṃsaṃ haṃsagatiṃ vīraṃ nīlavāsā halāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3254 //
GE07hv_apppu:15256: te muktā niśitā ghorā nārācāś ca suvājinaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3255 /
GE07hv_apppu:15257: rathe dhvaje tathā cāpe cakre tūṇīdvaye nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3256 /
GE07hv_apppu:15258: patitāḥ sarvato rājan vyathāṃ caiva tathā dadhuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3257 //
GE07hv_apppu:15259: tataḥ kruddho mahārāja haṃso vīryabalānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3258 /
GE07hv_apppu:15260: śareṇa halinaṃ vidhvā dhvajaṃ ciccheda kenacit / HV_App.I,31.3259 /
GE07hv_apppu:15261: śaraiś caturbhir aśvāṃś ca sūtaṃ pretādhipe dadau // HV_App.I,31.3260 //
GE07hv_apppu:15262: tataḥ kruddho halī tasmād gadāṃ gṛhya mahāraṇe / HV_App.I,31.3261 /
GE07hv_apppu:15263: āpapāta mahābāhur haṃsaṃ śeṣa iva śvasan // HV_App.I,31.3262 //
GE07hv_apppu:15264: tayā dhvajaṃ rathaṃ cakram īṣāṃ sūtaṃ halāyudhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3263 /
GE07hv_apppu:15265: babhañja tilaśaḥ sarvaṃ nanāda ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3264 //
GE07hv_apppu:15266: bhūyaś ca gadayā haṃsaṃ cikṣepa ca halī kila / HV_App.I,31.3265 /
GE07hv_apppu:15267: so 'pi haṃso gadāṃ gṛhya rathāt tasmād avāpatat // HV_App.I,31.3266 //
GE07hv_apppu:15268: tatas tau haṃsahalinau yuyudhāte mahāraṇe / HV_App.I,31.3267 /
GE07hv_apppu:15272: yathā devāsure yuddhe śakravṛtrau purāmbare / HV_App.I,31.3271 /
GE07hv_apppu:15275: tataś ca dakṣiṇaṃ mārgaṃ balabhadro 'nvagṛhṇata / HV_App.I,31.3274 /
GE07hv_apppu:15276: savyaṃ tu haṃso rājendra vyagṛhṇāt satyasaṃgaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3275 //
GE07hv_apppu:15277: pothayāṃ cakratur yuddhe gadābhyāṃ gajavikramau / HV_App.I,31.3276 /
GE07hv_apppu:15278: yathāprāṇaṃ mahābāhū jaghnatur maraṇāya vai // HV_App.I,31.3277 //
GE07hv_apppu:15281: devāś ca munayaś caiva vismayaṃ parijagmire / HV_App.I,31.3280 /
GE07hv_apppu:15282: aho khalv īdṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ pūrvaṃ na ca śrutam // HV_App.I,31.3281 //
GE07hv_apppu:15285: atha haṃso mahāraṅge dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3284 /
GE07hv_apppu:15286: vyacaran mārgam atyarthaṃ savyaṃ tu balavān balī // HV_App.I,31.3285 //
GE07hv_apppu:15287: vikuñcya jānunī pūrvaṃ cakratur gadayā bhṛśam / HV_App.I,31.3286 /
GE07hv_apppu:15288: raṇaṃ raṇavidāṃ śreṣṭhau paśyatāṃ tridivaukasām // HV_App.I,31.3287 //
GE07hv_apppu:15291: yuddhaṃ cakratur atyarthaṃ tato ḍibhakasātyakī / HV_App.I,31.3288 /
GE07hv_apppu:15292: tāv ubhau balinau vīrau prakhyātau kṣatriyeṣu vai // HV_App.I,31.3289 //
GE07hv_apppu:15294: sātyakir daśabhir vīro ḍibhakaṃ satyavikramam / HV_App.I,31.3291 /
GE07hv_apppu:15295: avidhyan niśitair bāṇaiḥ stanamadhye tathorasi // HV_App.I,31.3292 //
GE07hv_apppu:15296: sa tena viddho balinā ḍibhakaḥ kṣatriyottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3293 /
GE07hv_apppu:15297: nārācaiḥ pañcasāhasrair vivyādha yudhi garvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3294 //
GE07hv_apppu:15298: tān antare vṛṣṇivīro niṣedhya vyanadad raṇe / HV_App.I,31.3295 /
GE07hv_apppu:15299: atha kruddho nṛpavaro vidhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3296 /
GE07hv_apppu:15300: punaḥ śatasahasreṇa pratyavidhyat sa sātyakim // HV_App.I,31.3297 //
GE07hv_apppu:15301: sātyakis tv atha vikrānto dhanuś ciccheda tasya tat / HV_App.I,31.3298 /
GE07hv_apppu:15303: ardhacandreṇa tīkṣṇena ḍibhakasya sa yādavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3299 //
GE07hv_apppu:15306: ājaghne ḍibhako rājan yuyudhānaṃ yudhāṃ varam / HV_App.I,31.3300 /
GE07hv_apppu:15308: sa tena viddho bāṇena vamañ śoṇitakaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3302 /
GE07hv_apppu:15309: atīva śuśubhe rājan vasante kiṃśuko yathā // HV_App.I,31.3303 //
GE07hv_apppu:15310: dhanuś ciccheda bhūyas tu yad gṛhītaṃ punar mahat // HV_App.I,31.3304 //
GE07hv_apppu:15311: tato 'nyad dhanur ādāya ḍibhako yādaveśvaram / HV_App.I,31.3305 /
GE07hv_apppu:15312: jaghāna niśitair bānaiḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3306 //
GE07hv_apppu:15313: sa dhanuḥ punar atyugraṃ ciccheda yudhi sātyakiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3307 /
GE07hv_apppu:15315: tato 'nyad dhanur ādāya satvaraṃ sa nṛpottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3309 /
GE07hv_apppu:15316: dhanuṣā tena rājendra sātyakiṃ vivyadhe punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3310 //
GE07hv_apppu:15317: evaṃ dhanūṃṣi rājendra śataṃ pañca ca pañca ca / HV_App.I,31.3311 /
GE07hv_apppu:15318: chittvā nanāda śaineyaḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3312 //
GE07hv_apppu:15319: dhanūṃṣi tau samutsṛjya vīrau ḍibhakasātyakī / HV_App.I,31.3313 /
GE07hv_apppu:15320: khaḍgau pragṛhya cātyugrau yuddhāya samupasthitau // HV_App.I,31.3314 //
GE07hv_apppu:15321: tau hi khaḍgavidāṃ śreṣṭhau vīrau ḍibhakasātyakī / HV_App.I,31.3315 /
GE07hv_apppu:15322: dauḥśāsanir mahārāja saumadattis tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,31.3316 //
GE07hv_apppu:15323: abhimanyuś ca vikrānto nakulaś ca tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,31.3317 /
GE07hv_apppu:15324: ete khaḍgavidāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ kīrtitā yudhi sattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3318 //
GE07hv_apppu:15325: eṣv etau hi nṛpaśreṣṭhau khaḍge hi nṛpasattamau / HV_App.I,31.3319 /
GE07hv_apppu:15326: tāv etāv asinā yuddhaṃ cakratur yuddhalālasau // HV_App.I,31.3320 //
GE07hv_apppu:15327: bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddhaṃ praviddhaṃ bāhuniḥsṛtam / HV_App.I,31.3321 /
GE07hv_apppu:15328: ākaraṃ vikaraṃ bhinnaṃ nirmaryādam amānuṣam // HV_App.I,31.3322 //
GE07hv_apppu:15329: saṃkocitaṃ vikucitaṃ savyajānu vijānu ca / HV_App.I,31.3323 /
GE07hv_apppu:15330: āhitaṃ citrakaṃ kṣiptaṃ kuḍumbaṃ lambanaṃ dhṛtam // HV_App.I,31.3324 //
GE07hv_apppu:15332: tribāhutuṅgabāhū ca savyonnatam udāsi ca // HV_App.I,31.3326 //
GE07hv_apppu:15333: pṛṣṭhataḥpraharaṃ caiva yaudhikaṃ prathitaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.3327 /
GE07hv_apppu:15334: iti pracārān dvātriṃśac cakratuḥ khaḍgayodhinau // HV_App.I,31.3328 //
GE07hv_apppu:15335: punaś ca praharantau tau na ca śramam upeyatuḥ / HV_App.I,31.3329 /
GE07hv_apppu:15337: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3331 /
GE07hv_apppu:15338: tuṣṭuvus tau mahārāja jaye dhṛtakṛtaśramau / HV_App.I,31.3332 /
GE07hv_apppu:15339: aho vīryam aho vīryam etayor balaśālinoḥ // HV_App.I,31.3333 //
GE07hv_apppu:15340: etāv eva raṇe śaktau khaḍge dhanuṣi pāragau / HV_App.I,31.3334 /
GE07hv_apppu:15341: ekaḥ śiṣyo girīśasya droṇasyānyo hi dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3335 //
GE07hv_apppu:15342: arjunaḥ sātyakiś caiva vāsudevo jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3336 /
GE07hv_apppu:15343: traya ete mahārāja prathitāḥ saṃgare sadā // HV_App.I,31.3337 //
GE07hv_apppu:15344: ḍibhakaḥ śaktibhṛc charvas traya ete mahārathāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3338 /
GE07hv_apppu:15345: prasiddhāḥ sarva evaite vīryeṣu ca baleṣu ca // HV_App.I,31.3339 //
GE07hv_apppu:15346: iti te devagandharvāḥ siddhā yakṣā mahoragāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3340 /
GE07hv_apppu:15347: divi sthitāḥ samaṃ brūyur yuddhadarśanalālasāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3341 //
GE07hv_apppu:15350: vasudevograsenau ca vṛddhau yuddheṣu nirvṛtau / HV_App.I,31.3342 /
GE07hv_apppu:15354: śarair anekasāhasrair ardayām āsatū raṇe / HV_App.I,31.3346 /
GE07hv_apppu:15356: hiḍimbo rākṣasendras tu bhakṣayan sarvato narān / HV_App.I,31.3348 /
GE07hv_apppu:15364: gajān gajaiḥ samāghnāno hayair aśvān nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.3356 /
GE07hv_apppu:15365: rathān rathaiḥ samāhatya sādinaḥ sādibhis tathā // HV_App.I,31.3357 //
GE07hv_apppu:15366: manuṣyān svapuro dṛṣṭvā nāsyagrāsaṃ cakāra saḥ / HV_App.I,31.3358 /
GE07hv_apppu:15367: kāṃścid dhatvā mahārāja vṛṣṇipālān samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3359 //
GE07hv_apppu:15368: bhakṣayām āsa sahasā hiḍimbaḥ puruṣādakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3360 /
GE07hv_apppu:15369: yān paśyati puro rakṣas tāñ jaghāna virūpadhṛk // HV_App.I,31.3361 //
GE07hv_apppu:15370: bhakṣayann aparān vṛṣṇīn pādātān rākṣasādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3362 /
GE07hv_apppu:15371: cikṣepa sahasā kāṃścid dhiḍimbaḥ puruṣādakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3363 //
GE07hv_apppu:15372: antakāle yathā kruddho rudraḥ prāṇabhṛto nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3364 /
GE07hv_apppu:15373: kṣaṇenaikena sarvāṃs tān bhakṣayām āsa rākṣasaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3365 //
GE07hv_apppu:15374: kecid bhītā diśaḥ prāpur vṛṣṇayo vīryaśālinaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3366 /
GE07hv_apppu:15375: kecit tu bhakṣitās tena rakṣasā vṛṣṇipuṅgavāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3367 //
GE07hv_apppu:15376: kumbhakarṇo yathā rājan bhakṣayām āsa vānarān / HV_App.I,31.3368 /
GE07hv_apppu:15377: niḥśeṣaṃ vṛṣṇisainyaṃ tu cakāra puruṣādakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3369 //
GE07hv_apppu:15378: niśceṣṭaṃ vṛṣṇisainyaṃ tu sthitaṃ citrapaṭe yathā // HV_App.I,31.3370 //
GE07hv_apppu:15379: etasminn antare kruddhau vṛddhau yādavapuṅgavau / HV_App.I,31.3371 /
GE07hv_apppu:15380: dhanur gṛhya mahāghoraṃ rākṣasasya puraḥ sthitau // HV_App.I,31.3372 //
GE07hv_apppu:15381: yathā kruddhasya siṃhasya meṣau kruddhatamāv iva / HV_App.I,31.3373 /
GE07hv_apppu:15382: vyādāyāsyaṃ mahad rakṣas tau dṛṣṭvāthābhyadhāvata // HV_App.I,31.3374 //
GE07hv_apppu:15384: paryadhāvat tato rakṣaḥ khādat khādat kalevaram // HV_App.I,31.3376 //
GE07hv_apppu:15385: pūrayām āsatur vīrau śarair yaduvṛṣau nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3377 /
GE07hv_apppu:15387: sarvāṃs tān khādayām āsa devaśatrur virūpadhṛk / HV_App.I,31.3379 /
GE07hv_apppu:15388: dhāvati sma tato rakṣo vyāditāsyaṃ bhayānakam // HV_App.I,31.3380 //
GE07hv_apppu:15389: tayor gṛhītvā dhanuṣī babhañja yudhi satvaram / HV_App.I,31.3381 /
GE07hv_apppu:15390: bāhū prasārya duṣṭātmā rākṣaso vikṛtānanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3382 //
GE07hv_apppu:15394: eṣa vāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi vasudeva nṛpādhama / HV_App.I,31.3385 /
GE07hv_apppu:15395: ugrasena kimarthaṃ tvaṃ tiṣṭhase matpuro 'dhama // HV_App.I,31.3386 //
GE07hv_apppu:15396: āgaccha praviśāsyaṃ me grāsabhūtau yuvāṃ mama / HV_App.I,31.3387 /
GE07hv_apppu:15397: vidhinā nirmitau vṛddhau vasudeva hareḥ pitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3388 //
GE07hv_apppu:15398: bubhukṣitaḥ śramārtaś ca yuddhe tvaritavikramaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3389 /
GE07hv_apppu:15399: manmukhān naiva gacchetaṃ praviśantau tvarānvitau // HV_App.I,31.3390 //
GE07hv_apppu:15400: yuvayoḥ śoṇitaṃ pītvā tṛptiṃ yāsyāmi nirvṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3391 /
GE07hv_apppu:15401: khādāmi ca punar māṃsaṃ vṛddhayor yuvayoḥ sukham // HV_App.I,31.3392 //
GE07hv_apppu:15402: iti bruvaṃs tadā kruddho vyāditāsyo mahāhanuḥ / HV_App.I,31.3393 /
GE07hv_apppu:15403: dhāvati sma tadā kṣipraṃ hiḍimbo rākṣaseśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3394 //
GE07hv_apppu:15404: vasudevograsenau ca bhītau viprekṣya sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3395 /
GE07hv_apppu:15406: etasminn antare dṛṣṭvā balabhadraḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.3397 /
GE07hv_apppu:15407: dṛṣṭvā ca tau tathābhūtau vasudevograsenakau // HV_App.I,31.3398 //
GE07hv_apppu:15408: vāsudevaṃ samādiśya haṃsaṃ yudhyantam īśvaram / HV_App.I,31.3399 /
GE07hv_apppu:15409: nirgatya cāntaraṃ tasya rākṣasasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3400 //
GE07hv_apppu:15410: mā kṛthāḥ sāhasaṃ rakṣo muñcaitau rājasattamau / HV_App.I,31.3401 /
GE07hv_apppu:15411: sthito 'smi yudhyatāṃ rakṣo mayā śatrūñ jighāṃsatā // HV_App.I,31.3402 //
GE07hv_apppu:15412: aham eva haniṣye tvāṃ kā ceyaṃ tava bhīṣikā / HV_App.I,31.3403 /
GE07hv_apppu:15413: iti bruvāṇaṃ halinaṃ visṛjyaitau mahāraṇe // HV_App.I,31.3404 //
GE07hv_apppu:15414: mahān ayam asau puṣṭo bhakṣayāmy enam agrataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3405 /
GE07hv_apppu:15415: vidārya pūrvavad vaktraṃ balabhadram upādravat // HV_App.I,31.3406 //
GE07hv_apppu:15416: visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ rākṣasasya puraḥ sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3407 /
GE07hv_apppu:15417: muṣṭiṃ pragṛhya balavān sphoṭayan bāhum uttamam // HV_App.I,31.3408 //
GE07hv_apppu:15418: hiḍimbas tv atha duṣṭātmā muṣṭiṃ kṛtvā mahāravam / HV_App.I,31.3409 /
GE07hv_apppu:15419: jaghāna vakṣo rāmasya vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3410 //
GE07hv_apppu:15420: kruddho 'tha balabhadras tu muṣṭinā tena tāḍitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3411 /
GE07hv_apppu:15421: jaghāna muṣṭinā rāmo rākṣasendram aninditaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3412 //
GE07hv_apppu:15424: tayoś caṭacaṭāśabdaḥ prādur āsīd bhayānakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3415 //
GE07hv_apppu:15425: atha rākṣasarājas tu muṣṭinā rāmam āhave / HV_App.I,31.3416 /
GE07hv_apppu:15426: jaghāna vakṣodeśe tu vajreṇeva puraṃdaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3417 //
GE07hv_apppu:15427: atha rāmo balī sākṣān muṣṭiṃ saṃvartya yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3418 /
GE07hv_apppu:15428: hiḍimbaṃ tāḍayām āsa vakṣasy amaravidviṣam // HV_App.I,31.3419 //
GE07hv_apppu:15429: talābhyām atha rāmas tu jaghne vaktre sa rākṣasam // HV_App.I,31.3420 //
GE07hv_apppu:15431: jānubhyām apatad bhūmau gatāsur iva rākṣasaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3422 //
GE07hv_apppu:15432: tata utpatya rāmas tu dorbhyāṃ saṃgṛhya rākṣasam / HV_App.I,31.3423 /
GE07hv_apppu:15433: ādāya bāhuvegena bhrāmayitvā padāt padam // HV_App.I,31.3424 //
GE07hv_apppu:15434: vyāvidhya suciraṃ rāmo darśayann ātmano balam / HV_App.I,31.3425 /
GE07hv_apppu:15435: utkṣipya rākṣasendraṃ taṃ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3426 //
GE07hv_apppu:15436: gavyūtimātraṃ cikṣepa tato deśād dhalāyudhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3427 /
GE07hv_apppu:15437: gatāsur iva rakṣas tu tato deśān nirākramat // HV_App.I,31.3428 //
GE07hv_apppu:15438: ye kecid rākṣasās tatra hataśeṣā mahāraṇe / HV_App.I,31.3429 /
GE07hv_apppu:15439: balabhadrāt tato bhītā jagmuś caiva diśo daśa // HV_App.I,31.3430 //
GE07hv_apppu:15440: atha bhagavān api bhāskaro raviḥ @ HV_App.I,31.3431 @
GE07hv_apppu:15442: astaṃ yayau cakṣur api prajānām @ HV_App.I,31.3433 @
GE07hv_apppu:15454: ubhau tau haṃsaḍibhakau rātrāv eva mahāgirim / HV_App.I,31.3443 /
GE07hv_apppu:15455: jagmatuḥ sahitau rājan govardhanam atho nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3444 //
GE07hv_apppu:15456: atha prabhāte vimale sūrye cābhyudite sati / HV_App.I,31.3445 /
GE07hv_apppu:15458: śaineyo balabhadraś ca yādavāḥ sāraṇādayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3447 /
GE07hv_apppu:15459: gandharvair apsarobhiś ca nāditaṃ bahudhā girim // HV_App.I,31.3448 //
GE07hv_apppu:15460: [k: Ds2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15461: jagmatuḥ sahitau rājan govardhanam atho girim / **HV_App.I,31.3448**25:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15462: godhanair atha sainyaiś ca nāditaṃ bahudhā girim // **HV_App.I,31.3448**25:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:15463: tasyottaraṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha pārśvaṃ saṃprāpya yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3449 /
GE07hv_apppu:15464: nikaṣā yamunāṃ rājaṃs tato yuddham avartata / HV_App.I,31.3450 /
GE07hv_apppu:15465: haṃsena ḍibhakenātha yādavaiś ca samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3451 //
GE07hv_apppu:15467: vivyādha haṃsaḍibhakau vasudevaś ca saptabhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3453 /
GE07hv_apppu:15468: sāraṇaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā daśabhiḥ kaṅka eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3454 //
GE07hv_apppu:15470: niśaṭhas triṃśatā rājan sātyakiś cāpi saptabhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3455 /
GE07hv_apppu:15471: aśītyā vipṛthū rājann uddhavo daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3456 //
GE07hv_apppu:15472: pradyumnas triṃśatā rājan sāmbaś cāpi ca saptabhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3457 /
GE07hv_apppu:15473: anādhṛṣṭis tv ekaṣaṣṭyā śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām // HV_App.I,31.3458 //
GE07hv_apppu:15474: evaṃ te sahitā rājaṃś cakrur yuddham adīnavat / HV_App.I,31.3459 /
GE07hv_apppu:15475: atyadbhutaṃ mahāghoraṃ yādavāḥ sarva eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3460 //
GE07hv_apppu:15476: cakrus tābhyāṃ mahāyuddhaṃ vāsudevasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3461 /
GE07hv_apppu:15477: sarvān atha mahārāja yādavān balavattarān // HV_App.I,31.3462 //
GE07hv_apppu:15478: tāv ubhau haṃsaḍibhakau nṛpāṃs tān pratyavidhyatām / HV_App.I,31.3463 /
GE07hv_apppu:15479: pratyekaṃ daśabhir vidhvā bāṇaiś ca kṛtasaṃyataiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3464 /
GE07hv_apppu:15480: jaghnatuś ca śarais tīkṣṇair atyarthaṃ yādaveśvarān // HV_App.I,31.3465 //
GE07hv_apppu:15481: vyathitāḥ sarva evaite vamantaḥ śoṇitaṃ bahu / HV_App.I,31.3466 /
GE07hv_apppu:15482: mādhave kiṃśukā rājan puṣpitā iva te babhuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3467 //
GE07hv_apppu:15483: bhītāś ca yādavā rājan palāyanaparāyaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3468 /
GE07hv_apppu:15484: etasminn antare rājan vasudevātmajau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3469 //
GE07hv_apppu:15485: vāsudevo halī yuddhe pramukhe dhanvinau tayoḥ / HV_App.I,31.3470 /
GE07hv_apppu:15486: cakratur yuddham atulaṃ skandaśakrāv ivāmbare // HV_App.I,31.3471 //
GE07hv_apppu:15487: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhā yakṣā maharṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3472 /
GE07hv_apppu:15488: vimānasthāś ca dadṛśur yuddhaṃ devāsuropamam // HV_App.I,31.3473 //
GE07hv_apppu:15489: tataḥ prādur abhūtāṃ tau bhūtau bhūteśvarasya ha / HV_App.I,31.3474 /
GE07hv_apppu:15490: śūlinā preṣito yuddhe rakṣārthaṃ balinau tayoḥ // HV_App.I,31.3475 //
GE07hv_apppu:15491: haṃso 'tha vāsudevaś ca yuddhaṃ cakratur īśvarau / HV_App.I,31.3476 /
GE07hv_apppu:15492: rāmaś ca ḍibhakaś caiva saṃyuktau yuddhakāṅkṣayā // HV_App.I,31.3477 //
GE07hv_apppu:15493: vikrāntāḥ sarva evaite śastre hy astre tathā bale / HV_App.I,31.3478 /
GE07hv_apppu:15494: śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthag rājan sve sve sarve rathe sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3479 //
GE07hv_apppu:15495: atha kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśaḥ pāñcajanyaṃ mahāsvanam / HV_App.I,31.3480 /
GE07hv_apppu:15496: dadhmau padmapalāśākṣaḥ sarvān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.3481 //
GE07hv_apppu:15498: dudruvatur mahārāja śūlam ādāya keśavam / HV_App.I,31.3483 /
GE07hv_apppu:15499: śūlena pothayāṃ rājaṃś cakratur yādaveśvaram // HV_App.I,31.3484 //
GE07hv_apppu:15501: īṣasmitādharo devaḥ kiṃcid utplutya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.3486 /
GE07hv_apppu:15502: rathād rathivaraśreṣṭhas tau pragṛhya jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3487 //
GE07hv_apppu:15503: bhrāmayitvā śataguṇam alātam iva keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3488 /
GE07hv_apppu:15504: kailāsaṃ ca samuddiśya pracikṣepa tato hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.3489 //
GE07hv_apppu:15505: tāv etya tu gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ kailāsasya mahāmate / HV_App.I,31.3490 /
GE07hv_apppu:15506: dṛṣṭvā tatkarma devasya vismayaṃ jagmatuḥ param // HV_App.I,31.3491 //
GE07hv_apppu:15507: haṃsaś ca dṛṣṭvā tatkarma roṣatāmrāyatekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3492 /
GE07hv_apppu:15508: uvāca vacanaṃ viṣṇuṃ paśyatāṃ tridivaukasām // HV_App.I,31.3493 //
GE07hv_apppu:15509: kimarthaṃ rājasūyasya vighnaṃ carasi keśava / HV_App.I,31.3494 /
GE07hv_apppu:15510: brahmadatto mahīpālo yaṣṭā tasya mahākratoḥ / HV_App.I,31.3495 /
GE07hv_apppu:15511: karaṃ diśa yathāyogaṃ yadi prāṇān prakāṅkṣase // HV_App.I,31.3496 //
GE07hv_apppu:15512: atha cet tvaṃ kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha tato jñātvā karaṃ bahu / HV_App.I,31.3497 /
GE07hv_apppu:15513: dadāsi nandaputra tvaṃ tato yaṣṭā sa me guruḥ // HV_App.I,31.3498 //
GE07hv_apppu:15514: īśvaro 'haṃ sadā rājñāṃ devānām iva śūladhṛk / HV_App.I,31.3499 /
GE07hv_apppu:15515: evaṃ te vīryavibhavaṃ nāśayiṣyāmi saṃyuge // HV_App.I,31.3500 //
GE07hv_apppu:15516: ity uktvā saśaraṃ cāpaṃ sālatālopamaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3501 /
GE07hv_apppu:15517: ākṛṣya ca yathāprāṇaṃ nārācena sa keśavam / HV_App.I,31.3502 /
GE07hv_apppu:15518: lalāṭe cikṣipe haṃso lalāma iva so 'bhavat // HV_App.I,31.3503 //
GE07hv_apppu:15519: uvāca sātyakiṃ kṛṣṇo rathaṃ vāhaya me prabho / HV_App.I,31.3504 /
GE07hv_apppu:15520: dārukaṃ pṛṣṭavāhaṃ taṃ kṛtvā keśava īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3505 //
GE07hv_apppu:15521: atha tena samādiṣṭaḥ sātyakir vāhayan ratham / HV_App.I,31.3506 /
GE07hv_apppu:15522: maṇḍalāni bahūny ājau darśayām āsa satvaram // HV_App.I,31.3507 //
GE07hv_apppu:15523: atha viddho dṛḍhaṃ tena śareṇa harir īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.3508 /
GE07hv_apppu:15524: āgneyam astraṃ saṃyojya śare kasmiṃścid īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.3509 /
GE07hv_apppu:15525: uvāca haṃsaṃ rājendra sātyakiṃ preṣayan hayān // HV_App.I,31.3510 //
GE07hv_apppu:15526: anena tvāṃ dahāmy adya yadi śaknoṣi vāraya / HV_App.I,31.3511 /
GE07hv_apppu:15527: alaṃ te bahuyuddhena kṣatriyo 'si sadā śaṭha // HV_App.I,31.3512 //
GE07hv_apppu:15528: mattaś cet karam icchaṃs tvaṃ darśayādya parākramam / HV_App.I,31.3513 /
GE07hv_apppu:15529: yatayo bādhitā haṃsa puṣkare saṃsthitās tvayā // HV_App.I,31.3514 //
GE07hv_apppu:15530: śāstā tvaṃ khalu viprāṇāṃ sthite mayi narādhama / HV_App.I,31.3515 /
GE07hv_apppu:15531: sthite mayi jagannāthe hatvā kṣatriyakaṇṭakān // HV_App.I,31.3516 //
GE07hv_apppu:15532: śāstāsmy atho 'satāṃ loke duṣṭānāṃ brahmavidviṣām / HV_App.I,31.3517 /
GE07hv_apppu:15533: śāpena yatimukhyānāṃ hata eva purādhama // HV_App.I,31.3518 //
GE07hv_apppu:15534: mṛtyave tvāṃ nivedyādya rakṣitā brāhmaṇān aham / HV_App.I,31.3519 /
GE07hv_apppu:15535: iti bruvaṃs tad astraṃ tu mumoca yudhi keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3520 /
GE07hv_apppu:15536: tad astraṃ vāruṇenātha haṃso 'pi pratyaṣedhayat // HV_App.I,31.3521 //
GE07hv_apppu:15537: vāyavyam atha govindo mumoca yudhi haṃsake / HV_App.I,31.3522 /
GE07hv_apppu:15538: tad astraṃ vārayām āsa māhendreṇa nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.3523 //
GE07hv_apppu:15539: atha māheśvaraṃ kṛṣṇo mumocātyugram āhave / HV_App.I,31.3524 /
GE07hv_apppu:15540: raudreṇa tat tato haṃso vārayām āsa tatkṣaṇāt // HV_App.I,31.3525 //
GE07hv_apppu:15541: gāndharvaṃ rākṣasaṃ caiva paiśācam atha keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3526 /
GE07hv_apppu:15542: brahmāstram atha kauberam āsuraṃ yāmyam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3527 //
GE07hv_apppu:15543: chittvāsyaitāni haṃsas tu mumoca yudhi satvaram / HV_App.I,31.3528 /
GE07hv_apppu:15544: vāraṇārthaṃ tadastrāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ mādhavasya ha // HV_App.I,31.3529 //
GE07hv_apppu:15545: atha brahmaśiro nāma ghoraṃ śatruvināśanam / HV_App.I,31.3530 /
GE07hv_apppu:15546: mumoca haṃsam uddiśya keśavaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3531 /
GE07hv_apppu:15549: atha bhīto mahāraudram astraṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpottamaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.3531**26:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:15550: haṃso 'pi tena rājendra vārayām āsa taṃ śaram // HV_App.I,31.3532 //
GE07hv_apppu:15552: astraṃ vaiṣṇavam ādāya śare suniśite hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.3534 /
GE07hv_apppu:15554: yena devā raṇe hatvā rājyam āpuḥ purāsurān / HV_App.I,31.3536 /
GE07hv_apppu:15555: tadastraṃ yojayām āsa vadhārthaṃ tasya bhūpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.3537 //
GE07hv_apppu:15558: atha bhīto mahāraudram astraṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.3538 /
GE07hv_apppu:15559: haṃso rājā mahārāja niśceṣṭa iva saṃbabhau // HV_App.I,31.3539 //
GE07hv_apppu:15560: utplutya sa rathāt tasmād yamunām abhyadhāvata / HV_App.I,31.3540 /
GE07hv_apppu:15561: yatra kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśaḥ kāliyaṃ balaśālinam // HV_App.I,31.3541 //
GE07hv_apppu:15562: mamarda ca mahāghoraṃ yāvat pātālasaṃsthitiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3542 /
GE07hv_apppu:15563: tāvad dīrghaṃ mahānīlaṃ kālāñjananibhaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,31.3543 //
GE07hv_apppu:15564: tasmin hrade mahāghore papātātha sa haṃsakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3544 /
GE07hv_apppu:15565: haṃse patati tasmiṃs tu mahān rāvo babhūva ha / HV_App.I,31.3545 /
GE07hv_apppu:15566: girīṇāṃ pātyamānānāṃ samudra iva vajriṇā // HV_App.I,31.3546 //
GE07hv_apppu:15567: rathād utplutya kṛṣṇo 'pi tasyopari papāta ha / HV_App.I,31.3547 /
GE07hv_apppu:15568: devadevo jagannātho jagad vismāpayann iva / HV_App.I,31.3548 /
GE07hv_apppu:15569: prāharat taṃ mahābāhuṃ pādābhyām atha keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3549 //
GE07hv_apppu:15570: pādakṣepaṃ tatas tasmāl labdhvā haṃso nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.3550 /
GE07hv_apppu:15571: mamāra ca nṛpaśreṣṭha kecid evaṃ vadanti hi // HV_App.I,31.3551 //
GE07hv_apppu:15572: anye pātālam āyāto bhakṣitaḥ pannagair iti / HV_App.I,31.3552 /
GE07hv_apppu:15573: adyāpi naiva rājendra dṛṣṭa ity anuśuśrumaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3553 //
GE07hv_apppu:15575: hate tasmin mahārāja dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / HV_App.I,31.3555 /
GE07hv_apppu:15576: akarod rājasūyaṃ ca tava pūrvapitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3556 //
GE07hv_apppu:15577: yadi jīved asau haṃsaḥ ko nu maṃsyati taṃ kratum / HV_App.I,31.3557 /
GE07hv_apppu:15578: sa ca sarvāstravin nityaṃ rudrāl labdhavaraḥ prabho // HV_App.I,31.3558 //
GE07hv_apppu:15579: kṣaṇād eva mahārāja vārteyaṃ gām agāhata / HV_App.I,31.3559 /
GE07hv_apppu:15580: hato haṃso hato haṃsaḥ kṛṣṇena ripumardinā // HV_App.I,31.3560 //
GE07hv_apppu:15583: yamunāyā hrade ghore kṛṣṇeneti divāniśam // HV_App.I,31.3563 //
GE07hv_apppu:15586: śrutvā nihatam atyugraṃ bhrātaraṃ vīryaśālinam / HV_App.I,31.3564 /
GE07hv_apppu:15588: ḍibhako vīryasaṃpanno yamunām anu jagmivān / HV_App.I,31.3566 /
GE07hv_apppu:15589: tam anvadhāvad vegena balabhadro halāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3567 //
GE07hv_apppu:15590: haṃso hi yatra patitas tatrāsau nipapāta ha / HV_App.I,31.3568 /
GE07hv_apppu:15592: atikruddho 'tha ḍibhako bhrāmayitvā jalaṃ bahu / HV_App.I,31.3570 /
GE07hv_apppu:15593: unmajyonmajya sahasā nimajya ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3571 /
GE07hv_apppu:15594: na dadarśa tadā rājan bhrātaraṃ vīryaśālinam // HV_App.I,31.3572 //
GE07hv_apppu:15595: unmajyātha mahābāhur vāsudevaṃ vilokya ca / HV_App.I,31.3573 /
GE07hv_apppu:15596: uvāca vacanaṃ rājan ḍibhako vīryavattamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3574 /
GE07hv_apppu:15597: are gopakadāyāda kvāsau haṃsa iti sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3575 //
GE07hv_apppu:15598: vāsudevo 'pi dharmātmā yamunāṃ pṛccha rājaka / HV_App.I,31.3576 /
GE07hv_apppu:15599: ity abravīt prasannātmā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,31.3577 //
GE07hv_apppu:15600: tac chrutvā yamunāṃ bhūyaḥ praviśya ḍibhakaḥ kila / HV_App.I,31.3578 /
GE07hv_apppu:15602: vilalāpa tato rājā ḍibhako bhrāntamānasaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3580 /
GE07hv_apppu:15603: kva nu gacchasi rājendra vihāyaikam abāndhavam // HV_App.I,31.3581 //
GE07hv_apppu:15604: kuto bhrātar ito gaccheḥ parityajyaiva mām iha // HV_App.I,31.3582 //
GE07hv_apppu:15606: ātmatyāge manaḥ kurvan yamunāyā mahāhrade // HV_App.I,31.3584 //
GE07hv_apppu:15608: hastena jihvām ākṛṣya bhūyo bhūyo vilapya ca // HV_App.I,31.3586 //
GE07hv_apppu:15609: tataḥ samūlām ākṛṣya jihvāṃ sāhasakṛt svayam / HV_App.I,31.3587 /
GE07hv_apppu:15610: mamārāntarjale rājan ḍibhako narakāya vai // HV_App.I,31.3588 //
GE07hv_apppu:15611: gate narādhame haṃse ḍibhake ca tadā hate / HV_App.I,31.3589 /
GE07hv_apppu:15612: agamat puṇḍarīkākṣo bhūtān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.3590 //
GE07hv_apppu:15613: tataḥ prītaḥ prasannātmā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.3591 /
GE07hv_apppu:15615: kaṃcit kālaṃ mahārāja pūrvabhuktam uvāsa ha // HV_App.I,31.3593 //
GE07hv_apppu:15619: govardhanagataṃ śrutvā vāsudevaṃ ca sāgrajam // HV_App.I,31.3595 //
GE07hv_apppu:15620: navanītaṃ ca dadhi ca pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.3596 /
GE07hv_apppu:15621: vanyaṃ puṣpaṃ mahārāja mayūrāṅgadam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3597 //
GE07hv_apppu:15622: ballavair aparaiḥ sārdhaṃ gopībhiś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3598 /
GE07hv_apppu:15623: jagmatuḥ sahasā prītau govardhanam atho nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3599 //
GE07hv_apppu:15624: kvacid vṛkṣe samāsaktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇamṛgekṣaṇam / HV_App.I,31.3600 /
GE07hv_apppu:15625: dadarśatur mahābāhuṃ vāsudevaṃ ca sāgrajam // HV_App.I,31.3601 //
GE07hv_apppu:15626: praṇematuḥ susaṃhṛṣṭau tatra dṛṣṭvā mahābalau / HV_App.I,31.3602 /
GE07hv_apppu:15627: darśayām āsatur devaṃ pāyasāni mahānti ca // HV_App.I,31.3603 //
GE07hv_apppu:15628: nandagopaṃ yaśodāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā prīto 'bhavad dhariḥ / HV_App.I,31.3604 /
GE07hv_apppu:15629: avocac ca tato vākyaṃ nandagopaṃ saballavam / HV_App.I,31.3605 /
GE07hv_apppu:15630: yaśodāṃ mātaraṃ paścād vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,31.3606 //
GE07hv_apppu:15631: tāta mātar vraje goṣṭhe kuśalaṃ vā svagodhane / HV_App.I,31.3607 /
GE07hv_apppu:15632: api gāvaḥ kṣīravatyo vatsā vatsatarāḥ pitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3608 //
GE07hv_apppu:15633: api vā suśubhaṃ kṣīram api gāvaḥ suśobhanāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3609 /
GE07hv_apppu:15634: api vā dārakā mātar vatsapālāḥ pitar divā // HV_App.I,31.3610 //
GE07hv_apppu:15635: bahūni cāpi dāmāni kīlakā api vā bahu / HV_App.I,31.3611 /
GE07hv_apppu:15636: tṛṇāni bahurūpāṇi kiṃ vā santi pitaḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3612 //
GE07hv_apppu:15637: śakaṭāni sugandhīni kiṃ vā santi pitar dhruvam / HV_App.I,31.3613 /
GE07hv_apppu:15638: api gopyaḥ putravatyo dārakāḥ kim ajījanan // HV_App.I,31.3614 //
GE07hv_apppu:15639: ghaṭāḥ kiṃ bahavo mātar abhinnāḥ sarvato vraje / HV_App.I,31.3615 /
GE07hv_apppu:15640: kiṃ gāvaḥ kṣīram atulaṃ sravany ahar ahaḥ pitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3616 //
GE07hv_apppu:15641: haiyaṃgavīnaṃ kṣīrāṇi dadhi vā kim ajījanan / HV_App.I,31.3617 /
GE07hv_apppu:15642: godhanaṃ sarvam evaitan nīrogaṃ saṃprapadyate // HV_App.I,31.3618 //
GE07hv_apppu:15644: sarvam etad yaduśreṣṭha nīrogaṃ bahuśaḥ prabho / HV_App.I,31.3619 /
GE07hv_apppu:15646: rakṣaṇāt tava deveśa sadā kuśalino vayam / HV_App.I,31.3621 /
GE07hv_apppu:15647: sagodhanāḥ savatsāś ca nīrogā eva keśava // HV_App.I,31.3622 //
GE07hv_apppu:15648: ekam eva sadā duḥkhaṃ na tvāṃ drakṣyāma keśava / HV_App.I,31.3623 /
GE07hv_apppu:15649: yad etat kevalaṃ duḥkham iti me dhīyate sadā // HV_App.I,31.3624 //
GE07hv_apppu:15651: evamādi vilapyantaṃ gacchety āha sa keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3625 /
GE07hv_apppu:15652: mātaraṃ punar āhedaṃ mātar gaccha gṛhaṃ prati // HV_App.I,31.3626 //
GE07hv_apppu:15653: ye ca tvāṃ kīrtayiṣyanti te ca svargam avāpnuyuḥ / HV_App.I,31.3627 /
GE07hv_apppu:15654: ye kecit tvāṃ namasyanti te me priyatarāḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3628 //
GE07hv_apppu:15655: madbhaktāḥ sarvadā santu gacchety āha ca tāṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.3629 /
GE07hv_apppu:15657: ity uktvā pitarau devo vāsudevaḥ sanātanaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.3629**27:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15658: gāḍham āliṅgya tau prītau preṣayām āsa keśavaḥ // **HV_App.I,31.3629**27:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:15661: iti śrutvā ca tadvākyaṃ kṛṣṇād bhaktipuraḥsaram / **HV_App.I,31.3629**28:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15662: yaśodā nandagopaś ca jagmatuḥ svagṛhaṃ kila // HV_App.I,31.3630 //
GE07hv_apppu:15663: tataḥ kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśo yādavair vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.3631 /
GE07hv_apppu:15664: gantum aicchat tadā viṣṇuḥ purīṃ dvāravatīṃ kila // HV_App.I,31.3632 //
GE07hv_apppu:15665: [k: Dn Bom. Poona Cal. eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15666: ya etac chṛṇuyān nityaṃ paṭhed vāpi samāhitaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.3632**29:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15667: putravān dhanavāṃś caiva ante mokṣaṃ ca gacchati // **HV_App.I,31.3632**29:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:15670: gacchann atha mahāviṣṇuḥ puṣkaraṃ prāpya yādavaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3633 /
GE07hv_apppu:15671: apaśyan munimukhyāṃs tu puṣkarasthān nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.3634 //
GE07hv_apppu:15672: te sametya mahādevam ṛṣayo vītamatsarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3635 /
GE07hv_apppu:15675: atyadbhutam idaṃ viṣṇo tava vīryaṃ janārdana / HV_App.I,31.3638 /
GE07hv_apppu:15676: yena tau nihatau yuddhe haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3639 //
GE07hv_apppu:15677: yo vicakro durādharṣo devair api suduḥsahaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3640 /
GE07hv_apppu:15678: saṃgare nihato deva duḥsādhya iti no matiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3641 //
GE07hv_apppu:15679: kṣemo naḥ sarvakāryeṣu caratāṃ tapa uttamam / HV_App.I,31.3642 /
GE07hv_apppu:15680: tvatprasādāj jagannātha carāmas tapa uttamam // HV_App.I,31.3643 //
GE07hv_apppu:15681: niṣkalmaṣā bhaviṣyāmas tava saṃsmaraṇād dhare / HV_App.I,31.3644 /
GE07hv_apppu:15682: tvaṃ hi sarvasya duḥkhasya hartā tvāṃ dhyāyatāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3645 //
GE07hv_apppu:15683: tvadanusmaraṇaṃ jantoḥ sadā puṇyapradaṃ prabho / HV_App.I,31.3646 /
GE07hv_apppu:15684: tvaṃ hi naḥ satataṃ dhātā vidhātā tapaso hare // HV_App.I,31.3647 //
GE07hv_apppu:15685: tvam oṃkāro vaṣaṭkāras tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3648 /
GE07hv_apppu:15686: tvaṃ jyotir brahmaṇo mūrtis tvaṃ brahmā rudra eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3649 //
GE07hv_apppu:15687: prāṇas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānām antarātmeti śabdyase / HV_App.I,31.3650 /
GE07hv_apppu:15688: upāsyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yajñair dānair jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.3651 //
GE07hv_apppu:15689: namo viśvasṛje deva namas te viśvamūrtaye / HV_App.I,31.3652 /
GE07hv_apppu:15690: pāhi lokam imaṃ deva hatvā brahmadviṣaḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3653 //
GE07hv_apppu:15691: sa tatheti harir viṣṇur yayau dvāravatīṃ purīm / HV_App.I,31.3654 /
GE07hv_apppu:15692: avasad vṛṣṇibhiḥ sārdhaṃ stūyamānaḥ sa māgadhaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3655 //
GE07hv_apppu:15693: iyaṃ ca devadevasya ceṣṭā hi janamejaya / HV_App.I,31.3656 /
GE07hv_apppu:15694: proktā te pṛcchate rājan kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi // HV_App.I,31.3657 //
GE07hv_apppu:15696: [h: HV (CE), Appendix I, No. 32-39. Input by Luther Obrock,
GE07hv_apppu:15700: and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald. Fall 2004 and Spring 2005. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:15701: [k: After 107.18, Dn D6 Bom. Poona eds G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15702: tataḥ prabhṛti sā devī kāmamohaṃ gatā vibho / HV_App.I,32.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15703: devyās tu vacanaṃ smṛtvā saṃsmarantī patiṃ tadā / HV_App.I,32.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:15704: nidrāṃ na bhajate rātrau na divā bhojanaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,32.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:15705: smarantī patibhāvaṃ sā vilalāpa nṛpātmajā // HV_App.I,32.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:15706: nindantī śaśinaṃ nāke sevatī na ca candanam / HV_App.I,32.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:15707: sā bālā mohitā rājan kāmena paripīḍitā // HV_App.I,32.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:15708: upacaryanti tāṃ sukhyo vijvarām api sajvarām / HV_App.I,32.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:15709: tapyate hṛdayaṃ tasyā lepitaṃ candanena ca // HV_App.I,32.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:15710: kapole pāṇḍimā cihnaṃ netre jalasamanvite / HV_App.I,32.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:15711: jṛmbhaṇaṃ ca tathā svāpo dehe tasyā vyavardhata // HV_App.I,32.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:15713: kṣipanti sakhyo hṛdaye pīḍite manmathāgninā // HV_App.I,32.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:15714: vyajanāni prakurvanti pṛcchanti ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,32.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:15715: kā vyathā kiṃ śarīriṃ te kim idaṃ tava bhāmini // HV_App.I,32.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:15716: kiṃ tubhyaṃ rocate devi tad ākhyāhi varānane / HV_App.I,32.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:15717: kasmād idaṃ samutpannaṃ duḥkhasādhyaṃ manorame // HV_App.I,32.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:15718: tvanmanonugataṃ vākyaṃ vadanty etās tu sārikāḥ / HV_App.I,32.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:15719: śukā nīlatamāḥ subhru paṭhanti hi pumān iva // HV_App.I,32.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:15720: prahlādajananaṃ vākyaṃ kimarthaṃ nādya bhāṣase / HV_App.I,32.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:15721: tava tāto mahāvīro devānām api durjayaḥ // HV_App.I,32.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:15722: tasyāgre tiṣṭhate ko 'pi na bhūmau varavarṇini / HV_App.I,32.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:15723: baleḥ putro mahāvīro bāṇo hi duratikramaḥ // HV_App.I,32.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:15725: yatra saṃtiṣṭhate devaḥ śūlahasto maheśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,32.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:15726: putro 'yamiti jānīhi girijāṃ yo 'bravīd dharaḥ / HV_App.I,32.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:15727: bāṇaṃ prati mahādevas tava tātam uṣe śṛṇu // HV_App.I,32.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:15728: kā vyatheti mukhe cedaṃ nāsāgraṃ ca virājate / HV_App.I,32.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:15730: saṃpūrṇacandrapratimaṃ mukhaṃ candro yathā ghane / HV_App.I,32.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:15731: na śobhite tu vicchāyaṃ kimarthaṃ kāraṇaṃ vada // HV_App.I,32.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:15732: śvāsān muñcasi bāle tvaṃ na ratiṃ yāsi bhāvataḥ / HV_App.I,32.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:15733: gṛhāṇa bhojanaṃ divyaṃ yat te manasi vartate // HV_App.I,32.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:15734: tāmbūlaṃ rocate pūrvaṃ tat kimarthaṃ na gṛhyate / HV_App.I,32.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:15735: miṣṭāni yāni vastūni durlabhānītarair janaiḥ / HV_App.I,32.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:15736: gṛhāṇa devi uttiṣṭha vada pīḍāṃ śarīrajām // HV_App.I,32.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:15737: iti kolāhalaṃ śrutvā uṣā veśmasamudbhavam / HV_App.I,32.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:15738: dāsībhiḥ kīrtitaṃ tatra mātur agre pṛthak pṛthak // HV_App.I,32.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:15739: rājaputrī yadā devi samāyātā gṛhe satī / HV_App.I,32.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:15741: ato dāsījanā devi vadāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ janāḥ / HV_App.I,32.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:15742: ko mohaḥ kim idaṃ maunaṃ kaḥ svāpo mlānatā katham / HV_App.I,32.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:15743: vicārya bhiṣajo devi diśyantāṃ kaṣṭaśāntaye // HV_App.I,32.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:15745: tat kathaṃ sahate devi vyādhibhāraṃ varānane // HV_App.I,32.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:15746: iti śrutvā tadā devī satvarā haṃsagāminī / HV_App.I,32.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:15747: prāpya deśam uṣā yatra kim idaṃ kaṣṭalakṣaṇam // HV_App.I,32.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:15749: spṛṣṭvāṅgulīr anāyāsaṃ sphoṭayām āsa bhāvinī // HV_App.I,32.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:15750: kim asti tava kalyāṇi kā vyathā tava vartate / HV_App.I,32.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:15751: ete vaidyāḥ samāgatya pṛcchanti bhavatīṃ hi tat // HV_App.I,32.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:15753: jalakrīḍāṃ gatā tatra rājaputrī sakhīgaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,32.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:15754: pārvatyāḥ krīḍitaṃ tatra jānīmaḥ śramasaṃbhavam // HV_App.I,32.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:15755: śramād glāniḥ samutpannā jṛmbhaṇaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,32.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:15756: svāpaś ca jāyate tena mā bhayaṃ kartum arhasi // HV_App.I,32.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:15758: hṛdaye nihitaṃ vaidyāś candanaṃ himasaṃyutam / HV_App.I,32.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:15759: amātyāḥ kim idaṃ śīghraṃ kim idaṃ budbudāyate // HV_App.I,32.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:15760: atidāho mahān svedaḥ pipāsā na bubhukṣate / HV_App.I,32.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:15761: pralāpa eva kiṃ tasyāṃ śāstrato brūta niścitam // HV_App.I,32.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:15764: rūpeṇāpratimā devī rājaputrī ca bhāvinī / HV_App.I,32.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:15765: dṛṣṭipātaḥ kṛtas tābhis tena putryāṃ vyathābhavat // HV_App.I,32.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:15766: rakṣāmantrais tathā pītaiḥ sarṣapais tāṃ kumārikām / HV_App.I,32.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:15767: pānīyair abhiṣekeṇa parā śāntir bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,32.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:15768: ity uktvā bhiṣajaḥ sarve nivṛttā nṛpaveśmataḥ / HV_App.I,32.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:15769: sūcayanta punaḥ sarve kāmābhiprāyajāṃ vyathām // HV_App.I,32.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:15770: mātṛpṛṣṭā varārohā cirakālam uvāca sā / HV_App.I,32.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:15771: lajjāvatī mahābhāgā mātaraṃ rudatī bhṛśam // HV_App.I,32.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:15772: mātar na rocate nityaṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ na ca bhojanam / HV_App.I,32.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:15773: na cāpy utsavakaṃ mātaḥ sadāhaṃ hṛdayaṃ śṛṇu / HV_App.I,32.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:15774: ity uktvā virarāmātha hy uṣā nārī varāṅganā // HV_App.I,32.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:15775: sarvābhiḥ strībhir ārabdham anyonyaṃ mukhavīkṣaṇam / HV_App.I,32.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:15776: lajjānukāri nārīṇāṃ yauvanaṃ hi bhaved iti // HV_App.I,32.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:15777: iyaṃ ca rājakanyā hi bhartṛyogyā kim ucyate / HV_App.I,32.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:15778: pituḥ prasādān mātuś ca prāpnuyāt sadṛśaṃ varam // HV_App.I,32.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:15781: tatrasthāḥ paramā nāryaś citreṇa paramādbhutāḥ // HV_App.I,32.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:15782: [h: HV (CE), Appendix I, No. 33. Input by Luther Obrock,
GE07hv_apppu:15786: and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald. Fall 2004 and Spring 2005. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:15789: atha dvāravatīṃ prāpya sthitā sā bhavanāntike / HV_App.I,33.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15791: atha cintayatī sā tu buddhim vṛttiviniścitām / HV_App.I,33.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:15792: nāradaṃ dadṛśe tatra dhyāyantam udake munim // HV_App.I,33.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:15793: [k: After line 4, D6 T1.2 G M ins.: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15795: taṃ dṛṣṭvā citralekhā tu harṣeṇotphullalocanā / HV_App.I,33.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:15797: nāradas tv āśiṣaṃ dattvā citralehkām athābravīt / HV_App.I,33.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:15798: kim artham iha saṃprāptā śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,33.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:15799: devarṣim atha taṃ divyaṃ nāradaṃ lokapūjitam / HV_App.I,33.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:15801: bhagavañ śrūyatāṃ vākyaṃ dautyenāham ihāgatā / HV_App.I,33.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:15802: aniruddhaṃ mune netuṃ yadarthaṃ ca śṛṇuṣva me // HV_App.I,33.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:15803: nagare śoṇitapure bāṇo nāma mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,33.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:15804: tasya kanyā varārohā nāmnā coṣeti viśrutā / HV_App.I,33.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:15805: bhagavan sānuraktā ca prādyumnau puruṣottame // HV_App.I,33.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:15806: devyā varātisargeṇa tasyā bhartā vinirmitaḥ / HV_App.I,33.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:15807: taṃ ca netuṃ samāyātā tatra siddhiṃ vidhatsva me // HV_App.I,33.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:15808: mayā nīte 'niruddhe tu nagaraṃ śoṇitāhvayam / HV_App.I,33.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:15810: avaśyaṃ bhavitā caiva kṛṣṇena saha saṃgamaḥ / HV_App.I,33.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:15811: bāṇasya sumahān saṃkhye divyo hi sa mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,33.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:15812: na ca śakto 'niruddhas taṃ jetuṃ yuddhe mahāsuram / HV_App.I,33.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:15813: sahasrabāhum āyāntaṃ jayet kṛṣṇo mahābhujaḥ // HV_App.I,33.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:15814: bhagavat saṃnikarṣeṇa siddhaṃ me kāryam īhitam / HV_App.I,33.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:15815: [k: After line 24, K2 D2 ins. (D2 om. line 2):k]
GE07hv_apppu:15816: hṛtaḥ pravṛttiṃ kṛtvā me so 'niruddhaḥ kathaṃ bhavet / **HV_App.I,33.24**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15818: kathaṃ hi puṇḍarīkākṣo jñāpito 'sau bhaved idam // HV_App.I,33.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:15819: tvat prasādāc ca bhagavan na me kṛṣṇād bhayaṃ bhavet / HV_App.I,33.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:15820: sa hi tattvārthadṛṣṭis tu aniruddhaḥ kathaṃ hriyet // HV_App.I,33.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:15821: kruddho hi sa mahābāhus trailokyam api nirdahet / HV_App.I,33.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:15822: pautraśokābhisaṃtaptaḥ śāpena sa daheta mām // HV_App.I,33.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:15823: etāv arthau hi bhagavaṃś cintituṃ vai tvam arhasi / HV_App.I,33.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:15824: yathā hy uṣā labhet kāntaṃ mama caivābhayaṃ bhavet // HV_App.I,33.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:15825: ity evam ukto bhagavāṃś citralekhāṃ sa nāradaḥ / HV_App.I,33.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:15826: uvāca ca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ mā bhais tvaṃ samayaṃ śṛṇu // HV_App.I,33.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:15827: tvayā nīte 'niruddhe tu kanyāveśma praveśite / HV_App.I,33.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:15828: yadi yuddhaṃ bhavet tatra smartavyo 'haṃ śucismite // HV_App.I,33.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:15829: mamaiṣa paramaḥ kāmo yuddhaṃ draṣṭuṃ manorame / HV_App.I,33.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:15830: yad dṛṣṭvā ca bhavet prītiḥ pravṛttiś ca dṛḍhā bhavet // HV_App.I,33.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:15832: kṛtakṛtyā tato devi eṣa vidyāṃ dadāmy aham // HV_App.I,33.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:15833: evam ukte tu vacane nāradena maharṣiṇā / HV_App.I,33.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:15834: tatheti vacanaṃ prāha citralekhā manojavā // HV_App.I,33.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:15835: abhivādya mahātmānam ṛṣīṇāṃ nāradaṃ varam / HV_App.I,33.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:15837: [h: HV (CE), Appendix I, No. 34. Input by Luther Obrock,
GE07hv_apppu:15841: and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald. Fall 2004 and Spring 2005. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:15842: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B1.3 D1.3-5 T4 G2.4.5 ins. after 108.5; B2 Dn Ds D2.6 after the first occurrence of 108.6ab:
GE07hv_apppu:15845: prādyumniṃ vacanaṃ prāha ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā // HV_App.I,34.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:15846: cakṣur dattvā tu sā tasmai kṛtvā cātmanidarśanam / HV_App.I,34.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:15847: taṃ vivikte tu vai deśe sā vākyam idam abravīt // HV_App.I,34.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:15848: api te kuśalaṃ vīra sarvatra yadunandana / HV_App.I,34.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:15849: ahas tāvatpradoṣo vā kaccid gacchati te sukham // HV_App.I,34.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:15850: śṛṇuṣva tvaṃ mahābāho vijñaptiṃ me ratīsuta / HV_App.I,34.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:15851: uṣāyā mama sakhyās tu vākyaṃ vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,34.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:15852: svapne tu yā tvayā dṛṣṭā strībhāvaṃ cāpi lambhitā / HV_App.I,34.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:15853: bibharti hṛdayena tvāṃ tayā saṃpreṣitāsmy aham // HV_App.I,34.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:15854: rudatī jṛmbhatī caiva niḥśvasantī muhur muhuḥ / HV_App.I,34.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:15856: yadi tvaṃ yāsyase vīra dhārayiṣyati jīvitam / HV_App.I,34.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:15857: adarśanena maraṇaṃ tasyā nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,34.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:15858: yadi nārīsahasraṃ te hṛdisthaṃ yadunandana / HV_App.I,34.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:15860: tvaṃ ca tasyā varotsarge devyā datto manorathaḥ / HV_App.I,34.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:15861: citrapaṭṭaṃ mayā dattaṃ tvac cihnaṃ vīkṣya jīvati // HV_App.I,34.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:15862: [k: After line 18 Dn Ds D6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15864: sānukrośo yaduśreṣṭha bhava tasyā manorathe / HV_App.I,34.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:15865: uṣā te patate mūrdhnā vayaṃ ca yadunandana // HV_App.I,34.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:15866: śrūyatāṃ codbhavas tasyāḥ kulaṃ śīlaṃ ca yādṛśam / HV_App.I,34.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:15867: saṃsthānaṃ prakṛtiṃ cāsyāḥ pitaraṃ ca bravīmi te // HV_App.I,34.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:15868: vairocanisuto vīro bāṇo nāma mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,34.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:15869: sa rājā śoṇitapure tasya tvām icchate sutā // HV_App.I,34.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:15870: tvadbhāvagatacittā sā tvām ṛte na hi jīvati / HV_App.I,34.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:15871: manorathakṛto bhartā devyā datto na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,34.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:15872: tvatsaṃgamāt sā suśroṇī prāṇān dhārayate śubhā // HV_App.I,34.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:15874: dṛṣṭā svapne mayā sā hi tanmattaḥ śṛṇu śobhane // HV_App.I,34.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:15876: tataḥ prabuddhe na labhe śarma naiva ratiṃ sakhi / **HV_App.I,34.29**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15877: rūpaṃ kāntiṃ matiṃ caiva saṃyogaṃ ruditaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,34.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:15878: evaṃ sarvam ahorātraṃ muhyāmi paricintayan // HV_App.I,34.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:15879: yady ahaṃ samanugrāhyo yadi sakhyaṃ tvam icchasi / HV_App.I,34.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:15880: nayasva citralekhe māṃ draṣṭum icchāmy ahaṃ priyām // HV_App.I,34.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:15883: citralekhā tatas tuṣṭā tatheti ca tam abravīt // **HV_App.I,34.33**3:2 //
