GE07hv_apppu:15885: eṣo 'ñjalir mayā baddhaḥ satyaṃ svapnaṃ kuruṣva me // HV_App.I,34.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:15886: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā citralekhā varāpsarāḥ / HV_App.I,34.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:15887: saphalo 'dya mama kleśaḥ sakhyā me yat prayācitam // HV_App.I,34.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:15888: īpsitaṃ tasya vijñāya aniruddhasya bhāminī / HV_App.I,34.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:15889: citralekhā tatas tuṣṭā tatheti ca tam abravīt // HV_App.I,34.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:15893: sukeśyA vacanaṃ ślāghyaṃ jahāra saha śayyayā / **HV_App.I,34.39**4:3 /

GE07hv_apppu:15905: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T2.4 G ins. after adhy 108:
GE07hv_apppu:15908: yadā bāṇapure vīraḥ so 'niruddhaḥ sahoṣayā / HV_App.I,35.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15910: tadā devīṃ sa kaumārīṃ rakṣārthaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,35.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:15911: yad gītam aniruddhena devyāḥ stotram idaṃ śṛṇu // HV_App.I,35.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:15912: anantam akṣayaṃ divyam ādidevaṃ sanātanam / HV_App.I,35.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:15913: nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya pravaraṃ prathamaṃ prabhum // HV_App.I,35.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:15914: caṇḍīṃ kātyāyanīṃ devīm āryāṃ lokanamaskṛtām / HV_App.I,35.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:15918: ṛsibhir daivataiś caiva vākpuṣpair arcitāṃ śubhām / HV_App.I,35.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:15921: manasā bhāvaśuddhena śuciḥ stoṣye kṛtāñjaliḥ // HV_App.I,35.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:15924: prajñāṃ dakṣāṃ śivāṃ saumyāṃ danuputrapramardinīm / HV_App.I,35.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:15926: darśanīṃ pūranīṃ māyāṃ śaśivaktrāṃ śaśiprabhām / HV_App.I,35.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:15927: śāntiṃ dhruvāṃ ca jananīṃ mohanīṃ śoṣaṇīṃ tathā // HV_App.I,35.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:15929: kālīṃ kātyāyanīṃ devīṃ bhayadāṃ bhayanāśanīm // HV_App.I,35.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:15934: yūthasyādyāṃ mahābhāgāṃ śakunīṃ revatīṃ tathā / HV_App.I,35.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:15935: tithīnāṃ pañcamīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ paurṇamāsīṃ caturdaśīm // HV_App.I,35.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:15936: saptaviṃśati ṛkṣāṇi nadyaḥ sarvā diśo daśa / HV_App.I,35.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:15938: hrīṃ śrīṃ gaṅgāṃ ca gāndhārīṃ yoginīṃ yogadāṃ satām / HV_App.I,35.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:15939: kīrtim āśāṃ diśaṃ sparśāṃ namasyāmi sarasvatīm // HV_App.I,35.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:15940: vedānāṃ mātaraṃ caiva sāvitrīṃ bhaktavatsalām / HV_App.I,35.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:15942: kauberīṃ madirāṃ caṇḍām ilāṃ malayavāsinīm / HV_App.I,35.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:15947: surapriyāṃ surāṃ devīṃ vajrapāṇyanujāṃ śivām // HV_App.I,35.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:15953: pañcāśad devakanyānāṃ patnyo devagaṇasya ca / HV_App.I,35.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:15955: mātā pitā jaganmānyā divi devāpsarogaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,35.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:15957: vidyādharāṇāṃ nārīṣu sādhvīṣu manujāsu ca / HV_App.I,35.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:15958: evam etāsu nārīṣu sarvabhūtāśrayā hy asi // HV_App.I,35.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:15960: acintyā hy aprameyāsi yāsi sāsi namo 'stu te // HV_App.I,35.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:15961: ebhir nāmabhir anyaiś ca kīrtitā hy asi gautami / HV_App.I,35.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:15962: tvatprasādād avighnena kṣipraṃ mucyeya bandhanāt // HV_App.I,35.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:15963: avekṣasva viśālākṣi pādau te śaraṇaṃ vraje / HV_App.I,35.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:15964: sarveṣām eva bandhānāṃ mokṣaṇaṃ kartum arhasi // HV_App.I,35.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:15965: brahmā viṣṇuś ca rudraś ca candrasūryāgnimārutāḥ / HV_App.I,35.54 /

GE07hv_apppu:16082: [k: K Ñ V2 B1.2 Dn Ds2 D1-6 T2.4 G ins. after the first occurrence of 109.81ed (sic/); V1.3 B3 Ds1 after 109.81 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16083: praṇamyātha vacaḥ prāha vainateyo mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,36.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16084: vāsudevaṃ mahātmānaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ madhurayā girā // HV_App.I,36.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16085: padmanābha mahābāho kim arthaṃ cintito hy aham / HV_App.I,36.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16086: kṛtyaṃ te yad ihātrāsti śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,36.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:16087: kasya pakṣaparikṣepair nāśayāmi purīṃ prabho / HV_App.I,36.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:16088: prabhāvāt tava govinda ko na vidyād balaṃ mama // HV_App.I,36.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:16089: gadāvegaṃ ca te vīra cakrāgniṃ ca mahābhuja / HV_App.I,36.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:16090: nāvabudhyati mūḍhātmā ko darpān nāśam eṣyati // HV_App.I,36.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:16091: halaṃ siṃhamukhaṃ kasya vanamālī niyokṣyati / HV_App.I,36.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:16092: kasya dehas tu nirbhinno medinīṃ yāsyati prabho // HV_App.I,36.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:16093: kasya śaṅkharavaiḥ prāṇān mohayiṣyasi mādhava / HV_App.I,36.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:16094: ko 'yaṃ saparivāro 'dya yāsyate yam asādanam // HV_App.I,36.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:16095: evam ukte tu vacane vainateyena dhīmatā / HV_App.I,36.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:16096: vāsudevo vacaḥ prāha śṛṇuṣva patatāṃ vara // HV_App.I,36.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:16097: baleḥ putreṇa bāṇena prādyumnir aparājitaḥ / HV_App.I,36.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:16098: uṣāyāḥ kāraṇe baddho nagare śoṇitāhvaye // HV_App.I,36.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:16099: aniruddhas tu kāmārto baddho nāgair viṣolbaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,36.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:16100: tasya mokṣārtham āhūto mayā tvaṃ patageśvara // HV_App.I,36.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:16101: [k: After line 18, K1 (marg.) B1.2 D4 T2 G1.3 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16102: tava vegasamo nāsti pakṣiṇāṃ pravaro bhavān / **HV_App.I,36.18**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16103: aśakyaṃ ca tad adhvānaṃ gantum anyena vai dvija / HV_App.I,36.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:16104: tatra prāpaya māṃ śīghraṃ prādyumnir yatra tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,36.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:16105: vaidarbhī te snuṣā vīra rudate putragṛddhinī / HV_App.I,36.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:16106: tvatprasādād bhavaty eṣā putreṇa saha saṃgatā // HV_App.I,36.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:16107: amṛtaṃ tu hṛtaṃ vīra tvayā pannaganāśana / HV_App.I,36.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:16108: sa mayā tvaṃ samāgamya tasmin kāle mahābhuja / HV_App.I,36.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:16109: bhavān mama dhvajaś caiva tvadbhaktāḥ sarvavṛṣṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,36.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:16110: sakhitvaṃ mānayasvādya bhaktiṃ ca patageśvara // HV_App.I,36.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:16111: tava vegasamo nāsti paksiṇāṃ na ca te samaḥ / HV_App.I,36.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:16112: suparṇa sukṛtena tvāṃ śape pannaganāśana // HV_App.I,36.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:16113: dāsītvāc ca tvayā mātā mokṣitaikākinā purā / HV_App.I,36.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:16114: pakṣavikṣepam āśritya hatā yodhās tvayā purā // HV_App.I,36.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:16115: bhavān suragaṇān sarvān pṛṣṭham āropya vikramāt / HV_App.I,36.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:16116: gacchase hy agamān deśān vijayaś ca tavāsrayāṭ // HV_App.I,36.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:16117: gurutvān merutulyas tvaṃ laghutvāt pavanopamaḥ / HV_App.I,36.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:16118: bhute bhavye bhaviṣye ca na te tulyo 'sti vikrame // HV_App.I,36.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:16122: atyadbhutam idaṃ vākyaṃ tava kṛṣṇa mahābhuja / HV_App.I,36.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:16123: tvatprasādāt tu vijayaḥ sarvatra mama keśava // HV_App.I,36.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:16124: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi saṃs tavān madhusūdana / HV_App.I,36.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:16125: stotavyas tvaṃ mayā kṛṣṇa stauṣi māṃ tvaṃ mahābhuja // HV_App.I,36.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:16127: amoghadarśanas tvaṃ hi varārthiṣu varapradaḥ // HV_App.I,36.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:16130: dhanurdharaś cakradharo bhavāñ śaṅkhadharo mahān / HV_App.I,36.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:16131: bhavān pūrveṣu deheṣu khyāto bhūmidharaḥ prabho // HV_App.I,36.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:16132: lāṅgalī musalī cakrī devakītanayo bhavān / HV_App.I,36.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:16133: cāṇūramathanaś caiva gopriyaḥ kaṃsahā bhavān // HV_App.I,36.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:16135: mallapriyo mahāmallo mahāpuruṣa ity api // HV_App.I,36.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:16137: brahmaṇyaś ca vareṇyaś ca bhavān dāmodharaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,36.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:16139: asilomnaś ca hantā ca tathā rāvaṇanāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,36.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:16143: varuṇaś ca bhavān khyāto bhavāṃś ca saridudbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,36.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:16144: bhavān khaḍgadharo dhanvī dhanurdharavaro mahān / HV_App.I,36.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:16145: dāśārha iti vikhyāto mahādhanvā dhanuḥ priyaḥ // HV_App.I,36.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:16146: govinda iti vikhyāta udadhis tvaṃ ca suvrata / HV_App.I,36.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:16147: ākāśaś ca tapaś caiva samudramathano bhavān // HV_App.I,36.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:16148: bhavān svargo bahuphalo bhavān svargadharo mahān / HV_App.I,36.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:16149: tvam eva ca mahāmegho bījaniṣpattir eva ca // HV_App.I,36.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:16151: bhavān kāmapradaś caiva kāmaḥ sarvadhanurdharaḥ // HV_App.I,36.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:16152: saṃvarto vartanaś caiva pralayo nilayo mahān / HV_App.I,36.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:16154: īśas tvaṃ ca mahādeva asaṃkhyeyaguṇānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,36.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:16155: stotum icchasi māṃ deva stotavyas tvaṃ yadūttama // HV_App.I,36.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:16156: cakṣuṣā ye tvayā ghorāḥ prāṇinas tu nirīkṣitāḥ / HV_App.I,36.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:16158: ye tvayā parayā prītyā prāṇino vai nirīkṣitāḥ / HV_App.I,36.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:16159: iha ca pretya cāpāpāḥ sarve te svargagāminaḥ // HV_App.I,36.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:16160: eṣa te 'haṃ mahābāho vaśagaḥ śāsane sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,36.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:16163: jayaśabdaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā garuḍaḥ prāha keśavam / HV_App.I,36.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:16164: ayam asmi sthito vīra āruhasva mahābala // HV_App.I,36.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:16165: tataḥ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya mādhavo garuḍaṃ tataḥ / HV_App.I,36.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:16169: [h: HV (CE), Appendix I, No. 37. Input by Luther Obrock,
GE07hv_apppu:16173: and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald. Fall 2004 and Spring 2005. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:16174: [k: After 112.32, K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16175: etasminn antare tatra rudrapāriṣadā raṇe / HV_App.I,37.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16177: evaṃ sa śūlabhṛt tatra punar yuddhaṃ pracakrame / **HV_App.I,37.1**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16179: sarvāṃs tu nidrāvaśagān kṛtvā makaraketumān / HV_App.I,37.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16180: dānavān nāśayat tatra śarajālena vīryavān / HV_App.I,37.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:16183: jvālā prādurabhūd vaktrād dahantīva diśo daśa // HV_App.I,37.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:16184: tatas tu dharaṇī devī pīḍyamānā mahātmabhiḥ / HV_App.I,37.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:16189: aviṣahyam imaṃ bhāraṃ cintayasva pitāmaha / HV_App.I,37.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:16190: laghvībhūtā yathā deva dhārayeyaṃ carācaram // HV_App.I,37.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:16191: tatas tu kāsyapīṃ devīṃ pratyuvāca pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,37.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:16192: muhūrtaṃ dhārayātmānam āśu laghvī bhaviṣyasi // HV_App.I,37.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:16193: dṛṣṭvā tu bhagavān brahmā rudraṃ vacanam abravīt / HV_App.I,37.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:16194: sṛṣṭo mahāsuravadhaḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ parirakṣase // HV_App.I,37.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:16195: na ca yuddhaṃ mahābāho kṛṣṇena tava rocate / HV_App.I,37.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:16196: na ca budhyasi kṛṣṇaṃ tvam ātmānaṃ hi dvidhākṛtam // HV_App.I,37.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:16197: tataḥ śarīrayogād dhi bhagavān avyayaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,37.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:16198: praviśya paśyate kṛtsnāṃs trīṃ lokān sacarācarān // HV_App.I,37.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:16199: [k: After line 21, Ñ2.3 V B Ds D5.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16201: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Ds D5.6 cont.; K1 D1-3 ins. after 1375* [sic] :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16202: praviśya yogaṃ yogātmā varāṃs tān anucintayan / **HV_App.I,37.21**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16203: dvāravatyāṃ yad uktaṃ ca tad anusmṛtya sarvaśaḥ / **HV_App.I,37.21**3:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:16204: jagāda nottaraṃ kiṃ cin nivṛtto 'sau bhavat tadā // **HV_App.I,37.21**3:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:16205: ātmānaṃ kṛṣṇadehasthaṃ paśyate hy ekayonijam / HV_App.I,37.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:16206: tato niḥsṛtya rudras tu nyastavādo 'bhavan mṛdhe // HV_App.I,37.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:16207: brahmāṇaṃ cābravīd rudro na yotsye bhagavann iti / HV_App.I,37.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:16208: kṛṣṇena saha saṃgrāme laghvī bhavatu medinī // HV_App.I,37.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:16209: tataḥ kṛṣṇo 'tha rudraś ca pariṣvajya parasparam / HV_App.I,37.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:16210: parāṃ prītim upāgamya saṃgrāmād apajagmatuḥ // HV_App.I,37.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:16212: etadarthe purā rājan mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tu nāradaḥ / **HV_App.I,37.27**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16213: na ca tau paśyate kaścid yoginau yogam āgatau / HV_App.I,37.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:16214: eko brahmā tathā kṛtvā paśyaṃl lokapitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,37.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:16216: pārśvathaṃ paripapraccha jñātvā vai dīrghadarśinam // HV_App.I,37.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:16217: mandarasya gireḥ pārśve nalinyāṃ bhavakeśavau / HV_App.I,37.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:16218: rātrau svapnāntare brahman mayā dṛṣṭau harācyutau // HV_App.I,37.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:16219: hariṃ ca hararūpeṇa haraṃ ca harirūpiṇam / HV_App.I,37.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:16222: garuḍasthaṃ cāpi haraṃ hariṃ ca vṛṣabhadhvajam // HV_App.I,37.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:16223: vismayo me mahān brahman dṛṣṭvā tat paramādbhutam / HV_App.I,37.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:16224: etad ācakṣva bhagavan yāthātathyena suvrata // HV_App.I,37.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:16227: yathāntaraṃ na paśyāmi tena tau diśataḥ śivam // HV_App.I,37.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:16229: tad eva te pravakśyāmi rūpaṃ hariharātmakam // HV_App.I,37.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:16230: yo vai viṣṇuḥ sa vai rudro yo rudraḥ sa pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,37.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:16231: ekā mūrtis trayo devā rudraviṣṇupitāmahāḥ // HV_App.I,37.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:16233: ardhanārīśvarās te tu vrataṃ tīvraṃ samāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,37.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:16234: yathā jale jalaṃ kṣiptaṃ jalam eva tu tad bhavet / HV_App.I,37.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:16235: rudraṃ viṣṇuḥ praviṣṭas tu tathā rudramayo bhavet // HV_App.I,37.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:16236: agnim agniḥ praviṣṭas tu agnir eva yathā bhavet / HV_App.I,37.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:16237: tathā viṣṇuṃ praviṣtas tu rudro viṣṇumayo bhavet // HV_App.I,37.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:16238: rudram agnimayaṃ vidyād viṣṇuḥ somātmakaḥ smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,37.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:16240: kartārau cāpahartārau sthāvarasya carasya ca / HV_App.I,37.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:16244: [k: After line 57, Ñ2.3 V1.2 B1.2 Ds1 T4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16245: etau tau ca pravaktārāv etau tau ca prabhāmayau / **HV_App.I,37.57**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16246: [k: Ñ2 V1.2 B1.2 Ds1 T4 cont.; V3 Ds2 D6 ins. after line 57:k]
GE07hv_apppu:16247: jagataḥ pālakāv etāv etau sṣṛṭikarau smṛtau / **HV_App.I,37.57**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16248: ete caiva pravarṣanti bhānti vānti sṛjanti ca / HV_App.I,37.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:16249: etat parataraṃ guhyaṃ kathitaṃ te pitāmaha // HV_App.I,37.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:16250: yaś cainaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ yaś cainaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ / HV_App.I,37.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:16252: devau hariharau stoṣye brahmaṇā saha saṃgatau / HV_App.I,37.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:16253: etau ca paramau devau jagataḥ prabhavāpyayau // HV_App.I,37.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:16254: rudrasya paramo viṣṇur viṣṇoś ca paramaḥ śivaḥ / HV_App.I,37.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:16255: eka eva dvidhā bhūto loke carati nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,37.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:16256: na vinā śaṃkaraṃ viṣṇur na vinā keśavaṃ śivaḥ / HV_App.I,37.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:16257: tasmād ekatvam āyātau rudropendrau tu tau purā // HV_App.I,37.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:16258: namo rudrāya kṛṣṇāya namaḥ saṃhatacāriṇe / HV_App.I,37.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:16259: namaḥ ṣaḍardhanetrāya dvinetrāya ca vai namaḥ / HV_App.I,37.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:16260: namaḥ piṅgalanetrāya padmanetrāya vai namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:16262: namo dharaṇīdharāya ganṅgādharāya vai namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:16264: namaḥ kapālamālāya vanamālāya vai namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:16265: namas triśūlahastāya cakrahastāya vai namaḥ / HV_App.I,37.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:16266: namaḥ kanakadaṇḍāya namas te vratadaṇḍine // HV_App.I,37.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:16267: namaś carmanivāsāya namas te pītavāsase / HV_App.I,37.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:16268: namo 'stu lakṣmīpataye umāyāḥ pataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:16271: namaḥ śmaśānavāsāya namas tv āśramavāsine / HV_App.I,37.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:16273: namo 'stv anekarūpāya bahurūpāya vai namaḥ / HV_App.I,37.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:16274: namaḥ pralayakartre ca namaḥ sṛṣṭikarāya ca // HV_App.I,37.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:16276: virūpākṣāya devāya namaḥ saumyekṣaṇāya ca // HV_App.I,37.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:16279: namaḥ suraripughnāya tripuraghnāya vai namaḥ / HV_App.I,37.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:16286: namaḥ sahasraśīrṣāya bahuśīrṣāya vai namaḥ / HV_App.I,37.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:16288: namas te bhagavan viṣṇo namas te bhagavañ śiva / HV_App.I,37.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:16289: namas te bhagavan deva namas te devapūjita // HV_App.I,37.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:16290: namas te sāmabhir gīta namas te yajubhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,37.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:16291: namas te suraśatrughna namas te 'surapūjita // HV_App.I,37.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:16292: namas te karmiṇāṃ karma namo 'mitaparākrama / HV_App.I,37.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:16293: hṛṣīkeśa namas te 'stu svarṇakeśa namo 'stu te // HV_App.I,37.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:16294: imaṃ stavaṃ yo rudrasya viṣṇoś caiva mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,37.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:16295: sametya ṛṣibhiḥ sarvaiḥ stutau tau sumahātmabhiḥ // HV_App.I,37.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:16296: vyāsena devaviduṣā nāradena ca dhīmatā / HV_App.I,37.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:16297: bhāradvājena gārgyeṇa viśvāmitreṇa vai tathā / HV_App.I,37.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:16298: [k: After line 104, Ñ2 B2 D6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16300: agastyena pulastyena dhaumyena ca mahātmanā // HV_App.I,37.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:16301: yaś cedaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ nityaṃ hariharātmakam / HV_App.I,37.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:16302: arogo balavāṃś caiva jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,37.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:16303: śriyaṃ ca labhate nityaṃ na ca svargān nivartate // HV_App.I,37.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:16304: aputro labhate putraṃ kanyā vindati satpatim / HV_App.I,37.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:16305: gurviṇī śṛṇute yā tu varaṃ putraṃ prasūyate // HV_App.I,37.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:16306: rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca bhūtāni ca vināyakāḥ / HV_App.I,37.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:16307: bhayaṃ tatra na kurvanti yatrāyaṃ paṭhyate stavaḥ // HV_App.I,37.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:16308: [h: HV (CE), Appendix I, No. 38. Input by Luther Obrock,
GE07hv_apppu:16312: and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald. Fall 2004 and Spring 2005. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:16313: [k: 38 K2 Ñ2 V2.3 B Dn Ds D3-6 G4.5 ins. after 113.5;
GE07hv_apppu:16316: tato mahābalaṃ devaṃ balabhadraṃ yaśasvinam / HV_App.I,38.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16318: mādhavaṃ ca mahātmānam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ / HV_App.I,38.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16320: tato makaraketuṃ ca citrabāṇadharaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,38.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:16322: sakhīgaṇavṛtā caiva sā coṣā kulanandinī / HV_App.I,38.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:16323: balaṃ cātibalaṃ caiva vāsudevaṃ sudurjayam // HV_App.I,38.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:16324: asaṃkhyātagatiṃ caiva suparṇam abhivādya ca / HV_App.I,38.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:16326: tataḥ śakrasya vacanān nāradaḥ paramadyutiḥ / HV_App.I,38.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:16327: vāsudevasamīpaṃ sa prahasan punar āgataḥ // HV_App.I,38.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:16328: vardhāpayati taṃ devaṃ govindaṃ śatrusūdanam / HV_App.I,38.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:16331: āśīrbhir vardhayitvā ca devarṣiḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt // HV_App.I,38.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:16332: aniruddhasya vīryākhyo vivāhaḥ kriyatāṃ vibho / HV_App.I,38.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:16333: jambūlamālikāṃ draṣṭuṃ śraddhā hi mama jāyate // HV_App.I,38.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:16334: tataḥ prahasitāḥ sarve nāradasya vacaḥśravāt / HV_App.I,38.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:16335: kṛṣṇaḥ provāca bhagavān kriyatāmāśu māciram // HV_App.I,38.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:16336: etasminn antare tāta kumbhāṇḍaḥ samupasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,38.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:16337: vaivāhikāṃs tu saṃbhārān gṛhya kṛṣṇaṃ namasya ca // HV_App.I,38.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:16339: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahābāho bhava tvam abhayapradaḥ / HV_App.I,38.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:16340: śaraṇāgato 'smi te deva prasīdaiṣo 'ñjalis tava // HV_App.I,38.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:16341: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarvaṃ prāg eva so 'cyutaḥ / HV_App.I,38.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:16342: abhayaṃ yacchate tasmai kumbhāṇḍāya mahātmane // HV_App.I,38.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:16343: kumbhāṇḍa mantriṇāṃ śreṣṭha prīto 'smi tava suvrata / HV_App.I,38.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:16344: sukṛtaṃ te vijānāmi rāṣṭriko 'stu bhavān iha // HV_App.I,38.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:16345: sajñātipakṣaḥ susukhī nirvṛto 'stu bhavān iha / HV_App.I,38.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:16346: rājyaṃ ca te mayā dattaṃ ciraṃ jīva mamāśrayāt // HV_App.I,38.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:16347: evaṃ dattvā rājyam asmai kumbhāṇḍāya mahātmane / HV_App.I,38.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:16348: vivāham akarot tatra so 'niruddhasya buddhimān // HV_App.I,38.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:16349: tatas tu bhagavān vahniḥ svayaṃ tatra upasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,38.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:16350: vivāho hy aniruddhasya nakṣatre ca śubhe 'bhavat // HV_App.I,38.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:16351: tato 'psarogaṇās tatra kautukaṃ kartum udyatāḥ / HV_App.I,38.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:16352: snātaḥ svalaṃkṛtas tatra so 'niruddhaḥ sa bhāryayā // HV_App.I,38.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:16353: tataḥ snigdhaiḥ śubhair vākyair gandharvāś ca jagus tadā / HV_App.I,38.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:16354: nṛtyanty apsarasaś caiva vivāham upaśobhayan // HV_App.I,38.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:16355: tato nirvartayitvā tu vivāhaṃ śatrusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,38.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:16356: aniruddhasya suprājñaḥ sarvair devagaṇair vṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,38.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:16357: āmantrya varadaṃ tatra rudraṃ devanamaskṛtam / HV_App.I,38.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:16358: cakāra gamane buddhiṃ kṛṣṇaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ // HV_App.I,38.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:16360: kambhāṇḍo vacanaṃ prāha prāñjalir madhusūdanam // HV_App.I,38.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:16361: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B1.3 Dn Ds D2-6 T1.2.4 G1.4.5 ins. after line 44;
GE07hv_apppu:16364: bāṇasya gāvas tiṣṭhanti haste tu varuṇasya vai / HV_App.I,38.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:16365: yāsām amṛtakalpaṃ vai kṣīraṃ kṣarati mādhava / HV_App.I,38.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:16366: tat pītvātibalaś caiva naro bhavati durjayaḥ // HV_App.I,38.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:16367: kumbhāṇḍenaivam ākhyāte hariḥ prītamanās tadā / HV_App.I,38.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:16368: gamanāya matiṃ cakre gantavyam iti niścitaḥ // HV_App.I,38.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:16369: tatas tu bhagavān brahmā vardhāpya sa tu keśavam / HV_App.I,38.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:16370: jagāma brahmalokaṃ sa vṛtaḥ svabhavanālayaiḥ // HV_App.I,38.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:16371: indro marudgaṇaiś caiva dvārakābhimukhaṃ yayau / HV_App.I,38.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:16374: devadeva mahāyuddhe jayet tvāṃ ko nu sattamam // **HV_App.I,38.53**2:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16375: śakto na pramukhe sthātuṃ sākṣād api śatakratuḥ / **HV_App.I,38.53**2:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16376: āroha garuḍaṃ tūrṇaṃ gacchāmo dvārakāṃ purīm // **HV_App.I,38.53**2:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:16377: yataḥ kṛṣṇas tataḥ sarve gacchanti jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,38.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:16379: dvārakābhimukhī soṣā devyā prasthāpitā yayau // HV_App.I,38.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:16380: tato balaś ca kṛṣṇaś ca pradyumnaś ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,38.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:16381: ārūḍhavanto garuḍam aniruddhaś ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,38.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:16382: prasthitaś ca sa tejasvī garuḍaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,38.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:16383: unmūlayaṃs tarugaṇān kampayaṃś cāpi medinīm // HV_App.I,38.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:16384: ākulāś ca diśaḥ sarvā reṇudhvastam ivāmbaram / HV_App.I,38.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:16386: [h: HV (CE), Appendix I, No. 39. Input by Luther Obrock,
GE07hv_apppu:16390: and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald. Fall 2004 and Spring 2005. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:16393: K3.4 Ñ2 V B Dn Ds D2-6 T2 G1 after the addl. colophon (ins. after *1536): :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16395: athāhuko mahābāhuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ prāha mahādyutim / HV_App.I,39.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16398: kṣemāt pratyāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā sevyamānāḥ sahāsate (?) // HV_App.I,39.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:16399: [k: The question mark is part of CE. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16400: uṣāpi ca mahābhāgā sakhībhiḥ parivāritā / HV_App.I,39.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:16401: ramate parayā prītyā aniruddhena saṃgatā // HV_App.I,39.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:16403: praveśyatāṃ mahābhāgā vaidarbhīṃ vardhayet punaḥ // HV_App.I,39.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:16404: sāmbāya dīyatāṃ rāmā kumbhāṇḍaduhitā śubhā / HV_App.I,39.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:16405: śeṣāś ca kanyā dīyantāṃ kumārāṇāṃ yathākramam // HV_App.I,39.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:16406: vartate cotsavas tatra aniruddhasya veśmani / HV_App.I,39.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:16407: gṛhe śrīdhanvinaś caiva śubhas tatra pravartate // HV_App.I,39.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:16408: vādayanti pure tatra nāryo madavaśaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,39.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:16409: nṛtyante cāparās tatra gāyanti ca tathāparāḥ // HV_App.I,39.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:16410: kāścit pramuditās tatra kāścid anyonyam abruvan / HV_App.I,39.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:16412: abhiyānti tato 'nyonyaṃ kāś cin madavaśāt svayam / HV_App.I,39.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:16413: krīḍanti kāścid akṣais tu harṣād utphullalocanāḥ // HV_App.I,39.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:16414: māyūraṃ ratham āruhya sakhībhiḥ parivāritā / HV_App.I,39.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:16415: uṣā saṃpreṣitā devyā rudrāṇyā pratigṛhyatām // HV_App.I,39.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:16416: iyaṃ caiva kulaślāghyā nāmnoṣā nāma sundarī / HV_App.I,39.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:16417: bāṇaputrī tava vadhūḥ pratigṛhṇīṣva bhāminīm // HV_App.I,39.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:16418: tataḥ pratigṛhītā sā strībhir ācāramaṅgalaiḥ / HV_App.I,39.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:16419: praveśitā ca sā veśma aniruddhasya śobhanā // HV_App.I,39.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:16420: devakī revatī caiva rukmiṇy atha vidarbhajā / HV_App.I,39.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:16422: [k: Ñ3 V1.3 B2.3 D6 ins. after line 26;
GE07hv_apppu:16425: vadhūr vardhasi diṣṭyā tvam aniruddhasya darśanāt // **HV_App.I,39.26**1:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16426: tatas tūryapraṇādais tā varanāryaḥ śubhānanāḥ / HV_App.I,39.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:16427: kriyāṃ cārebhire kartum uṣā ca gṛhasaṃsthitā // HV_App.I,39.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:16431: āpṛcchya ca sakhīvargam uṣāṃ ca tridivaṃ gatā // HV_App.I,39.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:16432: gatāsu tāsu sarvāsu sakhīṣv asurasundarī / HV_App.I,39.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:16433: māyāvatyā gṛhaṃ nītā prathamaṃ sā nimantritā // HV_App.I,39.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:16434: tāsāṃ pradyumnagṛhiṇī snuṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā sumadhyamām / HV_App.I,39.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:16435: vāsobhir annapānaiś ca pūjayām āsa sundarīm // HV_App.I,39.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:16436: tataḥ krameṇa sarvās tā vadhūm ūṣāṃ yadustriyaḥ / HV_App.I,39.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:16437: ācāram anupaśyantyaḥ svavarma iti vavrire // HV_App.I,39.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:16438: etat te sarvamākhyātaṃ mayā kurukulodvaha / HV_App.I,39.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:16439: yathā bāṇo jitaḥ saṃkhye jīvanmuktaś ca viṣṇunā // HV_App.I,39.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:16440: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 40, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:16444: K Ñ2.3 V B D T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 after appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:16448: bhagavan kena vidhinā śrotavyaṃ bhārataṃ budhaiḥ / HV_App.I,40.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16449: [k: Before the ref. D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16452: prajānāṃ patibhiḥ sārdhaṃ devānām ṛṣibhiḥ saha / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:16454: daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca yakṣāṇām atha pakṣiṇām / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:16460: vicitrāś ca kathāyogā janma cāgryam anuttamam / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:10 /
GE07hv_apppu:16461: tat kathyamānam asmākaṃ tvayā vai ślakṣṇayā girā / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:11 /
GE07hv_apppu:16464: paurāṇe kiṃ phalaṃ cāsya tad bhavān vaktum arhati / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:14 /
GE07hv_apppu:16466: parvaṇāṃ śravaṇavidhiṃ pāraṇeṣu ca yat phalam / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:15 /
GE07hv_apppu:16467: janamejayena yat pṛṣṭaṃ tasminn avabhṛte kratau / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:16 /
GE07hv_apppu:16471: śrutvākhyānam idaṃ samyak pāvanaṃ vai dvijottama / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:19 /
GE07hv_apppu:16472: ato mahattaraṃ bhūyo vakṣyāmi vidhim uttamam / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:20 /
GE07hv_apppu:16473: phalaṃ kiṃ ke ca devāś ca pūjyā vai pāraṇeṣv iha // HV_App.I,40.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16474: deyaṃ samāpte bhagavan kiṃ ca parvaṇi parvaṇi / HV_App.I,40.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16475: vācakaḥ kīdṛśaś cātra eṣṭavyas tad bravīhi me // HV_App.I,40.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:16477: śṛṇu rājan vidhim imaṃ phalaṃ yac cāpi bhāratāt / HV_App.I,40.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:16478: [k: After the ref. D6 T1.2 G1.3.5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16479: samyak pṛṣṭo 'smi rājendra tvayā buddhimatāṃ vara / **HV_App.I,40.4**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16480: mayāpi bhagavān vyāsaḥ pṛṣṭo vedavidāṃ vara / **HV_App.I,40.4**2:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:16481: pṛṣṭena tu mayā guhyaṃ vidhir ukto mahātmanā / **HV_App.I,40.4**2:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16482: tathā vakṣ[y]āmi te samyak samādhāya punaḥ punaḥ / **HV_App.I,40.4**2:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:16483: śrutād bhavati rājendra yat tvaṃ mām anupṛcchasi // HV_App.I,40.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:16484: divi devā mahīpāla krīḍārtham avaniṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,40.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:16485: kṛtvā kāryam idaṃ caiva tataś ca divam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,40.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:16486: hanta yat te pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ / HV_App.I,40.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:16487: ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca saṃbhavaṃ vasudhātale // HV_App.I,40.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:16488: vasurudrās tathā sādhyā viśve devāś ca śāśvatāḥ / HV_App.I,40.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:16489: ādityāś cāśvinau devau lokapālāḥ saharṣibhiḥ // HV_App.I,40.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:16490: guhyakāś ca sagandharvā nāgā vidyādharās tathā / HV_App.I,40.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:16491: siddhā dharmaḥ svayaṃbhūś ca muniḥ kātyāyano varaḥ // HV_App.I,40.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:16492: girayaḥ sāgarā nadyas tathaivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,40.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:16493: grahāḥ saṃvatsarāś caiva ayanāny ṛtavas tathā // HV_App.I,40.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:16494: sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ caiva jagat sarvaṃ surāsuram / HV_App.I,40.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:16495: bhārate bharataśreṣṭha ekastham iha dṛśyate // HV_App.I,40.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:16497: kṛtvāpi pātakaṃ ghoraṃ sadyo mucyeta mānavaḥ // HV_App.I,40.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:16498: itihāsam imaṃ śrutvā yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,40.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:16499: saṃyamyāntaḥśucir bhūtvā pāraṃ gatvā ca bhārate // HV_App.I,40.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:16500: teṣāṃ śreṣṭhāni deyāni śrutvā bhārata bhāratam / HV_App.I,40.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:16501: brāhmaṇebhyo yathāśaktyā bhaktyā ca bharatarṣabha // HV_App.I,40.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:16502: mahādānāni deyāni ratnāni vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,40.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:16503: gāvaḥ kāṃsyopadohāś ca kanyāś caiva svalaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,40.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:16505: bhavanāni ca vicitrāṇi bhūmir vāsāṃsi kāñcanam // HV_App.I,40.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:16506: vāhanāni ca deyāni hayā mattāś ca vāraṇāḥ / HV_App.I,40.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:16507: śayanaṃ śibikāś caiva syandanāś ca svalaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,40.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:16510: kaṭakaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ caiva yajñasūtraṃ tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,40.30**3:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:16512: evaṃ saṃpūjya vidhivat tato dadyāc ca dakṣiṇām / **HV_App.I,40.30**3:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:16513: vidhihīnaṃ ca yaḥ kuryāt phalaṃ samyaṅ na cāpnuyāt / **HV_App.I,40.30**3:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:16514: kāmāl lobhāt tathā mohān na kartavyānyathā nṛpa / **HV_App.I,40.30**3:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:16515: kurvan sa narakaṃ yāti viparītaṃ phalaṃ labhet / **HV_App.I,40.30**3:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:16516: yad yad gṛhe varaṃ kiṃcid yad yad asti mahad vasu / HV_App.I,40.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:16517: tat tad deyaṃ dvijātibhya ātmā dārāś ca sūnavaḥ // HV_App.I,40.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:16518: śraddhayā parayā dattaṃ kramaśas tasya pāragaḥ / HV_App.I,40.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:16519: śaktitaḥ sumanā hṛṣṭaḥ śuśrūṣur avikatthanaḥ // HV_App.I,40.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:16521: śraddadhāno jitakrodho yathā sidhyati tac chṛṇu // HV_App.I,40.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:16525: vācake ca guṇāḥ proktā yāvantas tāñ śṛṇuṣva me / **HV_App.I,40.36**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16530: rūpavān subhago dāntaḥ satyavādī jitendriyaḥ / HV_App.I,40.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:16531: dānamānagṛhītaś ca kāryo bhavati vācakaḥ // HV_App.I,40.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:16537: avilambamanāyas tam adrutaṃ dhīram ūrjitam / HV_App.I,40.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:16540: vācayed vācakaḥ svasthaḥ svāsīnaḥ susamāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,40.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:16541: nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam / HV_App.I,40.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:16542: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet // HV_App.I,40.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:16543: īdṛśād vācakād rājañ śrutvā bhārata bhāratam / HV_App.I,40.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:16544: niyamasthaḥ śuciḥ śrotā śṛṇvan sa phalam aśnute // HV_App.I,40.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:16547: daśabhir daśabhiś caiva parvaṇāṃ pāraṇaṃ smṛtam // **HV_App.I,40.48**9:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16549: udyogāntaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu bhīṣmāntaṃ ca caturthakam // **HV_App.I,40.48**9:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:16553: //* **HV_App.I,40.48**9:8: kecit tu saṃkhyākathanābhāvāt samatāniyamena daśasahasraślokasamāptiḥ pāraṇam *//
GE07hv_apppu:16554: //* **HV_App.I,40.48**9:9: kecit tu mahābhāratasya ekāvṛttir ekapāraṇam iti ca *//
GE07hv_apppu:16555: pāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ prāpya dvijān kāmaiś ca tarpayet / HV_App.I,40.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:16556: agniṣṭomasya yāgasya phalaṃ vai labhate naraḥ // HV_App.I,40.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:16558: prahṛṣṭaḥ sa tu devaiś ca divaṃ yāti samāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,40.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:16560: haṃsayuktaṃ vimānaṃ sa prahṛṣṭaḥ saha devataiḥ / **HV_App.I,40.52**10:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16562: dvitīyaṃ pāraṇaṃ prāpya atirātraphalaṃ labhet / HV_App.I,40.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:16568: svargataś ca mudā yukto ramate nandane vane / **HV_App.I,40.53**11:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:16577: tṛtīyaṃ pāraṇaṃ prāpya dvādaśāhaphalaṃ labhet / HV_App.I,40.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:16578: vasaty amarasaṃkāśo varṣāṇy ayutaśo divi // HV_App.I,40.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:16579: caturthe vājapeyasya pañcame dviguṇaṃ labhet / HV_App.I,40.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:16583: vimānaṃ vibudhaiḥ sārdham āruhya divi gacchati / HV_App.I,40.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:16584: varṣāyutāni bhavane śakrasya divi modate // HV_App.I,40.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:16585: ṣaṣṭhe dviguṇam astīti saptame triguṇaṃ phalam / HV_App.I,40.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:16589: sarvāṃl lokān vicarate dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,40.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:16590: aṣṭame rājasūyasya pāraṇe labhate phalam / HV_App.I,40.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:16593: sevyamāno varastrīṇāṃ candrāt kāntatarair mukhaiḥ // HV_App.I,40.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:16594: mekhalānāṃ ninādena nūpurāṇāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ / HV_App.I,40.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:16598: phalaṃ sa labhate martyo vimānaṃ caiva kāmikam / **HV_App.I,40.74**15:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16600: jāmbūnadamayair divyair gavākṣaiḥ sarvato vṛtam // HV_App.I,40.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:16602: vimānaṃ samadhiṣṭhāya śriyā paramayā jvalan // HV_App.I,40.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:16604: modate daivataiḥ sārdhaṃ divi deva ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,40.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:16605: daśamaṃ pāraṇaṃ prāpya dvijātīn abhivandya ca / HV_App.I,40.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:16609: gandharvair gītakuśalair apsarobhiś ca śobhitam / HV_App.I,40.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:16613: divyāṃl lokān vicarati divyair bhogaiḥ samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,40.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:16614: vibudhānāṃ prasādena śriyā paramayā yutaḥ // HV_App.I,40.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:16615: atha varṣagaṇān evaṃ svargaloke mahīyate / HV_App.I,40.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:16620: puraṃdarapure ramye śakreṇa saha modate // HV_App.I,40.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:16621: dīpyamāno vimāneṣu lokeṣu vividheṣu ca / HV_App.I,40.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:16623: tataḥ sūryasya bhavane candrasya bhavane tathā / HV_App.I,40.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:16624: śivasya bhavane rājan viṣṇor yāti salokatām // HV_App.I,40.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:16625: evam etan mahārāja nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / HV_App.I,40.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:16626: śraddhadhānena vai bhāvyam evam āha gurur mama // HV_App.I,40.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:16627: lekhakasya tu dātavyaṃ manasā yad yad icchati / HV_App.I,40.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:16636: kaṭake kuṇḍale caiva brahmasūtraṃ tathāparam // HV_App.I,40.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:16637: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2 V1.3 B D G3 ins. :k]

GE07hv_apppu:16830: adhyāyaṃ ekaṃ devebhyaḥ śrāvayeta sadā naraḥ / **HV_App.I,40.157**49:9 /

GE07hv_apppu:16951: strībhiś ca putrakāmābhiḥ śrotavyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ // **HV_App.I,40.173**55:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:16955: vācakāya ca dadyād dhi ātmanaḥśreyaḥ icchatā // **HV_App.I,40.173**55:10 //
GE07hv_apppu:16956: alaṃkāraṃ pradadyāc ca pāṇyor vai bharatarṣabha / **HV_App.I,40.173**55:11 /
GE07hv_apppu:16959: bhūmidānasamaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // **HV_App.I,40.173**55:14 //
GE07hv_apppu:16960: śṛṇoti śrāvayed vāpi satataṃ caiva yo naraḥ / **HV_App.I,40.173**55:15 /
GE07hv_apppu:16963: ātmānaṃ sasutaṃ caiva striyaṃ ca bharatarṣabha // **HV_App.I,40.173**55:18 //
GE07hv_apppu:16965: idaṃ mayā tavāgre ca proktaṃ sarvaṃ nararṣabha / **HV_App.I,40.173**55:20 /
GE07hv_apppu:16967: [k: The additional material added in some mss. after the colophon (e.g.,
GE07hv_apppu:16969: has not been transliterated; cf. CE vol. II, pp. 514-516. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16970: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 41, transliterated by N. Hanemann,
GE07hv_apppu:16973: [k: K Ñ2 V B D T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after adhyāya 118 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16976: puṣkare vai yathodbhūtā devāḥ sarṣigaṇāḥ purā // HV_App.I,41.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16977: ādityā vasavo rudrā marutaś coṣmapās tathā / HV_App.I,41.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16978: aśvinau ca mahābhāgau śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:16979: ṛṣayaś ca mahātmānaḥ sādhyā viśveśvarās tathā // HV_App.I,41.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:16980: [k: Ñ2 V1.2 B3 Ds D5 ins., D6 after line 6:k]
GE07hv_apppu:16981: vyāsarṣiṇā purā proktam etad ākhyāhi me 'khilam / **HV_App.I,41.5**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16984: kriyantaṃ caiva kālaṃ vai sa śete puruṣottamaḥ // **HV_App.I,41.5**2:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16985: etad ākhyāhi nikhilaṃ yogaṃ yogavidāṃ pate / HV_App.I,41.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:16987: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramodāro vedavedāṅgavit tathā // **HV_App.I,41.6**3:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:16988: śṛṇvatas tasya me kīrtiṃ na tṛptir upajāyate // HV_App.I,41.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:16989: kiyantaṃ sa ca kālaṃ vai śete sa puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:16990: kiyantaṃ caiva śayite kālaṃ kālasya saṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:16991: kiyatā caiva kālena uttiṣṭhati surādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,41.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:16992: katham utthāya bhagavān asṛjan nikhalaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,41.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:16993: ke prajāpatayas tatra āsan pūrvaṃ mahāmune / HV_App.I,41.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:16994: kathaṃ nirmitavāṃś caiva sa tu lokān sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:16995: evam ekārṇave ghore naṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame / HV_App.I,41.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:17000: āste sa ca suraśreṣṭho vidhim ādāya kaṃ mune // HV_App.I,41.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:17002: śṛṇomi parayā bhaktyā tava vaktrād viśeṣataḥ / **HV_App.I,41.19**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17003: tan me tvam upapannāya brahmann etad asaṃśayam / HV_App.I,41.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:17004: vaktum arhasi dharmiṣṭha yaśo nārāyaṇātmakam // HV_App.I,41.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:17005: prādurbhāvaṃ puraskṛtya bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:17006: śrāddhānām upaviṣṭānāṃ bhagavan vaktum arhasi // HV_App.I,41.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:17008: nārāyaṇayaśojñāne yā bhaved bhavataḥ spṛhā / HV_App.I,41.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:17010: [k: T1.2 G1.3.5 M2.4 subst. for line 25:k]
GE07hv_apppu:17011: tam āśritya spṛhā yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ yuktā jagatpate / **HV_App.I,41.25**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17013: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vadatāṃ śruto 'smābhir mahātmanām // HV_App.I,41.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:17014: yathā ca tapasā dṛṣṭvā bṛhaspatisamadyutiḥ / HV_App.I,41.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:17016: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yathāśakti yathāśruti / HV_App.I,41.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:17017: na vijñātuṃ mayā śakyam ṛṣimātreṇa bhārata // HV_App.I,41.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:17018: kaḥ samutsahate jñātuṃ paraṃ nārāyaṇātmakam / HV_App.I,41.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:17019: viśvātmano 'yaṃ brahmāpi na vedayati tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:17020: śrutaṃ me viśvadevānāṃ yad rahasyaṃ maharṣiṇām / HV_App.I,41.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:17021: yad divyaṃ sarvadevānāṃ yat tattvaṃ tattvavādinām // HV_App.I,41.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:17022: tad adhyātmavidāṃ cintyaṃ kāraṇaṃ caiva karmaṇām / HV_App.I,41.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:17023: adhidaivaṃ yad adhyātmaṃ yad daivam iti saṃjñitam // HV_App.I,41.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:17024: yadbhūtam adhibhūtaṃ ca yat paraṃ ca maharṣiṇām / HV_App.I,41.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:17025: tat satyaṃ devadṛṣṭaṃ ca yat satyaṃ yatayo viduḥ // HV_App.I,41.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:17026: yaḥ kartā kārako buddhir manaḥ kṣetrajña eva ca / HV_App.I,41.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:17027: pradhānaṃ puruṣaḥ śāstā yaḥ kaścid abhiśabdyate // HV_App.I,41.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:17028: kālaḥ kālaṃ svapayati draṣṭā svādhīna eva ca / HV_App.I,41.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:17029: prāṇaḥ pañcavidhaś caiva dhruvam akṣaram eva ca // HV_App.I,41.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:17030: ucyate vividhair bhāvais tasyaivānagha tatparaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:17031: sa eva bhagavān sarvaṃ karoti vikaroti ca // HV_App.I,41.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:17032: yo 'smān kārayate karma tena sma vyākulīkṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,41.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:17033: yajāmahe tam eveśaṃ tam evecchāma nirvṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:17034: yo vaktā yaś ca vaktavyo yaś cāhaṃ prabravīmi te / HV_App.I,41.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:17035: idaṃ śṛṇuta yacchreyo yac cānyat parijalpatha // HV_App.I,41.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:17036: yāḥ kathāś caiva vartante śrutayo vātha gahvarāḥ / HV_App.I,41.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:17037: viśvaṃ viśvapatir devaḥ sarvaṃ nārāyaṇātmakam // HV_App.I,41.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:17038: yat satyaṃ yad amṛtam ādim akṣaraṃ vai @ HV_App.I,41.52 @
GE07hv_apppu:17039: yad bhūtaṃ bhavati mithaś ca yad bhaviṣyam / HV_App.I,41.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:17040: yat kiṃcic caram acarāvyayaṃ triloke @ HV_App.I,41.54 @
GE07hv_apppu:17041: tat sarvaṃ puruṣavaraḥ prabhur variṣṭhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:17044: catvāry āhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tat kṛtaṃ yugam / HV_App.I,41.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:17045: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā janamejaya // HV_App.I,41.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:17046: tatra dharmaś catuṣpādo hy adharmaḥ pādavigrahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:17047: svadharmaniratāḥ santo yajante caiva mānavāḥ // HV_App.I,41.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:17048: viprāḥ sthitā dharmaparā rājavṛtte sthitā nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,41.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:17049: kṛṣyām abhiratā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ śuśrūṣavaḥ sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:17050: sadā sattvaṃ ca satyaṃ ca dharmaś caiva vivardhate / HV_App.I,41.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:17051: sadbhir ācaritaṃ yac ca kriyate khyāyate ca vai // HV_App.I,41.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:17052: etat kṛtayuge vṛttaṃ sarveṣām eva bhārata / HV_App.I,41.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:17053: prāṇināṃ dharmabuddhīnām api cen nīcayoninām // HV_App.I,41.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:17055: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā parikīrtitā // HV_App.I,41.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:17056: dvābhyām adharmaḥ pādābhyāṃ tribhir dharmo vyavasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:17057: tatra satyaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca kṛte sarvaṃ vidhīyate // HV_App.I,41.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:17058: tretāyāṃ vikṛtiṃ yānti varṇā laulyena saṃyutāḥ / HV_App.I,41.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:17059: cāturvarṇyasya vaikṛtyād yānti daurbalyam āśritaḥ // HV_App.I,41.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:17061: dvāparasyāpi yā ceṣṭā tām api śrotum arhasi // HV_App.I,41.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:17062: dvāparaṃ dve sahasre tu varṣāṇāṃ kurusattama / HV_App.I,41.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:17063: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā parikīrtitā // HV_App.I,41.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:17064: tatrāpy arthaparā viprā jñānino rajasāvṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,41.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:17065: śaṭhā naikṛtikāḥ kṣudrā jāyante kurupuṃgava / HV_App.I,41.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:17066: dvābhyāṃ dharmaḥ sthitaḥ padbhyām adharmas tribhir utthitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:17067: viparyayaṃ yānti śanaiḥ kṛte ye dharmasetavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:17070: tathā varṣasahasraṃ tu varṣāṇāṃ dve śate tathā / HV_App.I,41.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:17071: saṃdhyāyāḥ parisaṃkhyātaṃ krūraṃ kaliyugaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,41.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:17072: tatrādharmaś catuṣpādaṃ syād dharmaḥ pādavigrahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:17073: kāminas tamasā channā jāyante tatra mānavāḥ // HV_App.I,41.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:17074: naivopavāsakṛt kaścin na sādhur na ca satyavāk / HV_App.I,41.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:17075: nāstiko brahmavaktā vā naro bhavati vai tadā // HV_App.I,41.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:17077: viprāḥ śūdrasamācārāḥ śūdrās tv ācāralakṣaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,41.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:17078: dūṣakās tv āśramāṇāṃ ca varṇānāṃ caiva saṃkarāḥ / HV_App.I,41.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:17079: agamyeṣv abhirajyante vatsyanty evaṃ kalau yuge // HV_App.I,41.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:17082: evaṃ dvādaśasāhasraṃ tatraitad yugam ucyate / HV_App.I,41.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:17085: bhūyaś caturdaśaguṇaṃ tad aho brahmaṇaḥ smṛtam / **HV_App.I,41.93**7:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17086: trayyāṃ caiva tu saṃdeho yugānte janamejaya / HV_App.I,41.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:17087: divyāṃ dvādaśasāhasrīṃ yugākhyaṃ kavayo viduḥ / HV_App.I,41.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:17088: etatsahasraparyantaṃ tad aho brāhmam ucyate // HV_App.I,41.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:17089: tato 'hani gate tasmin sarveṣām eva dehinām / HV_App.I,41.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:17091: devatānāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ mahīpate / HV_App.I,41.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:17093: devarṣīṇāṃ brahmarṣīṇāṃ tathā rājarṣiṇāṃ api / HV_App.I,41.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:17094: kiṃnarāṇām apsarasāṃ bhujaṅgānāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,41.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:17095: parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca paśūnāṃ caiva bhārata / HV_App.I,41.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:17096: tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kṛmiṇāṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:17097: mahābhūtapatir devaḥ pañca bhūtāni bhūtakṛt / HV_App.I,41.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:17105: bhūtvā nārāyaṇo yogī saptamūrtir vibhāvasuḥ / HV_App.I,41.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:17107: pītvārṇavāṃś ca sarvān sa nadīkūpāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:17108: parvatānāṃ ca salilaṃ sarvam ādāya raśmibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:17109: bhittvā sahasraśaś caiva mahīṃ gatvā rasātalam / HV_App.I,41.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:17110: rasātalagataṃ kṛtsnaṃ pibate rasam uttamam // HV_App.I,41.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:17111: apsu sṛjan kledam anyad dadāti prāṇināṃ dhruvam / HV_App.I,41.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:17112: tat sarvam aravindākṣa ādatte puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:17113: vāyuś ca balavān bhūtvā sa vidhūyākhilaṃ jagat / HV_App.I,41.119 /
GE07hv_apppu:17114: prāṇodayaṃ surāṇāṃ ca vāyunā kurute hariḥ // HV_App.I,41.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:17115: tato devagaṇānāṃ ca sarveṣām eva dehinām / HV_App.I,41.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:17116: ye cendriyagaṇāḥ sarve ye cānye rajasodbhavāḥ / HV_App.I,41.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:17117: rūpaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca pṛthivīm āśritā guṇāḥ // HV_App.I,41.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:17118: jihvā rasaś ca snehaś ca saṃśritāḥ salilaṃ guṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:17119: rūpaṃ cakṣur vipākaś ca jyotir evāśritā guṇāḥ // HV_App.I,41.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:17122: sparśaḥ prāṇaś ca ceṣṭā ca pavanaṃ saṃśritā guṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:17124: śabdaṃ śrotraṃ ca yoniś ca gaganaṃ saṃśritā guṇāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.126**9:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17126: mano buddhiś ca sarveṣāṃ kṣetrajñaś ceti yaḥ śrutaḥ / **HV_App.I,41.126**9:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:17127: parameṣṭhinaṃ vareṇyaṃ ca hṛṣīkeśaṃ samāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,41.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:17128: tato bhagavatā tatra raśmibhiḥ parivāritāḥ / HV_App.I,41.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:17130: teṣāṃ saṃgharṣajodbhūtaḥ pāvakaḥ śatadhā jvalan / HV_App.I,41.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:17131: adahan nikhilāṃl lokān ugraḥ saṃvartako 'nalaḥ // HV_App.I,41.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:17132: sa parvatāṃs tarūn gulmāṃl latāvallīs tṛṇāni ca / HV_App.I,41.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:17133: vimānāni ca divyāni purāṇi vividhāni ca // HV_App.I,41.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:17134: āśramāṃś ca tathā puṇyān divyāny āyatanāni ca / HV_App.I,41.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:17135: yāni cāśrayaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi so 'dahat // HV_App.I,41.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:17136: bhasmībhūtāṃs tataḥ sarvāṃl lokāṃl lokagurur hariḥ / HV_App.I,41.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:17138: sahasradṛṅ mahātejā bhūtvā kṛṣṇo mahāghanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:17141: śivena puṇyena mahī nirvāṇam agamat param // HV_App.I,41.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:17142: tena sā jalasaṃchannā payasā sarvato dharā / HV_App.I,41.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:17144: mahābhūtāny api ca taṃ praviṣṭāny amitaujasam / HV_App.I,41.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:17146: saṃśoṣayitvā pītvā ca kalpayitvā ca dehinaḥ / HV_App.I,41.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:17147: dagdhvā saṃtāpayitvā ca vasaty ekaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:17148: paurāṇaṃ rūpaṃ āsthāya kim apy amitabuddhimān / HV_App.I,41.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:17149: ekārṇavajale hy āsīd yogī yogam upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:17154: na cainaṃ kaścid avyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ veditum arhati // HV_App.I,41.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:17156: ekārṇavavidhiḥ ko 'yaṃ yaś caiṣa parikīrtitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:17157: ka eṣa puruṣo nāma kiṃ yogaḥ kaś ca yogavān // HV_App.I,41.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:17159: etāvantam asau kālam ekārṇavavidhiṃ prati / HV_App.I,41.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:17160: kariṣyatīmaṃ bhagavān iti kaścin na budhyate // HV_App.I,41.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:17161: na draṣṭā naiva vaditā na jñātā naiva pārśvataḥ / HV_App.I,41.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:17162: na sma vijñāyate kaścid ṛte taṃ devaṃ uttamam // HV_App.I,41.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:17163: nabhaḥ kṣitiṃ pavanam atha prakāśayan @ HV_App.I,41.158 @
GE07hv_apppu:17169: evam ekārṇavībhūte śete loke mahādyutiḥ / HV_App.I,41.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:17174: pracchādya salilaṃ sarvaṃ harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:17175: [k: T1.2 G4.5 M2.4 subst. for line 163 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17177: mahato rajaso madhye mahārṇavasamasya vai / HV_App.I,41.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:17178: virajasko mahābāhur akṣaraṃ brahma yaṃ viduḥ // HV_App.I,41.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:17180: divyam āsthāya kālaṃ tu tataḥ suṣvāpa so 'vyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:17182: manasādhikam āsthāya yatra taṃ satram āsate / **HV_App.I,41.167**13:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17183: yathātattvaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ sūtaṃ yad brahmaṇo matam / **HV_App.I,41.167**13:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:17185: puruṣo yajña ity evaṃ yat paraṃ parikīrtitam / HV_App.I,41.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:17186: yac cānyat puruṣākhyaṃ syāt sarvaṃ tat puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:17187: ye ca yajñaparā viprā ṛtvijā iti saṃjñitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:17188: ātmadehāt purā bhūtvā yajñebhyaḥ śrūyatāṃ tadā // HV_App.I,41.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:17189: brahmāṇaṃ paramaṃ vaktrād udgātāraṃ ca sāmagam / HV_App.I,41.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:17190: hotāram atha cādhvaryuṃ bāhubhyām asṛjat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:17191: brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇacchaṃsī prastotāraṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:17192: tanmitraṃ varuṇaṃ sṛṣṭvā pratiṣṭhātāram eva ca // HV_App.I,41.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:17193: udasat pratihartāraṃ hotāraṃ caiva bhārata / HV_App.I,41.176 /
GE07hv_apppu:17194: adhyāpakam athorubhyāṃ neṣṭhāraṃ caiva bhārata // HV_App.I,41.177 //
GE07hv_apppu:17195: pāṇibhyām atha cāgnīdhraṃ brahmaṇyaṃ caiva yajñiyam / HV_App.I,41.178 /
GE07hv_apppu:17196: grāvāṇam atha bāhubhyāṃ sūnetāraṃ ca cakṣuṣaḥ // HV_App.I,41.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:17197: evam evaiṣa bhagavān ṣoḍaśaitāñ jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.180 /
GE07hv_apppu:17199: tad eṣa vai vedamayaḥ puruṣo yajñasaṃjñitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.182 /
GE07hv_apppu:17200: vedāś ca tanmayāḥ sarve sāṅgopaniṣad akriyāḥ // HV_App.I,41.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:17201: svapity ekārṇave caiva yadāścaryam abhūt tadā / HV_App.I,41.184 /
GE07hv_apppu:17203: jīrṇo bhagavatas tasya kukṣāv eva mahāmuniḥ / HV_App.I,41.186 /
GE07hv_apppu:17206: āśramān api puṇyāṃś ca tīrthāny āyatanāni ca // HV_App.I,41.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:17207: deśān rāṣṭrāṇi citrāṇi purāṇi vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,41.190 /
GE07hv_apppu:17208: japahomarataḥ kṣāntas tapo ghoraṃ samāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,41.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:17211: candrādityau tathā vāyum indraṃ varuṇam eva ca // **HV_App.I,41.191**14:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:17212: agniṃ yamaṃ bhūtapatiṃ kālamṛtyuṃ tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,41.191**14:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:17219: mārkaṇḍeyas tatas tasya śanair vaktrād viniḥsṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.192 /
GE07hv_apppu:17220: niṣkrāmantaṃ na cātmānaṃ jānīte devamāyayā // HV_App.I,41.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:17221: niṣkrāntas tasya vadanād ekārṇavam atho gataḥ / HV_App.I,41.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:17222: sarvatas tapasā channaṃ mārkaṇḍeyo nirīkṣate // HV_App.I,41.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:17223: tasyotpannaṃ bhayaṃ tīvraṃ saṃśayaś cātmajīvite / HV_App.I,41.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:17228: kiṃ svid bhaved iyaṃ cintā mohaḥ svapno 'nubhūyate // HV_App.I,41.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:17229: vyaktam anyatamo bhāvo hy eteṣāṃ bhavitā mama / HV_App.I,41.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:17230: na hīdṛśam asaṃkliṣṭam ayuktaṃ satyam arhati // HV_App.I,41.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:17232: katamaḥ syād ayaṃ loka iti cintāṃ vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:17234: toyārdram iva jīmūtaṃ madhye magnaṃ mahārṇave // HV_App.I,41.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:17236: salilārdhād adho magnaṃ jīmūtam iva sāgare / **HV_App.I,41.205**16:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17237: tapantam iva tejobhir bhāsvantam iva varcasā / HV_App.I,41.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:17238: jāgrantam iva gāmbhīryāc chvasantam iva pannagam // HV_App.I,41.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:17239: sa devaṃ praṣṭum āyāti ko bhavān iti vismayāt / HV_App.I,41.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:17241: gāmbhīryāj jāgratam iva jvalantam iva tejasā // **HV_App.I,41.208**17:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:17242: tathaiva ca śanair bhūyo muniḥ kukṣiṃ praveśitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:17243: sa praviṣṭaḥ punaḥ kukṣau mārkaṇḍeyaḥ suniścitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:17245: sa tathaiva yathāpūrvaṃ pṛthivīm aṭate balāt / HV_App.I,41.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:17246: puṇyatīrthāni pūtāni nirīkṣann iva bhūtale // HV_App.I,41.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:17248: paśyate devakukṣisthān yajñiyāñ śataśo dvijān // HV_App.I,41.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:17249: sadvṛttam āśritāḥ sarve varṇā brāhmaṇapūrvakāḥ / HV_App.I,41.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:17252: carataḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ na ca kukṣyantam īkṣate // HV_App.I,41.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:17253: tataḥ kadācid atha vai punar vaktrād viniḥsṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.220 /
GE07hv_apppu:17254: suptaṃ nyagrodhaśākhāyāṃ bālam ekaṃ nirīkṣate // HV_App.I,41.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:17258: bālam ādityasaṃkāśaṃ na śaknoty upasarpitum // HV_App.I,41.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:17260: pūrvadṛṣṭam idaṃ neti śaṅkito devamāyayā // HV_App.I,41.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:17261: agādhe salile stabdhe mārkaṇḍeyaḥ plavan muniḥ / HV_App.I,41.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:17263: bāhubhyām asakṛd vipraḥ plavaty eva divāniśam / **HV_App.I,41.228**18:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17264: tadā śramas te bahudhā na pāraṃ tasya paśyati / **HV_App.I,41.228**18:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:17265: tataḥ plavati mūḍhātmā jānāty eva na kiṃcana // **HV_App.I,41.228**18:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:17266: na śāntiṃ labhate tatra tejasā grastavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,41.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:17269: tathaiva bhagavān haṃso gato yogena bālatām / HV_App.I,41.230 /
GE07hv_apppu:17271: mā bhair vatsa na bhetavyaṃ mamaivāyāhi cāntikam / HV_App.I,41.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:17272: mārkaṇḍeya mune vīra bālas tvaṃ śramapīḍitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:17274: ko māṃ nāmnā pīḍayati tapaḥ paribhavan mama / HV_App.I,41.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:17275: bahuvarṣasahasrākhyaṃ dharṣayaṃś caiva me vayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:17276: na hy eṣa samudācāro deveṣv api samāhitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.236 /
GE07hv_apppu:17277: māṃ brahmāpi sa viśvaśo dīrghāyur iti bhāṣate // HV_App.I,41.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:17279: ya 'yaṃ jagadguruḥ sākṣād viṣṇuḥ sarveśvaro hariḥ / **HV_App.I,41.237**20:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17280: sa eṣa vatsa vatseti pitā brūte na saṃśayaḥ / **HV_App.I,41.237**20:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:17282: mārkaṇḍeyeti māṃ proktvā mṛtyum īkṣitum icchati // HV_App.I,41.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:17283: evam ābhāṣate krodhān mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmuniḥ / HV_App.I,41.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:17284: athainaṃ bhagavān bhūyo babhāṣe tatparāyaṇam // HV_App.I,41.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:17285: ahaṃ te janako vatsa hṛṣīkeśaḥ pitā guruḥ / HV_App.I,41.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:17286: āyuḥpradātā paurāṇaḥ kim arthaṃ nopasarpasi // HV_App.I,41.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:17287: māṃ putrakāmaḥ prathamaṃ pitā te hy aṅgirā muniḥ / HV_App.I,41.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:17288: pūrvam ārādhayām āsa tapas tīvramupāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,41.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:17290: dattavān aham ātmeṣṭaṃ maharṣim amitāyuṣam // HV_App.I,41.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:17292: madaṃśo hi bhavān vatso na kopaṃ kartum arhasi // **HV_App.I,41.247**21:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:17293: na mām utsahate cānyo yo na bhūyo mamātmakaḥ / HV_App.I,41.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:17297: nāmagotraṃ tataḥ śrutvā dīrghāyur lokapūjitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:17298: athākaron namaskāraṃ praṇataḥ śirasā prabhum // HV_App.I,41.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:17302: icche 'haṃ tattvato māyām imāṃ jñātuṃ tavānagha / HV_App.I,41.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:17303: yad ekārṇavamadhyasthaṃ śeṣe tvaṃ bālarupavān // HV_App.I,41.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:17304: kiṃsaṃjñaḥ kaś ca bhagavāṃl loke vijñāyase 'nagha / HV_App.I,41.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:17305: tarkaye tvāṃ mahābhūtaṃ na bhūtam iha tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,41.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:17307: ahaṃ nārāyaṇo brahmā saṃbhavaḥ sarvadehinām / HV_App.I,41.258 /
GE07hv_apppu:17310: ahaṃ brahmā ca rudraś ca sarvavyāpī bhavāmy aham / **HV_App.I,41.259**23:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17311: aham aindre pade śakra ṛtūnām api vatsaraḥ / HV_App.I,41.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:17312: ahaṃ yuge yugākhyaś ca yugasyāvarta eva ca // HV_App.I,41.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:17313: ahaṃ sarvāṇi sattvāni daivatāny akhilāni ca / HV_App.I,41.262 /
GE07hv_apppu:17314: bhūjaṃgānām ahaṃ śeṣas tārkṣyo 'haṃ sarvapakṣiṇām // HV_App.I,41.263 //
GE07hv_apppu:17315: ahaṃ sahasraśīrṣā dyaur yaḥ padair abhisaṃvṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:17316: ādityo yajñapuruṣo devo yajñamayo makhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.265 /
GE07hv_apppu:17317: aham agnir havyavāho yādasāṃ patiravyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.266 //
GE07hv_apppu:17318: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ dvijendrāṇāṃ tapasā bhāvitātmanāṃ / HV_App.I,41.267 /
GE07hv_apppu:17322: ahaṃ karma kriyā jīvaḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmadarśanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.271 /
GE07hv_apppu:17324: pradhānapuruṣo devo 'ham ādyas tv akṣayo 'vyayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.273 /
GE07hv_apppu:17325: ahaṃ dharmas tapaś cāhaṃ sarvāśramanivāsinām // HV_App.I,41.274 //
GE07hv_apppu:17327: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ ca paramam aham ekaḥ prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,41.276 //
GE07hv_apppu:17328: ahaṃ sāṃkhyam ahaṃ yogo ahaṃ tatparamaṃ padam / HV_App.I,41.277 /
GE07hv_apppu:17329: aham īḍyo bhavaś cāham ahaṃ vidyādhipaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:17330: ahaṃ jyotir ahaṃ vāyur ahaṃ bhūmir ahaṃ nabhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.279 /
GE07hv_apppu:17331: aham āpaḥ samudrāś ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa / HV_App.I,41.280 /
GE07hv_apppu:17332: ahaṃ varṣam ahaṃ somaḥ parjanyo 'ham ahaṃ raviḥ // HV_App.I,41.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:17333: kṣīrodaḥ sāgaraś cāhaṃ samudro vaḍavāmukhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:17334: vahniḥ saṃvartako bhūtvā pibaṃs toyamayaṃ haviḥ // HV_App.I,41.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:17335: ahaṃ purāṇaṃ paramaṃ tathaivāhaṃ parāyaṇam / HV_App.I,41.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:17336: ahaṃ bhūtasya bhavyasya vartamānasya saṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:17337: [k: K3.4 Ñ2 B2 Dn Ds D3.5 T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17339: yat kiṃcit paśyase caiva yac chṛṇoṣi ca kiṃcana / HV_App.I,41.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:17340: yac cānubhavase loke tat sarvaṃ māmakaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,41.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:17341: viśvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ sṛjeyaṃ cādya paśya mām / HV_App.I,41.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:17342: yuge yuge ca srakṣyāmi mārkaṇḍeyākhilaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,41.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:17343: tad etad akhilaṃ sarvaṃ mārkaṇḍeyāvadhāraya / HV_App.I,41.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:17344: śuśrūṣur mama dharmepsuḥ kukṣau cara sukhī bhava / HV_App.I,41.291 /
GE07hv_apppu:17345: mama brahmā śarīrastho devāś ca ṛṣibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,41.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:17347: aham ekākṣaro mantras tryakṣaraś caiva sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.294 /
GE07hv_apppu:17349: evam ādipurāṇeṣu vedānte ca mahāmuniḥ / HV_App.I,41.296 /
GE07hv_apppu:17350: vyaktam āhṛtavān āśu mārkaṇḍeyaṃ mahāmunim // HV_App.I,41.297 //
GE07hv_apppu:17351: [k: Ñ2 V3 B Ds D2.5.6 G3.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17353: tato bhagavataḥ kukṣiṃ praviṣṭo munisattamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.298 /
GE07hv_apppu:17354: rarāma sukham āsādya śuśrūṣur haṃsam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:17355: tad akṣaraṃ vividham apāśrito vapur @ HV_App.I,41.300 @
GE07hv_apppu:17357: śanaiś caran prabhur api haṃsasaṃjñito @ HV_App.I,41.302 @
GE07hv_apppu:17361: āpavaḥ sa vibhur bhūtvā kārayām āsa vai tapaḥ / HV_App.I,41.304 /
GE07hv_apppu:17363: tato mahātmātibalo matiṃ lokasya sarjane / HV_App.I,41.306 /
GE07hv_apppu:17365: tasya cintayatas tatra tapasā bhāvitātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:17366: nirākāśe toyamaye sūkṣme jagati gahvare // HV_App.I,41.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:17367: īṣat saṃkṣobhayām āsa so 'rṇavaṃ salile sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.310 /
GE07hv_apppu:17368: so 'nantarormiṇā sūkṣmam atha cchidram abhūt tadā // HV_App.I,41.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:17370: sa labdhvāntaram akṣobhyaṃ vyavardhata samīraṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:17373: mahārṇavasya kṣubdhasya tasminn ambhasi manthite / HV_App.I,41.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:17375: tataḥ saṃśoṣayām āsa pāvakaḥ salilaṃ bahu / HV_App.I,41.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:17376: kṣayāj jalanidheś chidram abhavad vistṛtaṃ nabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:17383: dṛṣṭvā bhūtāni bhagavāṃl lokasṛṣṭyartham avyayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:17386: yat pṛthivyāṃ dvijendrāṇāṃ tapasā bhāvitātmanām // HV_App.I,41.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:17390: devo brahmaṇi viśveśo niyojayati yogavit // HV_App.I,41.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:17391: tatas tasmin mahātoye haviṣo harir acyutaḥ / HV_App.I,41.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:17392: svapan krīḍaṃś ca vividhaṃ modate caiṣa pāvakiḥ // HV_App.I,41.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:17393: padmaṃ nābhyudbhavaṃ caikaṃ samutpāditavāṃs tadā / HV_App.I,41.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:17401: atha yogavidāṃ śreṣṭham asṛjad bhūri tejasam / HV_App.I,41.340 /
GE07hv_apppu:17405: tac ca padmaṃ purāṇajñāḥ pṛthivīruham uttamam / HV_App.I,41.344 /
GE07hv_apppu:17407: yā tu padmāsanā devī pṛthivīṃ tāṃ pracakṣate / HV_App.I,41.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:17409: himavantaṃ ca meruṃ ca nīlaṃ niṣadhameva ca / HV_App.I,41.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:17410: kailāsaṃ muñjavantaṃ ca tathādriṃ gandhamādanam // HV_App.I,41.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:17411: puṇyaṃ triśikharaṃ caiva kāntaṃ mandarameva ca / HV_App.I,41.350 /
GE07hv_apppu:17412: udayaṃ ca giriṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vindhyamastaṃ ca parvatam // HV_App.I,41.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:17413: ete devagaṇānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ ca mahātmanām / HV_App.I,41.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:17415: eteṣām antaro deśo jambūdvīpa iti smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:17416: jambūdvīpasya saṃkhyānaṃ yajñiyā yatra cakrire // HV_App.I,41.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:17418: divyatīrthaśatāpāṅgyas tā divyāḥ saritaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:17419: yāny etāni tu padmasya kesarāṇi samantataḥ / HV_App.I,41.358 /
GE07hv_apppu:17420: asaṃkhyātāḥ pṛthivyāṃ tu viśve te dhātuparvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:17421: yāni padmasya patrāṇi bhūrīṇy ūrdhvaṃ narādhipa / HV_App.I,41.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:17422: te durgamāḥ śailacitā mlecchadeśā vikalpitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:17423: yāny adhaḥ padmapatrāṇi vāsārthaṃ tān vibhāgaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.362 /
GE07hv_apppu:17424: daityānām uragāṇāṃ ca pātālaṃ tan mahātmanām // HV_App.I,41.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:17425: teṣāṃ adhogataṃ yat tad udakety abhisaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,41.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:17427: padmasyānte bhṛśaṃ yat tad ekārṇavajalaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,41.366 /
GE07hv_apppu:17428: proktās te dikṣu saṃghātāś catvāro jalasāgarāḥ // HV_App.I,41.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:17431: etasmāt kāraṇāt tajjñaiḥ purāṇaiḥ paramarṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.370 /
GE07hv_apppu:17432: yajñiyair vedadṛṣṭārthair yajñe padmavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:17433: evaṃ bhagavataḥ padme viśvasya paramo vidhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.372 /
GE07hv_apppu:17434: parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca deśānāṃ ca vinirmitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:17437: utpattiḥ prakṛtā rājann ataḥ pauṣkarikās tu te // **HV_App.I,41.373**27:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:17445: vighnas tamasi saṃbhūto madhur nāma mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,41.379 /
GE07hv_apppu:17446: tasyaiva ca sahāyo 'nyo bhūto rajasi kaiṭabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.380 //
GE07hv_apppu:17458: kampayantāv iva hariṃ śayānam arisūdanam / HV_App.I,41.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:17459: tau tatra viharantau sma puṣkare viśvatomukham // HV_App.I,41.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:17460: paśyatāṃ dīptavapuṣaṃ yogināṃ śreṣṭham acyutam / HV_App.I,41.392 /
GE07hv_apppu:17462: yogināṃ śreṣṭham āsādya dīptaṃ dadṛśatus tadā / **HV_App.I,41.392**29:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17464: daivatāni ca viśvāni mānasāṃś ca sutān ṛṣīn // HV_App.I,41.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:17465: tatas tāv ūcatus tatra brahmāṇam asurottamau / HV_App.I,41.395 /
GE07hv_apppu:17467: kas tvaṃ puṣkaramadhyasthaḥ sitoṣṇīṣaś caturmukhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.397 /
GE07hv_apppu:17468: āvām agaṇayan mohād āsse tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.398 //
GE07hv_apppu:17469: ehy āgacchāvayor yuddhaṃ prayaccha kamalodbhava / HV_App.I,41.399 /
GE07hv_apppu:17470: āvābhyām ativīrābhyāṃ na śakyaṃ sthātum āhave // HV_App.I,41.400 //
GE07hv_apppu:17472: āvābhyāṃ paramābhyāṃ tvam aśaktaḥ sthātum arṇave // **HV_App.I,41.400**30:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:17473: kas tvaṃ kaś codbhavas tubhyaṃ kena vāsīha coditaḥ / HV_App.I,41.401 /
GE07hv_apppu:17474: kaḥ sraṣṭā kaś ca te goptā kena nāmnābhidhīyase // HV_App.I,41.402 //
GE07hv_apppu:17476: yaḥ ka ity ucyate loke hy avijñātaḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.403 /
GE07hv_apppu:17477: tatsaṃbhavena yogena kiṃ māṃ nābhyavagacchathaḥ // HV_App.I,41.404 //
GE07hv_apppu:17479: nāvayoḥ paramaṃ loke kiṃcid asti mahāmune / HV_App.I,41.405 /
GE07hv_apppu:17480: āvābhyāṃ chādyate viśvaṃ tamasā rajasā tathā // HV_App.I,41.406 //
GE07hv_apppu:17483: āvābhyāṃ muhyate loka ucchritābhyāṃ yuge yuge / HV_App.I,41.409 /
GE07hv_apppu:17484: āvām arthaś ca kāmaś ca yajñāḥ sarvaparigrahāḥ // HV_App.I,41.410 //
GE07hv_apppu:17485: sukhaṃ yatra mudo yatra śrīḥ saṃnatir nayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.411 /
GE07hv_apppu:17486: eṣāṃ yat kāṅkṣitaṃ caiva tat tad āvāṃ vicintaya // HV_App.I,41.412 //
GE07hv_apppu:17488: yat tad yogavatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yac ca pūrvam ayonijam / HV_App.I,41.413 /
GE07hv_apppu:17489: tat samādhāya guṇavān sattve cāsmi pratiṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.414 //
GE07hv_apppu:17490: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for lines 413-414:k]
GE07hv_apppu:17491: yasmin sarvam idaṃ viśvam udbhūtaṃ yugaparyaye / **HV_App.I,41.414**31:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17492: tam eva devaṃ yogeśaṃ āsthito 'haṃ yuge yuge // **HV_App.I,41.414**31:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:17494: yūnādyo bhavatī dṛṣṭvā yūyaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā jitāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.414**32:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17495: taṃ māṃ pāpau na bādhetāṃ sattve cāsmin pratiṣṭhitam // **HV_App.I,41.414**32:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:17496: yat paraṃ yogayuktānām akṣaraṃ sattvam eva ca / HV_App.I,41.415 /
GE07hv_apppu:17497: rajasas tamasaś caiva yaḥ sraṣṭā jīvasaṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.416 //
GE07hv_apppu:17498: yato bhūtāni jāyante sāttvikānītarāṇi ca / HV_App.I,41.417 /
GE07hv_apppu:17499: sa eva yuktaḥ samare vaśī vāṃ śamayiṣyati // HV_App.I,41.418 //
GE07hv_apppu:17504: na śekatus tau calituṃ śakunāv iva pīḍitau // **HV_App.I,41.419**33:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:17505: tatas tāv āhatur gatvā tadā devaṃ sanātanam / **HV_App.I,41.419**33:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:17506: padmanābhaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ praṇipatyātha tāv ubhau // HV_App.I,41.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:17507: jānīvas tvāṃ viśvayonim ekaṃ puruṣasattamam / HV_App.I,41.421 /
GE07hv_apppu:17509: amodhadarśanaṃ satyaṃ yatas tvāṃ viśvaviśvadam / HV_App.I,41.423 /
GE07hv_apppu:17510: tatas tvām abhito deva kāṅkṣāvaḥ prativīkṣitum // HV_App.I,41.424 //
GE07hv_apppu:17511: tad icchāvo varaṃ dattaṃ tvayā hy āvām ariṃdama / HV_App.I,41.425 /
GE07hv_apppu:17514: kān icchato drutaṃ brūtaṃ varān asurasattamau / HV_App.I,41.427 /
GE07hv_apppu:17515: dattāyuṣau mayā bhūyo aho jīvitum icchatha // HV_App.I,41.428 //
GE07hv_apppu:17516: tasmād yad eṣa vāṃ yatnas tat prāpnutaṃ mahābalau / HV_App.I,41.429 /
GE07hv_apppu:17517: [k: Ñ2 V3 B Ds D6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17518: vadhyau bhavantau tu syātāṃ tāv ityevābravīd dhariḥ // **HV_App.I,41.429**34:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:17519: [k: B1 cont., Ñ2 ins. after line 430:k]
GE07hv_apppu:17520: evam astv iti taṃ devaṃ māvayos taṃ hitaṃ varam / **HV_App.I,41.429**35:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17521: ubhāv api mahātmānāv ūrjitau kṣatratatparau // HV_App.I,41.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:17523: yasmin na kaścin mṛtavān deśe tasmin vibho vadham / HV_App.I,41.431 /
GE07hv_apppu:17524: icchāvaḥ putratāṃ caiva tava gantuṃ surādhipa // HV_App.I,41.432 //
GE07hv_apppu:17526: bāḍhaṃ sutau me pravarau bhaviṣye kalpasaṃbhave / HV_App.I,41.433 /
GE07hv_apppu:17527: bhaviṣyatho na saṃdehaḥ satyam etad bravīmi vām // HV_App.I,41.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:17534: sthitvā tasmiṃs tu kamale brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,41.439 /
GE07hv_apppu:17535: ūrdhvabāhur mahābāhus tapo ghoram athāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,41.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:17536: jvalann iva ca tejasvī bhābhiḥ svābhis tamonudaḥ / HV_App.I,41.441 /
GE07hv_apppu:17538: athānyad rūpam āstāya śaṃbhur nārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.443 /
GE07hv_apppu:17541: sāṃkhyācāryaś ca matimān kapilo brahmaṇāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,41.446 //
GE07hv_apppu:17542: devarṣibhiḥ stutāv etau brahmabrahmavidāṃ varau / HV_App.I,41.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:17543: ubhāv api mahātmānāv ūrjitau kṣetratatparau // HV_App.I,41.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:17544: tau prāptāv ūcatus tatra brahmāṇam amitaujasam / HV_App.I,41.449 /
GE07hv_apppu:17547: bṛhatvād brahmaṇatvāc ca brahmāsi satataṃ vibho / **HV_App.I,41.450**36:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17548: bahutvād bahupādaś ca viśvātmā jagataḥ sthitiḥ / HV_App.I,41.451 /
GE07hv_apppu:17549: grāmaṇīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ brahmā lokagurur varaḥ // HV_App.I,41.452 //
GE07hv_apppu:17550: tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tisro vyāhṛtayo japan / HV_App.I,41.453 /
GE07hv_apppu:17551: trīn imān kṛtavāṃl lokān yathāha brāhmaṇī śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,41.454 //
GE07hv_apppu:17552: tatra bhūsaṃjñakaṃ putraṃ samutpāditavān prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.455 /
GE07hv_apppu:17553: tato gatāgatas tatra brahmā mānasam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:17554: sotpannas tv agre brahmāṇam uvāca mānasaḥ sutaḥ / HV_App.I,41.457 /
GE07hv_apppu:17555: karomi kiṃ te sāhāyyaṃ bravītu bhagavān iti // HV_App.I,41.458 //
GE07hv_apppu:17557: ya eṣa kapilo nāma brahmā nārāyaṇas tathā / HV_App.I,41.459 /
GE07hv_apppu:17558: vadate varadas tvāṃ tu tat kuruṣva mahāmate // HV_App.I,41.460 //
GE07hv_apppu:17559: brahmaṇokte tadā bhūyaḥ saṃśayaṃ samupasthitau / HV_App.I,41.461 /
GE07hv_apppu:17563: yat satyam akṣaraṃ brahma hy aṣṭāviṃśavidhaṃ smṛtam / HV_App.I,41.463 /
GE07hv_apppu:17564: yat satyam amṛtaṃ caiva paraṃ tat samanusmara // HV_App.I,41.464 //
GE07hv_apppu:17565: etad vaco niśamyātha sa yayau diśam uttarām / HV_App.I,41.465 /
GE07hv_apppu:17566: gatvā ca tatra brahmatvam agamaj jñānacakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,41.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:17567: tato brahmā bhuvaṃ nāma dvitīyam asṛjat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.467 /
GE07hv_apppu:17568: taṃ kalpayitvā manasā manasaiva mahāmanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:17569: tataḥ so 'py abravīd vākyaṃ kiṃ kurveti pitāmaham / HV_App.I,41.469 /
GE07hv_apppu:17572: brahmabhyāṃ sahitaḥ so 'tha bhūyo bhagavatīṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,41.471 /
GE07hv_apppu:17573: prāptaś ca paramaṃ sthānaṃ sa tayoḥ pārśvam āgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.472 //
GE07hv_apppu:17574: tasminn api gate putre tṛtīyam asṛjat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.473 /
GE07hv_apppu:17575: mokṣopapattikuśalaṃ bhūrbhuvaṃ nāma tad viduḥ // HV_App.I,41.474 //
GE07hv_apppu:17576: āsādya so 'pi taṃ dharmaṃ tayor evāgamad gatim / HV_App.I,41.475 /
GE07hv_apppu:17577: evaṃ putrās trayo 'py ete uktāḥ śaṃbhor mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:17578: tān gṛhītvā sutāṃs tasya prayātau svārjitāṃ gatim / HV_App.I,41.477 /
GE07hv_apppu:17579: nārāyaṇaś ca bhagavān kapilaś ca yatīśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.478 //
GE07hv_apppu:17580: yaṃ kālaṃ tau gatau muktau brahmā tat kālam eva tu / HV_App.I,41.479 /
GE07hv_apppu:17581: tapo ghorataraṃ bhūyaḥ saṃśritaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ // HV_App.I,41.480 //
GE07hv_apppu:17582: na rarāma tato brahmā prabhur ekas tapaś caran / HV_App.I,41.481 /
GE07hv_apppu:17583: śarīrārdhāt tato bhāryāṃ samutpāditavāñ śubhām // HV_App.I,41.482 //
GE07hv_apppu:17585: tapasā tejasā caiva varcasā niyamena ca / HV_App.I,41.483 /
GE07hv_apppu:17586: sadṛśīm ātmano bhāryāṃ samarthāṃ lokasarjane // HV_App.I,41.484 //
GE07hv_apppu:17587: sa tayā sahitas tatra reme brahmā tapomayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.485 /
GE07hv_apppu:17588: tataḥ prajāpatīn sarvān sāgarān saritas tathā // HV_App.I,41.486 //
GE07hv_apppu:17589: tato 'sṛjad vai tripadāṃ gāyatrīṃ vedamātaram / HV_App.I,41.487 /
GE07hv_apppu:17590: akaroc caiva caturo vedān gāyatrisaṃbhavān // HV_App.I,41.488 //
GE07hv_apppu:17592: viśve prajānāṃ patayo yebhyo lokā viniḥsṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.490 //
GE07hv_apppu:17593: viśveśaṃ prathamaṃ nāma mahātapasam ātmajam / HV_App.I,41.491 /
GE07hv_apppu:17594: sarvāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ nāmnā dharmaṃ sa sṛṣṭavān // HV_App.I,41.492 //
GE07hv_apppu:17595: dakṣaṃ marīcim atriṃ ca pulastyam pulahaṃ kratum / HV_App.I,41.493 /
GE07hv_apppu:17596: vasiṣṭhaṃ gautamaṃ caiva bhṛgum aṅgirasaṃ munim // HV_App.I,41.494 //
GE07hv_apppu:17597: atharvabhūtā ity ete khyātā brahmamaharṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.495 /
GE07hv_apppu:17598: trayodaśasutānāṃ tu ye vaṃśās tu maharṣiṇām // HV_App.I,41.496 //
GE07hv_apppu:17599: aditir ditir danuḥ kālā anāyuḥ siṃhikā muniḥ / HV_App.I,41.497 /
GE07hv_apppu:17600: prādhā krodhā ca surasā vinatā kadrur eva ca // HV_App.I,41.498 //
GE07hv_apppu:17601: dakṣasyaitā duhitaraḥ kanyā dvādaśa bhārata / HV_App.I,41.499 /
GE07hv_apppu:17602: nakṣatrāṇi ca bhadraṃ te saptāviṃśatir ūrjitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.500 //
GE07hv_apppu:17603: marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putras tapasā nirmitaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.501 /
GE07hv_apppu:17606: tasmai kanyā dvādaśemā dakṣas tā anvamanyata // HV_App.I,41.502 //
GE07hv_apppu:17607: nakṣatrākhyāṃś ca somāya vasave dattavān ṛṣiḥ / HV_App.I,41.503 /
GE07hv_apppu:17610: lakṣmīḥ kīrtis tathā sādhyā viśvāvasuratā śubhā / HV_App.I,41.505 /
GE07hv_apppu:17611: devī padmodbhavā caiva brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ purā // HV_App.I,41.506 //
GE07hv_apppu:17612: etāḥ pañca variṣṭhā vai suraśreṣṭhāya bhārata / HV_App.I,41.507 /
GE07hv_apppu:17613: dattā dharmāya bhadraṃ te brahmaṇā dṛṣṭadharmaṇā // HV_App.I,41.508 //
GE07hv_apppu:17614: yā rūpārdhamayī patnī brahmaṇaḥ kāmarūpiṇī / HV_App.I,41.509 /
GE07hv_apppu:17615: surabhiḥ sā tu gaur bhūtvā brahmāṇaṃ samupasthitā // HV_App.I,41.510 //
GE07hv_apppu:17616: tatas tām agamad brahmā maithune lokapūjitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.511 /
GE07hv_apppu:17618: jajñe caikādaśa sutān vipulān dharmasaṃhitān / HV_App.I,41.513 /
GE07hv_apppu:17620: te rudanto dravantaś ca bhagavantaṃ pitāmaham / HV_App.I,41.515 /
GE07hv_apppu:17621: rodanād dravaṇāś caiva tato rudrā iti smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.516 //
GE07hv_apppu:17622: nirṛtiś caiva sarpaś ca tṛtīyo hy aja ekapāt / HV_App.I,41.517 /
GE07hv_apppu:17623: mṛgavyādhaḥ pinākī ca dahano 'theśvaraś ca vai // HV_App.I,41.518 //
GE07hv_apppu:17624: ahirbūdhnyaś ca bhagavān kapālī cāparājitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.519 /
GE07hv_apppu:17625: senānīś ca mahātejā rudrā ekādaśa smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.520 //
GE07hv_apppu:17626: tasyām eva surabhyāṃ vai jajñivān govṛṣas tathā / HV_App.I,41.521 /
GE07hv_apppu:17627: akṛṣṭāś ca tathā māṣāḥ sikatāḥ pṛśnayo 'kṣatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.522 //
GE07hv_apppu:17632: ajāś caikaśaphāś caiva tathaivāmṛtam uttamam / HV_App.I,41.523 /
GE07hv_apppu:17633: oṣadhyaḥ pravarā yāś ca surabhyāṃ tāḥ samutthitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.524 //
GE07hv_apppu:17634: dharmāl lakṣmyudbhavaḥ kāmaḥ sādhyān sādhyā vyajāyata / HV_App.I,41.525 /
GE07hv_apppu:17635: bhavaṃ ca prabhavaṃ caiva īśānam aratiṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.526 //
GE07hv_apppu:17637: mahiṣaṃ ca tanūjaṃ ca vijñānam anaghaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.528 //
GE07hv_apppu:17638: matsaraṃ ca vibhūtiṃ ca sarve surabhisūnavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.529 /
GE07hv_apppu:17639: suvarcasaṃ vṛṣaṃ nāgaṃ sādhyā lokanamaskṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.530 //
GE07hv_apppu:17640: vāsavānugatā devī janayām āsa vai sutam / HV_App.I,41.531 /
GE07hv_apppu:17641: dharaṃ ca prathamaṃ devaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhruvam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.532 //
GE07hv_apppu:17642: viśvāvasuṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ somam īśvaram / HV_App.I,41.533 /
GE07hv_apppu:17644: tato yogāyamānaṃ ca śamas tasmād anantaram / **HV_App.I,41.533**40:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17645: pañcamaṃ parvataṃ caiva yogendraṃ tadanantaram // HV_App.I,41.534 //
GE07hv_apppu:17646: saptamaṃ ca tato vāyum aṣṭamaṃ nirṛtiṃ vasum / HV_App.I,41.535 /
GE07hv_apppu:17647: dharmasyāpatyam etad vai surabhyāṃ samajāyata // HV_App.I,41.536 //
GE07hv_apppu:17648: viśve devāś ca viśvāyāṃ dharmodbhūtā iti śrutiḥ / HV_App.I,41.537 /
GE07hv_apppu:17650: dhanyaś caiva mahābāhur vivasvāṃś ca tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,41.537**41:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17651: dakṣaś caiva mahābāhur vasuś ca suta eva ca / HV_App.I,41.538 /
GE07hv_apppu:17652: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.6 G3.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17653: sudharmā ca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhapāc ca mahābalaḥ / **HV_App.I,41.538**42:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17656: ruruś ca ṛṣiputro vai bhāskarapratimadyutiḥ // HV_App.I,41.541 //
GE07hv_apppu:17657: viśve devān devamātā viśveśāñ janayat sutān / HV_App.I,41.542 /
GE07hv_apppu:17658: marutvatī marutvanto devān ajanayac chubhān // HV_App.I,41.543 //
GE07hv_apppu:17659: agniś cakṣur havir jyotiḥ sāvitraṃ mitram eva ca / HV_App.I,41.544 /
GE07hv_apppu:17660: amaraṃ śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca saṃkṣayaṃ ca mahābhujam // HV_App.I,41.545 //
GE07hv_apppu:17661: virajaṃ caiva śukraṃ ca viśvāvasuvibhāvasū / HV_App.I,41.546 /
GE07hv_apppu:17662: aśmantaṃ citraraśmiṃ ca tathā niṣṭavinaṃ nṛpam / HV_App.I,41.547 /
GE07hv_apppu:17663: kuyoniṃ ca kṛtiṃ caiva cāritraṃ bahupannagam // HV_App.I,41.548 //
GE07hv_apppu:17664: bṛhantaṃ ca bṛhad rūpaṃ tathaiva tapanānanam / HV_App.I,41.549 /
GE07hv_apppu:17665: marutvatī purā jajñe dharmād vai marutāṃ gaṇam // HV_App.I,41.550 //
GE07hv_apppu:17666: adityāṃ jajñire rājann ādityāḥ kaśyapād atha / HV_App.I,41.551 /
GE07hv_apppu:17667: indro viṣṇur bhagas tvaṣṭā varuṇo 'ṃśo 'ryamā raviḥ // HV_App.I,41.552 //
GE07hv_apppu:17668: pūṣā mitraś ca varado manuḥ parjanya eva ca / HV_App.I,41.553 /
GE07hv_apppu:17669: ity ete dvādaśādityā variṣṭhās tridivaukasaḥ // HV_App.I,41.554 //
GE07hv_apppu:17670: ādityasya sarasvatyāṃ jajñe putradvayaṃ śubham / HV_App.I,41.555 /
GE07hv_apppu:17671: rūpaśreṣṭhaṃ vapuḥśreṣṭhaṃ tridive rūpiṇāṃ varam // HV_App.I,41.556 //
GE07hv_apppu:17673: vairajaṃ caiva babhraṃ ca viśvāvasum adas tathā / **HV_App.I,41.556**43:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17674: danus tu dānavāñ jajñe ditir daityān vyajāyata / HV_App.I,41.557 /
GE07hv_apppu:17675: kālā tu kālakeyān vai asurān rākṣasāṃs tathā // HV_App.I,41.558 //
GE07hv_apppu:17676: anāyuṣāyās tanayā vyādhayaś cādhayas tathā / HV_App.I,41.559 /
GE07hv_apppu:17677: siṃhikā grahamātā ca gandharvajananī muniḥ // HV_App.I,41.560 //
GE07hv_apppu:17678: prādhā cāpsarasāṃ śreṣṭhā apsarāś cāpy ajījanat / HV_App.I,41.561 /
GE07hv_apppu:17679: krodhāyāḥ sarvabhūtāni piśācāś caiva bhārata // HV_App.I,41.562 //
GE07hv_apppu:17680: tathā pakṣigaṇāś caiva guhyakāś ca viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,41.563 /
GE07hv_apppu:17681: catuṣpadāni sarvāṇi ṛte gāvaś ca saurabhāḥ // HV_App.I,41.564 //
GE07hv_apppu:17682: aruṇo garuḍaś caiva vinatāyāṃ vyajāyata / HV_App.I,41.565 /
GE07hv_apppu:17683: mahīdharān sarvanāgān devī kadrūr vyajāyata // HV_App.I,41.566 //
GE07hv_apppu:17684: evaṃ vivṛddhim agaman viśve devāḥ parasparam / HV_App.I,41.567 /
GE07hv_apppu:17685: tadā pauṣkarake rājan prādurbhāve mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.568 //
GE07hv_apppu:17686: purāṇaṃ puṣkaraṃ caiva mayā dvaipāyanāc chrutaṃ / HV_App.I,41.569 /
GE07hv_apppu:17688: yaś cedam agryaṃ paramaṃ purāṇaṃ @ HV_App.I,41.571 @
GE07hv_apppu:17694: kṛtaṃ naḥ paramaṃ brahman viṣṇoś caritam adbhutaṃ / **HV_App.I,41.574**44:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17695: vārāhaṃ caritaṃ cāpi nārasiṃham ataḥ param // **HV_App.I,41.574**44:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:17697: dakṣasya cādhvaraṃ brahmañ chrotum icchāmi tatvataḥ // **HV_App.I,41.574**44:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:17700: suraiś ca munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ hariṇā śaṃkareṇa ca // **HV_App.I,41.574**44:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:17702: tasmin pravṛtte yajñe tu munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.574**44:8 /
GE07hv_apppu:17705: śrutaṃ naḥ paramaṃ brahman svavaṃśacaritaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,41.575 /
GE07hv_apppu:17706: divyam anyonyasaṃbhūtam arcitaṃ bahubhir guṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.576 //
GE07hv_apppu:17707: chandobhir vṛttasaṃjātaiḥ samāsaiś ca suvistaraiḥ / HV_App.I,41.577 /
GE07hv_apppu:17711: brāhmaṇānāṃ prabhāvaiś ca yodhānāṃ ca parākramaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.581 /
GE07hv_apppu:17712: vairaniryātanaiś caiva pratijñānāṃ ca pāragaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.582 //
GE07hv_apppu:17715: ye ca tasmin mahāraudre saṃgrāme nihatā nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,41.585 /
GE07hv_apppu:17716: teṣāṃ sarvāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi putrāḥ sarve prapedire // HV_App.I,41.586 //
GE07hv_apppu:17718: dharmaś ca bahudhā proktas trayāṇāṃ varṇasaṃpadām / HV_App.I,41.588 /
GE07hv_apppu:17719: śūrāṇām api vikhyātaḥ svargahetur dvijarṣabha // HV_App.I,41.589 //
GE07hv_apppu:17721: caturṇāṃ varṇasaṃjñānāṃ pṛthak pṛthag anekadhā // HV_App.I,41.591 //
GE07hv_apppu:17722: garbhavāsaṃ patantaś ca bhūtānāṃ saṃprabodhitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.592 /
GE07hv_apppu:17723: pṛcchatāṃ devasaṃcāre kṣīṇe puṇye ca karmaṇi // HV_App.I,41.593 //
GE07hv_apppu:17724: dāne yaś cāpi saṃyogaḥ sa cāpi bahudhā kṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.594 /
GE07hv_apppu:17725: dvābhyāṃ saṃyogavihitaṃ madhuvāg vacanaṃ tayoḥ // HV_App.I,41.595 //
GE07hv_apppu:17726: naitac chakyaṃ mayā khyātuṃ bhāratādhyayanaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,41.596 /
GE07hv_apppu:17727: ekāhena mahad brahmann api divyena cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,41.597 //
GE07hv_apppu:17728: brahmaṇo 'hnas tu vistāraṃ saṃkṣepaṃ ca susaṃgraham / HV_App.I,41.598 /
GE07hv_apppu:17729: śrotum icchāmi bhagavan mahat kautūhalaṃ hi me // HV_App.I,41.599 //
GE07hv_apppu:17733: kathāṃ kathayato rājan nirvikāreṇa cetasā // HV_App.I,41.601 //
GE07hv_apppu:17735: purastād brahmasaṃpannaṃ brahmaṇo yad adakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,41.603 //
GE07hv_apppu:17736: avyaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ yat tan nityaṃ sadasadātmakam / HV_App.I,41.604 /
GE07hv_apppu:17738: divyo divyena vapuṣā sarvabhūtapatir vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.606 /
GE07hv_apppu:17739: acintyaś cāvyayaś caiva yugānāṃ prabhavo 'vyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.607 //
