GE07hv_apppu:17740: abhūtaś cāpy ajātaś ca sarvatra samatāṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,41.608 /
GE07hv_apppu:17741: avyaktāt paramaṃ yat tat tat purāṇavido viduḥ // HV_App.I,41.609 //
GE07hv_apppu:17743: sarvataḥ śrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭati // HV_App.I,41.611 //
GE07hv_apppu:17744: asataś ca sataś caiva vijñeyaṃ tatra kāraṇam / HV_App.I,41.612 /
GE07hv_apppu:17745: avyakto vyaktarūpaś ca carann api na dṛśyate // HV_App.I,41.613 //
GE07hv_apppu:17746: vikārapuruṣo 'vyakto hy arūpī rūpam āśritaḥ / HV_App.I,41.614 /
GE07hv_apppu:17747: caraty acintyaḥ sarveṣu gūḍho 'gnir iva dāruṣu // HV_App.I,41.615 //
GE07hv_apppu:17749: prabhuḥ sarvasya lokasya nāma cāsyeti tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.617 //
GE07hv_apppu:17750: apadāt tu pado jātas tasmān nārāyaṇo 'bhavat / HV_App.I,41.618 /
GE07hv_apppu:17751: avyakto vyaktim āpanno brahmayogena kāmataḥ // HV_App.I,41.619 //
GE07hv_apppu:17752: brahmabhāvena taṃ viddhi sa śabdaṃ labdhavān prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.620 /
GE07hv_apppu:17753: prabhavaḥ sarvasya lokasya sthāvarasya carasya ca // HV_App.I,41.621 //
GE07hv_apppu:17754: ahaṃ tv iti sa hovāca prajāḥ srakṣyāmi bhārata / HV_App.I,41.622 /
GE07hv_apppu:17755: prabhavaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yasya tantur imāḥ prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.623 //
GE07hv_apppu:17756: svabhāvāj jāyate sarvaṃ svabhāvāc ca tathābhavat / HV_App.I,41.624 /
GE07hv_apppu:17757: ahaṃkārasvabhāvāc ca sa ca sarvam idaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,41.625 //
GE07hv_apppu:17758: sarvavyāpī nirālambo agrāhyo 'tha jayo dhruvaḥ / HV_App.I,41.626 /
GE07hv_apppu:17759: eṣa brahmamayo jyotir brahmaśabdena śabditaḥ // HV_App.I,41.627 //
GE07hv_apppu:17760: avyakto vyaktim āpannaḥ pañcabhiḥ kratulakṣanaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.628 /
GE07hv_apppu:17761: dhārayan brahmaṇo vyaktiṃ vividhaṃ vitataś caran // HV_App.I,41.629 //
GE07hv_apppu:17762: atha mūrtiṃ samādhāya svabhāvād brahmacoditaḥ / HV_App.I,41.630 /
GE07hv_apppu:17763: sasarja salilaṃ brahmā yena sarvam idaṃ tatam // HV_App.I,41.631 //
GE07hv_apppu:17764: vāyuṃ pūrvam atho dṛṣṭvā yo dhātur dhātṛsattamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.632 /
GE07hv_apppu:17765: dhāraṇād dhātṛśabdaṃ ca labhate lokasamjñitam // HV_App.I,41.633 //
GE07hv_apppu:17766: tad etadvāyusaṃbhūtaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagad abhūt purā / HV_App.I,41.634 /
GE07hv_apppu:17767: etad devair atikrāntaṃ pūrvam eva sarasvati // HV_App.I,41.635 //
GE07hv_apppu:17768: pṛthaktvaṃ gamitaṃ toyaṃ pṛthivīśabdam icchatā / HV_App.I,41.636 /
GE07hv_apppu:17769: ghanatvāc ca dravatvāc ca nikhilenopalabhyate // HV_App.I,41.637 //
GE07hv_apppu:17770: phalatvāt sīdamānāc ca salile salilodbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.638 /
GE07hv_apppu:17771: vyājahāra śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ samantāt pūrayann iva // HV_App.I,41.639 //
GE07hv_apppu:17772: ūrdhvaṃ vai sthātum icchāmi saṃsīdāmy uddharasva mām / HV_App.I,41.640 /
GE07hv_apppu:17776: śrutvā ca gaditaṃ tasyā giraṃ tāṃ ca subhāṣitām / HV_App.I,41.644 /
GE07hv_apppu:17778: uddhṛtya so 'vaniṃ toyāt kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram / HV_App.I,41.646 /
GE07hv_apppu:17779: samādhau pralayaṃ gatvā pralīno na ca dṛśyate // HV_App.I,41.647 //
GE07hv_apppu:17780: yat tad brahmamayaṃ jyotir ākāśam iti śabditam / HV_App.I,41.648 /
GE07hv_apppu:17782: adyāpi manasā dhātrā dhāryate brahmayoninā / HV_App.I,41.650 /
GE07hv_apppu:17784: bhittvā tu pṛthivīmadhyam upayāti samudbhavam / HV_App.I,41.652 /
GE07hv_apppu:17785: tapanas tūrdhvam ātiṣṭhan raśmibhiḥ pradahann iva // HV_App.I,41.653 //
GE07hv_apppu:17786: tasya maṇḍalamadhyāt tu niḥsṛtaṃ pratimaṇḍalam / HV_App.I,41.654 /
GE07hv_apppu:17787: sa sanātanajo brahmā saumyaṃ somatvam anvagāt // HV_App.I,41.655 //
GE07hv_apppu:17790: sa tu yogamayāj jñānāt svabhāvād brahmasaṃbhavāt / HV_App.I,41.658 /
GE07hv_apppu:17791: sṛjate puruṣaṃ divyaṃ brahmayoniṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.659 //
GE07hv_apppu:17792: dravaṃ yat salilaṃ tasya ghanaṃ yat pṛthivī bhavat / HV_App.I,41.660 /
GE07hv_apppu:17793: chidraṃ tatra tad ākāśaṃ jyotir yac cakṣur eva tat // HV_App.I,41.661 //
GE07hv_apppu:17794: vāyunā spandate caiva saṃghātāj jyotisaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.662 /
GE07hv_apppu:17795: puruṣāt puruśo bhāvaḥ pañcabhūtamayo mahān // HV_App.I,41.663 //
GE07hv_apppu:17796: bhūtātmā vai sa me tasmiṃs tasmin dehaḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.664 /
GE07hv_apppu:17797: guhāyāṃ nihitaṃ jñānaṃ yogād yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.665 //
GE07hv_apppu:17798: tapanasyaiva tad rūpaṃ yo 'gnir vasati dehinām / HV_App.I,41.666 /
GE07hv_apppu:17799: śarīre nityaśo yukte dhātubhiḥ saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.667 //
GE07hv_apppu:17800: svabhāvāt kṣayam āyāti svabhāvād bhavam eti ca / HV_App.I,41.668 /
GE07hv_apppu:17801: svabhāvād vindate śāntiṃ svabhāvāc ca na vindati // HV_App.I,41.669 //
GE07hv_apppu:17802: indriyair vyatimūḍhātmā mohito brahmaṇaḥ pade / HV_App.I,41.670 /
GE07hv_apppu:17803: saṃbhavaṃ nidhanaṃ caiva karmabhiḥ pratipadyate // HV_App.I,41.671 //
GE07hv_apppu:17804: yāvat tad brahmaviṣayaṃ nopayātīha jñānataḥ / HV_App.I,41.672 /
GE07hv_apppu:17805: tāvat saṃsāram āpnoti saṃbhavāṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.673 //
GE07hv_apppu:17806: indriyair vyatirikto vai yadā bhavati yogataḥ / HV_App.I,41.674 /
GE07hv_apppu:17807: tadā brahmatvam āpannaḥ pralayāgre pratiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,41.675 //
GE07hv_apppu:17808: pratiṣiddham amuṃ lokaṃ brahmavāṃś ca bhavaty uta / HV_App.I,41.676 /
GE07hv_apppu:17809: na ca rāgavyayair yāti na ca sajjati karhicit // HV_App.I,41.677 //
GE07hv_apppu:17810: āgatiṃ ca gatiṃ caiva nidhanaṃ saṃbhavaṃ tatha / HV_App.I,41.678 /
GE07hv_apppu:17811: bhūtebhyo vetti sarvajñaḥ parāṃ siddhim upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.679 //
GE07hv_apppu:17812: ātmano gatayaś caiva tathā viṣayagocaram / HV_App.I,41.680 /
GE07hv_apppu:17813: purastāt karmanirvṛttaḥ pade brāhme pratiṣṭhataḥ // HV_App.I,41.681 //
GE07hv_apppu:17814: cittagranthīś ca manasā rundhyāt pūrvāś ca yātanāḥ / HV_App.I,41.682 /
GE07hv_apppu:17816: pacyate hṛdayaṃ līnaṃ parebhyo jñānacakṣuṣā / HV_App.I,41.684 /
GE07hv_apppu:17817: brahmaproktam ihātmā vai vimukto dehabandhanāt // HV_App.I,41.685 //
GE07hv_apppu:17818: sṛjed api paraṃ lokaṃ saṃhared api vidyayā / HV_App.I,41.686 /
GE07hv_apppu:17819: tejomūrtir ivāviddham iha lokaṃ ca saṃsṛjet // HV_App.I,41.687 //
GE07hv_apppu:17820: tiryagyonau gatāṃś caiva karmabhir nirayopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.688 /
GE07hv_apppu:17821: tāny api pratimucyeta brahmayuktena cetasā // HV_App.I,41.689 //
GE07hv_apppu:17822: akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva yogakarmāti vidyate / HV_App.I,41.690 /
GE07hv_apppu:17823: na kṣaraṃ vidyate tatra yad brahma karmabhir dhruvam // HV_App.I,41.691 //
GE07hv_apppu:17826: pṛthivyāṃ yat kṛtaṃ chidraṃ tapanena vivardhatā / HV_App.I,41.692 /
GE07hv_apppu:17828: parvabhiḥ parvatatvaṃ ca labhate nāmasaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,41.694 /
GE07hv_apppu:17829: acalād acalatvaṃ ca svabhāvān merur eva saḥ // HV_App.I,41.695 //
GE07hv_apppu:17830: tasya pṛṣṭhe suvistīrṇe nagasya sumaharddhimān / HV_App.I,41.696 /
GE07hv_apppu:17831: tasmin sa puruṣo vyakto vasati jyotisaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.697 /
GE07hv_apppu:17832: vihitaś ca svabhāvena tenaiva paramātmanā // HV_App.I,41.698 //
GE07hv_apppu:17833: yat tad brahmamayaṃ tejo nihitaṃ śiraso 'ntare / HV_App.I,41.699 /
GE07hv_apppu:17834: tasya jyotirmayaṃ rūpaṃ dīptaṃ puruṣavigraham // HV_App.I,41.700 //
GE07hv_apppu:17835: vadanād abhiniṣkrāntaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā / HV_App.I,41.701 /
GE07hv_apppu:17836: caturbhir vadanair yuktaṃ caturbhiś ca bhujottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.702 //
GE07hv_apppu:17837: vaktrād brahma sumudbhūtaṃ brahmā brāhmaṇapuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.703 /
GE07hv_apppu:17838: tad evaitan mahābhūtaṃ punarbhāvatvam āgatam // HV_App.I,41.704 //
GE07hv_apppu:17839: uddhṛtā pṛthivī devī purastāt salilāśayā / HV_App.I,41.705 /
GE07hv_apppu:17843: brahmatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthānād aloko lokatāṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,41.706 //
GE07hv_apppu:17844: padasaṃdhau brahmalokaṃ śṛṅgaṃ meros tadābhavat / HV_App.I,41.707 /
GE07hv_apppu:17845: ucchritaṃ yojanaśataṃ sahasraśatam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.708 //
GE07hv_apppu:17846: evam eva ca vistāraṃ caturbhir guṇitaṃ guṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.709 /
GE07hv_apppu:17847: atha vā naiva saṃkhyātuṃ śakyaṃ bhūtena kenacit / HV_App.I,41.710 /
GE07hv_apppu:17848: samāsahasrair bahubhir api divyena cetasā // HV_App.I,41.711 //
GE07hv_apppu:17850: nagasya yasya rājendra vistāraiḥ śatayojanaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.713 //
GE07hv_apppu:17852: yogayuktaiḥ sadā siddhair nityaṃ brahmaparāyaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.715 //
GE07hv_apppu:17853: marudbhiḥ saha devendrai rudraiḥ vasubhir eva ca / HV_App.I,41.716 /
GE07hv_apppu:17855: rarakṣa pṛthivīṃ caiva bhagavān viṣṇunā saha / HV_App.I,41.718 /
GE07hv_apppu:17856: vivisvadvaruṇābhyāṃ ca saṃghātaṃ gamitāṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.719 //
GE07hv_apppu:17857: tena brāhmaṇe vapuṣā brahmaprāptena bhārata / HV_App.I,41.720 /
GE07hv_apppu:17858: yat tad viṣṇumayaṃ tejaḥ sarvatra samatāṃ gatam // HV_App.I,41.721 //
GE07hv_apppu:17859: yat tad brahmeti vai proktaṃ brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.722 /
GE07hv_apppu:17861: evam ete trayo lokā brāhme 'hani samāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.724 /
GE07hv_apppu:17862: ahani brahma cāvyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ prāṇe pratiṣṭhitam // HV_App.I,41.725 //
GE07hv_apppu:17863: brahmaṇo niyataṃ karma prabhāvena pracoditam / HV_App.I,41.726 /
GE07hv_apppu:17865: etad dhitam iti proktaṃ brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.728 /
GE07hv_apppu:17866: yad ekaṃ brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ viśvatāṃ gamitaṃ padam // HV_App.I,41.729 //
GE07hv_apppu:17868: yat tad viṣṇumayaṃ tejo viśvatvaṃ gamitaṃ param / **HV_App.I,41.729**46:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17872: evaṃ dvaṃdvaṃ sa bhagavān prathamaṃ mithunaṃ sṛjat // HV_App.I,41.733 //
GE07hv_apppu:17873: sa eva bhagavān viśvo devyā saha sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.734 /
GE07hv_apppu:17874: vidhāya vipulān bhogān brahmā carati sānugaḥ // HV_App.I,41.735 //
GE07hv_apppu:17875: sa eṣa bhagavān brahmā nityaṃ brahmavidāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,41.736 /
GE07hv_apppu:17879: abhiṣicya ca bhūteśaṃ kṛtvā karma svabhāvataḥ / HV_App.I,41.740 /
GE07hv_apppu:17880: nadati sma tadā nādaṃ tena sā hy ucyate nadī // HV_App.I,41.741 //
GE07hv_apppu:17881: sā brahmalokaṃ sambhāvyam abhibhūya sahasradhā / HV_App.I,41.742 /
GE07hv_apppu:17882: gāṃ gatā gaganād devī saptadhā prasasāra ha // HV_App.I,41.743 //
GE07hv_apppu:17883: sahasradhā ca rājendra bahudhā ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,41.744 /
GE07hv_apppu:17884: imaṃ lokam amuṃ caiva bhāvayan kṣarasaṃbhavam // HV_App.I,41.745 //
GE07hv_apppu:17885: tato bhūtāni rohanti mahābhūtaphalāni ca / HV_App.I,41.746 /
GE07hv_apppu:17886: tataḥ sarve kriyārambhāḥ prāvartanta manīṣiṇām // HV_App.I,41.747 //
GE07hv_apppu:17887: caturbhir vadanais tasya mukhapadmād viniḥsṛtā / HV_App.I,41.748 /
GE07hv_apppu:17889: tasya jñānamayaṃ puṇyaṃ catuṣpādaṃ sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.750 /
GE07hv_apppu:17890: patitvenābhavad devo brahmā cātra pitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,41.751 //
GE07hv_apppu:17891: pādā dharmasya catvāro yair idaṃ dhāryate jagat / HV_App.I,41.752 /
GE07hv_apppu:17892: brahmacaryeṇa vyaktena gṛhasthena ca pāvane // HV_App.I,41.753 //
GE07hv_apppu:17894: ity ete dharmapādāḥ syuḥ svargahetoḥ pracoditāḥ // HV_App.I,41.755 //
GE07hv_apppu:17895: nyāyād dharmeṇa guhyena somo vardhati maṇḍale / HV_App.I,41.756 /
GE07hv_apppu:17896: brahmā sabrahmacaraṇā vedā vartanti śāśvatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.757 //
GE07hv_apppu:17897: gṛhasthān abhivākyena tṛpyanti pitaras tadā / HV_App.I,41.758 /
GE07hv_apppu:17898: ṛṣayo 'pi ca dharmeṇa nagasya śirasi sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.759 //
GE07hv_apppu:17899: nagasya tasya saṃpaśya meroḥ śikharam uttamam / HV_App.I,41.760 /
GE07hv_apppu:17900: padbhyāṃ saṃpīḍya vṛṣaṇāv ṛṣibhis tair vicāryate // HV_App.I,41.761 //
GE07hv_apppu:17901: grīvāṃ nigṛhya pṛṣṭhaṃ ca vināmya prahasann iva / HV_App.I,41.762 /
GE07hv_apppu:17902: nābhideśe karau nyasya sarvaśo 'ṅgāni saṃkṣipan // HV_App.I,41.763 //
GE07hv_apppu:17903: mūrdhni brahma samutkṣipya manasā sa pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.764 /
GE07hv_apppu:17904: asṛjan manasā viṣṇuṃ yogād yogeśvarasya ca // HV_App.I,41.765 //
GE07hv_apppu:17905: vyatiriktendriyo viṣṇur bimbād bimbam ivoddhṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.766 /
GE07hv_apppu:17908: virājan nabhaso madhye prabhābhir atulaṃ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.769 //
GE07hv_apppu:17909: nopalabhyati mūḍhātmā pratyakṣaṃ brahma śāśvatam / HV_App.I,41.770 /
GE07hv_apppu:17910: lalāṭamadhye tiṣṭhantaṃ dvidhābhūtaṃ kriyāṃ prati // HV_App.I,41.771 //
GE07hv_apppu:17911: jyotiś cakṣuṣi saṃbaddhaṃ bimbaṃ bhāskarasomayoḥ / HV_App.I,41.772 /
GE07hv_apppu:17912: buddhyā pūrvaṃ tu paśyanti adhyātmaviṣaye ratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.773 //
GE07hv_apppu:17914: netare jātu paśyanti adhyātmaṃ nāvabudhyate // HV_App.I,41.775 //
GE07hv_apppu:17916: bhūtayo bhuvi bhūteśo mohaprāptena cetasā // HV_App.I,41.777 //
GE07hv_apppu:17918: narāṇāṃ yogam ādhāya sveṣu gātreṣu bhārata // HV_App.I,41.779 //
GE07hv_apppu:17920: candramaṇḍalasaṃsthānaṃ jyotis tejo mahat tadā // HV_App.I,41.781 //
GE07hv_apppu:17921: praviśya hṛdayaṃ kṣipraṃ gāyatryā nayanāntare / HV_App.I,41.782 /
GE07hv_apppu:17922: garbhasya saṃbhavo yaś ca caturdhā puruṣātmakaḥ // HV_App.I,41.783 //
GE07hv_apppu:17924: na cendriyaguṇair yukto yuktas tejoguṇena ca // HV_App.I,41.785 //
GE07hv_apppu:17926: netrābhyāṃ janayad devo ṛgvedaṃ yajuṣā saha // HV_App.I,41.787 //
GE07hv_apppu:17927: sāmavedaṃ ca jihvāgrād atharvāṇaṃ ca mūrdhataḥ / HV_App.I,41.788 /
GE07hv_apppu:17928: jātamātrās tu te vedāḥ kṣetraṃ vindanti tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.789 //
GE07hv_apppu:17929: tena vedatvam āpannā yasmād vindanti tatpadam / HV_App.I,41.790 /
GE07hv_apppu:17930: te sṛjanti tadā vedā brahma pūrvaṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.791 //
GE07hv_apppu:17931: puruṣaṃ divyarūpābhaṃ svaiḥ svair bhāvair manobhavaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.792 /
GE07hv_apppu:17932: atharvaṇas tu yo bhāgaḥ śīrṣaṃ yajñasya tat smṛtam // HV_App.I,41.793 //
GE07hv_apppu:17933: grīvābāhvantaraṃ caiva ṛgbhāgaḥ sa bhavet tataḥ / HV_App.I,41.794 /
GE07hv_apppu:17934: hṛdayaṃ caiva pārśvaṃ ca sāmabhāgas tu nirmitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.795 /
GE07hv_apppu:17936: evam eṣa yajurbhāgaḥ saṃghāto yajñakalpitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.797 /
GE07hv_apppu:17937: puruṣo divyarūpābhaḥ saṃbhūto hy amarāt padāt // HV_App.I,41.798 //
GE07hv_apppu:17938: sa hi vedamayo yajñaḥ sarvabhūtasukhāvahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.799 /
GE07hv_apppu:17939: ubhayor lokayos tāta hiṃsāvarjyaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.800 //
GE07hv_apppu:17941: prabhavaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yo vindati sa vedavit // HV_App.I,41.802 //
GE07hv_apppu:17942: sa siddhaḥ procyate loke siddhir eva na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.803 /
GE07hv_apppu:17944: vaiṣṇavaṃ yajñam ity evaṃ bruvate vedapāragāḥ / HV_App.I,41.805 /
GE07hv_apppu:17947: cetasas tūpalambho hi manogrāhyasya kāmataḥ / HV_App.I,41.807 /
GE07hv_apppu:17948: kāraṇaṃ śrotum icchāmi yathātattvaṃ mahāmune // HV_App.I,41.808 //
GE07hv_apppu:17950: na hy asya kāraṇaṃ kiṃcid bāhyaṃ bhavati bhārata / HV_App.I,41.809 /
GE07hv_apppu:17951: antargataṃ kāraṇaṃ tu śārīraṃ mānasaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.810 /
GE07hv_apppu:17952: yena vedyaṃ vidur martyā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.811 //
GE07hv_apppu:17953: avedyam api vedyaṃ ca śakyaṃ vettuṃ na karmaṇā / HV_App.I,41.812 /
GE07hv_apppu:17956: sadā caiva śucir bhūtvā niyato brahmakarmaṇā / HV_App.I,41.815 /
GE07hv_apppu:17957: upatiṣṭheta sa guruṃ baddhāñjalipuṭo dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,41.816 //
GE07hv_apppu:17958: sāyaṃ prātaś ca tattvajño mokṣakarmāṇi kārayet / HV_App.I,41.817 /
GE07hv_apppu:17960: saṃprapadyeta manasā vaiṣṇavaṃ padam uttamam / HV_App.I,41.819 /
GE07hv_apppu:17961: dhyāyann eva prasīdeta samāhitamatir dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,41.820 //
GE07hv_apppu:17962: sa gacchet paramaṃ brahma nirvikāreṇa cetasā / HV_App.I,41.821 /
GE07hv_apppu:17964: tad evākṣaram ity āhur yat tad brahma sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.823 /
GE07hv_apppu:17965: na hi tat karmayogena vidyāyogena darśitam // HV_App.I,41.824 //
GE07hv_apppu:17969: anādānena manasā rājan karmaṇi karmaṇi // HV_App.I,41.828 //
GE07hv_apppu:17970: ādānād badhyate jantur nirādānāt pramucyate / HV_App.I,41.829 /
GE07hv_apppu:17971: brahmaṇebhyaḥ kriyāprāptir jantoḥ pūrvāj janādhipa // HV_App.I,41.830 //
GE07hv_apppu:17972: muktaś cendriyabandhena prātaś ca paramaṃ padam / HV_App.I,41.831 /
GE07hv_apppu:17973: na bhūyaḥ punar āyāti mānuṣaṃ dehavigraham // HV_App.I,41.832 //
GE07hv_apppu:17976: upasargaṃ ca yogaṃ ca dhyātavyaṃ caiva yat padam / HV_App.I,41.833 /
GE07hv_apppu:17977: siddhiṃ siddhiguṇāṃś caiva śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.834 //
GE07hv_apppu:17979: śṛṇu vistarataḥ sarvaṃ yathā pṛcchasi medhayā / HV_App.I,41.835 /
GE07hv_apppu:17981: pañcendriyaguṇāṃs tyaktvā paśyato brahmaṇo nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.837 /
GE07hv_apppu:17984: bahurūpam anaiśvaryāt pravakṣyāmi nibodha tat // HV_App.I,41.840 //
GE07hv_apppu:17987: tejasā mūrdhni cādhāya dhūmo dodhūyate mahān / HV_App.I,41.843 /
GE07hv_apppu:17988: nīlalohitavarṇābhaḥ pītaiḥ śvetaiś ca dhātubhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.844 //
GE07hv_apppu:17994: saṃpatadbhiś ca yugapan meghair iva samāgame // HV_App.I,41.850 //
GE07hv_apppu:17997: nirvemuś caiva toyaughān viviśur vasudhātalam // HV_App.I,41.853 //
GE07hv_apppu:17998: mūrdhni caiva mahān agnir mānaso dhūyate prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.854 /
GE07hv_apppu:18000: tasyāgner visphuliṅgānāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca / HV_App.I,41.856 /
GE07hv_apppu:18002: yāvantyo varṣadhārāś ca tāvantyo 'rcyo 'nalasya tu / HV_App.I,41.858 /
GE07hv_apppu:18004: varṇābhyāṃ yujyamānaś ca vāyur dodhūyate mahān / HV_App.I,41.860 /
GE07hv_apppu:18007: tair eva cāgnisaṃghātair dhātubhiḥ saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.863 //
GE07hv_apppu:18008: sahasraśo 'tha śataśo mūrtiṃ kṛtvā pṛthagvidhām / HV_App.I,41.864 /
GE07hv_apppu:18009: agnir vāyujalaṃ bhūmir dhātavo brahmacoditāḥ // HV_App.I,41.865 //
GE07hv_apppu:18011: saṃghātaṃ brahmavegena dhātavo gamitā nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.867 //
GE07hv_apppu:18012: yadbrahma cakṣuṣor madhye sa sūkṣmaḥ puruṣo virāṭ / HV_App.I,41.868 /
GE07hv_apppu:18013: tayor anyān bahūn sukṣmān sasṛje puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.869 //
GE07hv_apppu:18014: sa eṣa bhagavān viṣṇur vyaktāvyaktaḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.870 /
GE07hv_apppu:18016: taṃ mūrdhni dhātubhir baddhaṃ viśanti brahmacoditāḥ / HV_App.I,41.872 /
GE07hv_apppu:18017: te 'ntarā puruṣāḥ sarve jñātāraḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ // HV_App.I,41.873 //
GE07hv_apppu:18018: atha ceṣṭitum ārabdhā mūrtayo brahmasaṃmitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.874 /
GE07hv_apppu:18019: bhittvā ca dharaṇīṃ devīṃ prapadyante diśo daśa // HV_App.I,41.875 //
GE07hv_apppu:18020: ity ete pārthivāḥ sarve ṛṣayo brahmanirmitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.876 /
GE07hv_apppu:18021: tatraiva pralayaṃ yātā bhūmitvam upayānti ca // HV_App.I,41.877 //
GE07hv_apppu:18023: karmakṣayād vimuktatvād indriyāṇāṃ ca bandhanāt / HV_App.I,41.879 /
GE07hv_apppu:18024: tām eva prakṛtiṃ yānti ajñātāṃ karmagocaraiḥ // HV_App.I,41.880 //
GE07hv_apppu:18025: kṣarād dhūmakṣayaṃ caiva agnigarbhās tapomayāḥ / HV_App.I,41.881 /
GE07hv_apppu:18026: yena tantur iva cchanno bhāvābhāvaḥ pravartate // HV_App.I,41.882 //
GE07hv_apppu:18027: dhūmād abhrās tu saṃbhūtā abhrāt toyaṃ sunirmalam / HV_App.I,41.883 /
GE07hv_apppu:18028: jagatī jalāt tu saṃbhūtā jagaty eva ca yat phalam // HV_App.I,41.884 //
GE07hv_apppu:18029: phalād rasaś ca saṃjajñe rasāt prāṇaś ca dehinām / HV_App.I,41.885 /
GE07hv_apppu:18030: rasas tu tanmayo jajñe yat tad brahma sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.886 //
GE07hv_apppu:18031: pradhānaṃ brahma uddiṣṭaṃ bahubhiḥ kāraṇāntaraiḥ / HV_App.I,41.887 /
GE07hv_apppu:18033: avyaktād vyaktim āpannaṃ svena bhāvena bhārata / HV_App.I,41.889 /
GE07hv_apppu:18034: antaḥsthaṃ sarvabhūteṣu carantaṃ vidyayā saha // HV_App.I,41.890 //
GE07hv_apppu:18035: karma karteti rājendra viṣayastham anekadhā / HV_App.I,41.891 /
GE07hv_apppu:18038: niḥsṛtas tu bhruvor madhyān meghamukta ivāṃśumān // HV_App.I,41.894 //
GE07hv_apppu:18039: caradbhiḥ pakṣival loke nirdvaṃdvair niṣparigrahaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.895 /
GE07hv_apppu:18040: yogadharmeṇa kauravya dhruvam āsādyate phalam // HV_App.I,41.896 //
GE07hv_apppu:18041: prādurbhāvaṃ kṣayaṃ caiva bhūtasya nidhanaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,41.897 /
GE07hv_apppu:18042: vidhatte śataśo brahmā saṃkṣaye ca bhavet tathā // HV_App.I,41.898 //
GE07hv_apppu:18043: karmaṇaḥ karmayogajño bhūtebhyo nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.899 /
GE07hv_apppu:18044: avināśāya lokasya dharmasyāpy āyanena ca // HV_App.I,41.900 //
GE07hv_apppu:18046: etad brahmayugaṃ nāma yugānāṃ prathamaṃ yugam // HV_App.I,41.902 //
GE07hv_apppu:18048: sūkṣmaṃ bhavati lokānāṃ nirvikāram acetanam // HV_App.I,41.904 //
GE07hv_apppu:18049: tathā pralayam āpannaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.905 /
GE07hv_apppu:18050: brahma sampadyate sūkṣmaṃ nirmitaṃ kāraṇair guṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.906 //
GE07hv_apppu:18053: prāgvaṃśaṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa mahāmune / HV_App.I,41.907 /
GE07hv_apppu:18054: ādyayor yugayor brahman brahmaprāptasya sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.908 //
GE07hv_apppu:18056: śṛṇu vistaraśaḥ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi medhayā / HV_App.I,41.909 /
GE07hv_apppu:18058: ṛddhiṃ prāptas tu bhagavān yogātmā brahmasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.911 /
GE07hv_apppu:18059: bhūtānāṃ bahulatvaṃ ca cakāreheśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.912 //
GE07hv_apppu:18060: sthito brahmāsane brahmā vikṣiptaḥ sahasā prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.913 /
GE07hv_apppu:18062: raktaś ca mokṣaviṣaye sarvajñānamaye pade / HV_App.I,41.915 /
GE07hv_apppu:18063: yasmāt padasahasrāṇi bhavanti na bhavanti ca // HV_App.I,41.916 //
GE07hv_apppu:18064: brahmayajñaṃ tu yajate yogād vedātmakaṃ sadā / HV_App.I,41.917 /
GE07hv_apppu:18065: brahmaṇo vipulaṃ jñānam aiśvaryaṃ ca prajāyate // HV_App.I,41.918 //
GE07hv_apppu:18066: tataḥ prathamam aiśvaryaṃ yuñjānena pravartitam / HV_App.I,41.919 /
GE07hv_apppu:18067: brahmaṇā brahmabhūtena bhūtānāṃ hitam icchatā // HV_App.I,41.920 //
GE07hv_apppu:18068: yadā tv ākāśam aiśvaryaṃ yuñjānasya pravartate / HV_App.I,41.921 /
GE07hv_apppu:18070: tadāntarikṣaṃ saṃprāptaṃ nirmalaṃ brahma cāvyayam / HV_App.I,41.923 /
GE07hv_apppu:18074: pravartamānam aiśvaryaṃ vāyubhūtaṃ karoti ca / HV_App.I,41.927 /
GE07hv_apppu:18075: vikārair bahubhiḥ prāptaiḥ saṃpatadbhir mahābalaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.928 //
GE07hv_apppu:18076: etair vikāraiḥ saṃvṛttair niruddhaiś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,41.929 /
GE07hv_apppu:18077: dhruvam aiśvaryam āpannaḥ siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.930 //
GE07hv_apppu:18079: nirālambo nirālambān ālambya manasā tataḥ // HV_App.I,41.932 //
GE07hv_apppu:18080: aiśvaryabhūto bhūtātmā caran divi na dṛśyate / HV_App.I,41.933 /
GE07hv_apppu:18081: cakṣurbhir bahubhir loke puraṃdarasamair api // HV_App.I,41.934 //
GE07hv_apppu:18082: oṃkāraṃ ye tv adhīyante manasā brahmasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,41.935 /
GE07hv_apppu:18083: vibhaktāḥ sarvakāmebhyas te taṃ paśyanti sādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.936 //
GE07hv_apppu:18084: etad dhi paramaṃ brahma brāhmaṇānāṃ manīṣiṇām / HV_App.I,41.937 /
GE07hv_apppu:18085: antaścarati bhūtānāṃ viddhi cetanayā saha // HV_App.I,41.938 //
GE07hv_apppu:18086: eṣa śabdo mahānādaḥ purāṇo brahmasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.939 /
GE07hv_apppu:18087: vāyūbhūto 'kṣaraṃ prāpto vadanty evaṃ dvijātayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.940 //
GE07hv_apppu:18088: arūpī rūpasaṃpanno dhātubhiḥ saha saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,41.941 /
GE07hv_apppu:18090: tataḥ pūrvam anudhyāya manasā pūrayann iva / HV_App.I,41.943 /
GE07hv_apppu:18091: vedātmakaṃ tadā yajñaṃ cintayanto manīṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.944 //
GE07hv_apppu:18092: brāhmaṇāḥ śucayo dāntā yaśo 'yuñjaṃs tadanvayāḥ / HV_App.I,41.945 /
GE07hv_apppu:18093: brahmalokaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇā vaiṣṇavaṃ padam uttamam // HV_App.I,41.946 //
GE07hv_apppu:18094: yasya hetoḥ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kurvanti vigatajvarāḥ / HV_App.I,41.947 /
GE07hv_apppu:18095: na hy ete prasavādāne bhavam icchanti bhārata // HV_App.I,41.948 //
GE07hv_apppu:18096: mālyopahāraiś ca tribhiḥ pratibhānaiś ca vai dvijāḥ / HV_App.I,41.949 /
GE07hv_apppu:18098: yajanaṃ vikramaṃ caiva brahmapūrvāḥ pracakrire / HV_App.I,41.951 /
GE07hv_apppu:18099: brahmā ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo vedoktair vacanair nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.952 //
GE07hv_apppu:18100: brāhmaṇair vedavidbhiś ca brahmajñair brahmavādibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.953 /
GE07hv_apppu:18102: dhātubhir mokṣakāle ca mahātmā saṃpradṛṣyate / HV_App.I,41.955 /
GE07hv_apppu:18103: tad eva paramaṃ brahma vaiṣṇavaṃ paramādbhutam // HV_App.I,41.956 //
GE07hv_apppu:18104: rasātmakaṃ tad aiśvaryaṃ vikārānte pradṛśyate / HV_App.I,41.957 /
GE07hv_apppu:18105: ghorarūpā vikārās te vyathayanti mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.958 //
GE07hv_apppu:18107: ūrmibhiś chādyate caiva śītoṣṇābhir vikārataḥ // HV_App.I,41.960 //
GE07hv_apppu:18108: mahārṇavagataś caiva dahyate na ca sajjate / HV_App.I,41.961 /
GE07hv_apppu:18109: bhagnāś caiva mahānadyaḥ salile caiva sīdati // HV_App.I,41.962 //
GE07hv_apppu:18110: sīdamānaś ca salile sa śīte pātyate balāt / HV_App.I,41.963 /
GE07hv_apppu:18111: aśanāc chādanāc cāpi yujyamāno vicetanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.964 //
GE07hv_apppu:18112: śvabhre prapadyamānaś ca toyena pariṣicyate / HV_App.I,41.965 /
GE07hv_apppu:18113: śuklavarṇena bahunā srotasā mūrdhni sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.966 //
GE07hv_apppu:18114: ūrdhvaṃ jyotir avekṣyaś ca śubhraiḥ pītaiś ca chādyate / HV_App.I,41.967 /
GE07hv_apppu:18115: vāripūrṇaiḥ sugambhīrair vidyudbhir iva bhāsitaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.968 //
GE07hv_apppu:18116: etair vikāraiḥ saṃvṛttair niruddhaiś caiva sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.969 /
GE07hv_apppu:18117: dhruvaiśvaryam athāsādya siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.970 //
GE07hv_apppu:18118: rasātmakaṃ tad aiśvaryaṃ jihvāgrād abhiniḥsṛtam / HV_App.I,41.971 /
GE07hv_apppu:18120: rasāṃś ca vividhān yogān sa siddhaḥ sṛjate prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.973 /
GE07hv_apppu:18122: tejaso rūpam aiśvaryaṃ vikāraiḥ saha vardhate / HV_App.I,41.975 /
GE07hv_apppu:18124: ugrarūpair vikāraiś ca hanyate daṇḍapāṇibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.977 /
GE07hv_apppu:18126: netraṃ samuddharan bhīmaṃ jihvāgraṃ cāsya vindati / HV_App.I,41.979 /
GE07hv_apppu:18127: nadanti yugapan nādāñ jṛmbhamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.980 //
GE07hv_apppu:18128: punar eva tadā bhūtvā bahurūpās tadābhavan / HV_App.I,41.981 /
GE07hv_apppu:18130: strībhūtāś ca samaṃ sarve yuñjānāś cāvalambire / HV_App.I,41.983 /
GE07hv_apppu:18131: kaṇṭheṣu bahurūpatvād vighnaiś caiva pralobhayan // HV_App.I,41.984 //
GE07hv_apppu:18132: madhurair abhidhānaiś ca vyāharanti nabhītavat / HV_App.I,41.985 /
GE07hv_apppu:18133: patanti yugapat sarve pādayor mūrdhabhir natāḥ // HV_App.I,41.986 //
GE07hv_apppu:18135: bahuprakāraṃ kathayan nṛtyanti ca ramanti ca // HV_App.I,41.988 //
GE07hv_apppu:18136: etair vikāraiḥ saṃvṛttair niruddhaiś caiva sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.989 /
GE07hv_apppu:18137: dhruvam aiśvaryam āsādya siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.990 //
GE07hv_apppu:18140: jyotīṃṣi caiva saṃvṛttā ākāśe guṇasaṃvṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,41.993 /
GE07hv_apppu:18141: caranti satataṃ loke sūryācandramasor gatim // HV_App.I,41.994 //
GE07hv_apppu:18142: candrasūryātmakaṃ divyaṃ jyotiṣmad dhanam uttamam / HV_App.I,41.995 /
GE07hv_apppu:18143: etad vibhrājate loke kālacakraṃ dhruvaṃ caran // HV_App.I,41.996 //
GE07hv_apppu:18144: ardhamāsāś ca māsāś ca ṛtusaṃvatsarāṇy atha / HV_App.I,41.997 /
GE07hv_apppu:18145: kṣaṇā lavā muhūrtāś ca kalāḥ kāṣṭhās tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,41.998 //
GE07hv_apppu:18147: tārāṇāṃ gatayaś caiva grahāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1000 //
GE07hv_apppu:18149: yogayuktās tv abhigrastāḥ prātyante hy acalāsanāt // HV_App.I,41.1002 //
GE07hv_apppu:18151: sīdate vasudhāmadhye bhidyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1004 //
GE07hv_apppu:18152: bhūtānāṃ bahurūpaiś ca anyaiś ca talavāsibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1005 /
GE07hv_apppu:18153: viṣayair yujyate kṣipraṃ saṃkṣepāt saṃprarudhyate // HV_App.I,41.1006 //
GE07hv_apppu:18155: tataḥ pārthivam aiśvaryaṃ sevamānaś ca sarvataḥ / **HV_App.I,41.1006**47:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:18156: mūrtimadbhiś ca bahudhā dhātubhiḥ sa ca hanyate / HV_App.I,41.1007 /
GE07hv_apppu:18158: asibhiḥ pātyate caiva kṣuradhāraiḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1009 /
GE07hv_apppu:18159: bhidyate caiva bāṇāgraiḥ sutīkṣṇair marmabhedibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1010 //
GE07hv_apppu:18160: ebhir vikāraiḥ sakalair niruddhaiś cāpi sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1011 /
GE07hv_apppu:18161: dhruvam aiśvaryam āpannaḥ siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1012 //
GE07hv_apppu:18162: tataḥ pārthivam aiśvaryaṃ nirmuktasya vikārataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1013 /
GE07hv_apppu:18163: prādurbhavati yuñjāne samādhau pralayaṃ gate // HV_App.I,41.1014 //
GE07hv_apppu:18164: divyaṃ tad gandham āghrāti divyārthāṃs tāñ śṛṇoti ca / HV_App.I,41.1015 /
GE07hv_apppu:18165: divyarūpaiś ca puruṣair bhidyate na ca chidyate / HV_App.I,41.1016 /
GE07hv_apppu:18166: gacchan prakṛtito 'nantaḥ pradhānātmā kṣarann iva // HV_App.I,41.1017 //
GE07hv_apppu:18169: tato 'nyāṃ dhāraṇāṃ gatvā manasā sa pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1018 /
GE07hv_apppu:18171: sarvāṅgadhāraṇāṃ kṛtvā manasā prahasann iva / HV_App.I,41.1020 /
GE07hv_apppu:18172: brahmayogena yogajñaḥ sṛjate manasā prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1021 //
GE07hv_apppu:18173: manasā rūpasaṃpannā hy apsarāḥ sṛjate prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1022 /
GE07hv_apppu:18177: brahmayogena yogajñaḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1026 //
GE07hv_apppu:18180: dharmyāṃ śucigiraṃ sevyāṃ brāhmīṃ mūrtimatīṃ śriyam // HV_App.I,41.1029 //
GE07hv_apppu:18181: sasṛje manasā brahmā samyakproktena cetasā / HV_App.I,41.1030 /
GE07hv_apppu:18183: cakṣuṣā rupasaṃpannāḥ sṛjan so 'psarasaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1032 /
GE07hv_apppu:18184: nāsikāgrāc ca gandharvān suvācaḥ supravāditān // HV_App.I,41.1033 //
GE07hv_apppu:18186: anyeṣāṃ caiva viprāṇāṃ gānaṃ brahmaprabhāvitam // HV_App.I,41.1035 //
GE07hv_apppu:18187: padbhyāṃ sṛjati bhūtāni gatimanti dhruvāṇi ca / HV_App.I,41.1036 /
GE07hv_apppu:18189: gajān siṃhāṃś ca vyāghrāṃś ca mṛgāṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1038 /
GE07hv_apppu:18190: tṛṇajātīś ca bahudhā bhāvahetoś catuṣpadān // HV_App.I,41.1039 //
GE07hv_apppu:18191: ye tu hastān nikhādanti karmaprāptena hetunā / HV_App.I,41.1040 /
GE07hv_apppu:18192: hastebhyaḥ karma sa sṛjan mantavyaṃ manasā tathā // HV_App.I,41.1041 //
GE07hv_apppu:18193: pāyunā sa visargaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ sukham icchatām / HV_App.I,41.1042 /
GE07hv_apppu:18195: hṛdayād asṛjad gāvo bāhunā pakṣiṇas tathā / HV_App.I,41.1044 /
GE07hv_apppu:18196: anyāni caiva sattvāni tais tair veṣaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1045 //
GE07hv_apppu:18197: ṛṣiṃ tv aṅgirasaṃ caiva muniṃ jvalitatejasam / HV_App.I,41.1046 /
GE07hv_apppu:18199: bhruvo 'ntare janayate yogād yogīśvaraḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1048 /
GE07hv_apppu:18202: sanatkumāraṃ mūrdhnaś ca mahāyogī pitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1051 //
GE07hv_apppu:18203: abhiṣiktaṃ ca somaṃ ca yauvarājye pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1052 /
GE07hv_apppu:18204: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca rājānaṃ śāśvataṃ rajanīcaram // HV_App.I,41.1053 //
GE07hv_apppu:18205: tapasā mahatā yukto grahaiḥ saha puraḥsaraḥ / HV_App.I,41.1054 /
GE07hv_apppu:18206: cacāra nabhaso madhye prabhābhir bhāsayañ jagat // HV_App.I,41.1055 //
GE07hv_apppu:18207: sa gātrair manasā yogān bhagavān siddhim āgataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1056 /
GE07hv_apppu:18208: sṛṣṭavān sarvabhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca // HV_App.I,41.1057 //
GE07hv_apppu:18209: tatra sthānāni bhūtānāṃ yogaṃś caiva pṛthagvidhān / HV_App.I,41.1058 /
GE07hv_apppu:18211: eṣa brahmamayo yajño yogaḥ sāṃkhyaś ca tattvataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1060 /
GE07hv_apppu:18212: vijñānaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ ca kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1061 //
GE07hv_apppu:18213: ekatvaṃ ca pṛthaktvaṃ ca saṃbhavo nidhanaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,41.1062 /
GE07hv_apppu:18214: kālaḥ kālakṣayaś caiva jñeyo vijñānam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1063 //
GE07hv_apppu:18217: śrutaṃ brahmayugaṃ brahman yugānāṃ prathamaṃ yugam / HV_App.I,41.1064 /
GE07hv_apppu:18218: kṣatrasyāpi yugam brahmañ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho // HV_App.I,41.1065 //
GE07hv_apppu:18219: sasaṃkṣepaṃ savistaraṃ niyamair bahubhiś citam / HV_App.I,41.1066 /
GE07hv_apppu:18220: upāyajñaiś ca kathitaṃ kratubhiś caiva śobhitam // HV_App.I,41.1067 //
GE07hv_apppu:18222: etat te kathayiṣyāmi yajñakarmabhir arcitam / HV_App.I,41.1068 /
GE07hv_apppu:18223: dānadharmaiś ca vividhaiḥ prajābhir upaśobhitam // HV_App.I,41.1069 //
GE07hv_apppu:18226: pravṛtte cāpravṛtte ca nityaṃ brahmaparāyaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1072 /
GE07hv_apppu:18227: parāyaṇasya saṃgamya brahmaṇas tu mahīpate // HV_App.I,41.1073 //
GE07hv_apppu:18228: śrīvṛtāḥ pāvanāś caiva brāhmaṇāś ca mahīpate / HV_App.I,41.1074 /
GE07hv_apppu:18230: pūrṇe yugasahasrānte pūrvaṃ ye pralayaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1076 /
GE07hv_apppu:18233: dakṣaḥ prajāpatir bhūtvā sṛjate vimalāḥ prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1079 //
GE07hv_apppu:18234: akṣarād brāhmaṇāḥ saumyāḥ kṣarāt kṣatriyabāndhavāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1080 /
GE07hv_apppu:18235: vaiśyā vikārataś caiva śūdrā dhūmavikārataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1081 //
GE07hv_apppu:18236: śvetalohitakair varṇaiḥ pītair nīlaiś ca brāhmaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1082 /
GE07hv_apppu:18238: tato varṇatvam āpannāḥ prajā loke caturvidhāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1084 /
GE07hv_apppu:18239: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś caiva mahīpate // HV_App.I,41.1085 //
GE07hv_apppu:18242: trayāṇāṃ varṇajātānāṃ vedaproktāḥ kriyāḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1088 /
GE07hv_apppu:18243: tena vā brahmayogena vaiṣṇavena mahīpate // HV_App.I,41.1089 //
GE07hv_apppu:18244: prajñayā tejasā yogāt tena prācetasaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1090 /
GE07hv_apppu:18245: viṣṇur eva mahāyogī karmaṇām antaraṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1091 //
GE07hv_apppu:18247: tasmān nārhanti saṃskāraṃ na hy atra brahma vidyate // HV_App.I,41.1093 //
GE07hv_apppu:18248: yathāgnau dhūmasaṃghāto hy araṇyā mathyamānayā / HV_App.I,41.1094 /
GE07hv_apppu:18249: prādurbhūto visarpan vai nopayujyati karmaṇi // HV_App.I,41.1095 //
GE07hv_apppu:18250: evaṃ śūdrā visarpante bhuvi kārtsnyena janmanā / HV_App.I,41.1096 /
GE07hv_apppu:18252: tato 'nye dakṣaputrās tu saṃbhūtā dharmayonayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1098 /
GE07hv_apppu:18255: antam icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ dhātryāḥ putro 'balo hy aham / HV_App.I,41.1101 /
GE07hv_apppu:18256: tato vidhāsye tattvajñaḥ prajānāṃ vipulaṃ balam / HV_App.I,41.1102 /
GE07hv_apppu:18257: vipulatvād dhi kṣetrāṇāṃ mamāpi vipulāḥ prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1103 //
GE07hv_apppu:18258: na teṣāṃ darśayed devī cakṣuṣā rūpam ātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1104 /
GE07hv_apppu:18259: prajāpatisutānāṃ vai vipulaṃ sāram icchatām // HV_App.I,41.1105 //
GE07hv_apppu:18260: ātmano bhāvanirvṛtte bhāvye kṛtayuge tadā / HV_App.I,41.1106 /
GE07hv_apppu:18261: janitrī sarvabhūtānām aṇḍajān udbhidāṃs tathā // HV_App.I,41.1107 //
GE07hv_apppu:18262: saṃvedajananī dhātrī ceti mātrā pracoditā / HV_App.I,41.1108 /
GE07hv_apppu:18263: aṇutāṃ tanutāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ karmabhāginām // HV_App.I,41.1109 //
GE07hv_apppu:18266: sādhv ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tretāyāṃ brāhmaṇottama / HV_App.I,41.1110 /
GE07hv_apppu:18267: yaṃ jñātvā sarvavidyānāṃ paraṃ paśyeyam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.1111 //
GE07hv_apppu:18269: dakṣas tu punar ālambya strībhāvaṃ puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1112 /
GE07hv_apppu:18275: dakṣaḥ prācetasas tasyāṃ kanyāyāṃ janayat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1116 /
GE07hv_apppu:18276: dehād dhi yogavidhinā kanyāḥ padmanibhānanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1117 //
GE07hv_apppu:18277: dakṣaḥ puruṣarūpeṇa strīrūpam apahāya ca / HV_App.I,41.1118 /
GE07hv_apppu:18279: tāḥ kanyāḥ pradadau dakṣaḥ svayaṃ prācetasaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1120 /
GE07hv_apppu:18281: pradadau daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa / HV_App.I,41.1122 /
GE07hv_apppu:18283: dakṣo dattvātha tāḥ kanyā brahmakṣatraṃ prapadyata / HV_App.I,41.1124 /
GE07hv_apppu:18285: tapyamāno mṛgaiḥ sārdhaṃ cacāra vasudhāṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.1126 /
GE07hv_apppu:18286: tṛṇamūlaphalair vṛddho vṛddhaś ca tapasāsakṛt // HV_App.I,41.1127 //
GE07hv_apppu:18287: mṛgās tu tasya modanti phalaṃ modanti brāhmaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1128 /
GE07hv_apppu:18290: karmayajñakṛtāṃ tāta siddhiṃ paśyati lakṣaṇām // HV_App.I,41.1131 //
GE07hv_apppu:18292: mṛgaiḥ saha jarāṃ yānti sapatnīkāḥ saputriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1133 //
GE07hv_apppu:18293: brāhmaṇāḥ stotrasaṃsiddhā janitre prathame pade / HV_App.I,41.1134 /
GE07hv_apppu:18297: yā prajā pūrvam ārūḍhā mānasī brahmacāriṇī / HV_App.I,41.1138 /
GE07hv_apppu:18299: [k: K3.4 Ñ2 B2.3 Dn Ds2 D1.2.4.6 G3 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:18302: sthāvarā jaṅgamāś caiva sthūlāḥ sūkṣmāś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1141 /
GE07hv_apppu:18303: kālayogena yogajñā bhavanti na bhavanti ca // HV_App.I,41.1142 //
GE07hv_apppu:18304: etāś caitāḥ prajāḥ sarvā dakṣakanyāsu jajñire / HV_App.I,41.1143 /
GE07hv_apppu:18306: ādityā vasavo rudrā viśve ca samarudgaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1145 /
GE07hv_apppu:18307: nāgāś cānekaśirasaḥ sādhyā vai pannagās tathā // HV_App.I,41.1146 //
GE07hv_apppu:18308: gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāḥ yakṣāḥ suparṇāś ca tathāpare / HV_App.I,41.1147 /
GE07hv_apppu:18309: garutmān saha yakṣaiś ca kiṃnarāś ca suvāsasaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1148 //
GE07hv_apppu:18310: gāvaḥ paśugaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ narāś ca vasudhādhipa / HV_App.I,41.1149 /
GE07hv_apppu:18311: dharādharāś ca vasudhā dhātāraś ca dharādharāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1150 /
GE07hv_apppu:18312: gajāḥ siṃhāś ca vyāghrāś ca hayāḥ pakṣadharās tathā // HV_App.I,41.1151 //
GE07hv_apppu:18313: khaḍgā viṣāṇinaś caiva vṛṣabhāś ca mṛgās tathā // HV_App.I,41.1152 //
GE07hv_apppu:18314: caturviṣāṇā nāgendrāḥ padmābhā varṇataḥ śubhāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1153 /
GE07hv_apppu:18316: tathārūpais tathāgātrais taiḥ śīlais taiḥ parākramaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1155 /
GE07hv_apppu:18317: munayaḥ punar udbhūtā dharmakṣetre sanātane // HV_App.I,41.1156 //
GE07hv_apppu:18318: kṣetrajñā mānuṣe loke dharmiṇo vedagocarāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1157 /
GE07hv_apppu:18319: yatrodbhūtāḥ surāḥ sarve divi loke pratiṣṭhitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1158 //
GE07hv_apppu:18320: ye cānye tapasā siddhā gṛhasthā manujādhipa / HV_App.I,41.1159 /
GE07hv_apppu:18321: brahmacaryeṇa saṃsiddhāḥ paricaryāṃ gatā guroḥ // HV_App.I,41.1160 //
GE07hv_apppu:18322: ye ca yogagatiṃ prāptāḥ siddhihetor mahīpate / HV_App.I,41.1161 /
GE07hv_apppu:18323: kleśādhikaiḥ karmajanyair vṛttiṃ lapsyanti vai dvijāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1162 //
GE07hv_apppu:18325: sarve tv ete divicarā bhavanti caritavratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1164 //
GE07hv_apppu:18333: mantrayajñaparā nityaṃ nityaṃ vratahite ratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1170 //
GE07hv_apppu:18334: ekam evāgnim ādhāya sarve brāhmaṇapuṃgavāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1171 /
GE07hv_apppu:18336: tridhā praṇīto jvalano munibhir vedapāragaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1173 /
GE07hv_apppu:18337: atas te tritvam āpannā yad ekas trividhaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1174 //
GE07hv_apppu:18338: eka eva mahān agnir haviṣā saṃpravartate / HV_App.I,41.1175 /
GE07hv_apppu:18340: svayaṃ ca dakṣaḥ saṃprāpto bhāgavān bhūtasatkṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1177 /
GE07hv_apppu:18342: daṇḍī carmī śarī khaḍgī śikhī padmanibhānanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1179 /
GE07hv_apppu:18344: yajate puṣkare brahmā medhayā saha saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1181 /
GE07hv_apppu:18346: ghṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ yavā vrīhiḥ sarvaṃ paramakaṃ haviḥ / HV_App.I,41.1183 /
GE07hv_apppu:18347: vedaproktaṃ makhe nyastaṃ kalpitaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pade // HV_App.I,41.1184 //
GE07hv_apppu:18349: sa brahmā prathamaṃ tasminn agnim anyaṃ pravartayat // HV_App.I,41.1186 //
GE07hv_apppu:18350: na hy anyad vihitaṃ dravyaṃ yathāgnir yajñakarmaṇi / HV_App.I,41.1187 /
GE07hv_apppu:18351: pravartayed vibhāgair vā hutahavyamayaṃ balam // HV_App.I,41.1188 //
GE07hv_apppu:18352: phalāni taiḥ prayuktāni havīṃṣi vitate 'dhvare / HV_App.I,41.1189 /
GE07hv_apppu:18354: ṣaṇmāsāṃś caturo vedān saṃbabhāṣe bṛhaspatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1191 /
GE07hv_apppu:18355: brahmajño brahmaṇo yajñe parayā varṇasaṃpadā // HV_App.I,41.1192 //
GE07hv_apppu:18359: vibhāti sa makho vyaktaṃ brahmaloka ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1196 //
GE07hv_apppu:18361: prayogaiḥ saṃprayuktasya jalpann iva sa vardhate // HV_App.I,41.1198 //
GE07hv_apppu:18362: samidbhiḥ somakalaśaiḥ pātraiś caiva savistaraiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1199 /
GE07hv_apppu:18363: yavair vrīhibhir ājyaiś ca pūrṇaiś ca jalabhājanaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1200 //
GE07hv_apppu:18364: kramaprāptaiś ca vasubhiḥ karmabhiś cāparājitaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1201 /
GE07hv_apppu:18365: gobhiḥ payasvinībhiś ca parivatsaiś ca komalaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1202 //
GE07hv_apppu:18366: brahmavṛddho vayovṛddhas tapovṛddhaś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1203 /
GE07hv_apppu:18369: brahmajñānamayo devo vidyayā saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1204 //
GE07hv_apppu:18370: mānasaiś ca kriyāmūrtir ye ca bhūtāḥ svayaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.1205 /
GE07hv_apppu:18371: brahmā juhoti tāṃs tasmān marudbhiḥ sahitas tadā // HV_App.I,41.1206 //
GE07hv_apppu:18372: tejomūrtidharai rūpair na ca tatkarmaṇāspṛśat / HV_App.I,41.1207 /
GE07hv_apppu:18375: yajate kratunā pūrvam agniṣṭomena sa prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1210 /
GE07hv_apppu:18376: sadasyais tatsado vyaktaṃ śuśubhe yajñakarmaṇi / HV_App.I,41.1211 /
GE07hv_apppu:18377: jalpanti madhurā vācaḥ sānusvārāḥ kriyās tataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1212 //
GE07hv_apppu:18381: vasudhām iva saṃprāptaiḥ sarvair eva divaukasaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1216 /
GE07hv_apppu:18384: jvaladbhir iva viprais tais tribhir evādhvare 'gnibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1219 /
GE07hv_apppu:18385: brahmaloka ivābhāti brahmaṇaḥ sa mahākratuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1220 //
GE07hv_apppu:18389: āyayur manayaḥ sarve manobhiḥ śrotravādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1224 //
GE07hv_apppu:18390: hotā cātrābhavad rājan brahmatve ca bṛhaspatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1225 /
GE07hv_apppu:18392: yajamānaś ca yajñānte viṣṇoḥ pūjāṃ prayujya ca / HV_App.I,41.1227 /
GE07hv_apppu:18393: adityāḥ paścime garbhe tapasā saṃbhṛte nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.1228 //
GE07hv_apppu:18394: padaṃ viṣṇur ajo brahmā nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1229 /
GE07hv_apppu:18395: yataḥ padasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanty udbhavanti ca // HV_App.I,41.1230 //
GE07hv_apppu:18396: avandhyaṃ cāprameyaṃ ca vyatiriktaṃ ca karmabhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1231 /
GE07hv_apppu:18397: ātmāpi yasya munayo bhavanti niṣparigrahāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1232 //
GE07hv_apppu:18398: parigrahāś ca viṣayā doṣaprāptā mahīpate / HV_App.I,41.1233 /
GE07hv_apppu:18399: doṣāṃś ca yugapat sarve chādayanti manobalāt // HV_App.I,41.1234 //
GE07hv_apppu:18401: parigrahaṃ śubhaṃ dharmam avidyālakṣaṇaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.1236 //
GE07hv_apppu:18402: vadyālakṣaṇasaṃyogān na manaś chādyate nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.1237 /
GE07hv_apppu:18403: yadi cen muniśabdena gṛhyate brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1238 //
GE07hv_apppu:18405: divi lokaḥ satāṃ sthānaṃ lokānāṃ loka ucyate // HV_App.I,41.1240 //
GE07hv_apppu:18406: yatra devā havyapuṣṭā na kṣayaṃ yānti bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1241 /
GE07hv_apppu:18407: yajamānaś ca bhāgaiḥ svaiḥ karmaprāptodite pade / HV_App.I,41.1242 /
GE07hv_apppu:18408: modate saha patnībhir vijvaro vasudhādhipa // HV_App.I,41.1243 //
GE07hv_apppu:18409: yajñāvasāne śailendraṃ dvijebhyaḥ pradadau prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1244 /
GE07hv_apppu:18412: na śekuḥ pravibhāgārthaṃ bhettuṃ sarvodyamair api // HV_App.I,41.1247 //
GE07hv_apppu:18413: tatas te brāhmaṇagaṇā niṣedur vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1248 /
GE07hv_apppu:18415: supārśvo girimukhyas tu vāgbhir madhurabhāṣitā / HV_App.I,41.1250 /
GE07hv_apppu:18416: abravīt praṇataḥ sarvāñ śirasā tān dvijottamān // HV_App.I,41.1251 //
GE07hv_apppu:18417: na hi śakyo balād bhettuṃ yuṣmābhir asusaṅgibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1252 /
GE07hv_apppu:18419: ekībhūtā yadā sarve bhaviṣyatha samāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1254 /
GE07hv_apppu:18421: balaṃ hi rāgadveṣābhyāṃ vardhate brahmasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1256 /
GE07hv_apppu:18422: vimuktaṃ rāgadoṣābhyāṃ brahma vardhati śāśvatam // HV_App.I,41.1257 //
GE07hv_apppu:18424: dhātubhiś ca visarpadbhiḥ śikharaiś cānupātibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1259 //
GE07hv_apppu:18425: viśīrṇaiḥ pārśvavivarair nāgaiś cāgalitair bhuvi / HV_App.I,41.1260 /
GE07hv_apppu:18426: bahubhir vyālarūpaiś ca codyamāno guhāśayaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1261 //
GE07hv_apppu:18427: pratigṛhya tu tadvākyaṃ śailendrasya subhāṣitam / HV_App.I,41.1262 /
GE07hv_apppu:18428: tūṣṇīṃ babhūvus te sarve tadā brāhmaṇasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1263 //
GE07hv_apppu:18431: balir homāś ca vardhante ahany ahani bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1264 /
GE07hv_apppu:18433: devatādyāś ca pūjyante tadāprabhṛti bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1266 /
GE07hv_apppu:18434: teṣāṃ brahmavidāṃ rājan pṛthivyāṃ brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1267 //
GE07hv_apppu:18437: vāsaṃ yatra prakurvanti dṛṣṭvā bhagavataḥ kriyām / HV_App.I,41.1270 /
GE07hv_apppu:18440: yatayaś cāpi kāṅkṣanti dharmeṇa harikāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1273 //
GE07hv_apppu:18441: anye karmaphale caiva ratā brāhmaṇapuṃgavāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1274 /
GE07hv_apppu:18443: daivayuktena vā yuktāḥ karmaṇā brahmasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1276 /
GE07hv_apppu:18445: caranto brahmacaryaṃ ca yatnam āsthāya dāruṇam / HV_App.I,41.1278 /
GE07hv_apppu:18446: anena vidhinā rājan kramaprāptena sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1279 //
GE07hv_apppu:18447: kramādye vedasaṃskāraṃ puṇyaṃ prāptāḥ sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.1280 /
GE07hv_apppu:18448: pūrvair ācaritaṃ rājan munibhir brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1281 //
GE07hv_apppu:18449: nāvedavidvān āgacchen nāpi raudram vrataṃ caret / HV_App.I,41.1282 /
GE07hv_apppu:18450: na ca tyāgena gaccheta gṛhadharmaṃ ca na tyajet // HV_App.I,41.1283 //
GE07hv_apppu:18451: evaṃ na gacched utthānam aprāpto vedasaṃcayam / HV_App.I,41.1284 /
GE07hv_apppu:18452: ṛcaś ca saṃcayaḥ pūrvaḥ sāmagānāṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1285 //
GE07hv_apppu:18454: asaṃcayaś ca saṃcayaṃ ca sāmagānaṃ ca bhārata // **HV_App.I,41.1285**51:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:18455: ye cāpi putriṇo na syuḥ śrutvāpi prāpnuyuḥ phalam / HV_App.I,41.1286 /
GE07hv_apppu:18456: brāhmaṇās tapasā śrāntā guroś ca paricaryayā // HV_App.I,41.1287 //
GE07hv_apppu:18457: yasya naivaṃ śrutam brahman na gṛhītam viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,41.1288 /
GE07hv_apppu:18458: kāmaṃ taṃ dhārmiko rājā śūdrakarmāṇi kārayet // HV_App.I,41.1289 //
GE07hv_apppu:18459: atha vā naiva vidyeta yad brahma nādriyed dvijaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1290 /
GE07hv_apppu:18460: dvābhyāṃ tu śrotraviṣaye manaḥ pūrvaṃ samāhite // HV_App.I,41.1291 //
GE07hv_apppu:18462: brāhmaṇo bhūtisaṃpanno ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1293 //
GE07hv_apppu:18465: te tu gobrāhmaṇāṃs tāṃś ca candrādityapuraskṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1294 /
GE07hv_apppu:18466: brāhmaṇān pūjayan rājan vasubhir brahmasaṃbhavaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1295 //
GE07hv_apppu:18467: nāradapramukhāś caiva gandharvā ṛṣayo nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.1296 /
GE07hv_apppu:18468: kurvanti satataṃ yajñaiḥ kramaprāptaiḥ pitāmaham // HV_App.I,41.1297 //
GE07hv_apppu:18472: provāca bhagavān brahma diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1301 //
GE07hv_apppu:18473: tataḥ kaśyapam ābhāṣya provāca bhagavān prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1302 /
GE07hv_apppu:18474: bhavān api sutaiḥ sārdhaṃ yakṣyate vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1303 //
GE07hv_apppu:18476: yakṣāḥ surāś ca te sarve yathāpratiguṇaiḥ prabho // HV_App.I,41.1305 //
GE07hv_apppu:18477: vayaṃ yakṣyāmahe sarve pūrvaṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam / HV_App.I,41.1306 /
GE07hv_apppu:18480: yuddhāyaiva pratiṣṭhanti pragṛhya vipulau bhujau // HV_App.I,41.1309 //
GE07hv_apppu:18482: anyaiś ca bahubhir viprair vedavedāṅgapāragaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1311 /
GE07hv_apppu:18483: nivāryamāṇā yudhyanti vṛṣabhā iva gokule // HV_App.I,41.1312 //
GE07hv_apppu:18485: paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ mṛtyor viṣayam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1314 //
GE07hv_apppu:18486: tataḥ śabdena mahatā paraṃ kṛtvā mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1315 /
GE07hv_apppu:18487: rundhanti bāhubhiḥ kruddhāḥ sapakṣā iva pakṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1316 //
GE07hv_apppu:18488: cacāla vasudhā caiva pādākrāntā ca roṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1317 /
GE07hv_apppu:18490: parvatāś ca viśīryante nardamānā vṛṣā iva // HV_App.I,41.1319 //
GE07hv_apppu:18491: cukṣubhuś ca mahānadyas tāḍitā mātariśvanā / HV_App.I,41.1320 /
GE07hv_apppu:18492: tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ madhor viṣṇoś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1321 //
GE07hv_apppu:18495: vahner iva balaṃ dīptaṃ śamayaty ambunā yathā // HV_App.I,41.1324 //
GE07hv_apppu:18500: balavān sa tu daiteyo madhur bhīmaparākramaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1325 /
GE07hv_apppu:18501: babandha pāśair niśitair mahendraṃ parvatāntare // HV_App.I,41.1326 //
GE07hv_apppu:18502: taṃ vai prahrādavacanāl lakṣaṇajñaś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1327 /
GE07hv_apppu:18503: aiśvaryam aindram ākāṅkṣan bhaviṣyaṃ buddhisaṃkṣayāt // HV_App.I,41.1328 //
GE07hv_apppu:18504: badhvendraṃ sahasā madhye pāśair marmavivarjitaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1329 /
GE07hv_apppu:18505: āyasair bahubhiś citrair balavadbhir vidāraṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1330 //
GE07hv_apppu:18506: viṣṇum evāgraṇīr ugram āhvayad yuddhakovidaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1331 /
GE07hv_apppu:18507: madhye gaṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kālasya vasām āgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1332 //
GE07hv_apppu:18508: dvaidhībhūtāḥ kāśyapeyā madhor vaśam upāgatāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1333 /
GE07hv_apppu:18509: yuddhārtham abhyadhāvanta pragṛhya vipulā gadāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1334 //
GE07hv_apppu:18510: gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāś caiva vādye gīte ca kovidāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1335 /
GE07hv_apppu:18511: pranṛtyanti pragāyanti prahasanti ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1336 //
GE07hv_apppu:18513: mano madhor vidhunvanti yudhyamānasya rāgiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1338 //
GE07hv_apppu:18514: madhor balārthaṃ madhuno niyogāt padmayoninaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1339 /
GE07hv_apppu:18515: etān vikārān kurvanti gandharvāḥ satyavādinaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1340 //
GE07hv_apppu:18516: tatra saktā hi gāndharve tasmiñ śabde dadur manaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1341 /
GE07hv_apppu:18517: dānavāś cāsurāś caiva pratyakṣaṃ yānti prāṇadan // HV_App.I,41.1342 //
GE07hv_apppu:18518: madhoś ca mana ākṣipya paśyan yogena cakṣuṣā / HV_App.I,41.1343 /
GE07hv_apppu:18519: mandaraṃ prāpatad viṣṇur gūḍho 'gnir iva dāruṣu // HV_App.I,41.1344 //
GE07hv_apppu:18522: viṣṇuṃ so 'bhyahanat kruddho madhur madhunibhekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1347 /
GE07hv_apppu:18523: bhujena śaṅkhadeśānte na cakampe padāt padam // HV_App.I,41.1348 //
GE07hv_apppu:18524: viṣṇuś cābhyahanad daityaṃ karāgreṇa stanāntare / HV_App.I,41.1349 /
GE07hv_apppu:18525: sa papāta mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ jānubhyāṃ rudhiraṃ vaman // HV_App.I,41.1350 //
GE07hv_apppu:18526: na cainaṃ patitaṃ hanti viṣṇur yuddhaviśāradaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1351 /
GE07hv_apppu:18528: indradhvaja ivottiṣṭhañ jānubhyāṃ sa mahītalāt / HV_App.I,41.1353 /
GE07hv_apppu:18529: madhū roṣaparītātmā nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,41.1354 //
GE07hv_apppu:18530: paruṣābhis tato vāgbhir anyonyam abhigarjatuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1355 /
GE07hv_apppu:18532: ubhau tau bāhubalināv ubhau yuddhaviśāradau / HV_App.I,41.1357 /
GE07hv_apppu:18533: ubhau ca tapasā śrāntāv ubhau satyaparākramau // HV_App.I,41.1358 //
GE07hv_apppu:18535: śailendrāv iva yudhyantau pakṣaiḥ pāṣāṇasaṃnibhaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1360 //
GE07hv_apppu:18536: vikarṣantau ramantau ca anyonyaṃ vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1361 /
GE07hv_apppu:18537: gajāv iva viṣāṇāgrair nakhāgraiś ca viceratuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1362 //
GE07hv_apppu:18538: tato vraṇamukhaiś caiva susrāva rudhiraṃ bahu / HV_App.I,41.1363 /
GE07hv_apppu:18539: grīṣmānte dhātusaṃsṛṣṭaṃ śailebhya iva kāñcanam // HV_App.I,41.1364 //
GE07hv_apppu:18540: saṃsiktau rudhiraughaiś ca sravadbhiḥ samarañjitau / HV_App.I,41.1365 /
GE07hv_apppu:18541: athodyataiḥ padāgraiś ca tau vyadārayatāṃ mahīm // HV_App.I,41.1366 //
GE07hv_apppu:18542: abhihatya tu tau vīrau parasparam anekadhā / HV_App.I,41.1367 /
GE07hv_apppu:18543: pataṃgāv iva yudhyetāṃ pakṣābhyāṃ māṃsagṛddhinau // HV_App.I,41.1368 //
GE07hv_apppu:18547: śarīraṃ dhātusaṃyuktaṃ saṃyuktaṃ cetanena ca / HV_App.I,41.1372 /
GE07hv_apppu:18548: tad brahma indriyair yuktaṃ tejobhūtaṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.1373 //
GE07hv_apppu:18549: dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhanti bhūtās te sūkṣme pralayatāṃ gate / HV_App.I,41.1374 /
GE07hv_apppu:18550: punaś codbhavate sūkṣmaṃ bahurūpam anekadhā / HV_App.I,41.1375 /
GE07hv_apppu:18551: prabodhya bhāvam bhūtānāṃ triṣu lokeṣu kāmadaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1376 //
GE07hv_apppu:18552: surūpo bahurūpas tāṃl lokān saṃcarate vaśī / HV_App.I,41.1377 /
GE07hv_apppu:18553: mānasīṃ tanum āsthāya bahubhiḥ kāraṇāntaraiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1378 //
GE07hv_apppu:18554: yogātmā dhārayann urvīṃ nāgātmā nandivardhanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1379 /
GE07hv_apppu:18555: brahmabhūtaṃ paraṃ caiva sūkṣmeṇātmānam īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.1380 //
GE07hv_apppu:18556: brāhmeṇa viprān vasati yuddhenaiva ca kṣatriyān / HV_App.I,41.1381 /
GE07hv_apppu:18557: pradānakarmaṇā vaiśyāñ śūdrān paricareṇa ca // HV_App.I,41.1382 //
GE07hv_apppu:18558: gāvaḥ kṣīrapradānena aśvān yajñeṣu prokṣaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1383 /
GE07hv_apppu:18560: caturbhir vyatiriktāṅgais tribhir anyaiś ca dhātubhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1385 /
GE07hv_apppu:18561: saptabhiḥ pitṛbhir nityais trīṃl lokān parirakṣaṇe // HV_App.I,41.1386 //
GE07hv_apppu:18563: prakāśe cāprakāśe ca nigūḍhaṃ svena tejasā // HV_App.I,41.1388 //
GE07hv_apppu:18564: trayas tu pitaro nityaṃ vardhayanti divākaram / HV_App.I,41.1389 /
GE07hv_apppu:18565: caturbhiḥ pitṛbhiś caiva candro vardhati maṇḍale // HV_App.I,41.1390 //
GE07hv_apppu:18566: trayaḥ pitṛgaṇā nityaṃ piṇḍān paścād adanti te / HV_App.I,41.1391 /
GE07hv_apppu:18567: catvāro 'nye pitṛgaṇāḥ siddhāḥ paṇcaka ādade // HV_App.I,41.1392 //
GE07hv_apppu:18568: tvam eva pañca tān dharmās tvam evāpañcatān vibho / HV_App.I,41.1393 /
GE07hv_apppu:18570: tasmāt tat teja ādatte agnir vāyuś ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1395 /
GE07hv_apppu:18571: atas tvaṃ karmaṇā tena ādityaḥ samapadyathāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1396 //
GE07hv_apppu:18572: yad aśnāsi jagat sarvaṃ raśmibhiḥ pradahann iva / HV_App.I,41.1397 /
GE07hv_apppu:18573: yūgāntakāle saṃprāpte parāṃ siddhim upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1398 //
GE07hv_apppu:18574: pakṣasaṃdhāvam āvāsyāṃ lokaṃ carasi mānuṣam / HV_App.I,41.1399 /
GE07hv_apppu:18576: saphalaṃ karma kurvāṇo yajatāṃ puṣṭivardhanam / HV_App.I,41.1401 /
GE07hv_apppu:18577: hetūnām adhikāraṃ ca mā bhūt karmaviparyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1402 //
GE07hv_apppu:18579: bālabhāvāya vasudhāṃ pakṣe pakṣe jarāṃ tava // HV_App.I,41.1404 //
GE07hv_apppu:18581: vasu yad bhuvi kiṃcic ca sarvaṃ tat tvanmayaṃ vibho // HV_App.I,41.1406 //
GE07hv_apppu:18582: tvam eva dvividhaṃ dharmaṃ śāśvataṃ vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1407 /
GE07hv_apppu:18584: dvividhaḥ svargamārgaś ca sūryaś candraś ca nirmalaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1409 /
GE07hv_apppu:18585: candramāḥ pitṛyānaś ca devayānaś ca bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.1410 //
GE07hv_apppu:18586: tvam eva vasudhāyukto viśvaṃ carasi māyayā / HV_App.I,41.1411 /
GE07hv_apppu:18587: ekīkṛtya gaṇān sarvān saṃkṣipyāmutra saṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1412 //
GE07hv_apppu:18588: ekas tvam asi saṃbhūtaḥ purāṇaḥ puruṣo virāṭ / HV_App.I,41.1413 /
GE07hv_apppu:18589: akṣayaś cāprameyaś ca kāmakārakaro vaśī // HV_App.I,41.1414 //
GE07hv_apppu:18590: mūrtas tejasi saṃbhūto vāyuḥ paryeti khecaraḥ / HV_App.I,41.1415 /
GE07hv_apppu:18591: saptabhī rūpasaṃsthānair nityam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,41.1416 //
GE07hv_apppu:18592: sādhane vāpi nirvāṇe saṃhāre pralaye tathā / HV_App.I,41.1417 /
GE07hv_apppu:18593: dhātā dhāraṇakāle ca diśaś cakṣuṣi sarpaṇe // HV_App.I,41.1418 //
GE07hv_apppu:18595: karmabhiḥ satyam āpannaiḥ samarāgair jitendriyaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1420 //
GE07hv_apppu:18596: stūyamānaś ca vibudhaiḥ siddhair munivarais tathā / HV_App.I,41.1421 /
GE07hv_apppu:18597: sasmāra vipulaṃ dehaṃ harir hayaśiro mahān // HV_App.I,41.1422 //
GE07hv_apppu:18598: kṛtvā vedamayaṃ rūpaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ vapuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1423 /
GE07hv_apppu:18599: śiromadhye mahādevo brahmā tu hṛdaye sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1424 //
GE07hv_apppu:18601: jaṅghe tu vasavaḥ sādhyāḥ sarvasaṃdhiṣu devatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1426 //
GE07hv_apppu:18602: jihvā vaiśvānaro devaḥ satyā devī sarasvatī / HV_App.I,41.1427 /
GE07hv_apppu:18604: evaṃ kṛtvā tathā rūpaṃ surāṇām adbhutaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,41.1429 /
GE07hv_apppu:18605: asuraṃ pīḍayām āsa krodhād raktāntalocanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1430 //
GE07hv_apppu:18608: medinīty eva śabdaś ca labdhaḥ pṛthvyā narottama / HV_App.I,41.1433 /
GE07hv_apppu:18612: madhor nipātanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvabhūtāni puṣkare / HV_App.I,41.1435 /
GE07hv_apppu:18613: prahṛṣṭāni pragāyanti pranṛtyanti ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1436 //
GE07hv_apppu:18614: supārśvo girimukhyas tu kāñcanaiḥ śikharottamaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1437 /
GE07hv_apppu:18615: bahudhātuvicitraiś ca saṃlikhann iva cābabhau // HV_App.I,41.1438 //
GE07hv_apppu:18616: girayaś cāpi śobhante dhātubhiḥ samarañjitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1439 /
GE07hv_apppu:18617: prāṃśubhiḥ śikharāgraiś ca savidyuta ivāmbudāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1440 //
GE07hv_apppu:18624: kāñcanāḥ parvatāḥ sarve sphāṭikair maṇibhiś citāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1447 /
GE07hv_apppu:18625: sūryakāntaiś ca bahubhiś candrakāntaiś ca nirmalaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1448 //
GE07hv_apppu:18626: himavāṃś ca mahāśailaḥ śvetair dhātubhir ācitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1449 /
GE07hv_apppu:18629: tāmrapuṣpaiś ca śikharair dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā // HV_App.I,41.1452 //
GE07hv_apppu:18630: mandaraś cograśikharaḥ sphāṭikair maṇibhiś citaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1453 /
GE07hv_apppu:18632: saha śṛṅgaiś ca kailāsaḥ śilādhātuvibhūṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1455 /
GE07hv_apppu:18633: toraṇaiś caiva nibiḍaiḥ prāṃśubhiś caiva pādapaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1456 //
GE07hv_apppu:18634: pravādayadbhir gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca pragāyibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1457 /
GE07hv_apppu:18636: madhurair vādyagītaiś ca nṛtyaiś cābhinayodgataiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1459 /
GE07hv_apppu:18637: śṛṅgāraiḥ sāṅgahāraiś ca kailāso madanāyate // HV_App.I,41.1460 //
GE07hv_apppu:18639: vindhyo nīlāmbudaśyāmo vibhinna iva toyadaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1462 //
GE07hv_apppu:18641: nirvemur vimalaṃ toyaṃ meghajālair ivottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1464 //
GE07hv_apppu:18644: grīṣmānte vāyusaṃmūḍhā ghanā iva savidyutaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1467 /
GE07hv_apppu:18645: citraiḥ puṣpais tarugaṇāḥ śobhanta iva bhūṣitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1468 //
GE07hv_apppu:18646: nāgāḥ kanakasaṃbhūtair vicitrair iva bhūṣitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1469 /
GE07hv_apppu:18647: vihaṃgamābhir līnāś ca latās tarusamāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1470 //
GE07hv_apppu:18648: vilambantyaḥ sapuṣpāś ca nṛtyante vāyughaṭṭitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1471 /
GE07hv_apppu:18650: mumucuḥ puṣpasaṃghātaṃ toyaṃ veleva varṣati / HV_App.I,41.1473 /
GE07hv_apppu:18652: pādapaiḥ parṇabahulair dhriyate ca vasuṃdharā / HV_App.I,41.1475 /
GE07hv_apppu:18655: viṣṇur madhor nihantā ca cakāra madhuvāhinīm / HV_App.I,41.1478 /
GE07hv_apppu:18659: viveśa puṣkaraṃ sā tu brahmaṇo vākyacoditā / HV_App.I,41.1482 /
GE07hv_apppu:18661: dhātrī kapilarūpeṇa gaur bhūtvā kṣarate payaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1484 /
GE07hv_apppu:18662: madhuraṃ vitate yajñe brahmaṇo vākyacoditā // HV_App.I,41.1485 //
GE07hv_apppu:18663: śiraś ca pṛthivībhūtaṃ saṃdhātuṃ prāptavān mahīm / HV_App.I,41.1486 /
GE07hv_apppu:18664: śuddhaṃ ca bhajate lokaṃ śāśvataṃ paramādbhutam // HV_App.I,41.1487 //
GE07hv_apppu:18673: mahāmeror yathā rūpaṃ pañcabhir dhātubhir vṛtam / HV_App.I,41.1496 /
GE07hv_apppu:18676: kariṣyāmy aham apy etan manasā dharmacāriṇam / HV_App.I,41.1499 /
GE07hv_apppu:18677: rūpaṃ bahuvidhaṃ loke pārthivī cetanā yathā // HV_App.I,41.1500 //
GE07hv_apppu:18678: trīṃś ca lokān prapadyeyaṃ pañcabhir dhātulakṣaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1501 /
GE07hv_apppu:18679: ṣaṣṭhena ca visarjeyaṃ manasā dharmacāriṇīm // HV_App.I,41.1502 //
GE07hv_apppu:18680: saṅgeṣu bhāvamohābhyāṃ paśyann iva samṛddhayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1503 /
GE07hv_apppu:18682: na ca vindeta māṃ kaścin manasā kāmarūpiṇam / HV_App.I,41.1505 /
GE07hv_apppu:18684: ye ca viṣṇum adhīyante bahudhā pādavigrahaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1507 /
GE07hv_apppu:18685: te māṃ paśyeyur avyaktaṃ tapasā dagdhakilbiṣāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1508 //
GE07hv_apppu:18686: ye ca mām abhiroheyur narā dharmapathe sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1509 /
GE07hv_apppu:18687: te 'pi svargejitaḥ sarve paśyeyur māṃ gataklamāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1510 //
GE07hv_apppu:18688: yaś caiva parvataḥ prāṃśur merupṛṣṭhe pratiṣṭhitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1511 /
GE07hv_apppu:18689: etam āruhya yudhyeyuḥ prāṇatyāgeṣu nirmalāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1512 //
GE07hv_apppu:18691: nandanaṃ vanam āsādya kāmyakaṃ ca mahad vanam // HV_App.I,41.1514 //
GE07hv_apppu:18692: imāṃ vidyāṃ samāsthāya madbhaktāḥ puṣkareṣv iha / HV_App.I,41.1515 /
GE07hv_apppu:18693: śarīraṃ kṣapayiṣyanti vratair bahuvidhaiḥ kṛśāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1516 //
GE07hv_apppu:18694: siddhiṃ prāpya krameyus te kāmair bahuvidhair narāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1517 /
GE07hv_apppu:18695: imaṃ lokam amuṃ caiva saṃpateyur yathāsukham // HV_App.I,41.1518 //
GE07hv_apppu:18696: gaurī siddheti vikhyātā triṣu lokeṣu vidyayā / HV_App.I,41.1519 /
GE07hv_apppu:18697: prabhāvaṃ tapaso vṛttaṃ darśayanti samāhitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1520 //
GE07hv_apppu:18699: bhaveyus te nirārambhā dhātubhir muktabandhanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1522 //
GE07hv_apppu:18700: sahasraguṇam apy atra dattvā dānaphalād iva / HV_App.I,41.1523 /
GE07hv_apppu:18704: yeṣām iha ca sāṃnidhyaṃ yajñe brāhmaṇasaṃkule / HV_App.I,41.1527 /
GE07hv_apppu:18705: te bhūyo yajamānādyā abhiṣicya punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1528 //
GE07hv_apppu:18706: tathā tāṃ manyase gaurīṃ manasā dharmacāriṇīm / HV_App.I,41.1529 /
GE07hv_apppu:18707: anugrahāya bhūtānāṃ mamāgre ca tapodhane // HV_App.I,41.1530 //
GE07hv_apppu:18708: satya eṣa paro divye bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1531 /
GE07hv_apppu:18709: nāphalo vidyate dharmaś carito brahmacāriṇā // HV_App.I,41.1532 //
GE07hv_apppu:18712: diśaṃ jigamiṣur divyām uttarāṃ satyasādhanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1533 /
GE07hv_apppu:18713: tathā sa dhātunicaye puṇye parvatarodhasi // HV_App.I,41.1534 //
GE07hv_apppu:18716: ātmany ātmānam ādhāya tapasā brahmasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1537 /
GE07hv_apppu:18718: bhāsuro bhasmanācchādya gātrāṇi svayam ātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1539 /
GE07hv_apppu:18722: aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi sahasraṃ ca tapodhanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1540 //
GE07hv_apppu:18723: tejasā tena jyotīṃṣi vibhāvya brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1541 /
GE07hv_apppu:18724: tiṣṭhate tapasā madhye yogātmā bhāvayañ jagat // HV_App.I,41.1542 //
GE07hv_apppu:18725: somo viṣayam ākṣipya manasā dhārayan manaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1543 /
GE07hv_apppu:18726: yuktaḥ paramadharmātmā brāhmīṃ siddhim upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1544 //
GE07hv_apppu:18727: sarvaṃ paśyati sarvatra divi bhuvy antare tathā / HV_App.I,41.1545 /
GE07hv_apppu:18728: jyotiṣṇuḥ karma kurvāṇo bahurūpaḥ sa saṃpadā // HV_App.I,41.1546 //
GE07hv_apppu:18730: uddhṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ vāyubhakṣaḥ samāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1548 //
GE07hv_apppu:18731: aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi sahasraṃ śatam eva ca / HV_App.I,41.1549 /
GE07hv_apppu:18733: atha vāyur ghanībhūtvā ante carati gopateḥ / HV_App.I,41.1551 /
GE07hv_apppu:18734: phenībhūtaṃ samudgāraiḥ pavanaṃ nirgiran mukhāt // HV_App.I,41.1552 //
GE07hv_apppu:18735: sa niṣkrāntas tato vaktrāt prāṇena paramātmavān / HV_App.I,41.1553 /
GE07hv_apppu:18736: niryāsabhūtaḥ patito naivārdro naiva pārthivaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1554 //
GE07hv_apppu:18737: sa pheno vāriṇāviśya cacāra vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1555 /
GE07hv_apppu:18738: naivārdro naiva śuṣkāṅgo vāyuḥ saṃghātam āgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1556 //
GE07hv_apppu:18739: tatkāle phenam utkṣipya pavanaḥ saha vāriṇā / HV_App.I,41.1557 /
GE07hv_apppu:18740: nirālambe nirālambas tv abhrāṇi samapadyata // HV_App.I,41.1558 //
GE07hv_apppu:18741: te kṣipanti payo bhūmāv ātmānaṃ svena ghaṭṭitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1559 /
GE07hv_apppu:18743: brāhmīṃ mūrtiṃ samādhāya vāyuḥ sarvatrago vaśī / HV_App.I,41.1561 /
GE07hv_apppu:18744: samāḥ sahasraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1562 //
GE07hv_apppu:18746: tapas tapyad anāhāro maunam āsthāya pauṣkare // HV_App.I,41.1564 //
GE07hv_apppu:18747: varṣāṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1565 /
GE07hv_apppu:18748: tasyāgnes tejaḥ saṃbhūto mahān agniḥ pravartate // HV_App.I,41.1566 //
GE07hv_apppu:18751: tapaś carati brahmāgnir lokānāṃ bhūtabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1569 /
GE07hv_apppu:18752: tat tamo bhuvi rājendra mānuṣeṣu pratiṣṭhitam / HV_App.I,41.1570 /
GE07hv_apppu:18753: bhāskaras tejasaṃhāras tato bhavati sattamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1571 //
GE07hv_apppu:18754: martyānāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ teja ākṣipya vartate / HV_App.I,41.1572 /
GE07hv_apppu:18755: na tu yogabale rājan brāhmaṇasya viśeṣataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1573 /
GE07hv_apppu:18756: tat tamo nāśayed rātrau nāpy aho bhavitā punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1574 //
GE07hv_apppu:18757: puṣpamitro mahātejā yakṣaḥ sarvatrago vaśī / HV_App.I,41.1575 /
GE07hv_apppu:18758: tapaś carati dharmātmā puṣkare susamāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1576 //
GE07hv_apppu:18759: mahendraśikharād dhārā yāvantyo yānti medinīm / HV_App.I,41.1577 /
GE07hv_apppu:18760: tāvat svarūpam āsthāya tiṣṭhate nikhilāḥ samāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1578 //
GE07hv_apppu:18761: jānubhyāṃ patito bhūmau jyotir nabhasi paśyati / HV_App.I,41.1579 /
GE07hv_apppu:18762: samāḥ sahasraṃ nikhilaṃ netrair animiṣair jagat // HV_App.I,41.1580 //
GE07hv_apppu:18763: netrāṇi bahudhā tasya netrāntair abhiniḥsṛtaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1581 /
GE07hv_apppu:18764: madhyaṃ dinakare prāpte raśmivān saparigrahaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1582 //
GE07hv_apppu:18765: te raśmayaḥ prabhānetraiḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1583 /
GE07hv_apppu:18766: rarāja tejaḥsaṃyogād vidyūdbhir iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1584 //
GE07hv_apppu:18769: bahudhā tu punar bhūtvā niṣaṇṇo vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1587 /
GE07hv_apppu:18770: samāsahasraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ tapas tepe sudāruṇam // HV_App.I,41.1588 //
GE07hv_apppu:18771: nigṛhītendriyo bhūtvā apsarobhir lalāma ha / HV_App.I,41.1589 /
GE07hv_apppu:18772: meroḥ śikharam āsādya kāmaṃ kāmena nirvaman // HV_App.I,41.1590 //
GE07hv_apppu:18773: tapaḥkāmaḥ sa yakṣas tu kubero naravāhanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1591 /
GE07hv_apppu:18774: viṣṇur eva tapodhyakṣas tejaso 'nte vijṛmbhati // HV_App.I,41.1592 //
GE07hv_apppu:18775: na hi kaścit pumān asti ya evaṃ tapa ācaret / HV_App.I,41.1593 /
GE07hv_apppu:18776: triṣu lokeṣu rājendra ṛte viṣṇuṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.1594 //
GE07hv_apppu:18777: vāsukir bahuśīrṣaś ca nāgendro maunam āsthitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1595 /
GE07hv_apppu:18778: tapa ācarate samyaṅ nidhāya manasā manaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1596 //
GE07hv_apppu:18779: śeṣaḥ satyadhṛtir nāgo balavān brahmasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1597 /
GE07hv_apppu:18781: jihvābhir lelihānābhir gātrajaṃ viṣam utsṛjan / HV_App.I,41.1599 /
GE07hv_apppu:18782: samāḥ sahasraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ nirāhāras tapodhanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1600 //
GE07hv_apppu:18783: kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ tad dhi sūmahat samapadyata / HV_App.I,41.1601 /
GE07hv_apppu:18784: yena loko hy abhigrasto na sukhaṃ vindate nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.1602 //
GE07hv_apppu:18786: jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ caiva sarvatrānugataṃ viṣam // HV_App.I,41.1604 //
GE07hv_apppu:18788: nāśayaty ātmano 'ṅgāni tena tīkṣṇena bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1606 //
GE07hv_apppu:18789: atha brahmā mahābhāgo bhūtānāṃ hitakāmyayā / HV_App.I,41.1607 /
GE07hv_apppu:18790: mantraṃ visṛjate rājan brahmākṣaram ahiṃsakam // HV_App.I,41.1608 //
GE07hv_apppu:18793: āhāraś ca tato yogād vihitās tasya pannagāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.1608**54:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:18795: garutmān vitataiḥ pakṣair nakhāgraiḥ salilaṃ mahīm / HV_App.I,41.1609 /
GE07hv_apppu:18797: parṇabhāraiś ca vikacair vistīrṇair vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1611 /
GE07hv_apppu:18798: rarāja vasudhā caiva taiḥ parṇair bahucitritaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1612 //
GE07hv_apppu:18799: yena vṛttena jīveyuḥ sarvabhūtāni bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1613 /
GE07hv_apppu:18800: ihaloke manuṣyendra devaloke ca bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1614 /
GE07hv_apppu:18802: maghavān himasaṃpāte bhavaty ekacaro vaśī / HV_App.I,41.1616 /
GE07hv_apppu:18804: atha sutalam ākramya pṛthivīṃ prāṃśudehinīm / HV_App.I,41.1618 /
GE07hv_apppu:18805: tapaś carati dharmātmā bāhum udyamya dakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,41.1619 //
GE07hv_apppu:18806: sāgraṃ varṣasahasraṃ ca śatam ekaṃ ca suvṛta / HV_App.I,41.1620 /
GE07hv_apppu:18807: tapaś carati saṃyogād vāyubhakṣaḥ samāhitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1621 /
GE07hv_apppu:18809: yeneyaṃ pṛthivī rājan dhāryate brahmayoninā / HV_App.I,41.1623 /
GE07hv_apppu:18811: yo 'sau viṣṇur agādhātmā paramātmā nirākṛtiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1625 /
GE07hv_apppu:18812: dine niṣaṇṇo bhavati rātrau bhavati vai sthiraḥ / HV_App.I,41.1626 /
GE07hv_apppu:18814: tasya yaḥ sodyataḥ pāṇiḥ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīsamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1628 /
GE07hv_apppu:18815: rātrau sa tapano bhavati maṇḍalaṃ vipulaṃ nabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1629 //
GE07hv_apppu:18816: sa candraviṣayaṃ rājañ śamayām āsa rundhati / HV_App.I,41.1630 /
GE07hv_apppu:18817: grahāṇāṃ gatayaś caiva tārāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1631 //
GE07hv_apppu:18818: tāṃ chāyām ākṣipat somaḥ sravadbhir maṇḍalena vai / HV_App.I,41.1632 /
GE07hv_apppu:18819: pṛthivyāṃ dakṣiṇo hasto mahāyogī mahāmanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1633 //
GE07hv_apppu:18820: saiṣā chāyā śaśībhūtā śaśimaṇḍalam āviśat / HV_App.I,41.1634 /
GE07hv_apppu:18821: aliṅgā pṛthivīliṅgād adbhutād akṣayā divi // HV_App.I,41.1635 //
GE07hv_apppu:18822: aṅgāṅgāny upagṛhyaiva tapaś carati niścayāt / HV_App.I,41.1636 /
GE07hv_apppu:18823: prokṣya pādau tu satalau pṛthvī vācyam upāgatā // HV_App.I,41.1637 //
GE07hv_apppu:18827: sphāṭikeva śūbhā yaiṣā kāñcanair dhātubhir vṛtā // HV_App.I,41.1641 //
GE07hv_apppu:18830: raśmibhiḥ punar uttīrṇā tato yogena dhāvati / HV_App.I,41.1644 /
GE07hv_apppu:18832: śītacchāyaiś ca tarubhir latābhiś ca sugandhibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1646 /
GE07hv_apppu:18833: padmakhaṇḍaiś ca vividhaiḥ śuśubhe divyagandhibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1647 //
GE07hv_apppu:18838: sakhyā gaṅgā phalaṃ lebhe puṣkareṇa samāhitā / HV_App.I,41.1652 /
GE07hv_apppu:18839: sutapā candravihitā lokānāṃ dhāraṇe ratā // HV_App.I,41.1653 //
GE07hv_apppu:18840: sarasvatī svarair vyaktair adhīte brahmavādinī / HV_App.I,41.1654 /
GE07hv_apppu:18841: pṛṣṭhāt prayātā śailendre mandare mandagāminī // HV_App.I,41.1655 //
GE07hv_apppu:18842: ṛgādyāṃś caturo vedān pādaiś caturbhir āvṛtān / HV_App.I,41.1656 /
GE07hv_apppu:18843: yajurbhiḥ sāmabhiś caiva grathitāñ śikṣayā tathā // HV_App.I,41.1657 //
GE07hv_apppu:18845: supārśvasya gireḥ pāde paridāyaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1659 //
GE07hv_apppu:18846: nisvanaṃ sarvabhūtāni niyamena ca me śṛṇu / HV_App.I,41.1660 /
GE07hv_apppu:18847: mandarāgre visarpantaṃ jagat kṛsnam atīndriyam // HV_App.I,41.1661 //
GE07hv_apppu:18848: virāmaniyame prāpte tūṣṇīṃbhūtā babhūva ha / HV_App.I,41.1662 /
GE07hv_apppu:18849: na vācam īrayed devī niyamāt satyavādinī // HV_App.I,41.1663 //
GE07hv_apppu:18850: atha bhūtāni sarvāṇi tūṣṇīṃbhūtāni sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1664 /
GE07hv_apppu:18851: na śekur abhidhānārthaṃ vyāhartuṃ vadanair balāt // HV_App.I,41.1665 //
GE07hv_apppu:18852: vibhajya yogaṃ manasā sarvabhūteṣv anugraham / HV_App.I,41.1666 /
GE07hv_apppu:18854: sarasvatyā samāyuktāṃ śikṣāṃ gṛhṇanti dehinaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1668 /
GE07hv_apppu:18855: tasminn evātha te sarve gānaṃ gāyanti śikṣayā // HV_App.I,41.1669 //
GE07hv_apppu:18856: ādityā vasavo rudrā marutaś cāśvibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,41.1670 /
GE07hv_apppu:18858: gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāś caiva sanāgāḥ saha cāmbhasaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1672 /
GE07hv_apppu:18861: tapaś caranti sahitāḥ puṣkareṣu manīṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1673 //
GE07hv_apppu:18862: api kīṭapataṃgaiś ca saha sarvaiḥ sarīsṛpaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1674 /
GE07hv_apppu:18864: viṣṇur viṣṇutvam āpanno dehāntaraṃ visṛṣṭavān / HV_App.I,41.1676 /
GE07hv_apppu:18865: saṃrakṣati mahāyogī sarvāṃs tān sahacāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1677 //
GE07hv_apppu:18866: puṣkare ramate viṣṇur viṣṇur eva dvidhā kṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1678 /
GE07hv_apppu:18867: dīpyamānaḥ svatejobhir vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1679 //
GE07hv_apppu:18868: so 'gnir manaḥsamudbhūtaḥ pṛthivīṃ tāpayann iva / HV_App.I,41.1680 /
GE07hv_apppu:18869: pradhāvati samaṃ tena maṇḍalaṃ daśayojanam // HV_App.I,41.1681 //
GE07hv_apppu:18872: tasyāgner visphuliṅgānāṃ na śekur laṅghane ratāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1684 /
GE07hv_apppu:18873: viprakīrṇasya bahudhā maryādām iva bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.1685 //
GE07hv_apppu:18874: so 'gnir dīpya vibhajyāṃśūn vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1686 /
GE07hv_apppu:18876: so 'gnir dhūmagatas tatra tiṣṭhate vipulas tadā / HV_App.I,41.1688 /
GE07hv_apppu:18877: yāvad viṣṇuḥ kramaprāpto niyamasya samāpanāt // HV_App.I,41.1689 //
GE07hv_apppu:18878: rakṣāṃ kṛtvā na taṃ vidyād viṣṇur viṣṇuparākramaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1690 /
GE07hv_apppu:18879: bhūtvā śataśarīro vai nāgo bālāhako 'bhavat // HV_App.I,41.1691 //
GE07hv_apppu:18880: tam agnim ātmasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ lelihānaṃ mahāmatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1692 /
GE07hv_apppu:18883: nyaṣiñcad dahanaṃ tatra nāgo bālāhakas tadā // HV_App.I,41.1695 //
GE07hv_apppu:18884: tataḥ siddhagaṇair juṣṭaḥ puṣkare tapyate tapaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1696 /
GE07hv_apppu:18886: saṃhṛtya pādagātraṇi mano mūrdhni vidhārayan / HV_App.I,41.1698 /
GE07hv_apppu:18887: acalaṃ sthānam āsādya tūṣṇīṃbhūto babhūva ha // HV_App.I,41.1699 //
GE07hv_apppu:18888: eṣa dharmo hi dharmāṇāṃ nopadhānavikalpitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1700 /
GE07hv_apppu:18889: hitaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu iha cāmutra cobhayoḥ // HV_App.I,41.1701 //
GE07hv_apppu:18890: atha daityā hatās tatra samāgamyodyatāyudhāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1702 /
GE07hv_apppu:18892: agniṃ daityāḥ parvatāgrair abhighnanti paraṃtapa / HV_App.I,41.1704 /
GE07hv_apppu:18894: meghībhūtāś ca māyābhir varṣanti baladarpitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1706 /
GE07hv_apppu:18896: te śailās tv arciṣā dagdhāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1708 /
GE07hv_apppu:18897: yugante prabhur ādityaḥ prajā iva didhakṣivān // HV_App.I,41.1709 //
GE07hv_apppu:18898: na śekur agniṃ daityās te māyābhimukham udyatam / HV_App.I,41.1710 /
GE07hv_apppu:18899: ādityam iva dīpyantaṃ nabhaḥ sūryodaye yathā // HV_App.I,41.1711 //
GE07hv_apppu:18900: vihatair udyamaiḥ sarvair daityā bhagnaparākramāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1712 /
GE07hv_apppu:18901: gandhamādanam āsādya niṣaṇṇā girir mūrdhani // HV_App.I,41.1713 //
GE07hv_apppu:18902: sa cāgnir vaiṣṇave loke vidyudbhir iva saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1714 /
GE07hv_apppu:18903: antarikṣacarān daityān nirdahan vicaran divi // HV_App.I,41.1715 //
GE07hv_apppu:18904: nāgo bālāhakaś caiva meghaiḥ saṃghātam āgataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1716 /
GE07hv_apppu:18905: mumoca salilaṃ bhūmau parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // HV_App.I,41.1717 //
GE07hv_apppu:18906: mantraiḥ saṃcodito nāgo dvijebhyo vadanodgataiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1718 /
GE07hv_apppu:18909: haviṣā mantrapūtena yathā vai vidhir eva ca // **HV_App.I,41.1718**56:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:18910: mumoca toyasaṃghātaṃ mānayan viprajaṃ janam // HV_App.I,41.1719 //
GE07hv_apppu:18913: saṃyujya tapasā devāḥ kim akurvaṃs tataḥ param / HV_App.I,41.1720 /
GE07hv_apppu:18914: na hi tad vidyate loke tapasā yan na labhyate // HV_App.I,41.1721 //
GE07hv_apppu:18916: atha dīkṣāṃ samāsthāya sarve viṣṇumayā gaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1722 /
GE07hv_apppu:18917: puṣkarād agnim uddhatya praṇīya ca yathāvidhi // HV_App.I,41.1723 //
GE07hv_apppu:18919: haviṣā mantrapūtena yathā vai vidhir eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1725 //
GE07hv_apppu:18920: sa cāgnir vidhivat tatra vardhate brahmatejasā / HV_App.I,41.1726 /
GE07hv_apppu:18922: brahmadaṇḍa iti khyāto vapuṣā nirdahann iva / HV_App.I,41.1728 /
GE07hv_apppu:18924: gadī ca lāṅgalī cakrī śarī carmī paraśvadhī / HV_App.I,41.1730 /
GE07hv_apppu:18925: śūlī vajrī khaḍgapāṇiḥ śaktimān varakārmukī // HV_App.I,41.1731 //
GE07hv_apppu:18926: viṣṇuś cakradharaḥ khaḍgī musalī lāṅgalāyudhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1732 /
GE07hv_apppu:18927: naro lāṅgalam ālambya musalaṃ ca mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1733 //
GE07hv_apppu:18928: vajram indras tapoyogāc chataparvāṇam ākṣipat / HV_App.I,41.1734 /
GE07hv_apppu:18929: rudraḥ śūlaṃ pinākaṃ ca manasādhārayat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1735 //
GE07hv_apppu:18930: mṛtyur daṇḍaṃ sapāśaṃ ca kālaḥ śaktim agṛhṇata / HV_App.I,41.1736 /
GE07hv_apppu:18931: jagrāha paraśuṃ tvaṣṭā kuberaś ca paraśvadham // HV_App.I,41.1737 //
GE07hv_apppu:18933: viśvakarmā ca tvaṣṭā ca cakrāte hy āyudhāni tu // HV_App.I,41.1739 //
GE07hv_apppu:18934: indrāyāgnī rathaṃ prādāt sūryāya ca pratāpine / HV_App.I,41.1740 /
GE07hv_apppu:18935: paramātmā dadau viṣṇū rudrāya ca mahātmane // HV_App.I,41.1741 //
GE07hv_apppu:18936: chandobhir eva tvaṣṭā tu sa cakārātha vāhinīm / HV_App.I,41.1742 /
GE07hv_apppu:18937: viśvakarmā vimānāni cakāra bahubhiḥ kramaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1743 //
GE07hv_apppu:18939: puṣkarāt parvaṇi ghanān pṛtanārthaṃ prakalpayat // HV_App.I,41.1745 //
GE07hv_apppu:18940: dyāṃ caiva sūryaṝkṣāṇāṃ tvarayā samakalpayat / HV_App.I,41.1746 /
GE07hv_apppu:18941: yayābhiyujya saṃgrāme śatruṃ nirbibhide raṇe // HV_App.I,41.1747 //
GE07hv_apppu:18942: sa taṃ daṇḍaṃ samucitaṃ nirvikāraṃ samāhitam / HV_App.I,41.1748 /
GE07hv_apppu:18943: brahmā jagrāha vidhinā antardhānagataḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1749 //
GE07hv_apppu:18944: svaiḥ prabhāvaiś ca bahudhā so 'stragrāmaṃ caturvidham / HV_App.I,41.1750 /
GE07hv_apppu:18945: aindram āgneyavāyavyaṃ raudraṃ raudreṇa varcasā // HV_App.I,41.1751 //
GE07hv_apppu:18946: ebhir vikāraiḥ saṃyuktā diteḥ putrā mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1752 /
GE07hv_apppu:18947: tapasā śikṣayā caiva astraiḥ praharaṇais tathā // HV_App.I,41.1753 //
GE07hv_apppu:18948: balena caturaṅgeṇa vīryeṇa ca samāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1754 /
GE07hv_apppu:18949: apradhṛṣyā raṇe sarve kṣaṇenaivābhavaṃs tadā // HV_App.I,41.1755 //
GE07hv_apppu:18950: te vihāya guhāmadhye sabhāṇḍopaskare rathe / HV_App.I,41.1756 /
GE07hv_apppu:18951: mandarasya gireḥ pāde vicerur vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1757 //
GE07hv_apppu:18952: caturaṅgaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ saṃhṛtya tamasaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1758 /
GE07hv_apppu:18953: viṣṇur eva mahāyogī cacāra vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1759 //
GE07hv_apppu:18954: bhūyo 'nyat tapa āseduś caranto brāhmaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,41.1760 /
GE07hv_apppu:18955: taiś ca sarvaiḥ suragaṇaiś carmacīranivāsibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1761 //
GE07hv_apppu:18958: brahman khile vartamāne nirmaryāde mahāgrahe / HV_App.I,41.1762 /
GE07hv_apppu:18959: avināśe ca bhūtānāṃ katham āsan prajās tadā // HV_App.I,41.1763 //
GE07hv_apppu:18961: abhyaṣiñcat pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ purā rājye prajāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1764 /
GE07hv_apppu:18962: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B1.3 Ds D3.6 G3 subst. for line 1764:k]
GE07hv_apppu:18965: eṣa vaḥ paramo rājā anurāgād ajāyata / HV_App.I,41.1766 /
GE07hv_apppu:18967: eṣa no vṛttidātā ca śilpānāṃ ca samarpitā / HV_App.I,41.1768 /
GE07hv_apppu:18970: bahubhir niyamaiḥ śrāntā niṣaṇṇā girisānuṣu // HV_App.I,41.1771 //
GE07hv_apppu:18971: atha gandhaṃ samāsādya samantād devadānavāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1772 /
GE07hv_apppu:18972: mādhave samaye prāpte tena gandhena darpitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1773 //
GE07hv_apppu:18974: manogrāhi sukhaṃ sarvaṃ pārthivaṃ gandham uttamam // HV_App.I,41.1775 //
GE07hv_apppu:18975: te daityās tena gandhena kiṃcid vismayam āgatāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1776 /
GE07hv_apppu:18976: prasannamanaso bhūtvā paraṃ saukhyam upāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1777 //
GE07hv_apppu:18977: ūcuś ca sahitāḥ sarve tena gandhena darpitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1778 /
GE07hv_apppu:18978: puṣpamātrasya yadvīryaṃ kiṃ tasya phalato bhavet // HV_App.I,41.1779 //
GE07hv_apppu:18980: śubhāś caivāśubhāś caiva buddhiprāṇena dehinām // HV_App.I,41.1781 //
GE07hv_apppu:18981: tasmād vayaṃ payomadhye oṣadhīr nirmathāmahe / HV_App.I,41.1782 /
GE07hv_apppu:18983: samudram abhisaṃrambhān mathnīmaḥ somajaṃ jalam / HV_App.I,41.1784 /
GE07hv_apppu:18984: pītvā ca sahitāḥ sarve prasthitāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1785 //
GE07hv_apppu:18985: viṣṇur evāgraṇīs teṣāṃ bhaviṣyati mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1786 /
GE07hv_apppu:18986: divaṃ ca vasudhāṃ caiva bhokṣyāmaḥ saha śatrubhīḥ // HV_App.I,41.1787 //
GE07hv_apppu:18988: sarvagrahāṃś ca gṛhṇīmaḥ sudhāṃ ca vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1789 //
GE07hv_apppu:18990: prabhāṣya vacanaṃ devā mandarasya prakampane // HV_App.I,41.1791 //
GE07hv_apppu:18991: samuddhartuṃ pradhāvanti kampayanti sma medinīm / HV_App.I,41.1792 /
GE07hv_apppu:18993: na śekus te samuddhartuṃ śailendraṃ danuvaṃśajāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1794 /
GE07hv_apppu:18994: nipetur jānubhir juṣṭā vipule parvatāntare // HV_App.I,41.1795 //
GE07hv_apppu:18997: teṣāṃ manobhilaṣitaṃ brahmā sarvatrago vaśī / HV_App.I,41.1798 /
GE07hv_apppu:18998: jñātvā bahuvidhair vākyair vyājahāra sarasvatīm // HV_App.I,41.1799 //
GE07hv_apppu:19001: ādityair vasubhiś caiva rudraiś ca samarudgaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1802 /
GE07hv_apppu:19002: devair yakṣaiḥ sagandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca pragāthibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1803 //
GE07hv_apppu:19003: sametya sahitaiḥ sarvaiḥ śakya uddharituṃ giriḥ / HV_App.I,41.1804 /
GE07hv_apppu:19007: etac chrutvā ca vacanaṃ sarveṣām antike tadā / HV_App.I,41.1808 /
GE07hv_apppu:19008: daiteyā bāhubalino manobhir vāgbhir eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1809 //
GE07hv_apppu:19011: na ca kecit pibanty anye devā naiva ca dānavāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.1810**58:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19012: yatra puṣkaraṃ vinyastaṃ sahitair devadānavaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1811 //
GE07hv_apppu:19015: mandaraṃ puṣkaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ vāsukim eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1813 //
GE07hv_apppu:19017: kūrmapṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ prāpya mandaraṃ nyastavāṃs tadā / **HV_App.I,41.1813**59:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19018: viṣṇur eva mahābāhuḥ parvataṃ yantravat tataḥ // **HV_App.I,41.1813**59:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19020: yataḥ pucchaṃ tato devā asurā mastake sthitāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.1813**59:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:19021: etasya ha saniśvāsā ukṣitā asurās tadā // **HV_App.I,41.1813**59:5 //
GE07hv_apppu:19022: samāḥ sahasraṃ mathitaṃ jalam oṣadhibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,41.1814 /
GE07hv_apppu:19026: mathyamāne tatas tasya samutpattiḥ krameṇa saḥ // **HV_App.I,41.1815**60:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19030: kalaśāt tat samudbhūtam amṛtaṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān // **HV_App.I,41.1815**60:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:19031: taj jahrur asurāḥ pūrvam ākrāntā lobhamanyunā // HV_App.I,41.1816 //
GE07hv_apppu:19032: [k: Ñ2 B G3 ins. after line 1816,
GE07hv_apppu:19035: dhanvataris tathā madyaṃ śrīr devī kaustubho maṇiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1817 /
GE07hv_apppu:19036: śaśāṅko vimalaś cāpi samuttasthuḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1818 /
