GE07hv_apppu:19037: uccaiḥśravā hayo ramyaḥ pīyūṣaṃ tadanantaram // HV_App.I,41.1819 //
GE07hv_apppu:19038: paścād devās tadādātum udyatā rāhum abruvan / HV_App.I,41.1820 /
GE07hv_apppu:19040: dṛṣṭvā daityaṃ sthitaṃ pātuṃ madhye taṃ rāhum avyayam / **HV_App.I,41.1820**62:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19041: na tu kecit pibanty ete daityā naiva ca dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1821 //
GE07hv_apppu:19042: cicchedātha hariḥ saṃkhye rāhoś cakreṇa kaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,41.1822 /
GE07hv_apppu:19043: anirbhuktaṃ pitṛgaṇair munibhiś ca sanātanaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1823 //
GE07hv_apppu:19044: tandrihastād amṛtaṃ jahāra pṛthivī svayam / HV_App.I,41.1824 /
GE07hv_apppu:19049: daiteyā dānaveyāś ca kim icchanti parākramāt // HV_App.I,41.1827 //
GE07hv_apppu:19051: dānavā rājyam icchanti parākramya mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1828 /
GE07hv_apppu:19052: tapa icchanti sahitā devāḥ satyaparākramāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1829 //
GE07hv_apppu:19053: atha kālasya mahato hiraṇyakaśipus tadā / HV_App.I,41.1830 /
GE07hv_apppu:19054: yajate brahmaṇaḥ kṣetre prāptaiśvaryaḥ sa kāmadaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1831 //
GE07hv_apppu:19057: gaṅgāyamunayor madhye yad abhūd vipulaṃ tapaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1834 /
GE07hv_apppu:19058: sameyus tatra sahitā yajamāne mahāsure // HV_App.I,41.1835 //
GE07hv_apppu:19060: yatayaś cāpare siddhā yogadharmeṇa bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1837 //
GE07hv_apppu:19061: munayo vālakhilyāś ca dhanyā dharmeṇa śodhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1838 /
GE07hv_apppu:19062: bahavo hi dvijā mukhyā nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1839 //
GE07hv_apppu:19063: ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgā vipraiḥ pūjyāḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1840 /
GE07hv_apppu:19064: vipulai ratnavibhavair hriyamāṇais tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1841 //
GE07hv_apppu:19065: śukras tu saha putreṇa daityaṃ yājayate prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1842 /
GE07hv_apppu:19068: kāmād varaṃ dadānīti tad vai saṃpratipadyatām // HV_App.I,41.1845 //
GE07hv_apppu:19069: viṣṇur vāmanarūpeṇa bhikṣāṃ tāṃ pratyagṛhṇata / HV_App.I,41.1846 /
GE07hv_apppu:19070: hiraṇyakaśipor hastād dve pade padam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1847 //
GE07hv_apppu:19071: tataḥ kramitum ārebhe viṣṇuḥ satyaparākramaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1848 /
GE07hv_apppu:19072: trīṃl lokāṃs tripadaiḥ krāntvā divyaṃ vapur adhārayat // HV_App.I,41.1849 //
GE07hv_apppu:19073: hṛtarājyāś ca daiteyāḥ pātālavivaraṃ yayuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1850 /
GE07hv_apppu:19079: sa tān svadhāmṛtenāśu pitṝn vai samatarpayat // HV_App.I,41.1856 //
GE07hv_apppu:19080: brahmā tad amṛtaṃ divyaṃ mahendrāya prayacchati / HV_App.I,41.1857 /
GE07hv_apppu:19081: akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva saṃvṛtas tena karmaṇā // HV_App.I,41.1858 //
GE07hv_apppu:19082: tataḥ śaṅkham upadhmāsīd dviṣatāṃ lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,41.1859 /
GE07hv_apppu:19084: taṃ śrutvā śaṅkhaśabdaṃ tu trayo lokāḥ samāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1861 /
GE07hv_apppu:19085: nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ prāptā indraṃ nātham avāpya ca // HV_App.I,41.1862 //
GE07hv_apppu:19086: sarvaiḥ praharaṇaiś caiva saṃyuktā vahnisaṃbhavaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1863 /
GE07hv_apppu:19087: mandarāgreṣu vihatair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1864 //
GE07hv_apppu:19090: tato mahati vṛttānte sthite rājye mahodaye / HV_App.I,41.1865 /
GE07hv_apppu:19091: devānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca sahavāso 'bhavat tadā // HV_App.I,41.1866 //
GE07hv_apppu:19092: ekataḥ samadhīyante sahitāḥ prarudanti ca / HV_App.I,41.1867 /
GE07hv_apppu:19095: svayaṃ ca bhāgaṃ gṛhṇanti yajñakarmaṇi bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1868 //
GE07hv_apppu:19096: prācetasaṃ tato dakṣaṃ dīkṣitvā vai bṛhaspatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1869 /
GE07hv_apppu:19098: tasmin paitāmahe yajñe dakṣasya viditātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1871 /
GE07hv_apppu:19099: śāmitram akarod rudro bhāgārthe saha nandinā // HV_App.I,41.1872 //
GE07hv_apppu:19100: rudrasyaiva hi tad rūpaṃ dvidhābhūtaṃ tadīpsayā / HV_App.I,41.1873 /
GE07hv_apppu:19102: tena yogena rājendra yat tad brahma sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.1875 /
GE07hv_apppu:19107: devāś ca bhāgaṃ gṛhṇanti dakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ // **HV_App.I,41.1876**64:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:19108: tataḥ kruddho mahādevaś cāpam udyamya vīryavān / **HV_App.I,41.1876**64:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:19109: nandinā saha bhūtaiś ca samuttasthau sabhāntare // **HV_App.I,41.1876**64:5 //
GE07hv_apppu:19110: sarūpaiś cāpy arūpaiś ca virūpākṣair ghaṭodaraiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1877 /
GE07hv_apppu:19111: ūrdhvanetrair mahākāyair vikaṭair vāmanais tathā // HV_App.I,41.1878 //
GE07hv_apppu:19112: śikhibhir jaṭibhiś caiva tryakṣair vai śaṅkukarṇibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1879 /
GE07hv_apppu:19117: etaiḥ parivṛto devo makhaṃ taṃ samupārujat // HV_App.I,41.1884 //
GE07hv_apppu:19120: virarājārcibhir dīptair makhair makhavatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1887 /
GE07hv_apppu:19121: kālāgnir iva dīptārcir jagad dagdhum ivodyataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1888 //
GE07hv_apppu:19122: nandī pinākapāṇiś ca jaghnatur makham uttamam / HV_App.I,41.1889 /
GE07hv_apppu:19123: yugānta iva kālāgniḥ kṣipraṃ dagdhum ivodyataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1890 //
GE07hv_apppu:19124: yūpam utkṣipya dhāvanti niśācaragaṇās tataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1891 /
GE07hv_apppu:19126: havīṃṣy anye pibanty eva jihvābhis tāmralocanāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1893 /
GE07hv_apppu:19127: bhakṣayanti paśūn anye rasanāntaiḥ pralambibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1894 //
GE07hv_apppu:19128: mumucuś cāpare yūpān prasabhaṃ praharanti ca / HV_App.I,41.1895 /
GE07hv_apppu:19129: vahnim anye prasiñcanti vāribhiḥ prahasanti ca // HV_App.I,41.1896 //
GE07hv_apppu:19130: somam anye jahuḥ kecin netrais tāmrajapopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1897 /
GE07hv_apppu:19131: darbhān kecid vilumpanti hastaiḥ padmadalaprabhaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1898 //
GE07hv_apppu:19132: babhañjire ca śālāgrān kalaśāṃś cāpaviddhire / HV_App.I,41.1899 /
GE07hv_apppu:19133: cicchiduḥ kāñcanān vṛkṣāñ śobhārtham upakalpitān // HV_App.I,41.1900 //
GE07hv_apppu:19134: bibhiduś caiva bāṇaiś ca mumucuś ca hiraṇmayān / HV_App.I,41.1901 /
GE07hv_apppu:19135: lulupuś caiva pātrāṇi mamanthuś cāraṇīm atha // HV_App.I,41.1902 //
GE07hv_apppu:19136: ārujaṃś caiva prāgvaṃśāṃl lulupuś ca samāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1903 /
GE07hv_apppu:19137: cakhādire puroḍāśān nakhāgraiś ca cakartire // HV_App.I,41.1904 //
GE07hv_apppu:19138: evaṃ divā ca rātrau ca bhidyamāno mahāmakhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1905 /
GE07hv_apppu:19139: cukrośa ca mahānādān bhidyamāna ivārṇavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1906 //
GE07hv_apppu:19140: dhanuḥ saśaram ādāya pūrvadattaṃ svayaṃbhuvā / HV_App.I,41.1907 /
GE07hv_apppu:19142: pratigṛhya mahādevaḥ sa śare samayojayat / HV_App.I,41.1909 /
GE07hv_apppu:19143: dhanur vigṛhya jānubhyāṃ jaghāna sa mahākratum // HV_App.I,41.1910 //
GE07hv_apppu:19144: sa viddhas tena bāṇena khaṃ samutpatitaḥ kratuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1911 /
GE07hv_apppu:19145: mṛgo bhūtvā nardamāno brahmāṇam upadhāvati // HV_App.I,41.1912 //
GE07hv_apppu:19146: śareṇābhihatas trāṇaṃ na lebhe praśamaṃ bhuvi / HV_App.I,41.1913 /
GE07hv_apppu:19147: śaraṇārthī hy ahaṃ prāptaḥ śareṇāntargatena ca // HV_App.I,41.1914 //
GE07hv_apppu:19148: tam uvāca mṛgaṃ brahmā śubhaṃ sānunayaṃ vacaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1915 /
GE07hv_apppu:19150: evaṃrūpo nabhasi tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi mahāmṛga // HV_App.I,41.1917 //
GE07hv_apppu:19152: tiṣṭhan nakṣatraśirasi saha rudreṇa nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1919 //
GE07hv_apppu:19153: somena saha saṃyukto hy akṣayeṇāvyayena ca / HV_App.I,41.1920 /
GE07hv_apppu:19154: divi saṃcārabhūtaś ca dhruvaś caiva mahādhruvaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1921 //
GE07hv_apppu:19155: jyotiṣāṃ jyotibhūtas tvaṃ dhruvaś caiva mahādhruvaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1922 //
GE07hv_apppu:19156: yac caitad rudhiraṃ divyaṃ kṣatāt samabhiniḥsṛtam / HV_App.I,41.1923 /
GE07hv_apppu:19157: nabhasy utpatitaṃ caiva pravegena pradhāvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1924 //
GE07hv_apppu:19159: nimittabhūtaṃ bhūtānāṃ varṣe varṣapradaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.1926 //
GE07hv_apppu:19160: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ darśane saṃpravartate / HV_App.I,41.1927 /
GE07hv_apppu:19162: cakṣuṣī mānuṣe rājan vismayāt samavekṣitum / HV_App.I,41.1929 /
GE07hv_apppu:19163: adbhutaṃ bahucitraṃ ca manasā saṃprakalpitam // HV_App.I,41.1930 //
GE07hv_apppu:19164: na tu rātrau pradṛśyeta khe tu savraṇasaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,41.1931 /
GE07hv_apppu:19165: dinasyaiva sadā tv agre mahat kāryaṃ pradṛśyate / HV_App.I,41.1932 /
GE07hv_apppu:19166: bhūmāv eva samuttiṣṭhed ākāśe pravilīyate // HV_App.I,41.1933 //
GE07hv_apppu:19167: śataśaś ca samaṃ sarve pradhāvanti pracetasaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1934 /
GE07hv_apppu:19168: bhayād rudrasya mahato dhanvino bāṇapāṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1935 //
GE07hv_apppu:19169: nandī rudragaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ pinākī samatiṣṭhata / HV_App.I,41.1936 /
GE07hv_apppu:19171: viṣṇuḥ śṛṅgāgrasaṃbhūtaṃ pragṛhya vipulaṃ dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1938 /
GE07hv_apppu:19172: prātiṣṭhata mahābāhuḥ pāṇinā cakram ādadhat // HV_App.I,41.1939 //
GE07hv_apppu:19173: gadāṃ saghaṇṭām anyena khaḍgam anyena pāṇinā / HV_App.I,41.1940 /
GE07hv_apppu:19175: tataḥ śṛṅgāgrasaṃbhūtaṃ pragṛhya vipulaṃ dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1942 /
GE07hv_apppu:19176: śaṅkhaṃ cāpratimaṃ loke śarāṃś ca nataparvaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1943 //
GE07hv_apppu:19177: viṣṇur agre sthito bhāti sabalaḥ saṃhatāñjaliḥ / HV_App.I,41.1944 /
GE07hv_apppu:19179: ādityā vasavaś caiva divyaiḥ praharaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,41.1946 /
GE07hv_apppu:19180: viṣṇum evābhitaḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti jvalanaprabhāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1947 //
GE07hv_apppu:19181: marutaś caiva viśve ca rudram evābhipedire / HV_App.I,41.1948 /
GE07hv_apppu:19182: gandharvakiṃnarāś caiva nāgā yakṣāḥ sapannagāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1949 //
GE07hv_apppu:19183: ṛṣayo nyastadaṇḍāś ca ubhayoḥ pakṣayor hitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1950 /
GE07hv_apppu:19184: jvalantaḥ śāntaye nityaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,41.1951 //
GE07hv_apppu:19185: rudraḥ śareṇābhyahanad viṣṇum evāgraṇī raṇe / HV_App.I,41.1952 /
GE07hv_apppu:19187: na cakampe tadā viṣṇuḥ sarvātmā sarvasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1954 /
GE07hv_apppu:19188: na ca roṣamanā nityaṃ vṛtaḥ sarvaiḥ ṣaḍindriyaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1955 //
GE07hv_apppu:19189: viṣṇuś ca dhanur ādāya śareṇa samayojayat / HV_App.I,41.1956 /
GE07hv_apppu:19191: sa viddhas tena bāṇena mahādevo na kampate / HV_App.I,41.1958 /
GE07hv_apppu:19193: tataḥ prasabham āplutya rudraṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.1960 /
GE07hv_apppu:19194: kaṇṭhe jagrāha bhagavān nīlakaṇṭhas tato 'bhavat // HV_App.I,41.1961 //
GE07hv_apppu:19195: anādinidhano devaḥ kṣamatāṃ bhagavan mama / HV_App.I,41.1962 /
GE07hv_apppu:19196: sarvabhūtāgamācāryo mama kartā ca karmaṇām // HV_App.I,41.1963 //
GE07hv_apppu:19197: karmaṇāṃ ca prakartā ca vikartā caiva bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1964 /
GE07hv_apppu:19198: aroṣatvāc ca bhūtānāṃ sarvabhūteṣu cottamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1965 //
GE07hv_apppu:19199: svayam eva hi yat karma vidhatte karmayoniṣu / HV_App.I,41.1966 /
GE07hv_apppu:19202: tayoḥ śubhatamo rājan svayam eva tathākarot // HV_App.I,41.1967 //
GE07hv_apppu:19203: antarikṣāc chubhā vācaḥ śrūyante paramādbhutāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1968 /
GE07hv_apppu:19204: siddhānāṃ vadanonmuktāḥ sanātana namo 'stu te // HV_App.I,41.1969 //
GE07hv_apppu:19205: nandī pinākam udyamya balavān rudrasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1970 /
GE07hv_apppu:19206: mūrdhany abhijaghānājau viṣṇuṃ krodhena mūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1971 //
GE07hv_apppu:19207: tataḥ prahasito viṣṇur nandīṃ dṛṣṭvā surottamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1972 /
GE07hv_apppu:19208: stambhayām āsa bhagavān sarvabhūtapatir hariḥ // HV_App.I,41.1973 //
GE07hv_apppu:19209: viṣṇur brahmasamo bhūtvā tejasā prajvalann iva / HV_App.I,41.1974 /
GE07hv_apppu:19210: kṣamayā ca samāyuktaḥ sthitaḥ sthāṇur ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1975 //
GE07hv_apppu:19211: acintyaś cāprameyaś ca ajeyaś cāpy ariṃdamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1976 /
GE07hv_apppu:19212: yugāntāgnisamo bhūtvā śāntātmā harir avyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1977 //
GE07hv_apppu:19213: prasannaḥ kalpayām āsa bhāgaṃ rudrāya dhīmate / HV_App.I,41.1978 /
GE07hv_apppu:19214: viṣṇur dharmaparo nityaṃ tyaktakāmaḥ surarṣabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1979 //
GE07hv_apppu:19215: viṣṇūnā caiva rājendra sa yajñaḥ saṃdhitaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1980 /
GE07hv_apppu:19216: yathāpakṣaṃ ca te sarve gaṇā āsan mahīpate / HV_App.I,41.1981 /
GE07hv_apppu:19217: tasmin yuddhe mahāghore viṣṇo rudrasya caiva ha // HV_App.I,41.1982 //
GE07hv_apppu:19218: pakṣaṃ pakṣaṃ bhavad yuddhaṃ dakṣayajñavināśane / HV_App.I,41.1983 /
GE07hv_apppu:19219: vināśaś caiva yajñasya tadā loke pratiṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1984 //
GE07hv_apppu:19220: sarvabhūteṣu rājendra hito yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1985 /
GE07hv_apppu:19221: dakṣo yajñaphalaṃ caiva prāptavān sa prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1986 //
GE07hv_apppu:19222: imāṃ dakṣādhvarāṃ divyāṃ kathām amitabuddhimān / HV_App.I,41.1987 /
GE07hv_apppu:19223: śrāvayed yas tu viprebhyaḥ śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1988 /
GE07hv_apppu:19224: adhītya sarvam adhyātmaṃ devaloke mahīyate // HV_App.I,41.1989 //
GE07hv_apppu:19225: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 V1.3 B2 Dn D4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19228: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 42, transliterated by N. Hanemann,
GE07hv_apppu:19231: [k: K Ñ2 V1.3 B D cont. after App. I,
GE07hv_apppu:19232: No. 41; Ñ1 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 cont. after adhyāya 118 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19235: satāṃ kathayatāṃ vipra vārāha iti naḥ śrutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19236: na jāne tv asya caritaṃ nikhilaṃ ca savistaram / HV_App.I,42.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:19237: na dharmaguṇasaṃsthānaṃ na hetuṃ na manīṣitam // HV_App.I,42.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:19238: kimātmako varāho 'sau kiṃvīryaḥ kāsya devatā / HV_App.I,42.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:19239: kimācāraḥ kiṃprabhāvaḥ kiṃ vā tena purā kṛtam // HV_App.I,42.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:19240: etan me śaṃsa tattvena vārāhaṃ śrutivistaram / HV_App.I,42.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:19241: yajñārthaṃ ca sametānāṃ dvijātīnāṃ mahātmanām // HV_App.I,42.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:19244: pramāṇārthaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha tan me vada mahāmune // **HV_App.I,42.8**1:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19246: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam / HV_App.I,42.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:19247: [k: Ñ2 B Dn Ds D3.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19249: samāhitamanā bhūtvā śṛṇu rājan yathātatham // HV_App.I,42.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:19251: yathā nārāyaṇo devo vārāhaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:19256: śuciḥ prayatnavān bhūtvā nibodha janamejaya // HV_App.I,42.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:19257: idaṃ purāṇaṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam / HV_App.I,42.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:19259: purāṇam etad akhilaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca veda yaḥ / HV_App.I,42.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:19260: kārtsnyena vidhinā proktaṃ so 'syārthaṃ vedayiṣyati // HV_App.I,42.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:19261: viśvedevās tathā sādhyā rudrādityās tathāśvinau / HV_App.I,42.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:19262: prajānāṃ patayaś caiva sapta caiva maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:19263: manaḥsaṃkalpajāś caiva pūrvajāś ca maharṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,42.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:19264: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for line 22 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19267: daityāḥ piśācā nāgāś ca bhūtāni vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,42.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:19268: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā mlecchādayo bhuvi // HV_App.I,42.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:19270: jaṅgamāni ca sattvāni yac cānyajjīvasaṃjñitam // HV_App.I,42.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:19273: hiraṇyaretās triśikhas tato bhūtvā vṛṣākapiḥ / HV_App.I,42.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:19274: śikhābhir vidhamaṃl lokān saṃśoṣayati dehinaḥ // HV_App.I,42.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:19275: dadyamānās tatas tasya tejorāśibhir agrataḥ / HV_App.I,42.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:19279: brahmāṇam agrataḥ kṛtvā prabhavaṃ viśvatomukham / HV_App.I,42.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:19280: pūrvadevagaṇāś caiva trayastriṃśac ca chandajāḥ // HV_App.I,42.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:19281: tasminn ahani saṃprāpte taṃ haṃsaṃ mahadakṣaram / HV_App.I,42.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:19282: praviśanti mahāyogaṃ hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum // HV_App.I,42.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:19283: teṣāṃ bhūyaḥ praviṣṭānāṃ nidhanotpattir ucyate / HV_App.I,42.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:19284: yathā sūryasya satatam udayāstamayāv iha // HV_App.I,42.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:19285: pūrṇe yugasahasrānte kalpo niḥśeṣa ucyate / HV_App.I,42.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:19286: tasmiñ jīvakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ niḥśeṣam avatiṣṭhate // HV_App.I,42.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:19287: saṃhṛtya lokān sarvān sa sadevāsurapannagān / HV_App.I,42.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:19288: kṛtvātmagarbhaṃ bhagavān āsta eko jagadguruḥ // HV_App.I,42.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:19289: yaḥ sraṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ kalpānteṣu punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,42.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:19290: avyaktaḥ śāśvato devas tasya sarvam idaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,42.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:19294: amaryādākule raudre sarvatas tamasā vṛte // HV_App.I,42.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:19302: vakṣo bibhran mahābāhuḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ // HV_App.I,42.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:19304: patnī cāsya svayaṃ lakṣmīr deham āśritya tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,42.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:19306: kim apy amitavikrānto yoganidrām upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,42.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:19309: tato yugasahasre tu pūrṇe sa puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,42.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:19310: svayam eva vibhur bhūtvā budhyate vibudhādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:19311: tataś cintayate bhūyaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ lokasya lokakṛt / HV_App.I,42.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:19313: tataś cintayate kāryaṃ deveṣu samitiṃjayaḥ / HV_App.I,42.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:19314: saṃbhavaṃ sarvalokasya vidadhāti sa vākpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:19315: kartā caiva vikartā ca saṃhartā ca prajāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:19316: dhātā vidhātā prabhavaḥ saṃyamo niyamo yamaḥ // HV_App.I,42.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:19320: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B1.2 Ds T1.2 G4.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19322: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B1.2 Ds cont., K Ñ1 B3 Dn D1-6 ins. after line 74:k]
GE07hv_apppu:19325: [k: Ñ1.2 V1.3 B Dn2 Ds D3.5.6 T2 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19326: nārāyaṇaparo devo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati / **HV_App.I,42.75**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19327: sa svayaṃbhūr iti jñeyaḥ sa brahmā bhuvanādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,42.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:19328: sa vāyur iti vijñeya eṣa yajñaḥ prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:19329: sadasac ca sa vijñeyaḥ sa yajñaḥ sa prajākaraḥ / HV_App.I,42.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:19330: yad veditavyaṃ tridaśais tad eṣa parivindati / HV_App.I,42.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:19331: yac ca vedyaṃ bhagavato devā api na tad viduḥ // HV_App.I,42.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:19332: prajānāṃ patayaḥ sapta ṛṣayaś ca sahāmaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:19333: nāsyāntam adhigacchanti tenānanta iti śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,42.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:19334: yad asya paramaṃ rūpaṃ tan na paśyanti devatāḥ / HV_App.I,42.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:19335: prādurbhāveṣu saṃbhūtaṃ yat tad arcanti devatāḥ // HV_App.I,42.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:19336: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for line 84:k]
GE07hv_apppu:19337: prādurbhāve tu yad rūpaṃ tad arcanti divaikasaḥ / **HV_App.I,42.84**9:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19338: darśitaṃ yad anenaiva tad avekṣanti devatāḥ / HV_App.I,42.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:19339: yan na darśitavān devaḥ kas tad anveṣṭum arhati // HV_App.I,42.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:19341: tejasas tapasaś caiva nidhānam amṛtasya ca // HV_App.I,42.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:19344: tad eṣa saṃhṛtya jagat kṛtvā garbhastham ātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:19351: tadāsṛjaj jagad idam ātmanā prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:19354: jagadaṇḍam idaṃ sarvam āsīt pūrvaṃ hiraṇmayam / HV_App.I,42.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:19355: prajāpater bhūtimayam itīyaṃ vaidikī śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,42.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:19358: bhūyo 'ṣṭadhā bibhedāṇḍaṃ vibhur vai lokayonikṛt / HV_App.I,42.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:19359: cakāra jagataś cātra vibhāgaṃ sarvabhāgavit // HV_App.I,42.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:19360: yac chidram ūrdhvam ākāśaṃ parā sukṛtināṃ gatiḥ / HV_App.I,42.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:19361: vihitaṃ viśvayogena yad adhas tad rasātalam // HV_App.I,42.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:19362: yad aṇḍam akarot pūrvaṃ devalokasisṛkṣayā / HV_App.I,42.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:19363: samantād aṣṭadhā yogī chidrāṇi kṛtavāṃs tu saḥ / HV_App.I,42.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:19364: diśaś ca vidiśaḥ sarvā manasaivākarod vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:19366: bahuvarṇadharāś citrā babhūvus te balāhakāḥ // HV_App.I,42.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:19367: yad aṇḍamadhye skannaṃ tad dravam āsīt samāhitam / HV_App.I,42.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:19368: jātarūpaṃ tad abhavat tat sarvaṃ pṛthivītale // HV_App.I,42.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:19370: pṛthivī nikhilā rājan yugānte sāgarair iva // HV_App.I,42.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:19371: yac cāṇḍam akarot pūrvaṃ devalokacikīrṣayā / HV_App.I,42.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:19372: tatra yat salilaṃ skannaṃ so 'bhavat kāñcano giriḥ // HV_App.I,42.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:19373: tenāmbhasā plutāḥ sarvā diśaś copadiśas tathā / HV_App.I,42.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:19374: antarikṣaṃ ca nākaṃ ca yac cānyat kiṃcid antaram // HV_App.I,42.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:19375: yatra yatra jalaṃ skannaṃ tatra tatrotthito giriḥ / HV_App.I,42.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:19376: śailaiḥ sahasrair gahanā viṣamā medinī kṛtā // HV_App.I,42.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:19378: pīḍitā gurubhir devī pṛthivī vyathitābhavat // HV_App.I,42.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:19380: hiraṇmayaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ tejo vimalarūpi tat // HV_App.I,42.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:19381: aśaktā vai dhārayitum adhastāt praviveśa ha / HV_App.I,42.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:19382: pīḍyamānā bhagavatas tejasā tena sā kṣitiḥ // HV_App.I,42.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:19383: pṛthivīṃ viśatīṃ dṛṣṭvā tām adho madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:19384: uddhārārthaṃ manaś cakre tasyāḥ sa hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,42.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:19386: matteja eva balavat samāsādya tapasvinī / HV_App.I,42.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:19387: rasātalaṃ viśed devī paṅke gaur iva durbalā // HV_App.I,42.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:19396: tvayātmā dhāryate deva tvayā saṃdhāryate jagat / HV_App.I,42.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:19397: tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni bhuvanaṃ tvaṃ bibharṣi ca // HV_App.I,42.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:19398: yat tvayā dhāryate kiṃcit tejasā ca balena ca / HV_App.I,42.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:19399: tatas tava prasādena mayā paścāt tu dhāryate // HV_App.I,42.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:19400: tvayā dhṛtaṃ dhārayāmi nādhṛtaṃ dhārayāmy aham / HV_App.I,42.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:19401: na hi tad vidyate bhūtaṃ yat tvayā nāvadhāryate // HV_App.I,42.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:19402: tvam eva kuruṣe vīra nārāyaṇa yuge yuge / HV_App.I,42.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:19405: trāyasva māṃ suraśreṣṭha tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gatām // HV_App.I,42.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:19406: dānavaiḥ pīḍyamānāhaṃ rākṣasaiś ca durātmabhiḥ / HV_App.I,42.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:19407: tvām eva śaraṇaṃ nityam upayāmi sanātanam // HV_App.I,42.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:19408: tāvan me 'sti bhayaṃ bhūyo yāvan na tvāṃ kakudminam / HV_App.I,42.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:19409: śaraṇaṃ yāmi manasā śataśo 'py upalakṣitā // HV_App.I,42.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:19411: mā bhair dharaṇi kalyāṇi śāntiṃ vraja samāhitā / HV_App.I,42.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:19412: eṣa tvām ucitaṃ sthānaṃ mānayāmi manīṣitam // HV_App.I,42.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:19414: tato mahātmā manasā divyaṃ rūpam acintayat / HV_App.I,42.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:19415: kiṃ nu rūpam ahaṃ kṛtvā uddharāmi vasuṃdharām // HV_App.I,42.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:19416: jale nimagnāṃ dharaṇīṃ yenāhaṃ vai samuddhare / HV_App.I,42.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:19417: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu devas tatkaraṇe matim // HV_App.I,42.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:19418: jalakrīḍārucis tasmād vārāhaṃ vapur asmarat / HV_App.I,42.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:19419: harir uddharaṇe yuktas tadā bhūmeḥ sa bhūmidhṛk // HV_App.I,42.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:19427: rūpam āsthāya vipulaṃ vārāham amitaṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,42.163 /
GE07hv_apppu:19432: ājyanāsaḥ sruvas tuṇḍaḥ sāmaghoṣasvano mahān // HV_App.I,42.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:19443: bhūtvā yajñavarāho 'sau drāgadhaḥ prāviśad guruḥ // HV_App.I,42.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:19444: adbhiḥ saṃchāditām urvīṃ sa tām ārchat prajāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42.180 /
GE07hv_apppu:19447: tataḥ svasthānam ānīya pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīdharaḥ / HV_App.I,42.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:19448: mumoca pūrvaṃ sahasā dhārayitvā dharādharaḥ // HV_App.I,42.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:19449: tato jagāma nirvāṇaṃ medinī tasya dhāraṇāt / HV_App.I,42.185 /
GE07hv_apppu:19450: cakāra ca namaskāraṃ tasmai devāya śaṃbhave // HV_App.I,42.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:19452: uddhṛtā pṛthivī devī lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,42.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:19453: athoddhṛtya kṣitiṃ devo jagataḥ sthāpanecchayā / HV_App.I,42.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:19455: rasātalagatām evaṃ vicintya sa surottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:19458: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for lines 192-193 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19465: tasyopari jalaughasya mahatī naur iva sthitā / HV_App.I,42.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:19466: vitatatvāt tu dehasya na yayau saṃplavaṃ mahī // HV_App.I,42.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:19467: tataḥ sa cintayām āsa pravibhāgaṃ kṣiter vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.198 /
GE07hv_apppu:19468: samucchrayaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ parvatānāṃ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:19469: vilekhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca gatiṃ prasavam eva ca / HV_App.I,42.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:19470: māhātmyaṃ ca viśeṣaṃ ca nadīnām anvacintayat // HV_App.I,42.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:19471: caturantāṃ dharāṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā caiva mahārṇavam / HV_App.I,42.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:19472: madhye pṛthivyāḥ sauvarṇam akaron meruparvatam // HV_App.I,42.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:19473: prācīṃ diśam atho gatvā cākarodayaparvatam / HV_App.I,42.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:19477: vividhāṃś ca mahāskandhān kāñcanān puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:19478: nityapuṣpaphalān vṛkṣān kṛtavāṃs tatra parvate // HV_App.I,42.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:19480: cakāra sa mahādevaḥ punaḥ saumanasaṃ girim // HV_App.I,42.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:19484: vedikāṃ bahuvarṇāṃ ca saṃdhyābhrābhām akalpayat // HV_App.I,42.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:19488: kṛtavān ātmanaḥ sthānaṃ viśvakarmā prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:19492: cakāra pulinopetāṃ vasudhārām iti śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,42.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:19493: sā diśaṃ nikhilāṃ prācīṃ puṇyair mukhaśataiś citām / HV_App.I,42.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:19496: bhūṣitābhyadhikaṃ kāntaiḥ sā nadītīrajair drumaiḥ // HV_App.I,42.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:19497: kṛtvā prācīvibhāgaṃ tu dakṣiṇāyām atho diśi / HV_App.I,42.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:19498: cakāra parvataṃ ramyaṃ sarvaṃ kāñcanarājatam // HV_App.I,42.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:19500: sa bibhracchuśubhe 'tīva dvau varṇau parvatottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:19501: tejasā yugapad vyāptaṃ sūryācandramasor iva / HV_App.I,42.230 /
GE07hv_apppu:19502: vapuṣmantam atho tatra bhānumantaṃ mahāgirim // HV_App.I,42.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:19503: sarvakāmaphalair vṛkṣair vṛtaṃ ramyair manoramaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:19506: ṛṣabhapratimaṃ caiva ṛṣabhaṃ nāma parvatam // HV_App.I,42.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:19508: mahendram atha śailendraṃ śatayojanam ucchritam // HV_App.I,42.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:19510: medinyāṃ kṛtavān devaḥ pratikṣobham ivācalam // HV_App.I,42.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:19514: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śubhaṃ cakāra sa mahācalam / HV_App.I,42.243 /
GE07hv_apppu:19518: suramyāṃ toyakalilāṃ vicitrāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam / HV_App.I,42.247 /
GE07hv_apppu:19520: diśaṃ yāmyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pratīcīṃ diśam āgamat / HV_App.I,42.249 /
GE07hv_apppu:19521: akarot tatra śailendraṃ śatayojanam ucchritam / HV_App.I,42.250 /
GE07hv_apppu:19522: śobhitaṃ śikharaiś citraiḥ supravṛddhair hiraṇmayaiḥ // HV_App.I,42.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:19523: kāñcanībhiḥ śilābhiś ca guhābhiś ca vibhūṣitam / HV_App.I,42.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:19524: samākulaṃ sūryanibhaiḥ sālais tālaiś ca bhāsvaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:19525: śuśubhe jātarūpaiś ca śrīmadbhiś citravedikaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:19527: merupratimarūpāṇi vapuṣā prabhayā ca ha // HV_App.I,42.256 //
GE07hv_apppu:19531: ātmarūpopamaṃ tatra vārāhaṃ nāma nāmataḥ / HV_App.I,42.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:19532: niveśayām āsa vibhur divyaṃ vaidūryaparvatam / HV_App.I,42.261 /
GE07hv_apppu:19533: rājatāḥ kāñcanāś caiva yatra divyāḥ śiloccayāḥ // HV_App.I,42.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:19540: śubhām atirasāṃ caiva ghṛtadhārām iti śrutiḥ / HV_App.I,42.269 /
GE07hv_apppu:19541: varāhaḥ saritaṃ puṇyāṃ pratīcyām akarot prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.270 //
GE07hv_apppu:19542: pratīcyāṃ saṃvidhiṃ kṛtvā parvatān kāñcanojjvalān / HV_App.I,42.271 /
GE07hv_apppu:19546: sa tu deśo visūryo 'pi tasya bhāsā prakāśate // HV_App.I,42.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:19547: tasya lakṣmyādhikaṃ bhāti tapatā raviṇā yathā / HV_App.I,42.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:19550: cakāra ratnasaṃkīrṇaṃ bhūyo 'staṃ nāma parvatam // HV_App.I,42.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:19555: giriṃ triśikharaṃ caiva tathā puṣkaraparvatam / HV_App.I,42.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:19556: śubhraṃ pāṇḍurameghābhaṃ kailāsaṃ ca nagottamam // HV_App.I,42.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:19558: niveśayām āsa harir vārāhīṃ tanum āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:19559: nadīṃ sarvaguṇopetām uttarasyāṃ diśi prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:19560: madhudhārāṃ sa kṛtavān divyāṃ mukhaśatākulām // HV_App.I,42.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:19561: sarve caiva kṣitidharāḥ sapakṣāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:19562: tadā kṛtā bhagavatā vicitrāḥ parameṣṭhinā // HV_App.I,42.291 //
GE07hv_apppu:19563: sa kṛtvā pravibhāgaṃ tu pṛthivyā lokabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:19571: jagatsraṣṭumanā devaś cintayām āsa pūrvajaḥ / HV_App.I,42.298 /
GE07hv_apppu:19572: tasya cintayato vaktrān niḥsṛtaḥ puruṣaḥ kila // HV_App.I,42.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:19573: tataḥ sa puruṣo devaṃ kiṃ karomīty upasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,42.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:19574: prayuvāca smitaṃ kṛtvā devadevo jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42.301 /
GE07hv_apppu:19575: vibhajātmānam ity uktvā gato 'ntardhānam īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42.302 //
GE07hv_apppu:19577: praśāntasyeva dīpasya gatis tasya na vidyate // HV_App.I,42.304 //
GE07hv_apppu:19578: tatas teneritāṃ vāṇīṃ so 'nvacintayata prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.305 /
GE07hv_apppu:19579: hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān ya eṣa cchandasi śrutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.306 //
GE07hv_apppu:19580: eṣa prajāpatiḥ pūrvam abhavad bhuvanādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,42.307 /
GE07hv_apppu:19585: vibhajātmānam ity uktas tenāsmi sumahātmanā / HV_App.I,42.309 /
GE07hv_apppu:19586: katham ātmā vibhajyaḥ syāt saṃśayo hy atra me mahān // HV_App.I,42.310 //
GE07hv_apppu:19587: iti cintayatas tasya om ity evotthitaḥ svaraḥ / HV_App.I,42.311 /
GE07hv_apppu:19588: sa bhūmāv antarikṣe ca nāke ca kṛtavān svanam // HV_App.I,42.312 //
GE07hv_apppu:19589: taṃ caivābhyasatas tasya manasāramayat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.313 /
GE07hv_apppu:19594: tatpadaṃ saṃsmaran divyāṃ sāvitrīm akarot prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.318 //
GE07hv_apppu:19596: cakāra nikhilān vedān brahmayuktena karmaṇā // HV_App.I,42.320 //
GE07hv_apppu:19597: tatas tasyaiva manasaḥ sanaḥ sanaka eva ca / HV_App.I,42.321 /
GE07hv_apppu:19598: sanātanaś ca bhagavān varadaś ca sanandanaḥ // HV_App.I,42.322 //
GE07hv_apppu:19599: sanatkumāraś ca vibhus tatra jajñe sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.323 /
GE07hv_apppu:19600: mānasāś caiva pūrvādyā ity ete ṣaṇmaharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.324 //
GE07hv_apppu:19601: brahmāṇaṃ kapilaṃ caiva ṣaḍ etāṃś caiva yoginaḥ / HV_App.I,42.325 /
GE07hv_apppu:19602: yatayo yogatantreṣu yān stuvanti dvijātayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.326 //
GE07hv_apppu:19603: tato marīcim atriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum / HV_App.I,42.327 /
GE07hv_apppu:19604: bhṛgum aṅgirasaṃ caiva manuṃ caiva prajāpatim // HV_App.I,42.328 //
GE07hv_apppu:19606: maharṣīn asṛjac chaṃbhur aṣṭāv etāṃs tu mānasān // HV_App.I,42.330 //
GE07hv_apppu:19607: ete yugasahasrānte yāś caiṣām abhavan prajāḥ / HV_App.I,42.331 /
GE07hv_apppu:19608: kalpe niḥśeṣamukte tu tato gacchanti nirvṛtim // HV_App.I,42.332 //
GE07hv_apppu:19611: bhūyo varṣasahasrānte utpattis tu vidhīyate / HV_App.I,42.333 /
GE07hv_apppu:19613: kiṃ tu karmaviśeṣeṇa devatānāṃ yuge yuge / HV_App.I,42.335 /
GE07hv_apppu:19615: aṅguṣṭhād dakṣiṇād dakṣa utpanno bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / HV_App.I,42.337 /
GE07hv_apppu:19616: tasthaiva tu punar bhāryā vāmāṅguṣṭhād ajāyata // HV_App.I,42.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:19617: tatra tasyābhavat kanyā viśrutā lokamātaraḥ / HV_App.I,42.339 /
GE07hv_apppu:19618: yābhir vyāptās trayo lokāḥ prajābhir manujādhipa // HV_App.I,42.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:19619: aditiṃ ca ditiṃ kālām anāyuṃ siṃhikāṃ munim / HV_App.I,42.341 /
GE07hv_apppu:19620: prādhāṃ krodhāṃ ca surabhiṃ vinatāṃ surasāṃ tathā // HV_App.I,42.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:19622: irāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva surasāṃ ca trayodaśa / **HV_App.I,42.342**16:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19623: danuṃ kadrūṃ ca duhitṝḥ pradadau kaśyapāya tu / HV_App.I,42.343 /
GE07hv_apppu:19625: arundhatīṃ vasuṃ yāmīṃ lambāṃ bhānuṃ marutvatīm / HV_App.I,42.345 /
GE07hv_apppu:19626: saṃkalpāṃ ca muhūrtāṃ ca sādhyāṃ viśvāṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,42.346 //
GE07hv_apppu:19627: manave brahmaputrāya kanyā dakṣo dadau daśa / HV_App.I,42.347 /
GE07hv_apppu:19628: tāś ca sarvān avadyāṅgyaḥ kanyāḥ kamalalocanāḥ // HV_App.I,42.348 //
GE07hv_apppu:19629: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 B1.3 Ds D3-6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19631: kīrtiṃ lakṣmīṃ dhṛtiṃ puṣṭiṃ buddhiṃ medhāṃ kriyāṃ tathā / HV_App.I,42.349 /
GE07hv_apppu:19632: matiṃ lajjāṃ vasuṃ caiva dakṣo dharmāya vai dadau // HV_App.I,42.350 //
GE07hv_apppu:19633: ātreyas tu tato bhūtas tasya toyātmakaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.351 /
GE07hv_apppu:19634: putro gṛhāṇām adhipaḥ sahasrāṃśus tamisrahā // HV_App.I,42.352 //
GE07hv_apppu:19636: rohiṇīpramukhāḥ kanyā dakṣaḥ prācetaso dadau // HV_App.I,42.354 //
GE07hv_apppu:19637: etāsāṃ putrapautraṃ tu procyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu / HV_App.I,42.355 /
GE07hv_apppu:19638: kaśyapasya manoś caiva dharmasya śaśinas tathā // HV_App.I,42.356 //
GE07hv_apppu:19639: aryamā varuṇo mitraḥ pūṣā dhātā puraṃdaraḥ / HV_App.I,42.357 /
GE07hv_apppu:19640: tvaṣṭā bhago 'ṃśaḥ savitā parjanyaś ceti viśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,42.358 //
GE07hv_apppu:19641: adityāṃ jajñire devāḥ kaśyapasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.359 /
GE07hv_apppu:19642: dityāṃ putradvayaṃ jajño kaśyapād iti naḥ śrutam // HV_App.I,42.360 //
GE07hv_apppu:19643: hiraṇyakaśipuś caiva hiraṇyākṣaś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,42.361 /
GE07hv_apppu:19644: dvāv apy amitavikrāntau tapasā kaśyapopamau // HV_App.I,42.362 //
GE07hv_apppu:19652: bhavāya tu bhavaṃ devaṃ śrīgarbhaṃ parameśvaram / **HV_App.I,42.362**18:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:19654: akṣayaṃ paramaṃ devam avyayaṃ bhavanaṃ param / **HV_App.I,42.362**18:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:19655: parāc ca paramaṃ devaṃ parāvaraparaṃ param // **HV_App.I,42.362**18:10 //
GE07hv_apppu:19661: [k: K1.2 Ñ1 B Ds D4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19662: prahrādaś caiva saṃhrādas tathānuhrāda eva ca / **HV_App.I,42.363**19:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19663: hradaś caiva tu vikrāntaḥ pañcamo 'nuhradas tathā // **HV_App.I,42.363**19:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19664: prahrādaḥ pūrvajas teṣām anuhrādas tato 'paraḥ // HV_App.I,42.364 //
GE07hv_apppu:19665: saṃhrādaś caiva hrādaś ca kanīyāṃsau babhūvatuḥ / HV_App.I,42.365 /
GE07hv_apppu:19666: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 B1.2 Dn Ds D3.4.6 T2 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19668: virocanaś ca prāhrādir daityendro 'bhūn mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,42.366 //
GE07hv_apppu:19669: virocanaś ca jambhaś ca sujambhaś ceti viśrutāḥ / HV_App.I,42.367 /
GE07hv_apppu:19672: balir virocanasuto bāṇa eko baleḥ sutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.368 //
GE07hv_apppu:19675: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 368:k]
GE07hv_apppu:19676: bales tu putro balavān bāṇa eva pratāpavān // **HV_App.I,42.368**23:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:19677: anuhlādasya ye putrā khyātāḥ sarvatra bhārata / **HV_App.I,42.368**23:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:19678: danoḥ putrās tu bahavo vaṃśe khyātā mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,42.369 /
GE07hv_apppu:19679: vipracittiḥ prathamajas teṣāṃ rājā babhūva ha // HV_App.I,42.370 //
GE07hv_apppu:19680: gaṇaḥ prajajñe krodhāyāḥ putrapautram anantakam / HV_App.I,42.371 /
GE07hv_apppu:19681: raudrāḥ krodhavaśā nāma krūrakarmāṇa eva te // HV_App.I,42.372 //
GE07hv_apppu:19682: siṃhikā suṣuve rāhuṃ grahaṃ candrārkamardanam / HV_App.I,42.373 /
GE07hv_apppu:19683: grastāraṃ caiva candrasya sūryasya ca vināśanam // HV_App.I,42.374 //
GE07hv_apppu:19684: kālāyāḥ kālakalpas tu gaṇaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42.375 /
GE07hv_apppu:19686: sahasraśīrṣā śeṣaś ca vāsukis takṣakas tathā / HV_App.I,42.377 /
GE07hv_apppu:19687: bahūnāṃ kadruputrāṇām ete prādhānyam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,42.378 //
GE07hv_apppu:19688: dharmātmāno vedavidaḥ sadā prāṇihite ratāḥ / HV_App.I,42.379 /
GE07hv_apppu:19690: tārkṣyaś cāriṣṭanemiś ca garuḍaś ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42.381 /
GE07hv_apppu:19691: aruṇaś cāruṇiś caiva vinatāyāḥ sutāḥ smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,42.382 //
GE07hv_apppu:19692: imāś cāpsarasaḥ puṇyā vividhāḥ puṇyalakṣaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,42.383 /
GE07hv_apppu:19694: anavadyām anūkāṃ ca anūnām aruṇapriyām / HV_App.I,42.385 /
GE07hv_apppu:19695: anugāṃ subhagāṃ caiva striyaḥ prādhā vyajāyata // HV_App.I,42.386 //
GE07hv_apppu:19697: surūpā lakṣmaṇā kṣemā tathā rambhā manoramā // HV_App.I,42.388 //
GE07hv_apppu:19698: amitā ca subāhū ca suvṛttā sumukhī tathā / HV_App.I,42.389 /
GE07hv_apppu:19699: supriyā ca sugandhā ca surathā ca pramāthinī // HV_App.I,42.390 //
GE07hv_apppu:19700: kāśyā śāradvatī caiva mauneyāpsarasaḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42.391 /
GE07hv_apppu:19701: viśvāvasur bharaṇyā ca gandharvāś caiva viśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,42.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:19702: menakā sahajanyā ca parṇinī puñjikasthalā / HV_App.I,42.393 /
GE07hv_apppu:19703: ghṛtasthalā ghṛtācī ca viśvācī corvaśī tathā // HV_App.I,42.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:19704: anumloceti vikhyātā pramloceti ca tā daśa / HV_App.I,42.395 /
GE07hv_apppu:19705: manovatī tathā caiva divyā apsarasaḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:19706: prajāpates tu saṃkalpāt saṃbhūtā bhuvanaśriyaḥ // HV_App.I,42.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:19707: amṛtaṃ brāhmaṇā gāvo rudrāśceti catuṣṭayam / HV_App.I,42.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:19708: surabhyapatyam ity etat purāṇe niścayo mahān // HV_App.I,42.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:19709: etad vai kaśyapāpatyaṃ manor vaṃśaṃ nibodhata / HV_App.I,42.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:19711: viśvedevās tu viśvāyāḥ sādhyā sādhyān vyajāyata / HV_App.I,42.402 /
GE07hv_apppu:19712: marutvatyā marutvanto vasos tu vasavaḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42.403 /
GE07hv_apppu:19713: bhānos tu bhānavas tāta muhūrtās tu muhūrtajāḥ // HV_App.I,42.404 //
GE07hv_apppu:19714: lambā ghoṣaṃ vijajñe 'tha nāgavīthī ca jāmijā / HV_App.I,42.405 /
GE07hv_apppu:19716: saṃkalpāyās tu kauravya jajñe saṃkalpa eva ca / HV_App.I,42.407 /
GE07hv_apppu:19717: dharmasya putro lakṣmyās tu kāmo jajñe jagatpriyaḥ // HV_App.I,42.408 //
GE07hv_apppu:19718: yaśo harṣaś ca kāmasya ratyāṃ putradvayaṃ smṛtam / HV_App.I,42.409 /
GE07hv_apppu:19719: somasya putro rohiṇyāṃ jajñe varcā mahāprabhaḥ // HV_App.I,42.410 //
GE07hv_apppu:19720: udayann eva bhagavān varcasvī yena jāyate // HV_App.I,42.411 //
GE07hv_apppu:19722: purūravāś ca bhagavān urvaśī yena yujyate / **HV_App.I,42.411**24:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19723: evaṃ putrasahasrāṇi strīṇāṃ caiva parasparam / HV_App.I,42.412 /
GE07hv_apppu:19724: etāvat tu jaganmūlaṃ yatra lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // HV_App.I,42.413 //
GE07hv_apppu:19725: prajāpatis tu bhagavān guṇataḥ prekṣya dehinaḥ / HV_App.I,42.414 /
GE07hv_apppu:19727: diśo daśa kṣitim ṛṣayo 'rṇavān nagān @ HV_App.I,42.416 @
GE07hv_apppu:19730: kriyā makhān atha kṛtavān girīṃś ca saḥ // HV_App.I,42.419 //
GE07hv_apppu:19733: trayāṇām api lokānām ādityānāṃ ca bhārata / HV_App.I,42.420 /
GE07hv_apppu:19735: sa vajrī kavacī jiṣṇur adityām abhijajñivān / HV_App.I,42.422 /
GE07hv_apppu:19736: smṛtīsahāyo dyutimān yathā so 'dhvaryubhiḥ stutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:19737: jātamātro 'tha bhagavān adityā sa kuśair vṛtah / HV_App.I,42.424 /
GE07hv_apppu:19740: brahmā krameṇa rājyāni vyādeṣṭum upacakrame // HV_App.I,42.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:19741: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva nakṣatragrahayos tathā / HV_App.I,42.428 /
GE07hv_apppu:19742: dvijānām oṣadhīnāṃ ca somaṃ rājye 'bhyaṣecayat // HV_App.I,42.429 //
GE07hv_apppu:19743: dakṣaṃ prajāpatīnāṃ tu ambhasāṃ varuṇaṃ patim / HV_App.I,42.430 /
GE07hv_apppu:19746: gandharvāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ mahādevaḥ kṛtaḥ prabhuḥ / **HV_App.I,42.431**25:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19747: gandharvāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ ca śarīriṇām / HV_App.I,42.432 /
GE07hv_apppu:19748: śabdakālabalānāṃ ca vāyur īśas tadā kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.433 //
GE07hv_apppu:19749: sarvabhūtapiśācānāṃ mātṝṇāṃ ca gavāṃ tathā / HV_App.I,42.434 /
GE07hv_apppu:19751: pretānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ mahādevaḥ kṛtaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.436 /
GE07hv_apppu:19752: yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca guhyakānāṃ dhanasya ca // HV_App.I,42.437 //
GE07hv_apppu:19753: ratnānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ kṛto vaiśravaṇaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.438 /
GE07hv_apppu:19754: sarveṣāṃ daṃṣṭriṇāṃ śeṣo nāgānām atha vāsukiḥ / HV_App.I,42.439 /
GE07hv_apppu:19755: sarīsṛṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhur vai takṣakaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:19756: sāgarāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ ca meghānāṃ varṣitasya ca / HV_App.I,42.441 /
GE07hv_apppu:19758: gandharvāṇām adhipatiṃ cakre citrarathaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,42.443 /
GE07hv_apppu:19759: sarvāpsarogaṇānāṃ ca kāmadevaḥ kṛtaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.444 //
GE07hv_apppu:19760: catuṣpadānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42.445 /
GE07hv_apppu:19762: daityānāṃ ca mahātejā hiraṇyākṣaḥ prabhuḥ kṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,42.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:19763: dānavānāṃ ca sarveṣām anīkānāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:19766: gaṇānāṃ kālakeyānāṃ mahākālaḥ kṛtaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.451 /
GE07hv_apppu:19767: anāyuṣāyāḥ putrāṇāṃ vṛtro rājā tadā kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.452 //
GE07hv_apppu:19770: siṃhikātanayo yas tu rāhur nāma mahāgrahaḥ / HV_App.I,42.453 /
GE07hv_apppu:19771: utpātānām anekānām aśubhānāṃ patiḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.454 //
GE07hv_apppu:19772: ṛtūnām atha sarveṣāṃ yugānāṃ caiva bhārata / HV_App.I,42.455 /
GE07hv_apppu:19773: pakṣāṇāṃ ca kṣapāṇāṃ ca tathāhastithiparvaṇām // HV_App.I,42.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:19775: kṛtaḥ saṃvatsaro rājā yogasya gaṇitasya ca // HV_App.I,42.458 //
GE07hv_apppu:19776: pakṣiṇām atha sarveṣāṃ nāgānāṃ ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42.459 /
GE07hv_apppu:19777: suparṇo bhogināṃ caiva guruḍo 'dhipatiḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.460 //
GE07hv_apppu:19779: [k: Ñ2 Bombay Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19780: yogānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ sādhyānām adhipaḥ kṛtaḥ // **HV_App.I,42.461**27:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:19785: rājā prācyāṃ diśi tathā vāsavo 'dhipatiḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:19786: ādityasya vibhoḥ putro dharmarājo mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,42.463 /
GE07hv_apppu:19789: amburāja iti khyātaḥ pratīcyāṃ diśi pārthivaḥ // HV_App.I,42.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:19791: ekākṣaḥ piṅgalo nāma saumyāyāṃ diśi pārthivaḥ // HV_App.I,42.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:19792: evaṃ vibhajya rājyāni svayaṃbhūr lokabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.469 /
GE07hv_apppu:19793: lokāṃś ca tridive divyān adadāt sa pṛthak pṛthak // HV_App.I,42.470 //
GE07hv_apppu:19798: ye ca bhāsā vibhānty agre saumyās tārāgaṇā iva / HV_App.I,42.475 /
GE07hv_apppu:19799: ete sukṛtināṃ lokā ye jātāḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:19800: ye yajanti makhaiḥ puṇyaiḥ samāptavaradakṣiṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.477 /
GE07hv_apppu:19803: te tyaktarajasaḥ śāntā yānti tatra tapojjvalāḥ // HV_App.I,42.480 //
GE07hv_apppu:19804: evaṃ niyujya tanayān svayaṃ lokapitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,42.481 /
GE07hv_apppu:19810: yaśo divaṃ ca pratipedire śubhaṃ @ HV_App.I,42.487 @
GE07hv_apppu:19814: kadācit tu sapakṣās te parvatā dharaṇīdharāḥ / HV_App.I,42.489 /
GE07hv_apppu:19815: prasthitā dharaṇīṃ tyaktvā nūnaṃ tasyaiva māyayā // HV_App.I,42.490 //
GE07hv_apppu:19817: diśaṃ pratīcīm āgamya hrade 'majjan yathā gajāḥ // HV_App.I,42.492 //
GE07hv_apppu:19819: tac chrutvāthāsurāḥ sarve cakrur udyogam uttamam // HV_App.I,42.494 //
GE07hv_apppu:19820: krūrāṃ ca buddhim atulāṃ pṛthivīharaṇe ratāḥ / HV_App.I,42.495 /
GE07hv_apppu:19821: āyudhāni ca sarvaṇi jagṛhur bhīmavikramāḥ // HV_App.I,42.496 //
GE07hv_apppu:19822: cakrāśanīṃs tathā khaḍgān bhuśuṇḍīś ca dhanūṃṣi ca / HV_App.I,42.497 /
GE07hv_apppu:19823: prāsān pāśāṃś ca śaktīś ca musalāni gadās tathā // HV_App.I,42.498 //
GE07hv_apppu:19824: kecit kavacinaḥ sajjā mattān nāgān samāsthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42.499 /
GE07hv_apppu:19825: kecid aśvarathān yuktā apare 'śvā mahārathāḥ // HV_App.I,42.500 //
GE07hv_apppu:19826: kecid uṣṭrāṃs tathā khaḍgān mahiṣān gardabhān api / HV_App.I,42.501 /
GE07hv_apppu:19827: svabāhubalam āsthāya kecic cāpi padātayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.502 //
GE07hv_apppu:19829: itaś cetaś ca niścerur hṛṣṭāḥ sarve yuyutsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42.504 //
GE07hv_apppu:19831: daityānāṃ viditodyogāś cakrur udyogam uttamam // HV_App.I,42.506 //
GE07hv_apppu:19834: ugrāyudhadharā devāḥ sveṣv anīkeṣv avasthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42.509 /
GE07hv_apppu:19836: tatas tūryaninādaiś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.511 /
GE07hv_apppu:19839: musalaiḥ paṭṭisaiś caiva chādayām āsa vāsavam // HV_App.I,42.514 //
GE07hv_apppu:19842: śiṣṭāś ca daityā balinaḥ śitadhārāparaśvadhaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.517 /
GE07hv_apppu:19843: parighair āyasaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42.518 //
GE07hv_apppu:19844: gaṇḍaśailaiś ca vipulair aśmabhiś cādrisaṃnibhaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.519 /
GE07hv_apppu:19845: ghātanībhiś ca gurvībhiḥ śataghnībhis tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42.520 //
GE07hv_apppu:19846: yugair yantraiś ca nirmuktair argalaiś ca vidāraṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.521 /
GE07hv_apppu:19847: sarvān devagaṇān daityāḥ saṃnijaghnuḥ savāsavān // HV_App.I,42.522 //
GE07hv_apppu:19852: samudyatāyudhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve devagaṇās tadā / HV_App.I,42.527 /
GE07hv_apppu:19853: te hiraṇyākṣam asuraṃ daityānām agrataḥ sthitam // HV_App.I,42.528 //
GE07hv_apppu:19854: yugāntasamaye bhīmaṃ sthitaṃ mṛtyum ivāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,42.529 /
GE07hv_apppu:19855: pravivyathuḥ surāḥ sarve tadā śakrapurogamāḥ // HV_App.I,42.530 //
GE07hv_apppu:19856: dṛṣṭvāyāntaṃ hiraṇyākṣaṃ mahādrim iva jaṅgamam / HV_App.I,42.531 /
GE07hv_apppu:19859: sā tu daityacamū reje hiraṇyakavacojjvalā / HV_App.I,42.534 /
GE07hv_apppu:19862: babhañjur bāhubhir bāhūn dvaṃdvam anye yuyutsavaḥ / HV_App.I,42.537 /
GE07hv_apppu:19863: gadānipātair bhagnāṅgā bāṇaiś ca mathitorasaḥ // HV_App.I,42.538 //
GE07hv_apppu:19864: vinipetuḥ pṛthak kecit tathānye vijughūrṇire / HV_App.I,42.539 /
GE07hv_apppu:19865: babhañjire rathān kecit kecit saṃmṛditā rathaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.540 /
GE07hv_apppu:19866: saṃbādham anye saṃprāptā na śekuś calituṃ rathāḥ // HV_App.I,42.541 //
GE07hv_apppu:19867: dānavendrabalaṃ tat tu devānāṃ ca mahad balam / HV_App.I,42.542 /
GE07hv_apppu:19869: hiraṇyākṣaś ca balavān kruddhaḥ sa ditinandanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.544 /
GE07hv_apppu:19870: vyavardhata mahātejāḥ samudra iva parvaṇi // HV_App.I,42.545 //
GE07hv_apppu:19871: tasya kruddhasya sahasā mukhān niścerur arciṣaḥ / HV_App.I,42.546 /
GE07hv_apppu:19873: śastrajālair bahuvidhair dhanurbhiḥ parighair api / HV_App.I,42.548 /
GE07hv_apppu:19874: divyam ākāśam āvavre parvatair ucchritair iva // HV_App.I,42.549 //
GE07hv_apppu:19876: na śekuś calituṃ devā hiraṇyākṣārditā yudhi // HV_App.I,42.551 //
GE07hv_apppu:19877: tena vitrāsitā devā hiraṇyākṣeṇa saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42.552 /
GE07hv_apppu:19878: na śekur yatnavanto 'pi yatnaṃ kartuṃ vicetasaḥ // HV_App.I,42.553 //
GE07hv_apppu:19879: tena śakraḥ sahasrākṣaḥ stambhito 'streṇa dhīmatā / HV_App.I,42.554 /
GE07hv_apppu:19880: airāvatagataḥ saṃkhye nāśakac calituṃ bhayāt // HV_App.I,42.555 //
GE07hv_apppu:19881: sarvāṃś ca devān akhilān sa parājitya dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42.556 /
GE07hv_apppu:19882: stambhayitvā ca deveśam ātmasthaṃ manyate jagat // HV_App.I,42.557 //
GE07hv_apppu:19889: niṣprayatne surapatau dharṣiteṣu sureṣu ca / HV_App.I,42.562 /
GE07hv_apppu:19891: vārāhaḥ parvato nāma yaḥ pūrvaṃ samudāhṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,42.564 /
GE07hv_apppu:19892: sa eṣa bhūtvā bhagavān ājagāmāsurāntakṛt // HV_App.I,42.565 //
GE07hv_apppu:19893: tataś candrapratīkāśaṃ so 'gṛhṇāc chaṅkham uttamam / HV_App.I,42.566 /
GE07hv_apppu:19896: japyate yo 'maraiḥ sarvair guhyair nāmabhir avyayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.569 //
GE07hv_apppu:19897: sa ca sarvātmani śreṣṭhaḥ sadbhir yaḥ sevyate sadā / HV_App.I,42.570 /
GE07hv_apppu:19898: ijyate ca purāṇaiś ca triloke lokabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,42.571 //
GE07hv_apppu:19899: yo vaikuṇṭhaḥ surendrāṇām ananto bhoginām api / HV_App.I,42.572 /
GE07hv_apppu:19900: viṣṇur yo yogaviduṣāṃ yo yajño yajñakarmaṇi // HV_App.I,42.573 //
GE07hv_apppu:19901: makhe yasya prasādena bhuvanasthā divaukasaḥ / HV_App.I,42.574 /
GE07hv_apppu:19902: ājyaṃ maharṣibhir dattam aśnuvanti tridhā hutam // HV_App.I,42.575 //
GE07hv_apppu:19903: yo naidhano 'gnir daityānāṃ yaḥ surāṇāṃ parā gatiḥ / HV_App.I,42.576 /
GE07hv_apppu:19904: yaḥ pavitraṃ pavitrāṇāṃ svayaṃbhor api yo vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.577 //
GE07hv_apppu:19905: yasya cakrapraviṣṭāni dānavānāṃ yuge yuge / HV_App.I,42.578 /
GE07hv_apppu:19906: kulāny ākulatāṃ yānti yāni dṛptāni vīryataḥ // HV_App.I,42.579 //
GE07hv_apppu:19907: tato daityadravakaraṃ paurāṇaṃ śaṅkham uttamam / HV_App.I,42.580 /
GE07hv_apppu:19908: dadhmau prāṇena balavān vikṣipan daityajīvitam // HV_App.I,42.581 //
GE07hv_apppu:19909: śrutvā śaṅkhasvanaṃ ghoram asurāṇāṃ bhayāvaham / HV_App.I,42.582 /
GE07hv_apppu:19910: kṣubhitā dānavāḥ sarve diśo daśa vilokayan // HV_App.I,42.583 //
GE07hv_apppu:19912: ko 'yam ity abravīd roṣān nārāyaṇam udaikṣata // HV_App.I,42.585 //
GE07hv_apppu:19913: varāharūpiṇaṃ devaṃ saṃsthitaṃ puruṣaṃ yathā / HV_App.I,42.586 /
GE07hv_apppu:19916: sūryācandramasor madhye yathā nīlaḥ payodharaḥ // HV_App.I,42.589 //
GE07hv_apppu:19920: na cacāla harir yuddhe 'kampamāna ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,42.593 //
GE07hv_apppu:19922: tataḥ kruddho hiraṇyākṣaḥ provāca harim uddhataḥ / **HV_App.I,42.593**29:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19923: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha na me 'dya tvaṃ mokṣyase sahajīvitaḥ // **HV_App.I,42.593**29:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19924: tataḥ prajvalitāṃ śaktiṃ varāhorasi dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42.594 /
GE07hv_apppu:19925: hiraṇyākṣo mahātejāḥ pātayām āsa vīryavān / HV_App.I,42.595 /
GE07hv_apppu:19926: tasyāḥ śaktyāḥ prahāreṇa brahmā vismayam āgataḥ // HV_App.I,42.596 //
GE07hv_apppu:19927: [k: B D4 Bombay Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19930: tasyāṃ pratihatāyāṃ tu brahmā sādhv iti cābravīt / HV_App.I,42.597 /
GE07hv_apppu:19931: yaḥ prabhuḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ varāhas tena tāḍitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.598 //
GE07hv_apppu:19936: tataś ca bhagavān viṣṇur durvijñeyagatiḥ prabhuḥ / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:19938: mahāvarāhaṃ daityendro muṣṭinā taṃ jaghāna ha // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:19939: tayor yuddhaṃ mahac cāsīd devadaityendrayos tadā / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:19940: tayoḥ śabdo mahān āsīd bāhvoḥ saṃkṣobhajas tadā // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:19941: kṣubdhā devās tadā sarve bhītās tatrāvatathire / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:19943: tasmin yuddhe mahāghore sanakādyās tato harim / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:11 /
GE07hv_apppu:19966: nirvighnāḥ santu lokāś ca dānavasya vadhād dhare // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:34 //
GE07hv_apppu:19967: ete devā namasyanti bhītās tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:35 /
GE07hv_apppu:19969: ity uktvā te munivarā vācam āyamya saṃsthitāḥ / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:37 /
GE07hv_apppu:19970: devāś ca munayaś caiva saṃsthitā bhayaviklavāḥ // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:38 //
GE07hv_apppu:19973: evaṃ stuto jagannātho vavṛdhe viṣṇur avyayaḥ / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:39 /
GE07hv_apppu:19974: dānavasya karaṃ gṛhya balād daṇḍam ivāyasam // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:40 //
GE07hv_apppu:19983: nanāda bhūyo 'pi tato balāt sa tam / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:49 /
GE07hv_apppu:20010: evaṃ bahūni yuddhāni kṛtvā tau devadānavau / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:76 /
GE07hv_apppu:20012: niśceṣṭaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ prādur āsīt samantataḥ / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:78 /
GE07hv_apppu:20013: evaṃ saṃkrīḍya bahudhā daityaṃ hantuṃ mano dadhe // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:79 //
GE07hv_apppu:20016: tato bhagavatā cakram āvidhyād ity asaṃnibham / HV_App.I,42.599 /
GE07hv_apppu:20018: tataḥ sthitasyaiva śiras tasya bhūmau papāta ha / HV_App.I,42.601 /
GE07hv_apppu:20020: hiraṇyākṣe hate daitye ye śeṣās tatra dānavāḥ / HV_App.I,42.603 /
GE07hv_apppu:20021: sarve tasya bhayatrastā jagmur ārtā diśo daśa // HV_App.I,42.604 //
GE07hv_apppu:20028: vidrāvya tu raṇe sarvān asurān puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,42.609 /
GE07hv_apppu:20029: mumoca tatra baddhāṃs tān puraṃdaramukhān surān // HV_App.I,42.610 //
GE07hv_apppu:20030: tataḥ prakṛtim āpannāḥ sarve devagaṇās tadā / HV_App.I,42.611 /
GE07hv_apppu:20037: tvatprasādena bhagavaṃs tava bāhubalena ca / HV_App.I,42.613 /
GE07hv_apppu:20038: [k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after the ref. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20039: natāḥ sma devadeveśa tvāṃ vayaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ / **HV_App.I,42.613**33:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20040: natāḥ sma viṣṇuṃ sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ bhūtabhāvanam // **HV_App.I,42.613**33:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20042: natāḥ sma bhūtabhavyeśam īḍyam ādiguruṃ harim // **HV_App.I,42.613**33:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:20043: natāḥ sma varuṇaṃ devam arcitaṃ bhuvaneśvaram / **HV_App.I,42.613**33:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:20046: namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ sarvakartre namo namaḥ // **HV_App.I,42.613**33:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:20048: namaḥ sraṣṭe namo hartre namaḥ kartre jagatpate / **HV_App.I,42.613**33:10 /
GE07hv_apppu:20049: namo goptre jagannātha namaḥ sthātre namo namaḥ // **HV_App.I,42.613**33:11 //
GE07hv_apppu:20050: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante yogino yatacetasaḥ / **HV_App.I,42.613**33:12 /
GE07hv_apppu:20051: tasmai tubhyaṃ pradhānātman sarvāya jagataḥ pate // **HV_App.I,42.613**33:13 //
GE07hv_apppu:20055: tvacchāsanād dhi bhagavan kiṃ kurvantv aditeḥ sutāḥ / HV_App.I,42.615 /
GE07hv_apppu:20056: icchāmaḥ pādaśuśrūṣāṃ tava kartuṃ sanātana // HV_App.I,42.616 //
GE07hv_apppu:20057: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ puṇḍarīkanibhekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42.617 /
GE07hv_apppu:20058: uvāca vacanaṃ devān mudā yukto hatadviṣaḥ // HV_App.I,42.618 //
GE07hv_apppu:20059: yo 'yaṃ sa bhavatāṃ loko mayaiva vihitaḥ purā / HV_App.I,42.619 /
GE07hv_apppu:20060: pālyatāṃ sa tu yatnena prādhānyena kvacit kvacit // HV_App.I,42.620 //
GE07hv_apppu:20062: mayaiva pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭo niyogaḥ paripālyatām // HV_App.I,42.622 //
GE07hv_apppu:20063: śakraṃ provāca bhagavān vacanaṃ duṃdubhisvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.623 /
GE07hv_apppu:20064: idaṃ yathāvat kartavyaṃ satsu cāsatsu ca tvayā // HV_App.I,42.624 //
GE07hv_apppu:20065: gacchantu tapasā svargaṃ munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / HV_App.I,42.625 /
GE07hv_apppu:20068: yāyajūkāś ca ye kecid brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā viśaḥ / **HV_App.I,42.625**34:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:20070: yajñair iṣṭvā yāyajūkāḥ phalaṃ te prāpnuvantu ca // HV_App.I,42.626 //
GE07hv_apppu:20073: satyaśūrā dānaśūrā raṇaśūrāś ca ye narāḥ / HV_App.I,42.629 /
GE07hv_apppu:20074: te svargaphalam aśnantu sadā ye cānasūyakāḥ // HV_App.I,42.630 //
GE07hv_apppu:20076: abrahmaṇyā nāstikāś ca narakaṃ yāntu mānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42.632 //
GE07hv_apppu:20078: yogino māṃ tu ye devaṃ bhajante yogatatparāḥ / **HV_App.I,42.632**35:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20080: sadā māṃ dhyāhi deveśa śreyas tava bhaviṣyati / **HV_App.I,42.632**35:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:20081: matparo bhava deveśa māṃ namaskuru yatnataḥ / **HV_App.I,42.632**35:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:20082: idam eva paraṃ śreyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // **HV_App.I,42.632**35:5 //
GE07hv_apppu:20083: etāvat kriyatāṃ vākyaṃ mayoktaṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ / HV_App.I,42.633 /
GE07hv_apppu:20084: tato mayi sthite sarvān bādhiṣyante na cārayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.634 //
GE07hv_apppu:20086: devatānāṃ ca sarveṣām abhavad vismayo mahān // HV_App.I,42.636 //
GE07hv_apppu:20087: etad atyadbhutaṃ dṛṣṭvā varāhacaritaṃ surāḥ / HV_App.I,42.637 /
GE07hv_apppu:20088: namaskṛtvā varāhāya nākapṛṣṭham ito gatāḥ // HV_App.I,42.638 //
GE07hv_apppu:20089: tataḥ svāny ādhipatyāni pratipannāni daivataiḥ / HV_App.I,42.639 /
GE07hv_apppu:20090: sarvalokādhipatye ca pratiṣṭhāṃ vāsavo gataḥ / HV_App.I,42.640 /
GE07hv_apppu:20091: vimuktā dānavagaṇaiḥ prakṛtiṃ dharaṇī gatā // HV_App.I,42.641 //
GE07hv_apppu:20092: sthairyahetor dharaṇyās tu jñātvā cāgaskṛtān girīn / HV_App.I,42.642 /
GE07hv_apppu:20093: sveṣu sthāneṣu saṃsthāpya parvatānāṃ puraṃdaraḥ / HV_App.I,42.643 /
GE07hv_apppu:20094: ciccheda bhagavān pakṣān vajreṇa śataparvaṇā // HV_App.I,42.644 //
GE07hv_apppu:20095: sarveṣām eva pakṣā vai chinnāḥ śakreṇa dhīmatā / HV_App.I,42.645 /
GE07hv_apppu:20096: ekaḥ sapakṣo mainākaḥ surais tatsamayaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.646 //
GE07hv_apppu:20098: vārāha iti viprendraiḥ purāṇe parikīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.648 //
GE07hv_apppu:20100: nāśūcerna kṛtaghnāya nṛśaṃsāya na kīrtayet // HV_App.I,42.650 //
GE07hv_apppu:20101: [k: Ñ2 Bombay Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20102: na kṣudrāya na nīcāya na gurudveṣakāriṇe / **HV_App.I,42.650**36:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20103: nāśiṣyāya tathā rājan na kṛtaghnāya caiva hi // **HV_App.I,42.650**36:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20104: āyuṣkāmair yaśaskāmair mahīkāmaiś ca mānavaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.651 /
GE07hv_apppu:20105: jayaiṣibhiś ca śrotavyo devānām eṣa vai jayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.652 //
GE07hv_apppu:20106: purāṇo vedasaṃbaddhaḥ śivaḥ svastyayano mahān / HV_App.I,42.653 /
GE07hv_apppu:20108: eṣa kauravya tattvena kathitas te 'nupūrvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42.655 /
GE07hv_apppu:20110: ye yajanti makhaiḥ puṇyair daivatāni pitṝn api / HV_App.I,42.657 /
GE07hv_apppu:20111: ātmānam ātmanā nityaṃ viṣṇum eva yajanti te // HV_App.I,42.658 //
GE07hv_apppu:20117: [h: HV (CE) App. 42A, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:20120: [k: K Ñ1.2 V1.3 B D T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 cont. after Appendix I, No. 42 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20122: vārāha eṣa kathito nārasiṃham ataḥ śṛṇu / HV_App.I,42A.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20123: [k: Before the ref., D6 T1 G3-5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20125: vārāha eṣa kathito nārasiṃham ataḥ param / **HV_App.I,42A.0**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20127: yatra bhūtvā mṛgendreṇa hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20128: purā kṛtayuge rājan hiraṇyakaśipuḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42A.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:20130: daśavarṣasahasrāṇi śatāni daśa pañca ca / HV_App.I,42A.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:20132: tataḥ śamadamābhyāṃ ca brahmacaryeṇa caiva ha / HV_App.I,42A.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:20133: brahmā prīto 'bhavat tasya tapasā niyamena ca // HV_App.I,42A.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:20134: tataḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān svayam āgatya tatra ha / HV_App.I,42A.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:20136: ādityair vasubhiḥ sādhyair marudbhir daivataiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42A.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:20138: digbhiś cāpi vidigbhiś ca nadībhiḥ sāgarais tathā / HV_App.I,42A.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:20139: nakṣatraiś ca muhūrtaiś ca khecaraiś ca mahāgrahaiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:20140: devair brahmarṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ siddhaiḥ saptarṣibhis tathā / HV_App.I,42A.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:20142: carācaraguruḥ śrīmān vṛto devagaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42A.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:20143: brahmā brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭho daityaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,42A.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:20144: prīto 'smi tava bhaktasya tapasānena suvrata / HV_App.I,42A.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:20145: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi // HV_App.I,42A.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:20146: [k: Ñ2 V1 B Dn Ds D6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20151: na mānuṣāḥ piśācāś ca nihanyur māṃ kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,42A.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:20152: ṛṣayo naiva māṃ kruddhāḥ sarvalokapitāmaha / HV_App.I,42A.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:20153: śapeyus tapasā yuktā vara eṣa vṛto mayā // HV_App.I,42A.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:20154: na śastreṇa na cāstreṇa giriṇā pādapena vā / HV_App.I,42A.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:20155: na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa na cānyenāpi me vadhaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:20157: nākāśe vā na bhūmau vā rātrau vā divase 'pi vā / **HV_App.I,42A.26**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20158: nāntardhāne bahir vāpi syād vadho me pitāmaha / **HV_App.I,42A.26**3:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:20159: paśubhir vā mṛgair na syāt pakṣibhir vā sarīsṛpaiḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.26**3:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:20160: [k: T1 G3.5 cont., G4 ins. after line 30,
GE07hv_apppu:20162: na kenacid bhaved brahman mṛtyur me lokabhāvana / **HV_App.I,42A.26**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20163: na svarge 'py atha pātāle nākāśe nāvanisthale / HV_App.I,42A.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:20164: na cābhyantararātryahnor na cāpyanyena me vadhaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:20166: yo māṃ nāśayituṃ śaktaḥ sa me mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:20167: bhaveyam aham evārkaḥ somo vāyur hutāśanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:20168: salilaṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa // HV_App.I,42A.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:20169: ahaṃ krodhaś ca kāmaś ca varuṇo vāsavo yamaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:20170: dhanadaś ca dhanādhyakṣo yakṣaḥ kiṃpuruṣādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:20171: mūrtimanti ca divyāni mamāstrāṇi mahāhave / HV_App.I,42A.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:20174: dadāsi ced varān etān devadeva vṛṇomy aham / **HV_App.I,42A.36**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20176: ete divyā varās tāta mayā dattās tavādbhutāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:20177: sarvakāmapradā vatsa prāpsyase tān na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:20179: evam uktvā sa bhagavāñ jagāmākāśam eva ca / HV_App.I,42A.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:20181: tato devāś ca nāgāś ca gandharvā ṛṣibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42A.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:20184: vareṇānena bhagavan vadhiṣyati sa no 'suraḥ / HV_App.I,42A.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:20185: tat prasīdasva bhagavan vadho 'py asya vicityatām // HV_App.I,42A.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:20187: bhagavān sarvabhūtānām ādikartā svayaṃ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42A.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:20188: sraṣṭā ca havyakavyānām avyaktaḥ prakṛtir dhruvaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:20189: sarvalokahitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā devaḥ prajāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:20190: āśvāsayām āsa surān suśītair vacanāmbubhiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:20191: avaśyaṃ tridasās tena prāptavyaṃ tapasaḥ phalam / HV_App.I,42A.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:20192: tapaso 'nte 'sya bhagavān vadhaṃ viṣṇuḥ kariṣyati // HV_App.I,42A.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:20193: etac chrutvā surāḥ sarve vākyaṃ paṅkajajanmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:20194: svāni sthānāni divyāni pratijagmur mudānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:20195: labdhamātre vare tasmin sarvāḥ so 'bādhata prajāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:20197: āśrameṣu munīn sarvān brāhmaṇān saṃśitavratān / HV_App.I,42A.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:20198: satyadharmaratān dāntān dharṣayām āsa vīryavān // HV_App.I,42A.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:20199: [k: T2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins., T1 after line 55 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20201: indraṃ ca pothayām āsa babādhe sa tu saṃyuge // **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20202: sa tu svargaṃ parityajya gataḥ śakraḥ śacīpatiḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:20206: narakasthān samānīya svargasthāṃs tāṃś cakāra ha / **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:20208: vāruṇāṃś ca tathā pāśāṃś chitvā dānavapuṃgavaḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:20210: saumyāṃ diśam atho gatvā kuberam atha saṃyuge / **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:11 /
GE07hv_apppu:20211: gṛhītvā sabalaṃ taṃ tu padmaśaṅkhau samādade / **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:12 /
GE07hv_apppu:20212: alakāyāṃ tathā daityān sthāpayām āsa dānavaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:13 //
GE07hv_apppu:20213: devāṃs tribhuvanasthāṃś ca parājitya mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42A.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:20214: trailokyaṃ vaśam ānīya svarge vasati dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:20216: yajñiyān akarod daityān devāṃś caivāpy ayajñiyān // HV_App.I,42A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:20220: athādityāś ca sādhyāś ca viśve ca vasavas tathā / HV_App.I,42A.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:20223: jitās tena mahārāja daityena ca mahaujasā / **HV_App.I,42A.62**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20224: śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ viṣṇum upatasthur mahābalam / HV_App.I,42A.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:20225: devaṃ devamayaṃ yajñaṃ brahmadevaṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,42A.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:20226: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca prajālokanamaskṛtam / HV_App.I,42A.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:20227: nārāyaṇaṃ mahādevaṃ devās tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:20228: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo dhātā tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo guruḥ / HV_App.I,42A.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:20229: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo devo brahmādīnāṃ surottama // HV_App.I,42A.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:20231: kṣayāya ditivaṃśasya śaraṇaṃ bhava naḥ prabho // HV_App.I,42A.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:20232: [k: K4 Ñ2 V1.3 B1.3 Dn Ds D1-3 ins., Dn2 D3 after line 65,
GE07hv_apppu:20233: Ñ1 Ds2 D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 after line 66:k]
GE07hv_apppu:20236: bhayaṃ tyajadhvam amarā abhayaṃ vo dadāmy aham / HV_App.I,42A.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:20237: tathaiva tridivaṃ devāḥ pratipatsyatha māciram // HV_App.I,42A.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:20238: eṣo 'haṃ sagaṇaṃ daityaṃ varadānena darpitam / HV_App.I,42A.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:20239: avadhyam amarendrāṇāṃ dānavendraṃ nihanmy aham // HV_App.I,42A.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:20241: evam uktvā tu bhagavān visṛjya tridivaukasaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:20242: vadhaṃ saṃkalpayitvā tu hiraṇyakaśipoḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42A.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:20243: [k: K3 B1.2 Dn Ds D3.5.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20245: kiṃ nu rūpaṃ samāsthāya nihanmy enaṃ mahāsuram / **HV_App.I,42A.76**10:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:20246: yat siddhikaram āśu syād vadhāya vibudhadviṣaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.76**10:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:20247: anutpannaṃ tataś cakre so 'tyantaṃ rūpam īśvaraḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.76**10:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:20249: sahāyaṃ tu mahābāhur jagrāhoṃkāram eva ca // HV_App.I,42A.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:20251: hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sthānaṃ jagāma prabhur īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42A.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:20252: tejasā bhāskara iva kāntyā candra ivāparaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:20254: nārasiṃhena vapuṣā pāṇiṃ saṃspṛśya pāṇinā // HV_App.I,42A.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:20255: tato 'paśyat suvistīrṇāṃ divyāṃ ramyāṃ manoramām / HV_App.I,42A.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:20257: vistīrṇāṃ yojanaśataṃ śatam adhyardham āyatām / HV_App.I,42A.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:20262: śubhrāsanavatīṃ ramyāṃ jvalantīm iva tejasā // HV_App.I,42A.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:20269: bhāsvarā divyagandhā ca raśmimaty api cātulā / **HV_App.I,42A.93**12:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20270: śayyāsanavatī ramyā jvalantīva ca tejasā // HV_App.I,42A.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:20271: prabhāvatī bhāsurā ca divyagandhā manoramā / HV_App.I,42A.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:20272: nāsukhā na ca duhkhā sā na śītā na ca gharmadā // HV_App.I,42A.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:20273: na kṣutpipāse glāniṃ vā prāpya tāṃ prāpnuvanti ha / HV_App.I,42A.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:20275: stambhair maṇimayair divyaiḥ śāśvatī cākṣayā ca yā / HV_App.I,42A.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:20276: ati candraṃ ca sūryaṃ ca pāvakaṃ ca svayaṃprabhā / HV_App.I,42A.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:20278: sarve ca kāmāḥ pracurā ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:20279: rasavantaḥ prabhūtāś ca bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ tathākṣayam // HV_App.I,42A.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:20281: uṣṇe śītāni toyāni śīte coṣṇāni santi vai / HV_App.I,42A.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:20283: latāvitānasaṃchannāḥ saraḥsu ca saritsu ca / HV_App.I,42A.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:20284: manoharāṃś ca vividhān dadarśa sa tadā prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42A.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:20285: drumān bahuvidhāṃs tatra mṛgendro dadṛśe prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42A.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:20286: gandhavanti ca puṣpāṇi rasavanti phalāni ca // HV_App.I,42A.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:20287: tāni śītāni toyāni tatra tatra sarāṃsi ca / HV_App.I,42A.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:20288: apaśyat sarvatīrthāni sabhāyāṃ tasya vai prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42A.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:20289: nalinaiḥ puṇḍarīkaiś ca śatapatraiḥ sugandhibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:20290: raktaiḥ kuvalayair nīlaiḥ kumudaiḥ saṃtatāni ca // HV_App.I,42A.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:20291: sakāntair dhārtarāṣṭraiś ca rājahaṃsaiḥ saraḥpriyaiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:20292: kādambaiś cakravākaiś ca sārasaiḥ kurarair api // HV_App.I,42A.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:20298: cūtā nīpā nāgapuṣpāḥ kadambā bakulā dhavāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.122 //
GE07hv_apppu:20300: sālās tālāḥ priyālāś ca campakāś ca manoharāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:20301: tathaivānye vyarājanta sabhāyāṃ puṣpitā drumāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:20305: varaṇā vatsanābhāś ca asanāḥ syandanaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42A.129 /
GE07hv_apppu:20306: nīlāḥ sumanasaś caiva pītāḥ sāśvatthatindukāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:20307: [k: T1.2 G1.4 M2 ins., G3.5 after line 134b,
GE07hv_apppu:20309: nimbāś ca barbarāś caiva vṛkṣāḥ sāśvatthatindukāḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.130**13:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20312: āmrātakās tathā jambūr lakucāś cailavālukāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:20313: sarjarasāḥ kundaravāḥ pataṅgāḥ kuṭajās tathā / HV_App.I,42A.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:20314: raktāḥ kurabakāś caiva nīpāś cāgurubhiḥ saha // HV_App.I,42A.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:20315: kadambāś caiva bhavyāś ca dāḍimā bījapūrakāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:20316: kālīyakā dukūlāś ca hiṅgavas tailaparṇikāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:20317: kharjūrā nārikelāś ca dharmavṛkṣā harītakī / HV_App.I,42A.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:20318: madhukāḥ saptaparṇāś ca bilvāḥ pārāvatās tathā // HV_App.I,42A.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:20319: panasāś ca tamālāś ca nānāgulmalatāvṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:20321: ete cānye ca bahavas tatra kānanajā drumāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:20324: puṣpitān puṣpitāgrāṃś ca saṃpatanti mahādrumān // HV_App.I,42A.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:20329: tasyāṃ sabhāyāṃ daityendro hiraṇyakaśipus tadā / HV_App.I,42A.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:20330: āsīna āsane citre nalvamātre pramāṇataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:20333: tasya daityapater mandaṃ virajaskaḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:20334: divyagandhavahas tatra mārutaḥ susukho vavau // HV_App.I,42A.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:20335: tatra devāḥ sagandharvā gaṇair apsarasāṃ vṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:20336: divyatālena divyāni jagur gītāni gāyanāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:20337: viśvācī sahajanyā ca pramlocety abhiviśrutāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:20338: divyā ca saurabheyī ca samīcī puñjikasthalā // HV_App.I,42A.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:20339: miśrakeśī ca rambhā ca citrasenā śucismitā / HV_App.I,42A.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:20340: cārunetrā ghṛtācī ca menakā corvaśī tathā // HV_App.I,42A.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:20343: [k: T1.2 G1.3.5 M2.4 subst. for line 160, G4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20348: upāsanta diteḥ putrāḥ sarve labdhavarāḥ purā // HV_App.I,42A.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:20349: balir virocanas tatra narakaḥ pṛthivījayaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:20350: prahlādo vipracittiś ca gaviṣṭhaś ca mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42A.166 //
GE07hv_apppu:20352: ghaṭodaro mahāpārśvaḥ krathanaḥ piṭharas tathā // HV_App.I,42A.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:20353: viśvarūpaḥ surūpaś ca virūpaś ca mahādyutiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:20354: daśagrīvaś ca vālī ca meghavāsā mahāravaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:20355: ghaṭābho vikaṭābhaś ca saṃhrādaś cendratāpanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.171 /
GE07hv_apppu:20357: sragviṇo vāgminaḥ sarve sarve sucaritavratāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:20358: sarve labdhavarāḥ śūrāḥ sarve vigatamṛtyavaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:20359: ete cānye ca bahavo hiraṇyakaśipuṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,42A.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:20361: vimānair vividhair agryair bhrājamānair ivārcibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:20362: sragviṇo bhūṣitāḥ sarve yānti cāyānti cāpare // HV_App.I,42A.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:20367: bhūṣitāṅgā diteḥ putrās tam upāsanta sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:20368: tasyāṃ sabhāyāṃ divyāyām asurāḥ parvatopamāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:20380: tato dṛṣṭvā mahābāhuṃ kālacakram ivāgatam / HV_App.I,42A.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:20383: rūpaudāryaṃ babhau tatra samastaṃ śaśisaṃnibham // HV_App.I,42A.194 //
GE07hv_apppu:20384: aho rūpam idaṃ citraṃ śaṅkhakundendusaṃnibham / HV_App.I,42A.195 /
GE07hv_apppu:20385: abruvan dānavāḥ sarve hiraṇyakaśipuś ca saḥ // HV_App.I,42A.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:20386: evaṃ hi bruvatāṃ teṣāṃ nirdagdhānāṃ mahātmanām / HV_App.I,42A.197 /
GE07hv_apppu:20388: hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putraḥ prahrādo nāma vīryavān / HV_App.I,42A.199 /
GE07hv_apppu:20391: divyena cakṣuṣā siṃham apaśyad devam āgatam // HV_App.I,42A.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:20392: taṃ dṛṣṭvā rukmaśailābham apūrvāṃ tanum āsthitam / HV_App.I,42A.201 /
GE07hv_apppu:20393: vismitā dānavāḥ sarve hiraṇyakaśipuś ca saḥ // HV_App.I,42A.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:20396: na śrutaṃ naiva no dṛṣṭaṃ nārasiṃham idaṃ vapuḥ // HV_App.I,42A.204 //
GE07hv_apppu:20397: avyaktaprabhavaṃ divyaṃ kim idaṃ rūpam adbhutam / HV_App.I,42A.205 /
GE07hv_apppu:20398: daityāntakaraṇaṃ ghoraṃ śaṃsatīva manāṃsi naḥ // HV_App.I,42A.206 //
GE07hv_apppu:20399: asya devāḥ śarīrasthāḥ sāgarāḥ saritas tathā / HV_App.I,42A.207 /
GE07hv_apppu:20400: himavān pāriyātraś ca ye cānye kulaparvatāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:20401: candramāḥ saha nakṣatrair ādityāś cāgninā saha / HV_App.I,42A.209 /
GE07hv_apppu:20402: dhanado varuṇaś caiva yamaḥ śakraḥ śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.210 //
GE07hv_apppu:20403: maruto devagandharvā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.211 /
GE07hv_apppu:20404: nāgā yakṣāḥ piśācāś ca rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.212 //
GE07hv_apppu:20405: brahmā devaḥ paśupatir lalāṭasthā vibhānti vai / HV_App.I,42A.213 /
GE07hv_apppu:20406: sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni jaṅgamāni tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42A.214 //
GE07hv_apppu:20407: bhavāṃś ca sahito 'smābhiḥ sarvadaityagaṇair vṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.215 /
GE07hv_apppu:20409: sarvaṃ tribhuvanaṃ rājaṃl lokadharmaś ca śāśvataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.217 /
GE07hv_apppu:20410: dṛśyate nārasiṃhe 'smin yathendau vimale jagat // HV_App.I,42A.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:20412: grahāś ca yāgāś ca mahī nabhaś ca / HV_App.I,42A.220 /
GE07hv_apppu:20413: utpātakālaś ca dhṛtiḥ smṛtiś ca @ HV_App.I,42A.221 @
GE07hv_apppu:20414: rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca tamo damaś ca // HV_App.I,42A.222 //
GE07hv_apppu:20416: viśve ca devā vasavaś ca sarve / HV_App.I,42A.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:20417: krodhaś ca kāmaś ca tathaiva harṣo @ HV_App.I,42A.225 @
GE07hv_apppu:20418: darpaś ca mohaḥ pitaraś ca sarve // HV_App.I,42A.226 //
GE07hv_apppu:20420: ity evam uktvā sa ca daityarājaṃ @ **HV_App.I,42A.226**17:1 @
GE07hv_apppu:20425: pāhi tīvraṃ mahārāja kālarūpo hi dṛśyate / **HV_App.I,42A.226**18:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20426: evaṃ bruvati vai putre roṣākrāntabhayas tadā // **HV_App.I,42A.226**18:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20427: [k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. after line 226:k]
GE07hv_apppu:20428: yaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaḥ kratuḥ svayam eva ha / **HV_App.I,42A.266**19:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20433: yogidhyeyaḥ sadā dāntaḥ pūjyo hi satataṃ prabho // **HV_App.I,42A.266**19:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:20435: namaskuruṣva yatnena bhūyo bhūyaḥ pitaḥ kuru // **HV_App.I,42A.266**19:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:20438: prahrādasya tataḥ śrūtvā hiraṇyakaśipur vacaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.227 /
GE07hv_apppu:20440: dhvaṃseti ca tadā putraṃ roṣād āha nṛpottama / **HV_App.I,42A.227**20:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20441: ko 'yaṃ viṣṇus tvayā jñeyaḥ ko 'yaṃ devaḥ sanātanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.227**20:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:20442: ayaṃ kila sadā viṣṇur mokṣibhir dhyeya ity uta // **HV_App.I,42A.227**20:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:20443: ity abaddhaṃ tadā daityaḥ kruddho dṛṣṭvā janārdanam / **HV_App.I,42A.227**20:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:20444: uvāca dānavān sarvān sagaṇāṃś ca gaṇādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.228 //
GE07hv_apppu:20445: mṛgendro gṛhyatāṃ śīghram apūrvāṃ tanum āsthitaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.229 /
GE07hv_apppu:20446: yadi vā saṃśayaḥ kaścid vadhyatāṃ vanagocaraḥ // HV_App.I,42A.230 //
GE07hv_apppu:20449: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya hiraṇyakaśipos tadā / **HV_App.I,42A.230**21:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20450: tac chrutvā dānavāḥ sarve mṛgendraṃ bhīmavikramam / HV_App.I,42A.231 /
GE07hv_apppu:20451: parikṣipanto muditās trāsayām āsur ojasā // HV_App.I,42A.232 //
GE07hv_apppu:20453: daśa pañca tathā koṭir dānavātha mahābalāḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.232**22:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20457: huṃkāreṇa tadā sarvān dānavāṃs trāsayan hariḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.233**23:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20458: babhañja tāṃ sabhāṃ divyāṃ vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.234 //
GE07hv_apppu:20463: sarvāstrāṇām atha śreṣṭhaṃ daṇḍam astraṃ subhairavam / HV_App.I,42A.237 /
GE07hv_apppu:20465: dharmacakraṃ mahācakram ajitaṃ nāma nāmataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.239 /
GE07hv_apppu:20466: cakram aindraṃ tathā ghoram ṛṣicakraṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42A.240 //
GE07hv_apppu:20467: paitāmahaṃ tathā cakraṃ trailokyam ahitasvaram / HV_App.I,42A.241 /
GE07hv_apppu:20468: vicitrām aśanīṃ caiva śuṣkārdraṃ cāśanidvayam // HV_App.I,42A.242 //
GE07hv_apppu:20469: raudraṃ tad ugraṃ śūlaṃ ca kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,42A.243 /
GE07hv_apppu:20470: astraṃ brahmaśiraś caiva brāhmam astraṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42A.244 //
GE07hv_apppu:20471: aiṣīkam astram aindraṃ ca āgneyaṃ śaiśiraṃ tathā / HV_App.I,42A.245 /
GE07hv_apppu:20472: vāyavyaṃ mathanaṃ nāma kāpālam atha kiṃkaram // HV_App.I,42A.246 //
GE07hv_apppu:20473: tathā cāpratimāṃ śaktiṃ krauñcam astraṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42A.247 /
GE07hv_apppu:20474: astraṃ hayaśiraś caiva somāstraṃ śiśiraprabham // HV_App.I,42A.248 //
GE07hv_apppu:20475: paiśācam astram amitaṃ sārpam astraṃ tathādbhutam / HV_App.I,42A.249 /
GE07hv_apppu:20477: darpaṇaṃ pātanaṃ caiva tvāṣṭraṃ caiva sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,42A.251 /
GE07hv_apppu:20478: kālamudgaram akṣobhyaṃ kṣobhaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // HV_App.I,42A.252 //
GE07hv_apppu:20479: saṃvartaṃ mohanaṃ caiva tathā māyādharaṃ param / HV_App.I,42A.253 /
GE07hv_apppu:20480: gāndharvam astraṃ dayitam asiratnaṃ ca nandakam // HV_App.I,42A.254 //
GE07hv_apppu:20481: prasvāpanaṃ pramathanaṃ vāruṇaṃ cāstram uttamam / HV_App.I,42A.255 /
GE07hv_apppu:20482: astraṃ pāśupataṃ caiva yasyāpratihatā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.256 //
GE07hv_apppu:20483: etāny astrāṇi sarvāṇi hiraṇyakaśipus tadā / HV_App.I,42A.257 /
GE07hv_apppu:20485: astraiḥ prajvalitaiḥ siṃham āvṛṇod asurādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.259 /
GE07hv_apppu:20487: sa hi varṣāniloddhūto daityānāṃ sainyasāgaraḥ / HV_App.I,42A.261 /
GE07hv_apppu:20488: kṣaṇenāplāvayat siṃhaṃ mainākam iva sāgaraḥ // HV_App.I,42A.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:20489: prāsaiḥ pāśaiś ca śūlaiś ca gadābhir musalais tathā / HV_App.I,42A.263 /
GE07hv_apppu:20490: vajrair aśanikalpaiś ca śilābhiś ca mahādrumaiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.264 //
GE07hv_apppu:20492: śataghnībhiś ca dīptābhir daṇḍair api sudāruṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.266 //
GE07hv_apppu:20494: parivārya samantāt tu nihanyus te hariṃ tadā / **HV_App.I,42A.266**25:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20495: svalpam apy asya na kṣuṇṇaṃ ūrjitasya mahātmanaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.266**25:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20531: pañcāsyā lelihānāś ca kākagṛdhramukhās tathā // HV_App.I,42A.300 //
GE07hv_apppu:20535: avadhyasya mṛgendrasya na vyathāṃ cakrur āhave // HV_App.I,42A.304 //
GE07hv_apppu:20536: evaṃ bhūyo 'parān ghorān asṛjan dānavāḥ śarān / HV_App.I,42A.305 /
GE07hv_apppu:20538: te dānavaśarā ghorā mṛgendrāya samīritāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.307 /
GE07hv_apppu:20539: vilayaṃ jagmur ākāśe khadyotā iva parvate // HV_App.I,42A.308 //
GE07hv_apppu:20540: tataś cakrāṇi divyāni daityāḥ krodhasamanvitāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.309 /
GE07hv_apppu:20541: mṛgendrāya kṣipanty āśu prajvalantīva sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.310 //
GE07hv_apppu:20542: tair āsīd gaganaṃ cakraiḥ saṃpatadbhiḥ samāvṛtam / HV_App.I,42A.311 /
GE07hv_apppu:20547: tāni cakrāṇi vadanaṃ praviśanti vibhānti vai / HV_App.I,42A.313 /
GE07hv_apppu:20549: tāni cakrāṇi sarvāṇi mṛgendreṇa mahātmanā / HV_App.I,42A.315 /
GE07hv_apppu:20551: hiraṇyakaśipur daityo bhūyaḥ prāsṛjad ūrjitām / HV_App.I,42A.317 /
GE07hv_apppu:20553: tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya mṛgendraḥ śaktim uttamām / HV_App.I,42A.319 /
GE07hv_apppu:20554: huṃkāreṇaiva raudreṇa babhañja bhagavāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,42A.320 //
GE07hv_apppu:20555: rarāja bhagnā sā śaktir mṛgendreṇa mahīṃ tale / HV_App.I,42A.321 /
GE07hv_apppu:20557: nārācapaṅktiḥ siṃhasya sṛṣṭā reje vidūrataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.323 /
GE07hv_apppu:20559: garjitvā tu yathākāmaṃ vikramya ca yathāsukham / HV_App.I,42A.325 /
GE07hv_apppu:20560: tat sainyam utsāritavāṃs tṛṇāgrāṇīva mārutaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.326 //
GE07hv_apppu:20563: tad aśmavarṣaṃ siṃhasya gātre nipatitaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,42A.329 /
GE07hv_apppu:20564: diśo daśa prakīrṇaṃ hi khadyotaprakaro yathā // HV_App.I,42A.330 //
GE07hv_apppu:20565: tamaśmaughair ditisutās tadā siṃham ariṃdamam / HV_App.I,42A.331 /
GE07hv_apppu:20566: prācchādayan yathā meghā dhārābhir iva parvatam // HV_App.I,42A.332 //
GE07hv_apppu:20567: na ca taṃ cālayām āsur daityaughā devam āsthitam / HV_App.I,42A.333 /
GE07hv_apppu:20568: bhīmavegā balaśreṣṭhaṃ samudra iva mandaram // HV_App.I,42A.334 //
GE07hv_apppu:20570: dhārābhir akṣamātrābhiḥ prādur āsīt samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.336 //
GE07hv_apppu:20571: nabhasaḥ pracyutā dhārās tigmavegāḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.337 /
GE07hv_apppu:20572: āvṛṇvan sarvato vyoma diśaś copadiśas tathā // HV_App.I,42A.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:20573: dhārāṇāṃ saṃnipātena vāyor visphūrjitena ca / HV_App.I,42A.339 /
GE07hv_apppu:20574: vardhatā caiva varṣeṇa na prājñāyata kiṃcana // HV_App.I,42A.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:20575: dhārā divi ca saṃsaktā vasudhāyāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.341 /
GE07hv_apppu:20576: na spṛśanti sma taṃ tatra nipatantyo 'niśaṃ bhuvi // HV_App.I,42A.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:20577: bāhyato vavṛśe varṣaṃ nopariṣṭāt tu vṛṣṭavān / HV_App.I,42A.343 /
GE07hv_apppu:20579: hate 'śmavarṣe tumule jalavarṣe ca śoṣite / HV_App.I,42A.345 /
GE07hv_apppu:20580: sasṛjur dānavā māyām agniṃ vāyuṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.346 //
GE07hv_apppu:20581: nabhasaḥ pracyutaś caiva tigmavegaḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.347 /
GE07hv_apppu:20583: sa sṛṣṭaḥ pāvakas tena daityendreṇa mahātmanā / HV_App.I,42A.349 /
GE07hv_apppu:20584: na śaśāka mahātejā dagdhum apratimaujasam // HV_App.I,42A.350 //
GE07hv_apppu:20585: tam indras toyadaiḥ sārdhaṃ sahasrākṣo 'mitadyutiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.351 /
GE07hv_apppu:20586: mahatā toyavarṣeṇa śamayām āsa pāvakam // HV_App.I,42A.352 //
GE07hv_apppu:20587: tasyāṃ pratihatāyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ yudhi dānavāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.353 /
GE07hv_apppu:20588: sasṛjur ghorasaṃkāśaṃ tamas tīvraṃ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.354 //
GE07hv_apppu:20589: tamasā saṃvṛte loke daityeṣv āttāyudheṣu vai / HV_App.I,42A.355 /
GE07hv_apppu:20591: triśikhāṃ bhrukuṭīṃ cāsya dadṛśur dānavā raṇe / HV_App.I,42A.357 /
GE07hv_apppu:20592: lalāṭasthāṃ trikūṭasthāṃ gaṅgāṃ tripathagām iva // HV_App.I,42A.358 //
GE07hv_apppu:20595: tataḥ sarvāsu māyāsu hatāsu ditinandanāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.359 /
GE07hv_apppu:20596: hiraṇyakaśipuṃ daityā viṣaṇṇāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.360 //
