GE07hv_apppu:20597: tataḥ prajvalitaḥ krodhāt pradahann iva tejasā / HV_App.I,42A.361 /
GE07hv_apppu:20598: [k: T2 G1 M2 ins., M4 after line 364:k]
GE07hv_apppu:20600: hiraṇyakaśipur daityaś cālayām āsa medinīm // HV_App.I,42A.362 //
GE07hv_apppu:20601: tataḥ prakṣubhitāḥ sarve sāgarāḥ salilākarāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.363 /
GE07hv_apppu:20603: tasmin kruddhe tu daityendre tamobhūtam abhūj jagat / HV_App.I,42A.365 /
GE07hv_apppu:20604: tamasā samavacchannaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃcana // HV_App.I,42A.366 //
GE07hv_apppu:20607: āvahaḥ pravahaś caiva vivahaś ca samīraṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.367 /
GE07hv_apppu:20609: ete cānye ca bahavo ghorā dānavayodhinaḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.367**29:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20610: parāvahaḥ saṃvahaś ca udvahaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.368 //
GE07hv_apppu:20611: tathā parivahaḥ śrīmān mārutā bhayaśaṃsinaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.369 /
GE07hv_apppu:20612: ity ete kṣubhitāḥ sapta mārutā gaganecarāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.370 //
GE07hv_apppu:20613: ye grahāḥ sarvalokasya kṣaye prādur bhavanti vai / HV_App.I,42A.371 /
GE07hv_apppu:20614: te grahā gagane hṛṣṭā vicaranti yathāsukham // HV_App.I,42A.372 //
GE07hv_apppu:20616: kalpānta iva samabhavat kṣubdhā devāḥ savāsavāḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.372**30:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20620: ayogataś cacārāśu sarveṣv ṛkṣeṣu candramāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.373 /
GE07hv_apppu:20621: sagrahaṃ sahanakṣatraṃ prajajvāla nabho niśi // HV_App.I,42A.374 //
GE07hv_apppu:20622: vivarṇatvaṃ ca bhagavān gato divi divākaraḥ / HV_App.I,42A.375 /
GE07hv_apppu:20623: kṛṣṇaḥ kabandhaś ca mahāṃl lakṣyate sma nabhastale // HV_App.I,42A.376 //
GE07hv_apppu:20624: amuñcac cāsitāṃ sūryo dhūmavartiṃ mahābhayām / HV_App.I,42A.377 /
GE07hv_apppu:20625: gaganasthaś ca bhagavān abhīkṣṇaṃ pariviṣyate // HV_App.I,42A.378 //
GE07hv_apppu:20626: sapta dhūmanibhā ghorāḥ sūryā divi samutthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.379 /
GE07hv_apppu:20627: somasya gaganasthasya grahās tiṣṭhanti śṛṅgagāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.380 //
GE07hv_apppu:20628: vāme ca dakṣiṇe caiva sthitau śukrabṛhaspatī / HV_App.I,42A.381 /
GE07hv_apppu:20631: śṛṅgāṇi śanakair ghorā yugāntāvartakā grahāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.384 //
GE07hv_apppu:20632: candramāḥ saha nakṣatrair grahaiḥ saptabhir āvṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.385 /
GE07hv_apppu:20634: gṛhīto rāhuṇā candra ulkābhir abhihanyate / HV_App.I,42A.387 /
GE07hv_apppu:20635: ulkāḥ prajvalitāś candre pracelur ghoradarśanāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.388 //
GE07hv_apppu:20636: devānām api yo devaḥ so 'py avarṣata śoṇitam / HV_App.I,42A.389 /
GE07hv_apppu:20638: akāle ca drumāḥ sarve puṣpitāś ca phalanti ca / HV_App.I,42A.391 /
GE07hv_apppu:20639: latāś ca saphalāḥ sarvā yāḥ prādur daityanāśanam // HV_App.I,42A.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:20640: phale phalāny ajāyanta puṣpe puṣpaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42A.393 /
GE07hv_apppu:20641: unmīlanti nimīlanti hasanti ca rudanti ca // HV_App.I,42A.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:20642: vikrośanti ca gambhīraṃ dhūmāyanti jvalanti ca / HV_App.I,42A.395 /
GE07hv_apppu:20644: āraṇyaiḥ saha saṃsṛṣṭā grāmyāś ca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.397 /
GE07hv_apppu:20645: cukruśur bhairavaṃ tatra mṛgendre samupasthite // HV_App.I,42A.398 //
GE07hv_apppu:20646: nadyaś ca pratilomāni vahanti kaluṣodakāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.399 /
GE07hv_apppu:20647: [k: K Ñ3 V1.3 B2 D (except D6) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20649: na prakāśanti ca diśo raktareṇusamākulāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.400 //
GE07hv_apppu:20650: vānaspatyā na pūjyante pūjanārhāḥ kathaṃcana / HV_App.I,42A.401 /
GE07hv_apppu:20651: vāyuvegena hanyante bhidyante praṇudanti ca // HV_App.I,42A.402 //
GE07hv_apppu:20652: tadā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ chāyā na parivartate / HV_App.I,42A.403 /
GE07hv_apppu:20653: aparāhṇagate sūrye lokānāṃ ca yugakṣaye // HV_App.I,42A.404 //
GE07hv_apppu:20656: [k: Ñ3 B Dn Ds D5.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20658: sa ca dṛṣṭvā mahotpātān hiraṇyakaśipus tadā / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:20659: purohitaṃ tadā śukraṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:20660: kim arthaṃ bhagavann ete mahotpātāḥ samutthitāḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:20661: śrotum icchāmi tattvena paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:5 //
GE07hv_apppu:20663: śṛṇu rājann avahito vacanaṃ me mahāsura / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:20666: deśo vā hriyate tasya rājā vā vadham arhati // **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:9 //
GE07hv_apppu:20667: ato buddhyā samīkṣasva yathā sarvaṃ praṇaśyati / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:10 /
GE07hv_apppu:20668: bṛhad bhayaṃ hi nacirād bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:11 //
GE07hv_apppu:20669: etāvad uktvā śukras tu hiraṇyakaśipuṃ tadā / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:12 /
GE07hv_apppu:20670: svastīty uktvā tu daityendraṃ jagāma svaṃ niveśanam // **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:13 //
GE07hv_apppu:20671: tasmin gate tu daityendro dhyātavān suciraṃ tadā / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:14 /
GE07hv_apppu:20673: asurāṇāṃ vināśāya surāṇāṃ vijayāya ca / HV_App.I,42A.407 /
GE07hv_apppu:20675: ete cānye ca bahavo ghorā hy utpātadarśanāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.409 /
GE07hv_apppu:20677: tato hiraṇyakaśipur gadām ādāya satvaram / HV_App.I,42A.411 /
GE07hv_apppu:20681: saṃspṛṣṭavāṃs tadā sarvaṃ jagad etad akampayat / **HV_App.I,42A.413**33:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20682: saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭaḥ krodhād varāha iva mūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.414 //
GE07hv_apppu:20684: tathā kruṣṭe nṛpaśreṣṭha tasmin ghore mahāsura / **HV_App.I,42A.414**34:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20689: catuḥśīrṣāḥ pañcaśīrṣāḥ saptaśīrṣāś ca pannagāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.418 /
GE07hv_apppu:20691: elāpatraḥ kāliyaś ca mahāpadmaś ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,42A.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:20695: tadā kruddhena daityena kampitāni samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.424 //
GE07hv_apppu:20696: [k: K Ñ1.2 V1.3 B Dn Ds D1-4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20698: [k: D5 T2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 424,
GE07hv_apppu:20701: [k: B2 G3 M2 cont., T1 ins. after line 424:k]
GE07hv_apppu:20703: āpaś ca sahasā kruddhā duṣprakampyarasāḥ śubhāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.425 /
GE07hv_apppu:20704: nadī bhāgīrathī caiva sarayūḥ kauśikī tathā // HV_App.I,42A.426 //
GE07hv_apppu:20706: sūryadehā tathā tāpī anyā nadyas tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,42A.426**38:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20707: yamunā caiva kāverī kṛṣṇā veṇṇā tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42A.427 /
GE07hv_apppu:20708: suveṇṇā ca mahābhāgā nadī godāvarī tathā // HV_App.I,42A.428 //
GE07hv_apppu:20709: carmaṇvatī ca sindhuś ca tathā nadanadīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.429 /
GE07hv_apppu:20711: susrotā narmadā caiva tathā vetravatī nadī / HV_App.I,42A.431 /
GE07hv_apppu:20712: gomatī gokulākīrṇā tathā pūrvā sarasvatī // HV_App.I,42A.432 //
GE07hv_apppu:20713: mahī kālanadī caiva tamasā puṣpavāhinī // HV_App.I,42A.433 //
GE07hv_apppu:20714: [k: Ñ2 B1.3 Dn Ds D1.3.5.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20715: sītā cekṣumatī caiva devikā ca mahānadī / **HV_App.I,42A.433**39:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20720: māgadhāṃś ca mahāgrāmān puṇḍrān vaṅgāṃs tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42A.438 /
GE07hv_apppu:20721: suhmān mallān videhāṃś ca mālavān kāśikosalān // HV_App.I,42A.439 //
GE07hv_apppu:20722: bhavanaṃ vainateyasya suparṇasya ca kampitam / HV_App.I,42A.440 /
GE07hv_apppu:20724: raktatoyo bhīmavego lohito nāma sāgaraḥ / HV_App.I,42A.442 /
GE07hv_apppu:20725: śubhaḥ pāṇḍurameghābhaḥ kṣīrodaś caiva sāgaraḥ // HV_App.I,42A.443 //
GE07hv_apppu:20726: udayaś caiva śailendra ucchritaḥ śatayojanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.444 /
GE07hv_apppu:20729: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca karṇikāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.447 //
GE07hv_apppu:20730: ayomukhaś ca vipulaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.448 /
GE07hv_apppu:20731: tamālavanagandhaś ca parvato malayaḥ śubhaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.449 //
GE07hv_apppu:20732: surāṣṭrāś ca subāhlīkāḥ śūrābhīrās tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42A.450 /
GE07hv_apppu:20733: bhojāḥ pāṇḍyāś ca vaṅgāś ca kaliṅgās tāmraliptakāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.451 //
GE07hv_apppu:20734: tathaivāndhrāś ca pauṇḍrāś ca vāmacūḍāḥ sakeralāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.452 /
GE07hv_apppu:20735: kṣobhitās tena daityena sadevāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.453 //
GE07hv_apppu:20736: agastyabhavanaṃ caiva yad agastyakṛtaṃ purā / HV_App.I,42A.454 /
GE07hv_apppu:20740: giriḥ puṣpitakaś caiva lakṣmīvān priyadarśanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.458 /
GE07hv_apppu:20741: utthitaḥ sāgaraṃ bhittvā vayasyaś candrasūryayoḥ // HV_App.I,42A.459 //
GE07hv_apppu:20742: rarāja sumahāśṛṅgair gaganaṃ vilikhann iva / HV_App.I,42A.460 /
GE07hv_apppu:20744: vidyutvān parvataḥ śrīmān āyataḥ śatayojanam / HV_App.I,42A.462 /
GE07hv_apppu:20745: vidyutāṃ yatra saṃpātā nipātyante nagottame // HV_App.I,42A.463 //
GE07hv_apppu:20746: ṛṣabhaḥ parvataś caiva śrīmān vṛṣabhasaṃsthitaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.464 /
GE07hv_apppu:20747: kuñjaraḥ parvataś caiva yatrāgastyagṛhaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,42A.465 //
GE07hv_apppu:20748: viśālarathyā durdharṣā sarpāṇām ālayā purī / HV_App.I,42A.466 /
GE07hv_apppu:20750: mahāmegho giriś caiva pāriyātraś ca parvataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.468 /
GE07hv_apppu:20751: cakravāṃś ca giriśreṣṭho vārāhaś caiva parvataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.469 //
GE07hv_apppu:20753: yasmin vasati duṣṭātmā narako nāma dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.471 //
GE07hv_apppu:20755: ṣaṣṭis tatra sahasrāṇi parvatānāṃ viśāṃ pate // HV_App.I,42A.473 //
GE07hv_apppu:20757: devāvāsaḥ śubhaḥ puṇyo girirājo hiraṇmayaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.475 //
GE07hv_apppu:20758: hemaśṛṅgo mahāśailas tathā meghasakho giriḥ / HV_App.I,42A.476 /
GE07hv_apppu:20759: kailāsaś cāpi śailendro dānavendreṇa kampitaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.477 //
GE07hv_apppu:20760: [k: T2 G1.4 ins., T1 G3.5 M2.4 after line 478 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20764: śrīmān manoharaś caiva nityaṃ puṣpitapādapaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.479 //
GE07hv_apppu:20766: kampitaṃ mānasaṃ caiva rājahaṃsair niṣevitam // HV_App.I,42A.481 //
GE07hv_apppu:20767: triśṛṅgaparvataś caiva kumārī ca saridvarā / HV_App.I,42A.482 /
GE07hv_apppu:20769: uśīrabījaś ca girī rudropasthas tathādrirāṭ / HV_App.I,42A.484 /
GE07hv_apppu:20770: prajāpateś ca nilayas tathā puṣkaraparvataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.485 //
GE07hv_apppu:20771: devāvṛtparvataś caiva tathā caivāluko giriḥ / HV_App.I,42A.486 /
GE07hv_apppu:20772: krauñcaḥ saptarṣiśailaś ca dhūmavarṇaś ca parvataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.487 //
GE07hv_apppu:20773: ete cānye ca girayo deśā janapadās tathā / HV_App.I,42A.488 /
GE07hv_apppu:20774: nadyaś ca sāgarāś caiva dānavendreṇa kampitāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.489 //
GE07hv_apppu:20775: kapilaś ca mahīputro vyāghrākṣaś caiva kampitaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.490 /
GE07hv_apppu:20778: [k: G1.4 ins., T1.2 G3.5 M2.4 after line 493:k]
GE07hv_apppu:20779: na vavau bhagavān vāyur na prabhāti sma bhāskaraḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.492**41:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20781: evaṃ kṣubdhaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tasmin kruddhe mahāsure // **HV_App.I,42A.492**41:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:20782: ūrdhvago bhīmavegaś ca sarva evābhikampitāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.493 //
GE07hv_apppu:20785: tatrādityāś ca sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutas tathā / HV_App.I,42A.494 /
GE07hv_apppu:20786: rudrā devā mahātmāno vasavaś ca mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.495 //
GE07hv_apppu:20787: āgamya te mṛgendrasya sakāśaṃ sūryavarcasaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.496 /
GE07hv_apppu:20789: jahi deva diteḥ putraṃ dānavaṃ lokanāśanam / HV_App.I,42A.498 /
GE07hv_apppu:20790: durvṛttam asadācāraṃ saha sarvair mahāsuraiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.499 //
GE07hv_apppu:20791: tvaṃ hy eṣām antako nānyo daityānāṃ daityanāśanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.500 /
GE07hv_apppu:20792: tan nāśaya hitārthāya lokānāṃ svasti vai kuru // HV_App.I,42A.501 //
GE07hv_apppu:20793: tvaṃ guruḥ sarvalokānāṃ tvam indras tvaṃ pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.502 /
GE07hv_apppu:20794: ṛte tvadanyaḥ śaraṇaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42A.503 //
GE07hv_apppu:20795: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ devo devānām ādisaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.504 /
GE07hv_apppu:20798: siṃhanādena mahatā hṛdayāni manāṃsi ca // HV_App.I,42A.507 //
GE07hv_apppu:20799: gaṇaḥ krodhavaśo nāma kālakeyas tathāparaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.508 /
GE07hv_apppu:20802: vegaś ca vegaleyaś ca saiṃhikeyaś ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,42A.509 //
GE07hv_apppu:20804: kapilaś ca mahīputro vyāghrākṣaḥ kṣitikampanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.511 /
GE07hv_apppu:20811: tato nṛsiṃhaḥ saṃkruddhas tān sarvān daityasattamān / **HV_App.I,42A.514**43:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:20812: [k: T1 G3.5 cont., G4 ins. after line 514 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20814: tatas tān nihatān dṛṣṭvā nṛsiṃhena mahātmanā / **HV_App.I,42A.514**44:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:20816: vajrī śūlī karālaś ca hiraṇyakaśipus tataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.515 //
GE07hv_apppu:20821: devārir ditijo dṛpto nṛsiṃhaṃ samupādravat // HV_App.I,42A.518 //
GE07hv_apppu:20826: kruddho daityapatis tāvad dhanur ādāya satvaram / **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20829: nadan bhīmaravaṃ ghoraṃ siṃhasya purataḥ sthitaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:20830: mumoca cāstraṃ daityendraḥ siṃho 'pi ca tad agrasat / **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:20831: nārāyaṇaṃ tato 'py astraṃ niyojya dhanuṣi sthitaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:20832: dṛṣṭvā tat karma daityasya nārasiṃho janārdanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:20833: tam abhyadhāvad vegena daityendraṃ purataḥ sthitaṃ // **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:20834: jagrāha dhanuratnaṃ tat taṃ ca bāṇaṃ mahādyutiḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:20836: tato daityapatiś caiva gadāṃ gṛhya mahābalaḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:11 /
GE07hv_apppu:20838: bāhubhyāṃ nārasiṃhaṃ tu jagrāha yudhi dānavaḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:13 /
GE07hv_apppu:20841: śaraiś cāśanikalpaiś ca urasas tāḍanais tathā // **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:16 //
GE07hv_apppu:20845: vadhāya hi mano dadhre daityasya harir īśvaraḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:20 //
GE07hv_apppu:20849: samutpatya tatas tīkṣṇair mṛgendreṇa mahānakhaiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.519 /
GE07hv_apppu:20854: mahī ca lokaś ca śasī nabhaś ca @ HV_App.I,42A.521 @
GE07hv_apppu:20855: grahāś ca sūryaś ca diśaś ca sarvāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.522 /
GE07hv_apppu:20856: nadyaś ca śailāś ca mahārṇavāś ca @ HV_App.I,42A.523 @
GE07hv_apppu:20860: tataḥ pramuditā devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.525 /
GE07hv_apppu:20861: tuṣṭuvur vidhaiḥ stotrair ādidevaṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,42A.526 //
GE07hv_apppu:20862: yat tvayā vihitaṃ deva nārasiṃham idaṃ vapuḥ / HV_App.I,42A.527 /
GE07hv_apppu:20865: vayaṃ cāpi tvayāviṣṭaṃ nārasiṃham idaṃ vapuḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.528**49:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20866: mṛgendratvaṃ ca lokeṣu sarvasattveṣu vā vibho / HV_App.I,42A.529 /
GE07hv_apppu:20872: gāsyanti tvāṃ ca munayo mṛgendra iti nityaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.530 /
GE07hv_apppu:20873: tvatprasādāt svakaṃ sthānaṃ pratipannāḥ sma vai vibho // HV_App.I,42A.531 //
GE07hv_apppu:20874: evam ukto devasaṃghair narasiṃho mahāmanāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.532 /
GE07hv_apppu:20875: brahmā ca paramaprīto viṣṇoḥ stotram udairayat // HV_App.I,42A.533 //
GE07hv_apppu:20878: bhavān akṣaram avyaktam acintyaṃ guhyam uttamam / HV_App.I,42A.534 /
GE07hv_apppu:20879: kūṭastham akṛtaṃ kartṛ sanātanam anāmayam // HV_App.I,42A.535 //
GE07hv_apppu:20880: sāṃkhye yoge ca yā buddhis tattvārthapariniṣṭitā / HV_App.I,42A.536 /
GE07hv_apppu:20881: bhagavān deva vidyātmā puruṣaḥ śāśvato dhruvaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.537 //
GE07hv_apppu:20882: tvaṃ vyaktaś ca tathāvyaktas tvattaḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat / HV_App.I,42A.538 /
GE07hv_apppu:20883: bhavan mayā vayaṃ devā bhavān ātmā bhavān prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42A.539 //
GE07hv_apppu:20889: kapilaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca yatīnāṃ paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.543 //
GE07hv_apppu:20891: sraṣṭā tvaṃ tvaṃ ca saṃhartā tvam eko lokabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.545 //
GE07hv_apppu:20892: bhavān brahmā ca rudraś ca mahendro varuṇo yamaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.546 /
GE07hv_apppu:20893: bhavān kartā vikartā ca lokānāṃ prabhavo 'vyayaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.547 //
GE07hv_apppu:20894: parāṃ ca siddhiṃ paramaṃ ca devaṃ @ HV_App.I,42A.548 @

GE07hv_apppu:20982: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 42B, transliterated by Andreas Viethsen,
GE07hv_apppu:20985: [k: K Ñ1.2 V1.3 B D T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 cont. after Appendix I, No. 42A :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20987: nārasiṃho mayā prokto vāmanaṃ śṛṇvataḥ param / HV_App.I,42B.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20988: [k: Before the ref., D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20991: viṣṇoś ca vāmanatvaṃ hi prabravīhi sanātanam // **HV_App.I,42B.1**1:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20992: [k: After the ref., K Ñ1.2 V1.3 B2 Dn Ds D1-4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20993: nṛsiṃha eṣa kathito bhūyo 'yaṃ vāmanaḥ paraḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.0**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20994: yatra vāmanam āsthāya rūpaṃ rūpavatāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20995: baler balavato yajñe balinā viṣṇunā purā / HV_App.I,42B.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:20996: vikramais tribhir ākramya trailokyam akhilaṃ hṛtam // HV_App.I,42B.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:20998: hṛtvā dattā surendrāya śakrāya prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_App.I,42B.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:21000: atra me saṃśayo brahmann atra me vismayo mahān / HV_App.I,42B.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:21001: kathaṃ nārāyaṇo devo vāmanatvam upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:21002: yaḥ purāṇe purāṇātmā bhūtvā nārāyano vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:21003: padmanābho mahāyogī lokānāṃ prakṛtir vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:21005: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B Dn2 Ds D3.5.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:21008: adityā devamātuś ca kathaṃ garbhe 'bhavat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:21009: sraṣṭā yo vāsavasyāpi sa kathaṃ vāsavānujaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:21010: prasūto divi deveśo viṣṇutvaṃ prāptavān katham / HV_App.I,42B.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:21011: etad ācakṣva me vipra prādurbhāvaṃ mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:21013: śṛṇu rājan kathāṃ divyām arcitām ṛṣipuṃgavaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:21014: [k: After the ref., D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:21017: purāṇaiḥ kavibhiḥ proktāṃ brahmoktāṃ brahmaṇeritām // HV_App.I,42B.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:21019: aditir ditir dve bhārye bhaginyau janamejaya // HV_App.I,42B.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:21020: adityāṃ jajñire devāḥ kaśyapasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:21021: dhātāryamā ca mitraś ca varuṇo 'ṃśo bhagas tathā // HV_App.I,42B.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:21022: indro vivasvān pūṣā ca parjanyo daśamas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:21023: tathaikādaśamas tvaṣṭā dvādaśo viṣṇur ucyate // HV_App.I,42B.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:21024: dityāṃ jāto hi bhagavān hiraṇyakaśipuḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:21026: gaṇāḥ subahuśo rājan deśe deśe sahasraśaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.25**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:21027: tasyānujaś ca daityendro hiraṇyākṣo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:21029: prahrādaś cānuhrādaś ca jambhaḥ saṃhrāda eva ca // HV_App.I,42B.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:21030: virocanas tu prāhrādis tasya putro baliḥ smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:21031: putrapautraṃ ca balavat teṣām akṣayam avyayam // HV_App.I,42B.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:21035: śaśāsa sarvān daityaindro jitvā devān savāsavān / **HV_App.I,42B.31**6:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:21036: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān viṣṇur jaghāna harirūpadhṛk // **HV_App.I,42B.31**6:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:21038: gaṇāḥ subahuśo rājan deśe deśe sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:21039: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nārasiṃhena hiraṇyakaśipuṃ hatam / HV_App.I,42B.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:21040: daityā devavadhārthāya balim indraṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:21041: dṛṣṭvā dharmaparaṃ nityaṃ satyavākyaṃ jitendriyam / HV_App.I,42B.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:21045: [k: For line 38, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:21047: abhiṣekeṇa divyena baliṃ vairocaniṃ tadā / HV_App.I,42B.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:21048: daityādhipatye ditijās tadā sarve nyayojayan // HV_App.I,42B.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:21049: abhiṣiktas tu daityais tair balir balivatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:21050: brahmaṇā caiva tuṣṭena hiraṇyakaśipoḥ pade // HV_App.I,42B.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:21053: jayaśabdaṃ tataś cakrur abhiṣiktasya dānavāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:21055: kṛtvendraṃ dānavāḥ sarve baliṃ balavatāṃ varam / HV_App.I,42B.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:21056: tato vijñāpayām āsuḥ śirobhiḥ patitāḥ kṣitau // HV_App.I,42B.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:21057: viditaṃ tava daityendra hiraṇyakaśipor yathā / HV_App.I,42B.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:21058: trailokyam āsīd akhilaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam // HV_App.I,42B.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:21059: pitāmahaṃ tu hatvā te suraiḥ suraniṣūdana / HV_App.I,42B.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:21060: hṛtaṃ tad eva trailokyaṃ śakraś caivābhiṣecitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:21062: hatvendram amaraiḥ sārdham asmābhiḥ saha dānava / **HV_App.I,42B.52**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:21063: tat pitāmaharājyaṃ svaṃ pratyāhartum ihārhasi // HV_App.I,42B.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:21064: asmābhiḥ sahito nātha trailokyam idam avyayam / HV_App.I,42B.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:21065: pratyānayasva bhadraṃ te rājyaṃ paitāmahaṃ vibho // HV_App.I,42B.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:21067: jaya divi devagaṇān sahānujas tvam / HV_App.I,42B.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:21076: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā baler vairocanasya tu / HV_App.I,42B.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:21077: udyogaṃ paramaṃ cakrur dānavā yuddhadurmadāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:21078: mahāpadmo nikumbhaś ca kumbhakarṇaś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:21080: sitakeśordhvavastraś ca vajranābhaḥ śikhī jaṭī / HV_App.I,42B.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:21083: vikṛto dīrghajihvaś ca mānuṣāśana eva ca // **HV_App.I,42B.69**9:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:21089: kapis kandhaḥ kṣobhaṇo 'tha kāñcan ākṣo gavekṣaṇaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.71**11:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:21091: karālo jvālajihvaś ca śatāṅgaḥ śatalocanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:21092: sahasrapāt kṛṣṇamukhaḥ kṛṣṇaś caiva mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:21094: samudro rabhasaś caṇḍo dhūmraś caiva priyaṃkaraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:21095: govrajo gokṣuro raudro godantaḥ svastiko dhruvaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:21096: māṃsapo māmsabhakṣaś ca vegavān ketumāñ śiniḥ / HV_App.I,42B.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:21100: vikṣaro dīrghabāhuś ca madyapo mārutāśanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:21101: kālakañjo mahākrodhaḥ sarabhaḥ śalabhaḥ krathaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:21102: samudramathano nādī vitataś ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:21103: pralambo narako vālī dhenukaḥ kālalocanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:21104: variṣṭhaś ca gaviṣṭhaś ca bhūtalonmathano vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:21105: duṣprasādaḥ kirīṭī ca sūcīvaktro mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:21106: subāhuḥ kubjabāhuś ca karuṇaḥ kalaśodaraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:21107: somapo devayājī ca pravaro vīramardanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:21108: śuśrūṣuḥ khaṇḍaśaktiś ca kuṇinetraḥ śaśidhvajaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:21111: yathāsmṛti mayā proktā marīceḥ kīrtivardhanāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:21112: ete cānye ca bahavo nānābhūśaṇabhūṣitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:21113: rathaughair bahusāhasrair yayur yoddhum ariṃdamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:21115: divyaiś ca kavacair naddhā divyaiś caivocchritair dhvajaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:21126: sahasrabāhur bāṇaś ca baleḥ putro mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:21128: sarve māyādharā daityāḥ sarve divyās trayodhinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:21129: sarve madabalotsiktāḥ sarve labdhavarās tathā // HV_App.I,42B.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:21133: syandanasthā vyarājanta śāradāḥ khe grahā iva // HV_App.I,42B.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:21136: teṣāṃ madhyagato bāṇaḥ prāvṛṣīvotthito ghanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:21142: pañca tasya mahāvīryā dānavā yuddhadurmadāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:21143: rarakṣū ratham avyagrā vyāditāsyā bhayāvahāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:21144: subāhur meghanādaś ca bhīmavegaś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:21145: tathā gaganamūrdhā ca vegavān ketumān api // HV_App.I,42B.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:21150: anāyuṣāyāḥ putras tu balo nāma mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:21152: yuktam ṛkṣasahasreṇa ratham āruhya vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:21155: mahatā rathavṛndena prayayau dānavas tadā / HV_App.I,42B.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:21162: ṣaṣtiṃ rathasahasrāṇi namucer asurasya vai / HV_App.I,42B.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:21164: nānāpraharaṇāḥ sarve sarve te citrayodhinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:21168: śārdūlacihnaḥ śuśubhe tasya ketur hiraṇmayaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:21170: sa bhīmavegaś ca mahābalaś ca @ HV_App.I,42B.150 @
GE07hv_apppu:21171: pragṛhya cāpaṃ himavān iva sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:21184: sa tena śuśubhe daityo viśvakarmā mayo balī / HV_App.I,42B.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:21185: ratharatne sthitaḥ śrīmān udayastha ivāṃśumān // HV_App.I,42B.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:21195: nemighoṣeṇa mahatā kṣubhyantam iva sāgaram // HV_App.I,42B.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:21197: śaktim udgarasaṃkīrṇaṃ satoyam iva toyadam // HV_App.I,42B.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:21208: hayagrīvas tu balavān hayagrīvo mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.186 /
GE07hv_apppu:21211: syandanaṃ bhīmam āsthāya yuddhāyābhimukhaḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:21221: sarvamāyādharaḥ śrīmān yaṣṭā kratuśatair api // HV_App.I,42B.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:21225: vṛto daityasahasreṇa devair iva pitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:21227: surasainyasya sarvasya pratirodha iva sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:21228: sa dhairyeṇodadhes tulyo vapuṣāgnir iva jvalan / HV_App.I,42B.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:21231: taṃ yāntam anuyānti sma dānavāḥ śatasaṃghaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:21240: śambaras tu mahāmāyo daityānāṃ rathayūthapaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.218 /
GE07hv_apppu:21249: balināṃ kālakalpānām anvayuḥ śambaraṃ tadā // HV_App.I,42B.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:21258: anuhrādas tu tatraiva daityaḥ paramadurjayaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:21262: [k: For line 237, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]

GE07hv_apppu:21270: parighair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca bhallaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.242 /

GE07hv_apppu:22034: tadā hy avabhṛthaṃ yajñe bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.869 //
GE07hv_apppu:22036: vedavanto vṛttavantaḥ śūrāḥ sarve tanutyajaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.871 //
GE07hv_apppu:22039: [k: T1 2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 873 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22041: svaṃ svaṃ karma yathāśaktyā yuddhakarma pravartate // **HV_App.I,42B.873**42:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:22045: svaṃ svaṃ tathā yathā cakrur yuddhakarma viśāradāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.873**42A:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22053: hayānāṃ heṣamāṇānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca garjatām / HV_App.I,42B.880 /
GE07hv_apppu:22055: dānavānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca śastravanti mahānti ca / HV_App.I,42B.882 /
GE07hv_apppu:22060: tato nāgā rathāś caiva jāmbūnadavibhūṣitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.884 /
GE07hv_apppu:22061: bhrājamānā hy adṛśyanta meghā iva savidyutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.885 //
GE07hv_apppu:22063: cāru bibhrājire tatra sveṣv anīkeṣu bhāgaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.887 //
GE07hv_apppu:22066: dānavānāṃ surāṇāṃ ca samālokyanta sainikāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.890 /
GE07hv_apppu:22068: saṃnaddhāḥ samadṛśyanta jyotīṃṣi gagane yathā / HV_App.I,42B.892 /
GE07hv_apppu:22069: udyatair āyudhaiś citrais talabaddhāḥ patākinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.893 /
GE07hv_apppu:22071: nānāvarṇāḥ patākāś ca dhvajamālāś ca saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.895 /
GE07hv_apppu:22072: yudhyatāṃ raṇaśauṇḍānām īrayām āsa mārutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.896 //
GE07hv_apppu:22074: raśmibhir bhāsayām āsa raśmivarṇāni raśmimān // HV_App.I,42B.898 //
GE07hv_apppu:22076: rajaḥ pracchādayām āsa patrorṇāḥ pāṇḍurā diśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.900 //
GE07hv_apppu:22082: girikūṭocchrayāḥ sarve tadā te devadānavāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.903 /
GE07hv_apppu:22084: bāṇaiḥ surucirais tīkṣṇaiḥ patravājair durāsadaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.905 //
GE07hv_apppu:22085: mudgarair musalaiḥ śūlair ayastuṇḍair ulūkhalaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.906 /
GE07hv_apppu:22086: vajrair aśanikalpaiś ca khaḍgavṛkṣādibhis tathā // HV_App.I,42B.907 //
GE07hv_apppu:22092: sāvitrasya vadhaṃ prepsur bāṇo jagrāha kārmukam // HV_App.I,42B.909 //
GE07hv_apppu:22094: mantrair huta ivārciṣmān sa prajajvāla tejasā // HV_App.I,42B.911 //
GE07hv_apppu:22097: mārutaḥ sa mahāvegaḥ sāvitraḥ śaktim uttamām / HV_App.I,42B.914 /
GE07hv_apppu:22099: āpatantī ca sā śaktir maholkā jvalitā iva / HV_App.I,42B.916 /
GE07hv_apppu:22101: hatāyām atha śaktyāṃ tu sāvitro devasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.918 /
GE07hv_apppu:22104: agṛhṇān niśitaṃ khaḍgam āśīviṣam ivoragam // HV_App.I,42B.921 //
GE07hv_apppu:22105: taṃ gṛhītvā raṇamukhe prajvalantaṃ mahāprabham / HV_App.I,42B.922 /
GE07hv_apppu:22107: sa taṃ sthitam athālakṣya sāvitraṃ balinandanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.924 /
GE07hv_apppu:22108: lohitākṣaṃ mahākāyaṃ cikṣepa ca nanāda ca // HV_App.I,42B.925 //
GE07hv_apppu:22110: saṃdadhe cāśu bāṇaughān āśīviṣasamān balī // HV_App.I,42B.927 //
GE07hv_apppu:22112: ākarṇapūrṇāṃś cikṣepa śarān ugrān samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.929 //
GE07hv_apppu:22114: sāvitraṃ chādayām āsuḥ kailāsam iva toyadāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.931 //
GE07hv_apppu:22117: parājitya ca sāvitraṃ bāṇaḥ paramaharṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.934 /
GE07hv_apppu:22118: pragṛhya kārmukaṃ ghoraṃ gataḥ śakrarathaṃ prati // HV_App.I,42B.935 //
GE07hv_apppu:22119: balaś cāpy asuraśreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadām / HV_App.I,42B.936 /
GE07hv_apppu:22120: dhruvāya vasave mūrdhni raudrāṃ cikṣepa dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.937 //
GE07hv_apppu:22121: tasya nirmathito deho hemacitraṃ ca varma vai / HV_App.I,42B.938 /
GE07hv_apppu:22122: gadāvegena bhīmena dhruvasya samare tadā // HV_App.I,42B.939 //
GE07hv_apppu:22123: śeṣaś ca vasavaḥ sarve divyāstrair ghoradarśanaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.940 /
GE07hv_apppu:22124: prācchādayan raṇe daityam ādityam iva toyadāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.941 //
GE07hv_apppu:22125: tataḥ so 'marṣito bāṇair balo dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.942 /
GE07hv_apppu:22126: avātarad rathāt tasmād gadām udyamya vegavān // HV_App.I,42B.943 //
GE07hv_apppu:22129: pātayām āsa śatrūṇāṃ samāvidhya mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.944 /
GE07hv_apppu:22130: [k: For line 944, B1.3 Ds D6 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22131: śiraḥsu pātayām āsa śatrūṇāṃ tāṃ gadāṃ tadā / **HV_App.I,42B.944**47:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22132: diśaḥ prādrāvayat sarvāṃs stridaśān sā mahāgadā / HV_App.I,42B.945 /
GE07hv_apppu:22134: tasyāḥ suvidyudghoṣāyās tena śabdena vejitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.947 /
GE07hv_apppu:22135: vyadravanta paribhraṣṭā rathebhyo rathinas tadā // HV_App.I,42B.948 //
GE07hv_apppu:22138: kṣuraprair viśikhair bhallair vatsadantaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.951 //
GE07hv_apppu:22139: muhur muhur mahātejāḥ pratyavidhyan mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.952 /
GE07hv_apppu:22140: balas tu sa gadāpāṇir vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.953 //
GE07hv_apppu:22142: pibann iva śaraughāṃs tān devacāpasamutthitān // HV_App.I,42B.955 //
GE07hv_apppu:22144: avasphūrjan diśaḥ sarvāḥ svena vīryeṇa dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.957 //
GE07hv_apppu:22145: arujaṃs tridaśān daityaḥ sindhuvegho nagān iva / HV_App.I,42B.958 /
GE07hv_apppu:22146: samṛddhas tarasā devān vāyur vṛkṣān ivaujasā / HV_App.I,42B.959 /
GE07hv_apppu:22147: śamayaṃś ca maheṣvāsāṇ vasubhyāṃ samasajjata // HV_App.I,42B.960 //
GE07hv_apppu:22148: āpaś caivānilaś caiva vavarṣatur ariṃdamau / HV_App.I,42B.961 /
GE07hv_apppu:22149: śaravarṣāṇi dīptāni meghāv iva paraṃtapau / HV_App.I,42B.962 /
GE07hv_apppu:22150: kṣiptāṃs tān viśikhān dīptān antarikṣe sa cicchide // HV_App.I,42B.963 //
GE07hv_apppu:22152: prāsādān vividhān dīptān antarikṣe ca cicchiduḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.963**48:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22153: amṛṣyamāṇas tat karma dhruvas tam abhidudruve / HV_App.I,42B.964 /
GE07hv_apppu:22154: tau pṛthak śaravarṣābhyām anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.965 //
GE07hv_apppu:22156: tau nakhair iva śārdūlau dantair iva mahādvipau / HV_App.I,42B.967 /
GE07hv_apppu:22158: nirbhindantau ca gātrāṇi vilikhantau ca sāyakaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.969 /
GE07hv_apppu:22159: stambhayantau ca balinau pratudantau sthitau raṇe / HV_App.I,42B.970 /
GE07hv_apppu:22160: carantau vividhān mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.971 //
GE07hv_apppu:22161: mudgarair jaghnatuḥ kruddhāv anyonyam abhimāninau / HV_App.I,42B.972 /
GE07hv_apppu:22162: asibhyāṃ carmaṇī divye vipule ca śarāsane / HV_App.I,42B.973 /
GE07hv_apppu:22165: bāhubhiḥ samasajjetām āyasaiḥ parighair iva // HV_App.I,42B.976 //
GE07hv_apppu:22166: tayor āsīd bhujāghāta+ nigrahaḥ pragrahas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.977 /
GE07hv_apppu:22167: atīva bhīmaḥ saṃhrādo vajraparvatayor iva // HV_App.I,42B.978 //
GE07hv_apppu:22168: dvipāv iva viṣāṇāgraiḥ śṛṅgair iva mahāvṛṣau / HV_App.I,42B.979 /
GE07hv_apppu:22170: tataḥ parājito devo balakena tadā dhruvaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.981 /
GE07hv_apppu:22171: rathaṃ tyaktvā bhayāt tasya pranaṣṭaḥ prāṅmukho vasuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.982 //
GE07hv_apppu:22172: punar eva ca tatrāsīn mahad yuddhaṃ sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,42B.983 /
GE07hv_apppu:22173: kruddhasya namuceś caiva dharasya ca mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.984 //
GE07hv_apppu:22174: saṃrabdhau ca mahābāhū maheṣvāsāv ariṃdamau / HV_App.I,42B.985 /
GE07hv_apppu:22175: parasparam udīkṣetāṃ dahantāv iva locanaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.986 //
GE07hv_apppu:22176: visphārya ca mahac cāpaṃ hemapṛṣṭhaṃ dūrāsadam / HV_App.I,42B.987 /
GE07hv_apppu:22177: saṃrambhāt sa vasuśreṣṭhas tyaktvā prāṇān ayudhyata // HV_App.I,42B.988 //
GE07hv_apppu:22178: sa sāyakamayair jālair vṛto daityarathaṃ prati / HV_App.I,42B.989 /
GE07hv_apppu:22179: bhānumadbhiḥ śilādhautair bhānoḥ pracchādayat prabhām // HV_App.I,42B.990 //
GE07hv_apppu:22180: tataḥ prahasya namucir dharasya ca śilāśitān / HV_App.I,42B.991 /
GE07hv_apppu:22181: asṛjat sāyakān dīptān bhīmavegān durāsadān // HV_App.I,42B.992 //
GE07hv_apppu:22183: vivyādhātiratho daityo navabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.994 //
GE07hv_apppu:22184: sa totrair iva mātaṅgo dāryamāṇaḥ patatribhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.995 /
GE07hv_apppu:22186: tam āpatantaṃ vegena saṃrambhān namucī raṇe / HV_App.I,42B.997 /
GE07hv_apppu:22187: daityaḥ pratyasarad devaṃ matto mattam iva dvipam // HV_App.I,42B.998 //
GE07hv_apppu:22189: vikṣobhya tad balaṃ harṣād uddhūtārṇavasaprabham // HV_App.I,42B.1000 //
GE07hv_apppu:22191: bhiśrayan samare daityo vasuṃ prācchādayac charaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1002 //
GE07hv_apppu:22193: dṛṣṭvā prākampata muhus tridaśānāṃ mahad balam // HV_App.I,42B.1004 //
GE07hv_apppu:22195: garjantāv iva śārdūlau prabhinnāv iva vāraṇau // HV_App.I,42B.1006 //
GE07hv_apppu:22196: mahāmeghopamaṃ raudram āsīd āyodhanaṃ tayoḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1007 /
GE07hv_apppu:22198: samājam iva taṃ dṛṣṭvā prekṣamānau mahārathau / HV_App.I,42B.1009 /
GE07hv_apppu:22199: āśaṃsante jayaṃ tābhyāṃ yodhās te gaṇaśaḥ sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1010 //
GE07hv_apppu:22202: tayoḥ praikṣanta samaraṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ mahāstrayoḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1011 /
GE07hv_apppu:22206: tau chādayantāv anyonyaṃ samare niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1013 /
GE07hv_apppu:22207: śarajālāvṛtaṃ vyoma cakratus tau mahābalau // HV_App.I,42B.1014 //
GE07hv_apppu:22208: tāv anyonyaṃ jighāṃsantau śarais tīkṣnair mahārathau // HV_App.I,42B.1015 //

GE07hv_apppu:22210: āsādayetām anyonyaṃ tau raṇe niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.1015**51:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:22213: bhāskarābhaṃ tadākāśam ulkābhir iva cakratuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1018 //
GE07hv_apppu:22214: tayoḥ śarāḥ prakāśante devadānavayos tadā / HV_App.I,42B.1019 /
GE07hv_apppu:22215: paṅktyaḥ śaradi mattānāṃ sārasānām ivāmbare // HV_App.I,42B.1020 //
GE07hv_apppu:22217: kṣaṇena saṃvṛtā bhūmir meghair iva nabhastalam // HV_App.I,42B.1022 //
GE07hv_apppu:22219: dharāya vasave muktaṃ cakraṃ namucinā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1024 //
GE07hv_apppu:22220: patatā tena cakreṇa dharasya syandanottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1025 //
GE07hv_apppu:22222: sa tyaktvā syandanaṃ devaḥ pradīptaṃ cakratejasā / HV_App.I,42B.1027 /
GE07hv_apppu:22223: bhayāt tasyāsurendrasya gataḥ svagṛham uttamam // HV_App.I,42B.1028 //
GE07hv_apppu:22224: parājitya suraṃ daityo namucir baladarpitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1029 /
GE07hv_apppu:22225: prayātaḥ svena sainyena bhūyaḥ suracamūṃ prati // HV_App.I,42B.1030 //
GE07hv_apppu:22226: yau tau mayaś ca tvaṣṭā ca devadaityeṣu viśrutau / HV_App.I,42B.1031 /
GE07hv_apppu:22228: ghoras tayoḥ saṃprahāraḥ prāvartata sudāruṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1033 /
GE07hv_apppu:22229: [k: For line 1033, B1.3 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22230: tayoḥ prāṇaharas tv āsīt saṃprahāro mahātmanoḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1033**52:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22231: anyonyaspardhinos tatra cirāt prabhṛti saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1034 //
GE07hv_apppu:22232: [k: For line 1034, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22234: tvaṣṭā tu niśitair bāṇair daityaṃ tu baladarpitam / HV_App.I,42B.1035 /
GE07hv_apppu:22235: parākrāntaṃ parākramya vivyādha triṃśatā śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1036 //
GE07hv_apppu:22236: mayas tu prativivyādha tvaṣṭāraṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1037 /
GE07hv_apppu:22238: nanāda ditijaśreṣṭho hatas tvaṣṭuḥ śarair mayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1039 //
GE07hv_apppu:22239: saṃkruddho daityasainyasya vicinvann iva jīvitam / HV_App.I,42B.1040 /
GE07hv_apppu:22241: devo gṛhītvā samare daityendre saṃnyapātayat / HV_App.I,42B.1042 /
GE07hv_apppu:22242: bhīmāṃ sarvāyasīṃ tvaṣṭā puraṃdara ivāśanim // HV_App.I,42B.1043 //
GE07hv_apppu:22244: mayaś ciccheda tīkṣṇāgrais tūrṇaṃ saptabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1045 //
GE07hv_apppu:22245: tataḥ kṣiṇvann iva prāṇāṃs tvaṣṭuḥ kopān mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1046 /
GE07hv_apppu:22246: preṣayām āsa saṃrabdhaḥ śarān barhiṇavāsasaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1047 //
GE07hv_apppu:22247: ciccheda bāṇāṃs tvaṣṭā tāñ jvalitair nataparvabhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1048 /
GE07hv_apppu:22249: tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau balinau vāśitāntare / HV_App.I,42B.1050 /
GE07hv_apppu:22250: śārdūlāv iva cānyonyaṃ prasaktāv abhijaghnatuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1051 //
GE07hv_apppu:22252: anyonyam abhivīkṣantau kruddhāv āśīviṣāv iva // HV_App.I,42B.1053 //
GE07hv_apppu:22255: tataḥ sa vipulāṃ dīptāṃ mayo rukmāṅgadāṃ gadām / HV_App.I,42B.1056 /
GE07hv_apppu:22258: gadayā dānavaḥ kruddho vajreṇendra ivācalān // HV_App.I,42B.1059 //
GE07hv_apppu:22259: tataḥ kruddho mahādaityaḥ kṣurābhyāṃ tasya saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1060 /
