GE07hv_apppu:22261: punar dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ tu niśitābhyāṃ mahāraṇe / **HV_App.I,42B.1060**54:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22262: dhvajaṃ tvaṣṭur atha cchittvā sūtaṃ ninye yamakṣayam // HV_App.I,42B.1061 //
GE07hv_apppu:22263: [k: K Ñ1.2 V B D (D6 missing) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22265: dṛṣṭvā tvaṣṭā hataṃ sūtaṃ kṣurābhyāṃ vinipātitam / HV_App.I,42B.1062 /
GE07hv_apppu:22266: hatāśvaṃ ratham utsṛjya sūtaṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi / HV_App.I,42B.1063 /
GE07hv_apppu:22267: visphārayan mahācāpaṃ sthito bhūmau mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1064 //
GE07hv_apppu:22268: hatāśvasūtaṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā ripum avasthitam / HV_App.I,42B.1065 /
GE07hv_apppu:22271: prādahad devasainyāni dāvāgnir iva kānanam // HV_App.I,42B.1068 //
GE07hv_apppu:22274: te papus tasya devasya śoṇitaṃ rukmabhūṣaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1071 /
GE07hv_apppu:22275: āśīviṣā iva kruddhā bhujagāḥ kālacoditāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1072 //
GE07hv_apppu:22276: te kṣitiṃ samavartanta śobhante rudhirokṣitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1073 /
GE07hv_apppu:22277: [k: For line 1073, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22280: te prakāśanta nārācāḥ praviśanto vasuṃdharām / HV_App.I,42B.1075 /
GE07hv_apppu:22281: astaṃ gacchantam ādityaṃ praviśanta ivāṃśavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1076 //
GE07hv_apppu:22282: taṃ pratyavidhyat tvaṣṭā tu jāmbūnadavibhūṣitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1077 /
GE07hv_apppu:22284: te tasya daityasya bhujaṃ savyaṃ nirbhidya patriṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1079 /
GE07hv_apppu:22285: vidārya viviśur bhūmiṃ bhujagā iva vegitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1080 //
GE07hv_apppu:22286: mayas tribhir athānarcchat tvaṣṭāraṃ tu patatribhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1081 /
GE07hv_apppu:22288: [k: For line 1082, B1.3 T1.2 G3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22290: tvaṣṭātha mayanirmuktaiḥ sāyakair arditaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1083 //
GE07hv_apppu:22292: taṃ tatra hatasūtāśvaṃ bhujaṃgam iva nirviṣam / HV_App.I,42B.1085 /
GE07hv_apppu:22293: tvaṣṭāraṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā muditaḥ sa tu dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1086 //
GE07hv_apppu:22294: visphārayan suruciraṃ cāpaṃ rukmāṅgadaṃ dṛḍham / HV_App.I,42B.1087 /
GE07hv_apppu:22295: raṇe 'bhyatiṣṭhad daityendro jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1088 //
GE07hv_apppu:22296: pulomā tu balaślāghī dṛpto dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1089 /
GE07hv_apppu:22300: sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ yaḥ prāṇaḥ kathyate dvijaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1091 /
GE07hv_apppu:22301: balinā kālakalpena vāyunā saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1092 //
GE07hv_apppu:22302: pulomnas tatra pavanaḥ śrutvā jyātalanisvanam / HV_App.I,42B.1093 /
GE07hv_apppu:22303: nāmṛṣyata yathā matto gajaḥ pratigajasvanam // HV_App.I,42B.1094 //
GE07hv_apppu:22304: daityacāpacyutair bāṇaiḥ prācchādyanta diśo daśa / HV_App.I,42B.1095 /
GE07hv_apppu:22305: raśmijālair ivārkasya vitataṃ sāmbaraṃ jagat // HV_App.I,42B.1096 //
GE07hv_apppu:22306: sa tāmranayanaḥ kruddhaḥ śvasann iva mahoragaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1097 /
GE07hv_apppu:22307: vṛto daityaśatair vāyū raśmivān iva bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1098 //
GE07hv_apppu:22309: rukmapuṅkhā vyarājanta haṃsāḥ śreṇīkṛtā iva // HV_App.I,42B.1100 //
GE07hv_apppu:22311: prapatantaḥ sma dṛśyante daityasyāyutaśaḥ śarāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1102 //
GE07hv_apppu:22312: evaṃ sutīkṣṇān khacarāñ śalabhān iva pāvake / HV_App.I,42B.1103 /
GE07hv_apppu:22313: suvarṇavikṛtāṃś citrān mumoca ditijaḥ śarān // HV_App.I,42B.1104 //
GE07hv_apppu:22314: tam antakam iva kruddham āpatantaṃ sa mārutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1105 /
GE07hv_apppu:22315: tyaktvā prāṇān atikramya vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1106 //
GE07hv_apppu:22316: tasya vegam asaṃhāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyuḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1107 /
GE07hv_apppu:22317: uttamaṃ javam āsthāya vyadhamat sāyakavrajān // HV_App.I,42B.1108 //
GE07hv_apppu:22318: tato vidhamya balavāñ śarajālāni mārutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1109 /
GE07hv_apppu:22321: vivyādha daityaṃ viṃśatyā viśikhair nataparvabhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1110 //
GE07hv_apppu:22322: mārudgaṇānāṃ pravarā daśa divyā mahaujasaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1111 /
GE07hv_apppu:22323: sādhu sādhv iti vegena siṃhanādaṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.1112 //
GE07hv_apppu:22324: tasmin samutthite śabde tumule lomaharṣaṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1113 /
GE07hv_apppu:22326: te samāsādya pavanaṃ samāvṛṇvañ śarottamaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1115 /
GE07hv_apppu:22327: [k: For line 1115, B1.3 Ds T1.2G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22330: te pīḍayantaḥ pavanaṃ kruddhāḥ sapta mahārathāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1117 /
GE07hv_apppu:22331: prajāsaṃharaṇe ghorāḥ somaṃ sapta grahā iva // HV_App.I,42B.1118 //
GE07hv_apppu:22333: karaṃ gajakarākāram udyamya yudhi mārutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1120 //
GE07hv_apppu:22334: teṣāṃ mūrdhasu daityānāṃ pātayām āsa vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.1121 /
GE07hv_apppu:22335: nihatā vāyuvegena sapta tena mahārathāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1122 //
GE07hv_apppu:22336: tyaktvā prāṇān pulomā tu vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1123 /
GE07hv_apppu:22337: tasyāpi tam asaṃhāryaṃ dṛṣtvā vāyuḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1124 /
GE07hv_apppu:22338: asaṃcintya śaraughāṃs tāñ jvalitān vai pulomataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1125 //
GE07hv_apppu:22339: teṣāṃ vidārya tejāṃsi dānavānāṃ mahātmanām / HV_App.I,42B.1126 /
GE07hv_apppu:22341: te bhinnavarmāsthibhujāḥ patanto bhānti dānavāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1128 /
GE07hv_apppu:22343: teṣāṃ vidāritair dehair dānavānāṃ mahātmanām / HV_App.I,42B.1130 /
GE07hv_apppu:22344: tataḥ prāvartata nadī raudrarūpā bhayāvahā // HV_App.I,42B.1131 //
GE07hv_apppu:22345: prasravantī raṇe raktaṃ bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhinī / HV_App.I,42B.1132 /
GE07hv_apppu:22347: raṇabhūmir abhūd raudrā tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1134 //
GE07hv_apppu:22349: sānukarṣapatākaiś ca sopāsaṅgair dhvajai rathaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1136 //
GE07hv_apppu:22350: śīrṇakumbhais tathā nāgair ghaṇṭābhiḥ suvibhūṣitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1137 /
GE07hv_apppu:22356: tanutraiḥ satalatraiś ca hārair niṣkaiś ca śobhanaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1143 /
GE07hv_apppu:22357: hataiś ca ditijais tatra śastrasyandanavarjitaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1144 //
GE07hv_apppu:22358: patitair apaviddhaiś ca śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1145 /
GE07hv_apppu:22362: vimardo devasainyānāṃ sadṛśaḥ karmaṇāṃ babhau // HV_App.I,42B.1147 //
GE07hv_apppu:22365: te jaghnuḥ śatasāhasrāḥ pavanaṃ dānavottamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1150 /
GE07hv_apppu:22366: tair vadhyamānaḥ sa babhau samantād arpitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1151 //
GE07hv_apppu:22368: hatvā tu ditijaḥ pṛṣṭham āsādya yudhi varjitān / **HV_App.I,42B.1151**62:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22369: hatvāṣṭau tatra yodhānāṃ śatāni pavanaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1152 /
GE07hv_apppu:22370: kṛtvā mārgaṃ suraśreṣṭhaḥ prayātaḥ sa mahārathaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1153 //
GE07hv_apppu:22371: adyāpi ca suvistīrṇaḥ panthāḥ saṃdṛśyate divi / HV_App.I,42B.1154 /
GE07hv_apppu:22372: nāmnā vāyupatho nāma siddhāḥ paśyanti taṃ divi // HV_App.I,42B.1155 //
GE07hv_apppu:22373: hayagrīvas tu ditijaḥ pūṣāṇaṃ prati vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.1156 /
GE07hv_apppu:22376: pūṣāṇaṃ ditijo 'paśyat kruddho ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,42B.1159 //
GE07hv_apppu:22377: bhujābhyām ādadānasya saṃdadhānasya vai śarān / HV_App.I,42B.1160 /
GE07hv_apppu:22378: muñcataḥ karṣato vāpi dadṛśus tatra nāntaram // HV_App.I,42B.1161 //
GE07hv_apppu:22381: rukmapuṅkhais tatas tasya cāpamuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1164 /
GE07hv_apppu:22382: prācchādyanta śilādhautair diśaḥ sūryasya ca prabhāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1165 //
GE07hv_apppu:22384: nabhaścarāṇāṃ nabhasi dṛśyante bahavo vrajāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1167 //
GE07hv_apppu:22386: śreṇībhūtāḥ prakāśante yāntaḥ śyenā ivāmbare // HV_App.I,42B.1169 //
GE07hv_apppu:22390: mahāvegān prasannāgrān mumoca ditijaḥ śarān // HV_App.I,42B.1171 //
GE07hv_apppu:22392: dehe samavakīryanta pūṣṇaḥ suniśitāḥ śarāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1173 //
GE07hv_apppu:22393: te vyomni vikṛtākārāḥ saṃprakāśanta sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1174 /
GE07hv_apppu:22394: khadyotā iva gharmānte khe carantaḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1175 //
GE07hv_apppu:22395: śilādhautāḥ prasannāgrāḥ pūṣaṇaṃ vikṛtāḥ śarāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1176 /
GE07hv_apppu:22396: parvataṃ vāridhārābhir yathā prāvṛṣi toyadāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1177 //
GE07hv_apppu:22397: [k: K3 Ñ1.2 V1.3 B2.3 Dn Ds D1.3.5 T1 G3.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22409: te bāṇā bhūtale magnāḥ pūṣṇo bhāti śilāśitāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1177**64C:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:22410: vikramaṃ śaṃsituṃ tūrṇam anantasya ca vai gatāḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.1177**64C:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:22417: tatas tu pūṣṇo devasya balaṃ vīryaṃ parākramam / HV_App.I,42B.1178 /
GE07hv_apppu:22418: vyavasāyaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca paśyanti tridaśādbhutam // HV_App.I,42B.1179 //
GE07hv_apppu:22419: tāṃ samudrād ivodbhūtāṃ śaravṛṣṭiṃ samutthitām / HV_App.I,42B.1180 /
GE07hv_apppu:22420: nācintayat tadā pūṣā daityāṃś cābhyadravad raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1181 //
GE07hv_apppu:22421: hemapṛṣṭhaṃ mahānādaṃ pūṣṇa āsīn mahad dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1182 /
GE07hv_apppu:22423: tataḥ śarāḥ prādur āsan pūrayanta ivāmbaram / HV_App.I,42B.1184 /
GE07hv_apppu:22424: suvarṇapuṅkhāḥ pūṣṇas te prabhavantaḥ śarāsanāt // HV_App.I,42B.1185 //
GE07hv_apppu:22425: māleva rukmapuṅkhānāṃ vitatā vyomni patriṇām / HV_App.I,42B.1186 /
GE07hv_apppu:22426: prādur āsīn mahāghorā bṛhataḥ pūṣakārmukāt // HV_App.I,42B.1187 //
GE07hv_apppu:22427: tato vyomni vibhaktāni śarajālāni sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1188 /
GE07hv_apppu:22430: patatāṃ pātyamānānāṃ kham āsīt saṃvṛtaṃ vrajaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1191 //
GE07hv_apppu:22431: pūṣā prāpūrayad bāṇair hayagrīvaṃ śilāśitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1192 /
GE07hv_apppu:22433: tato vyasṛjad ugrāṇi śarajālāni dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1194 /
GE07hv_apppu:22434: amarṣī balavān kruddho didhakṣann iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1195 //
GE07hv_apppu:22435: pūṣṇas tv ājau dhvajaṃ caiva patākāṃ dhanur eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.1196 /
GE07hv_apppu:22436: raśmīn yoktrāṇi cāśvānāṃ hayagrīvo raṇe 'cchinat // HV_App.I,42B.1197 //
GE07hv_apppu:22437: athāsyāśvān punar hatvā caturbhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1198 /
GE07hv_apppu:22438: sārathiṃ sa mahātejā rathopasthād apātayat // HV_App.I,42B.1199 //
GE07hv_apppu:22439: kṛtas tu virathaḥ pūṣā hayagrīveṇa saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1200 /
GE07hv_apppu:22440: pūṣā tasya rathābhyāśāt sa yayau tena vai jitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1201 //
GE07hv_apppu:22441: [k: B1.3 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for line 1201,
GE07hv_apppu:22446: tatrādbhutam ito bhūyo yuddhaṃ vartata dāruṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1202 /
GE07hv_apppu:22447: kṛtapratikṛtaṃ ghoraṃ śambarasya bhagasya ca // HV_App.I,42B.1203 //
GE07hv_apppu:22450: vikṣipann akṣasadṛśān vyasṛjat sāyakān bahūn / HV_App.I,42B.1206 /
GE07hv_apppu:22453: samakampanta bhītāni sindhor iva mahormayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1209 //
GE07hv_apppu:22454: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya virūpākṣaṃ vibhīṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1210 /
GE07hv_apppu:22456: tato bhago maheṣvāso divyaṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1212 /
GE07hv_apppu:22458: tam abhyayād bhago daityaṃ tūrṇam asyantam antikāt / HV_App.I,42B.1214 /
GE07hv_apppu:22459: mātaṅgam iva mātaṅgo vṛṣaḥ prativṛṣaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1215 //
GE07hv_apppu:22460: tau pragṛhya mahāvegau dhanuṣī bhārasādhane / HV_App.I,42B.1216 /
GE07hv_apppu:22461: prācchādayetām anyonyaṃ takṣamāṇau raṇe śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1217 //
GE07hv_apppu:22462: tayoḥ sutumulaṃ yuddham āsīd ghoraṃ mahāraṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1218 /
GE07hv_apppu:22465: vyadārayetām anyonyaṃ kārṣṇe nirbhidya varmaṇī // HV_App.I,42B.1221 //
GE07hv_apppu:22466: tau tu vikṣatasarvāṅgau rudhireṇa samukṣitau / HV_App.I,42B.1222 /
GE07hv_apppu:22467: [k: K3 Ñ2 B Dn D5 (marg.) T1.2 G1.4.5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22469: takṣamānau śitair bāṇair nānvīkṣitum aśaknutām // HV_App.I,42B.1223 //
GE07hv_apppu:22470: atha vivyādha samare tvaramāṇo 'suro bhagam / HV_App.I,42B.1224 /
GE07hv_apppu:22472: garutmān iva cākāśe pothayāno mahoragān / HV_App.I,42B.1226 /
GE07hv_apppu:22473: nārācā nyapatan dehe tūrṇaṃ śambaracoditāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1227 //
GE07hv_apppu:22474: tān antarikṣe nārācān bhagaś ciccheda patriṇā / HV_App.I,42B.1228 /
GE07hv_apppu:22478: [k: For line 1231, B T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22480: tadā tat suciraṃ kālaṃ yuddhaṃ samam ivābhavat / HV_App.I,42B.1232 /
GE07hv_apppu:22481: śambarasya ca māyābhir nādṛśyata tato 'mbaram // HV_App.I,42B.1233 //
GE07hv_apppu:22482: dorbhyāṃ vikṣipataś cāpaṃ rathaṃ viṣṭabhya tiṣṭhataḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1234 /
GE07hv_apppu:22483: śrūyate dhanuṣaḥ śabdo visphūrjitam ivāśaṇeḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1235 //
GE07hv_apppu:22484: sa bhagasya hayān hatvā chittvā ca dhvajam āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1236 /
GE07hv_apppu:22485: abhyavarṣac charair enaṃ parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // HV_App.I,42B.1237 //
GE07hv_apppu:22486: na tasyāsīd anirbhinnaṃ gātre dvyaṅgulam antaram / HV_App.I,42B.1238 /
GE07hv_apppu:22488: [k: For line 1239 B1.3 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst.,
GE07hv_apppu:22491: daityasya cādbhutaṃ divyam astram astreṇa vārayan / HV_App.I,42B.1240 /
GE07hv_apppu:22493: mumoca krodhatāṃ rākṣo didhakṣan daityam āhave / **HV_App.I,42B.1240**69:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22494: māyāyuddhena māyāvī śambaras tam ayodhayat / HV_App.I,42B.1241 /
GE07hv_apppu:22495: avañcayad bhagaṃ daityo māyābhir lāghavena ca // HV_App.I,42B.1242 //
GE07hv_apppu:22497: atha daityo bhagaṃ samyag vañcayām āsa lāghavaiḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1242**70:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22498: [k: While K1.2 D4 ins. after line 1242 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22499: bhagas tasya rathaṃ sāśvaṃ śaravarṣair avākirat / **HV_App.I,42B.1242**71:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22501: adṛśyata śaraiś channaḥ śambaraḥ śatadhā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1244 //
GE07hv_apppu:22502: adṛśyat patito bhūmau gatacetā ivāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1245 /
GE07hv_apppu:22503: atha sma yudhyate bhūyaḥ śatadhā śailasaṃnibhaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1246 //
GE07hv_apppu:22504: diśāgajendram ārūḍho dṛśyate sma punar balī / HV_App.I,42B.1247 /
GE07hv_apppu:22505: pādeśamātraś ca punar bhūtvā bhavati śailavat / HV_App.I,42B.1248 /
GE07hv_apppu:22506: mahāmegha iva śrīmāṃs tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca so 'bhavat / HV_App.I,42B.1249 /
GE07hv_apppu:22509: punaḥ kṛtvā virūpāṇi vikṛtāni ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1250 /
GE07hv_apppu:22510: sarvāṃ bhīṣayate senāṃ devānāṃ bhīmadarśanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1251 //
GE07hv_apppu:22511: [k: K1.2 B2 Dn D4 T1 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22512: te bhītāḥ prapalāyante siṃhatrastā mṛgā iva / **HV_App.I,42B.1251**73:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22513: tataḥ so 'nyaṃ navaṃ dehaṃ kṛtvā prāṃśutaraṃ punaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1252 /
GE07hv_apppu:22514: gacchaty ūrdhvagatiṃ ghoro diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan / HV_App.I,42B.1253 /
GE07hv_apppu:22515: nabhastalagataś cāpi varṣate vāsavo yathā / HV_App.I,42B.1254 /
GE07hv_apppu:22517: [k: For line 1255, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22520: śatavartmā śataśikho dadāha ca punaḥ surān // HV_App.I,42B.1257 //
GE07hv_apppu:22521: muhūrtāc ca mahāśailaḥ śataśīrṣaḥ śatodaraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1258 /
GE07hv_apppu:22522: adṛśyata divaṃ stabdhvā śataśṛṅga ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1259 //
GE07hv_apppu:22523: yo 'nye daityāś ca sādhyāś ca ye ca viśve ca devatāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1260 /
GE07hv_apppu:22524: kṣipanty astrāṇi divyāni tāni so 'grasatāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1261 //
GE07hv_apppu:22525: yudhyamānaś ca samare sarathaḥ so 'surottamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1262 /
GE07hv_apppu:22528: te bhītāḥ samudaikṣanta tridaśā bhīmavikramam / HV_App.I,42B.1264 /
GE07hv_apppu:22530: sa bhago bhayasaṃtrasto dānavendrasya saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1266 /
GE07hv_apppu:22531: rathaṃ tyaktvā mahābhāgo mahendraṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1267 //
GE07hv_apppu:22532: parājitya tu taṃ devaṃ dānavendraḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,42B.1268 /
GE07hv_apppu:22533: gato yatra mahātejā jātavedā mahāprabhaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1269 //
GE07hv_apppu:22534: sa vahnir vāgbhir ugrābhiḥ kruddhas tarjayate balī / HV_App.I,42B.1270 /
GE07hv_apppu:22535: bhavāmy eṣa hi te mṛtyur ity uktvāntaradhīyata // HV_App.I,42B.1271 //
GE07hv_apppu:22536: etasminn antare caiva brāhmaṇendro mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1272 /
GE07hv_apppu:22537: jaghāna somaḥ śītāstro dānavānāṃ camūṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1273 //
GE07hv_apppu:22539: avadhīd dānavān dṛptān daṇḍapāṇir ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1275 //
GE07hv_apppu:22541: daityeṣu vyacarac chrīmān yugānte kālavac chaśī // HV_App.I,42B.1277 //
GE07hv_apppu:22542: sa karṣan rathajālāni ūruvegena candramāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1278 /
GE07hv_apppu:22543: dadāha dānavān sarvān dāvāgnir iva coditaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1279 //
GE07hv_apppu:22544: mṛdgan rathebhyo rathino gajebhyo gajayodhinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1280 /
GE07hv_apppu:22545: sādinaś cāśvapṛṣṭhebhyo bhūmau cāpi padātinaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1281 //
GE07hv_apppu:22546: śītena vyadhamat sarvān vāyur vṛkṣān ivaujasā / HV_App.I,42B.1282 /
GE07hv_apppu:22548: tad astram abhavat tasya pradigdhaṃ śatruśoṇitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1284 /
GE07hv_apppu:22549: pinākam iva rudrasya kruddhasyābhighnataḥ paśūn / HV_App.I,42B.1285 /
GE07hv_apppu:22550: yugāntakopamaḥ śrīmān daityeṣu vyacarad balī // HV_App.I,42B.1286 //
GE07hv_apppu:22551: āvārya mahatīṃ senāṃ pradravantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1287 /
GE07hv_apppu:22552: candraṃ mṛtyum ivāyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā yodhā visiṣmiyuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1288 //
GE07hv_apppu:22553: yato yataḥ prakṣipati śiśirāstraṃ tamonudaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1289 /
GE07hv_apppu:22554: tatas tato vyaśīryanta daityasainyāni saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1290 //
GE07hv_apppu:22557: taṃ tathā bhīmakarmāṇaṃ gṛhītāstraṃ mahāhave / HV_App.I,42B.1293 /
GE07hv_apppu:22558: dṛṣṭvā śaśāṅkam āyāntaṃ daityānāṃ candrabhāskarau // HV_App.I,42B.1294 //
GE07hv_apppu:22560: chādayetāṃ śaraiś candraṃ vṛṣṭim antāv ivāmbudau // HV_App.I,42B.1296 //
GE07hv_apppu:22562: abhavat sumahāśabdo diśaḥ saṃnādayann iva // HV_App.I,42B.1298 //
GE07hv_apppu:22563: vinadadbhir mahānāgair heṣamānaiś ca vājibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1299 /
GE07hv_apppu:22565: yuyutsavas te saṃrabdhā jayagṛddhā yaśasvinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1301 /
GE07hv_apppu:22566: anyonyam abhigarjanto goṣṭheṣv iva mahāvṛṣāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1302 //
GE07hv_apppu:22567: śirasāṃ pātyamānānāṃ samare niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1303 /
GE07hv_apppu:22568: aśmavṛṣṭir ivākāśe hy abhavat senayos tayoḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1304 //
GE07hv_apppu:22570: patitāni sma dṛśyante śirāṃsi raṇamūrdhani // HV_App.I,42B.1306 //
GE07hv_apppu:22571: viśikhonmathitair gātrair bāhubhiś ca sakārmukaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1307 /
GE07hv_apppu:22572: sahasrābharaṇaiś cānyair vicchinnai ruciraiḥ karaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1308 //
GE07hv_apppu:22573: kavacair āvṛtair gātrair urubhiś candanokśitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1309 /
GE07hv_apppu:22576: āsīt sarvā samākīrṇā muhūrtena vasuṃdharā // HV_App.I,42B.1312 //
GE07hv_apppu:22579: sa saṃprahāras tumulaḥ kaṭukaḥ śoṇitodakaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1315 /
GE07hv_apppu:22580: prāvartata surāṇāṃ ca dānavānāṃ ca saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1316 //
GE07hv_apppu:22581: tasmin mahāhave raudre tumule lomaharṣaṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1317 /
GE07hv_apppu:22586: aśvāś ca paryadhāvanta hatārohā diśo daśa / HV_App.I,42B.1320 /
GE07hv_apppu:22588: devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca gajāśvarathināṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1322 /
GE07hv_apppu:22589: samare tatra śūrāṇāṃ pravarāṇāṃ tarasvinām / HV_App.I,42B.1323 /
GE07hv_apppu:22592: nirjaghnur mahatīṃ senām anyonyasya paraṃtapāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1326 //
GE07hv_apppu:22593: bāhūnām uttamāṅgānāṃ kārmukānāṃ ca saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1327 /
GE07hv_apppu:22595: aśvānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca rathānāṃ ca varūthināṃ / HV_App.I,42B.1329 /
GE07hv_apppu:22597: gadābhir asibhiḥ prāsair bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1331 /
GE07hv_apppu:22598: yodhās tatrābhyahanyanta hastyaśvam api tad bahu // HV_App.I,42B.1332 //
GE07hv_apppu:22601: hāhākāro mahāśabdo yodhānām abhavat tadā / HV_App.I,42B.1335 /
GE07hv_apppu:22604: abhavat tumulaḥ śabdo meghānām iva garjatām / **HV_App.I,42B.1336**76:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22605: evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ devānām asuraiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42B.1337 /
GE07hv_apppu:22607: virocanas tu tatraiva viṣvaksenaṃ mahāhave / HV_App.I,42B.1339 /
GE07hv_apppu:22609: tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya viṣvaksenaḥ surair vṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1341 /
GE07hv_apppu:22611: sādhyasya bāṇābhihatas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1343 /
GE07hv_apppu:22614: viṣvaksenaṃ bibhedājau dīptaiḥ saptabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1346 //
GE07hv_apppu:22616: mūrcchām abhijagāmāśu dhvajaṃ cāpy āśrayat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1348 //
GE07hv_apppu:22617: tataḥ sa punar āśvasya sādhyo yuddhe mano dadhe / HV_App.I,42B.1349 /
GE07hv_apppu:22618: visphārya ca mahācāpaṃ daityamadhye vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1350 //
GE07hv_apppu:22619: virocanaś ca balavān abhyayudhyata sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1351 /
GE07hv_apppu:22620: kṣobhayan surasainyāni samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1352 //
GE07hv_apppu:22623: tasya vai yudhyamānasya saṃyuge niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1353**77:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22624: śrūyate tumulaḥ śabdo jīmūtasyeva garjataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1354 //
GE07hv_apppu:22625: jagarja ca mahāghoṣo vinighnan devavāhinīm / HV_App.I,42B.1355 /
GE07hv_apppu:22627: diśo vidrāvayām āsa śaravarṣeṇa dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1357 /
GE07hv_apppu:22629: te prādravanta vitrastā rathebhyo rathinas tadā / HV_App.I,42B.1359 /
GE07hv_apppu:22630: sādinaś cāśvapṛṣṭhebhyo bhūmau cāpi padātayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1360 //
GE07hv_apppu:22637: padātīnāṃ yayuḥ saṃghā yatra devaḥ śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1364 //
GE07hv_apppu:22638: viṣvaksenasya sādhyasya sarvataḥ sa mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1365 /
GE07hv_apppu:22641: padātīnāṃ ca saṃgheṣu vinighnan pratyadṛśyata // HV_App.I,42B.1368 //
GE07hv_apppu:22642: vitatya śyenavat pakṣau sarvataḥ sa varūthinīm / HV_App.I,42B.1369 /
GE07hv_apppu:22643: bhittvā bhittvā mahābāhuḥ śirāṃsy ājāv akṛntata // HV_App.I,42B.1370 //
GE07hv_apppu:22644: sādinaś ca padātāś ca hataśeṣā rathās tathā / HV_App.I,42B.1371 /
GE07hv_apppu:22647: tam ekam abhyadhāvantaṃ siṃhanādaṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.1374 //
GE07hv_apppu:22648: tataḥ so 'siṃ samudyamya javam āsthāya dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1375 /
GE07hv_apppu:22649: cakarta rathinām ājau śirāṃsi ca dhanūṃṣi ca // HV_App.I,42B.1376 //
GE07hv_apppu:22651: virocanaś caran mārgān prakārān ekaviṃśatim // HV_App.I,42B.1378 //
GE07hv_apppu:22652: bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ viplutaṃ plutam / HV_App.I,42B.1379 /
GE07hv_apppu:22653: saṃpātaṃ samudīrṇaṃ ca darśayām āsa dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1380 //
GE07hv_apppu:22654: kecid varāsinā rugṇā dānavena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,42B.1381 /
GE07hv_apppu:22655: vineduś chinnavarmāṇo nipetuś ca gatāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1382 //
GE07hv_apppu:22657: vidrutāḥ svāny anīkāni jaghnus tridaśavāraṇāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1384 //
GE07hv_apppu:22658: nipetur urvyām ākāśān nikṛttā dṛḍhadhanvinā / HV_App.I,42B.1385 /
GE07hv_apppu:22659: vividhās tomarāś cāpā mahāmātraśirāṃsi ca / HV_App.I,42B.1386 /
GE07hv_apppu:22660: pratīpam āharan nāgān aśvāṃś ca dṛḍhavikramān / HV_App.I,42B.1387 /
GE07hv_apppu:22661: cakarta rathinām ājau śirāṃsi ca dhanūṃṣi ca // HV_App.I,42B.1388 //
GE07hv_apppu:22662: āplutya rathinaḥ kāṃścit parāmṛśya mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1389 /
GE07hv_apppu:22663: sūtāṃś ciccheda khaḍgena rathān api ca dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1390 //
GE07hv_apppu:22664: muhur utpatato dikṣu dhāvataś ca yaśasvinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1391 /
GE07hv_apppu:22665: mārgāṃś carita vai citrān vyasmayanta tato 'surāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1392 //
GE07hv_apppu:22666: nijaghāna padā kāṃścid ākṣipyānyān apothayat / HV_App.I,42B.1393 /
GE07hv_apppu:22667: khaḍgena cānyāṃś ciccheda nādenānyāṃś ca bhīṣayat // HV_App.I,42B.1394 //
GE07hv_apppu:22668: ūrustambhagṛhītāś ca prapatanty apare bhuvi / HV_App.I,42B.1395 /
GE07hv_apppu:22669: apare daityam ālokya bhayāt prāṇān avāsṛjan // HV_App.I,42B.1396 //
GE07hv_apppu:22670: tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne yuddhe mahati dāruṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1397 /
GE07hv_apppu:22674: kujumbho dānavaśreṣṭho hy aṃśam ādityam āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1399 /
GE07hv_apppu:22675: [k: K1.2.4 Ñ2 V1.3 B D T2 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22676: yodhayām āsa samare vṛṣaḥ prativṛṣaṃ yathā / **HV_App.I,42B.1399**80:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22678: [k: Ñ1 B Dn Ds D5.6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22679: sphuradbhir niśitais tīkṣnaiḥ śarair bahubhir āśugaiḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1400**81:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22681: tasya bāṇapathaṃ prāpya nābhyavartanta sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1402 //
GE07hv_apppu:22682: praṇeduḥ sarvabhūtāni babhuḥ satimirā diśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1403 /
GE07hv_apppu:22683: devānām ajayaḥ kruraḥ pratyapadyata dāruṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1404 //
GE07hv_apppu:22686: āpatantaṃ gajānīkaṃ kujambho vīkṣya dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1407 /
GE07hv_apppu:22688: adrisāramayīṃ gurvīṃ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadāṃ / HV_App.I,42B.1409 /
GE07hv_apppu:22690: sa gajān gadayā nighnan vyacarat samare balī / HV_App.I,42B.1411 /
GE07hv_apppu:22692: viśīrṇadantāṃś ca bahūn bhinnakumbhāṃś ca vāraṇān / HV_App.I,42B.1413 /
GE07hv_apppu:22693: akarod dānavaśreṣṭha uddiśyoddiśya tān balī // HV_App.I,42B.1414 //
GE07hv_apppu:22697: kujambhasya ca ye 'mātyā dānavā ghoravikramāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1415 /
GE07hv_apppu:22698: nārācair vividhais tīkṣṇair apāsya gajayodhinaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1416 //
GE07hv_apppu:22699: kṣuraiḥ kṣuraprair bhallaiś ca pītair añjalikaiḥ śitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1417 /
GE07hv_apppu:22701: śirobhiḥ prapatadbhiś ca gaganaṃ pratyapūryata / HV_App.I,42B.1419 /
GE07hv_apppu:22702: aśmavṛṣṭir ivābhāti bāhubhiś ca sahāṅkuśaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1420 //
GE07hv_apppu:22704: adṛśyanta mahārāja tālā viśiraso yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1422 //
GE07hv_apppu:22706: jaghānaikeṣuṇā kruddhas tataḥ sa vimukho 'bhavat // HV_App.I,42B.1424 //
GE07hv_apppu:22708: vinighnan pravarān sainyān gadayā balināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1426 //
GE07hv_apppu:22710: apaśyanta surāḥ sarve parvatān iva pātitān // HV_App.I,42B.1428 //
GE07hv_apppu:22711: kujambhasya ca mārgeṣu viśīrṇās te mahāgajāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1429 /
GE07hv_apppu:22712: vajrāhatā ivendreṇa viśīrṇā iva parvatāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1430 //
GE07hv_apppu:22713: apaśyaṃs tridaśāḥ sarve mūrtimantam ivāntakam / HV_App.I,42B.1431 /
GE07hv_apppu:22715: sa babhau tāṃ gadāṃ bibhrat prokṣitāṃ gajaśoṇitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1433 /
GE07hv_apppu:22717: [k: K1.2 Ñ1.2 B Dn D4 T1 G3 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22718: yathā hi bhagavān kruddhaḥ prajānāṃ saṃkṣaye purā / **HV_App.I,42B.1434**83:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22720: gopāla iva daṇḍena kālayan sa mahāgajān / HV_App.I,42B.1436 /
GE07hv_apppu:22721: kruddhaṃ kālam ivākāśe daṇḍam udyamya dānavam / HV_App.I,42B.1437 /
GE07hv_apppu:22722: apaśyanta surāḥ sarve kujambhaṃ bhīmavikramam // HV_App.I,42B.1438 //
GE07hv_apppu:22723: hatārohās tu tatrānye prabhinnā vāraṇottamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1439 /
GE07hv_apppu:22724: te hanyamānā gadayā bāṇaiś ca bhṛśavikṣatāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1440 //
GE07hv_apppu:22726: svāny anīkāni mṛdnantaḥ prādravanta mahāgajāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1442 //
GE07hv_apppu:22727: mahāvāta ivābhrāṇi vidhaman gadayā gajān / HV_App.I,42B.1443 /
GE07hv_apppu:22730: atiṣṭat samare daityaḥ kālaḥ saṃvartako yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1444 //
GE07hv_apppu:22731: tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni devarājasya śāsanāt / HV_App.I,42B.1445 /
GE07hv_apppu:22732: abhyadravanta ditijān nandanto bhairavān ravān // HV_App.I,42B.1446 //
GE07hv_apppu:22735: taṃ balaugham aparyantaṃ devānāṃ sudurāsadam / HV_App.I,42B.1447 /
GE07hv_apppu:22737: āpatantam apāraṃ ca samudram iva parvaṇi / **HV_App.I,42B.1447**86:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22739: āpatantaṃ suduṣpāraṃ rajasā sarvato vṛtam / HV_App.I,42B.1449 /
GE07hv_apppu:22741: tad āścaryam apaśyanta aśraddheyam ivādbhutam / HV_App.I,42B.1451 /
GE07hv_apppu:22743: B1. 3 Ds2 G5 ins. after line 1451 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22745: udīrṇāṃ pṛtanāṃ sarvāṃ sāśvāṃ sarathakuñjarām // HV_App.I,42B.1452 //
GE07hv_apppu:22746: āvārya samare 'tiṣṭhat kujambhas tarasā balī / HV_App.I,42B.1453 /
GE07hv_apppu:22747: sainyārṇavaṃ devatānāṃ girir merur ivācalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1454 /
GE07hv_apppu:22748: anīkinīṃ kujambhas tu gadayā saṃnyavārayat // HV_App.I,42B.1455 //
GE07hv_apppu:22749: [k: Dn Ds (marg.) Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22750: sā tathā vāritā senā vihvalābhūn nirudyamā / **HV_App.I,42B.1455**88:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22751: tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne saṃprahāre sudāruṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1456 /
GE07hv_apppu:22752: asilomā hariś caiva jaghnatus tau parasparam // HV_App.I,42B.1457 //
GE07hv_apppu:22753: asilomā tu balavān dānavo dānavādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1458 /
GE07hv_apppu:22755: tapaty arka ivāmoghaḥ surasainyāni saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1460 //
GE07hv_apppu:22757: śarair megha ivāvarṣad devānīkaṃ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,42B.1462 //
GE07hv_apppu:22759: raudraḥ krūro durādharṣo durvāryo dhvajinīmukhe // HV_App.I,42B.1464 //
GE07hv_apppu:22760: yudhyate daivataiḥ sārdhaṃ grasamāna iva prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1465 /
GE07hv_apppu:22768: tiṣṭhate dānavaśreṣṭhaḥ saṃyuge vyāghravad balī / HV_App.I,42B.1471 /
GE07hv_apppu:22778: hayān gajān padātīṃś ca rathāṃś ca tarasā bahūn // HV_App.I,42B.1478 //
GE07hv_apppu:22779: nyamajjayat sa samare paravīrān mahārathān / HV_App.I,42B.1479 /
GE07hv_apppu:22780: aplāvayat sa devaughān dāruṇo dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1480 //
GE07hv_apppu:22781: prāmardata yudhi śrīmān yudhi śreṣṭo yudhi sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1481 /
GE07hv_apppu:22783: saṃnaddhaṃ tatra yudhyantaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam / HV_App.I,42B.1483 /
GE07hv_apppu:22784: madhyaṃdinagataṃ sūryaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā / HV_App.I,42B.1484 /
GE07hv_apppu:22785: na śekuḥ sarvabhūtāni dānavaṃ prasamīkṣitum // HV_App.I,42B.1485 //
GE07hv_apppu:22786: yathā prarūḍhe gharmānte dahet kakṣaṃ hutāśanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1486 /
GE07hv_apppu:22787: tathā suravarān daityo dahate balatejasā // HV_App.I,42B.1487 //
GE07hv_apppu:22788: devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca balaṃ nardati dāruṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1488 /
GE07hv_apppu:22789: vimūḍham abhavat sarvam ākulaṃ ca samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1489 //
GE07hv_apppu:22791: āryāṃ buddhiṃ samādāya na tyajanti mahāraṇam // HV_App.I,42B.1491 //
GE07hv_apppu:22792: tad utpiñjalakaṃ yuddhaṃ abhaval lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1492 /
GE07hv_apppu:22795: astraghātāṃś ca vividhān dānavānāṃ tadā raṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1495 /
GE07hv_apppu:22796: anyonyaṃ mūḍhacittās te nijaghnur vyākulīkṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1496 /
GE07hv_apppu:22797: svān parān nābhijānanti vimūḍhāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1497 //
GE07hv_apppu:22798: śiroruheṣu saṃgṛhya kaścic chūrasya saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1498 /
GE07hv_apppu:22800: bāhubhir muṣṭibhiś caiva vajrakalpaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1500 /
GE07hv_apppu:22801: praharanti raṇe vīrā āttaśastrāḥ parasparam // HV_App.I,42B.1501 //
GE07hv_apppu:22803: saṃkule tumule yuddhe vartamāne mahābhaye // HV_App.I,42B.1503 //
GE07hv_apppu:22804: hayo hayaṃ gajo nāgaṃ vīro vīraṃ mahāhave / HV_App.I,42B.1504 /
GE07hv_apppu:22805: abhyadravañ jighāṃsanto hy asamañja samāhave // HV_App.I,42B.1505 //
GE07hv_apppu:22806: [k: For line 1505, B T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22808: asurāś ca surāś caiva vikramāḍhyā mahārathāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1506 /
GE07hv_apppu:22809: juhvataḥ samare prāṇān nijaghnur itaretaram // HV_App.I,42B.1507 //
GE07hv_apppu:22811: hastaiḥ pādaiś ca yudhyante dānavās tridaśaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,42B.1509 //
GE07hv_apppu:22812: haris tu niśitaṃ bhallaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1510 /
GE07hv_apppu:22813: sa tasya ghanuṣaḥ koṭiṃ chittvā bhūmāv apātayat / HV_App.I,42B.1511 /
GE07hv_apppu:22814: punaś cāpi pṛṣatkānāṃ śatāni nataparvaṇām / HV_App.I,42B.1512 /
GE07hv_apppu:22815: prāhiṇot sahasā tasya dānavendrasya saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1513 //
GE07hv_apppu:22816: tasya dehe vimuktās te mārutena samīritāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1514 /
GE07hv_apppu:22817: magnārdhakāyā viviśuḥ pannagā iva parvate // HV_App.I,42B.1515 //
GE07hv_apppu:22818: sa tair nipatitair gātraiḥ kṣaradbhir asṛg avyayam / HV_App.I,42B.1516 /
GE07hv_apppu:22819: babhau daityo mahābāhur merur dhātum ivotsṛjan // HV_App.I,42B.1517 //
GE07hv_apppu:22820: [k: Ñ1.2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22822: tato 'silomā saṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhyānyan mahad dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1518 /
GE07hv_apppu:22823: rukmapuṅkhāṃś ca niśitān preṣayām āsa sāyakān // HV_App.I,42B.1519 //
GE07hv_apppu:22824: tais tu marmasu vivyādha sarpānalaviṣopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1520 /
GE07hv_apppu:22825: gātraṃ saṃchādayām āsa mahābhrair iva parvatam // HV_App.I,42B.1521 //
GE07hv_apppu:22826: [k: For line 1521, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22828: bhūyaḥ saṃdhāya ca śaraṃ mumocāntakasaṃnibham / HV_App.I,42B.1522 /
GE07hv_apppu:22831: supuṅkhaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ bāṇam apratimaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1523 //
GE07hv_apppu:22833: mumoha sahasā devo bhūmau cāpi papāta ha // HV_App.I,42B.1525 //
GE07hv_apppu:22834: tato hāhākṛtāḥ sarve deve bhūtalam āśrite / HV_App.I,42B.1526 /
GE07hv_apppu:22837: jagat sadevam āvignaṃ yathārkapatane tathā // HV_App.I,42B.1527 //
GE07hv_apppu:22838: parivāraṃ tu samare tasya hatvā mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1528 /
GE07hv_apppu:22840: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 V3 B Dn Ds D4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22842: pragṛhya kārmukaṃ ghoraṃ gataḥ śakrarathaṃ prati // **HV_App.I,42B.1529**96:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:22843: tatraiva tu mahāyuddhe sasainyāv aśvināv ubhau / HV_App.I,42B.1530 /
GE07hv_apppu:22844: prayuddhau saha vṛtreṇa balinā devatāriṇā // HV_App.I,42B.1531 //
GE07hv_apppu:22846: āsādya so 'śvinau daityaḥ sthito girir ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1533 //
GE07hv_apppu:22847: tataḥ śaṅkham upādhmāya dviṣatāṃ lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1534 /
GE07hv_apppu:22854: bhallair vṛtraḥ praciccheda bhīmavegaravais tathā / HV_App.I,42B.1541 /
GE07hv_apppu:22855: antarikṣacarāṇāṃ ca bhūmiṣṭhānāṃ ca garjatām / HV_App.I,42B.1542 /
GE07hv_apppu:22856: śarair vivyādha gātrāṇi devānāṃ priyadarśanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1543 //
GE07hv_apppu:22860: nikṛttāny eva dṛśyante śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca // HV_App.I,42B.1545 //
GE07hv_apppu:22866: avidhyat sabalān kruddhaḥ sāyakair marmabhedibhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1551 //
GE07hv_apppu:22867: nadato vividhān nādān arditasyāpi sāyakaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1552 /
GE07hv_apppu:22868: na moham asurendrasya dadṛśus tridaśā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1553 //
GE07hv_apppu:22870: paraśvadhaiś ca śūlaiś ca pravavarṣur mahārathāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1555 //
GE07hv_apppu:22871: tato vṛtraḥ susaṃkruddhas tais tadābhyardito balāt / HV_App.I,42B.1556 /
GE07hv_apppu:22872: [k: For line 1556, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22874: abhyavarṣac chitair bāṇais tān sarvān satyavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1557 //
GE07hv_apppu:22878: uttarāṃ diśam ājagmus trāsitā dṛḍhadhanvanā // HV_App.I,42B.1561 //
GE07hv_apppu:22880: prāvartata raṇe vṛtras trāsayānaś carācarān // HV_App.I,42B.1563 //
GE07hv_apppu:22881: tatraikas tu mahābāhur asiśūladharaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1564 /
GE07hv_apppu:22882: abhyadhāvata daityendraṃ vṛtram apratimaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1565 //
GE07hv_apppu:22885: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya prabhinnam iva vāraṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1566 /
GE07hv_apppu:22889: tāṃ pragṛhya mahābhīmām adrisāramayīṃ dṛḍhām / HV_App.I,42B.1570 /
GE07hv_apppu:22890: aśvinaṃ sahasāgamya tāḍayām āsa vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.1571 //
GE07hv_apppu:22891: dīpyamānaṃ tataḥ śūlam aśvī suvipulaṃ dṛḍham / HV_App.I,42B.1572 /
GE07hv_apppu:22894: aśvinaṃ sahasā bhartsya garutmān iva pannagam // HV_App.I,42B.1575 //
GE07hv_apppu:22895: so 'ntarikṣāt samutpatya vidhūya mahatīṃ gadām / HV_App.I,42B.1576 /
GE07hv_apppu:22897: gadayābhihataḥ so 'śvī tyaktvā śūlam anuttamam / HV_App.I,42B.1578 /
GE07hv_apppu:22898: prayātaḥ sahasā tatra yatra yudhyati vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1579 //
GE07hv_apppu:22899: parājitya tu saṃgrāme so 'śvinaṃ bhīmavikramam / HV_App.I,42B.1580 /
GE07hv_apppu:22900: jayaśriyā sevyamāno vṛtro yuddhe vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1581 //
GE07hv_apppu:22902: tatraiva tu mahāyuddhe raṇājir devasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1582 /
GE07hv_apppu:22903: yudhyate saha daityena ekacakreṇa dhīmatā // HV_App.I,42B.1583 //
GE07hv_apppu:22905: ekacakrasya sainyaṃ tac charavarṣair avākirat // HV_App.I,42B.1585 //
GE07hv_apppu:22907: śūlāni ca bhuśuṇḍīś ca kṣipanti sma mahāraṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1587 //
GE07hv_apppu:22909: aśivaṃ ditijair muktaṃ durnivāryaṃ carācaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1589 //
GE07hv_apppu:22912: turaṃgamāṇāṃ tu śataṃ tasya yuktaṃ mahārathe / HV_App.I,42B.1592 /
GE07hv_apppu:22914: teṣāṃ ca raṇapātena cakranemisvanena ca / HV_App.I,42B.1594 /
GE07hv_apppu:22916: tasya bāṇanipātaiś ca hatā vai śataśaḥ surāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1595 //
GE07hv_apppu:22917: tataḥ sa laghubhiś citraiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1596 /
GE07hv_apppu:22918: āyudhān acchinat kruddhaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1597 //
GE07hv_apppu:22920: gamitāḥ prakṣayaṃ kecit tridaśair dānavā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1599 //
GE07hv_apppu:22921: tataḥ prakṣīyamāṇāṃs tān utprekṣya ca dite sutāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1600 /
GE07hv_apppu:22923: te diśo vidiśaś caiva pratirudhya prahāriṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1602 /
GE07hv_apppu:22924: abhyaghnan niśitaiḥ śastrair devān ditisutā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1603 //
GE07hv_apppu:22925: raṇājir jvalitaṃ ghoraṃ paramaṃ tigmatesam / HV_App.I,42B.1604 /
GE07hv_apppu:22926: mumocāstraṃ mahābāhur mathanaṃ nāma saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1605 //
GE07hv_apppu:22927: tataḥ śastrāṇi śūlāni niśitāni sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1606 /
GE07hv_apppu:22929: chittvā śūlāṃś ca tān sarvān ekacakro mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1608 /
GE07hv_apppu:22930: abhyavidhyata taṃ sādhyaṃ daśabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1609 //
GE07hv_apppu:22932: jvalitair aparaiḥ śīghrais tān avidhyat sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1611 //
GE07hv_apppu:22933: teṣāṃ chinnāni gātrāṇi visṛjanti sma śoṇitam / HV_App.I,42B.1612 /
GE07hv_apppu:22936: ditijaiḥ kālyamānās te vitresuḥ surasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1615 //
GE07hv_apppu:22937: ekacakro raṇe tiṣṭhann apaśyad gajayūthapān / HV_App.I,42B.1616 /
GE07hv_apppu:22939: mattān suvihitān dṛptān mahāmātrair adhiṣṭhitān / HV_App.I,42B.1618 /
GE07hv_apppu:22942: nyahanat surasainyasya gajān gaja ivāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1621 //
GE07hv_apppu:22943: vikṣaranto mahānāgān bhīmavegāṃs tridhā madam / HV_App.I,42B.1622 /
GE07hv_apppu:22944: meghas tanitanirghoṣān mahādrīn iva cotthitān // HV_App.I,42B.1623 //
GE07hv_apppu:22947: ekacakro gadāpāṇir balavān gadinām varaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1626 /
GE07hv_apppu:22948: utsārayām āsa gajān mahābhrāṇīva mārutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1627 //
GE07hv_apppu:22949: nihatya gadayā sarvāṃs tān gajān gajamardanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1628 /
GE07hv_apppu:22952: pārāvatasavarṇāṃś ca haṃsavarṇāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42B.1631 //
GE07hv_apppu:22955: niṣūdayām āsa balī gadayā bhīmavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1634 //
GE07hv_apppu:22956: raṇājis tasya samare sarvān dṛṣṭvāsuradviṣaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1635 /
GE07hv_apppu:22961: raṇe 'tiṣṭhata daityendro vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1640 //
GE07hv_apppu:22962: tasminn eva tu saṃgrāme balodrikto mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1641 /
GE07hv_apppu:22963: mṛgavyādhaṃ mahātmānaṃ yodhayaty ajitaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1642 //
GE07hv_apppu:22966: gajair mattai rathair divyair vājibhiś ca mahājavaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1645 /
GE07hv_apppu:22967: astraiś ca niśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ śaraiś cānalasaṃnibhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1646 //
GE07hv_apppu:22968: tatas te dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahāsuraṃ / HV_App.I,42B.1647 /
GE07hv_apppu:22972: taṃ saṃīkṣya mahāyodhaṃ dikṣu sarvāsv avasthitam / HV_App.I,42B.1651 /
GE07hv_apppu:22973: tataḥ praharaṇair ghorair abhipetuḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1652 //
GE07hv_apppu:22974: tasya sarvāyasās tīkṣṇāḥ śarāḥ pītamukhāḥ śitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1653 /
GE07hv_apppu:22976: taiś ca saptabhir āviṣṭaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi cārpitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1655 /
GE07hv_apppu:22977: utpapāta tadā vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan // HV_App.I,42B.1656 //
GE07hv_apppu:22978: tatas taṃ tridaśo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajyakārmukaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1657 /
GE07hv_apppu:22979: anuvavrāja saṃhṛṣṭaḥ khaṃ tadā sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1658 //
GE07hv_apppu:22980: [k: For line 1658, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22982: asuraṃ chādayām āsa taṃ vyomni śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1659 /
GE07hv_apppu:22983: vṛṣṭimān iva jīmūto nidāghānte dharādharam // HV_App.I,42B.1660 //
GE07hv_apppu:22984: ardyamānas tatas tena mṛgavyādhena dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1661 /
GE07hv_apppu:22985: cakāra ninadaṃ ghoram ambare jalado yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1662 //
GE07hv_apppu:22986: sa dūraṃ sahasotpatya mṛgavyādharathaṃ prati / HV_App.I,42B.1663 /
GE07hv_apppu:22987: nipapāta mahāvegaḥ pakṣavān vai girir yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1664 //
GE07hv_apppu:22988: babhañja ca tato daityo bhagneṣākūbaraṃ rathaṃ / HV_App.I,42B.1665 /
GE07hv_apppu:22989: mṛgavyādhaḥ parityajya sthito bhūmau mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1666 //
GE07hv_apppu:22990: virathaṃ prekṣya rudraṃ tu tasya pāriṣadāḥ śubhāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1667 /
GE07hv_apppu:22992: sa tu taiḥ sahasotthāya viṣṭhito vimale 'mbare / HV_App.I,42B.1669 /
GE07hv_apppu:22993: mudgarair ardito bhīmair vṛkṣaḥ paraśubhir yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1670 //
GE07hv_apppu:22994: teṣāṃ vegavatāṃ vegaṃ nihatya sa mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1671 /
GE07hv_apppu:22996: sa sālavṛkṣam utpāṭya mahāśākhaṃ mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1673 /
GE07hv_apppu:22997: sarvān pāriṣadān saṃkhye sūdayām āsa dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1674 //
GE07hv_apppu:22998: sa tair vikṣatadehas tu rudhiraughapariplutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1675 /
GE07hv_apppu:23001: jaghāna tān pāriṣadān samare dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1678 //
GE07hv_apppu:23002: tatas teṣv avasanneṣu mahāpāriṣadeṣu vai / HV_App.I,42B.1679 /
GE07hv_apppu:23003: balaṃ tad avaśeṣaṃ sa nāśayām āsa vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.1680 //
GE07hv_apppu:23004: aśvair aśvān gajair nāgān yodhān yodhai rathān rathaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1681 /
GE07hv_apppu:23005: dānavaḥ sūdayām āsa yugānte 'ntakavat prajāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1682 //
GE07hv_apppu:23006: hatair aśvaiś ca nāgaiś ca bhagnākṣaiś ca mahārathaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1683 /
GE07hv_apppu:23007: tridaśaiś cābhavad bhūmī ruddhamārgā samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1684 //
GE07hv_apppu:23008: evaṃbalaḥ sa daityendro mṛgavyādhaś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.1685 /
GE07hv_apppu:23009: yudhi prayuddhau balinau prabhinnāv iva vāraṇau // HV_App.I,42B.1686 //
GE07hv_apppu:23010: tatraiva yudhyate rudro dvitīyo rāhuṇā saha / HV_App.I,42B.1687 /
GE07hv_apppu:23011: viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu krodhātmā aja ekapāt // HV_App.I,42B.1688 //
GE07hv_apppu:23012: tat tadā sumahad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1689 /
GE07hv_apppu:23013: āsīt pratibhayaṃ raudraṃ vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatām // HV_App.I,42B.1690 //
GE07hv_apppu:23016: ājaghānātha saṃkruddho rudro raudrākṛtiḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1693 /
GE07hv_apppu:23018: tasya kāñcanacitrāṅgaṃ rathaṃ sāśvaṃ sasārathim / HV_App.I,42B.1695 /
GE07hv_apppu:23019: jaghāna samare śrīmān kruddho daityasya sāyakaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1696 //
GE07hv_apppu:23020: tasya pāriṣadas tv eko rathaśaktyā mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1697 /
GE07hv_apppu:23021: bibheda samare hṛṣṭo dānavaṃ taṃ stanāntare / HV_App.I,42B.1698 /
GE07hv_apppu:23022: sa bhinnagātro rudreṇa tathā pāriṣadair api // HV_App.I,42B.1699 //
GE07hv_apppu:23023: rudrasya ratham āyāntaṃ sa rāhur dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1700 /
GE07hv_apppu:23031: bibheda samare rudraḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1705 //
GE07hv_apppu:23035: nirbibheda śarais tīkṣṇair meruṃ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1709 //
GE07hv_apppu:23037: patitaiḥ parvatābhaiś ca dānavaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1711 //
GE07hv_apppu:23039: tataḥ sa rudraḥ samare muṣṭinābhihatas tadā / **HV_App.I,42B.1711**102:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23040: papāta sarathaḥ sāśvaḥ purāṭṭa iva bhūtale // **HV_App.I,42B.1711**102:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:23043: virejus te tadā daityāḥ puṣpitā iva kiṃśukāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1712**103:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23048: hatānāṃ svanatāṃ tatra daityānāṃ cāpi nisvanaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1715 /
GE07hv_apppu:23049: surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca saṃbabhūva mahāsvanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1716 //
GE07hv_apppu:23051: rurodha mārgaṃ yodhānāṃ cakṣūṃṣi ca dharārajaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1718 //
GE07hv_apppu:23054: āsīt pratibhayaṃ raudraṃ vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatāṃ // **HV_App.I,42B.1719**105:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:23058: bhagnaiḥ khaḍgair gadābhiś ca śaktitomarapaṭṭiśaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1721 /
GE07hv_apppu:23059: [k: For line 1721, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23061: apaviddhaiś ca bhagnaiś ca rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair hataiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1722 //
GE07hv_apppu:23062: nihataiḥ kuñjarair mattais tathā tridaśadānavaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1723 /
GE07hv_apppu:23067: nāgā lakṣaṃ hatā rājann aśvā lakṣatrayaṃ nṛpa // **HV_App.I,42B.1725**107:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:23068: utpetuś ca kavandhāni dikṣu sarvāsu saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1726 /
GE07hv_apppu:23072: ajasya caikapādasya rāhoś caiva mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1730 //
GE07hv_apppu:23073: teṣāṃ tu tatra patatāṃ kruddhānām atinisvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1731 /
GE07hv_apppu:23074: udvarta iva bhūtānāṃ samudrāṇāṃ ca śuśruve // HV_App.I,42B.1732 //
GE07hv_apppu:23075: tatraikas tu sadhūmrākṣaḥ śrīmān rudro munīśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1733 /
GE07hv_apppu:23079: ratham āsthāya ca śrīmāṃs taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1737 /
GE07hv_apppu:23080: dānavaiḥ saṃvṛtaḥ keśī yudhyate yudhi durjayaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1738 //
GE07hv_apppu:23082: niṣpetur ugravīryasya jvālā hi prasṛtā mukhāt // HV_App.I,42B.1740 //
GE07hv_apppu:23085: tasya niṣpatamānasya dānavaiḥ saṃvṛtasya vai / HV_App.I,42B.1743 /
GE07hv_apppu:23086: babhūva sumahānādaḥ kṣobhayaṃs tridivaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,42B.1744 //
GE07hv_apppu:23087: tena śabdena vitrastā tridaśānāṃ mahācamūḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1745 /
GE07hv_apppu:23089: [k: B Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23092: teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ saṃjajñe lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1747 /
GE07hv_apppu:23094: sarve hy atibalāḥ śūrāḥ sarve parvatasaṃnibhāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1749 /
GE07hv_apppu:23098: teṣāṃ ninadatāṃ śabdaḥ saṃyuge meghanisvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1751 /
GE07hv_apppu:23103: udbhūto devadaityaughaiḥ saṃrurodha diśo daśa // HV_App.I,42B.1754 //
GE07hv_apppu:23105: saṃvṛtā bahurūpeṇa dadṛśur na sma kiṃcana // HV_App.I,42B.1756 //
GE07hv_apppu:23106: na dhvajo na patākā vā na varma turago 'pi vā / HV_App.I,42B.1757 /
GE07hv_apppu:23107: āyudhaṃ syandanaṃ vāpi dṛśyate naiva sārathiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1758 //
GE07hv_apppu:23108: sa śabdas tumulas teṣām anyonyam abhidhāvatām / HV_App.I,42B.1759 /
GE07hv_apppu:23109: nipetur ugravīryasya jvālā hi prasṛtā mukhāt // HV_App.I,42B.1760 //
GE07hv_apppu:23112: tasya niṣpatamānasya dānavaiḥ saṃvṛtasya ca / HV_App.I,42B.1763 /
GE07hv_apppu:23113: śrūyate tumulaḥ śabdo na rūpāṇi cakāśire // HV_App.I,42B.1764 //
GE07hv_apppu:23114: dānavās tatra saṃkruddhā dānavān eva jaghnire / HV_App.I,42B.1765 /
GE07hv_apppu:23115: tridaśās tridaśāṃś caiva nijaghnus tumule tadā // HV_App.I,42B.1766 //
GE07hv_apppu:23116: te parāṃś ca vinighnantaḥ svāṃś ca yuddhe mahāsurān / HV_App.I,42B.1767 /
GE07hv_apppu:23117: rudhirārdrāṃ tathā cakrur medinīm asurāḥ surāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1768 //
GE07hv_apppu:23118: tatas tu rudhiraugheṇa saṃsiktaṃ mṛditaṃ rajaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1769 /
GE07hv_apppu:23121: tridaśā dānavāś caiva jaghnur anyonyam āhave // HV_App.I,42B.1772 //
GE07hv_apppu:23122: bāhubhiḥ parighākārair nighnantaḥ parvatais tadā / HV_App.I,42B.1773 /
GE07hv_apppu:23123: rudrapāriṣadān sarvān sūdayanti sma dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1774 //
GE07hv_apppu:23126: etasminn antare kruddhaḥ keśī dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1777 /
GE07hv_apppu:23127: saṃgrāmamarṣī ghoraḥ sa svāny anīkāni harṣayan / HV_App.I,42B.1778 /
GE07hv_apppu:23128: teṣāṃ paramasaṃkruddho vajram astram udīrayat // HV_App.I,42B.1779 //
GE07hv_apppu:23129: vajreṇāstreṇa divyena śastreṇa ca mahātmanā / HV_App.I,42B.1780 /
GE07hv_apppu:23130: mahāpāriṣadāḥ sarvaṃ nihatā yudhi durjayāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1781 //
GE07hv_apppu:23132: viprakīrṇadrumāḥ petuḥ śailā vajrahatā iva // HV_App.I,42B.1783 //
GE07hv_apppu:23133: evaṃ tat tumulaṃ yuddham abhaval lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1784 /
GE07hv_apppu:23134: keśinaḥ saha rudreṇa tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,42B.1785 //
GE07hv_apppu:23137: vṛṣaparvā tu daityendro viśvam adbhutadarśanam / HV_App.I,42B.1786 /
GE07hv_apppu:23140: dhvajinīṃ prekṣya śatrūṇāṃ sārathiṃ tvarito 'bravīt // HV_App.I,42B.1789 //
GE07hv_apppu:23141: atraiva tāvat tvaritaṃ nayemaṃ sārathe ratham / HV_App.I,42B.1790 /
GE07hv_apppu:23142: ete hi devāḥ sahitā ghnanti naḥ samare balam // HV_App.I,42B.1791 //
GE07hv_apppu:23143: etān nihantum icchāmi samaraślāghino raṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1792 /
GE07hv_apppu:23144: etair hi dānavānīkaṃ kṛtacchidram idaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,42B.1793 //
GE07hv_apppu:23145: tataḥ prajavitāśvena rathena rathināṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1794 /
GE07hv_apppu:23146: arīn abhyahanat kruddhaḥ śarajālair mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1795 //
GE07hv_apppu:23149: na sthātuṃ devatāḥ śaktāḥ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1796 /
GE07hv_apppu:23151: atyarthaṃ vai raṇe śūrāḥ saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1796**112:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23155: tān mṛtyuvaśam āpannān vaivasvatavaśaṃ gatān / HV_App.I,42B.1798 /
GE07hv_apppu:23157: samīkṣya nihatāñ jñātīn avatasthe mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1799 //
GE07hv_apppu:23158: niṣkumbhaṃ tatra taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te tridaśottamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1800 /
GE07hv_apppu:23159: sametya sahitāḥ sarve taṃ drutaṃ paryavārayan // HV_App.I,42B.1801 //
GE07hv_apppu:23160: vyavasthitaṃ ca niṣkumbhaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tridaśottamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1802 /
GE07hv_apppu:23162: vṛṣaparvā tu śailābhaṃ niṣkumbhaṃ samare sthitam / HV_App.I,42B.1804 /
GE07hv_apppu:23163: mahendra iva dhārābhiḥ śaravarṣair avākirat // HV_App.I,42B.1805 //
GE07hv_apppu:23164: acintayitvā tu śarāñ śarīre patitān bahūn / HV_App.I,42B.1806 /
GE07hv_apppu:23165: sthitaś ca pramukhe śrīmān sasainyaḥ sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1807 //
GE07hv_apppu:23166: sa prahasya mahātejā vṛṣaparvāṇam āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1808 /
GE07hv_apppu:23167: abhidudrāva vegena kampayann iva medinīm // HV_App.I,42B.1809 //
GE07hv_apppu:23168: tasya tv ādhāvamānasya dīpyamānasya tejasā / HV_App.I,42B.1810 /
GE07hv_apppu:23169: babhūva rūpaṃ durdharṣaṃ dīptasyeva vibhāvasoḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1811 //
GE07hv_apppu:23170: rathaṃ tyaktvā sa tu śrīmān sakrodhaḥ kamalekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1812 /
GE07hv_apppu:23171: vṛkṣam utpāṭayām āsa mahāśākhaṃ mahocchrayam / HV_App.I,42B.1813 /
GE07hv_apppu:23172: tataś cikṣepa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ niṣkumbho vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1814 //
GE07hv_apppu:23173: taṃ gṛhītvā mahāvṛkṣaṃ pāṇinaikena dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1815 /
GE07hv_apppu:23174: vinadya sumahānādaṃ bhrāmayitvā ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.1816 //
GE07hv_apppu:23175: sagajān sagajārohān sarathān rathinas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.1817 /
GE07hv_apppu:23176: jaghāna dānavas tena śākhinā tridaśāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,42B.1818 //
GE07hv_apppu:23177: tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ samare prāṇahāriṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1819 /
GE07hv_apppu:23179: tam āpatantaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ tridaśānāṃ bhayāvaham / HV_App.I,42B.1821 /
GE07hv_apppu:23180: ālokya dhanvī niṣkumbhaś cukrodha ca nanāda ca // HV_App.I,42B.1822 //
GE07hv_apppu:23181: sa tatra niśitair bāṇair viṃśadbhir marmavedhibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1823 /
GE07hv_apppu:23183: śaraśaktibhir ugrābhir daityānām adhipaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,42B.1825 /
GE07hv_apppu:23184: [k: K1 V1.3 B Dn Ds D3.4.6 T1.2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. for line 1825,
GE07hv_apppu:23191: viddhaḥ samaramadhyastho rudhiraṃ prāsravad bahu // HV_App.I,42B.1826 //
GE07hv_apppu:23192: udvignā muktakeśāś ca bhagnadarpāḥ parājitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1827 /
GE07hv_apppu:23193: śvasanto dudruvuḥ sarve bhayād vai vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1828 //
GE07hv_apppu:23194: anyonyaṃ pramamanthus te trāsitā vṛṣaparvaṇā / HV_App.I,42B.1829 /
GE07hv_apppu:23195: pṛṣṭhatas trāsasaṃvignāḥ prekṣamāṇā muhur muhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1830 //
GE07hv_apppu:23196: tyaktapraharaṇāḥ sarve kṛtās te vṛṣaparvaṇā / HV_App.I,42B.1831 /
GE07hv_apppu:23198: tatraiva tu mahāvīryaḥ prahrādaḥ kālam āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1833 /
GE07hv_apppu:23199: yodhayām āsa raktākṣo hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1834 //
GE07hv_apppu:23204: cakāra tvarayā yukto bhārgavo vijayāvahāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1836 //
GE07hv_apppu:23205: hutāśanaṃ tarpayato brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyataḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1837 /
GE07hv_apppu:23207: srajaś ca vividhāś citrā jayārtham abhimantritāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1839 /
GE07hv_apppu:23208: prahlādasya śubhe mūrdhni ābabandhośanāḥ svayam / HV_App.I,42B.1840 /
GE07hv_apppu:23209: kālena saha saṃgrāme prayuddhaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1841 //
GE07hv_apppu:23210: prahrādasyātivīryasya śāntiṃ cakre sa bhārgavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1842 /
GE07hv_apppu:23212: tāni dānavavīrāṇāṃ jepuḥ śāntim anuttamām // HV_App.I,42B.1844 //
GE07hv_apppu:23216: raṇapraveśasāntiṃ te kramāc cakruś ca dānavāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1845**117:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23221: balim abhyarcya rājānaṃ prahradāṃ paryavārayan // HV_App.I,42B.1850 //
GE07hv_apppu:23222: āsthāya vipulaṃ divyaṃ rathaṃ pararathārujam / HV_App.I,42B.1851 /
GE07hv_apppu:23225: meroḥ śikharam ākīrṇaṃ dyaur ivāmbudharāgame // HV_App.I,42B.1854 //
GE07hv_apppu:23231: tasya daityasahasrāṇi prayānty agre mahāraṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1860 //
GE07hv_apppu:23233: saptatir vai sahasrāṇi gajās tāvanta eva ca // HV_App.I,42B.1862 //
GE07hv_apppu:23234: madhye vyūhodarasthas tu kālanemir mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1863 /
GE07hv_apppu:23235: dhanur visphārayan ghoraṃ nanāda prajahāsa ca // HV_App.I,42B.1864 //
GE07hv_apppu:23236: tasmiñ śatasahasrāṇi puro yānti mahādyuteḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1865 /
GE07hv_apppu:23238: sa samaṃ vartamānas tu pakṣābhyāṃ vistṛto mahān / HV_App.I,42B.1867 /
GE07hv_apppu:23241: nānāpraharaṇānāṃ ca parimāṇaṃ na vidyate // HV_App.I,42B.1870 //
GE07hv_apppu:23244: garjanto vinadantaś ca vikrośantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1873 /
GE07hv_apppu:23246: tatra tūryasahasrāṇāṃ saṃjajñe nisvano mahān / HV_App.I,42B.1875 /
GE07hv_apppu:23247: hayānāṃ ca gajānāṃ ca garjatām abhitaujasām // HV_App.I,42B.1876 //
GE07hv_apppu:23249: śuśruve śaṅkhaśabdaś ca paṭahānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1878 //
GE07hv_apppu:23251: nirghoṣeṇa rathānāṃ ca krośatīva nabhaḥsthalam // HV_App.I,42B.1880 //
GE07hv_apppu:23256: antarikṣāt papātolkā vāyuś ca paruṣo vavau / HV_App.I,42B.1885 /
GE07hv_apppu:23257: vamantyaḥ pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ śivāś caiva vavāśire // HV_App.I,42B.1886 //
GE07hv_apppu:23258: prahrādas tu mahāvīryaḥ prahasan yuddhadurmadaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1887 /
GE07hv_apppu:23259: uvāca vacanaṃ śrīmāṃs tatkālakṣamam uttamam / HV_App.I,42B.1888 /
GE07hv_apppu:23261: adya madbāṇanihatān devān drakṣyatha saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1890 //
GE07hv_apppu:23262: bāndhavā nihatā yeṣāṃ tridaśair iha saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1891 /
GE07hv_apppu:23263: adya te nirvapiṣyanti śatrumāṃsāni dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1892 //
GE07hv_apppu:23264: imam adya samudbhūtaṃ reṇuṃ samaramūrdhani / HV_App.I,42B.1893 /
GE07hv_apppu:23267: ākāśaṃ saṃpatiṣyanti khadyotā iva me śarāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1896 //
GE07hv_apppu:23268: hṛṣṭāḥ saṃparimodadhvaṃ devebhyas tyajyatāṃ bhayam / HV_App.I,42B.1897 /
GE07hv_apppu:23269: adyāhaṃ nihaniṣyāmi kālendraṃ dhanuṣā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1898 //
GE07hv_apppu:23270: toṣayiṣyāmi rājānaṃ baliṃ balavatāṃ varam / HV_App.I,42B.1899 /
GE07hv_apppu:23271: tridaśān sagaṇān hatvā raṇe cāntakasaṃnibhān // HV_App.I,42B.1900 //
GE07hv_apppu:23272: akṣayāḥ santi me tūṇāḥ śarāś cāśīviṣopamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1901 /
GE07hv_apppu:23273: sthātuṃ me purataḥ śaktāḥ ke raṇe jīvitepsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1902 //
GE07hv_apppu:23274: hatvā ripugaṇāṃs tuṣṭir anurāgaś ca rājasu / HV_App.I,42B.1903 /
GE07hv_apppu:23275: hatasya tridive vāso nāsti yuddhasamā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1904 //
GE07hv_apppu:23276: te bhayaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā raṇe dānavasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1905 /
GE07hv_apppu:23277: nihatyemān arīn sarvān modadhvaṃ nandane vane // HV_App.I,42B.1906 //
GE07hv_apppu:23278: evam uktvā mahāsainyaṃ prahrādo dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1907 /
GE07hv_apppu:23280: sarvāstravidvāñ śūraś ca nityaṃ cāpy aparājitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1909 /
GE07hv_apppu:23283: prahrādasyātivīryasya ye tasya tanayā nijāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1912 //
GE07hv_apppu:23284: tais tu kratuśatair iṣṭaṃ vipulair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1913 /
GE07hv_apppu:23288: yaṣṭāraḥ kratubhir nityaṃ nityaṃ cādhyayane ratāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1917 /
GE07hv_apppu:23295: veṇuśaṅkharavaiś caiva siṃhanādaiś ca puṣkalaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1924 //
GE07hv_apppu:23296: āplutyāplutya sahasā raṇe vavrur anekaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1925 /
GE07hv_apppu:23299: mahāsurair apy ajitā yodhayanti raṇe 'ntakam // HV_App.I,42B.1928 //
GE07hv_apppu:23301: dānavā māninaḥ sarve sarve svargābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1930 //
GE07hv_apppu:23304: śuśubhe sā camūr dīptā patākādhvajamālinī / HV_App.I,42B.1931 /
GE07hv_apppu:23306: tataḥ kālas tu niryāto bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1933 /
GE07hv_apppu:23307: vinadan sumahākāyo vyādhibhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1934 //
GE07hv_apppu:23308: dadarśa mahatīṃ senāṃ dānavānāṃ balīyasām / HV_App.I,42B.1935 /
GE07hv_apppu:23312: praviśya dhvajinīṃ caiṣāṃ ghātayām āsa vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.1939 /
GE07hv_apppu:23314: prahrādabalam atyugraṃ prahrādaṃ ca mahābalam / HV_App.I,42B.1941 /
GE07hv_apppu:23315: ājaghāna raṇe kālo daṇḍam udgarapaṭṭisaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1942 //
GE07hv_apppu:23316: śaraśaktyṛṣṭikhaḍgāṃś ca śūlāni musalāni ca / HV_App.I,42B.1943 /
GE07hv_apppu:23317: gadāś ca parighāś caiva vividhāś ca paraśvadhāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1944 //
GE07hv_apppu:23318: dhanūṃṣi ca vicitrāṇi śataghnīś ca sthirāyasīḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1945 /
GE07hv_apppu:23319: pātyante vyādhibhir yuddhe dānavānāṃ camūmukhe // HV_App.I,42B.1946 //
GE07hv_apppu:23321: atisārā jvarāś caiva yakṣmāṇaḥ śleṣmajā rujāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1946**118:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23323: bahavo vyādhayo yuddhe bahūn asurapuṅgavān / HV_App.I,42B.1947 /
GE07hv_apppu:23324: vyādhīn api ca daityaughā nijaghnur bahavo bahūn // HV_App.I,42B.1948 //
GE07hv_apppu:23325: śūlaiḥ pramathitāḥ kecit kecic chinnāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1949 /
GE07hv_apppu:23326: parighair āhatāḥ kecit kecic ca paramāyudhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1950 //
GE07hv_apppu:23327: kecid dvidhākṛtāḥ khaḍgaiḥ sphurantaḥ patitā bhuvi / HV_App.I,42B.1951 /
GE07hv_apppu:23328: vyādhayo dānavair evaṃ nānāśastrair vidāritāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1952 //
GE07hv_apppu:23329: te cāpi vyādhibhiḥ sarve vividhair āyudhottamaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1953 /
GE07hv_apppu:23330: khaḍgaiś ca vipulais tīkṣṇaiḥ prāsatomaramudgaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1954 /
GE07hv_apppu:23331: bhinnāś ca dānavāḥ śūlair nikṛttāś ca paraśvadhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1955 //
GE07hv_apppu:23332: mudgaraiḥ paṭṭisaiś caiva vyādhibhiś ca mahābalaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1956 /
GE07hv_apppu:23333: kṣatāḥ śastrair anekaiś ca muṣṭibhiś ca mahāmṛdhe // HV_App.I,42B.1957 //
GE07hv_apppu:23335: ārtasvaraṃ ca nadatāṃ siṃhanādāṃś ca garjatām / HV_App.I,42B.1959 /
GE07hv_apppu:23336: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1960 //
GE07hv_apppu:23337: muṣṭibhiś cottamāṅgāni talair gātrāṇi cāsakṛt / HV_App.I,42B.1961 /
GE07hv_apppu:23338: sāditāni mahīṃ jagmus tiṣṭhatām eva saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1962 //
GE07hv_apppu:23351: parasparaṃ samāsādya tayor yudhi durāsadam / HV_App.I,42B.1975 /
GE07hv_apppu:23352: nāśaṃsanta tadā yodhā jīvitāny api saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1976 //
GE07hv_apppu:23355: patitair nipatadbhiś ca pātyamānaiś ca saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1979 /
GE07hv_apppu:23356: babhūva bhūḥ samākīrṇā yodhair udgatajīvitaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1980 //
GE07hv_apppu:23357: na gṛhṇatoḥ śarān ghorān na ca saṃdadhatos tayoḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1981 /
GE07hv_apppu:23358: antaraṃ dadṛśe kaścit prayatnād api saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1982 //
GE07hv_apppu:23359: laghutvāc ca mahābāhū yuddhaśauṇḍau mahābalau / HV_App.I,42B.1983 /
GE07hv_apppu:23367: hatadarpaṃ tu vijñāya prahrādaḥ kālam āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1987 /
GE07hv_apppu:23368: apayātaṃ ca samarād dviṣantaṃ saṃpratarkya tam // HV_App.I,42B.1988 //
GE07hv_apppu:23370: tanūjaḥ śārṅgiṇa iti bhītaṃ nāma tṛṇānanam / **HV_App.I,42B.1988**120:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23371: matvā vaśagataṃ caiva prahrādo yuddhadurmadaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1989 /
GE07hv_apppu:23372: tatraivānyāṃ camūṃ bhūyaḥ sa mamarda mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1990 //
GE07hv_apppu:23373: kālaprahrādayo yuddham abhavad yādṛśaṃ purā / HV_App.I,42B.1991 /
GE07hv_apppu:23374: tādṛśaṃ sarvalokeṣu na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.1992 //
GE07hv_apppu:23376: prahrādaḥ parivṛddho 'tra kālas tv apasṛto raṇāt // HV_App.I,42B.1994 //
GE07hv_apppu:23380: sasainyo yodhayām āsa kṣobhayan yakṣavāhinīm // HV_App.I,42B.1996 //
GE07hv_apppu:23382: ardayām āsa saṃkruddho dhanādhyakṣaṃ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,42B.1998 //
GE07hv_apppu:23384: cakāra kadanaṃ ghoraṃ dhanuṣpāṇir mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2000 //
GE07hv_apppu:23385: āvarta iva saṃjajñe balasya mahato mahān / HV_App.I,42B.2001 /
GE07hv_apppu:23387: tridaśānāṃ śarīrais tu dānavānāṃ ca medinī / HV_App.I,42B.2003 /
GE07hv_apppu:23388: babhūva nicitā ghoraiḥ parvatair iva saṃplave // HV_App.I,42B.2004 //
GE07hv_apppu:23389: merupṛṣṭhaṃ tu raktena rañjitaṃ saṃprakāśate / HV_App.I,42B.2005 /
GE07hv_apppu:23390: sarvato mādhave māsi puṣpitair iva kiṃśukaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2006 //
GE07hv_apppu:23391: hatair vīrair gajair aśvaiḥ prāvartata mahānadī / HV_App.I,42B.2007 /
GE07hv_apppu:23399: tridaśā dānavāś caiva terus tāṃ dustarāṃ nadīm / HV_App.I,42B.2015 /
GE07hv_apppu:23400: yathā padmarajodhvas tāṃ nalinīṃ gajayūthapāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2016 //
GE07hv_apppu:23401: tataḥ sṛjantaṃ bānaughān anuhrādaṃ rathe sthitam / HV_App.I,42B.2017 /
GE07hv_apppu:23402: dadarśa tarasā devo nighnantaṃ yakṣavāhinīm // HV_App.I,42B.2018 //
GE07hv_apppu:23403: kruddhas tato daityabalaṃ sūdayām āsa vittapaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2019 /
GE07hv_apppu:23404: vikṣipann iva khe vāyur mahābhrapaṭalaṃ balāt // HV_App.I,42B.2020 //
GE07hv_apppu:23405: samīkṣya tumulaṃ yuddham anuhrādaś ca bhūpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2021 /
GE07hv_apppu:23407: sa dhanur dhanināṃ śreṣṭho vikṛṣya raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,42B.2023 /
GE07hv_apppu:23408: utsasarja śitān bāṇān vitteśasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2024 //
GE07hv_apppu:23409: kuberaṃ prāpya te bāṇā nirbhidya susamāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2025 /
GE07hv_apppu:23410: aparān pṛṣṭhato jaghnur vyāsaktān yakṣarākṣasān // HV_App.I,42B.2026 //
GE07hv_apppu:23411: devaḥ śarair abhihato niśitair jvalanopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2027 /
GE07hv_apppu:23413: tato vaiśravaṇo rājā kruddho yakṣagaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42B.2029 /
GE07hv_apppu:23414: vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi dānavaṃ prati vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.2030 //
GE07hv_apppu:23415: tad yathā śāradaṃ varṣaṃ govṛṣaḥ śīghram āgatam / HV_App.I,42B.2031 /
GE07hv_apppu:23417: evam eva kuberasya śaravarṣaṃ mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2033 /
GE07hv_apppu:23418: nimīlitākṣaḥ sahasā daityaḥ sahati dāruṇam // HV_App.I,42B.2034 //
GE07hv_apppu:23421: utpapāta rathāt tūrṇaṃ kṣitiṃ padbhyām upāgataḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2035**121:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23424: utpāṭya kupito daityas taruṃ phalasamanvitam / HV_App.I,42B.2038 /
GE07hv_apppu:23425: nijaghāna hayāñ śreṣṭhān kuberasya mahājavān // HV_App.I,42B.2039 //
GE07hv_apppu:23426: tasya karma mahāghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2040 /
GE07hv_apppu:23428: tayos tu tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ saṃjajñe devadaityayoḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2042 //
GE07hv_apppu:23432: anyonyaṃ vividhaiḥ śastrair ghorair jaghnatur āhave // HV_App.I,42B.2044 //
GE07hv_apppu:23433: tridaśā dānavān yuddhe mathitvā prāṇadaṃs tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2045 /
GE07hv_apppu:23434: dānavais tridaśāś cāpi kruddhair bhuvi nipātitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2046 //
GE07hv_apppu:23435: dānavās tv atha saṃkruddhās tridaśān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2047 /
GE07hv_apppu:23437: vidāryamāṇā daityaughais tridaśās tu mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2049 /
GE07hv_apppu:23438: amarṣitatarā bhūyaś cakruḥ karmāṇy abhītavat // HV_App.I,42B.2050 //
GE07hv_apppu:23439: te gadābhiḥ subhīmābhiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlam udgaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2051 /
GE07hv_apppu:23440: parighaiś ca sutīkṣṇāgrair dānavāḥ pīḍitāḥ suraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2052 //
GE07hv_apppu:23442: jagṛhus te śilāś caiva drumāṃś cāsurasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2054 //
GE07hv_apppu:23443: te bhīmavegā ditijā nardamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2055 /
GE07hv_apppu:23444: mamanthus tridaśān vīrāñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2056 //
GE07hv_apppu:23445: tataḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ teṣāṃ samabhivartata / HV_App.I,42B.2057 /
GE07hv_apppu:23446: śilābhir vipulābhiś ca śataśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2058 /
GE07hv_apppu:23447: parighaiḥ paṭṭisair bhallair bhiṇḍipālaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2059 //
GE07hv_apppu:23448: kecin nikṛttaśirasaḥ kecic ca vidalīkṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2060 /
GE07hv_apppu:23449: kecid vinihatā bhūmau rudhirārdrāḥ surāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2061 //
GE07hv_apppu:23451: vibhinnahṛdayāḥ kecic chinnapādāś ca śerate / HV_App.I,42B.2063 /
GE07hv_apppu:23452: vidāritās triśūlaiś ca kecit tatra gatāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2064 //
GE07hv_apppu:23457: kuberaḥ sa dhanuṣpāṇir dānavān raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,42B.2069 /
GE07hv_apppu:23458: diśo vidrāvayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2070 //
GE07hv_apppu:23459: kubereṇārditaṃ sainyaṃ vidrutaṃ prekṣya dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2071 /
GE07hv_apppu:23460: abhyadravad anuhrādaḥ pragṛhya vipulāṃ śilām // HV_App.I,42B.2072 //
GE07hv_apppu:23462: śilāṃ tāṃ pātayām āsa kuberasya rathottame // HV_App.I,42B.2074 //
GE07hv_apppu:23463: āpatantīṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā gadāpāṇir dhanādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2075 /
GE07hv_apppu:23464: rathād āplutya vegena vasudhāyāṃ vyatiṣṭhata // HV_App.I,42B.2076 //
GE07hv_apppu:23466: bhaṅktvā rathottamaṃ tasya nipapāta śilā bhuvi // HV_App.I,42B.2078 //
GE07hv_apppu:23467: vimathya tu kuberasya prahrādasyānujo ratham / HV_App.I,42B.2079 /
GE07hv_apppu:23468: surāṇāṃ kadanaṃ cakre saskandhaviṭapair drumaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2080 //
GE07hv_apppu:23470: drumaiḥ pramathitāṅgāś ca nipetur dharaṇītale // HV_App.I,42B.2082 //
GE07hv_apppu:23472: giriśṛṅgaṃ mahad gṛhya kuberam abhidudruve // HV_App.I,42B.2084 //
GE07hv_apppu:23473: tam āpatantaṃ dhanado gadām udyamya vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.2085 /
GE07hv_apppu:23474: vinardann āhvayām āsa dānavendraṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,42B.2086 //
GE07hv_apppu:23475: tasya kruddhasya saṃkruddho gadāṃ tāṃ bahukaṇṭakām / HV_App.I,42B.2087 /
GE07hv_apppu:23477: daityas tu krodhatāmrākṣas taṃ prahāram acintayan / HV_App.I,42B.2089 /
GE07hv_apppu:23480: papāta sahasā bhūmau viśīrṇa iva parvataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2092 //
GE07hv_apppu:23481: vitteśaṃ vihvalaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te yakṣarākṣasāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2093 /
GE07hv_apppu:23483: muhūrtaṃ vihvalo bhūtvā prabhur viśravasaḥ sutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2095 /
GE07hv_apppu:23484: [k: K1-3 Ñ1 Dn1 Ds D3.4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23486: utthitaḥ sahasā bhūyaḥ piṅgākṣaḥ sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2096 //
GE07hv_apppu:23487: nanāda ca mahānādaṃ trailokyam abhinādayan / HV_App.I,42B.2097 /
GE07hv_apppu:23488: janayann iva nirghoṣaṃ vidhamann iva parvatān // HV_App.I,42B.2098 //
GE07hv_apppu:23489: tam avadhyaṃ tu vijñāya nihataṃ punar utthitam / HV_App.I,42B.2099 /
GE07hv_apppu:23490: prekṣya piṅgākṣam āyāntaṃ dānavā vipradudruvuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2100 //
GE07hv_apppu:23491: tāṃs tu vidravato dṛṣṭvā anuhrādo 'suro 'bravīt / HV_App.I,42B.2101 /
GE07hv_apppu:23492: kālanemiṃ ca nemiṃ ca mahānemiṃ ca dānavam // HV_App.I,42B.2102 //
GE07hv_apppu:23493: ātmānaṃ caiva vīryaṃ ca vismṛtyābhijanaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2103 /
GE07hv_apppu:23494: kva gacchata bhayatrastāḥ prākṛtā iva dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2104 //
GE07hv_apppu:23495: nivartadhvaṃ mahāvīryāḥ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha / HV_App.I,42B.2105 /
GE07hv_apppu:23496: nālaṃ yuddhāya yakṣo 'yaṃ mahatīyaṃ vibhīṣikā // HV_App.I,42B.2106 //
GE07hv_apppu:23497: etāṃ samutthitām adya dānavānāṃ vibhīṣikām / HV_App.I,42B.2107 /
GE07hv_apppu:23498: vikramya vidham iṣyāmi nivartadhvaṃ mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2108 //
GE07hv_apppu:23499: te 'surāḥ saṃnivṛtyātha samadā iva kuñjarāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2109 /
GE07hv_apppu:23502: darpotkaṭā bhujair eva saṃprahāraṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.2112 //
GE07hv_apppu:23503: pāṃsubhiś caiva kāṣṭhaiś ca śilābhiś ca mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2113 /
GE07hv_apppu:23504: bāhubhiś ca tathānyonyam ākṣipanti sma vegitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2114 //
GE07hv_apppu:23505: muṣtibhiś ca talaiś caiva nakhapātair mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2115 /
GE07hv_apppu:23506: pādapaiś ca mahāśākhair ayudhyanta raṇājire // HV_App.I,42B.2116 //
GE07hv_apppu:23507: anuhrādas tu saṃkruddho devatānāṃ mahācamūm / HV_App.I,42B.2117 /
GE07hv_apppu:23508: mamantha paramāyasto vanāny agnir ivotthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2118 //
GE07hv_apppu:23509: rudhirārdrās tu bahavaḥ śerate yodhasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2119 /
GE07hv_apppu:23510: nikṛttāḥ patitā bhūmau tāmrapuṣpā iva drumāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2120 //
GE07hv_apppu:23511: anuhrādas tu vikrānto devāṃs tv āśīviṣopamān / HV_App.I,42B.2121 /
GE07hv_apppu:23512: yudhyamānāṃś ca samare vyasṛjan niśitāñ śarān // HV_App.I,42B.2122 //
GE07hv_apppu:23514: aṅgāramiśrāḥ kruddhasya mukhān niścerur arciṣaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2124 //
GE07hv_apppu:23516: vivyādha samare kruddho daṇḍapāṇir ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2126 //
GE07hv_apppu:23517: kuberas tu śarair bhinnaḥ samantāt kṣatajokṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2127 /
GE07hv_apppu:23518: rudhiraṃ parisusrāva giriḥ prasravaṇair iva // HV_App.I,42B.2128 //
GE07hv_apppu:23520: vihvalaś cāpy abhūd devo muhūrtaṃ dhanadādhipaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2128**124:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23521: [k: Ñ2 V3 cont., K4 Dn D1.2 ins. after line 2128 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23522: labdhvā sa tu punaḥ saṃjñāṃ roṣaraktekṣaṇaḥ suraḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2128**125:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23523: gadām atha samāsādya bhīmāṃ bhīmaparākramaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2129 /
GE07hv_apppu:23524: cikṣeṣa daityam uddiśya balāt krodhena mūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2130 //
GE07hv_apppu:23525: aprāptām antare so 'tha tāṃ gadāṃ gadayāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2131 /
GE07hv_apppu:23526: babhañja vinadan kruddhas tad āścaryam abhūt tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2132 /
GE07hv_apppu:23527: pragṛhya tu gadāṃ bhūyo hy abhidudrāva dānavam // HV_App.I,42B.2133 //
GE07hv_apppu:23528: tam āpatantaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva anuhrādo mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2134 /
GE07hv_apppu:23531: tam antakam ivāyāntam ajeyaṃ sakalaiḥ suraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2137 /
GE07hv_apppu:23532: grasantam iva taṃ daityaṃ trailokyam akhilaṃ ruṣā // HV_App.I,42B.2138 //
GE07hv_apppu:23533: tam ālokya tathārūpaṃ dhanādhyakṣo raṇaṃ bhayāt / HV_App.I,42B.2139 /
GE07hv_apppu:23534: apahāya yayau tatra yatra śakraḥ surādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2140 //
GE07hv_apppu:23535: tasya cāpi mahat karma dṛṣṭvā vittapatis tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2141 /
GE07hv_apppu:23537: nāhaṃ śakto raṇe yoddhum iti matvā dhanādhipaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2141**126:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23538: jagāma bhayasaṃtrasto yatra devaḥ śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2142 //
GE07hv_apppu:23541: vipracittis tu varuṇaṃ daityānām ādir avyayam / HV_App.I,42B.2143 /
GE07hv_apppu:23542: jaghāneṣugaṇaiḥ kruddho dīptair iva mahoragaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2144 //
GE07hv_apppu:23543: sa dahyamāno daityena dīptaiḥ śaragabhastibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2145 /
GE07hv_apppu:23544: nābhyajānata kartavyaṃ saṃgrāme sa jaleśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2146 //
GE07hv_apppu:23549: na śaknoty agrataḥ sthātuṃ vipracitter jalādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2148 //
GE07hv_apppu:23550: vajro nāma mahāvyūho nirbhayaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2149 /
GE07hv_apppu:23551: taṃ vyūhya pratyayudhyanta dānavā devavāhinīm // HV_App.I,42B.2150 //
GE07hv_apppu:23553: mukham ābhāti daityasya vipracitter mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2152 //
GE07hv_apppu:23554: varuṇas tu mahātejā vipracittiṃ mahāsuram / HV_App.I,42B.2153 /
