GE07hv_apppu:23846: baliṃ balavatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ baliś cāpi sureśvaram // **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:23848: tataḥ kruddho balir daityaḥ śakraṃ hantuṃ mahāmṛdhe / **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:23853: catvāry etāni saṃgṛhya śakras tiṣṭheti cābravīt // **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:9 //
GE07hv_apppu:23854: tais tāni ca samāhatya nanāda vipulaṃ baliḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:10 /
GE07hv_apppu:23855: sa pāśupatam ādāya balir balavatāṃ varaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:11 /
GE07hv_apppu:23856: anena tvāṃ haniṣyāmi balir āha śatakratum // **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:12 //
GE07hv_apppu:23857: tenaiva tat samāhatya śakro dīptatvam āyayau // **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:13 //
GE07hv_apppu:23858: astre pāśupate caiva nirbhagne vaiṣṇave tadā / **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:14 /
GE07hv_apppu:23859: kṛtye caiva tadā mūḍhe śakro vajraṃ samādade // **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:15 //
GE07hv_apppu:23861: tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad āsij jagatpate // **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:17 //
GE07hv_apppu:23862: tato balir mahātejā brahmāstraṃ ca samādade / **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:18 /
GE07hv_apppu:23863: tena tat prahṛtaṃ ghoraṃ vajram astraṃ mahāraṇe // **HV_App.I,42B.2392**146:19 //
GE07hv_apppu:23869: prabodhito daityapatir agnir iddha ivābabhau // HV_App.I,42B.2394 //
GE07hv_apppu:23871: devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca bhūyo yuddham abhūt tadā // HV_App.I,42B.2396 //
GE07hv_apppu:23872: tato 'vidhyan mahendras taṃ baliṃ śastrair mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2397 /
GE07hv_apppu:23873: tāny astrāṇi mahābāhuś ciccheda śatadhā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.2398 //
GE07hv_apppu:23874: tataḥ kruddhaḥ punas tatra nijaghne dānavaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,42B.2399 /
GE07hv_apppu:23875: āgneyam atha śatrughnaṃ cikṣependro mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2400 /
GE07hv_apppu:23876: [k: K1 Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D4.6 G3 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23878: śātayām āsa tac caindraṃ vāruṇāstreṇa dhīmatā // HV_App.I,42B.2401 //
GE07hv_apppu:23879: saṃkruddho maghavā vajram agṛhṇāt parvatopamam / HV_App.I,42B.2402 /
GE07hv_apppu:23880: hantukāmo balaślāghī baliṃ daityādhipaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.2403 //
GE07hv_apppu:23881: tataḥ śuśrāva devendraḥ kauśiko harivāhanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2404 /
GE07hv_apppu:23882: aśarīrāṃ śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ tasmin mahati vaiśase // HV_App.I,42B.2405 //
GE07hv_apppu:23884: puraṃdara suraśreṣṭha jeṣyasi baliṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.2407 //
GE07hv_apppu:23885: tapasā hy uttamo daityo varadānena cādhikaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2408 /
GE07hv_apppu:23886: svayaṃbhūparitoṣāc ca satyadharmāc ca vāsava / HV_App.I,42B.2409 /
GE07hv_apppu:23887: naiṣa śakyas tvayā jetuṃ tridaśair vā sureśvara // HV_App.I,42B.2410 //
GE07hv_apppu:23888: [k: For line 2410, T1.2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23889: na śakyo bhavatā jetuṃ kuto 'nyais tridaśālayaiḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2410**148:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23890: yo hy asya jetā bhagavāṃs taṃ śṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2411 /
GE07hv_apppu:23891: brahmaṇaḥ sa hi sarvasvaṃ devānāṃ caiva sā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2412 //
GE07hv_apppu:23892: paraṃ rahasyaṃ dharmasya parasya ca parā gatiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2413 /
GE07hv_apppu:23893: parāt parataraḥ śrīmāṇ parāvaragatiḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2414 //
GE07hv_apppu:23894: [k: K V1.3 B2 Dn Ds D1-6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23898: jetājeyo jayaḥ śrīmān so 'sya jetā bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.2417 //
GE07hv_apppu:23899: śrutvā divyāṃ tu madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ tām aśarīriṇīm / HV_App.I,42B.2418 /
GE07hv_apppu:23900: apayāto raṇāc chakraḥ sārdhaṃ sarvair marudgaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2419 //
GE07hv_apppu:23901: apayāto tu devendre kauśike harivāhane / HV_App.I,42B.2420 /
GE07hv_apppu:23902: siṃhanādo mahān āsīd dānavānāṃ mahāmṛdhe // HV_App.I,42B.2421 //
GE07hv_apppu:23907: śaṅkhānāṃ ninadaś cātra yodhānāṃ valgitasvanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2423 //
GE07hv_apppu:23908: vāditrāṇāṃ ca nirghoṣas tumulaś cābhavat tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2424 /
GE07hv_apppu:23909: jayaśabdaravaś caiva devānāṃ tu parājaye // HV_App.I,42B.2425 //
GE07hv_apppu:23910: sasainyo daityarājas tu stūyamānaḥ suhṛdgaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2426 /
GE07hv_apppu:23911: balir indro babhau daityo hiraṇyakaśipur yathā // HV_App.I,42B.2427 //
GE07hv_apppu:23915: jaye baler balavato mayaśambarayos tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2429 //
GE07hv_apppu:23916: śuddhāsu dikṣu sarvāsu pravṛtte dharmakarmaṇi / HV_App.I,42B.2430 /
GE07hv_apppu:23919: dikṣu sarvāsu guptāsu gagane daityapālite // HV_App.I,42B.2433 //
GE07hv_apppu:23920: deveṣu makhaśobhāś ca svargārthaṃ darśayatsu ca / HV_App.I,42B.2434 /
GE07hv_apppu:23921: prakṛtisthe tadā loke vartamāne ca satpathe // HV_App.I,42B.2435 //
GE07hv_apppu:23922: abhāve sarvapāpānāṃ bhāve caiva tathā sthite / HV_App.I,42B.2436 /
GE07hv_apppu:23926: catuṣpāde sthite dharme adharme pādavigrahe / HV_App.I,42B.2438 /
GE07hv_apppu:23929: abhiṣikto 'suraiḥ sarvair devarājye balis tadā // HV_App.I,42B.2441 //
GE07hv_apppu:23930: hṛṣṭeṣv asurasaṃgheṣu nadatsu muditeṣu ca / HV_App.I,42B.2442 /
GE07hv_apppu:23931: athābhyupagatā lakṣmīr baliṃ padmāsane sthitā / HV_App.I,42B.2443 /
GE07hv_apppu:23936: bale balavatāṃ śreṣṭha mahārāja mahādyute / HV_App.I,42B.2445 /
GE07hv_apppu:23937: prītāsmi tava bhadraṃ te devatānāṃ parājaye // HV_App.I,42B.2446 //
GE07hv_apppu:23938: yat tvayā yudhi vikramya devarājaḥ parājitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2447 /
GE07hv_apppu:23939: dṛṣṭvā te paramaṃ sattvaṃ tato 'haṃ svayam āgatā // HV_App.I,42B.2448 //
GE07hv_apppu:23942: viśeṣitas tvayā rājan daityendraḥ sa pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2451 /
GE07hv_apppu:23945: yena bhuktaṃ hi nikhilaṃ trailokyam idam avyayam // HV_App.I,42B.2452 //
GE07hv_apppu:23946: [k: K1.4 Ñ2 B Ds D1.2.4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23947: viśeṣatas tava vibho sarvo dharmaḥ sthitaḥ pathi / **HV_App.I,42B.2452**154:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23949: evam uktvā hi sā devī lakṣmīr daityapatiṃ balim / HV_App.I,42B.2453 /
GE07hv_apppu:23951: śiṣṭāś ca divyaḥ pravarā hrīḥ kīrtir dyutir eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2455 /
GE07hv_apppu:23952: prabhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā bhūtir nītir vidyā dayā matiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2456 //
GE07hv_apppu:23953: smṛtir meghā tathā lajjā lakṣmīr īḍā gatis tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2457 /
GE07hv_apppu:23954: śrutiḥ prītis tathā kāntiḥ śāntiḥ puṣṭiḥ kriyā tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2458 //
GE07hv_apppu:23958: upatasthur mahātmānaṃ baliṃ indraṃ mahāratham // HV_App.I,42B.2460 //
GE07hv_apppu:23959: pratipannaṃ tu daiteyais trailokyaṃ sacarācaram / HV_App.I,42B.2461 /
GE07hv_apppu:23960: prāptam aiśvaryam amitaṃ balinā brahmavādinā // HV_App.I,42B.2462 //
GE07hv_apppu:23963: parājitāḥ surā daityaiḥ kim akurvata vai mune / HV_App.I,42B.2463 /
GE07hv_apppu:23964: kathaṃ ca tridivaṃ labdhaṃ bhūyo devair dvijottama // HV_App.I,42B.2464 //
GE07hv_apppu:23966: śrutvā vāṇīṃ tu tāṃ divyāṃ saha devaiḥ surādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2465 /
GE07hv_apppu:23967: prāgdiśaṃ prasthitaḥ śrīmān adityālayam uttamam // HV_App.I,42B.2466 //
GE07hv_apppu:23970: prāpyādityālayaṃ śakraḥ kathayām āsa tāṃ giram / HV_App.I,42B.2467 /
GE07hv_apppu:23971: adityā sā yathā yuddhe tena vāṇī purā śrutā // HV_App.I,42B.2468 //
GE07hv_apppu:23973: yady evaṃ putra yuṣmābhir na śakyo hantum āhave / HV_App.I,42B.2469 /
GE07hv_apppu:23974: balir virocanasutaḥ sarvaiś caiva marudgaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2470 //
GE07hv_apppu:23976: tenaikena sahasrākṣa na hy anyena śatakrato // HV_App.I,42B.2472 //
GE07hv_apppu:23977: tad vaḥ pṛcchāmi pitaraṃ kaśyapaṃ satyavādinam / HV_App.I,42B.2473 /
GE07hv_apppu:23979: tad gaccha pitaraṃ pṛccha kāśyapaṃ brahmavādinam / **HV_App.I,42B.2473**157:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23980: parājayārthaṃ daityasya bales tasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2474 //
GE07hv_apppu:23981: tato 'dityā saha surāḥ saṃprāptāḥ kaśyapāntikam / HV_App.I,42B.2475 /
GE07hv_apppu:23982: apaśyan kaśyapaṃ tatra muniṃ dīptataponidhim // HV_App.I,42B.2476 //
GE07hv_apppu:23983: ādyaṃ devaguruṃ divyaṃ klinnaṃ triṣavaṇāmbubhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2477 /
GE07hv_apppu:23991: taṃ brahmavādināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ surāsuraguruṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,42B.2483 /
GE07hv_apppu:23995: [k: For line 2484, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23997: yaḥ sraṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ prajānāṃ patir uttamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2485 /
GE07hv_apppu:23999: tataḥ praṇamya te vīrāḥ sahādityā surarṣabhāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2487 /
GE07hv_apppu:24000: ūcuḥ prāṅjalayaḥ sarve brahmāṇam iva mānasāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2488 //
GE07hv_apppu:24001: yac chrutaṃ yudhi śakreṇa sarasvatyā samīritam / HV_App.I,42B.2489 /
GE07hv_apppu:24002: ajeyas tridaśaiḥ sarvair balir dānavasattamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2490 //
GE07hv_apppu:24003: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ putrāṇāṃ kaśyapas tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2491 /
GE07hv_apppu:24004: cakāra gamane buddhiṃ brahmalokāya lokakṛt // HV_App.I,42B.2492 //
GE07hv_apppu:24007: yathāśrutaṃ ca tatraiva brahmaṇe vadatānaghāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2494 //
GE07hv_apppu:24008: tato 'dityā saha surā yāntaṃ kaśyapam anvayuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2495 /
GE07hv_apppu:24010: te muhūrtena saṃprāptā brahmalokaṃ divaukasaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2497 /
GE07hv_apppu:24011: divyaiḥ kāmagamair yānair mahārhaiḥ sumanoharaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2498 //
GE07hv_apppu:24012: didṛkṣavas te brahmāṇaṃ tapaso rāśim avyayam / HV_App.I,42B.2499 /
GE07hv_apppu:24013: abhyagacchanta vistīrṇāṃ brahmaṇaḥ paramāṃ sabhām // HV_App.I,42B.2500 //
GE07hv_apppu:24014: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. after line 2500 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24021: [k: K1 Ñ1 V1.3 B Ds D4.6 T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 ins. after line 2501,
GE07hv_apppu:24026: śuśruvur madhurāṃ devā brahmaṇaḥ sadane sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2502 //
GE07hv_apppu:24027: [k: K1 V1.3 B Ds D4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24031: ṛco bahvṛcamukhyaiś ca preryamāṇaiḥ padakramaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2503 /
GE07hv_apppu:24034: śuśruvus te 'maravyāghrā vitateṣu ca karmasu // HV_App.I,42B.2504 //
GE07hv_apppu:24036: ghoṣeṇa paramarṣīṇāṃ sā babhūva vināditā // HV_App.I,42B.2506 //
GE07hv_apppu:24037: yajñasaṃstavavidbhiś ca śikṣāvidbhis tathā dvijaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2507 /
GE07hv_apppu:24042: te tatra samanuprāpya śṛṇvanto vai dhvaniṃ surāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2512 /
GE07hv_apppu:24043: pūtāny ātmaśarīrāṇi menire te na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2513 //
GE07hv_apppu:24046: namaskurvanti ca punar guruṃ lokaguruṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,42B.2516 /
GE07hv_apppu:24047: manasaiva suraśreṣṭhāḥ puraskṛtya tu kaśyapam // HV_App.I,42B.2517 //
GE07hv_apppu:24050: [k: K1 B Ds D4.6 Bom. Poona ed. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24052: lokāyatikamukhyaiś ca śuśruvuḥ svanam īritam / HV_App.I,42B.2520 /
GE07hv_apppu:24053: tatra tatra ca viprendrān niyatān saṃśitavratān / HV_App.I,42B.2521 /
GE07hv_apppu:24055: tasyāṃ sabhāyām āste sma brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2523 /
GE07hv_apppu:24057: upāsate ca tatrainaṃ prajānāṃ patayaḥ prabhum / HV_App.I,42B.2525 /
GE07hv_apppu:24058: dakṣaḥ pracetāḥ pulaho marīciś ca dvijottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2526 //
GE07hv_apppu:24059: bhṛgur atrir vasiṣṭhaś ca gautamo nāradas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2527 /
GE07hv_apppu:24060: mano dyaur antarikṣaṃ ca vāyus tejo jalaṃ mahī // HV_App.I,42B.2528 //
GE07hv_apppu:24061: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2529 /
GE07hv_apppu:24062: prakṛtiś ca vikāraś ca yac cānyat kāraṇaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,42B.2530 //
GE07hv_apppu:24064: kriyāś ca kratavaś caiva saṃkalpaḥ prāṇa eva ca // HV_App.I,42B.2532 //
GE07hv_apppu:24065: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ svayaṃbhuvam upasthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2533 /
GE07hv_apppu:24066: artho dharmaś ca kāmaś ca dveṣo harṣaś ca nityadā // HV_App.I,42B.2534 //
GE07hv_apppu:24067: śuko bṛhaspatiś caiva saṃvarto budha eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2535 /
GE07hv_apppu:24068: śanaiś caraś ca rāhuś ca grahāḥ sarve hy aśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2536 //
GE07hv_apppu:24069: maruto viśvakarmā ca nakṣatrāṇi ca bhārata / HV_App.I,42B.2537 /
GE07hv_apppu:24070: divākaraś ca somaś ca brahmāṇaṃ samupāsate / HV_App.I,42B.2538 /
GE07hv_apppu:24071: sāvitrī durgataraṇī vāṇī saptavidhā tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2539 //
GE07hv_apppu:24072: sarvāṇi śrutiśāstrāṇi gāthāś ca niyamās tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2540 /
GE07hv_apppu:24073: bhāṣyāṇi sarvaśāstrāṇi dehavanti viśāṃ pate // HV_App.I,42B.2541 //
GE07hv_apppu:24074: kṣaṇā lavā muhūrtāś ca divā rātriś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,42B.2542 /
GE07hv_apppu:24075: ardhamāsāś ca māsāś ca ṛtavaḥ ṣaṭ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42B.2543 //
GE07hv_apppu:24076: saṃvatsarāś caturyugaṃ māsā rātriś caturvidhāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2544 /
GE07hv_apppu:24077: kālacakraṃ ca yad divyaṃ nityam adhruvam avyayam // HV_App.I,42B.2545 //
GE07hv_apppu:24078: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ svayaṃbhuvam upasthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2546 /
GE07hv_apppu:24079: te praviṣṭāḥ sabhāṃ divyāṃ brahmaṇaḥ sarvakāmadām // HV_App.I,42B.2547 //
GE07hv_apppu:24080: kaśyapas tridaśaiḥ sārdhaṃ putrair dharmaviśāradaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2548 /
GE07hv_apppu:24082: brāhmyā śriyā dīpyamānam acintyaṃ vigataklamam / HV_App.I,42B.2550 /
GE07hv_apppu:24083: brahmāṇaṃ vīkṣya te sarve āsīnaṃ paramāsane / HV_App.I,42B.2551 /
GE07hv_apppu:24085: śirobhiḥ praṇatāḥ sarve devāḥ kāśyapa eva ca / **HV_App.I,42B.2551**168:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24086: jagmur mūrdhnā śubhau pādau brahmaṇas te divaukasaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2552 //
GE07hv_apppu:24087: śirobhiḥ spṛśya caraṇau tasya te parameṣṭhinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2553 /
GE07hv_apppu:24089: dṛṣtvā tu tān surān sarvān kaśyapena sahāgatān / HV_App.I,42B.2555 /
GE07hv_apppu:24090: āha brahmā mahātejā devānāṃ prabhur īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2556 //
GE07hv_apppu:24093: yadartham iha saṃprāptā bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,42B.2557 /
GE07hv_apppu:24094: vijānāmy aham avyagram enam arthaṃ mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2558 //
GE07hv_apppu:24095: bhaviṣyati ca vaḥ so 'rthaḥ kāṅkṣito yaḥ surottamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2559 /
GE07hv_apppu:24096: baler dānavamukhyasya yo vai jetā bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.2560 //
GE07hv_apppu:24097: na khalv asurasaṃghānām eko jetā sa viśvakṛt / HV_App.I,42B.2561 /
GE07hv_apppu:24098: [k: For line 2561, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24100: trailokyasyāpi jetāsau devānām api cottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2562 //
GE07hv_apppu:24101: dhātā caiva hi lokānāṃ viśvayoniḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2563 /
GE07hv_apppu:24103: yo mānyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaś ca bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2563**170:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24105: ātmā vai yena vibhunā kṛto 'jeyo mahātmanā / HV_App.I,42B.2565 /
GE07hv_apppu:24106: baler asuramukhyasya viśvasya jagatas tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2566 //
GE07hv_apppu:24108: paraṃ devasya viśvasya jagataḥ śāśvatas tathā / **HV_App.I,42B.2566**171:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24109: prabhavaḥ sa hi sarveṣām asmākam api pūrvajaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2567 /
GE07hv_apppu:24110: acintyaḥ sa hi viśvātmā yogayuktaḥ paraṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2568 //
GE07hv_apppu:24111: taṃ devāpi mahātmānaṃ na viduḥ ko 'py asāv iti / HV_App.I,42B.2569 /
GE07hv_apppu:24112: vedātmānaṃ ca viśvaṃ ca sa devaḥ puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2570 //
GE07hv_apppu:24113: tasyaiva tu prasādena tasya vakṣye parāṃ gatim / HV_App.I,42B.2571 /
GE07hv_apppu:24114: yatra yogaṃ samāsthāya tapaś carati duścaram // HV_App.I,42B.2572 //
GE07hv_apppu:24115: kṣīrodasyottare kūle udīcyāṃ diśi devatāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2573 /
GE07hv_apppu:24116: amṛtaṃ nāma paramaṃ sthānam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2574 //
GE07hv_apppu:24117: bhavantas tatra vai gatvā tapasā saṃśitavratāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2575 /
GE07hv_apppu:24118: amṛtaṃ sthānam āsādya tapaś carata duścaram // HV_App.I,42B.2576 //
GE07hv_apppu:24125: tasya vratasamāptyāṃ tu yāvad vratavisarjanāt / HV_App.I,42B.2583 /
GE07hv_apppu:24126: amoghāṃ tasya devasya viśve devā mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2584 //
GE07hv_apppu:24129: atha yuṣmān harir brūyāt kim āgamanakāraṇam / **HV_App.I,42B.2584**172:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24130: svāgataṃ vaḥ suraśreṣṭhā matsakāśe vyavasthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2585 /
GE07hv_apppu:24131: kasya kaṃ vā varaṃ devā dadāmi varadaḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2586 //
GE07hv_apppu:24132: taṃ kaśyapo 'ditiś caiva varaṃ gṛhṇīta vai tataḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2587 /
GE07hv_apppu:24133: praṇamya śirasā pādau tasmai yogātmane tadā // HV_App.I,42B.2588 //
GE07hv_apppu:24134: bhagavān eva naḥ putro bhavatv iti na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2589 /
GE07hv_apppu:24135: uktaś ca parayā bhaktyā tathāstv iti sa vakṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.2590 //
GE07hv_apppu:24136: devā bruvantu te sarve bhrātā nas tvaṃ bhaveti ca / HV_App.I,42B.2591 /
GE07hv_apppu:24137: tathāstv iti ca sa śrīmān vakṣyate sarvalokakṛt // HV_App.I,42B.2592 //
GE07hv_apppu:24138: tasmād evaṃ gṛhītvā tu varaṃ tridaśasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2593 /
GE07hv_apppu:24139: kṛtakṛtyāḥ punaḥ sarve gacchadhvaṃ svaṃ svam ālayam // HV_App.I,42B.2594 //
GE07hv_apppu:24140: tathāstv iti surāḥ sarve kaśyapo 'ditir eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2595 /
GE07hv_apppu:24141: vanditvā brahmacaraṇau gatāḥ saumyāṃ diśaṃ prati // HV_App.I,42B.2596 //
GE07hv_apppu:24144: te 'tītya sāgarān sarvān parvatāṃś ca bahūn kṣaṇāt / HV_App.I,42B.2599 /
GE07hv_apppu:24145: nadīś ca vividhā divyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ surasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2600 //
GE07hv_apppu:24146: paśyanti ca sughorāṃ vai sarvasattvavivarjitām / HV_App.I,42B.2601 /
GE07hv_apppu:24147: abhāskarām amaryādāṃ tamasā saṃvṛtāṃ diśam // HV_App.I,42B.2602 //
GE07hv_apppu:24148: amṛtaṃ sthānam āsādya kaśyapena surāḥ saha / HV_App.I,42B.2603 /
GE07hv_apppu:24149: dīkṣitāḥ kāmadaṃ divyaṃ vrataṃ varṣasahasrakam // HV_App.I,42B.2604 //
GE07hv_apppu:24150: prasādārthaṃ sureśāya tasmai yogāya dhīmate / HV_App.I,42B.2605 /
GE07hv_apppu:24153: damena ca sūrāḥ sarve tapo duścaram āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2608 //
GE07hv_apppu:24154: kaśyapas tatra bhagavān prasādārthaṃ mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2609 /
GE07hv_apppu:24155: udīrayati vedoktaṃ yam āhuḥ paramaṃ stavam // HV_App.I,42B.2610 //
GE07hv_apppu:24163_0: //* namo 'stu te devadeva ekaśṛṅga varāha vṛṣārciṣa vṛṣasindho vṛṣākape suravṛṣabha
GE07hv_apppu:24163_1: suranirmita anirmita bhadra kapila viṣvaksena dhruvadharma dharmarāja vaikuṇṭha śatāvarta
GE07hv_apppu:24163_2: anādimadhyanidhana dhanaṃjaya śuciśravaḥ agnija vṛṣṇija aja ajaya amṛteśa sanātana
GE07hv_apppu:24163_3: vidhātaḥ trikāma tridhāma trikakut kukudmin duṃdubhe mahānābha lokanābha padmanābha
GE07hv_apppu:24163_4: viriñce variṣṭha bahurūpa virūpa viśvarūpa akṣaya akṣara satyākṣara haṃsākṣara havyabhuja
GE07hv_apppu:24163_5: khaṇḍaparaśo śukra muñjakeśa haṃsa mahadakṣara hṛṣīkeśa sūkṣma paramasūkṣma turāṣāṭ
GE07hv_apppu:24163_6: viśvamūrte surāgraja nīla nistama viraja tamorajaḥsattvadhāma sarvalokapratiṣṭha
GE07hv_apppu:24163_7: śipiviṣṭa sutapaḥ tapogra agra agraja dharmanābha gabhastinābha dharmaneme satyadhāma
GE07hv_apppu:24163_8: satyākṣara gabhastineme vipāpman candraratha tvam eva samudravāsī aja ekapāt sahasraśīrṣa
GE07hv_apppu:24163_9: sahasrasaṃmita mahāśīrṣa sahasradṛk sahasrapāt adhomukha mahāmukha mahāpuruṣa puruṣottama
GE07hv_apppu:24163_10: sahasrabāho sahasramūrte sahasrāsya sahasrākṣa sahasrabhuja sahasrabhuva sahasraśas
GE07hv_apppu:24164: //* viśvadeva viśvasaṃbhava sarveṣām eva devānāṃ saubhaga ādau gatiḥ viśvaṃ tvam āpyāyanaḥ viśvaṃ tvām āhuḥ puṣpahāsa paramavaradas tvam eva tvam eva vauṣaṭ *//
GE07hv_apppu:24165: //* oṃkāra vaṣaṭkāraṃ tvām ekam āhur agryaṃ makhabhāgaprāśinam *//
GE07hv_apppu:24166: //* śatadhāra sahasradhāra bhūrda bhuvarda svarda bhūrbhuvaḥsvarda tvam eva bhūtaṃ bhuvanaṃ tvaṃ svadhā tvam eva brahmaśaya brahmamaya brahmādis tvam eva *//
GE07hv_apppu:24167: //* dyaur asi pṛthivy asi pūṣāsi mātariśvāsi dharmo 'si maghavāsi hotā potā netā hantā mantā homyahotā parātparas tvaṃ homyahotā tvam eva *//
GE07hv_apppu:24168_0: //* āpo 'si viśvavāk dhātrā parameṇa dhāmnā tvam eva digbhyaḥ sruk srugbhāṇḍa ijyo
GE07hv_apppu:24168_1: 'si īḍyo 'si tvaṣṭā tvam eva samiddhaḥ tvam eva gatir gatimatām asi mokṣo 'si yogo
GE07hv_apppu:24168_2: 'si guhyo 'si siddho 'si dhanyo 'si dhātāsi paramo 'si yajño 'si somo 'si yūpo 'si
GE07hv_apppu:24169_0: //* sthaviṣṭha sthavira viśvaturāṣāṭ hiraṇyagarbha hiraṇyanābha hiraṇyanārāyaṇa
GE07hv_apppu:24169_1: nārāyaṇāntara nṛṇām ayana ādityavarṇa ādityatejaḥ mahāpuruṣa surottama ādideva padmanābha
GE07hv_apppu:24169_2: padmeśaya padmākṣa padmagarbha hiraṇyāgrakeśa śukla viśvadeva viśvatomukha viśvākṣa
GE07hv_apppu:24170_0: //* bhūrivikrama cakrakrama tribhuvanasuvikrama svavikrama svarvikrama babhruḥ suvibhuḥ
GE07hv_apppu:24170_1: prabhākaraḥ śaṃbhuḥ svayaṃbhūś ca bhūtādiḥ bhūtātman mahābhūta viśvabhuk tvam eva
GE07hv_apppu:24170_2: viśvagoptāsi viśvaṃbhara pavitram asi havirviśārada haviḥkarmā amṛtendhana surāsuraguro
GE07hv_apppu:24170_3: mahādideva nṛdeva ūrdhvakarman pūtātman amṛteśa divaspṛk viśvasthapate ghṛtācy asi
GE07hv_apppu:24170_4: anantakarman druhiṇavaṃśa svavaṃśa viśvapās tvaṃ tvam eva viśvaṃ bibharṣi varārthino nas trāyasveti * //
GE07hv_apppu:24173: nārāyaṇas tu bhagavāñ śrutvemaṃ paramaṃ stavam / HV_App.I,42B.2611 /
GE07hv_apppu:24178: ākāśāc chuśruvur devā darśanaṃ nopalabhyate / HV_App.I,42B.2616 /
GE07hv_apppu:24179: śrīmān prītamanā devaḥ provāca prabur īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2617 //
GE07hv_apppu:24180: prīto 'smi vaḥ suraśreṣṭhāḥ sarve matto viniścayan / HV_App.I,42B.2618 /
GE07hv_apppu:24181: varaṃ vṛṇuta bhadraṃ vo varado 'smi surottamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2619 //
GE07hv_apppu:24183: yadaiva bhagavān prītaḥ sarveṣām amarottama / HV_App.I,42B.2620 /
GE07hv_apppu:24184: tadaiva kṛtakṛtyāḥ sma tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2621 //
GE07hv_apppu:24185: yadi prasanno bhagavān dātavyo vā paro yadi / HV_App.I,42B.2622 /
GE07hv_apppu:24187: adityāṃ vai mama śrīmān bhagavān astu vai sutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2624 //
GE07hv_apppu:24189: aditir devamātā ca etam evārtham uttamam / HV_App.I,42B.2625 /
GE07hv_apppu:24190: putrārthe varadaṃ prāha bhagavantaṃ varārthinī // HV_App.I,42B.2626 //
GE07hv_apppu:24191: yācate putrakāmā vai bhavān putro bhavatv iti / HV_App.I,42B.2627 /
GE07hv_apppu:24192: niḥśreyasārthaṃ sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ hi mahātmanām / HV_App.I,42B.2628 /
GE07hv_apppu:24193: bhrātā bhartā ca dhātā ca śaraṇaṃ ca bhavasva naḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2629 //
GE07hv_apppu:24194: adityāḥ putratāṃ yāte tvayi devāḥ savāsavāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2630 /
GE07hv_apppu:24197: tatas tān abravīd viṣṇur devān kaśyapam eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2632 /
GE07hv_apppu:24198: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.6 G3.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24199: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuta / **HV_App.I,42B.2632**175:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24200: sarveṣām eva yuṣmākaṃ ye bhaviṣyanti śatravaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2633 /
GE07hv_apppu:24201: muhūrtam api te sarve na sthāsyanti mamāgrataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2634 //
GE07hv_apppu:24203: parair mama sukhaṃ cāpi tat kariṣyāmi cādarāt // **HV_App.I,42B.2634**176:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:24204: parituṣṭo 'smi vo devā mamaivaṃ niyamena ca / **HV_App.I,42B.2634**176:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24207: hatvāsuragaṇān sarvān ye cānye devaśatravaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2635 /
GE07hv_apppu:24209: havyādāṃś ca surān sarvān kavyādāṃś ca pitṝn api // HV_App.I,42B.2637 //
GE07hv_apppu:24213: yathāmanīṣitaṃ kartā gacchadhvaṃ tvaṃ svam ālayam // HV_App.I,42B.2641 //
GE07hv_apppu:24214: evam ukte tu vacane viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / HV_App.I,42B.2642 /
GE07hv_apppu:24215: devāḥ prahṛṣṭamanasaḥ pūjayanti sma sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2643 /
GE07hv_apppu:24216: viśve devā mahātmānaḥ kaśyapo 'ditir eva ca // HV_App.I,42B.2644 //
GE07hv_apppu:24217: [k: K1 Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.4.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24218: sādhyā marudgaṇāś caiva śakraś caiva mahābalaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2644**177:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24219: namaskṛtya sureśāya tasmai devāya raṃhase / HV_App.I,42B.2645 /
GE07hv_apppu:24220: prayātāḥ prāgdiśaṃ divyaṃ vipulaṃ kaśyapāśramam // HV_App.I,42B.2646 //
GE07hv_apppu:24221: gatvā tam āśramaṃ tatra brahmarṣigaṇasevitam / HV_App.I,42B.2647 /
GE07hv_apppu:24222: ceruḥ svādhyāyaniratā adityā garbham īpsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2648 //
GE07hv_apppu:24223: aditir devamātā ca garbhaṃ dadhre 'titejasam / HV_App.I,42B.2649 /
GE07hv_apppu:24233: pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu prasūtā garbham uttamam / HV_App.I,42B.2651 /
GE07hv_apppu:24234: surāṇāṃ śaraṇaṃ devam asurāṇāṃ vināśanam // HV_App.I,42B.2652 //
GE07hv_apppu:24235: garbhasthena tu devena paritrātāḥ surās tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2653 /
GE07hv_apppu:24237: tasmiñ jāte tu deveśe trailokyasya sukhāvahe / HV_App.I,42B.2655 /
GE07hv_apppu:24243: prajānāṃ patayaḥ sapta sapta caiva maharṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2657 /
GE07hv_apppu:24244: tasya devasya jātasya namaskāraṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.2658 //
GE07hv_apppu:24249: marīcir aṅgirāś caiva pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2663 /
GE07hv_apppu:24250: dakṣaḥ prajāpatiś caiva namaskāraṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.2664 //
GE07hv_apppu:24251: aurvo vasiṣṭhaputraś ca stambaḥ kaśyapa eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2665 /
GE07hv_apppu:24252: kapīvān akapīvāṃś ca datto niścyavanas tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2666 //
GE07hv_apppu:24253: vasiṣṭhaputrāḥ saptāsan vāsiṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2667 /
GE07hv_apppu:24254: hiraṇyagarbhasya sutāḥ aurvāj jātāḥ sutejasaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2668 //
GE07hv_apppu:24255: gārgyaḥ pṛthus tathaivāgryo yāmyo vāmana eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2669 /
GE07hv_apppu:24256: devabāhur yadudhraś ca parjanyaś caiva somajaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2670 //
GE07hv_apppu:24257: hiraṇyaromā vedaśirāḥ satyanetras tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2671 /
GE07hv_apppu:24258: viśvo 'tiviśvaś cyavanaḥ sudhāmā virajās tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2672 /
GE07hv_apppu:24259: atināmā sahiṣṇuś ca namaskāram akurvata // HV_App.I,42B.2673 //
GE07hv_apppu:24261: upanṛtyanti deveśaṃ viṣṇum apsarasāṃ varāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2675 //
GE07hv_apppu:24263: bahubhiḥ saha gandharvaiḥ prāgāyata ca tumburuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2677 //
GE07hv_apppu:24264: mahāśrutiś citraśirā ūrṇāyur anaghas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2678 /
GE07hv_apppu:24265: gomāyuḥ sūryavarcāś ca somavarcāś ca saptamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2679 //
GE07hv_apppu:24266: yugapas tṛṇapaḥ kārṣṇir nandiś citrarathas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2680 /
GE07hv_apppu:24267: trayodaśaḥ śāliśirāḥ parjanyaś ca caturdaśa // HV_App.I,42B.2681 //
GE07hv_apppu:24268: kaliḥ pañcadaśaś cātra nāradaś caiva ṣoḍaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2682 /
GE07hv_apppu:24269: ṣaṭpañcāśad ime proktās tatraiva tu mahīpate // HV_App.I,42B.2683 //
GE07hv_apppu:24270: hāhā hūhūś ca gandharvau haṃsaś caiva mahādyutiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2684 /
GE07hv_apppu:24273: sarve te devagandharvā upagāyanti keśavam // HV_App.I,42B.2685 //
GE07hv_apppu:24276: nanṛtuś ca mahābhāgā jaguś cāyatalocanāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2688 /
GE07hv_apppu:24277: sumadhyāś cārumadhyāś ca priyamukhyo varānanāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2689 //
GE07hv_apppu:24278: anūkā ca tathā jāmī miśrakeśī alaṃbusā / HV_App.I,42B.2690 /
GE07hv_apppu:24279: marīciḥ śucikā caiva vidyutparṇā tilottamā / HV_App.I,42B.2691 /
GE07hv_apppu:24280: adrikā lakṣmaṇā caiva rambhā tadvanmanoramā // HV_App.I,42B.2692 //
GE07hv_apppu:24281: asitā ca subāhuś ca supriyā subhagā tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2693 /
GE07hv_apppu:24282: urvaśī citralekhā ca sugrīvā ca sulocanā // HV_App.I,42B.2694 //
GE07hv_apppu:24285: nandā sarasvatī caiva tathānyās tatra saṃpadāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2694**181:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24286: puṇḍarīkā sugandhā ca surathā ca pramāthinī / HV_App.I,42B.2695 /
GE07hv_apppu:24287: nandā sārasvatī caiva tathānyās tatra saṃghaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2696 //
GE07hv_apppu:24288: menakā sahajanyā ca parṇikā puñjikasthalā / HV_App.I,42B.2697 /
GE07hv_apppu:24289: etāś cāpsaraso 'nyāś ca pranṛtyanti sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2698 //
GE07hv_apppu:24290: dhātāryamā ca mitraś ca varuṇo 'ṃśo bhagas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2699 /
GE07hv_apppu:24291: indro vivasvān pūṣā ca tvaṣṭā ca savitā tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2700 /
GE07hv_apppu:24292: kathito viṣṇur ity evaṃ kāśyapeyo gaṇas tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2701 //
GE07hv_apppu:24293: ity ete dvādaśādityā jvalantaḥ sūryavarcasaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2702 /
GE07hv_apppu:24294: cakrus tasya sureśasya namaskāraṃ mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2703 //
GE07hv_apppu:24295: mṛgavyādhaś ca sarpaś ca nirṛtiś ca mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2704 /
GE07hv_apppu:24297: dahano 'atheśvaraś caiva kapālī ca viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,42B.2706 /
GE07hv_apppu:24298: sthāṇur bhagaś ca bhagavān rudras tatrāvatasthire // HV_App.I,42B.2707 //
GE07hv_apppu:24300: stāṇuś ca bhagavān rudras tathā ekādaśāpare / **HV_App.I,42B.2707**182:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24301: aśvinau vasavaś cāṣṭau marutaś ca mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2708 /
GE07hv_apppu:24302: viśvedevāś ca sādhyāś ca tasya prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2709 /
GE07hv_apppu:24304: kacchapaś cāpahantā ca takṣakaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2711 //
GE07hv_apppu:24307: adhṛṣyās tejasā yuktā mahākrodhā mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2712 /
GE07hv_apppu:24308: ete nāgā mahātmānas tasmai prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2713 //
GE07hv_apppu:24310: ete cānye ca bahavo nāgās tasya mahātmanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2713**184:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24312: tārkṣyaś cāriṣṭanemiś ca garuḍaś ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2714 /
GE07hv_apppu:24313: aruṇaś cāruṇiś caiva vainateyā hy upasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2715 //
GE07hv_apppu:24317: ṛṣayaḥ pitaraś caiva somapāś cāmbupāś ca ye // **HV_App.I,42B.2715**185:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:24318: trailokyam adahat kṛtsnaṃ sādhyā ye ca tapodhanāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2715**185:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:24320: pitāmahaś ca bhagavān svayam āgamya lokakṛt / HV_App.I,42B.2716 /
GE07hv_apppu:24323: prāha devaguruḥ śrīmān saha sarvair mahātmabhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2717 //
GE07hv_apppu:24324: yasmāt prasūyate lokaḥ prabhaviṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2718 /
GE07hv_apppu:24325: tasmāl lokeśvaraḥ śrīmān viṣṇur eva bhavatv ayam // HV_App.I,42B.2719 //
GE07hv_apppu:24326: evam uktvā tu bhagavān sārdhaṃ devarṣibhiḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2720 /
GE07hv_apppu:24327: namas kṛtvā sureśāya jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2721 //
GE07hv_apppu:24328: sa tu jātaḥ sureśānaḥ kaśyapasyātmajaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2722 /
GE07hv_apppu:24331: utphullalocanāḥ sarvāḥ paśyanty apsarasas tadā // HV_App.I,42B.2725 //
GE07hv_apppu:24333: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2727 //
GE07hv_apppu:24334: surarṣipratimaḥ śrīmān bhūr bhuvo bhūtabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2728 /
GE07hv_apppu:24336: yo gatiḥ puṇyakīrtīnām agatiḥ pāpakarmiṇām / HV_App.I,42B.2730 /
GE07hv_apppu:24337: yogasiddhaṃ mahātmānaṃ yaṃ vidur yogam uttamam // HV_App.I,42B.2731 //
GE07hv_apppu:24338: yasyāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryaṃ yam āhur devasattamam / HV_App.I,42B.2732 /
GE07hv_apppu:24339: yaṃ prāpya śāśvataṃ viprā niyatā mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2733 /
GE07hv_apppu:24342: yaṃ prāhuḥ śāśvataṃ divyaṃ gīyatāṃ mokṣakāñkṣiṇaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2733**187:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24343: janmato maraṇāc caiva mucyante bhavabhīravaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2734 //
GE07hv_apppu:24344: yad etat tapa ity āhuḥ sarvāśrayanivāsinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2735 /
GE07hv_apppu:24345: sevante yaṃ yatāhārā duścaraṃ vratam āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2736 //
GE07hv_apppu:24346: yo 'nanta iti nāgeṣu sevyate sarvabhogibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2737 /
GE07hv_apppu:24348: yo yajña iti viprendrair ijyate svargalipsubhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2739 /
GE07hv_apppu:24349: nānāsthānagataḥ śrīmān ekaḥ kavir anuttamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2740 //
GE07hv_apppu:24350: yaṃ vedā gānti vettāraṃ yajñabhāgapradāyinam / HV_App.I,42B.2741 /
GE07hv_apppu:24352: sa prāha tridaśān sarvān vācā vai parayā vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2743 /
GE07hv_apppu:24353: jānann api mahātejā gato yogena bālatām // HV_App.I,42B.2744 //
GE07hv_apppu:24354: kiṃ karomi suraśreṣṭhāḥ kaṃ varaṃ ca dadāmi vaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2745 /
GE07hv_apppu:24355: yat kāṅkṣitaṃ vaḥ sarveṣāṃ tad vai brūta mudā yutāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2746 //
GE07hv_apppu:24356: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāmanasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2747 /
GE07hv_apppu:24357: sarve te hṛṣṭamanaso devāḥ kaśyapanandanāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2748 /
GE07hv_apppu:24358: ūcuḥ prāñjalayo viṣṇuṃ surāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2749 //
GE07hv_apppu:24359: brahmaṇo varadānena hṛtaṃ no nikhilaṃ jagat / HV_App.I,42B.2750 /
GE07hv_apppu:24360: tapasā mahatā caiva vikrameṇa damena ca // HV_App.I,42B.2751 //
GE07hv_apppu:24362: avadhyaḥ kila sarveśāṃ so 'smākaṃ devasattama // HV_App.I,42B.2753 //
GE07hv_apppu:24363: bhavān prabhavate tasya nānyaḥ kaścana suvrata / HV_App.I,42B.2754 /
GE07hv_apppu:24364: tat prapadyāmahe sarvaṃ bhavantaṃ śaraṇārthinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2755 /
GE07hv_apppu:24366: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca hitārthāya lokānāṃ ca sureśvara // HV_App.I,42B.2757 //
GE07hv_apppu:24367: priyārthaṃ ca tathādityāḥ kaśyapasya tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42B.2758 //
GE07hv_apppu:24368: kavyaṃ pitṝṇām ucitaṃ surāṇāṃ havyam uttamam / HV_App.I,42B.2759 /
GE07hv_apppu:24370: asmākaṃ ca hitārthāya trailokyasya ca sattama / **HV_App.I,42B.2759**188:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24373: priyahetor adityāś ca kāśyapasya tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,42B.2760**189:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24375: pratyānaya mahendrasya trailokyam idam avyayam // HV_App.I,42B.2762 //
GE07hv_apppu:24376: kratunā vājimeghena yajate sa hi dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2763 /
GE07hv_apppu:24379: asmin sthāne tu te nātha trailokyasya gataiḥ saha / **HV_App.I,42B.2763**190:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24380: yat pratyānayane yuktaṃ lokānāṃ tad vicintaya // HV_App.I,42B.2764 //
GE07hv_apppu:24381: evam uktas tadā devair viṣṇur vāmanarūpadhṛk / HV_App.I,42B.2765 /
GE07hv_apppu:24382: praharṣayann uvācātha sarvān devān idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2766 //
GE07hv_apppu:24383: tasya yajñasakāśaṃ māṃ maharṣir vedapāragaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2767 /
GE07hv_apppu:24387: tato bṛhaspatiḥ śrīmān anayad vāmanaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,42B.2771 /
GE07hv_apppu:24389: mauñjī yajñopavītī ca chatrī daṇḍī dhvajī tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2773 /
GE07hv_apppu:24391: taṃ gatvā yajñavāṭaṃ tu brahmarṣigaṇasevitam / HV_App.I,42B.2775 /
GE07hv_apppu:24393: praviśann eva sa śrīmān yajñavāṭaṃ sureśvaraḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2775**191:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24394: ātmānam eva bhagavān varṇayām āsa taṃ kratum // HV_App.I,42B.2776 //
GE07hv_apppu:24395: [k: After line 2776, K1 Ñ2 V1. 3 B Dn Ds D3. 4. 6 T1. 2 G1. 3-5 M2. 4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24408: ārād atha bales tasya ṛtvijām abhitas tathā / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:13 /
GE07hv_apppu:24409: yajñam ātmānam evāsau hetubhiḥ kāraṇair vibhuḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:14 //
GE07hv_apppu:24410: vaidikair aprakāśaiś ca punar apy atha bhārata / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:15 /
GE07hv_apppu:24412: tato niruttarān dṛṣṭvā sopādhyāyān ṛṣīṃś ca tān / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:17 /
GE07hv_apppu:24414: adbhutaṃ cāpi mene sa virocanasuto balī / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:19 /
GE07hv_apppu:24415: mūrdhnā kṛtāñjaliś cedam abravīd dhṛṣṭavad vacaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:20 //
GE07hv_apppu:24416: kutas tvaṃ ko 'si kasyāsi kiṃ cehāsti prayojanam / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:21 /
GE07hv_apppu:24420: nedṛśāḥ santi devānām ṛṣīṇām api sūnavaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:25 /
GE07hv_apppu:24421: na nāgānāṃ na yakṣāṇāṃ nāsurāṇāṃ na rakṣasām // **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:26 //
GE07hv_apppu:24422: na pitṝnāṃ na siddhānāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:27 /
GE07hv_apppu:24423: yo 'si so 'si namaste 'stu brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te // **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:28 //
GE07hv_apppu:24424: ukta evaṃ hy acintyātmā balinā vāmanas tadā / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:29 /
GE07hv_apppu:24428: sureśvarasya śakrasya yamasya varuṇasya ca / HV_App.I,42B.2779 /
GE07hv_apppu:24429: viśeṣitās tvayā yajñā dānavendra mahābala // HV_App.I,42B.2780 //
GE07hv_apppu:24430: yajatā vājimeghena kratūnāṃ pravareṇa ha / HV_App.I,42B.2781 /
GE07hv_apppu:24432: sarvakāmamayo hy eṣa saṃmato brahmavādinām / HV_App.I,42B.2783 /
GE07hv_apppu:24433: kratūnāṃ pravaraḥ śrīmān aśvamedha iti smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2784 //
GE07hv_apppu:24437: sa viśvayoniḥ paramo hi medhyaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2788 //
GE07hv_apppu:24440: yam āhur vai vedavido dvijendrā @ HV_App.I,42B.2791 @
GE07hv_apppu:24443: yathā nṛṇāṃ pravarā brāhmaṇāś ca / HV_App.I,42B.2794 /
GE07hv_apppu:24446: etac chrutvā tu daityendro vāmanena samīritam / HV_App.I,42B.2797 /
GE07hv_apppu:24447: mudā paramayā yuktaḥ prāha daityapatir baliḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2798 //
GE07hv_apppu:24448: kasyāsi brāhmaṇaśreṣṭha kim icchasi dadāmi te / HV_App.I,42B.2799 /
GE07hv_apppu:24449: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi // HV_App.I,42B.2800 //
GE07hv_apppu:24451: na rājyaṃ na ca yānāni na ratnāni na ca striyaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2801 /
GE07hv_apppu:24452: kāmaye yadi tuṣṭo 'si dharme ca yadi te matiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2802 //
GE07hv_apppu:24453: gurvarthaṃ me grayacchasva padāni trīṇi dānava / HV_App.I,42B.2803 /
GE07hv_apppu:24454: tvam agniśaraṇārthāya eṣa me paramo varaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2804 //
GE07hv_apppu:24456: vāmanasya vacaḥ śrutvā prāha daityapatir baliḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2804**193:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24457: [k: While D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2804 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24461: tribhiḥ kiṃ tava viprendra padaiḥ pravadatāṃ vara / HV_App.I,42B.2805 /
GE07hv_apppu:24462: śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ padānāṃ mārgatāṃ bhavān // HV_App.I,42B.2806 //
GE07hv_apppu:24464: mā dadasva mahābāho na taṃ vetsi mahāsura / HV_App.I,42B.2807 /
GE07hv_apppu:24465: eṣa māyāpraticchanno bhagavān pravaro hariḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2808 //
GE07hv_apppu:24467: tvāṃ vañcayitum āyāto baṭurūpadharo vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2810 //
GE07hv_apppu:24468: evam uktaḥ sa śukreṇa ciraṃ saṃcintya vai baliḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2811 /
GE07hv_apppu:24470: balir dānavarājas tu avajñāya tu tad vacaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2811**195:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24471: praharṣeṇa samāyuktaḥ kiṃ ataḥ pātram iṣyate // HV_App.I,42B.2812 //
GE07hv_apppu:24472: gṛhya haste tv asaṃbhrānto bhṛṅgāraṃ kanakāmayam / HV_App.I,42B.2813 /
GE07hv_apppu:24474: viprendra prāṅmukhas tiṣṭha sthito 'si kamalekṣaṇa // HV_App.I,42B.2814 //
GE07hv_apppu:24475: pratīccha dehi kiṃ bhūmiṃ kiṃmātrā bhoḥ padatrayam / HV_App.I,42B.2815 /
GE07hv_apppu:24476: dattaṃ vaḥ pātaya jalaṃ naiva mithyā bhaved guruḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2816 //
GE07hv_apppu:24478: bho na deyaṃ kuto daitya vijñāto 'yaṃ yathā dhruvam / HV_App.I,42B.2817 /
GE07hv_apppu:24479: ko 'yaṃ viṣṇur aho prītir vañcitas tvaṃ na vañcitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2818 //
GE07hv_apppu:24481: kathaṃ sa nātho 'yaṃ viṣṇur yajñe svayam upasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2819 /
GE07hv_apppu:24482: dāsyāmi devadevāya yad yad icchaty ayaṃ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2820 //
GE07hv_apppu:24483: ko vānyaḥ pātrabhūto 'smād viṣṇoḥ parataraṃ bhavet / HV_App.I,42B.2821 /
GE07hv_apppu:24484: evam uktvā baliḥ śīghraṃ pātayām āsa vai jalam // HV_App.I,42B.2822 //
GE07hv_apppu:24486: padāni trīṇi daityendra paryāptāni mamānagha / HV_App.I,42B.2823 /
GE07hv_apppu:24487: yan mayā pūrvam uktaṃ hi tat tathā na tad anyathā // HV_App.I,42B.2824 //
GE07hv_apppu:24488: [k: After line 2824, K1 Ñ2 V1.3 B Dn Ds D4.6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24490: ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāmanasya mahaujasaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24492: evam astv iti daityeśo vākyam uktvārisūdanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:24494: vāmano hy asurendrasya cikīrṣuḥ kadanaṃ mahat / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:24496: prāṅmukhaś cāpi daityeśas tasmai sumanasā jalam / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:24497: dātukāmaḥ kare yāvat tāvat taṃ pratyabodhayat // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:24500: iṅgitajño 'grataḥ sthitvā prahrādas tv abravīd vacaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:11 //
GE07hv_apppu:24502: mā dadasva jalaṃ haste baṭor vāmanarūpiṇaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:12 /
GE07hv_apppu:24503: sa tv asau yena te pūrvaṃ nihataḥ prapitāmahaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:13 /
GE07hv_apppu:24504: viṣṇur eva mahāprājñas tvāṃ vañcayitum āgataḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:14 //
GE07hv_apppu:24511: devāya pradadau tasmai padāni trīṇi viṣṇave // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:20 //
GE07hv_apppu:24513: dānaveśvara mā dās tvaṃ viprāyāsmai pratigraham / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:21 /
GE07hv_apppu:24514: nainaṃ vipraśiśuṃ manye nedṛśo bhavati dvijaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:22 //
GE07hv_apppu:24515: rūpeṇānena daityendra satyam etad bravīmi te / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:23 /
GE07hv_apppu:24516: nārasiṃham ahaṃ manye tam eva punar āgatam // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:24 //
GE07hv_apppu:24518: prahrādam abravīd vākyam idaṃ nirbhartsayann iva // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:26 //
GE07hv_apppu:24520: dehīti yācate yo hi pratyākhyāti ca yo 'sura / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:27 /
GE07hv_apppu:24521: ubhayor apy alakṣyā vai bhāgas taṃ viśate naram // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:28 //
GE07hv_apppu:24522: pratijñāya tu yo vipre na dadāti pratigraham / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:29 /
GE07hv_apppu:24525: pratigrahītā cāpy anyaḥ kaścid asmād dvijo 'tha vai // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:32 //
GE07hv_apppu:24526: nādhiko vidyate yasmāt tad dadāmi vasuṃdharām / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:33 /
GE07hv_apppu:24527: hṛdayasya ca me tuṣṭiḥ parā bhavati dānava // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:34 //
GE07hv_apppu:24529: eṣa tasmāt pradāsyāmi na sthāsyāmi nivāritaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:36 //
GE07hv_apppu:24530: bhūyaś ca prābravīd enaṃ vāmanaṃ baṭurūpiṇam / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:37 /
GE07hv_apppu:24532: svalpaiḥ svalpamate kiṃ te padais tribhir anuttamam / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:38 /
GE07hv_apppu:24533: kṛtsnāṃ dadāmi te vipra pṛthivīṃ sāgarair vṛtām // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:39 //
GE07hv_apppu:24535: na pṛthvīṃ kāmaye kṛtsnāṃ saṃtuṣṭo 'smi padais tribhiḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:40 /
GE07hv_apppu:24536: eṣa eva ruciṣyo me varo dānavasattama / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:41 /
GE07hv_apppu:24538: kṛtvārdhaṃ tanu siṃhasya narasyaiva paraṃ tathā / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196A:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24543: eka eva asau devaḥ kāryārthe bahutāṃ gataḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196A:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:24544: āpo bhūḥ khaṃ sarṣigaṇā devā jyotir gaṇādayaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196A:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:24546: yad aṃśabhūtāḥ sarve te sa eva punar āgataḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196A:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:24547: ātmānaṃ baṭum āsthāya yayāca tvāṃ sureśvara / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196A:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:24548: na deyaṃ hi na deyaṃ hi iti me niścitā matiḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196A:10 /
GE07hv_apppu:24550: sa kathaṃ yācate māṃ tu baṭur bhūtvā hariḥ svayam / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196B:11 /
GE07hv_apppu:24551: padāni trīṇi daityendra yajñavāṭe tataḥ punaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196B:12 //
GE07hv_apppu:24552: na vidyate sukṛtaṃ tāta yena sa dṛṣṭim āgataḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196B:13 /

GE07hv_apppu:24865: brāhmaṇāḥ svasti vo nityaṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit / **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:13 /
GE07hv_apppu:24867: ity uktvā jāmbavān ṛkṣaḥ sthito meroś ca mastake / **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:15 /
GE07hv_apppu:24868: samāghnan bahuśas tūryam ājñayā keśavasya hi // **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:16 //
GE07hv_apppu:24869: tasya bherīravaṃ sarvaṃ jagad vikṣobhya saṃsthitam / **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:17 /
GE07hv_apppu:24870: pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ ca pātālaṃ ca samaspṛśat // **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:18 //
GE07hv_apppu:24875: bhagavān api rājyānāṃ pravibhāgaṃ cakāra ha / HV_App.I,42B.2959 /
GE07hv_apppu:24876: dadau pūrvāṃ diśaṃ caindrīṃ śakrāyāmitatejase // HV_App.I,42B.2960 //
GE07hv_apppu:24877: yāmyāṃ yamāya devāya pitṛrājñe mahātmane // HV_App.I,42B.2961 //
GE07hv_apppu:24878: paścimām tu diśaṃ prādād varuṇāya mahātmane / HV_App.I,42B.2962 /
GE07hv_apppu:24879: uttarāṃ ca kuberāya yakṣādhipataye diśam / HV_App.I,42B.2963 /
GE07hv_apppu:24880: aghastān nāgarājāya somāyordhvāṃ diśaṃ dadau // HV_App.I,42B.2964 //
GE07hv_apppu:24881: evaṃ vibhajya trailokyaṃ viṣṇur balavatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2965 /
GE07hv_apppu:24884: [k: V1.3 B1.3 Ds D6 ins. after line 2965:k]
GE07hv_apppu:24886: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2965 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24887: akṣayaṃ cāmṛtatvaṃ ca dadau jāmbavate hariḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2965**229:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24889: jagāma tridivaṃ devaḥ pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2966 /
GE07hv_apppu:24891: nāradena jagannāthaḥ stūto devaiś ca pūjitaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2966**230:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24895: iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ vāmanatvaṃ yathāgatam / **HV_App.I,44B.2967**231:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24896: hariḥ sarveśvaro viṣṇuḥ prāptaṃ devair yathā divam / **HV_App.I,44B.2967**231:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:24898: sarve mumudire devāḥ puraskṛtya śatakratum // HV_App.I,42B.2969 //
GE07hv_apppu:24899: gate tu tridivaṃ kṛṣṇe badhvā vairocaniṃ balim / HV_App.I,42B.2970 /
GE07hv_apppu:24903: sa taṃ kṛcchragataṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpayābhipariplutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2974 /
GE07hv_apppu:24904: uvāca dānavaśreṣṭhaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ dadāmi te // HV_App.I,42B.2975 //
GE07hv_apppu:24908: tadgatas tanmanā bhūtvā drutaṃ mokṣam avāpsyasi // HV_App.I,42B.2979 //
GE07hv_apppu:24909: tato virocanasutaḥ prāñjaliḥ prayataḥ śuciḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2980 /
GE07hv_apppu:24911: tam adhītya stavaṃ divyaṃ nāradena samīritam / HV_App.I,42B.2982 /
GE07hv_apppu:24912: pṛthivī coddhṛtā yena taṃ jajāpa mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2983 //
GE07hv_apppu:24913: auṃ namo 'stv anantapataye akṣayāya mahātmane / HV_App.I,42B.2984 /
GE07hv_apppu:24915: saptasūryavapuḥ kṛtvā trīṃl lokān krāntavān asi / HV_App.I,42B.2986 /
GE07hv_apppu:24916: bhagavan kālakālas tvaṃ tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2987 //
GE07hv_apppu:24918: punaś cintayase lokāṃs tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2989 //
GE07hv_apppu:24920: tvatsthā dṛṣṭā dvijendreṇa tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2991 //
GE07hv_apppu:24921: mārkaṇḍena purākalpe praviśya jaṭharaṃ tava / HV_App.I,42B.2992 /
GE07hv_apppu:24922: carācaragataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2993 //
GE07hv_apppu:24923: eko vidyāsahāyas tvaṃ yogī yogam upāgataḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2994 /
GE07hv_apppu:24924: punas trailokyam utsṛjya tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2995 //
GE07hv_apppu:24926: lokāṃś cintayase bhūyas tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2997 //
GE07hv_apppu:24928: dharā jaloddhṛtā yena tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2999 //
GE07hv_apppu:24929: uddhṛtya daṃṣṭrayā yajñāṃs tripiṇḍān kṛtavān asi / HV_App.I,42B.3000 /
GE07hv_apppu:24931: tvaṃ pitṝṇām api hare tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3001 //
GE07hv_apppu:24933: paritrātās tvayā deva tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3003 //
GE07hv_apppu:24935: śiro jahāra cakreṇa tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3005 //
GE07hv_apppu:24937: huṃkāreṇa hato daityas tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3007 //
GE07hv_apppu:24938: dānavābhyāṃ hṛtā vedā brahmaṇaḥ paśyataḥ purā / HV_App.I,42B.3008 /
GE07hv_apppu:24939: paritrātās tvayā deva tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3009 //
GE07hv_apppu:24940: kṛtvā hayaśirorūpam hatvā tu madhukaiṭabhau / HV_App.I,42B.3010 /
GE07hv_apppu:24941: brahmaṇe te 'rpitā vedās tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3011 //
GE07hv_apppu:24943: antaṃ tava na paśyanti tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3013 //
GE07hv_apppu:24944: apāntaratamā nāma jāto devasya vai sutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3014 /
GE07hv_apppu:24945: kṛtāś ca tena vedārthās tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3015 //
GE07hv_apppu:24947: rahasyaṃ tava devasya tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3017 //
GE07hv_apppu:24948: ṛṣir dhīrghatamā nāma jātyandho guruśāpataḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3018 /
GE07hv_apppu:24949: tvatprasādāc ca cakṣuṣmāṃs tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3019 //
GE07hv_apppu:24950: grāhagrastaṃ gajendraṃ ca dīnaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatam / HV_App.I,42B.3020 /
GE07hv_apppu:24951: bhaktaṃ mokṣitavāṃs tvaṃ hi tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3021 //
GE07hv_apppu:24952: akṣayaś cāvyayaś ca tvaṃ brahmaṇyo bhaktavatsalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3022 /
GE07hv_apppu:24953: ucchritānāṃ niyantāsi tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3023 //
GE07hv_apppu:24954: śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ śārṅgaṃ garuḍam eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.3024 /
GE07hv_apppu:24955: prasādayāmi śirasā te bandhān mokṣayantu mām // HV_App.I,42B.3025 //
GE07hv_apppu:24957: hariṃ prasādayām āsur baliṃ mokṣaya bandhanāt // HV_App.I,42B.3027 //
GE07hv_apppu:24958: tataḥ prasanno bhagavān ādideśa khageśvaram / HV_App.I,42B.3028 /
GE07hv_apppu:24959: garuḍaṃ nāgahantāraṃ baliṃ mokṣaya bandhanāt // HV_App.I,42B.3029 //
GE07hv_apppu:24961: jagāma vasudhāmūlaṃ yatrāste saṃyato baliḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3031 //
GE07hv_apppu:24962: āgamaṃ tasya vijñāya nāgā muktvā mahāsuram / HV_App.I,42B.3032 /
GE07hv_apppu:24966: dānavendra mahābāho viṣṇus tvām abravīt prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3036 /
GE07hv_apppu:24968: itasvayā na gantavyaṃ gavyūtim api dānava / HV_App.I,42B.3038 /
GE07hv_apppu:24969: samayaṃ yadi bhindyās tvaṃ mūrdhā te śatadhā vrajet // HV_App.I,42B.3039 //
GE07hv_apppu:24971: sthito 'smi samaye tasya anantasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3041 //
GE07hv_apppu:24972: jīvyopāyaṃ tu bhagavān mama kiṃcit karotu saḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3042 /
GE07hv_apppu:24974: bales tu vacanaṃ śrutvā garutmān idam abravit / HV_App.I,42B.3044 /
GE07hv_apppu:24975: pūrvam eva kṛtas tena jīvyopāyo mahātmanā // HV_App.I,42B.3045 //
GE07hv_apppu:24976: pravartiṣyanti ye yajñā vidhihīnā hy anṛtvijaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3046 /
GE07hv_apppu:24977: prāyaścittam ajānanto yajñabhāgas tatas tava // HV_App.I,42B.3047 //
GE07hv_apppu:24978: na teṣāṃ yajñabhāgaṃ vai pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3048 /
GE07hv_apppu:24980: saṃdeśam etaṃ bhagavān dattavān kaśyapātmajaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3050 /
GE07hv_apppu:24983: yaḥ paṭheta naro bhaktyā tasya naśyati kilbiṣam // HV_App.I,42B.3053 //
GE07hv_apppu:24985: aputro labhate putraṃ kanyā caivepsitaṃ patim / HV_App.I,42B.3055 /
GE07hv_apppu:24986: lagnagarbhāt pramucyeta garbhiṇī janayet sutam // HV_App.I,42B.3056 //
GE07hv_apppu:24987: ye ca mokṣaiṣiṇo loke yoginaḥ sāṃkhyakāpilāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3057 /
GE07hv_apppu:24989: sarvakāmaprado hy eṣa stavo 'nantasya kīrtyate // HV_App.I,42B.3059 //
GE07hv_apppu:24990: yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3060 /
GE07hv_apppu:24991: sarvakāmam avāpnoti mānavo nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3061 //
GE07hv_apppu:24992: eṣa vai vāmano nāma prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3062 /
GE07hv_apppu:24993: vedavidbhir dvijair eva paṭhyate vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3063 //
GE07hv_apppu:24994: yas tv imaṃ vāmanaṃ divyaṃ prādurbhāvaṃ mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3064 /
GE07hv_apppu:24995: śṛṇuyān niyato bhaktyā sadā parvasu parvasu // HV_App.I,42B.3065 //
GE07hv_apppu:24996: parān vijayate rājā yathā viṣṇur mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3066 /
GE07hv_apppu:24997: yaśo vipulam āpnoti vipulaṃ cāpnute vasu // HV_App.I,42B.3067 //
GE07hv_apppu:24998: priyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāmano yathā / HV_App.I,42B.3068 /
GE07hv_apppu:25003: T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 ins. after line 3068,
GE07hv_apppu:25005: paṭhan nityam idaṃ sarvaṃ caritaṃ vāmanasya ha / **HV_App.I,42B.3068**233:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25006: bhaktyā niṣkalmaṣo bhūtvā dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt / **HV_App.I,42B.3068**233:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25007: [k: T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 cont., G3.4 ins. after line 3070:k]
GE07hv_apppu:25008: cintayed vāmanaṃ nityaṃ śriyaḥ prāptuṃ yad icchasi / **HV_App.I,42B.3068**234:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25009: śrāvayed divyam ākhyānaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dine dine / **HV_App.I,42B.3068**234:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25012: prīyate paṭhataś cāsya devadevo janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3070 /
GE07hv_apppu:25015: abhīkṣṇaṃ garbhiṇī śrutvā namasyati ca vāmanam / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25017: yas tv imāṃ harivaṃśasya saṃhitāṃ nikhilāṃ paṭhet / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:25018: so 'sukṣaye brahmalokaṃ gantā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:25020: pitāmahaḥ pitā caiva viṣṇur eva na saṃśayaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:25023: manasā karmaṇā vācā dveṣam eteṣu varjayet / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:25024: pretyānantyaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkte iha caiva na saṃśayaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:10 //
GE07hv_apppu:25026: ko hy anyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣān mahābhāratakṛd bhavet // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:12 //
GE07hv_apppu:25027: dharmāṇāṃ bhāvināṃ caiva ko brūyāt tam ṛte prabhum / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:13 /
GE07hv_apppu:25028: vartatāṃ te mahāyajño yathā saṃkalpitas tvayā // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:14 //
GE07hv_apppu:25029: saṃkalpitāśvamedhas tvaṃ śrutvā dharmāṃś ca śāsvatān / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:15 /
GE07hv_apppu:25030: āyuṣo 'nte tapas taptvā gantāsi tvaṃ narādhipa // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:16 //
GE07hv_apppu:25031: etat te mahad ākhyānaṃ śrutvā tvaṃ pārthivottama / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:17 /
GE07hv_apppu:25033: prādurbhāvo vāmanasya kathitaś caiṣa te mayā / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:19 /
GE07hv_apppu:25034: rājarṣīṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca nāradasya ca saṃnidhau // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:20 //
GE07hv_apppu:25035: eṣā te vaiṣṇavī caryā mayā kārtsnyena kīrtitā / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:21 /
GE07hv_apppu:25037: āścaryaparvam akhilaṃ yo hīdaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:23 /
GE07hv_apppu:25038: nāśubhaṃ prāpnuyā[t] kiṃcid dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:24 //
GE07hv_apppu:25039: yaś cedaṃ brāhmaṇo 'dhīte śucir bhūtvā sanātanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:25 /
GE07hv_apppu:25043: ā brahmabhavanāc cāpi yaśaḥ khyātim asaṃśayam / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:29 /
GE07hv_apppu:25044: bhaviṣyati nṛpaśreṣṭha satyam etad bravīmi te // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:30 //
GE07hv_apppu:25048: śaunakād yair hi saṃkṣepād bistareṇa tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:34 /
GE07hv_apppu:25049: proktas te harivaṃśas tu kim anyat kathayāmi te / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:35 /
GE07hv_apppu:25051: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 43, transliterated by H. Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:25054: [k: K1 V1.3 B Dn Ds D3-5 cont. after Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25056: V2 after line 13 of Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25057: No. 41; D6 cont. after Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25061: tryakṣād vadham ahaṃ brahmañ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ / HV_App.I,43.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25064: śṛṇu vistarataḥ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi naidhanam / HV_App.I,43.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:25066: śaṃkareṇa vadhaṃ rājañ śūlais tribhir ajihmagaiḥ / HV_App.I,43.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:25071: maṇibhiś ca prakāśadbhiḥ sarvaratnaiś ca toraṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,43.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:25072: babhāse nabhaso madhye śriyā paramayā jvalat / HV_App.I,43.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:25073: gandharvāṇām ivodagraṃ karmaṇā sādhitaṃ puraṃ // HV_App.I,43.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:25075: puraṃ prabhākaraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ manobhiḥ kāmacāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,43.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:25076: dhāvanto hreṣamāṇās te vikramaiḥ prāṇasaṃbhṛtaiḥ / HV_App.I,43.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:25083: bhavanair bahuvarṇaiś ca prāṃśubhiḥ samalaṃkṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,43.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:25091: babhau valgujanākīrṇaṃ vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,43.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:25092: samuddhūtapatākaṃ tad asibhiś ca virājitam / HV_App.I,43.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:25093: rarāja tripuraṃ rājan mahadvidyud ivāmbaram // HV_App.I,43.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:25094: sūryanābhaś ca daityendraś candranābhaś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,43.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:25095: tathānye ca mahāvīryā dānavā baladarpitāḥ // HV_App.I,43.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:25096: mamṛduś ca babhañjuś ca mohitāḥ parameṣṭhinā / HV_App.I,43.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:25097: panthānaṃ devagamanaṃ pitṛyānaṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,43.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:25098: tair evam asurāgraiś ca pragṛhītaśarāsanaiḥ / HV_App.I,43.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:25101: brahmāṇam abhyadhāvanta sarve suragaṇās tathā / HV_App.I,43.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:25102: vivarṇavadanā dīnāś chinne ca gatikarmaṇi // HV_App.I,43.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:25105: teṣāṃ caiva vadhopāyaṃ vadasva vadatāṃ vara / HV_App.I,43.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:25106: yaṃ jñātvā bāhubalino vadhema samare parān // HV_App.I,43.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:25107: sāntvayitvātha varado brahmā provāca devatāḥ / HV_App.I,43.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:25109: gacchadhvam amarāḥ sarve rudram ārādhituṃ bhuvi / **HV_App.I,43.44**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25110: sa eva nigrahe śakto daityānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // **HV_App.I,43.44**2:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25112: tapasā tasya devasya samartho vai tato bhavet / **HV_App.I,43.44**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25116: sa eva hatvā tān sarvān kuśalaṃ vo vidhāsyati // **HV_App.I,43.44**4:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25117: śṛṇudhvaṃ devatāḥ sarvāḥ śatrupratikṛtiṃ parām / HV_App.I,43.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:25118: avadhyā dānavāḥ sarve ṛte śaṃkaram avyayam // HV_App.I,43.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:25119: pratigṛhya ca tadvākyaṃ manobhir vāgbhir eva ca / HV_App.I,43.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:25120: bhūmau prapedire sarve saha rudraiś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,43.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:25121: vindhyapāde ca merau ca madhye ca pṛthivītale / HV_App.I,43.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:25122: tapasogreṇa yogajñāḥ sarve te munayo 'bhavan / HV_App.I,43.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:25123: kāśyapeyā haraṃ prāptā japanto brahmasaṃhitāṃ / HV_App.I,43.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:25125: vinyastadarbhanicaye tāmraṃ lohaṃ ca bhūṣaṇam // HV_App.I,43.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:25126: paridhānāni carmāṇi mṛdūni ca śubhāni ca / HV_App.I,43.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:25129: te 'ntarikṣam athopetya viviśur māyayā vṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,43.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:25131: praṇipatyātha te dīnā bhagavantaṃ jagatpatim / HV_App.I,43.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:25133: havir dattam ivājñānād bhasmacchanneṣu vahniṣu / HV_App.I,43.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:25134: varadānaṃ vṛthāsmāsu bhagavan vimukhe tvayi // HV_App.I,43.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:25135: yathādeśaṃ yathākālaṃ kriyatāṃ brahmaṇo vacaḥ / HV_App.I,43.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:25136: yad uktaṃ devadevena khecarāṇāṃ samīpataḥ // HV_App.I,43.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:25143: evaṃ devavacobhiś ca bhāvino 'rthasya vai balāt / HV_App.I,43.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:25144: samanahyan mahādevo devaiḥ saha savāsavaiḥ // HV_App.I,43.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:25145: ādityā ratham āsthāya saṃnaddhāḥ samalaṃkṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,43.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:25146: sarve kāñcana varṇābhā babhur dīptā ivāgnayaḥ // HV_App.I,43.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:25147: rudreṇa sahitā rudrā dahanta iva tejasā / HV_App.I,43.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:25148: saṃnaddhāś cārumukuṭāḥ prāṃśavaḥ parvatā iva // HV_App.I,43.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:25149: viśve viśvena vapuṣā balinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,43.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:25151: ebhiḥ saha balādhyakṣaiḥ samantāt parivāritaḥ / HV_App.I,43.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:25152: tripuraṃ yodhayat tryakṣaḥ pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // HV_App.I,43.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:25153: atha daityā bhinnadehāḥ purāṭ ṭālagatā iva / HV_App.I,43.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:25154: nyapatan bhuvi dehais te viśīrṇā iva parvatāḥ // HV_App.I,43.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:25155: abhividdhāḥ praviddhāś ca cayāṭ ṭālagatā nṛpa / HV_App.I,43.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:25156: nyapatan daityasaṃghāś ca vajreṇeva hatā nagāḥ // HV_App.I,43.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:25157: asibhiś ca hatā devaiḥ śakticakraparaśvadhaiḥ / HV_App.I,43.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:25158: bāṇaiś ca bhinnamarmāṇo daityendrā yudhi gocare / HV_App.I,43.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:25159: prapetuḥ sahitā urvyāṃ chinnapakṣā ivācalāḥ // HV_App.I,43.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:25160: tatra saṃjñāṃ vyamuñcanta tena dīptena tejasā / HV_App.I,43.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:25162: nopālabhyanta cakṣurbhyām api divyena cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,43.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:25163: astaṃ prāpte dinakare surendrās te niśāmukhe / HV_App.I,43.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:25165: atha daityā jayaṃ prāptā niśāyāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,43.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:25166: vinedur vipulair nādair meghā iva mahāravāḥ // HV_App.I,43.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:25168: trāsitās tridaśāḥ sarve saṃgrāme jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,43.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:25170: virejuś ca jayaṃ prāptā uśanohavyabodhitāḥ / HV_App.I,43.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:25172: suraiś ca sahitaḥ sarvai ratham āsthāya śaṃkaraḥ / HV_App.I,43.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:25173: darpitān abhinad daityān prabhindann iva vai diśaḥ // HV_App.I,43.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:25174: yugāntakāle vitato raśmivān iva nirdahan / HV_App.I,43.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:25176: sa ratho vājibhiḥ śīghrair uhyamāno manojavaiḥ / HV_App.I,43.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:25177: vibabhau nabhaso madhye savidyud iva toyadaḥ // HV_App.I,43.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:25179: bhāti sma sa ratho rājan sendrāyudha ivāmbudaḥ // HV_App.I,43.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:25181: karmabhiḥ pūrvajaṃ pūrvaiḥ śucibhis tryambakaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,43.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:25184: gandharvāś copagāyanti gāndharveṇa svareṇa vai / HV_App.I,43.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:25185: prahṛṣṭavadanāḥ saumyāḥ paitrye sthānāntare nṛpa // HV_App.I,43.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:25188: tatas tu śaravarṣāṇi mumucur daityadānavāḥ / HV_App.I,43.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:25189: surāṇām arayo madhye tīkṣṇāgrāṇi samantataḥ // HV_App.I,43.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:25190: śataghnībhiś ca nighnanto bhallaiḥ śūlaiś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,43.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:25191: te cakrire mahatkarma dānavā yuddhakovidāḥ // HV_App.I,43.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:25192: gadābhiś ca gadā jaghnur bhallair bhallāṃś ca cicchiduḥ / HV_App.I,43.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:25193: astrair astrāṇy abādhanta māyāṃ māyābhir eva ca // HV_App.I,43.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:25195: aśanīś ca mahāghorā yuktāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,43.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:25197: te vadhyamānā vibudhāḥ śaravarṣair avasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,43.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:25200: daityapraharaṇais taiś ca gurubhir bhārasādibhiḥ / HV_App.I,43.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:25201: citraiś ca bahubhiḥ śastrair atiṣṭhata śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,43.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:25202: tato madhye divyaśabdaḥ prādur āsīn mahīpate / HV_App.I,43.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:25203: ṛṣīṇāṃ brahmaputrāṇāṃ mahatām api bhārata // HV_App.I,43.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:25204: sa eṣa śaṃkarasyāgre ratho bhūmiṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ / HV_App.I,43.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:25205: ajeyo jayyatāṃ prāptaḥ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,43.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:25206: tasmin nipatite rājan rathānāṃ pravare rathe / HV_App.I,43.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:25208: viceluḥ parvatāgrāṇi celuś caiva mahādrumāḥ / HV_App.I,43.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:25209: vicukṣubhuḥ samudrāś ca na rejuś ca diśo daśa // HV_App.I,43.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:25210: vṛddhāś ca brāhmaṇās tatra jepuś ca paramaṃ japam / HV_App.I,43.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:25211: yat tad brahmamayaṃ tejaḥ sarvatra vijayaiṣiṇām // HV_App.I,43.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:25212: śāntyartham iha bhūtānām iha loke paratra ca / HV_App.I,43.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:25215: tejasā jvalayan viṣṇos tryakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,43.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:25216: sarveṣāṃ caiva devānāṃ balināṃ kāmarūpiṇām / HV_App.I,43.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:25217: ṛṣīṇāṃ tapasāḍhyānāṃ vasatāṃ vijane vane // HV_App.I,43.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:25218: atha viṣṇur mahāyogī sarvato dṛṣya tattvataḥ / HV_App.I,43.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:25221: balavāṃs tolayitvā tu viṣāṇābhyāṃ mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,43.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:25224: nanāda balavan nādaṃ samudra iva parvaṇi // HV_App.I,43.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:25225: tato nādena vitrastā daiteyā yuddhadurmadāḥ / HV_App.I,43.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:25226: punas te kṛtasaṃnāhā yuyudhuḥ sumahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,43.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:25229: agniṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi taṃ ca bāṇaṃ suyantritam / HV_App.I,43.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:25231: mumuce daityanagare tridhā śabdena saṃjñitam // HV_App.I,43.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:25232: taṃ bāṇaṃ trividhaṃ vīryāt saṃdhāya manasā prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,43.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:25233: satyena brahmayogena tapogreṇa ca bhārata // HV_App.I,43.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:25235: dīptān kanakavarṇābhān suparṇāṃś ca sunirmalān // HV_App.I,43.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:25236: muktvā śaravarān ghorān saviṣān iva pannagān / HV_App.I,43.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:25237: supradīptais tribhir bāṇair vegibhis tad vidāritam // HV_App.I,43.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:25239: gopurāṇy asuraiḥ sārdhaṃ dahyamānāni bhārata / HV_App.I,43.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:25243: tāni tasya tu dagdhāni vaidūryasadṛśāni vai / HV_App.I,43.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:25244: nipetur dahyamānāni śikharāṇi girer iva / HV_App.I,43.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:25247: tatas tu vijayī rudraḥ sevyamāno maharṣibhiḥ / **HV_App.I,43.167**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25248: vṛṣarūpaṃ tadā viṣṇuṃ pūjayan prayayau girim // **HV_App.I,43.167**6:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25249: ya imaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ vijayaṃ śaṃkarasya ca / **HV_App.I,43.167**6:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:25250: sarvatra vijayaṃ prāptaḥ sa tu dīrghāyur āpnuyāt // **HV_App.I,43.167**6:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:25251: hate tu tripure devair vāco harṣāt kileritāḥ / HV_App.I,43.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:25252: sarvāñ jahīti śatrūṃs tvaṃ pravṛddhān puruṣottama // HV_App.I,43.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:25253: viṣṇur eva mahāyogī yogena prasmayann iva / HV_App.I,43.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:25254: stūyate brahmasadṛśair ṛṣibhiḥ śaṃkareṇa ca / HV_App.I,43.171 /
GE07hv_apppu:25257: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 44, transliterated by H. Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:25260: [k: K1 Ñ2 V1 B2 Dn Ds D4.5 cont. after Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25261: No. 43; K2 cont. after Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25262: No. 42B; D3 ins. after line 26 of Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25263: No. 45; D6 cont. after Appendix I, No. 40 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25265: harivaṃśe 'tra vṛttāntāḥ kramād ete ihoditāḥ // HV_App.I,44.1 //
GE07hv_apppu:25266: tatrādya ādisargas tu bhūtasargas tataḥ paraḥ / HV_App.I,44.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25267: pṛthor vainyasya cākhyānaṃ manūnāṃ kīrtanaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,44.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:25270: pitṛkalpas tathotpattiḥ somasya ca budhasya ca / HV_App.I,44.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:25277: saṃkṣepāt kīrtitā viṣṇoḥ prādurbhāvās tataḥ param // HV_App.I,44.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:25279: yoganidrāsamutthānaṃ viṣṇor vākyaṃ ca vedhasaḥ // HV_App.I,44.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:25280: pṛthvīvākyaṃ ca devānām aṃśāvataraṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,44.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:25284: tato nāradavākyaṃ ca svapnagarbhavidhis tathā // HV_App.I,44.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:25285: āryāstavaḥ punaḥ kṛṣṇa+ samutpattiḥ prapañcataḥ / HV_App.I,44.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:25286: govraje gamanaṃ viṣṇoḥ śakaṭasya nivartanam // HV_App.I,44.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:25287: pūtanāyā vadho bhaṅgo yamalārjunayor api / HV_App.I,44.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:25290: damanaṃ kāliyasyāpi dhenukasya vadhas tathā // HV_App.I,44.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:25291: pralambanidhanaṃ caiva śaradvarṇanam eva ca / HV_App.I,44.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:25295: andhakasya ca vākyāni keśino nidhanaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,44.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:25299: mālākāre mālyayācñā varadānaṃ ca tasya vai / **HV_App.I,44.27**3:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25302: dhanurbhaṇgasya kathanaṃ kaṃsavākyam ataḥ param / HV_App.I,44.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:25306: kaṃsasya nidhanaṃ cāpi vilāpaḥ kaṃsayoṣitām / HV_App.I,44.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:25312: vikadruvākyaṃ rāmasya darśanaṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,44.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:25314: gomantasya girer dāhaḥ karavīrapure gatiḥ / HV_App.I,44.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:25315: śṛgālasya vadhas tatra mathurāgamanaṃ tataḥ // HV_App.I,44.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:25317: upāyena vadhaḥ kāla+ yavanasya prakīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,44.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:25318: nirmāṇaṃ dvāravatyās tu rukmiṇīharaṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,44.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:25319: vivāhaś caiva rukmiṇyā rukmiṇo nidhanaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,44.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:25320: baladevāhnikaṃ puṇyaṃ balamāhātmyam eva ca / HV_App.I,44.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:25321: narakasya vadhaḥ pāri+ jātasya haraṇaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,44.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:25322: [k: K2, V1, D4 subst. for line 43 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25327: dvārakāyāṃ praveśaś ca sabhāyāṃ ca praveśanam // HV_App.I,44.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:25332: tataś chālikyagāndharva+ kam udāharaṇaṃ hareḥ / HV_App.I,44.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:25333: bhānoś ca duhitur bhānum atyāharaṇakīrtanam / HV_App.I,44.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:25337: śambarasya vadhaś caiva dhanyopākhyānam eva ca / HV_App.I,44.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:25340: bhaviṣyaṃ cātra dāhaś ca tripurasya udāhṛtaḥ / **HV_App.I,44.56**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25341: bhaviṣyaṃ puṣkaraṃ caiva prapañcenaiva kīrtitam / HV_App.I,44.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:25342: vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ ca vāmanaṃ bahuvistaram / HV_App.I,44.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:25343: [k: Dn Ds2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25362: loke sajjanaṣaṭpadair ahar ahaḥ pepīyamānaṃ mudā @ **HV_App.I,44.58**10:15 @
GE07hv_apppu:25368: //* **HV_App.I,44.58**10:21: iti śrīmanmahābhārate śatasahasrasaṃhitāyāṃ vaiyyāsakyāṃ pārijāte sakalaharicarite khilasaṃjñaṃ samāptam *//
GE07hv_apppu:25370: tripurasyāpi dāhaś ca iti vṛttāntasaṃgrahaḥ // HV_App.I,44.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:25375: [k: follows postscriptum in prose -- not transliterated. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25376: [k: V1 ins. *12 = lines 160-173 of Appendix I, No. 40. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25379: vṛttāntaṃ śṛṇuyād yas tu sāyaṃ prātaḥ samāhitaḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**13:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25380: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma labdhakāmaḥ kurūdvaha // **HV_App.I,44.59**13:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:25383: imāṃ ca saṃhitāṃ ceti sarvaśāstramayīṃ tathā / **HV_App.I,44.59**14:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25384: ekakālaṃ dvikālaṃ vā trikālaṃ vāpi yaḥ paṭhet // **HV_App.I,44.59**14:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25386: śivālaye tathā kṣetre naimiṣe puṣkare tathā // **HV_App.I,44.59**14:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:25387: śucir bhūtvā dampatī ca vācakaṃ pūjayet sudhīḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**14:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:25389: khilo viṣṇuḥ prasīdeta vācakaḥ paṭhanāt punaḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**14:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:25391: śrutvā ca labhate lakṣmīṃ saṃtatiṃ manasepsitāṃ / **HV_App.I,44.59**14:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:25397: kṛṣṇāt paraṃ kim api tattvam ahaṃ na jāne // **HV_App.I,44.59**14:15 //
GE07hv_apppu:25399: ya idaṃ śrāvayed vidvān samastaṃ tv ardham eva vā / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25400: pādamātraṃ tadardhaṃ vā tv ekaṃ cākhyānaṃ uttamam / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25401: sa namasyaḥ prayatnena viṣṇoḥ saṃprītaye sadā // **HV_App.I,44.59**15:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:25403: tasmai deyaṃ prayatnena viṣṇoḥ saṃprītaye sadā / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:25404: ya etat pustakaṃ ramyaṃ leṣayitvā samarpa .. / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:25406: atrākhyānāni yāvanti ślokā yāvanta eva hi / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:8 /
GE07hv_apppu:25408: yāvanty api ca mātrāṇi yāvantyaḥ patrapaṅkayaḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:10 /
GE07hv_apppu:25412: aputraḥ śṛṇuyād yas tu susnātaḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:14 /
GE07hv_apppu:25416: yasya viśveśvaras tuṣṭas tasmai tacchravaṇe matiḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:18 /
GE07hv_apppu:25418: tac chrotavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa paramaṃ padam icchatā / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:20 /
GE07hv_apppu:25423: [h: HV (CE) Appendix I, No. 45, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:25426: [k: Dn D3.5.6 cont. after App. I, No. 44 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25428: harivaṃśe purāṇe tu śrute munivarottama / HV_App.I,45.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25429: kiṃ phalaṃ kiṃ ca deyaṃ vai tad brūhi tvaṃ mamāgrataḥ // HV_App.I,45.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25431: harivaṃśe purāṇe tu śrute ca bharatottama / HV_App.I,45.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:25432: kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ caiva manasā samupārjitam / HV_App.I,45.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:25433: tat sarvaṃ nāśam āyāti himaṃ sūryodaye yathā // HV_App.I,45.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:25434: aṣṭādaśapurāṇānāṃ śravaṇād yat phalaṃ labhet / HV_App.I,45.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:25435: tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti vaiṣṇavo nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,45.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:25437: striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āpnuyuḥ / **HV_App.I,45.7**1:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25439: śṛṇvantaḥ śraddhayā yuktā vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āpnuyuḥ // HV_App.I,45.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:25440: jambūdvīpaṃ samāśritya śrotāro durlabhāḥ kalau / HV_App.I,45.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:25441: bhaviṣyanti narā rājan satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmy aham // HV_App.I,45.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:25442: strībhiś ca putrakāmābhiḥ śrotavyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ / HV_App.I,45.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:25443: dakṣiṇā cātra deyā vai niṣkatrayasuvarṇakam / HV_App.I,45.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:25444: vācakāya yathāśaktyā yathoktaṃ phalam icchatā // HV_App.I,45.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:25445: svarṇaśṛṅgīṃ ca kapilāṃ savatsāṃ vastrasaṃyutām / HV_App.I,45.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:25446: vācakāya pradadyād vai ātmanaḥ śreyakāṅkṣayā // HV_App.I,45.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:25447: alaṃkāraṃ pradadyāc ca pāṇyor vai bharatarṣabha / HV_App.I,45.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:25448: karṇasyābharaṇaṃ dadyād yānaṃ ca saviśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,45.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:25450: bhūmidānasamaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,45.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:25452: ghoṭakaṃ javinaṃ dadyād vṛṣaṃ ca dhuri yojitam / **HV_App.I,45.20**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25453: śṛṇoti śrāvayād vāpi harivaṃśaṃ tu yo naraḥ / HV_App.I,45.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:25456: kuṇḍale caiva dātavye ūrṇāvastraṃ tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,45.22**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25457: samāptau vidhivad vastraṃ deyaṃ kṣaumaṃ dvijātaye // **HV_App.I,45.22**3:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25458: pitṝn uddharate sarvān ekādaśa samudbhavān / HV_App.I,45.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:25459: ātmānaṃ sasutaṃ caiva striyaṃ ca bharatarṣabha / HV_App.I,45.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:25460: daśāṃśaś cātra homo vai kāryaḥ śrotrā narādhipa // HV_App.I,45.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:25461: idaṃ mayā tavāgre ca sarvaṃ proktaṃ nararṣabha / HV_App.I,45.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:25463: aputraḥ putram āpnoti adhano dhanam āpnuyāt // HV_App.I,45.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:25464: naramedhāśvamedhābhyāṃ yat phalaṃ prāpyate naraiḥ / HV_App.I,45.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:25465: tat phalaṃ labhate nūnaṃ purāṇaśravaṇād dhareḥ // HV_App.I,45.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:25466: brahmahā bhrūṇahā goghnaḥ surāpo gurutalpagaḥ / HV_App.I,45.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:25467: sakṛt purāṇaśravaṇāt pūto bhavati nānyathā // HV_App.I,45.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:25468: idaṃ mayā te parikīrtitaṃ mahac @ HV_App.I,45.33 @
GE07hv_apppu:25470: śṛṇvan paṭhann āśu samāpnuyāt phalaṃ @ HV_App.I,45.35 @
GE07hv_apppu:25471: yac cāpi lokeṣu sudurlabhaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,45.36 //
